genesis 1:1	braSit bra alhim at hSmim oat harz׃ 
genesis 1:2	oharz hith tho obho oHSk el pni thom oroH alhim mrHpt el pni hmim׃ 
genesis 1:3	oiamr alhim ihi aor oihi aor׃ 
genesis 1:4	oira alhim at haor ki Tob oibdl alhim bin haor obin hHSk׃ 
genesis 1:5	oiqra alhim laor iom olHSk qra lilh oihi erb oihi bqr iom aHd׃ 
genesis 1:6	oiamr alhim ihi rqie btok hmim oihi mbdil bin mim lmim׃ 
genesis 1:7	oieS alhim at hrqie oibdl bin hmim aSr mtHt lrqie obin hmim aSr mel lrqie oihi kn׃ 
genesis 1:8	oiqra alhim lrqie Smim oihi erb oihi bqr iom Sni׃ 
genesis 1:9	oiamr alhim iqoo hmim mtHt hSmim al mqom aHd otrah hibSh oihi kn׃ 
genesis 1:10	oiqra alhim libSh arz olmqoh hmim qra imim oira alhim ki Tob׃ 
genesis 1:11	oiamr alhim tdSa harz dSa eSb mcrie cre ez pri eSh pri lmino aSr creo bo el harz oihi kn׃ 
genesis 1:12	otoza harz dSa eSb mcrie cre lminho oez eSh pri aSr creo bo lminho oira alhim ki Tob׃ 
genesis 1:13	oihi erb oihi bqr iom SliSi׃ 
genesis 1:14	oiamr alhim ihi mart brqie hSmim lhbdil bin hiom obin hlilh ohio latt olmoedim olimim oSnim׃ 
genesis 1:15	ohio lmaort brqie hSmim lhair el harz oihi kn׃ 
genesis 1:16	oieS alhim at Sni hmart hgdlim at hmaor hgdl lmmSlt hiom oat hmaor hqTn lmmSlt hlilh oat hkokbim׃ 
genesis 1:17	oitn atm alhim brqie hSmim lhair el harz׃ 
genesis 1:18	olmSl biom oblilh olhbdil bin haor obin hHSk oira alhim ki Tob׃ 
genesis 1:19	oihi erb oihi bqr iom rbiei׃ 
genesis 1:20	oiamr alhim iSrzo hmim Srz npS Hih oeop ieopp el harz el pni rqie hSmim׃ 
genesis 1:21	oibra alhim at htninm hgdlim oat kl npS hHih hrmSt aSr Srzo hmim lminhm oat kl eop knp lminho oira alhim ki Tob׃ 
genesis 1:22	oibrk atm alhim lamr pro orbo omlao at hmim bimim oheop irb barz׃ 
genesis 1:23	oihi erb oihi bqr iom HmiSi׃ 
genesis 1:24	oiamr alhim toza harz npS Hih lminh bhmh ormS oHito arz lminh oihi kn׃ 
genesis 1:25	oieS alhim at Hit harz lminh oat hbhmh lminh oat kl rmS hadmh lminho oira alhim ki Tob׃ 
genesis 1:26	oiamr alhim neSh adm bzlmno kdmotno oirdo bdgt him obeop hSmim obbhmh obkl harz obkl hrmS hrmS el harz׃ 
genesis 1:27	oibra alhim at hadm bzlmo bzlm alhim bra ato ckr onqbh bra atm׃ 
genesis 1:28	oibrk atm alhim oiamr lhm alhim pro orbo omlao at harz okbSh ordo bdgt him obeop hSmim obkl Hih hrmSt el harz׃ 
genesis 1:29	oiamr alhim hnh ntti lkm at kl eSb cre cre aSr el pni kl harz oat kl hez aSr bo pri ez cre cre lkm ihih laklh׃ 
genesis 1:30	olkl Hit harz olkl eop hSmim olkl romS el harz aSr bo npS Hih at kl irq eSb laklh oihi kn׃ 
genesis 1:31	oira alhim at kl aSr eSh ohnh Tob mad oihi erb oihi bqr iom hSSi׃ 
genesis 2:1	oiklo hSmim oharz okl zbam׃ 
genesis 2:2	oikl alhim biom hSbiei mlakto aSr eSh oiSbt biom hSbiei mkl mlakto aSr eSh׃ 
genesis 2:3	oibrk alhim at iom hSbiei oiqdS ato ki bo Sbt mkl mlakto aSr bra alhim leSot׃ 
genesis 2:4	alh toldot hSmim oharz bhbram biom eSot ihoh alhim arz oSmim׃ 
genesis 2:5	okl SiH hSdh Trm ihih barz okl eSb hSdh Trm izmH ki la hmTir ihoh alhim el harz oadm ain lebd at hadmh׃ 
genesis 2:6	oad ielh mn harz ohSqh at kl pni hadmh׃ 
genesis 2:7	oiizr ihoh alhim at hadm epr mn hadmh oipH bapio nSmt Hiim oihi hadm lnpS Hih׃ 
genesis 2:8	oiTe ihoh alhim gn bedn mqdm oiSm Sm at hadm aSr izr׃ 
genesis 2:9	oizmH ihoh alhim mn hadmh kl ez nHmd lmrah oTob lmakl oez hHiim btok hgn oez hdet Tob ore׃ 
genesis 2:10	onhr iza medn lhSqot at hgn omSm iprd ohih larbeh raSim׃ 
genesis 2:11	Sm haHd piSon hoa hsbb at kl arz hHoilh aSr Sm hchb׃ 
genesis 2:12	ochb harz hhoa Tob Sm hbdlH oabn hShm׃ 
genesis 2:13	oSm hnhr hSni giHon hoa hsobb at kl arz koS׃ 
genesis 2:14	oSm hnhr hSliSi Hdql hoa hhlk qdmt aSor ohnhr hrbiei hoa prt׃ 
genesis 2:15	oiqH ihoh alhim at hadm oinHho bgn edn lebdh olSmrh׃ 
genesis 2:16	oizo ihoh alhim el hadm lamr mkl ez hgn akl takl׃ 
genesis 2:17	omez hdet Tob ore la takl mmno ki biom aklk mmno mot tmot׃ 
genesis 2:18	oiamr ihoh alhim la Tob hiot hadm lbdo aeSh lo ecr kngdo׃ 
genesis 2:19	oizr ihoh alhim mn hadmh kl Hit hSdh oat kl eop hSmim oiba al hadm lraot mh iqra lo okl aSr iqra lo hadm npS Hih hoa Smo׃ 
genesis 2:20	oiqra hadm Smot lkl hbhmh oleop hSmim olkl Hit hSdh oladm la mza ecr kngdo׃ 
genesis 2:21	oipl ihoh alhim trdmh el hadm oiiSn oiqH aHt mzletio oisgr bSr tHtnh׃ 
genesis 2:22	oibn ihoh alhim at hzle aSr lqH mn hadm laSh oibah al hadm׃ 
genesis 2:23	oiamr hadm cat hpem ezm mezmi obSr mbSri lcat iqra aSh ki maiS lqHh cat׃ 
genesis 2:24	el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto ohio lbSr aHd׃ 
genesis 2:25	oihio Snihm eromim hadm oaSto ola itbSSo׃ 
genesis 3:1	ohnHS hih erom mkl Hit hSdh aSr eSh ihoh alhim oiamr al haSh ap ki amr alhim la taklo mkl ez hgn׃ 
genesis 3:2	otamr haSh al hnHS mpri ez hgn nakl׃ 
genesis 3:3	ompri hez aSr btok hgn amr alhim la taklo mmno ola tgeo bo pn tmton׃ 
genesis 3:4	oiamr hnHS al haSh la mot tmton׃ 
genesis 3:5	ki ide alhim ki biom aklkm mmno onpqHo einikm ohiitm kalhim idei Tob ore׃ 
genesis 3:6	otra haSh ki Tob hez lmakl oki taoh hoa leinim onHmd hez lhSkil otqH mprio otakl ottn gm laiSh emh oiakl׃ 
genesis 3:7	otpqHnh eini Snihm oideo ki eirmm hm oitpro elh tanh oieSo lhm Hgrt׃ 
genesis 3:8	oiSmeo at qol ihoh alhim mthlk bgn lroH hiom oitHba hadm oaSto mpni ihoh alhim btok ez hgn׃ 
genesis 3:9	oiqra ihoh alhim al hadm oiamr lo aikh׃ 
genesis 3:10	oiamr at qlk Smeti bgn oaira ki eirm anki oaHba׃ 
genesis 3:11	oiamr mi hgid lk ki eirm ath hmn hez aSr zoitik lblti akl mmno aklt׃ 
genesis 3:12	oiamr hadm haSh aSr ntth emdi hoa ntnh li mn hez oakl׃ 
genesis 3:13	oiamr ihoh alhim laSh mh cat eSit otamr haSh hnHS hSiani oakl׃ 
genesis 3:14	oiamr ihoh alhim al hnHS ki eSit cat aror ath mkl hbhmh omkl Hit hSdh el gHnk tlk oepr takl kl imi Hiik׃ 
genesis 3:15	oaibh aSit bink obin haSh obin crek obin creh hoa iSopk raS oath tSopno eqb׃ 
genesis 3:16	al haSh amr hrbh arbh ezbonk ohrnk bezb tldi bnim oal aiSk tSoqtk ohoa imSl bk׃ 
genesis 3:17	oladm amr ki Smet lqol aStk otakl mn hez aSr zoitik lamr la takl mmno arorh hadmh bebork bezbon taklnh kl imi Hiik׃ 
genesis 3:18	oqoz odrdr tzmiH lk oaklt at eSb hSdh׃ 
genesis 3:19	bcet apik takl lHm ed Sobk al hadmh ki mmnh lqHt ki epr ath oal epr tSob׃ 
genesis 3:20	oiqra hadm Sm aSto Hoh ki hoa hith am kl Hi׃ 
genesis 3:21	oieS ihoh alhim ladm olaSto ktnot eor oilbSm׃ 
genesis 3:22	oiamr ihoh alhim hn hadm hih kaHd mmno ldet Tob ore oeth pn iSlH ido olqH gm mez hHiim oakl oHi lelm׃ 
genesis 3:23	oiSlHho ihoh alhim mgn edn lebd at hadmh aSr lqH mSm׃ 
genesis 3:24	oigrS at hadm oiSkn mqdm lgn edn at hkrbim oat lhT hHrb hmthpkt lSmr at drk ez hHiim׃ 
genesis 4:1	ohadm ide at Hoh aSto othr otld at qin otamr qniti aiS at ihoh׃ 
genesis 4:2	otsp lldt at aHio at hbl oihi hbl reh zan oqin hih ebd admh׃ 
genesis 4:3	oihi mqz imim oiba qin mpri hadmh mnHh lihoh׃ 
genesis 4:4	ohbl hbia gm hoa mbkrot zano omHlbhn oiSe ihoh al hbl oal mnHto׃ 
genesis 4:5	oal qin oal mnHto la Seh oiHr lqin mad oiplo pnio׃ 
genesis 4:6	oiamr ihoh al qin lmh Hrh lk olmh nplo pnik׃ 
genesis 4:7	hloa am tiTib Sat oam la tiTib lptH HTat rbz oalik tSoqto oath tmSl bo׃ 
genesis 4:8	oiamr qin al hbl aHio oihi bhiotm bSdh oiqm qin al hbl aHio oihrgho׃ 
genesis 4:9	oiamr ihoh al qin ai hbl aHik oiamr la ideti hSmr aHi anki׃ 
genesis 4:10	oiamr mh eSit qol dmi aHik zeqim ali mn hadmh׃ 
genesis 4:11	oeth aror ath mn hadmh aSr pzth at pih lqHt at dmi aHik midk׃ 
genesis 4:12	ki tebd at hadmh la tsp tt kHh lk ne ond thih barz׃ 
genesis 4:13	oiamr qin al ihoh gdol eoni mnSa׃ 
genesis 4:14	hn grSt ati hiom mel pni hadmh ompnik astr ohiiti ne ond barz ohih kl mzai ihrgni׃ 
genesis 4:15	oiamr lo ihoh lkn kl hrg qin Sbetim iqm oiSm ihoh lqin aot lblti hkot ato kl mzao׃ 
genesis 4:16	oiza qin mlpni ihoh oiSb barz nod qdmt edn׃ 
genesis 4:17	oide qin at aSto othr otld at Hnok oihi bnh eir oiqra Sm heir kSm bno Hnok׃ 
genesis 4:18	oiold lHnok at eird oeird ild at mHoial omHiial ild at mtoSal omtoSal ild at lmk׃ 
genesis 4:19	oiqH lo lmk Sti nSim Sm haHt edh oSm hSnit zlh׃ 
genesis 4:20	otld edh at ibl hoa hih abi iSb ahl omqnh׃ 
genesis 4:21	oSm aHio iobl hoa hih abi kl tpS knor oeogb׃ 
genesis 4:22	ozlh gm hoa ildh at tobl qin lTS kl HrS nHSt obrcl oaHot tobl qin nemh׃ 
genesis 4:23	oiamr lmk lnSio edh ozlh Smen qoli nSi lmk hacnh amrti ki aiS hrgti lpzei oild lHbrti׃ 
genesis 4:24	ki Sbetim iqm qin olmk Sbeim oSbeh׃ 
genesis 4:25	oide adm eod at aSto otld bn otqra at Smo St ki St li alhim cre aHr tHt hbl ki hrgo qin׃ 
genesis 4:26	olSt gm hoa ild bn oiqra at Smo anoS ac hoHl lqra bSm ihoh׃ 
genesis 5:1	ch spr toldt adm biom bra alhim adm bdmot alhim eSh ato׃ 
genesis 5:2	ckr onqbh bram oibrk atm oiqra at Smm adm biom hbram׃ 
genesis 5:3	oiHi adm SlSim omat Snh oiold bdmoto kzlmo oiqra at Smo St׃ 
genesis 5:4	oihio imi adm aHri holido at St Smnh mat Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:5	oihio kl imi adm aSr Hi tSe maot Snh oSlSim Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:6	oiHi St HmS Snim omat Snh oiold at anoS׃ 
genesis 5:7	oiHi St aHri holido at anoS Sbe Snim oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:8	oihio kl imi St Stim eSrh Snh otSe maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:9	oiHi anoS tSeim Snh oiold at qinn׃ 
genesis 5:10	oiHi anoS aHri holido at qinn HmS eSrh Snh oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:11	oihio kl imi anoS HmS Snim otSe maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:12	oiHi qinn Sbeim Snh oiold at mhllal׃ 
genesis 5:13	oiHi qinn aHri holido at mhllal arbeim Snh oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:14	oihio kl imi qinn eSr Snim otSe maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:15	oiHi mhllal HmS Snim oSSim Snh oiold at ird׃ 
genesis 5:16	oiHi mhllal aHri holido at ird SlSim Snh oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:17	oihio kl imi mhllal HmS otSeim Snh oSmnh maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:18	oiHi ird Stim oSSim Snh omat Snh oiold at Hnok׃ 
genesis 5:19	oiHi ird aHri holido at Hnok Smnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:20	oihio kl imi ird Stim oSSim Snh otSe maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:21	oiHi Hnok HmS oSSim Snh oiold at mtoSlH׃ 
genesis 5:22	oithlk Hnok at halhim aHri holido at mtoSlH SlS maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:23	oihi kl imi Hnok HmS oSSim Snh oSlS maot Snh׃ 
genesis 5:24	oithlk Hnok at halhim oainno ki lqH ato alhim׃ 
genesis 5:25	oiHi mtoSlH Sbe oSmnim Snh omat Snh oiold at lmk׃ 
genesis 5:26	oiHi mtoSlH aHri holido at lmk Stim oSmonim Snh oSbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:27	oihio kl imi mtoSlH tSe oSSim Snh otSe maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:28	oiHi lmk Stim oSmnim Snh omat Snh oiold bn׃ 
genesis 5:29	oiqra at Smo nH lamr ch inHmno mmeSno omezbon idino mn hadmh aSr arrh ihoh׃ 
genesis 5:30	oiHi lmk aHri holido at nH HmS otSeim Snh oHmS mat Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 5:31	oihi kl imi lmk Sbe oSbeim Snh oSbe maot Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 5:32	oihi nH bn HmS maot Snh oiold nH at Sm at Hm oat ipt׃ 
genesis 6:1	oihi ki hHl hadm lrb el pni hadmh obnot ildo lhm׃ 
genesis 6:2	oirao bni halhim at bnot hadm ki Tbt hnh oiqHo lhm nSim mkl aSr bHro׃ 
genesis 6:3	oiamr ihoh la idon roHi badm lelm bSgm hoa bSr ohio imio mah oeSrim Snh׃ 
genesis 6:4	hnplim hio barz bimim hhm ogm aHri kn aSr ibao bni halhim al bnot hadm oildo lhm hmh hgbrim aSr meolm anSi hSm׃ 
genesis 6:5	oira ihoh ki rbh ret hadm barz okl izr mHSbt lbo rq re kl hiom׃ 
genesis 6:6	oinHm ihoh ki eSh at hadm barz oitezb al lbo׃ 
genesis 6:7	oiamr ihoh amHh at hadm aSr brati mel pni hadmh madm ed bhmh ed rmS oed eop hSmim ki nHmti ki eSitm׃ 
genesis 6:8	onH mza Hn beini ihoh׃ 
genesis 6:9	alh toldt nH nH aiS zdiq tmim hih bdrtio at halhim hthlk nH׃ 
genesis 6:10	oiold nH SlSh bnim at Sm at Hm oat ipt׃ 
genesis 6:11	otSHt harz lpni halhim otmla harz Hms׃ 
genesis 6:12	oira alhim at harz ohnh nSHth ki hSHit kl bSr at drko el harz׃ 
genesis 6:13	oiamr alhim lnH qz kl bSr ba lpni ki mlah harz Hms mpnihm ohnni mSHitm at harz׃ 
genesis 6:14	eSh lk tbt ezi gpr qnim teSh at htbh okprt ath mbit omHoz bkpr׃ 
genesis 6:15	och aSr teSh ath SlS maot amh ark htbh HmSim amh rHbh oSlSim amh qomth׃ 
genesis 6:16	zhr teSh ltbh oal amh tklnh mlmelh optH htbh bzdh tSim tHtim Snim oSlSim teSh׃ 
genesis 6:17	oani hnni mbia at hmbol mim el harz lSHt kl bSr aSr bo roH Hiim mtHt hSmim kl aSr barz igoe׃ 
genesis 6:18	ohqmti at briti atk obat al htbh ath obnik oaStk onSi bnik atk׃ 
genesis 6:19	omkl hHi mkl bSr Snim mkl tbia al htbh lhHit atk ckr onqbh ihio׃ 
genesis 6:20	mheop lminho omn hbhmh lminh mkl rmS hadmh lminho Snim mkl ibao alik lhHiot׃ 
genesis 6:21	oath qH lk mkl makl aSr iakl oaspt alik ohih lk olhm laklh׃ 
genesis 6:22	oieS nH kkl aSr zoh ato alhim kn eSh׃ 
genesis 7:1	oiamr ihoh lnH ba ath okl bitk al htbh ki atk raiti zdiq lpni bdor hch׃ 
genesis 7:2	mkl hbhmh hThorh tqH lk Sbeh Sbeh aiS oaSto omn hbhmh aSr la Thrh hoa Snim aiS oaSto׃ 
genesis 7:3	gm meop hSmim Sbeh Sbeh ckr onqbh lHiot cre el pni kl harz׃ 
genesis 7:4	ki limim eod Sbeh anki mmTir el harz arbeim iom oarbeim lilh omHiti at kl hiqom aSr eSiti mel pni hadmh׃ 
genesis 7:5	oieS nH kkl aSr zoho ihoh׃ 
genesis 7:6	onH bn SS maot Snh ohmbol hih mim el harz׃ 
genesis 7:7	oiba nH obnio oaSto onSi bnio ato al htbh mpni mi hmbol׃ 
genesis 7:8	mn hbhmh hThorh omn hbhmh aSr ainnh Thrh omn heop okl aSr rmS el hadmh׃ 
genesis 7:9	Snim Snim bao al nH al htbh ckr onqbh kaSr zoh alhim at nH׃ 
genesis 7:10	oihi lSbet himim omi hmbol hio el harz׃ 
genesis 7:11	bSnt SS maot Snh lHii nH bHdS hSni bSbeh eSr iom lHdS biom hch nbqeo kl meint thom rbh oarbt hSmim nptHo׃ 
genesis 7:12	oihi hgSm el harz arbeim iom oarbeim lilh׃ 
genesis 7:13	bezm hiom hch ba nH oSm oHm oipt bni nH oaSt nH oSlSt nSi bnio atm al htbh׃ 
genesis 7:14	hmh okl hHih lminh okl hbhmh lminh okl hrmS hrmS el harz lminho okl heop lminho kl zpor kl knp׃ 
genesis 7:15	oibao al nH al htbh Snim Snim mkl hbSr aSr bo roH Hiim׃ 
genesis 7:16	ohbaim ckr onqbh mkl bSr bao kaSr zoh ato alhim oisgr ihoh bedo׃ 
genesis 7:17	oihi hmbol arbeim iom el harz oirbo hmim oiSao at htbh otrm mel harz׃ 
genesis 7:18	oigbro hmim oirbo mad el harz otlk htbh el pni hmim׃ 
genesis 7:19	ohmim gbro mad mad el harz oikso kl hhrim hgbhim aSr tHt kl hSmim׃ 
genesis 7:20	HmS eSrh amh mlmelh gbro hmim oikso hhrim׃ 
genesis 7:21	oigoe kl bSr hrmS el harz beop obbhmh obHih obkl hSrz hSrz el harz okl hadm׃ 
genesis 7:22	kl aSr nSmt roH Hiim bapio mkl aSr bHrbh mto׃ 
genesis 7:23	oimH at kl hiqom aSr el pni hadmh madm ed bhmh ed rmS oed eop hSmim oimHo mn harz oiSar ak nH oaSr ato btbh׃ 
genesis 7:24	oigbro hmim el harz HmSim omat iom׃ 
genesis 8:1	oickr alhim at nH oat kl hHih oat kl hbhmh aSr ato btbh oiebr alhim roH el harz oiSko hmim׃ 
genesis 8:2	oiskro meint thom oarbt hSmim oikla hgSm mn hSmim׃ 
genesis 8:3	oiSbo hmim mel harz hlok oSob oiHsro hmim mqzh HmSim omat iom׃ 
genesis 8:4	otnH htbh bHdS hSbiei bSbeh eSr iom lHdS el hri arrT׃ 
genesis 8:5	ohmim hio hlok oHsor ed hHdS heSiri beSiri baHd lHdS nrao raSi hhrim׃ 
genesis 8:6	oihi mqz arbeim iom oiptH nH at Hlon htbh aSr eSh׃ 
genesis 8:7	oiSlH at herb oiza izoa oSob ed ibSt hmim mel harz׃ 
genesis 8:8	oiSlH at hionh mato lraot hqlo hmim mel pni hadmh׃ 
genesis 8:9	ola mzah hionh mnoH lkp rglh otSb alio al htbh ki mim el pni kl harz oiSlH ido oiqHh oiba ath alio al htbh׃ 
genesis 8:10	oiHl eod Sbet imim aHrim oisp SlH at hionh mn htbh׃ 
genesis 8:11	otba alio hionh let erb ohnh elh cit Trp bpih oide nH ki qlo hmim mel harz׃ 
genesis 8:12	oiiHl eod Sbet imim aHrim oiSlH at hionh ola isph Sob alio eod׃ 
genesis 8:13	oihi baHt oSS maot Snh braSon baHd lHdS Hrbo hmim mel harz oisr nH at mksh htbh oira ohnh Hrbo pni hadmh׃ 
genesis 8:14	obHdS hSni bSbeh oeSrim iom lHdS ibSh harz׃ 
genesis 8:15	oidbr alhim al nH lamr׃ 
genesis 8:16	za mn htbh ath oaStk obnik onSi bnik atk׃ 
genesis 8:17	kl hHih aSr atk mkl bSr beop obbhmh obkl hrmS hrmS el harz hoza atk oSrzo barz opro orbo el harz׃ 
genesis 8:18	oiza nH obnio oaSto onSi bnio ato׃ 
genesis 8:19	kl hHih kl hrmS okl heop kl romS el harz lmSpHtihm izao mn htbh׃ 
genesis 8:20	oibn nH mcbH lihoh oiqH mkl hbhmh hThorh omkl heop hThr oiel elt bmcbH׃ 
genesis 8:21	oirH ihoh at riH hniHH oiamr ihoh al lbo la asp lqll eod at hadmh bebor hadm ki izr lb hadm re mnerio ola asp eod lhkot at kl Hi kaSr eSiti׃ 
genesis 8:22	ed kl imi harz cre oqzir oqr oHm oqiz oHrp oiom olilh la iSbto׃ 
genesis 9:1	oibrk alhim at nH oat bnio oiamr lhm pro orbo omlao at harz׃ 
genesis 9:2	omorakm oHtkm ihih el kl Hit harz oel kl eop hSmim bkl aSr trmS hadmh obkl dgi him bidkm ntno׃ 
genesis 9:3	kl rmS aSr hoa Hi lkm ihih laklh kirq eSb ntti lkm at kl׃ 
genesis 9:4	ak bSr bnpSo dmo la taklo׃ 
genesis 9:5	oak at dmkm lnpStikm adrS mid kl Hih adrSno omid hadm mid aiS aHio adrS at npS hadm׃ 
genesis 9:6	Spk dm hadm badm dmo iSpk ki bzlm alhim eSh at hadm׃ 
genesis 9:7	oatm pro orbo Srzo barz orbo bh׃ 
genesis 9:8	oiamr alhim al nH oal bnio ato lamr׃ 
genesis 9:9	oani hnni mqim at briti atkm oat crekm aHrikm׃ 
genesis 9:10	oat kl npS hHih aSr atkm beop bbhmh obkl Hit harz atkm mkl izai htbh lkl Hit harz׃ 
genesis 9:11	ohqmti at briti atkm ola ikrt kl bSr eod mmi hmbol ola ihih eod mbol lSHt harz׃ 
genesis 9:12	oiamr alhim cat aot hbrit aSr ani ntn bini obinikm obin kl npS Hih aSr atkm ldrt eolm׃ 
genesis 9:13	at qSti ntti benn ohith laot brit bini obin harz׃ 
genesis 9:14	ohih benni enn el harz onrath hqSt benn׃ 
genesis 9:15	ockrti at briti aSr bini obinikm obin kl npS Hih bkl bSr ola ihih eod hmim lmbol lSHt kl bSr׃ 
genesis 9:16	ohith hqSt benn oraitih lckr brit eolm bin alhim obin kl npS Hih bkl bSr aSr el harz׃ 
genesis 9:17	oiamr alhim al nH cat aot hbrit aSr hqmti bini obin kl bSr aSr el harz׃ 
genesis 9:18	oihio bni nH hizaim mn htbh Sm oHm oipt oHm hoa abi knen׃ 
genesis 9:19	SlSh alh bni nH omalh npzh kl harz׃ 
genesis 9:20	oiHl nH aiS hadmh oiTe krm׃ 
genesis 9:21	oiSt mn hiin oiSkr oitgl btok ahlh׃ 
genesis 9:22	oira Hm abi knen at erot abio oigd lSni aHio bHoz׃ 
genesis 9:23	oiqH Sm oipt at hSmlh oiSimo el Skm Snihm oilko aHrnit oikso at erot abihm opnihm aHrnit oerot abihm la rao׃ 
genesis 9:24	oiiqz nH miino oide at aSr eSh lo bno hqTn׃ 
genesis 9:25	oiamr aror knen ebd ebdim ihih laHio׃ 
genesis 9:26	oiamr brok ihoh alhi Sm oihi knen ebd lmo׃ 
genesis 9:27	ipt alhim lipt oiSkn bahli Sm oihi knen ebd lmo׃ 
genesis 9:28	oiHi nH aHr hmbol SlS maot Snh oHmSim Snh׃ 
genesis 9:29	oihio kl imi nH tSe maot Snh oHmSim Snh oimt׃ 
genesis 10:1	oalh toldt bni nH Sm Hm oipt oioldo lhm bnim aHr hmbol׃ 
genesis 10:2	bni ipt gmr omgog omdi oion otbl omSk otirs׃ 
genesis 10:3	obni gmr aSknc oript otgrmh׃ 
genesis 10:4	obni ion aliSh otrSiS ktim oddnim׃ 
genesis 10:5	malh nprdo aii hgoim barztm aiS llSno lmSpHtm bgoihm׃ 
genesis 10:6	obni Hm koS omzrim opoT oknen׃ 
genesis 10:7	obni koS sba oHoilh osbth oremh osbtka obni remh Sba oddn׃ 
genesis 10:8	okoS ild at nmrd hoa hHl lhiot gbr barz׃ 
genesis 10:9	hoa hih gbr zid lpni ihoh el kn iamr knmrd gbor zid lpni ihoh׃ 
genesis 10:10	othi raSit mmlkto bbl oark oakd oklnh barz Sner׃ 
genesis 10:11	mn harz hhoa iza aSor oibn at ninoh oat rHbt eir oat klH׃ 
genesis 10:12	oat rsn bin ninoh obin klH hoa heir hgdlh׃ 
genesis 10:13	omzrim ild at lodim oat enmim oat lhbim oat nptHim׃ 
genesis 10:14	oat ptrsim oat kslHim aSr izao mSm plStim oat kptrim׃ 
genesis 10:15	oknen ild at zidn bkro oat Ht׃ 
genesis 10:16	oat hibosi oat hamri oat hgrgSi׃ 
genesis 10:17	oat hHoi oat herqi oat hsini׃ 
genesis 10:18	oat harodi oat hzmri oat hHmti oaHr npzo mSpHot hkneni׃ 
genesis 10:19	oihi gbol hkneni mzidn bakh grrh ed ech bakh sdmh oemrh oadmh ozbim ed lSe׃ 
genesis 10:20	alh bni Hm lmSpHtm llSntm barztm bgoihm׃ 
genesis 10:21	olSm ild gm hoa abi kl bni ebr aHi ipt hgdol׃ 
genesis 10:22	bni Sm eilm oaSor oarpkSd olod oarm׃ 
genesis 10:23	obni arm eoz oHol ogtr omS׃ 
genesis 10:24	oarpkSd ild at SlH oSlH ild at ebr׃ 
genesis 10:25	olebr ild Sni bnim Sm haHd plg ki bimio nplgh harz oSm aHio iqTn׃ 
genesis 10:26	oiqTn ild at almodd oat Slp oat Hzrmot oat irH׃ 
genesis 10:27	oat hdorm oat aocl oat dqlh׃ 
genesis 10:28	oat eobl oat abimal oat Sba׃ 
genesis 10:29	oat aopr oat Hoilh oat iobb kl alh bni iqTn׃ 
genesis 10:30	oihi moSbm mmSa bakh sprh hr hqdm׃ 
genesis 10:31	alh bni Sm lmSpHtm llSntm barztm lgoihm׃ 
genesis 10:32	alh mSpHt bni nH ltoldtm bgoihm omalh nprdo hgoim barz aHr hmbol׃ 
genesis 11:1	oihi kl harz Sph aHt odbrim aHdim׃ 
genesis 11:2	oihi bnsem mqdm oimzao bqeh barz Sner oiSbo Sm׃ 
genesis 11:3	oiamro aiS al reho hbh nlbnh lbnim onSrph lSrph othi lhm hlbnh labn ohHmr hih lhm lHmr׃ 
genesis 11:4	oiamro hbh nbnh lno eir omgdl oraSo bSmim oneSh lno Sm pn npoz el pni kl harz׃ 
genesis 11:5	oird ihoh lrat at heir oat hmgdl aSr bno bni hadm׃ 
genesis 11:6	oiamr ihoh hn em aHd oSph aHt lklm och hHlm leSot oeth la ibzr mhm kl aSr icmo leSot׃ 
genesis 11:7	hbh nrdh onblh Sm Sptm aSr la iSmeo aiS Spt reho׃ 
genesis 11:8	oipz ihoh atm mSm el pni kl harz oiHdlo lbnt heir׃ 
genesis 11:9	el kn qra Smh bbl ki Sm bll ihoh Spt kl harz omSm hpizm ihoh el pni kl harz׃ 
genesis 11:10	alh toldt Sm Sm bn mat Snh oiold at arpkSd Sntim aHr hmbol׃ 
genesis 11:11	oiHi Sm aHri holido at arpkSd HmS maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:12	oarpkSd Hi HmS oSlSim Snh oiold at SlH׃ 
genesis 11:13	oiHi arpkSd aHri holido at SlH SlS Snim oarbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:14	oSlH Hi SlSim Snh oiold at ebr׃ 
genesis 11:15	oiHi SlH aHri holido at ebr SlS Snim oarbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:16	oiHi ebr arbe oSlSim Snh oiold at plg׃ 
genesis 11:17	oiHi ebr aHri holido at plg SlSim Snh oarbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:18	oiHi plg SlSim Snh oiold at reo׃ 
genesis 11:19	oiHi plg aHri holido at reo tSe Snim omatim Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:20	oiHi reo Stim oSlSim Snh oiold at Srog׃ 
genesis 11:21	oiHi reo aHri holido at Srog Sbe Snim omatim Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:22	oiHi Srog SlSim Snh oiold at nHor׃ 
genesis 11:23	oiHi Srog aHri holido at nHor matim Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:24	oiHi nHor tSe oeSrim Snh oiold at trH׃ 
genesis 11:25	oiHi nHor aHri holido at trH tSe eSrh Snh omat Snh oiold bnim obnot׃ 
genesis 11:26	oiHi trH Sbeim Snh oiold at abrm at nHor oat hrn׃ 
genesis 11:27	oalh toldt trH trH holid at abrm at nHor oat hrn ohrn holid at loT׃ 
genesis 11:28	oimt hrn el pni trH abio barz moldto baor kSdim׃ 
genesis 11:29	oiqH abrm onHor lhm nSim Sm aSt abrm Sri oSm aSt nHor mlkh bt hrn abi mlkh oabi iskh׃ 
genesis 11:30	othi Sri eqrh ain lh old׃ 
genesis 11:31	oiqH trH at abrm bno oat loT bn hrn bn bno oat Sri klto aSt abrm bno oizao atm maor kSdim llkt arzh knen oibao ed Hrn oiSbo Sm׃ 
genesis 11:32	oihio imi trH HmS Snim omatim Snh oimt trH bHrn׃ 
genesis 12:1	oiamr ihoh al abrm lk lk marzk ommoldtk ombit abik al harz aSr arak׃ 
genesis 12:2	oaeSk lgoi gdol oabrkk oagdlh Smk ohih brkh׃ 
genesis 12:3	oabrkh mbrkik omqllk aar onbrko bk kl mSpHt hadmh׃ 
genesis 12:4	oilk abrm kaSr dbr alio ihoh oilk ato loT oabrm bn HmS Snim oSbeim Snh bzato mHrn׃ 
genesis 12:5	oiqH abrm at Sri aSto oat loT bn aHio oat kl rkoSm aSr rkSo oat hnpS aSr eSo bHrn oizao llkt arzh knen oibao arzh knen׃ 
genesis 12:6	oiebr abrm barz ed mqom Skm ed alon morh ohkneni ac barz׃ 
genesis 12:7	oira ihoh al abrm oiamr lcrek atn at harz hcat oibn Sm mcbH lihoh hnrah alio׃ 
genesis 12:8	oietq mSm hhrh mqdm lbit al oiT ahlh bit al mim ohei mqdm oibn Sm mcbH lihoh oiqra bSm ihoh׃ 
genesis 12:9	oise abrm hlok onsoe hngbh׃ 
genesis 12:10	oihi reb barz oird abrm mzrimh lgor Sm ki kbd hreb barz׃ 
genesis 12:11	oihi kaSr hqrib lboa mzrimh oiamr al Sri aSto hnh na ideti ki aSh ipt mrah at׃ 
genesis 12:12	ohih ki irao atk hmzrim oamro aSto cat ohrgo ati oatk iHio׃ 
genesis 12:13	amri na aHti at lmen iiTb li bebork oHith npSi bgllk׃ 
genesis 12:14	oihi kboa abrm mzrimh oirao hmzrim at haSh ki iph hoa mad׃ 
genesis 12:15	oirao ath Sri preh oihllo ath al preh otqH haSh bit preh׃ 
genesis 12:16	olabrm hiTib beborh oihi lo zan obqr oHmrim oebdim oSpHt oatnt ogmlim׃ 
genesis 12:17	oinge ihoh at preh ngeim gdlim oat bito el dbr Sri aSt abrm׃ 
genesis 12:18	oiqra preh labrm oiamr mh cat eSit li lmh la hgdt li ki aStk hoa׃ 
genesis 12:19	lmh amrt aHti hoa oaqH ath li laSh oeth hnh aStk qH olk׃ 
genesis 12:20	oizo elio preh anSim oiSlHo ato oat aSto oat kl aSr lo׃ 
genesis 13:1	oiel abrm mmzrim hoa oaSto okl aSr lo oloT emo hngbh׃ 
genesis 13:2	oabrm kbd mad bmqnh bksp obchb׃ 
genesis 13:3	oilk lmseio mngb oed bit al ed hmqom aSr hih Sm ahlh btHlh bin bit al obin hei׃ 
genesis 13:4	al mqom hmcbH aSr eSh Sm braSnh oiqra Sm abrm bSm ihoh׃ 
genesis 13:5	ogm lloT hhlk at abrm hih zan obqr oahlim׃ 
genesis 13:6	ola nSa atm harz lSbt iHdo ki hih rkoSm rb ola iklo lSbt iHdo׃ 
genesis 13:7	oihi rib bin rei mqnh abrm obin rei mqnh loT ohkneni ohprci ac iSb barz׃ 
genesis 13:8	oiamr abrm al loT al na thi mribh bini obinik obin rei obin reik ki anSim aHim anHno׃ 
genesis 13:9	hla kl harz lpnik hprd na meli am hSmal oaimnh oam himin oaSmailh׃ 
genesis 13:10	oiSa loT at einio oira at kl kkr hirdn ki klh mSqh lpni SHt ihoh at sdm oat emrh kgn ihoh karz mzrim bakh zer׃ 
genesis 13:11	oibHr lo loT at kl kkr hirdn oise loT mqdm oiprdo aiS mel aHio׃ 
genesis 13:12	abrm iSb barz knen oloT iSb beri hkkr oiahl ed sdm׃ 
genesis 13:13	oanSi sdm reim oHTaim lihoh mad׃ 
genesis 13:14	oihoh amr al abrm aHri hprd loT memo Sa na einik orah mn hmqom aSr ath Sm zpnh ongbh oqdmh oimh׃ 
genesis 13:15	ki at kl harz aSr ath rah lk atnnh olcrek ed eolm׃ 
genesis 13:16	oSmti at crek kepr harz aSr am iokl aiS lmnot at epr harz gm crek imnh׃ 
genesis 13:17	qom hthlk barz larkh olrHbh ki lk atnnh׃ 
genesis 13:18	oiahl abrm oiba oiSb balni mmra aSr bHbron oibn Sm mcbH lihoh׃ 
genesis 14:1	oihi bimi amrpl mlk Sner ariok mlk alsr kdrlemr mlk eilm otdel mlk goim׃ 
genesis 14:2	eSo mlHmh at bre mlk sdm oat brSe mlk emrh Snab mlk admh oSmabr mlk zbiim omlk ble hia zer׃ 
genesis 14:3	kl alh Hbro al emq hSdim hoa im hmlH׃ 
genesis 14:4	Stim eSrh Snh ebdo at kdrlemr oSlS eSrh Snh mrdo׃ 
genesis 14:5	obarbe eSrh Snh ba kdrlemr ohmlkim aSr ato oiko at rpaim beStrt qrnim oat hcocim bhm oat haimim bSoh qritim׃ 
genesis 14:6	oat hHri bhrrm Seir ed ail parn aSr el hmdbr׃ 
genesis 14:7	oiSbo oibao al ein mSpT hoa qdS oiko at kl Sdh hemlqi ogm at hamri hiSb bHzzn tmr׃ 
genesis 14:8	oiza mlk sdm omlk emrh omlk admh omlk zbiim omlk ble hoa zer oierko atm mlHmh bemq hSdim׃ 
genesis 14:9	at kdrlemr mlk eilm otdel mlk goim oamrpl mlk Sner oariok mlk alsr arbeh mlkim at hHmSh׃ 
genesis 14:10	oemq hSdim bart bart Hmr oinso mlk sdm oemrh oiplo Smh ohnSarim hrh nso׃ 
genesis 14:11	oiqHo at kl rkS sdm oemrh oat kl aklm oilko׃ 
genesis 14:12	oiqHo at loT oat rkSo bn aHi abrm oilko ohoa iSb bsdm׃ 
genesis 14:13	oiba hpliT oigd labrm hebri ohoa Skn balni mmra hamri aHi aSkl oaHi enr ohm beli brit abrm׃ 
genesis 14:14	oiSme abrm ki nSbh aHio oirq at Hnikio ilidi bito Smnh eSr oSlS maot oirdp ed dn׃ 
genesis 14:15	oiHlq elihm lilh hoa oebdio oikm oirdpm ed Hobh aSr mSmal ldmSq׃ 
genesis 14:16	oiSb at kl hrkS ogm at loT aHio orkSo hSib ogm at hnSim oat hem׃ 
genesis 14:17	oiza mlk sdm lqrato aHri Sobo mhkot at kdr lemr oat hmlkim aSr ato al emq Soh hoa emq hmlk׃ 
genesis 14:18	omlki zdq mlk Slm hozia lHm oiin ohoa khn lal elion׃ 
genesis 14:19	oibrkho oiamr brok abrm lal elion qnh Smim oarz׃ 
genesis 14:20	obrok al elion aSr mgn zrik bidk oitn lo meSr mkl׃ 
genesis 14:21	oiamr mlk sdm al abrm tn li hnpS ohrkS qH lk׃ 
genesis 14:22	oiamr abrm al mlk sdm hrimti idi al ihoh al elion qnh Smim oarz׃ 
genesis 14:23	am mHoT oed Srok nel oam aqH mkl aSr lk ola tamr ani heSrti at abrm׃ 
genesis 14:24	bledi rq aSr aklo hnerim oHlq hanSim aSr hlko ati enr aSkl ommra hm iqHo Hlqm׃

genesis 15:2	oiamr abrm adni ihoh mh ttn li oanki holk eriri obn mSq biti hoa dmSq aliecr׃ 
genesis 15:3	oiamr abrm hn li la ntth cre ohnh bn biti iorS ati׃ 
genesis 15:4	ohnh dbr ihoh alio lamr la iirSk ch ki am aSr iza mmeik hoa iirSk׃

genesis 15:12	oihi hSmS lboa otrdmh nplh el abrm ohnh aimh HSkh gdlh nplt elio׃

genesis 15:16	odor rbiei iSobo hnh ki la Slm eon hamri ed hnh׃

genesis 16:1	oSri aSt abrm la ildh lo olh SpHh mzrit oSmh hgr׃ 
genesis 16:2	otamr Sri al abrm hnh na ezrni ihoh mldt ba na al SpHti aoli abnh mmnh oiSme abrm lqol Sri׃ 
genesis 16:3	otqH Sri aSt abrm at hgr hmzrit SpHth mqz eSr Snim lSbt abrm barz knen ottn ath labrm aiSh lo laSh׃ 
genesis 16:4	oiba al hgr othr otra ki hrth otql gbrth beinih׃ 
genesis 16:5	otamr Sri al abrm Hmsi elik anki ntti SpHti bHiqk otra ki hrth oaql beinih iSpT ihoh bini obinik׃ 
genesis 16:6	oiamr abrm al Sri hnh SpHtk bidk eSi lh hTob beinik otenh Sri otbrH mpnih׃ 
genesis 16:7	oimzah mlak ihoh el ein hmim bmdbr el hein bdrk Sor׃ 
genesis 16:8	oiamr hgr SpHt Sri ai mch bat oanh tlki otamr mpni Sri gbrti anki brHt׃ 
genesis 16:9	oiamr lh mlak ihoh Sobi al gbrtk ohteni tHt idih׃ 
genesis 16:10	oiamr lh mlak ihoh hrbh arbh at crek ola ispr mrb׃ 
genesis 16:11	oiamr lh mlak ihoh hnk hrh oildt bn oqrat Smo iSmeal ki Sme ihoh al enik׃ 
genesis 16:12	ohoa ihih pra adm ido bkl oid kl bo oel pni kl aHio iSkn׃ 
genesis 16:13	otqra Sm ihoh hdbr alih ath al rai ki amrh hgm hlm raiti aHri rai׃ 
genesis 16:14	el kn qra lbar bar lHi rai hnh bin qdS obin brd׃ 
genesis 16:15	otld hgr labrm bn oiqra abrm Sm bno aSr ildh hgr iSmeal׃ 
genesis 16:16	oabrm bn Smnim Snh oSS Snim bldt hgr at iSmeal labrm׃ 
genesis 17:1	oihi abrm bn tSeim Snh otSe Snim oira ihoh al abrm oiamr alio ani al Sdi hthlk lpni ohih tmim׃ 
genesis 17:2	oatnh briti bini obink oarbh aotk bmad mad׃ 
genesis 17:3	oipl abrm el pnio oidbr ato alhim lamr׃ 
genesis 17:4	ani hnh briti atk ohiit lab hmon goim׃ 
genesis 17:5	ola iqra eod at Smk abrm ohih Smk abrhm ki ab hmon goim nttik׃ 
genesis 17:6	ohprti atk bmad mad onttik lgoim omlkim mmk izao׃ 
genesis 17:7	ohqmti at briti bini obink obin crek aHrik ldrtm lbrit eolm lhiot lk lalhim olcrek aHrik׃ 
genesis 17:8	ontti lk olcrek aHrik at arz mgrik at kl arz knen laHct eolm ohiiti lhm lalhim׃ 
genesis 17:9	oiamr alhim al abrhm oath at briti tSmr ath ocrek aHrik ldrtm׃ 
genesis 17:10	cat briti aSr tSmro bini obinikm obin crek aHrik hmol lkm kl ckr׃ 
genesis 17:11	onmltm at bSr erltkm ohih laot brit bini obinikm׃ 
genesis 17:12	obn Smnt imim imol lkm kl ckr ldrtikm ilid bit omqnt ksp mkl bn nkr aSr la mcrek hoa׃ 
genesis 17:13	hmol imol ilid bitk omqnt kspk ohith briti bbSrkm lbrit eolm׃ 
genesis 17:14	oerl ckr aSr la imol at bSr erlto onkrth hnpS hhoa memih at briti hpr׃ 
genesis 17:15	oiamr alhim al abrhm Sri aStk la tqra at Smh Sri ki Srh Smh׃ 
genesis 17:16	obrkti ath ogm ntti mmnh lk bn obrktih ohith lgoim mlki emim mmnh ihio׃ 
genesis 17:17	oipl abrhm el pnio oizHq oiamr blbo hlbn mah Snh iold oam Srh hbt tSeim Snh tld׃ 
genesis 17:18	oiamr abrhm al halhim lo iSmeal iHih lpnik׃ 
genesis 17:19	oiamr alhim abl Srh aStk ildt lk bn oqrat at Smo izHq ohqmti at briti ato lbrit eolm lcreo aHrio׃ 
genesis 17:20	oliSmeal Smetik hnh brkti ato ohpriti ato ohrbiti ato bmad mad Snim eSr nSiam iolid onttio lgoi gdol׃ 
genesis 17:21	oat briti aqim at izHq aSr tld lk Srh lmoed hch bSnh haHrt׃ 
genesis 17:22	oikl ldbr ato oiel alhim mel abrhm׃ 
genesis 17:23	oiqH abrhm at iSmeal bno oat kl ilidi bito oat kl mqnt kspo kl ckr banSi bit abrhm oiml at bSr erltm bezm hiom hch kaSr dbr ato alhim׃ 
genesis 17:24	oabrhm bn tSeim otSe Snh bhmlo bSr erlto׃ 
genesis 17:25	oiSmeal bno bn SlS eSrh Snh bhmlo at bSr erlto׃ 
genesis 17:26	bezm hiom hch nmol abrhm oiSmeal bno׃ 
genesis 17:27	okl anSi bito ilid bit omqnt ksp mat bn nkr nmlo ato׃ 
genesis 18:1	oira alio ihoh balni mmra ohoa iSb ptH hahl kHm hiom׃ 
genesis 18:2	oiSa einio oira ohnh SlSh anSim nzbim elio oira oirz lqratm mptH hahl oiStHo arzh׃ 
genesis 18:3	oiamr adni am na mzati Hn beinik al na tebr mel ebdk׃ 
genesis 18:4	iqH na meT mim orHzo rglikm ohSeno tHt hez׃ 
genesis 18:5	oaqHh pt lHm osedo lbkm aHr tebro ki el kn ebrtm el ebdkm oiamro kn teSh kaSr dbrt׃ 
genesis 18:6	oimhr abrhm hahlh al Srh oiamr mhri SlS saim qmH slt loSi oeSi egot׃ 
genesis 18:7	oal hbqr rz abrhm oiqH bn bqr rk oTob oitn al hner oimhr leSot ato׃ 
genesis 18:8	oiqH Hmah oHlb obn hbqr aSr eSh oitn lpnihm ohoa emd elihm tHt hez oiaklo׃ 
genesis 18:9	oiamro alio aih Srh aStk oiamr hnh bahl׃ 
genesis 18:10	oiamr Sob aSob alik ket Hih ohnh bn lSrh aStk oSrh Smet ptH hahl ohoa aHrio׃ 
genesis 18:11	oabrhm oSrh cqnim baim bimim Hdl lhiot lSrh arH knSim׃ 
genesis 18:12	otzHq Srh bqrbh lamr aHri blti hith li ednh oadni cqn׃ 
genesis 18:13	oiamr ihoh al abrhm lmh ch zHqh Srh lamr hap amnm ald oani cqnti׃ 
genesis 18:14	hipla mihoh dbr lmoed aSob alik ket Hih olSrh bn׃ 
genesis 18:15	otkHS Srh lamr la zHqti ki irah oiamr la ki zHqt׃ 
genesis 18:16	oiqmo mSm hanSim oiSqpo el pni sdm oabrhm hlk emm lSlHm׃ 
genesis 18:17	oihoh amr hmksh ani mabrhm aSr ani eSh׃ 
genesis 18:18	oabrhm hio ihih lgoi gdol oezom onbrko bo kl goii harz׃ 
genesis 18:19	ki idetio lmen aSr izoh at bnio oat bito aHrio oSmro drk ihoh leSot zdqh omSpT lmen hbia ihoh el abrhm at aSr dbr elio׃ 
genesis 18:20	oiamr ihoh ceqt sdm oemrh ki rbh oHTatm ki kbdh mad׃ 
genesis 18:21	ardh na oarah hkzeqth hbah ali eSo klh oam la adeh׃ 
genesis 18:22	oipno mSm hanSim oilko sdmh oabrhm eodno emd lpni ihoh׃ 
genesis 18:23	oigS abrhm oiamr hap tsph zdiq em rSe׃ 
genesis 18:24	aoli iS HmSim zdiqm btok heir hap tsph ola tSa lmqom lmen HmSim hzdiqm aSr bqrbh׃ 
genesis 18:25	Hllh lk meSt kdbr hch lhmit zdiq em rSe ohih kzdiq krSe Hllh lk hSpT kl harz la ieSh mSpT׃ 
genesis 18:26	oiamr ihoh am amza bsdm HmSim zdiqm btok heir onSati lkl hmqom beborm׃ 
genesis 18:27	oien abrhm oiamr hnh na hoalti ldbr al adni oanki epr oapr׃ 
genesis 18:28	aoli iHsron HmSim hzdiqm HmSh htSHit bHmSh at kl heir oiamr la aSHit am amza Sm arbeim oHmSh׃ 
genesis 18:29	oisp eod ldbr alio oiamr aoli imzaon Sm arbeim oiamr la aeSh bebor harbeim׃ 
genesis 18:30	oiamr al na iHr ladni oadbrh aoli imzaon Sm SlSim oiamr la aeSh am amza Sm SlSim׃ 
genesis 18:31	oiamr hnh na hoalti ldbr al adni aoli imzaon Sm eSrim oiamr la aSHit bebor heSrim׃ 
genesis 18:32	oiamr al na iHr ladni oadbrh ak hpem aoli imzaon Sm eSrh oiamr la aSHit bebor heSrh׃ 
genesis 18:33	oilk ihoh kaSr klh ldbr al abrhm oabrhm Sb lmqmo׃ 
genesis 19:1	oibao Sni hmlakim sdmh berb oloT iSb bSer sdm oira loT oiqm lqratm oiStHo apim arzh׃ 
genesis 19:2	oiamr hnh na adni soro na al bit ebdkm olino orHzo rglikm ohSkmtm ohlktm ldrkkm oiamro la ki brHob nlin׃ 
genesis 19:3	oipzr bm mad oisro alio oibao al bito oieS lhm mSth omzot aph oiaklo׃ 
genesis 19:4	Trm iSkbo oanSi heir anSi sdm nsbo el hbit mner oed cqn kl hem mqzh׃ 
genesis 19:5	oiqrao al loT oiamro lo aih hanSim aSr bao alik hlilh hoziam alino ondeh atm׃ 
genesis 19:6	oiza alhm loT hptHh ohdlt sgr aHrio׃ 
genesis 19:7	oiamr al na aHi treo׃ 
genesis 19:8	hnh na li Sti bnot aSr la ideo aiS aoziah na athn alikm oeSo lhn kTob beinikm rq lanSim hal al teSo dbr ki el kn bao bzl qrti׃

genesis 19:10	oiSlHo hanSim at idm oibiao at loT alihm hbith oat hdlt sgro׃ 
genesis 19:11	oat hanSim aSr ptH hbit hko bsnorim mqTn oed gdol oilao lmza hptH׃ 
genesis 19:12	oiamro hanSim al loT ed mi lk ph Htn obnik obntik okl aSr lk beir hoza mn hmqom׃ 
genesis 19:13	ki mSHtim anHno at hmqom hch ki gdlh zeqtm at pni ihoh oiSlHno ihoh lSHth׃

genesis 19:16	oitmhmh oiHcqo hanSim bido obid aSto obid Sti bntio bHmlt ihoh elio oizaho oinHho mHoz leir׃ 
genesis 19:17	oihi khoziam atm hHozh oiamr hmlT el npSk al tbiT aHrik oal temd bkl hkkr hhrh hmlT pn tsph׃ 
genesis 19:18	oiamr loT alhm al na adni׃ 
genesis 19:19	hnh na mza ebdk Hn beinik otgdl Hsdk aSr eSit emdi lhHiot at npSi oanki la aokl lhmlT hhrh pn tdbqni hreh omti׃ 
genesis 19:20	hnh na heir hcat qrbh lnos Smh ohia mzer amlTh na Smh hla mzer hoa otHi npSi׃ 
genesis 19:21	oiamr alio hnh nSati pnik gm ldbr hch lblti hpki at heir aSr dbrt׃ 
genesis 19:22	mhr hmlT Smh ki la aokl leSot dbr ed bak Smh el kn qra Sm heir zoer׃ 
genesis 19:23	hSmS iza el harz oloT ba zerh׃ 
genesis 19:24	oihoh hmTir el sdm oel emrh gprit oaS mat ihoh mn hSmim׃ 
genesis 19:25	oihpk at herim hal oat kl hkkr oat kl iSbi herim ozmH hadmh׃ 
genesis 19:26	otbT aSto maHrio othi nzib mlH׃ 
genesis 19:27	oiSkm abrhm bbqr al hmqom aSr emd Sm at pni ihoh׃ 
genesis 19:28	oiSqp el pni sdm oemrh oel kl pni arz hkkr oira ohnh elh qiTr harz kqiTr hkbSn׃ 
genesis 19:29	oihi bSHt alhim at eri hkkr oickr alhim at abrhm oiSlH at loT mtok hhpkh bhpk at herim aSr iSb bhn loT׃ 
genesis 19:30	oiel loT mzoer oiSb bhr oSti bntio emo ki ira lSbt bzoer oiSb bmerh hoa oSti bntio׃ 
genesis 19:31	otamr hbkirh al hzeirh abino cqn oaiS ain barz lboa elino kdrk kl harz׃ 
genesis 19:32	lkh nSqh at abino iin onSkbh emo onHih mabino cre׃ 
genesis 19:33	otSqin at abihn iin blilh hoa otba hbkirh otSkb at abih ola ide bSkbh obqomh׃

genesis 19:36	othrin Sti bnot loT mabihn׃ 
genesis 19:37	otld hbkirh bn otqra Smo moab hoa abi moab ed hiom׃

genesis 20:1	oise mSm abrhm arzh hngb oiSb bin qdS obin Sor oigr bgrr׃ 
genesis 20:2	oiamr abrhm al Srh aSto aHti hoa oiSlH abimlk mlk grr oiqH at Srh׃ 
genesis 20:3	oiba alhim al abimlk bHlom hlilh oiamr lo hnk mt el haSh aSr lqHt ohoa belt bel׃ 
genesis 20:4	oabimlk la qrb alih oiamr adni hgoi gm zdiq thrg׃ 
genesis 20:5	hla hoa amr li aHti hoa ohia gm hoa amrh aHi hoa btm lbbi obnqin kpi eSiti cat׃ 
genesis 20:6	oiamr alio halhim bHlm gm anki ideti ki btm lbbk eSit cat oaHSk gm anki aotk mHTo li el kn la nttik lnge alih׃ 
genesis 20:7	oeth hSb aSt haiS ki nbia hoa oitpll bedk oHih oam aink mSib de ki mot tmot ath okl aSr lk׃ 
genesis 20:8	oiSkm abimlk bbqr oiqra lkl ebdio oidbr at kl hdbrim halh bacnihm oiirao hanSim mad׃ 
genesis 20:9	oiqra abimlk labrhm oiamr lo mh eSit lno omh HTati lk ki hbat eli oel mmlkti HTah gdlh meSim aSr la ieSo eSit emdi׃ 
genesis 20:10	oiamr abimlk al abrhm mh rait ki eSit at hdbr hch׃ 
genesis 20:11	oiamr abrhm ki amrti rq ain irat alhim bmqom hch ohrgoni el dbr aSti׃ 
genesis 20:12	ogm amnh aHti bt abi hoa ak la bt ami othi li laSh׃ 
genesis 20:13	oihi kaSr hteo ati alhim mbit abi oamr lh ch Hsdk aSr teSi emdi al kl hmqom aSr nboa Smh amri li aHi hoa׃ 
genesis 20:14	oiqH abimlk zan obqr oebdim oSpHt oitn labrhm oiSb lo at Srh aSto׃ 
genesis 20:15	oiamr abimlk hnh arzi lpnik bTob beinik Sb׃

genesis 20:17	oitpll abrhm al halhim oirpa alhim at abimlk oat aSto oamhtio oildo׃ 
genesis 20:18	ki ezr ezr ihoh bed kl rHm lbit abimlk el dbr Srh aSt abrhm׃ 
genesis 21:1	oihoh pqd at Srh kaSr amr oieS ihoh lSrh kaSr dbr׃ 
genesis 21:2	othr otld Srh labrhm bn lcqnio lmoed aSr dbr ato alhim׃ 
genesis 21:3	oiqra abrhm at Sm bno hnold lo aSr ildh lo Srh izHq׃ 
genesis 21:4	oiml abrhm at izHq bno bn Smnt imim kaSr zoh ato alhim׃ 
genesis 21:5	oabrhm bn mat Snh bhold lo at izHq bno׃ 
genesis 21:6	otamr Srh zHq eSh li alhim kl hSme izHq li׃ 
genesis 21:7	otamr mi mll labrhm hiniqh bnim Srh ki ildti bn lcqnio׃ 
genesis 21:8	oigdl hild oigml oieS abrhm mSth gdol biom hgml at izHq׃ 
genesis 21:9	otra Srh at bn hgr hmzrit aSr ildh labrhm mzHq׃ 
genesis 21:10	otamr labrhm grS hamh hcat oat bnh ki la iirS bn hamh hcat em bni em izHq׃ 
genesis 21:11	oire hdbr mad beini abrhm el aodt bno׃ 
genesis 21:12	oiamr alhim al abrhm al ire beinik el hner oel amtk kl aSr tamr alik Srh Sme bqlh ki bizHq iqra lk cre׃ 
genesis 21:13	ogm at bn hamh lgoi aSimno ki crek hoa׃ 
genesis 21:14	oiSkm abrhm bbqr oiqH lHm oHmt mim oitn al hgr Sm el Skmh oat hild oiSlHh otlk otte bmdbr bar Sbe׃ 
genesis 21:15	oiklo hmim mn hHmt otSlk at hild tHt aHd hSiHm׃ 
genesis 21:16	otlk otSb lh mngd hrHq kmTHoi qSt ki amrh al arah bmot hild otSb mngd otSa at qlh otbk׃ 
genesis 21:17	oiSme alhim at qol hner oiqra mlak alhim al hgr mn hSmim oiamr lh mh lk hgr al tirai ki Sme alhim al qol hner baSr hoa Sm׃ 
genesis 21:18	qomi Sai at hner ohHciqi at idk bo ki lgoi gdol aSimno׃ 
genesis 21:19	oipqH alhim at einih otra bar mim otlk otmla at hHmt mim otSq at hner׃ 
genesis 21:20	oihi alhim at hner oigdl oiSb bmdbr oihi rbh qSt׃ 
genesis 21:21	oiSb bmdbr parn otqH lo amo aSh marz mzrim׃ 
genesis 21:22	oihi bet hhoa oiamr abimlk opikl Sr zbao al abrhm lamr alhim emk bkl aSr ath eSh׃ 
genesis 21:23	oeth hSbeh li balhim hnh am tSqr li olnini olnkdi kHsd aSr eSiti emk teSh emdi oem harz aSr grth bh׃ 
genesis 21:24	oiamr abrhm anki aSbe׃ 
genesis 21:25	ohokH abrhm at abimlk el adot bar hmim aSr gclo ebdi abimlk׃ 
genesis 21:26	oiamr abimlk la ideti mi eSh at hdbr hch ogm ath la hgdt li ogm anki la Smeti blti hiom׃ 
genesis 21:27	oiqH abrhm zan obqr oitn labimlk oikrto Snihm brit׃ 
genesis 21:28	oizb abrhm at Sbe kbSt hzan lbdhn׃ 
genesis 21:29	oiamr abimlk al abrhm mh hnh Sbe kbSt halh aSr hzbt lbdnh׃ 
genesis 21:30	oiamr ki at Sbe kbSt tqH midi bebor thih li ledh ki Hprti at hbar hcat׃ 
genesis 21:31	el kn qra lmqom hhoa bar Sbe ki Sm nSbeo Snihm׃

genesis 21:34	oigr abrhm barz plStim imim rbim׃ 
genesis 22:1	oihi aHr hdbrim halh ohalhim nsh at abrhm oiamr alio abrhm oiamr hnni׃ 
genesis 22:2	oiamr qH na at bnk at iHidk aSr ahbt at izHq olk lk al arz hmrih ohelho Sm lelh el aHd hhrim aSr amr alik׃ 
genesis 22:3	oiSkm abrhm bbqr oiHbS at Hmro oiqH at Sni nerio ato oat izHq bno oibqe ezi elh oiqm oilk al hmqom aSr amr lo halhim׃ 
genesis 22:4	biom hSliSi oiSa abrhm at einio oira at hmqom mrHq׃ 
genesis 22:5	oiamr abrhm al nerio Sbo lkm ph em hHmor oani ohner nlkh ed kh onStHoh onSobh alikm׃ 
genesis 22:6	oiqH abrhm at ezi helh oiSm el izHq bno oiqH bido at haS oat hmaklt oilko Snihm iHdo׃

genesis 22:8	oiamr abrhm alhim irah lo hSh lelh bni oilko Snihm iHdo׃ 
genesis 22:9	oibao al hmqom aSr amr lo halhim oibn Sm abrhm at hmcbH oierk at hezim oieqd at izHq bno oiSm ato el hmcbH mmel lezim׃ 
genesis 22:10	oiSlH abrhm at ido oiqH at hmaklt lSHT at bno׃ 
genesis 22:11	oiqra alio mlak ihoh mn hSmim oiamr abrhm abrhm oiamr hnni׃ 
genesis 22:12	oiamr al tSlH idk al hner oal teS lo maomh ki eth ideti ki ira alhim ath ola HSkt at bnk at iHidk mmni׃ 
genesis 22:13	oiSa abrhm at einio oira ohnh ail aHr naHc bsbk bqrnio oilk abrhm oiqH at hail oielho lelh tHt bno׃ 
genesis 22:14	oiqra abrhm Sm hmqom hhoa ihoh irah aSr iamr hiom bhr ihoh irah׃ 
genesis 22:15	oiqra mlak ihoh al abrhm Snit mn hSmim׃ 
genesis 22:16	oiamr bi nSbeti nam ihoh ki ien aSr eSit at hdbr hch ola HSkt at bnk at iHidk׃ 
genesis 22:17	ki brk abrkk ohrbh arbh at crek kkokbi hSmim okHol aSr el Spt him oirS crek at Ser aibio׃ 
genesis 22:18	ohtbrko bcrek kl goii harz eqb aSr Smet bqli׃ 
genesis 22:19	oiSb abrhm al nerio oiqmo oilko iHdo al bar Sbe oiSb abrhm bbar Sbe׃

genesis 23:1	oihio Hii Srh mah Snh oeSrim Snh oSbe Snim Sni Hii Srh׃

genesis 23:3	oiqm abrhm mel pni mto oidbr al bni Ht lamr׃ 
genesis 23:4	gr otoSb anki emkm tno li aHct qbr emkm oaqbrh mti mlpni׃ 
genesis 23:5	oieno bni Ht at abrhm lamr lo׃ 
genesis 23:6	Smeno adni nSia alhim ath btokno bmbHr qbrino qbr at mtk aiS mmno at qbro la iklh mmk mqbr mtk׃ 
genesis 23:7	oiqm abrhm oiStHo lem harz lbni Ht׃ 
genesis 23:8	oidbr atm lamr am iS at npSkm lqbr at mti mlpni Smeoni opgeo li bepron bn zHr׃ 
genesis 23:9	oitn li at mert hmkplh aSr lo aSr bqzh Sdho bksp mla itnnh li btokkm laHct qbr׃ 
genesis 23:10	oepron iSb btok bni Ht oien epron hHti at abrhm bacni bni Ht lkl bai Ser eiro lamr׃ 
genesis 23:11	la adni Smeni hSdh ntti lk ohmerh aSr bo lk nttih leini bni emi nttih lk qbr mtk׃ 
genesis 23:12	oiStHo abrhm lpni em harz׃ 
genesis 23:13	oidbr al epron bacni em harz lamr ak am ath lo Smeni ntti ksp hSdh qH mmni oaqbrh at mti Smh׃ 
genesis 23:14	oien epron at abrhm lamr lo׃ 
genesis 23:15	adni Smeni arz arbe mat Sql ksp bini obink mh hoa oat mtk qbr׃

genesis 23:20	oiqm hSdh ohmerh aSr bo labrhm laHct qbr mat bni Ht׃ 
genesis 24:1	oabrhm cqn ba bimim oihoh brk at abrhm bkl׃ 
genesis 24:2	oiamr abrhm al ebdo cqn bito hmSl bkl aSr lo Sim na idk tHt irki׃ 
genesis 24:3	oaSbiek bihoh alhi hSmim oalhi harz aSr la tqH aSh lbni mbnot hkneni aSr anki ioSb bqrbo׃ 
genesis 24:4	ki al arzi oal moldti tlk olqHt aSh lbni lizHq׃ 
genesis 24:5	oiamr alio hebd aoli la tabh haSh llkt aHri al harz hcat hhSb aSib at bnk al harz aSr izat mSm׃ 
genesis 24:6	oiamr alio abrhm hSmr lk pn tSib at bni Smh׃ 
genesis 24:7	ihoh alhi hSmim aSr lqHni mbit abi omarz moldti oaSr dbr li oaSr nSbe li lamr lcrek atn at harz hcat hoa iSlH mlako lpnik olqHt aSh lbni mSm׃ 
genesis 24:8	oam la tabh haSh llkt aHrik onqit mSbeti cat rq at bni la tSb Smh׃ 
genesis 24:9	oiSm hebd at ido tHt irk abrhm adnio oiSbe lo el hdbr hch׃ 
genesis 24:10	oiqH hebd eSrh gmlim mgmli adnio oilk okl Tob adnio bido oiqm oilk al arm nhrim al eir nHor׃ 
genesis 24:11	oibrk hgmlim mHoz leir al bar hmim let erb let zat hSabt׃ 
genesis 24:12	oiamr ihoh alhi adni abrhm hqrh na lpni hiom oeSh Hsd em adni abrhm׃ 
genesis 24:13	hnh anki nzb el ein hmim obnot anSi heir izat lSab mim׃ 
genesis 24:14	ohih hner aSr amr alih hTi na kdk oaSth oamrh Sth ogm gmlik aSqh ath hkHt lebdk lizHq obh ade ki eSit Hsd em adni׃ 
genesis 24:15	oihi hoa Trm klh ldbr ohnh rbqh izat aSr ildh lbtoal bn mlkh aSt nHor aHi abrhm okdh el Skmh׃ 
genesis 24:16	ohner Tbt mrah mad btolh oaiS la ideh otrd heinh otmla kdh otel׃ 
genesis 24:17	oirz hebd lqrath oiamr hgmiaini na meT mim mkdk׃ 
genesis 24:18	otamr Sth adni otmhr otrd kdh el idh otSqho׃ 
genesis 24:19	otkl lhSqto otamr gm lgmlik aSab ed am klo lStt׃ 
genesis 24:20	otmhr oter kdh al hSqt otrz eod al hbar lSab otSab lkl gmlio׃ 
genesis 24:21	ohaiS mStah lh mHriS ldet hhzliH ihoh drko am la׃ 
genesis 24:22	oihi kaSr klo hgmlim lStot oiqH haiS ncm chb bqe mSqlo oSni zmidim el idih eSrh chb mSqlm׃ 
genesis 24:23	oiamr bt mi at hgidi na li hiS bit abik mqom lno llin׃ 
genesis 24:24	otamr alio bt btoal anki bn mlkh aSr ildh lnHor׃ 
genesis 24:25	otamr alio gm tbn gm mspoa rb emno gm mqom llon׃ 
genesis 24:26	oiqd haiS oiStHo lihoh׃ 
genesis 24:27	oiamr brok ihoh alhi adni abrhm aSr la ecb Hsdo oamto mem adni anki bdrk nHni ihoh bit aHi adni׃ 
genesis 24:28	otrz hner otgd lbit amh kdbrim halh׃ 
genesis 24:29	olrbqh aH oSmo lbn oirz lbn al haiS hHozh al hein׃ 
genesis 24:30	oihi krat at hncm oat hzmdim el idi aHto okSmeo at dbri rbqh aHto lamr kh dbr ali haiS oiba al haiS ohnh emd el hgmlim el hein׃ 
genesis 24:31	oiamr boa brok ihoh lmh temd bHoz oanki pniti hbit omqom lgmlim׃ 
genesis 24:32	oiba haiS hbith oiptH hgmlim oitn tbn omspoa lgmlim omim lrHz rglio orgli hanSim aSr ato׃ 
genesis 24:33	oiiSm lpnio lakl oiamr la akl ed am dbrti dbri oiamr dbr׃ 
genesis 24:34	oiamr ebd abrhm anki׃ 
genesis 24:35	oihoh brk at adni mad oigdl oitn lo zan obqr oksp ochb oebdm oSpHt ogmlim oHmrim׃ 
genesis 24:36	otld Srh aSt adni bn ladni aHri cqnth oitn lo at kl aSr lo׃ 
genesis 24:37	oiSbeni adni lamr la tqH aSh lbni mbnot hkneni aSr anki iSb barzo׃ 
genesis 24:38	am la al bit abi tlk oal mSpHti olqHt aSh lbni׃ 
genesis 24:39	oamr al adni ali la tlk haSh aHri׃ 
genesis 24:40	oiamr ali ihoh aSr hthlkti lpnio iSlH mlako atk ohzliH drkk olqHt aSh lbni mmSpHti ombit abi׃ 
genesis 24:41	ac tnqh malti ki tboa al mSpHti oam la itno lk ohiit nqi malti׃ 
genesis 24:42	oaba hiom al hein oamr ihoh alhi adni abrhm am iSk na mzliH drki aSr anki hlk elih׃ 
genesis 24:43	hnh anki nzb el ein hmim ohih helmh hizat lSab oamrti alih hSqini na meT mim mkdk׃ 
genesis 24:44	oamrh ali gm ath Sth ogm lgmlik aSab hoa haSh aSr hkiH ihoh lbn adni׃ 
genesis 24:45	ani Trm aklh ldbr al lbi ohnh rbqh izat okdh el Skmh otrd heinh otSab oamr alih hSqini na׃ 
genesis 24:46	otmhr otord kdh melih otamr Sth ogm gmlik aSqh oaSt ogm hgmlim hSqth׃ 
genesis 24:47	oaSal ath oamr bt mi at otamr bt btoal bn nHor aSr ildh lo mlkh oaSm hncm el aph ohzmidim el idih׃ 
genesis 24:48	oaqd oaStHoh lihoh oabrk at ihoh alhi adni abrhm aSr hnHni bdrk amt lqHt at bt aHi adni lbno׃ 
genesis 24:49	oeth am iSkm eSim Hsd oamt at adni hgido li oam la hgido li oapnh el imin ao el Smal׃ 
genesis 24:50	oien lbn obtoal oiamro mihoh iza hdbr la nokl dbr alik re ao Tob׃ 
genesis 24:51	hnh rbqh lpnik qH olk othi aSh lbn adnik kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
genesis 24:52	oihi kaSr Sme ebd abrhm at dbrihm oiStHo arzh lihoh׃ 
genesis 24:53	oioza hebd kli ksp okli chb obgdim oitn lrbqh omgdnt ntn laHih olamh׃ 
genesis 24:54	oiaklo oiSto hoa ohanSim aSr emo oilino oiqomo bbqr oiamr SlHni ladni׃ 
genesis 24:55	oiamr aHih oamh tSb hner atno imim ao eSor aHr tlk׃ 
genesis 24:56	oiamr alhm al taHro ati oihoh hzliH drki SlHoni oalkh ladni׃ 
genesis 24:57	oiamro nqra lner onSalh at pih׃ 
genesis 24:58	oiqrao lrbqh oiamro alih htlki em haiS hch otamr alk׃ 
genesis 24:59	oiSlHo at rbqh aHtm oat mnqth oat ebd abrhm oat anSio׃ 
genesis 24:60	oibrko at rbqh oiamro lh aHtno at hii lalpi rbbh oiirS crek at Ser Snaio׃ 
genesis 24:61	otqm rbqh onertih otrkbnh el hgmlim otlknh aHri haiS oiqH hebd at rbqh oilk׃ 
genesis 24:62	oizHq ba mboa bar lHi rai ohoa ioSb barz hngb׃ 
genesis 24:63	oiza izHq lSoH bSdh lpnot erb oiSa einio oira ohnh gmlim baim׃ 
genesis 24:64	otSa rbqh at einih otra at izHq otpl mel hgml׃ 
genesis 24:65	otamr al hebd mi haiS hlch hhlk bSdh lqratno oiamr hebd hoa adni otqH hzeip ottks׃ 
genesis 24:66	oispr hebd lizHq at kl hdbrim aSr eSh׃ 
genesis 24:67	oibah izHq hahlh Srh amo oiqH at rbqh othi lo laSh oiahbh oinHm izHq aHri amo׃ 
genesis 25:1	oisp abrhm oiqH aSh oSmh qTorh׃ 
genesis 25:2	otld lo at cmrn oat iqSn oat mdn oat mdin oat iSbq oat SoH׃ 
genesis 25:3	oiqSn ild at Sba oat ddn obni ddn hio aSorm olToSim olamim׃ 
genesis 25:4	obni mdin eiph oepr oHnk oabide oaldeh kl alh bni qTorh׃ 
genesis 25:5	oitn abrhm at kl aSr lo lizHq׃ 
genesis 25:6	olbni hpilgSim aSr labrhm ntn abrhm mtnt oiSlHm mel izHq bno beodno Hi qdmh al arz qdm׃ 
genesis 25:7	oalh imi Sni Hii abrhm aSr Hi mat Snh oSbeim Snh oHmS Snim׃ 
genesis 25:8	oigoe oimt abrhm bSibh Tobh cqn oSbe oiasp al emio׃ 
genesis 25:9	oiqbro ato izHq oiSmeal bnio al mert hmkplh al Sdh eprn bn zHr hHti aSr el pni mmra׃ 
genesis 25:10	hSdh aSr qnh abrhm mat bni Ht Smh qbr abrhm oSrh aSto׃ 
genesis 25:11	oihi aHri mot abrhm oibrk alhim at izHq bno oiSb izHq em bar lHi rai׃ 
genesis 25:12	oalh tldt iSmeal bn abrhm aSr ildh hgr hmzrit SpHt Srh labrhm׃ 
genesis 25:13	oalh Smot bni iSmeal bSmtm ltoldtm bkr iSmeal nbit oqdr oadbal ombSm׃ 
genesis 25:14	omSme odomh omSa׃ 
genesis 25:15	Hdd otima iTor npiS oqdmh׃ 
genesis 25:16	alh hm bni iSmeal oalh Smtm bHzrihm obTirtm Snim eSr nSiam lamtm׃ 
genesis 25:17	oalh Sni Hii iSmeal mat Snh oSlSim Snh oSbe Snim oigoe oimt oiasp al emio׃ 
genesis 25:18	oiSkno mHoilh ed Sor aSr el pni mzrim bakh aSorh el pni kl aHio npl׃ 
genesis 25:19	oalh toldt izHq bn abrhm abrhm holid at izHq׃ 
genesis 25:20	oihi izHq bn arbeim Snh bqHto at rbqh bt btoal harmi mpdn arm aHot lbn harmi lo laSh׃ 
genesis 25:21	oietr izHq lihoh lnkH aSto ki eqrh hoa oietr lo ihoh othr rbqh aSto׃ 
genesis 25:22	oitrzzo hbnim bqrbh otamr am kn lmh ch anki otlk ldrS at ihoh׃

genesis 25:24	oimlao imih lldt ohnh tomm bbTnh׃ 
genesis 25:25	oiza hraSon admoni klo kadrt Ser oiqrao Smo eSo׃ 
genesis 25:26	oaHri kn iza aHio oido aHct beqb eSo oiqra Smo ieqb oizHq bn SSim Snh bldt atm׃ 
genesis 25:27	oigdlo hnerim oihi eSo aiS ide zid aiS Sdh oieqb aiS tm iSb ahlim׃ 
genesis 25:28	oiahb izHq at eSo ki zid bpio orbqh ahbt at ieqb׃ 
genesis 25:29	oicd ieqb ncid oiba eSo mn hSdh ohoa eip׃ 
genesis 25:30	oiamr eSo al ieqb hleiTni na mn hadm hadm hch ki eip anki el kn qra Smo adom׃ 
genesis 25:31	oiamr ieqb mkrh kiom at bkrtk li׃ 
genesis 25:32	oiamr eSo hnh anki holk lmot olmh ch li bkrh׃

genesis 26:1	oihi reb barz mlbd hreb hraSon aSr hih bimi abrhm oilk izHq al abimlk mlk plStim grrh׃ 
genesis 26:2	oira alio ihoh oiamr al trd mzrimh Skn barz aSr amr alik׃ 
genesis 26:3	gor barz hcat oahih emk oabrkk ki lk olcrek atn at kl harzt hal ohqmti at hSbeh aSr nSbeti labrhm abik׃ 
genesis 26:4	ohrbiti at crek kkokbi hSmim ontti lcrek at kl harzt hal ohtbrko bcrek kl goii harz׃ 
genesis 26:5	eqb aSr Sme abrhm bqli oiSmr mSmrti mzoti Hqoti otorti׃ 
genesis 26:6	oiSb izHq bgrr׃ 
genesis 26:7	oiSalo anSi hmqom laSto oiamr aHti hoa ki ira lamr aSti pn ihrgni anSi hmqom el rbqh ki Tobt mrah hia׃ 
genesis 26:8	oihi ki arko lo Sm himim oiSqp abimlk mlk plStim bed hHlon oira ohnh izHq mzHq at rbqh aSto׃ 
genesis 26:9	oiqra abimlk lizHq oiamr ak hnh aStk hoa oaik amrt aHti hoa oiamr alio izHq ki amrti pn amot elih׃ 
genesis 26:10	oiamr abimlk mh cat eSit lno kmeT Skb aHd hem at aStk ohbat elino aSm׃ 
genesis 26:11	oizo abimlk at kl hem lamr hnge baiS hch obaSto mot iomt׃ 
genesis 26:12	oicre izHq barz hhoa oimza bSnh hhoa mah Serim oibrkho ihoh׃ 
genesis 26:13	oigdl haiS oilk hlok ogdl ed ki gdl mad׃ 
genesis 26:14	oihi lo mqnh zan omqnh bqr oebdh rbh oiqnao ato plStim׃ 
genesis 26:15	okl hbart aSr Hpro ebdi abio bimi abrhm abio stmom plStim oimlaom epr׃ 
genesis 26:16	oiamr abimlk al izHq lk memno ki ezmt mmno mad׃ 
genesis 26:17	oilk mSm izHq oiHn bnHl grr oiSb Sm׃ 
genesis 26:18	oiSb izHq oiHpr at bart hmim aSr Hpro bimi abrhm abio oistmom plStim aHri mot abrhm oiqra lhn Smot kSmt aSr qra lhn abio׃ 
genesis 26:19	oiHpro ebdi izHq bnHl oimzao Sm bar mim Hiim׃ 
genesis 26:20	oiribo rei grr em rei izHq lamr lno hmim oiqra Sm hbar eSq ki hteSqo emo׃ 
genesis 26:21	oiHpro bar aHrt oiribo gm elih oiqra Smh STnh׃ 
genesis 26:22	oietq mSm oiHpr bar aHrt ola rbo elih oiqra Smh rHbot oiamr ki eth hrHib ihoh lno oprino barz׃ 
genesis 26:23	oiel mSm bar Sbe׃ 
genesis 26:24	oira alio ihoh blilh hhoa oiamr anki alhi abrhm abik al tira ki atk anki obrktik ohrbiti at crek bebor abrhm ebdi׃ 
genesis 26:25	oibn Sm mcbH oiqra bSm ihoh oiT Sm ahlo oikro Sm ebdi izHq bar׃ 
genesis 26:26	oabimlk hlk alio mgrr oaHct mreho opikl Sr zbao׃ 
genesis 26:27	oiamr alhm izHq mdoe batm ali oatm Snatm ati otSlHoni matkm׃ 
genesis 26:28	oiamro rao raino ki hih ihoh emk onamr thi na alh binotino binino obink onkrth brit emk׃ 
genesis 26:29	am teSh emno reh kaSr la ngenok okaSr eSino emk rq Tob onSlHk bSlom ath eth brok ihoh׃

genesis 27:1	oihi ki cqn izHq otkhin einio mrat oiqra at eSo bno hgdl oiamr alio bni oiamr alio hnni׃ 
genesis 27:2	oiamr hnh na cqnti la ideti iom moti׃ 
genesis 27:3	oeth Sa na klik tlik oqStk oza hSdh ozodh li zidh׃ 
genesis 27:4	oeSh li mTemim kaSr ahbti ohbiah li oaklh bebor tbrkk npSi bTrm amot׃ 
genesis 27:5	orbqh Smet bdbr izHq al eSo bno oilk eSo hSdh lzod zid lhbia׃

genesis 27:16	oat ert gdii hecim hlbiSh el idio oel Hlqt zoario׃

genesis 28:4	oitn lk at brkt abrhm lk olcrek atk lrStk at arz mgrik aSr ntn alhim labrhm׃

genesis 29:1	oiSa ieqb rglio oilk arzh bni qdm׃ 
genesis 29:2	oira ohnh bar bSdh ohnh Sm SlSh edri zan rbzim elih ki mn hbar hhoa iSqo hedrim ohabn gdlh el pi hbar׃ 
genesis 29:3	onaspo Smh kl hedrim ogllo at habn mel pi hbar ohSqo at hzan ohSibo at habn el pi hbar lmqmh׃

genesis 29:24	oitn lbn lh at clph SpHto llah bto SpHh׃

genesis 29:26	oiamr lbn la ieSh kn bmqomno ltt hzeirh lpni hbkirh׃ 
genesis 29:27	mla Sbe cat ontnh lk gm at cat bebdh aSr tebd emdi eod Sbe Snim aHrot׃ 
genesis 29:28	oieS ieqb kn oimla Sbe cat oitn lo at rHl bto lo laSh׃ 
genesis 29:29	oitn lbn lrHl bto at blhh SpHto lh lSpHh׃ 
genesis 29:30	oiba gm al rHl oiahb gm at rHl mlah oiebd emo eod Sbe Snim aHrot׃ 
genesis 29:31	oira ihoh ki Snoah lah oiptH at rHmh orHl eqrh׃ 
genesis 29:32	othr lah otld bn otqra Smo raobn ki amrh ki rah ihoh benii ki eth iahbni aiSi׃ 
genesis 29:33	othr eod otld bn otamr ki Sme ihoh ki Snoah anki oitn li gm at ch otqra Smo Smeon׃ 
genesis 29:34	othr eod otld bn otamr eth hpem iloh aiSi ali ki ildti lo SlSh bnim el kn qra Smo loi׃ 
genesis 29:35	othr eod otld bn otamr hpem aodh at ihoh el kn qrah Smo ihodh otemd mldt׃ 
genesis 30:1	otra rHl ki la ildh lieqb otqna rHl baHth otamr al ieqb hbh li bnim oam ain mth anki׃ 
genesis 30:2	oiHr ap ieqb brHl oiamr htHt alhim anki aSr mne mmk pri bTn׃ 
genesis 30:3	otamr hnh amti blhh ba alih otld el brki oabnh gm anki mmnh׃ 
genesis 30:4	ottn lo at blhh SpHth laSh oiba alih ieqb׃ 
genesis 30:5	othr blhh otld lieqb bn׃ 
genesis 30:6	otamr rHl dnni alhim ogm Sme bqli oitn li bn el kn qrah Smo dn׃ 
genesis 30:7	othr eod otld blhh SpHt rHl bn Sni lieqb׃ 
genesis 30:8	otamr rHl nptoli alhim nptlti em aHti gm iklti otqra Smo nptli׃ 
genesis 30:9	otra lah ki emdh mldt otqH at clph SpHth ottn ath lieqb laSh׃ 
genesis 30:10	otld clph SpHt lah lieqb bn׃ 
genesis 30:11	otamr lah bgd otqra at Smo gd׃ 
genesis 30:12	otld clph SpHt lah bn Sni lieqb׃ 
genesis 30:13	otamr lah baSri ki aSroni bnot otqra at Smo aSr׃ 
genesis 30:14	oilk raobn bimi qzir HTim oimza dodaim bSdh oiba atm al lah amo otamr rHl al lah tni na li mdodai bnk׃ 
genesis 30:15	otamr lh hmeT qHtk at aiSi olqHt gm at dodai bni otamr rHl lkn iSkb emk hlilh tHt dodai bnk׃ 
genesis 30:16	oiba ieqb mn hSdh berb otza lah lqrato otamr ali tboa ki Skr Skrtik bdodai bni oiSkb emh blilh hoa׃ 
genesis 30:17	oiSme alhim al lah othr otld lieqb bn HmiSi׃ 
genesis 30:18	otamr lah ntn alhim Skri aSr ntti SpHti laiSi otqra Smo iSSkr׃ 
genesis 30:19	othr eod lah otld bn SSi lieqb׃ 
genesis 30:20	otamr lah cbdni alhim ati cbd Tob hpem icblni aiSi ki ildti lo SSh bnim otqra at Smo cblon׃ 
genesis 30:21	oaHr ildh bt otqra at Smh dinh׃ 
genesis 30:22	oickr alhim at rHl oiSme alih alhim oiptH at rHmh׃ 
genesis 30:23	othr otld bn otamr asp alhim at Hrpti׃ 
genesis 30:24	otqra at Smo iosp lamr isp ihoh li bn aHr׃ 
genesis 30:25	oihi kaSr ildh rHl at iosp oiamr ieqb al lbn SlHni oalkh al mqomi olarzi׃ 
genesis 30:26	tnh at nSi oat ildi aSr ebdti atk bhn oalkh ki ath idet at ebdti aSr ebdtik׃ 
genesis 30:27	oiamr alio lbn am na mzati Hn beinik nHSti oibrkni ihoh bgllk׃ 
genesis 30:28	oiamr nqbh Skrk eli oatnh׃ 
genesis 30:29	oiamr alio ath idet at aSr ebdtik oat aSr hih mqnk ati׃ 
genesis 30:30	ki meT aSr hih lk lpni oiprz lrb oibrk ihoh atk lrgli oeth mti aeSh gm anki lbiti׃ 
genesis 30:31	oiamr mh atn lk oiamr ieqb la ttn li maomh am teSh li hdbr hch aSobh areh zank aSmr׃ 
genesis 30:32	aebr bkl zank hiom hsr mSm kl Sh nqd oTloa okl Sh Hom bkSbim oTloa onqd becim ohih Skri׃ 
genesis 30:33	oenth bi zdqti biom mHr ki tboa el Skri lpnik kl aSr ainno nqd oTloa becim oHom bkSbim gnob hoa ati׃ 
genesis 30:34	oiamr lbn hn lo ihi kdbrk׃ 
genesis 30:35	oisr biom hhoa at htiSim heqdim ohTlaim oat kl hecim hnqdot ohTlat kl aSr lbn bo okl Hom bkSbim oitn bid bnio׃ 
genesis 30:36	oiSm drk SlSt imim bino obin ieqb oieqb reh at zan lbn hnotrt׃ 
genesis 30:37	oiqH lo ieqb mql lbnh lH oloc oermon oipzl bhn pzlot lbnot mHSp hlbn aSr el hmqlot׃ 
genesis 30:38	oizg at hmqlot aSr pzl brhTim bSqtot hmim aSr tban hzan lStot lnkH hzan oiHmnh bban lStot׃ 
genesis 30:39	oiHmo hzan al hmqlot otldn hzan eqdim nqdim oTlaim׃ 
genesis 30:40	ohkSbim hprid ieqb oitn pni hzan al eqd okl Hom bzan lbn oiSt lo edrim lbdo ola Stm el zan lbn׃ 
genesis 30:41	ohih bkl iHm hzan hmqSrot oSm ieqb at hmqlot leini hzan brhTim liHmnh bmqlot׃ 
genesis 30:42	obheTip hzan la iSim ohih heTpim llbn ohqSrim lieqb׃ 
genesis 30:43	oiprz haiS mad mad oihi lo zan rbot oSpHot oebdim ogmlim oHmrim׃ 
genesis 31:1	oiSme at dbri bni lbn lamr lqH ieqb at kl aSr labino omaSr labino eSh at kl hkbd hch׃ 
genesis 31:2	oira ieqb at pni lbn ohnh ainno emo ktmol SlSom׃ 
genesis 31:3	oiamr ihoh al ieqb Sob al arz abotik olmoldtk oahih emk׃ 
genesis 31:4	oiSlH ieqb oiqra lrHl ollah hSdh al zano׃

genesis 31:9	oizl alhim at mqnh abikm oitn li׃

genesis 31:22	oigd llbn biom hSliSi ki brH ieqb׃

genesis 36:4	otld edh leSo at alipc obSmt ildh at reoal׃

genesis 47:28	oiHi ieqb barz mzrim Sbe eSrh Snh oihi imi ieqb Sni Hiio Sbe Snim oarbeim omat Snh׃ 
genesis 47:29	oiqrbo imi iSral lmot oiqra lbno liosp oiamr lo am na mzati Hn beinik Sim na idk tHt irki oeSit emdi Hsd oamt al na tqbrni bmzrim׃ 
genesis 47:30	oSkbti em abti onSatni mmzrim oqbrtni bqbrtm oiamr anki aeSh kdbrk׃ 
genesis 47:31	oiamr hSbeh li oiSbe lo oiStHo iSral el raS hmTh׃ 
genesis 48:1	oihi aHri hdbrim halh oiamr liosp hnh abik Hlh oiqH at Sni bnio emo at mnSh oat aprim׃

genesis 48:4	oiamr ali hnni mprk ohrbitk onttik lqhl emim ontti at harz hcat lcrek aHrik aHct eolm׃ 
genesis 48:5	oeth Sni bnik hnoldim lk barz mzrim ed bai alik mzrimh li hm aprim omnSh kraobn oSmeon ihio li׃

genesis 50:1	oipl iosp el pni abio oibk elio oiSq lo׃

exodus 1:3	iSSkr cboln obnimn׃ 
exodus 1:4	dn onptli gd oaSr׃ 
exodus 1:5	oihi kl npS izai irk ieqb Sbeim npS oiosp hih bmzrim׃ 
exodus 1:6	oimt iosp okl aHio okl hdor hhoa׃ 
exodus 1:7	obni iSral pro oiSrzo oirbo oiezmo bmad mad otmla harz atm׃ 
exodus 1:8	oiqm mlk HdS el mzrim aSr la ide at iosp׃

exodus 5:2	oiamr preh mi ihoh aSr aSme bqlo lSlH at iSral la ideti at ihoh ogm at iSral la aSlH׃ 
exodus 5:3	oiamro alhi hebrim nqra elino nlkh na drk SlSt imim bmdbr oncbHh lihoh alhino pn ipgeno bdbr ao bHrb׃ 
exodus 5:4	oiamr alhm mlk mzrim lmh mSh oahrn tprieo at hem mmeSio lko lsbltikm׃ 
exodus 5:5	oiamr preh hn rbim eth em harz ohSbtm atm msbltm׃ 
exodus 5:6	oizo preh biom hhoa at hngSim bem oat STrio lamr׃ 
exodus 5:7	la taspon ltt tbn lem llbn hlbnim ktmol SlSm hm ilko oqSSo lhm tbn׃

exodus 5:10	oizao ngSi hem oSTrio oiamro al hem lamr kh amr preh ainni ntn lkm tbn׃ 
exodus 5:11	atm lko qHo lkm tbn maSr tmzao ki ain ngre mebdtkm dbr׃ 
exodus 5:12	oipz hem bkl arz mzrim lqSS qS ltbn׃ 
exodus 5:13	ohngSim azim lamr klo meSikm dbr iom biomo kaSr bhiot htbn׃ 
exodus 5:14	oiko STri bni iSral aSr Smo elhm ngSi preh lamr mdoe la klitm Hqkm llbn ktmol SlSm gm tmol gm hiom׃ 
exodus 5:15	oibao STri bni iSral oizeqo al preh lamr lmh teSh kh lebdik׃ 
exodus 5:16	tbn ain ntn lebdik olbnim amrim lno eSo ohnh ebdik mkim oHTat emk׃ 
exodus 5:17	oiamr nrpim atm nrpim el kn atm amrim nlkh ncbHh lihoh׃ 
exodus 5:18	oeth lko ebdo otbn la intn lkm otkn lbnim ttno׃ 
exodus 5:19	oirao STri bni iSral atm bre lamr la tgreo mlbnikm dbr iom biomo׃ 
exodus 5:20	oipgeo at mSh oat ahrn nzbim lqratm bzatm mat preh׃ 
exodus 5:21	oiamro alhm ira ihoh elikm oiSpT aSr hbaStm at riHno beini preh obeini ebdio ltt Hrb bidm lhrgno׃ 
exodus 5:22	oiSb mSh al ihoh oiamr adni lmh hreth lem hch lmh ch SlHtni׃ 
exodus 5:23	omac bati al preh ldbr bSmk hre lem hch ohzl la hzlt at emk׃ 
exodus 6:1	oiamr ihoh al mSh eth trah aSr aeSh lpreh ki bid Hcqh iSlHm obid Hcqh igrSm marzo׃ 
exodus 6:2	oidbr alhim al mSh oiamr alio ani ihoh׃ 
exodus 6:3	oara al abrhm al izHq oal ieqb bal Sdi oSmi ihoh la nodeti lhm׃ 
exodus 6:4	ogm hqmti at briti atm ltt lhm at arz knen at arz mgrihm aSr gro bh׃ 
exodus 6:5	ogm ani Smeti at naqt bni iSral aSr mzrim mebdim atm oackr at briti׃ 
exodus 6:6	lkn amr lbni iSral ani ihoh ohozati atkm mtHt sblt mzrim ohzlti atkm mebdtm ogalti atkm bcroe nToih obSpTim gdlim׃ 
exodus 6:7	olqHti atkm li lem ohiiti lkm lalhim oidetm ki ani ihoh alhikm hmozia atkm mtHt sblot mzrim׃ 
exodus 6:8	ohbati atkm al harz aSr nSati at idi ltt ath labrhm lizHq olieqb ontti ath lkm morSh ani ihoh׃ 
exodus 6:9	oidbr mSh kn al bni iSral ola Smeo al mSh mqzr roH omebdh qSh׃ 
exodus 6:10	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
exodus 6:11	ba dbr al preh mlk mzrim oiSlH at bni iSral marzo׃ 
exodus 6:12	oidbr mSh lpni ihoh lamr hn bni iSral la Smeo ali oaik iSmeni preh oani erl Sptim׃ 
exodus 6:13	oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn oizom al bni iSral oal preh mlk mzrim lhozia at bni iSral marz mzrim׃ 
exodus 6:14	alh raSi bit abtm bni raobn bkr iSral Hnok oploa Hzron okrmi alh mSpHt raobn׃ 
exodus 6:15	obni Smeon imoal oimin oahd oikin ozHr oSaol bn hknenit alh mSpHt Smeon׃ 
exodus 6:16	oalh Smot bni loi ltldtm grSon oqht omrri oSni Hii loi Sbe oSlSim omat Snh׃ 
exodus 6:17	bni grSon lbni oSmei lmSpHtm׃ 
exodus 6:18	obni qht emrm oizhr oHbron oecial oSni Hii qht SlS oSlSim omat Snh׃ 
exodus 6:19	obni mrri mHli omoSi alh mSpHt hloi ltldtm׃ 
exodus 6:20	oiqH emrm at iokbd ddto lo laSh otld lo at ahrn oat mSh oSni Hii emrm Sbe oSlSim omat Snh׃ 
exodus 6:21	obni izhr qrH onpg ockri׃ 
exodus 6:22	obni ecial miSal oalzpn ostri׃ 
exodus 6:23	oiqH ahrn at aliSbe bt emindb aHot nHSon lo laSh otld lo at ndb oat abihoa at alecr oat aitmr׃ 
exodus 6:24	obni qrH asir oalqnh oabiasp alh mSpHt hqrHi׃ 
exodus 6:25	oalecr bn ahrn lqH lo mbnot poTial lo laSh otld lo at pinHs alh raSi abot hloim lmSpHtm׃ 
exodus 6:26	hoa ahrn omSh aSr amr ihoh lhm hoziao at bni iSral marz mzrim el zbatm׃ 
exodus 6:27	hm hmdbrim al preh mlk mzrim lhozia at bni iSral mmzrim hoa mSh oahrn׃ 
exodus 6:28	oihi biom dbr ihoh al mSh barz mzrim׃

exodus 6:30	oiamr mSh lpni ihoh hn ani erl Sptim oaik iSme ali preh׃ 
exodus 7:1	oiamr ihoh al mSh rah nttik alhim lpreh oahrn aHik ihih nbiak׃ 
exodus 7:2	ath tdbr at kl aSr azok oahrn aHik idbr al preh oSlH at bni iSral marzo׃ 
exodus 7:3	oani aqSh at lb preh ohrbiti at atti oat mopti barz mzrim׃ 
exodus 7:4	ola iSme alkm preh ontti at idi bmzrim ohozati at zbati at emi bni iSral marz mzrim bSpTim gdlim׃ 
exodus 7:5	oideo mzrim ki ani ihoh bnTti at idi el mzrim ohozati at bni iSral mtokm׃ 
exodus 7:6	oieS mSh oahrn kaSr zoh ihoh atm kn eSo׃ 
exodus 7:7	omSh bn Smnim Snh oahrn bn SlS oSmnim Snh bdbrm al preh׃ 
exodus 7:8	oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr׃ 
exodus 7:9	ki idbr alkm preh lamr tno lkm mopt oamrt al ahrn qH at mTk ohSlk lpni preh ihi ltnin׃ 
exodus 7:10	oiba mSh oahrn al preh oieSo kn kaSr zoh ihoh oiSlk ahrn at mTho lpni preh olpni ebdio oihi ltnin׃ 
exodus 7:11	oiqra gm preh lHkmim olmkSpim oieSo gm hm HrTmi mzrim blhTihm kn׃ 
exodus 7:12	oiSliko aiS mTho oihio ltninm oible mTh ahrn at mTtm׃ 
exodus 7:13	oiHcq lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
exodus 7:14	oiamr ihoh al mSh kbd lb preh man lSlH hem׃ 
exodus 7:15	lk al preh bbqr hnh iza hmimh onzbt lqrato el Spt hiar ohmTh aSr nhpk lnHS tqH bidk׃ 
exodus 7:16	oamrt alio ihoh alhi hebrim SlHni alik lamr SlH at emi oiebdni bmdbr ohnh la Smet ed kh׃

exodus 7:18	ohdgh aSr biar tmot obaS hiar onlao mzrim lStot mim mn hiar׃ 
exodus 7:19	oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al ahrn qH mTk onTh idk el mimi mzrim el nhrtm el iarihm oel agmihm oel kl mqoh mimihm oihio dm ohih dm bkl arz mzrim obezim obabnim׃ 
exodus 7:20	oieSo kn mSh oahrn kaSr zoh ihoh oirm bmTh oik at hmim aSr biar leini preh oleini ebdio oihpko kl hmim aSr biar ldm׃ 
exodus 7:21	ohdgh aSr biar mth oibaS hiar ola iklo mzrim lStot mim mn hiar oihi hdm bkl arz mzrim׃ 
exodus 7:22	oieSo kn HrTmi mzrim blTihm oiHcq lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
exodus 7:23	oipn preh oiba al bito ola St lbo gm lcat׃ 
exodus 7:24	oiHpro kl mzrim sbibt hiar mim lStot ki la iklo lStt mmimi hiar׃ 
exodus 7:25	oimla Sbet imim aHri hkot ihoh at hiar׃ 
exodus 8:1	oiamr ihoh al mSh ba al preh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh SlH at emi oiebdni׃ 
exodus 8:2	oam man ath lSlH hnh anki ngp at kl gbolk bzprdeim׃ 
exodus 8:3	oSrz hiar zprdeim oelo obao bbitk obHdr mSkbk oel mTtk obbit ebdik obemk obtnorik obmSarotik׃ 
exodus 8:4	obkh obemk obkl ebdik ielo hzprdeim׃ 
exodus 8:5	oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al ahrn nTh at idk bmTk el hnhrt el hiarim oel hagmim ohel at hzprdeim el arz mzrim׃ 
exodus 8:6	oiT ahrn at ido el mimi mzrim otel hzprde otks at arz mzrim׃ 
exodus 8:7	oieSo kn hHrTmim blTihm oielo at hzprdeim el arz mzrim׃ 
exodus 8:8	oiqra preh lmSh olahrn oiamr hetiro al ihoh oisr hzprdeim mmni omemi oaSlHh at hem oicbHo lihoh׃ 
exodus 8:9	oiamr mSh lpreh htpar eli lmti aetir lk olebdik olemk lhkrit hzprdeim mmk ombtik rq biar tSarnh׃ 
exodus 8:10	oiamr lmHr oiamr kdbrk lmen tde ki ain kihoh alhino׃ 
exodus 8:11	osro hzprdeim mmk ombtik omebdik omemk rq biar tSarnh׃ 
exodus 8:12	oiza mSh oahrn mem preh oizeq mSh al ihoh el dbr hzprdeim aSr Sm lpreh׃ 
exodus 8:13	oieS ihoh kdbr mSh oimto hzprdeim mn hbtim mn hHzrt omn hSdt׃ 
exodus 8:14	oizbro atm Hmrm Hmrm otbaS harz׃ 
exodus 8:15	oira preh ki hith hroHh ohkbd at lbo ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
exodus 8:16	oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al ahrn nTh at mTk ohk at epr harz ohih lknm bkl arz mzrim׃ 
exodus 8:17	oieSo kn oiT ahrn at ido bmTho oik at epr harz othi hknm badm obbhmh kl epr harz hih knim bkl arz mzrim׃ 
exodus 8:18	oieSo kn hHrTmim blTihm lhozia at hknim ola iklo othi hknm badm obbhmh׃ 
exodus 8:19	oiamro hHrTmim al preh azbe alhim hoa oiHcq lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
exodus 8:20	oiamr ihoh al mSh hSkm bbqr ohtizb lpni preh hnh ioza hmimh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh SlH emi oiebdni׃ 
exodus 8:21	ki am aink mSlH at emi hnni mSliH bk obebdik obemk obbtik at herb omlao bti mzrim at herb ogm hadmh aSr hm elih׃ 
exodus 8:22	ohpliti biom hhoa at arz gSn aSr emi emd elih lblti hiot Sm erb lmen tde ki ani ihoh bqrb harz׃ 
exodus 8:23	oSmti pdt bin emi obin emk lmHr ihih hat hch׃ 
exodus 8:24	oieS ihoh kn oiba erb kbd bith preh obit ebdio obkl arz mzrim tSHt harz mpni herb׃ 
exodus 8:25	oiqra preh al mSh olahrn oiamr lko cbHo lalhikm barz׃ 
exodus 8:26	oiamr mSh la nkon leSot kn ki toebt mzrim ncbH lihoh alhino hn ncbH at toebt mzrim leinihm ola isqlno׃ 
exodus 8:27	drk SlSt imim nlk bmdbr ocbHno lihoh alhino kaSr iamr alino׃ 
exodus 8:28	oiamr preh anki aSlH atkm ocbHtm lihoh alhikm bmdbr rq hrHq la trHiqo llkt hetiro bedi׃ 
exodus 8:29	oiamr mSh hnh anki ioza memk ohetrti al ihoh osr herb mpreh mebdio omemo mHr rq al isp preh htl lblti SlH at hem lcbH lihoh׃ 
exodus 8:30	oiza mSh mem preh oietr al ihoh׃ 
exodus 8:31	oieS ihoh kdbr mSh oisr herb mpreh mebdio omemo la nSar aHd׃

exodus 9:3	hnh id ihoh hoih bmqnk aSr bSdh bsosim bHmrim bgmlim bbqr obzan dbr kbd mad׃ 
exodus 9:4	ohplh ihoh bin mqnh iSral obin mqnh mzrim ola imot mkl lbni iSral dbr׃ 
exodus 9:5	oiSm ihoh moed lamr mHr ieSh ihoh hdbr hch barz׃

exodus 9:20	hira at dbr ihoh mebdi preh hnis at ebdio oat mqnho al hbtim׃ 
exodus 9:21	oaSr la Sm lbo al dbr ihoh oiecb at ebdio oat mqnho bSdh׃ 
exodus 9:22	oiamr ihoh al mSh nTh at idk el hSmim oihi brd bkl arz mzrim el hadm oel hbhmh oel kl eSb hSdh barz mzrim׃ 
exodus 9:23	oiT mSh at mTho el hSmim oihoh ntn qlt obrd othlk aS arzh oimTr ihoh brd el arz mzrim׃

exodus 9:25	oik hbrd bkl arz mzrim at kl aSr bSdh madm oed bhmh oat kl eSb hSdh hkh hbrd oat kl ez hSdh Sbr׃ 
exodus 9:26	rq barz gSn aSr Sm bni iSral la hih brd׃

exodus 12:1	oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn barz mzrim lamr׃ 
exodus 12:2	hHdS hch lkm raS HdSim raSon hoa lkm lHdSi hSnh׃ 
exodus 12:3	dbro al kl edt iSral lamr beSr lHdS hch oiqHo lhm aiS Sh lbit abt Sh lbit׃ 
exodus 12:4	oam imeT hbit mhit mSh olqH hoa oSkno hqrb al bito bmkst npSt aiS lpi aklo tkso el hSh׃ 
exodus 12:5	Sh tmim ckr bn Snh ihih lkm mn hkbSim omn hecim tqHo׃ 
exodus 12:6	ohih lkm lmSmrt ed arbeh eSr iom lHdS hch oSHTo ato kl qhl edt iSral bin herbim׃ 
exodus 12:7	olqHo mn hdm ontno el Sti hmcoct oel hmSqop el hbtim aSr iaklo ato bhm׃ 
exodus 12:8	oaklo at hbSr blilh hch zli aS omzot el mrrim iaklho׃ 
exodus 12:9	al taklo mmno na obSl mbSl bmim ki am zli aS raSo el kreio oel qrbo׃ 
exodus 12:10	ola totiro mmno ed bqr ohntr mmno ed bqr baS tSrpo׃ 
exodus 12:11	okkh taklo ato mtnikm Hgrim nelikm brglikm omqlkm bidkm oakltm ato bHpcon psH hoa lihoh׃ 
exodus 12:12	oebrti barz mzrim blilh hch ohkiti kl bkor barz mzrim madm oed bhmh obkl alhi mzrim aeSh SpTim ani ihoh׃ 
exodus 12:13	ohih hdm lkm lat el hbtim aSr atm Sm oraiti at hdm opsHti elkm ola ihih bkm ngp lmSHit bhkti barz mzrim׃ 
exodus 12:14	ohih hiom hch lkm lckron oHgtm ato Hg lihoh ldrtikm Hqt eolm tHgho׃ 
exodus 12:15	Sbet imim mzot taklo ak biom hraSon tSbito Sar mbtikm ki kl akl Hmz onkrth hnpS hhoa miSral miom hraSn ed iom hSbei׃ 
exodus 12:16	obiom hraSon mqra qdS obiom hSbiei mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakh la ieSh bhm ak aSr iakl lkl npS hoa lbdo ieSh lkm׃ 
exodus 12:17	oSmrtm at hmzot ki bezm hiom hch hozati at zbaotikm marz mzrim oSmrtm at hiom hch ldrtikm Hqt eolm׃ 
exodus 12:18	braSn barbeh eSr iom lHdS berb taklo mzt ed iom haHd oeSrim lHdS berb׃

exodus 12:20	kl mHmzt la taklo bkl moSbtikm taklo mzot׃

exodus 12:24	oSmrtm at hdbr hch lHq lk olbnik ed eolm׃

exodus 12:32	gm zankm gm bqrkm qHo kaSr dbrtm olko obrktm gm ati׃

exodus 13:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃

exodus 13:5	ohih ki ibiak ihoh al arz hkneni ohHti ohamri ohHoi ohibosi aSr nSbe labtik ltt lk arz cbt Hlb odbS oebdt at hebdh hcat bHdS hch׃

exodus 14:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃

exodus 14:6	oiasr at rkbo oat emo lqH emo׃

exodus 18:2	oiqH itro Htn mSh at zprh aSt mSh aHr SloHih׃ 
exodus 18:3	oat Sni bnih aSr Sm haHd grSm ki amr gr hiiti barz nkrih׃ 
exodus 18:4	oSm haHd aliecr ki alhi abi becri oizlni mHrb preh׃ 
exodus 18:5	oiba itro Htn mSh obnio oaSto al mSh al hmdbr aSr hoa Hnh Sm hr halhim׃ 
exodus 18:6	oiamr al mSh ani Htnk itro ba alik oaStk oSni bnih emh׃ 
exodus 18:7	oiza mSh lqrat Htno oiStHo oiSq lo oiSalo aiS lreho lSlom oibao hahlh׃

exodus 18:9	oiHd itro el kl hTobh aSr eSh ihoh liSral aSr hzilo mid mzrim׃ 
exodus 18:10	oiamr itro brok ihoh aSr hzil atkm mid mzrim omid preh aSr hzil at hem mtHt id mzrim׃ 
exodus 18:11	eth ideti ki gdol ihoh mkl halhim ki bdbr aSr cdo elihm׃ 
exodus 18:12	oiqH itro Htn mSh elh ocbHim lalhim oiba ahrn okl cqni iSral lakl lHm em Htn mSh lpni halhim׃ 
exodus 18:13	oihi mmHrt oiSb mSh lSpT at hem oiemd hem el mSh mn hbqr ed herb׃

exodus 18:15	oiamr mSh lHtno ki iba ali hem ldrS alhim׃ 
exodus 18:16	ki ihih lhm dbr ba ali oSpTti bin aiS obin reho ohodeti at Hqi halhim oat tortio׃ 
exodus 18:17	oiamr Htn mSh alio la Tob hdbr aSr ath eSh׃

exodus 26:2	ark hirieh haHt Smnh oeSrim bamh orHb arbe bamh hirieh haHt mdh aHt lkl hiriet׃ 
exodus 26:3	HmS hiriet thiin Hbrt aSh al aHth oHmS iriet Hbrt aSh al aHth׃ 
exodus 26:4	oeSit llat tklt el Spt hirieh haHt mqzh bHbrt okn teSh bSpt hirieh hqizonh bmHbrt hSnit׃ 
exodus 26:5	HmSim llat teSh birieh haHt oHmSim llat teSh bqzh hirieh aSr bmHbrt hSnit mqbilt hllat aSh al aHth׃ 
exodus 26:6	oeSit HmSim qrsi chb oHbrt at hiriet aSh al aHth bqrsim ohih hmSkn aHd׃ 
exodus 26:7	oeSit iriet ecim lahl el hmSkn eSti eSrh iriet teSh atm׃ 
exodus 26:8	ark hirieh haHt SlSim bamh orHb arbe bamh hirieh haHt mdh aHt leSti eSrh iriet׃ 
exodus 26:9	oHbrt at HmS hiriet lbd oat SS hiriet lbd okplt at hirieh hSSit al mol pni hahl׃ 
exodus 26:10	oeSit HmSim llat el Spt hirieh haHt hqiznh bHbrt oHmSim llat el Spt hirieh hHbrt hSnit׃ 
exodus 26:11	oeSit qrsi nHSt HmSim ohbat at hqrsim bllat oHbrt at hahl ohih aHd׃ 
exodus 26:12	osrH hedp biriet hahl Hzi hirieh hedpt tsrH el aHri hmSkn׃ 
exodus 26:13	ohamh mch ohamh mch bedp bark iriet hahl ihih sroH el zdi hmSkn mch omch lksto׃ 
exodus 26:14	oeSit mksh lahl ert ailm madmim omksh ert tHSim mlmelh׃ 
exodus 26:15	oeSit at hqrSim lmSkn ezi STim emdim׃ 
exodus 26:16	eSr amot ark hqrS oamh oHzi hamh rHb hqrS haHd׃ 
exodus 26:17	Sti idot lqrS haHd mSlbt aSh al aHth kn teSh lkl qrSi hmSkn׃ 
exodus 26:18	oeSit at hqrSim lmSkn eSrim qrS lpat ngbh timnh׃ 
exodus 26:19	oarbeim adni ksp teSh tHt eSrim hqrS Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd lSti idtio oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd lSti idtio׃ 
exodus 26:20	olzle hmSkn hSnit lpat zpon eSrim qrS׃ 
exodus 26:21	oarbeim adnihm ksp Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd׃ 
exodus 26:22	olirkti hmSkn imh teSh SSh qrSim׃ 
exodus 26:23	oSni qrSim teSh lmqzet hmSkn birktim׃ 
exodus 26:24	oihio tamim mlmTh oiHdo ihio tmim el raSo al hTbet haHt kn ihih lSnihm lSni hmqzet ihio׃ 
exodus 26:25	ohio Smnh qrSim oadnihm ksp SSh eSr adnim Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd׃ 
exodus 26:26	oeSit briHm ezi STim HmSh lqrSi zle hmSkn haHd׃ 
exodus 26:27	oHmSh briHm lqrSi zle hmSkn hSnit oHmSh briHm lqrSi zle hmSkn lirktim imh׃ 
exodus 26:28	ohbriH htikn btok hqrSim mbrH mn hqzh al hqzh׃ 
exodus 26:29	oat hqrSim tzph chb oat Tbetihm teSh chb btim lbriHm ozpit at hbriHm chb׃ 
exodus 26:30	ohqmt at hmSkn kmSpTo aSr hrait bhr׃ 
exodus 26:31	oeSit prkt tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr meSh HSb ieSh ath krbim׃ 
exodus 26:32	ontth ath el arbeh emodi STim mzpim chb ooihm chb el arbeh adni ksp׃ 
exodus 26:33	ontth at hprkt tHt hqrsim ohbat Smh mbit lprkt at aron hedot ohbdilh hprkt lkm bin hqdS obin qdS hqdSim׃ 
exodus 26:34	ontt at hkprt el aron hedt bqdS hqdSim׃ 
exodus 26:35	oSmt at hSlHn mHoz lprkt oat hmnrh nkH hSlHn el zle hmSkn timnh ohSlHn ttn el zle zpon׃

exodus 31:12	oiamr ihoh al mSh lamr׃

exodus 31:14	oSmrtm at hSbt ki qdS hoa lkm mHllih mot iomt ki kl heSh bh mlakh onkrth hnpS hhoa mqrb emih׃ 
exodus 31:15	SSt imim ieSh mlakh obiom hSbiei Sbt Sbton qdS lihoh kl heSh mlakh biom hSbt mot iomt׃

exodus 32:1	oira hem ki bSS mSh lrdt mn hhr oiqhl hem el ahrn oiamro alio qom eSh lno alhim aSr ilko lpnino ki ch mSh haiS aSr helno marz mzrim la ideno mh hih lo׃ 
exodus 32:2	oiamr alhm ahrn prqo ncmi hchb aSr bacni nSikm bnikm obntikm ohbiao ali׃ 
exodus 32:3	oitprqo kl hem at ncmi hchb aSr bacnihm oibiao al ahrn׃

exodus 34:1	oiamr ihoh al mSh psl lk Sni lHt abnim kraSnim oktbti el hlHt at hdbrim aSr hio el hlHt hraSnim aSr Sbrt׃

exodus 36:9	ark hirieh haHt Smnh oeSrim bamh orHb arbe bamh hirieh haHt mdh aHt lkl hiriet׃

exodus 37:1	oieS bzlal at harn ezi STim amtim oHzi arko oamh oHzi rHbo oamh oHzi qmto׃ 
exodus 37:2	oizpho chb Thor mbit omHoz oieS lo cr chb sbib׃ 
exodus 37:3	oizq lo arbe Tbet chb el arbe pemtio oSti Tbet el zleo haHt oSti Tbeot el zleo hSnit׃ 
exodus 37:4	oieS bdi ezi STim oizp atm chb׃ 
exodus 37:5	oiba at hbdim bTbet el zlet harn lSat at harn׃ 
exodus 37:6	oieS kprt chb Thor amtim oHzi arkh oamh oHzi rHbh׃ 
exodus 37:7	oieS Sni krbim chb mqSh eSh atm mSni qzot hkprt׃ 
exodus 37:8	krob aHd mqzh mch okrob aHd mqzh mch mn hkprt eSh at hkrbim mSni qzooto׃ 
exodus 37:9	oihio hkrbim prSi knpim lmelh skkim bknpihm el hkprt opnihm aiS al aHio al hkprt hio pni hkrbim׃ 
exodus 37:10	oieS at hSlHn ezi STim amtim arko oamh rHbo oamh oHzi qmto׃ 
exodus 37:11	oizp ato chb Thor oieS lo cr chb sbib׃ 
exodus 37:12	oieS lo msgrt TpH sbib oieS cr chb lmsgrto sbib׃ 
exodus 37:13	oizq lo arbe Tbet chb oitn at hTbet el arbe hpat aSr larbe rglio׃ 
exodus 37:14	lemt hmsgrt hio hTbet btim lbdim lSat at hSlHn׃ 
exodus 37:15	oieS at hbdim ezi STim oizp atm chb lSat at hSlHn׃ 
exodus 37:16	oieS at hklim aSr el hSlHn at qertio oat kptio oat mnqitio oat hqSot aSr isk bhn chb Thor׃ 
exodus 37:17	oieS at hmnrh chb Thor mqSh eSh at hmnrh irkh oqnh gbieih kptrih oprHih mmnh hio׃ 
exodus 37:18	oSSh qnim izaim mzdih SlSh qni mnrh mzdh haHd oSlSh qni mnrh mzdh hSni׃ 
exodus 37:19	SlSh gbeim mSqdim bqnh haHd kptr oprH oSlSh gbeim mSqdim bqnh aHd kptr oprH kn lSSt hqnim hizaim mn hmnrh׃ 
exodus 37:20	obmnrh arbeh gbeim mSqdim kptrih oprHih׃ 
exodus 37:21	okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh lSSt hqnim hizaim mmnh׃ 
exodus 37:22	kptrihm oqntm mmnh hio klh mqSh aHt chb Thor׃ 
exodus 37:23	oieS at nrtih Sbeh omlqHih omHttih chb Thor׃ 
exodus 37:24	kkr chb Thor eSh ath oat kl klih׃ 
exodus 37:25	oieS at mcbH hqTrt ezi STim amh arko oamh rHbo rboe oamtim qmto mmno hio qrntio׃

exodus 38:1	oieS at mcbH helh ezi STim HmS amot arko oHmS amot rHbo rboe oSlS amot qmto׃ 
exodus 38:2	oieS qrntio el arbe pntio mmno hio qrntio oizp ato nHSt׃

exodus 38:20	okl hitdt lmSkn olHzr sbib nHSt׃

leviticus 1:1	oiqra al mSh oidbr ihoh alio mahl moed lamr׃ 
leviticus 1:2	dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm adm ki iqrib mkm qrbn lihoh mn hbhmh mn hbqr omn hzan tqribo at qrbnkm׃ 
leviticus 1:3	am elh qrbno mn hbqr ckr tmim iqribno al ptH ahl moed iqrib ato lrzno lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 1:4	osmk ido el raS helh onrzh lo lkpr elio׃ 
leviticus 1:5	oSHT at bn hbqr lpni ihoh ohqribo bni ahrn hkhnim at hdm ocrqo at hdm el hmcbH sbib aSr ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 1:6	ohpSiT at helh ontH ath lntHih׃ 
leviticus 1:7	ontno bni ahrn hkhn aS el hmcbH oerko ezim el haS׃ 
leviticus 1:8	oerko bni ahrn hkhnim at hntHim at hraS oat hpdr el hezim aSr el haS aSr el hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 1:9	oqrbo okreio irHz bmim ohqTir hkhn at hkl hmcbHh elh aSh riH niHoH lihoh׃ 
leviticus 1:10	oam mn hzan qrbno mn hkSbim ao mn hecim lelh ckr tmim iqribno׃ 
leviticus 1:11	oSHT ato el irk hmcbH zpnh lpni ihoh ocrqo bni ahrn hkhnim at dmo el hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 1:12	ontH ato lntHio oat raSo oat pdro oerk hkhn atm el hezim aSr el haS aSr el hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 1:13	ohqrb ohkreim irHz bmim ohqrib hkhn at hkl ohqTir hmcbHh elh hoa aSh riH niHH lihoh׃
