leviticus 4:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 4:2	dbr al bni iSral lamr npS ki tHTa bSggh mkl mzot ihoh aSr la teSinh oeSh maHt mhnh׃ 
leviticus 4:3	am hkhn hmSiH iHTa laSmt hem ohqrib el HTato aSr HTa pr bn bqr tmim lihoh lHTat׃ 
leviticus 4:4	ohbia at hpr al ptH ahl moed lpni ihoh osmk at ido el raS hpr oSHT at hpr lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 4:5	olqH hkhn hmSiH mdm hpr ohbia ato al ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 4:6	oTbl hkhn at azbeo bdm ohch mn hdm Sbe pemim lpni ihoh at pni prkt hqdS׃ 
leviticus 4:7	ontn hkhn mn hdm el qrnot mcbH qTrt hsmim lpni ihoh aSr bahl moed oat kl dm hpr iSpk al isod mcbH helh aSr ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 4:8	oat kl Hlb pr hHTat irim mmno at hHlb hmksh el hqrb oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb׃ 
leviticus 4:9	oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elihn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hkliot isirnh׃ 
leviticus 4:10	kaSr iorm mSor cbH hSlmim ohqTirm hkhn el mcbH helh׃ 
leviticus 4:11	oat eor hpr oat kl bSro el raSo oel kreio oqrbo oprSo׃ 
leviticus 4:12	ohozia at kl hpr al mHoz lmHnh al mqom Thor al Spk hdSn oSrp ato el ezim baS el Spk hdSn iSrp׃ 
leviticus 4:13	oam kl edt iSral iSgo onelm dbr meini hqhl oeSo aHt mkl mzot ihoh aSr la teSinh oaSmo׃ 
leviticus 4:14	onodeh hHTat aSr HTao elih ohqribo hqhl pr bn bqr lHTat ohbiao ato lpni ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 4:15	osmko cqni hedh at idihm el raS hpr lpni ihoh oSHT at hpr lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 4:16	ohbia hkhn hmSiH mdm hpr al ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 4:17	oTbl hkhn azbeo mn hdm ohch Sbe pemim lpni ihoh at pni hprkt׃ 
leviticus 4:18	omn hdm itn el qrnt hmcbH aSr lpni ihoh aSr bahl moed oat kl hdm iSpk al isod mcbH helh aSr ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 4:19	oat kl Hlbo irim mmno ohqTir hmcbHh׃ 
leviticus 4:20	oeSh lpr kaSr eSh lpr hHTat kn ieSh lo okpr elhm hkhn onslH lhm׃ 
leviticus 4:21	ohozia at hpr al mHoz lmHnh oSrp ato kaSr Srp at hpr hraSon HTat hqhl hoa׃ 
leviticus 4:22	aSr nSia iHTa oeSh aHt mkl mzot ihoh alhio aSr la teSinh bSggh oaSm׃ 
leviticus 4:23	ao hode alio HTato aSr HTa bh ohbia at qrbno Seir ecim ckr tmim׃ 
leviticus 4:24	osmk ido el raS hSeir oSHT ato bmqom aSr iSHT at helh lpni ihoh HTat hoa׃ 
leviticus 4:25	olqH hkhn mdm hHTat bazbeo ontn el qrnt mcbH helh oat dmo iSpk al isod mcbH helh׃ 
leviticus 4:26	oat kl Hlbo iqTir hmcbHh kHlb cbH hSlmim okpr elio hkhn mHTato onslH lo׃ 
leviticus 4:27	oam npS aHt tHTa bSggh mem harz beSth aHt mmzot ihoh aSr la teSinh oaSm׃ 
leviticus 4:28	ao hode alio HTato aSr HTa ohbia qrbno Seirt ecim tmimh nqbh el HTato aSr HTa׃ 
leviticus 4:29	osmk at ido el raS hHTat oSHT at hHTat bmqom helh׃ 
leviticus 4:30	olqH hkhn mdmh bazbeo ontn el qrnt mcbH helh oat kl dmh iSpk al isod hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 4:31	oat kl Hlbh isir kaSr hosr Hlb mel cbH hSlmim ohqTir hkhn hmcbHh lriH niHH lihoh okpr elio hkhn onslH lo׃ 
leviticus 4:32	oam kbS ibia qrbno lHTat nqbh tmimh ibianh׃ 
leviticus 4:33	osmk at ido el raS hHTat oSHT ath lHTat bmqom aSr iSHT at helh׃ 
leviticus 4:34	olqH hkhn mdm hHTat bazbeo ontn el qrnt mcbH helh oat kl dmh iSpk al isod hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 4:35	oat kl Hlbh isir kaSr iosr Hlb hkSb mcbH hSlmim ohqTir hkhn atm hmcbHh el aSi ihoh okpr elio hkhn el HTato aSr HTa onslH lo׃ 
leviticus 5:1	onpS ki tHTa oSmeh qol alh ohoa ed ao rah ao ide am loa igid onSa eono׃ 
leviticus 5:2	ao npS aSr tge bkl dbr Tma ao bnblt Hih Tmah ao bnblt bhmh Tmah ao bnblt Srz Tma onelm mmno ohoa Tma oaSm׃ 
leviticus 5:3	ao ki ige bTmat adm lkl Tmato aSr iTma bh onelm mmno ohoa ide oaSm׃ 
leviticus 5:4	ao npS ki tSbe lbTa bSptim lhre ao lhiTib lkl aSr ibTa hadm bSbeh onelm mmno ohoa ide oaSm laHt malh׃ 
leviticus 5:5	ohih ki iaSm laHt malh ohtodh aSr HTa elih׃ 
leviticus 5:6	ohbia at aSmo lihoh el HTato aSr HTa nqbh mn hzan kSbh ao Seirt ecim lHTat okpr elio hkhn mHTato׃ 
leviticus 5:7	oam la tgie ido di Sh ohbia at aSmo aSr HTa Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh lihoh aHd lHTat oaHd lelh׃ 
leviticus 5:8	ohbia atm al hkhn ohqrib at aSr lHTat raSonh omlq at raSo mmol erpo ola ibdil׃ 
leviticus 5:9	ohch mdm hHTat el qir hmcbH ohnSar bdm imzh al isod hmcbH HTat hoa׃ 
leviticus 5:10	oat hSni ieSh elh kmSpT okpr elio hkhn mHTato aSr HTa onslH lo׃ 
leviticus 5:11	oam la tSig ido lSti trim ao lSni bni ionh ohbia at qrbno aSr HTa eSirt haph slt lHTat la iSim elih Smn ola itn elih lbnh ki HTat hia׃ 
leviticus 5:12	ohbiah al hkhn oqmz hkhn mmnh mloa qmzo at ackrth ohqTir hmcbHh el aSi ihoh HTat hoa׃ 
leviticus 5:13	okpr elio hkhn el HTato aSr HTa maHt malh onslH lo ohith lkhn kmnHh׃ 
leviticus 5:14	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 5:15	npS ki tmel mel oHTah bSggh mqdSi ihoh ohbia at aSmo lihoh ail tmim mn hzan berkk ksp Sqlim bSql hqdS laSm׃ 
leviticus 5:16	oat aSr HTa mn hqdS iSlm oat HmiSto iosp elio ontn ato lkhn ohkhn ikpr elio bail haSm onslH lo׃ 
leviticus 5:17	oam npS ki tHTa oeSth aHt mkl mzot ihoh aSr la teSinh ola ide oaSm onSa eono׃ 
leviticus 5:18	ohbia ail tmim mn hzan berkk laSm al hkhn okpr elio hkhn el Sggto aSr Sgg ohoa la ide onslH lo׃ 
leviticus 5:19	aSm hoa aSm aSm lihoh׃ 
leviticus 6:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 6:2	npS ki tHTa omelh mel bihoh okHS bemito bpqdon ao btSomt id ao bgcl ao eSq at emito׃ 
leviticus 6:3	ao mza abdh okHS bh onSbe el Sqr el aHt mkl aSr ieSh hadm lHTa bhnh׃ 
leviticus 6:4	ohih ki iHTa oaSm ohSib at hgclh aSr gcl ao at heSq aSr eSq ao at hpqdon aSr hpqd ato ao at habdh aSr mza׃ 
leviticus 6:5	ao mkl aSr iSbe elio lSqr oSlm ato braSo oHmStio isp elio laSr hoa lo itnno biom aSmto׃

leviticus 6:9	zo at ahrn oat bnio lamr cat tort helh hoa helh el moqdh el hmcbH kl hlilh ed hbqr oaS hmcbH toqd bo׃ 
leviticus 6:10	olbS hkhn mdo bd omknsi bd ilbS el bSro ohrim at hdSn aSr takl haS at helh el hmcbH oSmo azl hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 6:11	opST at bgdio olbS bgdim aHrim ohozia at hdSn al mHoz lmHnh al mqom Thor׃ 
leviticus 6:12	ohaS el hmcbH toqd bo la tkbh ober elih hkhn ezim bbqr bbqr oerk elih helh ohqTir elih Hlbi hSlmim׃ 
leviticus 6:13	aS tmid toqd el hmcbH la tkbh׃ 
leviticus 6:14	ocat tort hmnHh hqrb ath bni ahrn lpni ihoh al pni hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 6:15	ohrim mmno bqmzo mslt hmnHh omSmnh oat kl hlbnh aSr el hmnHh ohqTir hmcbH riH niHH ackrth lihoh׃ 
leviticus 6:16	ohnotrt mmnh iaklo ahrn obnio mzot takl bmqom qdS bHzr ahl moed iakloh׃ 
leviticus 6:17	la taph Hmz Hlqm ntti ath maSi qdS qdSim hoa kHTat okaSm׃ 
leviticus 6:18	kl ckr bbni ahrn iaklnh Hq eolm ldrtikm maSi ihoh kl aSr ige bhm iqdS׃ 
leviticus 6:19	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 6:20	ch qrbn ahrn obnio aSr iqribo lihoh biom hmSH ato eSirt haph slt mnHh tmid mHzith bbqr omHzith berb׃ 
leviticus 6:21	el mHbt bSmn teSh mrbkt tbianh tpini mnHt ptim tqrib riH niHH lihoh׃

leviticus 6:24	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃

leviticus 6:26	hkhn hmHTa ath iaklnh bmqom qdS takl bHzr ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 6:27	kl aSr ige bbSrh iqdS oaSr ich mdmh el hbgd aSr ich elih tkbs bmqom qdS׃ 
leviticus 6:28	okli HrS aSr tbSl bo iSbr oam bkli nHSt bSlh omrq oSTp bmim׃

leviticus 7:1	ocat tort haSm qdS qdSim hoa׃ 
leviticus 7:2	bmqom aSr iSHTo at helh iSHTo at haSm oat dmo icrq el hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 7:3	oat kl Hlbo iqrib mmno at halih oat hHlb hmksh at hqrb׃ 
leviticus 7:4	oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elihn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hklit isirnh׃ 
leviticus 7:5	ohqTir atm hkhn hmcbHh aSh lihoh aSm hoa׃ 
leviticus 7:6	kl ckr bkhnim iaklno bmqom qdoS iakl qdS qdSim hoa׃ 
leviticus 7:7	kHTat kaSm torh aHt lhm hkhn aSr ikpr bo lo ihih׃ 
leviticus 7:8	ohkhn hmqrib at elt aiS eor helh aSr hqrib lkhn lo ihih׃ 
leviticus 7:9	okl mnHh aSr taph btnor okl neSh bmrHSt oel mHbt lkhn hmqrib ath lo thih׃ 
leviticus 7:10	okl mnHh blolh bSmn oHrbh lkl bni ahrn thih aiS kaHio׃ 
leviticus 7:11	ocat tort cbH hSlmim aSr iqrib lihoh׃ 
leviticus 7:12	am el todh iqribno ohqrib el cbH htodh Hlot mzot blolt bSmn orqiqi mzot mSHim bSmn oslt mrbkt Hlt blolt bSmn׃ 
leviticus 7:13	el Hlt lHm Hmz iqrib qrbno el cbH todt Slmio׃ 
leviticus 7:14	ohqrib mmno aHd mkl qrbn tromh lihoh lkhn hcrq at dm hSlmim lo ihih׃ 
leviticus 7:15	obSr cbH todt Slmio biom qrbno iakl la iniH mmno ed bqr׃ 
leviticus 7:16	oam ndr ao ndbh cbH qrbno biom hqribo at cbHo iakl ommHrt ohnotr mmno iakl׃ 
leviticus 7:17	ohnotr mbSr hcbH biom hSliSi baS iSrp׃ 
leviticus 7:18	oam hakl iakl mbSr cbH Slmio biom hSliSi la irzh hmqrib ato la iHSb lo pgol ihih ohnpS haklt mmno eonh tSa׃ 
leviticus 7:19	ohbSr aSr ige bkl Tma la iakl baS iSrp ohbSr kl Thor iakl bSr׃ 
leviticus 7:20	ohnpS aSr takl bSr mcbH hSlmim aSr lihoh oTmato elio onkrth hnpS hhoa memih׃ 
leviticus 7:21	onpS ki tge bkl Tma bTmat adm ao bbhmh Tmah ao bkl Sqz Tma oakl mbSr cbH hSlmim aSr lihoh onkrth hnpS hhoa memih׃ 
leviticus 7:22	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 7:23	dbr al bni iSral lamr kl Hlb Sor okSb oec la taklo׃ 
leviticus 7:24	oHlb nblh oHlb Trph ieSh lkl mlakh oakl la taklho׃ 
leviticus 7:25	ki kl akl Hlb mn hbhmh aSr iqrib mmnh aSh lihoh onkrth hnpS haklt memih׃ 
leviticus 7:26	okl dm la taklo bkl moSbtikm leop olbhmh׃ 
leviticus 7:27	kl npS aSr takl kl dm onkrth hnpS hhoa memih׃ 
leviticus 7:28	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 7:29	dbr al bni iSral lamr hmqrib at cbH Slmio lihoh ibia at qrbno lihoh mcbH Slmio׃ 
leviticus 7:30	idio tbiainh at aSi ihoh at hHlb el hHch ibiano at hHch lhnip ato tnoph lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 7:31	ohqTir hkhn at hHlb hmcbHh ohih hHch lahrn olbnio׃ 
leviticus 7:32	oat Soq himin ttno tromh lkhn mcbHi Slmikm׃ 
leviticus 7:33	hmqrib at dm hSlmim oat hHlb mbni ahrn lo thih Soq himin lmnh׃ 
leviticus 7:34	ki at Hch htnoph oat Soq htromh lqHti mat bni iSral mcbHi Slmihm oatn atm lahrn hkhn olbnio lHq eolm mat bni iSral׃

leviticus 8:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 8:2	qH at ahrn oat bnio ato oat hbgdim oat Smn hmSHh oat pr hHTat oat Sni hailim oat sl hmzot׃ 
leviticus 8:3	oat kl hedh hqhl al ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 8:4	oieS mSh kaSr zoh ihoh ato otqhl hedh al ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 8:5	oiamr mSh al hedh ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh leSot׃ 
leviticus 8:6	oiqrb mSh at ahrn oat bnio oirHz atm bmim׃ 
leviticus 8:7	oitn elio at hktnt oiHgr ato babnT oilbS ato at hmeil oitn elio at hapd oiHgr ato bHSb hapd oiapd lo bo׃ 
leviticus 8:8	oiSm elio at hHSn oitn al hHSn at haorim oat htmim׃ 
leviticus 8:9	oiSm at hmznpt el raSo oiSm el hmznpt al mol pnio at ziz hchb ncr hqdS kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
leviticus 8:10	oiqH mSh at Smn hmSHh oimSH at hmSkn oat kl aSr bo oiqdS atm׃ 
leviticus 8:11	oic mmno el hmcbH Sbe pemim oimSH at hmcbH oat kl klio oat hkir oat kno lqdSm׃ 
leviticus 8:12	oizq mSmn hmSHh el raS ahrn oimSH ato lqdSo׃ 
leviticus 8:13	oiqrb mSh at bni ahrn oilbSm ktnt oiHgr atm abnT oiHbS lhm mgbeot kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
leviticus 8:14	oigS at pr hHTat oismk ahrn obnio at idihm el raS pr hHTat׃ 
leviticus 8:15	oiSHT oiqH mSh at hdm oitn el qrnot hmcbH sbib bazbeo oiHTa at hmcbH oat hdm izq al isod hmcbH oiqdSho lkpr elio׃ 
leviticus 8:16	oiqH at kl hHlb aSr el hqrb oat itrt hkbd oat Sti hklit oat Hlbhn oiqTr mSh hmcbHh׃ 
leviticus 8:17	oat hpr oat ero oat bSro oat prSo Srp baS mHoz lmHnh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
leviticus 8:18	oiqrb at ail helh oismko ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hail׃ 
leviticus 8:19	oiSHT oicrq mSh at hdm el hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 8:20	oat hail ntH lntHio oiqTr mSh at hraS oat hntHim oat hpdr׃ 
leviticus 8:21	oat hqrb oat hkreim rHz bmim oiqTr mSh at kl hail hmcbHh elh hoa lriH niHH aSh hoa lihoh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
leviticus 8:22	oiqrb at hail hSni ail hmlaim oismko ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hail׃ 
leviticus 8:23	oiSHT oiqH mSh mdmo oitn el tnok acn ahrn himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit׃ 
leviticus 8:24	oiqrb at bni ahrn oitn mSh mn hdm el tnok acnm himnit oel bhn idm himnit oel bhn rglm himnit oicrq mSh at hdm el hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 8:25	oiqH at hHlb oat halih oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb oat itrt hkbd oat Sti hklit oat Hlbhn oat Soq himin׃ 
leviticus 8:26	omsl hmzot aSr lpni ihoh lqH Hlt mzh aHt oHlt lHm Smn aHt orqiq aHd oiSm el hHlbim oel Soq himin׃ 
leviticus 8:27	oitn at hkl el kpi ahrn oel kpi bnio oinp atm tnoph lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 8:28	oiqH mSh atm mel kpihm oiqTr hmcbHh el helh mlaim hm lriH niHH aSh hoa lihoh׃ 
leviticus 8:29	oiqH mSh at hHch oinipho tnoph lpni ihoh mail hmlaim lmSh hih lmnh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
leviticus 8:30	oiqH mSh mSmn hmSHh omn hdm aSr el hmcbH oic el ahrn el bgdio oel bnio oel bgdi bnio ato oiqdS at ahrn at bgdio oat bnio oat bgdi bnio ato׃ 
leviticus 8:31	oiamr mSh al ahrn oal bnio bSlo at hbSr ptH ahl moed oSm taklo ato oat hlHm aSr bsl hmlaim kaSr zoiti lamr ahrn obnio iaklho׃ 
leviticus 8:32	ohnotr bbSr oblHm baS tSrpo׃ 
leviticus 8:33	omptH ahl moed la tzao Sbet imim ed iom mlat imi mlaikm ki Sbet imim imla at idkm׃ 
leviticus 8:34	kaSr eSh biom hch zoh ihoh leSt lkpr elikm׃ 
leviticus 8:35	optH ahl moed tSbo iomm olilh Sbet imim oSmrtm at mSmrt ihoh ola tmoto ki kn zoiti׃ 
leviticus 8:36	oieS ahrn obnio at kl hdbrim aSr zoh ihoh bid mSh׃ 
leviticus 9:1	oihi biom hSmini qra mSh lahrn olbnio olcqni iSral׃ 
leviticus 9:2	oiamr al ahrn qH lk egl bn bqr lHTat oail lelh tmimm ohqrb lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 9:3	oal bni iSral tdbr lamr qHo Seir ecim lHTat oegl okbS bni Snh tmimm lelh׃ 
leviticus 9:4	oSor oail lSlmim lcbH lpni ihoh omnHh blolh bSmn ki hiom ihoh nrah alikm׃ 
leviticus 9:5	oiqHo at aSr zoh mSh al pni ahl moed oiqrbo kl hedh oiemdo lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 9:6	oiamr mSh ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh teSo oira alikm kbod ihoh׃ 
leviticus 9:7	oiamr mSh al ahrn qrb al hmcbH oeSh at HTatk oat eltk okpr bedk obed hem oeSh at qrbn hem okpr bedm kaSr zoh ihoh׃ 
leviticus 9:8	oiqrb ahrn al hmcbH oiSHT at egl hHTat aSr lo׃ 
leviticus 9:9	oiqrbo bni ahrn at hdm alio oiTbl azbeo bdm oitn el qrnot hmcbH oat hdm izq al isod hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 9:10	oat hHlb oat hklit oat hitrt mn hkbd mn hHTat hqTir hmcbHh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
leviticus 9:11	oat hbSr oat heor Srp baS mHoz lmHnh׃ 
leviticus 9:12	oiSHT at helh oimzao bni ahrn alio at hdm oicrqho el hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 9:13	oat helh hmziao alio lntHih oat hraS oiqTr el hmcbH׃ 
leviticus 9:14	oirHz at hqrb oat hkreim oiqTr el helh hmcbHh׃ 
leviticus 9:15	oiqrb at qrbn hem oiqH at Seir hHTat aSr lem oiSHTho oiHTaho kraSon׃ 
leviticus 9:16	oiqrb at helh oieSh kmSpT׃ 
leviticus 9:17	oiqrb at hmnHh oimla kpo mmnh oiqTr el hmcbH mlbd elt hbqr׃ 
leviticus 9:18	oiSHT at hSor oat hail cbH hSlmim aSr lem oimzao bni ahrn at hdm alio oicrqho el hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 9:19	oat hHlbim mn hSor omn hail halih ohmksh ohklit oitrt hkbd׃ 
leviticus 9:20	oiSimo at hHlbim el hHcot oiqTr hHlbim hmcbHh׃ 
leviticus 9:21	oat hHcot oat Soq himin hnip ahrn tnoph lpni ihoh kaSr zoh mSh׃ 
leviticus 9:22	oiSa ahrn at ido al hem oibrkm oird meSt hHTat ohelh ohSlmim׃ 
leviticus 9:23	oiba mSh oahrn al ahl moed oizao oibrko at hem oira kbod ihoh al kl hem׃ 
leviticus 9:24	otza aS mlpni ihoh otakl el hmcbH at helh oat hHlbim oira kl hem oirno oiplo el pnihm׃ 
leviticus 10:1	oiqHo bni ahrn ndb oabihoa aiS mHtto oitno bhn aS oiSimo elih qTrt oiqrbo lpni ihoh aS crh aSr la zoh atm׃ 
leviticus 10:2	otza aS mlpni ihoh otakl aotm oimto lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 10:3	oiamr mSh al ahrn hoa aSr dbr ihoh lamr bqrbi aqdS oel pni kl hem akbd oidm ahrn׃ 
leviticus 10:4	oiqra mSh al miSal oal alzpn bni ecial dd ahrn oiamr alhm qrbo Sao at aHikm mat pni hqdS al mHoz lmHnh׃ 
leviticus 10:5	oiqrbo oiSam bktntm al mHoz lmHnh kaSr dbr mSh׃ 
leviticus 10:6	oiamr mSh al ahrn olalecr olaitmr bnio raSikm al tpreo obgdikm la tprmo ola tmto oel kl hedh iqzp oaHikm kl bit iSral ibko at hSrph aSr Srp ihoh׃ 
leviticus 10:7	omptH ahl moed la tzao pn tmto ki Smn mSHt ihoh elikm oieSo kdbr mSh׃ 
leviticus 10:8	oidbr ihoh al ahrn lamr׃ 
leviticus 10:9	iin oSkr al tSt ath obnik atk bbakm al ahl moed ola tmto Hqt eolm ldrtikm׃ 
leviticus 10:10	olhbdil bin hqdS obin hHl obin hTma obin hThor׃ 
leviticus 10:11	olhort at bni iSral at kl hHqim aSr dbr ihoh alihm bid mSh׃ 
leviticus 10:12	oidbr mSh al ahrn oal alecr oal aitmr bnio hnotrim qHo at hmnHh hnotrt maSi ihoh oakloh mzot azl hmcbH ki qdS qdSim hoa׃ 
leviticus 10:13	oakltm ath bmqom qdS ki Hqk oHq bnik hoa maSi ihoh ki kn zoiti׃ 
leviticus 10:14	oat Hch htnoph oat Soq htromh taklo bmqom Thor ath obnik obntik atk ki Hqk oHq bnik ntno mcbHi Slmi bni iSral׃ 
leviticus 10:15	Soq htromh oHch htnoph el aSi hHlbim ibiao lhnip tnoph lpni ihoh ohih lk olbnik atk lHq eolm kaSr zoh ihoh׃ 
leviticus 10:16	oat Seir hHTat drS drS mSh ohnh Srp oiqzp el alecr oel aitmr bni ahrn hnotrm lamr׃ 
leviticus 10:17	mdoe la akltm at hHTat bmqom hqdS ki qdS qdSim hoa oath ntn lkm lSat at eon hedh lkpr elihm lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 10:18	hn la hoba at dmh al hqdS pnimh akol taklo ath bqdS kaSr zoiti׃ 
leviticus 10:19	oidbr ahrn al mSh hn hiom hqribo at HTatm oat eltm lpni ihoh otqranh ati kalh oaklti HTat hiom hiiTb beini ihoh׃ 
leviticus 10:20	oiSme mSh oiiTb beinio׃ 
leviticus 11:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr alhm׃ 
leviticus 11:2	dbro al bni iSral lamr cat hHih aSr taklo mkl hbhmh aSr el harz׃ 
leviticus 11:3	kl mprst prsh oSset Sse prst melt grh bbhmh ath taklo׃ 
leviticus 11:4	ak at ch la taklo mmeli hgrh ommprisi hprsh at hgml ki melh grh hoa oprsh ainno mpris Tma hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:5	oat hSpn ki melh grh hoa oprsh la ipris Tma hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:6	oat harnbt ki melt grh hoa oprsh la hprish Tmah hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:7	oat hHcir ki mpris prsh hoa oSse Sse prsh ohoa grh la igr Tma hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:8	mbSrm la taklo obnbltm la tgeo Tmaim hm lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:9	at ch taklo mkl aSr bmim kl aSr lo snpir oqSqSt bmim bimim obnHlim atm taklo׃ 
leviticus 11:10	okl aSr ain lo snpir oqSqSt bimim obnHlim mkl Srz hmim omkl npS hHih aSr bmim Sqz hm lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:11	oSqz ihio lkm mbSrm la taklo oat nbltm tSqzo׃ 
leviticus 11:12	kl aSr ain lo snpir oqSqSt bmim Sqz hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:13	oat alh tSqzo mn heop la iaklo Sqz hm at hnSr oat hprs oat hecnih׃ 
leviticus 11:14	oat hdah oat haih lminh׃ 
leviticus 11:15	at kl erb lmino׃ 
leviticus 11:16	oat bt hienh oat htHms oat hSHp oat hnz lminho׃ 
leviticus 11:17	oat hkos oat hSlk oat hinSop׃ 
leviticus 11:18	oat htnSmt oat hqat oat hrHm׃ 
leviticus 11:19	oat hHsidh hanph lminh oat hdokipt oat heTlp׃ 
leviticus 11:20	kl Srz heop hhlk el arbe Sqz hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:21	ak at ch taklo mkl Srz heop hhlk el arbe aSr la kreim mmel lrglio lntr bhn el harz׃ 
leviticus 11:22	at alh mhm taklo at harbh lmino oat hslem lminho oat hHrgl lminho oat hHgb lminho׃ 
leviticus 11:23	okl Srz heop aSr lo arbe rglim Sqz hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:24	olalh tTmao kl hnge bnbltm iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 11:25	okl hnSa mnbltm ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 11:26	lkl hbhmh aSr hoa mprst prsh oSse ainnh Sset ogrh ainnh melh Tmaim hm lkm kl hnge bhm iTma׃ 
leviticus 11:27	okl holk el kpio bkl hHih hhlkt el arbe Tmaim hm lkm kl hnge bnbltm iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 11:28	ohnSa at nbltm ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb Tmaim hmh lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:29	och lkm hTma bSrz hSrz el harz hHld ohekbr ohzb lminho׃ 
leviticus 11:30	ohanqh ohkH ohlTah ohHmT ohtnSmt׃ 
leviticus 11:31	alh hTmaim lkm bkl hSrz kl hnge bhm bmtm iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 11:32	okl aSr ipl elio mhm bmtm iTma mkl kli ez ao bgd ao eor ao Sq kl kli aSr ieSh mlakh bhm bmim ioba oTma ed herb oThr׃ 
leviticus 11:33	okl kli HrS aSr ipl mhm al toko kl aSr btoko iTma oato tSbro׃ 
leviticus 11:34	mkl hakl aSr iakl aSr iboa elio mim iTma okl mSqh aSr iSth bkl kli iTma׃ 
leviticus 11:35	okl aSr ipl mnbltm elio iTma tnor okirim itz Tmaim hm oTmaim ihio lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:36	ak mein obor mqoh mim ihih Thor onge bnbltm iTma׃ 
leviticus 11:37	oki ipl mnbltm el kl cre croe aSr icre Thor hoa׃ 
leviticus 11:38	oki itn mim el cre onpl mnbltm elio Tma hoa lkm׃ 
leviticus 11:39	oki imot mn hbhmh aSr hia lkm laklh hnge bnblth iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 11:40	ohakl mnblth ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb ohnSa at nblth ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 11:41	okl hSrz hSrz el harz Sqz hoa la iakl׃ 
leviticus 11:42	kl holk el gHon okl holk el arbe ed kl mrbh rglim lkl hSrz hSrz el harz la taklom ki Sqz hm׃ 
leviticus 11:43	al tSqzo at npStikm bkl hSrz hSrz ola tTmao bhm onTmtm bm׃ 
leviticus 11:44	ki ani ihoh alhikm ohtqdStm ohiitm qdSim ki qdoS ani ola tTmao at npStikm bkl hSrz hrmS el harz׃ 
leviticus 11:45	ki ani ihoh hmelh atkm marz mzrim lhit lkm lalhim ohiitm qdSim ki qdoS ani׃ 
leviticus 11:46	cat tort hbhmh oheop okl npS hHih hrmSt bmim olkl npS hSrzt el harz׃ 
leviticus 11:47	lhbdil bin hTma obin hThr obin hHih hnaklt obin hHih aSr la takl׃ 
leviticus 12:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 12:2	dbr al bni iSral lamr aSh ki tcrie oildh ckr oTmah Sbet imim kimi ndt doth tTma׃ 
leviticus 12:3	obiom hSmini imol bSr erlto׃ 
leviticus 12:4	oSlSim iom oSlSt imim tSb bdmi Thrh bkl qdS la tge oal hmqdS la tba ed mlat imi Thrh׃ 
leviticus 12:5	oam nqbh tld oTmah Sbeim kndth oSSim iom oSSt imim tSb el dmi Thrh׃ 
leviticus 12:6	obmlat imi Thrh lbn ao lbt tbia kbS bn Snto lelh obn ionh ao tr lHTat al ptH ahl moed al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 12:7	ohqribo lpni ihoh okpr elih oThrh mmqr dmih cat tort hildt lckr ao lnqbh׃ 
leviticus 12:8	oam la tmza idh di Sh olqHh Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh aHd lelh oaHd lHTat okpr elih hkhn oThrh׃ 
leviticus 13:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr׃ 
leviticus 13:2	adm ki ihih beor bSro Sat ao spHt ao bhrt ohih beor bSro lnge zret ohoba al ahrn hkhn ao al aHd mbnio hkhnim׃ 
leviticus 13:3	orah hkhn at hnge beor hbSr oSer bnge hpk lbn omrah hnge emq meor bSro nge zret hoa oraho hkhn oTma ato׃ 
leviticus 13:4	oam bhrt lbnh hoa beor bSro oemq ain mrah mn heor oSerh la hpk lbn ohsgir hkhn at hnge Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 13:5	oraho hkhn biom hSbiei ohnh hnge emd beinio la pSh hnge beor ohsgiro hkhn Sbet imim Snit׃ 
leviticus 13:6	orah hkhn ato biom hSbiei Snit ohnh khh hnge ola pSh hnge beor oThro hkhn mspHt hia okbs bgdio oThr׃ 
leviticus 13:7	oam pSh tpSh hmspHt beor aHri hrato al hkhn lThrto onrah Snit al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:8	orah hkhn ohnh pSth hmspHt beor oTmao hkhn zret hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:9	nge zret ki thih badm ohoba al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:10	orah hkhn ohnh Sat lbnh beor ohia hpkh Ser lbn omHit bSr Hi bSat׃ 
leviticus 13:11	zret noSnt hoa beor bSro oTmao hkhn la isgrno ki Tma hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:12	oam proH tprH hzret beor oksth hzret at kl eor hnge mraSo oed rglio lkl mrah eini hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:13	orah hkhn ohnh ksth hzret at kl bSro oThr at hnge klo hpk lbn Thor hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:14	obiom hraot bo bSr Hi iTma׃ 
leviticus 13:15	orah hkhn at hbSr hHi oTmao hbSr hHi Tma hoa zret hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:16	ao ki iSob hbSr hHi onhpk llbn oba al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:17	oraho hkhn ohnh nhpk hnge llbn oThr hkhn at hnge Thor hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:18	obSr ki ihih bo bero SHin onrpa׃ 
leviticus 13:19	ohih bmqom hSHin Sat lbnh ao bhrt lbnh admdmt onrah al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:20	orah hkhn ohnh mrah Spl mn heor oSerh hpk lbn oTmao hkhn nge zret hia bSHin prHh׃ 
leviticus 13:21	oam iranh hkhn ohnh ain bh Ser lbn oSplh ainnh mn heor ohia khh ohsgiro hkhn Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 13:22	oam pSh tpSh beor oTma hkhn ato nge hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:23	oam tHtih temd hbhrt la pSth zrbt hSHin hoa oThro hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:24	ao bSr ki ihih bero mkot aS ohith mHit hmkoh bhrt lbnh admdmt ao lbnh׃ 
leviticus 13:25	orah ath hkhn ohnh nhpk Ser lbn bbhrt omrah emq mn heor zret hoa bmkoh prHh oTma ato hkhn nge zret hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:26	oam iranh hkhn ohnh ain bbhrt Ser lbn oSplh ainnh mn heor ohoa khh ohsgiro hkhn Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 13:27	oraho hkhn biom hSbiei am pSh tpSh beor oTma hkhn ato nge zret hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:28	oam tHtih temd hbhrt la pSth beor ohoa khh Sat hmkoh hoa oThro hkhn ki zrbt hmkoh hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:29	oaiS ao aSh ki ihih bo nge braS ao bcqn׃ 
leviticus 13:30	orah hkhn at hnge ohnh mraho emq mn heor obo Ser zhb dq oTma ato hkhn ntq hoa zret hraS ao hcqn hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:31	oki irah hkhn at nge hntq ohnh ain mraho emq mn heor oSer SHr ain bo ohsgir hkhn at nge hntq Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 13:32	orah hkhn at hnge biom hSbiei ohnh la pSh hntq ola hih bo Ser zhb omrah hntq ain emq mn heor׃ 
leviticus 13:33	ohtglH oat hntq la iglH ohsgir hkhn at hntq Sbet imim Snit׃ 
leviticus 13:34	orah hkhn at hntq biom hSbiei ohnh la pSh hntq beor omraho ainno emq mn heor oThr ato hkhn okbs bgdio oThr׃ 
leviticus 13:35	oam pSh ipSh hntq beor aHri Thrto׃ 
leviticus 13:36	oraho hkhn ohnh pSh hntq beor la ibqr hkhn lSer hzhb Tma hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:37	oam beinio emd hntq oSer SHr zmH bo nrpa hntq Thor hoa oThro hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:38	oaiS ao aSh ki ihih beor bSrm bhrt bhrt lbnt׃ 
leviticus 13:39	orah hkhn ohnh beor bSrm bhrt khot lbnt bhq hoa prH beor Thor hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:40	oaiS ki imrT raSo qrH hoa Thor hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:41	oam mpat pnio imrT raSo gbH hoa Thor hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:42	oki ihih bqrHt ao bgbHt nge lbn admdm zret prHt hoa bqrHto ao bgbHto׃ 
leviticus 13:43	orah ato hkhn ohnh Sat hnge lbnh admdmt bqrHto ao bgbHto kmrah zret eor bSr׃ 
leviticus 13:44	aiS zroe hoa Tma hoa Tma iTmano hkhn braSo ngeo׃ 
leviticus 13:45	ohzroe aSr bo hnge bgdio ihio prmim oraSo ihih proe oel Spm ieTh oTma Tma iqra׃ 
leviticus 13:46	kl imi aSr hnge bo iTma Tma hoa bdd iSb mHoz lmHnh moSbo׃ 
leviticus 13:47	ohbgd ki ihih bo nge zret bbgd zmr ao bbgd pStim׃ 
leviticus 13:48	ao bSti ao berb lpStim olzmr ao beor ao bkl mlakt eor׃ 
leviticus 13:49	ohih hnge irqrq ao admdm bbgd ao beor ao bSti ao berb ao bkl kli eor nge zret hoa ohrah at hkhn׃ 
leviticus 13:50	orah hkhn at hnge ohsgir at hnge Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 13:51	orah at hnge biom hSbiei ki pSh hnge bbgd ao bSti ao berb ao beor lkl aSr ieSh heor lmlakh zret mmart hnge Tma hoa׃ 
leviticus 13:52	oSrp at hbgd ao at hSti ao at herb bzmr ao bpStim ao at kl kli heor aSr ihih bo hnge ki zret mmart hoa baS tSrp׃ 
leviticus 13:53	oam irah hkhn ohnh la pSh hnge bbgd ao bSti ao berb ao bkl kli eor׃ 
leviticus 13:54	ozoh hkhn okbso at aSr bo hnge ohsgiro Sbet imim Snit׃ 
leviticus 13:55	orah hkhn aHri hkbs at hnge ohnh la hpk hnge at eino ohnge la pSh Tma hoa baS tSrpno pHtt hoa bqrHto ao bgbHto׃ 
leviticus 13:56	oam rah hkhn ohnh khh hnge aHri hkbs ato oqre ato mn hbgd ao mn heor ao mn hSti ao mn herb׃ 
leviticus 13:57	oam trah eod bbgd ao bSti ao berb ao bkl kli eor prHt hoa baS tSrpno at aSr bo hnge׃ 
leviticus 13:58	ohbgd ao hSti ao herb ao kl kli heor aSr tkbs osr mhm hnge okbs Snit oThr׃ 
leviticus 13:59	cat tort nge zret bgd hzmr ao hpStim ao hSti ao herb ao kl kli eor lThro ao lTmao׃ 
leviticus 14:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 14:2	cat thih tort hmzre biom Thrto ohoba al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 14:3	oiza hkhn al mHoz lmHnh orah hkhn ohnh nrpa nge hzret mn hzroe׃ 
leviticus 14:4	ozoh hkhn olqH lmThr Sti zprim Hiot Throt oez arc oSni tolet oacb׃ 
leviticus 14:5	ozoh hkhn oSHT at hzpor haHt al kli HrS el mim Hiim׃ 
leviticus 14:6	at hzpr hHih iqH ath oat ez harc oat Sni htolet oat hacb oTbl aotm oat hzpr hHih bdm hzpr hSHTh el hmim hHiim׃ 
leviticus 14:7	ohch el hmThr mn hzret Sbe pemim oThro oSlH at hzpr hHih el pni hSdh׃ 
leviticus 14:8	okbs hmThr at bgdio oglH at kl Sero orHz bmim oThr oaHr iboa al hmHnh oiSb mHoz lahlo Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 14:9	ohih biom hSbiei iglH at kl Sero at raSo oat cqno oat gbt einio oat kl Sero iglH okbs at bgdio orHz at bSro bmim oThr׃ 
leviticus 14:10	obiom hSmini iqH Sni kbSim tmimim okbSh aHt bt Snth tmimh oSlSh eSrnim slt mnHh blolh bSmn olg aHd Smn׃ 
leviticus 14:11	ohemid hkhn hmThr at haiS hmThr oatm lpni ihoh ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 14:12	olqH hkhn at hkbS haHd ohqrib ato laSm oat lg hSmn ohnip atm tnoph lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:13	oSHT at hkbS bmqom aSr iSHT at hHTat oat helh bmqom hqdS ki kHTat haSm hoa lkhn qdS qdSim hoa׃ 
leviticus 14:14	olqH hkhn mdm haSm ontn hkhn el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit׃ 
leviticus 14:15	olqH hkhn mlg hSmn oizq el kp hkhn hSmalit׃ 
leviticus 14:16	oTbl hkhn at azbeo himnit mn hSmn aSr el kpo hSmalit ohch mn hSmn bazbeo Sbe pemim lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:17	omitr hSmn aSr el kpo itn hkhn el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit el dm haSm׃ 
leviticus 14:18	ohnotr bSmn aSr el kp hkhn itn el raS hmThr okpr elio hkhn lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:19	oeSh hkhn at hHTat okpr el hmThr mTmato oaHr iSHT at helh׃ 
leviticus 14:20	ohelh hkhn at helh oat hmnHh hmcbHh okpr elio hkhn oThr׃ 
leviticus 14:21	oam dl hoa oain ido mSgt olqH kbS aHd aSm ltnoph lkpr elio oeSron slt aHd blol bSmn lmnHh olg Smn׃ 
leviticus 14:22	oSti trim ao Sni bni ionh aSr tSig ido ohih aHd HTat ohaHd elh׃ 
leviticus 14:23	ohbia atm biom hSmini lThrto al hkhn al ptH ahl moed lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:24	olqH hkhn at kbS haSm oat lg hSmn ohnip atm hkhn tnoph lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:25	oSHT at kbS haSm olqH hkhn mdm haSm ontn el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit׃ 
leviticus 14:26	omn hSmn izq hkhn el kp hkhn hSmalit׃ 
leviticus 14:27	ohch hkhn bazbeo himnit mn hSmn aSr el kpo hSmalit Sbe pemim lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:28	ontn hkhn mn hSmn aSr el kpo el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit el mqom dm haSm׃ 
leviticus 14:29	ohnotr mn hSmn aSr el kp hkhn itn el raS hmThr lkpr elio lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:30	oeSh at haHd mn htrim ao mn bni hionh maSr tSig ido׃ 
leviticus 14:31	at aSr tSig ido at haHd HTat oat haHd elh el hmnHh okpr hkhn el hmThr lpni ihoh׃ 
leviticus 14:32	cat tort aSr bo nge zret aSr la tSig ido bThrto׃ 
leviticus 14:33	oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr׃ 
leviticus 14:34	ki tbao al arz knen aSr ani ntn lkm laHch ontti nge zret bbit arz aHctkm׃ 
leviticus 14:35	oba aSr lo hbit ohgid lkhn lamr knge nrah li bbit׃ 
leviticus 14:36	ozoh hkhn opno at hbit bTrm iba hkhn lraot at hnge ola iTma kl aSr bbit oaHr kn iba hkhn lraot at hbit׃ 
leviticus 14:37	orah at hnge ohnh hnge bqirt hbit Sqerort irqrqt ao admdmt omraihn Spl mn hqir׃ 
leviticus 14:38	oiza hkhn mn hbit al ptH hbit ohsgir at hbit Sbet imim׃ 
leviticus 14:39	oSb hkhn biom hSbiei orah ohnh pSh hnge bqirt hbit׃ 
leviticus 14:40	ozoh hkhn oHlzo at habnim aSr bhn hnge ohSliko athn al mHoz leir al mqom Tma׃ 
leviticus 14:41	oat hbit iqze mbit sbib oSpko at hepr aSr hqzo al mHoz leir al mqom Tma׃ 
leviticus 14:42	olqHo abnim aHrot ohbiao al tHt habnim oepr aHr iqH oTH at hbit׃ 
leviticus 14:43	oam iSob hnge oprH bbit aHr Hlz at habnim oaHri hqzot at hbit oaHri hToH׃ 
leviticus 14:44	oba hkhn orah ohnh pSh hnge bbit zret mmart hoa bbit Tma hoa׃ 
leviticus 14:45	ontz at hbit at abnio oat ezio oat kl epr hbit ohozia al mHoz leir al mqom Tma׃ 
leviticus 14:46	ohba al hbit kl imi hsgir ato iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 14:47	ohSkb bbit ikbs at bgdio ohakl bbit ikbs at bgdio׃ 
leviticus 14:48	oam ba iba hkhn orah ohnh la pSh hnge bbit aHri hTH at hbit oThr hkhn at hbit ki nrpa hnge׃ 
leviticus 14:49	olqH lHTa at hbit Sti zprim oez arc oSni tolet oacb׃ 
leviticus 14:50	oSHT at hzpr haHt al kli HrS el mim Hiim׃ 
leviticus 14:51	olqH at ez harc oat hacb oat Sni htolet oat hzpr hHih oTbl atm bdm hzpr hSHoTh obmim hHiim ohch al hbit Sbe pemim׃ 
leviticus 14:52	oHTa at hbit bdm hzpor obmim hHiim obzpr hHih obez harc obacb obSni htolet׃ 
leviticus 14:53	oSlH at hzpr hHih al mHoz leir al pni hSdh okpr el hbit oThr׃ 
leviticus 14:54	cat htorh lkl nge hzret olntq׃ 
leviticus 14:55	olzret hbgd olbit׃ 
leviticus 14:56	olSat olspHt olbhrt׃ 
leviticus 14:57	lhort biom hTma obiom hThr cat tort hzret׃ 
leviticus 15:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr׃ 
leviticus 15:2	dbro al bni iSral oamrtm alhm aiS aiS ki ihih cb mbSro cobo Tma hoa׃ 
leviticus 15:3	ocat thih Tmato bcobo rr bSro at cobo ao hHtim bSro mcobo Tmato hoa׃ 
leviticus 15:4	kl hmSkb aSr iSkb elio hcb iTma okl hkli aSr iSb elio iTma׃ 
leviticus 15:5	oaiS aSr ige bmSkbo ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:6	ohiSb el hkli aSr iSb elio hcb ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:7	ohnge bbSr hcb ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:8	oki irq hcb bThor okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:9	okl hmrkb aSr irkb elio hcb iTma׃ 
leviticus 15:10	okl hnge bkl aSr ihih tHtio iTma ed herb ohnoSa aotm ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:11	okl aSr ige bo hcb oidio la STp bmim okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:12	okli HrS aSr ige bo hcb iSbr okl kli ez iSTp bmim׃ 
leviticus 15:13	oki iThr hcb mcobo ospr lo Sbet imim lThrto okbs bgdio orHz bSro bmim Hiim oThr׃ 
leviticus 15:14	obiom hSmini iqH lo Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh oba lpni ihoh al ptH ahl moed ontnm al hkhn׃ 
leviticus 15:15	oeSh atm hkhn aHd HTat ohaHd elh okpr elio hkhn lpni ihoh mcobo׃ 
leviticus 15:16	oaiS ki tza mmno Skbt cre orHz bmim at kl bSro oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:17	okl bgd okl eor aSr ihih elio Skbt cre okbs bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:18	oaSh aSr iSkb aiS ath Skbt cre orHzo bmim oTmao ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:19	oaSh ki thih cbh dm ihih cbh bbSrh Sbet imim thih bndth okl hnge bh iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:20	okl aSr tSkb elio bndth iTma okl aSr tSb elio iTma׃ 
leviticus 15:21	okl hnge bmSkbh ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:22	okl hnge bkl kli aSr tSb elio ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:23	oam el hmSkb hoa ao el hkli aSr hoa iSbt elio bngeo bo iTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:24	oam Skb iSkb aiS ath othi ndth elio oTma Sbet imim okl hmSkb aSr iSkb elio iTma׃ 
leviticus 15:25	oaSh ki icob cob dmh imim rbim bla et ndth ao ki tcob el ndth kl imi cob Tmath kimi ndth thih Tmah hoa׃ 
leviticus 15:26	kl hmSkb aSr tSkb elio kl imi cobh kmSkb ndth ihih lh okl hkli aSr tSb elio Tma ihih kTmat ndth׃ 
leviticus 15:27	okl hnoge bm iTma okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb׃ 
leviticus 15:28	oam Thrh mcobh osprh lh Sbet imim oaHr tThr׃ 
leviticus 15:29	obiom hSmini tqH lh Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh ohbiah aotm al hkhn al ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 15:30	oeSh hkhn at haHd HTat oat haHd elh okpr elih hkhn lpni ihoh mcob Tmath׃ 
leviticus 15:31	ohcrtm at bni iSral mTmatm ola imto bTmatm bTmam at mSkni aSr btokm׃ 
leviticus 15:32	cat tort hcb oaSr tza mmno Skbt cre lTmah bh׃ 
leviticus 15:33	ohdoh bndth ohcb at cobo lckr olnqbh olaiS aSr iSkb em Tmah׃ 
leviticus 16:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh aHri mot Sni bni ahrn bqrbtm lpni ihoh oimto׃ 
leviticus 16:2	oiamr ihoh al mSh dbr al ahrn aHik oal iba bkl et al hqdS mbit lprkt al pni hkprt aSr el harn ola imot ki benn arah el hkprt׃ 
leviticus 16:3	bcat iba ahrn al hqdS bpr bn bqr lHTat oail lelh׃ 
leviticus 16:4	ktnt bd qdS ilbS omknsi bd ihio el bSro obabnT bd iHgr obmznpt bd iznp bgdi qdS hm orHz bmim at bSro olbSm׃ 
leviticus 16:5	omat edt bni iSral iqH Sni Seiri ecim lHTat oail aHd lelh׃ 
leviticus 16:6	ohqrib ahrn at pr hHTat aSr lo okpr bedo obed bito׃ 
leviticus 16:7	olqH at Sni hSeirm ohemid atm lpni ihoh ptH ahl moed׃ 
leviticus 16:8	ontn ahrn el Sni hSeirm gorlot gorl aHd lihoh ogorl aHd lecacl׃ 
leviticus 16:9	ohqrib ahrn at hSeir aSr elh elio hgorl lihoh oeSho HTat׃ 
leviticus 16:10	ohSeir aSr elh elio hgorl lecacl iemd Hi lpni ihoh lkpr elio lSlH ato lecacl hmdbrh׃ 
leviticus 16:11	ohqrib ahrn at pr hHTat aSr lo okpr bedo obed bito oSHT at pr hHTat aSr lo׃ 
leviticus 16:12	olqH mla hmHth gHli aS mel hmcbH mlpni ihoh omla Hpnio qTrt smim dqh ohbia mbit lprkt׃ 
leviticus 16:13	ontn at hqTrt el haS lpni ihoh oksh enn hqTrt at hkprt aSr el hedot ola imot׃ 
leviticus 16:14	olqH mdm hpr ohch bazbeo el pni hkprt qdmh olpni hkprt ich Sbe pemim mn hdm bazbeo׃ 
leviticus 16:15	oSHT at Seir hHTat aSr lem ohbia at dmo al mbit lprkt oeSh at dmo kaSr eSh ldm hpr ohch ato el hkprt olpni hkprt׃ 
leviticus 16:16	okpr el hqdS mTmat bni iSral ompSeihm lkl HTatm okn ieSh lahl moed hSkn atm btok Tmatm׃ 
leviticus 16:17	okl adm la ihih bahl moed bbao lkpr bqdS ed zato okpr bedo obed bito obed kl qhl iSral׃ 
leviticus 16:18	oiza al hmcbH aSr lpni ihoh okpr elio olqH mdm hpr omdm hSeir ontn el qrnot hmcbH sbib׃ 
leviticus 16:19	ohch elio mn hdm bazbeo Sbe pemim oThro oqdSo mTmat bni iSral׃ 
leviticus 16:20	oklh mkpr at hqdS oat ahl moed oat hmcbH ohqrib at hSeir hHi׃

leviticus 16:22	onSa hSeir elio at kl eontm al arz gcrh oSlH at hSeir bmdbr׃ 
leviticus 16:23	oba ahrn al ahl moed opST at bgdi hbd aSr lbS bbao al hqdS ohniHm Sm׃ 
leviticus 16:24	orHz at bSro bmim bmqom qdoS olbS at bgdio oiza oeSh at elto oat elt hem okpr bedo obed hem׃ 
leviticus 16:25	oat Hlb hHTat iqTir hmcbHh׃ 
leviticus 16:26	ohmSlH at hSeir lecacl ikbs bgdio orHz at bSro bmim oaHri kn iboa al hmHnh׃ 
leviticus 16:27	oat pr hHTat oat Seir hHTat aSr hoba at dmm lkpr bqdS iozia al mHoz lmHnh oSrpo baS at ertm oat bSrm oat prSm׃ 
leviticus 16:28	ohSrp atm ikbs bgdio orHz at bSro bmim oaHri kn iboa al hmHnh׃ 
leviticus 16:29	ohith lkm lHqt eolm bHdS hSbiei beSor lHdS teno at npStikm okl mlakh la teSo hacrH ohgr hgr btokkm׃ 
leviticus 16:30	ki biom hch ikpr elikm lThr atkm mkl HTatikm lpni ihoh tThro׃ 
leviticus 16:31	Sbt Sbton hia lkm oenitm at npStikm Hqt eolm׃

leviticus 22:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 22:2	dbr al ahrn oal bnio oincro mqdSi bni iSral ola iHllo at Sm qdSi aSr hm mqdSim li ani ihoh׃ 
leviticus 22:3	amr alhm ldrtikm kl aiS aSr iqrb mkl crekm al hqdSim aSr iqdiSo bni iSral lihoh oTmato elio onkrth hnpS hhoa mlpni ani ihoh׃ 
leviticus 22:4	aiS aiS mcre ahrn ohoa zroe ao cb bqdSim la iakl ed aSr iThr ohnge bkl Tma npS ao aiS aSr tza mmno Skbt cre׃ 
leviticus 22:5	ao aiS aSr ige bkl Srz aSr iTma lo ao badm aSr iTma lo lkl Tmato׃ 
leviticus 22:6	npS aSr tge bo oTmah ed herb ola iakl mn hqdSim ki am rHz bSro bmim׃ 
leviticus 22:7	oba hSmS oThr oaHr iakl mn hqdSim ki lHmo hoa׃ 
leviticus 22:8	nblh oTrph la iakl lTmah bh ani ihoh׃ 
leviticus 22:9	oSmro at mSmrti ola iSao elio HTa omto bo ki iHllho ani ihoh mqdSm׃ 
leviticus 22:10	okl cr la iakl qdS toSb khn oSkir la iakl qdS׃

leviticus 27:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
leviticus 27:2	dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm aiS ki ipla ndr berkk npSt lihoh׃ 
leviticus 27:3	ohih erkk hckr mbn eSrim Snh oed bn SSim Snh ohih erkk HmSim Sql ksp bSql hqdS׃ 
leviticus 27:4	oam nqbh hoa ohih erkk SlSim Sql׃ 
leviticus 27:5	oam mbn HmS Snim oed bn eSrim Snh ohih erkk hckr eSrim Sqlim olnqbh eSrt Sqlim׃ 
leviticus 27:6	oam mbn HdS oed bn HmS Snim ohih erkk hckr HmSh Sqlim ksp olnqbh erkk SlSt Sqlim ksp׃ 
leviticus 27:7	oam mbn SSim Snh omelh am ckr ohih erkk HmSh eSr Sql olnqbh eSrh Sqlim׃ 
leviticus 27:8	oam mk hoa merkk ohemido lpni hkhn oherik ato hkhn el pi aSr tSig id hndr ierikno hkhn׃ 
leviticus 27:9	oam bhmh aSr iqribo mmnh qrbn lihoh kl aSr itn mmno lihoh ihih qdS׃ 
leviticus 27:10	la iHlipno ola imir ato Tob bre ao re bTob oam hmr imir bhmh bbhmh ohih hoa otmorto ihih qdS׃ 
leviticus 27:11	oam kl bhmh Tmah aSr la iqribo mmnh qrbn lihoh ohemid at hbhmh lpni hkhn׃ 
leviticus 27:12	oherik hkhn ath bin Tob obin re kerkk hkhn kn ihih׃ 
leviticus 27:13	oam gal igalnh oisp HmiSto el erkk׃ 
leviticus 27:14	oaiS ki iqdS at bito qdS lihoh oheriko hkhn bin Tob obin re kaSr ierik ato hkhn kn iqom׃ 
leviticus 27:15	oam hmqdiS igal at bito oisp HmiSit ksp erkk elio ohih lo׃ 
leviticus 27:16	oam mSdh aHcto iqdiS aiS lihoh ohih erkk lpi creo cre Hmr Serim bHmSim Sql ksp׃ 
leviticus 27:17	am mSnt hibl iqdiS Sdho kerkk iqom׃ 
leviticus 27:18	oam aHr hibl iqdiS Sdho oHSb lo hkhn at hksp el pi hSnim hnotrt ed Snt hibl ongre merkk׃ 
leviticus 27:19	oam gal igal at hSdh hmqdiS ato oisp HmSit ksp erkk elio oqm lo׃ 
leviticus 27:20	oam la igal at hSdh oam mkr at hSdh laiS aHr la igal eod׃ 
leviticus 27:21	ohih hSdh bzato bibl qdS lihoh kSdh hHrm lkhn thih aHcto׃ 
leviticus 27:22	oam at Sdh mqnto aSr la mSdh aHcto iqdiS lihoh׃ 
leviticus 27:23	oHSb lo hkhn at mkst herkk ed Snt hibl ontn at herkk biom hhoa qdS lihoh׃ 
leviticus 27:24	bSnt hiobl iSob hSdh laSr qnho mato laSr lo aHct harz׃ 
leviticus 27:25	okl erkk ihih bSql hqdS eSrim grh ihih hSql׃ 
leviticus 27:26	ak bkor aSr ibkr lihoh bbhmh la iqdiS aiS ato am Sor am Sh lihoh hoa׃ 
leviticus 27:27	oam bbhmh hTmah opdh berkk oisp HmSto elio oam la igal onmkr berkk׃ 
leviticus 27:28	ak kl Hrm aSr iHrm aiS lihoh mkl aSr lo madm obhmh omSdh aHcto la imkr ola igal kl Hrm qdS qdSim hoa lihoh׃ 
leviticus 27:29	kl Hrm aSr iHrm mn hadm la ipdh mot iomt׃ 
leviticus 27:30	okl meSr harz mcre harz mpri hez lihoh hoa qdS lihoh׃ 
leviticus 27:31	oam gal igal aiS mmeSro HmSito isp elio׃ 
leviticus 27:32	okl meSr bqr ozan kl aSr iebr tHt hSbT heSiri ihih qdS lihoh׃ 
leviticus 27:33	la ibqr bin Tob lre ola imirno oam hmr imirno ohih hoa otmorto ihih qdS la igal׃ 
leviticus 27:34	alh hmzot aSr zoh ihoh at mSh al bni iSral bhr sini׃

numbers 1:3	mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba biSral tpqdo atm lzbatm ath oahrn׃

numbers 1:8	liSSkr ntnal bn zoer׃

numbers 1:35	pqdihm lmTh mnSh Snim oSlSim alp omatim׃

numbers 1:38	lbni dn toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba׃ 
numbers 1:39	pqdihm lmTh dn Snim oSSim alp oSbe maot׃

numbers 3:30	onSia bit ab lmSpHt hqhti alizpn bn ecial׃

numbers 34:13	oizo mSh at bni iSral lamr cat harz aSr ttnHlo ath bgorl aSr zoh ihoh ltt ltSet hmTot oHzi hmTh׃

numbers 34:15	Sni hmTot oHzi hmTh lqHo nHltm mebr lirdn irHo qdmh mcrHh׃ 
numbers 34:16	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
numbers 34:17	alh Smot hanSim aSr inHlo lkm at harz alecr hkhn oihoSe bn non׃ 
numbers 34:18	onSia aHd nSia aHd mmTh tqHo lnHl at harz׃ 
numbers 34:19	oalh Smot hanSim lmTh ihodh klb bn ipnh׃ 
numbers 34:20	olmTh bni Smeon Smoal bn emihod׃ 
numbers 34:21	lmTh bnimn alidd bn kslon׃ 
numbers 34:22	olmTh bni dn nSia bqi bn igli׃ 
numbers 34:23	lbni iosp lmTh bni mnSh nSia Hnial bn apd׃ 
numbers 34:24	olmTh bni aprim nSia qmoal bn SpTn׃ 
numbers 34:25	olmTh bni cboln nSia alizpn bn prnk׃ 
numbers 34:26	olmTh bni iSSkr nSia plTial bn ecn׃ 
numbers 34:27	olmTh bni aSr nSia aHihod bn Slmi׃ 
numbers 34:28	olmTh bni nptli nSia pdhal bn emihod׃ 
numbers 34:29	alh aSr zoh ihoh lnHl at bni iSral barz knen׃ 
numbers 35:1	oidbr ihoh al mSh berbt moab el irdn irHo lamr׃ 
numbers 35:2	zo at bni iSral ontno lloim mnHlt aHctm erim lSbt omgrS lerim sbibtihm ttno lloim׃ 
numbers 35:3	ohio herim lhm lSbt omgrSihm ihio lbhmtm olrkSm olkl Hitm׃ 
numbers 35:4	omgrSi herim aSr ttno lloim mqir heir oHozh alp amh sbib׃ 
numbers 35:5	omdtm mHoz leir at pat qdmh alpim bamh oat pat ngb alpim bamh oat pat im alpim bamh oat pat zpon alpim bamh oheir btok ch ihih lhm mgrSi herim׃ 
numbers 35:6	oat herim aSr ttno lloim at SS eri hmqlT aSr ttno lns Smh hrzH oelihm ttno arbeim oStim eir׃ 
numbers 35:7	kl herim aSr ttno lloim arbeim oSmnh eir athn oat mgrSihn׃ 
numbers 35:8	oherim aSr ttno maHct bni iSral mat hrb trbo omat hmeT tmeiTo aiS kpi nHlto aSr inHlo itn merio lloim׃ 
numbers 35:9	oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr׃ 
numbers 35:10	dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ki atm ebrim at hirdn arzh knen׃ 
numbers 35:11	ohqritm lkm erim eri mqlT thiinh lkm ons Smh rzH mkh npS bSggh׃ 
numbers 35:12	ohio lkm herim lmqlT mgal ola imot hrzH ed emdo lpni hedh lmSpT׃ 
numbers 35:13	oherim aSr ttno SS eri mqlT thiinh lkm׃ 
numbers 35:14	at SlS herim ttno mebr lirdn oat SlS herim ttno barz knen eri mqlT thiinh׃ 
numbers 35:15	lbni iSral olgr oltoSb btokm thiinh SS herim halh lmqlT lnos Smh kl mkh npS bSggh׃ 
numbers 35:16	oam bkli brcl hkho oimt rzH hoa mot iomt hrzH׃ 
numbers 35:17	oam babn id aSr imot bh hkho oimt rzH hoa mot iomt hrzH׃ 
numbers 35:18	ao bkli ez id aSr imot bo hkho oimt rzH hoa mot iomt hrzH׃ 
numbers 35:19	gal hdm hoa imit at hrzH bpgeo bo hoa imitno׃ 
numbers 35:20	oam bSnah ihdpno ao hSlik elio bzdih oimt׃ 
numbers 35:21	ao baibh hkho bido oimt mot iomt hmkh rzH hoa gal hdm imit at hrzH bpgeo bo׃ 
numbers 35:22	oam bpte bla aibh hdpo ao hSlik elio kl kli bla zdih׃ 
numbers 35:23	ao bkl abn aSr imot bh bla raot oipl elio oimt ohoa la aoib lo ola mbqS reto׃ 
numbers 35:24	oSpTo hedh bin hmkh obin gal hdm el hmSpTim halh׃ 
numbers 35:25	ohzilo hedh at hrzH mid gal hdm ohSibo ato hedh al eir mqlTo aSr ns Smh oiSb bh ed mot hkhn hgdl aSr mSH ato bSmn hqdS׃ 
numbers 35:26	oam iza iza hrzH at gbol eir mqlTo aSr inos Smh׃ 
numbers 35:27	omza ato gal hdm mHoz lgbol eir mqlTo orzH gal hdm at hrzH ain lo dm׃ 
numbers 35:28	ki beir mqlTo iSb ed mot hkhn hgdl oaHri mot hkhn hgdl iSob hrzH al arz aHcto׃ 
numbers 35:29	ohio alh lkm lHqt mSpT ldrtikm bkl moSbtikm׃ 
numbers 35:30	kl mkh npS lpi edim irzH at hrzH oed aHd la ienh bnpS lmot׃ 
numbers 35:31	ola tqHo kpr lnpS rzH aSr hoa rSe lmot ki mot iomt׃ 
numbers 35:32	ola tqHo kpr lnos al eir mqlTo lSob lSbt barz ed mot hkhn׃ 
numbers 35:33	ola tHnipo at harz aSr atm bh ki hdm hoa iHnip at harz olarz la ikpr ldm aSr Spk bh ki am bdm Spko׃ 
numbers 35:34	ola tTma at harz aSr atm iSbim bh aSr ani Skn btokh ki ani ihoh Skn btok bni iSral׃ 
numbers 36:1	oiqrbo raSi habot lmSpHt bni gled bn mkir bn mnSh mmSpHt bni iosp oidbro lpni mSh olpni hnSaim raSi abot lbni iSral׃ 
numbers 36:2	oiamro at adni zoh ihoh ltt at harz bnHlh bgorl lbni iSral oadni zoh bihoh ltt at nHlt zlpHd aHino lbntio׃ 
numbers 36:3	ohio laHd mbni SbTi bni iSral lnSim ongreh nHltn mnHlt abtino onosp el nHlt hmTh aSr thiinh lhm omgrl nHltno igre׃ 
numbers 36:4	oam ihih hibl lbni iSral onosph nHltn el nHlt hmTh aSr thiinh lhm omnHlt mTh abtino igre nHltn׃ 
numbers 36:5	oizo mSh at bni iSral el pi ihoh lamr kn mTh bni iosp dbrim׃ 
numbers 36:6	ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh lbnot zlpHd lamr lTob beinihm thiinh lnSim ak lmSpHt mTh abihm thiinh lnSim׃ 
numbers 36:7	ola tsb nHlh lbni iSral mmTh al mTh ki aiS bnHlt mTh abtio idbqo bni iSral׃ 
numbers 36:8	okl bt irSt nHlh mmTot bni iSral laHd mmSpHt mTh abih thih laSh lmen iirSo bni iSral aiS nHlt abtio׃ 
numbers 36:9	ola tsb nHlh mmTh lmTh aHr ki aiS bnHlto idbqo mTot bni iSral׃ 
numbers 36:10	kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo bnot zlpHd׃ 
numbers 36:11	othiinh mHlh trzh oHglh omlkh oneh bnot zlpHd lbni ddihn lnSim׃ 
numbers 36:12	mmSpHt bni mnSh bn iosp hio lnSim othi nHltn el mTh mSpHt abihn׃ 
numbers 36:13	alh hmzot ohmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh bid mSh al bni iSral berbt moab el irdn irHo׃ 
deuteronomy 1:1	alh hdbrim aSr dbr mSh al kl iSral bebr hirdn bmdbr berbh mol sop bin parn obin tpl olbn oHzrt odi chb׃ 
deuteronomy 1:2	aHd eSr iom mHrb drk hr Seir ed qdS brne׃ 
deuteronomy 1:3	oihi barbeim Snh beSti eSr HdS baHd lHdS dbr mSh al bni iSral kkl aSr zoh ihoh ato alhm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:4	aHri hkto at siHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon oat eog mlk hbSn aSr ioSb beStrt badrei׃ 
deuteronomy 1:5	bebr hirdn barz moab hoail mSh bar at htorh hcat lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 1:6	ihoh alhino dbr alino bHrb lamr rb lkm Sbt bhr hch׃ 
deuteronomy 1:7	pno oseo lkm obao hr hamri oal kl Sknio berbh bhr obSplh obngb obHop him arz hkneni ohlbnon ed hnhr hgdl nhr prt׃ 
deuteronomy 1:8	rah ntti lpnikm at harz bao orSo at harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm labrhm lizHq olieqb ltt lhm olcrem aHrihm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:9	oamr alkm bet hhoa lamr la aokl lbdi Sat atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:10	ihoh alhikm hrbh atkm ohnkm hiom kkokbi hSmim lrb׃ 
deuteronomy 1:11	ihoh alhi abotkm isp elikm kkm alp pemim oibrk atkm kaSr dbr lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:12	aikh aSa lbdi TrHkm omSakm oribkm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:13	hbo lkm anSim Hkmim onbnim oideim lSbTikm oaSimm braSikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:14	oteno ati otamro Tob hdbr aSr dbrt leSot׃ 
deuteronomy 1:15	oaqH at raSi SbTikm anSim Hkmim oideim oatn atm raSim elikm Sri alpim oSri maot oSri HmSim oSri eSrt oSTrim lSbTikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:16	oazoh at SpTikm bet hhoa lamr Sme bin aHikm oSpTtm zdq bin aiS obin aHio obin gro׃ 
deuteronomy 1:17	la tkiro pnim bmSpT kqTn kgdl tSmeon la tgoro mpni aiS ki hmSpT lalhim hoa ohdbr aSr iqSh mkm tqrbon ali oSmetio׃ 
deuteronomy 1:18	oazoh atkm bet hhoa at kl hdbrim aSr teSon׃ 
deuteronomy 1:19	onse mHrb onlk at kl hmdbr hgdol ohnora hhoa aSr raitm drk hr hamri kaSr zoh ihoh alhino atno onba ed qdS brne׃ 
deuteronomy 1:20	oamr alkm batm ed hr hamri aSr ihoh alhino ntn lno׃ 
deuteronomy 1:21	rah ntn ihoh alhik lpnik at harz elh rS kaSr dbr ihoh alhi abtik lk al tira oal tHt׃ 
deuteronomy 1:22	otqrbon ali klkm otamro nSlHh anSim lpnino oiHpro lno at harz oiSbo atno dbr at hdrk aSr nelh bh oat herim aSr nba alihn׃ 
deuteronomy 1:23	oiiTb beini hdbr oaqH mkm Snim eSr anSim aiS aHd lSbT׃ 
deuteronomy 1:24	oipno oielo hhrh oibao ed nHl aSkl oirglo ath׃ 
deuteronomy 1:25	oiqHo bidm mpri harz oiordo alino oiSbo atno dbr oiamro Tobh harz aSr ihoh alhino ntn lno׃ 
deuteronomy 1:26	ola abitm lelt otmro at pi ihoh alhikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:27	otrgno bahlikm otamro bSnat ihoh atno hoziano marz mzrim ltt atno bid hamri lhSmidno׃ 
deuteronomy 1:28	anh anHno elim aHino hmso at lbbno lamr em gdol orm mmno erim gdlt obzort bSmim ogm bni enqim raino Sm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:29	oamr alkm la terzon ola tiraon mhm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:30	ihoh alhikm hhlk lpnikm hoa ilHm lkm kkl aSr eSh atkm bmzrim leinikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:31	obmdbr aSr rait aSr nSak ihoh alhik kaSr iSa aiS at bno bkl hdrk aSr hlktm ed bakm ed hmqom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 1:32	obdbr hch ainkm maminm bihoh alhikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:33	hhlk lpnikm bdrk ltor lkm mqom lHntkm baS lilh lratkm bdrk aSr tlko bh obenn iomm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:34	oiSme ihoh at qol dbrikm oiqzp oiSbe lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 1:35	am irah aiS banSim halh hdor hre hch at harz hTobh aSr nSbeti ltt labtikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:36	colti klb bn ipnh hoa iranh olo atn at harz aSr drk bh olbnio ien aSr mla aHri ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 1:37	gm bi htanp ihoh bgllkm lamr gm ath la tba Sm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:38	ihoSe bn non hemd lpnik hoa iba Smh ato Hcq ki hoa inHlnh at iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 1:39	oTpkm aSr amrtm lbc ihih obnikm aSr la ideo hiom Tob ore hmh ibao Smh olhm atnnh ohm iirSoh׃ 
deuteronomy 1:40	oatm pno lkm oseo hmdbrh drk im sop׃ 
deuteronomy 1:41	oteno otamro ali HTano lihoh anHno nelh onlHmno kkl aSr zono ihoh alhino otHgro aiS at kli mlHmto othino lelt hhrh׃ 
deuteronomy 1:42	oiamr ihoh ali amr lhm la telo ola tlHmo ki ainni bqrbkm ola tngpo lpni aibikm׃ 
deuteronomy 1:43	oadbr alikm ola Smetm otmro at pi ihoh otcdo otelo hhrh׃

deuteronomy 2:1	onpn onse hmdbrh drk im sop kaSr dbr ihoh ali onsb at hr Seir imim rbim׃

deuteronomy 2:3	rb lkm sb at hhr hch pno lkm zpnh׃ 
deuteronomy 2:4	oat hem zo lamr atm ebrim bgbol aHikm bni eSo hiSbim bSeir oiirao mkm onSmrtm mad׃ 
deuteronomy 2:5	al ttgro bm ki la atn lkm marzm ed mdrk kp rgl ki irSh leSo ntti at hr Seir׃ 
deuteronomy 2:6	akl tSbro matm bksp oakltm ogm mim tkro matm bksp oStitm׃ 
deuteronomy 2:7	ki ihoh alhik brkk bkl meSh idk ide lktk at hmdbr hgdl hch ch arbeim Snh ihoh alhik emk la Hsrt dbr׃ 
deuteronomy 2:8	onebr mat aHino bni eSo hiSbim bSeir mdrk herbh mailt omezin gbr onpn onebr drk mdbr moab׃

deuteronomy 2:10	hamim lpnim iSbo bh em gdol orb orm kenqim׃

deuteronomy 2:12	obSeir iSbo hHrim lpnim obni eSo iirSom oiSmidom mpnihm oiSbo tHtm kaSr eSh iSral larz irSto aSr ntn ihoh lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 2:13	eth qmo oebro lkm at nHl crd onebr at nHl crd׃ 
deuteronomy 2:14	ohimim aSr hlkno mqdS brne ed aSr ebrno at nHl crd SlSim oSmnh Snh ed tm kl hdor anSi hmlHmh mqrb hmHnh kaSr nSbe ihoh lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 2:15	ogm id ihoh hith bm lhmm mqrb hmHnh ed tmm׃ 
deuteronomy 2:16	oihi kaSr tmo kl anSi hmlHmh lmot mqrb hem׃ 
deuteronomy 2:17	oidbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 2:18	ath ebr hiom at gbol moab at er׃ 
deuteronomy 2:19	oqrbt mol bni emon al tzrm oal ttgr bm ki la atn marz bni emon lk irSh ki lbni loT nttih irSh׃ 
deuteronomy 2:20	arz rpaim tHSb ap hoa rpaim iSbo bh lpnim ohemnim iqrao lhm cmcmim׃ 
deuteronomy 2:21	em gdol orb orm kenqim oiSmidm ihoh mpnihm oiirSm oiSbo tHtm׃ 
deuteronomy 2:22	kaSr eSh lbni eSo hiSbim bSeir aSr hSmid at hHri mpnihm oiirSm oiSbo tHtm ed hiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 2:23	oheoim hiSbim bHzrim ed ech kptrim hizaim mkptor hSmidm oiSbo tHtm׃ 
deuteronomy 2:24	qomo seo oebro at nHl arnn rah ntti bidk at siHn mlk HSbon hamri oat arzo hHl rS ohtgr bo mlHmh׃ 
deuteronomy 2:25	hiom hch aHl tt pHdk oiratk el pni hemim tHt kl hSmim aSr iSmeon Smek orgco oHlo mpnik׃ 
deuteronomy 2:26	oaSlH mlakim mmdbr qdmot al siHon mlk HSbon dbri Slom lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 2:27	aebrh barzk bdrk bdrk alk la asor imin oSmaol׃ 
deuteronomy 2:28	akl bksp tSbrni oaklti omim bksp ttn li oStiti rq aebrh brgli׃ 
deuteronomy 2:29	kaSr eSo li bni eSo hiSbim bSeir ohmoabim hiSbim ber ed aSr aebr at hirdn al harz aSr ihoh alhino ntn lno׃ 
deuteronomy 2:30	ola abh siHn mlk HSbon hebrno bo ki hqSh ihoh alhik at roHo oamz at lbbo lmen tto bidk kiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 2:31	oiamr ihoh ali rah hHlti tt lpnik at siHn oat arzo hHl rS lrSt at arzo׃ 
deuteronomy 2:32	oiza siHn lqratno hoa okl emo lmlHmh ihzh׃ 
deuteronomy 2:33	oitnho ihoh alhino lpnino onk ato oat bno oat kl emo׃ 
deuteronomy 2:34	onlkd at kl erio bet hhoa onHrm at kl eir mtm ohnSim ohTp la hSarno Srid׃ 
deuteronomy 2:35	rq hbhmh bccno lno oSll herim aSr lkdno׃ 
deuteronomy 2:36	merer aSr el Spt nHl arnn oheir aSr bnHl oed hgled la hith qrih aSr Sgbh mmno at hkl ntn ihoh alhino lpnino׃ 
deuteronomy 2:37	rq al arz bni emon la qrbt kl id nHl ibq oeri hhr okl aSr zoh ihoh alhino׃ 
deuteronomy 3:1	onpn onel drk hbSn oiza eog mlk hbSn lqratno hoa okl emo lmlHmh adrei׃ 
deuteronomy 3:2	oiamr ihoh ali al tira ato ki bidk ntti ato oat kl emo oat arzo oeSit lo kaSr eSit lsiHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon׃ 
deuteronomy 3:3	oitn ihoh alhino bidno gm at eog mlk hbSn oat kl emo onkho ed blti hSair lo Srid׃ 
deuteronomy 3:4	onlkd at kl erio bet hhoa la hith qrih aSr la lqHno matm SSim eir kl Hbl argb mmlkt eog bbSn׃ 
deuteronomy 3:5	kl alh erim bzrot Homh gbhh dltim obriH lbd meri hprci hrbh mad׃ 
deuteronomy 3:6	onHrm aotm kaSr eSino lsiHn mlk HSbon hHrm kl eir mtm hnSim ohTp׃ 
deuteronomy 3:7	okl hbhmh oSll herim bcono lno׃ 
deuteronomy 3:8	onqH bet hhoa at harz mid Sni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn mnHl arnn ed hr Hrmon׃ 
deuteronomy 3:9	zidnim iqrao lHrmon Srin ohamri iqrao lo Snir׃ 
deuteronomy 3:10	kl eri hmiSr okl hgled okl hbSn ed slkh oadrei eri mmlkt eog bbSn׃ 
deuteronomy 3:11	ki rq eog mlk hbSn nSar mitr hrpaim hnh erSo erS brcl hlh hoa brbt bni emon tSe amot arkh oarbe amot rHbh bamt aiS׃ 
deuteronomy 3:12	oat harz hcat irSno bet hhoa merer aSr el nHl arnn oHzi hr hgled oerio ntti lraobni olgdi׃ 
deuteronomy 3:13	oitr hgled okl hbSn mmlkt eog ntti lHzi SbT hmnSh kl Hbl hargb lkl hbSn hhoa iqra arz rpaim׃ 
deuteronomy 3:14	iair bn mnSh lqH at kl Hbl argb ed gbol hgSori ohmekti oiqra atm el Smo at hbSn Hot iair ed hiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 3:15	olmkir ntti at hgled׃ 
deuteronomy 3:16	olraobni olgdi ntti mn hgled oed nHl arnn tok hnHl ogbl oed ibq hnHl gbol bni emon׃ 
deuteronomy 3:17	oherbh ohirdn ogbl mknrt oed im herbh im hmlH tHt aSdt hpsgh mcrHh׃ 
deuteronomy 3:18	oazo atkm bet hhoa lamr ihoh alhikm ntn lkm at harz hcat lrSth Hlozim tebro lpni aHikm bni iSral kl bni Hil׃ 
deuteronomy 3:19	rq nSikm oTpkm omqnkm ideti ki mqnh rb lkm iSbo berikm aSr ntti lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 3:20	ed aSr iniH ihoh laHikm kkm oirSo gm hm at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lhm bebr hirdn oSbtm aiS lirSto aSr ntti lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 3:21	oat ihoSoe zoiti bet hhoa lamr einik hrat at kl aSr eSh ihoh alhikm lSni hmlkim halh kn ieSh ihoh lkl hmmlkot aSr ath ebr Smh׃ 
deuteronomy 3:22	la tiraom ki ihoh alhikm hoa hnlHm lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 3:23	oatHnn al ihoh bet hhoa lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 3:24	adni ihoh ath hHlot lhraot at ebdk at gdlk oat idk hHcqh aSr mi al bSmim obarz aSr ieSh kmeSik okgbortk׃ 
deuteronomy 3:25	aebrh na oarah at harz hTobh aSr bebr hirdn hhr hTob hch ohlbnon׃ 
deuteronomy 3:26	oitebr ihoh bi lmenkm ola Sme ali oiamr ihoh ali rb lk al tosp dbr ali eod bdbr hch׃ 
deuteronomy 3:27	elh raS hpsgh oSa einik imh ozpnh otimnh omcrHh orah beinik ki la tebr at hirdn hch׃ 
deuteronomy 3:28	ozo at ihoSe oHcqho oamzho ki hoa iebr lpni hem hch ohoa inHil aotm at harz aSr trah׃ 
deuteronomy 3:29	onSb bgia mol bit peor׃ 
deuteronomy 4:1	oeth iSral Sme al hHqim oal hmSpTim aSr anki mlmd atkm leSot lmen tHio obatm oirStm at harz aSr ihoh alhi abtikm ntn lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 4:2	la tspo el hdbr aSr anki mzoh atkm ola tgreo mmno lSmr at mzot ihoh alhikm aSr anki mzoh atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 4:3	einikm hrat at aSr eSh ihoh bbel peor ki kl haiS aSr hlk aHri bel peor hSmido ihoh alhik mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 4:4	oatm hdbqim bihoh alhikm Hiim klkm hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 4:5	rah lmdti atkm Hqim omSpTim kaSr zoni ihoh alhi leSot kn bqrb harz aSr atm baim Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 4:6	oSmrtm oeSitm ki hoa Hkmtkm obintkm leini hemim aSr iSmeon at kl hHqim halh oamro rq em Hkm onbon hgoi hgdol hch׃ 
deuteronomy 4:7	ki mi goi gdol aSr lo alhim qrbim alio kihoh alhino bkl qrano alio׃ 
deuteronomy 4:8	omi goi gdol aSr lo Hqim omSpTim zdiqm kkl htorh hcat aSr anki ntn lpnikm hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 4:9	rq hSmr lk oSmr npSk mad pn tSkH at hdbrim aSr rao einik opn isoro mlbbk kl imi Hiik ohodetm lbnik olbni bnik׃ 
deuteronomy 4:10	iom aSr emdt lpni ihoh alhik bHrb bamr ihoh ali hqhl li at hem oaSmem at dbri aSr ilmdon lirah ati kl himim aSr hm Hiim el hadmh oat bnihm ilmdon׃ 
deuteronomy 4:11	otqrbon otemdon tHt hhr ohhr ber baS ed lb hSmim HSk enn oerpl׃ 
deuteronomy 4:12	oidbr ihoh alikm mtok haS qol dbrim atm Smeim otmonh ainkm raim colti qol׃ 
deuteronomy 4:13	oigd lkm at brito aSr zoh atkm leSot eSrt hdbrim oiktbm el Sni lHot abnim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:14	oati zoh ihoh bet hhoa llmd atkm Hqim omSpTim leStkm atm barz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 4:15	onSmrtm mad lnpStikm ki la raitm kl tmonh biom dbr ihoh alikm bHrb mtok haS׃ 
deuteronomy 4:16	pn tSHton oeSitm lkm psl tmont kl sml tbnit ckr ao nqbh׃ 
deuteronomy 4:17	tbnit kl bhmh aSr barz tbnit kl zpor knp aSr teop bSmim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:18	tbnit kl rmS badmh tbnit kl dgh aSr bmim mtHt larz׃ 
deuteronomy 4:19	opn tSa einik hSmimh orait at hSmS oat hirH oat hkokbim kl zba hSmim ondHt ohStHoit lhm oebdtm aSr Hlq ihoh alhik atm lkl hemim tHt kl hSmim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:20	oatkm lqH ihoh oioza atkm mkor hbrcl mmzrim lhiot lo lem nHlh kiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 4:21	oihoh htanp bi el dbrikm oiSbe lblti ebri at hirdn olblti ba al harz hTobh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh׃ 
deuteronomy 4:22	ki anki mt barz hcat ainni ebr at hirdn oatm ebrim oirStm at harz hTobh hcat׃ 
deuteronomy 4:23	hSmro lkm pn tSkHo at brit ihoh alhikm aSr krt emkm oeSitm lkm psl tmont kl aSr zok ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 4:24	ki ihoh alhik aS aklh hoa al qna׃ 
deuteronomy 4:25	ki tolid bnim obni bnim onoSntm barz ohSHtm oeSitm psl tmont kl oeSitm hre beini ihoh alhik lhkeiso׃ 
deuteronomy 4:26	heidti bkm hiom at hSmim oat harz ki abd tabdon mhr mel harz aSr atm ebrim at hirdn Smh lrSth la tarikn imim elih ki hSmd tSmdon׃ 
deuteronomy 4:27	ohpiz ihoh atkm bemim onSartm mti mspr bgoim aSr inhg ihoh atkm Smh׃ 
deuteronomy 4:28	oebdtm Sm alhim meSh idi adm ez oabn aSr la iraon ola iSmeon ola iaklon ola iriHn׃ 
deuteronomy 4:29	obqStm mSm at ihoh alhik omzat ki tdrSno bkl lbbk obkl npSk׃ 
deuteronomy 4:30	bzr lk omzaok kl hdbrim halh baHrit himim oSbt ed ihoh alhik oSmet bqlo׃ 
deuteronomy 4:31	ki al rHom ihoh alhik la irpk ola iSHitk ola iSkH at brit abtik aSr nSbe lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 4:32	ki Sal na limim raSnim aSr hio lpnik lmn hiom aSr bra alhim adm el harz olmqzh hSmim oed qzh hSmim hnhih kdbr hgdol hch ao hnSme kmho׃ 
deuteronomy 4:33	hSme em qol alhim mdbr mtok haS kaSr Smet ath oiHi׃ 
deuteronomy 4:34	ao hnsh alhim lboa lqHt lo goi mqrb goi bmst batt obmoptim obmlHmh obid Hcqh obcroe nToih obmoraim gdlim kkl aSr eSh lkm ihoh alhikm bmzrim leinik׃ 
deuteronomy 4:35	ath hrat ldet ki ihoh hoa halhim ain eod mlbdo׃ 
deuteronomy 4:36	mn hSmim hSmiek at qlo lisrk oel harz hrak at aSo hgdolh odbrio Smet mtok haS׃ 
deuteronomy 4:37	otHt ki ahb at abtik oibHr bcreo aHrio oiozak bpnio bkHo hgdl mmzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:38	lhoriS goim gdlim oezmim mmk mpnik lhbiak ltt lk at arzm nHlh kiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 4:39	oidet hiom ohSbt al lbbk ki ihoh hoa halhim bSmim mmel oel harz mtHt ain eod׃ 
deuteronomy 4:40	oSmrt at Hqio oat mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom aSr iiTb lk olbnik aHrik olmen tarik imim el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk kl himim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:41	ac ibdil mSh SlS erim bebr hirdn mcrHh SmS׃ 
deuteronomy 4:42	lns Smh rozH aSr irzH at reho bbli det ohoa la Sna lo mtmol SlSom ons al aHt mn herim hal oHi׃ 
deuteronomy 4:43	at bzr bmdbr barz hmiSr lraobni oat ramt bgled lgdi oat goln bbSn lmnSi׃ 
deuteronomy 4:44	ocat htorh aSr Sm mSh lpni bni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 4:45	alh hedt ohHqim ohmSpTim aSr dbr mSh al bni iSral bzatm mmzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:46	bebr hirdn bgia mol bit peor barz siHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon aSr hkh mSh obni iSral bzatm mmzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 4:47	oiirSo at arzo oat arz eog mlk hbSn Sni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn mcrH SmS׃ 
deuteronomy 4:48	merer aSr el Spt nHl arnn oed hr Sian hoa Hrmon׃ 
deuteronomy 4:49	okl herbh ebr hirdn mcrHh oed im herbh tHt aSdt hpsgh׃ 
deuteronomy 5:1	oiqra mSh al kl iSral oiamr alhm Sme iSral at hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr anki dbr bacnikm hiom olmdtm atm oSmrtm leStm׃ 
deuteronomy 5:2	ihoh alhino krt emno brit bHrb׃ 
deuteronomy 5:3	la at abtino krt ihoh at hbrit hcat ki atno anHno alh ph hiom klno Hiim׃ 
deuteronomy 5:4	pnim bpnim dbr ihoh emkm bhr mtok haS׃ 
deuteronomy 5:5	anki emd bin ihoh obinikm bet hhoa lhgid lkm at dbr ihoh ki iratm mpni haS ola elitm bhr lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 5:6	anki ihoh alhik aSr hozatik marz mzrim mbit ebdim׃ 
deuteronomy 5:7	la ihih lk alhim aHrim el pni׃ 
deuteronomy 5:8	la teSh lk psl kl tmonh aSr bSmim mmel oaSr barz mtHt oaSr bmim mtHt larz׃ 
deuteronomy 5:9	la tStHoh lhm ola tebdm ki anki ihoh alhik al qna pqd eon abot el bnim oel SlSim oel rbeim lSnai׃ 
deuteronomy 5:10	oeSh Hsd lalpim lahbi olSmri mzoto׃ 
deuteronomy 5:11	la tSa at Sm ihoh alhik lSoa ki la inqh ihoh at aSr iSa at Smo lSoa׃ 
deuteronomy 5:12	Smor at iom hSbt lqdSo kaSr zok ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 5:13	SSt imim tebd oeSit kl mlaktk׃ 
deuteronomy 5:14	oiom hSbiei Sbt lihoh alhik la teSh kl mlakh ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk oSork oHmrk okl bhmtk ogrk aSr bSerik lmen inoH ebdk oamtk kmok׃ 
deuteronomy 5:15	ockrt ki ebd hiit barz mzrim oizak ihoh alhik mSm bid Hcqh obcre nToih el kn zok ihoh alhik leSot at iom hSbt׃ 
deuteronomy 5:16	kbd at abik oat amk kaSr zok ihoh alhik lmen iarikn imik olmen iiTb lk el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 5:17	la trzH׃ 
deuteronomy 5:18	ola tnap׃ 
deuteronomy 5:19	ola tgnb׃ 
deuteronomy 5:20	ola tenh brek ed Soa׃ 
deuteronomy 5:21	ola tHmd aSt rek ola ttaoh bit rek Sdho oebdo oamto Soro oHmro okl aSr lrek׃ 
deuteronomy 5:22	at hdbrim halh dbr ihoh al kl qhlkm bhr mtok haS henn oherpl qol gdol ola isp oiktbm el Sni lHt abnim oitnm ali׃ 
deuteronomy 5:23	oihi kSmekm at hqol mtok hHSk ohhr ber baS otqrbon ali kl raSi SbTikm ocqnikm׃ 
deuteronomy 5:24	otamro hn hrano ihoh alhino at kbdo oat gdlo oat qlo Smeno mtok haS hiom hch raino ki idbr alhim at hadm oHi׃ 
deuteronomy 5:25	oeth lmh nmot ki taklno haS hgdlh hcat am ispim anHno lSme at qol ihoh alhino eod omtno׃ 
deuteronomy 5:26	ki mi kl bSr aSr Sme qol alhim Hiim mdbr mtok haS kmno oiHi׃ 
deuteronomy 5:27	qrb ath oSme at kl aSr iamr ihoh alhino oat tdbr alino at kl aSr idbr ihoh alhino alik oSmeno oeSino׃ 
deuteronomy 5:28	oiSme ihoh at qol dbrikm bdbrkm ali oiamr ihoh ali Smeti at qol dbri hem hch aSr dbro alik hiTibo kl aSr dbro׃ 
deuteronomy 5:29	mi itn ohih lbbm ch lhm lirah ati olSmr at kl mzoti kl himim lmen iiTb lhm olbnihm lelm׃ 
deuteronomy 5:30	lk amr lhm Sobo lkm lahlikm׃

deuteronomy 5:32	oSmrtm leSot kaSr zoh ihoh alhikm atkm la tsro imin oSmal׃

deuteronomy 6:1	ocat hmzoh hHqim ohmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh alhikm llmd atkm leSot barz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 6:2	lmen tira at ihoh alhik lSmr at kl Hqtio omzotio aSr anki mzok ath obnk obn bnk kl imi Hiik olmen iarkn imik׃ 
deuteronomy 6:3	oSmet iSral oSmrt leSot aSr iiTb lk oaSr trbon mad kaSr dbr ihoh alhi abtik lk arz cbt Hlb odbS׃ 
deuteronomy 6:4	Sme iSral ihoh alhino ihoh aHd׃ 
deuteronomy 6:5	oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl madk׃ 
deuteronomy 6:6	ohio hdbrim halh aSr anki mzok hiom el lbbk׃ 
deuteronomy 6:7	oSnntm lbnik odbrt bm bSbtk bbitk oblktk bdrk obSkbk obqomk׃ 
deuteronomy 6:8	oqSrtm laot el idk ohio lTTpt bin einik׃ 
deuteronomy 6:9	oktbtm el mcoct bitk obSerik׃ 
deuteronomy 6:10	ohih ki ibiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr nSbe labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb ltt lk erim gdlt oTbt aSr la bnit׃ 
deuteronomy 6:11	obtim mlaim kl Tob aSr la mlat obrt Hzobim aSr la Hzbt krmim ocitim aSr la nTet oaklt oSbet׃ 
deuteronomy 6:12	hSmr lk pn tSkH at ihoh aSr hoziak marz mzrim mbit ebdim׃ 
deuteronomy 6:13	at ihoh alhik tira oato tebd obSmo tSbe׃ 
deuteronomy 6:14	la tlkon aHri alhim aHrim malhi hemim aSr sbibotikm׃ 
deuteronomy 6:15	ki al qna ihoh alhik bqrbk pn iHrh ap ihoh alhik bk ohSmidk mel pni hadmh׃ 
deuteronomy 6:16	la tnso at ihoh alhikm kaSr nsitm bmsh׃ 
deuteronomy 6:17	Smor tSmron at mzot ihoh alhikm oedtio oHqio aSr zok׃ 
deuteronomy 6:18	oeSit hiSr ohTob beini ihoh lmen iiTb lk obat oirSt at harz hTbh aSr nSbe ihoh labtik׃ 
deuteronomy 6:19	lhdp at kl aibik mpnik kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 6:20	ki iSalk bnk mHr lamr mh hedt ohHqim ohmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh alhino atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 6:21	oamrt lbnk ebdim hiino lpreh bmzrim oioziano ihoh mmzrim bid Hcqh׃ 
deuteronomy 6:22	oitn ihoh aott omptim gdlim oreim bmzrim bpreh obkl bito leinino׃ 
deuteronomy 6:23	oaotno hozia mSm lmen hbia atno ltt lno at harz aSr nSbe labtino׃

deuteronomy 7:1	ki ibiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth onSl goim rbim mpnik hHti ohgrgSi ohamri ohkneni ohprci ohHoi ohibosi Sbeh goim rbim oezomim mmk׃ 
deuteronomy 7:2	ontnm ihoh alhik lpnik ohkitm hHrm tHrim atm la tkrt lhm brit ola tHnm׃ 
deuteronomy 7:3	ola ttHtn bm btk la ttn lbno obto la tqH lbnk׃ 
deuteronomy 7:4	ki isir at bnk maHri oebdo alhim aHrim oHrh ap ihoh bkm ohSmidk mhr׃ 
deuteronomy 7:5	ki am kh teSo lhm mcbHtihm ttzo omzbtm tSbro oaSirhm tgdeon opsilihm tSrpon baS׃ 
deuteronomy 7:6	ki em qdoS ath lihoh alhik bk bHr ihoh alhik lhiot lo lem sglh mkl hemim aSr el pni hadmh׃

deuteronomy 7:10	omSlm lSnaio al pnio lhabido la iaHr lSnao al pnio iSlm lo׃

deuteronomy 7:13	oahbk obrkk ohrbk obrk pri bTnk opri admtk dgnk otirSk oizhrk Sgr alpik oeStrt zank el hadmh aSr nSbe labtik ltt lk׃ 
deuteronomy 7:14	brok thih mkl hemim la ihih bk eqr oeqrh obbhmtk׃ 
deuteronomy 7:15	ohsir ihoh mmk kl Hli okl mdoi mzrim hreim aSr idet la iSimm bk ontnm bkl Snaik׃ 
deuteronomy 7:16	oaklt at kl hemim aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk la tHs eink elihm ola tebd at alhihm ki moqS hoa lk׃ 
deuteronomy 7:17	ki tamr blbbk rbim hgoim halh mmni aikh aokl lhoriSm׃ 
deuteronomy 7:18	la tira mhm ckr tckr at aSr eSh ihoh alhik lpreh olkl mzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 7:19	hmst hgdlt aSr rao einik ohatt ohmptim ohid hHcqh ohcre hnToih aSr hozak ihoh alhik kn ieSh ihoh alhik lkl hemim aSr ath ira mpnihm׃ 
deuteronomy 7:20	ogm at hzreh iSlH ihoh alhik bm ed abd hnSarim ohnstrim mpnik׃ 
deuteronomy 7:21	la terz mpnihm ki ihoh alhik bqrbk al gdol onora׃ 
deuteronomy 7:22	onSl ihoh alhik at hgoim hal mpnik meT meT la tokl kltm mhr pn trbh elik Hit hSdh׃ 
deuteronomy 7:23	ontnm ihoh alhik lpnik ohmm mhomh gdlh ed hSmdm׃ 
deuteronomy 7:24	ontn mlkihm bidk ohabdt at Smm mtHt hSmim la itizb aiS bpnik ed hSmdk atm׃ 
deuteronomy 7:25	psili alhihm tSrpon baS la tHmd ksp ochb elihm olqHt lk pn toqS bo ki toebt ihoh alhik hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 7:26	ola tbia toebh al bitk ohiit Hrm kmho Sqz tSqzno oteb ttebno ki Hrm hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 8:1	kl hmzoh aSr anki mzok hiom tSmron leSot lmen tHion orbitm obatm oirStm at harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm׃ 
deuteronomy 8:2	ockrt at kl hdrk aSr hlikk ihoh alhik ch arbeim Snh bmdbr lmen entk lnstk ldet at aSr blbbk htSmr mzoto am la׃ 
deuteronomy 8:3	oienk oirebk oiaklk at hmn aSr la idet ola ideon abtik lmen hodek ki la el hlHm lbdo iHih hadm ki el kl moza pi ihoh iHih hadm׃ 
deuteronomy 8:4	Smltk la blth melik orglk la bzqh ch arbeim Snh׃ 
deuteronomy 8:5	oidet em lbbk ki kaSr iisr aiS at bno ihoh alhik misrk׃ 
deuteronomy 8:6	oSmrt at mzot ihoh alhik llkt bdrkio olirah ato׃ 
deuteronomy 8:7	ki ihoh alhik mbiak al arz Tobh arz nHli mim eint othmt izaim bbqeh obhr׃ 
deuteronomy 8:8	arz HTh oSerh ogpn otanh ormon arz cit Smn odbS׃ 
deuteronomy 8:9	arz aSr la bmsknt takl bh lHm la tHsr kl bh arz aSr abnih brcl omhrrih tHzb nHSt׃ 
deuteronomy 8:10	oaklt oSbet obrkt at ihoh alhik el harz hTbh aSr ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 8:11	hSmr lk pn tSkH at ihoh alhik lblti Smr mzotio omSpTio oHqtio aSr anki mzok hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 8:12	pn takl oSbet obtim Tobim tbnh oiSbt׃ 
deuteronomy 8:13	obqrk ozank irbin oksp ochb irbh lk okl aSr lk irbh׃

deuteronomy 8:15	hmolikk bmdbr hgdl ohnora nHS Srp oeqrb ozmaon aSr ain mim hmozia lk mim mzor hHlmiS׃

deuteronomy 8:17	oamrt blbbk kHi oezm idi eSh li at hHil hch׃ 
deuteronomy 8:18	ockrt at ihoh alhik ki hoa hntn lk kH leSot Hil lmen hqim at brito aSr nSbe labtik kiom hch׃

deuteronomy 9:2	em gdol orm bni enqim aSr ath idet oath Smet mi itizb lpni bni enq׃ 
deuteronomy 9:3	oidet hiom ki ihoh alhik hoa hebr lpnik aS aklh hoa iSmidm ohoa ikniem lpnik ohorStm ohabdtm mhr kaSr dbr ihoh lk׃ 
deuteronomy 9:4	al tamr blbbk bhdp ihoh alhik atm mlpnik lamr bzdqti hbiani ihoh lrSt at harz hcat obrSet hgoim halh ihoh moriSm mpnik׃ 
deuteronomy 9:5	la bzdqtk obiSr lbbk ath ba lrSt at arzm ki brSet hgoim halh ihoh alhik moriSm mpnik olmen hqim at hdbr aSr nSbe ihoh labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb׃ 
deuteronomy 9:6	oidet ki la bzdqtk ihoh alhik ntn lk at harz hTobh hcat lrSth ki em qSh erp ath׃ 
deuteronomy 9:7	ckr al tSkH at aSr hqzpt at ihoh alhik bmdbr lmn hiom aSr izat marz mzrim ed bakm ed hmqom hch mmrim hiitm em ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 9:8	obHrb hqzptm at ihoh oitanp ihoh bkm lhSmid atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 9:9	belti hhrh lqHt loHt habnim loHt hbrit aSr krt ihoh emkm oaSb bhr arbeim iom oarbeim lilh lHm la aklti omim la Stiti׃ 
deuteronomy 9:10	oitn ihoh ali at Sni loHt habnim ktbim bazbe alhim oelihm kkl hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh emkm bhr mtok haS biom hqhl׃ 
deuteronomy 9:11	oihi mqz arbeim iom oarbeim lilh ntn ihoh ali at Sni lHt habnim lHot hbrit׃ 
deuteronomy 9:12	oiamr ihoh ali qom rd mhr mch ki SHt emk aSr hozat mmzrim sro mhr mn hdrk aSr zoitm eSo lhm mskh׃ 
deuteronomy 9:13	oiamr ihoh ali lamr raiti at hem hch ohnh em qSh erp hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 9:14	hrp mmni oaSmidm oamHh at Smm mtHt hSmim oaeSh aotk lgoi ezom orb mmno׃ 
deuteronomy 9:15	oapn oard mn hhr ohhr ber baS oSni lHt hbrit el Sti idi׃ 
deuteronomy 9:16	oara ohnh HTatm lihoh alhikm eSitm lkm egl mskh srtm mhr mn hdrk aSr zoh ihoh atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 9:17	oatpS bSni hlHt oaSlkm mel Sti idi oaSbrm leinikm׃ 
deuteronomy 9:18	oatnpl lpni ihoh kraSnh arbeim iom oarbeim lilh lHm la aklti omim la Stiti el kl HTatkm aSr HTatm leSot hre beini ihoh lhkeiso׃ 
deuteronomy 9:19	ki igrti mpni hap ohHmh aSr qzp ihoh elikm lhSmid atkm oiSme ihoh ali gm bpem hhoa׃ 
deuteronomy 9:20	obahrn htanp ihoh mad lhSmido oatpll gm bed ahrn bet hhoa׃ 
deuteronomy 9:21	oat HTatkm aSr eSitm at hegl lqHti oaSrp ato baS oakt ato THon hiTb ed aSr dq lepr oaSlk at epro al hnHl hird mn hhr׃ 
deuteronomy 9:22	obtberh obmsh obqbrt htaoh mqzpim hiitm at ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 9:23	obSlH ihoh atkm mqdS brne lamr elo orSo at harz aSr ntti lkm otmro at pi ihoh alhikm ola hamntm lo ola Smetm bqlo׃ 
deuteronomy 9:24	mmrim hiitm em ihoh miom deti atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 9:25	oatnpl lpni ihoh at arbeim hiom oat arbeim hlilh aSr htnplti ki amr ihoh lhSmid atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 9:26	oatpll al ihoh oamr adni ihoh al tSHt emk onHltk aSr pdit bgdlk aSr hozat mmzrim bid Hcqh׃ 
deuteronomy 9:27	ckr lebdik labrhm lizHq olieqb al tpn al qSi hem hch oal rSeo oal HTato׃ 
deuteronomy 9:28	pn iamro harz aSr hozatno mSm mbli iklt ihoh lhbiam al harz aSr dbr lhm omSnato aotm hoziam lhmtm bmdbr׃ 
deuteronomy 9:29	ohm emk onHltk aSr hozat bkHk hgdl obcrek hnToih׃ 
deuteronomy 10:1	bet hhoa amr ihoh ali psl lk Sni loHt abnim kraSnim oelh ali hhrh oeSit lk aron ez׃ 
deuteronomy 10:2	oaktb el hlHt at hdbrim aSr hio el hlHt hraSnim aSr Sbrt oSmtm baron׃ 
deuteronomy 10:3	oaeS aron ezi STim oapsl Sni lHt abnim kraSnim oael hhrh oSni hlHt bidi׃ 
deuteronomy 10:4	oiktb el hlHt kmktb hraSon at eSrt hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh alikm bhr mtok haS biom hqhl oitnm ihoh ali׃ 
deuteronomy 10:5	oapn oard mn hhr oaSm at hlHt baron aSr eSiti oihio Sm kaSr zoni ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 10:6	obni iSral nseo mbart bni ieqn mosrh Sm mt ahrn oiqbr Sm oikhn alecr bno tHtio׃ 
deuteronomy 10:7	mSm nseo hgdgdh omn hgdgdh iTbth arz nHli mim׃ 
deuteronomy 10:8	bet hhoa hbdil ihoh at SbT hloi lSat at aron brit ihoh lemd lpni ihoh lSrto olbrk bSmo ed hiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 10:9	el kn la hih lloi Hlq onHlh em aHio ihoh hoa nHlto kaSr dbr ihoh alhik lo׃ 
deuteronomy 10:10	oanki emdti bhr kimim hraSnim arbeim iom oarbeim lilh oiSme ihoh ali gm bpem hhoa la abh ihoh hSHitk׃ 
deuteronomy 10:11	oiamr ihoh ali qom lk lmse lpni hem oibao oirSo at harz aSr nSbeti labtm ltt lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 10:12	oeth iSral mh ihoh alhik Sal memk ki am lirah at ihoh alhik llkt bkl drkio olahbh ato olebd at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk׃ 
deuteronomy 10:13	lSmr at mzot ihoh oat Hqtio aSr anki mzok hiom lTob lk׃ 
deuteronomy 10:14	hn lihoh alhik hSmim oSmi hSmim harz okl aSr bh׃ 
deuteronomy 10:15	rq babtik HSq ihoh lahbh aotm oibHr bcrem aHrihm bkm mkl hemim kiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 10:16	omltm at erlt lbbkm oerpkm la tqSo eod׃ 
deuteronomy 10:17	ki ihoh alhikm hoa alhi halhim oadni hadnim hal hgdl hgbr ohnora aSr la iSa pnim ola iqH SHd׃ 
deuteronomy 10:18	eSh mSpT itom oalmnh oahb gr ltt lo lHm oSmlh׃ 
deuteronomy 10:19	oahbtm at hgr ki grim hiitm barz mzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 10:20	at ihoh alhik tira ato tebd obo tdbq obSmo tSbe׃ 
deuteronomy 10:21	hoa thltk ohoa alhik aSr eSh atk at hgdlt oat hnorat halh aSr rao einik׃ 
deuteronomy 10:22	bSbeim npS irdo abtik mzrimh oeth Smk ihoh alhik kkokbi hSmim lrb׃ 
deuteronomy 11:1	oahbt at ihoh alhik oSmrt mSmrto oHqtio omSpTio omzotio kl himim׃ 
deuteronomy 11:2	oidetm hiom ki la at bnikm aSr la ideo oaSr la rao at mosr ihoh alhikm at gdlo at ido hHcqh ocreo hnToih׃ 
deuteronomy 11:3	oat attio oat meSio aSr eSh btok mzrim lpreh mlk mzrim olkl arzo׃ 
deuteronomy 11:4	oaSr eSh lHil mzrim lsosio olrkbo aSr hzip at mi im sop el pnihm brdpm aHrikm oiabdm ihoh ed hiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 11:5	oaSr eSh lkm bmdbr ed bakm ed hmqom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 11:6	oaSr eSh ldtn olabirm bni aliab bn raobn aSr pzth harz at pih otblem oat btihm oat ahlihm oat kl hiqom aSr brglihm bqrb kl iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 11:7	ki einikm hrat at kl meSh ihoh hgdl aSr eSh׃ 
deuteronomy 11:8	oSmrtm at kl hmzoh aSr anki mzok hiom lmen tHcqo obatm oirStm at harz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 11:9	olmen tariko imim el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm ltt lhm olcrem arz cbt Hlb odbS׃ 
deuteronomy 11:10	ki harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth la karz mzrim hoa aSr izatm mSm aSr tcre at crek ohSqit brglk kgn hirq׃ 
deuteronomy 11:11	oharz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth arz hrim obqet lmTr hSmim tSth mim׃ 
deuteronomy 11:12	arz aSr ihoh alhik drS ath tmid eini ihoh alhik bh mrSit hSnh oed aHrit Snh׃ 
deuteronomy 11:13	ohih am Sme tSmeo al mzoti aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom lahbh at ihoh alhikm olebdo bkl lbbkm obkl npSkm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:14	ontti mTr arzkm beto iorh omlqoS oaspt dgnk otirSk oizhrk׃ 
deuteronomy 11:15	ontti eSb bSdk lbhmtk oaklt oSbet׃ 
deuteronomy 11:16	hSmro lkm pn ipth lbbkm osrtm oebdtm alhim aHrim ohStHoitm lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:17	oHrh ap ihoh bkm oezr at hSmim ola ihih mTr ohadmh la ttn at ibolh oabdtm mhrh mel harz hTbh aSr ihoh ntn lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:18	oSmtm at dbri alh el lbbkm oel npSkm oqSrtm atm laot el idkm ohio lToTpt bin einikm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:19	olmdtm atm at bnikm ldbr bm bSbtk bbitk oblktk bdrk obSkbk obqomk׃ 
deuteronomy 11:20	oktbtm el mcocot bitk obSerik׃ 
deuteronomy 11:21	lmen irbo imikm oimi bnikm el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm ltt lhm kimi hSmim el harz׃ 
deuteronomy 11:22	ki am Smr tSmron at kl hmzoh hcat aSr anki mzoh atkm leSth lahbh at ihoh alhikm llkt bkl drkio oldbqh bo׃ 
deuteronomy 11:23	ohoriS ihoh at kl hgoim halh mlpnikm oirStm goim gdlim oezmim mkm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:24	kl hmqom aSr tdrk kp rglkm bo lkm ihih mn hmdbr ohlbnon mn hnhr nhr prt oed him haHron ihih gblkm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:25	la itizb aiS bpnikm pHdkm omorakm itn ihoh alhikm el pni kl harz aSr tdrko bh kaSr dbr lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:26	rah anki ntn lpnikm hiom brkh oqllh׃ 
deuteronomy 11:27	at hbrkh aSr tSmeo al mzot ihoh alhikm aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 11:28	ohqllh am la tSmeo al mzot ihoh alhikm osrtm mn hdrk aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom llkt aHri alhim aHrim aSr la idetm׃ 
deuteronomy 11:29	ohih ki ibiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth ontth at hbrkh el hr grcim oat hqllh el hr eibl׃ 
deuteronomy 11:30	hla hmh bebr hirdn aHri drk mboa hSmS barz hkneni hiSb berbh mol hglgl azl aloni mrh׃
