deuteronomy 12:1	alh hHqim ohmSpTim aSr tSmron leSot barz aSr ntn ihoh alhi abtik lk lrSth kl himim aSr atm Hiim el hadmh׃ 
deuteronomy 12:2	abd tabdon at kl hmqmot aSr ebdo Sm hgoim aSr atm irSim atm at alhihm el hhrim hrmim oel hgbeot otHt kl ez renn׃ 
deuteronomy 12:3	ontztm at mcbHtm oSbrtm at mzbtm oaSrihm tSrpon baS opsili alhihm tgdeon oabdtm at Smm mn hmqom hhoa׃ 
deuteronomy 12:4	la teSon kn lihoh alhikm׃ 
deuteronomy 12:5	ki am al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhikm mkl SbTikm lSom at Smo Sm lSkno tdrSo obat Smh׃ 
deuteronomy 12:6	ohbatm Smh eltikm ocbHikm oat meSrtikm oat tromt idkm ondrikm ondbtikm obkrt bqrkm ozankm׃ 
deuteronomy 12:7	oakltm Sm lpni ihoh alhikm oSmHtm bkl mSlH idkm atm obtikm aSr brkk ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 12:8	la teSon kkl aSr anHno eSim ph hiom aiS kl hiSr beinio׃ 
deuteronomy 12:9	ki la batm ed eth al hmnoHh oal hnHlh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 12:10	oebrtm at hirdn oiSbtm barz aSr ihoh alhikm mnHil atkm ohniH lkm mkl aibikm msbib oiSbtm bTH׃ 
deuteronomy 12:11	ohih hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhikm bo lSkn Smo Sm Smh tbiao at kl aSr anki mzoh atkm eoltikm ocbHikm meSrtikm otrmt idkm okl mbHr ndrikm aSr tdro lihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 12:12	oSmHtm lpni ihoh alhikm atm obnikm obntikm oebdikm oamhtikm ohloi aSr bSerikm ki ain lo Hlq onHlh atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 12:13	hSmr lk pn telh eltik bkl mqom aSr trah׃ 
deuteronomy 12:14	ki am bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh baHd SbTik Sm telh eltik oSm teSh kl aSr anki mzok׃ 
deuteronomy 12:15	rq bkl aot npSk tcbH oaklt bSr kbrkt ihoh alhik aSr ntn lk bkl Serik hTma ohThor iaklno kzbi okail׃ 
deuteronomy 12:16	rq hdm la taklo el harz tSpkno kmim׃ 
deuteronomy 12:17	la tokl lakl bSerik meSr dgnk otirSk oizhrk obkrt bqrk ozank okl ndrik aSr tdr ondbtik otromt idk׃ 
deuteronomy 12:18	ki am lpni ihoh alhik taklno bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk ohloi aSr bSerik oSmHt lpni ihoh alhik bkl mSlH idk׃ 
deuteronomy 12:19	hSmr lk pn tecb at hloi kl imik el admtk׃ 
deuteronomy 12:20	ki irHib ihoh alhik at gbolk kaSr dbr lk oamrt aklh bSr ki taoh npSk lakl bSr bkl aot npSk takl bSr׃ 
deuteronomy 12:21	ki irHq mmk hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSom Smo Sm ocbHt mbqrk omzank aSr ntn ihoh lk kaSr zoitk oaklt bSerik bkl aot npSk׃ 
deuteronomy 12:22	ak kaSr iakl at hzbi oat hail kn taklno hTma ohThor iHdo iaklno׃ 
deuteronomy 12:23	rq Hcq lblti akl hdm ki hdm hoa hnpS ola takl hnpS em hbSr׃ 
deuteronomy 12:24	la taklno el harz tSpkno kmim׃ 
deuteronomy 12:25	la taklno lmen iiTb lk olbnik aHrik ki teSh hiSr beini ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 12:26	rq qdSik aSr ihio lk ondrik tSa obat al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 12:27	oeSit eltik hbSr ohdm el mcbH ihoh alhik odm cbHik iSpk el mcbH ihoh alhik ohbSr takl׃ 
deuteronomy 12:28	Smr oSmet at kl hdbrim halh aSr anki mzok lmen iiTb lk olbnik aHrik ed eolm ki teSh hTob ohiSr beini ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 12:29	ki ikrit ihoh alhik at hgoim aSr ath ba Smh lrSt aotm mpnik oirSt atm oiSbt barzm׃ 
deuteronomy 12:30	hSmr lk pn tnqS aHrihm aHri hSmdm mpnik opn tdrS lalhihm lamr aikh iebdo hgoim halh at alhihm oaeSh kn gm ani׃ 
deuteronomy 12:31	la teSh kn lihoh alhik ki kl toebt ihoh aSr Sna eSo lalhihm ki gm at bnihm oat bntihm iSrpo baS lalhihm׃ 
deuteronomy 12:32	at kl hdbr aSr anki mzoh atkm ato tSmro leSot la tsp elio ola tgre mmno׃ 
deuteronomy 13:1	ki iqom bqrbk nbia ao Hlm Hlom ontn alik aot ao mopt׃ 
deuteronomy 13:2	oba haot ohmopt aSr dbr alik lamr nlkh aHri alhim aHrim aSr la idetm onebdm׃ 
deuteronomy 13:3	la tSme al dbri hnbia hhoa ao al Holm hHlom hhoa ki mnsh ihoh alhikm atkm ldet hiSkm ahbim at ihoh alhikm bkl lbbkm obkl npSkm׃ 
deuteronomy 13:4	aHri ihoh alhikm tlko oato tirao oat mzotio tSmro obqlo tSmeo oato tebdo obo tdbqon׃ 
deuteronomy 13:5	ohnbia hhoa ao Hlm hHlom hhoa iomt ki dbr srh el ihoh alhikm hmozia atkm marz mzrim ohpdk mbit ebdim lhdiHk mn hdrk aSr zok ihoh alhik llkt bh obert hre mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 13:6	ki isitk aHik bn amk ao bnk ao btk ao aSt Hiqk ao rek aSr knpSk bstr lamr nlkh onebdh alhim aHrim aSr la idet ath oabtik׃ 
deuteronomy 13:7	malhi hemim aSr sbibtikm hqrbim alik ao hrHqim mmk mqzh harz oed qzh harz׃ 
deuteronomy 13:8	la tabh lo ola tSme alio ola tHos eink elio ola tHml ola tksh elio׃ 
deuteronomy 13:9	ki hrg thrgno idk thih bo braSonh lhmito oid kl hem baHrnh׃ 
deuteronomy 13:10	osqlto babnim omt ki bqS lhdiHk mel ihoh alhik hmoziak marz mzrim mbit ebdim׃ 
deuteronomy 13:11	okl iSral iSmeo oiraon ola iospo leSot kdbr hre hch bqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 13:12	ki tSme baHt erik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lSbt Sm lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 13:13	izao anSim bni bliel mqrbk oidiHo at iSbi eirm lamr nlkh onebdh alhim aHrim aSr la idetm׃ 
deuteronomy 13:14	odrSt oHqrt oSalt hiTb ohnh amt nkon hdbr neSth htoebh hcat bqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 13:15	hkh tkh at iSbi heir hhoa lpi Hrb hHrm ath oat kl aSr bh oat bhmth lpi Hrb׃ 
deuteronomy 13:16	oat kl Sllh tqbz al tok rHbh oSrpt baS at heir oat kl Sllh klil lihoh alhik ohith tl eolm la tbnh eod׃ 
deuteronomy 13:17	ola idbq bidk maomh mn hHrm lmen iSob ihoh mHron apo ontn lk rHmim orHmk ohrbk kaSr nSbe labtik׃ 
deuteronomy 13:18	ki tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr at kl mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom leSot hiSr beini ihoh alhik׃

deuteronomy 14:7	ak at ch la taklo mmeli hgrh ommprisi hprsh hSsoeh at hgml oat harnbt oat hSpn ki melh grh hmh oprsh la hpriso Tmaim hm lkm׃ 
deuteronomy 14:8	oat hHcir ki mpris prsh hoa ola grh Tma hoa lkm mbSrm la taklo obnbltm la tgeo׃

deuteronomy 14:14	oat kl erb lmino׃

deuteronomy 14:19	okl Srz heop Tma hoa lkm la iaklo׃ 
deuteronomy 14:20	kl eop Thor taklo׃

deuteronomy 14:22	eSr teSr at kl tboat crek hiza hSdh Snh Snh׃ 
deuteronomy 14:23	oaklt lpni ihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr lSkn Smo Sm meSr dgnk tirSk oizhrk obkrt bqrk ozank lmen tlmd lirah at ihoh alhik kl himim׃ 
deuteronomy 14:24	oki irbh mmk hdrk ki la tokl Sato ki irHq mmk hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSom Smo Sm ki ibrkk ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 14:25	ontth bksp ozrt hksp bidk ohlkt al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo׃ 
deuteronomy 14:26	ontth hksp bkl aSr taoh npSk bbqr obzan obiin obSkr obkl aSr tSalk npSk oaklt Sm lpni ihoh alhik oSmHt ath obitk׃ 
deuteronomy 14:27	ohloi aSr bSerik la tecbno ki ain lo Hlq onHlh emk׃ 
deuteronomy 14:28	mqzh SlS Snim tozia at kl meSr tboatk bSnh hhoa ohnHt bSerik׃ 
deuteronomy 14:29	oba hloi ki ain lo Hlq onHlh emk ohgr ohitom ohalmnh aSr bSerik oaklo oSbeo lmen ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl meSh idk aSr teSh׃ 
deuteronomy 15:1	mqz Sbe Snim teSh SmTh׃ 
deuteronomy 15:2	och dbr hSmTh SmoT kl bel mSh ido aSr iSh breho la igS at reho oat aHio ki qra SmTh lihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 15:3	at hnkri tgS oaSr ihih lk at aHik tSmT idk׃ 
deuteronomy 15:4	aps ki la ihih bk abion ki brk ibrkk ihoh barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 15:5	rq am Smoe tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr leSot at kl hmzoh hcat aSr anki mzok hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 15:6	ki ihoh alhik brkk kaSr dbr lk ohebTt goim rbim oath la tebT omSlt bgoim rbim obk la imSlo׃ 
deuteronomy 15:7	ki ihih bk abion maHd aHik baHd Serik barzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk la tamz at lbbk ola tqpz at idk maHik habion׃ 
deuteronomy 15:8	ki ptH tptH at idk lo ohebT tebiTno di mHsro aSr iHsr lo׃ 
deuteronomy 15:9	hSmr lk pn ihih dbr em lbbk bliel lamr qrbh Snt hSbe Snt hSmTh oreh eink baHik habion ola ttn lo oqra elik al ihoh ohih bk HTa׃ 
deuteronomy 15:10	nton ttn lo ola ire lbbk bttk lo ki bgll hdbr hch ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl meSk obkl mSlH idk׃ 
deuteronomy 15:11	ki la iHdl abion mqrb harz el kn anki mzok lamr ptH tptH at idk laHik lenik olabink barzk׃ 
deuteronomy 15:12	ki imkr lk aHik hebri ao hebrih oebdk SS Snim obSnh hSbiet tSlHno HpSi memk׃ 
deuteronomy 15:13	oki tSlHno HpSi memk la tSlHno riqm׃ 
deuteronomy 15:14	heniq teniq lo mzank omgrnk omiqbk aSr brkk ihoh alhik ttn lo׃ 
deuteronomy 15:15	ockrt ki ebd hiit barz mzrim oipdk ihoh alhik el kn anki mzok at hdbr hch hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 15:16	ohih ki iamr alik la aza memk ki ahbk oat bitk ki Tob lo emk׃ 
deuteronomy 15:17	olqHt at hmrze ontth bacno obdlt ohih lk ebd eolm oap lamtk teSh kn׃ 
deuteronomy 15:18	la iqSh beink bSlHk ato HpSi memk ki mSnh Skr Skir ebdk SS Snim obrkk ihoh alhik bkl aSr teSh׃ 
deuteronomy 15:19	kl hbkor aSr iold bbqrk obzank hckr tqdiS lihoh alhik la tebd bbkr Sork ola tgc bkor zank׃ 
deuteronomy 15:20	lpni ihoh alhik taklno Snh bSnh bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh ath obitk׃ 
deuteronomy 15:21	oki ihih bo mom psH ao eor kl mom re la tcbHno lihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 15:22	bSerik taklno hTma ohThor iHdo kzbi okail׃ 
deuteronomy 15:23	rq at dmo la takl el harz tSpkno kmim׃ 
deuteronomy 16:1	Smor at HdS habib oeSit psH lihoh alhik ki bHdS habib hoziak ihoh alhik mmzrim lilh׃ 
deuteronomy 16:2	ocbHt psH lihoh alhik zan obqr bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh lSkn Smo Sm׃ 
deuteronomy 16:3	la takl elio Hmz Sbet imim takl elio mzot lHm eni ki bHpcon izat marz mzrim lmen tckr at iom zatk marz mzrim kl imi Hiik׃ 
deuteronomy 16:4	ola irah lk Sar bkl gblk Sbet imim ola ilin mn hbSr aSr tcbH berb biom hraSon lbqr׃ 
deuteronomy 16:5	la tokl lcbH at hpsH baHd Serik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 16:6	ki am al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSkn Smo Sm tcbH at hpsH berb kboa hSmS moed zatk mmzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 16:7	obSlt oaklt bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo opnit bbqr ohlkt lahlik׃ 
deuteronomy 16:8	SSt imim takl mzot obiom hSbiei ezrt lihoh alhik la teSh mlakh׃ 
deuteronomy 16:9	Sbeh Sbet tspr lk mhHl HrmS bqmh tHl lspr Sbeh Sbeot׃ 
deuteronomy 16:10	oeSit Hg Sbeot lihoh alhik mst ndbt idk aSr ttn kaSr ibrkk ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 16:11	oSmHt lpni ihoh alhik ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk ohloi aSr bSerik ohgr ohitom ohalmnh aSr bqrbk bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSkn Smo Sm׃ 
deuteronomy 16:12	ockrt ki ebd hiit bmzrim oSmrt oeSit at hHqim halh׃ 
deuteronomy 16:13	Hg hskt teSh lk Sbet imim baspk mgrnk omiqbk׃ 
deuteronomy 16:14	oSmHt bHgk ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk ohloi ohgr ohitom ohalmnh aSr bSerik׃ 
deuteronomy 16:15	Sbet imim tHg lihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh ki ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl tboatk obkl meSh idik ohiit ak SmH׃ 
deuteronomy 16:16	SloS pemim bSnh irah kl ckork at pni ihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr bHg hmzot obHg hSbeot obHg hskot ola irah at pni ihoh riqm׃ 
deuteronomy 16:17	aiS kmtnt ido kbrkt ihoh alhik aSr ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 16:18	SpTim oSTrim ttn lk bkl Serik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lSbTik oSpTo at hem mSpT zdq׃ 
deuteronomy 16:19	la tTh mSpT la tkir pnim ola tqH SHd ki hSHd ieor eini Hkmim oislp dbri zdiqm׃ 
deuteronomy 16:20	zdq zdq trdp lmen tHih oirSt at harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 16:21	la tTe lk aSrh kl ez azl mcbH ihoh alhik aSr teSh lk׃ 
deuteronomy 16:22	ola tqim lk mzbh aSr Sna ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 17:1	la tcbH lihoh alhik Sor oSh aSr ihih bo mom kl dbr re ki toebt ihoh alhik hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 17:2	ki imza bqrbk baHd Serik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk aiS ao aSh aSr ieSh at hre beini ihoh alhik lebr brito׃ 
deuteronomy 17:3	oilk oiebd alhim aHrim oiStHo lhm olSmS ao lirH ao lkl zba hSmim aSr la zoiti׃ 
deuteronomy 17:4	ohgd lk oSmet odrSt hiTb ohnh amt nkon hdbr neSth htoebh hcat biSral׃ 
deuteronomy 17:5	ohozat at haiS hhoa ao at haSh hhoa aSr eSo at hdbr hre hch al Serik at haiS ao at haSh osqltm babnim omto׃ 
deuteronomy 17:6	el pi Snim edim ao SlSh edim iomt hmt la iomt el pi ed aHd׃ 
deuteronomy 17:7	id hedim thih bo braSnh lhmito oid kl hem baHrnh obert hre mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 17:8	ki ipla mmk dbr lmSpT bin dm ldm bin din ldin obin nge lnge dbri ribt bSerik oqmt oelit al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo׃ 
deuteronomy 17:9	obat al hkhnim hloim oal hSpT aSr ihih bimim hhm odrSt ohgido lk at dbr hmSpT׃ 
deuteronomy 17:10	oeSit el pi hdbr aSr igido lk mn hmqom hhoa aSr ibHr ihoh oSmrt leSot kkl aSr iorok׃ 
deuteronomy 17:11	el pi htorh aSr iorok oel hmSpT aSr iamro lk teSh la tsor mn hdbr aSr igido lk imin oSmal׃ 
deuteronomy 17:12	ohaiS aSr ieSh bcdon lblti Sme al hkhn hemd lSrt Sm at ihoh alhik ao al hSpT omt haiS hhoa obert hre miSral׃ 
deuteronomy 17:13	okl hem iSmeo oirao ola icidon eod׃ 
deuteronomy 17:14	ki tba al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk oirSth oiSbth bh oamrt aSimh eli mlk kkl hgoim aSr sbibti׃ 
deuteronomy 17:15	Som tSim elik mlk aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo mqrb aHik tSim elik mlk la tokl ltt elik aiS nkri aSr la aHik hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 17:16	rq la irbh lo sosim ola iSib at hem mzrimh lmen hrbot sos oihoh amr lkm la tspon lSob bdrk hch eod׃ 
deuteronomy 17:17	ola irbh lo nSim ola isor lbbo oksp ochb la irbh lo mad׃ 
deuteronomy 17:18	ohih kSbto el ksa mmlkto oktb lo at mSnh htorh hcat el spr mlpni hkhnim hloim׃ 
deuteronomy 17:19	ohith emo oqra bo kl imi Hiio lmen ilmd lirah at ihoh alhio lSmr at kl dbri htorh hcat oat hHqim halh leStm׃ 
deuteronomy 17:20	lblti rom lbbo maHio olblti sor mn hmzoh imin oSmaol lmen iarik imim el mmlkto hoa obnio bqrb iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 18:1	la ihih lkhnim hloim kl SbT loi Hlq onHlh em iSral aSi ihoh onHlto iaklon׃ 
deuteronomy 18:2	onHlh la ihih lo bqrb aHio ihoh hoa nHlto kaSr dbr lo׃ 
deuteronomy 18:3	och ihih mSpT hkhnim mat hem mat cbHi hcbH am Sor am Sh ontn lkhn hcre ohlHiim ohqbh׃ 
deuteronomy 18:4	raSit dgnk tirSk oizhrk oraSit gc zank ttn lo׃ 
deuteronomy 18:5	ki bo bHr ihoh alhik mkl SbTik lemd lSrt bSm ihoh hoa obnio kl himim׃ 
deuteronomy 18:6	oki iba hloi maHd Serik mkl iSral aSr hoa gr Sm oba bkl aot npSo al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 18:7	oSrt bSm ihoh alhio kkl aHio hloim hemdim Sm lpni ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 18:8	Hlq kHlq iaklo lbd mmkrio el habot׃ 
deuteronomy 18:9	ki ath ba al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk la tlmd leSot ktoebt hgoim hhm׃ 
deuteronomy 18:10	la imza bk mebir bno obto baS qsm qsmim meonn omnHS omkSp׃ 
deuteronomy 18:11	oHbr Hbr oSal aob oideni odrS al hmtim׃ 
deuteronomy 18:12	ki toebt ihoh kl eSh alh obgll htoebt halh ihoh alhik moriS aotm mpnik׃ 
deuteronomy 18:13	tmim thih em ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 18:14	ki hgoim halh aSr ath iorS aotm al mennim oal qsmim iSmeo oath la kn ntn lk ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 18:15	nbia mqrbk maHik kmni iqim lk ihoh alhik alio tSmeon׃ 
deuteronomy 18:16	kkl aSr Salt mem ihoh alhik bHrb biom hqhl lamr la asp lSme at qol ihoh alhi oat haS hgdlh hcat la arah eod ola amot׃ 
deuteronomy 18:17	oiamr ihoh ali hiTibo aSr dbro׃ 
deuteronomy 18:18	nbia aqim lhm mqrb aHihm kmok ontti dbri bpio odbr alihm at kl aSr azono׃ 
deuteronomy 18:19	ohih haiS aSr la iSme al dbri aSr idbr bSmi anki adrS memo׃ 
deuteronomy 18:20	ak hnbia aSr icid ldbr dbr bSmi at aSr la zoitio ldbr oaSr idbr bSm alhim aHrim omt hnbia hhoa׃ 
deuteronomy 18:21	oki tamr blbbk aikh nde at hdbr aSr la dbro ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 18:22	aSr idbr hnbia bSm ihoh ola ihih hdbr ola iboa hoa hdbr aSr la dbro ihoh bcdon dbro hnbia la tgor mmno׃ 
deuteronomy 19:1	ki ikrit ihoh alhik at hgoim aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk at arzm oirStm oiSbt berihm obbtihm׃ 
deuteronomy 19:2	SloS erim tbdil lk btok arzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 19:3	tkin lk hdrk oSlSt at gbol arzk aSr inHilk ihoh alhik ohih lnos Smh kl rzH׃ 
deuteronomy 19:4	och dbr hrzH aSr inos Smh oHi aSr ikh at reho bbli det ohoa la Sna lo mtml SlSm׃ 
deuteronomy 19:5	oaSr iba at reho bier lHTb ezim ondHh ido bgrcn lkrt hez onSl hbrcl mn hez omza at reho omt hoa inos al aHt herim halh oHi׃ 
deuteronomy 19:6	pn irdp gal hdm aHri hrzH ki iHm lbbo ohSigo ki irbh hdrk ohkho npS olo ain mSpT mot ki la Sna hoa lo mtmol SlSom׃ 
deuteronomy 19:7	el kn anki mzok lamr SlS erim tbdil lk׃ 
deuteronomy 19:8	oam irHib ihoh alhik at gblk kaSr nSbe labtik ontn lk at kl harz aSr dbr ltt labtik׃ 
deuteronomy 19:9	ki tSmr at kl hmzoh hcat leSth aSr anki mzok hiom lahbh at ihoh alhik ollkt bdrkio kl himim oispt lk eod SlS erim el hSlS halh׃ 
deuteronomy 19:10	ola iSpk dm nqi bqrb arzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh ohih elik dmim׃ 
deuteronomy 19:11	oki ihih aiS Sna lreho oarb lo oqm elio ohkho npS omt ons al aHt herim hal׃ 
deuteronomy 19:12	oSlHo cqni eiro olqHo ato mSm ontno ato bid gal hdm omt׃ 
deuteronomy 19:13	la tHos eink elio obert dm hnqi miSral oTob lk׃ 
deuteronomy 19:14	la tsig gbol rek aSr gblo raSnim bnHltk aSr tnHl barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 19:15	la iqom ed aHd baiS lkl eon olkl HTat bkl HTa aSr iHTa el pi Sni edim ao el pi SlSh edim iqom dbr׃ 
deuteronomy 19:16	ki iqom ed Hms baiS lenot bo srh׃ 
deuteronomy 19:17	oemdo Sni hanSim aSr lhm hrib lpni ihoh lpni hkhnim ohSpTim aSr ihio bimim hhm׃ 
deuteronomy 19:18	odrSo hSpTim hiTb ohnh ed Sqr hed Sqr enh baHio׃ 
deuteronomy 19:19	oeSitm lo kaSr cmm leSot laHio obert hre mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 19:20	ohnSarim iSmeo oirao ola ispo leSot eod kdbr hre hch bqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 19:21	ola tHos eink npS bnpS ein bein Sn bSn id bid rgl brgl׃ 
deuteronomy 20:1	ki tza lmlHmh el aibik orait sos orkb em rb mmk la tira mhm ki ihoh alhik emk hmelk marz mzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 20:2	ohih kqrbkm al hmlHmh ongS hkhn odbr al hem׃ 
deuteronomy 20:3	oamr alhm Sme iSral atm qrbim hiom lmlHmh el aibikm al irk lbbkm al tirao oal tHpco oal terzo mpnihm׃ 
deuteronomy 20:4	ki ihoh alhikm hhlk emkm lhlHm lkm em aibikm lhoSie atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 20:5	odbro hSTrim al hem lamr mi haiS aSr bnh bit HdS ola Hnko ilk oiSb lbito pn imot bmlHmh oaiS aHr iHnkno׃ 
deuteronomy 20:6	omi haiS aSr nTe krm ola Hllo ilk oiSb lbito pn imot bmlHmh oaiS aHr iHllno׃ 
deuteronomy 20:7	omi haiS aSr arS aSh ola lqHh ilk oiSb lbito pn imot bmlHmh oaiS aHr iqHnh׃ 
deuteronomy 20:8	oispo hSTrim ldbr al hem oamro mi haiS hira ork hlbb ilk oiSb lbito ola ims at lbb aHio klbbo׃ 
deuteronomy 20:9	ohih kklt hSTrim ldbr al hem opqdo Sri zbaot braS hem׃ 
deuteronomy 20:10	ki tqrb al eir lhlHm elih oqrat alih lSlom׃ 
deuteronomy 20:11	ohih am Slom tenk optHh lk ohih kl hem hnmza bh ihio lk lms oebdok׃ 
deuteronomy 20:12	oam la tSlim emk oeSth emk mlHmh ozrt elih׃ 
deuteronomy 20:13	ontnh ihoh alhik bidk ohkit at kl ckorh lpi Hrb׃ 
deuteronomy 20:14	rq hnSim ohTp ohbhmh okl aSr ihih beir kl Sllh tbc lk oaklt at Sll aibik aSr ntn ihoh alhik lk׃ 
deuteronomy 20:15	kn teSh lkl herim hrHqt mmk mad aSr la meri hgoim halh hnh׃ 
deuteronomy 20:16	rq meri hemim halh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh la tHih kl nSmh׃ 
deuteronomy 20:17	ki hHrm tHrimm hHti ohamri hkneni ohprci hHoi ohibosi kaSr zok ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 20:18	lmen aSr la ilmdo atkm leSot kkl toebtm aSr eSo lalhihm oHTatm lihoh alhikm׃ 
deuteronomy 20:19	ki tzor al eir imim rbim lhlHm elih ltpSh la tSHit at ezh lndH elio grcn ki mmno takl oato la tkrt ki hadm ez hSdh lba mpnik bmzor׃ 
deuteronomy 20:20	rq ez aSr tde ki la ez makl hoa ato tSHit okrt obnit mzor el heir aSr hoa eSh emk mlHmh ed rdth׃ 
deuteronomy 21:1	ki imza Hll badmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lrSth npl bSdh la node mi hkho׃ 
deuteronomy 21:2	oizao cqnik oSpTik omddo al herim aSr sbibt hHll׃ 
deuteronomy 21:3	ohih heir hqrbh al hHll olqHo cqni heir hhoa eglt bqr aSr la ebd bh aSr la mSkh bel׃ 
deuteronomy 21:4	ohordo cqni heir hhoa at heglh al nHl aitn aSr la iebd bo ola icre oerpo Sm at heglh bnHl׃ 
deuteronomy 21:5	ongSo hkhnim bni loi ki bm bHr ihoh alhik lSrto olbrk bSm ihoh oel pihm ihih kl rib okl nge׃ 
deuteronomy 21:6	okl cqni heir hhoa hqrbim al hHll irHzo at idihm el heglh heroph bnHl׃ 
deuteronomy 21:7	oeno oamro idino la Spkh at hdm hch oeinino la rao׃ 
deuteronomy 21:8	kpr lemk iSral aSr pdit ihoh oal ttn dm nqi bqrb emk iSral onkpr lhm hdm׃ 
deuteronomy 21:9	oath tber hdm hnqi mqrbk ki teSh hiSr beini ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 21:10	ki tza lmlHmh el aibik ontno ihoh alhik bidk oSbit Sbio׃ 
deuteronomy 21:11	orait bSbih aSt ipt tar oHSqt bh olqHt lk laSh׃ 
deuteronomy 21:12	ohbath al tok bitk oglHh at raSh oeSth at zprnih׃ 
deuteronomy 21:13	ohsirh at Smlt Sbih melih oiSbh bbitk obkth at abih oat amh irH imim oaHr kn tboa alih obelth ohith lk laSh׃ 
deuteronomy 21:14	ohih am la Hpzt bh oSlHth lnpSh omkr la tmkrnh bksp la ttemr bh tHt aSr enith׃ 
deuteronomy 21:15	ki thiin laiS Sti nSim haHt ahobh ohaHt Snoah oildo lo bnim hahobh ohSnoah ohih hbn hbkor lSniah׃ 
deuteronomy 21:16	ohih biom hnHilo at bnio at aSr ihih lo la iokl lbkr at bn hahobh el pni bn hSnoah hbkr׃ 
deuteronomy 21:17	ki at hbkr bn hSnoah ikir ltt lo pi Snim bkl aSr imza lo ki hoa raSit ano lo mSpT hbkrh׃ 
deuteronomy 21:18	ki ihih laiS bn sorr omorh ainno Sme bqol abio obqol amo oisro ato ola iSme alihm׃ 
deuteronomy 21:19	otpSo bo abio oamo ohoziao ato al cqni eiro oal Ser mqmo׃ 
deuteronomy 21:20	oamro al cqni eiro bnno ch sorr omrh ainno Sme bqlno coll osba׃ 
deuteronomy 21:21	orgmho kl anSi eiro babnim omt obert hre mqrbk okl iSral iSmeo oirao׃ 
deuteronomy 21:22	oki ihih baiS HTa mSpT mot ohomt otlit ato el ez׃ 
deuteronomy 21:23	la tlin nblto el hez ki qbor tqbrno biom hhoa ki qllt alhim tloi ola tTma at admtk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh׃ 
deuteronomy 22:1	la trah at Sor aHik ao at Sio ndHim ohtelmt mhm hSb tSibm laHik׃ 
deuteronomy 22:2	oam la qrob aHik alik ola ideto oaspto al tok bitk ohih emk ed drS aHik ato ohSbto lo׃ 
deuteronomy 22:3	okn teSh lHmro okn teSh lSmlto okn teSh lkl abdt aHik aSr tabd mmno omzath la tokl lhtelm׃ 
deuteronomy 22:4	la trah at Hmor aHik ao Soro nplim bdrk ohtelmt mhm hqm tqim emo׃ 
deuteronomy 22:5	la ihih kli gbr el aSh ola ilbS gbr Smlt aSh ki toebt ihoh alhik kl eSh alh׃ 
deuteronomy 22:6	ki iqra qn zpor lpnik bdrk bkl ez ao el harz aprHim ao bizim oham rbzt el haprHim ao el hbizim la tqH ham el hbnim׃ 
deuteronomy 22:7	SlH tSlH at ham oat hbnim tqH lk lmen iiTb lk oharkt imim׃ 
deuteronomy 22:8	ki tbnh bit HdS oeSit meqh lggk ola tSim dmim bbitk ki ipl hnpl mmno׃ 
deuteronomy 22:9	la tcre krmk klaim pn tqdS hmlah hcre aSr tcre otboat hkrm׃ 
deuteronomy 22:10	la tHrS bSor obHmr iHdo׃ 
deuteronomy 22:11	la tlbS SeTnc zmr opStim iHdo׃ 
deuteronomy 22:12	gdlim teSh lk el arbe knpot ksotk aSr tksh bh׃ 
deuteronomy 22:13	ki iqH aiS aSh oba alih oSnah׃ 
deuteronomy 22:14	oSm lh elilt dbrim ohozia elih Sm re oamr at haSh hcat lqHti oaqrb alih ola mzati lh btolim׃ 
deuteronomy 22:15	olqH abi hner oamh ohoziao at btoli hner al cqni heir hSerh׃ 
deuteronomy 22:16	oamr abi hner al hcqnim at bti ntti laiS hch laSh oiSnah׃ 
deuteronomy 22:17	ohnh hoa Sm elilt dbrim lamr la mzati lbtk btolim oalh btoli bti oprSo hSmlh lpni cqni heir׃ 
deuteronomy 22:18	olqHo cqni heir hhoa at haiS oisro ato׃ 
deuteronomy 22:19	oenSo ato mah ksp ontno labi hnerh ki hozia Sm re el btolt iSral olo thih laSh la iokl lSlHh kl imio׃ 
deuteronomy 22:20	oam amt hih hdbr hch la nmzao btolim lner׃ 
deuteronomy 22:21	ohoziao at hner al ptH bit abih osqloh anSi eirh babnim omth ki eSth nblh biSral lcnot bit abih obert hre mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 22:22	ki imza aiS Skb em aSh belt bel omto gm Snihm haiS hSkb em haSh ohaSh obert hre miSral׃ 
deuteronomy 22:23	ki ihih ner btolh marSh laiS omzah aiS beir oSkb emh׃ 
deuteronomy 22:24	ohozatm at Snihm al Ser heir hhoa osqltm atm babnim omto at hner el dbr aSr la zeqh beir oat haiS el dbr aSr enh at aSt reho obert hre mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 22:25	oam bSdh imza haiS at hner hmarSh ohHciq bh haiS oSkb emh omt haiS aSr Skb emh lbdo׃ 
deuteronomy 22:26	olner la teSh dbr ain lner HTa mot ki kaSr iqom aiS el reho orzHo npS kn hdbr hch׃ 
deuteronomy 22:27	ki bSdh mzah zeqh hner hmarSh oain moSie lh׃ 
deuteronomy 22:28	ki imza aiS ner btolh aSr la arSh otpSh oSkb emh onmzao׃ 
deuteronomy 22:29	ontn haiS hSkb emh labi hner HmSim ksp olo thih laSh tHt aSr enh la iokl SlHh kl imio׃ 
deuteronomy 22:30	la iqH aiS at aSt abio ola iglh knp abio׃ 
deuteronomy 23:1	la iba pzoe dka okrot Spkh bqhl ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 23:2	la iba mmcr bqhl ihoh gm dor eSiri la iba lo bqhl ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 23:3	la iba emoni omoabi bqhl ihoh gm dor eSiri la iba lhm bqhl ihoh ed eolm׃ 
deuteronomy 23:4	el dbr aSr la qdmo atkm blHm obmim bdrk bzatkm mmzrim oaSr Skr elik at blem bn beor mptor arm nhrim lqllk׃ 
deuteronomy 23:5	ola abh ihoh alhik lSme al blem oihpk ihoh alhik lk at hqllh lbrkh ki ahbk ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 23:6	la tdrS Slmm oTbtm kl imik leolm׃ 
deuteronomy 23:7	la tteb admi ki aHik hoa la tteb mzri ki gr hiit barzo׃ 
deuteronomy 23:8	bnim aSr ioldo lhm dor SliSi iba lhm bqhl ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 23:9	ki tza mHnh el aibik onSmrt mkl dbr re׃ 
deuteronomy 23:10	ki ihih bk aiS aSr la ihih Thor mqrh lilh oiza al mHoz lmHnh la iba al tok hmHnh׃ 
deuteronomy 23:11	ohih lpnot erb irHz bmim okba hSmS iba al tok hmHnh׃ 
deuteronomy 23:12	oid thih lk mHoz lmHnh oizat Smh Hoz׃ 
deuteronomy 23:13	oitd thih lk el acnk ohih bSbtk Hoz oHprth bh oSbt oksit at zatk׃ 
deuteronomy 23:14	ki ihoh alhik mthlk bqrb mHnk lhzilk oltt aibik lpnik ohih mHnik qdoS ola irah bk erot dbr oSb maHrik׃ 
deuteronomy 23:15	la tsgir ebd al adnio aSr inzl alik mem adnio׃ 
deuteronomy 23:16	emk iSb bqrbk bmqom aSr ibHr baHd Serik bTob lo la tonno׃ 
deuteronomy 23:17	la thih qdSh mbnot iSral ola ihih qdS mbni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 23:18	la tbia atnn conh omHir klb bit ihoh alhik lkl ndr ki toebt ihoh alhik gm Snihm׃ 
deuteronomy 23:19	la tSik laHik nSk ksp nSk akl nSk kl dbr aSr iSk׃ 
deuteronomy 23:20	lnkri tSik olaHik la tSik lmen ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl mSlH idk el harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 23:21	ki tdr ndr lihoh alhik la taHr lSlmo ki drS idrSno ihoh alhik memk ohih bk HTa׃ 
deuteronomy 23:22	oki tHdl lndr la ihih bk HTa׃ 
deuteronomy 23:23	moza Sptik tSmr oeSit kaSr ndrt lihoh alhik ndbh aSr dbrt bpik׃ 
deuteronomy 23:24	ki tba bkrm rek oaklt enbim knpSk Sbek oal klik la ttn׃ 
deuteronomy 23:25	ki tba bqmt rek oqTpt mlilt bidk oHrmS la tnip el qmt rek׃ 
deuteronomy 24:1	ki iqH aiS aSh obelh ohih am la tmza Hn beinio ki mza bh erot dbr oktb lh spr kritt ontn bidh oSlHh mbito׃ 
deuteronomy 24:2	oizah mbito ohlkh ohith laiS aHr׃ 
deuteronomy 24:3	oSnah haiS haHron oktb lh spr kritt ontn bidh oSlHh mbito ao ki imot haiS haHron aSr lqHh lo laSh׃ 
deuteronomy 24:4	la iokl belh hraSon aSr SlHh lSob lqHth lhiot lo laSh aHri aSr hTmah ki toebh hoa lpni ihoh ola tHTia at harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh׃ 
deuteronomy 24:5	ki iqH aiS aSh HdSh la iza bzba ola iebr elio lkl dbr nqi ihih lbito Snh aHt oSmH at aSto aSr lqH׃ 
deuteronomy 24:6	la iHbl rHim orkb ki npS hoa Hbl׃ 
deuteronomy 24:7	ki imza aiS gnb npS maHio mbni iSral ohtemr bo omkro omt hgnb hhoa obert hre mqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 24:8	hSmr bnge hzret lSmr mad oleSot kkl aSr ioro atkm hkhnim hloim kaSr zoitm tSmro leSot׃ 
deuteronomy 24:9	ckor at aSr eSh ihoh alhik lmrim bdrk bzatkm mmzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 24:10	ki tSh brek mSat maomh la tba al bito lebT ebTo׃ 
deuteronomy 24:11	bHoz temd ohaiS aSr ath nSh bo iozia alik at heboT hHozh׃ 
deuteronomy 24:12	oam aiS eni hoa la tSkb bebTo׃ 
deuteronomy 24:13	hSb tSib lo at heboT kba hSmS oSkb bSlmto obrkk olk thih zdqh lpni ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 24:14	la teSq Skir eni oabion maHik ao mgrk aSr barzk bSerik׃ 
deuteronomy 24:15	biomo ttn Skro ola tboa elio hSmS ki eni hoa oalio hoa nSa at npSo ola iqra elik al ihoh ohih bk HTa׃ 
deuteronomy 24:16	la iomto abot el bnim obnim la iomto el abot aiS bHTao iomto׃ 
deuteronomy 24:17	la tTh mSpT gr itom ola tHbl bgd almnh׃ 
deuteronomy 24:18	ockrt ki ebd hiit bmzrim oipdk ihoh alhik mSm el kn anki mzok leSot at hdbr hch׃ 
deuteronomy 24:19	ki tqzr qzirk bSdk oSkHt emr bSdh la tSob lqHto lgr litom olalmnh ihih lmen ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl meSh idik׃ 
deuteronomy 24:20	ki tHbT citk la tpar aHrik lgr litom olalmnh ihih׃ 
deuteronomy 24:21	ki tbzr krmk la teoll aHrik lgr litom olalmnh ihih׃ 
deuteronomy 24:22	ockrt ki ebd hiit barz mzrim el kn anki mzok leSot at hdbr hch׃ 
deuteronomy 25:1	ki ihih rib bin anSim ongSo al hmSpT oSpTom ohzdiqo at hzdiq ohrSieo at hrSe׃ 
deuteronomy 25:2	ohih am bn hkot hrSe ohpilo hSpT ohkho lpnio kdi rSeto bmspr׃ 
deuteronomy 25:3	arbeim ikno la isip pn isip lhkto el alh mkh rbh onqlh aHik leinik׃ 
deuteronomy 25:4	la tHsm Sor bdiSo׃ 
deuteronomy 25:5	ki iSbo aHim iHdo omt aHd mhm obn ain lo la thih aSt hmt hHozh laiS cr ibmh iba elih olqHh lo laSh oibmh׃ 
deuteronomy 25:6	ohih hbkor aSr tld iqom el Sm aHio hmt ola imHh Smo miSral׃ 
deuteronomy 25:7	oam la iHpz haiS lqHt at ibmto oelth ibmto hSerh al hcqnim oamrh man ibmi lhqim laHio Sm biSral la abh ibmi׃ 
deuteronomy 25:8	oqrao lo cqni eiro odbro alio oemd oamr la Hpzti lqHth׃ 
deuteronomy 25:9	ongSh ibmto alio leini hcqnim oHlzh nelo mel rglo oirqh bpnio oenth oamrh kkh ieSh laiS aSr la ibnh at bit aHio׃ 
deuteronomy 25:10	onqra Smo biSral bit Hloz hnel׃ 
deuteronomy 25:11	ki inzo anSim iHdo aiS oaHio oqrbh aSt haHd lhzil at aiSh mid mkho oSlHh idh ohHciqh bmbSio׃ 
deuteronomy 25:12	oqzth at kph la tHos eink׃ 
deuteronomy 25:13	la ihih lk bkisk abn oabn gdolh oqTnh׃ 
deuteronomy 25:14	la ihih lk bbitk aiph oaiph gdolh oqTnh׃ 
deuteronomy 25:15	abn Slmh ozdq ihih lk aiph Slmh ozdq ihih lk lmen iariko imik el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 25:16	ki toebt ihoh alhik kl eSh alh kl eSh eol׃ 
deuteronomy 25:17	ckor at aSr eSh lk emlq bdrk bzatkm mmzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 25:18	aSr qrk bdrk oicnb bk kl hnHSlim aHrik oath eip oige ola ira alhim׃ 
deuteronomy 25:19	ohih bhniH ihoh alhik lk mkl aibik msbib barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh lrSth tmHh at ckr emlq mtHt hSmim la tSkH׃ 
deuteronomy 26:1	ohih ki tboa al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh oirSth oiSbt bh׃ 
deuteronomy 26:2	olqHt mraSit kl pri hadmh aSr tbia marzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk oSmt bTna ohlkt al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSkn Smo Sm׃ 
deuteronomy 26:3	obat al hkhn aSr ihih bimim hhm oamrt alio hgdti hiom lihoh alhik ki bati al harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtino ltt lno׃ 
deuteronomy 26:4	olqH hkhn hTna midk ohniHo lpni mcbH ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 26:5	oenit oamrt lpni ihoh alhik armi abd abi oird mzrimh oigr Sm bmti meT oihi Sm lgoi gdol ezom orb׃ 
deuteronomy 26:6	oireo atno hmzrim oienono oitno elino ebdh qSh׃ 
deuteronomy 26:7	onzeq al ihoh alhi abtino oiSme ihoh at qlno oira at enino oat emlno oat lHzno׃ 
deuteronomy 26:8	oiozano ihoh mmzrim bid Hcqh obcre nToih obmra gdl obatot obmptim׃ 
deuteronomy 26:9	oibano al hmqom hch oitn lno at harz hcat arz cbt Hlb odbS׃ 
deuteronomy 26:10	oeth hnh hbati at raSit pri hadmh aSr ntth li ihoh ohnHto lpni ihoh alhik ohStHoit lpni ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 26:11	oSmHt bkl hTob aSr ntn lk ihoh alhik olbitk ath ohloi ohgr aSr bqrbk׃ 
deuteronomy 26:12	ki tklh leSr at kl meSr tboatk bSnh hSliSt Snt hmeSr ontth lloi lgr litom olalmnh oaklo bSerik oSbeo׃ 
deuteronomy 26:13	oamrt lpni ihoh alhik berti hqdS mn hbit ogm nttio lloi olgr litom olalmnh kkl mzotk aSr zoitni la ebrti mmzotik ola SkHti׃ 
deuteronomy 26:14	la aklti bani mmno ola berti mmno bTma ola ntti mmno lmt Smeti bqol ihoh alhi eSiti kkl aSr zoitni׃ 
deuteronomy 26:15	hSqiph mmeon qdSk mn hSmim obrk at emk at iSral oat hadmh aSr ntth lno kaSr nSbet labtino arz cbt Hlb odbS׃ 
deuteronomy 26:16	hiom hch ihoh alhik mzok leSot at hHqim halh oat hmSpTim oSmrt oeSit aotm bkl lbbk obkl npSk׃ 
deuteronomy 26:17	at ihoh hamrt hiom lhiot lk lalhim ollkt bdrkio olSmr Hqio omzotio omSpTio olSme bqlo׃ 
deuteronomy 26:18	oihoh hamirk hiom lhiot lo lem sglh kaSr dbr lk olSmr kl mzotio׃ 
deuteronomy 26:19	olttk elion el kl hgoim aSr eSh lthlh olSm oltpart olhitk em qdS lihoh alhik kaSr dbr׃ 
deuteronomy 27:1	oizo mSh ocqni iSral at hem lamr Smr at kl hmzoh aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 27:2	ohih biom aSr tebro at hirdn al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk ohqmt lk abnim gdlot oSdt atm bSid׃ 
deuteronomy 27:3	oktbt elihn at kl dbri htorh hcat bebrk lmen aSr tba al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk arz cbt Hlb odbS kaSr dbr ihoh alhi abtik lk׃ 
deuteronomy 27:4	ohih bebrkm at hirdn tqimo at habnim halh aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom bhr eibl oSdt aotm bSid׃ 
deuteronomy 27:5	obnit Sm mcbH lihoh alhik mcbH abnim la tnip elihm brcl׃ 
deuteronomy 27:6	abnim Slmot tbnh at mcbH ihoh alhik ohelit elio eolt lihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 27:7	ocbHt Slmim oaklt Sm oSmHt lpni ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 27:8	oktbt el habnim at kl dbri htorh hcat bar hiTb׃ 
deuteronomy 27:9	oidbr mSh ohkhnim hloim al kl iSral lamr hskt oSme iSral hiom hch nhiit lem lihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 27:10	oSmet bqol ihoh alhik oeSit at mzoto oat Hqio aSr anki mzok hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 27:11	oizo mSh at hem biom hhoa lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 27:12	alh iemdo lbrk at hem el hr grcim bebrkm at hirdn Smeon oloi oihodh oiSSkr oiosp obnimn׃ 
deuteronomy 27:13	oalh iemdo el hqllh bhr eibl raobn gd oaSr ocboln dn onptli׃ 
deuteronomy 27:14	oeno hloim oamro al kl aiS iSral qol rm׃ 
deuteronomy 27:15	aror haiS aSr ieSh psl omskh toebt ihoh meSh idi HrS oSm bstr oeno kl hem oamro amn׃

deuteronomy 27:18	aror mSgh eor bdrk oamr kl hem amn׃ 
deuteronomy 27:19	aror mTh mSpT gr itom oalmnh oamr kl hem amn׃

deuteronomy 27:21	aror Skb em kl bhmh oamr kl hem amn׃

deuteronomy 27:25	aror lqH SHd lhkot npS dm nqi oamr kl hem amn׃ 
deuteronomy 27:26	aror aSr la iqim at dbri htorh hcat leSot aotm oamr kl hem amn׃ 
deuteronomy 28:1	ohih am Smoe tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr leSot at kl mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom ontnk ihoh alhik elion el kl goii harz׃ 
deuteronomy 28:2	obao elik kl hbrkot halh ohSigk ki tSme bqol ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:3	brok ath beir obrok ath bSdh׃ 
deuteronomy 28:4	brok pri bTnk opri admtk opri bhmtk Sgr alpik oeStrot zank׃ 
deuteronomy 28:5	brok Tnak omSartk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:6	brok ath bbak obrok ath bzatk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:7	itn ihoh at aibik hqmim elik ngpim lpnik bdrk aHd izao alik obSbeh drkim inoso lpnik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:8	izo ihoh atk at hbrkh basmik obkl mSlH idk obrkk barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:9	iqimk ihoh lo lem qdoS kaSr nSbe lk ki tSmr at mzot ihoh alhik ohlkt bdrkio׃ 
deuteronomy 28:10	orao kl emi harz ki Sm ihoh nqra elik oirao mmk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:11	ohotrk ihoh lTobh bpri bTnk obpri bhmtk obpri admtk el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtik ltt lk׃

deuteronomy 28:13	ontnk ihoh lraS ola lcnb ohiit rq lmelh ola thih lmTh ki tSme al mzot ihoh alhik aSr anki mzok hiom lSmr oleSot׃

deuteronomy 28:15	ohih am la tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr leSot at kl mzotio oHqtio aSr anki mzok hiom obao elik kl hqllot halh ohSigok׃

deuteronomy 28:17	aror Tnak omSartk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:18	aror pri bTnk opri admtk Sgr alpik oeStrot zank׃ 
deuteronomy 28:19	aror ath bbak oaror ath bzatk׃

deuteronomy 28:21	idbq ihoh bk at hdbr ed klto atk mel hadmh aSr ath ba Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 28:22	ikkh ihoh bSHpt obqdHt obdlqt obHrHr obHrb obSdpon obirqon ordpok ed abdk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:23	ohio Smik aSr el raSk nHSt oharz aSr tHtik brcl׃ 
deuteronomy 28:24	itn ihoh at mTr arzk abq oepr mn hSmim ird elik ed hSmdk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:25	itnk ihoh ngp lpni aibik bdrk aHd tza alio obSbeh drkim tnos lpnio ohiit lceoh lkl mmlkot harz׃ 
deuteronomy 28:26	ohith nbltk lmakl lkl eop hSmim olbhmt harz oain mHrid׃ 
deuteronomy 28:27	ikkh ihoh bSHin mzrim obeplim obgrb obHrs aSr la tokl lhrpa׃ 
deuteronomy 28:28	ikkh ihoh bSgeon obeoron obtmhon lbb׃ 
deuteronomy 28:29	ohiit mmSS bzhrim kaSr imSS heor baplh ola tzliH at drkik ohiit ak eSoq ogcol kl himim oain moSie׃ 
deuteronomy 28:30	aSh tarS oaiS aHr iSglnh bit tbnh ola tSb bo krm tTe ola tHllno׃ 
deuteronomy 28:31	Sork TboH leinik ola takl mmno Hmrk gcol mlpnik ola iSob lk zank ntnot laibik oain lk moSie׃ 
deuteronomy 28:32	bnik obntik ntnim lem aHr oeinik raot oklot alihm kl hiom oain lal idk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:33	pri admtk okl igiek iakl em aSr la idet ohiit rq eSoq orzoz kl himim׃ 
deuteronomy 28:34	ohiit mSge mmrah einik aSr trah׃ 
deuteronomy 28:35	ikkh ihoh bSHin re el hbrkim oel hSqim aSr la tokl lhrpa mkp rglk oed qdqdk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:36	iolk ihoh atk oat mlkk aSr tqim elik al goi aSr la idet ath oabtik oebdt Sm alhim aHrim ez oabn׃ 
deuteronomy 28:37	ohiit lSmh lmSl olSninh bkl hemim aSr inhgk ihoh Smh׃ 
deuteronomy 28:38	cre rb tozia hSdh omeT tasp ki iHslno harbh׃ 
deuteronomy 28:39	krmim tTe oebdt oiin la tSth ola tagr ki taklno htlet׃ 
deuteronomy 28:40	citim ihio lk bkl gbolk oSmn la tsok ki iSl citk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:41	bnim obnot tolid ola ihio lk ki ilko bSbi׃ 
deuteronomy 28:42	kl ezk opri admtk iirS hzlzl׃ 
deuteronomy 28:43	hgr aSr bqrbk ielh elik melh melh oath trd mTh mTh׃ 
deuteronomy 28:44	hoa ilok oath la tlono hoa ihih lraS oath thih lcnb׃ 
deuteronomy 28:45	obao elik kl hqllot halh ordpok ohSigok ed hSmdk ki la Smet bqol ihoh alhik lSmr mzotio oHqtio aSr zok׃ 
deuteronomy 28:46	ohio bk laot olmopt obcrek ed eolm׃ 
deuteronomy 28:47	tHt aSr la ebdt at ihoh alhik bSmHh obTob lbb mrb kl׃ 
deuteronomy 28:48	oebdt at aibik aSr iSlHno ihoh bk breb obzma obeirm obHsr kl ontn el brcl el zoark ed hSmido atk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:49	iSa ihoh elik goi mrHoq mqzh harz kaSr idah hnSr goi aSr la tSme lSno׃ 
deuteronomy 28:50	goi ec pnim aSr la iSa pnim lcqn oner la iHn׃ 
deuteronomy 28:51	oakl pri bhmtk opri admtk ed hSmdk aSr la iSair lk dgn tiroS oizhr Sgr alpik oeStrt zank ed habido atk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:52	ohzr lk bkl Serik ed rdt Hmtik hgbhot ohbzrot aSr ath bTH bhn bkl arzk ohzr lk bkl Serik bkl arzk aSr ntn ihoh alhik lk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:53	oaklt pri bTnk bSr bnik obntik aSr ntn lk ihoh alhik bmzor obmzoq aSr iziq lk aibk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:54	haiS hrk bk oheng mad tre eino baHio obaSt Hiqo obitr bnio aSr iotir׃ 
deuteronomy 28:55	mtt laHd mhm mbSr bnio aSr iakl mbli hSair lo kl bmzor obmzoq aSr iziq lk aibk bkl Serik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:56	hrkh bk ohengh aSr la nsth kp rglh hzg el harz mhteng omrk tre einh baiS Hiqh obbnh obbth׃ 
deuteronomy 28:57	obSlith hiozt mbin rglih obbnih aSr tld ki taklm bHsr kl bstr bmzor obmzoq aSr iziq lk aibk bSerik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:58	am la tSmr leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat hktobim bspr hch lirah at hSm hnkbd ohnora hch at ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:59	ohpla ihoh at mktk oat mkot crek mkot gdlot onamnot oHlim reim onamnim׃ 
deuteronomy 28:60	ohSib bk at kl mdoh mzrim aSr igrt mpnihm odbqo bk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:61	gm kl Hli okl mkh aSr la ktob bspr htorh hcat ielm ihoh elik ed hSmdk׃ 
deuteronomy 28:62	onSartm bmti meT tHt aSr hiitm kkokbi hSmim lrb ki la Smet bqol ihoh alhik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:63	ohih kaSr SS ihoh elikm lhiTib atkm olhrbot atkm kn iSiS ihoh elikm lhabid atkm olhSmid atkm onsHtm mel hadmh aSr ath ba Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 28:64	ohpizk ihoh bkl hemim mqzh harz oed qzh harz oebdt Sm alhim aHrim aSr la idet ath oabtik ez oabn׃ 
deuteronomy 28:65	obgoim hhm la trgie ola ihih mnoH lkp rglk ontn ihoh lk Sm lb rgc oklion einim odabon npS׃ 
deuteronomy 28:66	ohio Hiik tlaim lk mngd opHdt lilh oiomm ola tamin bHiik׃ 
deuteronomy 28:67	bbqr tamr mi itn erb oberb tamr mi itn bqr mpHd lbbk aSr tpHd ommrah einik aSr trah׃

deuteronomy 29:3	hmsot hgdlt aSr rao einik hatt ohmptim hgdlim hhm׃ 
deuteronomy 29:4	ola ntn ihoh lkm lb ldet oeinim lraot oacnim lSme ed hiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 29:5	oaolk atkm arbeim Snh bmdbr la blo Slmtikm melikm onelk la blth mel rglk׃ 
deuteronomy 29:6	lHm la akltm oiin oSkr la Stitm lmen tdeo ki ani ihoh alhikm׃ 
deuteronomy 29:7	otbao al hmqom hch oiza siHn mlk HSbon oeog mlk hbSn lqratno lmlHmh onkm׃ 
deuteronomy 29:8	onqH at arzm ontnh lnHlh lraobni olgdi olHzi SbT hmnSi׃ 
deuteronomy 29:9	oSmrtm at dbri hbrit hcat oeSitm atm lmen tSkilo at kl aSr teSon׃

deuteronomy 29:11	Tpkm nSikm ogrk aSr bqrb mHnik mHTb ezik ed Sab mimik׃ 
deuteronomy 29:12	lebrk bbrit ihoh alhik obalto aSr ihoh alhik krt emk hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 29:13	lmen hqim atk hiom lo lem ohoa ihih lk lalhim kaSr dbr lk okaSr nSbe labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb׃ 
deuteronomy 29:14	ola atkm lbdkm anki krt at hbrit hcat oat halh hcat׃ 
deuteronomy 29:15	ki at aSr iSno ph emno emd hiom lpni ihoh alhino oat aSr ainno ph emno hiom׃

deuteronomy 29:17	otrao at Sqozihm oat gllihm ez oabn ksp ochb aSr emhm׃

deuteronomy 29:19	ohih bSmeo at dbri halh hcat ohtbrk blbbo lamr Slom ihih li ki bSrrot lbi alk lmen spot hroh at hzmah׃ 
deuteronomy 29:20	la iabh ihoh slH lo ki ac ieSn ap ihoh oqnato baiS hhoa orbzh bo kl halh hktobh bspr hch omHh ihoh at Smo mtHt hSmim׃ 
deuteronomy 29:21	ohbdilo ihoh lreh mkl SbTi iSral kkl alot hbrit hktobh bspr htorh hch׃ 
deuteronomy 29:22	oamr hdor haHron bnikm aSr iqomo maHrikm ohnkri aSr iba marz rHoqh orao at mkot harz hhoa oat tHlaih aSr Hlh ihoh bh׃ 
deuteronomy 29:23	gprit omlH Srph kl arzh la tcre ola tzmH ola ielh bh kl eSb kmhpkt sdm oemrh admh ozbiim aSr hpk ihoh bapo obHmto׃ 
deuteronomy 29:24	oamro kl hgoim el mh eSh ihoh kkh larz hcat mh Hri hap hgdol hch׃ 
deuteronomy 29:25	oamro el aSr ecbo at brit ihoh alhi abtm aSr krt emm bhoziao atm marz mzrim׃ 
deuteronomy 29:26	oilko oiebdo alhim aHrim oiStHoo lhm alhim aSr la ideom ola Hlq lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 29:27	oiHr ap ihoh barz hhoa lhbia elih at kl hqllh hktobh bspr hch׃ 
deuteronomy 29:28	oitSm ihoh mel admtm bap obHmh obqzp gdol oiSlkm al arz aHrt kiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 29:29	hnstrt lihoh alhino ohnglt lno olbnino ed eolm leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat׃ 
deuteronomy 30:1	ohih ki ibao elik kl hdbrim halh hbrkh ohqllh aSr ntti lpnik ohSbt al lbbk bkl hgoim aSr hdiHk ihoh alhik Smh׃ 
deuteronomy 30:2	oSbt ed ihoh alhik oSmet bqlo kkl aSr anki mzok hiom ath obnik bkl lbbk obkl npSk׃ 
deuteronomy 30:3	oSb ihoh alhik at Sbotk orHmk oSb oqbzk mkl hemim aSr hpizk ihoh alhik Smh׃ 
deuteronomy 30:4	am ihih ndHk bqzh hSmim mSm iqbzk ihoh alhik omSm iqHk׃ 
deuteronomy 30:5	ohbiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr irSo abtik oirSth ohiTbk ohrbk mabtik׃ 
deuteronomy 30:6	oml ihoh alhik at lbbk oat lbb crek lahbh at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk lmen Hiik׃ 
deuteronomy 30:7	ontn ihoh alhik at kl halot halh el aibik oel Snaik aSr rdpok׃ 
deuteronomy 30:8	oath tSob oSmet bqol ihoh oeSit at kl mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom׃ 
deuteronomy 30:9	ohotirk ihoh alhik bkl meSh idk bpri bTnk obpri bhmtk obpri admtk lTobh ki iSob ihoh lSoS elik lTob kaSr SS el abtik׃ 
deuteronomy 30:10	ki tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr mzotio oHqtio hktobh bspr htorh hch ki tSob al ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk׃ 
deuteronomy 30:11	ki hmzoh hcat aSr anki mzok hiom la nplat hoa mmk ola rHqh hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 30:12	la bSmim hoa lamr mi ielh lno hSmimh oiqHh lno oiSmeno ath oneSnh׃ 
deuteronomy 30:13	ola mebr lim hoa lamr mi iebr lno al ebr him oiqHh lno oiSmeno ath oneSnh׃ 
deuteronomy 30:14	ki qrob alik hdbr mad bpik oblbbk leSto׃ 
deuteronomy 30:15	rah ntti lpnik hiom at hHiim oat hTob oat hmot oat hre׃ 
deuteronomy 30:16	aSr anki mzok hiom lahbh at ihoh alhik llkt bdrkio olSmr mzotio oHqtio omSpTio oHiit orbit obrkk ihoh alhik barz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 30:17	oam ipnh lbbk ola tSme ondHt ohStHoit lalhim aHrim oebdtm׃ 
deuteronomy 30:18	hgdti lkm hiom ki abd tabdon la tarikn imim el hadmh aSr ath ebr at hirdn lba Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 30:19	heidti bkm hiom at hSmim oat harz hHiim ohmot ntti lpnik hbrkh ohqllh obHrt bHiim lmen tHih ath ocrek׃ 
deuteronomy 30:20	lahbh at ihoh alhik lSme bqlo oldbqh bo ki hoa Hiik oark imik lSbt el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb ltt lhm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:1	oilk mSh oidbr at hdbrim halh al kl iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 31:2	oiamr alhm bn mah oeSrim Snh anki hiom la aokl eod lzat olboa oihoh amr ali la tebr at hirdn hch׃ 
deuteronomy 31:3	ihoh alhik hoa ebr lpnik hoa iSmid at hgoim halh mlpnik oirStm ihoSe hoa ebr lpnik kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 31:4	oeSh ihoh lhm kaSr eSh lsiHon oleog mlki hamri olarzm aSr hSmid atm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:5	ontnm ihoh lpnikm oeSitm lhm kkl hmzoh aSr zoiti atkm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:6	Hcqo oamzo al tirao oal terzo mpnihm ki ihoh alhik hoa hhlk emk la irpk ola iecbk׃ 
deuteronomy 31:7	oiqra mSh lihoSe oiamr alio leini kl iSral Hcq oamz ki ath tboa at hem hch al harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtm ltt lhm oath tnHilnh aotm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:8	oihoh hoa hhlk lpnik hoa ihih emk la irpk ola iecbk la tira ola tHt׃ 
deuteronomy 31:9	oiktb mSh at htorh hcat oitnh al hkhnim bni loi hnSaim at aron brit ihoh oal kl cqni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 31:10	oizo mSh aotm lamr mqz Sbe Snim bmed Snt hSmTh bHg hskot׃ 
deuteronomy 31:11	bboa kl iSral lraot at pni ihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr tqra at htorh hcat ngd kl iSral bacnihm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:12	hqhl at hem hanSim ohnSim ohTp ogrk aSr bSerik lmen iSmeo olmen ilmdo oirao at ihoh alhikm oSmro leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat׃ 
deuteronomy 31:13	obnihm aSr la ideo iSmeo olmdo lirah at ihoh alhikm kl himim aSr atm Hiim el hadmh aSr atm ebrim at hirdn Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 31:14	oiamr ihoh al mSh hn qrbo imik lmot qra at ihoSe ohtizbo bahl moed oazono oilk mSh oihoSe oitizbo bahl moed׃ 
deuteronomy 31:15	oira ihoh bahl bemod enn oiemd emod henn el ptH hahl׃ 
deuteronomy 31:16	oiamr ihoh al mSh hnk Skb em abtik oqm hem hch ocnh aHri alhi nkr harz aSr hoa ba Smh bqrbo oecbni ohpr at briti aSr krti ato׃ 
deuteronomy 31:17	oHrh api bo biom hhoa oecbtim ohstrti pni mhm ohih lakl omzaho reot rbot ozrot oamr biom hhoa hla el ki ain alhi bqrbi mzaoni hreot halh׃ 
deuteronomy 31:18	oanki hstr astir pni biom hhoa el kl hreh aSr eSh ki pnh al alhim aHrim׃ 
deuteronomy 31:19	oeth ktbo lkm at hSirh hcat olmdh at bni iSral Simh bpihm lmen thih li hSirh hcat led bbni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 31:20	ki abiano al hadmh aSr nSbeti labtio cbt Hlb odbS oakl oSbe odSn opnh al alhim aHrim oebdom onazoni ohpr at briti׃ 
deuteronomy 31:21	ohih ki tmzan ato reot rbot ozrot oenth hSirh hcat lpnio led ki la tSkH mpi creo ki ideti at izro aSr hoa eSh hiom bTrm abiano al harz aSr nSbeti׃ 
deuteronomy 31:22	oiktb mSh at hSirh hcat biom hhoa oilmdh at bni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 31:23	oizo at ihoSe bn non oiamr Hcq oamz ki ath tbia at bni iSral al harz aSr nSbeti lhm oanki ahih emk׃ 
deuteronomy 31:24	oihi kklot mSh lktb at dbri htorh hcat el spr ed tmm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:25	oizo mSh at hloim nSai aron brit ihoh lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 31:26	lqH at spr htorh hch oSmtm ato mzd aron brit ihoh alhikm ohih Sm bk led׃ 
deuteronomy 31:27	ki anki ideti at mrik oat erpk hqSh hn beodni Hi emkm hiom mmrim hitm em ihoh oap ki aHri moti׃ 
deuteronomy 31:28	hqhilo ali at kl cqni SbTikm oSTrikm oadbrh bacnihm at hdbrim halh oaeidh bm at hSmim oat harz׃ 
deuteronomy 31:29	ki ideti aHri moti ki hSHt tSHton osrtm mn hdrk aSr zoiti atkm oqrat atkm hreh baHrit himim ki teSo at hre beini ihoh lhkeiso bmeSh idikm׃ 
deuteronomy 31:30	oidbr mSh bacni kl qhl iSral at dbri hSirh hcat ed tmm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:1	hacino hSmim oadbrh otSme harz amri pi׃ 
deuteronomy 32:2	ierp kmTr lqHi tcl kTl amrti kSeirm eli dSa okrbibim eli eSb׃ 
deuteronomy 32:3	ki Sm ihoh aqra hbo gdl lalhino׃ 
deuteronomy 32:4	hzor tmim pelo ki kl drkio mSpT al amonh oain eol zdiq oiSr hoa׃ 
deuteronomy 32:5	SHt lo la bnio momm dor eqS optltl׃ 
deuteronomy 32:6	h lihoh tgmlo cat em nbl ola Hkm hloa hoa abik qnk hoa eSk oiknnk׃ 
deuteronomy 32:7	ckr imot eolm bino Snot dor odor Sal abik oigdk cqnik oiamro lk׃ 
deuteronomy 32:8	bhnHl elion goim bhprido bni adm izb gblt emim lmspr bni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 32:9	ki Hlq ihoh emo ieqb Hbl nHlto׃ 
deuteronomy 32:10	imzaho barz mdbr obtho ill iSmn isbbnho ibonnho izrnho kaiSon eino׃ 
deuteronomy 32:11	knSr ieir qno el goclio irHp iprS knpio iqHho iSaho el abrto׃ 
deuteronomy 32:12	ihoh bdd inHno oain emo al nkr׃ 
deuteronomy 32:13	irkbho el bmoti arz oiakl tnobt Sdi oinqho dbS msle oSmn mHlmiS zor׃ 
deuteronomy 32:14	Hmat bqr oHlb zan em Hlb krim oailim bni bSn oetodim em Hlb kliot HTh odm enb tSth Hmr׃ 
deuteronomy 32:15	oiSmn iSron oibeT Smnt ebit kSit oiTS aloh eSho oinbl zor iSeto׃ 
deuteronomy 32:16	iqnaho bcrim btoebt ikeisho׃ 
deuteronomy 32:17	icbHo lSdim la alh alhim la ideom HdSim mqrb bao la Serom abtikm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:18	zor ildk tSi otSkH al mHllk׃ 
deuteronomy 32:19	oira ihoh oinaz mkes bnio obntio׃ 
deuteronomy 32:20	oiamr astirh pni mhm arah mh aHritm ki dor thpkt hmh bnim la amn bm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:21	hm qnaoni bla al kesoni bhblihm oani aqniam bla em bgoi nbl akeism׃ 
deuteronomy 32:22	ki aS qdHh bapi otiqd ed Saol tHtit otakl arz oiblh otlhT mosdi hrim׃ 
deuteronomy 32:23	asph elimo reot Hzi aklh bm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:24	mci reb olHmi rSp oqTb mriri oSn bhmot aSlH bm em Hmt cHli epr׃ 
deuteronomy 32:25	mHoz tSkl Hrb omHdrim aimh gm bHor gm btolh ionq em aiS Sibh׃ 
deuteronomy 32:26	amrti apaihm aSbith manoS ckrm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:27	loli kes aoib agor pn inkro zrimo pn iamro idino rmh ola ihoh pel kl cat׃ 
deuteronomy 32:28	ki goi abd ezot hmh oain bhm tbonh׃ 
deuteronomy 32:29	lo Hkmo iSkilo cat ibino laHritm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:30	aikh irdp aHd alp oSnim iniso rbbh am la ki zorm mkrm oihoh hsgirm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:31	ki la kzorno zorm oaibino plilim׃ 
deuteronomy 32:32	ki mgpn sdm gpnm omSdmt emrh enbmo enbi roS aSklt mrrt lmo׃ 
deuteronomy 32:33	Hmt tninm iinm oraS ptnim akcr׃ 
deuteronomy 32:34	hla hoa kms emdi Htm baozrti׃ 
deuteronomy 32:35	li nqm oSlm let tmoT rglm ki qrob iom aidm oHS etdt lmo׃ 
deuteronomy 32:36	ki idin ihoh emo oel ebdio itnHm ki irah ki aclt id oaps ezor oecob׃ 
deuteronomy 32:37	oamr ai alhimo zor Hsio bo׃ 
deuteronomy 32:38	aSr Hlb cbHimo iaklo iSto iin nsikm iqomo oiecrkm ihi elikm strh׃ 
deuteronomy 32:39	rao eth ki ani ani hoa oain alhim emdi ani amit oaHih mHzti oani arpa oain midi mzil׃ 
deuteronomy 32:40	ki aSa al Smim idi oamrti Hi anki lelm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:41	am Snoti brq Hrbi otaHc bmSpT idi aSib nqm lzri olmSnai aSlm׃ 
deuteronomy 32:42	aSkir Hzi mdm oHrbi takl bSr mdm Hll oSbih mraS preot aoib׃ 
deuteronomy 32:43	hrnino goim emo ki dm ebdio iqom onqm iSib lzrio okpr admto emo׃ 
deuteronomy 32:44	oiba mSh oidbr at kl dbri hSirh hcat bacni hem hoa ohoSe bn non׃ 
deuteronomy 32:45	oikl mSh ldbr at kl hdbrim halh al kl iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 32:46	oiamr alhm Simo lbbkm lkl hdbrim aSr anki meid bkm hiom aSr tzom at bnikm lSmr leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat׃ 
deuteronomy 32:47	ki la dbr rq hoa mkm ki hoa Hiikm obdbr hch tariko imim el hadmh aSr atm ebrim at hirdn Smh lrSth׃ 
deuteronomy 32:48	oidbr ihoh al mSh bezm hiom hch lamr׃ 
deuteronomy 32:49	elh al hr hebrim hch hr nbo aSr barz moab aSr el pni irHo orah at arz knen aSr ani ntn lbni iSral laHch׃ 
deuteronomy 32:50	omt bhr aSr ath elh Smh ohasp al emik kaSr mt ahrn aHik bhr hhr oiasp al emio׃ 
deuteronomy 32:51	el aSr meltm bi btok bni iSral bmi mribt qdS mdbr zn el aSr la qdStm aoti btok bni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 32:52	ki mngd trah at harz oSmh la tboa al harz aSr ani ntn lbni iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 33:1	ocat hbrkh aSr brk mSh aiS halhim at bni iSral lpni moto׃ 
deuteronomy 33:2	oiamr ihoh msini ba ocrH mSeir lmo hopie mhr parn oath mrbbt qdS mimino aS dt lmo׃ 
deuteronomy 33:3	ap Hbb emim kl qdSio bidk ohm tko lrglk iSa mdbrtik׃ 
deuteronomy 33:4	torh zoh lno mSh morSh qhlt ieqb׃ 
deuteronomy 33:5	oihi biSron mlk bhtasp raSi em iHd SbTi iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 33:6	iHi raobn oal imt oihi mtio mspr׃ 
deuteronomy 33:7	ocat lihodh oiamr Sme ihoh qol ihodh oal emo tbiano idio rb lo oecr mzrio thih׃ 
deuteronomy 33:8	olloi amr tmik oaorik laiS Hsidk aSr nsito bmsh tribho el mi mribh׃ 
deuteronomy 33:9	hamr labio olamo la raitio oat aHio la hkir oat bno la ide ki Smro amrtk obritk inzro׃ 
deuteronomy 33:10	ioro mSpTik lieqb otortk liSral iSimo qTorh bapk oklil el mcbHk׃ 
deuteronomy 33:11	brk ihoh Hilo opel idio trzh mHz mtnim qmio omSnaio mn iqomon׃ 
deuteronomy 33:12	lbnimn amr idid ihoh iSkn lbTH elio Hpp elio kl hiom obin ktipio Skn׃ 
deuteronomy 33:13	oliosp amr mbrkt ihoh arzo mmgd Smim mTl omthom rbzt tHt׃ 
deuteronomy 33:14	ommgd tboat SmS ommgd grS irHim׃ 
deuteronomy 33:15	omraS hrri qdm ommgd gbeot eolm׃ 
deuteronomy 33:16	ommgd arz omlah orzon Skni snh tboath lraS iosp olqdqd ncir aHio׃ 
deuteronomy 33:17	bkor Soro hdr lo oqrni ram qrnio bhm emim ingH iHdo apsi arz ohm rbbot aprim ohm alpi mnSh׃ 
deuteronomy 33:18	olcboln amr SmH cboln bzatk oiSSkr bahlik׃ 
deuteronomy 33:19	emim hr iqrao Sm icbHo cbHi zdq ki Spe imim iinqo oSponi Tmoni Hol׃ 
deuteronomy 33:20	olgd amr brok mrHib gd klbia Skn oTrp croe ap qdqd׃ 
deuteronomy 33:21	oira raSit lo ki Sm Hlqt mHqq spon oita raSi em zdqt ihoh eSh omSpTio em iSral׃ 
deuteronomy 33:22	oldn amr dn gor arih icnq mn hbSn׃ 
deuteronomy 33:23	olnptli amr nptli Sbe rzon omla brkt ihoh im odrom irSh׃ 
deuteronomy 33:24	olaSr amr brok mbnim aSr ihi rzoi aHio oTbl bSmn rglo׃ 
deuteronomy 33:25	brcl onHSt mnelik okimik dbak׃ 
deuteronomy 33:26	ain kal iSron rkb Smim becrk obgaoto SHqim׃ 
deuteronomy 33:27	menh alhi qdm omtHt cret eolm oigrS mpnik aoib oiamr hSmd׃ 
deuteronomy 33:28	oiSkn iSral bTH bdd ein ieqb al arz dgn otiroS ap Smio ierpo Tl׃ 
deuteronomy 33:29	aSrik iSral mi kmok em noSe bihoh mgn ecrk oaSr Hrb gaotk oikHSo aibik lk oath el bmotimo tdrk׃ 
deuteronomy 34:1	oiel mSh merbt moab al hr nbo raS hpsgh aSr el pni irHo oiraho ihoh at kl harz at hgled ed dn׃ 
deuteronomy 34:2	oat kl nptli oat arz aprim omnSh oat kl arz ihodh ed him haHron׃ 
deuteronomy 34:3	oat hngb oat hkkr bqet irHo eir htmrim ed zer׃ 
deuteronomy 34:4	oiamr ihoh alio cat harz aSr nSbeti labrhm lizHq olieqb lamr lcrek atnnh hraitik beinik oSmh la tebr׃ 
deuteronomy 34:5	oimt Sm mSh ebd ihoh barz moab el pi ihoh׃ 
deuteronomy 34:6	oiqbr ato bgi barz moab mol bit peor ola ide aiS at qbrto ed hiom hch׃ 
deuteronomy 34:7	omSh bn mah oeSrim Snh bmto la khth eino ola ns lHh׃ 
deuteronomy 34:8	oibko bni iSral at mSh berbt moab SlSim iom oitmo imi bki abl mSh׃ 
deuteronomy 34:9	oihoSe bn non mla roH Hkmh ki smk mSh at idio elio oiSmeo alio bni iSral oieSo kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
deuteronomy 34:10	ola qm nbia eod biSral kmSh aSr ideo ihoh pnim al pnim׃ 
deuteronomy 34:11	lkl hatot ohmoptim aSr SlHo ihoh leSot barz mzrim lpreh olkl ebdio olkl arzo׃ 
deuteronomy 34:12	olkl hid hHcqh olkl hmora hgdol aSr eSh mSh leini kl iSral׃ 
joshua 1:1	oihi aHri mot mSh ebd ihoh oiamr ihoh al ihoSe bn non mSrt mSh lamr׃ 
joshua 1:2	mSh ebdi mt oeth qom ebr at hirdn hch ath okl hem hch al harz aSr anki ntn lhm lbni iSral׃ 
joshua 1:3	kl mqom aSr tdrk kp rglkm bo lkm nttio kaSr dbrti al mSh׃ 
joshua 1:4	mhmdbr ohlbnon hch oed hnhr hgdol nhr prt kl arz hHtim oed him hgdol mboa hSmS ihih gbolkm׃ 
joshua 1:5	la itizb aiS lpnik kl imi Hiik kaSr hiiti em mSh ahih emk la arpk ola aecbk׃ 
joshua 1:6	Hcq oamz ki ath tnHil at hem hch at harz aSr nSbeti labotm ltt lhm׃ 
joshua 1:7	rq Hcq oamz mad lSmr leSot kkl htorh aSr zok mSh ebdi al tsor mmno imin oSmaol lmen tSkil bkl aSr tlk׃ 
joshua 1:8	la imoS spr htorh hch mpik ohgit bo iomm olilh lmen tSmr leSot kkl hktob bo ki ac tzliH at drkk oac tSkil׃ 
joshua 1:9	hloa zoitik Hcq oamz al terz oal tHt ki emk ihoh alhik bkl aSr tlk׃ 
joshua 1:10	oizo ihoSe at STri hem lamr׃ 
joshua 1:11	ebro bqrb hmHnh ozoo at hem lamr hkino lkm zidh ki beod SlSt imim atm ebrim at hirdn hch lboa lrSt at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lkm lrSth׃ 
joshua 1:12	olraobni olgdi olHzi SbT hmnSh amr ihoSe lamr׃ 
joshua 1:13	ckor at hdbr aSr zoh atkm mSh ebd ihoh lamr ihoh alhikm mniH lkm ontn lkm at harz hcat׃ 
joshua 1:14	nSikm Tpkm omqnikm iSbo barz aSr ntn lkm mSh bebr hirdn oatm tebro HmSim lpni aHikm kl gbori hHil oecrtm aotm׃ 
joshua 1:15	ed aSr iniH ihoh laHikm kkm oirSo gm hmh at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lhm oSbtm larz irStkm oirStm aoth aSr ntn lkm mSh ebd ihoh bebr hirdn mcrH hSmS׃ 
joshua 1:16	oieno at ihoSe lamr kl aSr zoitno neSh oal kl aSr tSlHno nlk׃ 
joshua 1:17	kkl aSr Smeno al mSh kn nSme alik rq ihih ihoh alhik emk kaSr hih em mSh׃ 
joshua 1:18	kl aiS aSr imrh at pik ola iSme at dbrik lkl aSr tzono iomt rq Hcq oamz׃ 
joshua 2:1	oiSlH ihoSe bn non mn hSTim Snim anSim mrglim HrS lamr lko rao at harz oat iriHo oilko oibao bit aSh conh oSmh rHb oiSkbo Smh׃ 
joshua 2:2	oiamr lmlk iriHo lamr hnh anSim bao hnh hlilh mbni iSral lHpr at harz׃ 
joshua 2:3	oiSlH mlk iriHo al rHb lamr hoziai hanSim hbaim alik aSr bao lbitk ki lHpr at kl harz bao׃ 
joshua 2:4	otqH haSh at Sni hanSim otzpno otamr kn bao ali hanSim ola ideti main hmh׃ 
joshua 2:5	oihi hSer lsgor bHSk ohanSim izao la ideti anh hlko hanSim rdpo mhr aHrihm ki tSigom׃ 
joshua 2:6	ohia heltm hggh otTmnm bpSti hez herkot lh el hgg׃ 
joshua 2:7	ohanSim rdpo aHrihm drk hirdn el hmebrot ohSer sgro aHri kaSr izao hrdpim aHrihm׃ 
joshua 2:8	ohmh Trm iSkbon ohia elth elihm el hgg׃ 
joshua 2:9	otamr al hanSim ideti ki ntn ihoh lkm at harz oki nplh aimtkm elino oki nmgo kl iSbi harz mpnikm׃ 
joshua 2:10	ki Smeno at aSr hobiS ihoh at mi im sop mpnikm bzatkm mmzrim oaSr eSitm lSni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn lsiHn oleog aSr hHrmtm aotm׃ 
joshua 2:11	onSme oims lbbno ola qmh eod roH baiS mpnikm ki ihoh alhikm hoa alhim bSmim mmel oel harz mtHt׃ 
joshua 2:12	oeth hSbeo na li bihoh ki eSiti emkm Hsd oeSitm gm atm em bit abi Hsd onttm li aot amt׃ 
joshua 2:13	ohHitm at abi oat ami oat aHi oat aHoti oat kl aSr lhm ohzltm at npStino mmot׃ 
joshua 2:14	oiamro lh hanSim npSno tHtikm lmot am la tgido at dbrno ch ohih btt ihoh lno at harz oeSino emk Hsd oamt׃ 
joshua 2:15	otordm bHbl bed hHlon ki bith bqir hHomh obHomh hia ioSbt׃ 
joshua 2:16	otamr lhm hhrh lko pn ipgeo bkm hrdpim onHbtm Smh SlSt imim ed Sob hrdpim oaHr tlko ldrkkm׃ 
joshua 2:17	oiamro alih hanSim nqim anHno mSbetk hch aSr hSbetno׃ 
joshua 2:18	hnh anHno baim barz at tqot HoT hSni hch tqSri bHlon aSr hordtno bo oat abik oat amk oat aHik oat kl bit abik taspi alik hbith׃ 
joshua 2:19	ohih kl aSr iza mdlti bitk hHozh dmo braSo oanHno nqim okl aSr ihih atk bbit dmo braSno am id thih bo׃ 
joshua 2:20	oam tgidi at dbrno ch ohiino nqim mSbetk aSr hSbetno׃ 
joshua 2:21	otamr kdbrikm kn hoa otSlHm oilko otqSr at tqot hSni bHlon׃ 
joshua 2:22	oilko oibao hhrh oiSbo Sm SlSt imim ed Sbo hrdpim oibqSo hrdpim bkl hdrk ola mzao׃ 
joshua 2:23	oiSbo Sni hanSim oirdo mhhr oiebro oibao al ihoSe bn non oispro lo at kl hmzaot aotm׃ 
joshua 2:24	oiamro al ihoSe ki ntn ihoh bidno at kl harz ogm nmgo kl iSbi harz mpnino׃ 
joshua 3:1	oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oiseo mhSTim oibao ed hirdn hoa okl bni iSral oilno Sm Trm iebro׃ 
joshua 3:2	oihi mqzh SlSt imim oiebro hSTrim bqrb hmHnh׃ 
joshua 3:3	oizoo at hem lamr kraotkm at aron brit ihoh alhikm ohkhnim hloim nSaim ato oatm tseo mmqomkm ohlktm aHrio׃ 
joshua 3:4	ak rHoq ihih binikm obino kalpim amh bmdh al tqrbo alio lmen aSr tdeo at hdrk aSr tlko bh ki la ebrtm bdrk mtmol SlSom׃ 
joshua 3:5	oiamr ihoSe al hem htqdSo ki mHr ieSh ihoh bqrbkm nplaot׃ 
joshua 3:6	oiamr ihoSe al hkhnim lamr Sao at aron hbrit oebro lpni hem oiSao at aron hbrit oilko lpni hem׃ 
joshua 3:7	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe hiom hch aHl gdlk beini kl iSral aSr ideon ki kaSr hiiti em mSh ahih emk׃ 
joshua 3:8	oath tzoh at hkhnim nSai aron hbrit lamr kbakm ed qzh mi hirdn birdn temdo׃ 
joshua 3:9	oiamr ihoSe al bni iSral gSo hnh oSmeo at dbri ihoh alhikm׃ 
joshua 3:10	oiamr ihoSe bcat tdeon ki al Hi bqrbkm ohorS ioriS mpnikm at hkneni oat hHti oat hHoi oat hprci oat hgrgSi ohamri ohibosi׃ 
joshua 3:11	hnh aron hbrit adon kl harz ebr lpnikm birdn׃ 
joshua 3:12	oeth qHo lkm Sni eSr aiS mSbTi iSral aiS aHd aiS aHd lSbT׃ 
joshua 3:13	ohih knoH kpot rgli hkhnim nSai aron ihoh adon kl harz bmi hirdn mi hirdn ikrton hmim hirdim mlmelh oiemdo nd aHd׃ 
joshua 3:14	oihi bnse hem mahlihm lebr at hirdn ohkhnim nSai haron hbrit lpni hem׃ 
joshua 3:15	okboa nSai haron ed hirdn orgli hkhnim nSai haron nTblo bqzh hmim ohirdn mla el kl gdotio kl imi qzir׃ 
joshua 3:16	oiemdo hmim hirdim mlmelh qmo nd aHd hrHq mad badm heir aSr mzd zrtn ohirdim el im herbh im hmlH tmo nkrto ohem ebro ngd iriHo׃ 
joshua 3:17	oiemdo hkhnim nSai haron brit ihoh bHrbh btok hirdn hkn okl iSral ebrim bHrbh ed aSr tmo kl hgoi lebr at hirdn׃ 
joshua 4:1	oihi kaSr tmo kl hgoi lebor at hirdn oiamr ihoh al ihoSe lamr׃ 
joshua 4:2	qHo lkm mn hem Snim eSr anSim aiS aHd aiS aHd mSbT׃ 
joshua 4:3	ozoo aotm lamr Sao lkm mch mtok hirdn mmzb rgli hkhnim hkin Stim eSrh abnim ohebrtm aotm emkm ohnHtm aotm bmlon aSr tlino bo hlilh׃ 
joshua 4:4	oiqra ihoSe al Snim heSr aiS aSr hkin mbni iSral aiS aHd aiS aHd mSbT׃ 
joshua 4:5	oiamr lhm ihoSe ebro lpni aron ihoh alhikm al tok hirdn ohrimo lkm aiS abn aHt el Skmo lmspr SbTi bni iSral׃ 
joshua 4:6	lmen thih cat aot bqrbkm ki iSalon bnikm mHr lamr mh habnim halh lkm׃ 
joshua 4:7	oamrtm lhm aSr nkrto mimi hirdn mpni aron brit ihoh bebro birdn nkrto mi hirdn ohio habnim halh lckron lbni iSral ed eolm׃ 
joshua 4:8	oieSo kn bni iSral kaSr zoh ihoSe oiSao Sti eSrh abnim mtok hirdn kaSr dbr ihoh al ihoSe lmspr SbTi bni iSral oiebrom emm al hmlon oinHom Sm׃ 
joshua 4:9	oStim eSrh abnim hqim ihoSe btok hirdn tHt mzb rgli hkhnim nSai aron hbrit oihio Sm ed hiom hch׃ 
joshua 4:10	ohkhnim nSai haron emdim btok hirdn ed tm kl hdbr aSr zoh ihoh at ihoSe ldbr al hem kkl aSr zoh mSh at ihoSe oimhro hem oiebro׃ 
joshua 4:11	oihi kaSr tm kl hem lebor oiebr aron ihoh ohkhnim lpni hem׃ 
joshua 4:12	oiebro bni raobn obni gd oHzi SbT hmnSh HmSim lpni bni iSral kaSr dbr alihm mSh׃ 
joshua 4:13	karbeim alp Hlozi hzba ebro lpni ihoh lmlHmh al erbot iriHo׃ 
joshua 4:14	biom hhoa gdl ihoh at ihoSe beini kl iSral oirao ato kaSr irao at mSh kl imi Hiio׃ 
joshua 4:15	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe lamr׃ 
joshua 4:16	zoh at hkhnim nSai aron hedot oielo mn hirdn׃ 
joshua 4:17	oizo ihoSe at hkhnim lamr elo mn hirdn׃ 
joshua 4:18	oihi belot hkhnim nSai aron brit ihoh mtok hirdn ntqo kpot rgli hkhnim al hHrbh oiSbo mi hirdn lmqomm oilko ktmol SlSom el kl gdotio׃ 
joshua 4:19	ohem elo mn hirdn beSor lHdS hraSon oiHno bglgl bqzh mcrH iriHo׃ 
joshua 4:20	oat Stim eSrh habnim halh aSr lqHo mn hirdn hqim ihoSe bglgl׃ 
joshua 4:21	oiamr al bni iSral lamr aSr iSalon bnikm mHr at abotm lamr mh habnim halh׃ 
joshua 4:22	ohodetm at bnikm lamr bibSh ebr iSral at hirdn hch׃ 
joshua 4:23	aSr hobiS ihoh alhikm at mi hirdn mpnikm ed ebrkm kaSr eSh ihoh alhikm lim sop aSr hobiS mpnino ed ebrno׃ 
joshua 4:24	lmen det kl emi harz at id ihoh ki Hcqh hia lmen iratm at ihoh alhikm kl himim׃ 
joshua 5:1	oihi kSme kl mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn imh okl mlki hkneni aSr el him at aSr hobiS ihoh at mi hirdn mpni bni iSral ed ebrno oims lbbm ola hih bm eod roH mpni bni iSral׃ 
joshua 5:2	bet hhia amr ihoh al ihoSe eSh lk Hrbot zrim oSob ml at bni iSral Snit׃ 
joshua 5:3	oieS lo ihoSe Hrbot zrim oiml at bni iSral al gbet herlot׃ 
joshua 5:4	och hdbr aSr ml ihoSe kl hem hiza mmzrim hckrim kl anSi hmlHmh mto bmdbr bdrk bzatm mmzrim׃ 
joshua 5:5	ki mlim hio kl hem hizaim okl hem hildim bmdbr bdrk bzatm mmzrim la mlo׃ 
joshua 5:6	ki arbeim Snh hlko bni iSral bmdbr ed tm kl hgoi anSi hmlHmh hizaim mmzrim aSr la Smeo bqol ihoh aSr nSbe ihoh lhm lblti hraotm at harz aSr nSbe ihoh labotm ltt lno arz cbt Hlb odbS׃ 
joshua 5:7	oat bnihm hqim tHtm atm ml ihoSe ki erlim hio ki la mlo aotm bdrk׃ 
joshua 5:8	oihi kaSr tmo kl hgoi lhmol oiSbo tHtm bmHnh ed Hiotm׃ 
joshua 5:9	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe hiom gloti at Hrpt mzrim melikm oiqra Sm hmqom hhoa glgl ed hiom hch׃ 
joshua 5:10	oiHno bni iSral bglgl oieSo at hpsH barbeh eSr iom lHdS berb berbot iriHo׃ 
joshua 5:11	oiaklo mebor harz mmHrt hpsH mzot oqloi bezm hiom hch׃ 
joshua 5:12	oiSbt hmn mmHrt baklm mebor harz ola hih eod lbni iSral mn oiaklo mtboat arz knen bSnh hhia׃ 
joshua 5:13	oihi bhiot ihoSe biriHo oiSa einio oira ohnh aiS emd lngdo oHrbo Sloph bido oilk ihoSe alio oiamr lo hlno ath am lzrino׃ 
joshua 5:14	oiamr la ki ani Sr zba ihoh eth bati oipl ihoSe al pnio arzh oiStHo oiamr lo mh adni mdbr al ebdo׃ 
joshua 5:15	oiamr Sr zba ihoh al ihoSe Sl nelk mel rglk ki hmqom aSr ath emd elio qdS hoa oieS ihoSe kn׃ 
joshua 6:1	oiriHo sgrt omsgrt mpni bni iSral ain ioza oain ba׃ 
joshua 6:2	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe rah ntti bidk at iriHo oat mlkh gbori hHil׃ 
joshua 6:3	osbtm at heir kl anSi hmlHmh hqip at heir pem aHt kh teSh SSt imim׃ 
joshua 6:4	oSbeh khnim iSao Sbeh Soprot hioblim lpni haron obiom hSbiei tsbo at heir Sbe pemim ohkhnim itqeo bSoprot׃ 
joshua 6:5	ohih bmSk bqrn hiobl bSmekm at qol hSopr irieo kl hem troeh gdolh onplh Homt heir tHtih oelo hem aiS ngdo׃ 
joshua 6:6	oiqra ihoSe bn non al hkhnim oiamr alhm Sao at aron hbrit oSbeh khnim iSao Sbeh Soprot ioblim lpni aron ihoh׃ 
joshua 6:7	oiamro al hem ebro osbo at heir ohHloz iebr lpni aron ihoh׃ 
joshua 6:8	oihi kamr ihoSe al hem oSbeh hkhnim nSaim Sbeh Soprot hioblim lpni ihoh ebro otqeo bSoprot oaron brit ihoh hlk aHrihm׃ 
joshua 6:9	ohHloz hlk lpni hkhnim tqeo hSoprot ohmasp hlk aHri haron hlok otqoe bSoprot׃ 
joshua 6:10	oat hem zoh ihoSe lamr la trieo ola tSmieo at qolkm ola iza mpikm dbr ed iom amri alikm hrieo ohrietm׃ 
joshua 6:11	oisb aron ihoh at heir hqp pem aHt oibao hmHnh oilino bmHnh׃ 
joshua 6:12	oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oiSao hkhnim at aron ihoh׃ 
joshua 6:13	oSbeh hkhnim nSaim Sbeh Soprot hiblim lpni aron ihoh hlkim hlok otqeo bSoprot ohHloz hlk lpnihm ohmasp hlk aHri aron ihoh holk otqoe bSoprot׃ 
joshua 6:14	oisbo at heir biom hSni pem aHt oiSbo hmHnh kh eSo SSt imim׃ 
joshua 6:15	oihi biom hSbiei oiSkmo kelot hSHr oisbo at heir kmSpT hch Sbe pemim rq biom hhoa sbbo at heir Sbe pemim׃ 
joshua 6:16	oihi bpem hSbieit tqeo hkhnim bSoprot oiamr ihoSe al hem hrieo ki ntn ihoh lkm at heir׃ 
joshua 6:17	ohith heir Hrm hia okl aSr bh lihoh rq rHb hconh tHih hia okl aSr ath bbit ki hHbath at hmlakim aSr SlHno׃ 
joshua 6:18	orq atm Smro mn hHrm pn tHrimo olqHtm mn hHrm oSmtm at mHnh iSral lHrm oekrtm aoto׃ 
joshua 6:19	okl ksp ochb okli nHSt obrcl qdS hoa lihoh aozr ihoh iboa׃ 
joshua 6:20	oire hem oitqeo bSprot oihi kSme hem at qol hSopr oirieo hem troeh gdolh otpl hHomh tHtih oiel hem heirh aiS ngdo oilkdo at heir׃ 
joshua 6:21	oiHrimo at kl aSr beir maiS oed aSh mner oed cqn oed Sor oSh oHmor lpi Hrb׃ 
joshua 6:22	olSnim hanSim hmrglim at harz amr ihoSe bao bit haSh hconh ohoziao mSm at haSh oat kl aSr lh kaSr nSbetm lh׃ 
joshua 6:23	oibao hnerim hmrglim oiziao at rHb oat abih oat amh oat aHih oat kl aSr lh oat kl mSpHotih hoziao oiniHom mHoz lmHnh iSral׃ 
joshua 6:24	oheir Srpo baS okl aSr bh rq hksp ohchb okli hnHSt ohbrcl ntno aozr bit ihoh׃ 
joshua 6:25	oat rHb hconh oat bit abih oat kl aSr lh hHih ihoSe otSb bqrb iSral ed hiom hch ki hHbiah at hmlakim aSr SlH ihoSe lrgl at iriHo׃ 
joshua 6:26	oiSbe ihoSe bet hhia lamr aror haiS lpni ihoh aSr iqom obnh at heir hcat at iriHo bbkro iisdnh obzeiro izib dltih׃ 
joshua 6:27	oihi ihoh at ihoSe oihi Smeo bkl harz׃ 
joshua 7:1	oimelo bni iSral mel bHrm oiqH ekn bn krmi bn cbdi bn crH lmTh ihodh mn hHrm oiHr ap ihoh bbni iSral׃ 
joshua 7:2	oiSlH ihoSe anSim miriHo hei aSr em bit aon mqdm lbit al oiamr alihm lamr elo orglo at harz oielo hanSim oirglo at hei׃ 
joshua 7:3	oiSbo al ihoSe oiamro alio al iel kl hem kalpim aiS ao kSlSt alpim aiS ielo oiko at hei al tige Smh at kl hem ki meT hmh׃ 
joshua 7:4	oielo mn hem Smh kSlSt alpim aiS oinso lpni anSi hei׃ 
joshua 7:5	oiko mhm anSi hei kSlSim oSSh aiS oirdpom lpni hSer ed hSbrim oikom bmord oims lbb hem oihi lmim׃ 
joshua 7:6	oiqre ihoSe Smltio oipl el pnio arzh lpni aron ihoh ed herb hoa ocqni iSral oielo epr el raSm׃ 
joshua 7:7	oiamr ihoSe ahh adni ihoh lmh hebrt hebir at hem hch at hirdn ltt atno bid hamri lhabidno olo hoalno onSb bebr hirdn׃ 
joshua 7:8	bi adni mh amr aHri aSr hpk iSral erp lpni aibio׃ 
joshua 7:9	oiSmeo hkneni okl iSbi harz onsbo elino ohkrito at Smno mn harz omh teSh lSmk hgdol׃ 
joshua 7:10	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe qm lk lmh ch ath npl el pnik׃ 
joshua 7:11	HTa iSral ogm ebro at briti aSr zoiti aotm ogm lqHo mn hHrm ogm gnbo ogm kHSo ogm Smo bklihm׃ 
joshua 7:12	ola iklo bni iSral lqom lpni aibihm erp ipno lpni aibihm ki hio lHrm la aosip lhiot emkm am la tSmido hHrm mqrbkm׃ 
joshua 7:13	qm qdS at hem oamrt htqdSo lmHr ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral Hrm bqrbk iSral la tokl lqom lpni aibik ed hsirkm hHrm mqrbkm׃ 
joshua 7:14	onqrbtm bbqr lSbTikm ohih hSbT aSr ilkdno ihoh iqrb lmSpHot ohmSpHh aSr ilkdnh ihoh tqrb lbtim ohbit aSr ilkdno ihoh iqrb lgbrim׃ 
joshua 7:15	ohih hnlkd bHrm iSrp baS ato oat kl aSr lo ki ebr at brit ihoh oki eSh nblh biSral׃ 
joshua 7:16	oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oiqrb at iSral lSbTio oilkd SbT ihodh׃ 
joshua 7:17	oiqrb at mSpHt ihodh oilkd at mSpHt hcrHi oiqrb at mSpHt hcrHi lgbrim oilkd cbdi׃ 
joshua 7:18	oiqrb at bito lgbrim oilkd ekn bn krmi bn cbdi bn crH lmTh ihodh׃ 
joshua 7:19	oiamr ihoSe al ekn bni Sim na kbod lihoh alhi iSral otn lo todh ohgd na li mh eSit al tkHd mmni׃ 
joshua 7:20	oien ekn at ihoSe oiamr amnh anki HTati lihoh alhi iSral okcat okcat eSiti׃ 
joshua 7:21	oarah bSll adrt Sner aHt Tobh omatim Sqlim ksp olSon chb aHd HmSim Sqlim mSqlo oaHmdm oaqHm ohnm Tmonim barz btok hahli ohksp tHtih׃ 
joshua 7:22	oiSlH ihoSe mlakim oirzo hahlh ohnh Tmonh bahlo ohksp tHtih׃ 
joshua 7:23	oiqHom mtok hahl oibaom al ihoSe oal kl bni iSral oizqm lpni ihoh׃ 
joshua 7:24	oiqH ihoSe at ekn bn crH oat hksp oat hadrt oat lSon hchb oat bnio oat bntio oat Soro oat Hmro oat zano oat ahlo oat kl aSr lo okl iSral emo oielo atm emq ekor׃ 
joshua 7:25	oiamr ihoSe mh ekrtno iekrk ihoh biom hch oirgmo ato kl iSral abn oiSrpo atm baS oisqlo atm babnim׃ 
joshua 7:26	oiqimo elio gl abnim gdol ed hiom hch oiSb ihoh mHron apo el kn qra Sm hmqom hhoa emq ekor ed hiom hch׃ 
joshua 8:1	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe al tira oal tHt qH emk at kl em hmlHmh oqom elh hei rah ntti bidk at mlk hei oat emo oat eiro oat arzo׃ 
joshua 8:2	oeSit lei olmlkh kaSr eSit liriHo olmlkh rq Sllh obhmth tbco lkm Sim lk arb leir maHrih׃ 
joshua 8:3	oiqm ihoSe okl em hmlHmh lelot hei oibHr ihoSe SlSim alp aiS gbori hHil oiSlHm lilh׃ 
joshua 8:4	oizo atm lamr rao atm arbim leir maHri heir al trHiqo mn heir mad ohiitm klkm nknim׃ 
joshua 8:5	oani okl hem aSr ati nqrb al heir ohih ki izao lqratno kaSr braSnh onsno lpnihm׃ 
joshua 8:6	oizao aHrino ed htiqno aotm mn heir ki iamro nsim lpnino kaSr braSnh onsno lpnihm׃ 
joshua 8:7	oatm tqmo mhaorb ohorStm at heir ontnh ihoh alhikm bidkm׃ 
joshua 8:8	ohih ktpSkm at heir tzito at heir baS kdbr ihoh teSo rao zoiti atkm׃ 
joshua 8:9	oiSlHm ihoSe oilko al hmarb oiSbo bin bit al obin hei mim lei oiln ihoSe blilh hhoa btok hem׃ 
joshua 8:10	oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oipqd at hem oiel hoa ocqni iSral lpni hem hei׃ 
joshua 8:11	okl hem hmlHmh aSr ato elo oigSo oibao ngd heir oiHno mzpon lei ohgi bino obin hei׃ 
joshua 8:12	oiqH kHmSt alpim aiS oiSm aotm arb bin bit al obin hei mim leir׃ 
joshua 8:13	oiSimo hem at kl hmHnh aSr mzpon leir oat eqbo mim leir oilk ihoSe blilh hhoa btok hemq׃ 
joshua 8:14	oihi kraot mlk hei oimhro oiSkimo oizao anSi heir lqrat iSral lmlHmh hoa okl emo lmoed lpni herbh ohoa la ide ki arb lo maHri heir׃ 
joshua 8:15	oingeo ihoSe okl iSral lpnihm oinso drk hmdbr׃ 
joshua 8:16	oiceqo kl hem aSr beir lrdp aHrihm oirdpo aHri ihoSe ointqo mn heir׃ 
joshua 8:17	ola nSar aiS bei obit al aSr la izao aHri iSral oiecbo at heir ptoHh oirdpo aHri iSral׃ 
joshua 8:18	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe nTh bkidon aSr bidk al hei ki bidk atnnh oiT ihoSe bkidon aSr bido al heir׃ 
joshua 8:19	ohaorb qm mhrh mmqomo oirozo knTot ido oibao heir oilkdoh oimhro oizito at heir baS׃ 
joshua 8:20	oipno anSi hei aHrihm oirao ohnh elh eSn heir hSmimh ola hih bhm idim lnos hnh ohnh ohem hns hmdbr nhpk al hrodp׃ 
joshua 8:21	oihoSe okl iSral rao ki lkd harb at heir oki elh eSn heir oiSbo oiko at anSi hei׃ 
joshua 8:22	oalh izao mn heir lqratm oihio liSral btok alh mch oalh mch oiko aotm ed blti hSair lo Srid opliT׃ 
joshua 8:23	oat mlk hei tpSo Hi oiqrbo ato al ihoSe׃ 
joshua 8:24	oihi kklot iSral lhrg at kl iSbi hei bSdh bmdbr aSr rdpom bo oiplo klm lpi Hrb ed tmm oiSbo kl iSral hei oiko ath lpi Hrb׃ 
joshua 8:25	oihi kl hnplim biom hhoa maiS oed aSh Snim eSr alp kl anSi hei׃ 
joshua 8:26	oihoSe la hSib ido aSr nTh bkidon ed aSr hHrim at kl iSbi hei׃ 
joshua 8:27	rq hbhmh oSll heir hhia bcco lhm iSral kdbr ihoh aSr zoh at ihoSe׃ 
joshua 8:28	oiSrp ihoSe at hei oiSimh tl eolm Smmh ed hiom hch׃ 
joshua 8:29	oat mlk hei tlh el hez ed et herb okboa hSmS zoh ihoSe oirido at nblto mn hez oiSliko aoth al ptH Ser heir oiqimo elio gl abnim gdol ed hiom hch׃ 
joshua 8:30	ac ibnh ihoSe mcbH lihoh alhi iSral bhr eibl׃ 
joshua 8:31	kaSr zoh mSh ebd ihoh at bni iSral kktob bspr tort mSh mcbH abnim Slmot aSr la hnip elihn brcl oielo elio elot lihoh oicbHo Slmim׃ 
joshua 8:32	oiktb Sm el habnim at mSnh tort mSh aSr ktb lpni bni iSral׃

joshua 8:34	oaHri kn qra at kl dbri htorh hbrkh ohqllh kkl hktob bspr htorh׃
