joshua 9:1	oihi kSme kl hmlkim aSr bebr hirdn bhr obSplh obkl Hop him hgdol al mol hlbnon hHti ohamri hkneni hprci hHoi ohibosi׃ 
joshua 9:2	oitqbzo iHdo lhlHm em ihoSe oem iSral ph aHd׃ 
joshua 9:3	oiSbi gbeon Smeo at aSr eSh ihoSe liriHo olei׃ 
joshua 9:4	oieSo gm hmh bermh oilko oizTiro oiqHo Sqim blim lHmorihm onadot iin blim ombqeim omzrrim׃ 
joshua 9:5	onelot blot omTlaot brglihm oSlmot blot elihm okl lHm zidm ibS hih nqdim׃ 
joshua 9:6	oilko al ihoSe al hmHnh hglgl oiamro alio oal aiS iSral marz rHoqh bano oeth krto lno brit׃ 
joshua 9:7	oiamro aiS iSral al hHoi aoli bqrbi ath ioSb oaik akrot lk brit׃ 
joshua 9:8	oiamro al ihoSe ebdik anHno oiamr alhm ihoSe mi atm omain tbao׃ 
joshua 9:9	oiamro alio marz rHoqh mad bao ebdik lSm ihoh alhik ki Smeno Smeo oat kl aSr eSh bmzrim׃ 
joshua 9:10	oat kl aSr eSh lSni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn lsiHon mlk HSbon oleog mlk hbSn aSr beStrot׃ 
joshua 9:11	oiamro alino cqinino okl iSbi arzno lamr qHo bidkm zidh ldrk olko lqratm oamrtm alihm ebdikm anHno oeth krto lno brit׃ 
joshua 9:12	ch lHmno Hm hzTidno ato mbtino biom zatno llkt alikm oeth hnh ibS ohih nqdim׃ 
joshua 9:13	oalh nadot hiin aSr mlano HdSim ohnh htbqeo oalh Slmotino onelino blo mrb hdrk mad׃ 
joshua 9:14	oiqHo hanSim mzidm oat pi ihoh la Salo׃ 
joshua 9:15	oieS lhm ihoSe Slom oikrt lhm brit lHiotm oiSbeo lhm nSiai hedh׃ 
joshua 9:16	oihi mqzh SlSt imim aHri aSr krto lhm brit oiSmeo ki qrbim hm alio obqrbo hm iSbim׃ 
joshua 9:17	oiseo bni iSral oibao al erihm biom hSliSi oerihm gbeon ohkpirh obarot oqrit ierim׃ 
joshua 9:18	ola hkom bni iSral ki nSbeo lhm nSiai hedh bihoh alhi iSral oilno kl hedh el hnSiaim׃ 
joshua 9:19	oiamro kl hnSiaim al kl hedh anHno nSbeno lhm bihoh alhi iSral oeth la nokl lnge bhm׃ 
joshua 9:20	cat neSh lhm ohHih aotm ola ihih elino qzp el hSboeh aSr nSbeno lhm׃ 
joshua 9:21	oiamro alihm hnSiaim iHio oihio HTbi ezim oSabi mim lkl hedh kaSr dbro lhm hnSiaim׃ 
joshua 9:22	oiqra lhm ihoSe oidbr alihm lamr lmh rmitm atno lamr rHoqim anHno mkm mad oatm bqrbno iSbim׃ 
joshua 9:23	oeth arorim atm ola ikrt mkm ebd oHTbi ezim oSabi mim lbit alhi׃ 
joshua 9:24	oieno at ihoSe oiamro ki hgd hgd lebdik at aSr zoh ihoh alhik at mSh ebdo ltt lkm at kl harz olhSmid at kl iSbi harz mpnikm onira mad lnpStino mpnikm oneSh at hdbr hch׃ 
joshua 9:25	oeth hnno bidk kTob okiSr beinik leSot lno eSh׃ 
joshua 9:26	oieS lhm kn oizl aotm mid bni iSral ola hrgom׃ 
joshua 9:27	oitnm ihoSe biom hhoa HTbi ezim oSabi mim ledh olmcbH ihoh ed hiom hch al hmqom aSr ibHr׃ 
joshua 10:1	oihi kSme adni zdq mlk iroSlm ki lkd ihoSe at hei oiHrimh kaSr eSh liriHo olmlkh kn eSh lei olmlkh oki hSlimo iSbi gbeon at iSral oihio bqrbm׃ 
joshua 10:2	oiirao mad ki eir gdolh gbeon kaHt eri hmmlkh oki hia gdolh mn hei okl anSih gbrim׃ 
joshua 10:3	oiSlH adni zdq mlk iroSlm al hohm mlk Hbron oal pram mlk irmot oal ipie mlk lkiS oal dbir mlk eglon lamr׃ 
joshua 10:4	elo ali oecrni onkh at gbeon ki hSlimh at ihoSe oat bni iSral׃ 
joshua 10:5	oiaspo oielo HmSt mlki hamri mlk iroSlm mlk Hbron mlk irmot mlk lkiS mlk eglon hm okl mHnihm oiHno el gbeon oilHmo elih׃ 
joshua 10:6	oiSlHo anSi gbeon al ihoSe al hmHnh hglglh lamr al trp idik mebdik elh alino mhrh ohoSieh lno oecrno ki nqbzo alino kl mlki hamri iSbi hhr׃ 
joshua 10:7	oiel ihoSe mn hglgl hoa okl em hmlHmh emo okl gbori hHil׃ 
joshua 10:8	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe al tira mhm ki bidk nttim la iemd aiS mhm bpnik׃ 
joshua 10:9	oiba alihm ihoSe ptam kl hlilh elh mn hglgl׃ 
joshua 10:10	oihmm ihoh lpni iSral oikm mkh gdolh bgbeon oirdpm drk melh bit Horn oikm ed ecqh oed mqdh׃ 
joshua 10:11	oihi bnsm mpni iSral hm bmord bit Horn oihoh hSlik elihm abnim gdlot mn hSmim ed ecqh oimto rbim aSr mto babni hbrd maSr hrgo bni iSral bHrb׃ 
joshua 10:12	ac idbr ihoSe lihoh biom tt ihoh at hamri lpni bni iSral oiamr leini iSral SmS bgbeon dom oirH bemq ailon׃ 
joshua 10:13	oidm hSmS oirH emd ed iqm goi aibio hla hia ktobh el spr hiSr oiemd hSmS bHzi hSmim ola az lboa kiom tmim׃ 
joshua 10:14	ola hih kiom hhoa lpnio oaHrio lSme ihoh bqol aiS ki ihoh nlHm liSral׃ 
joshua 10:15	oiSb ihoSe okl iSral emo al hmHnh hglglh׃ 
joshua 10:16	oinso HmSt hmlkim halh oiHbao bmerh bmqdh׃ 
joshua 10:17	oigd lihoSe lamr nmzao HmSt hmlkim nHbaim bmerh bmqdh׃ 
joshua 10:18	oiamr ihoSe glo abnim gdlot al pi hmerh ohpqido elih anSim lSmrm׃ 
joshua 10:19	oatm al temdo rdpo aHri aibikm ocnbtm aotm al ttnom lboa al erihm ki ntnm ihoh alhikm bidkm׃ 
joshua 10:20	oihi kklot ihoSe obni iSral lhkotm mkh gdolh mad ed tmm ohSridim Srdo mhm oibao al eri hmbzr׃ 
joshua 10:21	oiSbo kl hem al hmHnh al ihoSe mqdh bSlom la Hrz lbni iSral laiS at lSno׃ 
joshua 10:22	oiamr ihoSe ptHo at pi hmerh ohoziao ali at HmSt hmlkim halh mn hmerh׃ 
joshua 10:23	oieSo kn oiziao alio at HmSt hmlkim halh mn hmerh at mlk iroSlm at mlk Hbron at mlk irmot at mlk lkiS at mlk eglon׃ 
joshua 10:24	oihi khoziam at hmlkim halh al ihoSe oiqra ihoSe al kl aiS iSral oiamr al qzini anSi hmlHmh hhlkoa ato qrbo Simo at rglikm el zoari hmlkim halh oiqrbo oiSimo at rglihm el zoarihm׃ 
joshua 10:25	oiamr alihm ihoSe al tirao oal tHto Hcqo oamzo ki kkh ieSh ihoh lkl aibikm aSr atm nlHmim aotm׃ 
joshua 10:26	oikm ihoSe aHri kn oimitm oitlm el HmSh ezim oihio tloim el hezim ed herb׃ 
joshua 10:27	oihi let boa hSmS zoh ihoSe oiridom mel hezim oiSlkm al hmerh aSr nHbao Sm oiSmo abnim gdlot el pi hmerh ed ezm hiom hch׃ 
joshua 10:28	oat mqdh lkd ihoSe biom hhoa oikh lpi Hrb oat mlkh hHrm aotm oat kl hnpS aSr bh la hSair Srid oieS lmlk mqdh kaSr eSh lmlk iriHo׃ 
joshua 10:29	oiebr ihoSe okl iSral emo mmqdh lbnh oilHm em lbnh׃ 
joshua 10:30	oitn ihoh gm aoth bid iSral oat mlkh oikh lpi Hrb oat kl hnpS aSr bh la hSair bh Srid oieS lmlkh kaSr eSh lmlk iriHo׃ 
joshua 10:31	oiebr ihoSe okl iSral emo mlbnh lkiSh oiHn elih oilHm bh׃ 
joshua 10:32	oitn ihoh at lkiS bid iSral oilkdh biom hSni oikh lpi Hrb oat kl hnpS aSr bh kkl aSr eSh llbnh׃ 
joshua 10:33	ac elh hrm mlk gcr lecr at lkiS oikho ihoSe oat emo ed blti hSair lo Srid׃ 
joshua 10:34	oiebr ihoSe okl iSral emo mlkiS eglnh oiHno elih oilHmo elih׃ 
joshua 10:35	oilkdoh biom hhoa oikoh lpi Hrb oat kl hnpS aSr bh biom hhoa hHrim kkl aSr eSh llkiS׃ 
joshua 10:36	oiel ihoSe okl iSral emo meglonh Hbronh oilHmo elih׃ 
joshua 10:37	oilkdoh oikoh lpi Hrb oat mlkh oat kl erih oat kl hnpS aSr bh la hSair Srid kkl aSr eSh leglon oiHrm aoth oat kl hnpS aSr bh׃ 
joshua 10:38	oiSb ihoSe okl iSral emo dbrh oilHm elih׃ 
joshua 10:39	oilkdh oat mlkh oat kl erih oikom lpi Hrb oiHrimo at kl npS aSr bh la hSair Srid kaSr eSh lHbron kn eSh ldbrh olmlkh okaSr eSh llbnh olmlkh׃ 
joshua 10:40	oikh ihoSe at kl harz hhr ohngb ohSplh ohaSdot oat kl mlkihm la hSair Srid oat kl hnSmh hHrim kaSr zoh ihoh alhi iSral׃ 
joshua 10:41	oikm ihoSe mqdS brne oed ech oat kl arz gSn oed gbeon׃ 
joshua 10:42	oat kl hmlkim halh oat arzm lkd ihoSe pem aHt ki ihoh alhi iSral nlHm liSral׃ 
joshua 10:43	oiSb ihoSe okl iSral emo al hmHnh hglglh׃ 
joshua 11:1	oihi kSme ibin mlk Hzor oiSlH al iobb mlk mdon oal mlk Smron oal mlk akSp׃ 
joshua 11:2	oal hmlkim aSr mzpon bhr oberbh ngb knrot obSplh obnpot dor mim׃ 
joshua 11:3	hkneni mmcrH omim ohamri ohHti ohprci ohibosi bhr ohHoi tHt Hrmon barz hmzph׃ 
joshua 11:4	oizao hm okl mHnihm emm em rb kHol aSr el Spt him lrb osos orkb rb mad׃ 
joshua 11:5	oioedo kl hmlkim halh oibao oiHno iHdo al mi mrom lhlHm em iSral׃ 
joshua 11:6	oiamr ihoh al ihoSe al tira mpnihm ki mHr ket hcat anki ntn at klm Hllim lpni iSral at sosihm teqr oat mrkbtihm tSrp baS׃ 
joshua 11:7	oiba ihoSe okl em hmlHmh emo elihm el mi mrom ptam oiplo bhm׃ 
joshua 11:8	oitnm ihoh bid iSral oikom oirdpom ed zidon rbh oed mSrpot mim oed bqet mzph mcrHh oikm ed blti hSair lhm Srid׃ 
joshua 11:9	oieS lhm ihoSe kaSr amr lo ihoh at sosihm eqr oat mrkbtihm Srp baS׃ 
joshua 11:10	oiSb ihoSe bet hhia oilkd at Hzor oat mlkh hkh bHrb ki Hzor lpnim hia raS kl hmmlkot halh׃ 
joshua 11:11	oiko at kl hnpS aSr bh lpi Hrb hHrm la notr kl nSmh oat Hzor Srp baS׃ 
joshua 11:12	oat kl eri hmlkim halh oat kl mlkihm lkd ihoSe oikm lpi Hrb hHrim aotm kaSr zoh mSh ebd ihoh׃ 
joshua 11:13	rq kl herim hemdot el tlm la Srpm iSral colti at Hzor lbdh Srp ihoSe׃ 
joshua 11:14	okl Sll herim halh ohbhmh bcco lhm bni iSral rq at kl hadm hko lpi Hrb ed hSmdm aotm la hSairo kl nSmh׃ 
joshua 11:15	kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh ebdo kn zoh mSh at ihoSe okn eSh ihoSe la hsir dbr mkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
joshua 11:16	oiqH ihoSe at kl harz hcat hhr oat kl hngb oat kl arz hgSn oat hSplh oat herbh oat hr iSral oSplth׃ 
joshua 11:17	mn hhr hHlq heolh Seir oed bel gd bbqet hlbnon tHt hr Hrmon oat kl mlkihm lkd oikm oimitm׃ 
joshua 11:18	imim rbim eSh ihoSe at kl hmlkim halh mlHmh׃ 
joshua 11:19	la hith eir aSr hSlimh al bni iSral blti hHoi iSbi gbeon at hkl lqHo bmlHmh׃ 
joshua 11:20	ki mat ihoh hith lHcq at lbm lqrat hmlHmh at iSral lmen hHrimm lblti hiot lhm tHnh ki lmen hSmidm kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh׃ 
joshua 11:21	oiba ihoSe bet hhia oikrt at henqim mn hhr mn Hbron mn dbr mn enb omkl hr ihodh omkl hr iSral em erihm hHrimm ihoSe׃ 
joshua 11:22	la notr enqim barz bni iSral rq bech bgt obaSdod nSaro׃ 
joshua 11:23	oiqH ihoSe at kl harz kkl aSr dbr ihoh al mSh oitnh ihoSe lnHlh liSral kmHlqtm lSbTihm oharz SqTh mmlHmh׃ 
joshua 12:1	oalh mlki harz aSr hko bni iSral oirSo at arzm bebr hirdn mcrHh hSmS mnHl arnon ed hr Hrmon okl herbh mcrHh׃ 
joshua 12:2	siHon mlk hamri hioSb bHSbon mSl meroer aSr el Spt nHl arnon otok hnHl oHzi hgled oed ibq hnHl gbol bni emon׃ 
joshua 12:3	oherbh ed im knrot mcrHh oed im herbh im hmlH mcrHh drk bit hiSmot omtimn tHt aSdot hpsgh׃ 
joshua 12:4	ogbol eog mlk hbSn mitr hrpaim hioSb beStrot obadrei׃ 
joshua 12:5	omSl bhr Hrmon obslkh obkl hbSn ed gbol hgSori ohmekti oHzi hgled gbol siHon mlk HSbon׃ 
joshua 12:6	mSh ebd ihoh obni iSral hkom oitnh mSh ebd ihoh irSh lraobni olgdi olHzi SbT hmnSh׃ 
joshua 12:7	oalh mlki harz aSr hkh ihoSe obni iSral bebr hirdn imh mbel gd bbqet hlbnon oed hhr hHlq helh Seirh oitnh ihoSe lSbTi iSral irSh kmHlqtm׃ 
joshua 12:8	bhr obSplh oberbh obaSdot obmdbr obngb hHti hamri ohkneni hprci hHoi ohibosi׃ 
joshua 12:9	mlk iriHo aHd mlk hei aSr mzd bit al aHd׃ 
joshua 12:10	mlk iroSlm aHd mlk Hbron aHd׃ 
joshua 12:11	mlk irmot aHd mlk lkiS aHd׃ 
joshua 12:12	mlk eglon aHd mlk gcr aHd׃ 
joshua 12:13	mlk dbr aHd mlk gdr aHd׃ 
joshua 12:14	mlk Hrmh aHd mlk erd aHd׃ 
joshua 12:15	mlk lbnh aHd mlk edlm aHd׃ 
joshua 12:16	mlk mqdh aHd mlk bit al aHd׃ 
joshua 12:17	mlk tpoH aHd mlk Hpr aHd׃ 
joshua 12:18	mlk apq aHd mlk lSron aHd׃ 
joshua 12:19	mlk mdon aHd mlk Hzor aHd׃ 
joshua 12:20	mlk Smron mraon aHd mlk akSp aHd׃ 
joshua 12:21	mlk tenk aHd mlk mgdo aHd׃ 
joshua 12:22	mlk qdS aHd mlk iqnem lkrml aHd׃ 
joshua 12:23	mlk dor lnpt dor aHd mlk goim lglgl aHd׃ 
joshua 12:24	mlk trzh aHd kl mlkim SlSim oaHd׃ 
joshua 13:1	oihoSe cqn ba bimim oiamr ihoh alio ath cqnth bat bimim oharz nSarh hrbh mad lrSth׃ 
joshua 13:2	cat harz hnSart kl glilot hplStim okl hgSori׃ 
joshua 13:3	mn hSiHor aSr el pni mzrim oed gbol eqron zponh lkneni tHSb HmSt srni plStim hecti ohaSdodi haSqloni hgti oheqroni oheoim׃ 
joshua 13:4	mtimn kl arz hkneni omerh aSr lzidnim ed apqh ed gbol hamri׃ 
joshua 13:5	oharz hgbli okl hlbnon mcrH hSmS mbel gd tHt hr Hrmon ed lboa Hmt׃ 
joshua 13:6	kl iSbi hhr mn hlbnon ed mSrpt mim kl zidnim anki aoriSm mpni bni iSral rq hplh liSral bnHlh kaSr zoitik׃ 
joshua 13:7	oeth Hlq at harz hcat bnHlh ltSet hSbTim oHzi hSbT hmnSh׃ 
joshua 13:8	emo hraobni ohgdi lqHo nHltm aSr ntn lhm mSh bebr hirdn mcrHh kaSr ntn lhm mSh ebd ihoh׃ 
joshua 13:9	meroer aSr el Spt nHl arnon oheir aSr btok hnHl okl hmiSr midba ed dibon׃ 
joshua 13:10	okl eri siHon mlk hamri aSr mlk bHSbon ed gbol bni emon׃ 
joshua 13:11	ohgled ogbol hgSori ohmekti okl hr Hrmon okl hbSn ed slkh׃ 
joshua 13:12	kl mmlkot eog bbSn aSr mlk beStrot obadrei hoa nSar mitr hrpaim oikm mSh oirSm׃ 
joshua 13:13	ola horiSo bni iSral at hgSori oat hmekti oiSb gSor omekt bqrb iSral ed hiom hch׃ 
joshua 13:14	rq lSbT hloi la ntn nHlh aSi ihoh alhi iSral hoa nHlto kaSr dbr lo׃ 
joshua 13:15	oitn mSh lmTh bni raobn lmSpHtm׃ 
joshua 13:16	oihi lhm hgbol meroer aSr el Spt nHl arnon oheir aSr btok hnHl okl hmiSr el midba׃ 
joshua 13:17	HSbon okl erih aSr bmiSr dibon obmot bel obit bel meon׃ 
joshua 13:18	oihzh oqdmt ompet׃ 
joshua 13:19	oqritim oSbmh ozrt hSHr bhr hemq׃ 
joshua 13:20	obit peor oaSdot hpsgh obit hiSmot׃ 
joshua 13:21	okl eri hmiSr okl mmlkot siHon mlk hamri aSr mlk bHSbon aSr hkh mSh ato oat nSiai mdin at aoi oat rqm oat zor oat Hor oat rbe nsiki siHon iSbi harz׃ 
joshua 13:22	oat blem bn beor hqosm hrgo bni iSral bHrb al Hllihm׃ 
joshua 13:23	oihi gbol bni raobn hirdn ogbol cat nHlt bni raobn lmSpHtm herim oHzrihn׃ 
joshua 13:24	oitn mSh lmTh gd lbni gd lmSpHtm׃ 
joshua 13:25	oihi lhm hgbol iecr okl eri hgled oHzi arz bni emon ed eroer aSr el pni rbh׃ 
joshua 13:26	omHSbon ed rmt hmzph obTnim ommHnim ed gbol ldbr׃ 
joshua 13:27	obemq bit hrm obit nmrh oskot ozpon itr mmlkot siHon mlk HSbon hirdn ogbl ed qzh im knrt ebr hirdn mcrHh׃ 
joshua 13:28	cat nHlt bni gd lmSpHtm herim oHzrihm׃ 
joshua 13:29	oitn mSh lHzi SbT mnSh oihi lHzi mTh bni mnSh lmSpHotm׃ 
joshua 13:30	oihi gbolm mmHnim kl hbSn kl mmlkot eog mlk hbSn okl Hot iair aSr bbSn SSim eir׃ 
joshua 13:31	oHzi hgled oeStrot oadrei eri mmlkot eog bbSn lbni mkir bn mnSh lHzi bni mkir lmSpHotm׃ 
joshua 13:32	alh aSr nHl mSh berbot moab mebr lirdn iriHo mcrHh׃ 
joshua 13:33	olSbT hloi la ntn mSh nHlh ihoh alhi iSral hoa nHltm kaSr dbr lhm׃ 
joshua 14:1	oalh aSr nHlo bni iSral barz knen aSr nHlo aotm alecr hkhn oihoSe bn non oraSi abot hmTot lbni iSral׃ 
joshua 14:2	bgorl nHltm kaSr zoh ihoh bid mSh ltSet hmTot oHzi hmTh׃ 
joshua 14:3	ki ntn mSh nHlt Sni hmTot oHzi hmTh mebr lirdn olloim la ntn nHlh btokm׃ 
joshua 14:4	ki hio bni iosp Sni mTot mnSh oaprim ola ntno Hlq lloim barz ki am erim lSbt omgrSihm lmqnihm olqninm׃ 
joshua 14:5	kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo bni iSral oiHlqo at harz׃ 
joshua 14:6	oigSo bni ihodh al ihoSe bglgl oiamr alio klb bn ipnh hqnci ath idet at hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al mSh aiS halhim el adoti oel adotik bqdS brne׃ 
joshua 14:7	bn arbeim Snh anki bSlH mSh ebd ihoh ati mqdS brne lrgl at harz oaSb ato dbr kaSr em lbbi׃ 
joshua 14:8	oaHi aSr elo emi hmsio at lb hem oanki mlati aHri ihoh alhi׃ 
joshua 14:9	oiSbe mSh biom hhoa lamr am la harz aSr drkh rglk bh lk thih lnHlh olbnik ed eolm ki mlat aHri ihoh alhi׃ 
joshua 14:10	oeth hnh hHih ihoh aoti kaSr dbr ch arbeim oHmS Snh mac dbr ihoh at hdbr hch al mSh aSr hlk iSral bmdbr oeth hnh anki hiom bn HmS oSmonim Snh׃ 
joshua 14:11	eodni hiom Hcq kaSr biom SlH aoti mSh kkHi ac okkHi eth lmlHmh olzat olboa׃ 
joshua 14:12	oeth tnh li at hhr hch aSr dbr ihoh biom hhoa ki ath Smet biom hhoa ki enqim Sm oerim gdlot bzrot aoli ihoh aoti ohorStim kaSr dbr ihoh׃ 
joshua 14:13	oibrkho ihoSe oitn at Hbron lklb bn ipnh lnHlh׃ 
joshua 14:14	el kn hith Hbron lklb bn ipnh hqnci lnHlh ed hiom hch ien aSr mla aHri ihoh alhi iSral׃ 
joshua 14:15	oSm Hbron lpnim qrit arbe hadm hgdol benqim hoa oharz SqTh mmlHmh׃ 
joshua 15:1	oihi hgorl lmTh bni ihodh lmSpHtm al gbol adom mdbr zn ngbh mqzh timn׃ 
joshua 15:2	oihi lhm gbol ngb mqzh im hmlH mn hlSn hpnh ngbh׃ 
joshua 15:3	oiza al mngb lmelh eqrbim oebr znh oelh mngb lqdS brne oebr Hzron oelh adrh onsb hqrqeh׃ 
joshua 15:4	oebr ezmonh oiza nHl mzrim ohih tzaot hgbol imh ch ihih lkm gbol ngb׃ 
joshua 15:5	ogbol qdmh im hmlH ed qzh hirdn ogbol lpat zponh mlSon him mqzh hirdn׃ 
joshua 15:6	oelh hgbol bit Hglh oebr mzpon lbit herbh oelh hgbol abn bhn bn raobn׃ 
joshua 15:7	oelh hgbol dbrh memq ekor ozponh pnh al hglgl aSr nkH lmelh admim aSr mngb lnHl oebr hgbol al mi ein SmS ohio tzatio al ein rgl׃ 
joshua 15:8	oelh hgbol gi bn hnm al ktp hibosi mngb hia iroSlm oelh hgbol al raS hhr aSr el pni gi hnm imh aSr bqzh emq rpaim zpnh׃ 
joshua 15:9	otar hgbol mraS hhr al mein mi nptoH oiza al eri hr epron otar hgbol belh hia qrit ierim׃ 
joshua 15:10	onsb hgbol mbelh imh al hr Seir oebr al ktp hr ierim mzponh hia kslon oird bit SmS oebr tmnh׃ 
joshua 15:11	oiza hgbol al ktp eqron zponh otar hgbol Skronh oebr hr hbelh oiza ibnal ohio tzaot hgbol imh׃ 
joshua 15:12	ogbol im himh hgdol ogbol ch gbol bni ihodh sbib lmSpHtm׃ 
joshua 15:13	olklb bn ipnh ntn Hlq btok bni ihodh al pi ihoh lihoSe at qrit arbe abi henq hia Hbron׃ 
joshua 15:14	oirS mSm klb at SloSh bni henq at SSi oat aHimn oat tlmi ilidi henq׃ 
joshua 15:15	oiel mSm al iSbi dbr oSm dbr lpnim qrit spr׃ 
joshua 15:16	oiamr klb aSr ikh at qrit spr olkdh ontti lo at eksh bti laSh׃ 
joshua 15:17	oilkdh etnial bn qnc aHi klb oitn lo at eksh bto laSh׃ 
joshua 15:18	oihi bboah otsitho lSaol mat abih Sdh otznH mel hHmor oiamr lh klb mh lk׃ 
joshua 15:19	otamr tnh li brkh ki arz hngb nttni ontth li glt mim oitn lh at glt eliot oat glt tHtiot׃ 
joshua 15:20	cat nHlt mTh bni ihodh lmSpHtm׃ 
joshua 15:21	oihio herim mqzh lmTh bni ihodh al gbol adom bngbh qbzal oedr oigor׃

joshua 15:23	oqdS oHzor oitnn׃

joshua 15:25	oHzor Hdth oqriot Hzron hia Hzor׃ 
joshua 15:26	amm oSme omoldh׃

joshua 15:30	oaltold oksil oHrmh׃ 
joshua 15:31	ozqlg omdmnh osnsnh׃

joshua 15:33	bSplh aStaol ozreh oaSnh׃ 
joshua 15:34	ocnoH oein gnim tpoH oheinm׃ 
joshua 15:35	irmot oedlm Sokh oecqh׃ 
joshua 15:36	oSerim oeditim ohgdrh ogdrtim erim arbe eSrh oHzrihn׃ 
joshua 15:37	znn oHdSh omgdl gd׃ 
joshua 15:38	odlen ohmzph oiqtal׃ 
joshua 15:39	lkiS obzqt oeglon׃ 
joshua 15:40	okbon olHms oktliS׃ 
joshua 15:41	ogdrot bit dgon onemh omqdh erim SS eSrh oHzrihn׃ 
joshua 15:42	lbnh oetr oeSn׃

joshua 15:44	oqeilh oakcib omraSh erim tSe oHzrihn׃ 
joshua 15:45	eqron obntih oHzrih׃ 
joshua 15:46	meqron oimh kl aSr el id aSdod oHzrihn׃ 
joshua 15:47	aSdod bnotih oHzrih ech bnotih oHzrih ed nHl mzrim ohim hgbol ogbol׃

joshua 15:49	odnh oqrit snh hia dbr׃ 
joshua 15:50	oenb oaStmh oenim׃ 
joshua 15:51	ogSn oHln oglh erim aHt eSrh oHzrihn׃ 
joshua 15:52	arb oromh oaSen׃ 
joshua 15:53	oinim obit tpoH oapqh׃

joshua 15:55	meon krml ocip oioTh׃

joshua 22:30	oiSme pinHs hkhn onSiai hedh oraSi alpi iSral aSr ato at hdbrim aSr dbro bni raobn obni gd obni mnSh oiiTb beinihm׃

judges 4:12	oigdo lsisra ki elh brq bn abinem hr tbor׃ 
judges 4:13	oiceq sisra at kl rkbo tSe maot rkb brcl oat kl hem aSr ato mHrSt hgoim al nHl qiSon׃ 
judges 4:14	otamr dbrh al brq qom ki ch hiom aSr ntn ihoh at sisra bidk hla ihoh iza lpnik oird brq mhr tbor oeSrt alpim aiS aHrio׃ 
judges 4:15	oihm ihoh at sisra oat kl hrkb oat kl hmHnh lpi Hrb lpni brq oird sisra mel hmrkbh oins brglio׃ 
judges 4:16	obrq rdp aHri hrkb oaHri hmHnh ed HrSt hgoim oipl kl mHnh sisra lpi Hrb la nSar ed aHd׃ 
judges 4:17	osisra ns brglio al ahl iel aSt Hbr hqini ki Slom bin ibin mlk Hzor obin bit Hbr hqini׃ 
judges 4:18	otza iel lqrat sisra otamr alio sorh adni sorh ali al tira oisr alih hahlh otksho bSmikh׃ 
judges 4:19	oiamr alih hSqini na meT mim ki zmati otptH at naod hHlb otSqho otksho׃ 
judges 4:20	oiamr alih emd ptH hahl ohih am aiS iboa oSalk oamr hiS ph aiS oamrt ain׃ 
judges 4:21	otqH iel aSt Hbr at itd hahl otSm at hmqbt bidh otboa alio blaT ottqe at hitd brqto otznH barz ohoa nrdm oiep oimt׃ 
judges 4:22	ohnh brq rdp at sisra otza iel lqrato otamr lo lk oarak at haiS aSr ath mbqS oiba alih ohnh sisra npl mt ohitd brqto׃ 
judges 4:23	oikne alhim biom hhoa at ibin mlk knen lpni bni iSral׃ 
judges 4:24	otlk id bni iSral hlok oqSh el ibin mlk knen ed aSr hkrito at ibin mlk knen׃

judges 5:2	bpre preot biSral bhtndb em brko ihoh׃

judges 5:22	ac hlmo eqbi sos mdhrot dhrot abirio׃ 
judges 5:23	aoro mroc amr mlak ihoh aro aror iSbih ki la bao lecrt ihoh lecrt ihoh bgborim׃

judges 9:2	dbro na bacni kl beli Skm mh Tob lkm hmSl bkm Sbeim aiS kl bni irbel am mSl bkm aiS aHd ockrtm ki ezmkm obSrkm ani׃ 
judges 9:3	oidbro aHi amo elio bacni kl beli Skm at kl hdbrim halh oiT lbm aHri abimlk ki amro aHino hoa׃ 
judges 9:4	oitno lo Sbeim ksp mbit bel brit oiSkr bhm abimlk anSim riqim opHcim oilko aHrio׃ 
judges 9:5	oiba bit abio eprth oihrg at aHio bni irbel Sbeim aiS el abn aHt oiotr iotm bn irbel hqTn ki nHba׃ 
judges 9:6	oiaspo kl beli Skm okl bit mloa oilko oimliko at abimlk lmlk em alon mzb aSr bSkm׃ 
judges 9:7	oigdo liotm oilk oiemd braS hr grcim oiSa qolo oiqra oiamr lhm Smeo ali beli Skm oiSme alikm alhim׃ 
judges 9:8	hlok hlko hezim lmSH elihm mlk oiamro lcit mlokh elino׃ 
judges 9:9	oiamr lhm hcit hHdlti at dSni aSr bi ikbdo alhim oanSim ohlkti lnoe el hezim׃ 
judges 9:10	oiamro hezim ltanh lki at mlki elino׃ 
judges 9:11	otamr lhm htanh hHdlti at mtqi oat tnobti hTobh ohlkti lnoe el hezim׃ 
judges 9:12	oiamro hezim lgpn lki at mloki elino׃ 
judges 9:13	otamr lhm hgpn hHdlti at tiroSi hmSmH alhim oanSim ohlkti lnoe el hezim׃ 
judges 9:14	oiamro kl hezim al haTd lk ath mlk elino׃ 
judges 9:15	oiamr haTd al hezim am bamt atm mSHim ati lmlk elikm bao Hso bzli oam ain tza aS mn haTd otakl at arci hlbnon׃ 
judges 9:16	oeth am bamt obtmim eSitm otmliko at abimlk oam Tobh eSitm em irbel oem bito oam kgmol idio eSitm lo׃ 
judges 9:17	aSr nlHm abi elikm oiSlk at npSo mngd oizl atkm mid mdin׃ 
judges 9:18	oatm qmtm el bit abi hiom othrgo at bnio Sbeim aiS el abn aHt otmliko at abimlk bn amto el beli Skm ki aHikm hoa׃ 
judges 9:19	oam bamt obtmim eSitm em irbel oem bito hiom hch SmHo babimlk oiSmH gm hoa bkm׃ 
judges 9:20	oam ain tza aS mabimlk otakl at beli Skm oat bit mloa otza aS mbeli Skm ombit mloa otakl at abimlk׃ 
judges 9:21	oins iotm oibrH oilk barh oiSb Sm mpni abimlk aHio׃ 
judges 9:22	oiSr abimlk el iSral SlS Snim׃ 
judges 9:23	oiSlH alhim roH reh bin abimlk obin beli Skm oibgdo beli Skm babimlk׃ 
judges 9:24	lboa Hms Sbeim bni irbel odmm lSom el abimlk aHihm aSr hrg aotm oel beli Skm aSr Hcqo at idio lhrg at aHio׃ 
judges 9:25	oiSimo lo beli Skm marbim el raSi hhrim oigclo at kl aSr iebr elihm bdrk oigd labimlk׃ 
judges 9:26	oiba gel bn ebd oaHio oiebro bSkm oibTHo bo beli Skm׃ 
judges 9:27	oizao hSdh oibzro at krmihm oidrko oieSo hlolim oibao bit alhihm oiaklo oiSto oiqllo at abimlk׃ 
judges 9:28	oiamr gel bn ebd mi abimlk omi Skm ki nebdno hla bn irbel ocbl pqido ebdo at anSi Hmor abi Skm omdoe nebdno anHno׃ 
judges 9:29	omi itn at hem hch bidi oasirh at abimlk oiamr labimlk rbh zbak ozah׃ 
judges 9:30	oiSme cbl Sr heir at dbri gel bn ebd oiHr apo׃ 
judges 9:31	oiSlH mlakim al abimlk btrmh lamr hnh gel bn ebd oaHio baim Skmh ohnm zrim at heir elik׃ 
judges 9:32	oeth qom lilh ath ohem aSr atk oarb bSdh׃ 
judges 9:33	ohih bbqr kcrH hSmS tSkim opSTt el heir ohnh hoa ohem aSr ato izaim alik oeSit lo kaSr tmza idk׃ 
judges 9:34	oiqm abimlk okl hem aSr emo lilh oiarbo el Skm arbeh raSim׃ 
judges 9:35	oiza gel bn ebd oiemd ptH Ser heir oiqm abimlk ohem aSr ato mn hmarb׃ 
judges 9:36	oira gel at hem oiamr al cbl hnh em iord mraSi hhrim oiamr alio cbl at zl hhrim ath rah kanSim׃ 
judges 9:37	oisp eod gel ldbr oiamr hnh em iordim mem Tbor harz oraS aHd ba mdrk alon meonnim׃ 
judges 9:38	oiamr alio cbl aih apoa pik aSr tamr mi abimlk ki nebdno hla ch hem aSr masth bo za na eth ohlHm bo׃ 
judges 9:39	oiza gel lpni beli Skm oilHm babimlk׃ 
judges 9:40	oirdpho abimlk oins mpnio oiplo Hllim rbim ed ptH hSer׃ 
judges 9:41	oiSb abimlk baromh oigrS cbl at gel oat aHio mSbt bSkm׃ 
judges 9:42	oihi mmHrt oiza hem hSdh oigdo labimlk׃ 
judges 9:43	oiqH at hem oiHzm lSlSh raSim oiarb bSdh oira ohnh hem iza mn heir oiqm elihm oikm׃ 
judges 9:44	oabimlk ohraSim aSr emo pSTo oiemdo ptH Ser heir oSni hraSim pSTo el kl aSr bSdh oikom׃ 
judges 9:45	oabimlk nlHm beir kl hiom hhoa oilkd at heir oat hem aSr bh hrg oitz at heir oicreh mlH׃ 
judges 9:46	oiSmeo kl beli mgdl Skm oibao al zriH bit al brit׃ 
judges 9:47	oigd labimlk ki htqbzo kl beli mgdl Skm׃ 
judges 9:48	oiel abimlk hr zlmon hoa okl hem aSr ato oiqH abimlk at hqrdmot bido oikrt Sokt ezim oiSah oiSm el Skmo oiamr al hem aSr emo mh raitm eSiti mhro eSo kmoni׃ 
judges 9:49	oikrto gm kl hem aiS Sokh oilko aHri abimlk oiSimo el hzriH oizito elihm at hzriH baS oimto gm kl anSi mgdl Skm kalp aiS oaSh׃ 
judges 9:50	oilk abimlk al tbz oiHn btbz oilkdh׃ 
judges 9:51	omgdl ec hih btok heir oinso Smh kl hanSim ohnSim okl beli heir oisgro bedm oielo el gg hmgdl׃ 
judges 9:52	oiba abimlk ed hmgdl oilHm bo oigS ed ptH hmgdl lSrpo baS׃ 
judges 9:53	otSlk aSh aHt plH rkb el raS abimlk otrz at glglto׃ 
judges 9:54	oiqra mhrh al hner nSa klio oiamr lo Slp Hrbk omottni pn iamro li aSh hrgtho oidqrho nero oimt׃ 
judges 9:55	oirao aiS iSral ki mt abimlk oilko aiS lmqmo׃ 
judges 9:56	oiSb alhim at ret abimlk aSr eSh labio lhrg at Sbeim aHio׃ 
judges 9:57	oat kl ret anSi Skm hSib alhim braSm otba alihm qllt iotm bn irbel׃ 
judges 10:1	oiqm aHri abimlk lhoSie at iSral tole bn poah bn dodo aiS iSSkr ohoa iSb bSmir bhr aprim׃ 
judges 10:2	oiSpT at iSral eSrim oSlS Snh oimt oiqbr bSmir׃ 
judges 10:3	oiqm aHrio iair hgledi oiSpT at iSral eSrim oStim Snh׃ 
judges 10:4	oihi lo SlSim bnim rkbim el SlSim eirim oSlSim eirim lhm lhm iqrao Hot iair ed hiom hch aSr barz hgled׃ 
judges 10:5	oimt iair oiqbr bqmon׃ 
judges 10:6	oispo bni iSral leSot hre beini ihoh oiebdo at hbelim oat heStrot oat alhi arm oat alhi zidon oat alhi moab oat alhi bni emon oat alhi plStim oiecbo at ihoh ola ebdoho׃ 
judges 10:7	oiHr ap ihoh biSral oimkrm bid plStim obid bni emon׃ 
judges 10:8	oirezo oirzzo at bni iSral bSnh hhia Smnh eSrh Snh at kl bni iSral aSr bebr hirdn barz hamri aSr bgled׃ 
judges 10:9	oiebro bni emon at hirdn lhlHm gm bihodh obbnimin obbit aprim otzr liSral mad׃ 
judges 10:10	oiceqo bni iSral al ihoh lamr HTano lk oki ecbno at alhino onebd at hbelim׃ 
judges 10:11	oiamr ihoh al bni iSral hla mmzrim omn hamri omn bni emon omn plStim׃ 
judges 10:12	ozidonim oemlq omeon lHzo atkm otzeqo ali oaoSieh atkm midm׃ 
judges 10:13	oatm ecbtm aoti otebdo alhim aHrim lkn la aosip lhoSie atkm׃ 
judges 10:14	lko oceqo al halhim aSr bHrtm bm hmh ioSieo lkm bet zrtkm׃

judges 10:16	oisiro at alhi hnkr mqrbm oiebdo at ihoh otqzr npSo beml iSral׃ 
judges 10:17	oizeqo bni emon oiHno bgled oiaspo bni iSral oiHno bmzph׃ 
judges 10:18	oiamro hem Sri gled aiS al reho mi haiS aSr iHl lhlHm bbni emon ihih lraS lkl iSbi gled׃ 
judges 11:1	oiptH hgledi hih gbor Hil ohoa bn aSh conh oiold gled at iptH׃

judges 11:3	oibrH iptH mpni aHio oiSb barz Tob oitlqTo al iptH anSim riqim oizao emo׃ 
judges 11:4	oihi mimim oilHmo bni emon em iSral׃ 
judges 11:5	oihi kaSr nlHmo bni emon em iSral oilko cqni gled lqHt at iptH marz Tob׃ 
judges 11:6	oiamro liptH lkh ohiith lno lqzin onlHmh bbni emon׃ 
judges 11:7	oiamr iptH lcqni gled hla atm Snatm aoti otgrSoni mbit abi omdoe batm ali eth kaSr zr lkm׃ 
judges 11:8	oiamro cqni gled al iptH lkn eth Sbno alik ohlkt emno onlHmt bbni emon ohiit lno lraS lkl iSbi gled׃ 
judges 11:9	oiamr iptH al cqni gled am mSibim atm aoti lhlHm bbni emon ontn ihoh aotm lpni anki ahih lkm lraS׃ 
judges 11:10	oiamro cqni gled al iptH ihoh ihih Sme binotino am la kdbrk kn neSh׃ 
judges 11:11	oilk iptH em cqni gled oiSimo hem aoto elihm lraS olqzin oidbr iptH at kl dbrio lpni ihoh bmzph׃ 
judges 11:12	oiSlH iptH mlakim al mlk bni emon lamr mh li olk ki bat ali lhlHm barzi׃ 
judges 11:13	oiamr mlk bni emon al mlaki iptH ki lqH iSral at arzi beloto mmzrim marnon oed hibq oed hirdn oeth hSibh athn bSlom׃ 
judges 11:14	oiosp eod iptH oiSlH mlakim al mlk bni emon׃ 
judges 11:15	oiamr lo kh amr iptH la lqH iSral at arz moab oat arz bni emon׃ 
judges 11:16	ki belotm mmzrim oilk iSral bmdbr ed im sop oiba qdSh׃ 
judges 11:17	oiSlH iSral mlakim al mlk adom lamr aebrh na barzk ola Sme mlk adom ogm al mlk moab SlH ola abh oiSb iSral bqdS׃ 
judges 11:18	oilk bmdbr oisb at arz adom oat arz moab oiba mmcrH SmS larz moab oiHnon bebr arnon ola bao bgbol moab ki arnon gbol moab׃ 
judges 11:19	oiSlH iSral mlakim al siHon mlk hamri mlk HSbon oiamr lo iSral nebrh na barzk ed mqomi׃ 
judges 11:20	ola hamin siHon at iSral ebr bgblo oiasp siHon at kl emo oiHno bihzh oilHm em iSral׃ 
judges 11:21	oitn ihoh alhi iSral at siHon oat kl emo bid iSral oikom oiirS iSral at kl arz hamri ioSb harz hhia׃ 
judges 11:22	oiirSo at kl gbol hamri marnon oed hibq omn hmdbr oed hirdn׃ 
judges 11:23	oeth ihoh alhi iSral horiS at hamri mpni emo iSral oath tirSno׃ 
judges 11:24	hla at aSr ioriSk kmoS alhik aoto tirS oat kl aSr horiS ihoh alhino mpnino aoto nirS׃ 
judges 11:25	oeth hTob Tob ath mblq bn zpor mlk moab hrob rb em iSral am nlHm nlHm bm׃ 
judges 11:26	bSbt iSral bHSbon obbnotih obereor obbnotih obkl herim aSr el idi arnon SlS maot Snh omdoe la hzltm bet hhia׃ 
judges 11:27	oanki la HTati lk oath eSh ati reh lhlHm bi iSpT ihoh hSpT hiom bin bni iSral obin bni emon׃ 
judges 11:28	ola Sme mlk bni emon al dbri iptH aSr SlH alio׃ 
judges 11:29	othi el iptH roH ihoh oiebr at hgled oat mnSh oiebr at mzph gled ommzph gled ebr bni emon׃ 
judges 11:30	oidr iptH ndr lihoh oiamr am nton ttn at bni emon bidi׃ 
judges 11:31	ohih hioza aSr iza mdlti biti lqrati bSobi bSlom mbni emon ohih lihoh ohelitho eolh׃ 
judges 11:32	oiebr iptH al bni emon lhlHm bm oitnm ihoh bido׃ 
judges 11:33	oikm meroer oed boak mnit eSrim eir oed abl krmim mkh gdolh mad oikneo bni emon mpni bni iSral׃ 
judges 11:34	oiba iptH hmzph al bito ohnh bto izat lqrato btpim obmHlot orq hia iHidh ain lo mmno bn ao bt׃ 
judges 11:35	oihi kraoto aoth oiqre at bgdio oiamr ahh bti hkre hkretni oat hiit bekri oanki pziti pi al ihoh ola aokl lSob׃ 
judges 11:36	otamr alio abi pzith at pik al ihoh eSh li kaSr iza mpik aHri aSr eSh lk ihoh nqmot maibik mbni emon׃ 
judges 11:37	otamr al abih ieSh li hdbr hch hrph mmni Snim HdSim oalkh oirdti el hhrim oabkh el btoli anki oreiti׃

judges 11:40	mimim imimh tlknh bnot iSral ltnot lbt iptH hgledi arbet imim bSnh׃ 
judges 12:1	oizeq aiS aprim oiebr zponh oiamro liptH mdoe ebrt lhlHm bbni emon olno la qrat llkt emk bitk nSrp elik baS׃ 
judges 12:2	oiamr iptH alihm aiS rib hiiti ani oemi obni emon mad oaceq atkm ola hoSetm aoti midm׃ 
judges 12:3	oarah ki aink moSie oaSimh npSi bkpi oaebrh al bni emon oitnm ihoh bidi olmh elitm ali hiom hch lhlHm bi׃ 
judges 12:4	oiqbz iptH at kl anSi gled oilHm at aprim oiko anSi gled at aprim ki amro pliTi aprim atm gled btok aprim btok mnSh׃ 
judges 12:5	oilkd gled at mebrot hirdn laprim ohih ki iamro pliTi aprim aebrh oiamro lo anSi gled haprti ath oiamr la׃

judges 13:1	oispo bni iSral leSot hre beini ihoh oitnm ihoh bid plStim arbeim Snh׃

judges 13:6	otba haSh otamr laiSh lamr aiS halhim ba ali omraho kmrah mlak halhim nora mad ola Saltiho ai mch hoa oat Smo la hgid li׃ 
judges 13:7	oiamr li hnk hrh oildt bn oeth al tSti iin oSkr oal takli kl Tmah ki ncir alhim ihih hner mn hbTn ed iom moto׃ 
judges 13:8	oietr mnoH al ihoh oiamr bi adoni aiS halhim aSr SlHt iboa na eod alino oiorno mh neSh lner hiold׃

judges 13:12	oiamr mnoH eth iba dbrik mh ihih mSpT hner omeSho׃

judges 13:14	mkl aSr iza mgpn hiin la takl oiin oSkr al tSt okl Tmah al takl kl aSr zoitih tSmr׃ 
judges 13:15	oiamr mnoH al mlak ihoh nezrh na aotk oneSh lpnik gdi ecim׃ 
judges 13:16	oiamr mlak ihoh al mnoH am tezrni la akl blHmk oam teSh elh lihoh telnh ki la ide mnoH ki mlak ihoh hoa׃ 
judges 13:17	oiamr mnoH al mlak ihoh mi Smk ki iba dbrik okbdnok׃ 
judges 13:18	oiamr lo mlak ihoh lmh ch tSal lSmi ohoa plai׃

judges 13:21	ola isp eod mlak ihoh lhrah al mnoH oal aSto ac ide mnoH ki mlak ihoh hoa׃ 
judges 13:22	oiamr mnoH al aSto mot nmot ki alhim raino׃

judges 14:1	oird SmSon tmnth oira aSh btmnth mbnot plStim׃

judges 14:3	oiamr lo abio oamo hain bbnot aHik obkl emi aSh ki ath holk lqHt aSh mplStim herlim oiamr SmSon al abio aoth qH li ki hia iSrh beini׃

judges 14:20	othi aSt SmSon lmreho aSr reh lo׃ 
judges 15:1	oihi mimim bimi qzir HTim oipqd SmSon at aSto bgdi ecim oiamr abah al aSti hHdrh ola ntno abih lboa׃ 
judges 15:2	oiamr abih amr amrti ki Sna Snath oatnnh lmrek hla aHth hqTnh Tobh mmnh thi na lk tHtih׃ 
judges 15:3	oiamr lhm SmSon nqiti hpem mplStim ki eSh ani emm reh׃ 
judges 15:4	oilk SmSon oilkd SlS maot Soelim oiqH lpdim oipn cnb al cnb oiSm lpid aHd bin Sni hcnbot btok׃ 
judges 15:5	oiber aS blpidim oiSlH bqmot plStim oiber mgdiS oed qmh oed krm cit׃

judges 15:7	oiamr lhm SmSon am teSon kcat ki am nqmti bkm oaHr aHdl׃

judges 15:9	oielo plStim oiHno bihodh oinTSo blHi׃

judges 15:11	oirdo SlSt alpim aiS mihodh al seip sle eiTm oiamro lSmSon hla idet ki mSlim bno plStim omh cat eSit lno oiamr lhm kaSr eSo li kn eSiti lhm׃ 
judges 15:12	oiamro lo lasrk irdno lttk bid plStim oiamr lhm SmSon hSbeo li pn tpgeon bi atm׃ 
judges 15:13	oiamro lo lamr la ki asr nasrk ontnok bidm ohmt la nmitk oiasrho bSnim ebtim HdSim oieloho mn hsle׃ 
judges 15:14	hoa ba ed lHi oplStim hrieo lqrato otzlH elio roH ihoh othiinh hebtim aSr el croeotio kpStim aSr bero baS oimso asorio mel idio׃ 
judges 15:15	oimza lHi Hmor Trih oiSlH ido oiqHh oik bh alp aiS׃

judges 15:18	oizma mad oiqra al ihoh oiamr ath ntt bid ebdk at htSoeh hgdlh hcat oeth amot bzma onplti bid herlim׃ 
judges 15:19	oibqe alhim at hmktS aSr blHi oizao mmno mim oiSt otSb roHo oiHi el kn qra Smh ein hqora aSr blHi ed hiom hch׃ 
judges 15:20	oiSpT at iSral bimi plStim eSrim Snh׃ 
judges 16:1	oilk SmSon ecth oira Sm aSh conh oiba alih׃ 
judges 16:2	lectim lamr ba SmSon hnh oisbo oiarbo lo kl hlilh bSer heir oitHrSo kl hlilh lamr ed aor hbqr ohrgnho׃ 
judges 16:3	oiSkb SmSon ed Hzi hlilh oiqm bHzi hlilh oiaHc bdltot Ser heir obSti hmcocot oisem em hbriH oiSm el ktpio oielm al raS hhr aSr el pni Hbron׃ 
judges 16:4	oihi aHri kn oiahb aSh bnHl Srq oSmh dlilh׃ 
judges 16:5	oielo alih srni plStim oiamro lh pti aoto orai bmh kHo gdol obmh nokl lo oasrnho lento oanHno ntn lk aiS alp omah ksp׃ 
judges 16:6	otamr dlilh al SmSon hgidh na li bmh kHk gdol obmh tasr lenotk׃ 
judges 16:7	oiamr alih SmSon am iasrni bSbeh itrim lHim aSr la Hrbo oHliti ohiiti kaHd hadm׃ 
judges 16:8	oielo lh srni plStim Sbeh itrim lHim aSr la Hrbo otasrho bhm׃ 
judges 16:9	oharb iSb lh bHdr otamr alio plStim elik SmSon ointq at hitrim kaSr intq ptil hnert bhriHo aS ola node kHo׃ 
judges 16:10	otamr dlilh al SmSon hnh htlt bi otdbr ali kcbim eth hgidh na li bmh tasr׃ 
judges 16:11	oiamr alih am asor iasroni bebtim HdSim aSr la neSh bhm mlakh oHliti ohiiti kaHd hadm׃ 
judges 16:12	otqH dlilh ebtim HdSim otasrho bhm otamr alio plStim elik SmSon oharb iSb bHdr ointqm mel cretio kHoT׃

judges 21:23	oieSo kn bni bnimn oiSao nSim lmsprm mn hmHllot aSr gclo oilko oiSobo al nHltm oibno at herim oiSbo bhm׃

judges 21:25	bimim hhm ain mlk biSral aiS hiSr beinio ieSh׃ 
1_samuel 1:1	oihi aiS aHd mn hrmtim zopim mhr aprim oSmo alqnh bn irHm bn alihoa bn tHo bn zop aprti׃ 
1_samuel 1:2	olo Sti nSim Sm aHt Hnh oSm hSnit pnnh oihi lpnnh ildim olHnh ain ildim׃ 
1_samuel 1:3	oelh haiS hhoa meiro mimim imimh lhStHot olcbH lihoh zbaot bSlh oSm Sni bni eli Hpni opnHs khnim lihoh׃ 
1_samuel 1:4	oihi hiom oicbH alqnh ontn lpnnh aSto olkl bnih obnotih mnot׃ 
1_samuel 1:5	olHnh itn mnh aHt apim ki at Hnh ahb oihoh sgr rHmh׃ 
1_samuel 1:6	okesth zrth gm kes bebor hremh ki sgr ihoh bed rHmh׃ 
1_samuel 1:7	okn ieSh Snh bSnh mdi elth bbit ihoh kn tkesnh otbkh ola takl׃ 
1_samuel 1:8	oiamr lh alqnh aiSh Hnh lmh tbki olmh la takli olmh ire lbbk hloa anki Tob lk meSrh bnim׃ 
1_samuel 1:9	otqm Hnh aHri aklh bSlh oaHri Sth oeli hkhn iSb el hksa el mcoct hikl ihoh׃ 
1_samuel 1:10	ohia mrt npS ottpll el ihoh obkh tbkh׃ 
1_samuel 1:11	otdr ndr otamr ihoh zbaot am rah trah beni amtk ockrtni ola tSkH at amtk ontth lamtk cre anSim onttio lihoh kl imi Hiio omorh la ielh el raSo׃ 
1_samuel 1:12	ohih ki hrbth lhtpll lpni ihoh oeli Smr at pih׃

1_samuel 1:14	oiamr alih eli ed mti tStkrin hsiri at iink melik׃

1_samuel 1:16	al ttn at amtk lpni bt bliel ki mrb SiHi okesi dbrti ed hnh׃

1_samuel 3:4	oiqra ihoh al Smoal oiamr hnni׃

1_samuel 8:7	oiamr ihoh al Smoal Sme bqol hem lkl aSr iamro alik ki la atk maso ki ati maso mmlk elihm׃ 
1_samuel 8:8	kkl hmeSim aSr eSo miom helti atm mmzrim oed hiom hch oiecbni oiebdo alhim aHrim kn hmh eSim gm lk׃ 
1_samuel 8:9	oeth Sme bqolm ak ki hed teid bhm ohgdt lhm mSpT hmlk aSr imlk elihm׃ 
1_samuel 8:10	oiamr Smoal at kl dbri ihoh al hem hSalim mato mlk׃ 
1_samuel 8:11	oiamr ch ihih mSpT hmlk aSr imlk elikm at bnikm iqH oSm lo bmrkbto obprSio orzo lpni mrkbto׃ 
1_samuel 8:12	olSom lo Sri alpim oSri HmSim olHrS HriSo olqzr qziro oleSot kli mlHmto okli rkbo׃ 
1_samuel 8:13	oat bnotikm iqH lrqHot olTbHot olapot׃ 
1_samuel 8:14	oat Sdotikm oat krmikm ocitikm hTobim iqH ontn lebdio׃ 
1_samuel 8:15	ocreikm okrmikm ieSr ontn lsrisio olebdio׃ 
1_samuel 8:16	oat ebdikm oat SpHotikm oat bHorikm hTobim oat Hmorikm iqH oeSh lmlakto׃ 
1_samuel 8:17	zankm ieSr oatm thio lo lebdim׃ 
1_samuel 8:18	oceqtm biom hhoa mlpni mlkkm aSr bHrtm lkm ola ienh ihoh atkm biom hhoa׃ 
1_samuel 8:19	oimano hem lSme bqol Smoal oiamro la ki am mlk ihih elino׃ 
1_samuel 8:20	ohiino gm anHno kkl hgoim oSpTno mlkno oiza lpnino onlHm at mlHmtno׃ 
1_samuel 8:21	oiSme Smoal at kl dbri hem oidbrm bacni ihoh׃ 
1_samuel 8:22	oiamr ihoh al Smoal Sme bqolm ohmlkt lhm mlk oiamr Smoal al anSi iSral lko aiS leiro׃ 
1_samuel 9:1	oihi aiS mbn imin oSmo qiS bn abial bn zror bn bkort bn apiH bn aiS imini gbor Hil׃ 
1_samuel 9:2	olo hih bn oSmo Saol bHor oTob oain aiS mbni iSral Tob mmno mSkmo omelh gbh mkl hem׃ 
1_samuel 9:3	otabdnh hatnot lqiS abi Saol oiamr qiS al Saol bno qH na atk at aHd mhnerim oqom lk bqS at hatnt׃ 
1_samuel 9:4	oiebr bhr aprim oiebr barz SlSh ola mzao oiebro barz Selim oain oiebr barz imini ola mzao׃ 
1_samuel 9:5	hmh bao barz zop oSaol amr lnero aSr emo lkh onSobh pn iHdl abi mn hatnot odag lno׃ 
1_samuel 9:6	oiamr lo hnh na aiS alhim beir hcat ohaiS nkbd kl aSr idbr boa iboa eth nlkh Sm aoli igid lno at drkno aSr hlkno elih׃ 
1_samuel 9:7	oiamr Saol lnero ohnh nlk omh nbia laiS ki hlHm acl mklino otSorh ain lhbia laiS halhim mh atno׃ 
1_samuel 9:8	oisp hner lenot at Saol oiamr hnh nmza bidi rbe Sql ksp ontti laiS halhim ohgid lno at drkno׃ 
1_samuel 9:9	lpnim biSral kh amr haiS blkto ldroS alhim lko onlkh ed hrah ki lnbia hiom iqra lpnim hrah׃ 
1_samuel 9:10	oiamr Saol lnero Tob dbrk lkh nlkh oilko al heir aSr Sm aiS halhim׃ 
1_samuel 9:11	hmh elim bmelh heir ohmh mzao nerot izaot lSab mim oiamro lhn hiS bch hrah׃ 
1_samuel 9:12	oteninh aotm otamrnh iS hnh lpnik mhr eth ki hiom ba leir ki cbH hiom lem bbmh׃ 
1_samuel 9:13	kbakm heir kn tmzaon ato bTrm ielh hbmth lakl ki la iakl hem ed bao ki hoa ibrk hcbH aHri kn iaklo hqraim oeth elo ki ato khiom tmzaon ato׃ 
1_samuel 9:14	oielo heir hmh baim btok heir ohnh Smoal iza lqratm lelot hbmh׃ 
1_samuel 9:15	oihoh glh at acn Smoal iom aHd lpni boa Saol lamr׃ 
1_samuel 9:16	ket mHr aSlH alik aiS marz bnimn omSHto lngid el emi iSral ohoSie at emi mid plStim ki raiti at emi ki bah zeqto ali׃ 
1_samuel 9:17	oSmoal rah at Saol oihoh enho hnh haiS aSr amrti alik ch iezr bemi׃ 
1_samuel 9:18	oigS Saol at Smoal btok hSer oiamr hgidh na li ai ch bit hrah׃ 
1_samuel 9:19	oien Smoal at Saol oiamr anki hrah elh lpni hbmh oakltm emi hiom oSlHtik bbqr okl aSr blbbk agid lk׃ 
1_samuel 9:20	olatnot habdot lk hiom SlSt himim al tSm at lbk lhm ki nmzao olmi kl Hmdt iSral hloa lk olkl bit abik׃ 
1_samuel 9:21	oien Saol oiamr hloa bn imini anki mqTni SbTi iSral omSpHti hzerh mkl mSpHot SbTi bnimn olmh dbrt ali kdbr hch׃ 
1_samuel 9:22	oiqH Smoal at Saol oat nero oibiam lSkth oitn lhm mqom braS hqroaim ohmh kSlSim aiS׃ 
1_samuel 9:23	oiamr Smoal lTbH tnh at hmnh aSr ntti lk aSr amrti alik Sim ath emk׃

1_samuel 9:25	oirdo mhbmh heir oidbr em Saol el hgg׃

1_samuel 9:27	hmh iordim bqzh heir oSmoal amr al Saol amr lner oiebr lpnino oiebr oath emd kiom oaSmiek at dbr alhim׃

1_samuel 10:3	oHlpt mSm ohlah obat ed alon tbor omzaok Sm SlSh anSim elim al halhim bit al aHd nSa SlSh gdiim oaHd nSa SlSt kkrot lHm oaHd nSa nbl iin׃

1_samuel 10:17	oizeq Smoal at hem al ihoh hmzph׃

1_samuel 10:20	oiqrb Smoal at kl SbTi iSral oilkd SbT bnimn׃

1_samuel 12:1	oiamr Smoal al kl iSral hnh Smeti bqlkm lkl aSr amrtm li oamlik elikm mlk׃ 
1_samuel 12:2	oeth hnh hmlk mthlk lpnikm oani cqnti oSbti obni hnm atkm oani hthlkti lpnikm mneri ed hiom hch׃ 
1_samuel 12:3	hnni eno bi ngd ihoh ongd mSiHo at Sor mi lqHti oHmor mi lqHti oat mi eSqti at mi rzoti omid mi lqHti kpr oaelim eini bo oaSib lkm׃ 
1_samuel 12:4	oiamro la eSqtno ola rzotno ola lqHt mid aiS maomh׃

1_samuel 13:1	bn Snh Saol bmlko oSti Snim mlk el iSral׃

1_samuel 13:3	oik iontn at nzib plStim aSr bgbe oiSmeo plStim oSaol tqe bSopr bkl harz lamr iSmeo hebrim׃ 
1_samuel 13:4	okl iSral Smeo lamr hkh Saol at nzib plStim ogm nbaS iSral bplStim oizeqo hem aHri Saol hglgl׃ 
1_samuel 13:5	oplStim naspo lhlHm em iSral SlSim alp rkb oSSt alpim prSim oem kHol aSr el Spt him lrb oielo oiHno bmkmS qdmt bit aon׃

1_samuel 13:14	oeth mmlktk la tqom bqS ihoh lo aiS klbbo oizoho ihoh lngid el emo ki la Smrt at aSr zok ihoh׃ 
1_samuel 13:15	oiqm Smoal oiel mn hglgl gbet bnimn oipqd Saol at hem hnmzaim emo kSS maot aiS׃

1_samuel 14:1	oihi hiom oiamr iontn bn Saol al hner nSa klio lkh onebrh al mzb plStim aSr mebr hlc olabio la hgid׃ 
1_samuel 14:2	oSaol ioSb bqzh hgbeh tHt hrmon aSr bmgron ohem aSr emo kSS maot aiS׃ 
1_samuel 14:3	oaHih bn aHTob aHi aikbod bn pinHs bn eli khn ihoh bSlo nSa apod ohem la ide ki hlk iontn׃ 
1_samuel 14:4	obin hmebrot aSr bqS iontn lebr el mzb plStim Sn hsle mhebr mch oSn hsle mhebr mch oSm haHd bozz oSm haHd snh׃ 
1_samuel 14:5	hSn haHd mzoq mzpon mol mkmS ohaHd mngb mol gbe׃ 
1_samuel 14:6	oiamr ihontn al hner nSa klio lkh onebrh al mzb herlim halh aoli ieSh ihoh lno ki ain lihoh mezor lhoSie brb ao bmeT׃ 
1_samuel 14:7	oiamr lo nSa klio eSh kl aSr blbbk nTh lk hnni emk klbbk׃ 
1_samuel 14:8	oiamr ihontn hnh anHno ebrim al hanSim onglino alihm׃

1_samuel 14:10	oam kh iamro elo elino oelino ki ntnm ihoh bidno och lno haot׃

1_samuel 14:12	oieno anSi hmzbh at iontn oat nSa klio oiamro elo alino onodieh atkm dbr oiamr iontn al nSa klio elh aHri ki ntnm ihoh bid iSral׃ 
1_samuel 14:13	oiel iontn el idio oel rglio onSa klio aHrio oiplo lpni iontn onSa klio mmott aHrio׃ 
1_samuel 14:14	othi hmkh hraSnh aSr hkh iontn onSa klio keSrim aiS kbHzi menh zmd Sdh׃ 
1_samuel 14:15	othi Hrdh bmHnh bSdh obkl hem hmzb ohmSHit Hrdo gm hmh otrgc harz othi lHrdt alhim׃ 
1_samuel 14:16	oirao hzpim lSaol bgbet bnimn ohnh hhmon nmog oilk ohlm׃

1_samuel 14:18	oiamr Saol laHih hgiSh aron halhim ki hih aron halhim biom hhoa obni iSral׃ 
1_samuel 14:19	oihi ed dbr Saol al hkhn ohhmon aSr bmHnh plStim oilk hlok orb oiamr Saol al hkhn asp idk׃ 
1_samuel 14:20	oiceq Saol okl hem aSr ato oibao ed hmlHmh ohnh hith Hrb aiS breho mhomh gdolh mad׃ 
1_samuel 14:21	ohebrim hio lplStim katmol SlSom aSr elo emm bmHnh sbib ogm hmh lhiot em iSral aSr em Saol oiontn׃ 
1_samuel 14:22	okl aiS iSral hmtHbaim bhr aprim Smeo ki nso plStim oidbqo gm hmh aHrihm bmlHmh׃ 
1_samuel 14:23	oioSe ihoh biom hhoa at iSral ohmlHmh ebrh at bit aon׃ 
1_samuel 14:24	oaiS iSral ngS biom hhoa oial Saol at hem lamr aror haiS aSr iakl lHm ed herb onqmti maibi ola Tem kl hem lHm׃ 
1_samuel 14:25	okl harz bao bier oihi dbS el pni hSdh׃ 
1_samuel 14:26	oiba hem al hier ohnh hlk dbS oain mSig ido al pio ki ira hem at hSbeh׃ 
1_samuel 14:27	oiontn la Sme bhSbie abio at hem oiSlH at qzh hmTh aSr bido oiTbl aoth biert hdbS oiSb ido al pio otranh einio׃ 
1_samuel 14:28	oien aiS mhem oiamr hSbe hSbie abik at hem lamr aror haiS aSr iakl lHm hiom oiep hem׃ 
1_samuel 14:29	oiamr iontn ekr abi at harz rao na ki aro eini ki Temti meT dbS hch׃ 
1_samuel 14:30	ap ki loa akl akl hiom hem mSll aibio aSr mza ki eth la rbth mkh bplStim׃ 
1_samuel 14:31	oiko biom hhoa bplStim mmkmS ailnh oiep hem mad׃ 
1_samuel 14:32	oieS hem al Sll oiqHo zan obqr obni bqr oiSHTo arzh oiakl hem el hdm׃ 
1_samuel 14:33	oigido lSaol lamr hnh hem HTaim lihoh lakl el hdm oiamr bgdtm glo ali hiom abn gdolh׃

1_samuel 14:35	oibn Saol mcbH lihoh ato hHl lbnot mcbH lihoh׃ 
1_samuel 14:36	oiamr Saol nrdh aHri plStim lilh onbch bhm ed aor hbqr ola nSar bhm aiS oiamro kl hTob beinik eSh oiamr hkhn nqrbh hlm al halhim׃

1_samuel 15:10	oihi dbr ihoh al Smoal lamr׃

1_samuel 19:4	oidbr ihontn bdod Tob al Saol abio oiamr alio al iHTa hmlk bebdo bdod ki loa HTa lk oki meSio Tob lk mad׃ 
1_samuel 19:5	oiSm at npSo bkpo oik at hplSti oieS ihoh tSoeh gdolh lkl iSral rait otSmH olmh tHTa bdm nqi lhmit at dod Hnm׃ 
1_samuel 19:6	oiSme Saol bqol ihontn oiSbe Saol Hi ihoh am iomt׃ 
1_samuel 19:7	oiqra ihontn ldod oigd lo ihontn at kl hdbrim halh oiba ihontn at dod al Saol oihi lpnio katmol SlSom׃ 
1_samuel 19:8	otosp hmlHmh lhiot oiza dod oilHm bplStim oik bhm mkh gdolh oinso mpnio׃ 
1_samuel 19:9	othi roH ihoh reh al Saol ohoa bbito ioSb oHnito bido odod mngn bid׃ 
1_samuel 19:10	oibqS Saol lhkot bHnit bdod obqir oipTr mpni Saol oik at hHnit bqir odod ns oimlT blilh hoa׃ 
1_samuel 19:11	oiSlH Saol mlakim al bit dod lSmro olhmito bbqr otgd ldod mikl aSto lamr am aink mmlT at npSk hlilh mHr ath momt׃ 
1_samuel 19:12	otrd mikl at dod bed hHlon oilk oibrH oimlT׃ 
1_samuel 19:13	otqH mikl at htrpim otSm al hmTh oat kbir hecim Smh mraStio otks bbgd׃ 
1_samuel 19:14	oiSlH Saol mlakim lqHt at dod otamr Hlh hoa׃ 
1_samuel 19:15	oiSlH Saol at hmlakim lraot at dod lamr helo ato bmTh ali lhmto׃ 
1_samuel 19:16	oibao hmlakim ohnh htrpim al hmTh okbir hecim mraStio׃ 
1_samuel 19:17	oiamr Saol al mikl lmh kkh rmitni otSlHi at aibi oimlT otamr mikl al Saol hoa amr ali SlHni lmh amitk׃ 
1_samuel 19:18	odod brH oimlT oiba al Smoal hrmth oigd lo at kl aSr eSh lo Saol oilk hoa oSmoal oiSbo bnoit׃ 
1_samuel 19:19	oigd lSaol lamr hnh dod bnoit brmh׃ 
1_samuel 19:20	oiSlH Saol mlakim lqHt at dod oira at lhqt hnbiaim nbaim oSmoal emd nzb elihm othi el mlaki Saol roH alhim oitnbao gm hmh׃ 
1_samuel 19:21	oigdo lSaol oiSlH mlakim aHrim oitnbao gm hmh oisp Saol oiSlH mlakim SlSim oitnbao gm hmh׃ 
1_samuel 19:22	oilk gm hoa hrmth oiba ed bor hgdol aSr bSko oiSal oiamr aiph Smoal odod oiamr hnh bnoit brmh׃ 
1_samuel 19:23	oilk Sm al noit brmh othi elio gm hoa roH alhim oilk hlok oitnba ed bao bnoit brmh׃ 
1_samuel 19:24	oipST gm hoa bgdio oitnba gm hoa lpni Smoal oipl erm kl hiom hhoa okl hlilh el kn iamro hgm Saol bnbiam׃ 
1_samuel 20:1	oibrH dod mnoit brmh oiba oiamr lpni ihontn mh eSiti mh eoni omh HTati lpni abik ki mbqS at npSi׃ 
1_samuel 20:2	oiamr lo Hlilh la tmot hnh lo eSh abi dbr gdol ao dbr qTn ola iglh at acni omdoe istir abi mmni at hdbr hch ain cat׃ 
1_samuel 20:3	oiSbe eod dod oiamr ide ide abik ki mzati Hn beinik oiamr al ide cat ihontn pn iezb oaolm Hi ihoh oHi npSk ki kpSe bini obin hmot׃ 
1_samuel 20:4	oiamr ihontn al dod mh tamr npSk oaeSh lk׃ 
1_samuel 20:5	oiamr dod al ihontn hnh HdS mHr oanki iSb aSb em hmlk lakol oSlHtni onstrti bSdh ed herb hSlSit׃ 
1_samuel 20:6	am pqd ipqdni abik oamrt nSal nSal mmni dod lroz bit lHm eiro ki cbH himim Sm lkl hmSpHh׃ 
1_samuel 20:7	am kh iamr Tob Slom lebdk oam Hrh iHrh lo de ki klth hreh memo׃ 
1_samuel 20:8	oeSit Hsd el ebdk ki bbrit ihoh hbat at ebdk emk oam iS bi eon hmitni ath oed abik lmh ch tbiani׃ 
1_samuel 20:9	oiamr ihontn Hlilh lk ki am ide ade ki klth hreh mem abi lboa elik ola ath agid lk׃ 
1_samuel 20:10	oiamr dod al ihontn mi igid li ao mh ienk abik qSh׃ 
1_samuel 20:11	oiamr ihontn al dod lkh onza hSdh oizao Snihm hSdh׃ 
1_samuel 20:12	oiamr ihontn al dod ihoh alhi iSral ki aHqr at abi ket mHr hSlSit ohnh Tob al dod ola ac aSlH alik ogliti at acnk׃ 
1_samuel 20:13	kh ieSh ihoh lihontn okh isip ki iiTb al abi at hreh elik ogliti at acnk oSlHtik ohlkt lSlom oihi ihoh emk kaSr hih em abi׃ 
1_samuel 20:14	ola am eodni Hi ola teSh emdi Hsd ihoh ola amot׃ 
1_samuel 20:15	ola tkrt at Hsdk mem biti ed eolm ola bhkrt ihoh at aibi dod aiS mel pni hadmh׃ 
1_samuel 20:16	oikrt ihontn em bit dod obqS ihoh mid aibi dod׃ 
1_samuel 20:17	oiosp ihontn lhSbie at dod bahbto ato ki ahbt npSo ahbo׃ 
1_samuel 20:18	oiamr lo ihontn mHr HdS onpqdt ki ipqd moSbk׃ 
1_samuel 20:19	oSlSt trd mad obat al hmqom aSr nstrt Sm biom hmeSh oiSbt azl habn hacl׃ 
1_samuel 20:20	oani SlSt hHzim zdh aorh lSlH li lmTrh׃

1_samuel 20:22	oam kh amr lelm hnh hHzim mmk ohlah lk ki SlHk ihoh׃ 
1_samuel 20:23	ohdbr aSr dbrno ani oath hnh ihoh bini obink ed eolm׃ 
1_samuel 20:24	oistr dod bSdh oihi hHdS oiSb hmlk el hlHm lakol׃ 
1_samuel 20:25	oiSb hmlk el moSbo kpem bpem al moSb hqir oiqm ihontn oiSb abnr mzd Saol oipqd mqom dod׃ 
1_samuel 20:26	ola dbr Saol maomh biom hhoa ki amr mqrh hoa blti Thor hoa ki la Thor׃ 
1_samuel 20:27	oihi mmHrt hHdS hSni oipqd mqom dod oiamr Saol al ihontn bno mdoe la ba bn iSi gm tmol gm hiom al hlHm׃ 
1_samuel 20:28	oien ihontn at Saol nSal nSal dod memdi ed bit lHm׃ 
1_samuel 20:29	oiamr SlHni na ki cbH mSpHh lno beir ohoa zoh li aHi oeth am mzati Hn beinik amlTh na oarah at aHi el kn la ba al SlHn hmlk׃ 
1_samuel 20:30	oiHr ap Saol bihontn oiamr lo bn neot hmrdot hloa ideti ki bHr ath lbn iSi lbStk olbSt erot amk׃ 
1_samuel 20:31	ki kl himim aSr bn iSi Hi el hadmh la tkon ath omlkotk oeth SlH oqH ato ali ki bn mot hoa׃ 
1_samuel 20:32	oien ihontn at Saol abio oiamr alio lmh iomt mh eSh׃ 
1_samuel 20:33	oiTl Saol at hHnit elio lhkto oide ihontn ki klh hia mem abio lhmit at dod׃ 
1_samuel 20:34	oiqm ihontn mem hSlHn bHri ap ola akl biom hHdS hSni lHm ki nezb al dod ki hklmo abio׃ 
1_samuel 20:35	oihi bbqr oiza ihontn hSdh lmoed dod oner qTn emo׃ 
1_samuel 20:36	oiamr lnero rz mza na at hHzim aSr anki morh hner rz ohoa irh hHzi lhebro׃ 
1_samuel 20:37	oiba hner ed mqom hHzi aSr irh ihontn oiqra ihontn aHri hner oiamr hloa hHzi mmk ohlah׃ 
1_samuel 20:38	oiqra ihontn aHri hner mhrh HoSh al temd oilqT ner ihontn at hHzi oiba al adnio׃ 
1_samuel 20:39	ohner la ide maomh ak ihontn odod ideo at hdbr׃ 
1_samuel 20:40	oitn ihontn at klio al hner aSr lo oiamr lo lk hbia heir׃ 
1_samuel 20:41	hner ba odod qm mazl hngb oipl lapio arzh oiStHo SlS pemim oiSqo aiS at reho oibko aiS at reho ed dod hgdil׃ 
1_samuel 20:42	oiamr ihontn ldod lk lSlom aSr nSbeno Snino anHno bSm ihoh lamr ihoh ihih bini obink obin crei obin crek ed eolm oiqm oilk oihontn ba heir׃ 
1_samuel 21:1	oiba dod nbh al aHimlk hkhn oiHrd aHimlk lqrat dod oiamr lo mdoe ath lbdk oaiS ain atk׃ 
1_samuel 21:2	oiamr dod laHimlk hkhn hmlk zoni dbr oiamr ali aiS al ide maomh at hdbr aSr anki SlHk oaSr zoitk oat hnerim iodeti al mqom plni almoni׃ 
1_samuel 21:3	oeth mh iS tHt idk HmSh lHm tnh bidi ao hnmza׃ 
1_samuel 21:4	oien hkhn at dod oiamr ain lHm Hl al tHt idi ki am lHm qdS iS am nSmro hnerim ak maSh׃

1_samuel 21:6	oitn lo hkhn qdS ki la hih Sm lHm ki am lHm hpnim hmosrim mlpni ihoh lSom lHm Hm biom hlqHo׃ 
1_samuel 21:7	oSm aiS mebdi Saol biom hhoa nezr lpni ihoh oSmo dag hadmi abir hreim aSr lSaol׃ 
1_samuel 21:8	oiamr dod laHimlk oain iS ph tHt idk Hnit ao Hrb ki gm Hrbi ogm kli la lqHti bidi ki hih dbr hmlk nHoz׃

1_samuel 21:10	oiqm dod oibrH biom hhoa mpni Saol oiba al akiS mlk gt׃

1_samuel 21:12	oiSm dod at hdbrim halh blbbo oira mad mpni akiS mlk gt׃

1_samuel 21:15	Hsr mSgeim ani ki hbatm at ch lhStge eli hch iboa al biti׃

1_samuel 22:16	oiamr hmlk mot tmot aHimlk ath okl bit abik׃

1_samuel 24:5	oihi aHri kn oik lb dod ato el aSr krt at knp aSr lSaol׃

1_samuel 25:13	oiamr dod lanSio Hgro aiS at Hrbo oiHgro aiS at Hrbo oiHgr gm dod at Hrbo oielo aHri dod karbe maot aiS omatim iSbo el hklim׃ 
1_samuel 25:14	olabigil aSt nbl hgid ner aHd mhnerim lamr hnh SlH dod mlakim mhmdbr lbrk at adnino oieT bhm׃ 
1_samuel 25:15	ohanSim Tbim lno mad ola hklmno ola pqdno maomh kl imi hthlkno atm bhiotno bSdh׃ 
1_samuel 25:16	Homh hio elino gm lilh gm iomm kl imi hiotno emm reim hzan׃ 
1_samuel 25:17	oeth dei orai mh teSi ki klth hreh al adnino oel kl bito ohoa bn bliel mdbr alio׃ 
1_samuel 25:18	otmhr abogil otqH matim lHm oSnim nbli iin oHmS zan eSoot oHmS saim qli omah zmqim omatim dblim otSm el hHmrim׃ 
1_samuel 25:19	otamr lnerih ebro lpni hnni aHrikm bah olaiSh nbl la hgidh׃ 
1_samuel 25:20	ohih hia rkbt el hHmor oirdt bstr hhr ohnh dod oanSio irdim lqrath otpgS atm׃ 
1_samuel 25:21	odod amr ak lSqr Smrti at kl aSr lch bmdbr ola npqd mkl aSr lo maomh oiSb li reh tHt Tobh׃ 
1_samuel 25:22	kh ieSh alhim laibi dod okh isip am aSair mkl aSr lo ed hbqr mStin bqir׃ 
1_samuel 25:23	otra abigil at dod otmhr otrd mel hHmor otpl lapi dod el pnih otStHo arz׃ 
1_samuel 25:24	otpl el rglio otamr bi ani adni heon otdbr na amtk bacnik oSme at dbri amtk׃ 
1_samuel 25:25	al na iSim adni at lbo al aiS hbliel hch el nbl ki kSmo kn hoa nbl Smo onblh emo oani amtk la raiti at neri adni aSr SlHt׃ 
1_samuel 25:26	oeth adni Hi ihoh oHi npSk aSr mnek ihoh mboa bdmim ohoSe idk lk oeth ihio knbl aibik ohmbqSim al adni reh׃ 
1_samuel 25:27	oeth hbrkh hcat aSr hbia SpHtk ladni ontnh lnerim hmthlkim brgli adni׃ 
1_samuel 25:28	Sa na lpSe amtk ki eSh ieSh ihoh ladni bit namn ki mlHmot ihoh adni nlHm oreh la tmza bk mimik׃ 
1_samuel 25:29	oiqm adm lrdpk olbqS at npSk ohith npS adni zrorh bzror hHiim at ihoh alhik oat npS aibik iqlenh btok kp hqle׃ 
1_samuel 25:30	ohih ki ieSh ihoh ladni kkl aSr dbr at hTobh elik ozok lngid el iSral׃ 
1_samuel 25:31	ola thih cat lk lpoqh olmkSol lb ladni olSpk dm Hnm olhoSie adni lo ohiTb ihoh ladni ockrt at amtk׃ 
1_samuel 25:32	oiamr dod labigl brok ihoh alhi iSral aSr SlHk hiom hch lqrati׃ 
1_samuel 25:33	obrok Temk obrokh at aSr kltni hiom hch mboa bdmim ohSe idi li׃ 
1_samuel 25:34	oaolm Hi ihoh alhi iSral aSr mneni mhre atk ki loli mhrt otbati lqrati ki am notr lnbl ed aor hbqr mStin bqir׃ 
1_samuel 25:35	oiqH dod midh at aSr hbiah lo olh amr eli lSlom lbitk rai Smeti bqolk oaSa pnik׃ 
1_samuel 25:36	otba abigil al nbl ohnh lo mSth bbito kmSth hmlk olb nbl Tob elio ohoa Skr ed mad ola hgidh lo dbr qTn ogdol ed aor hbqr׃ 
1_samuel 25:37	oihi bbqr bzat hiin mnbl otgd lo aSto at hdbrim halh oimt lbo bqrbo ohoa hih labn׃ 
1_samuel 25:38	oihi keSrt himim oigp ihoh at nbl oimt׃ 
1_samuel 25:39	oiSme dod ki mt nbl oiamr brok ihoh aSr rb at rib Hrpti mid nbl oat ebdo HSk mreh oat ret nbl hSib ihoh braSo oiSlH dod oidbr babigil lqHth lo laSh׃ 
1_samuel 25:40	oibao ebdi dod al abigil hkrmlh oidbro alih lamr dod SlHno alik lqHtk lo laSh׃ 
1_samuel 25:41	otqm otStHo apim arzh otamr hnh amtk lSpHh lrHz rgli ebdi adni׃ 
1_samuel 25:42	otmhr otqm abigil otrkb el hHmor oHmS nertih hhlkot lrglh otlk aHri mlaki dod othi lo laSh׃ 
1_samuel 25:43	oat aHinem lqH dod micreal othiin gm Stihn lo lnSim׃ 
1_samuel 25:44	oSaol ntn at mikl bto aSt dod lplTi bn liS aSr mglim׃ 
1_samuel 26:1	oibao hcpim al Saol hgbeth lamr hloa dod msttr bgbet hHkilh el pni hiSimn׃ 
1_samuel 26:2	oiqm Saol oird al mdbr cip oato SlSt alpim aiS bHori iSral lbqS at dod bmdbr cip׃ 
1_samuel 26:3	oiHn Saol bgbet hHkilh aSr el pni hiSimn el hdrk odod iSb bmdbr oira ki ba Saol aHrio hmdbrh׃ 
1_samuel 26:4	oiSlH dod mrglim oide ki ba Saol al nkon׃ 
1_samuel 26:5	oiqm dod oiba al hmqom aSr Hnh Sm Saol oira dod at hmqom aSr Skb Sm Saol oabnr bn nr Sr zbao oSaol Skb bmegl ohem Hnim sbibto׃ 
1_samuel 26:6	oien dod oiamr al aHimlk hHti oal abiSi bn zroih aHi ioab lamr mi ird ati al Saol al hmHnh oiamr abiSi ani ard emk׃ 
1_samuel 26:7	oiba dod oabiSi al hem lilh ohnh Saol Skb iSn bmegl oHnito meokh barz mraSto oabnr ohem Skbim sbibto׃ 
1_samuel 26:8	oiamr abiSi al dod sgr alhim hiom at aoibk bidk oeth akno na bHnit obarz pem aHt ola aSnh lo׃ 
1_samuel 26:9	oiamr dod al abiSi al tSHitho ki mi SlH ido bmSiH ihoh onqh׃ 
1_samuel 26:10	oiamr dod Hi ihoh ki am ihoh igpno ao iomo iboa omt ao bmlHmh ird onsph׃ 
1_samuel 26:11	Hlilh li mihoh mSlH idi bmSiH ihoh oeth qH na at hHnit aSr mraSto oat zpHt hmim onlkh lno׃ 
1_samuel 26:12	oiqH dod at hHnit oat zpHt hmim mraSti Saol oilko lhm oain rah oain iode oain mqiz ki klm iSnim ki trdmt ihoh nplh elihm׃ 
1_samuel 26:13	oiebr dod hebr oiemd el raS hhr mrHq rb hmqom binihm׃ 
1_samuel 26:14	oiqra dod al hem oal abnr bn nr lamr hloa tenh abnr oien abnr oiamr mi ath qrat al hmlk׃ 
1_samuel 26:15	oiamr dod al abnr hloa aiS ath omi kmok biSral olmh la Smrt al adnik hmlk ki ba aHd hem lhSHit at hmlk adnik׃ 
1_samuel 26:16	la Tob hdbr hch aSr eSit Hi ihoh ki bni mot atm aSr la Smrtm el adnikm el mSiH ihoh oeth rah ai Hnit hmlk oat zpHt hmim aSr mraSto׃ 
1_samuel 26:17	oikr Saol at qol dod oiamr hqolk ch bni dod oiamr dod qoli adni hmlk׃ 
1_samuel 26:18	oiamr lmh ch adni rdp aHri ebdo ki mh eSiti omh bidi reh׃ 
1_samuel 26:19	oeth iSme na adni hmlk at dbri ebdo am ihoh hsitk bi irH mnHh oam bni hadm arorim hm lpni ihoh ki grSoni hiom mhstpH bnHlt ihoh lamr lk ebd alhim aHrim׃ 
1_samuel 26:20	oeth al ipl dmi arzh mngd pni ihoh ki iza mlk iSral lbqS at preS aHd kaSr irdp hqra bhrim׃ 
1_samuel 26:21	oiamr Saol HTati Sob bni dod ki la are lk eod tHt aSr iqrh npSi beinik hiom hch hnh hsklti oaSgh hrbh mad׃ 
1_samuel 26:22	oien dod oiamr hnh hHnit hmlk oiebr aHd mhnerim oiqHh׃

1_samuel 27:1	oiamr dod al lbo eth asph iom aHd bid Saol ain li Tob ki hmlT amlT al arz plStim onoaS mmni Saol lbqSni eod bkl gbol iSral onmlTti mido׃ 
1_samuel 27:2	oiqm dod oiebr hoa oSS maot aiS aSr emo al akiS bn meok mlk gt׃

1_samuel 27:4	oigd lSaol ki brH dod gt ola iosp eod lbqSo׃ 
1_samuel 27:5	oiamr dod al akiS am na mzati Hn beinik itno li mqom baHt eri hSdh oaSbh Sm olmh iSb ebdk beir hmmlkh emk׃

1_samuel 28:1	oihi bimim hhm oiqbzo plStim at mHnihm lzba lhlHm biSral oiamr akiS al dod ide tde ki ati tza bmHnh ath oanSik׃ 
1_samuel 28:2	oiamr dod al akiS lkn ath tde at aSr ieSh ebdk oiamr akiS al dod lkn Smr lraSi aSimk kl himim׃ 
1_samuel 28:3	oSmoal mt oispdo lo kl iSral oiqbrho brmh obeiro oSaol hsir habot oat hidenim mharz׃ 
1_samuel 28:4	oiqbzo plStim oibao oiHno bSonm oiqbz Saol at kl iSral oiHno bglbe׃ 
1_samuel 28:5	oira Saol at mHnh plStim oira oiHrd lbo mad׃ 
1_samuel 28:6	oiSal Saol bihoh ola enho ihoh gm bHlmot gm baorim gm bnbiam׃

1_samuel 28:9	otamr haSh alio hnh ath idet at aSr eSh Saol aSr hkrit at habot oat hideni mn harz olmh ath mtnqS bnpSi lhmitni׃ 
1_samuel 28:10	oiSbe lh Saol bihoh lamr Hi ihoh am iqrk eon bdbr hch׃ 
1_samuel 28:11	otamr haSh at mi aelh lk oiamr at Smoal heli li׃ 
1_samuel 28:12	otra haSh at Smoal otceq bqol gdol otamr haSh al Saol lamr lmh rmitni oath Saol׃ 
1_samuel 28:13	oiamr lh hmlk al tirai ki mh rait otamr haSh al Saol alhim raiti elim mn harz׃ 
1_samuel 28:14	oiamr lh mh taro otamr aiS cqn elh ohoa eTh meil oide Saol ki Smoal hoa oiqd apim arzh oiStHo׃ 
1_samuel 28:15	oiamr Smoal al Saol lmh hrgctni lhelot ati oiamr Saol zr li mad oplStim nlHmim bi oalhim sr meli ola enni eod gm bid hnbiam gm bHlmot oaqrah lk lhodieni mh aeSh׃ 
1_samuel 28:16	oiamr Smoal olmh tSalni oihoh sr melik oihi erk׃ 
1_samuel 28:17	oieS ihoh lo kaSr dbr bidi oiqre ihoh at hmmlkh midk oitnh lrek ldod׃ 
1_samuel 28:18	kaSr la Smet bqol ihoh ola eSit Hron apo bemlq el kn hdbr hch eSh lk ihoh hiom hch׃ 
1_samuel 28:19	oitn ihoh gm at iSral emk bid plStim omHr ath obnik emi gm at mHnh iSral itn ihoh bid plStim׃ 
1_samuel 28:20	oimhr Saol oipl mla qomto arzh oira mad mdbri Smoal gm kH la hih bo ki la akl lHm kl hiom okl hlilh׃ 
1_samuel 28:21	otboa haSh al Saol otra ki nbhl mad otamr alio hnh Smeh SpHtk bqolk oaSim npSi bkpi oaSme at dbrik aSr dbrt ali׃

1_samuel 29:7	oeth Sob olk bSlom ola teSh re beini srni plStim׃

1_samuel 30:17	oikm dod mhnSp oed herb lmHrtm ola nmlT mhm aiS ki am arbe maot aiS ner aSr rkbo el hgmlim oinso׃ 
1_samuel 30:18	oizl dod at kl aSr lqHo emlq oat Sti nSio hzil dod׃

1_samuel 30:20	oiqH dod at kl hzan ohbqr nhgo lpni hmqnh hhoa oiamro ch Sll dod׃

1_samuel 30:22	oien kl aiS re obliel mhanSim aSr hlko em dod oiamro ien aSr la hlko emi la ntn lhm mhSll aSr hzlno ki am aiS at aSto oat bnio oinhgo oilko׃

1_samuel 31:3	otkbd hmlHmh al Saol oimzaho hmorim anSim bqSt oiHl mad mhmorim׃

1_samuel 31:5	oira nSa klio ki mt Saol oipl gm hoa el Hrbo oimt emo׃ 
1_samuel 31:6	oimt Saol oSlSt bnio onSa klio gm kl anSio biom hhoa iHdo׃
