1_samuel 31:13	oiqHo at ezmtihm oiqbro tHt haSl bibSh oizmo Sbet imim׃ 
2_samuel 1:1	oihi aHri mot Saol odod Sb mhkot at hemlq oiSb dod bzqlg imim Snim׃ 
2_samuel 1:2	oihi biom hSliSi ohnh aiS ba mn hmHnh mem Saol obgdio qreim oadmh el raSo oihi bbao al dod oipl arzh oiStHo׃ 
2_samuel 1:3	oiamr lo dod ai mch tboa oiamr alio mmHnh iSral nmlTti׃ 
2_samuel 1:4	oiamr alio dod mh hih hdbr hgd na li oiamr aSr ns hem mn hmlHmh ogm hrbh npl mn hem oimto ogm Saol oihontn bno mto׃ 
2_samuel 1:5	oiamr dod al hner hmgid lo aik idet ki mt Saol oihontn bno׃ 
2_samuel 1:6	oiamr hner hmgid lo nqra nqriti bhr hglbe ohnh Saol nSen el Hnito ohnh hrkb obeli hprSim hdbqho׃ 
2_samuel 1:7	oipn aHrio oirani oiqra ali oamr hnni׃ 
2_samuel 1:8	oiamr li mi ath oiamr alio emlqi anki׃ 
2_samuel 1:9	oiamr ali emd na eli omttni ki aHcni hSbz ki kl eod npSi bi׃ 
2_samuel 1:10	oaemd elio oamttho ki ideti ki la iHih aHri nplo oaqH hncr aSr el raSo oazedh aSr el creo oabiam al adni hnh׃ 
2_samuel 1:11	oiHcq dod bbgdo oiqrem ogm kl hanSim aSr ato׃ 
2_samuel 1:12	oispdo oibko oizmo ed herb el Saol oel ihontn bno oel em ihoh oel bit iSral ki nplo bHrb׃ 
2_samuel 1:13	oiamr dod al hner hmgid lo ai mch ath oiamr bn aiS gr emlqi anki׃ 
2_samuel 1:14	oiamr alio dod aik la irat lSlH idk lSHt at mSiH ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 1:15	oiqra dod laHd mhnerim oiamr gS pge bo oikho oimt׃ 
2_samuel 1:16	oiamr alio dod dmik el raSk ki pik enh bk lamr anki mtti at mSiH ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 1:17	oiqnn dod at hqinh hcat el Saol oel ihontn bno׃ 
2_samuel 1:18	oiamr llmd bni ihodh qSt hnh ktobh el spr hiSr׃ 
2_samuel 1:19	hzbi iSral el bmotik Hll aik nplo gborim׃ 
2_samuel 1:20	al tgido bgt al tbSro bHozt aSqlon pn tSmHnh bnot plStim pn telcnh bnot herlim׃ 
2_samuel 1:21	hri bglbe al Tl oal mTr elikm oSdi tromt ki Sm ngel mgn gborim mgn Saol bli mSiH bSmn׃ 
2_samuel 1:22	mdm Hllim mHlb gborim qSt ihontn la nSog aHor oHrb Saol la tSob riqm׃ 
2_samuel 1:23	Saol oihontn hnahbim ohneimm bHiihm obmotm la nprdo mnSrim qlo mariot gbro׃ 
2_samuel 1:24	bnot iSral al Saol bkinh hmlbSkm Sni em ednim hmelh edi chb el lboSkn׃ 
2_samuel 1:25	aik nplo gbrim btok hmlHmh ihontn el bmotik Hll׃ 
2_samuel 1:26	zr li elik aHi ihontn nemt li mad nplath ahbtk li mahbt nSim׃ 
2_samuel 1:27	aik nplo gborim oiabdo kli mlHmh׃ 
2_samuel 2:1	oihi aHri kn oiSal dod bihoh lamr haelh baHt eri ihodh oiamr ihoh alio elh oiamr dod anh aelh oiamr Hbrnh׃ 
2_samuel 2:2	oiel Sm dod ogm Sti nSio aHinem hicrelit oabigil aSt nbl hkrmli׃ 
2_samuel 2:3	oanSio aSr emo helh dod aiS obito oiSbo beri Hbron׃ 
2_samuel 2:4	oibao anSi ihodh oimSHo Sm at dod lmlk el bit ihodh oigdo ldod lamr anSi ibiS gled aSr qbro at Saol׃ 
2_samuel 2:5	oiSlH dod mlakim al anSi ibiS gled oiamr alihm brkim atm lihoh aSr eSitm hHsd hch em adnikm em Saol otqbro ato׃ 
2_samuel 2:6	oeth ieS ihoh emkm Hsd oamt ogm anki aeSh atkm hTobh hcat aSr eSitm hdbr hch׃ 
2_samuel 2:7	oeth tHcqnh idikm ohio lbni Hil ki mt adnikm Saol ogm ati mSHo bit ihodh lmlk elihm׃ 
2_samuel 2:8	oabnr bn nr Sr zba aSr lSaol lqH at aiS bSt bn Saol oiebrho mHnim׃ 
2_samuel 2:9	oimlkho al hgled oal haSori oal icreal oel aprim oel bnimn oel iSral klh׃ 
2_samuel 2:10	bn arbeim Snh aiS bSt bn Saol bmlko el iSral oStim Snim mlk ak bit ihodh hio aHri dod׃ 
2_samuel 2:11	oihi mspr himim aSr hih dod mlk bHbron el bit ihodh Sbe Snim oSSh HdSim׃ 
2_samuel 2:12	oiza abnr bn nr oebdi aiS bSt bn Saol mmHnim gbeonh׃ 
2_samuel 2:13	oioab bn zroih oebdi dod izao oipgSom el brkt gbeon iHdo oiSbo alh el hbrkh mch oalh el hbrkh mch׃ 
2_samuel 2:14	oiamr abnr al ioab iqomo na hnerim oiSHqo lpnino oiamr ioab iqmo׃ 
2_samuel 2:15	oiqmo oiebro bmspr Snim eSr lbnimn olaiS bSt bn Saol oSnim eSr mebdi dod׃ 
2_samuel 2:16	oiHcqo aiS braS reho oHrbo bzd reho oiplo iHdo oiqra lmqom hhoa Hlqt hzrim aSr bgbeon׃ 
2_samuel 2:17	othi hmlHmh qSh ed mad biom hhoa oingp abnr oanSi iSral lpni ebdi dod׃ 
2_samuel 2:18	oihio Sm SlSh bni zroih ioab oabiSi oeShal oeShal ql brglio kaHd hzbim aSr bSdh׃ 
2_samuel 2:19	oirdp eShal aHri abnr ola nTh llkt el himin oel hSmaol maHri abnr׃ 
2_samuel 2:20	oipn abnr aHrio oiamr hath ch eShal oiamr anki׃ 
2_samuel 2:21	oiamr lo abnr nTh lk el imink ao el Smalk oaHc lk aHd mhnerim oqH lk at Hlzto ola abh eShal lsor maHrio׃ 
2_samuel 2:22	oisp eod abnr lamr al eShal sor lk maHri lmh akkh arzh oaik aSa pni al ioab aHik׃ 
2_samuel 2:23	oiman lsor oikho abnr baHri hHnit al hHmS otza hHnit maHrio oipl Sm oimt tHto oihi kl hba al hmqom aSr npl Sm eShal oimt oiemdo׃ 
2_samuel 2:24	oirdpo ioab oabiSi aHri abnr ohSmS bah ohmh bao ed gbet amh aSr el pni giH drk mdbr gbeon׃ 
2_samuel 2:25	oitqbzo bni bnimn aHri abnr oihio lagdh aHt oiemdo el raS gbeh aHt׃ 
2_samuel 2:26	oiqra abnr al ioab oiamr hlnzH takl Hrb hloa ideth ki mrh thih baHronh oed mti la tamr lem lSob maHri aHihm׃ 
2_samuel 2:27	oiamr ioab Hi halhim ki lola dbrt ki ac mhbqr nelh hem aiS maHri aHio׃ 
2_samuel 2:28	oitqe ioab bSopr oiemdo kl hem ola irdpo eod aHri iSral ola ispo eod lhlHm׃ 
2_samuel 2:29	oabnr oanSio hlko berbh kl hlilh hhoa oiebro at hirdn oilko kl hbtron oibao mHnim׃ 
2_samuel 2:30	oioab Sb maHri abnr oiqbz at kl hem oipqdo mebdi dod tSeh eSr aiS oeShal׃ 
2_samuel 2:31	oebdi dod hko mbnimn obanSi abnr SlS maot oSSim aiS mto׃ 
2_samuel 2:32	oiSao at eShal oiqbrho bqbr abio aSr bit lHm oilko kl hlilh ioab oanSio oiar lhm bHbron׃ 
2_samuel 3:1	othi hmlHmh arkh bin bit Saol obin bit dod odod hlk oHcq obit Saol hlkim odlim׃ 
2_samuel 3:2	oildo ldod bnim bHbron oihi bkoro amnon laHinem hicrealt׃ 
2_samuel 3:3	omSnho klab labigl aSt nbl hkrmli ohSlSi abSlom bn mekh bt tlmi mlk gSor׃ 
2_samuel 3:4	ohrbiei adnih bn Hgit ohHmiSi SpTih bn abiTl׃ 
2_samuel 3:5	ohSSi itrem leglh aSt dod alh ildo ldod bHbron׃ 
2_samuel 3:6	oihi bhiot hmlHmh bin bit Saol obin bit dod oabnr hih mtHcq bbit Saol׃ 
2_samuel 3:7	olSaol plgS oSmh rzph bt aih oiamr al abnr mdoe bath al pilgS abi׃ 
2_samuel 3:8	oiHr labnr mad el dbri aiS bSt oiamr hraS klb anki aSr lihodh hiom aeSh Hsd em bit Saol abik al aHio oal mreho ola hmzitk bid dod otpqd eli eon haSh hiom׃ 
2_samuel 3:9	kh ieSh alhim labnr okh isip lo ki kaSr nSbe ihoh ldod ki kn aeSh lo׃ 
2_samuel 3:10	lhebir hmmlkh mbit Saol olhqim at ksa dod el iSral oel ihodh mdn oed bar Sbe׃ 
2_samuel 3:11	ola ikl eod lhSib at abnr dbr mirato ato׃ 
2_samuel 3:12	oiSlH abnr mlakim al dod tHto lamr lmi arz lamr krth britk ati ohnh idi emk lhsb alik at kl iSral׃ 
2_samuel 3:13	oiamr Tob ani akrt atk brit ak dbr aHd anki Sal matk lamr la trah at pni ki am lpni hbiak at mikl bt Saol bbak lraot at pni׃ 
2_samuel 3:14	oiSlH dod mlakim al aiS bSt bn Saol lamr tnh at aSti at mikl aSr arSti li bmah erlot plStim׃ 
2_samuel 3:15	oiSlH aiS bSt oiqHh mem aiS mem plTial bn loS׃ 
2_samuel 3:16	oilk ath aiSh hlok obkh aHrih ed bHrim oiamr alio abnr lk Sob oiSb׃ 
2_samuel 3:17	odbr abnr hih em cqni iSral lamr gm tmol gm SlSm hiitm mbqSim at dod lmlk elikm׃ 
2_samuel 3:18	oeth eSo ki ihoh amr al dod lamr bid dod ebdi hoSie at emi iSral mid plStim omid kl aibihm׃ 
2_samuel 3:19	oidbr gm abnr bacni bnimin oilk gm abnr ldbr bacni dod bHbron at kl aSr Tob beini iSral obeini kl bit bnimn׃ 
2_samuel 3:20	oiba abnr al dod Hbron oato eSrim anSim oieS dod labnr olanSim aSr ato mSth׃ 
2_samuel 3:21	oiamr abnr al dod aqomh oalkh oaqbzh al adni hmlk at kl iSral oikrto atk brit omlkt bkl aSr taoh npSk oiSlH dod at abnr oilk bSlom׃ 
2_samuel 3:22	ohnh ebdi dod oioab ba mhgdod oSll rb emm hbiao oabnr ainno em dod bHbron ki SlHo oilk bSlom׃ 
2_samuel 3:23	oioab okl hzba aSr ato bao oigdo lioab lamr ba abnr bn nr al hmlk oiSlHho oilk bSlom׃ 
2_samuel 3:24	oiba ioab al hmlk oiamr mh eSith hnh ba abnr alik lmh ch SlHto oilk hlok׃ 
2_samuel 3:25	idet at abnr bn nr ki lpttk ba oldet at mozak oat mboak oldet at kl aSr ath eSh׃ 
2_samuel 3:26	oiza ioab mem dod oiSlH mlakim aHri abnr oiSbo ato mbor hsrh odod la ide׃ 
2_samuel 3:27	oiSb abnr Hbron oiTho ioab al tok hSer ldbr ato bSli oikho Sm hHmS oimt bdm eSh al aHio׃ 
2_samuel 3:28	oiSme dod maHri kn oiamr nqi anki ommlkti mem ihoh ed eolm mdmi abnr bn nr׃ 
2_samuel 3:29	iHlo el raS ioab oal kl bit abio oal ikrt mbit ioab cb omzre omHciq bplk onpl bHrb oHsr lHm׃ 
2_samuel 3:30	oioab oabiSi aHio hrgo labnr el aSr hmit at eShal aHihm bgbeon bmlHmh׃ 
2_samuel 3:31	oiamr dod al ioab oal kl hem aSr ato qreo bgdikm oHgro Sqim ospdo lpni abnr ohmlk dod hlk aHri hmTh׃ 
2_samuel 3:32	oiqbro at abnr bHbron oiSa hmlk at qolo oibk al qbr abnr oibko kl hem׃ 
2_samuel 3:33	oiqnn hmlk al abnr oiamr hkmot nbl imot abnr׃ 
2_samuel 3:34	idk la asrot orglik la lnHStim hgSo knpol lpni bni eolh nplt oispo kl hem lbkot elio׃ 
2_samuel 3:35	oiba kl hem lhbrot at dod lHm beod hiom oiSbe dod lamr kh ieSh li alhim okh isip ki am lpni boa hSmS aTem lHm ao kl maomh׃ 
2_samuel 3:36	okl hem hkiro oiiTb beinihm kkl aSr eSh hmlk beini kl hem Tob׃ 
2_samuel 3:37	oideo kl hem okl iSral biom hhoa ki la hith mhmlk lhmit at abnr bn nr׃ 
2_samuel 3:38	oiamr hmlk al ebdio hloa tdeo ki Sr ogdol npl hiom hch biSral׃ 
2_samuel 3:39	oanki hiom rk omSoH mlk ohanSim halh bni zroih qSim mmni iSlm ihoh leSh hreh kreto׃ 
2_samuel 4:1	oiSme bn Saol ki mt abnr bHbron oirpo idio okl iSral nbhlo׃ 
2_samuel 4:2	oSni anSim Sri gdodim hio bn Saol Sm haHd benh oSm hSni rkb bni rmon hbarti mbni bnimn ki gm barot tHSb el bnimn׃ 
2_samuel 4:3	oibrHo hbartim gtimh oihio Sm grim ed hiom hch׃ 
2_samuel 4:4	olihontn bn Saol bn nkh rglim bn HmS Snim hih bba Smet Saol oihontn micreal otSaho amnto otns oihi bHpch lnos oipl oipsH oSmo mpibSt׃ 
2_samuel 4:5	oilko bni rmon hbarti rkb obenh oibao kHm hiom al bit aiS bSt ohoa Skb at mSkb hzhrim׃ 
2_samuel 4:6	ohnh bao ed tok hbit lqHi HTim oikho al hHmS orkb obenh aHio nmlTo׃ 
2_samuel 4:7	oibao hbit ohoa Skb el mTto bHdr mSkbo oikho oimtho oisiro at raSo oiqHo at raSo oilko drk herbh kl hlilh׃ 
2_samuel 4:8	oibao at raS aiS bSt al dod Hbron oiamro al hmlk hnh raS aiS bSt bn Saol aibk aSr bqS at npSk oitn ihoh ladni hmlk nqmot hiom hch mSaol omcreo׃ 
2_samuel 4:9	oien dod at rkb oat benh aHio bni rmon hbarti oiamr lhm Hi ihoh aSr pdh at npSi mkl zrh׃ 
2_samuel 4:10	ki hmgid li lamr hnh mt Saol ohoa hih kmbSr beinio oaHch bo oahrgho bzqlg aSr ltti lo bSrh׃ 
2_samuel 4:11	ap ki anSim rSeim hrgo at aiS zdiq bbito el mSkbo oeth hloa abqS at dmo midkm oberti atkm mn harz׃ 
2_samuel 4:12	oizo dod at hnerim oihrgom oiqzzo at idihm oat rglihm oitlo el hbrkh bHbron oat raS aiS bSt lqHo oiqbro bqbr abnr bHbron׃ 
2_samuel 5:1	oibao kl SbTi iSral al dod Hbronh oiamro lamr hnno ezmk obSrk anHno׃ 
2_samuel 5:2	gm atmol gm SlSom bhiot Saol mlk elino ath hiith mozia ohmbi at iSral oiamr ihoh lk ath treh at emi at iSral oath thih lngid el iSral׃ 
2_samuel 5:3	oibao kl cqni iSral al hmlk Hbronh oikrt lhm hmlk dod brit bHbron lpni ihoh oimSHo at dod lmlk el iSral׃ 
2_samuel 5:4	bn SlSim Snh dod bmlko arbeim Snh mlk׃ 
2_samuel 5:5	bHbron mlk el ihodh Sbe Snim oSSh HdSim obiroSlm mlk SlSim oSlS Snh el kl iSral oihodh׃ 
2_samuel 5:6	oilk hmlk oanSio iroSlm al hibsi ioSb harz oiamr ldod lamr la tboa hnh ki am hsirk heorim ohpsHim lamr la iboa dod hnh׃ 
2_samuel 5:7	oilkd dod at mzdt zion hia eir dod׃ 
2_samuel 5:8	oiamr dod biom hhoa kl mkh ibsi oige bznor oat hpsHim oat heorim Snao npS dod el kn iamro eor opsH la iboa al hbit׃ 
2_samuel 5:9	oiSb dod bmzdh oiqra lh eir dod oibn dod sbib mn hmloa obith׃ 
2_samuel 5:10	oilk dod hlok ogdol oihoh alhi zbaot emo׃ 
2_samuel 5:11	oiSlH Hirm mlk zr mlakim al dod oezi arcim oHrSi ez oHrSi abn qir oibno bit ldod׃ 
2_samuel 5:12	oide dod ki hkino ihoh lmlk el iSral oki nSa mmlkto bebor emo iSral׃ 
2_samuel 5:13	oiqH dod eod plgSim onSim miroSlm aHri bao mHbron oioldo eod ldod bnim obnot׃ 
2_samuel 5:14	oalh Smot hildim lo biroSlm Smoe oSobb ontn oSlmh׃ 
2_samuel 5:15	oibHr oaliSoe onpg oipie׃ 
2_samuel 5:16	oaliSme oalide oaliplT׃ 
2_samuel 5:17	oiSmeo plStim ki mSHo at dod lmlk el iSral oielo kl plStim lbqS at dod oiSme dod oird al hmzodh׃ 
2_samuel 5:18	oplStim bao oinTSo bemq rpaim׃ 
2_samuel 5:19	oiSal dod bihoh lamr haelh al plStim httnm bidi oiamr ihoh al dod elh ki ntn atn at hplStim bidk׃ 
2_samuel 5:20	oiba dod bbel przim oikm Sm dod oiamr prz ihoh at aibi lpni kprz mim el kn qra Sm hmqom hhoa bel przim׃ 
2_samuel 5:21	oiecbo Sm at ezbihm oiSam dod oanSio׃ 
2_samuel 5:22	oispo eod plStim lelot oinTSo bemq rpaim׃ 
2_samuel 5:23	oiSal dod bihoh oiamr la telh hsb al aHrihm obat lhm mmol bkaim׃ 
2_samuel 5:24	oihi bSmek at qol zedh braSi hbkaim ac tHrz ki ac iza ihoh lpnik lhkot bmHnh plStim׃ 
2_samuel 5:25	oieS dod kn kaSr zoho ihoh oik at plStim mgbe ed bak gcr׃ 
2_samuel 6:1	oisp eod dod at kl bHor biSral SlSim alp׃ 
2_samuel 6:2	oiqm oilk dod okl hem aSr ato mbeli ihodh lhelot mSm at aron halhim aSr nqra Sm Sm ihoh zbaot iSb hkrbim elio׃ 
2_samuel 6:3	oirkbo at aron halhim al eglh HdSh oiSaho mbit abindb aSr bgbeh oeca oaHio bni abindb nhgim at heglh HdSh׃ 
2_samuel 6:4	oiSaho mbit abindb aSr bgbeh em aron halhim oaHio hlk lpni haron׃ 
2_samuel 6:5	odod okl bit iSral mSHqim lpni ihoh bkl ezi broSim obknrot obnblim obtpim obmneneim obzlzlim׃ 
2_samuel 6:6	oibao ed grn nkon oiSlH eca al aron halhim oiaHc bo ki SmTo hbqr׃ 
2_samuel 6:7	oiHr ap ihoh bech oikho Sm halhim el hSl oimt Sm em aron halhim׃ 
2_samuel 6:8	oiHr ldod el aSr prz ihoh prz bech oiqra lmqom hhoa prz ech ed hiom hch׃ 
2_samuel 6:9	oira dod at ihoh biom hhoa oiamr aik iboa ali aron ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 6:10	ola abh dod lhsir alio at aron ihoh el eir dod oiTho dod bit ebd adom hgti׃ 
2_samuel 6:11	oiSb aron ihoh bit ebd adm hgti SlSh HdSim oibrk ihoh at ebd adm oat kl bito׃ 
2_samuel 6:12	oigd lmlk dod lamr brk ihoh at bit ebd adm oat kl aSr lo bebor aron halhim oilk dod oiel at aron halhim mbit ebd adm eir dod bSmHh׃ 
2_samuel 6:13	oihi ki zedo nSai aron ihoh SSh zedim oicbH Sor omria׃ 
2_samuel 6:14	odod mkrkr bkl ec lpni ihoh odod Hgor apod bd׃ 
2_samuel 6:15	odod okl bit iSral melim at aron ihoh btroeh obqol Sopr׃ 
2_samuel 6:16	ohih aron ihoh ba eir dod omikl bt Saol nSqph bed hHlon otra at hmlk dod mpcc omkrkr lpni ihoh otbc lo blbh׃ 
2_samuel 6:17	oibao at aron ihoh oizgo ato bmqomo btok hahl aSr nTh lo dod oiel dod elot lpni ihoh oSlmim׃ 
2_samuel 6:18	oikl dod mhelot heolh ohSlmim oibrk at hem bSm ihoh zbaot׃ 
2_samuel 6:19	oiHlq lkl hem lkl hmon iSral lmaiS oed aSh laiS Hlt lHm aHt oaSpr aHd oaSiSh aHt oilk kl hem aiS lbito׃ 
2_samuel 6:20	oiSb dod lbrk at bito otza mikl bt Saol lqrat dod otamr mh nkbd hiom mlk iSral aSr nglh hiom leini amhot ebdio khglot nglot aHd hrqim׃ 
2_samuel 6:21	oiamr dod al mikl lpni ihoh aSr bHr bi mabik omkl bito lzot ati ngid el em ihoh el iSral oSHqti lpni ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 6:22	onqlti eod mcat ohiiti Spl beini oem hamhot aSr amrt emm akbdh׃ 
2_samuel 6:23	olmikl bt Saol la hih lh ild ed iom moth׃ 
2_samuel 7:1	oihi ki iSb hmlk bbito oihoh hniH lo msbib mkl aibio׃ 
2_samuel 7:2	oiamr hmlk al ntn hnbia rah na anki ioSb bbit arcim oaron halhim iSb btok hirieh׃ 
2_samuel 7:3	oiamr ntn al hmlk kl aSr blbbk lk eSh ki ihoh emk׃ 
2_samuel 7:4	oihi blilh hhoa oihi dbr ihoh al ntn lamr׃ 
2_samuel 7:5	lk oamrt al ebdi al dod kh amr ihoh hath tbnh li bit lSbti׃ 
2_samuel 7:6	ki la iSbti bbit lmiom helti at bni iSral mmzrim oed hiom hch oahih mthlk bahl obmSkn׃ 
2_samuel 7:7	bkl aSr hthlkti bkl bni iSral hdbr dbrti at aHd SbTi iSral aSr zoiti lreot at emi at iSral lamr lmh la bnitm li bit arcim׃ 
2_samuel 7:8	oeth kh tamr lebdi ldod kh amr ihoh zbaot ani lqHtik mn hnoh maHr hzan lhiot ngid el emi el iSral׃ 
2_samuel 7:9	oahih emk bkl aSr hlkt oakrth at kl aibik mpnik oeSti lk Sm gdol kSm hgdlim aSr barz׃ 
2_samuel 7:10	oSmti mqom lemi liSral onTetio oSkn tHtio ola irgc eod ola isipo bni eolh lenoto kaSr braSonh׃ 
2_samuel 7:11	olmn hiom aSr zoiti SpTim el emi iSral ohniHti lk mkl aibik ohgid lk ihoh ki bit ieSh lk ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 7:12	ki imlao imik oSkbt at abtik ohqimti at crek aHrik aSr iza mmeik ohkinti at mmlkto׃ 
2_samuel 7:13	hoa ibnh bit lSmi oknnti at ksa mmlkto ed eolm׃ 
2_samuel 7:14	ani ahih lo lab ohoa ihih li lbn aSr bheoto ohkHtio bSbT anSim obngei bni adm׃ 
2_samuel 7:15	oHsdi la isor mmno kaSr hsrti mem Saol aSr hsrti mlpnik׃ 
2_samuel 7:16	onamn bitk ommlktk ed eolm lpnik ksak ihih nkon ed eolm׃ 
2_samuel 7:17	kkl hdbrim halh okkl hHcion hch kn dbr ntn al dod׃ 
2_samuel 7:18	oiba hmlk dod oiSb lpni ihoh oiamr mi anki adni ihoh omi biti ki hbiatni ed hlm׃ 
2_samuel 7:19	otqTn eod cat beinik adni ihoh otdbr gm al bit ebdk lmrHoq ocat tort hadm adni ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 7:20	omh iosip dod eod ldbr alik oath idet at ebdk adni ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 7:21	bebor dbrk oklbk eSit at kl hgdolh hcat lhodie at ebdk׃ 
2_samuel 7:22	el kn gdlt adni ihoh ki ain kmok oain alhim coltk bkl aSr Smeno bacnino׃ 
2_samuel 7:23	omi kemk kiSral goi aHd barz aSr hlko alhim lpdot lo lem olSom lo Sm oleSot lkm hgdolh onraot larzk mpni emk aSr pdit lk mmzrim goim oalhio׃ 
2_samuel 7:24	otkonn lk at emk iSral lk lem ed eolm oath ihoh hiit lhm lalhim׃ 
2_samuel 7:25	oeth ihoh alhim hdbr aSr dbrt el ebdk oel bito hqm ed eolm oeSh kaSr dbrt׃ 
2_samuel 7:26	oigdl Smk ed eolm lamr ihoh zbaot alhim el iSral obit ebdk dod ihih nkon lpnik׃ 
2_samuel 7:27	ki ath ihoh zbaot alhi iSral glith at acn ebdk lamr bit abnh lk el kn mza ebdk at lbo lhtpll alik at htplh hcat׃ 
2_samuel 7:28	oeth adni ihoh ath hoa halhim odbrik ihio amt otdbr al ebdk at hTobh hcat׃ 
2_samuel 7:29	oeth hoal obrk at bit ebdk lhiot leolm lpnik ki ath adni ihoh dbrt ombrktk ibrk bit ebdk leolm׃ 
2_samuel 8:1	oihi aHri kn oik dod at plStim oikniem oiqH dod at mtg hamh mid plStim׃ 
2_samuel 8:2	oik at moab oimddm bHbl hSkb aotm arzh oimdd Sni Hblim lhmit omla hHbl lhHiot othi moab ldod lebdim nSai mnHh׃ 
2_samuel 8:3	oik dod at hddecr bn rHb mlk zobh blkto lhSib ido bnhr׃ 
2_samuel 8:4	oilkd dod mmno alp oSbe maot prSim oeSrim alp aiS rgli oieqr dod at kl hrkb oiotr mmno mah rkb׃ 
2_samuel 8:5	otba arm dmSq lecr lhddecr mlk zobh oik dod barm eSrim oSnim alp aiS׃ 
2_samuel 8:6	oiSm dod nzbim barm dmSq othi arm ldod lebdim noSai mnHh oiSe ihoh at dod bkl aSr hlk׃ 
2_samuel 8:7	oiqH dod at SlTi hchb aSr hio al ebdi hddecr oibiam iroSlm׃ 
2_samuel 8:8	ombTH ombrti eri hddecr lqH hmlk dod nHSt hrbh mad׃ 
2_samuel 8:9	oiSme tei mlk Hmt ki hkh dod at kl Hil hddecr׃ 
2_samuel 8:10	oiSlH tei at iorm bno al hmlk dod lSal lo lSlom olbrko el aSr nlHm bhddecr oikho ki aiS mlHmot tei hih hddecr obido hio kli ksp okli chb okli nHSt׃ 
2_samuel 8:11	gm atm hqdiS hmlk dod lihoh em hksp ohchb aSr hqdiS mkl hgoim aSr kbS׃ 
2_samuel 8:12	marm ommoab ombni emon omplStim omemlq omSll hddecr bn rHb mlk zobh׃ 
2_samuel 8:13	oieS dod Sm bSbo mhkoto at arm bgia mlH Smonh eSr alp׃ 
2_samuel 8:14	oiSm badom nzbim bkl adom Sm nzbim oihi kl adom ebdim ldod oioSe ihoh at dod bkl aSr hlk׃ 
2_samuel 8:15	oimlk dod el kl iSral oihi dod eSh mSpT ozdqh lkl emo׃ 
2_samuel 8:16	oioab bn zroih el hzba oihoSpT bn aHilod mckir׃ 
2_samuel 8:17	ozdoq bn aHiTob oaHimlk bn abitr khnim oSrih sopr׃ 
2_samuel 8:18	obniho bn ihoide ohkrti ohplti obni dod khnim hio׃ 
2_samuel 9:1	oiamr dod hki iS eod aSr notr lbit Saol oaeSh emo Hsd bebor ihontn׃ 
2_samuel 9:2	olbit Saol ebd oSmo ziba oiqrao lo al dod oiamr hmlk alio hath ziba oiamr ebdk׃ 
2_samuel 9:3	oiamr hmlk haps eod aiS lbit Saol oaeSh emo Hsd alhim oiamr ziba al hmlk eod bn lihontn nkh rglim׃ 
2_samuel 9:4	oiamr lo hmlk aiph hoa oiamr ziba al hmlk hnh hoa bit mkir bn emial blo dbr׃ 
2_samuel 9:5	oiSlH hmlk dod oiqHho mbit mkir bn emial mlo dbr׃ 
2_samuel 9:6	oiba mpibSt bn ihontn bn Saol al dod oipl el pnio oiStHo oiamr dod mpibSt oiamr hnh ebdk׃ 
2_samuel 9:7	oiamr lo dod al tira ki eSh aeSh emk Hsd bebor ihontn abik ohSbti lk at kl Sdh Saol abik oath takl lHm el SlHni tmid׃ 
2_samuel 9:8	oiStHo oiamr mh ebdk ki pnit al hklb hmt aSr kmoni׃ 
2_samuel 9:9	oiqra hmlk al ziba ner Saol oiamr alio kl aSr hih lSaol olkl bito ntti lbn adnik׃ 
2_samuel 9:10	oebdt lo at hadmh ath obnik oebdik ohbat ohih lbn adnik lHm oaklo ompibSt bn adnik iakl tmid lHm el SlHni olziba HmSh eSr bnim oeSrim ebdim׃ 
2_samuel 9:11	oiamr ziba al hmlk kkl aSr izoh adni hmlk at ebdo kn ieSh ebdk ompibSt akl el SlHni kaHd mbni hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 9:12	olmpibSt bn qTn oSmo mika okl moSb bit ziba ebdim lmpibSt׃ 
2_samuel 9:13	ompibSt iSb biroSlm ki el SlHn hmlk tmid hoa akl ohoa psH Sti rglio׃ 
2_samuel 10:1	oihi aHri kn oimt mlk bni emon oimlk Hnon bno tHtio׃ 
2_samuel 10:2	oiamr dod aeSh Hsd em Hnon bn nHS kaSr eSh abio emdi Hsd oiSlH dod lnHmo bid ebdio al abio oibao ebdi dod arz bni emon׃ 
2_samuel 10:3	oiamro Sri bni emon al Hnon adnihm hmkbd dod at abik beinik ki SlH lk mnHmim hloa bebor Hqor at heir olrglh olhpkh SlH dod at ebdio alik׃ 
2_samuel 10:4	oiqH Hnon at ebdi dod oiglH at Hzi cqnm oikrt at mdoihm bHzi ed Stotihm oiSlHm׃ 
2_samuel 10:5	oigdo ldod oiSlH lqratm ki hio hanSim nklmim mad oiamr hmlk Sbo birHo ed izmH cqnkm oSbtm׃ 
2_samuel 10:6	oirao bni emon ki nbaSo bdod oiSlHo bni emon oiSkro at arm bit rHob oat arm zoba eSrim alp rgli oat mlk mekh alp aiS oaiS Tob Snim eSr alp aiS׃ 
2_samuel 10:7	oiSme dod oiSlH at ioab oat kl hzba hgbrim׃ 
2_samuel 10:8	oizao bni emon oierko mlHmh ptH hSer oarm zoba orHob oaiS Tob omekh lbdm bSdh׃ 
2_samuel 10:9	oira ioab ki hith alio pni hmlHmh mpnim omaHor oibHr mkl bHori biSral oierk lqrat arm׃ 
2_samuel 10:10	oat itr hem ntn bid abSi aHio oierk lqrat bni emon׃ 
2_samuel 10:11	oiamr am tHcq arm mmni ohith li liSoeh oam bni emon iHcqo mmk ohlkti lhoSie lk׃ 
2_samuel 10:12	Hcq ontHcq bed emno obed eri alhino oihoh ieSh hTob beinio׃ 
2_samuel 10:13	oigS ioab ohem aSr emo lmlHmh barm oinso mpnio׃ 
2_samuel 10:14	obni emon rao ki ns arm oinso mpni abiSi oibao heir oiSb ioab mel bni emon oiba iroSlm׃ 
2_samuel 10:15	oira arm ki ngp lpni iSral oiaspo iHd׃ 
2_samuel 10:16	oiSlH hddecr oiza at arm aSr mebr hnhr oibao Hilm oSobk Sr zba hddecr lpnihm׃ 
2_samuel 10:17	oigd ldod oiasp at kl iSral oiebr at hirdn oiba Hlamh oierko arm lqrat dod oilHmo emo׃ 
2_samuel 10:18	oins arm mpni iSral oihrg dod marm Sbe maot rkb oarbeim alp prSim oat Sobk Sr zbao hkh oimt Sm׃ 
2_samuel 10:19	oirao kl hmlkim ebdi hddecr ki ngpo lpni iSral oiSlmo at iSral oiebdom oirao arm lhoSie eod at bni emon׃ 
2_samuel 11:1	oihi ltSobt hSnh let zat hmlakim oiSlH dod at ioab oat ebdio emo oat kl iSral oiSHto at bni emon oizro el rbh odod ioSb biroSlm׃ 
2_samuel 11:2	oihi let herb oiqm dod mel mSkbo oithlk el gg bit hmlk oira aSh rHzt mel hgg ohaSh Tobt mrah mad׃ 
2_samuel 11:3	oiSlH dod oidrS laSh oiamr hloa cat bt Sbe bt aliem aSt aorih hHti׃ 
2_samuel 11:4	oiSlH dod mlakim oiqHh otboa alio oiSkb emh ohia mtqdSt mTmath otSb al bith׃ 
2_samuel 11:5	othr haSh otSlH otgd ldod otamr hrh anki׃ 
2_samuel 11:6	oiSlH dod al ioab SlH ali at aorih hHti oiSlH ioab at aorih al dod׃ 
2_samuel 11:7	oiba aorih alio oiSal dod lSlom ioab olSlom hem olSlom hmlHmh׃ 
2_samuel 11:8	oiamr dod laorih rd lbitk orHz rglik oiza aorih mbit hmlk otza aHrio mSat hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 11:9	oiSkb aorih ptH bit hmlk at kl ebdi adnio ola ird al bito׃ 
2_samuel 11:10	oigdo ldod lamr la ird aorih al bito oiamr dod al aorih hloa mdrk ath ba mdoe la irdt al bitk׃ 
2_samuel 11:11	oiamr aorih al dod haron oiSral oihodh iSbim bskot oadni ioab oebdi adni el pni hSdh Hnim oani aboa al biti lakl olStot olSkb em aSti Hik oHi npSk am aeSh at hdbr hch׃ 
2_samuel 11:12	oiamr dod al aorih Sb bch gm hiom omHr aSlHk oiSb aorih biroSlm biom hhoa ommHrt׃ 
2_samuel 11:13	oiqra lo dod oiakl lpnio oiSt oiSkrho oiza berb lSkb bmSkbo em ebdi adnio oal bito la ird׃ 
2_samuel 11:14	oihi bbqr oiktb dod spr al ioab oiSlH bid aorih׃ 
2_samuel 11:15	oiktb bspr lamr hbo at aorih al mol pni hmlHmh hHcqh oSbtm maHrio onkh omt׃ 
2_samuel 11:16	oihi bSmor ioab al heir oitn at aorih al hmqom aSr ide ki anSi Hil Sm׃ 
2_samuel 11:17	oizao anSi heir oilHmo at ioab oipl mn hem mebdi dod oimt gm aorih hHti׃ 
2_samuel 11:18	oiSlH ioab oigd ldod at kl dbri hmlHmh׃ 
2_samuel 11:19	oizo at hmlak lamr kklotk at kl dbri hmlHmh ldbr al hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 11:20	ohih am telh Hmt hmlk oamr lk mdoe ngStm al heir lhlHm hloa idetm at aSr iro mel hHomh׃ 
2_samuel 11:21	mi hkh at abimlk bn irbSt hloa aSh hSlikh elio plH rkb mel hHomh oimt btbz lmh ngStm al hHomh oamrt gm ebdk aorih hHti mt׃ 
2_samuel 11:22	oilk hmlak oiba oigd ldod at kl aSr SlHo ioab׃ 
2_samuel 11:23	oiamr hmlak al dod ki gbro elino hanSim oizao alino hSdh onhih elihm ed ptH hSer׃ 
2_samuel 11:24	oirao hmoraim al ebdk mel hHomh oimoto mebdi hmlk ogm ebdk aorih hHti mt׃ 
2_samuel 11:25	oiamr dod al hmlak kh tamr al ioab al ire beinik at hdbr hch ki kch okch takl hHrb hHcq mlHmtk al heir ohrsh oHcqho׃ 
2_samuel 11:26	otSme aSt aorih ki mt aorih aiSh otspd el belh׃

2_samuel 12:1	oiSlH ihoh at ntn al dod oiba alio oiamr lo Sni anSim hio beir aHt aHd eSir oaHd raS׃ 
2_samuel 12:2	leSir hih zan obqr hrbh mad׃ 
2_samuel 12:3	olrS ain kl ki am kbSh aHt qTnh aSr qnh oiHih otgdl emo oem bnio iHdo mpto takl omkso tSth obHiqo tSkb othi lo kbt׃ 
2_samuel 12:4	oiba hlk laiS heSir oiHml lqHt mzano ombqro leSot larH hba lo oiqH at kbSt haiS hraS oieSh laiS hba alio׃ 
2_samuel 12:5	oiHr ap dod baiS mad oiamr al ntn Hi ihoh ki bn mot haiS heSh cat׃ 
2_samuel 12:6	oat hkbSh iSlm arbetim eqb aSr eSh at hdbr hch oel aSr la Hml׃ 
2_samuel 12:7	oiamr ntn al dod ath haiS kh amr ihoh alhi iSral anki mSHtik lmlk el iSral oanki hzltik mid Saol׃ 
2_samuel 12:8	oatnh lk at bit adnik oat nSi adnik bHiqk oatnh lk at bit iSral oihodh oam meT oasph lk khnh okhnh׃ 
2_samuel 12:9	mdoe bcit at dbr ihoh leSot hre beino at aorih hHti hkit bHrb oat aSto lqHt lk laSh oato hrgt bHrb bni emon׃ 
2_samuel 12:10	oeth la tsor Hrb mbitk ed eolm eqb ki bctni otqH at aSt aorih hHti lhiot lk laSh׃ 
2_samuel 12:11	kh amr ihoh hnni mqim elik reh mbitk olqHti at nSik leinik ontti lreik oSkb em nSik leini hSmS hcat׃ 
2_samuel 12:12	ki ath eSit bstr oani aeSh at hdbr hch ngd kl iSral ongd hSmS׃ 
2_samuel 12:13	oiamr dod al ntn HTati lihoh oiamr ntn al dod gm ihoh hebir HTatk la tmot׃ 
2_samuel 12:14	aps ki naz nazt at aibi ihoh bdbr hch gm hbn hilod lk mot imot׃ 
2_samuel 12:15	oilk ntn al bito oigp ihoh at hild aSr ildh aSt aorih ldod oianS׃ 
2_samuel 12:16	oibqS dod at halhim bed hner oizm dod zom oba oln oSkb arzh׃ 
2_samuel 12:17	oiqmo cqni bito elio lhqimo mn harz ola abh ola bra atm lHm׃ 
2_samuel 12:18	oihi biom hSbiei oimt hild oirao ebdi dod lhgid lo ki mt hild ki amro hnh bhiot hild Hi dbrno alio ola Sme bqolno oaik namr alio mt hild oeSh reh׃ 
2_samuel 12:19	oira dod ki ebdio mtlHSim oibn dod ki mt hild oiamr dod al ebdio hmt hild oiamro mt׃ 
2_samuel 12:20	oiqm dod mharz oirHz oisk oiHlp Smlto oiba bit ihoh oiStHo oiba al bito oiSal oiSimo lo lHm oiakl׃ 
2_samuel 12:21	oiamro ebdio alio mh hdbr hch aSr eSith bebor hild Hi zmt otbk okaSr mt hild qmt otakl lHm׃ 
2_samuel 12:22	oiamr beod hild Hi zmti oabkh ki amrti mi iode iHnni ihoh oHi hild׃ 
2_samuel 12:23	oeth mt lmh ch ani zm haokl lhSibo eod ani hlk alio ohoa la iSob ali׃ 
2_samuel 12:24	oinHm dod at bt Sbe aSto oiba alih oiSkb emh otld bn oiqra at Smo Slmh oihoh ahbo׃ 
2_samuel 12:25	oiSlH bid ntn hnbia oiqra at Smo ididih bebor ihoh׃ 
2_samuel 12:26	oilHm ioab brbt bni emon oilkd at eir hmlokh׃ 
2_samuel 12:27	oiSlH ioab mlakim al dod oiamr nlHmti brbh gm lkdti at eir hmim׃ 
2_samuel 12:28	oeth asp at itr hem oHnh el heir olkdh pn alkd ani at heir onqra Smi elih׃ 
2_samuel 12:29	oiasp dod at kl hem oilk rbth oilHm bh oilkdh׃ 
2_samuel 12:30	oiqH at eTrt mlkm mel raSo omSqlh kkr chb oabn iqrh othi el raS dod oSll heir hozia hrbh mad׃ 
2_samuel 12:31	oat hem aSr bh hozia oiSm bmgrh obHrzi hbrcl obmgcrt hbrcl ohebir aotm bmlkn okn ieSh lkl eri bni emon oiSb dod okl hem iroSlm׃ 
2_samuel 13:1	oihi aHri kn olabSlom bn dod aHot iph oSmh tmr oiahbh amnon bn dod׃ 
2_samuel 13:2	oizr lamnon lhtHlot bebor tmr aHto ki btolh hia oipla beini amnon leSot lh maomh׃ 
2_samuel 13:3	olamnon re oSmo iondb bn Smeh aHi dod oiondb aiS Hkm mad׃ 
2_samuel 13:4	oiamr lo mdoe ath kkh dl bn hmlk bbqr bbqr hloa tgid li oiamr lo amnon at tmr aHot abSlm aHi ani ahb׃ 
2_samuel 13:5	oiamr lo ihondb Skb el mSkbk ohtHl oba abik lraotk oamrt alio tba na tmr aHoti otbrni lHm oeSth leini at hbrih lmen aSr arah oaklti midh׃ 
2_samuel 13:6	oiSkb amnon oitHl oiba hmlk lrato oiamr amnon al hmlk tboa na tmr aHti otlbb leini Sti lbbot oabrh midh׃ 
2_samuel 13:7	oiSlH dod al tmr hbith lamr lki na bit amnon aHik oeSi lo hbrih׃ 
2_samuel 13:8	otlk tmr bit amnon aHih ohoa Skb otqH at hbzq otloS otlbb leinio otbSl at hlbbot׃ 
2_samuel 13:9	otqH at hmSrt otzq lpnio oiman lakol oiamr amnon hoziao kl aiS meli oizao kl aiS melio׃ 
2_samuel 13:10	oiamr amnon al tmr hbiai hbrih hHdr oabrh midk otqH tmr at hlbbot aSr eSth otba lamnon aHih hHdrh׃ 
2_samuel 13:11	otgS alio lakl oiHcq bh oiamr lh boai Skbi emi aHoti׃ 
2_samuel 13:12	otamr lo al aHi al tenni ki la ieSh kn biSral al teSh at hnblh hcat׃ 
2_samuel 13:13	oani anh aolik at Hrpti oath thih kaHd hnblim biSral oeth dbr na al hmlk ki la imneni mmk׃ 
2_samuel 13:14	ola abh lSme bqolh oiHcq mmnh oienh oiSkb ath׃ 
2_samuel 13:15	oiSnah amnon Snah gdolh mad ki gdolh hSnah aSr Snah mahbh aSr ahbh oiamr lh amnon qomi lki׃ 
2_samuel 13:16	otamr lo al aodt hreh hgdolh hcat maHrt aSr eSit emi lSlHni ola abh lSme lh׃ 
2_samuel 13:17	oiqra at nero mSrto oiamr SlHo na at cat meli hHozh onel hdlt aHrih׃ 
2_samuel 13:18	oelih ktnt psim ki kn tlbSn bnot hmlk hbtolt meilim oiza aoth mSrto hHoz onel hdlt aHrih׃ 
2_samuel 13:19	otqH tmr apr el raSh oktnt hpsim aSr elih qreh otSm idh el raSh otlk hlok oceqh׃ 
2_samuel 13:20	oiamr alih abSlom aHih haminon aHik hih emk oeth aHoti hHriSi aHik hoa al tSiti at lbk ldbr hch otSb tmr oSmmh bit abSlom aHih׃ 
2_samuel 13:21	ohmlk dod Sme at kl hdbrim halh oiHr lo mad׃ 
2_samuel 13:22	ola dbr abSlom em amnon lmre oed Tob ki Sna abSlom at amnon el dbr aSr enh at tmr aHto׃ 
2_samuel 13:23	oihi lSntim imim oihio gccim labSlom bbel Hzor aSr em aprim oiqra abSlom lkl bni hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 13:24	oiba abSlom al hmlk oiamr hnh na gccim lebdk ilk na hmlk oebdio em ebdk׃ 
2_samuel 13:25	oiamr hmlk al abSlom al bni al na nlk klno ola nkbd elik oiprz bo ola abh llkt oibrkho׃ 
2_samuel 13:26	oiamr abSlom ola ilk na atno amnon aHi oiamr lo hmlk lmh ilk emk׃ 
2_samuel 13:27	oiprz bo abSlom oiSlH ato at amnon oat kl bni hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 13:28	oizo abSlom at nerio lamr rao na kTob lb amnon biin oamrti alikm hko at amnon ohmtm ato al tirao hloa ki anki zoiti atkm Hcqo ohio lbni Hil׃ 
2_samuel 13:29	oieSo neri abSlom lamnon kaSr zoh abSlom oiqmo kl bni hmlk oirkbo aiS el prdo oinso׃ 
2_samuel 13:30	oihi hmh bdrk ohSmeh bah al dod lamr hkh abSlom at kl bni hmlk ola notr mhm aHd׃ 
2_samuel 13:31	oiqm hmlk oiqre at bgdio oiSkb arzh okl ebdio nzbim qrei bgdim׃ 
2_samuel 13:32	oien iondb bn Smeh aHi dod oiamr al iamr adni at kl hnerim bni hmlk hmito ki amnon lbdo mt ki el pi abSlom hith Simh miom ento at tmr aHto׃ 
2_samuel 13:33	oeth al iSm adni hmlk al lbo dbr lamr kl bni hmlk mto ki am amnon lbdo mt׃ 
2_samuel 13:34	oibrH abSlom oiSa hner hzph at eino oira ohnh em rb hlkim mdrk aHrio mzd hhr׃ 
2_samuel 13:35	oiamr iondb al hmlk hnh bni hmlk bao kdbr ebdk kn hih׃ 
2_samuel 13:36	oihi kklto ldbr ohnh bni hmlk bao oiSao qolm oibko ogm hmlk okl ebdio bko bki gdol mad׃ 
2_samuel 13:37	oabSlom brH oilk al tlmi bn emiHor mlk gSor oitabl el bno kl himim׃ 
2_samuel 13:38	oabSlom brH oilk gSor oihi Sm SlS Snim׃ 
2_samuel 13:39	otkl dod hmlk lzat al abSlom ki nHm el amnon ki mt׃ 
2_samuel 14:1	oide ioab bn zrih ki lb hmlk el abSlom׃ 
2_samuel 14:2	oiSlH ioab tqoeh oiqH mSm aSh Hkmh oiamr alih htabli na olbSi na bgdi abl oal tsoki Smn ohiit kaSh ch imim rbim mtablt el mt׃ 
2_samuel 14:3	obat al hmlk odbrt alio kdbr hch oiSm ioab at hdbrim bpih׃ 
2_samuel 14:4	otamr haSh htqeit al hmlk otpl el apih arzh otStHo otamr hoSeh hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 14:5	oiamr lh hmlk mh lk otamr abl aSh almnh ani oimt aiSi׃ 
2_samuel 14:6	olSpHtk Sni bnim oinzo Snihm bSdh oain mzil binihm oiko haHd at haHd oimt ato׃ 
2_samuel 14:7	ohnh qmh kl hmSpHh el SpHtk oiamro tni at mkh aHio onmtho bnpS aHio aSr hrg onSmidh gm at hiorS okbo at gHlti aSr nSarh lblti Som laiSi Sm oSarit el pni hadmh׃ 
2_samuel 14:8	oiamr hmlk al haSh lki lbitk oani azoh elik׃ 
2_samuel 14:9	otamr haSh htqoeit al hmlk eli adni hmlk heon oel bit abi ohmlk oksao nqi׃ 
2_samuel 14:10	oiamr hmlk hmdbr alik ohbato ali ola isip eod lget bk׃ 
2_samuel 14:11	otamr ickr na hmlk at ihoh alhik mhrbit gal hdm lSHt ola iSmido at bni oiamr Hi ihoh am ipl mSert bnk arzh׃ 
2_samuel 14:12	otamr haSh tdbr na SpHtk al adni hmlk dbr oiamr dbri׃ 
2_samuel 14:13	otamr haSh olmh HSbth kcat el em alhim omdbr hmlk hdbr hch kaSm lblti hSib hmlk at ndHo׃ 
2_samuel 14:14	ki mot nmot okmim hngrim arzh aSr la iaspo ola iSa alhim npS oHSb mHSbot lblti idH mmno ndH׃ 
2_samuel 14:15	oeth aSr bati ldbr al hmlk adni at hdbr hch ki irani hem otamr SpHtk adbrh na al hmlk aoli ieSh hmlk at dbr amto׃ 
2_samuel 14:16	ki iSme hmlk lhzil at amto mkp haiS lhSmid ati oat bni iHd mnHlt alhim׃ 
2_samuel 14:17	otamr SpHtk ihih na dbr adni hmlk lmnoHh ki kmlak halhim kn adni hmlk lSme hTob ohre oihoh alhik ihi emk׃ 
2_samuel 14:18	oien hmlk oiamr al haSh al na tkHdi mmni dbr aSr anki Sal atk otamr haSh idbr na adni hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 14:19	oiamr hmlk hid ioab atk bkl cat oten haSh otamr Hi npSk adni hmlk am aS lhmin olhSmil mkl aSr dbr adni hmlk ki ebdk ioab hoa zoni ohoa Sm bpi SpHtk at kl hdbrim halh׃ 
2_samuel 14:20	lbebor sbb at pni hdbr eSh ebdk ioab at hdbr hch oadni Hkm kHkmt mlak halhim ldet at kl aSr barz׃ 
2_samuel 14:21	oiamr hmlk al ioab hnh na eSiti at hdbr hch olk hSb at hner at abSlom׃ 
2_samuel 14:22	oipl ioab al pnio arzh oiStHo oibrk at hmlk oiamr ioab hiom ide ebdk ki mzati Hn beinik adni hmlk aSr eSh hmlk at dbr ebdo׃ 
2_samuel 14:23	oiqm ioab oilk gSorh oiba at abSlom iroSlm׃ 
2_samuel 14:24	oiamr hmlk isb al bito opni la irah oisb abSlom al bito opni hmlk la rah׃

2_samuel 14:26	obglHo at raSo ohih mqz imim limim aSr iglH ki kbd elio oglHo oSql at Ser raSo matim Sqlim babn hmlk׃ 
2_samuel 14:27	oioldo labSlom SloSh bnim obt aHt oSmh tmr hia hith aSh ipt mrah׃ 
2_samuel 14:28	oiSb abSlom biroSlm Sntim imim opni hmlk la rah׃ 
2_samuel 14:29	oiSlH abSlom al ioab lSlH ato al hmlk ola abh lboa alio oiSlH eod Snit ola abh lboa׃

2_samuel 19:17	oalp aiS emo mbnimn oziba ner bit Saol oHmSt eSr bnio oeSrim ebdio ato ozlHo hirdn lpni hmlk׃

2_kings 1:10	oienh aliho oidbr al Sr hHmSim oam aiS alhim ani trd aS mn hSmim otakl atk oat HmSik otrd aS mn hSmim otakl ato oat HmSio׃

isaiah 5:12	ohih knor onbl tp oHlil oiin mStihm oat pel ihoh la ibiTo omeSh idio la rao׃ 
isaiah 5:13	lkn glh emi mbli det okbodo mti reb ohmono zHh zma׃ 
isaiah 5:14	lkn hrHibh Saol npSh operh pih lbli Hq oird hdrh ohmonh oSaonh oelc bh׃ 
isaiah 5:15	oiSH adm oiSpl aiS oeini gbhim tSplnh׃ 
isaiah 5:16	oigbh ihoh zbaot bmSpT ohal hqdoS nqdS bzdqh׃ 
isaiah 5:17	oreo kbSim kdbrm oHrbot mHim grim iaklo׃ 
isaiah 5:18	hoi mSki heon bHbli hSoa okebot heglh HTah׃ 
isaiah 5:19	hamrim imhr iHiSh meSho lmen nrah otqrb otboah ezt qdoS iSral ondeh׃ 
isaiah 5:20	hoi hamrim lre Tob olTob re Smim HSk laor oaor lHSk Smim mr lmtoq omtoq lmr׃ 
isaiah 5:21	hoi Hkmim beinihm ongd pnihm nbnim׃ 
isaiah 5:22	hoi gborim lStot iin oanSi Hil lmsk Skr׃ 
isaiah 5:23	mzdiqi rSe eqb SHd ozdqt zdiqim isiro mmno׃ 
isaiah 5:24	lkn kakl qS lSon aS oHSS lhbh irph SrSm kmq ihih oprHm kabq ielh ki maso at tort ihoh zbaot oat amrt qdoS iSral nazo׃ 
isaiah 5:25	el kn Hrh ap ihoh bemo oiT ido elio oikho oirgco hhrim othi nbltm ksoHh bqrb Hozot bkl cat la Sb apo oeod ido nToih׃ 
isaiah 5:26	onSa ns lgoim mrHoq oSrq lo mqzh harz ohnh mhrh ql iboa׃ 
isaiah 5:27	ain eip oain koSl bo la inom ola iiSn ola nptH acor Hlzio ola ntq Srok nelio׃ 
isaiah 5:28	aSr Hzio Snonim okl qSttio drkot prsot sosio kzr nHSbo oglglio ksoph׃ 
isaiah 5:29	Sagh lo klbia oSag kkpirim oinhm oiaHc Trp oipliT oain mzil׃ 
isaiah 5:30	oinhm elio biom hhoa knhmt im onbT larz ohnh HSk zr oaor HSk beripih׃

isaiah 6:5	oamr aoi li ki ndmiti ki aiS Tma Sptim anki obtok em Tma Sptim anki ioSb ki at hmlk ihoh zbaot rao eini׃ 
isaiah 6:6	oiep ali aHd mn hSrpim obido rzph bmlqHim lqH mel hmcbH׃

isaiah 7:1	oihi bimi aHc bn iotm bn eciho mlk ihodh elh rzin mlk arm opqH bn rmliho mlk iSral iroSlm lmlHmh elih ola ikl lhlHm elih׃ 
isaiah 7:2	oigd lbit dod lamr nHh arm el aprim oine lbbo olbb emo knoe ezi ier mpni roH׃ 
isaiah 7:3	oiamr ihoh al iSeiho za na lqrat aHc ath oSar iSob bnk al qzh telt hbrkh helionh al mslt Sdh kobs׃ 
isaiah 7:4	oamrt alio hSmr ohSqT al tira olbbk al irk mSni cnbot haodim heSnim halh bHri ap rzin oarm obn rmliho׃ 
isaiah 7:5	ien ki iez elik arm reh aprim obn rmliho lamr׃ 
isaiah 7:6	nelh bihodh onqiznh onbqenh alino onmlik mlk btokh at bn Tbal׃ 
isaiah 7:7	kh amr adni ihoh la tqom ola thih׃

isaiah 7:13	oiamr Smeo na bit dod hmeT mkm hlaot anSim ki tlao gm at alhi׃ 
isaiah 7:14	lkn itn adni hoa lkm aot hnh helmh hrh oildt bn oqrat Smo emno al׃ 
isaiah 7:15	Hmah odbS iakl ldeto maos bre obHor bTob׃

isaiah 7:21	ohih biom hhoa iHih aiS eglt bqr oSti zan׃

isaiah 8:5	oisp ihoh dbr ali eod lamr׃ 
isaiah 8:6	ien ki mas hem hch at mi hSlH hhlkim laT omSoS at rzin obn rmliho׃

isaiah 14:6	mkh emim bebrh mkt blti srh rdh bap goim mrdp bli HSk׃ 
isaiah 14:7	nHh SqTh kl harz pzHo rnh׃ 
isaiah 14:8	gm broSim SmHo lk arci lbnon mac Skbt la ielh hkrt elino׃ 
isaiah 14:9	Saol mtHt rgch lk lqrat boak eorr lk rpaim kl etodi arz hqim mksaotm kl mlki goim׃ 
isaiah 14:10	klm ieno oiamro alik gm ath Hlit kmono alino nmSlt׃

isaiah 14:12	aik nplt mSmim hill bn SHr ngdet larz HolS el goim׃ 
isaiah 14:13	oath amrt blbbk hSmim aelh mmel lkokbi al arim ksai oaSb bhr moed birkti zpon׃ 
isaiah 14:14	aelh el bmti eb admh lelion׃ 
isaiah 14:15	ak al Saol tord al irkti bor׃ 
isaiah 14:16	raik alik iSgiHo alik itbonno hch haiS mrgic harz mreiS mmlkot׃

isaiah 14:18	kl mlki goim klm Skbo bkbod aiS bbito׃ 
isaiah 14:19	oath hSlkt mqbrk knzr nteb lboS hrgim mTeni Hrb iordi al abni bor kpgr mobs׃ 
isaiah 14:20	la tHd atm bqborh ki arzk SHt emk hrgt la iqra leolm cre mreim׃ 
isaiah 14:21	hkino lbnio mTbH beon abotm bl iqmo oirSo arz omlao pni tbl erim׃ 
isaiah 14:22	oqmti elihm nam ihoh zbaot ohkrti lbbl Sm oSar onin onkd nam ihoh׃ 
isaiah 14:23	oSmtih lmorS qpd oagmi mim oTaTatih bmTaTa hSmd nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
isaiah 14:24	nSbe ihoh zbaot lamr am la kaSr dmiti kn hith okaSr iezti hia tqom׃ 
isaiah 14:25	lSbr aSor barzi oel hri abosno osr melihm elo osblo mel Skmo isor׃ 
isaiah 14:26	cat hezh hieozh el kl harz ocat hid hnToih el kl hgoim׃ 
isaiah 14:27	ki ihoh zbaot iez omi ipr oido hnToih omi iSibnh׃ 
isaiah 14:28	bSnt mot hmlk aHc hih hmSa hch׃ 
isaiah 14:29	al tSmHi plSt klk ki nSbr SbT mkk ki mSrS nHS iza zpe oprio Srp meopp׃ 
isaiah 14:30	oreo bkori dlim oabionim lbTH irbzo ohmti breb SrSk oSaritk ihrg׃

isaiah 14:32	omh ienh mlaki goi ki ihoh isd zion obh iHso enii emo׃ 
isaiah 15:1	mSa moab ki blil Sdd er moab ndmh ki blil Sdd qir moab ndmh׃ 
isaiah 15:2	elh hbit odibn hbmot lbki el nbo oel midba moab iilil bkl raSio qrHh kl cqn groeh׃ 
isaiah 15:3	bHoztio Hgro Sq el ggotih obrHbtih klh iilil ird bbki׃ 
isaiah 15:4	otceq HSbon oalelh ed ihz nSme qolm el kn Hlzi moab irieo npSo ireh lo׃ 
isaiah 15:5	lbi lmoab iceq briHh ed zer eglt SlSih ki melh hloHit bbki ielh bo ki drk Hornim ceqt Sbr ieero׃ 
isaiah 15:6	ki mi nmrim mSmot ihio ki ibS Hzir klh dSa irq la hih׃ 
isaiah 15:7	el kn itrh eSh opqdtm el nHl herbim iSaom׃ 
isaiah 15:8	ki hqiph hceqh at gbol moab ed aglim illth obar ailim illth׃ 
isaiah 15:9	ki mi dimon mlao dm ki aSit el dimon nospot lpliTt moab arih olSarit admh׃ 
isaiah 16:1	SlHo kr mSl arz msle mdbrh al hr bt zion׃ 
isaiah 16:2	ohih keop nodd qn mSlH thiinh bnot moab mebrt larnon׃ 
isaiah 16:3	hbiao ezh eSo plilh Siti klil zlk btok zhrim stri ndHim ndd al tgli׃ 
isaiah 16:4	igoro bk ndHi moab hoi str lmo mpni Sodd ki aps hmz klh Sd tmo rms mn harz׃ 
isaiah 16:5	ohokn bHsd ksa oiSb elio bamt bahl dod SpT odrS mSpT omhr zdq׃ 
isaiah 16:6	Smeno gaon moab ga mad gaoto ogaono oebrto la kn bdio׃ 
isaiah 16:7	lkn iilil moab lmoab klh iilil laSiSi qir HrSt thgo ak nkaim׃ 
isaiah 16:8	ki Sdmot HSbon amll gpn Sbmh beli goim hlmo Sroqih ed iecr ngeo teo mdbr SlHotih nTSo ebro im׃ 
isaiah 16:9	el kn abkh bbki iecr gpn Sbmh ariok dmeti HSbon oalelh ki el qizk oel qzirk hidd npl׃ 
isaiah 16:10	onasp SmHh ogil mn hkrml obkrmim la irnn la iree iin biqbim la idrk hdrk hidd hSbti׃ 
isaiah 16:11	el kn mei lmoab kknor ihmo oqrbi lqir HrS׃ 
isaiah 16:12	ohih ki nrah ki nlah moab el hbmh oba al mqdSo lhtpll ola iokl׃ 
isaiah 16:13	ch hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al moab mac׃ 
isaiah 16:14	oeth dbr ihoh lamr bSlS Snim kSni Skir onqlh kbod moab bkl hhmon hrb oSar meT mcer loa kbir׃ 
isaiah 17:1	mSa dmSq hnh dmSq mosr meir ohith mei mplh׃ 
isaiah 17:2	ecbot eri erer ledrim thiinh orbzo oain mHrid׃ 
isaiah 17:3	onSbt mbzr maprim ommlkh mdmSq oSar arm kkbod bni iSral ihio nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
isaiah 17:4	ohih biom hhoa idl kbod ieqb omSmn bSro irch׃ 
isaiah 17:5	ohih kasp qzir qmh ocreo Sblim iqzor ohih kmlqT Sblim bemq rpaim׃ 
isaiah 17:6	onSar bo eollt knqp cit Snim SlSh grgrim braS amir arbeh HmSh bsepih prih nam ihoh alhi iSral׃ 
isaiah 17:7	biom hhoa iSeh hadm el eSho oeinio al qdoS iSral trainh׃ 
isaiah 17:8	ola iSeh al hmcbHot meSh idio oaSr eSo azbetio la irah ohaSrim ohHmnim׃ 
isaiah 17:9	biom hhoa ihio eri meco kecobt hHrS ohamir aSr ecbo mpni bni iSral ohith Smmh׃ 
isaiah 17:10	ki SkHt alhi iSek ozor meck la ckrt el kn tTei nTei nemnim ocmrt cr tcreno׃ 
isaiah 17:11	biom nTek tSgSgi obbqr crek tpriHi nd qzir biom nHlh okab anoS׃ 
isaiah 17:12	hoi hmon emim rbim khmot imim ihmion oSaon lamim kSaon mim kbirim iSaon׃ 
isaiah 17:13	lamim kSaon mim rbim iSaon oger bo ons mmrHq ordp kmz hrim lpni roH okglgl lpni soph׃ 
isaiah 17:14	let erb ohnh blhh bTrm bqr ainno ch Hlq Sosino ogorl lbccino׃ 
isaiah 18:1	hoi arz zlzl knpim aSr mebr lnhri koS׃ 
isaiah 18:2	hSlH bim zirim obkli gma el pni mim lko mlakim qlim al goi mmSk omorT al em nora mn hoa ohlah goi qo qo ombosh aSr bcao nhrim arzo׃ 
isaiah 18:3	kl iSbi tbl oSkni arz knSa ns hrim trao oktqe Sopr tSmeo׃ 
isaiah 18:4	ki kh amr ihoh ali aSqoTh oabiTh bmkoni kHm zH eli aor keb Tl bHm qzir׃ 
isaiah 18:5	ki lpni qzir ktm prH obsr gml ihih nzh okrt hclclim bmcmrot oat hnTiSot hsir htc׃ 
isaiah 18:6	iecbo iHdo leiT hrim olbhmt harz oqz elio heiT okl bhmt harz elio tHrp׃ 
isaiah 18:7	bet hhia iobl Si lihoh zbaot em mmSk omorT omem nora mn hoa ohlah goi qo qo ombosh aSr bcao nhrim arzo al mqom Sm ihoh zbaot hr zion׃ 
isaiah 19:1	mSa mzrim hnh ihoh rkb el eb ql oba mzrim oneo alili mzrim mpnio olbb mzrim ims bqrbo׃ 
isaiah 19:2	oskskti mzrim bmzrim onlHmo aiS baHio oaiS breho eir beir mmlkh bmmlkh׃ 
isaiah 19:3	onbqh roH mzrim bqrbo oezto able odrSo al halilim oal haTim oal habot oal hidenim׃ 
isaiah 19:4	oskrti at mzrim bid adnim qSh omlk ec imSl bm nam hadon ihoh zbaot׃ 
isaiah 19:5	onSto mim mhim onhr iHrb oibS׃ 
isaiah 19:6	ohacniHo nhrot dllo oHrbo iari mzor qnh osop qmlo׃ 
isaiah 19:7	erot el iaor el pi iaor okl mcre iaor iibS ndp oainno׃ 
isaiah 19:8	oano hdigim oablo kl mSliki biaor Hkh oprSi mkmrt el pni mim amllo׃ 
isaiah 19:9	obSo ebdi pStim Sriqot oargim Hori׃ 
isaiah 19:10	ohio Sttih mdkaim kl eSi Skr agmi npS׃ 
isaiah 19:11	ak aolim Sri zen Hkmi iezi preh ezh nberh aik tamro al preh bn Hkmim ani bn mlki qdm׃ 
isaiah 19:12	aim apoa Hkmik oigido na lk oideo mh iez ihoh zbaot el mzrim׃ 
isaiah 19:13	noalo Sri zen nSao Sri np hteo at mzrim pnt SbTih׃ 
isaiah 19:14	ihoh msk bqrbh roH eoeim ohteo at mzrim bkl meSho khteot Skor bqiao׃ 
isaiah 19:15	ola ihih lmzrim meSh aSr ieSh raS ocnb kph oagmon׃ 
isaiah 19:16	biom hhoa ihih mzrim knSim oHrd opHd mpni tnopt id ihoh zbaot aSr hoa mnip elio׃ 
isaiah 19:17	ohith admt ihodh lmzrim lHga kl aSr ickir ath alio ipHd mpni ezt ihoh zbaot aSr hoa ioez elio׃ 
isaiah 19:18	biom hhoa ihio HmS erim barz mzrim mdbrot Spt knen onSbeot lihoh zbaot eir hhrs iamr laHt׃ 
isaiah 19:19	biom hhoa ihih mcbH lihoh btok arz mzrim omzbh azl gbolh lihoh׃ 
isaiah 19:20	ohih laot oled lihoh zbaot barz mzrim ki izeqo al ihoh mpni lHzim oiSlH lhm moSie orb ohzilm׃ 
isaiah 19:21	onode ihoh lmzrim oideo mzrim at ihoh biom hhoa oebdo cbH omnHh ondro ndr lihoh oSlmo׃ 
isaiah 19:22	ongp ihoh at mzrim ngp orpoa oSbo ed ihoh onetr lhm orpam׃ 
isaiah 19:23	biom hhoa thih mslh mmzrim aSorh oba aSor bmzrim omzrim baSor oebdo mzrim at aSor׃ 
isaiah 19:24	biom hhoa ihih iSral SliSih lmzrim olaSor brkh bqrb harz׃ 
isaiah 19:25	aSr brko ihoh zbaot lamr brok emi mzrim omeSh idi aSor onHlti iSral׃ 
isaiah 20:1	bSnt ba trtn aSdodh bSlH ato srgon mlk aSor oilHm baSdod oilkdh׃ 
isaiah 20:2	bet hhia dbr ihoh bid iSeiho bn amoz lamr lk optHt hSq mel mtnik onelk tHlz mel rglik oieS kn hlk erom oiHp׃ 
isaiah 20:3	oiamr ihoh kaSr hlk ebdi iSeiho erom oiHp SlS Snim aot omopt el mzrim oel koS׃ 
isaiah 20:4	kn inhg mlk aSor at Sbi mzrim oat glot koS nerim ocqnim erom oiHp oHSopi St erot mzrim׃ 
isaiah 20:5	oHto obSo mkoS mbTm omn mzrim tpartm׃ 
isaiah 20:6	oamr iSb hai hch biom hhoa hnh kh mbTno aSr nsno Sm lecrh lhnzl mpni mlk aSor oaik nmlT anHno׃ 
isaiah 21:1	mSa mdbr im ksopot bngb lHlp mmdbr ba marz norah׃ 
isaiah 21:2	Hcot qSh hgd li hbogd bogd ohSodd Sodd eli eilm zori mdi kl anHth hSbti׃ 
isaiah 21:3	el kn mlao mtni HlHlh zirim aHconi kziri ioldh neoiti mSme nbhlti mraot׃ 
isaiah 21:4	teh lbbi plzot bettni at nSp HSqi Sm li lHrdh׃ 
isaiah 21:5	erk hSlHn zph hzpit akol Sth qomo hSrim mSHo mgn׃ 
isaiah 21:6	ki kh amr ali adni lk hemd hmzph aSr irah igid׃ 
isaiah 21:7	orah rkb zmd prSim rkb Hmor rkb gml ohqSib qSb rb qSb׃ 
isaiah 21:8	oiqra arih el mzph adni anki emd tmid iomm oel mSmrti anki nzb kl hlilot׃ 
isaiah 21:9	ohnh ch ba rkb aiS zmd prSim oien oiamr nplh nplh bbl okl psili alhih Sbr larz׃ 
isaiah 21:10	mdSti obn grni aSr Smeti mat ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hgdti lkm׃ 
isaiah 21:11	mSa domh ali qra mSeir Smr mh mlilh Smr mh mlil׃ 
isaiah 21:12	amr Smr ath bqr ogm lilh am tbeion beio Sbo atio׃ 
isaiah 21:13	mSa berb bier berb tlino arHot ddnim׃ 
isaiah 21:14	lqrat zma htio mim iSbi arz tima blHmo qdmo ndd׃ 
isaiah 21:15	ki mpni Hrbot nddo mpni Hrb nToSh ompni qSt drokh ompni kbd mlHmh׃ 
isaiah 21:16	ki kh amr adni ali beod Snh kSni Skir oklh kl kbod qdr׃ 
isaiah 21:17	oSar mspr qSt gbori bni qdr imeTo ki ihoh alhi iSral dbr׃ 
isaiah 22:1	mSa gia Hcion mh lk apoa ki elit klk lggot׃ 
isaiah 22:2	tSaot mlah eir homih qrih elich Hllik la Hlli Hrb ola mti mlHmh׃ 
isaiah 22:3	kl qzinik nddo iHd mqSt asro kl nmzaik asro iHdo mrHoq brHo׃ 
isaiah 22:4	el kn amrti Seo mni amrr bbki al taizo lnHmni el Sd bt emi׃ 
isaiah 22:5	ki iom mhomh ombosh ombokh ladni ihoh zbaot bgia Hcion mqrqr qr oSoe al hhr׃ 
isaiah 22:6	oeilm nSa aSph brkb adm prSim oqir erh mgn׃ 
isaiah 22:7	oihi mbHr emqik mlao rkb ohprSim St Sto hSerh׃ 
isaiah 22:8	oigl at msk ihodh otbT biom hhoa al nSq bit hier׃ 
isaiah 22:9	oat bqiei eir dod raitm ki rbo otqbzo at mi hbrkh htHtonh׃ 
isaiah 22:10	oat bti iroSlm sprtm ottzo hbtim lbzr hHomh׃ 
isaiah 22:11	omqoh eSitm bin hHmtim lmi hbrkh hiSnh ola hbTtm al eSih oizrh mrHoq la raitm׃ 
isaiah 22:12	oiqra adni ihoh zbaot biom hhoa lbki olmspd olqrHh olHgr Sq׃ 
isaiah 22:13	ohnh SSon oSmHh hrg bqr oSHT zan akl bSr oStot iin akol oSto ki mHr nmot׃ 
isaiah 22:14	onglh bacni ihoh zbaot am ikpr heon hch lkm ed tmton amr adni ihoh zbaot׃ 
isaiah 22:15	kh amr adni ihoh zbaot lk ba al hskn hch el Sbna aSr el hbit׃ 
isaiah 22:16	mh lk ph omi lk ph ki Hzbt lk ph qbr Hzbi mrom qbro Hqqi bsle mSkn lo׃ 
isaiah 22:17	hnh ihoh mTlTlk TlTlh gbr oeTk eTh׃ 
isaiah 22:18	znop iznpk znph kdor al arz rHbt idim Smh tmot oSmh mrkbot kbodk qlon bit adnik׃ 
isaiah 22:19	ohdptik mmzbk ommemdk ihrsk׃ 
isaiah 22:20	ohih biom hhoa oqrati lebdi laliqim bn Hlqiho׃ 
isaiah 22:21	ohlbStio ktntk oabnTk aHcqno ommSltk atn bido ohih lab lioSb iroSlm olbit ihodh׃ 
isaiah 22:22	ontti mptH bit dod el Skmo optH oain sgr osgr oain ptH׃ 
isaiah 22:23	otqetio itd bmqom namn ohih lksa kbod lbit abio׃ 
isaiah 22:24	otlo elio kl kbod bit abio hzazaim ohzpeot kl kli hqTn mkli hagnot oed kl kli hnblim׃ 
isaiah 22:25	biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot tmoS hitd htqoeh bmqom namn ongdeh onplh onkrt hmSa aSr elih ki ihoh dbr׃ 
isaiah 23:1	mSa zr hililo aniot trSiS ki Sdd mbit mboa marz ktim nglh lmo׃ 
isaiah 23:2	dmo iSbi ai sHr zidon ebr im mlaok׃ 
isaiah 23:3	obmim rbim cre SHr qzir iaor tboath othi sHr goim׃ 
isaiah 23:4	boSi zidon ki amr im meoc him lamr la Hlti ola ildti ola gdlti bHorim rommti btolot׃ 
isaiah 23:5	kaSr Sme lmzrim iHilo kSme zr׃ 
isaiah 23:6	ebro trSiSh hililo iSbi ai׃ 
isaiah 23:7	hcat lkm elich mimi qdm qdmth ibloh rglih mrHoq lgor׃ 
isaiah 23:8	mi iez cat el zr hmeTirh aSr sHrih Srim knenih nkbdi arz׃ 
isaiah 23:9	ihoh zbaot iezh lHll gaon kl zbi lhql kl nkbdi arz׃ 
isaiah 23:10	ebri arzk kiar bt trSiS ain mcH eod׃ 
isaiah 23:11	ido nTh el him hrgic mmlkot ihoh zoh al knen lSmd mecnih׃ 
isaiah 23:12	oiamr la tosipi eod leloc hmeSqh btolt bt zidon ktiim qomi ebri gm Sm la inoH lk׃ 
isaiah 23:13	hn arz kSdim ch hem la hih aSor isdh lziim hqimo bHinio erro armnotih Smh lmplh׃ 
isaiah 23:14	hililo aniot trSiS ki Sdd meckn׃ 
isaiah 23:15	ohih biom hhoa onSkHt zr Sbeim Snh kimi mlk aHd mqz Sbeim Snh ihih lzr kSirt hconh׃ 
isaiah 23:16	qHi knor sbi eir conh nSkHh hiTibi ngn hrbi Sir lmen tckri׃ 
isaiah 23:17	ohih mqz Sbeim Snh ipqd ihoh at zr oSbh latnnh ocnth at kl mmlkot harz el pni hadmh׃ 
isaiah 23:18	ohih sHrh oatnnh qdS lihoh la iazr ola iHsn ki liSbim lpni ihoh ihih sHrh lakl lSbeh olmksh etiq׃ 
isaiah 24:1	hnh ihoh boqq harz obolqh oeoh pnih ohpiz iSbih׃ 
isaiah 24:2	ohih kem kkhn kebd kadnio kSpHh kgbrth kqonh kmokr kmloh kloh knSh kaSr nSa bo׃ 
isaiah 24:3	hboq tboq harz ohboc tboc ki ihoh dbr at hdbr hch׃ 
isaiah 24:4	ablh nblh harz amllh nblh tbl amllo mrom em harz׃ 
isaiah 24:5	oharz Hnph tHt iSbih ki ebro tort Hlpo Hq hpro brit eolm׃ 
isaiah 24:6	el kn alh aklh arz oiaSmo iSbi bh el kn Hro iSbi arz onSar anoS mcer׃ 
isaiah 24:7	abl tiroS amllh gpn nanHo kl SmHi lb׃ 
isaiah 24:8	Sbt mSoS tpim Hdl Saon elicim Sbt mSoS knor׃ 
isaiah 24:9	bSir la iSto iin imr Skr lStio׃ 
isaiah 24:10	nSbrh qrit tho sgr kl bit mboa׃ 
isaiah 24:11	zoHh el hiin bHozot erbh kl SmHh glh mSoS harz׃ 
isaiah 24:12	nSar beir Smh oSaih ikt Ser׃ 
isaiah 24:13	ki kh ihih bqrb harz btok hemim knqp cit keollt am klh bzir׃ 
isaiah 24:14	hmh iSao qolm irno bgaon ihoh zhlo mim׃ 
isaiah 24:15	el kn barim kbdo ihoh baii him Sm ihoh alhi iSral׃ 
isaiah 24:16	mknp harz cmrt Smeno zbi lzdiq oamr rci li rci li aoi li bgdim bgdo obgd bogdim bgdo׃ 
isaiah 24:17	pHd opHt opH elik ioSb harz׃ 
isaiah 24:18	ohih hns mqol hpHd ipl al hpHt oheolh mtok hpHt ilkd bpH ki arbot mmrom nptHo oireSo mosdi arz׃ 
isaiah 24:19	reh htreeh harz por htporrh arz moT htmoTTh arz׃ 
isaiah 24:20	noe tnoe arz kSkor ohtnoddh kmlonh okbd elih pSeh onplh ola tsip qom׃ 
isaiah 24:21	ohih biom hhoa ipqd ihoh el zba hmrom bmrom oel mlki hadmh el hadmh׃ 
isaiah 24:22	oaspo asph asir el bor osgro el msgr omrb imim ipqdo׃ 
isaiah 24:23	oHprh hlbnh oboSh hHmh ki mlk ihoh zbaot bhr zion obiroSlm ongd cqnio kbod׃ 
isaiah 25:1	ihoh alhi ath arommk aodh Smk ki eSit pla ezot mrHoq amonh amn׃ 
isaiah 25:2	ki Smt meir lgl qrih bzorh lmplh armon crim meir leolm la ibnh׃ 
isaiah 25:3	el kn ikbdok em ec qrit goim erizim iiraok׃ 
isaiah 25:4	ki hiit meoc ldl meoc labion bzr lo mHsh mcrm zl mHrb ki roH erizim kcrm qir׃ 
isaiah 25:5	kHrb bzion Saon crim tknie Hrb bzl eb cmir erizim ienh׃ 
isaiah 25:6	oeSh ihoh zbaot lkl hemim bhr hch mSth Smnim mSth Smrim Smnim mmHim Smrim mcqqim׃ 
isaiah 25:7	oble bhr hch pni hloT hloT el kl hemim ohmskh hnsokh el kl hgoim׃ 
isaiah 25:8	ble hmot lnzH omHh adni ihoh dmeh mel kl pnim oHrpt emo isir mel kl harz ki ihoh dbr׃ 
isaiah 25:9	oamr biom hhoa hnh alhino ch qoino lo oioSieno ch ihoh qoino lo ngilh onSmHh biSoeto׃ 
isaiah 25:10	ki tnoH id ihoh bhr hch ondoS moab tHtio khdoS mtbn bmi mdmnh׃ 
isaiah 25:11	oprS idio bqrbo kaSr iprS hSHh lSHot ohSpil gaoto em arbot idio׃ 
isaiah 25:12	ombzr mSgb Homtik hSH hSpil hgie larz ed epr׃ 
isaiah 26:1	biom hhoa ioSr hSir hch barz ihodh eir ec lno iSoeh iSit Homot oHl׃ 
isaiah 26:2	ptHo Serim oiba goi zdiq Smr amnim׃ 
isaiah 26:3	izr smok tzr Slom Slom ki bk bToH׃ 
isaiah 26:4	bTHo bihoh edi ed ki bih ihoh zor eolmim׃ 
isaiah 26:5	ki hSH iSbi mrom qrih nSgbh iSpilnh iSpilh ed arz igienh ed epr׃ 
isaiah 26:6	trmsnh rgl rgli eni pemi dlim׃ 
isaiah 26:7	arH lzdiq miSrim iSr megl zdiq tpls׃ 
isaiah 26:8	ap arH mSpTik ihoh qoinok lSmk olckrk taot npS׃ 
isaiah 26:9	npSi aoitik blilh ap roHi bqrbi aSHrk ki kaSr mSpTik larz zdq lmdo iSbi tbl׃ 
isaiah 26:10	iHn rSe bl lmd zdq barz nkHot ieol obl irah gaot ihoh׃ 
isaiah 26:11	ihoh rmh idk bl iHcion iHco oibSo qnat em ap aS zrik taklm׃ 
isaiah 26:12	ihoh tSpt Slom lno ki gm kl meSino pelt lno׃ 
isaiah 26:13	ihoh alhino belono adnim coltk lbd bk nckir Smk׃ 
isaiah 26:14	mtim bl iHio rpaim bl iqmo lkn pqdt otSmidm otabd kl ckr lmo׃ 
isaiah 26:15	ispt lgoi ihoh ispt lgoi nkbdt rHqt kl qzoi arz׃ 
isaiah 26:16	ihoh bzr pqdok zqon lHS mosrk lmo׃ 
isaiah 26:17	kmo hrh tqrib lldt tHil tceq bHblih kn hiino mpnik ihoh׃ 
isaiah 26:18	hrino Hlno kmo ildno roH iSoet bl neSh arz obl iplo iSbi tbl׃ 
isaiah 26:19	iHio mtik nblti iqomon hqizo ornno Skni epr ki Tl aort Tlk oarz rpaim tpil׃ 
isaiah 26:20	lk emi ba bHdrik osgr dltik bedk Hbi kmeT rge ed iebor cem׃ 
isaiah 26:21	ki hnh ihoh iza mmqomo lpqd eon iSb harz elio oglth harz at dmih ola tksh eod el hrogih׃ 
isaiah 27:1	biom hhoa ipqd ihoh bHrbo hqSh ohgdolh ohHcqh el loitn nHS brH oel loitn nHS eqlton ohrg at htnin aSr bim׃ 
isaiah 27:2	biom hhoa krm Hmd eno lh׃ 
isaiah 27:3	ani ihoh nzrh lrgeim aSqnh pn ipqd elih lilh oiom azrnh׃ 
isaiah 27:4	Hmh ain li mi itnni Smir Sit bmlHmh apSeh bh azitnh iHd׃ 
isaiah 27:5	ao iHcq bmeoci ieSh Slom li Slom ieSh li׃ 
isaiah 27:6	hbaim iSrS ieqb iziz oprH iSral omlao pni tbl tnobh׃ 
isaiah 27:7	hkmkt mkho hkho am khrg hrgio hrg׃ 
isaiah 27:8	bsasah bSlHh tribnh hgh broHo hqSh biom qdim׃ 
isaiah 27:9	lkn bcat ikpr eon ieqb och kl pri hsr HTato bSomo kl abni mcbH kabni gr mnpzot la iqmo aSrim oHmnim׃ 
isaiah 27:10	ki eir bzorh bdd noh mSlH onecb kmdbr Sm ireh egl oSm irbz oklh sepih׃ 
isaiah 27:11	bibS qzirh tSbrnh nSim baot mairot aoth ki la em binot hoa el kn la irHmno eSho oizro la iHnno׃ 
isaiah 27:12	ohih biom hhoa iHbT ihoh mSblt hnhr ed nHl mzrim oatm tlqTo laHd aHd bni iSral׃ 
isaiah 27:13	ohih biom hhoa itqe bSopr gdol obao habdim barz aSor ohndHim barz mzrim ohStHoo lihoh bhr hqdS biroSlm׃ 
isaiah 28:1	hoi eTrt gaot Skri aprim oziz nbl zbi tparto aSr el raS gia Smnim hlomi iin׃ 
isaiah 28:2	hnh Hcq oamz ladni kcrm brd Ser qTb kcrm mim kbirim STpim hniH larz bid׃ 
isaiah 28:3	brglim trmsnh eTrt gaot Skori aprim׃ 
isaiah 28:4	ohith zizt nbl zbi tparto aSr el raS gia Smnim kbkorh bTrm qiz aSr irah hrah aoth beodh bkpo iblenh׃ 
isaiah 28:5	biom hhoa ihih ihoh zbaot leTrt zbi olzpirt tparh lSar emo׃ 
isaiah 28:6	olroH mSpT lioSb el hmSpT olgborh mSibi mlHmh Serh׃ 
isaiah 28:7	ogm alh biin Sgo obSkr teo khn onbia Sgo bSkr nbleo mn hiin teo mn hSkr Sgo brah pqo plilih׃ 
isaiah 28:8	ki kl SlHnot mlao qia zah bli mqom׃ 
isaiah 28:9	at mi iorh deh oat mi ibin Smoeh gmoli mHlb etiqi mSdim׃ 
isaiah 28:10	ki zo lzo zo lzo qo lqo qo lqo ceir Sm ceir Sm׃ 
isaiah 28:11	ki blegi Sph oblSon aHrt idbr al hem hch׃ 
isaiah 28:12	aSr amr alihm cat hmnoHh hniHo leip ocat hmrgeh ola aboa Smoe׃ 
isaiah 28:13	ohih lhm dbr ihoh zo lzo zo lzo qo lqo qo lqo ceir Sm ceir Sm lmen ilko okSlo aHor onSbro onoqSo onlkdo׃ 
isaiah 28:14	lkn Smeo dbr ihoh anSi lzon mSli hem hch aSr biroSlm׃ 
isaiah 28:15	ki amrtm krtno brit at mot oem Saol eSino Hch SiT SoTp ki ebr la iboano ki Smno kcb mHsno obSqr nstrno׃ 
isaiah 28:16	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni isd bzion abn abn bHn pnt iqrt mosd mosd hmamin la iHiS׃ 
isaiah 28:17	oSmti mSpT lqo ozdqh lmSqlt oieh brd mHsh kcb ostr mim iSTpo׃ 
isaiah 28:18	okpr britkm at mot oHcotkm at Saol la tqom SoT SoTp ki iebr ohiitm lo lmrms׃ 
isaiah 28:19	mdi ebro iqH atkm ki bbqr bbqr iebr biom oblilh ohih rq coeh hbin Smoeh׃ 
isaiah 28:20	ki qzr hmze mhStre ohmskh zrh khtkns׃ 
isaiah 28:21	ki khr przim iqom ihoh kemq bgbeon irgc leSot meSho cr meSho olebd ebdto nkrih ebdto׃ 
isaiah 28:22	oeth al ttlozzo pn iHcqo mosrikm ki klh onHrzh Smeti mat adni ihoh zbaot el kl harz׃ 
isaiah 28:23	hacino oSmeo qoli hqSibo oSmeo amrti׃ 
isaiah 28:24	hkl hiom iHrS hHrS lcre iptH oiSdd admto׃ 
isaiah 28:25	hloa am Soh pnih ohpiz qzH okmn icrq oSm HTh Sorh oSerh nsmn oksmt gblto׃ 
isaiah 28:26	oisro lmSpT alhio iorno׃ 
isaiah 28:27	ki la bHroz iodS qzH oaopn eglh el kmn iosb ki bmTh iHbT qzH okmn bSbT׃ 
isaiah 28:28	lHm iodq ki la lnzH adoS idoSno ohmm glgl eglto oprSio la idqno׃ 
isaiah 28:29	gm cat mem ihoh zbaot izah hplia ezh hgdil toSih׃ 
isaiah 29:1	hoi arial arial qrit Hnh dod spo Snh el Snh Hgim inqpo׃ 
isaiah 29:2	ohziqoti larial ohith tanih oanih ohith li karial׃ 
isaiah 29:3	oHniti kdor elik ozrti elik mzb ohqimti elik mzrt׃ 
isaiah 29:4	oSplt marz tdbri omepr tSH amrtk ohih kaob marz qolk omepr amrtk tzpzp׃ 
isaiah 29:5	ohih kabq dq hmon crik okmz ebr hmon erizim ohih lpte ptam׃ 
isaiah 29:6	mem ihoh zbaot tpqd brem obreS oqol gdol soph oserh olhb aS aoklh׃ 
isaiah 29:7	ohih kHlom Hcon lilh hmon kl hgoim hzbaim el arial okl zbih omzdth ohmziqim lh׃ 
isaiah 29:8	ohih kaSr iHlm hreb ohnh aokl ohqiz oriqh npSo okaSr iHlm hzma ohnh Sth ohqiz ohnh eip onpSo Soqqh kn ihih hmon kl hgoim hzbaim el hr zion׃ 
isaiah 29:9	htmhmho otmho hSteSeo oSeo Skro ola iin neo ola Skr׃ 
isaiah 29:10	ki nsk elikm ihoh roH trdmh oiezm at einikm at hnbiaim oat raSikm hHcim ksh׃ 
isaiah 29:11	othi lkm Hcot hkl kdbri hspr hHtom aSr itno ato al iode hspr lamr qra na ch oamr la aokl ki Htom hoa׃ 
isaiah 29:12	ontn hspr el aSr la ide spr lamr qra na ch oamr la ideti spr׃ 
isaiah 29:13	oiamr adni ien ki ngS hem hch bpio obSptio kbdoni olbo rHq mmni othi iratm ati mzot anSim mlmdh׃ 
isaiah 29:14	lkn hnni iosp lhplia at hem hch hpla opla oabdh Hkmt Hkmio obint nbnio tsttr׃ 
isaiah 29:15	hoi hmemiqim mihoh lstr ezh ohih bmHSk meSihm oiamro mi rano omi iodeno׃ 
isaiah 29:16	hpkkm am kHmr hizr iHSb ki iamr meSh leSho la eSni oizr amr liozro la hbin׃ 
isaiah 29:17	hloa eod meT mcer oSb lbnon lkrml ohkrml lier iHSb׃ 
isaiah 29:18	oSmeo biom hhoa hHrSim dbri spr omapl omHSk eini eorim trainh׃ 
isaiah 29:19	oispo enoim bihoh SmHh oabioni adm bqdoS iSral igilo׃ 
isaiah 29:20	ki aps eriz oklh lz onkrto kl Sqdi aon׃ 
isaiah 29:21	mHTiai adm bdbr olmokiH bSer iqSon oiTo btho zdiq׃ 
isaiah 29:22	lkn kh amr ihoh al bit ieqb aSr pdh at abrhm la eth iboS ieqb ola eth pnio iHoro׃ 
isaiah 29:23	ki brato ildio meSh idi bqrbo iqdiSo Smi ohqdiSo at qdoS ieqb oat alhi iSral ierizo׃ 
isaiah 29:24	oideo tei roH binh orognim ilmdo lqH׃ 
isaiah 30:1	hoi bnim sorrim nam ihoh leSot ezh ola mni olnsk mskh ola roHi lmen spot HTat el HTat׃ 
isaiah 30:2	hhlkim lrdt mzrim opi la Salo leoc bmeoc preh olHsot bzl mzrim׃ 
isaiah 30:3	ohih lkm meoc preh lbSt ohHsot bzl mzrim lklmh׃ 
isaiah 30:4	ki hio bzen Srio omlakio Hns igieo׃ 
isaiah 30:5	kl hbaiS el em la ioeilo lmo la lecr ola lhoeil ki lbSt ogm lHrph׃ 
isaiah 30:6	mSa bhmot ngb barz zrh ozoqh lbia oliS mhm apeh oSrp meopp iSao el ktp eirim Hilhm oel dbSt gmlim aozrtm el em la ioeilo׃ 
isaiah 30:7	omzrim hbl oriq iecro lkn qrati lcat rhb hm Sbt׃ 
isaiah 30:8	eth boa ktbh el loH atm oel spr Hqh othi liom aHron led ed eolm׃ 
isaiah 30:9	ki em mri hoa bnim kHSim bnim la abo Smoe tort ihoh׃ 
isaiah 30:10	aSr amro lraim la trao olHcim la tHco lno nkHot dbro lno Hlqot Hco mhtlot׃ 
isaiah 30:11	soro mni drk hTo mni arH hSbito mpnino at qdoS iSral׃ 
isaiah 30:12	lkn kh amr qdoS iSral ien maskm bdbr hch otbTHo beSq onloc otSeno elio׃ 
isaiah 30:13	lkn ihih lkm heon hch kprz npl nbeh bHomh nSgbh aSr ptam lpte iboa Sbrh׃ 
isaiah 30:14	oSbrh kSbr nbl iozrim ktot la iHml ola imza bmktto HrS lHtot aS miqod olHSp mim mgba׃ 
isaiah 30:15	ki kh amr adni ihoh qdoS iSral bSobh onHt toSeon bhSqT obbTHh thih gbortkm ola abitm׃ 
isaiah 30:16	otamro la ki el sos nnos el kn tnoson oel ql nrkb el kn iqlo rdpikm׃ 
isaiah 30:17	alp aHd mpni gert aHd mpni gert HmSh tnso ed am notrtm ktrn el raS hhr okns el hgbeh׃ 
isaiah 30:18	olkn iHkh ihoh lHnnkm olkn irom lrHmkm ki alhi mSpT ihoh aSri kl Hoki lo׃ 
isaiah 30:19	ki em bzion iSb biroSlm bko la tbkh Hnon iHnk lqol ceqk kSmeto enk׃ 
isaiah 30:20	ontn lkm adni lHm zr omim lHz ola iknp eod morik ohio einik raot at morik׃ 
isaiah 30:21	oacnik tSmenh dbr maHrik lamr ch hdrk lko bo ki tamino oki tSmailo׃ 
isaiah 30:22	oTmatm at zpoi psili kspk oat apdt mskt chbk tcrm kmo doh za tamr lo׃ 
isaiah 30:23	ontn mTr crek aSr tcre at hadmh olHm tboat hadmh ohih dSn oSmn ireh mqnik biom hhoa kr nrHb׃ 
isaiah 30:24	ohalpim oheirim ebdi hadmh blil Hmiz iaklo aSr crh brHt obmcrh׃ 
isaiah 30:25	ohih el kl hr gbh oel kl gbeh nSah plgim ibli mim biom hrg rb bnpl mgdlim׃ 
isaiah 30:26	ohih aor hlbnh kaor hHmh oaor hHmh ihih Sbetim kaor Sbet himim biom HbS ihoh at Sbr emo omHz mkto irpa׃ 
isaiah 30:27	hnh Sm ihoh ba mmrHq ber apo okbd mSah Sptio mlao cem olSono kaS aklt׃ 
isaiah 30:28	oroHo knHl SoTp ed zoar iHzh lhnph goim bnpt Soa orsn mteh el lHii emim׃ 
isaiah 30:29	hSir ihih lkm klil htqdS Hg oSmHt lbb kholk bHlil lboa bhr ihoh al zor iSral׃ 
isaiah 30:30	ohSmie ihoh at hod qolo onHt croeo irah bcep ap olhb aS aoklh npz ocrm oabn brd׃ 
isaiah 30:31	ki mqol ihoh iHt aSor bSbT ikh׃

isaiah 31:1	hoi hirdim mzrim lecrh el sosim iSeno oibTHo el rkb ki rb oel prSim ki ezmo mad ola Seo el qdoS iSral oat ihoh la drSo׃ 
isaiah 31:2	ogm hoa Hkm oiba re oat dbrio la hsir oqm el bit mreim oel ecrt peli aon׃

isaiah 31:5	kzprim epot kn ign ihoh zbaot el iroSlm gnon ohzil psH ohmliT׃ 
isaiah 31:6	Sobo laSr hemiqo srh bni iSral׃

isaiah 32:1	hn lzdq imlk mlk olSrim lmSpT iSro׃

isaiah 32:3	ola tSeinh eini raim oacni Smeim tqSbnh׃ 
isaiah 32:4	olbb nmhrim ibin ldet olSon elgim tmhr ldbr zHot׃ 
isaiah 32:5	la iqra eod lnbl ndib olkili la iamr Soe׃ 
isaiah 32:6	ki nbl nblh idbr olbo ieSh aon leSot Hnp oldbr al ihoh toeh lhriq npS reb omSqh zma iHsir׃ 
isaiah 32:7	okli klio reim hoa cmot iez lHbl enoim bamri Sqr obdbr abion mSpT׃ 
isaiah 32:8	ondib ndibot iez ohoa el ndibot iqom׃ 
isaiah 32:9	nSim Sannot qmnh Smenh qoli bnot bTHot hacnh amrti׃ 
isaiah 32:10	imim el Snh trgcnh bTHot ki klh bzir asp bli iboa׃ 
isaiah 32:11	Hrdo Sannot rgch bTHot pSTh oerh oHgorh el Hlzim׃ 
isaiah 32:12	el Sdim spdim el Sdi Hmd el gpn prih׃ 
isaiah 32:13	el admt emi qoz Smir telh ki el kl bti mSoS qrih elich׃ 
isaiah 32:14	ki armon nTS hmon eir ecb epl obHn hih bed merot ed eolm mSoS praim mreh edrim׃ 
isaiah 32:15	ed ierh elino roH mmrom ohih mdbr lkrml okrml lier iHSb׃

isaiah 33:1	hoi Sodd oath la Sdod obogd ola bgdo bo khtmk Sodd toSd knltk lbgd ibgdo bk׃

isaiah 33:3	mqol hmon nddo emim mrommtk npzo goim׃ 
isaiah 33:4	oasp Sllkm asp hHsil kmSq gbim Soqq bo׃

isaiah 33:7	hn aralm zeqo Hzh mlaki Slom mr ibkion׃

isaiah 33:9	abl amllh arz hHpir lbnon qml hih hSron kerbh oner bSn okrml׃ 
isaiah 33:10	eth aqom iamr ihoh eth aromm eth anSa׃

isaiah 33:16	hoa mromim iSkn mzdot sleim mSgbo lHmo ntn mimio namnim׃ 
isaiah 33:17	mlk bipio tHcinh einik trainh arz mrHqim׃ 
isaiah 33:18	lbk ihgh aimh aih spr aih Sql aih spr at hmgdlim׃ 
isaiah 33:19	at em noec la trah em emqi Sph mSmoe nleg lSon ain binh׃ 
isaiah 33:20	Hch zion qrit moedno einik trainh iroSlm noh Sann ahl bl izen bl ise itdtio lnzH okl Hblio bl intqo׃ 
isaiah 33:21	ki am Sm adir ihoh lno mqom nhrim iarim rHbi idim bl tlk bo ani SiT ozi adir la iebrno׃ 
isaiah 33:22	ki ihoh SpTno ihoh mHqqno ihoh mlkno hoa ioSieno׃

isaiah 33:24	obl iamr Skn Hliti hem hiSb bh nSa eon׃ 
isaiah 34:1	qrbo goim lSme olamim hqSibo tSme harz omlah tbl okl zazaih׃ 
isaiah 34:2	ki qzp lihoh el kl hgoim oHmh el kl zbam hHrimm ntnm lTbH׃ 
isaiah 34:3	oHllihm iSlko opgrihm ielh baSm onmso hrim mdmm׃ 
isaiah 34:4	onmqo kl zba hSmim onglo kspr hSmim okl zbam ibol knbl elh mgpn oknblt mtanh׃ 
isaiah 34:5	ki roth bSmim Hrbi hnh el adom trd oel em Hrmi lmSpT׃ 
isaiah 34:6	Hrb lihoh mlah dm hdSnh mHlb mdm krim oetodim mHlb kliot ailim ki cbH lihoh bbzrh oTbH gdol barz adom׃ 
isaiah 34:7	oirdo ramim emm oprim em abirim oroth arzm mdm oeprm mHlb idSn׃ 
isaiah 34:8	ki iom nqm lihoh Snt Slomim lrib zion׃ 
isaiah 34:9	onhpko nHlih lcpt oeprh lgprit ohith arzh lcpt berh׃ 
isaiah 34:10	lilh oiomm la tkbh leolm ielh eSnh mdor ldor tHrb lnzH nzHim ain ebr bh׃ 
isaiah 34:11	oirSoh qat oqpod oinSop oerb iSkno bh onTh elih qo tho oabni bho׃ 
isaiah 34:12	Hrih oain Sm mlokh iqrao okl Srih ihio aps׃ 
isaiah 34:13	oelth armntih sirim qmoS oHoH bmbzrih ohith noh tnim Hzir lbnot ienh׃ 
isaiah 34:14	opgSo ziim at aiim oSeir el reho iqra ak Sm hrgieh lilit omzah lh mnoH׃ 
isaiah 34:15	Smh qnnh qpoc otmlT obqeh odgrh bzlh ak Sm nqbzo diot aSh reoth׃

isaiah 35:1	iSSom mdbr ozih otgl erbh otprH kHbzlt׃ 
isaiah 35:2	prH tprH otgl ap gilt ornn kbod hlbnon ntn lh hdr hkrml ohSron hmh irao kbod ihoh hdr alhino׃ 
isaiah 35:3	Hcqo idim rpot obrkim kSlot amzo׃ 
isaiah 35:4	amro lnmhri lb Hcqo al tirao hnh alhikm nqm iboa gmol alhim hoa iboa oiSekm׃ 
isaiah 35:5	ac tpqHnh eini eorim oacni HrSim tptHnh׃ 
isaiah 35:6	ac idlg kail psH otrn lSon alm ki nbqeo bmdbr mim onHlim berbh׃ 
isaiah 35:7	ohih hSrb lagm ozmaon lmboei mim bnoh tnim rbzh Hzir lqnh ogma׃ 
isaiah 35:8	ohih Sm mslol odrk odrk hqdS iqra lh la iebrno Tma ohoa lmo hlk drk oaoilim la iteo׃ 
isaiah 35:9	la ihih Sm arih opriz Hiot bl ielnh la tmza Sm ohlko gaolim׃
