isaiah 36:1	oihi barbe eSrh Snh lmlk Hcqiho elh snHrib mlk aSor el kl eri ihodh hbzrot oitpSm׃ 
isaiah 36:2	oiSlH mlk aSor at rb Sqh mlkiS iroSlmh al hmlk Hcqiho bHil kbd oiemd btelt hbrkh helionh bmslt Sdh kobs׃ 
isaiah 36:3	oiza alio aliqim bn Hlqiho aSr el hbit oSbna hspr oioaH bn asp hmckir׃ 
isaiah 36:4	oiamr alihm rb Sqh amro na al Hcqiho kh amr hmlk hgdol mlk aSor mh hbTHon hch aSr bTHt׃ 
isaiah 36:5	amrti ak dbr Sptim ezh ogborh lmlHmh eth el mi bTHt ki mrdt bi׃ 
isaiah 36:6	hnh bTHt el mSent hqnh hrzoz hch el mzrim aSr ismk aiS elio oba bkpo onqbh kn preh mlk mzrim lkl hbTHim elio׃ 
isaiah 36:7	oki tamr ali al ihoh alhino bTHno hloa hoa aSr hsir Hcqiho at bmtio oat mcbHtio oiamr lihodh oliroSlm lpni hmcbH hch tStHoo׃ 
isaiah 36:8	oeth hterb na at adni hmlk aSor oatnh lk alpim sosim am tokl ltt lk rkbim elihm׃ 
isaiah 36:9	oaik tSib at pni pHt aHd ebdi adni hqTnim otbTH lk el mzrim lrkb olprSim׃ 
isaiah 36:10	oeth hmbledi ihoh eliti el harz hcat lhSHith ihoh amr ali elh al harz hcat ohSHith׃ 
isaiah 36:11	oiamr aliqim oSbna oioaH al rb Sqh dbr na al ebdik armit ki Smeim anHno oal tdbr alino ihodit bacni hem aSr el hHomh׃ 
isaiah 36:12	oiamr rb Sqh hal adnik oalik SlHni adni ldbr at hdbrim halh hla el hanSim hiSbim el hHomh lakl at Hraihm olStot at Sinihm emkm׃ 
isaiah 36:13	oiemd rb Sqh oiqra bqol gdol ihodit oiamr Smeo at dbri hmlk hgdol mlk aSor׃ 
isaiah 36:14	kh amr hmlk al iSa lkm Hcqiho ki la iokl lhzil atkm׃ 
isaiah 36:15	oal ibTH atkm Hcqiho al ihoh lamr hzl izilno ihoh la tntn heir hcat bid mlk aSor׃ 
isaiah 36:16	al tSmeo al Hcqiho ki kh amr hmlk aSor eSo ati brkh ozao ali oaklo aiS gpno oaiS tanto oSto aiS mi boro׃ 
isaiah 36:17	ed bai olqHti atkm al arz karzkm arz dgn otiroS arz lHm okrmim׃ 
isaiah 36:18	pn isit atkm Hcqiho lamr ihoh izilno hhzilo alhi hgoim aiS at arzo mid mlk aSor׃ 
isaiah 36:19	aih alhi Hmt oarpd aih alhi sproim oki hzilo at Smron midi׃ 
isaiah 36:20	mi bkl alhi harzot halh aSr hzilo at arzm midi ki izil ihoh at iroSlm midi׃ 
isaiah 36:21	oiHriSo ola eno ato dbr ki mzot hmlk hia lamr la tenho׃ 
isaiah 36:22	oiba aliqim bn Hlqiho aSr el hbit oSbna hsopr oioaH bn asp hmckir al Hcqiho qroei bgdim oigido lo at dbri rb Sqh׃ 
isaiah 37:1	oihi kSme hmlk Hcqiho oiqre at bgdio oitks bSq oiba bit ihoh׃ 
isaiah 37:2	oiSlH at aliqim aSr el hbit oat Sbna hsopr oat cqni hkhnim mtksim bSqim al iSeiho bn amoz hnbia׃ 
isaiah 37:3	oiamro alio kh amr Hcqiho iom zrh otokHh onazh hiom hch ki bao bnim ed mSbr okH ain lldh׃ 
isaiah 37:4	aoli iSme ihoh alhik at dbri rb Sqh aSr SlHo mlk aSor adnio lHrp alhim Hi ohokiH bdbrim aSr Sme ihoh alhik onSat tplh bed hSarit hnmzah׃ 
isaiah 37:5	oibao ebdi hmlk Hcqiho al iSeiho׃ 
isaiah 37:6	oiamr alihm iSeiho kh tamron al adnikm kh amr ihoh al tira mpni hdbrim aSr Smet aSr gdpo neri mlk aSor aoti׃ 
isaiah 37:7	hnni notn bo roH oSme Smoeh oSb al arzo ohpltio bHrb barzo׃ 
isaiah 37:8	oiSb rb Sqh oimza at mlk aSor nlHm el lbnh ki Sme ki nse mlkiS׃ 
isaiah 37:9	oiSme el trhqh mlk koS lamr iza lhlHm atk oiSme oiSlH mlakim al Hcqiho lamr׃ 
isaiah 37:10	kh tamron al Hcqiho mlk ihodh lamr al iSak alhik aSr ath boTH bo lamr la tntn iroSlm bid mlk aSor׃ 
isaiah 37:11	hnh ath Smet aSr eSo mlki aSor lkl harzot lhHrimm oath tnzl׃ 
isaiah 37:12	hhzilo aotm alhi hgoim aSr hSHito aboti at gocn oat Hrn orzp obni edn aSr btlSr׃ 
isaiah 37:13	aih mlk Hmt omlk arpd omlk leir sproim hne oeoh׃ 
isaiah 37:14	oiqH Hcqiho at hsprim mid hmlakim oiqraho oiel bit ihoh oiprSho Hcqiho lpni ihoh׃ 
isaiah 37:15	oitpll Hcqiho al ihoh lamr׃ 
isaiah 37:16	ihoh zbaot alhi iSral iSb hkrbim ath hoa halhim lbdk lkl mmlkot harz ath eSit at hSmim oat harz׃ 
isaiah 37:17	hTh ihoh acnk oSme pqH ihoh eink orah oSme at kl dbri snHrib aSr SlH lHrp alhim Hi׃ 
isaiah 37:18	amnm ihoh hHribo mlki aSor at kl harzot oat arzm׃ 
isaiah 37:19	ontn at alhihm baS ki la alhim hmh ki am meSh idi adm ez oabn oiabdom׃ 
isaiah 37:20	oeth ihoh alhino hoSieno mido oideo kl mmlkot harz ki ath ihoh lbdk׃ 
isaiah 37:21	oiSlH iSeiho bn amoz al Hcqiho lamr kh amr ihoh alhi iSral aSr htpllt ali al snHrib mlk aSor׃ 
isaiah 37:22	ch hdbr aSr dbr ihoh elio bch lk legh lk btolt bt zion aHrik raS hnieh bt iroSlm׃ 
isaiah 37:23	at mi Hrpt ogdpt oel mi hrimoth qol otSa mrom einik al qdoS iSral׃ 
isaiah 37:24	bid ebdik Hrpt adni otamr brb rkbi ani eliti mrom hrim irkti lbnon oakrt qomt arcio mbHr brSio oaboa mrom qzo ier krmlo׃ 
isaiah 37:25	ani qrti oStiti mim oaHrb bkp pemi kl iari mzor׃ 
isaiah 37:26	hloa Smet lmrHoq aoth eSiti mimi qdm oizrtih eth hbatih othi lhSaot glim nzim erim bzrot׃ 
isaiah 37:27	oiSbihn qzri id Hto obSo hio eSb Sdh oirq dSa Hzir ggot oSdmh lpni qmh׃ 
isaiah 37:28	oSbtk ozatk oboak ideti oat htrgck ali׃ 
isaiah 37:29	ien htrgck ali oSannk elh bacni oSmti HHi bapk omtgi bSptik ohSibtik bdrk aSr bat bh׃ 
isaiah 37:30	och lk haot akol hSnh spiH obSnh hSnit SHis obSnh hSliSit creo oqzro onTeo krmim oakol prim׃ 
isaiah 37:31	oisph pliTt bit ihodh hnSarh SrS lmTh oeSh pri lmelh׃ 
isaiah 37:32	ki miroSlm tza Sarit opliTh mhr zion qnat ihoh zbaot teSh cat׃ 
isaiah 37:33	lkn kh amr ihoh al mlk aSor la iboa al heir hcat ola iorh Sm Hz ola iqdmnh mgn ola iSpk elih sllh׃ 
isaiah 37:34	bdrk aSr ba bh iSob oal heir hcat la iboa nam ihoh׃ 
isaiah 37:35	ognoti el heir hcat lhoSieh lmeni olmen dod ebdi׃ 
isaiah 37:36	oiza mlak ihoh oikh bmHnh aSor mah oSmnim oHmSh alp oiSkimo bbqr ohnh klm pgrim mtim׃ 
isaiah 37:37	oise oilk oiSb snHrib mlk aSor oiSb bninoh׃ 
isaiah 37:38	oihi hoa mStHoh bit nsrk alhio oadrmlk oSrazr bnio hkho bHrb ohmh nmlTo arz arrT oimlk asr Hdn bno tHtio׃ 
isaiah 38:1	bimim hhm Hlh Hcqiho lmot oiboa alio iSeiho bn amoz hnbia oiamr alio kh amr ihoh zo lbitk ki mt ath ola tHih׃ 
isaiah 38:2	oisb Hcqiho pnio al hqir oitpll al ihoh׃ 
isaiah 38:3	oiamr anh ihoh ckr na at aSr hthlkti lpnik bamt oblb Slm ohTob beinik eSiti oibk Hcqiho bki gdol׃ 
isaiah 38:4	oihi dbr ihoh al iSeiho lamr׃ 
isaiah 38:5	hlok oamrt al Hcqiho kh amr ihoh alhi dod abik Smeti at tpltk raiti at dmetk hnni iosp el imik HmS eSrh Snh׃ 
isaiah 38:6	omkp mlk aSor azilk oat heir hcat ognoti el heir hcat׃ 
isaiah 38:7	och lk haot mat ihoh aSr ieSh ihoh at hdbr hch aSr dbr׃ 
isaiah 38:8	hnni mSib at zl hmelot aSr irdh bmelot aHc bSmS aHrnit eSr melot otSb hSmS eSr melot bmelot aSr irdh׃ 
isaiah 38:9	mktb lHcqiho mlk ihodh bHlto oiHi mHlio׃ 
isaiah 38:10	ani amrti bdmi imi alkh bSeri Saol pqdti itr Snoti׃ 
isaiah 38:11	amrti la arah ih ih barz hHiim la abiT adm eod em ioSbi Hdl׃ 
isaiah 38:12	dori nse onglh mni kahl rei qpdti karg Hii mdlh ibzeni miom ed lilh tSlimni׃ 
isaiah 38:13	Soiti ed bqr kari kn iSbr kl ezmoti miom ed lilh tSlimni׃ 
isaiah 38:14	ksos egor kn azpzp ahgh kionh dlo eini lmrom adni eSqh li erbni׃ 
isaiah 38:15	mh adbr oamr li ohoa eSh addh kl Snoti el mr npSi׃ 
isaiah 38:16	adni elihm iHio olkl bhn Hii roHi otHlimni ohHini׃ 
isaiah 38:17	hnh lSlom mr li mr oath HSqt npSi mSHt bli ki hSlkt aHri gok kl HTai׃ 
isaiah 38:18	ki la Saol todk mot ihllk la iSbro iordi bor al amtk׃ 
isaiah 38:19	Hi Hi hoa iodk kmoni hiom ab lbnim iodie al amtk׃ 
isaiah 38:20	ihoh lhoSieni ongnoti nngn kl imi Hiino el bit ihoh׃ 
isaiah 38:21	oiamr iSeiho iSao dblt tanim oimrHo el hSHin oiHi׃ 
isaiah 38:22	oiamr Hcqiho mh aot ki aelh bit ihoh׃ 
isaiah 39:1	bet hhia SlH mrdk bladn bn bladn mlk bbl sprim omnHh al Hcqiho oiSme ki Hlh oiHcq׃ 
isaiah 39:2	oiSmH elihm Hcqiho oiram at bit nkth at hksp oat hchb oat hbSmim oat hSmn hTob oat kl bit klio oat kl aSr nmza bazrtio la hih dbr aSr la hram Hcqiho bbito obkl mmSlto׃ 
isaiah 39:3	oiba iSeiho hnbia al hmlk Hcqiho oiamr alio mh amro hanSim halh omain ibao alik oiamr Hcqiho marz rHoqh bao ali mbbl׃ 
isaiah 39:4	oiamr mh rao bbitk oiamr Hcqiho at kl aSr bbiti rao la hih dbr aSr la hraitim baozrti׃ 
isaiah 39:5	oiamr iSeiho al Hcqiho Sme dbr ihoh zbaot׃ 
isaiah 39:6	hnh imim baim onSa kl aSr bbitk oaSr azro abtik ed hiom hch bbl la iotr dbr amr ihoh׃ 
isaiah 39:7	ombnik aSr izao mmk aSr tolid iqHo ohio srisim bhikl mlk bbl׃ 
isaiah 39:8	oiamr Hcqiho al iSeiho Tob dbr ihoh aSr dbrt oiamr ki ihih Slom oamt bimi׃ 
isaiah 40:1	nHmo nHmo emi iamr alhikm׃ 
isaiah 40:2	dbro el lb iroSlm oqrao alih ki mlah zbah ki nrzh eonh ki lqHh mid ihoh kplim bkl HTatih׃ 
isaiah 40:3	qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro berbh mslh lalhino׃ 
isaiah 40:4	kl gia inSa okl hr ogbeh iSplo ohih heqb lmiSor ohrksim lbqeh׃ 
isaiah 40:5	onglh kbod ihoh orao kl bSr iHdo ki pi ihoh dbr׃ 
isaiah 40:6	qol amr qra oamr mh aqra kl hbSr Hzir okl Hsdo kziz hSdh׃ 
isaiah 40:7	ibS Hzir nbl ziz ki roH ihoh nSbh bo akn Hzir hem׃ 
isaiah 40:8	ibS Hzir nbl ziz odbr alhino iqom leolm׃ 
isaiah 40:9	el hr gbh eli lk mbSrt zion hrimi bkH qolk mbSrt iroSlm hrimi al tirai amri leri ihodh hnh alhikm׃ 
isaiah 40:10	hnh adni ihoh bHcq iboa ocreo mSlh lo hnh Skro ato opelto lpnio׃ 
isaiah 40:11	kreh edro ireh bcreo iqbz Tlaim obHiqo iSa elot inhl׃ 
isaiah 40:12	mi mdd bSelo mim oSmim bcrt tkn okl bSlS epr harz oSql bpls hrim ogbeot bmacnim׃ 
isaiah 40:13	mi tkn at roH ihoh oaiS ezto iodieno׃ 
isaiah 40:14	at mi noez oibinho oilmdho barH mSpT oilmdho det odrk tbonot iodieno׃ 
isaiah 40:15	hn goim kmr mdli okSHq macnim nHSbo hn aiim kdq iTol׃ 
isaiah 40:16	olbnon ain di ber oHito ain di eolh׃ 
isaiah 40:17	kl hgoim kain ngdo maps otho nHSbo lo׃ 
isaiah 40:18	oal mi tdmion al omh dmot terko lo׃ 
isaiah 40:19	hpsl nsk HrS ozrp bchb irqeno ortqot ksp zorp׃ 
isaiah 40:20	hmskn tromh ez la irqb ibHr HrS Hkm ibqS lo lhkin psl la imoT׃ 
isaiah 40:21	hloa tdeo hloa tSmeo hloa hgd mraS lkm hloa hbintm mosdot harz׃ 
isaiah 40:22	hiSb el Hog harz oiSbih kHgbim hnoTh kdq Smim oimtHm kahl lSbt׃ 
isaiah 40:23	hnotn rocnim lain SpTi arz ktho eSh׃ 
isaiah 40:24	ap bl nTeo ap bl creo ap bl SrS barz gcem ogm nSp bhm oibSo oserh kqS tSam׃ 
isaiah 40:25	oal mi tdmioni oaSoh iamr qdoS׃ 
isaiah 40:26	Sao mrom einikm orao mi bra alh hmozia bmspr zbam lklm bSm iqra mrb aonim oamiz kH aiS la nedr׃ 
isaiah 40:27	lmh tamr ieqb otdbr iSral nstrh drki mihoh omalhi mSpTi iebor׃ 
isaiah 40:28	hloa idet am la Smet alhi eolm ihoh bora qzot harz la iiep ola iige ain Hqr ltbonto׃ 
isaiah 40:29	ntn liep kH olain aonim ezmh irbh׃ 
isaiah 40:30	oiepo nerim oigeo obHorim kSol ikSlo׃ 
isaiah 40:31	oqoi ihoh iHlipo kH ielo abr knSrim irozo ola iigeo ilko ola iiepo׃ 
isaiah 41:1	hHriSo ali aiim olamim iHlipo kH igSo ac idbro iHdo lmSpT nqrbh׃ 
isaiah 41:2	mi heir mmcrH zdq iqraho lrglo itn lpnio goim omlkim ird itn kepr Hrbo kqS ndp qSto׃ 
isaiah 41:3	irdpm iebor Slom arH brglio la iboa׃ 
isaiah 41:4	mi pel oeSh qra hdrot mraS ani ihoh raSon oat aHrnim ani hoa׃ 
isaiah 41:5	rao aiim oiirao qzot harz iHrdo qrbo oiation׃ 
isaiah 41:6	aiS at reho iecro olaHio iamr Hcq׃ 
isaiah 41:7	oiHcq HrS at zrp mHliq pTiS at holm pem amr ldbq Tob hoa oiHcqho bmsmrim la imoT׃ 
isaiah 41:8	oath iSral ebdi ieqb aSr bHrtik cre abrhm ahbi׃ 
isaiah 41:9	aSr hHcqtik mqzot harz omazilih qratik oamr lk ebdi ath bHrtik ola mastik׃ 
isaiah 41:10	al tira ki emk ani al tSte ki ani alhik amztik ap ecrtik ap tmktik bimin zdqi׃ 
isaiah 41:11	hn ibSo oiklmo kl hnHrim bk ihio kain oiabdo anSi ribk׃ 
isaiah 41:12	tbqSm ola tmzam anSi mztk ihio kain okaps anSi mlHmtk׃ 
isaiah 41:13	ki ani ihoh alhik mHciq imink hamr lk al tira ani ecrtik׃ 
isaiah 41:14	al tirai tolet ieqb mti iSral ani ecrtik nam ihoh ogalk qdoS iSral׃ 
isaiah 41:15	hnh Smtik lmorg Hroz HdS bel pipiot tdoS hrim otdq ogbeot kmz tSim׃ 
isaiah 41:16	tcrm oroH tSam oserh tpiz aotm oath tgil bihoh bqdoS iSral tthll׃ 
isaiah 41:17	heniim ohabionim mbqSim mim oain lSonm bzma nSth ani ihoh aenm alhi iSral la aecbm׃ 
isaiah 41:18	aptH el Spiim nhrot obtok bqeot meinot aSim mdbr lagm mim oarz zih lmozai mim׃ 
isaiah 41:19	atn bmdbr arc STh ohds oez Smn aSim berbh broS tdhr otaSor iHdo׃ 
isaiah 41:20	lmen irao oideo oiSimo oiSkilo iHdo ki id ihoh eSth cat oqdoS iSral brah׃ 
isaiah 41:21	qrbo ribkm iamr ihoh hgiSo ezmotikm iamr mlk ieqb׃ 
isaiah 41:22	igiSo oigido lno at aSr tqrinh hraSnot mh hnh hgido onSimh lbno ondeh aHritn ao hbaot hSmieno׃ 
isaiah 41:23	hgido hatiot laHor ondeh ki alhim atm ap tiTibo otreo onSteh onra iHdo׃ 
isaiah 41:24	hn atm main opelkm mape toebh ibHr bkm׃ 
isaiah 41:25	heiroti mzpon oiat mmcrH SmS iqra bSmi oiba sgnim kmo Hmr okmo iozr irms TiT׃ 
isaiah 41:26	mi hgid mraS ondeh omlpnim onamr zdiq ap ain mgid ap ain mSmie ap ain Sme amrikm׃ 
isaiah 41:27	raSon lzion hnh hnm oliroSlm mbSr atn׃ 
isaiah 41:28	oara oain aiS omalh oain ioez oaSalm oiSibo dbr׃ 
isaiah 41:29	hn klm aon aps meSihm roH otho nskihm׃ 
isaiah 42:1	hn ebdi atmk bo bHiri rzth npSi ntti roHi elio mSpT lgoim iozia׃ 
isaiah 42:2	la izeq ola iSa ola iSmie bHoz qolo׃ 
isaiah 42:3	qnh rzoz la iSbor opSth khh la ikbnh lamt iozia mSpT׃ 
isaiah 42:4	la ikhh ola iroz ed iSim barz mSpT oltorto aiim iiHilo׃ 
isaiah 42:5	kh amr hal ihoh bora hSmim onoTihm rqe harz ozazaih ntn nSmh lem elih oroH lhlkim bh׃ 
isaiah 42:6	ani ihoh qratik bzdq oaHcq bidk oazrk oatnk lbrit em laor goim׃ 
isaiah 42:7	lpqH einim eorot lhozia mmsgr asir mbit kla iSbi HSk׃ 
isaiah 42:8	ani ihoh hoa Smi okbodi laHr la atn othlti lpsilim׃ 
isaiah 42:9	hraSnot hnh bao oHdSot ani mgid bTrm tzmHnh aSmie atkm׃ 
isaiah 42:10	Siro lihoh Sir HdS thlto mqzh harz iordi him omlao aiim oiSbihm׃ 
isaiah 42:11	iSao mdbr oerio Hzrim tSb qdr irno iSbi sle mraS hrim izoHo׃ 
isaiah 42:12	iSimo lihoh kbod othlto baiim igido׃ 
isaiah 42:13	ihoh kgbor iza kaiS mlHmot ieir qnah irie ap izriH el aibio itgbr׃ 
isaiah 42:14	hHSiti meolm aHriS atapq kioldh apeh aSm oaSap iHd׃ 
isaiah 42:15	aHrib hrim ogbeot okl eSbm aobiS oSmti nhrot laiim oagmim aobiS׃ 
isaiah 42:16	oholkti eorim bdrk la ideo bntibot la ideo adrikm aSim mHSk lpnihm laor omeqSim lmiSor alh hdbrim eSitm ola ecbtim׃ 
isaiah 42:17	nsgo aHor ibSo bSt hbTHim bpsl hamrim lmskh atm alhino׃ 
isaiah 42:18	hHrSim Smeo oheorim hbiTo lraot׃ 
isaiah 42:19	mi eor ki am ebdi oHrS kmlaki aSlH mi eor kmSlm oeor kebd ihoh׃ 
isaiah 42:20	rait rbot ola tSmr pqoH acnim ola iSme׃ 
isaiah 42:21	ihoh Hpz lmen zdqo igdil torh oiadir׃ 
isaiah 42:22	ohoa em bcoc oSsoi hpH bHorim klm obbti klaim hHbao hio lbc oain mzil mSsh oain amr hSb׃ 
isaiah 42:23	mi bkm iacin cat iqSb oiSme laHor׃ 
isaiah 42:24	mi ntn lmSosh ieqb oiSral lbccim hloa ihoh co HTano lo ola abo bdrkio hlok ola Smeo btorto׃ 
isaiah 42:25	oiSpk elio Hmh apo oecoc mlHmh otlhTho msbib ola ide otber bo ola iSim el lb׃ 
isaiah 43:1	oeth kh amr ihoh brak ieqb oizrk iSral al tira ki galtik qrati bSmk li ath׃ 
isaiah 43:2	ki tebr bmim atk ani obnhrot la iSTpok ki tlk bmo aS la tkoh olhbh la tber bk׃ 
isaiah 43:3	ki ani ihoh alhik qdoS iSral moSiek ntti kprk mzrim koS osba tHtik׃ 
isaiah 43:4	maSr iqrt beini nkbdt oani ahbtik oatn adm tHtik olamim tHt npSk׃ 
isaiah 43:5	al tira ki atk ani mmcrH abia crek ommerb aqbzk׃ 
isaiah 43:6	amr lzpon tni oltimn al tklai hbiai bni mrHoq obnoti mqzh harz׃ 
isaiah 43:7	kl hnqra bSmi olkbodi bratio izrtio ap eSitio׃ 
isaiah 43:8	hozia em eor oeinim iS oHrSim oacnim lmo׃ 
isaiah 43:9	kl hgoim nqbzo iHdo oiaspo lamim mi bhm igid cat oraSnot iSmieno itno edihm oizdqo oiSmeo oiamro amt׃ 
isaiah 43:10	atm edi nam ihoh oebdi aSr bHrti lmen tdeo otamino li otbino ki ani hoa lpni la nozr al oaHri la ihih׃ 
isaiah 43:11	anki anki ihoh oain mbledi moSie׃ 
isaiah 43:12	anki hgdti ohoSeti ohSmeti oain bkm cr oatm edi nam ihoh oani al׃ 
isaiah 43:13	gm miom ani hoa oain midi mzil apel omi iSibnh׃ 
isaiah 43:14	kh amr ihoh galkm qdoS iSral lmenkm SlHti bblh ohordti briHim klm okSdim baniot rntm׃ 
isaiah 43:15	ani ihoh qdoSkm bora iSral mlkkm׃ 
isaiah 43:16	kh amr ihoh hnotn bim drk obmim ecim ntibh׃ 
isaiah 43:17	hmozia rkb osos Hil oecoc iHdo iSkbo bl iqomo deko kpSth kbo׃ 
isaiah 43:18	al tckro raSnot oqdmniot al ttbnno׃ 
isaiah 43:19	hnni eSh HdSh eth tzmH hloa tdeoh ap aSim bmdbr drk biSmon nhrot׃ 
isaiah 43:20	tkbdni Hit hSdh tnim obnot ienh ki ntti bmdbr mim nhrot biSimn lhSqot emi bHiri׃ 
isaiah 43:21	em co izrti li thlti ispro׃ 
isaiah 43:22	ola ati qrat ieqb ki iget bi iSral׃ 
isaiah 43:23	la hbiat li Sh eltik ocbHik la kbdtni la hebdtik bmnHh ola hogetik blbonh׃ 
isaiah 43:24	la qnit li bksp qnh oHlb cbHik la hroitni ak hebdtni bHTaotik hogetni beontik׃ 
isaiah 43:25	anki anki hoa mHh pSeik lmeni oHTatik la ackr׃ 
isaiah 43:26	hckirni nSpTh iHd spr ath lmen tzdq׃ 
isaiah 43:27	abik hraSon HTa omlizik pSeo bi׃ 
isaiah 43:28	oaHll Sri qdS oatnh lHrm ieqb oiSral lgdopim׃ 
isaiah 44:1	oeth Sme ieqb ebdi oiSral bHrti bo׃ 
isaiah 44:2	kh amr ihoh eSk oizrk mbTn iecrk al tira ebdi ieqb oiSron bHrti bo׃ 
isaiah 44:3	ki azq mim el zma onclim el ibSh azq roHi el crek obrkti el zazaik׃ 
isaiah 44:4	ozmHo bbin Hzir kerbim el ibli mim׃ 
isaiah 44:5	ch iamr lihoh ani och iqra bSm ieqb och iktb ido lihoh obSm iSral iknh׃ 
isaiah 44:6	kh amr ihoh mlk iSral ogalo ihoh zbaot ani raSon oani aHron ombledi ain alhim׃ 
isaiah 44:7	omi kmoni iqra oigidh oierkh li mSomi em eolm oatiot oaSr tbanh igido lmo׃ 
isaiah 44:8	al tpHdo oal trho hla mac hSmetik ohgdti oatm edi hiS aloh mbledi oain zor bl ideti׃ 
isaiah 44:9	izri psl klm tho oHmodihm bl ioeilo oedihm hmh bl irao obl ideo lmen ibSo׃ 
isaiah 44:10	mi izr al opsl nsk lblti hoeil׃ 
isaiah 44:11	hn kl Hbrio ibSo oHrSim hmh madm itqbzo klm iemdo ipHdo ibSo iHd׃ 
isaiah 44:12	HrS brcl mezd opel bpHm obmqbot izrho oipelho bcroe kHo gm reb oain kH la Sth mim oiiep׃ 
isaiah 44:13	HrS ezim nTh qo itarho bSrd ieSho bmqzeot obmHogh itarho oieSho ktbnit aiS ktpart adm lSbt bit׃ 
isaiah 44:14	lkrt lo arcim oiqH trch oalon oiamz lo bezi ier nTe arn ogSm igdl׃ 
isaiah 44:15	ohih ladm lber oiqH mhm oiHm ap iSiq oaph lHm ap ipel al oiStHo eSho psl oisgd lmo׃ 
isaiah 44:16	Hzio Srp bmo aS el Hzio bSr iakl izlh zli oiSbe ap iHm oiamr haH Hmoti raiti aor׃ 
isaiah 44:17	oSarito lal eSh lpslo isgod lo oiStHo oitpll alio oiamr hzilni ki ali ath׃ 
isaiah 44:18	la ideo ola ibino ki TH mraot einihm mhSkil lbtm׃ 
isaiah 44:19	ola iSib al lbo ola det ola tbonh lamr Hzio Srpti bmo aS oap apiti el gHlio lHm azlh bSr oakl oitro ltoebh aeSh lbol ez asgod׃ 
isaiah 44:20	reh apr lb hotl hTho ola izil at npSo ola iamr hloa Sqr bimini׃ 
isaiah 44:21	ckr alh ieqb oiSral ki ebdi ath izrtik ebd li ath iSral la tnSni׃ 
isaiah 44:22	mHiti keb pSeik okenn HTaotik Sobh ali ki galtik׃ 
isaiah 44:23	rno Smim ki eSh ihoh hrieo tHtiot arz pzHo hrim rnh ier okl ez bo ki gal ihoh ieqb obiSral itpar׃ 
isaiah 44:24	kh amr ihoh galk oizrk mbTn anki ihoh eSh kl nTh Smim lbdi rqe harz mi ati׃ 
isaiah 44:25	mpr atot bdim oqsmim iholl mSib Hkmim aHor odetm iSkl׃ 
isaiah 44:26	mqim dbr ebdo oezt mlakio iSlim hamr liroSlm toSb oleri ihodh tbninh oHrbotih aqomm׃ 
isaiah 44:27	hamr lzolh Hrbi onhrtik aobiS׃ 
isaiah 44:28	hamr lkorS rei okl Hpzi iSlm olamr liroSlm tbnh ohikl tosd׃ 
isaiah 45:1	kh amr ihoh lmSiHo lkorS aSr hHcqti bimino lrd lpnio goim omtni mlkim aptH lptH lpnio dltim oSerim la isgro׃ 
isaiah 45:2	ani lpnik alk ohdorim aoSr dltot nHoSh aSbr obriHi brcl agde׃ 
isaiah 45:3	ontti lk aozrot HSk omTmni mstrim lmen tde ki ani ihoh hqora bSmk alhi iSral׃ 
isaiah 45:4	lmen ebdi ieqb oiSral bHiri oaqra lk bSmk aknk ola idetni׃ 
isaiah 45:5	ani ihoh oain eod colti ain alhim aacrk ola idetni׃ 
isaiah 45:6	lmen ideo mmcrH SmS ommerbh ki aps bledi ani ihoh oain eod׃ 
isaiah 45:7	iozr aor obora HSk eSh Slom obora re ani ihoh eSh kl alh׃ 
isaiah 45:8	hreipo Smim mmel oSHqim iclo zdq tptH arz oipro iSe ozdqh tzmiH iHd ani ihoh bratio׃ 
isaiah 45:9	hoi rb at izro HrS at HrSi admh hiamr Hmr lizro mh teSh opelk ain idim lo׃ 
isaiah 45:10	hoi amr lab mh tolid olaSh mh tHilin׃ 
isaiah 45:11	kh amr ihoh qdoS iSral oizro hatiot Saloni el bni oel pel idi tzoni׃ 
isaiah 45:12	anki eSiti arz oadm elih brati ani idi nTo Smim okl zbam zoiti׃ 
isaiah 45:13	anki heirtho bzdq okl drkio aiSr hoa ibnh eiri ogloti iSlH la bmHir ola bSHd amr ihoh zbaot׃ 
isaiah 45:14	kh amr ihoh igie mzrim osHr koS osbaim anSi mdh elik iebro olk ihio aHrik ilko bcqim iebro oalik iStHoo alik itpllo ak bk al oain eod aps alhim׃ 
isaiah 45:15	akn ath al msttr alhi iSral moSie׃ 
isaiah 45:16	boSo ogm nklmo klm iHdo hlko bklmh HrSi zirim׃ 
isaiah 45:17	iSral noSe bihoh tSoet eolmim la tbSo ola tklmo ed eolmi ed׃ 
isaiah 45:18	ki kh amr ihoh bora hSmim hoa halhim izr harz oeSh hoa konnh la tho brah lSbt izrh ani ihoh oain eod׃ 
isaiah 45:19	la bstr dbrti bmqom arz HSk la amrti lcre ieqb tho bqSoni ani ihoh dbr zdq mgid miSrim׃ 
isaiah 45:20	hqbzo obao htngSo iHdo pliTi hgoim la ideo hnSaim at ez pslm omtpllim al al la ioSie׃ 
isaiah 45:21	hgido ohgiSo ap ioezo iHdo mi hSmie cat mqdm mac hgidh hloa ani ihoh oain eod alhim mbledi al zdiq omoSie ain colti׃ 
isaiah 45:22	pno ali ohoSeo kl apsi arz ki ani al oain eod׃ 
isaiah 45:23	bi nSbeti iza mpi zdqh dbr ola iSob ki li tkre kl brk tSbe kl lSon׃ 
isaiah 45:24	ak bihoh li amr zdqot oec edio iboa oibSo kl hnHrim bo׃ 
isaiah 45:25	bihoh izdqo oithllo kl cre iSral׃ 
isaiah 46:1	kre bl qrs nbo hio ezbihm lHih olbhmh nSatikm emosot mSa leiph׃ 
isaiah 46:2	qrso kreo iHdo la iklo mlT mSa onpSm bSbi hlkh׃ 
isaiah 46:3	Smeo ali bit ieqb okl Sarit bit iSral hemsim mni bTn hnSaim mni rHm׃ 
isaiah 46:4	oed cqnh ani hoa oed Sibh ani asbl ani eSiti oani aSa oani asbl oamlT׃ 
isaiah 46:5	lmi tdmioni otSoo otmSloni ondmh׃ 
isaiah 46:6	hclim chb mkis oksp bqnh iSqlo iSkro zorp oieSho al isgdo ap iStHoo׃ 
isaiah 46:7	iSaho el ktp isblho oiniHho tHtio oiemd mmqomo la imiS ap izeq alio ola ienh mzrto la ioSieno׃ 
isaiah 46:8	ckro cat ohtaSSo hSibo poSeim el lb׃ 
isaiah 46:9	ckro raSnot meolm ki anki al oain eod alhim oaps kmoni׃ 
isaiah 46:10	mgid mraSit aHrit omqdm aSr la neSo amr ezti tqom okl Hpzi aeSh׃ 
isaiah 46:11	qra mmcrH eiT marz mrHq aiS ezto ap dbrti ap abianh izrti ap aeSnh׃ 
isaiah 46:12	Smeo ali abiri lb hrHoqim mzdqh׃ 
isaiah 46:13	qrbti zdqti la trHq otSoeti la taHr ontti bzion tSoeh liSral tparti׃ 
isaiah 47:1	rdi oSbi el epr btolt bt bbl Sbi larz ain ksa bt kSdim ki la tosipi iqrao lk rkh oengh׃ 
isaiah 47:2	qHi rHim oTHni qmH gli zmtk HSpi Sbl gli Soq ebri nhrot׃ 
isaiah 47:3	tgl erotk gm trah Hrptk nqm aqH ola apge adm׃ 
isaiah 47:4	galno ihoh zbaot Smo qdoS iSral׃ 
isaiah 47:5	Sbi domm obai bHSk bt kSdim ki la tosipi iqrao lk gbrt mmlkot׃ 
isaiah 47:6	qzpti el emi Hllti nHlti oatnm bidk la Smt lhm rHmim el cqn hkbdt elk mad׃ 
isaiah 47:7	otamri leolm ahih gbrt ed la Smt alh el lbk la ckrt aHrith׃ 
isaiah 47:8	oeth Smei cat edinh hioSbt lbTH hamrh blbbh ani oapsi eod la aSb almnh ola ade Skol׃ 
isaiah 47:9	otbanh lk Sti alh rge biom aHd Skol oalmn ktmm bao elik brb kSpik bezmt Hbrik mad׃ 
isaiah 47:10	otbTHi bretk amrt ain rani Hkmtk odetk hia Sobbtk otamri blbk ani oapsi eod׃ 
isaiah 47:11	oba elik reh la tdei SHrh otpl elik hoh la tokli kprh otba elik ptam Soah la tdei׃ 
isaiah 47:12	emdi na bHbrik obrb kSpik baSr iget mneorik aoli tokli hoeil aoli terozi׃ 
isaiah 47:13	nlait brb eztik iemdo na oioSiek hbro Smim hHcim bkokbim modiem lHdSim maSr ibao elik׃ 
isaiah 47:14	hnh hio kqS aS Srptm la izilo at npSm mid lhbh ain gHlt lHmm aor lSbt ngdo׃ 
isaiah 47:15	kn hio lk aSr iget sHrik mneorik aiS lebro teo ain moSiek׃ 
isaiah 48:1	Smeo cat bit ieqb hnqraim bSm iSral ommi ihodh izao hnSbeim bSm ihoh obalhi iSral ickiro la bamt ola bzdqh׃ 
isaiah 48:2	ki meir hqdS nqrao oel alhi iSral nsmko ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
isaiah 48:3	hraSnot mac hgdti ompi izao oaSmiem ptam eSiti otbanh׃ 
isaiah 48:4	mdeti ki qSh ath ogid brcl erpk omzHk nHoSh׃ 
isaiah 48:5	oagid lk mac bTrm tboa hSmetik pn tamr ezbi eSm opsli onski zom׃ 
isaiah 48:6	Smet Hch klh oatm hloa tgido hSmetik HdSot meth onzrot ola idetm׃ 
isaiah 48:7	eth nbrao ola mac olpni iom ola Smetm pn tamr hnh idetin׃ 
isaiah 48:8	gm la Smet gm la idet gm mac la ptHh acnk ki ideti bgod tbgod opSe mbTn qra lk׃ 
isaiah 48:9	lmen Smi aarik api othlti aHTm lk lblti hkritk׃ 
isaiah 48:10	hnh zrptik ola bksp bHrtik bkor eni׃ 
isaiah 48:11	lmeni lmeni aeSh ki aik iHl okbodi laHr la atn׃ 
isaiah 48:12	Sme ali ieqb oiSral mqrai ani hoa ani raSon ap ani aHron׃ 
isaiah 48:13	ap idi isdh arz oimini TpHh Smim qra ani alihm iemdo iHdo׃ 
isaiah 48:14	hqbzo klkm oSmeo mi bhm hgid at alh ihoh ahbo ieSh Hpzo bbbl ocreo kSdim׃ 
isaiah 48:15	ani ani dbrti ap qratio hbiatio ohzliH drko׃ 
isaiah 48:16	qrbo ali Smeo cat la mraS bstr dbrti met hioth Sm ani oeth adni ihoh SlHni oroHo׃ 
isaiah 48:17	kh amr ihoh galk qdoS iSral ani ihoh alhik mlmdk lhoeil mdrikk bdrk tlk׃ 
isaiah 48:18	loa hqSbt lmzoti oihi knhr Slomk ozdqtk kgli him׃ 
isaiah 48:19	oihi kHol crek ozazai meik kmetio la ikrt ola iSmd Smo mlpni׃ 
isaiah 48:20	zao mbbl brHo mkSdim bqol rnh hgido hSmieo cat hoziaoh ed qzh harz amro gal ihoh ebdo ieqb׃ 
isaiah 48:21	ola zmao bHrbot holikm mim mzor hcil lmo oibqe zor oicbo mim׃ 
isaiah 48:22	ain Slom amr ihoh lrSeim׃ 
isaiah 49:1	Smeo aiim ali ohqSibo lamim mrHoq ihoh mbTn qrani mmei ami hckir Smi׃ 
isaiah 49:2	oiSm pi kHrb Hdh bzl ido hHbiani oiSimni lHz bror baSpto hstirni׃ 
isaiah 49:3	oiamr li ebdi ath iSral aSr bk atpar׃ 
isaiah 49:4	oani amrti lriq igeti ltho ohbl kHi kliti akn mSpTi at ihoh opelti at alhi׃ 
isaiah 49:5	oeth amr ihoh izri mbTn lebd lo lSobb ieqb alio oiSral la iasp oakbd beini ihoh oalhi hih eci׃ 
isaiah 49:6	oiamr nql mhiotk li ebd lhqim at SbTi ieqb onziri iSral lhSib onttik laor goim lhiot iSoeti ed qzh harz׃ 
isaiah 49:7	kh amr ihoh gal iSral qdoSo lbch npS lmteb goi lebd mSlim mlkim irao oqmo Srim oiStHoo lmen ihoh aSr namn qdS iSral oibHrk׃ 
isaiah 49:8	kh amr ihoh bet rzon enitik obiom iSoeh ecrtik oazrk oatnk lbrit em lhqim arz lhnHil nHlot Smmot׃ 
isaiah 49:9	lamr lasorim zao laSr bHSk hglo el drkim ireo obkl Spiim mreitm׃ 
isaiah 49:10	la irebo ola izmao ola ikm Srb oSmS ki mrHmm inhgm oel mboei mim inhlm׃ 
isaiah 49:11	oSmti kl hri ldrk omslti irmon׃ 
isaiah 49:12	hnh alh mrHoq ibao ohnh alh mzpon omim oalh marz sinim׃ 
isaiah 49:13	rno Smim ogili arz ipzHo hrim rnh ki nHm ihoh emo oenio irHm׃ 
isaiah 49:14	otamr zion ecbni ihoh oadni SkHni׃ 
isaiah 49:15	htSkH aSh eolh mrHm bn bTnh gm alh tSkHnh oanki la aSkHk׃ 
isaiah 49:16	hn el kpim Hqtik Homtik ngdi tmid׃ 
isaiah 49:17	mhro bnik mhrsik omHrbik mmk izao׃ 
isaiah 49:18	Sai sbib einik orai klm nqbzo bao lk Hi ani nam ihoh ki klm kedi tlbSi otqSrim kklh׃ 
isaiah 49:19	ki Hrbtik oSmmtik oarz hrstik ki eth tzri mioSb orHqo mbleik׃ 
isaiah 49:20	eod iamro bacnik bni Sklik zr li hmqom gSh li oaSbh׃ 
isaiah 49:21	oamrt blbbk mi ild li at alh oani Skolh oglmodh glh osorh oalh mi gdl hn ani nSarti lbdi alh aiph hm׃ 
isaiah 49:22	kh amr adni ihoh hnh aSa al goim idi oal emim arim nsi ohbiao bnik bHzn obntik el ktp tnSanh׃ 
isaiah 49:23	ohio mlkim amnik oSrotihm miniqtik apim arz iStHoo lk oepr rglik ilHko oidet ki ani ihoh aSr la ibSo qoi׃ 
isaiah 49:24	hiqH mgbor mlqoH oam Sbi zdiq imlT׃ 
isaiah 49:25	ki kh amr ihoh gm Sbi gbor iqH omlqoH eriz imlT oat iribk anki arib oat bnik anki aoSie׃ 
isaiah 49:26	ohaklti at monik at bSrm okesis dmm iSkron oideo kl bSr ki ani ihoh moSiek ogalk abir ieqb׃ 
isaiah 50:1	kh amr ihoh ai ch spr kritot amkm aSr SlHtih ao mi mnoSi aSr mkrti atkm lo hn beontikm nmkrtm obpSeikm SlHh amkm׃ 
isaiah 50:2	mdoe bati oain aiS qrati oain eonh hqzor qzrh idi mpdot oam ain bi kH lhzil hn bgerti aHrib im aSim nhrot mdbr tbaS dgtm main mim otmt bzma׃ 
isaiah 50:3	albiS Smim qdrot oSq aSim ksotm׃ 
isaiah 50:4	adni ihoh ntn li lSon lmodim ldet leot at iep dbr ieir bbqr bbqr ieir li acn lSme klmodim׃ 
isaiah 50:5	adni ihoh ptH li acn oanki la mriti aHor la nsogti׃ 
isaiah 50:6	goi ntti lmkim olHii lmrTim pni la hstrti mklmot orq׃ 
isaiah 50:7	oadni ihoh iecr li el kn la nklmti el kn Smti pni kHlmiS oade ki la aboS׃ 
isaiah 50:8	qrob mzdiqi mi irib ati nemdh iHd mi bel mSpTi igS ali׃ 
isaiah 50:9	hn adni ihoh iecr li mi hoa irSieni hn klm kbgd iblo eS iaklm׃ 
isaiah 50:10	mi bkm ira ihoh Sme bqol ebdo aSr hlk HSkim oain ngh lo ibTH bSm ihoh oiSen balhio׃ 
isaiah 50:11	hn klkm qdHi aS macri ciqot lko baor aSkm obciqot bertm midi hith cat lkm lmezbh tSkbon׃ 
isaiah 51:1	Smeo ali rdpi zdq mbqSi ihoh hbiTo al zor Hzbtm oal mqbt bor nqrtm׃ 
isaiah 51:2	hbiTo al abrhm abikm oal Srh tHollkm ki aHd qratio oabrkho oarbho׃ 
isaiah 51:3	ki nHm ihoh zion nHm kl Hrbtih oiSm mdbrh kedn oerbth kgn ihoh SSon oSmHh imza bh todh oqol cmrh׃ 
isaiah 51:4	hqSibo ali emi olaomi ali hacino ki torh mati tza omSpTi laor emim argie׃ 
isaiah 51:5	qrob zdqi iza iSei ocrei emim iSpTo ali aiim iqoo oal crei iiHlon׃ 
isaiah 51:6	Sao lSmim einikm ohbiTo al harz mtHt ki Smim keSn nmlHo oharz kbgd tblh oiSbih kmo kn imoton oiSoeti leolm thih ozdqti la tHt׃ 
isaiah 51:7	Smeo ali idei zdq em torti blbm al tirao Hrpt anoS omgdptm al tHto׃ 
isaiah 51:8	ki kbgd iaklm eS okzmr iaklm ss ozdqti leolm thih oiSoeti ldor dorim׃ 
isaiah 51:9	eori eori lbSi ec croe ihoh eori kimi qdm drot eolmim hloa at hia hmHzbt rhb mHollt tnin׃ 
isaiah 51:10	hloa at hia hmHrbt im mi thom rbh hSmh memqi im drk lebr gaolim׃ 
isaiah 51:11	opdoii ihoh iSobon obao zion brnh oSmHt eolm el raSm SSon oSmHh iSigon nso igon oanHh׃ 
isaiah 51:12	anki anki hoa mnHmkm mi at otirai manoS imot ombn adm Hzir intn׃ 
isaiah 51:13	otSkH ihoh eSk noTh Smim oisd arz otpHd tmid kl hiom mpni Hmt hmziq kaSr konn lhSHit oaih Hmt hmziq׃ 
isaiah 51:14	mhr zeh lhptH ola imot lSHt ola iHsr lHmo׃ 
isaiah 51:15	oanki ihoh alhik rge him oihmo glio ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
isaiah 51:16	oaSim dbri bpik obzl idi ksitik lnTe Smim olisd arz olamr lzion emi ath׃ 
isaiah 51:17	hteorri hteorri qomi iroSlm aSr Stit mid ihoh at kos Hmto at qbet kos htrelh Stit mzit׃ 
isaiah 51:18	ain mnhl lh mkl bnim ildh oain mHciq bidh mkl bnim gdlh׃ 
isaiah 51:19	Stim hnh qratik mi inod lk hSd ohSbr ohreb ohHrb mi anHmk׃ 
isaiah 51:20	bnik elpo Skbo braS kl Hozot ktoa mkmr hmlaim Hmt ihoh gert alhik׃ 
isaiah 51:21	lkn Smei na cat enih oSkrt ola miin׃ 
isaiah 51:22	kh amr adnik ihoh oalhik irib emo hnh lqHti midk at kos htrelh at qbet kos Hmti la tosipi lStoth eod׃ 
isaiah 51:23	oSmtih bid mogik aSr amro lnpSk SHi onebrh otSimi karz gok okHoz lebrim׃ 
isaiah 52:1	eori eori lbSi eck zion lbSi bgdi tpartk iroSlm eir hqdS ki la iosip iba bk eod erl oTma׃ 
isaiah 52:2	htneri mepr qomi Sbi iroSlm htptHo mosri zoark Sbih bt zion׃ 
isaiah 52:3	ki kh amr ihoh Hnm nmkrtm ola bksp tgalo׃ 
isaiah 52:4	ki kh amr adni ihoh mzrim ird emi braSnh lgor Sm oaSor baps eSqo׃ 
isaiah 52:5	oeth mh li ph nam ihoh ki lqH emi Hnm mSlo ihililo nam ihoh otmid kl hiom Smi mnaz׃ 
isaiah 52:6	lkn ide emi Smi lkn biom hhoa ki ani hoa hmdbr hnni׃ 
isaiah 52:7	mh naoo el hhrim rgli mbSr mSmie Slom mbSr Tob mSmie iSoeh amr lzion mlk alhik׃ 
isaiah 52:8	qol zpik nSao qol iHdo irnno ki ein bein irao bSob ihoh zion׃ 
isaiah 52:9	pzHo rnno iHdo Hrbot iroSlm ki nHm ihoh emo gal iroSlm׃ 
isaiah 52:10	HSp ihoh at croe qdSo leini kl hgoim orao kl apsi arz at iSoet alhino׃ 
isaiah 52:11	soro soro zao mSm Tma al tgeo zao mtokh hbro nSai kli ihoh׃ 
isaiah 52:12	ki la bHpcon tzao obmnosh la tlkon ki hlk lpnikm ihoh omaspkm alhi iSral׃ 
isaiah 52:13	hnh iSkil ebdi irom onSa ogbh mad׃ 
isaiah 52:14	kaSr Smmo elik rbim kn mSHt maiS mraho otaro mbni adm׃ 
isaiah 52:15	kn ich goim rbim elio iqpzo mlkim pihm ki aSr la spr lhm rao oaSr la Smeo htbonno׃ 
isaiah 53:1	mi hamin lSmetno ocroe ihoh el mi nglth׃ 
isaiah 53:2	oiel kionq lpnio okSrS marz zih la tar lo ola hdr onraho ola mrah onHmdho׃ 
isaiah 53:3	nbch oHdl aiSim aiS mkabot oidoe Hli okmstr pnim mmno nbch ola HSbnho׃ 
isaiah 53:4	akn Hlino hoa nSa omkabino sblm oanHno HSbnho ngoe mkh alhim omenh׃ 
isaiah 53:5	ohoa mHll mpSeno mdka meontino mosr Slomno elio obHbrto nrpa lno׃ 
isaiah 53:6	klno kzan teino aiS ldrko pnino oihoh hpgie bo at eon klno׃ 
isaiah 53:7	ngS ohoa nenh ola iptH pio kSh lTbH iobl okrHl lpni gccih nalmh ola iptH pio׃ 
isaiah 53:8	mezr ommSpT lqH oat doro mi iSoHH ki ngcr marz Hiim mpSe emi nge lmo׃ 
isaiah 53:9	oitn at rSeim qbro oat eSir bmtio el la Hms eSh ola mrmh bpio׃ 
isaiah 53:10	oihoh Hpz dkao hHli am tSim aSm npSo irah cre iarik imim oHpz ihoh bido izlH׃ 
isaiah 53:11	meml npSo irah iSbe bdeto izdiq zdiq ebdi lrbim oeontm hoa isbl׃ 
isaiah 53:12	lkn aHlq lo brbim oat ezomim iHlq Sll tHt aSr herh lmot npSo oat pSeim nmnh ohoa HTa rbim nSa olpSeim ipgie׃ 
isaiah 54:1	rni eqrh la ildh pzHi rnh ozhli la Hlh ki rbim bni Sommh mbni beolh amr ihoh׃ 
isaiah 54:2	hrHibi mqom ahlk oirieot mSknotik iTo al tHSki hariki mitrik oitdtik Hcqi׃ 
isaiah 54:3	ki imin oSmaol tprzi ocrek goim iirS oerim nSmot ioSibo׃ 
isaiah 54:4	al tirai ki la tboSi oal tklmi ki la tHpiri ki bSt elomik tSkHi oHrpt almnotik la tckri eod׃ 
isaiah 54:5	ki belik eSik ihoh zbaot Smo ogalk qdoS iSral alhi kl harz iqra׃ 
isaiah 54:6	ki kaSh ecobh oezobt roH qrak ihoh oaSt neorim ki tmas amr alhik׃ 
isaiah 54:7	brge qTn ecbtik obrHmim gdlim aqbzk׃ 
isaiah 54:8	bSzp qzp hstrti pni rge mmk obHsd eolm rHmtik amr galk ihoh׃ 
isaiah 54:9	ki mi nH cat li aSr nSbeti mebr mi nH eod el harz kn nSbeti mqzp elik omger bk׃ 
isaiah 54:10	ki hhrim imoSo ohgbeot tmoTnh oHsdi matk la imoS obrit Slomi la tmoT amr mrHmk ihoh׃ 
isaiah 54:11	enih serh la nHmh hnh anki mrbiz bpok abnik oisdtik bspirim׃ 
isaiah 54:12	oSmti kdkd SmStik oSerik labni aqdH okl gbolk labni Hpz׃ 
isaiah 54:13	okl bnik lmodi ihoh orb Slom bnik׃ 
isaiah 54:14	bzdqh tkonni rHqi meSq ki la tirai ommHth ki la tqrb alik׃ 
isaiah 54:15	hn gor igor aps maoti mi gr atk elik ipol׃ 
isaiah 54:16	hn anki brati HrS npH baS pHm omozia kli lmeSho oanki brati mSHit lHbl׃ 
isaiah 54:17	kl kli iozr elik la izlH okl lSon tqom atk lmSpT trSiei cat nHlt ebdi ihoh ozdqtm mati nam ihoh׃ 
isaiah 55:1	hoi kl zma lko lmim oaSr ain lo ksp lko Sbro oaklo olko Sbro bloa ksp obloa mHir iin oHlb׃ 
isaiah 55:2	lmh tSqlo ksp bloa lHm oigiekm bloa lSbeh Smeo Smoe ali oaklo Tob otteng bdSn npSkm׃ 
isaiah 55:3	hTo acnkm olko ali Smeo otHi npSkm oakrth lkm brit eolm Hsdi dod hnamnim׃ 
isaiah 55:4	hn ed laomim nttio ngid omzoh lamim׃ 
isaiah 55:5	hn goi la tde tqra ogoi la ideok alik irozo lmen ihoh alhik olqdoS iSral ki park׃ 
isaiah 55:6	drSo ihoh bhmzao qraho bhioto qrob׃ 
isaiah 55:7	iecb rSe drko oaiS aon mHSbtio oiSb al ihoh oirHmho oal alhino ki irbh lsloH׃ 
isaiah 55:8	ki la mHSboti mHSbotikm ola drkikm drki nam ihoh׃ 
isaiah 55:9	ki gbho Smim marz kn gbho drki mdrkikm omHSbti mmHSbtikm׃ 
isaiah 55:10	ki kaSr ird hgSm ohSlg mn hSmim oSmh la iSob ki am hroh at harz oholidh ohzmiHh ontn cre lcre olHm lakl׃ 
isaiah 55:11	kn ihih dbri aSr iza mpi la iSob ali riqm ki am eSh at aSr Hpzti ohzliH aSr SlHtio׃ 
isaiah 55:12	ki bSmHh tzao obSlom toblon hhrim ohgbeot ipzHo lpnikm rnh okl ezi hSdh imHao kp׃ 
isaiah 55:13	tHt hnezoz ielh broS tHt hsrpd ielh hds ohih lihoh lSm laot eolm la ikrt׃ 
isaiah 56:1	kh amr ihoh Smro mSpT oeSo zdqh ki qrobh iSoeti lboa ozdqti lhglot׃ 
isaiah 56:2	aSri anoS ieSh cat obn adm iHciq bh Smr Sbt mHllo oSmr ido meSot kl re׃ 
isaiah 56:3	oal iamr bn hnkr hnloh al ihoh lamr hbdl ibdilni ihoh mel emo oal iamr hsris hn ani ez ibS׃ 
isaiah 56:4	ki kh amr ihoh lsrisim aSr iSmro at Sbtoti obHro baSr Hpzti omHciqim bbriti׃ 
isaiah 56:5	ontti lhm bbiti obHomti id oSm Tob mbnim ombnot Sm eolm atn lo aSr la ikrt׃ 
isaiah 56:6	obni hnkr hnloim el ihoh lSrto olahbh at Sm ihoh lhiot lo lebdim kl Smr Sbt mHllo omHciqim bbriti׃ 
isaiah 56:7	ohbiaotim al hr qdSi oSmHtim bbit tplti eoltihm ocbHihm lrzon el mcbHi ki biti bit tplh iqra lkl hemim׃ 
isaiah 56:8	nam adni ihoh mqbz ndHi iSral eod aqbz elio lnqbzio׃ 
isaiah 56:9	kl Hito Sdi atio lakl kl Hito bier׃ 
isaiah 56:10	zpo eorim klm la ideo klm klbim almim la ioklo lnbH hcim Skbim ahbi lnom׃ 
isaiah 56:11	ohklbim eci npS la ideo Sbeh ohmh reim la ideo hbin klm ldrkm pno aiS lbzeo mqzho׃ 
isaiah 56:12	atio aqHh iin onsbah Skr ohih kch iom mHr gdol itr mad׃ 
isaiah 57:1	hzdiq abd oain aiS Sm el lb oanSi Hsd naspim bain mbin ki mpni hreh nasp hzdiq׃ 
isaiah 57:2	iboa Slom inoHo el mSkbotm hlk nkHo׃ 
isaiah 57:3	oatm qrbo hnh bni ennh cre mnap otcnh׃ 
isaiah 57:4	el mi ttengo el mi trHibo ph tariko lSon hloa atm ildi pSe cre Sqr׃ 
isaiah 57:5	hnHmim balim tHt kl ez renn SHTi hildim bnHlim tHt sepi hsleim׃ 
isaiah 57:6	bHlqi nHl Hlqk hm hm gorlk gm lhm Spkt nsk helit mnHh hel alh anHm׃ 
isaiah 57:7	el hr gbh onSa Smt mSkbk gm Sm elit lcbH cbH׃ 
isaiah 57:8	oaHr hdlt ohmcoch Smt ckronk ki mati glit oteli hrHbt mSkbk otkrt lk mhm ahbt mSkbm id Hcit׃ 
isaiah 57:9	otSri lmlk bSmn otrbi rqHik otSlHi zrik ed mrHq otSpili ed Saol׃ 
isaiah 57:10	brb drkk iget la amrt noaS Hit idk mzat el kn la Hlit׃ 
isaiah 57:11	oat mi dagt otirai ki tkcbi oaoti la ckrt la Smt el lbk hla ani mHSh omelm oaoti la tirai׃ 
isaiah 57:12	ani agid zdqtk oat meSik ola ioeilok׃ 
isaiah 57:13	bceqk izilk qbozik oat klm iSa roH iqH hbl ohHosh bi inHl arz oiirS hr qdSi׃ 
isaiah 57:14	oamr slo slo pno drk hrimo mkSol mdrk emi׃ 
isaiah 57:15	ki kh amr rm onSa Skn ed oqdoS Smo mrom oqdoS aSkon oat dka oSpl roH lhHiot roH Splim olhHiot lb ndkaim׃ 
isaiah 57:16	ki la leolm arib ola lnzH aqzop ki roH mlpni ieTop onSmot ani eSiti׃ 
isaiah 57:17	beon bzeo qzpti oakho hstr oaqzp oilk Sobb bdrk lbo׃ 
isaiah 57:18	drkio raiti oarpaho oanHho oaSlm nHmim lo olablio׃ 
isaiah 57:19	bora nob Sptim Slom Slom lrHoq olqrob amr ihoh orpatio׃ 
isaiah 57:20	ohrSeim kim ngrS ki hSqT la iokl oigrSo mimio rpS oTiT׃ 
isaiah 57:21	ain Slom amr alhi lrSeim׃ 
isaiah 58:1	qra bgron al tHSk kSopr hrm qolk ohgd lemi pSem olbit ieqb HTatm׃ 
isaiah 58:2	oaoti iom iom idrSon odet drki iHpzon kgoi aSr zdqh eSh omSpT alhio la ecb iSaloni mSpTi zdq qrbt alhim iHpzon׃ 
isaiah 58:3	lmh zmno ola rait enino npSno ola tde hn biom zmkm tmzao Hpz okl ezbikm tngSo׃ 
isaiah 58:4	hn lrib omzh tzomo olhkot bagrp rSe la tzomo kiom lhSmie bmrom qolkm׃ 
isaiah 58:5	hkch ihih zom abHrho iom enot adm npSo hlkp kagmn raSo oSq oapr izie hlch tqra zom oiom rzon lihoh׃ 
isaiah 58:6	hloa ch zom abHrho ptH Hrzbot rSe htr agdot moTh oSlH rzozim HpSim okl moTh tntqo׃ 
isaiah 58:7	hloa prs lreb lHmk oeniim mrodim tbia bit ki trah erm oksito ombSrk la ttelm׃ 
isaiah 58:8	ac ibqe kSHr aork oarktk mhrh tzmH ohlk lpnik zdqk kbod ihoh iaspk׃ 
isaiah 58:9	ac tqra oihoh ienh tSoe oiamr hnni am tsir mtokk moTh SlH azbe odbr aon׃ 
isaiah 58:10	otpq lreb npSk onpS nenh tSbie ocrH bHSk aork oapltk kzhrim׃ 
isaiah 58:11	onHk ihoh tmid ohSbie bzHzHot npSk oezmtik iHliz ohiit kgn roh okmoza mim aSr la ikcbo mimio׃ 
isaiah 58:12	obno mmk Hrbot eolm mosdi dor odor tqomm oqra lk gdr prz mSbb ntibot lSbt׃ 
isaiah 58:13	am tSib mSbt rglk eSot Hpzik biom qdSi oqrat lSbt eng lqdoS ihoh mkbd okbdto meSot drkik mmzoa Hpzk odbr dbr׃ 
isaiah 58:14	ac tteng el ihoh ohrkbtik el bmoti arz ohakltik nHlt ieqb abik ki pi ihoh dbr׃ 
isaiah 59:1	hn la qzrh id ihoh mhoSie ola kbdh acno mSmoe׃ 
isaiah 59:2	ki am eontikm hio mbdlim binkm lbin alhikm oHTaotikm hstiro pnim mkm mSmoe׃ 
isaiah 59:3	ki kpikm ngalo bdm oazbeotikm beon Sptotikm dbro Sqr lSonkm eolh thgh׃ 
isaiah 59:4	ain qra bzdq oain nSpT bamonh bToH el tho odbr Soa hro eml oholid aon׃ 
isaiah 59:5	bizi zpeoni bqeo oqori ekbiS iargo hakl mbizihm imot ohcorh tbqe apeh׃ 
isaiah 59:6	qorihm la ihio lbgd ola itkso bmeSihm meSihm meSi aon opel Hms bkpihm׃ 
isaiah 59:7	rglihm lre irzo oimhro lSpk dm nqi mHSbotihm mHSbot aon Sd oSbr bmslotm׃ 
isaiah 59:8	drk Slom la ideo oain mSpT bmeglotm ntibotihm eqSo lhm kl drk bh la ide Slom׃ 
isaiah 59:9	el kn rHq mSpT mmno ola tSigno zdqh nqoh laor ohnh HSk lnghot baplot nhlk׃ 
isaiah 59:10	ngSSh keorim qir okain einim ngSSh kSlno bzhrim knSp baSmnim kmtim׃ 
isaiah 59:11	nhmh kdbim klno okionim hgh nhgh nqoh lmSpT oain liSoeh rHqh mmno׃ 
isaiah 59:12	ki rbo pSeino ngdk oHTaotino enth bno ki pSeino atno oeontino idenom׃ 
isaiah 59:13	pSe okHS bihoh onsog maHr alhino dbr eSq osrh hro ohgo mlb dbri Sqr׃ 
isaiah 59:14	ohsg aHor mSpT ozdqh mrHoq temd ki kSlh brHob amt onkHh la tokl lboa׃ 
isaiah 59:15	othi hamt nedrt osr mre mStoll oira ihoh oire beinio ki ain mSpT׃ 
isaiah 59:16	oira ki ain aiS oiStomm ki ain mpgie otoSe lo creo ozdqto hia smktho׃ 
isaiah 59:17	oilbS zdqh kSrin okobe iSoeh braSo oilbS bgdi nqm tlbSt oieT kmeil qnah׃ 
isaiah 59:18	kel gmlot kel iSlm Hmh lzrio gmol laibio laiim gmol iSlm׃ 
isaiah 59:19	oiirao mmerb at Sm ihoh ommcrH SmS at kbodo ki iboa knhr zr roH ihoh nssh bo׃ 
isaiah 59:20	oba lzion goal olSbi pSe bieqb nam ihoh׃ 
isaiah 59:21	oani cat briti aotm amr ihoh roHi aSr elik odbri aSr Smti bpik la imoSo mpik ompi crek ompi cre crek amr ihoh meth oed eolm׃ 
isaiah 60:1	qomi aori ki ba aork okbod ihoh elik crH׃ 
isaiah 60:2	ki hnh hHSk iksh arz oerpl lamim oelik icrH ihoh okbodo elik irah׃ 
isaiah 60:3	ohlko goim laork omlkim lngh crHk׃ 
isaiah 60:4	Sai sbib einik orai klm nqbzo bao lk bnik mrHoq ibao obntik el zd tamnh׃ 
isaiah 60:5	ac trai onhrt opHd orHb lbbk ki ihpk elik hmon im Hil goim ibao lk׃ 
isaiah 60:6	Spet gmlim tksk bkri mdin oeiph klm mSba ibao chb olbonh iSao othlt ihoh ibSro׃ 
isaiah 60:7	kl zan qdr iqbzo lk aili nbiot iSrtonk ielo el rzon mcbHi obit tparti apar׃ 
isaiah 60:8	mi alh keb teopinh okionim al arbtihm׃ 
isaiah 60:9	ki li aiim iqoo oaniot trSiS braSnh lhbia bnik mrHoq kspm ochbm atm lSm ihoh alhik olqdoS iSral ki park׃ 
isaiah 60:10	obno bni nkr Hmtik omlkihm iSrtonk ki bqzpi hkitik obrzoni rHmtik׃ 
isaiah 60:11	optHo Serik tmid iomm olilh la isgro lhbia alik Hil goim omlkihm nhogim׃ 
isaiah 60:12	ki hgoi ohmmlkh aSr la iebdok iabdo ohgoim Hrb iHrbo׃ 
isaiah 60:13	kbod hlbnon alik iboa broS tdhr otaSor iHdo lpar mqom mqdSi omqom rgli akbd׃ 
isaiah 60:14	ohlko alik SHoH bni menik ohStHoo el kpot rglik kl mnazik oqrao lk eir ihoh zion qdoS iSral׃ 
isaiah 60:15	tHt hiotk ecobh oSnoah oain eobr oSmtik lgaon eolm mSoS dor odor׃ 
isaiah 60:16	oinqt Hlb goim oSd mlkim tinqi oidet ki ani ihoh moSiek ogalk abir ieqb׃ 
isaiah 60:17	tHt hnHSt abia chb otHt hbrcl abia ksp otHt hezim nHSt otHt habnim brcl oSmti pqdtk Slom ongSik zdqh׃ 
isaiah 60:18	la iSme eod Hms barzk Sd oSbr bgbolik oqrat iSoeh Homtik oSerik thlh׃ 
isaiah 60:19	la ihih lk eod hSmS laor iomm olngh hirH la iair lk ohih lk ihoh laor eolm oalhik ltpartk׃ 
isaiah 60:20	la iboa eod SmSk oirHk la iasp ki ihoh ihih lk laor eolm oSlmo imi ablk׃ 
isaiah 60:21	oemk klm zdiqim leolm iirSo arz nzr mTeo meSh idi lhtpar׃ 
isaiah 60:22	hqTn ihih lalp ohzeir lgoi ezom ani ihoh beth aHiSnh׃ 
isaiah 61:1	roH adni ihoh eli ien mSH ihoh ati lbSr enoim SlHni lHbS lnSbri lb lqra lSboim dror olasorim pqH qoH׃ 
isaiah 61:2	lqra Snt rzon lihoh oiom nqm lalhino lnHm kl ablim׃ 
isaiah 61:3	lSom labli zion ltt lhm par tHt apr Smn SSon tHt abl meTh thlh tHt roH khh oqra lhm aili hzdq mTe ihoh lhtpar׃ 
isaiah 61:4	obno Hrbot eolm Smmot raSnim iqommo oHdSo eri Hrb Smmot dor odor׃ 
isaiah 61:5	oemdo crim oreo zankm obni nkr akrikm okrmikm׃ 
isaiah 61:6	oatm khni ihoh tqrao mSrti alhino iamr lkm Hil goim taklo obkbodm ttimro׃ 
isaiah 61:7	tHt bStkm mSnh oklmh irno Hlqm lkn barzm mSnh iirSo SmHt eolm thih lhm׃ 
isaiah 61:8	ki ani ihoh ahb mSpT Sna gcl beolh ontti peltm bamt obrit eolm akrot lhm׃ 
isaiah 61:9	onode bgoim crem ozazaihm btok hemim kl raihm ikirom ki hm cre brk ihoh׃ 
isaiah 61:10	SoS aSiS bihoh tgl npSi balhi ki hlbiSni bgdi iSe meil zdqh ieTni kHtn ikhn par okklh tedh klih׃ 
isaiah 61:11	ki karz tozia zmHh okgnh croeih tzmiH kn adni ihoh izmiH zdqh othlh ngd kl hgoim׃ 
isaiah 62:1	lmen zion la aHSh olmen iroSlm la aSqoT ed iza kngh zdqh oiSoeth klpid iber׃ 
isaiah 62:2	orao goim zdqk okl mlkim kbodk oqra lk Sm HdS aSr pi ihoh iqbno׃ 
isaiah 62:3	ohiit eTrt tpart bid ihoh oznop mlokh bkp alhik׃ 
isaiah 62:4	la iamr lk eod ecobh olarzk la iamr eod Smmh ki lk iqra Hpzi bh olarzk beolh ki Hpz ihoh bk oarzk tbel׃ 
isaiah 62:5	ki ibel bHor btolh ibelok bnik omSoS Htn el klh iSiS elik alhik׃ 
isaiah 62:6	el Homtik iroSlm hpqdti Smrim kl hiom okl hlilh tmid la iHSo hmckrim at ihoh al dmi lkm׃ 
isaiah 62:7	oal ttno dmi lo ed ikonn oed iSim at iroSlm thlh barz׃ 
isaiah 62:8	nSbe ihoh bimino obcroe eco am atn at dgnk eod makl laibik oam iSto bni nkr tiroSk aSr iget bo׃ 
isaiah 62:9	ki maspio iaklho ohllo at ihoh omqbzio iStho bHzrot qdSi׃ 
isaiah 62:10	ebro ebro bSerim pno drk hem slo slo hmslh sqlo mabn hrimo ns el hemim׃ 
isaiah 62:11	hnh ihoh hSmie al qzh harz amro lbt zion hnh iSek ba hnh Skro ato opelto lpnio׃ 
isaiah 62:12	oqrao lhm em hqdS gaoli ihoh olk iqra droSh eir la necbh׃ 
isaiah 63:1	mi ch ba madom Hmoz bgdim mbzrh ch hdor blboSo zeh brb kHo ani mdbr bzdqh rb lhoSie׃ 
isaiah 63:2	mdoe adm llboSk obgdik kdrk bgt׃ 
isaiah 63:3	porh drkti lbdi omemim ain aiS ati oadrkm bapi oarmsm bHmti oic nzHm el bgdi okl mlboSi agalti׃ 
isaiah 63:4	ki iom nqm blbi oSnt gaoli bah׃ 
isaiah 63:5	oabiT oain ecr oaStomm oain somk otoSe li crei oHmti hia smktni׃ 
isaiah 63:6	oabos emim bapi oaSkrm bHmti oaorid larz nzHm׃ 
isaiah 63:7	Hsdi ihoh ackir thlt ihoh kel kl aSr gmlno ihoh orb Tob lbit iSral aSr gmlm krHmio okrb Hsdio׃ 
isaiah 63:8	oiamr ak emi hmh bnim la iSqro oihi lhm lmoSie׃ 
isaiah 63:9	bkl zrtm la zr omlak pnio hoSiem bahbto obHmlto hoa galm oinTlm oinSam kl imi eolm׃ 
isaiah 63:10	ohmh mro oezbo at roH qdSo oihpk lhm laoib hoa nlHm bm׃ 
isaiah 63:11	oickr imi eolm mSh emo aih hmelm mim at rei zano aih hSm bqrbo at roH qdSo׃ 
isaiah 63:12	molik limin mSh croe tparto boqe mim mpnihm leSot lo Sm eolm׃ 
isaiah 63:13	molikm bthmot ksos bmdbr la ikSlo׃ 
isaiah 63:14	kbhmh bbqeh trd roH ihoh tniHno kn nhgt emk leSot lk Sm tpart׃ 
isaiah 63:15	hbT mSmim orah mcbl qdSk otpartk aih qnatk ogbortk hmon meik orHmik ali htapqo׃ 
isaiah 63:16	ki ath abino ki abrhm la ideno oiSral la ikirno ath ihoh abino galno meolm Smk׃ 
isaiah 63:17	lmh tteno ihoh mdrkik tqSiH lbno miratk Sob lmen ebdik SbTi nHltk׃ 
isaiah 63:18	lmzer irSo em qdSk zrino bosso mqdSk׃ 
isaiah 63:19	hiino meolm la mSlt bm la nqra Smk elihm׃ 
isaiah 64:1	loa qret Smim irdt mpnik hrim nclo׃ 
isaiah 64:2	kqdH aS hmsim mim tbeh aS lhodie Smk lzrik mpnik goim irgco׃ 
isaiah 64:3	beSotk noraot la nqoh irdt mpnik hrim nclo׃ 
isaiah 64:4	omeolm la Smeo la hacino ein la rath alhim coltk ieSh lmHkh lo׃ 
isaiah 64:5	pget at SS oeSh zdq bdrkik ickrok hn ath qzpt onHTa bhm eolm onoSe׃ 
isaiah 64:6	onhi kTma klno okbgd edim kl zdqtino onbl kelh klno oeonno kroH iSano׃ 
isaiah 64:7	oain qora bSmk mteorr lhHciq bk ki hstrt pnik mmno otmogno bid eonno׃ 
isaiah 64:8	oeth ihoh abino ath anHno hHmr oath izrno omeSh idk klno׃ 
isaiah 64:9	al tqzp ihoh ed mad oal led tckr eon hn hbT na emk klno׃ 
isaiah 64:10	eri qdSk hio mdbr zion mdbr hith iroSlm Smmh׃ 
isaiah 64:11	bit qdSno otpartno aSr hllok abtino hih lSrpt aS okl mHmdino hih lHrbh׃ 
isaiah 64:12	hel alh ttapq ihoh tHSh otenno ed mad׃ 
isaiah 65:1	ndrSti lloa Salo nmzati lla bqSni amrti hnni hnni al goi la qra bSmi׃ 
isaiah 65:2	prSti idi kl hiom al em sorr hhlkim hdrk la Tob aHr mHSbtihm׃ 
isaiah 65:3	hem hmkeisim aoti el pni tmid cbHim bgnot omqTrim el hlbnim׃ 
isaiah 65:4	hiSbim bqbrim obnzorim ilino haklim bSr hHcir oprq pglim klihm׃ 
isaiah 65:5	hamrim qrb alik al tgS bi ki qdStik alh eSn bapi aS iqdt kl hiom׃ 
isaiah 65:6	hnh ktobh lpni la aHSh ki am Slmti oSlmti el Hiqm׃ 
isaiah 65:7	eontikm oeont abotikm iHdo amr ihoh aSr qTro el hhrim oel hgbeot Hrponi omdti peltm raSnh el Hiqm׃ 
isaiah 65:8	kh amr ihoh kaSr imza htiroS baSkol oamr al tSHitho ki brkh bo kn aeSh lmen ebdi lblti hSHit hkl׃ 
isaiah 65:9	ohozati mieqb cre omihodh iorS hri oirSoh bHiri oebdi iSkno Smh׃ 
isaiah 65:10	ohih hSron lnoh zan oemq ekor lrbz bqr lemi aSr drSoni׃ 
isaiah 65:11	oatm ecbi ihoh hSkHim at hr qdSi herkim lgd SlHn ohmmlaim lmni mmsk׃ 
isaiah 65:12	omniti atkm lHrb oklkm lTbH tkreo ien qrati ola enitm dbrti ola Smetm oteSo hre beini obaSr la Hpzti bHrtm׃ 
isaiah 65:13	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnh ebdi iaklo oatm trebo hnh ebdi iSto oatm tzmao hnh ebdi iSmHo oatm tbSo׃ 
isaiah 65:14	hnh ebdi irno mTob lb oatm tzeqo mkab lb omSbr roH tililo׃ 
isaiah 65:15	ohnHtm Smkm lSboeh lbHiri ohmitk adni ihoh olebdio iqra Sm aHr׃ 
isaiah 65:16	aSr hmtbrk barz itbrk balhi amn ohnSbe barz iSbe balhi amn ki nSkHo hzrot hraSnot oki nstro meini׃ 
isaiah 65:17	ki hnni bora Smim HdSim oarz HdSh ola tckrnh hraSnot ola telinh el lb׃ 
isaiah 65:18	ki am SiSo ogilo edi ed aSr ani bora ki hnni bora at iroSlm gilh oemh mSoS׃ 
isaiah 65:19	oglti biroSlm oSSti bemi ola iSme bh eod qol bki oqol ceqh׃ 
isaiah 65:20	la ihih mSm eod eol imim ocqn aSr la imla at imio ki hner bn mah Snh imot ohHoTa bn mah Snh iqll׃ 
isaiah 65:21	obno btim oiSbo onTeo krmim oaklo prim׃ 
isaiah 65:22	la ibno oaHr iSb la iTeo oaHr iakl ki kimi hez imi emi omeSh idihm iblo bHiri׃ 
isaiah 65:23	la iigeo lriq ola ildo lbhlh ki cre broki ihoh hmh ozazaihm atm׃ 
isaiah 65:24	ohih Trm iqrao oani aenh eod hm mdbrim oani aSme׃ 
isaiah 65:25	cab oTlh ireo kaHd oarih kbqr iakl tbn onHS epr lHmo la ireo ola iSHito bkl hr qdSi amr ihoh׃ 
isaiah 66:1	kh amr ihoh hSmim ksai oharz hdm rgli ai ch bit aSr tbno li oai ch mqom mnoHti׃ 
isaiah 66:2	oat kl alh idi eSth oihio kl alh nam ihoh oal ch abiT al eni onkh roH oHrd el dbri׃ 
isaiah 66:3	SoHT hSor mkh aiS cobH hSh erp klb melh mnHh dm Hcir mckir lbnh mbrk aon gm hmh bHro bdrkihm obSqozihm npSm Hpzh׃ 
isaiah 66:4	gm ani abHr btellihm omgortm abia lhm ien qrati oain eonh dbrti ola Smeo oieSo hre beini obaSr la Hpzti bHro׃ 
isaiah 66:5	Smeo dbr ihoh hHrdim al dbro amro aHikm Snaikm mndikm lmen Smi ikbd ihoh onrah bSmHtkm ohm ibSo׃ 
isaiah 66:6	qol Saon meir qol mhikl qol ihoh mSlm gmol laibio׃ 
isaiah 66:7	bTrm tHil ildh bTrm iboa Hbl lh ohmliTh ckr׃ 
isaiah 66:8	mi Sme kcat mi rah kalh hioHl arz biom aHd am iold goi pem aHt ki Hlh gm ildh zion at bnih׃ 
isaiah 66:9	hani aSbir ola aolid iamr ihoh am ani hmolid oezrti amr alhik׃ 
isaiah 66:10	SmHo at iroSlm ogilo bh kl ahbih SiSo ath mSoS kl hmtablim elih׃ 
isaiah 66:11	lmen tinqo oSbetm mSd tnHmih lmen tmzo ohtengtm mcic kbodh׃ 
isaiah 66:12	ki kh amr ihoh hnni nTh alih knhr Slom oknHl SoTp kbod goim oinqtm el zd tnSao oel brkim tSeSeo׃ 
isaiah 66:13	kaiS aSr amo tnHmno kn anki anHmkm obiroSlm tnHmo׃ 
isaiah 66:14	oraitm oSS lbkm oezmotikm kdSa tprHnh onodeh id ihoh at ebdio ocem at aibio׃ 
isaiah 66:15	ki hnh ihoh baS iboa oksoph mrkbtio lhSib bHmh apo ogerto blhbi aS׃ 
isaiah 66:16	ki baS ihoh nSpT obHrbo at kl bSr orbo Hlli ihoh׃ 
isaiah 66:17	hmtqdSim ohmThrim al hgnot aHr aHd btok akli bSr hHcir ohSqz ohekbr iHdo ispo nam ihoh׃ 
isaiah 66:18	oanki meSihm omHSbtihm bah lqbz at kl hgoim ohlSnot obao orao at kbodi׃ 
isaiah 66:19	oSmti bhm aot oSlHti mhm pliTim al hgoim trSiS pol olod mSki qSt tbl oion haiim hrHqim aSr la Smeo at Smei ola rao at kbodi ohgido at kbodi bgoim׃ 
isaiah 66:20	ohbiao at kl aHikm mkl hgoim mnHh lihoh bsosim obrkb obzbim obprdim obkrkrot el hr qdSi iroSlm amr ihoh kaSr ibiao bni iSral at hmnHh bkli Thor bit ihoh׃ 
isaiah 66:21	ogm mhm aqH lkhnim lloim amr ihoh׃ 
isaiah 66:22	ki kaSr hSmim hHdSim oharz hHdSh aSr ani eSh emdim lpni nam ihoh kn iemd crekm oSmkm׃ 
isaiah 66:23	ohih mdi HdS bHdSo omdi Sbt bSbto iboa kl bSr lhStHot lpni amr ihoh׃ 
isaiah 66:24	oizao orao bpgri hanSim hpSeim bi ki toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh ohio draon lkl bSr׃ 
jeremiah 1:1	dbri irmiho bn Hlqiho mn hkhnim aSr bentot barz bnimn׃ 
jeremiah 1:2	aSr hih dbr ihoh alio bimi iaSiho bn amon mlk ihodh bSlS eSrh Snh lmlko׃ 
jeremiah 1:3	oihi bimi ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh ed tm eSti eSrh Snh lzdqiho bn iaSiho mlk ihodh ed glot iroSlm bHdS hHmiSi׃ 
jeremiah 1:4	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
jeremiah 1:5	bTrm azork bbTn idetik obTrm tza mrHm hqdStik nbia lgoim nttik׃ 
jeremiah 1:6	oamr ahh adni ihoh hnh la ideti dbr ki ner anki׃ 
jeremiah 1:7	oiamr ihoh ali al tamr ner anki ki el kl aSr aSlHk tlk oat kl aSr azok tdbr׃ 
jeremiah 1:8	al tira mpnihm ki atk ani lhzlk nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 1:9	oiSlH ihoh at ido oige el pi oiamr ihoh ali hnh ntti dbri bpik׃ 
jeremiah 1:10	rah hpqdtik hiom hch el hgoim oel hmmlkot lntoS olntoz olhabid olhros lbnot olnToe׃ 
jeremiah 1:11	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr mh ath rah irmiho oamr mql Sqd ani rah׃ 
jeremiah 1:12	oiamr ihoh ali hiTbt lraot ki Sqd ani el dbri leSto׃ 
jeremiah 1:13	oihi dbr ihoh ali Snit lamr mh ath rah oamr sir npoH ani rah opnio mpni zponh׃ 
jeremiah 1:14	oiamr ihoh ali mzpon tptH hreh el kl iSbi harz׃ 
jeremiah 1:15	ki hnni qra lkl mSpHot mmlkot zponh nam ihoh obao ontno aiS ksao ptH Seri iroSlm oel kl Homtih sbib oel kl eri ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 1:16	odbrti mSpTi aotm el kl retm aSr ecboni oiqTro lalhim aHrim oiStHoo lmeSi idihm׃ 
jeremiah 1:17	oath tacr mtnik oqmt odbrt alihm at kl aSr anki azok al tHt mpnihm pn aHtk lpnihm׃ 
jeremiah 1:18	oani hnh nttik hiom leir mbzr olemod brcl olHmot nHSt el kl harz lmlki ihodh lSrih lkhnih olem harz׃ 
jeremiah 1:19	onlHmo alik ola ioklo lk ki atk ani nam ihoh lhzilk׃ 
jeremiah 2:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
jeremiah 2:2	hlk oqrat bacni iroSlm lamr kh amr ihoh ckrti lk Hsd neorik ahbt kloltik lktk aHri bmdbr barz la croeh׃ 
jeremiah 2:3	qdS iSral lihoh raSit tboath kl aklio iaSmo reh tba alihm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 2:4	Smeo dbr ihoh bit ieqb okl mSpHot bit iSral׃ 
jeremiah 2:5	kh amr ihoh mh mzao abotikm bi eol ki rHqo meli oilko aHri hhbl oihblo׃ 
jeremiah 2:6	ola amro aih ihoh hmelh atno marz mzrim hmolik atno bmdbr barz erbh oSoHh barz zih ozlmot barz la ebr bh aiS ola iSb adm Sm׃ 
jeremiah 2:7	oabia atkm al arz hkrml lakl prih oTobh otbao otTmao at arzi onHlti Smtm ltoebh׃ 
jeremiah 2:8	hkhnim la amro aih ihoh otpSi htorh la ideoni ohreim pSeo bi ohnbiaim nbao bbel oaHri la ioelo hlko׃ 
jeremiah 2:9	lkn ed arib atkm nam ihoh oat bni bnikm arib׃ 
jeremiah 2:10	ki ebro aii ktiim orao oqdr SlHo ohtbonno mad orao hn hith kcat׃ 
jeremiah 2:11	hhimir goi alhim ohmh la alhim oemi hmir kbodo bloa ioeil׃ 
jeremiah 2:12	Smo Smim el cat oSero Hrbo mad nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 2:13	ki Stim reot eSh emi ati ecbo mqor mim Hiim lHzb lhm barot bart nSbrim aSr la iklo hmim׃ 
jeremiah 2:14	hebd iSral am ilid bit hoa mdoe hih lbc׃ 
jeremiah 2:15	elio iSago kprim ntno qolm oiSito arzo lSmh erio nzth mbli iSb׃ 
jeremiah 2:16	gm bni np otHpns ireok qdqd׃ 
jeremiah 2:17	hloa cat teSh lk ecbk at ihoh alhik bet molikk bdrk׃ 
jeremiah 2:18	oeth mh lk ldrk mzrim lStot mi SHor omh lk ldrk aSor lStot mi nhr׃ 
jeremiah 2:19	tisrk retk omSbotik tokHk odei orai ki re omr ecbk at ihoh alhik ola pHdti alik nam adni ihoh zbaot׃ 
jeremiah 2:20	ki meolm Sbrti elk ntqti mosrtik otamri la aebd ki el kl gbeh gbhh otHt kl ez renn at zeh cnh׃ 
jeremiah 2:21	oanki nTetik Srq klh cre amt oaik nhpkt li sori hgpn nkrih׃ 
jeremiah 2:22	ki am tkbsi bntr otrbi lk brit nktm eonk lpni nam adni ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 2:23	aik tamri la nTmati aHri hbelim la hlkti rai drkk bgia dei mh eSit bkrh qlh mSrkt drkih׃ 
jeremiah 2:24	prh lmd mdbr baot npSo Saph roH tanth mi iSibnh kl mbqSih la iiepo bHdSh imzaonh׃ 
jeremiah 2:25	mnei rglk miHp ogornk mzmah otamri noaS loa ki ahbti crim oaHrihm alk׃ 
jeremiah 2:26	kbSt gnb ki imza kn hbiSo bit iSral hmh mlkihm Srihm okhnihm onbiaihm׃ 
jeremiah 2:27	amrim lez abi ath olabn at ildtni ki pno ali erp ola pnim obet retm iamro qomh ohoSieno׃ 
jeremiah 2:28	oaih alhik aSr eSit lk iqomo am ioSieok bet retk ki mspr erik hio alhik ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 2:29	lmh tribo ali klkm pSetm bi nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 2:30	lSoa hkiti at bnikm mosr la lqHo aklh Hrbkm nbiaikm karih mSHit׃ 
jeremiah 2:31	hdor atm rao dbr ihoh hmdbr hiiti liSral am arz maplih mdoe amro emi rdno loa nboa eod alik׃ 
jeremiah 2:32	htSkH btolh edih klh qSrih oemi SkHoni imim ain mspr׃ 
jeremiah 2:33	mh tiTbi drkk lbqS ahbh lkn gm at hreot lmdti at drkik׃ 
jeremiah 2:34	gm bknpik nmzao dm npSot abionim nqiim la bmHtrt mzatim ki el kl alh׃ 
jeremiah 2:35	otamri ki nqiti ak Sb apo mmni hnni nSpT aotk el amrk la HTati׃ 
jeremiah 2:36	mh tcli mad lSnot at drkk gm mmzrim tboSi kaSr bSt maSor׃ 
jeremiah 2:37	gm mat ch tzai oidik el raSk ki mas ihoh bmbTHik ola tzliHi lhm׃ 
jeremiah 3:1	lamr hn iSlH aiS at aSto ohlkh mato ohith laiS aHr hiSob alih eod hloa Hnop tHnp harz hhia oat cnit reim rbim oSob ali nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 3:2	Sai einik el Spim orai aiph la Sglt el drkim iSbt lhm kerbi bmdbr otHnipi arz bcnotik obretk׃ 
jeremiah 3:3	oimneo rbbim omlqoS loa hih omzH aSh conh hih lk mant hklm׃ 
jeremiah 3:4	hloa meth qrati li abi alop neri ath׃ 
jeremiah 3:5	hinTr leolm am iSmr lnzH hnh dbrti oteSi hreot otokl׃ 
jeremiah 3:6	oiamr ihoh ali bimi iaSiho hmlk hrait aSr eSth mSbh iSral hlkh hia el kl hr gbh oal tHt kl ez renn otcni Sm׃ 
jeremiah 3:7	oamr aHri eSoth at kl alh ali tSob ola Sbh otrah bgodh aHoth ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 3:8	oara ki el kl adot aSr naph mSbh iSral SlHtih oatn at spr krittih alih ola irah bgdh ihodh aHoth otlk otcn gm hia׃ 
jeremiah 3:9	ohih mql cnoth otHnp at harz otnap at habn oat hez׃ 
jeremiah 3:10	ogm bkl cat la Sbh ali bgodh aHoth ihodh bkl lbh ki am bSqr nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 3:11	oiamr ihoh ali zdqh npSh mSbh iSral mbgdh ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 3:12	hlk oqrat at hdbrim halh zponh oamrt Sobh mSbh iSral nam ihoh loa apil pni bkm ki Hsid ani nam ihoh la aTor leolm׃ 
jeremiah 3:13	ak dei eonk ki bihoh alhik pSet otpcri at drkik lcrim tHt kl ez renn obqoli la Smetm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 3:14	Sobo bnim Sobbim nam ihoh ki anki belti bkm olqHti atkm aHd meir oSnim mmSpHh ohbati atkm zion׃ 
jeremiah 3:15	ontti lkm reim klbi oreo atkm deh ohSkil׃ 
jeremiah 3:16	ohih ki trbo opritm barz bimim hhmh nam ihoh la iamro eod aron brit ihoh ola ielh el lb ola ickro bo ola ipqdo ola ieSh eod׃ 
jeremiah 3:17	bet hhia iqrao liroSlm ksa ihoh onqoo alih kl hgoim lSm ihoh liroSlm ola ilko eod aHri Srrot lbm hre׃ 
jeremiah 3:18	bimim hhmh ilko bit ihodh el bit iSral oibao iHdo marz zpon el harz aSr hnHlti at abotikm׃ 
jeremiah 3:19	oanki amrti aik aSitk bbnim oatn lk arz Hmdh nHlt zbi zbaot goim oamr abi tqrao li omaHri la tSobo׃ 
jeremiah 3:20	akn bgdh aSh mreh kn bgdtm bi bit iSral nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 3:21	qol el Spiim nSme bki tHnoni bni iSral ki heoo at drkm SkHo at ihoh alhihm׃ 
jeremiah 3:22	Sobo bnim Sobbim arph mSobtikm hnno atno lk ki ath ihoh alhino׃ 
jeremiah 3:23	akn lSqr mgbeot hmon hrim akn bihoh alhino tSoet iSral׃ 
jeremiah 3:24	ohbSt aklh at igie abotino mneorino at zanm oat bqrm at bnihm oat bnotihm׃ 
jeremiah 3:25	nSkbh bbStno otksno klmtno ki lihoh alhino HTano anHno oabotino mneorino oed hiom hch ola Smeno bqol ihoh alhino׃ 
jeremiah 4:1	am tSob iSral nam ihoh ali tSob oam tsir Sqozik mpni ola tnod׃ 
jeremiah 4:2	onSbet Hi ihoh bamt bmSpT obzdqh ohtbrko bo goim obo ithllo׃ 
jeremiah 4:3	ki kh amr ihoh laiS ihodh oliroSlm niro lkm nir oal tcreo al qozim׃ 
jeremiah 4:4	hmlo lihoh ohsro erlot lbbkm aiS ihodh oiSbi iroSlm pn tza kaS Hmti oberh oain mkbh mpni re mellikm׃ 
jeremiah 4:5	hgido bihodh obiroSlm hSmieo oamro otqeo Sopr barz qrao mlao oamro haspo onboah al eri hmbzr׃ 
jeremiah 4:6	Sao ns zionh heico al temdo ki reh anki mbia mzpon oSbr gdol׃ 
jeremiah 4:7	elh arih msbko omSHit goim nse iza mmqmo lSom arzk lSmh erik tzinh main ioSb׃ 
jeremiah 4:8	el cat Hgro Sqim spdo ohililo ki la Sb Hron ap ihoh mmno׃ 
jeremiah 4:9	ohih biom hhoa nam ihoh iabd lb hmlk olb hSrim onSmo hkhnim ohnbiaim itmho׃ 
jeremiah 4:10	oamr ahh adni ihoh akn hSa hSat lem hch oliroSlm lamr Slom ihih lkm ongeh Hrb ed hnpS׃ 
jeremiah 4:11	bet hhia iamr lem hch oliroSlm roH zH Spiim bmdbr drk bt emi loa lcrot oloa lhbr׃ 
jeremiah 4:12	roH mla malh iboa li eth gm ani adbr mSpTim aotm׃ 
jeremiah 4:13	hnh kennim ielh oksoph mrkbotio qlo mnSrim sosio aoi lno ki Sddno׃ 
jeremiah 4:14	kbsi mreh lbk iroSlm lmen toSei ed mti tlin bqrbk mHSbot aonk׃ 
jeremiah 4:15	ki qol mgid mdn omSmie aon mhr aprim׃ 
jeremiah 4:16	hckiro lgoim hnh hSmieo el iroSlm nzrim baim marz hmrHq oitno el eri ihodh qolm׃ 
jeremiah 4:17	kSmri Sdi hio elih msbib ki ati mrth nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 4:18	drkk omellik eSo alh lk cat retk ki mr ki nge ed lbk׃ 
jeremiah 4:19	mei mei aHolh qirot lbi hmh li lbi la aHriS ki qol Sopr Smeti npSi troet mlHmh׃ 
jeremiah 4:20	Sbr el Sbr nqra ki Sddh kl harz ptam Sddo ahli rge irieti׃ 
jeremiah 4:21	ed mti arah ns aSmeh qol Sopr׃ 
jeremiah 4:22	ki aoil emi aoti la ideo bnim sklim hmh ola nbonim hmh Hkmim hmh lhre olhiTib la ideo׃ 
jeremiah 4:23	raiti at harz ohnh tho obho oal hSmim oain aorm׃ 
jeremiah 4:24	raiti hhrim ohnh reSim okl hgbeot htqlqlo׃ 
jeremiah 4:25	raiti ohnh ain hadm okl eop hSmim nddo׃ 
jeremiah 4:26	raiti ohnh hkrml hmdbr okl erio ntzo mpni ihoh mpni Hron apo׃ 
jeremiah 4:27	ki kh amr ihoh Smmh thih kl harz oklh la aeSh׃ 
jeremiah 4:28	el cat tabl harz oqdro hSmim mmel el ki dbrti cmti ola nHmti ola aSob mmnh׃ 
jeremiah 4:29	mqol prS ormh qSt brHt kl heir bao bebim obkpim elo kl heir ecobh oain ioSb bhn aiS׃ 
jeremiah 4:30	oati Sdod mh teSi ki tlbSi Sni ki tedi edi chb ki tqrei bpok einik lSoa ttipi maso bk egbim npSk ibqSo׃ 
jeremiah 4:31	ki qol kHolh Smeti zrh kmbkirh qol bt zion ttipH tprS kpih aoi na li ki eiph npSi lhrgim׃ 
jeremiah 5:1	SoTTo bHozot iroSlm orao na odeo obqSo brHobotih am tmzao aiS am iS eSh mSpT mbqS amonh oaslH lh׃ 
jeremiah 5:2	oam Hi ihoh iamro lkn lSqr iSbeo׃ 
jeremiah 5:3	ihoh einik hloa lamonh hkith atm ola Hlo klitm mano qHt mosr Hcqo pnihm msle mano lSob׃ 
jeremiah 5:4	oani amrti ak dlim hm noalo ki la ideo drk ihoh mSpT alhihm׃ 
jeremiah 5:5	alkh li al hgdlim oadbrh aotm ki hmh ideo drk ihoh mSpT alhihm ak hmh iHdo Sbro el ntqo mosrot׃ 
jeremiah 5:6	el kn hkm arih mier cab erbot iSddm nmr Sqd el erihm kl hioza mhnh iTrp ki rbo pSeihm ezmo mSbotihm׃ 
jeremiah 5:7	ai lcat asloH lk bnik ecboni oiSbeo bla alhim oaSbe aotm oinapo obit conh itgddo׃ 
jeremiah 5:8	sosim micnim mSkim hio aiS al aSt reho izhlo׃ 
jeremiah 5:9	hel alh loa apqd nam ihoh oam bgoi aSr kch la ttnqm npSi׃ 
jeremiah 5:10	elo bSrotih oSHto oklh al teSo hsiro nTiSotih ki loa lihoh hmh׃ 
jeremiah 5:11	ki bgod bgdo bi bit iSral obit ihodh nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 5:12	kHSo bihoh oiamro la hoa ola tboa elino reh oHrb oreb loa nrah׃ 
jeremiah 5:13	ohnbiaim ihio lroH ohdbr ain bhm kh ieSh lhm׃ 
jeremiah 5:14	lkn kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot ien dbrkm at hdbr hch hnni ntn dbri bpik laS ohem hch ezim oakltm׃ 
jeremiah 5:15	hnni mbia elikm goi mmrHq bit iSral nam ihoh goi aitn hoa goi meolm hoa goi la tde lSno ola tSme mh idbr׃ 
jeremiah 5:16	aSpto kqbr ptoH klm gborim׃ 
jeremiah 5:17	oakl qzirk olHmk iaklo bnik obnotik iakl zank obqrk iakl gpnk otantk irSS eri mbzrik aSr ath boTH bhnh bHrb׃ 
jeremiah 5:18	ogm bimim hhmh nam ihoh la aeSh atkm klh׃ 
jeremiah 5:19	ohih ki tamro tHt mh eSh ihoh alhino lno at kl alh oamrt alihm kaSr ecbtm aoti otebdo alhi nkr barzkm kn tebdo crim barz la lkm׃ 
jeremiah 5:20	hgido cat bbit ieqb ohSmieoh bihodh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 5:21	Smeo na cat em skl oain lb einim lhm ola irao acnim lhm ola iSmeo׃ 
jeremiah 5:22	haoti la tirao nam ihoh am mpni la tHilo aSr Smti Hol gbol lim Hq eolm ola iebrnho oitgeSo ola ioklo ohmo glio ola iebrnho׃ 
jeremiah 5:23	olem hch hih lb sorr omorh sro oilko׃ 
jeremiah 5:24	ola amro blbbm nira na at ihoh alhino hntn gSm oirh omlqoS beto Sbeot Hqot qzir iSmr lno׃ 
jeremiah 5:25	eonotikm hTo alh oHTaotikm mneo hTob mkm׃ 
jeremiah 5:26	ki nmzao bemi rSeim iSor kSk iqoSim hzibo mSHit anSim ilkdo׃ 
jeremiah 5:27	kklob mla eop kn btihm mlaim mrmh el kn gdlo oieSiro׃ 
jeremiah 5:28	Smno eSto gm ebro dbri re din la dno din itom oizliHo omSpT abionim la SpTo׃ 
jeremiah 5:29	hel alh la apqd nam ihoh am bgoi aSr kch la ttnqm npSi׃ 
jeremiah 5:30	Smh oSerorh nhith barz׃ 
jeremiah 5:31	hnbiaim nbao bSqr ohkhnim irdo el idihm oemi ahbo kn omh teSo laHrith׃ 
jeremiah 6:1	heco bni bnimn mqrb iroSlm obtqoe tqeo Sopr oel bit hkrm Sao mSat ki reh nSqph mzpon oSbr gdol׃ 
jeremiah 6:2	hnoh ohmengh dmiti bt zion׃ 
jeremiah 6:3	alih ibao reim oedrihm tqeo elih ahlim sbib reo aiS at ido׃ 
jeremiah 6:4	qdSo elih mlHmh qomo onelh bzhrim aoi lno ki pnh hiom ki inTo zlli erb׃ 
jeremiah 6:5	qomo onelh blilh onSHith armnotih׃ 
jeremiah 6:6	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot krto ezh oSpko el iroSlm sllh hia heir hpqd klh eSq bqrbh׃ 
jeremiah 6:7	khqir bor mimih kn hqrh reth Hms oSd iSme bh el pni tmid Hli omkh׃ 
jeremiah 6:8	hosri iroSlm pn tqe npSi mmk pn aSimk Smmh arz loa noSbh׃ 
jeremiah 6:9	kh amr ihoh zbaot eoll ieollo kgpn Sarit iSral hSb idk kbozr el slslot׃ 
jeremiah 6:10	el mi adbrh oaeidh oiSmeo hnh erlh acnm ola ioklo lhqSib hnh dbr ihoh hih lhm lHrph la iHpzo bo׃ 
jeremiah 6:11	oat Hmt ihoh mlati nlaiti hkil Spk el eoll bHoz oel sod bHorim iHdo ki gm aiS em aSh ilkdo cqn em mla imim׃ 
jeremiah 6:12	onsbo btihm laHrim Sdot onSim iHdo ki aTh at idi el iSbi harz nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 6:13	ki mqTnm oed gdolm klo boze bze omnbia oed khn klo eSh Sqr׃ 
jeremiah 6:14	oirpao at Sbr emi el nqlh lamr Slom Slom oain Slom׃ 
jeremiah 6:15	hbiSo ki toebh eSo gm boS la iboSo gm hklim la ideo lkn iplo bnplim bet pqdtim ikSlo amr ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 6:16	kh amr ihoh emdo el drkim orao oSalo lntbot eolm ai ch drk hTob olko bh omzao mrgoe lnpSkm oiamro la nlk׃ 
jeremiah 6:17	ohqmti elikm zpim hqSibo lqol Sopr oiamro la nqSib׃ 
jeremiah 6:18	lkn Smeo hgoim odei edh at aSr bm׃ 
jeremiah 6:19	Smei harz hnh anki mbia reh al hem hch pri mHSbotm ki el dbri la hqSibo otorti oimaso bh׃ 
jeremiah 6:20	lmh ch li lbonh mSba tboa oqnh hTob marz mrHq elotikm la lrzon ocbHikm la erbo li׃ 
jeremiah 6:21	lkn kh amr ihoh hnni ntn al hem hch mkSlim okSlo bm abot obnim iHdo Skn oreo iabdo׃ 
jeremiah 6:22	kh amr ihoh hnh em ba marz zpon ogoi gdol ieor mirkti arz׃ 
jeremiah 6:23	qSt okidon iHciqo akcri hoa ola irHmo qolm kim ihmh oel sosim irkbo erok kaiS lmlHmh elik bt zion׃ 
jeremiah 6:24	Smeno at Smeo rpo idino zrh hHciqtno Hil kioldh׃ 
jeremiah 6:25	al tzai hSdh obdrk al tlki ki Hrb laib mgor msbib׃ 
jeremiah 6:26	bt emi Hgri Sq ohtplSi bapr abl iHid eSi lk mspd tmrorim ki ptam iba hSdd elino׃ 
jeremiah 6:27	bHon nttik bemi mbzr otde obHnt at drkm׃ 
jeremiah 6:28	klm sri sorrim hlki rkil nHSt obrcl klm mSHitim hmh׃ 
jeremiah 6:29	nHr mpH maStm eprt lSoa zrp zrop oreim la ntqo׃ 
jeremiah 6:30	ksp nmas qrao lhm ki mas ihoh bhm׃ 
jeremiah 7:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 7:2	emd bSer bit ihoh oqrat Sm at hdbr hch oamrt Smeo dbr ihoh kl ihodh hbaim bSerim halh lhStHot lihoh׃ 
jeremiah 7:3	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hiTibo drkikm omellikm oaSknh atkm bmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 7:4	al tbTHo lkm al dbri hSqr lamr hikl ihoh hikl ihoh hikl ihoh hmh׃ 
jeremiah 7:5	ki am hiTib tiTibo at drkikm oat mellikm am eSo teSo mSpT bin aiS obin reho׃ 
jeremiah 7:6	gr itom oalmnh la teSqo odm nqi al tSpko bmqom hch oaHri alhim aHrim la tlko lre lkm׃ 
jeremiah 7:7	oSknti atkm bmqom hch barz aSr ntti labotikm lmn eolm oed eolm׃ 
jeremiah 7:8	hnh atm bTHim lkm el dbri hSqr lblti hoeil׃ 
jeremiah 7:9	hgnb rzH onap ohSbe lSqr oqTr lbel ohlk aHri alhim aHrim aSr la idetm׃ 
jeremiah 7:10	obatm oemdtm lpni bbit hch aSr nqra Smi elio oamrtm nzlno lmen eSot at kl htoebot halh׃ 
jeremiah 7:11	hmert przim hih hbit hch aSr nqra Smi elio beinikm gm anki hnh raiti nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 7:12	ki lko na al mqomi aSr bSilo aSr Sknti Smi Sm braSonh orao at aSr eSiti lo mpni ret emi iSral׃ 
jeremiah 7:13	oeth ien eSotkm at kl hmeSim halh nam ihoh oadbr alikm hSkm odbr ola Smetm oaqra atkm ola enitm׃ 
jeremiah 7:14	oeSiti lbit aSr nqra Smi elio aSr atm bTHim bo olmqom aSr ntti lkm olabotikm kaSr eSiti lSlo׃ 
jeremiah 7:15	ohSlkti atkm mel pni kaSr hSlkti at kl aHikm at kl cre aprim׃ 
jeremiah 7:16	oath al ttpll bed hem hch oal tSa bedm rnh otplh oal tpge bi ki ainni Sme atk׃ 
jeremiah 7:17	haink rah mh hmh eSim beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 7:18	hbnim mlqTim ezim ohabot mberim at haS ohnSim lSot bzq leSot konim lmlkt hSmim ohsk nskim lalhim aHrim lmen hkesni׃ 
jeremiah 7:19	hati hm mkesim nam ihoh hloa atm lmen bSt pnihm׃ 
jeremiah 7:20	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnh api oHmti ntkt al hmqom hch el hadm oel hbhmh oel ez hSdh oel pri hadmh oberh ola tkbh׃ 
jeremiah 7:21	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral elotikm spo el cbHikm oaklo bSr׃ 
jeremiah 7:22	ki la dbrti at abotikm ola zoitim biom hozia aotm marz mzrim el dbri eolh ocbH׃ 
jeremiah 7:23	ki am at hdbr hch zoiti aotm lamr Smeo bqoli ohiiti lkm lalhim oatm thio li lem ohlktm bkl hdrk aSr azoh atkm lmen iiTb lkm׃ 
jeremiah 7:24	ola Smeo ola hTo at acnm oilko bmezot bSrrot lbm hre oihio laHor ola lpnim׃ 
jeremiah 7:25	lmn hiom aSr izao abotikm marz mzrim ed hiom hch oaSlH alikm at kl ebdi hnbiaim iom hSkm oSlH׃ 
jeremiah 7:26	oloa Smeo ali ola hTo at acnm oiqSo at erpm hreo mabotm׃ 
jeremiah 7:27	odbrt alihm at kl hdbrim halh ola iSmeo alik oqrat alihm ola ienokh׃ 
jeremiah 7:28	oamrt alihm ch hgoi aSr loa Smeo bqol ihoh alhio ola lqHo mosr abdh hamonh onkrth mpihm׃ 
jeremiah 7:29	gci ncrk ohSliki oSai el Spim qinh ki mas ihoh oiTS at dor ebrto׃ 
jeremiah 7:30	ki eSo bni ihodh hre beini naom ihoh Smo Sqozihm bbit aSr nqra Smi elio lTmao׃ 
jeremiah 7:31	obno bmot htpt aSr bgia bn hnm lSrp at bnihm oat bntihm baS aSr la zoiti ola elth el lbi׃ 
jeremiah 7:32	lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ola iamr eod htpt ogia bn hnm ki am gia hhrgh oqbro btpt main mqom׃ 
jeremiah 7:33	ohith nblt hem hch lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz oain mHrid׃ 
jeremiah 7:34	ohSbti meri ihodh omHzot iroSlm qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh ki lHrbh thih harz׃

jeremiah 8:3	onbHr mot mHiim lkl hSarit hnSarim mn hmSpHh hreh hcat bkl hmqmot hnSarim aSr hdHtim Sm nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
jeremiah 8:4	oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh hiplo ola iqomo am iSob ola iSob׃

jeremiah 9:6	Sbtk btok mrmh bmrmh mano det aoti nam ihoh׃

jeremiah 9:11	ontti at iroSlm lglim meon tnim oat eri ihodh atn Smmh mbli ioSb׃

jeremiah 9:13	oiamr ihoh el ecbm at torti aSr ntti lpnihm ola Smeo bqoli ola hlko bh׃ 
jeremiah 9:14	oilko aHri Srrot lbm oaHri hbelim aSr lmdom abotm׃ 
jeremiah 9:15	lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni makilm at hem hch lenh ohSqitim mi raS׃

jeremiah 9:17	kh amr ihoh zbaot htbonno oqrao lmqonnot otboainh oal hHkmot SlHo otboanh׃ 
jeremiah 9:18	otmhrnh otSnh elino nhi otrdnh einino dmeh oepepino iclo mim׃ 
jeremiah 9:19	ki qol nhi nSme mzion aik Sddno bSno mad ki ecbno arz ki hSliko mSknotino׃

jeremiah 9:21	ki elh mot bHlonino ba barmnotino lhkrit eoll mHoz bHorim mrHbot׃

jeremiah 9:25	hnh imim baim nam ihoh opqdti el kl mol berlh׃

jeremiah 10:4	bksp obchb iipho bmsmrot obmqbot iHcqom oloa ipiq׃ 
jeremiah 10:5	ktmr mqSh hmh ola idbro nSoa inSoa ki la izedo al tirao mhm ki la ireo ogm hiTib ain aotm׃ 
jeremiah 10:6	main kmok ihoh gdol ath ogdol Smk bgborh׃

jeremiah 10:14	nber kl adm mdet hbiS kl zorp mpsl ki Sqr nsko ola roH bm׃ 
jeremiah 10:15	hbl hmh meSh teteim bet pqdtm iabdo׃

jeremiah 10:19	aoi li el Sbri nHlh mkti oani amrti ak ch Hli oaSano׃ 
jeremiah 10:20	ahli Sdd okl mitri ntqo bni izani oainm ain nTh eod ahli omqim irieoti׃ 
jeremiah 10:21	ki nbero hreim oat ihoh la drSo el kn la hSkilo okl mreitm npozh׃ 
jeremiah 10:22	qol Smoeh hnh bah oreS gdol marz zpon lSom at eri ihodh Smmh meon tnim׃

jeremiah 13:19	eri hngb sgro oain ptH hglt ihodh klh hglt Slomim׃ 
jeremiah 13:20	Sai einikm orai hbaim mzpon aih hedr ntn lk zan tpartk׃

jeremiah 14:1	aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho el dbri hbzrot׃ 
jeremiah 14:2	ablh ihodh oSerih amllo qdro larz ozoHt iroSlm elth׃ 
jeremiah 14:3	oadrihm SlHo zeorihm lmim bao el gbim la mzao mim Sbo klihm riqm bSo ohklmo oHpo raSm׃ 
jeremiah 14:4	bebor hadmh Hth ki la hih gSm barz bSo akrim Hpo raSm׃ 
jeremiah 14:5	ki gm ailt bSdh ildh oecob ki la hih dSa׃ 
jeremiah 14:6	opraim emdo el Spim Sapo roH ktnim klo einihm ki ain eSb׃ 
jeremiah 14:7	am eonino eno bno ihoh eSh lmen Smk ki rbo mSobtino lk HTano׃ 
jeremiah 14:8	mqoh iSral moSieo bet zrh lmh thih kgr barz okarH nTh llon׃ 
jeremiah 14:9	lmh thih kaiS ndhm kgbor la iokl lhoSie oath bqrbno ihoh oSmk elino nqra al tnHno׃ 
jeremiah 14:10	kh amr ihoh lem hch kn ahbo lnoe rglihm la HSko oihoh la rzm eth ickr eonm oipqd HTatm׃ 
jeremiah 14:11	oiamr ihoh ali al ttpll bed hem hch lTobh׃ 
jeremiah 14:12	ki izmo ainni Sme al rntm oki ielo elh omnHh ainni rzm ki bHrb obreb obdbr anki mklh aotm׃ 
jeremiah 14:13	oamr ahh adni ihoh hnh hnbaim amrim lhm la trao Hrb oreb la ihih lkm ki Slom amt atn lkm bmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 14:14	oiamr ihoh ali Sqr hnbaim nbaim bSmi la SlHtim ola zoitim ola dbrti alihm Hcon Sqr oqsm oalol otrmot lbm hmh mtnbaim lkm׃ 
jeremiah 14:15	lkn kh amr ihoh el hnbaim hnbaim bSmi oani la SlHtim ohmh amrim Hrb oreb la ihih barz hcat bHrb obreb itmo hnbaim hhmh׃ 
jeremiah 14:16	ohem aSr hmh nbaim lhm ihio mSlkim bHzot iroSlm mpni hreb ohHrb oain mqbr lhmh hmh nSihm obnihm obntihm oSpkti elihm at retm׃ 
jeremiah 14:17	oamrt alihm at hdbr hch trdnh eini dmeh lilh oiomm oal tdminh ki Sbr gdol nSbrh btolt bt emi mkh nHlh mad׃ 
jeremiah 14:18	am izati hSdh ohnh Hlli Hrb oam bati heir ohnh tHloai reb ki gm nbia gm khn sHro al arz ola ideo׃ 
jeremiah 14:19	hmas mast at ihodh am bzion gelh npSk mdoe hkitno oain lno mrpa qoh lSlom oain Tob olet mrpa ohnh beth׃ 
jeremiah 14:20	ideno ihoh rSeno eon abotino ki HTano lk׃ 
jeremiah 14:21	al tnaz lmen Smk al tnbl ksa kbodk ckr al tpr britk atno׃ 
jeremiah 14:22	hiS bhbli hgoim mgSmim oam hSmim itno rbbim hla ath hoa ihoh alhino onqoh lk ki ath eSit at kl alh׃ 
jeremiah 15:1	oiamr ihoh ali am iemd mSh oSmoal lpni ain npSi al hem hch SlH mel pni oizao׃ 
jeremiah 15:2	ohih ki iamro alik anh nza oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh aSr lmot lmot oaSr lHrb lHrb oaSr lreb lreb oaSr lSbi lSbi׃ 
jeremiah 15:3	opqdti elihm arbe mSpHot nam ihoh at hHrb lhrg oat hklbim lsHb oat eop hSmim oat bhmt harz lakl olhSHit׃ 
jeremiah 15:4	onttim lcoeh lkl mmlkot harz bgll mnSh bn iHcqiho mlk ihodh el aSr eSh biroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 15:5	ki mi iHml elik iroSlm omi inod lk omi isor lSal lSlm lk׃ 
jeremiah 15:6	at nTSt ati nam ihoh aHor tlki oaT at idi elik oaSHitk nlaiti hnHm׃ 
jeremiah 15:7	oacrm bmcrh bSeri harz Sklti abdti at emi mdrkihm loa Sbo׃ 
jeremiah 15:8	ezmo li almnto mHol imim hbati lhm el am bHor Sdd bzhrim hplti elih ptam eir obhlot׃ 
jeremiah 15:9	amllh ildt hSbeh npHh npSh bah SmSh bed iomm boSh oHprh oSaritm lHrb atn lpni aibihm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 15:10	aoi li ami ki ildtni aiS rib oaiS mdon lkl harz la nSiti ola nSo bi klh mqlloni׃ 
jeremiah 15:11	amr ihoh am la Srotk lTob am loa hpgeti bk bet reh obet zrh at haib׃ 
jeremiah 15:12	hire brcl brcl mzpon onHSt׃ 
jeremiah 15:13	Hilk oaozrotik lbc atn la bmHir obkl HTaotik obkl gbolik׃ 
jeremiah 15:14	ohebrti at aibik barz la idet ki aS qdHh bapi elikm toqd׃ 
jeremiah 15:15	ath idet ihoh ckrni opqdni ohnqm li mrdpi al lark apk tqHni de Sati elik Hrph׃ 
jeremiah 15:16	nmzao dbrik oaklm oihi dbrik li lSSon olSmHt lbbi ki nqra Smk eli ihoh alhi zbaot׃ 
jeremiah 15:17	la iSbti bsod mSHqim oaelc mpni idk bdd iSbti ki cem mlatni׃ 
jeremiah 15:18	lmh hih kabi nzH omkti anoSh manh hrpa hio thih li kmo akcb mim la namno׃ 
jeremiah 15:19	lkn kh amr ihoh am tSob oaSibk lpni temd oam tozia iqr mcoll kpi thih iSbo hmh alik oath la tSob alihm׃

jeremiah 16:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
jeremiah 16:2	la tqH lk aSh ola ihio lk bnim obnot bmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 16:3	ki kh amr ihoh el hbnim oel hbnot hilodim bmqom hch oel amtm hildot aotm oel abotm hmoldim aotm barz hcat׃ 
jeremiah 16:4	mmoti tHlaim imto la ispdo ola iqbro ldmn el pni hadmh ihio obHrb obreb iklo ohith nbltm lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz׃ 
jeremiah 16:5	ki kh amr ihoh al tboa bit mrcH oal tlk lspod oal tnd lhm ki aspti at Slomi mat hem hch nam ihoh at hHsd oat hrHmim׃

jeremiah 16:9	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni mSbit mn hmqom hch leinikm obimikm qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh׃

jeremiah 21:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh bSlH alio hmlk zdqiho at pSHor bn mlkih oat zpnih bn meSih hkhn lamr׃ 
jeremiah 21:2	drS na bedno at ihoh ki nbokdrazr mlk bbl nlHm elino aoli ieSh ihoh aotno kkl nplatio oielh melino׃ 
jeremiah 21:3	oiamr irmiho alihm kh tamrn al zdqiho׃ 
jeremiah 21:4	kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hnni msb at kli hmlHmh aSr bidkm aSr atm nlHmim bm at mlk bbl oat hkSdim hzrim elikm mHoz lHomh oaspti aotm al tok heir hcat׃

jeremiah 21:8	oal hem hch tamr kh amr ihoh hnni ntn lpnikm at drk hHiim oat drk hmot׃ 
jeremiah 21:9	hiSb beir hcat imot bHrb obreb obdbr ohioza onpl el hkSdim hzrim elikm iHih ohith lo npSo lSll׃ 
jeremiah 21:10	ki Smti pni beir hcat lreh ola lTobh nam ihoh bid mlk bbl tntn oSrph baS׃ 
jeremiah 21:11	olbit mlk ihodh Smeo dbr ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 21:12	bit dod kh amr ihoh dino lbqr mSpT ohzilo gcol mid eoSq pn tza kaS Hmti oberh oain mkbh mpni re mellihm׃

jeremiah 22:1	kh amr ihoh rd bit mlk ihodh odbrt Sm at hdbr hch׃ 
jeremiah 22:2	oamrt Sme dbr ihoh mlk ihodh hiSb el ksa dod ath oebdik oemk hbaim bSerim halh׃ 
jeremiah 22:3	kh amr ihoh eSo mSpT ozdqh ohzilo gcol mid eSoq ogr itom oalmnh al tno al tHmso odm nqi al tSpko bmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 22:4	ki am eSo teSo at hdbr hch obao bSeri hbit hch mlkim iSbim ldod el ksao rkbim brkb obsosim hoa oebdo oemo׃ 
jeremiah 22:5	oam la tSmeo at hdbrim halh bi nSbeti nam ihoh ki lHrbh ihih hbit hch׃ 
jeremiah 22:6	ki kh amr ihoh el bit mlk ihodh gled ath li raS hlbnon am la aSitk mdbr erim la noSbh׃ 
jeremiah 22:7	oqdSti elik mSHtim aiS oklio okrto mbHr arcik ohpilo el haS׃ 
jeremiah 22:8	oebro goim rbim el heir hcat oamro aiS al reho el mh eSh ihoh kkh leir hgdolh hcat׃ 
jeremiah 22:9	oamro el aSr ecbo at brit ihoh alhihm oiStHoo lalhim aHrim oiebdom׃ 
jeremiah 22:10	al tbko lmt oal tndo lo bko bko lhlk ki la iSob eod orah at arz moldto׃ 
jeremiah 22:11	ki kh amr ihoh al Slm bn iaSiho mlk ihodh hmlk tHt iaSiho abio aSr iza mn hmqom hch la iSob Sm eod׃ 
jeremiah 22:12	ki bmqom aSr hglo ato Sm imot oat harz hcat la irah eod׃ 
jeremiah 22:13	hoi bnh bito bla zdq oeliotio bla mSpT breho iebd Hnm opelo la itn lo׃ 
jeremiah 22:14	hamr abnh li bit mdot oeliot mroHim oqre lo Hloni ospon barc omSoH bSSr׃ 
jeremiah 22:15	htmlk ki ath mtHrh barc abik hloa akl oSth oeSh mSpT ozdqh ac Tob lo׃ 
jeremiah 22:16	dn din eni oabion ac Tob hloa hia hdet ati nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 22:17	ki ain einik olbk ki am el bzek oel dm hnqi lSpok oel heSq oel hmrozh leSot׃ 
jeremiah 22:18	lkn kh amr ihoh al ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh la ispdo lo hoi aHi ohoi aHot la ispdo lo hoi adon ohoi hdh׃ 
jeremiah 22:19	qbort Hmor iqbr sHob ohSlk mhlah lSeri iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 22:20	eli hlbnon ozeqi obbSn tni qolk ozeqi mebrim ki nSbro kl mahbik׃ 
jeremiah 22:21	dbrti alik bSlotik amrt la aSme ch drkk mneorik ki la Smet bqoli׃ 
jeremiah 22:22	kl reik treh roH omahbik bSbi ilko ki ac tbSi onklmt mkl retk׃ 
jeremiah 22:23	iSbti blbnon mqnnti barcim mh nHnt bba lk Hblim Hil kildh׃ 
jeremiah 22:24	Hi ani nam ihoh ki am ihih kniho bn ihoiqim mlk ihodh Hotm el id imini ki mSm atqnk׃ 
jeremiah 22:25	onttik bid mbqSi npSk obid aSr ath igor mpnihm obid nbokdrazr mlk bbl obid hkSdim׃
