jeremiah 29:8	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral al iSiao lkm nbiaikm aSr bqrbkm oqsmikm oal tSmeo al Hlmtikm aSr atm mHlmim׃ 
jeremiah 29:9	ki bSqr hm nbaim lkm bSmi la SlHtim nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 29:10	ki kh amr ihoh ki lpi mlat lbbl Sbeim Snh apqd atkm ohqmti elikm at dbri hTob lhSib atkm al hmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 29:11	ki anki ideti at hmHSbt aSr anki HSb elikm nam ihoh mHSbot Slom ola lreh ltt lkm aHrit otqoh׃ 
jeremiah 29:12	oqratm ati ohlktm ohtplltm ali oSmeti alikm׃ 
jeremiah 29:13	obqStm ati omzatm ki tdrSni bkl lbbkm׃ 
jeremiah 29:14	onmzati lkm nam ihoh oSbti at Sbitkm oqbzti atkm mkl hgoim omkl hmqomot aSr hdHti atkm Sm nam ihoh ohSbti atkm al hmqom aSr hgliti atkm mSm׃ 
jeremiah 29:15	ki amrtm hqim lno ihoh nbaim bblh׃ 
jeremiah 29:16	ki kh amr ihoh al hmlk hioSb al ksa dod oal kl hem hioSb beir hcat aHikm aSr la izao atkm bgolh׃ 
jeremiah 29:17	kh amr ihoh zbaot hnni mSlH bm at hHrb at hreb oat hdbr ontti aotm ktanim hSerim aSr la taklnh mre׃ 
jeremiah 29:18	ordpti aHrihm bHrb breb obdbr onttim lcoeh lkl mmlkot harz lalh olSmh olSrqh olHrph bkl hgoim aSr hdHtim Sm׃ 
jeremiah 29:19	tHt aSr la Smeo al dbri nam ihoh aSr SlHti alihm at ebdi hnbaim hSkm oSlH ola Smetm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 29:20	oatm Smeo dbr ihoh kl hgolh aSr SlHti miroSlm bblh׃ 
jeremiah 29:21	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral al aHab bn qolih oal zdqiho bn meSih hnbaim lkm bSmi Sqr hnni ntn atm bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl ohkm leinikm׃ 
jeremiah 29:22	olqH mhm qllh lkl glot ihodh aSr bbbl lamr iSmk ihoh kzdqiho okaHb aSr qlm mlk bbl baS׃ 
jeremiah 29:23	ien aSr eSo nblh biSral oinapo at nSi reihm oidbro dbr bSmi Sqr aSr loa zoitm oanki hoide oed nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 29:24	oal Smeiho hnHlmi tamr lamr׃ 
jeremiah 29:25	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lamr ien aSr ath SlHt bSmkh sprim al kl hem aSr biroSlm oal zpnih bn meSih hkhn oal kl hkhnim lamr׃ 
jeremiah 29:26	ihoh ntnk khn tHt ihoide hkhn lhiot pqdim bit ihoh lkl aiS mSge omtnba ontth ato al hmhpkt oal hzinq׃ 
jeremiah 29:27	oeth lmh la gert birmiho hentti hmtnba lkm׃ 
jeremiah 29:28	ki el kn SlH alino bbl lamr arkh hia bno btim oSbo onTeo gnot oaklo at prihn׃ 
jeremiah 29:29	oiqra zpnih hkhn at hspr hch bacni irmiho hnbia׃ 
jeremiah 29:30	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr׃ 
jeremiah 29:31	SlH el kl hgolh lamr kh amr ihoh al Smeih hnHlmi ien aSr nba lkm Smeih oani la SlHtio oibTH atkm el Sqr׃ 
jeremiah 29:32	lkn kh amr ihoh hnni pqd el Smeih hnHlmi oel creo la ihih lo aiS ioSb btok hem hch ola irah bTob aSr ani eSh lemi nam ihoh ki srh dbr el ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 30:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 30:2	kh amr ihoh alhi iSral lamr ktb lk at kl hdbrim aSr dbrti alik al spr׃ 
jeremiah 30:3	ki hnh imim baim nam ihoh oSbti at Sbot emi iSral oihodh amr ihoh ohSbtim al harz aSr ntti labotm oirSoh׃ 
jeremiah 30:4	oalh hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh al iSral oal ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 30:5	ki kh amr ihoh qol Hrdh Smeno pHd oain Slom׃ 
jeremiah 30:6	Salo na orao am ild ckr mdoe raiti kl gbr idio el Hlzio kioldh onhpko kl pnim lirqon׃ 
jeremiah 30:7	hoi ki gdol hiom hhoa main kmho oet zrh hia lieqb ommnh ioSe׃ 
jeremiah 30:8	ohih biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot aSbr elo mel zoark omosrotik antq ola iebdo bo eod crim׃ 
jeremiah 30:9	oebdo at ihoh alhihm oat dod mlkm aSr aqim lhm׃ 
jeremiah 30:10	oath al tira ebdi ieqb nam ihoh oal tHt iSral ki hnni moSiek mrHoq oat crek marz Sbim oSb ieqb oSqT oSann oain mHrid׃ 
jeremiah 30:11	ki atk ani nam ihoh lhoSiek ki aeSh klh bkl hgoim aSr hpzotik Sm ak atk la aeSh klh oisrtik lmSpT onqh la anqk׃ 
jeremiah 30:12	ki kh amr ihoh anoS lSbrk nHlh mktk׃ 
jeremiah 30:13	ain dn dink lmcor rpaot telh ain lk׃ 
jeremiah 30:14	kl mahbik SkHok aotk la idrSo ki mkt aoib hkitik mosr akcri el rb eonk ezmo HTatik׃ 
jeremiah 30:15	mh tceq el Sbrk anoS mkabk el rb eonk ezmo HTatik eSiti alh lk׃ 
jeremiah 30:16	lkn kl aklik iaklo okl zrik klm bSbi ilko ohio Sasik lmSsh okl bccik atn lbc׃ 
jeremiah 30:17	ki aelh arkh lk ommkotik arpak nam ihoh ki ndHh qrao lk zion hia drS ain lh׃ 
jeremiah 30:18	kh amr ihoh hnni Sb Sbot ahli ieqob omSkntio arHm onbnth eir el tlh oarmon el mSpTo iSb׃ 
jeremiah 30:19	oiza mhm todh oqol mSHqim ohrbtim ola imeTo ohkbdtim ola izero׃ 
jeremiah 30:20	ohio bnio kqdm oedto lpni tkon opqdti el kl lHzio׃ 
jeremiah 30:21	ohih adiro mmno omSlo mqrbo iza ohqrbtio ongS ali ki mi hoa ch erb at lbo lgSt ali nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 30:22	ohiitm li lem oanki ahih lkm lalhim׃ 
jeremiah 30:23	hnh sert ihoh Hmh izah ser mtgorr el raS rSeim iHol׃ 
jeremiah 30:24	la iSob Hron ap ihoh ed eSto oed hqimo mcmot lbo baHrit himim ttbonno bh׃ 
jeremiah 31:1	bet hhia nam ihoh ahih lalhim lkl mSpHot iSral ohmh ihio li lem׃ 
jeremiah 31:2	kh amr ihoh mza Hn bmdbr em Sridi Hrb hlok lhrgieo iSral׃ 
jeremiah 31:3	mrHoq ihoh nrah li oahbt eolm ahbtik el kn mSktik Hsd׃ 
jeremiah 31:4	eod abnk onbnit btolt iSral eod tedi tpik oizat bmHol mSHqim׃ 
jeremiah 31:5	eod tTei krmim bhri Smron nTeo nTeim oHllo׃ 
jeremiah 31:6	ki iS iom qrao nzrim bhr aprim qomo onelh zion al ihoh alhino׃ 
jeremiah 31:7	ki kh amr ihoh rno lieqb SmHh ozhlo braS hgoim hSmieo hllo oamro hoSe ihoh at emk at Sarit iSral׃ 
jeremiah 31:8	hnni mbia aotm marz zpon oqbztim mirkti arz bm eor opsH hrh oildt iHdo qhl gdol iSobo hnh׃ 
jeremiah 31:9	bbki ibao obtHnonim aobilm aolikm al nHli mim bdrk iSr la ikSlo bh ki hiiti liSral lab oaprim bkri hoa׃ 
jeremiah 31:10	Smeo dbr ihoh goim ohgido baiim mmrHq oamro mcrh iSral iqbzno oSmro kreh edro׃ 
jeremiah 31:11	ki pdh ihoh at ieqb ogalo mid Hcq mmno׃ 
jeremiah 31:12	obao ornno bmrom zion onhro al Tob ihoh el dgn oel tirS oel izhr oel bni zan obqr ohith npSm kgn roh ola iosipo ldabh eod׃ 
jeremiah 31:13	ac tSmH btolh bmHol obHrim ocqnim iHdo ohpkti ablm lSSon onHmtim oSmHtim migonm׃ 
jeremiah 31:14	oroiti npS hkhnim dSn oemi at Tobi iSbeo nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 31:15	kh amr ihoh qol brmh nSme nhi bki tmrorim rHl mbkh el bnih manh lhnHm el bnih ki ainno׃ 
jeremiah 31:16	kh amr ihoh mnei qolk mbki oeinik mdmeh ki iS Skr lpeltk nam ihoh oSbo marz aoib׃ 
jeremiah 31:17	oiS tqoh laHritk nam ihoh oSbo bnim lgbolm׃ 
jeremiah 31:18	Smoe Smeti aprim mtnodd isrtni oaosr kegl la lmd hSbni oaSobh ki ath ihoh alhi׃ 
jeremiah 31:19	ki aHri Sobi nHmti oaHri hodei spqti el irk bSti ogm nklmti ki nSati Hrpt neori׃ 
jeremiah 31:20	hbn iqir li aprim am ild SeSoeim ki mdi dbri bo ckr ackrno eod el kn hmo mei lo rHm arHmno nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 31:21	hzibi lk zinim Smi lk tmrorim Sti lbk lmslh drk hlkti Sobi btolt iSral Sbi al erik alh׃ 
jeremiah 31:22	ed mti ttHmqin hbt hSobbh ki bra ihoh HdSh barz nqbh tsobb gbr׃ 
jeremiah 31:23	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral eod iamro at hdbr hch barz ihodh oberio bSobi at Sbotm ibrkk ihoh noh zdq hr hqdS׃ 
jeremiah 31:24	oiSbo bh ihodh okl erio iHdo akrim onseo bedr׃ 
jeremiah 31:25	ki hroiti npS eiph okl npS dabh mlati׃ 
jeremiah 31:26	el cat hqizti oarah oSnti erbh li׃ 
jeremiah 31:27	hnh imim baim nam ihoh ocreti at bit iSral oat bit ihodh cre adm ocre bhmh׃ 
jeremiah 31:28	ohih kaSr Sqdti elihm lntoS olntoz olhrs olhabid olhre kn aSqd elihm lbnot olnToe nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 31:29	bimim hhm la iamro eod abot aklo bsr oSni bnim tqhinh׃ 
jeremiah 31:30	ki am aiS beono imot kl hadm hakl hbsr tqhinh Snio׃ 
jeremiah 31:31	hnh imim baim nam ihoh okrti at bit iSral oat bit ihodh brit HdSh׃ 
jeremiah 31:32	la kbrit aSr krti at abotm biom hHciqi bidm lhoziam marz mzrim aSr hmh hpro at briti oanki belti bm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 31:33	ki cat hbrit aSr akrt at bit iSral aHri himim hhm nam ihoh ntti at torti bqrbm oel lbm aktbnh ohiiti lhm lalhim ohmh ihio li lem׃ 
jeremiah 31:34	ola ilmdo eod aiS at reho oaiS at aHio lamr deo at ihoh ki kolm ideo aoti lmqTnm oed gdolm nam ihoh ki aslH leonm olHTatm la ackr eod׃ 
jeremiah 31:35	kh amr ihoh ntn SmS laor iomm Hqt irH okokbim laor lilh rge him oihmo glio ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
jeremiah 31:36	am imSo hHqim halh mlpni nam ihoh gm cre iSral iSbto mhiot goi lpni kl himim׃ 
jeremiah 31:37	kh amr ihoh am imdo Smim mlmelh oiHqro mosdi arz lmTh gm ani amas bkl cre iSral el kl aSr eSo nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 31:38	hnh imim nam ihoh onbnth heir lihoh mmgdl Hnnal Ser hpnh׃ 
jeremiah 31:39	oiza eod qoh hmdh ngdo el gbet grb onsb geth׃ 
jeremiah 31:40	okl hemq hpgrim ohdSn okl hSrmot ed nHl qdron ed pnt Ser hsosim mcrHh qdS lihoh la intS ola ihrs eod leolm׃ 
jeremiah 32:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh bSnt heSrit lzdqiho mlk ihodh hia hSnh Smnh eSrh Snh lnbokdrazr׃ 
jeremiah 32:2	oac Hil mlk bbl zrim el iroSlm oirmiho hnbia hih kloa bHzr hmTrh aSr bit mlk ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 32:3	aSr klao zdqiho mlk ihodh lamr mdoe ath nba lamr kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at heir hcat bid mlk bbl olkdh׃ 
jeremiah 32:4	ozdqiho mlk ihodh la imlT mid hkSdim ki hntn intn bid mlk bbl odbr pio em pio oeinio at eino trainh׃ 
jeremiah 32:5	obbl iolk at zdqiho oSm ihih ed pqdi ato nam ihoh ki tlHmo at hkSdim la tzliHo׃ 
jeremiah 32:6	oiamr irmiho hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
jeremiah 32:7	hnh Hnmal bn Slm ddk ba alik lamr qnh lk at Sdi aSr bentot ki lk mSpT hgalh lqnot׃ 
jeremiah 32:8	oiba ali Hnmal bn ddi kdbr ihoh al Hzr hmTrh oiamr ali qnh na at Sdi aSr bentot aSr barz bnimin ki lk mSpT hirSh olk hgalh qnh lk oade ki dbr ihoh hoa׃ 
jeremiah 32:9	oaqnh at hSdh mat Hnmal bn ddi aSr bentot oaSqlh lo at hksp Sbeh Sqlim oeSrh hksp׃ 
jeremiah 32:10	oaktb bspr oaHtm oaed edim oaSql hksp bmacnim׃ 
jeremiah 32:11	oaqH at spr hmqnh at hHtom hmzoh ohHqim oat hgloi׃ 
jeremiah 32:12	oatn at hspr hmqnh al brok bn nrih bn mHsih leini Hnmal ddi oleini hedim hktbim bspr hmqnh leini kl hihodim hiSbim bHzr hmTrh׃ 
jeremiah 32:13	oazoh at brok leinihm lamr׃ 
jeremiah 32:14	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lqoH at hsprim halh at spr hmqnh hch oat hHtom oat spr hgloi hch onttm bkli HrS lmen iemdo imim rbim׃ 
jeremiah 32:15	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral eod iqno btim oSdot okrmim barz hcat׃ 
jeremiah 32:16	oatpll al ihoh aHri tti at spr hmqnh al brok bn nrih lamr׃ 
jeremiah 32:17	ahh adni ihoh hnh ath eSit at hSmim oat harz bkHk hgdol obcrek hnToih la ipla mmk kl dbr׃ 
jeremiah 32:18	eSh Hsd lalpim omSlm eon abot al Hiq bnihm aHrihm hal hgdol hgbor ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
jeremiah 32:19	gdl hezh orb helilih aSr einik pqHot el kl drki bni adm ltt laiS kdrkio okpri mellio׃ 
jeremiah 32:20	aSr Smt atot omptim barz mzrim ed hiom hch obiSral obadm oteSh lk Sm kiom hch׃ 
jeremiah 32:21	otza at emk at iSral marz mzrim batot obmoptim obid Hcqh obacroe nToih obmora gdol׃ 
jeremiah 32:22	ottn lhm at harz hcat aSr nSbet labotm ltt lhm arz cbt Hlb odbS׃ 
jeremiah 32:23	oibao oirSo ath ola Smeo bqolk obtrotk la hlko at kl aSr zoith lhm leSot la eSo otqra atm at kl hreh hcat׃ 
jeremiah 32:24	hnh hsllot bao heir llkdh oheir ntnh bid hkSdim hnlHmim elih mpni hHrb ohreb ohdbr oaSr dbrt hih ohnk rah׃ 
jeremiah 32:25	oath amrt ali adni ihoh qnh lk hSdh bksp ohed edim oheir ntnh bid hkSdim׃ 
jeremiah 32:26	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr׃ 
jeremiah 32:27	hnh ani ihoh alhi kl bSr hmmni ipla kl dbr׃ 
jeremiah 32:28	lkn kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at heir hcat bid hkSdim obid nbokdrazr mlk bbl olkdh׃ 
jeremiah 32:29	obao hkSdim hnlHmim el heir hcat ohzito at heir hcat baS oSrpoh oat hbtim aSr qTro el ggotihm lbel ohsko nskim lalhim aHrim lmen hkesni׃ 
jeremiah 32:30	ki hio bni iSral obni ihodh ak eSim hre beini mnertihm ki bni iSral ak mkesim ati bmeSh idihm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 32:31	ki el api oel Hmti hith li heir hcat lmn hiom aSr bno aoth oed hiom hch lhsirh mel pni׃ 
jeremiah 32:32	el kl ret bni iSral obni ihodh aSr eSo lhkesni hmh mlkihm Srihm khnihm onbiaihm oaiS ihodh oiSbi iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 32:33	oipno ali erp ola pnim olmd atm hSkm olmd oainm Smeim lqHt mosr׃ 
jeremiah 32:34	oiSimo Sqozihm bbit aSr nqra Smi elio lTmao׃ 
jeremiah 32:35	oibno at bmot hbel aSr bgia bn hnm lhebir at bnihm oat bnotihm lmlk aSr la zoitim ola elth el lbi leSot htoebh hcat lmen hHTi at ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 32:36	oeth lkn kh amr ihoh alhi iSral al heir hcat aSr atm amrim ntnh bid mlk bbl bHrb obreb obdbr׃ 
jeremiah 32:37	hnni mqbzm mkl harzot aSr hdHtim Sm bapi obHmti obqzp gdol ohSbtim al hmqom hch ohSbtim lbTH׃ 
jeremiah 32:38	ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim׃ 
jeremiah 32:39	ontti lhm lb aHd odrk aHd lirah aoti kl himim lTob lhm olbnihm aHrihm׃ 
jeremiah 32:40	okrti lhm brit eolm aSr la aSob maHrihm lhiTibi aotm oat irati atn blbbm lblti sor meli׃ 
jeremiah 32:41	oSSti elihm lhTib aotm onTetim barz hcat bamt bkl lbi obkl npSi׃ 
jeremiah 32:42	ki kh amr ihoh kaSr hbati al hem hch at kl hreh hgdolh hcat kn anki mbia elihm at kl hTobh aSr anki dbr elihm׃ 
jeremiah 32:43	onqnh hSdh barz hcat aSr atm amrim Smmh hia main adm obhmh ntnh bid hkSdim׃ 
jeremiah 32:44	Sdot bksp iqno oktob bspr oHtom ohed edim barz bnimn obsbibi iroSlm oberi ihodh oberi hhr oberi hSplh oberi hngb ki aSib at Sbotm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 33:1	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho Snit ohoa eodno ezor bHzr hmTrh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 33:2	kh amr ihoh eSh ihoh iozr aoth lhkinh ihoh Smo׃ 
jeremiah 33:3	qra ali oaenk oagidh lk gdlot obzrot la idetm׃ 
jeremiah 33:4	ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral el bti heir hcat oel bti mlki ihodh hntzim al hsllot oal hHrb׃ 
jeremiah 33:5	baim lhlHm at hkSdim olmlam at pgri hadm aSr hkiti bapi obHmti oaSr hstrti pni mheir hcat el kl retm׃ 
jeremiah 33:6	hnni melh lh arkh omrpa orpatim ogliti lhm etrt Slom oamt׃ 
jeremiah 33:7	ohSbti at Sbot ihodh oat Sbot iSral obntim kbraSnh׃ 
jeremiah 33:8	oThrtim mkl eonm aSr HTao li oslHti lkol eonotihm aSr HTao li oaSr pSeo bi׃ 
jeremiah 33:9	ohith li lSm SSon lthlh oltpart lkl goii harz aSr iSmeo at kl hTobh aSr anki eSh atm opHdo orgco el kl hTobh oel kl hSlom aSr anki eSh lh׃ 
jeremiah 33:10	kh amr ihoh eod iSme bmqom hch aSr atm amrim Hrb hoa main adm omain bhmh beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm hnSmot main adm omain ioSb omain bhmh׃ 
jeremiah 33:11	qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh qol amrim hodo at ihoh zbaot ki Tob ihoh ki leolm Hsdo mbaim todh bit ihoh ki aSib at Sbot harz kbraSnh amr ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 33:12	kh amr ihoh zbaot eod ihih bmqom hch hHrb main adm oed bhmh obkl erio noh reim mrbzim zan׃ 
jeremiah 33:13	beri hhr beri hSplh oberi hngb obarz bnimn obsbibi iroSlm oberi ihodh ed tebrnh hzan el idi monh amr ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 33:14	hnh imim baim nam ihoh ohqmti at hdbr hTob aSr dbrti al bit iSral oel bit ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 33:15	bimim hhm obet hhia azmiH ldod zmH zdqh oeSh mSpT ozdqh barz׃ 
jeremiah 33:16	bimim hhm toSe ihodh oiroSlm tSkon lbTH och aSr iqra lh ihoh zdqno׃ 
jeremiah 33:17	ki kh amr ihoh la ikrt ldod aiS iSb el ksa bit iSral׃ 
jeremiah 33:18	olkhnim hloim la ikrt aiS mlpni melh eolh omqTir mnHh oeSh cbH kl himim׃ 
jeremiah 33:19	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamor׃ 
jeremiah 33:20	kh amr ihoh am tpro at briti hiom oat briti hlilh olblti hiot iomm olilh betm׃ 
jeremiah 33:21	gm briti tpr at dod ebdi mhiot lo bn mlk el ksao oat hloim hkhnim mSrti׃ 
jeremiah 33:22	aSr la ispr zba hSmim ola imd Hol him kn arbh at cre dod ebdi oat hloim mSrti ati׃ 
jeremiah 33:23	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr׃ 
jeremiah 33:24	hloa rait mh hem hch dbro lamr Sti hmSpHot aSr bHr ihoh bhm oimasm oat emi inazon mhiot eod goi lpnihm׃ 
jeremiah 33:25	kh amr ihoh am la briti iomm olilh Hqot Smim oarz la Smti׃ 
jeremiah 33:26	gm cre ieqob odod ebdi amas mqHt mcreo mSlim al cre abrhm iSHq oieqb ki aSob at Sbotm orHmtim׃ 
jeremiah 34:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh onbokdrazr mlk bbl okl Hilo okl mmlkot arz mmSlt ido okl hemim nlHmim el iroSlm oel kl erih lamr׃ 
jeremiah 34:2	kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hlk oamrt al zdqiho mlk ihodh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at heir hcat bid mlk bbl oSrph baS׃ 
jeremiah 34:3	oath la tmlT mido ki tpS ttpS obido tntn oeinik at eini mlk bbl trainh opiho at pik idbr obbl tboa׃ 
jeremiah 34:4	ak Sme dbr ihoh zdqiho mlk ihodh kh amr ihoh elik la tmot bHrb׃ 
jeremiah 34:5	bSlom tmot okmSrpot abotik hmlkim hraSnim aSr hio lpnik kn iSrpo lk ohoi adon ispdo lk ki dbr ani dbrti nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 34:6	oidbr irmiho hnbia al zdqiho mlk ihodh at kl hdbrim halh biroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 34:7	oHil mlk bbl nlHmim el iroSlm oel kl eri ihodh hnotrot al lkiS oal ecqh ki hnh nSaro beri ihodh eri mbzr׃ 
jeremiah 34:8	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh aHri krt hmlk zdqiho brit at kl hem aSr biroSlm lqra lhm dror׃ 
jeremiah 34:9	lSlH aiS at ebdo oaiS at SpHto hebri ohebrih HpSim lblti ebd bm bihodi aHiho aiS׃ 
jeremiah 34:10	oiSmeo kl hSrim okl hem aSr bao bbrit lSlH aiS at ebdo oaiS at SpHto HpSim lblti ebd bm eod oiSmeo oiSlHo׃ 
jeremiah 34:11	oiSobo aHri kn oiSbo at hebdim oat hSpHot aSr SlHo HpSim oikbiSom lebdim olSpHot׃ 
jeremiah 34:12	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho mat ihoh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 34:13	kh amr ihoh alhi iSral anki krti brit at abotikm biom hozai aotm marz mzrim mbit ebdim lamr׃ 
jeremiah 34:14	mqz Sbe Snim tSlHo aiS at aHio hebri aSr imkr lk oebdk SS Snim oSlHto HpSi memk ola Smeo abotikm ali ola hTo at acnm׃ 
jeremiah 34:15	otSbo atm hiom oteSo at hiSr beini lqra dror aiS lreho otkrto brit lpni bbit aSr nqra Smi elio׃ 
jeremiah 34:16	otSbo otHllo at Smi otSbo aiS at ebdo oaiS at SpHto aSr SlHtm HpSim lnpSm otkbSo atm lhiot lkm lebdim olSpHot׃ 
jeremiah 34:17	lkn kh amr ihoh atm la Smetm ali lqra dror aiS laHio oaiS lreho hnni qra lkm dror nam ihoh al hHrb al hdbr oal hreb ontti atkm lcoeh lkl mmlkot harz׃ 
jeremiah 34:18	ontti at hanSim hebrim at brti aSr la hqimo at dbri hbrit aSr krto lpni hegl aSr krto lSnim oiebro bin btrio׃ 
jeremiah 34:19	Sri ihodh oSri iroSlm hsrsim ohkhnim okl em harz hebrim bin btri hegl׃ 
jeremiah 34:20	ontti aotm bid aibihm obid mbqSi npSm ohith nbltm lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz׃ 
jeremiah 34:21	oat zdqiho mlk ihodh oat Srio atn bid aibihm obid mbqSi npSm obid Hil mlk bbl helim melikm׃ 
jeremiah 34:22	hnni mzoh nam ihoh ohSbtim al heir hcat onlHmo elih olkdoh oSrph baS oat eri ihodh atn Smmh main iSb׃ 
jeremiah 35:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh bimi ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 35:2	hlok al bit hrkbim odbrt aotm ohbaotm bit ihoh al aHt hlSkot ohSqit aotm iin׃ 
jeremiah 35:3	oaqH at iacnih bn irmiho bn Hbznih oat aHio oat kl bnio oat kl bit hrkbim׃ 
jeremiah 35:4	oaba atm bit ihoh al lSkt bni Hnn bn igdliho aiS halhim aSr azl lSkt hSrim aSr mmel llSkt meSiho bn Slm Smr hsp׃ 
jeremiah 35:5	oatn lpni bni bit hrkbim gbeim mlaim iin oksot oamr alihm Sto iin׃ 
jeremiah 35:6	oiamro la nSth iin ki iondb bn rkb abino zoh elino lamr la tSto iin atm obnikm ed eolm׃ 
jeremiah 35:7	obit la tbno ocre la tcreo okrm la tTeo ola ihih lkm ki bahlim tSbo kl imikm lmen tHio imim rbim el pni hadmh aSr atm grim Sm׃ 
jeremiah 35:8	onSme bqol ihondb bn rkb abino lkl aSr zono lblti Stot iin kl imino anHno nSino bnino obntino׃ 
jeremiah 35:9	olblti bnot btim lSbtno okrm oSdh ocre la ihih lno׃ 
jeremiah 35:10	onSb bahlim onSme oneS kkl aSr zono iondb abino׃ 
jeremiah 35:11	oihi belot nbokdrazr mlk bbl al harz onamr bao onboa iroSlm mpni Hil hkSdim ompni Hil arm onSb biroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 35:12	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr׃ 
jeremiah 35:13	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hlk oamrt laiS ihodh olioSbi iroSlm hloa tqHo mosr lSme al dbri nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 35:14	hoqm at dbri ihondb bn rkb aSr zoh at bnio lblti Stot iin ola Sto ed hiom hch ki Smeo at mzot abihm oanki dbrti alikm hSkm odbr ola Smetm ali׃ 
jeremiah 35:15	oaSlH alikm at kl ebdi hnbaim hSkim oSlH lamr Sbo na aiS mdrko hreh ohiTibo mellikm oal tlko aHri alhim aHrim lebdm oSbo al hadmh aSr ntti lkm olabtikm ola hTitm at acnkm ola Smetm ali׃ 
jeremiah 35:16	ki hqimo bni ihondb bn rkb at mzot abihm aSr zom ohem hch la Smeo ali׃ 
jeremiah 35:17	lkn kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot alhi iSral hnni mbia al ihodh oal kl ioSbi iroSlm at kl hreh aSr dbrti elihm ien dbrti alihm ola Smeo oaqra lhm ola eno׃ 
jeremiah 35:18	olbit hrkbim amr irmiho kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral ien aSr Smetm el mzot ihondb abikm otSmro at kl mzotio oteSo kkl aSr zoh atkm׃ 
jeremiah 35:19	lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral la ikrt aiS liondb bn rkb emd lpni kl himim׃ 
jeremiah 36:1	oihi bSnh hrbiet lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh hih hdbr hch al irmiho mat ihoh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 36:2	qH lk mglt spr oktbt alih at kl hdbrim aSr dbrti alik el iSral oel ihodh oel kl hgoim miom dbrti alik mimi iaSiho oed hiom hch׃ 
jeremiah 36:3	aoli iSmeo bit ihodh at kl hreh aSr anki HSb leSot lhm lmen iSobo aiS mdrko hreh oslHti leonm olHTatm׃ 
jeremiah 36:4	oiqra irmiho at brok bn nrih oiktb brok mpi irmiho at kl dbri ihoh aSr dbr alio el mglt spr׃ 
jeremiah 36:5	oizoh irmiho at brok lamr ani ezor la aokl lboa bit ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 36:6	obat ath oqrat bmglh aSr ktbt mpi at dbri ihoh bacni hem bit ihoh biom zom ogm bacni kl ihodh hbaim merihm tqram׃ 
jeremiah 36:7	aoli tpl tHntm lpni ihoh oiSbo aiS mdrko hreh ki gdol hap ohHmh aSr dbr ihoh al hem hch׃ 
jeremiah 36:8	oieS brok bn nrih kkl aSr zoho irmiho hnbia lqra bspr dbri ihoh bit ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 36:9	oihi bSnh hHmSit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh bHdS htSei qrao zom lpni ihoh kl hem biroSlm okl hem hbaim meri ihodh biroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 36:10	oiqra brok bspr at dbri irmiho bit ihoh blSkt gmriho bn Spn hspr bHzr helion ptH Ser bit ihoh hHdS bacni kl hem׃ 
jeremiah 36:11	oiSme mkiho bn gmriho bn Spn at kl dbri ihoh mel hspr׃ 
jeremiah 36:12	oird bit hmlk el lSkt hspr ohnh Sm kl hSrim ioSbim aliSme hspr odliho bn Smeiho oalntn bn ekbor ogmriho bn Spn ozdqiho bn Hnniho okl hSrim׃ 
jeremiah 36:13	oigd lhm mkiho at kl hdbrim aSr Sme bqra brok bspr bacni hem׃ 
jeremiah 36:14	oiSlHo kl hSrim al brok at ihodi bn ntniho bn Slmiho bn koSi lamr hmglh aSr qrat bh bacni hem qHnh bidk olk oiqH brok bn nriho at hmglh bido oiba alihm׃ 
jeremiah 36:15	oiamro alio Sb na oqranh bacnino oiqra brok bacnihm׃ 
jeremiah 36:16	oihi kSmem at kl hdbrim pHdo aiS al reho oiamro al brok hgid ngid lmlk at kl hdbrim halh׃ 
jeremiah 36:17	oat brok Salo lamr hgd na lno aik ktbt at kl hdbrim halh mpio׃ 
jeremiah 36:18	oiamr lhm brok mpio iqra ali at kl hdbrim halh oani ktb el hspr bdio׃ 
jeremiah 36:19	oiamro hSrim al brok lk hstr ath oirmiho oaiS al ide aiph atm׃ 
jeremiah 36:20	oibao al hmlk Hzrh oat hmglh hpqdo blSkt aliSme hspr oigido bacni hmlk at kl hdbrim׃ 
jeremiah 36:21	oiSlH hmlk at ihodi lqHt at hmglh oiqHh mlSkt aliSme hspr oiqrah ihodi bacni hmlk obacni kl hSrim hemdim mel hmlk׃ 
jeremiah 36:22	ohmlk ioSb bit hHrp bHdS htSiei oat haH lpnio mbert׃ 
jeremiah 36:23	oihi kqroa ihodi SlS dltot oarbeh iqreh bter hspr ohSlk al haS aSr al haH ed tm kl hmglh el haS aSr el haH׃ 
jeremiah 36:24	ola pHdo ola qreo at bgdihm hmlk okl ebdio hSmeim at kl hdbrim halh׃ 
jeremiah 36:25	ogm alntn odliho ogmriho hpgeo bmlk lblti Srp at hmglh ola Sme alihm׃ 
jeremiah 36:26	oizoh hmlk at irHmal bn hmlk oat Sriho bn ecrial oat Slmiho bn ebdal lqHt at brok hspr oat irmiho hnbia oistrm ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 36:27	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho aHri Srp hmlk at hmglh oat hdbrim aSr ktb brok mpi irmiho lamr׃ 
jeremiah 36:28	Sob qH lk mglh aHrt oktb elih at kl hdbrim hraSnim aSr hio el hmglh hraSnh aSr Srp ihoiqim mlk ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 36:29	oel ihoiqim mlk ihodh tamr kh amr ihoh ath Srpt at hmglh hcat lamr mdoe ktbt elih lamr ba iboa mlk bbl ohSHit at harz hcat ohSbit mmnh adm obhmh׃ 
jeremiah 36:30	lkn kh amr ihoh el ihoiqim mlk ihodh la ihih lo ioSb el ksa dod onblto thih mSlkt lHrb biom olqrH blilh׃ 
jeremiah 36:31	opqdti elio oel creo oel ebdio at eonm ohbati elihm oel iSbi iroSlm oal aiS ihodh at kl hreh aSr dbrti alihm ola Smeo׃ 
jeremiah 36:32	oirmiho lqH mglh aHrt oitnh al brok bn nriho hspr oiktb elih mpi irmiho at kl dbri hspr aSr Srp ihoiqim mlk ihodh baS oeod nosp elihm dbrim rbim khmh׃ 
jeremiah 37:1	oimlk mlk zdqiho bn iaSiho tHt kniho bn ihoiqim aSr hmlik nbokdrazr mlk bbl barz ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 37:2	ola Sme hoa oebdio oem harz al dbri ihoh aSr dbr bid irmiho hnbia׃ 
jeremiah 37:3	oiSlH hmlk zdqiho at ihokl bn Slmih oat zpniho bn meSih hkhn al irmiho hnbia lamr htpll na bedno al ihoh alhino׃ 
jeremiah 37:4	oirmiho ba oiza btok hem ola ntno ato bit hklia׃ 
jeremiah 37:5	oHil preh iza mmzrim oiSmeo hkSdim hzrim el iroSlm at Smem oielo mel iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 37:6	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia lamr׃ 
jeremiah 37:7	kh amr ihoh alhi iSral kh tamro al mlk ihodh hSlH atkm ali ldrSni hnh Hil preh hiza lkm lecrh Sb larzo mzrim׃ 
jeremiah 37:8	oSbo hkSdim onlHmo el heir hcat olkdh oSrph baS׃ 
jeremiah 37:9	kh amr ihoh al tSao npStikm lamr hlk ilko melino hkSdim ki la ilko׃ 
jeremiah 37:10	ki am hkitm kl Hil kSdim hnlHmim atkm onSaro bm anSim mdqrim aiS bahlo iqomo oSrpo at heir hcat baS׃ 
jeremiah 37:11	ohih bhelot Hil hkSdim mel iroSlm mpni Hil preh׃ 
jeremiah 37:12	oiza irmiho miroSlm llkt arz bnimn lHlq mSm btok hem׃ 
jeremiah 37:13	oihi hoa bSer bnimn oSm bel pqdt oSmo iraiih bn Slmih bn Hnnih oitpS at irmiho hnbia lamr al hkSdim ath npl׃ 
jeremiah 37:14	oiamr irmiho Sqr ainni npl el hkSdim ola Sme alio oitpS iraiih birmiho oibaho al hSrim׃ 
jeremiah 37:15	oiqzpo hSrim el irmiho ohko ato ontno aoto bit hasor bit ihontn hspr ki ato eSo lbit hkla׃ 
jeremiah 37:16	ki ba irmiho al bit hbor oal hHniot oiSb Sm irmiho imim rbim׃ 
jeremiah 37:17	oiSlH hmlk zdqiho oiqHho oiSalho hmlk bbito bstr oiamr hiS dbr mat ihoh oiamr irmiho iS oiamr bid mlk bbl tntn׃ 
jeremiah 37:18	oiamr irmiho al hmlk zdqiho mh HTati lk olebdik olem hch ki nttm aoti al bit hkla׃ 
jeremiah 37:19	oaio nbiaikm aSr nbao lkm lamr la iba mlk bbl elikm oel harz hcat׃ 
jeremiah 37:20	oeth Sme na adni hmlk tpl na tHnti lpnik oal tSbni bit ihontn hspr ola amot Sm׃ 
jeremiah 37:21	oizoh hmlk zdqiho oipqdo at irmiho bHzr hmTrh ontn lo kkr lHm liom mHoz hapim ed tm kl hlHm mn heir oiSb irmiho bHzr hmTrh׃ 
jeremiah 38:1	oiSme SpTih bn mtn ogdliho bn pSHor oiokl bn Slmiho opSHor bn mlkih at hdbrim aSr irmiho mdbr al kl hem lamr׃ 
jeremiah 38:2	kh amr ihoh hiSb beir hcat imot bHrb breb obdbr ohiza al hkSdim iHih ohith lo npSo lSll oHi׃ 
jeremiah 38:3	kh amr ihoh hntn tntn heir hcat bid Hil mlk bbl olkdh׃ 
jeremiah 38:4	oiamro hSrim al hmlk iomt na at haiS hch ki el kn hoa mrpa at idi anSi hmlHmh hnSarim beir hcat oat idi kl hem ldbr alihm kdbrim halh ki haiS hch ainno drS lSlom lem hch ki am lreh׃ 
jeremiah 38:5	oiamr hmlk zdqiho hnh hoa bidkm ki ain hmlk iokl atkm dbr׃ 
jeremiah 38:6	oiqHo at irmiho oiSlko ato al hbor mlkiho bn hmlk aSr bHzr hmTrh oiSlHo at irmiho bHblim obbor ain mim ki am TiT oiTbe irmiho bTiT׃ 
jeremiah 38:7	oiSme ebd mlk hkoSi aiS sris ohoa bbit hmlk ki ntno at irmiho al hbor ohmlk ioSb bSer bnimn׃ 
jeremiah 38:8	oiza ebd mlk mbit hmlk oidbr al hmlk lamr׃ 
jeremiah 38:9	adni hmlk hreo hanSim halh at kl aSr eSo lirmiho hnbia at aSr hSliko al hbor oimt tHtio mpni hreb ki ain hlHm eod beir׃ 
jeremiah 38:10	oizoh hmlk at ebd mlk hkoSi lamr qH bidk mch SlSim anSim ohelit at irmiho hnbia mn hbor bTrm imot׃ 
jeremiah 38:11	oiqH ebd mlk at hanSim bido oiba bit hmlk al tHt haozr oiqH mSm bloi hsHbot obloi mlHim oiSlHm al irmiho al hbor bHblim׃ 
jeremiah 38:12	oiamr ebd mlk hkoSi al irmiho Sim na bloai hsHbot ohmlHim tHt azlot idik mtHt lHblim oieS irmiho kn׃ 
jeremiah 38:13	oimSko at irmiho bHblim oielo ato mn hbor oiSb irmiho bHzr hmTrh׃ 
jeremiah 38:14	oiSlH hmlk zdqiho oiqH at irmiho hnbia alio al mboa hSliSi aSr bbit ihoh oiamr hmlk al irmiho Sal ani atk dbr al tkHd mmni dbr׃ 
jeremiah 38:15	oiamr irmiho al zdqiho ki agid lk hloa hmt tmitni oki aiezk la tSme ali׃ 
jeremiah 38:16	oiSbe hmlk zdqiho al irmiho bstr lamr Hi ihoh at aSr eSh lno at hnpS hcat am amitk oam atnk bid hanSim halh aSr mbqSim at npSk׃ 
jeremiah 38:17	oiamr irmiho al zdqiho kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot alhi iSral am iza tza al Sri mlk bbl oHith npSk oheir hcat la tSrp baS oHith ath obitk׃ 
jeremiah 38:18	oam la tza al Sri mlk bbl ontnh heir hcat bid hkSdim oSrpoh baS oath la tmlT midm׃ 
jeremiah 38:19	oiamr hmlk zdqiho al irmiho ani dag at hihodim aSr nplo al hkSdim pn itno ati bidm ohtello bi׃ 
jeremiah 38:20	oiamr irmiho la itno Sme na bqol ihoh laSr ani dbr alik oiiTb lk otHi npSk׃ 
jeremiah 38:21	oam man ath lzat ch hdbr aSr hrani ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 38:22	ohnh kl hnSim aSr nSaro bbit mlk ihodh mozaot al Sri mlk bbl ohnh amrot hsitok oiklo lk anSi Slmk hTbeo bbz rglk nsgo aHor׃ 
jeremiah 38:23	oat kl nSik oat bnik mozaim al hkSdim oath la tmlT midm ki bid mlk bbl ttpS oat heir hcat tSrp baS׃ 
jeremiah 38:24	oiamr zdqiho al irmiho aiS al ide bdbrim halh ola tmot׃ 
jeremiah 38:25	oki iSmeo hSrim ki dbrti atk obao alik oamro alik hgidh na lno mh dbrt al hmlk al tkHd mmno ola nmitk omh dbr alik hmlk׃ 
jeremiah 38:26	oamrt alihm mpil ani tHnti lpni hmlk lblti hSibni bit ihontn lmot Sm׃ 
jeremiah 38:27	oibao kl hSrim al irmiho oiSalo ato oigd lhm kkl hdbrim halh aSr zoh hmlk oiHrSo mmno ki la nSme hdbr׃ 
jeremiah 38:28	oiSb irmiho bHzr hmTrh ed iom aSr nlkdh iroSlm ohih kaSr nlkdh iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 39:1	bSnh htSeit lzdqiho mlk ihodh bHdS heSri ba nbokdrazr mlk bbl okl Hilo al iroSlm oizro elih׃ 
jeremiah 39:2	beSti eSrh Snh lzdqiho bHdS hrbiei btSeh lHdS hbqeh heir׃ 
jeremiah 39:3	oibao kl Sri mlk bbl oiSbo bSer htok nrgl Sr azr smgr nbo Sr skim rb sris nrgl Sr azr rb mg okl Sarit Sri mlk bbl׃ 
jeremiah 39:4	oihi kaSr ram zdqiho mlk ihodh okl anSi hmlHmh oibrHo oizao lilh mn heir drk gn hmlk bSer bin hHmtim oiza drk herbh׃ 
jeremiah 39:5	oirdpo Hil kSdim aHrihm oiSgo at zdqiho berbot irHo oiqHo ato oielho al nbokdrazr mlk bbl rblth barz Hmt oidbr ato mSpTim׃ 
jeremiah 39:6	oiSHT mlk bbl at bni zdqiho brblh leinio oat kl Hri ihodh SHT mlk bbl׃ 
jeremiah 39:7	oat eini zdqiho eor oiasrho bnHStim lbia ato bblh׃ 
jeremiah 39:8	oat bit hmlk oat bit hem Srpo hkSdim baS oat Hmot iroSlm ntzo׃ 
jeremiah 39:9	oat itr hem hnSarim beir oat hnplim aSr nplo elio oat itr hem hnSarim hglh nbocr adn rb TbHim bbl׃ 
jeremiah 39:10	omn hem hdlim aSr ain lhm maomh hSair nbocradn rb TbHim barz ihodh oitn lhm krmim oigbim biom hhoa׃ 
jeremiah 39:11	oizo nbokdrazr mlk bbl el irmiho bid nbocradn rb TbHim lamr׃ 
jeremiah 39:12	qHno oeinik Sim elio oal teS lo maomh re ki am kaSr idbr alik kn eSh emo׃ 
jeremiah 39:13	oiSlH nbocradn rb TbHim onboScbn rb sris onrgl Sr azr rb mg okl rbi mlk bbl׃ 
jeremiah 39:14	oiSlHo oiqHo at irmiho mHzr hmTrh oitno ato al gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn lhozaho al hbit oiSb btok hem׃ 
jeremiah 39:15	oal irmiho hih dbr ihoh bhito ezor bHzr hmTrh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 39:16	hlok oamrt lebd mlk hkoSi lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni mbi at dbri al heir hcat lreh ola lTobh ohio lpnik biom hhoa׃ 
jeremiah 39:17	ohzltik biom hhoa nam ihoh ola tntn bid hanSim aSr ath igor mpnihm׃ 
jeremiah 39:18	ki mlT amlTk obHrb la tpl ohith lk npSk lSll ki bTHt bi nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 40:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh aHr SlH ato nbocradn rb TbHim mn hrmh bqHto ato ohoa asor bacqim btok kl glot iroSlm oihodh hmglim bblh׃ 
jeremiah 40:2	oiqH rb TbHim lirmiho oiamr alio ihoh alhik dbr at hreh hcat al hmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 40:3	oiba oieS ihoh kaSr dbr ki HTatm lihoh ola Smetm bqolo ohih lkm dbr hch׃ 
jeremiah 40:4	oeth hnh ptHtik hiom mn hacqim aSr el idk am Tob beinik lboa ati bbl ba oaSim at eini elik oam re beinik lboa ati bbl Hdl rah kl harz lpnik al Tob oal hiSr beinik llkt Smh lk׃ 
jeremiah 40:5	oeodno la iSob oSbh al gdlih bn aHiqm bn Spn aSr hpqid mlk bbl beri ihodh oSb ato btok hem ao al kl hiSr beinik llkt lk oitn lo rb TbHim arHh omSat oiSlHho׃ 
jeremiah 40:6	oiba irmiho al gdlih bn aHiqm hmzpth oiSb ato btok hem hnSarim barz׃ 
jeremiah 40:7	oiSmeo kl Sri hHilim aSr bSdh hmh oanSihm ki hpqid mlk bbl at gdliho bn aHiqm barz oki hpqid ato anSim onSim oTp omdlt harz maSr la hglo bblh׃ 
jeremiah 40:8	oibao al gdlih hmzpth oiSmeal bn ntniho oioHnn oiontn bni qrH oSrih bn tnHmt obni eopi hnTpti oicniho bn hmekti hmh oanSihm׃ 
jeremiah 40:9	oiSbe lhm gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn olanSihm lamr al tirao mebod hkSdim Sbo barz oebdo at mlk bbl oiiTb lkm׃ 
jeremiah 40:10	oani hnni iSb bmzph lemd lpni hkSdim aSr ibao alino oatm aspo iin oqiz oSmn oSmo bklikm oSbo berikm aSr tpStm׃ 
jeremiah 40:11	ogm kl hihodim aSr bmoab obbni emon obadom oaSr bkl harzot Smeo ki ntn mlk bbl Sarit lihodh oki hpqid elihm at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn׃ 
jeremiah 40:12	oiSbo kl hihodim mkl hmqmot aSr ndHo Sm oibao arz ihodh al gdliho hmzpth oiaspo iin oqiz hrbh mad׃ 
jeremiah 40:13	oioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim aSr bSdh bao al gdliho hmzpth׃ 
jeremiah 40:14	oiamro alio hide tde ki belis mlk bni emon SlH at iSmeal bn ntnih lhktk npS ola hamin lhm gdliho bn aHiqm׃ 
jeremiah 40:15	oioHnn bn qrH amr al gdliho bstr bmzph lamr alkh na oakh at iSmeal bn ntnih oaiS la ide lmh ikkh npS onpzo kl ihodh hnqbzim alik oabdh Sarit ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 40:16	oiamr gdliho bn aHiqm al ioHnn bn qrH al teS at hdbr hch ki Sqr ath dbr al iSmeal׃ 
jeremiah 41:1	oihi bHdS hSbiei ba iSmeal bn ntnih bn aliSme mcre hmlokh orbi hmlk oeSrh anSim ato al gdliho bn aHiqm hmzpth oiaklo Sm lHm iHdo bmzph׃ 
jeremiah 41:2	oiqm iSmeal bn ntnih oeSrt hanSim aSr hio ato oiko at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn bHrb oimt ato aSr hpqid mlk bbl barz׃ 
jeremiah 41:3	oat kl hihodim aSr hio ato at gdliho bmzph oat hkSdim aSr nmzao Sm at anSi hmlHmh hkh iSmeal׃ 
jeremiah 41:4	oihi biom hSni lhmit at gdliho oaiS la ide׃ 
jeremiah 41:5	oibao anSim mSkm mSlo omSmron Smnim aiS mglHi cqn oqrei bgdim omtgddim omnHh olbonh bidm lhbia bit ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 41:6	oiza iSmeal bn ntnih lqratm mn hmzph hlk hlk obkh oihi kpgS atm oiamr alihm bao al gdliho bn aHiqm׃ 
jeremiah 41:7	oihi kboam al tok heir oiSHTm iSmeal bn ntnih al tok hbor hoa ohanSim aSr ato׃ 
jeremiah 41:8	oeSrh anSim nmzao bm oiamro al iSmeal al tmtno ki iS lno mTmnim bSdh HTim oSerim oSmn odbS oiHdl ola hmitm btok aHihm׃ 
jeremiah 41:9	ohbor aSr hSlik Sm iSmeal at kl pgri hanSim aSr hkh bid gdliho hoa aSr eSh hmlk asa mpni beSa mlk iSral ato mla iSmeal bn ntniho Hllim׃ 
jeremiah 41:10	oiSb iSmeal at kl Sarit hem aSr bmzph at bnot hmlk oat kl hem hnSarim bmzph aSr hpqid nbocradn rb TbHim at gdliho bn aHiqm oiSbm iSmeal bn ntnih oilk lebr al bni emon׃ 
jeremiah 41:11	oiSme ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim aSr ato at kl hreh aSr eSh iSmeal bn ntnih׃ 
jeremiah 41:12	oiqHo at kl hanSim oilko lhlHm em iSmeal bn ntnih oimzao ato al mim rbim aSr bgbeon׃ 
jeremiah 41:13	oihi kraot kl hem aSr at iSmeal at ioHnn bn qrH oat kl Sri hHilim aSr ato oiSmHo׃ 
jeremiah 41:14	oisbo kl hem aSr Sbh iSmeal mn hmzph oiSbo oilko al ioHnn bn qrH׃ 
jeremiah 41:15	oiSmeal bn ntnih nmlT bSmnh anSim mpni ioHnn oilk al bni emon׃ 
jeremiah 41:16	oiqH ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim aSr ato at kl Sarit hem aSr hSib mat iSmeal bn ntnih mn hmzph aHr hkh at gdlih bn aHiqm gbrim anSi hmlHmh onSim oTp osrsim aSr hSib mgbeon׃ 
jeremiah 41:17	oilko oiSbo bgrot kmohm aSr azl bit lHm llkt lboa mzrim׃ 
jeremiah 41:18	mpni hkSdim ki irao mpnihm ki hkh iSmeal bn ntnih at gdliho bn aHiqm aSr hpqid mlk bbl barz׃ 
jeremiah 42:1	oigSo kl Sri hHilim oioHnn bn qrH oicnih bn hoSeih okl hem mqTn oed gdol׃ 
jeremiah 42:2	oiamro al irmiho hnbia tpl na tHntno lpnik ohtpll bedno al ihoh alhik bed kl hSarit hcat ki nSarno meT mhrbh kaSr einik raot atno׃ 
jeremiah 42:3	oigd lno ihoh alhik at hdrk aSr nlk bh oat hdbr aSr neSh׃ 
jeremiah 42:4	oiamr alihm irmiho hnbia Smeti hnni mtpll al ihoh alhikm kdbrikm ohih kl hdbr aSr ienh ihoh atkm agid lkm la amne mkm dbr׃ 
jeremiah 42:5	ohmh amro al irmiho ihi ihoh bno led amt onamn am la kkl hdbr aSr iSlHk ihoh alhik alino kn neSh׃ 
jeremiah 42:6	am Tob oam re bqol ihoh alhino aSr ano SlHim atk alio nSme lmen aSr iiTb lno ki nSme bqol ihoh alhino׃ 
jeremiah 42:7	oihi mqz eSrt imim oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho׃ 
jeremiah 42:8	oiqra al ioHnn bn qrH oal kl Sri hHilim aSr ato olkl hem lmqTn oed gdol׃ 
jeremiah 42:9	oiamr alihm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral aSr SlHtm ati alio lhpil tHntkm lpnio׃ 
jeremiah 42:10	am Sob tSbo barz hcat obniti atkm ola ahrs onTeti atkm ola atoS ki nHmti al hreh aSr eSiti lkm׃ 
jeremiah 42:11	al tirao mpni mlk bbl aSr atm iraim mpnio al tirao mmno nam ihoh ki atkm ani lhoSie atkm olhzil atkm mido׃ 
jeremiah 42:12	oatn lkm rHmim orHm atkm ohSib atkm al admtkm׃ 
jeremiah 42:13	oam amrim atm la nSb barz hcat lblti Sme bqol ihoh alhikm׃ 
jeremiah 42:14	lamr la ki arz mzrim nboa aSr la nrah mlHmh oqol Sopr la nSme ollHm la nreb oSm nSb׃ 
jeremiah 42:15	oeth lkn Smeo dbr ihoh Sarit ihodh kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral am atm Som tSmon pnikm lba mzrim obatm lgor Sm׃ 
jeremiah 42:16	ohith hHrb aSr atm iraim mmnh Sm tSig atkm barz mzrim ohreb aSr atm dagim mmno Sm idbq aHrikm mzrim oSm tmto׃ 
jeremiah 42:17	oihio kl hanSim aSr Smo at pnihm lboa mzrim lgor Sm imoto bHrb breb obdbr ola ihih lhm Srid opliT mpni hreh aSr ani mbia elihm׃ 
jeremiah 42:18	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral kaSr ntk api oHmti el iSbi iroSlm kn ttk Hmti elikm bbakm mzrim ohiitm lalh olSmh olqllh olHrph ola trao eod at hmqom hch׃ 
jeremiah 42:19	dbr ihoh elikm Sarit ihodh al tbao mzrim ide tdeo ki heidti bkm hiom׃ 
jeremiah 42:20	ki htetim bnpSotikm ki atm SlHtm ati al ihoh alhikm lamr htpll bedno al ihoh alhino okkl aSr iamr ihoh alhino kn hgd lno oeSino׃ 
jeremiah 42:21	oagd lkm hiom ola Smetm bqol ihoh alhikm olkl aSr SlHni alikm׃ 
jeremiah 42:22	oeth ide tdeo ki bHrb breb obdbr tmoto bmqom aSr Hpztm lboa lgor Sm׃ 
jeremiah 43:1	oihi kklot irmiho ldbr al kl hem at kl dbri ihoh alhihm aSr SlHo ihoh alhihm alihm at kl hdbrim halh׃ 
jeremiah 43:2	oiamr ecrih bn hoSeih oioHnn bn qrH okl hanSim hcdim amrim al irmiho Sqr ath mdbr la SlHk ihoh alhino lamr la tbao mzrim lgor Sm׃ 
jeremiah 43:3	ki brok bn nrih msit atk bno lmen tt atno bid hkSdim lhmit atno olhglot atno bbl׃ 
jeremiah 43:4	ola Sme ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim okl hem bqol ihoh lSbt barz ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 43:5	oiqH ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim at kl Sarit ihodh aSr Sbo mkl hgoim aSr ndHo Sm lgor barz ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 43:6	at hgbrim oat hnSim oat hTp oat bnot hmlk oat kl hnpS aSr hniH nbocradn rb TbHim at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn oat irmiho hnbia oat brok bn nriho׃ 
jeremiah 43:7	oibao arz mzrim ki la Smeo bqol ihoh oibao ed tHpnHs׃ 
jeremiah 43:8	oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho btHpnHs lamr׃ 
jeremiah 43:9	qH bidk abnim gdlot oTmntm bmlT bmlbn aSr bptH bit preh btHpnHs leini anSim ihodim׃ 
jeremiah 43:10	oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni SlH olqHti at nbokdrazr mlk bbl ebdi oSmti ksao mmel labnim halh aSr Tmnti onTh at Sproro elihm׃ 
jeremiah 43:11	obah ohkh at arz mzrim aSr lmot lmot oaSr lSbi lSbi oaSr lHrb lHrb׃ 
jeremiah 43:12	ohzti aS bbti alhi mzrim oSrpm oSbm oeTh at arz mzrim kaSr ieTh hreh at bgdo oiza mSm bSlom׃ 
jeremiah 43:13	oSbr at mzbot bit SmS aSr barz mzrim oat bti alhi mzrim iSrp baS׃ 
jeremiah 44:1	hdbr aSr hih al irmiho al kl hihodim hiSbim barz mzrim hiSbim bmgdl obtHpnHs obnp obarz ptros lamr׃ 
jeremiah 44:2	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral atm raitm at kl hreh aSr hbati el iroSlm oel kl eri ihodh ohnm Hrbh hiom hch oain bhm ioSb׃ 
jeremiah 44:3	mpni retm aSr eSo lhkesni llkt lqTr lebd lalhim aHrim aSr la ideom hmh atm oabtikm׃ 
jeremiah 44:4	oaSlH alikm at kl ebdi hnbiaim hSkim oSlH lamr al na teSo at dbr htebh hcat aSr Snati׃ 
jeremiah 44:5	ola Smeo ola hTo at acnm lSob mretm lblti qTr lalhim aHrim׃ 
jeremiah 44:6	ottk Hmti oapi otber beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm othiinh lHrbh lSmmh kiom hch׃ 
jeremiah 44:7	oeth kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot alhi iSral lmh atm eSim reh gdolh al npStkm lhkrit lkm aiS oaSh eoll oionq mtok ihodh lblti hotir lkm Sarit׃ 
jeremiah 44:8	lhkesni bmeSi idikm lqTr lalhim aHrim barz mzrim aSr atm baim lgor Sm lmen hkrit lkm olmen hiotkm lqllh olHrph bkl goii harz׃ 
jeremiah 44:9	hSkHtm at reot abotikm oat reot mlki ihodh oat reot nSio oat retkm oat ret nSikm aSr eSo barz ihodh obHzot iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 44:10	la dkao ed hiom hch ola irao ola hlko btorti obHqti aSr ntti lpnikm olpni abotikm׃ 
jeremiah 44:11	lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni Sm pni bkm lreh olhkrit at kl ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 44:12	olqHti at Sarit ihodh aSr Smo pnihm lboa arz mzrim lgor Sm otmo kl barz mzrim iplo bHrb breb itmo mqTn oed gdol bHrb obreb imto ohio lalh lSmh olqllh olHrph׃ 
jeremiah 44:13	opqdti el hioSbim barz mzrim kaSr pqdti el iroSlm bHrb breb obdbr׃ 
jeremiah 44:14	ola ihih pliT oSrid lSarit ihodh hbaim lgor Sm barz mzrim olSob arz ihodh aSr hmh mnSaim at npSm lSob lSbt Sm ki la iSobo ki am plTim׃ 
jeremiah 44:15	oieno at irmiho kl hanSim hideim ki mqTrot nSihm lalhim aHrim okl hnSim hemdot qhl gdol okl hem hiSbim barz mzrim bptros lamr׃ 
jeremiah 44:16	hdbr aSr dbrt alino bSm ihoh ainno Smeim alik׃ 
jeremiah 44:17	ki eSh neSh at kl hdbr aSr iza mpino lqTr lmlkt hSmim ohsik lh nskim kaSr eSino anHno oabtino mlkino oSrino beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm onSbe lHm onhih Tobim oreh la raino׃ 
jeremiah 44:18	omn ac Hdlno lqTr lmlkt hSmim ohsk lh nskim Hsrno kl obHrb obreb tmno׃ 
jeremiah 44:19	oki anHno mqTrim lmlkt hSmim olhsk lh nskim hmbledi anSino eSino lh konim lhezbh ohsk lh nskim׃ 
jeremiah 44:20	oiamr irmiho al kl hem el hgbrim oel hnSim oel kl hem henim ato dbr lamr׃ 
jeremiah 44:21	hloa at hqTr aSr qTrtm beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm atm oabotikm mlkikm oSrikm oem harz atm ckr ihoh otelh el lbo׃ 
jeremiah 44:22	ola iokl ihoh eod lSat mpni re mellikm mpni htoebt aSr eSitm othi arzkm lHrbh olSmh olqllh main ioSb khiom hch׃ 
jeremiah 44:23	mpni aSr qTrtm oaSr HTatm lihoh ola Smetm bqol ihoh obtrto obHqtio obedotio la hlktm el kn qrat atkm hreh hcat kiom hch׃ 
jeremiah 44:24	oiamr irmiho al kl hem oal kl hnSim Smeo dbr ihoh kl ihodh aSr barz mzrim׃ 
jeremiah 44:25	kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lamr atm onSikm otdbrnh bpikm obidikm mlatm lamr eSh neSh at ndrino aSr ndrno lqTr lmlkt hSmim olhsk lh nskim hqim tqimnh at ndrikm oeSh teSinh at ndrikm׃ 
jeremiah 44:26	lkn Smeo dbr ihoh kl ihodh hiSbim barz mzrim hnni nSbeti bSmi hgdol amr ihoh am ihih eod Smi nqra bpi kl aiS ihodh amr Hi adni ihoh bkl arz mzrim׃ 
jeremiah 44:27	hnni Sqd elihm lreh ola lTobh otmo kl aiS ihodh aSr barz mzrim bHrb obreb ed klotm׃ 
jeremiah 44:28	opliTi Hrb iSbon mn arz mzrim arz ihodh mti mspr oideo kl Sarit ihodh hbaim larz mzrim lgor Sm dbr mi iqom mmni omhm׃ 
jeremiah 44:29	ocat lkm haot nam ihoh ki pqd ani elikm bmqom hch lmen tdeo ki qom iqomo dbri elikm lreh׃ 
jeremiah 44:30	kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at preh Hpre mlk mzrim bid aibio obid mbqSi npSo kaSr ntti at zdqiho mlk ihodh bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl aibo ombqS npSo׃ 
jeremiah 45:1	hdbr aSr dbr irmiho hnbia al brok bn nrih bktbo at hdbrim halh el spr mpi irmiho bSnh hrbeit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 45:2	kh amr ihoh alhi iSral elik brok׃ 
jeremiah 45:3	amrt aoi na li ki isp ihoh igon el mkabi igeti banHti omnoHh la mzati׃ 
jeremiah 45:4	kh tamr alio kh amr ihoh hnh aSr bniti ani hrs oat aSr nTeti ani ntS oat kl harz hia׃ 
jeremiah 45:5	oath tbqS lk gdlot al tbqS ki hnni mbia reh el kl bSr nam ihoh ontti lk at npSk lSll el kl hmqmot aSr tlk Sm׃ 
jeremiah 46:1	aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia el hgoim׃ 
jeremiah 46:2	lmzrim el Hil preh nko mlk mzrim aSr hih el nhr prt bkrkmS aSr hkh nbokdrazr mlk bbl bSnt hrbieit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh׃ 
jeremiah 46:3	erko mgn oznh ogSo lmlHmh׃ 
jeremiah 46:4	asro hsosim oelo hprSim ohtizbo bkobeim mrqo hrmHim lbSo hsrint׃ 
jeremiah 46:5	mdoe raiti hmh Htim nsgim aHor ogborihm ikto omnos nso ola hpno mgor msbib nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 46:6	al inos hql oal imlT hgbor zponh el id nhr prt kSlo onplo׃ 
jeremiah 46:7	mi ch kiar ielh knhrot itgeSo mimio׃ 
jeremiah 46:8	mzrim kiar ielh oknhrot itgeSo mim oiamr aelh aksh arz abidh eir oiSbi bh׃ 
jeremiah 46:9	elo hsosim ohthllo hrkb oizao hgborim koS opoT tpSi mgn olodim tpSi drki qSt׃ 
jeremiah 46:10	ohiom hhoa ladni ihoh zbaot iom nqmh lhnqm mzrio oaklh Hrb oSbeh oroth mdmm ki cbH ladni ihoh zbaot barz zpon al nhr prt׃ 
jeremiah 46:11	eli gled oqHi zri btolt bt mzrim lSoa hrbiti rpaot telh ain lk׃ 
jeremiah 46:12	Smeo goim qlonk ozoHtk mlah harz ki gbor bgbor kSlo iHdio nplo Snihm׃ 
jeremiah 46:13	hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia lboa nbokdrazr mlk bbl lhkot at arz mzrim׃ 
jeremiah 46:14	hgido bmzrim ohSmieo bmgdol ohSmieo bnp obtHpnHs amro htizb ohkn lk ki aklh Hrb sbibik׃ 
jeremiah 46:15	mdoe nsHp abirik la emd ki ihoh hdpo׃ 
jeremiah 46:16	hrbh koSl gm npl aiS al reho oiamro qomh onSbh al emno oal arz moldtno mpni Hrb hionh׃ 
jeremiah 46:17	qrao Sm preh mlk mzrim Saon hebir hmoed׃ 
jeremiah 46:18	Hi ani nam hmlk ihoh zbaot Smo ki ktbor bhrim okkrml bim iboa׃ 
jeremiah 46:19	kli golh eSi lk ioSbt bt mzrim ki np lSmh thih onzth main ioSb׃ 
jeremiah 46:20	eglh iph pih mzrim qrz mzpon ba ba׃ 
jeremiah 46:21	gm Skrih bqrbh kegli mrbq ki gm hmh hpno nso iHdio la emdo ki iom aidm ba elihm et pqdtm׃ 
jeremiah 46:22	qolh knHS ilk ki bHil ilko obqrdmot bao lh kHTbi ezim׃ 
jeremiah 46:23	krto ierh nam ihoh ki la iHqr ki rbo marbh oain lhm mspr׃ 
jeremiah 46:24	hbiSh bt mzrim ntnh bid em zpon׃ 
jeremiah 46:25	amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni poqd al amon mna oel preh oel mzrim oel alhih oel mlkih oel preh oel hbTHim bo׃ 
jeremiah 46:26	onttim bid mbqSi npSm obid nbokdrazr mlk bbl obid ebdio oaHri kn tSkn kimi qdm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 46:27	oath al tira ebdi ieqb oal tHt iSral ki hnni moSek mrHoq oat crek marz Sbim oSb ieqob oSqT oSann oain mHrid׃ 
jeremiah 46:28	ath al tira ebdi ieqb nam ihoh ki atk ani ki aeSh klh bkl hgoim aSr hdHtik Smh oatk la aeSh klh oisrtik lmSpT onqh la anqk׃ 
jeremiah 47:1	aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia al plStim bTrm ikh preh at ech׃ 
jeremiah 47:2	kh amr ihoh hnh mim elim mzpon ohio lnHl SoTp oiSTpo arz omloah eir oiSbi bh oceqo hadm ohill kl ioSb harz׃ 
jeremiah 47:3	mqol SeTt prsot abirio mreS lrkbo hmon glglio la hpno abot al bnim mrpion idim׃ 
jeremiah 47:4	el hiom hba lSdod at kl plStim lhkrit lzr olzidon kl Srid ecr ki Sdd ihoh at plStim Sarit ai kptor׃ 
jeremiah 47:5	bah qrHh al ech ndmth aSqlon Sarit emqm ed mti ttgoddi׃ 
jeremiah 47:6	hoi Hrb lihoh ed anh la tSqTi haspi al terk hrgei odmi׃ 
jeremiah 47:7	aik tSqTi oihoh zoh lh al aSqlon oal Hop him Sm iedh׃ 
jeremiah 48:1	lmoab kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hoi al nbo ki Sddh hbiSh nlkdh qritim hbiSh hmSgb oHth׃ 
jeremiah 48:2	ain eod thlt moab bHSbon HSbo elih reh lko onkritnh mgoi gm mdmn tdmi aHrik tlk Hrb׃ 
jeremiah 48:3	qol zeqh mHronim Sd oSbr gdol׃ 
jeremiah 48:4	nSbrh moab hSmieo ceqh zeorih׃ 
jeremiah 48:5	ki melh hlHot bbki ielh bki ki bmord Hornim zri zeqt Sbr Smeo׃ 
jeremiah 48:6	nso mlTo npSkm othiinh keroer bmdbr׃ 
jeremiah 48:7	ki ien bTHk bmeSik obaozrotik gm at tlkdi oiza kmiS bgolh khnio oSrio iHd׃ 
jeremiah 48:8	oiba Sdd al kl eir oeir la tmlT oabd hemq onSmd hmiSr aSr amr ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 48:9	tno ziz lmoab ki nza tza oerih lSmh thiinh main ioSb bhn׃ 
jeremiah 48:10	aror eSh mlakt ihoh rmih oaror mne Hrbo mdm׃ 
jeremiah 48:11	Sann moab mneorio oSqT hoa al Smrio ola horq mkli al kli obgolh la hlk el kn emd Temo bo oriHo la nmr׃ 
jeremiah 48:12	lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh oSlHti lo zeim ozeho oklio iriqo onblihm inpzo׃ 
jeremiah 48:13	obS moab mkmoS kaSr bSo bit iSral mbit al mbTHm׃ 
jeremiah 48:14	aik tamro gborim anHno oanSi Hil lmlHmh׃ 
jeremiah 48:15	Sdd moab oerih elh ombHr bHorio irdo lTbH nam hmlk ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
jeremiah 48:16	qrob aid moab lboa oreto mhrh mad׃ 
jeremiah 48:17	ndo lo kl sbibio okl idei Smo amro aikh nSbr mTh ec mql tparh׃ 
jeremiah 48:18	rdi mkbod iSbi bzma iSbt bt dibon ki Sdd moab elh bk SHt mbzrik׃ 
jeremiah 48:19	al drk emdi ozpi ioSbt eroer Sali ns onmlTh amri mh nhith׃ 
jeremiah 48:20	hbiS moab ki Hth hilili oceqi hgido barnon ki Sdd moab׃ 
jeremiah 48:21	omSpT ba al arz hmiSr al Hlon oal ihzh oel mopet׃ 
jeremiah 48:22	oel dibon oel nbo oel bit dbltim׃ 
jeremiah 48:23	oel qritim oel bit gmol oel bit meon׃ 
jeremiah 48:24	oel qriot oel bzrh oel kl eri arz moab hrHqot ohqrbot׃ 
jeremiah 48:25	ngdeh qrn moab ocreo nSbrh nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 48:26	hSkirho ki el ihoh hgdil ospq moab bqiao ohih lSHq gm hoa׃ 
jeremiah 48:27	oam loa hSHq hih lk iSral am bgnbim nmzah ki mdi dbrik bo ttnodd׃ 
jeremiah 48:28	ecbo erim oSkno bsle iSbi moab ohio kionh tqnn bebri pi pHt׃ 
jeremiah 48:29	Smeno gaon moab gah mad gbho ogaono ogaoto orm lbo׃ 
jeremiah 48:30	ani ideti nam ihoh ebrto ola kn bdio la kn eSo׃ 
jeremiah 48:31	el kn el moab ailil olmoab klh aceq al anSi qir HrS ihgh׃ 
jeremiah 48:32	mbki iecr abkh lk hgpn Sbmh nTiStik ebro im ed im iecr ngeo el qizk oel bzirk Sdd npl׃ 
jeremiah 48:33	onasph SmHh ogil mkrml omarz moab oiin miqbim hSbti la idrk hidd hidd la hidd׃ 
jeremiah 48:34	mceqt HSbon ed alelh ed ihz ntno qolm mzer ed Hrnim eglt SlSih ki gm mi nmrim lmSmot ihio׃ 
jeremiah 48:35	ohSbti lmoab nam ihoh melh bmh omqTir lalhio׃ 
jeremiah 48:36	el kn lbi lmoab kHllim ihmh olbi al anSi qir HrS kHlilim ihmh el kn itrt eSh abdo׃ 
jeremiah 48:37	ki kl raS qrHh okl cqn greh el kl idim gddt oel mtnim Sq׃ 
jeremiah 48:38	el kl ggot moab obrHbtih klh mspd ki Sbrti at moab kkli ain Hpz bo nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 48:39	aik Hth hililo aik hpnh erp moab boS ohih moab lSHq olmHth lkl sbibio׃ 
jeremiah 48:40	ki kh amr ihoh hnh knSr idah oprS knpio al moab׃ 
jeremiah 48:41	nlkdh hqriot ohmzdot ntpSh ohih lb gbori moab biom hhoa klb aSh mzrh׃ 
jeremiah 48:42	onSmd moab mem ki el ihoh hgdil׃ 
jeremiah 48:43	pHd opHt opH elik ioSb moab nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 48:44	hnis mpni hpHd ipl al hpHt ohelh mn hpHt ilkd bpH ki abia alih al moab Snt pqdtm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 48:45	bzl HSbon emdo mkH nsim ki aS iza mHSbon olhbh mbin siHon otakl pat moab oqdqd bni Saon׃ 
jeremiah 48:46	aoi lk moab abd em kmoS ki lqHo bnik bSbi obntik bSbih׃ 
jeremiah 48:47	oSbti Sbot moab baHrit himim nam ihoh ed hnh mSpT moab׃ 
jeremiah 49:1	lbni emon kh amr ihoh hbnim ain liSral am iorS ain lo mdoe irS mlkm at gd oemo berio iSb׃ 
jeremiah 49:2	lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ohSmeti al rbt bni emon troet mlHmh ohith ltl Smmh obntih baS tztnh oirS iSral at irSio amr ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 49:3	hilili HSbon ki Sddh ei zeqnh bnot rbh Hgrnh Sqim spdnh ohtSoTTnh bgdrot ki mlkm bgolh ilk khnio oSrio iHdio׃ 
jeremiah 49:4	mh tthlli bemqim cb emqk hbt hSobbh hbTHh bazrtih mi iboa ali׃ 
jeremiah 49:5	hnni mbia elik pHd nam adni ihoh zbaot mkl sbibik ondHtm aiS lpnio oain mqbz lndd׃ 
jeremiah 49:6	oaHri kn aSib at Sbot bni emon nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 49:7	ladom kh amr ihoh zbaot hain eod Hkmh btimn abdh ezh mbnim nsrHh Hkmtm׃ 
jeremiah 49:8	nso hpno hemiqo lSbt iSbi ddn ki aid eSo hbati elio et pqdtio׃ 
jeremiah 49:9	am bzrim bao lk la iSaro eollot am gnbim blilh hSHito dim׃ 
jeremiah 49:10	ki ani HSpti at eSo gliti at mstrio onHbh la iokl Sdd creo oaHio oSknio oainno׃ 
jeremiah 49:11	ecbh itmik ani aHih oalmntik eli tbTHo׃ 
jeremiah 49:12	ki kh amr ihoh hnh aSr ain mSpTm lStot hkos Sto iSto oath hoa nqh tnqh la tnqh ki Sth tSth׃ 
jeremiah 49:13	ki bi nSbeti nam ihoh ki lSmh lHrph lHrb olqllh thih bzrh okl erih thiinh lHrbot eolm׃ 
jeremiah 49:14	Smoeh Smeti mat ihoh ozir bgoim SloH htqbzo obao elih oqomo lmlHmh׃ 
jeremiah 49:15	ki hnh qTn nttik bgoim bcoi badm׃ 
jeremiah 49:16	tplztk hSia atk cdon lbk Skni bHgoi hsle tpSi mrom gbeh ki tgbih knSr qnk mSm aoridk nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 49:17	ohith adom lSmh kl ebr elih iSm oiSrq el kl mkoth׃ 
jeremiah 49:18	kmhpkt sdm oemrh oSknih amr ihoh la iSb Sm aiS ola igor bh bn adm׃ 
jeremiah 49:19	hnh karih ielh mgaon hirdn al noh aitn ki argieh arizno melih omi bHor alih apqd ki mi kmoni omi ieidni omi ch reh aSr iemd lpni׃ 
jeremiah 49:20	lkn Smeo ezt ihoh aSr iez al adom omHSbotio aSr HSb al iSbi timn am la isHbom zeiri hzan am la iSim elihm nohm׃ 
jeremiah 49:21	mqol nplm reSh harz zeqh bim sop nSme qolh׃ 
jeremiah 49:22	hnh knSr ielh oidah oiprS knpio el bzrh ohih lb gbori adom biom hhoa klb aSh mzrh׃ 
jeremiah 49:23	ldmSq boSh Hmt oarpd ki Smeh reh Smeo nmgo bim dagh hSqT la iokl׃ 
jeremiah 49:24	rpth dmSq hpnth lnos orTT hHciqh zrh oHblim aHcth kioldh׃ 
jeremiah 49:25	aik la ecbh eir thlh qrit mSoSi׃ 
jeremiah 49:26	lkn iplo bHorih brHbtih okl anSi hmlHmh idmo biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
jeremiah 49:27	ohzti aS bHomt dmSq oaklh armnot bn hdd׃ 
jeremiah 49:28	lqdr olmmlkot Hzor aSr hkh nbokdrazor mlk bbl kh amr ihoh qomo elo al qdr oSddo at bni qdm׃ 
jeremiah 49:29	ahlihm ozanm iqHo irieotihm okl klihm ogmlihm iSao lhm oqrao elihm mgor msbib׃ 
jeremiah 49:30	nso ndo mad hemiqo lSbt iSbi Hzor nam ihoh ki iez elikm nbokdrazr mlk bbl ezh oHSb elihm mHSbh׃ 
jeremiah 49:31	qomo elo al goi Slio ioSb lbTH nam ihoh la dltim ola briH lo bdd iSkno׃ 
jeremiah 49:32	ohio gmlihm lbc ohmon mqnihm lSll ocrtim lkl roH qzozi pah omkl ebrio abia at aidm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 49:33	ohith Hzor lmeon tnim Smmh ed eolm la iSb Sm aiS ola igor bh bn adm׃ 
jeremiah 49:34	aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia al eilm braSit mlkot zdqih mlk ihodh lamr׃ 
jeremiah 49:35	kh amr ihoh zbaot hnni Sbr at qSt eilm raSit gbortm׃ 
jeremiah 49:36	ohbati al eilm arbe roHot marbe qzot hSmim ocrtim lkl hrHot halh ola ihih hgoi aSr la iboa Sm ndHi eolm׃ 
jeremiah 49:37	ohHtti at eilm lpni aibihm olpni mbqSi npSm ohbati elihm reh at Hron api nam ihoh oSlHti aHrihm at hHrb ed kloti aotm׃ 
jeremiah 49:38	oSmti ksai beilm ohabdti mSm mlk oSrim nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 49:39	ohih baHrit himim aSob at Sbit eilm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 50:1	hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al bbl al arz kSdim bid irmiho hnbia׃ 
jeremiah 50:2	hgido bgoim ohSmieo oSao ns hSmieo al tkHdo amro nlkdh bbl hbiS bl Ht mrdk hbiSo ezbih Hto glolih׃ 
jeremiah 50:3	ki elh elih goi mzpon hoa iSit at arzh lSmh ola ihih ioSb bh madm oed bhmh ndo hlko׃ 
jeremiah 50:4	bimim hhmh obet hhia nam ihoh ibao bni iSral hmh obni ihodh iHdo hlok obko ilko oat ihoh alhihm ibqSo׃ 
jeremiah 50:5	zion iSalo drk hnh pnihm bao onloo al ihoh brit eolm la tSkH׃ 
jeremiah 50:6	zan abdot hih emi reihm hteom hrim Sobbim mhr al gbeh hlko SkHo rbzm׃ 
jeremiah 50:7	kl mozaihm aklom ozrihm amro la naSm tHt aSr HTao lihoh noh zdq omqoh abotihm ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 50:8	ndo mtok bbl omarz kSdim izao ohio ketodim lpni zan׃

jeremiah 50:10	ohith kSdim lSll kl Sllih iSbeo nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 50:11	ki tSmHi ki telci Ssi nHlti ki tpoSi keglh dSh otzhli kabrim׃ 
jeremiah 50:12	boSh amkm mad Hprh ioldtkm hnh aHrit goim mdbr zih oerbh׃ 
jeremiah 50:13	mqzp ihoh la tSb ohith Smmh klh kl ebr el bbl iSm oiSrq el kl mkotih׃ 
jeremiah 50:14	erko el bbl sbib kl drki qSt ido alih al tHmlo al Hz ki lihoh HTah׃ 
jeremiah 50:15	hrieo elih sbib ntnh idh nplo aSoitih nhrso Homotih ki nqmt ihoh hia hnqmo bh kaSr eSth eSo lh׃ 
jeremiah 50:16	krto core mbbl otpS mgl bet qzir mpni Hrb hionh aiS al emo ipno oaiS larzo inso׃ 
jeremiah 50:17	Sh pcorh iSral ariot hdiHo hraSon aklo mlk aSor och haHron ezmo nbokdrazr mlk bbl׃ 
jeremiah 50:18	lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni pqd al mlk bbl oal arzo kaSr pqdti al mlk aSor׃ 
jeremiah 50:19	oSbbti at iSral al noho oreh hkrml ohbSn obhr aprim ohgled tSbe npSo׃ 
jeremiah 50:20	bimim hhm obet hhia nam ihoh ibqS at eon iSral oainno oat HTat ihodh ola tmzainh ki aslH laSr aSair׃ 
jeremiah 50:21	el harz mrtim elh elih oal ioSbi pqod Hrb ohHrm aHrihm nam ihoh oeSh kkl aSr zoitik׃ 
jeremiah 50:22	qol mlHmh barz oSbr gdol׃ 
jeremiah 50:23	aik ngde oiSbr pTiS kl harz aik hith lSmh bbl bgoim׃ 
jeremiah 50:24	iqSti lk ogm nlkdt bbl oat la idet nmzat ogm ntpSt ki bihoh htgrit׃ 
jeremiah 50:25	ptH ihoh at aozro oioza at kli cemo ki mlakh hia ladni ihoh zbaot barz kSdim׃ 
jeremiah 50:26	bao lh mqz ptHo mabsih sloh kmo ermim ohHrimoh al thi lh Sarit׃ 
jeremiah 50:27	Hrbo kl prih irdo lTbH hoi elihm ki ba iomm et pqdtm׃ 
jeremiah 50:28	qol nsim oplTim marz bbl lhgid bzion at nqmt ihoh alhino nqmt hiklo׃ 
jeremiah 50:29	hSmieo al bbl rbim kl drki qSt Hno elih sbib al ihi pliTh Slmo lh kpelh kkl aSr eSth eSo lh ki al ihoh cdh al qdoS iSral׃ 
jeremiah 50:30	lkn iplo bHorih brHbtih okl anSi mlHmth idmo biom hhoa nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 50:31	hnni alik cdon nam adni ihoh zbaot ki ba iomk et pqdtik׃ 
jeremiah 50:32	okSl cdon onpl oain lo mqim ohzti aS berio oaklh kl sbibtio׃ 
jeremiah 50:33	kh amr ihoh zbaot eSoqim bni iSral obni ihodh iHdo okl Sbihm hHciqo bm mano SlHm׃ 
jeremiah 50:34	galm Hcq ihoh zbaot Smo rib irib at ribm lmen hrgie at harz ohrgic liSbi bbl׃ 
jeremiah 50:35	Hrb el kSdim nam ihoh oal iSbi bbl oal Srih oal Hkmih׃ 
jeremiah 50:36	Hrb al hbdim onalo Hrb al gborih oHto׃ 
jeremiah 50:37	Hrb al sosio oal rkbo oal kl herb aSr btokh ohio lnSim Hrb al aozrtih obcco׃ 
jeremiah 50:38	Hrb al mimih oibSo ki arz pslim hia obaimim ithllo׃ 
jeremiah 50:39	lkn iSbo ziim at aiim oiSbo bh bnot ienh ola tSb eod lnzH ola tSkon ed dor odor׃ 
jeremiah 50:40	kmhpkt alhim at sdm oat emrh oat Sknih nam ihoh la iSb Sm aiS ola igor bh bn adm׃ 
jeremiah 50:41	hnh em ba mzpon ogoi gdol omlkim rbim iero mirkti arz׃ 
jeremiah 50:42	qSt okidn iHciqo akcri hmh ola irHmo qolm kim ihmh oel sosim irkbo erok kaiS lmlHmh elik bt bbl׃ 
jeremiah 50:43	Sme mlk bbl at Smem orpo idio zrh hHciqtho Hil kioldh׃ 
jeremiah 50:44	hnh karih ielh mgaon hirdn al noh aitn ki argeh arozm melih omi bHor alih apqd ki mi kmoni omi ioedni omi ch reh aSr iemd lpni׃

jeremiah 50:46	mqol ntpSh bbl nreSh harz oceqh bgoim nSme׃ 
jeremiah 51:1	kh amr ihoh hnni meir el bbl oal iSbi lb qmi roH mSHit׃ 
jeremiah 51:2	oSlHti lbbl crim ocroh oibqqo at arzh ki hio elih msbib biom reh׃ 
jeremiah 51:3	al idrk idrk hdrk qSto oal itel bsrino oal tHmlo al bHrih hHrimo kl zbah׃ 
jeremiah 51:4	onplo Hllim barz kSdim omdqrim bHozotih׃ 
jeremiah 51:5	ki la almn iSral oihodh malhio mihoh zbaot ki arzm mlah aSm mqdoS iSral׃ 
jeremiah 51:6	nso mtok bbl omlTo aiS npSo al tdmo beonh ki et nqmh hia lihoh gmol hoa mSlm lh׃ 
jeremiah 51:7	kos chb bbl bid ihoh mSkrt kl harz miinh Sto goim el kn ithllo goim׃ 
jeremiah 51:8	ptam nplh bbl otSbr hililo elih qHo zri lmkaobh aoli trpa׃ 
jeremiah 51:9	rpano at bbl ola nrpth ecboh onlk aiS larzo ki nge al hSmim mSpTh onSa ed SHqim׃ 
jeremiah 51:10	hozia ihoh at zdqtino bao onsprh bzion at meSh ihoh alhino׃ 
jeremiah 51:11	hbro hHzim mlao hSlTim heir ihoh at roH mlki mdi ki el bbl mcmto lhSHith ki nqmt ihoh hia nqmt hiklo׃ 
jeremiah 51:12	al Homt bbl Sao ns hHciqo hmSmr hqimo Smrim hkino harbim ki gm cmm ihoh gm eSh at aSr dbr al iSbi bbl׃ 
jeremiah 51:13	Sknti el mim rbim rbt aozrt ba qzk amt bzek׃ 
jeremiah 51:14	nSbe ihoh zbaot bnpSo ki am mlatik adm kilq oeno elik hidd׃ 
jeremiah 51:15	eSh arz bkHo mkin tbl bHkmto obtbonto nTh Smim׃ 
jeremiah 51:16	lqol tto hmon mim bSmim oiel nSaim mqzh arz brqim lmTr eSh oioza roH mazrtio׃ 
jeremiah 51:17	nber kl adm mdet hbiS kl zrp mpsl ki Sqr nsko ola roH bm׃ 
jeremiah 51:18	hbl hmh meSh teteim bet pqdtm iabdo׃ 
jeremiah 51:19	la kalh Hlq ieqob ki iozr hkl hoa oSbT nHlto ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
jeremiah 51:20	mpz ath li kli mlHmh onpzti bk goim ohSHti bk mmlkot׃ 
jeremiah 51:21	onpzti bk sos orkbo onpzti bk rkb orkbo׃ 
jeremiah 51:22	onpzti bk aiS oaSh onpzti bk cqn oner onpzti bk bHor obtolh׃ 
jeremiah 51:23	onpzti bk reh oedro onpzti bk akr ozmdo onpzti bk pHot osgnim׃ 
jeremiah 51:24	oSlmti lbbl olkl ioSbi kSdim at kl retm aSr eSo bzion leinikm nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:25	hnni alik hr hmSHit nam ihoh hmSHit at kl harz onTiti at idi elik oglgltik mn hsleim onttik lhr Srph׃ 
jeremiah 51:26	ola iqHo mmk abn lpnh oabn lmosdot ki Smmot eolm thih nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:27	Sao ns barz tqeo Sopr bgoim qdSo elih goim hSmieo elih mmlkot arrT mni oaSknc pqdo elih Tpsr helo sos kilq smr׃ 
jeremiah 51:28	qdSo elih goim at mlki mdi at pHotih oat kl sgnih oat kl arz mmSlto׃ 
jeremiah 51:29	otreS harz otHl ki qmh el bbl mHSbot ihoh lSom at arz bbl lSmh main ioSb׃ 
jeremiah 51:30	Hdlo gbori bbl lhlHm iSbo bmzdot nSth gbortm hio lnSim hzito mSkntih nSbro briHih׃ 
jeremiah 51:31	rz lqrat rz iroz omgid lqrat mgid lhgid lmlk bbl ki nlkdh eiro mqzh׃ 
jeremiah 51:32	ohmebrot ntpSo oat hagmim Srpo baS oanSi hmlHmh nbhlo׃ 
jeremiah 51:33	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral bt bbl kgrn et hdrikh eod meT obah et hqzir lh׃ 
jeremiah 51:34	aklno hmmno nbokdrazr mlk bbl hzigno kli riq bleno ktnin mla krSo medni hdiHno׃ 
jeremiah 51:35	Hmsi oSari el bbl tamr iSbt zion odmi al iSbi kSdim tamr iroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 51:36	lkn kh amr ihoh hnni rb at ribk onqmti at nqmtk ohHrbti at imh ohbSti at mqorh׃ 
jeremiah 51:37	ohith bbl lglim meon tnim Smh oSrqh main ioSb׃ 
jeremiah 51:38	iHdo kkprim iSago nero kgori ariot׃ 
jeremiah 51:39	bHmm aSit at mStihm ohSkrtim lmen ielco oiSno Snt eolm ola iqizo nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:40	aoridm kkrim lTboH kailim em etodim׃ 
jeremiah 51:41	aik nlkdh SSk ottpS thlt kl harz aik hith lSmh bbl bgoim׃ 
jeremiah 51:42	elh el bbl him bhmon glio nksth׃ 
jeremiah 51:43	hio erih lSmh arz zih oerbh arz la iSb bhn kl aiS ola iebr bhn bn adm׃ 
jeremiah 51:44	opqdti el bl bbbl ohzati at bleo mpio ola inhro alio eod goim gm Homt bbl nplh׃ 
jeremiah 51:45	zao mtokh emi omlTo aiS at npSo mHron ap ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:46	opn irk lbbkm otirao bSmoeh hnSmet barz oba bSnh hSmoeh oaHrio bSnh hSmoeh oHms barz omSl el mSl׃ 
jeremiah 51:47	lkn hnh imim baim opqdti el psili bbl okl arzh tboS okl Hllih iplo btokh׃ 
jeremiah 51:48	ornno el bbl Smim oarz okl aSr bhm ki mzpon iboa lh hSoddim nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:49	gm bbl lnpl Hlli iSral gm lbbl nplo Hlli kl harz׃ 
jeremiah 51:50	plTim mHrb hlko al temdo ckro mrHoq at ihoh oiroSlm telh el lbbkm׃ 
jeremiah 51:51	bSno ki Smeno Hrph ksth klmh pnino ki bao crim el mqdSi bit ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:52	lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh opqdti el psilih obkl arzh ianq Hll׃ 
jeremiah 51:53	ki telh bbl hSmim oki tbzr mrom ech mati ibao Sddim lh nam ihoh׃ 
jeremiah 51:54	qol ceqh mbbl oSbr gdol marz kSdim׃ 
jeremiah 51:55	ki Sdd ihoh at bbl oabd mmnh qol gdol ohmo glihm kmim rbim ntn Saon qolm׃ 
jeremiah 51:56	ki ba elih el bbl Sodd onlkdo gborih Htth qStotm ki al gmlot ihoh Slm iSlm׃ 
jeremiah 51:57	ohSkrti Srih oHkmih pHotih osgnih ogborih oiSno Snt eolm ola iqizo nam hmlk ihoh zbaot Smo׃ 
jeremiah 51:58	kh amr ihoh zbaot Hmot bbl hrHbh erer tterer oSerih hgbhim baS izto oigeo emim bdi riq olamim bdi aS oiepo׃ 
jeremiah 51:59	hdbr aSr zoh irmiho hnbia at Srih bn nrih bn mHsih blkto at zdqiho mlk ihodh bbl bSnt hrbeit lmlko oSrih Sr mnoHh׃ 
jeremiah 51:60	oiktb irmiho at kl hreh aSr tboa al bbl al spr aHd at kl hdbrim halh hktbim al bbl׃ 
jeremiah 51:61	oiamr irmiho al Srih kbak bbl orait oqrat at kl hdbrim halh׃ 
jeremiah 51:62	oamrt ihoh ath dbrt al hmqom hch lhkrito lblti hiot bo ioSb lmadm oed bhmh ki Smmot eolm thih׃ 
jeremiah 51:63	ohih kkltk lqra at hspr hch tqSr elio abn ohSlkto al tok prt׃ 
jeremiah 51:64	oamrt kkh tSqe bbl ola tqom mpni hreh aSr anki mbia elih oiepo ed hnh dbri irmiho׃ 
jeremiah 52:1	bn eSrim oaHt Snh zdqiho bmlko oaHt eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo HmiTl bt irmiho mlbnh׃ 
jeremiah 52:2	oieS hre beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh ihoiqim׃ 
jeremiah 52:3	ki el ap ihoh hith biroSlm oihodh ed hSliko aotm mel pnio oimrd zdqiho bmlk bbl׃ 
jeremiah 52:4	oihi bSnh htSeit lmlko bHdS heSiri beSor lHdS ba nbokdrazr mlk bbl hoa okl Hilo el iroSlm oiHno elih oibno elih diq sbib׃ 
jeremiah 52:5	otba heir bmzor ed eSti eSrh Snh lmlk zdqiho׃ 
jeremiah 52:6	bHdS hrbiei btSeh lHdS oiHcq hreb beir ola hih lHm lem harz׃ 
jeremiah 52:7	otbqe heir okl anSi hmlHmh ibrHo oizao mheir lilh drk Ser bin hHmtim aSr el gn hmlk okSdim el heir sbib oilko drk herbh׃ 
jeremiah 52:8	oirdpo Hil kSdim aHri hmlk oiSigo at zdqiho berbt irHo okl Hilo npzo melio׃ 
jeremiah 52:9	oitpSo at hmlk oielo ato al mlk bbl rblth barz Hmt oidbr ato mSpTim׃ 
jeremiah 52:10	oiSHT mlk bbl at bni zdqiho leinio ogm at kl Sri ihodh SHT brblth׃ 
jeremiah 52:11	oat eini zdqiho eor oiasrho bnHStim oibaho mlk bbl bblh oitnho bbit hpqdt ed iom moto׃ 
jeremiah 52:12	obHdS hHmiSi beSor lHdS hia Snt tSe eSrh Snh lmlk nbokdrazr mlk bbl ba nbocradn rb TbHim emd lpni mlk bbl biroSlm׃ 
jeremiah 52:13	oiSrp at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk oat kl bti iroSlm oat kl bit hgdol Srp baS׃ 
jeremiah 52:14	oat kl Hmot iroSlm sbib ntzo kl Hil kSdim aSr at rb TbHim׃ 
jeremiah 52:15	omdlot hem oat itr hem hnSarim beir oat hnplim aSr nplo al mlk bbl oat itr hamon hglh nbocradn rb TbHim׃ 
jeremiah 52:16	omdlot harz hSair nbocradn rb TbHim lkrmim oligbim׃ 
jeremiah 52:17	oat emodi hnHSt aSr lbit ihoh oat hmknot oat im hnHSt aSr bbit ihoh Sbro kSdim oiSao at kl nHStm bblh׃ 
jeremiah 52:18	oat hsrot oat hieim oat hmcmrot oat hmcrqt oat hkpot oat kl kli hnHSt aSr iSrto bhm lqHo׃ 
jeremiah 52:19	oat hspim oat hmHtot oat hmcrqot oat hsirot oat hmnrot oat hkpot oat hmnqiot aSr chb chb oaSr ksp ksp lqH rb TbHim׃ 
jeremiah 52:20	hemodim Snim him aHd ohbqr Snim eSr nHSt aSr tHt hmknot aSr eSh hmlk Slmh lbit ihoh la hih mSql lnHStm kl hklim halh׃ 
jeremiah 52:21	ohemodim Smnh eSrh amh qomh hemd haHd oHoT Stim eSrh amh isbno oebio arbe azbeot nbob׃ 
jeremiah 52:22	oktrt elio nHSt oqomt hktrt haHt HmS amot oSbkh ormonim el hkotrt sbib hkl nHSt okalh lemod hSni ormonim׃ 
jeremiah 52:23	oihio hrmnim tSeim oSSh roHh kl hrmonim mah el hSbkh sbib׃ 
jeremiah 52:24	oiqH rb TbHim at Srih khn hraS oat zpnih khn hmSnh oat SlSt Smri hsp׃ 
jeremiah 52:25	omn heir lqH sris aHd aSr hih pqid el anSi hmlHmh oSbeh anSim mrai pni hmlk aSr nmzao beir oat spr Sr hzba hmzba at em harz oSSim aiS mem harz hnmzaim btok heir׃ 
jeremiah 52:26	oiqH aotm nbocradn rb TbHim oilk aotm al mlk bbl rblth׃ 
jeremiah 52:27	oikh aotm mlk bbl oimtm brblh barz Hmt oigl ihodh mel admto׃ 
jeremiah 52:28	ch hem aSr hglh nbokdrazr bSnt Sbe ihodim SlSt alpim oeSrim oSlSh׃ 
jeremiah 52:29	bSnt Smonh eSrh lnbokdrazr miroSlm npS Smnh maot SlSim oSnim׃ 
jeremiah 52:30	bSnt SlS oeSrim lnbokdrazr hglh nbocradn rb TbHim ihodim npS Sbe maot arbeim oHmSh kl npS arbet alpim oSS maot׃ 
jeremiah 52:31	oihi bSlSim oSbe Snh lglot ihoikn mlk ihodh bSnim eSr HdS beSrim oHmSh lHdS nSa aoil mrdk mlk bbl bSnt mlkto at raS ihoikin mlk ihodh oiza aoto mbit hklia׃ 
jeremiah 52:32	oidbr ato Tbot oitn at ksao mmel lksa mlkim aSr ato bbbl׃ 
jeremiah 52:33	oSnh at bgdi klao oakl lHm lpnio tmid kl imi Hio׃ 
jeremiah 52:34	oarHto arHt tmid ntnh lo mat mlk bbl dbr iom biomo ed iom moto kl imi Hiio׃ 
ezekiel 1:1	oihi bSlSim Snh brbiei bHmSh lHdS oani btok hgolh el nhr kbr nptHo hSmim oarah mraot alhim׃ 
ezekiel 1:2	bHmSh lHdS hia hSnh hHmiSit lglot hmlk ioikin׃ 
ezekiel 1:3	hih hih dbr ihoh al iHcqal bn boci hkhn barz kSdim el nhr kbr othi elio Sm id ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 1:4	oara ohnh roH serh bah mn hzpon enn gdol oaS mtlqHt ongh lo sbib omtokh kein hHSml mtok haS׃ 
ezekiel 1:5	omtokh dmot arbe Hiot och mraihn dmot adm lhnh׃ 
ezekiel 1:6	oarbeh pnim laHt oarbe knpim laHt lhm׃ 
ezekiel 1:7	orglihm rgl iSrh okp rglihm kkp rgl egl onzzim kein nHSt qll׃ 
ezekiel 1:8	oido adm mtHt knpihm el arbet rbeihm opnihm oknpihm larbetm׃ 
ezekiel 1:9	Hbrt aSh al aHoth knpihm la isbo blktn aiS al ebr pnio ilko׃ 
ezekiel 1:10	odmot pnihm pni adm opni arih al himin larbetm opni Sor mhSmaol larbetn opni nSr larbetn׃ 
ezekiel 1:11	opnihm oknpihm prdot mlmelh laiS Stim Hbrot aiS oStim mksot at goitihnh׃ 
ezekiel 1:12	oaiS al ebr pnio ilko al aSr ihih Smh hroH llkt ilko la isbo blktn׃ 
ezekiel 1:13	odmot hHiot mraihm kgHli aS berot kmrah hlpdim hia mthlkt bin hHiot ongh laS omn haS ioza brq׃ 
ezekiel 1:14	ohHiot rzoa oSob kmrah hbcq׃ 
ezekiel 1:15	oara hHiot ohnh aopn aHd barz azl hHiot larbet pnio׃ 
ezekiel 1:16	mrah haopnim omeSihm kein trSiS odmot aHd larbetn omraihm omeSihm kaSr ihih haopn btok haopn׃ 
ezekiel 1:17	el arbet rbeihn blktm ilko la isbo blktn׃ 
ezekiel 1:18	ogbihn ogbh lhm oirah lhm ogbtm mlat einim sbib larbetn׃ 
ezekiel 1:19	oblkt hHiot ilko haopnim azlm obhnSa hHiot mel harz inSao haopnim׃ 
ezekiel 1:20	el aSr ihih Sm hroH llkt ilko Smh hroH llkt ohaopnim inSao lemtm ki roH hHih baopnim׃ 
ezekiel 1:21	blktm ilko obemdm iemdo obhnSam mel harz inSao haopnim lemtm ki roH hHih baopnim׃ 
ezekiel 1:22	odmot el raSi hHih rqie kein hqrH hnora nToi el raSihm mlmelh׃ 
ezekiel 1:23	otHt hrqie knpihm iSrot aSh al aHoth laiS Stim mksot lhnh olaiS Stim mksot lhnh at goitihm׃ 
ezekiel 1:24	oaSme at qol knpihm kqol mim rbim kqol Sdi blktm qol hmlh kqol mHnh bemdm trpinh knpihn׃ 
ezekiel 1:25	oihi qol mel lrqie aSr el raSm bemdm trpinh knpihn׃ 
ezekiel 1:26	ommel lrqie aSr el raSm kmrah abn spir dmot ksa oel dmot hksa dmot kmrah adm elio mlmelh׃ 
ezekiel 1:27	oara kein HSml kmrah aS bit lh sbib mmrah mtnio olmelh ommrah mtnio olmTh raiti kmrah aS ongh lo sbib׃ 
ezekiel 1:28	kmrah hqSt aSr ihih benn biom hgSm kn mrah hngh sbib hoa mrah dmot kbod ihoh oarah oapl el pni oaSme qol mdbr׃ 
ezekiel 2:1	oiamr ali bn adm emd el rglik oadbr atk׃ 
ezekiel 2:2	otba bi roH kaSr dbr ali otemdni el rgli oaSme at mdbr ali׃ 
ezekiel 2:3	oiamr ali bn adm SolH ani aotk al bni iSral al goim hmordim aSr mrdo bi hmh oabotm pSeo bi ed ezm hiom hch׃ 
ezekiel 2:4	ohbnim qSi pnim oHcqi lb ani SolH aotk alihm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 2:5	ohmh am iSmeo oam iHdlo ki bit mri hmh oideo ki nbia hih btokm׃ 
ezekiel 2:6	oath bn adm al tira mhm omdbrihm al tira ki srbim oslonim aotk oal eqrbim ath ioSb mdbrihm al tira ompnihm al tHt ki bit mri hmh׃ 
ezekiel 2:7	odbrt at dbri alihm am iSmeo oam iHdlo ki mri hmh׃ 
ezekiel 2:8	oath bn adm Sme at aSr ani mdbr alik al thi mri kbit hmri pzh pik oakl at aSr ani ntn alik׃

ezekiel 3:1	oiamr ali bn adm at aSr tmza akol akol at hmglh hcat olk dbr al bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 3:2	oaptH at pi oiaklni at hmglh hcat׃ 
ezekiel 3:3	oiamr ali bn adm bTnk takl omeik tmla at hmglh hcat aSr ani ntn alik oaklh othi bpi kdbS lmtoq׃ 
ezekiel 3:4	oiamr ali bn adm lk ba al bit iSral odbrt bdbri alihm׃ 
ezekiel 3:5	ki la al em emqi Sph okbdi lSon ath SloH al bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 3:6	la al emim rbim emqi Sph okbdi lSon aSr la tSme dbrihm am la alihm SlHtik hmh iSmeo alik׃ 
ezekiel 3:7	obit iSral la iabo lSme alik ki ainm abim lSme ali ki kl bit iSral Hcqi mzH oqSi lb hmh׃ 
ezekiel 3:8	hnh ntti at pnik Hcqim lemt pnihm oat mzHk Hcq lemt mzHm׃ 
ezekiel 3:9	kSmir Hcq mzr ntti mzHk la tira aotm ola tHt mpnihm ki bit mri hmh׃ 
ezekiel 3:10	oiamr ali bn adm at kl dbri aSr adbr alik qH blbbk obacnik Sme׃ 
ezekiel 3:11	olk ba al hgolh al bni emk odbrt alihm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh am iSmeo oam iHdlo׃ 
ezekiel 3:12	otSani roH oaSme aHri qol reS gdol brok kbod ihoh mmqomo׃ 
ezekiel 3:13	oqol knpi hHiot mSiqot aSh al aHoth oqol haopnim lemtm oqol reS gdol׃ 
ezekiel 3:14	oroH nSatni otqHni oalk mr bHmt roHi oid ihoh eli Hcqh׃ 
ezekiel 3:15	oaboa al hgolh tl abib hiSbim al nhr kbr oaSr hmh ioSbim Sm oaSb Sm Sbet imim mSmim btokm׃ 
ezekiel 3:16	oihi mqzh Sbet imim oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 3:17	bn adm zph nttik lbit iSral oSmet mpi dbr ohchrt aotm mmni׃ 
ezekiel 3:18	bamri lrSe mot tmot ola hchrto ola dbrt lhchir rSe mdrko hrSeh lHito hoa rSe beono imot odmo midk abqS׃ 
ezekiel 3:19	oath ki hchrt rSe ola Sb mrSeo omdrko hrSeh hoa beono imot oath at npSk hzlt׃ 
ezekiel 3:20	obSob zdiq mzdqo oeSh eol ontti mkSol lpnio hoa imot ki la hchrto bHTato imot ola tckrn zdqto aSr eSh odmo midk abqS׃ 
ezekiel 3:21	oath ki hchrto zdiq lblti HTa zdiq ohoa la HTa Hio iHih ki nchr oath at npSk hzlt׃ 
ezekiel 3:22	othi eli Sm id ihoh oiamr ali qom za al hbqeh oSm adbr aotk׃ 
ezekiel 3:23	oaqom oaza al hbqeh ohnh Sm kbod ihoh emd kkbod aSr raiti el nhr kbr oapl el pni׃ 
ezekiel 3:24	otba bi roH otemdni el rgli oidbr ati oiamr ali ba hsgr btok bitk׃ 
ezekiel 3:25	oath bn adm hnh ntno elik ebotim oasrok bhm ola tza btokm׃ 
ezekiel 3:26	olSonk adbiq al Hkk onalmt ola thih lhm laiS mokiH ki bit mri hmh׃ 
ezekiel 3:27	obdbri aotk aptH at pik oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh hSme iSme ohHdl iHdl ki bit mri hmh׃ 
ezekiel 4:1	oath bn adm qH lk lbnh ontth aoth lpnik oHqot elih eir at iroSlm׃

ezekiel 4:3	oath qH lk mHbt brcl ontth aoth qir brcl bink obin heir ohkinth at pnik alih ohith bmzor ozrt elih aot hia lbit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 4:4	oath Skb el zdk hSmali oSmt at eon bit iSral elio mspr himim aSr tSkb elio tSa at eonm׃ 
ezekiel 4:5	oani ntti lk at Sni eonm lmspr imim SlS maot otSeim iom onSat eon bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 4:6	oklit at alh oSkbt el zdk himoni Snit onSat at eon bit ihodh arbeim iom iom lSnh iom lSnh nttio lk׃ 
ezekiel 4:7	oal mzor iroSlm tkin pnik ocrek HSoph onbat elih׃ 
ezekiel 4:8	ohnh ntti elik ebotim ola thpk mzdk al zdk ed klotk imi mzork׃ 
ezekiel 4:9	oath qH lk HTin oSerim opol oedSim odHn oksmim ontth aotm bkli aHd oeSit aotm lk llHm mspr himim aSr ath Sokb el zdk SlS maot otSeim iom taklno׃ 
ezekiel 4:10	omaklk aSr taklno bmSqol eSrim Sql liom met ed et taklno׃ 
ezekiel 4:11	omim bmSorh tSth SSit hhin met ed et tSth׃ 
ezekiel 4:12	oegt Serim taklnh ohia bglli zat hadm tegnh leinihm׃ 
ezekiel 4:13	oiamr ihoh kkh iaklo bni iSral at lHmm Tma bgoim aSr adiHm Sm׃ 
ezekiel 4:14	oamr ahh adni ihoh hnh npSi la mTmah onblh oTrph la aklti mneori oed eth ola ba bpi bSr pgol׃

ezekiel 4:17	lmen iHsro lHm omim onSmo aiS oaHio onmqo beonm׃

ezekiel 5:3	olqHt mSm meT bmspr ozrt aotm bknpik׃

ezekiel 5:5	kh amr adni ihoh cat iroSlm btok hgoim Smtih osbibotih arzot׃ 
ezekiel 5:6	otmr at mSpTi lrSeh mn hgoim oat Hqoti mn harzot aSr sbibotih ki bmSpTi maso oHqoti la hlko bhm׃ 
ezekiel 5:7	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien hmnkm mn hgoim aSr sbibotikm bHqoti la hlktm oat mSpTi la eSitm okmSpTi hgoim aSr sbibotikm la eSitm׃ 
ezekiel 5:8	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik gm ani oeSiti btokk mSpTim leini hgoim׃ 
ezekiel 5:9	oeSiti bk at aSr la eSiti oat aSr la aeSh kmho eod ien kl toebtik׃

ezekiel 5:11	lkn Hi ani nam adni ihoh am la ien at mqdSi Tmat bkl Sqozik obkl toebtik ogm ani agre ola tHos eini ogm ani la aHmol׃ 
ezekiel 5:12	SlStik bdbr imoto obreb iklo btokk ohSlSit bHrb iplo sbibotik ohSliSit lkl roH acrh oHrb ariq aHrihm׃ 
ezekiel 5:13	oklh api ohnHoti Hmti bm ohnHmti oideo ki ani ihoh dbrti bqnati bkloti Hmti bm׃ 
ezekiel 5:14	oatnk lHrbh olHrph bgoim aSr sbibotik leini kl eobr׃ 
ezekiel 5:15	ohith Hrph ogdoph mosr omSmh lgoim aSr sbibotik beSoti bk SpTim bap obHmh obtkHot Hmh ani ihoh dbrti׃

ezekiel 6:4	onSmo mcbHotikm onSbro Hmnikm ohplti Hllikm lpni glolikm׃

ezekiel 7:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 7:2	oath bn adm kh amr adni ihoh ladmt iSral qz ba hqz el arbet knpot harz׃ 
ezekiel 7:3	eth hqz elik oSlHti api bk oSpTtik kdrkik ontti elik at kl toebtik׃ 
ezekiel 7:4	ola tHos eini elik ola aHmol ki drkik elik atn otoebotik btokk thiin oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 7:5	kh amr adni ihoh reh aHt reh hnh bah׃ 
ezekiel 7:6	qz ba ba hqz hqiz alik hnh bah׃ 
ezekiel 7:7	bah hzpirh alik ioSb harz ba het qrob hiom mhomh ola hd hrim׃ 
ezekiel 7:8	eth mqrob aSpok Hmti elik okliti api bk oSpTtik kdrkik ontti elik at kl toebotik׃ 
ezekiel 7:9	ola tHos eini ola aHmol kdrkik elik atn otoebotik btokk thiin oidetm ki ani ihoh mkh׃

ezekiel 7:14	tqeo btqoe ohkin hkl oain hlk lmlHmh ki Hroni al kl hmonh׃

ezekiel 7:17	kl hidim trpinh okl brkim tlknh mim׃ 
ezekiel 7:18	oHgro Sqim oksth aotm plzot oal kl pnim boSh obkl raSihm qrHh׃ 
ezekiel 7:19	kspm bHozot iSliko ochbm lndh ihih kspm ochbm la iokl lhzilm biom ebrt ihoh npSm la iSbeo omeihm la imlao ki mkSol eonm hih׃ 
ezekiel 7:20	ozbi edio lgaon Smho ozlmi toebtm Sqozihm eSo bo el kn nttio lhm lndh׃

ezekiel 7:25	qpdh ba obqSo Slom oain׃
