ezekiel 8:3	oiSlH tbnit id oiqHni bzizt raSi otSa ati roH bin harz obin hSmim otba ati iroSlmh bmraot alhim al ptH Ser hpnimit hponh zponh aSr Sm moSb sml hqnah hmqnh׃ 
ezekiel 8:4	ohnh Sm kbod alhi iSral kmrah aSr raiti bbqeh׃ 
ezekiel 8:5	oiamr ali bn adm Sa na einik drk zponh oaSa eini drk zponh ohnh mzpon lSer hmcbH sml hqnah hch bbah׃ 
ezekiel 8:6	oiamr ali bn adm hrah ath mhm eSim toebot gdlot aSr bit iSral eSim ph lrHqh mel mqdSi oeod tSob trah toebot gdlot׃ 
ezekiel 8:7	oiba ati al ptH hHzr oarah ohnh Hr aHd bqir׃ 
ezekiel 8:8	oiamr ali bn adm Htr na bqir oaHtr bqir ohnh ptH aHd׃ 
ezekiel 8:9	oiamr ali ba orah at htoebot hreot aSr hm eSim ph׃ 
ezekiel 8:10	oaboa oarah ohnh kl tbnit rmS obhmh Sqz okl gloli bit iSral mHqh el hqir sbib sbib׃ 
ezekiel 8:11	oSbeim aiS mcqni bit iSral oiacniho bn Spn emd btokm emdim lpnihm oaiS mqTrto bido oetr enn hqTrt elh׃ 
ezekiel 8:12	oiamr ali hrait bn adm aSr cqni bit iSral eSim bHSk aiS bHdri mSkito ki amrim ain ihoh rah atno ecb ihoh at harz׃ 
ezekiel 8:13	oiamr ali eod tSob trah toebot gdlot aSr hmh eSim׃ 
ezekiel 8:14	oiba ati al ptH Ser bit ihoh aSr al hzponh ohnh Sm hnSim iSbot mbkot at htmoc׃ 
ezekiel 8:15	oiamr ali hrait bn adm eod tSob trah toebot gdlot malh׃ 
ezekiel 8:16	oiba ati al Hzr bit ihoh hpnimit ohnh ptH hikl ihoh bin haolm obin hmcbH keSrim oHmSh aiS aHrihm al hikl ihoh opnihm qdmh ohmh mStHoitm qdmh lSmS׃ 
ezekiel 8:17	oiamr ali hrait bn adm hnql lbit ihodh meSot at htoebot aSr eSo ph ki mlao at harz Hms oiSbo lhkeisni ohnm SlHim at hcmorh al apm׃ 
ezekiel 8:18	ogm ani aeSh bHmh la tHos eini ola aHml oqrao bacni qol gdol ola aSme aotm׃ 
ezekiel 9:1	oiqra bacni qol gdol lamr qrbo pqdot heir oaiS kli mSHto bido׃ 
ezekiel 9:2	ohnh SSh anSim baim mdrk Ser helion aSr mpnh zponh oaiS kli mpzo bido oaiS aHd btokm lbS bdim oqst hspr bmtnio oibao oiemdo azl mcbH hnHSt׃ 
ezekiel 9:3	okbod alhi iSral nelh mel hkrob aSr hih elio al mptn hbit oiqra al haiS hlbS hbdim aSr qst hspr bmtnio׃ 
ezekiel 9:4	oiamr ihoh alo ebr btok heir btok iroSlm ohtoit to el mzHot hanSim hnanHim ohnanqim el kl htoebot hneSot btokh׃ 
ezekiel 9:5	olalh amr bacni ebro beir aHrio ohko el tHs einikm oal tHmlo׃ 
ezekiel 9:6	cqn bHor obtolh oTp onSim thrgo lmSHit oel kl aiS aSr elio hto al tgSo ommqdSi tHlo oiHlo banSim hcqnim aSr lpni hbit׃ 
ezekiel 9:7	oiamr alihm Tmao at hbit omlao at hHzrot Hllim zao oizao ohko beir׃ 
ezekiel 9:8	oihi khkotm onaSar ani oaplh el pni oaceq oamr ahh adni ihoh hmSHit ath at kl Sarit iSral bSpkk at Hmtk el iroSlm׃ 
ezekiel 9:9	oiamr ali eon bit iSral oihodh gdol bmad mad otmla harz dmim oheir mlah mTh ki amro ecb ihoh at harz oain ihoh rah׃ 
ezekiel 9:10	ogm ani la tHos eini ola aHml drkm braSm ntti׃ 
ezekiel 9:11	ohnh haiS lbS hbdim aSr hqst bmtnio mSib dbr lamr eSiti kaSr zoitni׃ 
ezekiel 10:1	oarah ohnh al hrqie aSr el raS hkrbim kabn spir kmrah dmot ksa nrah elihm׃ 
ezekiel 10:2	oiamr al haiS lbS hbdim oiamr ba al binot lglgl al tHt lkrob omla Hpnik gHli aS mbinot lkrbim ocrq el heir oiba leini׃ 
ezekiel 10:3	ohkrbim emdim mimin lbit bbao haiS ohenn mla at hHzr hpnimit׃ 
ezekiel 10:4	oirm kbod ihoh mel hkrob el mptn hbit oimla hbit at henn ohHzr mlah at ngh kbod ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 10:5	oqol knpi hkrobim nSme ed hHzr hHiznh kqol al Sdi bdbro׃ 
ezekiel 10:6	oihi bzoto at haiS lbS hbdim lamr qH aS mbinot lglgl mbinot lkrobim oiba oiemd azl haopn׃ 
ezekiel 10:7	oiSlH hkrob at ido mbinot lkrobim al haS aSr binot hkrbim oiSa oitn al Hpni lbS hbdim oiqH oiza׃ 
ezekiel 10:8	oira lkrbim tbnit id adm tHt knpihm׃ 
ezekiel 10:9	oarah ohnh arbeh aopnim azl hkrobim aopn aHd azl hkrob aHd oaopn aHd azl hkrob aHd omrah haopnim kein abn trSiS׃ 
ezekiel 10:10	omraihm dmot aHd larbetm kaSr ihih haopn btok haopn׃ 
ezekiel 10:11	blktm al arbet rbeihm ilko la isbo blktm ki hmqom aSr ipnh hraS aHrio ilko la isbo blktm׃ 
ezekiel 10:12	okl bSrm ogbhm oidihm oknpihm ohaopnim mlaim einim sbib larbetm aopnihm׃ 
ezekiel 10:13	laopnim lhm qora hglgl bacni׃ 
ezekiel 10:14	oarbeh pnim laHd pni haHd pni hkrob opni hSni pni adm ohSliSi pni arih ohrbiei pni nSr׃ 
ezekiel 10:15	oirmo hkrobim hia hHih aSr raiti bnhr kbr׃ 
ezekiel 10:16	oblkt hkrobim ilko haopnim azlm obSat hkrobim at knpihm lrom mel harz la isbo haopnim gm hm mazlm׃ 
ezekiel 10:17	bemdm iemdo obromm iromo aotm ki roH hHih bhm׃ 
ezekiel 10:18	oiza kbod ihoh mel mptn hbit oiemd el hkrobim׃ 
ezekiel 10:19	oiSao hkrobim at knpihm oiromo mn harz leini bzatm ohaopnim lemtm oiemd ptH Ser bit ihoh hqdmoni okbod alhi iSral elihm mlmelh׃ 
ezekiel 10:20	hia hHih aSr raiti tHt alhi iSral bnhr kbr oade ki krobim hmh׃ 
ezekiel 10:21	arbeh arbeh pnim laHd oarbe knpim laHd odmot idi adm tHt knpihm׃ 
ezekiel 10:22	odmot pnihm hmh hpnim aSr raiti el nhr kbr mraihm oaotm aiS al ebr pnio ilko׃ 
ezekiel 11:1	otSa ati roH otba ati al Ser bit ihoh hqdmoni hponh qdimh ohnh bptH hSer eSrim oHmSh aiS oarah btokm at iacnih bn ecr oat plTiho bn bniho Sri hem׃ 
ezekiel 11:2	oiamr ali bn adm alh hanSim hHSbim aon ohiezim ezt re beir hcat׃ 
ezekiel 11:3	hamrim la bqrob bnot btim hia hsir oanHno hbSr׃ 
ezekiel 11:4	lkn hnba elihm hnba bn adm׃ 
ezekiel 11:5	otpl eli roH ihoh oiamr ali amr kh amr ihoh kn amrtm bit iSral omelot roHkm ani idetih׃ 
ezekiel 11:6	hrbitm Hllikm beir hcat omlatm Hoztih Hll׃ 
ezekiel 11:7	lkn kh amr adni ihoh Hllikm aSr Smtm btokh hmh hbSr ohia hsir oatkm hozia mtokh׃ 
ezekiel 11:8	Hrb iratm oHrb abia elikm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 11:9	ohozati atkm mtokh ontti atkm bid crim oeSiti bkm SpTim׃ 
ezekiel 11:10	bHrb tplo el gbol iSral aSpoT atkm oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 11:11	hia la thih lkm lsir oatm thio btokh lbSr al gbol iSral aSpT atkm׃ 
ezekiel 11:12	oidetm ki ani ihoh aSr bHqi la hlktm omSpTi la eSitm okmSpTi hgoim aSr sbibotikm eSitm׃ 
ezekiel 11:13	oihi khnbai oplTiho bn bnih mt oapl el pni oaceq qol gdol oamr ahh adni ihoh klh ath eSh at Sarit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 11:14	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 11:15	bn adm aHik aHik anSi galtk okl bit iSral klh aSr amro lhm iSbi iroSlm rHqo mel ihoh lno hia ntnh harz lmorSh׃ 
ezekiel 11:16	lkn amr kh amr adni ihoh ki hrHqtim bgoim oki hpizotim barzot oahi lhm lmqdS meT barzot aSr bao Sm׃ 
ezekiel 11:17	lkn amr kh amr adni ihoh oqbzti atkm mn hemim oaspti atkm mn harzot aSr npzotm bhm ontti lkm at admt iSral׃ 
ezekiel 11:18	obao Smh ohsiro at kl Sqozih oat kl toebtih mmnh׃ 
ezekiel 11:19	onnti lhm lb aHd oroH HdSh atn bqrbkm ohsrti lb habn mbSrm ontti lhm lb bSr׃ 
ezekiel 11:20	lmen bHqti ilko oat mSpTi iSmro oeSo atm ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim׃ 
ezekiel 11:21	oal lb Sqozihm otoebotihm lbm hlk drkm braSm ntti nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 11:22	oiSao hkrobim at knpihm ohaopnim lemtm okbod alhi iSral elihm mlmelh׃ 
ezekiel 11:23	oiel kbod ihoh mel tok heir oiemd el hhr aSr mqdm leir׃ 
ezekiel 11:24	oroH nSatni otbani kSdimh al hgolh bmrah broH alhim oiel meli hmrah aSr raiti׃ 
ezekiel 11:25	oadbr al hgolh at kl dbri ihoh aSr hrani׃ 
ezekiel 12:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 12:2	bn adm btok bit hmri ath iSb aSr einim lhm lraot ola rao acnim lhm lSme ola Smeo ki bit mri hm׃ 
ezekiel 12:3	oath bn adm eSh lk kli golh oglh iomm leinihm oglit mmqomk al mqom aHr leinihm aoli irao ki bit mri hmh׃ 
ezekiel 12:4	ohozat klik kkli golh iomm leinihm oath tza berb leinihm kmozai golh׃ 
ezekiel 12:5	leinihm Htr lk bqir ohozat bo׃ 
ezekiel 12:6	leinihm el ktp tSa belTh tozia pnik tksh ola trah at harz ki mopt nttik lbit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 12:7	oaeS kn kaSr zoiti kli hozati kkli golh iomm oberb Htrti li bqir bid belTh hozati el ktp nSati leinihm׃ 
ezekiel 12:8	oihi dbr ihoh ali bbqr lamr׃ 
ezekiel 12:9	bn adm hla amro alik bit iSral bit hmri mh ath eSh׃ 
ezekiel 12:10	amr alihm kh amr adni ihoh hnSia hmSa hch biroSlm okl bit iSral aSr hmh btokm׃ 
ezekiel 12:11	amr ani moptkm kaSr eSiti kn ieSh lhm bgolh bSbi ilko׃ 
ezekiel 12:12	ohnSia aSr btokm al ktp iSa belTh oiza bqir iHtro lhozia bo pnio iksh ien aSr la irah lein hoa at harz׃ 
ezekiel 12:13	oprSti at rSti elio ontpS bmzodti ohbati ato bblh arz kSdim oaoth la irah oSm imot׃ 
ezekiel 12:14	okl aSr sbibtio ecrh okl agpio acrh lkl roH oHrb ariq aHrihm׃ 
ezekiel 12:15	oideo ki ani ihoh bhpizi aotm bgoim ocriti aotm barzot׃ 
ezekiel 12:16	ohotrti mhm anSi mspr mHrb mreb omdbr lmen ispro at kl toebotihm bgoim aSr bao Sm oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 12:17	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 12:18	bn adm lHmk breS takl omimik brgch obdagh tSth׃

ezekiel 12:20	oherim hnoSbot tHrbnh oharz Smmh thih oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 12:21	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃

ezekiel 12:23	lkn amr alihm kh amr adni ihoh hSbti at hmSl hch ola imSlo ato eod biSral ki am dbr alihm qrbo himim odbr kl Hcon׃ 
ezekiel 12:24	ki la ihih eod kl Hcon Soa omqsm Hlq btok bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 12:25	ki ani ihoh adbr at aSr adbr dbr oieSh la tmSk eod ki bimikm bit hmri adbr dbr oeSitio nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 12:26	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃

ezekiel 13:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 13:2	bn adm hnba al nbiai iSral hnbaim oamrt lnbiai mlbm Smeo dbr ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:3	kh amr adni ihoh hoi el hnbiaim hnblim aSr hlkim aHr roHm olblti rao׃ 
ezekiel 13:4	kSelim bHrbot nbiaik iSral hio׃ 
ezekiel 13:5	la elitm bprzot otgdro gdr el bit iSral lemd bmlHmh biom ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:6	Hco Soa oqsm kcb hamrim nam ihoh oihoh la SlHm oiHlo lqim dbr׃ 
ezekiel 13:7	hloa mHch Soa Hcitm omqsm kcb amrtm oamrim nam ihoh oani la dbrti׃ 
ezekiel 13:8	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien dbrkm Soa oHcitm kcb lkn hnni alikm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:9	ohith idi al hnbiaim hHcim Soa ohqsmim kcb bsod emi la ihio obktb bit iSral la iktbo oal admt iSral la ibao oidetm ki ani adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:10	ien obien hTeo at emi lamr Slom oain Slom ohoa bnh Hiz ohnm THim ato tpl׃ 
ezekiel 13:11	amr al THi tpl oipl hih gSm SoTp oatnh abni algbiS tplnh oroH serot tbqe׃ 
ezekiel 13:12	ohnh npl hqir hloa iamr alikm aih hTiH aSr THtm׃ 
ezekiel 13:13	lkn kh amr adni ihoh obqeti roH serot bHmti ogSm STp bapi ihih oabni algbiS bHmh lklh׃ 
ezekiel 13:14	ohrsti at hqir aSr THtm tpl ohgetiho al harz onglh isdo onplh oklitm btokh oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:15	okliti at Hmti bqir obTHim ato tpl oamr lkm ain hqir oain hTHim ato׃ 
ezekiel 13:16	nbiai iSral hnbaim al iroSlm ohHcim lh Hcon Slm oain Slm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:17	oath bn adm Sim pnik al bnot emk hmtnbaot mlbhn ohnba elihn׃ 
ezekiel 13:18	oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hoi lmtprot kstot el kl azili idi oeSot hmspHot el raS kl qomh lzodd npSot hnpSot tzoddnh lemi onpSot lknh tHiinh׃ 
ezekiel 13:19	otHllnh ati al emi bSeli Serim obptoti lHm lhmit npSot aSr la tmotnh olHiot npSot aSr la tHiinh bkcbkm lemi Smei kcb׃ 
ezekiel 13:20	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni al kstotiknh aSr atnh mzddot Sm at hnpSot lprHot oqreti atm mel croetikm oSlHti at hnpSot aSr atm mzddot at npSim lprHt׃ 
ezekiel 13:21	oqreti at mspHtikm ohzlti at emi midkn ola ihio eod bidkn lmzodh oidetn ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 13:22	ien hkaot lb zdiq Sqr oani la hkabtio olHcq idi rSe lblti Sob mdrko hre lhHito׃ 
ezekiel 13:23	lkn Soa la tHcinh oqsm la tqsmnh eod ohzlti at emi midkn oidetn ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 14:1	oiboa ali anSim mcqni iSral oiSbo lpni׃ 
ezekiel 14:2	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 14:3	bn adm hanSim halh helo glolihm el lbm omkSol eonm ntno nkH pnihm hadrS adrS lhm׃ 
ezekiel 14:4	lkn dbr aotm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh aiS aiS mbit iSral aSr ielh at glolio al lbo omkSol eono iSim nkH pnio oba al hnbia ani ihoh neniti lo bh brb glolio׃ 
ezekiel 14:5	lmen tpS at bit iSral blbm aSr ncro meli bglolihm klm׃ 
ezekiel 14:6	lkn amr al bit iSral kh amr adni ihoh Sobo ohSibo mel glolikm omel kl toebtikm hSibo pnikm׃ 
ezekiel 14:7	ki aiS aiS mbit iSral omhgr aSr igor biSral oincr maHri oiel glolio al lbo omkSol eono iSim nkH pnio oba al hnbia ldrS lo bi ani ihoh nenh lo bi׃ 
ezekiel 14:8	ontti pni baiS hhoa ohSmtiho laot olmSlim ohkrtio mtok emi oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 14:9	ohnbia ki ipth odbr dbr ani ihoh ptiti at hnbia hhoa onTiti at idi elio ohSmdtio mtok emi iSral׃ 
ezekiel 14:10	onSao eonm keon hdrS keon hnbia ihih׃ 
ezekiel 14:11	lmen la iteo eod bit iSral maHri ola iTmao eod bkl pSeihm ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 14:12	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 14:13	bn adm arz ki tHTa li lmel mel onTiti idi elih oSbrti lh mTh lHm ohSlHti bh reb ohkrti mmnh adm obhmh׃ 
ezekiel 14:14	ohio SlSt hanSim halh btokh nH dnal oaiob hmh bzdqtm inzlo npSm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 14:15	lo Hih reh aebir barz oSklth ohith Smmh mbli eobr mpni hHih׃ 
ezekiel 14:16	SlSt hanSim halh btokh Hi ani nam adni ihoh am bnim oam bnot izilo hmh lbdm inzlo oharz thih Smmh׃ 
ezekiel 14:17	ao Hrb abia el harz hhia oamrti Hrb tebr barz ohkrti mmnh adm obhmh׃ 
ezekiel 14:18	oSlSt hanSim halh btokh Hi ani nam adni ihoh la izilo bnim obnot ki hm lbdm inzlo׃ 
ezekiel 14:19	ao dbr aSlH al harz hhia oSpkti Hmti elih bdm lhkrit mmnh adm obhmh׃ 
ezekiel 14:20	onH dnal oaiob btokh Hi ani nam adni ihoh am bn am bt izilo hmh bzdqtm izilo npSm׃ 
ezekiel 14:21	ki kh amr adni ihoh ap ki arbet SpTi hreim Hrb oreb oHih reh odbr SlHti al iroSlm lhkrit mmnh adm obhmh׃ 
ezekiel 14:22	ohnh notrh bh plTh hmozaim bnim obnot hnm iozaim alikm oraitm at drkm oat elilotm onHmtm el hreh aSr hbati el iroSlm at kl aSr hbati elih׃ 
ezekiel 14:23	onHmo atkm ki trao at drkm oat elilotm oidetm ki la Hnm eSiti at kl aSr eSiti bh nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 15:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 15:2	bn adm mh ihih ez hgpn mkl ez hcmorh aSr hih bezi hier׃ 
ezekiel 15:3	hiqH mmno ez leSot lmlakh am iqHo mmno itd ltlot elio kl kli׃ 
ezekiel 15:4	hnh laS ntn laklh at Sni qzotio aklh haS otoko nHr hizlH lmlakh׃ 
ezekiel 15:5	hnh bhioto tmim la ieSh lmlakh ap ki aS akltho oiHr oneSh eod lmlakh׃

ezekiel 16:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 16:2	bn adm hode at iroSlm at toebtih׃ 
ezekiel 16:3	oamrt kh amr adni ihoh liroSlm mkrtik omldtik marz hkneni abik hamri oamk Htit׃ 
ezekiel 16:4	omoldotik biom holdt atk la krt Srk obmim la rHzt lmSei ohmlH la hmlHt ohHtl la Htlt׃ 
ezekiel 16:5	la Hsh elik ein leSot lk aHt malh lHmlh elik otSlki al pni hSdh bgel npSk biom hldt atk׃ 
ezekiel 16:6	oaebr elik oarak mtbosst bdmik oamr lk bdmik Hii oamr lk bdmik Hii׃ 
ezekiel 16:7	rbbh kzmH hSdh nttik otrbi otgdli otbai bedi ediim Sdim nkno oSerk zmH oat erm oerih׃ 
ezekiel 16:8	oaebr elik oarak ohnh etk et ddim oaprS knpi elik oaksh erotk oaSbe lk oaboa bbrit atk nam adni ihoh othii li׃ 
ezekiel 16:9	oarHzk bmim oaSTp dmik melik oaskk bSmn׃ 
ezekiel 16:10	oalbiSk rqmh oanelk tHS oaHbSk bSS oaksk mSi׃ 
ezekiel 16:11	oaedk edi oatnh zmidim el idik orbid el gronk׃ 
ezekiel 16:12	oatn ncm el apk oegilim el acnik oeTrt tpart braSk׃ 
ezekiel 16:13	otedi chb oksp omlboSk SSi omSi orqmh slt odbS oSmn aklti otipi bmad mad otzlHi lmlokh׃ 
ezekiel 16:14	oiza lk Sm bgoim bipik ki klil hoa bhdri aSr Smti elik nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 16:15	otbTHi bipik otcni el Smk otSpki at tcnotik el kl eobr lo ihi׃ 
ezekiel 16:16	otqHi mbgdik oteSi lk bmot Tlaot otcni elihm la baot ola ihih׃ 
ezekiel 16:17	otqHi kli tpartk mchbi omkspi aSr ntti lk oteSi lk zlmi ckr otcni bm׃ 
ezekiel 16:18	otqHi at bgdi rqmtk otksim oSmni oqTrti ntti lpnihm׃ 
ezekiel 16:19	olHmi aSr ntti lk slt oSmn odbS hakltik onttiho lpnihm lriH niHH oihi nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 16:20	otqHi at bnik oat bnotik aSr ildt li otcbHim lhm lakol hmeT mtcntk׃ 
ezekiel 16:21	otSHTi at bni ottnim bhebir aotm lhm׃ 
ezekiel 16:22	oat kl toebtik otcntik la ckrti at imi neorik bhiotk erm oerih mtbosst bdmk hiit׃ 
ezekiel 16:23	oihi aHri kl retk aoi aoi lk nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 16:24	otbni lk gb oteSi lk rmh bkl rHob׃ 
ezekiel 16:25	al kl raS drk bnit rmtk ottebi at ipik otpSqi at rglik lkl eobr otrbi at tcntk׃ 
ezekiel 16:26	otcni al bni mzrim Sknik gdli bSr otrbi at tcntk lhkeisni׃ 
ezekiel 16:27	ohnh nTiti idi elik oagre Hqk oatnk bnpS Snaotik bnot plStim hnklmot mdrkk cmh׃ 
ezekiel 16:28	otcni al bni aSor mblti Sbetk otcnim ogm la Sbet׃ 
ezekiel 16:29	otrbi at tcnotk al arz knen kSdimh ogm bcat la Sbet׃ 
ezekiel 16:30	mh amlh lbtk nam adni ihoh beSotk at kl alh meSh aSh conh SlTt׃ 
ezekiel 16:31	bbnotik gbk braS kl drk ormtk eSiti bkl rHob ola hiiti kconh lqls atnn׃ 
ezekiel 16:32	haSh hmnapt tHt aiSh tqH at crim׃ 
ezekiel 16:33	lkl cnot itno ndh oat ntt at ndnik lkl mahbik otSHdi aotm lboa alik msbib btcnotik׃ 
ezekiel 16:34	oihi bk hpk mn hnSim btcnotik oaHrik la conh obttk atnn oatnn la ntn lk othi lhpk׃ 
ezekiel 16:35	lkn conh Smei dbr ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 16:36	kh amr adni ihoh ien hSpk nHStk otglh erotk btcnotik el mahbik oel kl gloli toebotik okdmi bnik aSr ntt lhm׃ 
ezekiel 16:37	lkn hnni mqbz at kl mahbik aSr erbt elihm oat kl aSr ahbt el kl aSr Snat oqbzti atm elik msbib ogliti erotk alhm orao at kl erotk׃ 
ezekiel 16:38	oSpTtik mSpTi napot oSpkt dm onttik dm Hmh oqnah׃ 
ezekiel 16:39	ontti aotk bidm ohrso gbk ontzo rmtik ohpSiTo aotk bgdik olqHo kli tpartk ohniHok eirm oerih׃ 
ezekiel 16:40	ohelo elik qhl orgmo aotk babn obtqok bHrbotm׃ 
ezekiel 16:41	oSrpo btik baS oeSo bk SpTim leini nSim rbot ohSbtik mconh ogm atnn la ttni eod׃ 
ezekiel 16:42	ohnHti Hmti bk osrh qnati mmk oSqTti ola akes eod׃ 
ezekiel 16:43	ien aSr la ckrti at imi neorik otrgci li bkl alh ogm ani ha drkk braS ntti nam adni ihoh ola eSiti at hcmh el kl toebtik׃ 
ezekiel 16:44	hnh kl hmSl elik imSl lamr kamh bth׃ 
ezekiel 16:45	bt amk at gelt aiSh obnih oaHot aHotk at aSr gelo anSihn obnihn amkn Htit oabikn amri׃ 
ezekiel 16:46	oaHotk hgdolh Smron hia obnotih hioSbt el Smaolk oaHotk hqTnh mmk hioSbt mimink sdm obnotih׃ 
ezekiel 16:47	ola bdrkihn hlkt obtoebotihn eSiti kmeT qT otSHti mhn bkl drkik׃ 
ezekiel 16:48	Hi ani nam adni ihoh am eSth sdm aHotk hia obnotih kaSr eSit at obnotik׃ 
ezekiel 16:49	hnh ch hih eon sdm aHotk gaon Sbet lHm oSlot hSqT hih lh olbnotih oid eni oabion la hHciqh׃ 
ezekiel 16:50	otgbhinh oteSinh toebh lpni oasir athn kaSr raiti׃ 
ezekiel 16:51	oSmron kHzi HTatik la HTah otrbi at toebotik mhnh otzdqi at aHotk bkl toebtik aSr eSiti׃ 
ezekiel 16:52	gm at Sai klmtk aSr pllt laHotk bHTatik aSr htebt mhn tzdqnh mmk ogm at boSi oSai klmtk bzdqtk aHiotk׃ 
ezekiel 16:53	oSbti at Sbothn at Sbit sdm obnotih oat Sbit Smron obnotih oSbit Sbitik btokhnh׃ 
ezekiel 16:54	lmen tSai klmtk onklmt mkl aSr eSit bnHmk atn׃ 
ezekiel 16:55	oaHotik sdm obnotih tSbn lqdmtn oSmron obnotih tSbn lqdmtn oat obnotik tSbinh lqdmtkn׃ 
ezekiel 16:56	oloa hith sdm aHotk lSmoeh bpik biom gaonik׃ 
ezekiel 16:57	bTrm tglh retk kmo et Hrpt bnot arm okl sbibotih bnot plStim hSaTot aotk msbib׃ 
ezekiel 16:58	at cmtk oat toebotik at nSatim nam ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 16:59	ki kh amr adni ihoh oeSit aotk kaSr eSit aSr bcit alh lhpr brit׃ 
ezekiel 16:60	ockrti ani at briti aotk bimi neorik ohqmoti lk brit eolm׃

ezekiel 18:5	oaiS ki ihih zdiq oeSh mSpT ozdqh׃

ezekiel 22:13	ohnh hkiti kpi al bzek aSr eSit oel dmk aSr hio btokk׃ 
ezekiel 22:14	hiemd lbk am tHcqnh idik limim aSr ani eSh aotk ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti׃ 
ezekiel 22:15	ohpizoti aotk bgoim ocritik barzot ohtmti Tmatk mmk׃ 
ezekiel 22:16	onHlt bk leini goim oidet ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 22:17	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 22:18	bn adm hio li bit iSral lsog klm nHSt obdil obrcl oeoprt btok kor sgim ksp hio׃ 
ezekiel 22:19	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien hiot klkm lsgim lkn hnni qbz atkm al tok iroSlm׃ 
ezekiel 22:20	qbzt ksp onHSt obrcl oeoprt obdil al tok kor lpHt elio aS lhntik kn aqbz bapi obHmti ohnHti ohtkti atkm׃ 
ezekiel 22:21	oknsti atkm onpHti elikm baS ebrti ontktm btokh׃ 
ezekiel 22:22	khtok ksp btok kor kn ttko btokh oidetm ki ani ihoh Spkti Hmti elikm׃ 
ezekiel 22:23	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 22:24	bn adm amr lh at arz la mThrh hia la gSmh biom cem׃ 
ezekiel 22:25	qSr nbiaih btokh kari Soag Trp Trp npS aklo Hsn oiqr iqHo almnotih hrbo btokh׃ 
ezekiel 22:26	khnih Hmso torti oiHllo qdSi bin qdS lHl la hbdilo obin hTma lThor la hodieo omSbtoti helimo einihm oaHl btokm׃ 
ezekiel 22:27	Srih bqrbh kcabim Trpi Trp lSpk dm labd npSot lmen bze bze׃ 
ezekiel 22:28	onbiaih THo lhm tpl Hcim Soa oqsmim lhm kcb amrim kh amr adni ihoh oihoh la dbr׃

ezekiel 23:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 23:2	bn adm Stim nSim bnot am aHt hio׃ 
ezekiel 23:3	otcninh bmzrim bneorihn cno Smh meko Sdihn oSm eSo ddi btolihn׃ 
ezekiel 23:4	oSmotn ahlh hgdolh oahlibh aHoth othiinh li otldnh bnim obnot oSmotn Smron ahlh oiroSlm ahlibh׃ 
ezekiel 23:5	otcn ahlh tHti otegb el mahbih al aSor qrobim׃ 
ezekiel 23:6	lbSi tklt pHot osgnim bHori Hmd klm prSim rkbi sosim׃ 
ezekiel 23:7	ottn tcnotih elihm mbHr bni aSor klm obkl aSr egbh bkl glolihm nTmah׃ 
ezekiel 23:8	oat tcnotih mmzrim la ecbh ki aoth Skbo bneorih ohmh eSo ddi btolih oiSpko tcnotm elih׃ 
ezekiel 23:9	lkn nttih bid mahbih bid bni aSor aSr egbh elihm׃ 
ezekiel 23:10	hmh glo eroth bnih obnotih lqHo oaoth bHrb hrgo othi Sm lnSim oSpoTim eSo bh׃ 
ezekiel 23:11	otra aHoth ahlibh otSHt egbth mmnh oat tcnotih mcnoni aHoth׃ 
ezekiel 23:12	al bni aSor egbh pHot osgnim qrbim lbSi mklol prSim rkbi sosim bHori Hmd klm׃ 
ezekiel 23:13	oara ki nTmah drk aHd lStihn׃ 
ezekiel 23:14	otosp al tcnotih otra anSi mHqh el hqir zlmi kSdiim Hqqim bSSr׃ 
ezekiel 23:15	Hgori acor bmtnihm sroHi Tbolim braSihm mrah SliSim klm dmot bni bbl kSdim arz moldtm׃ 
ezekiel 23:16	otegb elihm lmrah einih otSlH mlakim alihm kSdimh׃ 
ezekiel 23:17	oibao alih bni bbl lmSkb ddim oiTmao aoth btcnotm otTma bm otqe npSh mhm׃ 
ezekiel 23:18	otgl tcnotih otgl at eroth otqe npSi melih kaSr nqeh npSi mel aHoth׃ 
ezekiel 23:19	otrbh at tcnotih lckr at imi neorih aSr cnth barz mzrim׃ 
ezekiel 23:20	otegbh el plgSihm aSr bSr Hmorim bSrm ocrmt sosim crmtm׃ 
ezekiel 23:21	otpqdi at cmt neorik beSot mmzrim ddik lmen Sdi neorik׃ 
ezekiel 23:22	lkn ahlibh kh amr adni ihoh hnni meir at mahbik elik at aSr nqeh npSk mhm ohbatim elik msbib׃ 
ezekiel 23:23	bni bbl okl kSdim pqod oSoe oqoe kl bni aSor aotm bHori Hmd pHot osgnim klm SlSim oqroaim rkbi sosim klm׃ 
ezekiel 23:24	obao elik hzn rkb oglgl obqhl emim znh omgn oqobe iSimo elik sbib ontti lpnihm mSpT oSpTok bmSpTihm׃ 
ezekiel 23:25	ontti qnati bk oeSo aotk bHmh apk oacnik isiro oaHritk bHrb tpol hmh bnik obnotik iqHo oaHritk takl baS׃ 
ezekiel 23:26	ohpSiTok at bgdik olqHo kli tpartk׃ 
ezekiel 23:27	ohSbti cmtk mmk oat cnotk marz mzrim ola tSai einik alihm omzrim la tckri eod׃ 
ezekiel 23:28	ki kh amr adni ihoh hnni ntnk bid aSr Snat bid aSr nqeh npSk mhm׃ 
ezekiel 23:29	oeSo aotk bSnah olqHo kl igiek oecbok eirm oerih onglh erot cnonik ocmtk otcnotik׃ 
ezekiel 23:30	eSh alh lk bcnotk aHri goim el aSr nTmat bglolihm׃ 
ezekiel 23:31	bdrk aHotk hlkt ontti kosh bidk׃ 
ezekiel 23:32	kh amr adni ihoh kos aHotk tSti hemqh ohrHbh thih lzHq olleg mrbh lhkil׃ 
ezekiel 23:33	Skron oigon tmlai kos Smh oSmmh kos aHotk Smron׃ 
ezekiel 23:34	oStit aoth omzit oat HrSih tgrmi oSdik tntqi ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 23:35	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien SkHt aoti otSliki aoti aHri gok ogm at Sai cmtk oat tcnotik׃ 
ezekiel 23:36	oiamr ihoh ali bn adm htSpoT at ahlh oat ahlibh ohgd lhn at toebotihn׃ 
ezekiel 23:37	ki napo odm bidihn oat glolihn napo ogm at bnihn aSr ildo li hebiro lhm laklh׃ 
ezekiel 23:38	eod cat eSo li Tmao at mqdSi biom hhoa oat Sbtoti Hllo׃ 
ezekiel 23:39	obSHTm at bnihm lglolihm oibao al mqdSi biom hhoa lHllo ohnh kh eSo btok biti׃ 
ezekiel 23:40	oap ki tSlHnh lanSim baim mmrHq aSr mlak SloH alihm ohnh bao laSr rHzt kHlt einik oedit edi׃ 
ezekiel 23:41	oiSbt el mTh kbodh oSlHn erok lpnih oqTrti oSmni Smt elih׃ 
ezekiel 23:42	oqol hmon Slo bh oal anSim mrb adm mobaim sobaim mmdbr oitno zmidim al idihn oeTrt tpart el raSihn׃ 
ezekiel 23:43	oamr lblh naopim et icnh tcnotih ohia׃ 
ezekiel 23:44	oiboa alih kboa al aSh conh kn bao al ahlh oal ahlibh aSt hcmh׃ 
ezekiel 23:45	oanSim zdiqm hmh iSpTo aothm mSpT napot omSpT Spkot dm ki napt hnh odm bidihn׃ 
ezekiel 23:46	ki kh amr adni ihoh helh elihm qhl ontn athn lceoh olbc׃

ezekiel 24:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali bSnh htSieit bHdS heSiri beSor lHdS lamr׃ 
ezekiel 24:2	bn adm ktob lk at Sm hiom at ezm hiom hch smk mlk bbl al iroSlm bezm hiom hch׃ 
ezekiel 24:3	omSl al bit hmri mSl oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh Spt hsir Spt ogm izq bo mim׃ 
ezekiel 24:4	asp ntHih alih kl ntH Tob irk oktp mbHr ezmim mla׃ 
ezekiel 24:5	mbHr hzan lqoH ogm dor hezmim tHtih rtH rtHih gm bSlo ezmih btokh׃ 
ezekiel 24:6	lkn kh amr adni ihoh aoi eir hdmim sir aSr Hlath bh oHlath la izah mmnh lntHih lntHih hoziah la npl elih gorl׃ 
ezekiel 24:7	ki dmh btokh hih el zHiH sle Smtho la Spktho el harz lksot elio epr׃ 
ezekiel 24:8	lhelot Hmh lnqm nqm ntti at dmh el zHiH sle lblti hksot׃ 
ezekiel 24:9	lkn kh amr adni ihoh aoi eir hdmim gm ani agdil hmdorh׃ 
ezekiel 24:10	hrbh hezim hdlq haS htm hbSr ohrqH hmrqHh ohezmot iHro׃ 
ezekiel 24:11	ohemidh el gHlih rqh lmen tHm oHrh nHSth ontkh btokh Tmath ttm Hlath׃ 
ezekiel 24:12	tanim hlat ola tza mmnh rbt Hlath baS Hlath׃ 
ezekiel 24:13	bTmatk cmh ien Thrtik ola Thrt mTmatk la tThri eod ed hniHi at Hmti bk׃ 
ezekiel 24:14	ani ihoh dbrti bah oeSiti la apre ola aHos ola anHm kdrkik okelilotik SpTok nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 24:15	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 24:16	bn adm hnni lqH mmk at mHmd einik bmgph ola tspd ola tbkh oloa tboa dmetk׃ 
ezekiel 24:17	hanq dm mtim abl la teSh park HboS elik onelik tSim brglik ola teTh el Spm olHm anSim la takl׃ 
ezekiel 24:18	oadbr al hem bbqr otmt aSti berb oaeS bbqr kaSr zoiti׃ 
ezekiel 24:19	oiamro ali hem hla tgid lno mh alh lno ki ath eSh׃ 
ezekiel 24:20	oamr alihm dbr ihoh hih ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 24:21	amr lbit iSral kh amr adni ihoh hnni mHll at mqdSi gaon eckm mHmd einikm omHml npSkm obnikm obnotikm aSr ecbtm bHrb iplo׃ 
ezekiel 24:22	oeSitm kaSr eSiti el Spm la teTo olHm anSim la taklo׃ 
ezekiel 24:23	oparkm el raSikm onelikm brglikm la tspdo ola tbko onmqtm beontikm onhmtm aiS al aHio׃

ezekiel 24:27	biom hhoa iptH pik at hpliT otdbr ola talm eod ohiit lhm lmopt oideo ki ani ihoh׃

ezekiel 25:2	bn adm Sim pnik al bni emon ohnba elihm׃

ezekiel 25:4	lkn hnni ntnk lbni qdm lmorSh oiSbo Tirotihm bk ontno bk mSknihm hmh iaklo prik ohmh iSto Hlbk׃ 
ezekiel 25:5	ontti at rbh lnoh gmlim oat bni emon lmrbz zan oidetm ki ani ihoh׃

ezekiel 25:9	lkn hnni ptH at ktp moab mherim merio mqzho zbi arz bit hiSimt bel meon oqritmh׃ 
ezekiel 25:10	lbni qdm el bni emon onttih lmorSh lmen la tckr bni emon bgoim׃ 
ezekiel 25:11	obmoab aeSh SpTim oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 25:12	kh amr adni ihoh ien eSot adom bnqm nqm lbit ihodh oiaSmo aSom onqmo bhm׃ 
ezekiel 25:13	lkn kh amr adni ihoh onTti idi el adom ohkrti mmnh adm obhmh onttih Hrbh mtimn oddnh bHrb iplo׃ 
ezekiel 25:14	ontti at nqmti badom bid emi iSral oeSo badom kapi okHmti oideo at nqmti nam adni ihoh׃

ezekiel 26:3	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik zr oheliti elik goim rbim khelot him lglio׃ 
ezekiel 26:4	oSHto Hmot zr ohrso mgdlih osHiti eprh mmnh ontti aoth lzHiH sle׃ 
ezekiel 26:5	mSTH Hrmim thih btok him ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh ohith lbc lgoim׃ 
ezekiel 26:6	obnotih aSr bSdh bHrb thrgnh oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 26:7	ki kh amr adni ihoh hnni mbia al zr nbokdrazr mlk bbl mzpon mlk mlkim bsos obrkb obprSim oqhl oem rb׃

ezekiel 26:10	mSpet sosio iksk abqm mqol prS oglgl orkb treSnh Homotik bbao bSerik kmboai eir mbqeh׃ 
ezekiel 26:11	bprsot sosio irms at kl Hozotik emk bHrb ihrg omzbot eck larz trd׃

ezekiel 26:13	ohSbti hmon Sirik oqol knorik la iSme eod׃ 
ezekiel 26:14	onttik lzHiH sle mSTH Hrmim thih la tbnh eod ki ani ihoh dbrti nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 26:15	kh amr adni ihoh lzor hla mqol mpltk banq Hll bhrg hrg btokk ireSo haiim׃ 
ezekiel 26:16	oirdo mel ksaotm kl nSiai him ohsiro at meilihm oat bgdi rqmtm ipSTo Hrdot ilbSo el harz iSbo oHrdo lrgeim oSmmo elik׃ 
ezekiel 26:17	onSao elik qinh oamro lk aik abdt noSbt mimim heir hhllh aSr hith Hcqh bim hia oiSbih aSr ntno Htitm lkl ioSbih׃ 
ezekiel 26:18	eth iHrdo hain iom mpltk onbhlo haiim aSr bim mzatk׃ 
ezekiel 26:19	ki kh amr adni ihoh btti atk eir nHrbt kerim aSr la noSbo bhelot elik at thom oksok hmim hrbim׃ 
ezekiel 26:20	ohordtik at iordi bor al em eolm ohoSbtik barz tHtiot kHrbot meolm at iordi bor lmen la tSbi ontti zbi barz Hiim׃

ezekiel 27:2	oath bn adm Sa el zr qinh׃ 
ezekiel 27:3	oamrt lzor hiSbti el mboat im rklt hemim al aiim rbim kh amr adni ihoh zor at amrt ani klilt ipi׃ 
ezekiel 27:4	blb imim gbolik bnik kllo ipik׃ 
ezekiel 27:5	broSim mSnir bno lk at kl lHtim arc mlbnon lqHo leSot trn elik׃ 
ezekiel 27:6	alonim mbSn eSo mSoTik qrSk eSo Sn bt aSrim maii ktim׃ 
ezekiel 27:7	SS brqmh mmzrim hih mprSk lhiot lk lns tklt oargmn maii aliSh hih mksk׃ 
ezekiel 27:8	iSbi zidon oarod hio STim lk Hkmik zor hio bk hmh Hblik׃ 
ezekiel 27:9	cqni gbl oHkmih hio bk mHciqi bdqk kl aniot him omlHihm hio bk lerb merbk׃ 
ezekiel 27:10	prs olod opoT hio bHilk anSi mlHmtk mgn okobe tlo bk hmh ntno hdrk׃ 
ezekiel 27:11	bni arod oHilk el Homotik sbib ogmdim bmgdlotik hio SlTihm tlo el Homotik sbib hmh kllo ipik׃ 
ezekiel 27:12	trSiS sHrtk mrb kl hon bksp brcl bdil oeoprt ntno ecbonik׃ 
ezekiel 27:13	ion tbl omSk hmh rklik bnpS adm okli nHSt ntno merbk׃ 
ezekiel 27:14	mbit togrmh sosim oprSim oprdim ntno ecbonik׃ 
ezekiel 27:15	bni ddn rklik aiim rbim sHrt idk qrnot Sn ohobnim hSibo aSkrk׃ 
ezekiel 27:16	arm sHrtk mrb meSik bnpk argmn orqmh oboz oramt okdkd ntno becbonik׃ 
ezekiel 27:17	ihodh oarz iSral hmh rklik bHTi mnit opng odbS oSmn ozri ntno merbk׃ 
ezekiel 27:18	dmSq sHrtk brb meSik mrb kl hon biin Hlbon ozmr zHr׃ 
ezekiel 27:19	odn oion maocl becbonik ntno brcl eSot qdh oqnh bmerbk hih׃ 
ezekiel 27:20	ddn rkltk bbgdi HpS lrkbh׃ 
ezekiel 27:21	erb okl nSiai qdr hmh sHri idk bkrim oailim oetodim bm sHrik׃ 
ezekiel 27:22	rkli Sba oremh hmh rklik braS kl bSm obkl abn iqrh ochb ntno ecbonik׃ 
ezekiel 27:23	Hrn oknh oedn rkli Sba aSor klmd rkltk׃ 
ezekiel 27:24	hmh rklik bmkllim bglomi tklt orqmh obgnci brmim bHblim HbSim oarcim bmrkltk׃ 
ezekiel 27:25	aniot trSiS Srotik merbk otmlai otkbdi mad blb imim׃ 
ezekiel 27:26	bmim rbim hbiaok hSTim atk roH hqdim Sbrk blb imim׃ 
ezekiel 27:27	honk oecbonik merbk mlHik oHblik mHciqi bdqk oerbi merbk okl anSi mlHmtk aSr bk obkl qhlk aSr btokk iplo blb imim biom mpltk׃ 
ezekiel 27:28	lqol ceqt Hblik ireSo mgrSot׃ 
ezekiel 27:29	oirdo maniotihm kl tpSi mSoT mlHim kl Hbli him al harz iemdo׃ 
ezekiel 27:30	ohSmieo elik bqolm oiceqo mrh oielo epr el raSihm bapr itplSo׃ 
ezekiel 27:31	ohqriHo alik qrHh oHgro Sqim obko alik bmr npS mspd mr׃ 
ezekiel 27:32	onSao alik bnihm qinh oqonno elik mi kzor kdmh btok him׃ 
ezekiel 27:33	bzat ecbonik mimim hSbet emim rbim brb honik omerbik heSrt mlki arz׃ 
ezekiel 27:34	et nSbrt mimim bmemqi mim merbk okl qhlk btokk nplo׃ 
ezekiel 27:35	kl iSbi haiim Smmo elik omlkihm Sero Ser remo pnim׃
