ezekiel 28:2	bn adm amr lngid zr kh amr adni ihoh ien gbh lbk otamr al ani moSb alhim iSbti blb imim oath adm ola al ottn lbk klb alhim׃ 
ezekiel 28:3	hnh Hkm ath mdnal kl stom la emmok׃ 
ezekiel 28:4	bHkmtk obtbontk eSit lk Hil oteS chb oksp baozrotik׃ 
ezekiel 28:5	brb Hkmtk brkltk hrbit Hilk oigbh lbbk bHilk׃ 
ezekiel 28:6	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien ttk at lbbk klb alhim׃ 
ezekiel 28:7	lkn hnni mbia elik crim erizi goim ohriqo Hrbotm el ipi Hkmtk oHllo ipetk׃ 
ezekiel 28:8	lSHt iordok omth mmoti Hll blb imim׃ 
ezekiel 28:9	hamr tamr alhim ani lpni hrgk oath adm ola al bid mHllik׃ 
ezekiel 28:10	moti erlim tmot bid crim ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 28:11	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 28:12	bn adm Sa qinh el mlk zor oamrt lo kh amr adni ihoh ath Hotm tknit mla Hkmh oklil ipi׃ 
ezekiel 28:13	bedn gn alhim hiit kl abn iqrh msktk adm pTdh oihlm trSiS Shm oiSph spir npk obrqt ochb mlakt tpik onqbik bk biom hbrak konno׃ 
ezekiel 28:14	at krob mmSH hsokk onttik bhr qdS alhim hiit btok abni aS hthlkt׃ 
ezekiel 28:15	tmim ath bdrkik miom hbrak ed nmza eolth bk׃ 
ezekiel 28:16	brb rkltk mlo tokk Hms otHTa oaHllk mhr alhim oabdk krob hskk mtok abni aS׃ 
ezekiel 28:17	gbh lbk bipik SHt Hkmtk el ipetk el arz hSlktik lpni mlkim nttik lraoh bk׃ 
ezekiel 28:18	mrb eonik beol rkltk Hllt mqdSik oaoza aS mtokk hia akltk oatnk lapr el harz leini kl raik׃ 
ezekiel 28:19	kl iodeik bemim Smmo elik blhot hiit oaink ed eolm׃ 
ezekiel 28:20	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 28:21	bn adm Sim pnik al zidon ohnba elih׃ 
ezekiel 28:22	oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik zidon onkbdti btokk oideo ki ani ihoh beSoti bh SpTim onqdSti bh׃ 
ezekiel 28:23	oSlHti bh dbr odm bHozotih onpll Hll btokh bHrb elih msbib oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 28:24	ola ihih eod lbit iSral slon mmair oqoz mkab mkl sbibtm hSaTim aotm oideo ki ani adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 28:25	kh amr adni ihoh bqbzi at bit iSral mn hemim aSr npzo bm onqdSti bm leini hgoim oiSbo el admtm aSr ntti lebdi lieqb׃ 
ezekiel 28:26	oiSbo elih lbTH obno btim onTeo krmim oiSbo lbTH beSoti SpTim bkl hSaTim atm msbibotm oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm׃ 
ezekiel 29:1	bSnh heSrit beSri bSnim eSr lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 29:2	bn adm Sim pnik el preh mlk mzrim ohnba elio oel mzrim klh׃ 
ezekiel 29:3	dbr oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik preh mlk mzrim htnim hgdol hrbz btok iario aSr amr li iari oani eSitni׃ 
ezekiel 29:4	ontti HHiim blHiik ohdbqti dgt iarik bqSqStik ohelitik mtok iarik oat kl dgt iarik bqSqStik tdbq׃ 
ezekiel 29:5	onTStik hmdbrh aotk oat kl dgt iarik el pni hSdh tpol la tasp ola tqbz lHit harz oleop hSmim nttik laklh׃ 
ezekiel 29:6	oideo kl iSbi mzrim ki ani ihoh ien hiotm mSent qnh lbit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 29:7	btpSm bk bkpk troz obqet lhm kl ktp obhSenm elik tSbr ohemdt lhm kl mtnim׃ 
ezekiel 29:8	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni mbia elik Hrb ohkrti mmk adm obhmh׃ 
ezekiel 29:9	ohith arz mzrim lSmmh oHrbh oideo ki ani ihoh ien amr iar li oani eSiti׃ 
ezekiel 29:10	lkn hnni alik oal iarik ontti at arz mzrim lHrbot Hrb Smmh mmgdl sonh oed gbol koS׃ 
ezekiel 29:11	la tebr bh rgl adm orgl bhmh la tebr bh ola tSb arbeim Snh׃ 
ezekiel 29:12	ontti at arz mzrim Smmh btok arzot nSmot oerih btok erim mHrbot thiin Smmh arbeim Snh ohpzti at mzrim bgoim ocritim barzot׃ 
ezekiel 29:13	ki kh amr adni ihoh mqz arbeim Snh aqbz at mzrim mn hemim aSr npzo Smh׃ 
ezekiel 29:14	oSbti at Sbot mzrim ohSbti atm arz ptros el arz mkortm ohio Sm mmlkh Splh׃ 
ezekiel 29:15	mn hmmlkot thih Splh ola ttnSa eod el hgoim ohmeTtim lblti rdot bgoim׃ 
ezekiel 29:16	ola ihih eod lbit iSral lmbTH mckir eon bpnotm aHrihm oideo ki ani adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 29:17	oihi beSrim oSbe Snh braSon baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 29:18	bn adm nbokdrazr mlk bbl hebid at Hilo ebdh gdlh al zr kl raS mqrH okl ktp mroTh oSkr la hih lo olHilo mzr el hebdh aSr ebd elih׃ 
ezekiel 29:19	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni ntn lnbokdrazr mlk bbl at arz mzrim onSa hmnh oSll Sllh obcc bch ohith Skr lHilo׃ 
ezekiel 29:20	pelto aSr ebd bh ntti lo at arz mzrim aSr eSo li nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 29:21	biom hhoa azmiH qrn lbit iSral olk atn ptHon ph btokm oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 30:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 30:2	bn adm hnba oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hililo hh liom׃ 
ezekiel 30:3	ki qrob iom oqrob iom lihoh iom enn et goim ihih׃ 
ezekiel 30:4	obah Hrb bmzrim ohith HlHlh bkoS bnpl Hll bmzrim olqHo hmonh onhrso isodtih׃ 
ezekiel 30:5	koS opoT olod okl herb okob obni arz hbrit atm bHrb iplo׃ 
ezekiel 30:6	kh amr ihoh onplo smki mzrim oird gaon ech mmgdl sonh bHrb iplo bh nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 30:7	onSmo btok arzot nSmot oerio btok erim nHrbot thiinh׃ 
ezekiel 30:8	oideo ki ani ihoh btti aS bmzrim onSbro kl ecrih׃ 
ezekiel 30:9	biom hhoa izao mlakim mlpni bzim lhHrid at koS bTH ohith HlHlh bhm biom mzrim ki hnh bah׃ 
ezekiel 30:10	kh amr adni ihoh ohSbti at hmon mzrim bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl׃ 
ezekiel 30:11	hoa oemo ato erizi goim mobaim lSHt harz ohriqo Hrbotm el mzrim omlao at harz Hll׃ 
ezekiel 30:12	ontti iarim Hrbh omkrti at harz bid reim ohSmti arz omlah bid crim ani ihoh dbrti׃ 
ezekiel 30:13	kh amr adni ihoh ohabdti glolim ohSbti alilim mnp onSia marz mzrim la ihih eod ontti irah barz mzrim׃ 
ezekiel 30:14	ohSmti at ptros ontti aS bzen oeSiti SpTim bna׃ 
ezekiel 30:15	oSpkti Hmti el sin meoc mzrim ohkrti at hmon na׃ 
ezekiel 30:16	ontti aS bmzrim Hol tHil sin ona thih lhbqe onp zri iomm׃ 
ezekiel 30:17	bHori aon opi bst bHrb iplo ohnh bSbi tlknh׃ 
ezekiel 30:18	obtHpnHs HSk hiom bSbri Sm at mTot mzrim onSbt bh gaon ech hia enn iksnh obnotih bSbi tlknh׃ 
ezekiel 30:19	oeSiti SpTim bmzrim oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 30:20	oihi baHt eSrh Snh braSon bSbeh lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 30:21	bn adm at croe preh mlk mzrim Sbrti ohnh la HbSh ltt rpaot lSom Htol lHbSh lHcqh ltpS bHrb׃ 
ezekiel 30:22	lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni al preh mlk mzrim oSbrti at cretio at hHcqh oat hnSbrt ohplti at hHrb mido׃ 
ezekiel 30:23	ohpzoti at mzrim bgoim ocritm barzot׃ 
ezekiel 30:24	oHcqti at creot mlk bbl ontti at Hrbi bido oSbrti at creot preh onaq naqot Hll lpnio׃ 
ezekiel 30:25	ohHcqti at creot mlk bbl ocreot preh tplnh oideo ki ani ihoh btti Hrbi bid mlk bbl onTh aoth al arz mzrim׃ 
ezekiel 30:26	ohpzoti at mzrim bgoim ocriti aotm barzot oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 31:1	oihi baHt eSrh Snh bSliSi baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 31:2	bn adm amr al preh mlk mzrim oal hmono al mi dmit bgdlk׃ 
ezekiel 31:3	hnh aSor arc blbnon iph enp oHrS mzl ogbh qomh obin ebtim hith zmrto׃ 
ezekiel 31:4	mim gdloho thom rmmtho at nhrtih hlk sbibot mTeh oat teltih SlHh al kl ezi hSdh׃ 
ezekiel 31:5	el kn gbha qmto mkl ezi hSdh otrbinh sreptio otarknh parto mmim rbim bSlHo׃ 
ezekiel 31:6	bseptio qnno kl eop hSmim otHt partio ildo kl Hit hSdh obzlo iSbo kl goim rbim׃ 
ezekiel 31:7	oiip bgdlo bark dliotio ki hih SrSo al mim rbim׃ 
ezekiel 31:8	arcim la emmho bgn alhim broSim la dmo al septio oermnim la hio kpartio kl ez bgn alhim la dmh alio bipio׃ 
ezekiel 31:9	iph eSitio brb dliotio oiqnaho kl ezi edn aSr bgn halhim׃ 
ezekiel 31:10	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien aSr gbht bqomh oitn zmrto al bin ebotim orm lbbo bgbho׃ 
ezekiel 31:11	oatnho bid ail goim eSo ieSh lo krSeo grStho׃ 
ezekiel 31:12	oikrtho crim erizi goim oiTSho al hhrim obkl gaiot nplo dliotio otSbrnh partio bkl apiqi harz oirdo mzlo kl emi harz oiTSho׃ 
ezekiel 31:13	el mplto iSkno kl eop hSmim oal partio hio kl Hit hSdh׃ 
ezekiel 31:14	lmen aSr la igbho bqomtm kl ezi mim ola itno at zmrtm al bin ebtim ola iemdo alihm bgbhm kl Sti mim ki klm ntno lmot al arz tHtit btok bni adm al iordi bor׃ 
ezekiel 31:15	kh amr adni ihoh biom rdto Saolh hablti ksti elio at thom oamne nhrotih oiklao mim rbim oaqdr elio lbnon okl ezi hSdh elio elph׃ 
ezekiel 31:16	mqol mplto hreSti goim bhordi ato Saolh at iordi bor oinHmo barz tHtit kl ezi edn mbHr oTob lbnon kl Sti mim׃ 
ezekiel 31:17	gm hm ato irdo Salh al Hlli Hrb ocreo iSbo bzlo btok goim׃ 
ezekiel 31:18	al mi dmit kkh bkbod obgdl bezi edn ohordt at ezi edn al arz tHtit btok erlim tSkb at Hlli Hrb hoa preh okl hmonh nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 32:1	oihi bSti eSrh Snh bSni eSr HdS baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 32:2	bn adm Sa qinh el preh mlk mzrim oamrt alio kpir goim ndmit oath ktnim bimim otgH bnhrotik otdlH mim brglik otrps nhrotm׃ 
ezekiel 32:3	kh amr adni ihoh oprSti elik at rSti bqhl emim rbim ohelok bHrmi׃ 
ezekiel 32:4	onTStik barz el pni hSdh aTilk ohSknti elik kl eop hSmim ohSbeti mmk Hit kl harz׃ 
ezekiel 32:5	ontti at bSrk el hhrim omlati hgaiot rmotk׃ 
ezekiel 32:6	ohSqiti arz zptk mdmk al hhrim oapqim imlaon mmk׃ 
ezekiel 32:7	oksiti bkbotk Smim ohqdrti at kkbihm SmS benn aksno oirH la iair aoro׃ 
ezekiel 32:8	kl maori aor bSmim aqdirm elik ontti HSk el arzk nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 32:9	ohkesti lb emim rbim bhbiai Sbrk bgoim el arzot aSr la idetm׃ 
ezekiel 32:10	ohSmoti elik emim rbim omlkihm iSero elik Ser beoppi Hrbi el pnihm oHrdo lrgeim aiS lnpSo biom mpltk׃ 
ezekiel 32:11	ki kh amr adni ihoh Hrb mlk bbl tboak׃ 
ezekiel 32:12	bHrbot gborim apil hmonk erizi goim klm oSddo at gaon mzrim onSmd kl hmonh׃ 
ezekiel 32:13	ohabdti at kl bhmth mel mim rbim ola tdlHm rgl adm eod oprsot bhmh la tdlHm׃ 
ezekiel 32:14	ac aSqie mimihm onhrotm kSmn aolik nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 32:15	btti at arz mzrim Smmh onSmh arz mmlah bhkoti at kl ioSbi bh oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 32:16	qinh hia oqonnoh bnot hgoim tqonnh aoth el mzrim oel kl hmonh tqonnh aoth nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 32:17	oihi bSti eSrh Snh bHmSh eSr lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 32:18	bn adm nhh el hmon mzrim ohordho aoth obnot goim adrm al arz tHtiot at iordi bor׃ 
ezekiel 32:19	mmi nemt rdh ohSkbh at erlim׃ 
ezekiel 32:20	btok Hlli Hrb iplo Hrb ntnh mSko aoth okl hmonih׃ 
ezekiel 32:21	idbro lo ali gborim mtok Saol at ecrio irdo Skbo herlim Hlli Hrb׃ 
ezekiel 32:22	Sm aSor okl qhlh sbibotio qbrtio klm Hllim hnplim bHrb׃ 
ezekiel 32:23	aSr ntno qbrtih birkti bor oihi qhlh sbibot qbrth klm Hllim nplim bHrb aSr ntno Htit barz Hiim׃ 
ezekiel 32:24	Sm eilm okl hmonh sbibot qbrth klm Hllim hnplim bHrb aSr irdo erlim al arz tHtiot aSr ntno Htitm barz Hiim oiSao klmtm at iordi bor׃ 
ezekiel 32:25	btok Hllim ntno mSkb lh bkl hmonh sbibotio qbrth klm erlim Hlli Hrb ki ntn Htitm barz Hiim oiSao klmtm at iordi bor btok Hllim ntn׃ 
ezekiel 32:26	Sm mSk tbl okl hmonh sbibotio qbrotih klm erlim mHlli Hrb ki ntno Htitm barz Hiim׃ 
ezekiel 32:27	ola iSkbo at gborim nplim merlim aSr irdo Saol bkli mlHmtm oitno at Hrbotm tHt raSihm othi eontm el ezmotm ki Htit gborim barz Hiim׃ 
ezekiel 32:28	oath btok erlim tSbr otSkb at Hlli Hrb׃ 
ezekiel 32:29	Smh adom mlkih okl nSiaih aSr ntno bgbortm at Hlli Hrb hmh at erlim iSkbo oat irdi bor׃ 
ezekiel 32:30	Smh nsiki zpon klm okl zdni aSr irdo at Hllim bHtitm mgbortm boSim oiSkbo erlim at Hlli Hrb oiSao klmtm at iordi bor׃ 
ezekiel 32:31	aotm irah preh onHm el kl hmonh Hlli Hrb preh okl Hilo nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 32:32	ki ntti at Htito barz Hiim ohSkb btok erlim at Hlli Hrb preh okl hmonh nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 33:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 33:2	bn adm dbr al bni emk oamrt alihm arz ki abia elih Hrb olqHo em harz aiS aHd mqzihm ontno ato lhm lzph׃ 
ezekiel 33:3	orah at hHrb bah el harz otqe bSopr ohchir at hem׃ 
ezekiel 33:4	oSme hSme at qol hSopr ola nchr otboa Hrb otqHho dmo braSo ihih׃ 
ezekiel 33:5	at qol hSopr Sme ola nchr dmo bo ihih ohoa nchr npSo mlT׃ 
ezekiel 33:6	ohzph ki irah at hHrb bah ola tqe bSopr ohem la nchr otboa Hrb otqH mhm npS hoa beono nlqH odmo mid hzph adrS׃ 
ezekiel 33:7	oath bn adm zph nttik lbit iSral oSmet mpi dbr ohchrt atm mmni׃ 
ezekiel 33:8	bamri lrSe rSe mot tmot ola dbrt lhchir rSe mdrko hoa rSe beono imot odmo midk abqS׃ 
ezekiel 33:9	oath ki hchrt rSe mdrko lSob mmnh ola Sb mdrko hoa beono imot oath npSk hzlt׃ 
ezekiel 33:10	oath bn adm amr al bit iSral kn amrtm lamr ki pSeino oHTatino elino obm anHno nmqim oaik nHih׃ 
ezekiel 33:11	amr alihm Hi ani nam adni ihoh am aHpz bmot hrSe ki am bSob rSe mdrko oHih Sobo Sobo mdrkikm hreim olmh tmoto bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 33:12	oath bn adm amr al bni emk zdqt hzdiq la tzilno biom pSeo orSet hrSe la ikSl bh biom Sobo mrSeo ozdiq la iokl lHiot bh biom HTato׃ 
ezekiel 33:13	bamri lzdiq Hih iHih ohoa bTh el zdqto oeSh eol kl zdqto la tckrnh obeolo aSr eSh bo imot׃ 
ezekiel 33:14	obamri lrSe mot tmot oSb mHTato oeSh mSpT ozdqh׃ 
ezekiel 33:15	Hbl iSib rSe gclh iSlm bHqot hHiim hlk lblti eSot eol Hio iHih la imot׃ 
ezekiel 33:16	kl HTato aSr HTa la tckrnh lo mSpT ozdqh eSh Hio iHih׃ 
ezekiel 33:17	oamro bni emk la itkn drk adni ohmh drkm la itkn׃ 
ezekiel 33:18	bSob zdiq mzdqto oeSh eol omt bhm׃ 
ezekiel 33:19	obSob rSe mrSeto oeSh mSpT ozdqh elihm hoa iHih׃ 
ezekiel 33:20	oamrtm la itkn drk adni aiS kdrkio aSpoT atkm bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 33:21	oihi bSti eSrh Snh beSri bHmSh lHdS lglotno ba ali hpliT miroSlm lamr hkth heir׃ 
ezekiel 33:22	oid ihoh hith ali berb lpni boa hpliT oiptH at pi ed boa ali bbqr oiptH pi ola nalmti eod׃ 
ezekiel 33:23	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 33:24	bn adm iSbi hHrbot halh el admt iSral amrim lamr aHd hih abrhm oiirS at harz oanHno rbim lno ntnh harz lmorSh׃ 
ezekiel 33:25	lkn amr alhm kh amr adni ihoh el hdm taklo oeinkm tSao al glolikm odm tSpko oharz tirSo׃ 
ezekiel 33:26	emdtm el Hrbkm eSitn toebh oaiS at aSt reho Tmatm oharz tirSo׃ 
ezekiel 33:27	kh tamr alhm kh amr adni ihoh Hi ani am la aSr bHrbot bHrb iplo oaSr el pni hSdh lHih nttio laklo oaSr bmzdot obmerot bdbr imoto׃ 
ezekiel 33:28	ontti at harz Smmh omSmh onSbt gaon ech oSmmo hri iSral main eobr׃ 
ezekiel 33:29	oideo ki ani ihoh btti at harz Smmh omSmh el kl toebtm aSr eSo׃ 
ezekiel 33:30	oath bn adm bni emk hndbrim bk azl hqirot obptHi hbtim odbr Hd at aHd aiS at aHio lamr bao na oSmeo mh hdbr hioza mat ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 33:31	oiboao alik kmboa em oiSbo lpnik emi oSmeo at dbrik oaotm la ieSo ki egbim bpihm hmh eSim aHri bzem lbm hlk׃ 
ezekiel 33:32	ohnk lhm kSir egbim iph qol omTb ngn oSmeo at dbrik oeSim ainm aotm׃ 
ezekiel 33:33	obbah hnh bah oideo ki nbia hih btokm׃ 
ezekiel 34:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 34:2	bn adm hnba el roei iSral hnba oamrt alihm lreim kh amr adni ihoh hoi rei iSral aSr hio reim aotm hloa hzan ireo hreim׃ 
ezekiel 34:3	at hHlb taklo oat hzmr tlbSo hbriah tcbHo hzan la treo׃ 
ezekiel 34:4	at hnHlot la Hcqtm oat hHolh la rpatm olnSbrt la HbStm oat hndHt la hSbtm oat habdt la bqStm obHcqh rditm atm obprk׃ 
ezekiel 34:5	otpozinh mbli reh othiinh laklh lkl Hit hSdh otpozinh׃ 
ezekiel 34:6	iSgo zani bkl hhrim oel kl gbeh rmh oel kl pni harz npzo zani oain dorS oain mbqS׃ 
ezekiel 34:7	lkn reim Smeo at dbr ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 34:8	Hi ani nam adni ihoh am la ien hiot zani lbc othiinh zani laklh lkl Hit hSdh main reh ola drSo rei at zani oireo hreim aotm oat zani la reo׃ 
ezekiel 34:9	lkn hreim Smeo dbr ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 34:10	kh amr adni ihoh hnni al hreim odrSti at zani midm ohSbtim mreot zan ola ireo eod hreim aotm ohzlti zani mpihm ola thiin lhm laklh׃ 
ezekiel 34:11	ki kh amr adni ihoh hnni ani odrSti at zani obqrtim׃ 
ezekiel 34:12	kbqrt reh edro biom hioto btok zano nprSot kn abqr at zani ohzlti athm mkl hmqomt aSr npzo Sm biom enn oerpl׃ 
ezekiel 34:13	ohozatim mn hemim oqbztim mn harzot ohbiatim al admtm oreitim al hri iSral bapiqim obkl moSbi harz׃ 
ezekiel 34:14	bmreh Tob areh atm obhri mrom iSral ihih nohm Sm trbznh bnoh Tob omreh Smn treinh al hri iSral׃ 
ezekiel 34:15	ani areh zani oani arbizm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 34:16	at habdt abqS oat hndHt aSib olnSbrt aHbS oat hHolh aHcq oat hSmnh oat hHcqh aSmid arenh bmSpT׃ 
ezekiel 34:17	oatnh zani kh amr adni ihoh hnni SpT bin Sh lSh lailim oletodim׃ 
ezekiel 34:18	hmeT mkm hmreh hTob treo oitr mreikm trmso brglikm omSqe mim tSto oat hnotrim brglikm trpSon׃ 
ezekiel 34:19	ozani mrms rglikm treinh omrpS rglikm tStinh׃ 
ezekiel 34:20	lkn kh amr adni ihoh alihm hnni ani oSpTti bin Sh brih obin Sh rch׃ 
ezekiel 34:21	ien bzd obktp thdpo obqrnikm tngHo kl hnHlot ed aSr hpizotm aotnh al hHozh׃ 
ezekiel 34:22	ohoSeti lzani ola thiinh eod lbc oSpTti bin Sh lSh׃ 
ezekiel 34:23	ohqmti elihm reh aHd oreh athn at ebdi doid hoa ireh atm ohoa ihih lhn lreh׃ 
ezekiel 34:24	oani ihoh ahih lhm lalhim oebdi dod nSia btokm ani ihoh dbrti׃ 
ezekiel 34:25	okrti lhm brit Slom ohSbti Hih reh mn harz oiSbo bmdbr lbTH oiSno bierim׃ 
ezekiel 34:26	ontti aotm osbibot gbeti brkh ohordti hgSm beto gSmi brkh ihio׃ 
ezekiel 34:27	ontn ez hSdh at prio oharz ttn ibolh ohio el admtm lbTH oideo ki ani ihoh bSbri at mTot elm ohzltim mid hebdim bhm׃ 
ezekiel 34:28	ola ihio eod bc lgoim oHit harz la taklm oiSbo lbTH oain mHrid׃ 
ezekiel 34:29	ohqmti lhm mTe lSm ola ihio eod aspi reb barz ola iSao eod klmt hgoim׃ 
ezekiel 34:30	oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm atm ohmh emi bit iSral nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 34:31	oatn zani zan mreiti adm atm ani alhikm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 35:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 35:2	bn adm Sim pnik el hr Seir ohnba elio׃ 
ezekiel 35:3	oamrt lo kh amr adni ihoh hnni alik hr Seir onTiti idi elik onttik Smmh omSmh׃ 
ezekiel 35:4	erik Hrbh aSim oath Smmh thih oidet ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 35:5	ien hiot lk aibt eolm otgr at bni iSral el idi Hrb bet aidm bet eon qz׃ 
ezekiel 35:6	lkn Hi ani nam adni ihoh ki ldm aeSk odm irdpk am la dm Snat odm irdpk׃ 
ezekiel 35:7	ontti at hr Seir lSmmh oSmmh ohkrti mmno ebr oSb׃ 
ezekiel 35:8	omlati at hrio Hllio gbeotik ogiaotik okl apiqik Hlli Hrb iplo bhm׃ 
ezekiel 35:9	Smmot eolm atnk oerik la tiSbnh oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 35:10	ien amrk at Sni hgoim oat Sti harzot li thiinh oirSnoh oihoh Sm hih׃ 
ezekiel 35:11	lkn Hi ani nam adni ihoh oeSiti kapk okqnatk aSr eSith mSnatik bm onodeti bm kaSr aSpTk׃ 
ezekiel 35:12	oidet ki ani ihoh Smeti at kl nazotik aSr amrt el hri iSral lamr Smmh lno ntno laklh׃ 
ezekiel 35:13	otgdilo eli bpikm ohetrtm eli dbrikm ani Smeti׃ 
ezekiel 35:14	kh amr adni ihoh kSmH kl harz Smmh aeSh lk׃ 
ezekiel 35:15	kSmHtk lnHlt bit iSral el aSr Smmh kn aeSh lk Smmh thih hr Seir okl adom klh oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 36:1	oath bn adm hnba al hri iSral oamrt hri iSral Smeo dbr ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 36:2	kh amr adni ihoh ien amr haoib elikm haH obmot eolm lmorSh hith lno׃ 
ezekiel 36:3	lkn hnba oamrt kh amr adni ihoh ien bien Smot oSap atkm msbib lhiotkm morSh lSarit hgoim otelo el Spt lSon odbt em׃ 
ezekiel 36:4	lkn hri iSral Smeo dbr adni ihoh kh amr adni ihoh lhrim olgbeot lapiqim olgaiot olHrbot hSmmot olerim hnecbot aSr hio lbc olleg lSarit hgoim aSr msbib׃ 
ezekiel 36:5	lkn kh amr adni ihoh am la baS qnati dbrti el Sarit hgoim oel adom kla aSr ntno at arzi lhm lmorSh bSmHt kl lbb bSaT npS lmen mgrSh lbc׃ 
ezekiel 36:6	lkn hnba el admt iSral oamrt lhrim olgbeot lapiqim olgaiot kh amr adni ihoh hnni bqnati obHmti dbrti ien klmt goim nSatm׃ 
ezekiel 36:7	lkn kh amr adni ihoh ani nSati at idi am la hgoim aSr lkm msbib hmh klmtm iSao׃ 
ezekiel 36:8	oatm hri iSral enpkm ttno oprikm tSao lemi iSral ki qrbo lboa׃ 
ezekiel 36:9	ki hnni alikm opniti alikm onebdtm oncretm׃ 
ezekiel 36:10	ohrbiti elikm adm kl bit iSral klh onSbo herim ohHrbot tbninh׃ 
ezekiel 36:11	ohrbiti elikm adm obhmh orbo opro ohoSbti atkm kqdmotikm ohiTbti mraStikm oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 36:12	oholkti elikm adm at emi iSral oirSok ohiit lhm lnHlh ola tosp eod lSklm׃ 
ezekiel 36:13	kh amr adni ihoh ien amrim lkm aklt adm ati omSklt goik hiit׃ 
ezekiel 36:14	lkn adm la takli eod ogoik la tkSli eod nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 36:15	ola aSmie alik eod klmt hgoim oHrpt emim la tSai eod ogoik la tkSli eod nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 36:16	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 36:17	bn adm bit iSral iSbim el admtm oiTmao aoth bdrkm obelilotm kTmat hndh hith drkm lpni׃ 
ezekiel 36:18	oaSpk Hmti elihm el hdm aSr Spko el harz obglolihm Tmaoh׃ 
ezekiel 36:19	oapiz atm bgoim oicro barzot kdrkm okelilotm SpTtim׃ 
ezekiel 36:20	oiboa al hgoim aSr bao Sm oiHllo at Sm qdSi bamr lhm em ihoh alh omarzo izao׃ 
ezekiel 36:21	oaHml el Sm qdSi aSr Hlloho bit iSral bgoim aSr bao Smh׃ 
ezekiel 36:22	lkn amr lbit iSral kh amr adni ihoh la lmenkm ani eSh bit iSral ki am lSm qdSi aSr Hlltm bgoim aSr batm Sm׃ 
ezekiel 36:23	oqdSti at Smi hgdol hmHll bgoim aSr Hlltm btokm oideo hgoim ki ani ihoh nam adni ihoh bhqdSi bkm leinihm׃ 
ezekiel 36:24	olqHti atkm mn hgoim oqbzti atkm mkl harzot ohbati atkm al admtkm׃ 
ezekiel 36:25	ocrqti elikm mim Thorim oThrtm mkl Tmaotikm omkl glolikm aThr atkm׃ 
ezekiel 36:26	ontti lkm lb HdS oroH HdSh atn bqrbkm ohsrti at lb habn mbSrkm ontti lkm lb bSr׃ 
ezekiel 36:27	oat roHi atn bqrbkm oeSiti at aSr bHqi tlko omSpTi tSmro oeSitm׃ 
ezekiel 36:28	oiSbtm barz aSr ntti labtikm ohiitm li lem oanki ahih lkm lalhim׃ 
ezekiel 36:29	ohoSeti atkm mkl Tmaotikm oqrati al hdgn ohrbiti ato ola atn elikm reb׃ 
ezekiel 36:30	ohrbiti at pri hez otnobt hSdh lmen aSr la tqHo eod Hrpt reb bgoim׃ 
ezekiel 36:31	ockrtm at drkikm hreim omellikm aSr la Tobim onqTtm bpnikm el eontikm oel toebtikm׃ 
ezekiel 36:32	la lmenkm ani eSh nam adni ihoh iode lkm boSo ohklmo mdrkikm bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 36:33	kh amr adni ihoh biom Thri atkm mkl eonotikm ohoSbti at herim onbno hHrbot׃ 
ezekiel 36:34	oharz hnSmh tebd tHt aSr hith Smmh leini kl eobr׃ 
ezekiel 36:35	oamro harz hlco hnSmh hith kgn edn oherim hHrbot ohnSmot ohnhrsot bzorot iSbo׃ 
ezekiel 36:36	oideo hgoim aSr iSaro sbibotikm ki ani ihoh bniti hnhrsot nTeti hnSmh ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti׃ 
ezekiel 36:37	kh amr adni ihoh eod cat adrS lbit iSral leSot lhm arbh atm kzan adm׃ 
ezekiel 36:38	kzan qdSim kzan iroSlm bmoedih kn thiinh herim hHrbot mlaot zan adm oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 37:1	hith eli id ihoh oiozani broH ihoh oiniHni btok hbqeh ohia mlah ezmot׃ 
ezekiel 37:2	ohebirni elihm sbib sbib ohnh rbot mad el pni hbqeh ohnh ibSot mad׃ 
ezekiel 37:3	oiamr ali bn adm htHiinh hezmot halh oamr adni ihoh ath idet׃ 
ezekiel 37:4	oiamr ali hnba el hezmot halh oamrt alihm hezmot hibSot Smeo dbr ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 37:5	kh amr adni ihoh lezmot halh hnh ani mbia bkm roH oHiitm׃ 
ezekiel 37:6	ontti elikm gdim ohelti elikm bSr oqrmti elikm eor ontti bkm roH oHiitm oidetm ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 37:7	onbati kaSr zoiti oihi qol khnbai ohnh reS otqrbo ezmot ezm al ezmo׃ 
ezekiel 37:8	oraiti ohnh elihm gdim obSr elh oiqrm elihm eor mlmelh oroH ain bhm׃ 
ezekiel 37:9	oiamr ali hnba al hroH hnba bn adm oamrt al hroH kh amr adni ihoh marbe roHot bai hroH opHi bhrogim halh oiHio׃ 
ezekiel 37:10	ohnbati kaSr zoni otboa bhm hroH oiHio oiemdo el rglihm Hil gdol mad mad׃ 
ezekiel 37:11	oiamr ali bn adm hezmot halh kl bit iSral hmh hnh amrim ibSo ezmotino oabdh tqotno ngcrno lno׃ 
ezekiel 37:12	lkn hnba oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh hnh ani ptH at qbrotikm oheliti atkm mqbrotikm emi ohbati atkm al admt iSral׃ 
ezekiel 37:13	oidetm ki ani ihoh bptHi at qbrotikm obheloti atkm mqbrotikm emi׃ 
ezekiel 37:14	ontti roHi bkm oHiitm ohnHti atkm el admtkm oidetm ki ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti nam ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 37:15	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 37:16	oath bn adm qH lk ez aHd oktb elio lihodh olbni iSral Hbro olqH ez aHd oktob elio liosp ez aprim okl bit iSral Hbro׃ 
ezekiel 37:17	oqrb atm aHd al aHd lk lez aHd ohio laHdim bidk׃ 
ezekiel 37:18	okaSr iamro alik bni emk lamr hloa tgid lno mh alh lk׃ 
ezekiel 37:19	dbr alhm kh amr adni ihoh hnh ani lqH at ez iosp aSr bid aprim oSbTi iSral Hbro ontti aotm elio at ez ihodh oeSitm lez aHd ohio aHd bidi׃ 
ezekiel 37:20	ohio hezim aSr tktb elihm bidk leinihm׃ 
ezekiel 37:21	odbr alihm kh amr adni ihoh hnh ani lqH at bni iSral mbin hgoim aSr hlko Sm oqbzti atm msbib ohbati aotm al admtm׃ 
ezekiel 37:22	oeSiti atm lgoi aHd barz bhri iSral omlk aHd ihih lklm lmlk ola ihih eod lSni goim ola iHzo eod lSti mmlkot eod׃ 
ezekiel 37:23	ola iTmao eod bglolihm obSqozihm obkl pSeihm ohoSeti atm mkl moSbtihm aSr HTao bhm oThrti aotm ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim׃ 
ezekiel 37:24	oebdi dod mlk elihm oroeh aHd ihih lklm obmSpTi ilko oHqti iSmro oeSo aotm׃ 
ezekiel 37:25	oiSbo el harz aSr ntti lebdi lieqb aSr iSbo bh abotikm oiSbo elih hmh obnihm obni bnihm ed eolm odod ebdi nSia lhm leolm׃ 
ezekiel 37:26	okrti lhm brit Slom brit eolm ihih aotm onttim ohrbiti aotm ontti at mqdSi btokm leolm׃ 
ezekiel 37:27	ohih mSkni elihm ohiiti lhm lalhim ohmh ihio li lem׃ 
ezekiel 37:28	oideo hgoim ki ani ihoh mqdS at iSral bhiot mqdSi btokm leolm׃ 
ezekiel 38:1	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
ezekiel 38:2	bn adm Sim pnik al gog arz hmgog nSia raS mSk otbl ohnba elio׃ 
ezekiel 38:3	oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni alik gog nSia raS mSk otbl׃ 
ezekiel 38:4	oSobbtik ontti HHim blHiik ohozati aotk oat kl Hilk sosim oprSim lbSi mklol klm qhl rb znh omgn tpSi Hrbot klm׃ 
ezekiel 38:5	prs koS opoT atm klm mgn okobe׃ 
ezekiel 38:6	gmr okl agpih bit togrmh irkti zpon oat kl agpio emim rbim atk׃ 
ezekiel 38:7	hkn ohkn lk ath okl qhlk hnqhlim elik ohiit lhm lmSmr׃ 
ezekiel 38:8	mimim rbim tpqd baHrit hSnim tboa al arz mSobbt mHrb mqbzt memim rbim el hri iSral aSr hio lHrbh tmid ohia memim hozah oiSbo lbTH klm׃ 
ezekiel 38:9	oelit kSah tboa kenn lksot harz thih ath okl agpik oemim rbim aotk׃ 
ezekiel 38:10	kh amr adni ihoh ohih biom hhoa ielo dbrim el lbbk oHSbt mHSbt reh׃ 
ezekiel 38:11	oamrt aelh el arz prcot aboa hSqTim iSbi lbTH klm iSbim bain Homh obriH odltim ain lhm׃ 
ezekiel 38:12	lSll Sll olbc bc lhSib idk el Hrbot noSbt oal em masp mgoim eSh mqnh oqnin iSbi el Tbor harz׃ 
ezekiel 38:13	Sba oddn osHri trSiS okl kprih iamro lk hlSll Sll ath ba hlbc bc hqhlt qhlk lSat ksp ochb lqHt mqnh oqnin lSll Sll gdol׃ 
ezekiel 38:14	lkn hnba bn adm oamrt lgog kh amr adni ihoh hloa biom hhoa bSbt emi iSral lbTH tde׃ 
ezekiel 38:15	obat mmqomk mirkti zpon ath oemim rbim atk rkbi sosim klm qhl gdol oHil rb׃ 
ezekiel 38:16	oelit el emi iSral kenn lksot harz baHrit himim thih ohbaotik el arzi lmen det hgoim ati bhqdSi bk leinihm gog׃ 
ezekiel 38:17	kh amr adni ihoh hath hoa aSr dbrti bimim qdmonim bid ebdi nbiai iSral hnbaim bimim hhm Snim lhbia atk elihm׃ 
ezekiel 38:18	ohih biom hhoa biom boa gog el admt iSral nam adni ihoh telh Hmti bapi׃ 
ezekiel 38:19	obqnati baS ebrti dbrti am la biom hhoa ihih reS gdol el admt iSral׃ 
ezekiel 38:20	oreSo mpni dgi him oeop hSmim oHit hSdh okl hrmS hrmS el hadmh okl hadm aSr el pni hadmh onhrso hhrim onplo hmdrgot okl Homh larz tpol׃ 
ezekiel 38:21	oqrati elio lkl hri Hrb nam adni ihoh Hrb aiS baHio thih׃ 
ezekiel 38:22	onSpTti ato bdbr obdm ogSm SoTp oabni algbiS aS ogprit amTir elio oel agpio oel emim rbim aSr ato׃ 
ezekiel 38:23	ohtgdlti ohtqdSti onodeti leini goim rbim oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 39:1	oath bn adm hnba el gog oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni alik gog nSia raS mSk otbl׃ 
ezekiel 39:2	oSbbtik oSSatik ohelitik mirkti zpon ohbaotk el hri iSral׃ 
ezekiel 39:3	ohkiti qStk mid Smaolk oHzik mid imink apil׃ 
ezekiel 39:4	el hri iSral tpol ath okl agpik oemim aSr atk leiT zpor kl knp oHit hSdh nttik laklh׃ 
ezekiel 39:5	el pni hSdh tpol ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 39:6	oSlHti aS bmgog obiSbi haiim lbTH oideo ki ani ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 39:7	oat Sm qdSi aodie btok emi iSral ola aHl at Sm qdSi eod oideo hgoim ki ani ihoh qdoS biSral׃ 
ezekiel 39:8	hnh bah onhith nam adni ihoh hoa hiom aSr dbrti׃ 
ezekiel 39:9	oizao iSbi eri iSral obero ohSiqo bnSq omgn oznh bqSt obHzim obmql id obrmH obero bhm aS Sbe Snim׃ 
ezekiel 39:10	ola iSao ezim mn hSdh ola iHTbo mn hierim ki bnSq ibero aS oSllo at Sllihm obcco at bccihm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 39:11	ohih biom hhoa atn lgog mqom Sm qbr biSral gi hebrim qdmt him oHsmt hia at hebrim oqbro Sm at gog oat kl hmonh oqrao gia hmon gog׃ 
ezekiel 39:12	oqbrom bit iSral lmen Thr at harz Sbeh HdSim׃ 
ezekiel 39:13	oqbro kl em harz ohih lhm lSm iom hkbdi nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 39:14	oanSi tmid ibdilo ebrim barz mqbrim at hebrim at hnotrim el pni harz lThrh mqzh Sbeh HdSim iHqro׃ 
ezekiel 39:15	oebro hebrim barz orah ezm adm obnh azlo zion ed qbro ato hmqbrim al gia hmon gog׃ 
ezekiel 39:16	ogm Sm eir hmonh oThro harz׃ 
ezekiel 39:17	oath bn adm kh amr adni ihoh amr lzpor kl knp olkl Hit hSdh hqbzo obao haspo msbib el cbHi aSr ani cbH lkm cbH gdol el hri iSral oakltm bSr oStitm dm׃ 
ezekiel 39:18	bSr gborim taklo odm nSiai harz tSto ailim krim oetodim prim mriai bSn klm׃ 
ezekiel 39:19	oakltm Hlb lSbeh oStitm dm lSkron mcbHi aSr cbHti lkm׃ 
ezekiel 39:20	oSbetm el SlHni sos orkb gbor okl aiS mlHmh nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 39:21	ontti at kbodi bgoim orao kl hgoim at mSpTi aSr eSiti oat idi aSr Smti bhm׃ 
ezekiel 39:22	oideo bit iSral ki ani ihoh alhihm mn hiom hhoa ohlah׃ 
ezekiel 39:23	oideo hgoim ki beonm glo bit iSral el aSr melo bi oastr pni mhm oatnm bid zrihm oiplo bHrb klm׃ 
ezekiel 39:24	kTmatm okpSeihm eSiti atm oastr pni mhm׃ 
ezekiel 39:25	lkn kh amr adni ihoh eth aSib at Sbit ieqb orHmti kl bit iSral oqnati lSm qdSi׃ 
ezekiel 39:26	onSo at klmtm oat kl melm aSr melo bi bSbtm el admtm lbTH oain mHrid׃ 
ezekiel 39:27	bSobbi aotm mn hemim oqbzti atm marzot aibihm onqdSti bm leini hgoim rbim׃ 
ezekiel 39:28	oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm bhgloti atm al hgoim oknstim el admtm ola aotir eod mhm Sm׃ 
ezekiel 39:29	ola astir eod pni mhm aSr Spkti at roHi el bit iSral nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 40:1	beSrim oHmS Snh lglotno braS hSnh beSor lHdS barbe eSrh Snh aHr aSr hkth heir bezm hiom hch hith eli id ihoh oiba ati Smh׃ 
ezekiel 40:2	bmraot alhim hbiani al arz iSral oiniHni al hr gbh mad oelio kmbnh eir mngb׃ 
ezekiel 40:3	oibia aoti Smh ohnh aiS mraho kmrah nHSt optil pStim bido oqnh hmdh ohoa emd bSer׃ 
ezekiel 40:4	oidbr ali haiS bn adm rah beinik obacnik Sme oSim lbk lkl aSr ani mrah aotk ki lmen hraotkh hbath hnh hgd at kl aSr ath rah lbit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 40:5	ohnh Homh mHoz lbit sbib sbib obid haiS qnh hmdh SS amot bamh oTpH oimd at rHb hbnin qnh aHd oqomh qnh aHd׃ 
ezekiel 40:6	oiboa al Ser aSr pnio drk hqdimh oiel bmelto oimd at sp hSer qnh aHd rHb oat sp aHd qnh aHd rHb׃ 
ezekiel 40:7	ohta qnh aHd ark oqnh aHd rHb obin htaim HmS amot osp hSer mazl aolm hSer mhbit qnh aHd׃ 
ezekiel 40:8	oimd at alm hSer mhbit qnh aHd׃ 
ezekiel 40:9	oimd at alm hSer Smnh amot oailo Stim amot oalm hSer mhbit׃ 
ezekiel 40:10	otai hSer drk hqdim SlSh mph oSlSh mph mdh aHt lSlStm omdh aHt lailm mph ompo׃ 
ezekiel 40:11	oimd at rHb ptH hSer eSr amot ark hSer SloS eSrh amot׃ 
ezekiel 40:12	ogbol lpni htaot amh aHt oamh aHt gbol mph ohta SS amot mpo oSS amot mpo׃ 
ezekiel 40:13	oimd at hSer mgg hta lggo rHb eSrim oHmS amot ptH ngd ptH׃ 
ezekiel 40:14	oieS at ailim SSim amh oal ail hHzr hSer sbib sbib׃ 
ezekiel 40:15	oel pni hSer hiaton el lpni alm hSer hpnimi HmSim amh׃ 
ezekiel 40:16	oHlonot aTmot al htaim oal alihmh lpnimh lSer sbib sbib okn lalmot oHlonot sbib sbib lpnimh oal ail tmrim׃ 
ezekiel 40:17	oibiani al hHzr hHizonh ohnh lSkot orzph eSoi lHzr sbib sbib SlSim lSkot al hrzph׃ 
ezekiel 40:18	ohrzph al ktp hSerim lemt ark hSerim hrzph htHtonh׃ 
ezekiel 40:19	oimd rHb mlpni hSer htHtonh lpni hHzr hpnimi mHoz mah amh hqdim ohzpon׃ 
ezekiel 40:20	ohSer aSr pnio drk hzpon lHzr hHizonh mdd arko orHbo׃ 
ezekiel 40:21	otao SloSh mpo oSlSh mpo oailo oalmo hih kmdt hSer hraSon HmSim amh arko orHb HmS oeSrim bamh׃ 
ezekiel 40:22	oHlono oalmo otmro kmdt hSer aSr pnio drk hqdim obmelot Sbe ielo bo oailmo lpnihm׃ 
ezekiel 40:23	oSer lHzr hpnimi ngd hSer lzpon olqdim oimd mSer al Ser mah amh׃ 
ezekiel 40:24	oiolkni drk hdrom ohnh Ser drk hdrom omdd ailo oailmo kmdot halh׃ 
ezekiel 40:25	oHlonim lo olailmo sbib sbib khHlnot halh HmSim amh ark orHb HmS oeSrim amh׃ 
ezekiel 40:26	omelot Sbeh eloto oalmo lpnihm otmrim lo aHd mpo oaHd mpo al ailo׃ 
ezekiel 40:27	oSer lHzr hpnimi drk hdrom oimd mSer al hSer drk hdrom mah amot׃ 
ezekiel 40:28	oibiani al Hzr hpnimi bSer hdrom oimd at hSer hdrom kmdot halh׃ 
ezekiel 40:29	otao oailo oalmo kmdot halh oHlonot lo olalmo sbib sbib HmSim amh ark orHb eSrim oHmS amot׃ 
ezekiel 40:30	oalmot sbib sbib ark HmS oeSrim amh orHb HmS amot׃ 
ezekiel 40:31	oalmo al Hzr hHzonh otmrim al ailo omelot Smonh melo׃ 
ezekiel 40:32	oibiani al hHzr hpnimi drk hqdim oimd at hSer kmdot halh׃ 
ezekiel 40:33	otao oalo oalmo kmdot halh oHlonot lo olalmo sbib sbib ark HmSim amh orHb HmS oeSrim amh׃ 
ezekiel 40:34	oalmo lHzr hHizonh otmrim al alo mpo ompo oSmnh melot melo׃ 
ezekiel 40:35	oibiani al Ser hzpon omdd kmdot halh׃ 
ezekiel 40:36	tao alo oalmo oHlonot lo sbib sbib ark HmSim amh orHb HmS oeSrim amh׃ 
ezekiel 40:37	oailo lHzr hHizonh otmrim al ailo mpo ompo oSmnh melot melo׃ 
ezekiel 40:38	olSkh optHh bailim hSerim Sm idiHo at helh׃ 
ezekiel 40:39	obalm hSer Snim SlHnot mpo oSnim SlHnot mph lSHoT alihm heolh ohHTat ohaSm׃ 
ezekiel 40:40	oal hktp mHozh leolh lptH hSer hzponh Snim SlHnot oal hktp haHrt aSr lalm hSer Snim SlHnot׃ 
ezekiel 40:41	arbeh SlHnot mph oarbeh SlHnot mph lktp hSer Smonh SlHnot alihm iSHTo׃ 
ezekiel 40:42	oarbeh SlHnot leolh abni gcit ark amh aHt oHzi orHb amh aHt oHzi ogbh amh aHt alihm oiniHo at hklim aSr iSHTo at heolh bm ohcbH׃ 
ezekiel 40:43	ohSptim TpH aHd moknim bbit sbib sbib oal hSlHnot bSr hqrbn׃ 
ezekiel 40:44	omHozh lSer hpnimi lSkot Srim bHzr hpnimi aSr al ktp Ser hzpon opnihm drk hdrom aHd al ktp Ser hqdim pni drk hzpn׃ 
ezekiel 40:45	oidbr ali ch hlSkh aSr pnih drk hdrom lkhnim Smri mSmrt hbit׃ 
ezekiel 40:46	ohlSkh aSr pnih drk hzpon lkhnim Smri mSmrt hmcbH hmh bni zdoq hqrbim mbni loi al ihoh lSrto׃ 
ezekiel 40:47	oimd at hHzr ark mah amh orHb mah amh mrbet ohmcbH lpni hbit׃ 
ezekiel 40:48	oibani al alm hbit oimd al alm HmS amot mph oHmS amot mph orHb hSer SlS amot mpo oSlS amot mpo׃ 
ezekiel 40:49	ark halm eSrim amh orHb eSti eSrh amh obmelot aSr ielo alio oemdim al hailim aHd mph oaHd mph׃ 
ezekiel 41:1	oibiani al hhikl oimd at hailim SS amot rHb mpo oSS amot rHb mpo rHb hahl׃ 
ezekiel 41:2	orHb hptH eSr amot oktpot hptH HmS amot mpo oHmS amot mpo oimd arko arbeim amh orHb eSrim amh׃ 
ezekiel 41:3	oba lpnimh oimd ail hptH Stim amot ohptH SS amot orHb hptH Sbe amot׃ 
ezekiel 41:4	oimd at arko eSrim amh orHb eSrim amh al pni hhikl oiamr ali ch qdS hqdSim׃ 
ezekiel 41:5	oimd qir hbit SS amot orHb hzle arbe amot sbib sbib lbit sbib׃ 
ezekiel 41:6	ohzleot zle al zle SloS oSlSim pemim obaot bqir aSr lbit lzleot sbib sbib lhiot aHocim ola ihio aHocim bqir hbit׃ 
ezekiel 41:7	orHbh onsbh lmelh lmelh lzleot ki mosb hbit lmelh lmelh sbib sbib lbit el kn rHb lbit lmelh okn htHtonh ielh el helionh ltikonh׃ 
ezekiel 41:8	oraiti lbit gbh sbib sbib misdot hzleot mlo hqnh SS amot azilh׃ 
ezekiel 41:9	rHb hqir aSr lzle al hHoz HmS amot oaSr mnH bit zleot aSr lbit׃ 
ezekiel 41:10	obin hlSkot rHb eSrim amh sbib lbit sbib sbib׃ 
ezekiel 41:11	optH hzle lmnH ptH aHd drk hzpon optH aHd ldrom orHb mqom hmnH HmS amot sbib sbib׃ 
ezekiel 41:12	ohbnin aSr al pni hgcrh pat drk him rHb Sbeim amh oqir hbnin HmS amot rHb sbib sbib oarko tSeim amh׃ 
ezekiel 41:13	omdd at hbit ark mah amh ohgcrh ohbnih oqirotih ark mah amh׃ 
ezekiel 41:14	orHb pni hbit ohgcrh lqdim mah amh׃ 
ezekiel 41:15	omdd ark hbnin al pni hgcrh aSr el aHrih oatoqiha mpo ompo mah amh ohhikl hpnimi oalmi hHzr׃ 
ezekiel 41:16	hspim ohHlonim haTmot ohatiqim sbib lSlStm ngd hsp SHip ez sbib sbib oharz ed hHlnot ohHlnot mksot׃ 
ezekiel 41:17	el mel hptH oed hbit hpnimi olHoz oal kl hqir sbib sbib bpnimi obHizon mdot׃ 
ezekiel 41:18	oeSoi krobim otmrim otmrh bin krob lkrob oSnim pnim lkrob׃ 
ezekiel 41:19	opni adm al htmrh mpo opni kpir al htmrh mpo eSoi al kl hbit sbib sbib׃ 
ezekiel 41:20	mharz ed mel hptH hkrobim ohtmrim eSoim oqir hhikl׃ 
ezekiel 41:21	hhikl mcoct rbeh opni hqdS hmrah kmrah׃ 
ezekiel 41:22	hmcbH ez SloS amot gbh oarko Stim amot omqzeotio lo oarko oqirtio ez oidbr ali ch hSlHn aSr lpni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 41:23	oStim dltot lhikl olqdS׃ 
ezekiel 41:24	oStim dltot ldltot Stim mosbot dltot Stim ldlt aHt oSti dltot laHrt׃ 
ezekiel 41:25	oeSoih alihn al dltot hhikl krobim otmrim kaSr eSoim lqirot oeb ez al pni haolm mhHoz׃ 
ezekiel 41:26	oHlonim aTmot otmrim mpo ompo al ktpot haolm ozleot hbit ohebim׃ 
ezekiel 42:1	oiozani al hHzr hHizonh hdrk drk hzpon oibani al hlSkh aSr ngd hgcrh oaSr ngd hbnin al hzpon׃ 
ezekiel 42:2	al pni ark amot hmah ptH hzpon ohrHb HmSim amot׃ 
ezekiel 42:3	ngd heSrim aSr lHzr hpnimi ongd rzph aSr lHzr hHizonh atiq al pni atiq bSlSim׃ 
ezekiel 42:4	olpni hlSkot mhlk eSr amot rHb al hpnimit drk amh aHt optHihm lzpon׃ 
ezekiel 42:5	ohlSkot heliont qzrot ki ioklo atiqim mhnh mhtHtnot omhtknot bnin׃ 
ezekiel 42:6	ki mSlSot hnh oain lhn emodim kemodi hHzrot el kn nazl mhtHtonot omhtiknot mharz׃ 
ezekiel 42:7	ogdr aSr lHoz lemt hlSkot drk hHzr hHzonh al pni hlSkot arko HmSim amh׃ 
ezekiel 42:8	ki ark hlSkot aSr lHzr hHzonh HmSim amh ohnh el pni hhikl mah amh׃ 
ezekiel 42:9	omtHth lSkot halh hmboa mhqdim bbao lhnh mhHzr hHznh׃ 
ezekiel 42:10	brHb gdr hHzr drk hqdim al pni hgcrh oal pni hbnin lSkot׃ 
ezekiel 42:11	odrk lpnihm kmrah hlSkot aSr drk hzpon karkn kn rHbn okl mozaihn okmSpTihn okptHihn׃ 
ezekiel 42:12	okptHi hlSkot aSr drk hdrom ptH braS drk drk bpni hgdrt hginh drk hqdim bboan׃ 
ezekiel 42:13	oiamr ali lSkot hzpon lSkot hdrom aSr al pni hgcrh hnh lSkot hqdS aSr iaklo Sm hkhnim aSr qrobim lihoh qdSi hqdSim Sm iniHo qdSi hqdSim ohmnHh ohHTat ohaSm ki hmqom qdS׃ 
ezekiel 42:14	bbam hkhnim ola izao mhqdS al hHzr hHizonh oSm iniHo bgdihm aSr iSrto bhn ki qdS hnh ilbSo bgdim aHrim oqrbo al aSr lem׃ 
ezekiel 42:15	oklh at mdot hbit hpnimi ohoziani drk hSer aSr pnio drk hqdim omddo sbib sbib׃ 
ezekiel 42:16	mdd roH hqdim bqnh hmdh HmS amot qnim bqnh hmdh sbib׃ 
ezekiel 42:17	mdd roH hzpon HmS maot qnim bqnh hmdh sbib׃ 
ezekiel 42:18	at roH hdrom mdd HmS maot qnim bqnh hmdh׃ 
ezekiel 42:19	sbb al roH him mdd HmS maot qnim bqnh hmdh׃ 
ezekiel 42:20	larbe roHot mddo Homh lo sbib sbib ark HmS maot orHb HmS maot lhbdil bin hqdS lHl׃ 
ezekiel 43:1	oiolkni al hSer Ser aSr pnh drk hqdim׃ 
ezekiel 43:2	ohnh kbod alhi iSral ba mdrk hqdim oqolo kqol mim rbim oharz hairh mkbdo׃ 
ezekiel 43:3	okmrah hmrah aSr raiti kmrah aSr raiti bbai lSHt at heir omraot kmrah aSr raiti al nhr kbr oapl al pni׃ 
ezekiel 43:4	okbod ihoh ba al hbit drk Ser aSr pnio drk hqdim׃ 
ezekiel 43:5	otSani roH otbiani al hHzr hpnimi ohnh mla kbod ihoh hbit׃ 
ezekiel 43:6	oaSme mdbr ali mhbit oaiS hih emd azli׃ 
ezekiel 43:7	oiamr ali bn adm at mqom ksai oat mqom kpot rgli aSr aSkn Sm btok bni iSral leolm ola iTmao eod bit iSral Sm qdSi hmh omlkihm bcnotm obpgri mlkihm bmotm׃ 
ezekiel 43:8	bttm spm at spi omcoctm azl mcocti ohqir bini obinihm oTmao at Sm qdSi btoebotm aSr eSo oakl atm bapi׃ 
ezekiel 43:9	eth irHqo at cnotm opgri mlkihm mmni oSknti btokm leolm׃ 
ezekiel 43:10	ath bn adm hgd at bit iSral at hbit oiklmo meonotihm omddo at tknit׃ 
ezekiel 43:11	oam nklmo mkl aSr eSo zort hbit otkonto omozaio omobaio okl zorto oat kl Hqtio okl zorto okl torto hode aotm oktb leinihm oiSmro at kl zorto oat kl Hqtio oeSo aotm׃ 
ezekiel 43:12	cat tort hbit el raS hhr kl gblo sbib sbib qdS qdSim hnh cat tort hbit׃ 
ezekiel 43:13	oalh mdot hmcbH bamot amh amh oTpH oHiq hamh oamh rHb ogbolh al Spth sbib crt haHd och gb hmcbH׃ 
ezekiel 43:14	omHiq harz ed hecrh htHtonh Stim amot orHb amh aHt omhecrh hqTnh ed hecrh hgdolh arbe amot orHb hamh׃ 
ezekiel 43:15	ohhral arbe amot omharail olmelh hqrnot arbe׃ 
ezekiel 43:16	oharail Stim eSrh ark bStim eSrh rHb rboe al arbet rbeio׃ 
ezekiel 43:17	ohecrh arbe eSrh ark barbe eSrh rHb al arbet rbeih ohgbol sbib aoth Hzi hamh ohHiq lh amh sbib omeltho pnot qdim׃ 
ezekiel 43:18	oiamr ali bn adm kh amr adni ihoh alh Hqot hmcbH biom heSoto lhelot elio eolh olcrq elio dm׃ 
ezekiel 43:19	ontth al hkhnim hloim aSr hm mcre zdoq hqrbim ali nam adni ihoh lSrtni pr bn bqr lHTat׃ 
ezekiel 43:20	olqHt mdmo ontth el arbe qrntio oal arbe pnot hecrh oal hgbol sbib oHTat aoto okprtho׃ 
ezekiel 43:21	olqHt at hpr hHTat oSrpo bmpqd hbit mHoz lmqdS׃ 
ezekiel 43:22	obiom hSni tqrib Seir ecim tmim lHTat oHTao at hmcbH kaSr HTao bpr׃ 
ezekiel 43:23	bklotk mHTa tqrib pr bn bqr tmim oail mn hzan tmim׃ 
ezekiel 43:24	ohqrbtm lpni ihoh ohSliko hkhnim elihm mlH ohelo aotm elh lihoh׃ 
ezekiel 43:25	Sbet imim teSh Seir HTat liom opr bn bqr oail mn hzan tmimim ieSo׃ 
ezekiel 43:26	Sbet imim ikpro at hmcbH oThro ato omlao ido׃ 
ezekiel 43:27	oiklo at himim ohih biom hSmini ohlah ieSo hkhnim el hmcbH at eolotikm oat Slmikm orzati atkm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 44:1	oiSb ati drk Ser hmqdS hHizon hpnh qdim ohoa sgor׃ 
ezekiel 44:2	oiamr ali ihoh hSer hch sgor ihih la iptH oaiS la iba bo ki ihoh alhi iSral ba bo ohih sgor׃ 
ezekiel 44:3	at hnSia nSia hoa iSb bo lakol lHm lpni ihoh mdrk alm hSer iboa omdrko iza׃ 
ezekiel 44:4	oibiani drk Ser hzpon al pni hbit oara ohnh mla kbod ihoh at bit ihoh oapl al pni׃ 
ezekiel 44:5	oiamr ali ihoh bn adm Sim lbk orah beinik obacnik Sme at kl aSr ani mdbr atk lkl Hqot bit ihoh olkl torto oSmt lbk lmboa hbit bkl mozai hmqdS׃ 
ezekiel 44:6	oamrt al mri al bit iSral kh amr adni ihoh rb lkm mkl toebotikm bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 44:7	bhbiakm bni nkr erli lb oerli bSr lhiot bmqdSi lHllo at biti bhqribkm at lHmi Hlb odm oipro at briti al kl toebotikm׃ 
ezekiel 44:8	ola Smrtm mSmrt qdSi otSimon lSmri mSmrti bmqdSi lkm׃ 
ezekiel 44:9	kh amr adni ihoh kl bn nkr erl lb oerl bSr la iboa al mqdSi lkl bn nkr aSr btok bni iSral׃ 
ezekiel 44:10	ki am hloim aSr rHqo meli bteot iSral aSr teo meli aHri glolihm onSao eonm׃ 
ezekiel 44:11	ohio bmqdSi mSrtim pqdot al Seri hbit omSrtim at hbit hmh iSHTo at helh oat hcbH lem ohmh iemdo lpnihm lSrtm׃ 
ezekiel 44:12	ien aSr iSrto aotm lpni glolihm ohio lbit iSral lmkSol eon el kn nSati idi elihm nam adni ihoh onSao eonm׃ 
ezekiel 44:13	ola igSo ali lkhn li olgSt el kl qdSi al qdSi hqdSim onSao klmtm otoebotm aSr eSo׃ 
ezekiel 44:14	ontti aotm Smri mSmrt hbit lkl ebdto olkl aSr ieSh bo׃ 
ezekiel 44:15	ohkhnim hloim bni zdoq aSr Smro at mSmrt mqdSi bteot bni iSral meli hmh iqrbo ali lSrtni oemdo lpni lhqrib li Hlb odm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 44:16	hmh ibao al mqdSi ohmh iqrbo al SlHni lSrtni oSmro at mSmrti׃ 
ezekiel 44:17	ohih bboam al Seri hHzr hpnimit bgdi pStim ilbSo ola ielh elihm zmr bSrtm bSeri hHzr hpnimit obith׃ 
ezekiel 44:18	pari pStim ihio el raSm omknsi pStim ihio el mtnihm la iHgro bice׃ 
ezekiel 44:19	obzatm al hHzr hHizonh al hHzr hHizonh al hem ipSTo at bgdihm aSr hmh mSrtm bm ohniHo aotm blSkt hqdS olbSo bgdim aHrim ola iqdSo at hem bbgdihm׃ 
ezekiel 44:20	oraSm la iglHo opre la iSlHo ksom iksmo at raSihm׃ 
ezekiel 44:21	oiin la iSto kl khn bboam al hHzr hpnimit׃ 
ezekiel 44:22	oalmnh ogroSh la iqHo lhm lnSim ki am btolt mcre bit iSral ohalmnh aSr thih almnh mkhn iqHo׃ 
ezekiel 44:23	oat emi ioro bin qdS lHl obin Tma lThor iodem׃ 
ezekiel 44:24	oel rib hmh iemdo lSpT bmSpTi oSpTho oat torti oat Hqti bkl moedi iSmro oat Sbtoti iqdSo׃ 
ezekiel 44:25	oal mt adm la iboa lTmah ki am lab olam olbn olbt laH olaHot aSr la hith laiS iTmao׃ 
ezekiel 44:26	oaHri Thrto Sbet imim ispro lo׃ 
ezekiel 44:27	obiom bao al hqdS al hHzr hpnimit lSrt bqdS iqrib HTato nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 44:28	ohith lhm lnHlh ani nHltm oaHch la ttno lhm biSral ani aHctm׃ 
ezekiel 44:29	hmnHh ohHTat ohaSm hmh iaklom okl Hrm biSral lhm ihih׃ 
ezekiel 44:30	oraSit kl bkori kl okl tromt kl mkl tromotikm lkhnim ihih oraSit ersotikm ttno lkhn lhniH brkh al bitk׃ 
ezekiel 44:31	kl nblh oTrph mn heop omn hbhmh la iaklo hkhnim׃ 
ezekiel 45:1	obhpilkm at harz bnHlh trimo tromh lihoh qdS mn harz ark HmSh oeSrim alp ark orHb eSrh alp qdS hoa bkl gbolh sbib׃ 
ezekiel 45:2	ihih mch al hqdS HmS maot bHmS maot mrbe sbib oHmSim amh mgrS lo sbib׃ 
ezekiel 45:3	omn hmdh hcat tmod ark HmS oeSrim alp orHb eSrt alpim obo ihih hmqdS qdS qdSim׃ 
ezekiel 45:4	qdS mn harz hoa lkhnim mSrti hmqdS ihih hqrbim lSrt at ihoh ohih lhm mqom lbtim omqdS lmqdS׃ 
ezekiel 45:5	oHmSh oeSrim alp ark oeSrt alpim rHb ihih lloim mSrti hbit lhm laHch eSrim lSkt׃ 
ezekiel 45:6	oaHct heir ttno HmSt alpim rHb oark HmSh oeSrim alp lemt tromt hqdS lkl bit iSral ihih׃ 
ezekiel 45:7	olnSia mch omch ltromt hqdS olaHct heir al pni tromt hqdS oal pni aHct heir mpat im imh ompat qdmh qdimh oark lemot aHd hHlqim mgbol im al gbol qdimh׃ 
ezekiel 45:8	larz ihih lo laHch biSral ola iono eod nSiai at emi oharz itno lbit iSral lSbTihm׃ 
ezekiel 45:9	kh amr adni ihoh rb lkm nSiai iSral Hms oSd hsiro omSpT ozdqh eSo hrimo grStikm mel emi nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 45:10	macni zdq oaipt zdq obt zdq ihi lkm׃ 
ezekiel 45:11	haiph ohbt tkn aHd ihih lSat meSr hHmr hbt oeSirt hHmr haiph al hHmr ihih mtknto׃ 
ezekiel 45:12	ohSql eSrim grh eSrim Sqlim HmSh oeSrim Sqlim eSrh oHmSh Sql hmnh ihih lkm׃ 
ezekiel 45:13	cat htromh aSr trimo SSit haiph mHmr hHTim oSSitm haiph mHmr hSerim׃ 
ezekiel 45:14	oHq hSmn hbt hSmn meSr hbt mn hkr eSrt hbtim Hmr ki eSrt hbtim Hmr׃ 
ezekiel 45:15	oSh aHt mn hzan mn hmatim mmSqh iSral lmnHh oleolh olSlmim lkpr elihm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 45:16	kl hem harz ihio al htromh hcat lnSia biSral׃ 
ezekiel 45:17	oel hnSia ihih heolot ohmnHh ohnsk bHgim obHdSim obSbtot bkl moedi bit iSral hoa ieSh at hHTat oat hmnHh oat heolh oat hSlmim lkpr bed bit iSral׃ 
ezekiel 45:18	kh amr adni ihoh braSon baHd lHdS tqH pr bn bqr tmim oHTat at hmqdS׃ 
ezekiel 45:19	olqH hkhn mdm hHTat ontn al mcoct hbit oal arbe pnot hecrh lmcbH oel mcoct Ser hHzr hpnimit׃ 
ezekiel 45:20	okn teSh bSbeh bHdS maiS Sgh ompti okprtm at hbit׃ 
ezekiel 45:21	braSon barbeh eSr iom lHdS ihih lkm hpsH Hg Sbeot imim mzot iakl׃ 
ezekiel 45:22	oeSh hnSia biom hhoa bedo obed kl em harz pr HTat׃ 
ezekiel 45:23	oSbet imi hHg ieSh eolh lihoh Sbet prim oSbet ailim tmimm liom Sbet himim oHTat Seir ecim liom׃ 
ezekiel 45:24	omnHh aiph lpr oaiph lail ieSh oSmn hin laiph׃ 
ezekiel 45:25	bSbiei bHmSh eSr iom lHdS bHg ieSh kalh Sbet himim kHTat kelh okmnHh okSmn׃ 
ezekiel 46:1	kh amr adni ihoh Ser hHzr hpnimit hpnh qdim ihih sgor SSt imi hmeSh obiom hSbt iptH obiom hHdS iptH׃ 
ezekiel 46:2	oba hnSia drk aolm hSer mHoz oemd el mcoct hSer oeSo hkhnim at eolto oat Slmio ohStHoh el mptn hSer oiza ohSer la isgr ed herb׃ 
ezekiel 46:3	ohStHoo em harz ptH hSer hhoa bSbtot obHdSim lpni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 46:4	ohelh aSr iqrb hnSia lihoh biom hSbt SSh kbSim tmimm oail tmim׃ 
ezekiel 46:5	omnHh aiph lail olkbSim mnHh mtt ido oSmn hin laiph׃ 
ezekiel 46:6	obiom hHdS pr bn bqr tmimm oSSt kbSm oail tmimm ihio׃ 
ezekiel 46:7	oaiph lpr oaiph lail ieSh mnHh olkbSim kaSr tSig ido oSmn hin laiph׃ 
ezekiel 46:8	obboa hnSia drk aolm hSer iboa obdrko iza׃ 
ezekiel 46:9	obboa em harz lpni ihoh bmoedim hba drk Ser zpon lhStHot iza drk Ser ngb ohba drk Ser ngb iza drk Ser zponh la iSob drk hSer aSr ba bo ki nkHo izao׃ 
ezekiel 46:10	ohnSia btokm bboam iboa obzatm izao׃ 
ezekiel 46:11	obHgim obmoedim thih hmnHh aiph lpr oaiph lail olkbSim mtt ido oSmn hin laiph׃ 
ezekiel 46:12	oki ieSh hnSia ndbh eolh ao Slmim ndbh lihoh optH lo at hSer hpnh qdim oeSh at elto oat Slmio kaSr ieSh biom hSbt oiza osgr at hSer aHri zato׃ 
ezekiel 46:13	okbS bn Snto tmim teSh eolh liom lihoh bbqr bbqr teSh ato׃ 
ezekiel 46:14	omnHh teSh elio bbqr bbqr SSit haiph oSmn SliSit hhin lrs at hslt mnHh lihoh Hqot eolm tmid׃ 
ezekiel 46:15	oeSo at hkbS oat hmnHh oat hSmn bbqr bbqr eolt tmid׃ 
ezekiel 46:16	kh amr adni ihoh ki itn hnSia mtnh laiS mbnio nHlto hia lbnio thih aHctm hia bnHlh׃ 
ezekiel 46:17	oki itn mtnh mnHlto laHd mebdio ohith lo ed Snt hdror oSbt lnSia ak nHlto bnio lhm thih׃ 
ezekiel 46:18	ola iqH hnSia mnHlt hem lhontm maHctm maHcto inHl at bnio lmen aSr la ipzo emi aiS maHcto׃ 
ezekiel 46:19	oibiani bmboa aSr el ktp hSer al hlSkot hqdS al hkhnim hpnot zponh ohnh Sm mqom birktm imh׃ 
ezekiel 46:20	oiamr ali ch hmqom aSr ibSlo Sm hkhnim at haSm oat hHTat aSr iapo at hmnHh lblti hozia al hHzr hHizonh lqdS at hem׃ 
ezekiel 46:21	oioziani al hHzr hHiznh oiebirni al arbet mqzoei hHzr ohnh Hzr bmqze hHzr Hzr bmqze hHzr׃ 
ezekiel 46:22	barbet mqzeot hHzr Hzrot qTrot arbeim ark oSlSim rHb mdh aHt larbetm mhqzeot׃ 
ezekiel 46:23	oTor sbib bhm sbib larbetm ombSlot eSoi mtHt hTirot sbib׃ 
ezekiel 46:24	oiamr ali alh bit hmbSlim aSr ibSlo Sm mSrti hbit at cbH hem׃ 
ezekiel 47:1	oiSbni al ptH hbit ohnh mim izaim mtHt mptn hbit qdimh ki pni hbit qdim ohmim irdim mtHt mktp hbit himnit mngb lmcbH׃ 
ezekiel 47:2	oiozani drk Ser zponh oisbni drk Hoz al Ser hHoz drk hponh qdim ohnh mim mpkim mn hktp himnit׃ 
ezekiel 47:3	bzat haiS qdim oqo bido oimd alp bamh oiebrni bmim mi apsim׃ 
ezekiel 47:4	oimd alp oiebrni bmim mim brkim oimd alp oiebrni mi mtnim׃ 
ezekiel 47:5	oimd alp nHl aSr la aokl lebr ki gao hmim mi SHo nHl aSr la iebr׃ 
ezekiel 47:6	oiamr ali hrait bn adm oiolkni oiSbni Spt hnHl׃ 
ezekiel 47:7	bSobni ohnh al Spt hnHl ez rb mad mch omch׃ 
ezekiel 47:8	oiamr ali hmim halh iozaim al hglilh hqdmonh oirdo el herbh obao himh al himh hmozaim onrpao hmim׃ 
ezekiel 47:9	ohih kl npS Hih aSr iSrz al kl aSr iboa Sm nHlim iHih ohih hdgh rbh mad ki bao Smh hmim halh oirpao oHi kl aSr iboa Smh hnHl׃ 
ezekiel 47:10	ohih iemdo elio dogim mein gdi oed ein eglim mSToH lHrmim ihio lminh thih dgtm kdgt him hgdol rbh mad׃ 
ezekiel 47:11	bzato ogbaio ola irpao lmlH ntno׃ 
ezekiel 47:12	oel hnHl ielh el Spto mch omch kl ez makl la ibol elho ola itm prio lHdSio ibkr ki mimio mn hmqdS hmh iozaim ohio prio lmakl oelho ltroph׃ 
ezekiel 47:13	kh amr adni ihoh gh gbol aSr ttnHlo at harz lSni eSr SbTi iSral iosp Hblim׃ 
ezekiel 47:14	onHltm aoth aiS kaHio aSr nSati at idi ltth labtikm onplh harz hcat lkm bnHlh׃ 
ezekiel 47:15	och gbol harz lpat zponh mn him hgdol hdrk Htln lboa zddh׃ 
ezekiel 47:16	Hmt broth sbrim aSr bin gbol dmSq obin gbol Hmt Hzr htikon aSr al gbol Horn׃ 
ezekiel 47:17	ohih gbol mn him Hzr einon gbol dmSq ozpon zponh ogbol Hmt oat pat zpon׃ 
ezekiel 47:18	opat qdim mbin Horn ombin dmSq ombin hgled ombin arz iSral hirdn mgbol el him hqdmoni tmdo oat pat qdimh׃ 
ezekiel 47:19	opat ngb timnh mtmr ed mi mribot qdS nHlh al him hgdol oat pat timnh ngbh׃ 
ezekiel 47:20	opat im him hgdol mgbol ed nkH lboa Hmt cat pat im׃ 
ezekiel 47:21	oHlqtm at harz hcat lkm lSbTi iSral׃ 
ezekiel 47:22	ohih tplo aoth bnHlh lkm olhgrim hgrim btokkm aSr holdo bnim btokkm ohio lkm kacrH bbni iSral atkm iplo bnHlh btok SbTi iSral׃ 
ezekiel 47:23	ohih bSbT aSr gr hgr ato Sm ttno nHlto nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 48:1	oalh Smot hSbTim mqzh zponh al id drk Htln lboa Hmt Hzr einn gbol dmSq zponh al id Hmt ohio lo pat qdim him dn aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:2	oel gbol dn mpat qdim ed pat imh aSr aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:3	oel gbol aSr mpat qdimh oed pat imh nptli aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:4	oel gbol nptli mpat qdmh ed pat imh mnSh aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:5	oel gbol mnSh mpat qdmh ed pat imh aprim aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:6	oel gbol aprim mpat qdim oed pat imh raobn aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:7	oel gbol raobn mpat qdim ed pat imh ihodh aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:8	oel gbol ihodh mpat qdim ed pat imh thih htromh aSr trimo HmSh oeSrim alp rHb oark kaHd hHlqim mpat qdimh ed pat imh ohih hmqdS btoko׃ 
ezekiel 48:9	htromh aSr trimo lihoh ark HmSh oeSrim alp orHb eSrt alpim׃ 
ezekiel 48:10	olalh thih tromt hqdS lkhnim zponh HmSh oeSrim alp oimh rHb eSrt alpim oqdimh rHb eSrt alpim ongbh ark HmSh oeSrim alp ohih mqdS ihoh btoko׃ 
ezekiel 48:11	lkhnim hmqdS mbni zdoq aSr Smro mSmrti aSr la teo bteot bni iSral kaSr teo hloim׃ 
ezekiel 48:12	ohith lhm tromih mtromt harz qdS qdSim al gbol hloim׃ 
ezekiel 48:13	ohloim lemt gbol hkhnim HmSh oeSrim alp ark orHb eSrt alpim kl ark HmSh oeSrim alp orHb eSrt alpim׃ 
ezekiel 48:14	ola imkro mmno ola imr ola iebor raSit harz ki qdS lihoh׃ 
ezekiel 48:15	oHmSt alpim hnotr brHb el pni HmSh oeSrim alp Hl hoa leir lmoSb olmgrS ohith heir btokh׃ 
ezekiel 48:16	oalh mdotih pat zpon HmS maot oarbet alpim opat ngb HmS HmS maot oarbet alpim ompat qdim HmS maot oarbet alpim opat imh HmS maot oarbet alpim׃ 
ezekiel 48:17	ohih mgrS leir zponh HmSim omatim ongbh HmSim omatim oqdimh HmSim omatim oimh HmSim omatim׃ 
ezekiel 48:18	ohnotr bark lemt tromt hqdS eSrt alpim qdimh oeSrt alpim imh ohih lemt tromt hqdS ohith tboath llHm lebdi heir׃ 
ezekiel 48:19	ohebd heir iebdoho mkl SbTi iSral׃ 
ezekiel 48:20	kl htromh HmSh oeSrim alp bHmSh oeSrim alp rbieit trimo at tromt hqdS al aHct heir׃ 
ezekiel 48:21	ohnotr lnSia mch omch ltromt hqdS olaHct heir al pni HmSh oeSrim alp tromh ed gbol qdimh oimh el pni HmSh oeSrim alp el gbol imh lemt Hlqim lnSia ohith tromt hqdS omqdS hbit btokh׃ 
ezekiel 48:22	omaHct hloim omaHct heir btok aSr lnSia ihih bin gbol ihodh obin gbol bnimn lnSia ihih׃ 
ezekiel 48:23	oitr hSbTim mpat qdmh ed pat imh bnimn aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:24	oel gbol bnimn mpat qdimh ed pat imh Smeon aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:25	oel gbol Smeon mpat qdimh ed pat imh iSSkr aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:26	oel gbol iSSkr mpat qdimh ed pat imh cboln aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:27	oel gbol cboln mpat qdmh ed pat imh gd aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:28	oel gbol gd al pat ngb timnh ohih gbol mtmr mi mribt qdS nHlh el him hgdol׃ 
ezekiel 48:29	cat harz aSr tpilo mnHlh lSbTi iSral oalh mHlqtm nam adni ihoh׃ 
ezekiel 48:30	oalh tozat heir mpat zpon HmS maot oarbet alpim mdh׃ 
ezekiel 48:31	oSeri heir el Smot SbTi iSral Serim SloSh zponh Ser raobn aHd Ser ihodh aHd Ser loi aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:32	oal pat qdimh HmS maot oarbet alpim oSerim SlSh oSer iosp aHd Ser bnimn aHd Ser dn aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:33	opat ngbh HmS maot oarbet alpim mdh oSerim SlSh Ser Smeon aHd Ser iSSkr aHd Ser cboln aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:34	pat imh HmS maot oarbet alpim Serihm SlSh Ser gd aHd Ser aSr aHd Ser nptli aHd׃ 
ezekiel 48:35	sbib Smnh eSr alp oSm heir miom ihoh Smh׃
