hosea 12:2	orib lihoh em ihodh olpqd el ieqb kdrkio kmellio iSib lo׃ 
hosea 12:3	bbTn eqb at aHio obaono Srh at alhim׃ 
hosea 12:4	oiSr al mlak oikl bkh oitHnn lo bit al imzano oSm idbr emno׃ 
hosea 12:5	oihoh alhi hzbaot ihoh ckro׃ 
hosea 12:6	oath balhik tSob Hsd omSpT Smr oqoh al alhik tmid׃ 
hosea 12:7	knen bido macni mrmh leSq ahb׃ 
hosea 12:8	oiamr aprim ak eSrti mzati aon li kl igiei la imzao li eon aSr HTa׃ 
hosea 12:9	oanki ihoh alhik marz mzrim ed aoSibk bahlim kimi moed׃ 
hosea 12:10	odbrti el hnbiaim oanki Hcon hrbiti obid hnbiaim admh׃ 
hosea 12:11	am gled aon ak Soa hio bglgl Sorim cbHo gm mcbHotm kglim el tlmi Sdi׃ 
hosea 12:12	oibrH ieqb Sdh arm oiebd iSral baSh obaSh Smr׃ 
hosea 12:13	obnbia helh ihoh at iSral mmzrim obnbia nSmr׃ 
hosea 12:14	hkeis aprim tmrorim odmio elio iToS oHrpto iSib lo adnio׃ 
hosea 13:1	kdbr aprim rtt nSa hoa biSral oiaSm bbel oimt׃ 
hosea 13:2	oeth iospo lHTa oieSo lhm mskh mkspm ktbonm ezbim meSh HrSim klh lhm hm amrim cbHi adm eglim iSqon׃ 
hosea 13:3	lkn ihio kenn bqr okTl mSkim hlk kmz iser mgrn okeSn marbh׃ 
hosea 13:4	oanki ihoh alhik marz mzrim oalhim colti la tde omoSie ain blti׃ 
hosea 13:5	ani idetik bmdbr barz tlabot׃ 
hosea 13:6	kmreitm oiSbeo Sbeo oirm lbm el kn SkHoni׃ 
hosea 13:7	oahi lhm kmo SHl knmr el drk aSor׃ 
hosea 13:8	apgSm kdb Skol oaqre sgor lbm oaklm Sm klbia Hit hSdh tbqem׃ 
hosea 13:9	SHtk iSral ki bi becrk׃ 
hosea 13:10	ahi mlkk apoa oioSiek bkl erik oSpTik aSr amrt tnh li mlk oSrim׃ 
hosea 13:11	atn lk mlk bapi oaqH bebrti׃ 
hosea 13:12	zror eon aprim zponh HTato׃ 
hosea 13:13	Hbli ioldh ibao lo hoa bn la Hkm ki et la iemd bmSbr bnim׃ 
hosea 13:14	mid Saol apdm mmot agalm ahi dbrik mot ahi qTbk Saol nHm istr meini׃ 
hosea 13:15	ki hoa bin aHim ipria iboa qdim roH ihoh mmdbr elh oiboS mqoro oiHrb meino hoa iSsh aozr kl kli Hmdh׃ 
hosea 13:16	taSm Smron ki mrth balhih bHrb iplo ellihm irTSo ohriotio ibqeo׃ 
hosea 14:1	Sobh iSral ed ihoh alhik ki kSlt beonk׃ 
hosea 14:2	qHo emkm dbrim oSobo al ihoh amro alio kl tSa eon oqH Tob onSlmh prim Sptino׃ 
hosea 14:3	aSor la ioSieno el sos la nrkb ola namr eod alhino lmeSh idino aSr bk irHm itom׃ 
hosea 14:4	arpa mSobtm ahbm ndbh ki Sb api mmno׃ 
hosea 14:5	ahih kTl liSral iprH kSoSnh oik SrSio klbnon׃ 
hosea 14:6	ilko inqotio oihi kcit hodo oriH lo klbnon׃ 
hosea 14:7	iSbo iSbi bzlo iHio dgn oiprHo kgpn ckro kiin lbnon׃ 
hosea 14:8	aprim mh li eod lezbim ani eniti oaSorno ani kbroS renn mmni prik nmza׃ 
hosea 14:9	mi Hkm oibn alh nbon oidem ki iSrim drki ihoh ozdqim ilko bm opSeim ikSlo bm׃ 
joel 1:1	dbr ihoh aSr hih al ioal bn ptoal׃ 
joel 1:2	Smeo cat hcqnim ohacino kl ioSbi harz hhith cat bimikm oam bimi abtikm׃ 
joel 1:3	elih lbnikm spro obnikm lbnihm obnihm ldor aHr׃ 
joel 1:4	itr hgcm akl harbh oitr harbh akl hilq oitr hilq akl hHsil׃ 
joel 1:5	hqizo Skorim obko ohillo kl Sti iin el esis ki nkrt mpikm׃ 
joel 1:6	ki goi elh el arzi ezom oain mspr Snio Sni arih omtleot lbia lo׃ 
joel 1:7	Sm gpni lSmh otanti lqzph HSp HSph ohSlik hlbino Srigih׃ 
joel 1:8	ali kbtolh Hgrt Sq el bel neorih׃ 
joel 1:9	hkrt mnHh onsk mbit ihoh ablo hkhnim mSrti ihoh׃ 
joel 1:10	Sdd Sdh ablh admh ki Sdd dgn hobiS tiroS amll izhr׃ 
joel 1:11	hbiSo akrim hililo krmim el HTh oel Serh ki abd qzir Sdh׃ 
joel 1:12	hgpn hobiSh ohtanh amllh rmon gm tmr otpoH kl ezi hSdh ibSo ki hbiS SSon mn bni adm׃ 
joel 1:13	Hgro ospdo hkhnim hililo mSrti mcbH bao lino bSqim mSrti alhi ki nmne mbit alhikm mnHh onsk׃ 
joel 1:14	qdSo zom qrao ezrh aspo cqnim kl iSbi harz bit ihoh alhikm oceqo al ihoh׃ 
joel 1:15	ahh liom ki qrob iom ihoh okSd mSdi iboa׃ 
joel 1:16	hloa ngd einino akl nkrt mbit alhino SmHh ogil׃ 
joel 1:17	ebSo prdot tHt mgrptihm nSmo azrot nhrso mmgrot ki hbiS dgn׃ 
joel 1:18	mh nanHh bhmh nbko edri bqr ki ain mreh lhm gm edri hzan naSmo׃ 
joel 1:19	alik ihoh aqra ki aS aklh naot mdbr olhbh lhTh kl ezi hSdh׃ 
joel 1:20	gm bhmot Sdh terog alik ki ibSo apiqi mim oaS aklh naot hmdbr׃ 
joel 2:1	tqeo Sopr bzion ohrieo bhr qdSi irgco kl iSbi harz ki ba iom ihoh ki qrob׃ 
joel 2:2	iom HSk oaplh iom enn oerpl kSHr prS el hhrim em rb oezom kmho la nhih mn heolm oaHrio la iosp ed Sni dor odor׃ 
joel 2:3	lpnio aklh aS oaHrio tlhT lhbh kgn edn harz lpnio oaHrio mdbr Smmh ogm pliTh la hith lo׃ 
joel 2:4	kmrah sosim mraho okprSim kn irozon׃ 
joel 2:5	kqol mrkbot el raSi hhrim irqdon kqol lhb aS aklh qS kem ezom erok mlHmh׃ 
joel 2:6	mpnio iHilo emim kl pnim qbzo paror׃ 
joel 2:7	kgborim irzon kanSi mlHmh ielo Homh oaiS bdrkio ilkon ola iebTon arHotm׃ 
joel 2:8	oaiS aHio la idHqon gbr bmslto ilkon obed hSlH iplo la ibzeo׃ 
joel 2:9	beir iSqo bHomh irzon bbtim ielo bed hHlonim ibao kgnb׃ 
joel 2:10	lpnio rgch arz reSo Smim SmS oirH qdro okokbim aspo nghm׃ 
joel 2:11	oihoh ntn qolo lpni Hilo ki rb mad mHnho ki ezom eSh dbro ki gdol iom ihoh onora mad omi ikilno׃ 
joel 2:12	ogm eth nam ihoh Sbo edi bkl lbbkm obzom obbki obmspd׃ 
joel 2:13	oqreo lbbkm oal bgdikm oSobo al ihoh alhikm ki Hnon orHom hoa ark apim orb Hsd onHm el hreh׃ 
joel 2:14	mi iode iSob onHm ohSair aHrio brkh mnHh onsk lihoh alhikm׃ 
joel 2:15	tqeo Sopr bzion qdSo zom qrao ezrh׃ 
joel 2:16	aspo em qdSo qhl qbzo cqnim aspo eollim oinqi Sdim iza Htn mHdro oklh mHpth׃ 
joel 2:17	bin haolm olmcbH ibko hkhnim mSrti ihoh oiamro Hosh ihoh el emk oal ttn nHltk lHrph lmSl bm goim lmh iamro bemim aih alhihm׃ 
joel 2:18	oiqna ihoh larzo oiHml el emo׃ 
joel 2:19	oien ihoh oiamr lemo hnni SlH lkm at hdgn ohtiroS ohizhr oSbetm ato ola atn atkm eod Hrph bgoim׃ 
joel 2:20	oat hzponi arHiq melikm ohdHtio al arz zih oSmmh at pnio al him hqdmni ospo al him haHron oelh baSo otel zHnto ki hgdil leSot׃ 
joel 2:21	al tirai admh gili oSmHi ki hgdil ihoh leSot׃ 
joel 2:22	al tirao bhmot Sdi ki dSao naot mdbr ki ez nSa prio tanh ogpn ntno Hilm׃ 
joel 2:23	obni zion gilo oSmHo bihoh alhikm ki ntn lkm at hmorh lzdqh oiord lkm gSm morh omlqoS braSon׃ 
joel 2:24	omlao hgrnot br ohSiqo hiqbim tiroS oizhr׃ 
joel 2:25	oSlmti lkm at hSnim aSr akl harbh hilq ohHsil ohgcm Hili hgdol aSr SlHti bkm׃ 
joel 2:26	oakltm akol oSboe ohlltm at Sm ihoh alhikm aSr eSh emkm lhplia ola ibSo emi leolm׃ 
joel 2:27	oidetm ki bqrb iSral ani oani ihoh alhikm oain eod ola ibSo emi leolm׃ 
joel 2:28	ohih aHri kn aSpok at roHi el kl bSr onbao bnikm obnotikm cqnikm Hlmot iHlmon bHorikm Hcinot irao׃ 
joel 2:29	ogm el hebdim oel hSpHot bimim hhmh aSpok at roHi׃ 
joel 2:30	ontti moptim bSmim obarz dm oaS otimrot eSn׃ 
joel 2:31	hSmS ihpk lHSk ohirH ldm lpni boa iom ihoh hgdol ohnora׃ 
joel 2:32	ohih kl aSr iqra bSm ihoh imlT ki bhr zion obiroSlm thih pliTh kaSr amr ihoh obSridim aSr ihoh qra׃ 
joel 3:1	ki hnh bimim hhmh obet hhia aSr aSob at Sbot ihodh oiroSlm׃ 
joel 3:2	oqbzti at kl hgoim ohordtim al emq ihoSpT onSpTti emm Sm el emi onHlti iSral aSr pcro bgoim oat arzi Hlqo׃ 
joel 3:3	oal emi ido gorl oitno hild bconh ohildh mkro biin oiSto׃ 
joel 3:4	ogm mh atm li zr ozidon okl glilot plSt hgmol atm mSlmim eli oam gmlim atm eli ql mhrh aSib gmlkm braSkm׃ 
joel 3:5	aSr kspi ochbi lqHtm omHmdi hTbim hbatm lhiklikm׃ 
joel 3:6	obni ihodh obni iroSlm mkrtm lbni hionim lmen hrHiqm mel gbolm׃ 
joel 3:7	hnni meirm mn hmqom aSr mkrtm atm Smh ohSbti gmlkm braSkm׃ 
joel 3:8	omkrti at bnikm oat bnotikm bid bni ihodh omkrom lSbaim al goi rHoq ki ihoh dbr׃ 
joel 3:9	qrao cat bgoim qdSo mlHmh heiro hgborim igSo ielo kl anSi hmlHmh׃ 
joel 3:10	kto atikm lHrbot omcmrtikm lrmHim hHlS iamr gbor ani׃ 
joel 3:11	eoSo obao kl hgoim msbib onqbzo Smh hnHt ihoh gborik׃ 
joel 3:12	ieoro oielo hgoim al emq ihoSpT ki Sm aSb lSpT at kl hgoim msbib׃ 
joel 3:13	SlHo mgl ki bSl qzir bao rdo ki mlah gt hSiqo hiqbim ki rbh retm׃ 
joel 3:14	hmonim hmonim bemq hHroz ki qrob iom ihoh bemq hHroz׃ 
joel 3:15	SmS oirH qdro okokbim aspo nghm׃ 
joel 3:16	oihoh mzion iSag omiroSlm itn qolo oreSo Smim oarz oihoh mHsh lemo omeoc lbni iSral׃ 
joel 3:17	oidetm ki ani ihoh alhikm Skn bzion hr qdSi ohith iroSlm qdS ocrim la iebro bh eod׃ 
joel 3:18	ohih biom hhoa iTpo hhrim esis ohgbeot tlknh Hlb okl apiqi ihodh ilko mim omein mbit ihoh iza ohSqh at nHl hSTim׃ 
joel 3:19	mzrim lSmmh thih oadom lmdbr Smmh thih mHms bni ihodh aSr Spko dm nqia barzm׃ 
joel 3:20	oihodh leolm tSb oiroSlm ldor odor׃ 
joel 3:21	onqiti dmm la nqiti oihoh Skn bzion׃ 
amos 1:1	dbri emos aSr hih bnqdim mtqoe aSr Hch el iSral bimi ecih mlk ihodh obimi irbem bn ioaS mlk iSral Sntim lpni hreS׃ 
amos 1:2	oiamr ihoh mzion iSag omiroSlm itn qolo oablo naot hreim oibS raS hkrml׃ 
amos 1:3	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei dmSq oel arbeh la aSibno el doSm bHrzot hbrcl at hgled׃ 
amos 1:4	oSlHti aS bbit Hcal oaklh armnot bn hdd׃ 
amos 1:5	oSbrti briH dmSq ohkrti ioSb mbqet aon otomk SbT mbit edn oglo em arm qirh amr ihoh׃ 
amos 1:6	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei ech oel arbeh la aSibno el hglotm glot Slmh lhsgir ladom׃ 
amos 1:7	oSlHti aS bHomt ech oaklh armntih׃ 
amos 1:8	ohkrti ioSb maSdod otomk SbT maSqlon ohSiboti idi el eqron oabdo Sarit plStim amr adni ihoh׃ 
amos 1:9	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei zr oel arbeh la aSibno el hsgirm glot Slmh ladom ola ckro brit aHim׃ 
amos 1:10	oSlHti aS bHomt zr oaklh armnotih׃ 
amos 1:11	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei adom oel arbeh la aSibno el rdpo bHrb aHio oSHt rHmio oiTrp led apo oebrto Smrh nzH׃ 
amos 1:12	oSlHti aS btimn oaklh armnot bzrh׃ 
amos 1:13	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei bni emon oel arbeh la aSibno el bqem hrot hgled lmen hrHib at gbolm׃ 
amos 1:14	ohzti aS bHomt rbh oaklh armnotih btroeh biom mlHmh bser biom soph׃ 
amos 1:15	ohlk mlkm bgolh hoa oSrio iHdo amr ihoh׃ 
amos 2:1	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei moab oel arbeh la aSibno el Srpo ezmot mlk adom lSid׃ 
amos 2:2	oSlHti aS bmoab oaklh armnot hqriot omt bSaon moab btroeh bqol Sopr׃ 
amos 2:3	ohkrti SopT mqrbh okl Srih ahrog emo amr ihoh׃ 
amos 2:4	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei ihodh oel arbeh la aSibno el masm at tort ihoh oHqio la Smro oiteom kcbihm aSr hlko abotm aHrihm׃ 
amos 2:5	oSlHti aS bihodh oaklh armnot iroSlm׃ 
amos 2:6	kh amr ihoh el SlSh pSei iSral oel arbeh la aSibno el mkrm bksp zdiq oabion bebor nelim׃ 
amos 2:7	hSapim el epr arz braS dlim odrk enoim iTo oaiS oabio ilko al hnerh lmen Hll at Sm qdSi׃ 
amos 2:8	oel bgdim Hblim iTo azl kl mcbH oiin enoSim iSto bit alhihm׃ 
amos 2:9	oanki hSmdti at hamri mpnihm aSr kgbh arcim gbho oHsn hoa kalonim oaSmid prio mmel oSrSio mtHt׃ 
amos 2:10	oanki heliti atkm marz mzrim oaolk atkm bmdbr arbeim Snh lrSt at arz hamri׃ 
amos 2:11	oaqim mbnikm lnbiaim ombHorikm lncrim hap ain cat bni iSral nam ihoh׃ 
amos 2:12	otSqo at hncrim iin oel hnbiaim zoitm lamr la tnbao׃ 
amos 2:13	hnh anki meiq tHtikm kaSr teiq heglh hmlah lh emir׃ 
amos 2:14	oabd mnos mql oHcq la iamz kHo ogbor la imlT npSo׃ 
amos 2:15	otpS hqSt la iemd oql brglio la imlT orkb hsos la imlT npSo׃ 
amos 2:16	oamiz lbo bgborim erom inos biom hhoa nam ihoh׃ 
amos 3:1	Smeo at hdbr hch aSr dbr ihoh elikm bni iSral el kl hmSpHh aSr heliti marz mzrim lamr׃ 
amos 3:2	rq atkm ideti mkl mSpHot hadmh el kn apqd elikm at kl eontikm׃ 
amos 3:3	hilko Snim iHdo blti am noedo׃ 
amos 3:4	hiSag arih bier oTrp ain lo hitn kpir qolo mmento blti am lkd׃ 
amos 3:5	htpl zpor el pH harz omoqS ain lh hielh pH mn hadmh olkod la ilkod׃ 
amos 3:6	am itqe Sopr beir oem la iHrdo am thih reh beir oihoh la eSh׃ 
amos 3:7	ki la ieSh adni ihoh dbr ki am glh sodo al ebdio hnbiaim׃ 
amos 3:8	arih Sag mi la iira adni ihoh dbr mi la inba׃ 
amos 3:9	hSmieo el armnot baSdod oel armnot barz mzrim oamro haspo el hri Smron orao mhomt rbot btokh oeSoqim bqrbh׃ 
amos 3:10	ola ideo eSot nkHh nam ihoh haozrim Hms oSd barmnotihm׃ 
amos 3:11	lkn kh amr adni ihoh zr osbib harz ohord mmk eck onbco armnotik׃ 
amos 3:12	kh amr ihoh kaSr izil hreh mpi hari Sti kreim ao bdl acn kn inzlo bni iSral hiSbim bSmron bpat mTh obdmSq erS׃ 
amos 3:13	Smeo oheido bbit ieqb nam adni ihoh alhi hzbaot׃ 
amos 3:14	ki biom pqdi pSei iSral elio opqdti el mcbHot bit al ongdeo qrnot hmcbH onplo larz׃ 
amos 3:15	ohkiti bit hHrp el bit hqiz oabdo bti hSn ospo btim rbim nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:1	Smeo hdbr hch prot hbSn aSr bhr Smron heSqot dlim hrzzot abionim hamrt ladnihm hbiah onSth׃ 
amos 4:2	nSbe adni ihoh bqdSo ki hnh imim baim elikm onSa atkm bznot oaHritkn bsirot dogh׃ 
amos 4:3	oprzim tzanh aSh ngdh ohSlktnh hhrmonh nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:4	bao bit al opSeo hglgl hrbo lpSe ohbiao lbqr cbHikm lSlSt imim meSrtikm׃ 
amos 4:5	oqTr mHmz todh oqrao ndbot hSmieo ki kn ahbtm bni iSral nam adni ihoh׃ 
amos 4:6	ogm ani ntti lkm nqion Snim bkl erikm oHsr lHm bkl mqomtikm ola Sbtm edi nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:7	ogm anki mneti mkm at hgSm beod SlSh HdSim lqzir ohmTrti el eir aHt oel eir aHt la amTir Hlqh aHt tmTr oHlqh aSr la tmTir elih tibS׃ 
amos 4:8	oneo Stim SlS erim al eir aHt lStot mim ola iSbeo ola Sbtm edi nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:9	hkiti atkm bSdpon obirqon hrbot gnotikm okrmikm otanikm ocitikm iakl hgcm ola Sbtm edi nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:10	SlHti bkm dbr bdrk mzrim hrgti bHrb bHorikm em Sbi sosikm oaelh baS mHnikm obapkm ola Sbtm edi nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:11	hpkti bkm kmhpkt alhim at sdm oat emrh othio kaod mzl mSrph ola Sbtm edi nam ihoh׃ 
amos 4:12	lkn kh aeSh lk iSral eqb ki cat aeSh lk hkon lqrat alhik iSral׃ 
amos 4:13	ki hnh iozr hrim obra roH omgid ladm mh SHo eSh SHr eiph odrk el bmti arz ihoh alhi zbaot Smo׃ 
amos 5:1	Smeo at hdbr hch aSr anki nSa elikm qinh bit iSral׃ 
amos 5:2	nplh la tosip qom btolt iSral nTSh el admth ain mqimh׃ 
amos 5:3	ki kh amr adni ihoh heir hizat alp tSair mah ohiozat mah tSair eSrh lbit iSral׃ 
amos 5:4	ki kh amr ihoh lbit iSral drSoni oHio׃ 
amos 5:5	oal tdrSo bit al ohglgl la tbao obar Sbe la tebro ki hglgl glh iglh obit al ihih laon׃ 
amos 5:6	drSo at ihoh oHio pn izlH kaS bit iosp oaklh oain mkbh lbit al׃ 
amos 5:7	hhpkim llenh mSpT ozdqh larz hniHo׃ 
amos 5:8	eSh kimh oksil ohpk lbqr zlmot oiom lilh hHSik hqora lmi him oiSpkm el pni harz ihoh Smo׃ 
amos 5:9	hmblig Sd el ec oSd el mbzr iboa׃ 
amos 5:10	Snao bSer mokiH odbr tmim itebo׃ 
amos 5:11	lkn ien boSskm el dl omSat br tqHo mmno bti gcit bnitm ola tSbo bm krmi Hmd nTetm ola tSto at iinm׃ 
amos 5:12	ki ideti rbim pSeikm oezmim HTatikm zrri zdiq lqHi kpr oabionim bSer hTo׃ 
amos 5:13	lkn hmSkil bet hhia idm ki et reh hia׃ 
amos 5:14	drSo Tob oal re lmen tHio oihi kn ihoh alhi zbaot atkm kaSr amrtm׃ 
amos 5:15	Snao re oahbo Tob ohzigo bSer mSpT aoli iHnn ihoh alhi zbaot Sarit iosp׃ 
amos 5:16	lkn kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot adni bkl rHbot mspd obkl Hozot iamro ho ho oqrao akr al abl omspd al iodei nhi׃ 
amos 5:17	obkl krmim mspd ki aebr bqrbk amr ihoh׃ 
amos 5:18	hoi hmtaoim at iom ihoh lmh ch lkm iom ihoh hoa HSk ola aor׃ 
amos 5:19	kaSr inos aiS mpni hari opgeo hdb oba hbit osmk ido el hqir onSko hnHS׃ 
amos 5:20	hla HSk iom ihoh ola aor oapl ola ngh lo׃ 
amos 5:21	Snati masti Hgikm ola ariH bezrtikm׃ 
amos 5:22	ki am telo li elot omnHtikm la arzh oSlm mriaikm la abiT׃ 
amos 5:23	hsr meli hmon Srik ocmrt nblik la aSme׃ 
amos 5:24	oigl kmim mSpT ozdqh knHl aitn׃ 
amos 5:25	hcbHim omnHh hgStm li bmdbr arbeim Snh bit iSral׃ 
amos 5:26	onSatm at skot mlkkm oat kion zlmikm kokb alhikm aSr eSitm lkm׃ 
amos 5:27	ohgliti atkm mhlah ldmSq amr ihoh alhi zbaot Smo׃ 
amos 6:1	hoi hSannim bzion ohbTHim bhr Smron nqbi raSit hgoim obao lhm bit iSral׃ 
amos 6:2	ebro klnh orao olko mSm Hmt rbh ordo gt plStim hTobim mn hmmlkot halh am rb gbolm mgblkm׃ 
amos 6:3	hmndim liom re otgiSon Sbt Hms׃ 
amos 6:4	hSkbim el mTot Sn osrHim el erSotm oaklim krim mzan oeglim mtok mrbq׃ 
amos 6:5	hprTim el pi hnbl kdoid HSbo lhm kli Sir׃ 
amos 6:6	hStim bmcrqi iin oraSit Smnim imSHo ola nHlo el Sbr iosp׃ 
amos 6:7	lkn eth iglo braS glim osr mrcH sroHim׃ 
amos 6:8	nSbe adni ihoh bnpSo nam ihoh alhi zbaot mtab anki at gaon ieqb oarmntio Snati ohsgrti eir omlah׃ 
amos 6:9	ohih am iotro eSrh anSim bbit aHd omto׃ 
amos 6:10	onSao dodo omsrpo lhozia ezmim mn hbit oamr laSr birkti hbit heod emk oamr aps oamr hs ki la lhckir bSm ihoh׃ 
amos 6:11	ki hnh ihoh mzoh ohkh hbit hgdol rsisim ohbit hqTn bqeim׃ 
amos 6:12	hirzon bsle sosim am iHroS bbqrim ki hpktm lraS mSpT opri zdqh llenh׃ 
amos 6:13	hSmHim lla dbr hamrim hloa bHcqno lqHno lno qrnim׃ 
amos 6:14	ki hnni mqim elikm bit iSral nam ihoh alhi hzbaot goi olHzo atkm mlboa Hmt ed nHl herbh׃ 
amos 7:1	kh hrani adni ihoh ohnh iozr gbi btHlt elot hlqS ohnh lqS aHr gci hmlk׃ 
amos 7:2	ohih am klh lakol at eSb harz oamr adni ihoh slH na mi iqom ieqb ki qTn hoa׃ 
amos 7:3	nHm ihoh el cat la thih amr ihoh׃ 
amos 7:4	kh hrani adni ihoh ohnh qra lrb baS adni ihoh otakl at thom rbh oaklh at hHlq׃ 
amos 7:5	oamr adni ihoh Hdl na mi iqom ieqb ki qTn hoa׃ 
amos 7:6	nHm ihoh el cat gm hia la thih amr adni ihoh׃ 
amos 7:7	kh hrani ohnh adni nzb el Homt ank obido ank׃ 
amos 7:8	oiamr ihoh ali mh ath rah emos oamr ank oiamr adni hnni Sm ank bqrb emi iSral la aosip eod ebor lo׃ 
amos 7:9	onSmo bmot iSHq omqdSi iSral iHrbo oqmti el bit irbem bHrb׃ 
amos 7:10	oiSlH amzih khn bit al al irbem mlk iSral lamr qSr elik emos bqrb bit iSral la tokl harz lhkil at kl dbrio׃ 
amos 7:11	ki kh amr emos bHrb imot irbem oiSral glh iglh mel admto׃ 
amos 7:12	oiamr amzih al emos Hch lk brH lk al arz ihodh oakl Sm lHm oSm tnba׃ 
amos 7:13	obit al la tosip eod lhnba ki mqdS mlk hoa obit mmlkh hoa׃ 
amos 7:14	oien emos oiamr al amzih la nbia anki ola bn nbia anki ki boqr anki obols Sqmim׃ 
amos 7:15	oiqHni ihoh maHri hzan oiamr ali ihoh lk hnba al emi iSral׃ 
amos 7:16	oeth Sme dbr ihoh ath amr la tnba el iSral ola tTip el bit iSHq׃ 
amos 7:17	lkn kh amr ihoh aStk beir tcnh obnik obntik bHrb iplo oadmtk bHbl tHlq oath el admh Tmah tmot oiSral glh iglh mel admto׃ 
amos 8:1	kh hrani adni ihoh ohnh klob qiz׃ 
amos 8:2	oiamr mh ath rah emos oamr klob qiz oiamr ihoh ali ba hqz al emi iSral la aosip eod ebor lo׃ 
amos 8:3	ohililo Sirot hikl biom hhoa nam adni ihoh rb hpgr bkl mqom hSlik hs׃ 
amos 8:4	Smeo cat hSapim abion olSbit enoi arz׃ 
amos 8:5	lamr mti iebr hHdS onSbirh Sbr ohSbt onptHh br lhqTin aiph olhgdil Sql oleot macni mrmh׃ 
amos 8:6	lqnot bksp dlim oabion bebor nelim ompl br nSbir׃ 
amos 8:7	nSbe ihoh bgaon ieqb am aSkH lnzH kl meSihm׃ 
amos 8:8	hel cat la trgc harz oabl kl ioSb bh oelth kar klh ongrSh onSqh kiaor mzrim׃ 
amos 8:9	ohih biom hhoa nam adni ihoh ohbati hSmS bzhrim ohHSkti larz biom aor׃ 
amos 8:10	ohpkti Hgikm labl okl Sirikm lqinh oheliti el kl mtnim Sq oel kl raS qrHh oSmtih kabl iHid oaHrith kiom mr׃ 
amos 8:11	hnh imim baim nam adni ihoh ohSlHti reb barz la reb llHm ola zma lmim ki am lSme at dbri ihoh׃ 
amos 8:12	oneo mim ed im omzpon oed mcrH iSoTTo lbqS at dbr ihoh ola imzao׃ 
amos 8:13	biom hhoa ttelpnh hbtolt hipot ohbHorim bzma׃ 
amos 8:14	hnSbeim baSmt Smron oamro Hi alhik dn oHi drk bar Sbe onplo ola iqomo eod׃ 
amos 9:1	raiti at adni nzb el hmcbH oiamr hk hkptor oireSo hspim obzem braS klm oaHritm bHrb ahrg la inos lhm ns ola imlT lhm pliT׃ 
amos 9:2	am iHtro bSaol mSm idi tqHm oam ielo hSmim mSm aoridm׃ 
amos 9:3	oam iHbao braS hkrml mSm aHpS olqHtim oam istro mngd eini bqrqe him mSm azoh at hnHS onSkm׃ 
amos 9:4	oam ilko bSbi lpni aibihm mSm azoh at hHrb ohrgtm oSmti eini elihm lreh ola lTobh׃ 
amos 9:5	oadni ihoh hzbaot hnoge barz otmog oablo kl ioSbi bh oelth kiar klh oSqeh kiar mzrim׃ 
amos 9:6	hbonh bSmim meloto oagdto el arz isdh hqra lmi him oiSpkm el pni harz ihoh Smo׃ 
amos 9:7	hloa kbni kSiim atm li bni iSral nam ihoh hloa at iSral heliti marz mzrim oplStiim mkptor oarm mqir׃ 
amos 9:8	hnh eini adni ihoh bmmlkh hHTah ohSmdti ath mel pni hadmh aps ki la hSmid aSmid at bit ieqb nam ihoh׃ 
amos 9:9	ki hnh anki mzoh ohneoti bkl hgoim at bit iSral kaSr inoe bkbrh ola ipol zror arz׃ 
amos 9:10	bHrb imoto kl HTai emi hamrim la tgiS otqdim bedino hreh׃ 
amos 9:11	biom hhoa aqim at skt doid hnplt ogdrti at przihn ohrstio aqim obnitih kimi eolm׃ 
amos 9:12	lmen iirSo at Sarit adom okl hgoim aSr nqra Smi elihm nam ihoh eSh cat׃ 
amos 9:13	hnh imim baim nam ihoh ongS HorS bqzr odrk enbim bmSk hcre ohTipo hhrim esis okl hgbeot ttmoggnh׃ 
amos 9:14	oSbti at Sbot emi iSral obno erim nSmot oiSbo onTeo krmim oSto at iinm oeSo gnot oaklo at prihm׃ 
amos 9:15	onTetim el admtm ola intSo eod mel admtm aSr ntti lhm amr ihoh alhik׃ 
obadiah 1:1	Hcon ebdih kh amr adni ihoh ladom Smoeh Smeno mat ihoh ozir bgoim SlH qomo onqomh elih lmlHmh׃ 
obadiah 1:2	hnh qTn nttik bgoim bcoi ath mad׃ 
obadiah 1:3	cdon lbk hSiak Skni bHgoi sle mrom Sbto amr blbo mi iordni arz׃ 
obadiah 1:4	am tgbih knSr oam bin kokbim Sim qnk mSm aoridk nam ihoh׃ 
obadiah 1:5	am gnbim bao lk am Soddi lilh aik ndmith hloa ignbo dim am bzrim bao lk hloa iSairo ellot׃ 
obadiah 1:6	aik nHpSo eSo nbeo mzpnio׃ 
obadiah 1:7	ed hgbol SlHok kl anSi britk hSiaok iklo lk anSi Slmk lHmk iSimo mcor tHtik ain tbonh bo׃ 
obadiah 1:8	hloa biom hhoa nam ihoh ohabdti Hkmim madom otbonh mhr eSo׃ 
obadiah 1:9	oHto gborik timn lmen ikrt aiS mhr eSo mqTl׃ 
obadiah 1:10	mHms aHik ieqb tksk boSh onkrt leolm׃ 
obadiah 1:11	biom emdk mngd biom Sbot crim Hilo onkrim bao Sero oel iroSlm ido gorl gm ath kaHd mhm׃ 
obadiah 1:12	oal tra biom aHik biom nkro oal tSmH lbni ihodh biom abdm oal tgdl pik biom zrh׃ 
obadiah 1:13	al tboa bSer emi biom aidm al tra gm ath breto biom aido oal tSlHnh bHilo biom aido׃ 
obadiah 1:14	oal temd el hprq lhkrit at pliTio oal tsgr Sridio biom zrh׃ 
obadiah 1:15	ki qrob iom ihoh el kl hgoim kaSr eSit ieSh lk gmlk iSob braSk׃ 
obadiah 1:16	ki kaSr Stitm el hr qdSi iSto kl hgoim tmid oSto oleo ohio kloa hio׃ 
obadiah 1:17	obhr zion thih pliTh ohih qdS oirSo bit ieqb at morSihm׃ 
obadiah 1:18	ohih bit ieqb aS obit iosp lhbh obit eSo lqS odlqo bhm oaklom ola ihih Srid lbit eSo ki ihoh dbr׃ 
obadiah 1:19	oirSo hngb at hr eSo ohSplh at plStim oirSo at Sdh aprim oat Sdh Smron obnimn at hgled׃ 
obadiah 1:20	oglt hHl hch lbni iSral aSr knenim ed zrpt oglt iroSlm aSr bsprd irSo at eri hngb׃ 
obadiah 1:21	oelo moSeim bhr zion lSpT at hr eSo ohith lihoh hmlokh׃ 
jonah 1:1	oihi dbr ihoh al ionh bn amti lamr׃ 
jonah 1:2	qom lk al ninoh heir hgdolh oqra elih ki elth retm lpni׃ 
jonah 1:3	oiqm ionh lbrH trSiSh mlpni ihoh oird ipo oimza anih bah trSiS oitn Skrh oird bh lboa emhm trSiSh mlpni ihoh׃ 
jonah 1:4	oihoh hTil roH gdolh al him oihi ser gdol bim ohanih HSbh lhSbr׃ 
jonah 1:5	oiirao hmlHim oiceqo aiS al alhio oiTlo at hklim aSr banih al him lhql melihm oionh ird al irkti hspinh oiSkb oirdm׃ 
jonah 1:6	oiqrb alio rb hHbl oiamr lo mh lk nrdm qom qra al alhik aoli iteSt halhim lno ola nabd׃ 
jonah 1:7	oiamro aiS al reho lko onpilh gorlot ondeh bSlmi hreh hcat lno oiplo gorlot oipl hgorl el ionh׃ 
jonah 1:8	oiamro alio hgidh na lno baSr lmi hreh hcat lno mh mlaktk omain tboa mh arzk oai mch em ath׃ 
jonah 1:9	oiamr alihm ebri anki oat ihoh alhi hSmim ani ira aSr eSh at him oat hibSh׃ 
jonah 1:10	oiirao hanSim irah gdolh oiamro alio mh cat eSit ki ideo hanSim ki mlpni ihoh hoa brH ki hgid lhm׃ 
jonah 1:11	oiamro alio mh neSh lk oiStq him melino ki him holk oser׃ 
jonah 1:12	oiamr alihm Saoni ohTilni al him oiStq him melikm ki iode ani ki bSli hser hgdol hch elikm׃ 
jonah 1:13	oiHtro hanSim lhSib al hibSh ola iklo ki him holk oser elihm׃ 
jonah 1:14	oiqrao al ihoh oiamro anh ihoh al na nabdh bnpS haiS hch oal ttn elino dm nqia ki ath ihoh kaSr Hpzt eSit׃ 
jonah 1:15	oiSao at ionh oiTlho al him oiemd him mcepo׃ 
jonah 1:16	oiirao hanSim irah gdolh at ihoh oicbHo cbH lihoh oidro ndrim׃ 
jonah 1:17	oimn ihoh dg gdol lble at ionh oihi ionh bmei hdg SlSh imim oSlSh lilot׃ 
jonah 2:1	oitpll ionh al ihoh alhio mmei hdgh׃ 
jonah 2:2	oiamr qrati mzrh li al ihoh oienni mbTn Saol Soeti Smet qoli׃ 
jonah 2:3	otSlikni mzolh blbb imim onhr isbbni kl mSbrik oglik eli ebro׃ 
jonah 2:4	oani amrti ngrSti mngd einik ak aosip lhbiT al hikl qdSk׃ 
jonah 2:5	apponi mim ed npS thom isbbni sop HboS lraSi׃ 
jonah 2:6	lqzbi hrim irdti harz brHih bedi leolm otel mSHt Hii ihoh alhi׃ 
jonah 2:7	bhteTp eli npSi at ihoh ckrti otboa alik tplti al hikl qdSk׃ 
jonah 2:8	mSmrim hbli Soa Hsdm iecbo׃ 
jonah 2:9	oani bqol todh acbHh lk aSr ndrti aSlmh iSoeth lihoh׃ 
jonah 2:10	oiamr ihoh ldg oiqa at ionh al hibSh׃ 
jonah 3:1	oihi dbr ihoh al ionh Snit lamr׃ 
jonah 3:2	qom lk al ninoh heir hgdolh oqra alih at hqriah aSr anki dbr alik׃ 
jonah 3:3	oiqm ionh oilk al ninoh kdbr ihoh oninoh hith eir gdolh lalhim mhlk SlSt imim׃ 
jonah 3:4	oiHl ionh lboa beir mhlk iom aHd oiqra oiamr eod arbeim iom oninoh nhpkt׃ 
jonah 3:5	oiamino anSi ninoh balhim oiqrao zom oilbSo Sqim mgdolm oed qTnm׃ 
jonah 3:6	oige hdbr al mlk ninoh oiqm mksao oiebr adrto melio oiks Sq oiSb el hapr׃ 
jonah 3:7	oiceq oiamr bninoh mTem hmlk ogdlio lamr hadm ohbhmh hbqr ohzan al iTemo maomh al ireo omim al iSto׃ 
jonah 3:8	oitkso Sqim hadm ohbhmh oiqrao al alhim bHcqh oiSbo aiS mdrko hreh omn hHms aSr bkpihm׃ 
jonah 3:9	mi iode iSob onHm halhim oSb mHron apo ola nabd׃ 
jonah 3:10	oira halhim at meSihm ki Sbo mdrkm hreh oinHm halhim el hreh aSr dbr leSot lhm ola eSh׃ 
jonah 4:1	oire al ionh reh gdolh oiHr lo׃ 
jonah 4:2	oitpll al ihoh oiamr anh ihoh hloa ch dbri ed hioti el admti el kn qdmti lbrH trSiSh ki ideti ki ath al Hnon orHom ark apim orb Hsd onHm el hreh׃ 
jonah 4:3	oeth ihoh qH na at npSi mmni ki Tob moti mHii׃ 
jonah 4:4	oiamr ihoh hhiTb Hrh lk׃ 
jonah 4:5	oiza ionh mn heir oiSb mqdm leir oieS lo Sm skh oiSb tHtih bzl ed aSr irah mh ihih beir׃ 
jonah 4:6	oimn ihoh alhim qiqion oiel mel lionh lhiot zl el raSo lhzil lo mreto oiSmH ionh el hqiqion SmHh gdolh׃ 
jonah 4:7	oimn halhim tolet belot hSHr lmHrt otk at hqiqion oiibS׃ 
jonah 4:8	oihi kcrH hSmS oimn alhim roH qdim HriSit otk hSmS el raS ionh oitelp oiSal at npSo lmot oiamr Tob moti mHii׃ 
jonah 4:9	oiamr alhim al ionh hhiTb Hrh lk el hqiqion oiamr hiTb Hrh li ed mot׃ 
jonah 4:10	oiamr ihoh ath Hst el hqiqion aSr la emlt bo ola gdlto Sbn lilh hih obn lilh abd׃ 
jonah 4:11	oani la aHos el ninoh heir hgdolh aSr iS bh hrbh mStim eSrh rbo adm aSr la ide bin imino lSmalo obhmh rbh׃ 
micah 1:1	dbr ihoh aSr hih al mikh hmrSti bimi iotm aHc iHcqih mlki ihodh aSr Hch el Smron oiroSlm׃ 
micah 1:2	Smeo emim klm hqSibi arz omlah oihi adni ihoh bkm led adni mhikl qdSo׃ 
micah 1:3	ki hnh ihoh iza mmqomo oird odrk el bmoti arz׃ 
micah 1:4	onmso hhrim tHtio ohemqim itbqeo kdong mpni haS kmim mgrim bmord׃ 
micah 1:5	bpSe ieqb kl cat obHTaot bit iSral mi pSe ieqb hloa Smron omi bmot ihodh hloa iroSlm׃ 
micah 1:6	oSmti Smron lei hSdh lmTei krm ohgrti lgi abnih oisdih aglh׃ 
micah 1:7	okl psilih ikto okl atnnih iSrpo baS okl ezbih aSim Smmh ki matnn conh qbzh oed atnn conh iSobo׃ 
micah 1:8	el cat aspdh oaililh ailkh Sill oerom aeSh mspd ktnim oabl kbnot ienh׃ 
micah 1:9	ki anoSh mkotih ki bah ed ihodh nge ed Ser emi ed iroSlm׃ 
micah 1:10	bgt al tgido bko al tbko bbit leprh epr htplSti׃ 
micah 1:11	ebri lkm ioSbt Spir erih bSt la izah ioSbt zann mspd bit hazl iqH mkm emdto׃ 
micah 1:12	ki Hlh lTob ioSbt mrot ki ird re mat ihoh lSer iroSlm׃ 
micah 1:13	rtm hmrkbh lrkS ioSbt lkiS raSit HTat hia lbt zion ki bk nmzao pSei iSral׃ 
micah 1:14	lkn ttni SloHim el morSt gt bti akcib lakcb lmlki iSral׃ 
micah 1:15	ed hirS abi lk ioSbt mrSh ed edlm iboa kbod iSral׃ 
micah 1:16	qrHi ogci el bni tenogik hrHbi qrHtk knSr ki glo mmk׃ 
micah 2:1	hoi HSbi aon opeli re el mSkbotm baor hbqr ieSoh ki iS lal idm׃ 
micah 2:2	oHmdo Sdot ogclo obtim onSao oeSqo gbr obito oaiS onHlto׃ 
micah 2:3	lkn kh amr ihoh hnni HSb el hmSpHh hcat reh aSr la tmiSo mSm zoartikm ola tlko romh ki et reh hia׃ 
micah 2:4	biom hhoa iSa elikm mSl onhh nhi nhih amr Sdod nSdno Hlq emi imir aik imiS li lSobb Sdino iHlq׃ 
micah 2:5	lkn la ihih lk mSlik Hbl bgorl bqhl ihoh׃ 
micah 2:6	al tTpo iTipon la iTpo lalh la isg klmot׃ 
micah 2:7	hamor bit ieqb hqzr roH ihoh am alh mellio hloa dbri iiTibo em hiSr holk׃ 
micah 2:8	oatmol emi laoib iqomm mmol Slmh adr tpSTon mebrim bTH Sobi mlHmh׃ 
micah 2:9	nSi emi tgrSon mbit tengih mel ellih tqHo hdri leolm׃ 
micah 2:10	qomo olko ki la cat hmnoHh bebor Tmah tHbl oHbl nmrz׃ 
micah 2:11	lo aiS hlk roH oSqr kcb aTp lk liin olSkr ohih mTip hem hch׃ 
micah 2:12	asp aasp ieqb klk qbz aqbz Sarit iSral iHd aSimno kzan bzrh kedr btok hdbro thimnh madm׃ 
micah 2:13	elh hprz lpnihm przo oiebro Ser oizao bo oiebr mlkm lpnihm oihoh braSm׃ 
micah 3:1	oamr Smeo na raSi ieqb oqzini bit iSral hloa lkm ldet at hmSpT׃ 
micah 3:2	Snai Tob oahbi reh gcli eorm melihm oSarm mel ezmotm׃ 
micah 3:3	oaSr aklo Sar emi oeorm melihm hpSiTo oat ezmtihm pzHo oprSo kaSr bsir okbSr btok qlHt׃ 
micah 3:4	ac iceqo al ihoh ola ienh aotm oistr pnio mhm bet hhia kaSr hreo mellihm׃ 
micah 3:5	kh amr ihoh el hnbiaim hmteim at emi hnSkim bSnihm oqrao Slom oaSr la itn el pihm oqdSo elio mlHmh׃ 
micah 3:6	lkn lilh lkm mHcon oHSkh lkm mqsm obah hSmS el hnbiaim oqdr elihm hiom׃ 
micah 3:7	obSo hHcim oHpro hqsmim oeTo el Spm klm ki ain menh alhim׃ 
micah 3:8	oaolm anki mlati kH at roH ihoh omSpT ogborh lhgid lieqb pSeo oliSral HTato׃ 
micah 3:9	Smeo na cat raSi bit ieqb oqzini bit iSral hmtebim mSpT oat kl hiSrh ieqSo׃

micah 3:12	lkn bgllkm zion Sdh tHrS oiroSlm eiin thih ohr hbit lbmot ier׃ 
micah 4:1	ohih baHrit himim ihih hr bit ihoh nkon braS hhrim onSa hoa mgbeot onhro elio emim׃ 
micah 4:2	ohlko goim rbim oamro lko onelh al hr ihoh oal bit alhi ieqb oiorno mdrkio onlkh barHtio ki mzion tza torh odbr ihoh miroSlm׃ 
micah 4:3	oSpT bin emim rbim ohokiH lgoim ezmim ed rHoq oktto Hrbtihm latim oHnittihm lmcmrot la iSao goi al goi Hrb ola ilmdon eod mlHmh׃ 
micah 4:4	oiSbo aiS tHt gpno otHt tanto oain mHrid ki pi ihoh zbaot dbr׃ 
micah 4:5	ki kl hemim ilko aiS bSm alhio oanHno nlk bSm ihoh alhino leolm oed׃ 
micah 4:6	biom hhoa nam ihoh asph hzleh ohndHh aqbzh oaSr hreti׃ 
micah 4:7	oSmti at hzleh lSarit ohnhlah lgoi ezom omlk ihoh elihm bhr zion meth oed eolm׃ 
micah 4:8	oath mgdl edr epl bt zion edik tath obah hmmSlh hraSnh mmlkt lbt iroSlm׃ 
micah 4:9	eth lmh triei re hmlk ain bk am ioezk abd ki hHciqk Hil kioldh׃ 
micah 4:10	Holi ogHi bt zion kioldh ki eth tzai mqrih oSknt bSdh obat ed bbl Sm tnzli Sm igalk ihoh mkp aibik׃ 
micah 4:11	oeth naspo elik goim rbim hamrim tHnp otHc bzion einino׃ 
micah 4:12	ohmh la ideo mHSbot ihoh ola hbino ezto ki qbzm kemir grnh׃ 
micah 4:13	qomi odoSi bt zion ki qrnk aSim brcl oprstik aSim nHoSh ohdqot emim rbim ohHrmti lihoh bzem oHilm ladon kl harz׃ 
micah 5:1	eth ttgddi bt gdod mzor Sm elino bSbT iko el hlHi at SpT iSral׃ 
micah 5:2	oath bit lHm aprth zeir lhiot balpi ihodh mmk li iza lhiot moSl biSral omozatio mqdm mimi eolm׃ 
micah 5:3	lkn itnm ed et ioldh ildh oitr aHio iSobon el bni iSral׃ 
micah 5:4	oemd oreh bec ihoh bgaon Sm ihoh alhio oiSbo ki eth igdl ed apsi arz׃ 
micah 5:5	ohih ch Slom aSor ki iboa barzno oki idrk barmntino ohqmno elio Sbeh reim oSmnh nsiki adm׃ 
micah 5:6	oreo at arz aSor bHrb oat arz nmrd bptHih ohzil maSor ki iboa barzno oki idrk bgbolno׃ 
micah 5:7	ohih Sarit ieqb bqrb emim rbim kTl mat ihoh krbibim eli eSb aSr la iqoh laiS ola iiHl lbni adm׃ 
micah 5:8	ohih Sarit ieqb bgoim bqrb emim rbim karih bbhmot ier kkpir bedri zan aSr am ebr orms oTrp oain mzil׃ 
micah 5:9	trm idk el zrik okl aibik ikrto׃ 
micah 5:10	ohih biom hhoa nam ihoh ohkrti sosik mqrbk ohabdti mrkbtik׃ 
micah 5:11	ohkrti eri arzk ohrsti kl mbzrik׃ 
micah 5:12	ohkrti kSpim midk omeonnim la ihio lk׃ 
micah 5:13	ohkrti psilik omzbotik mqrbk ola tStHoh eod lmeSh idik׃ 
micah 5:14	ontSti aSirik mqrbk ohSmdti erik׃ 
micah 5:15	oeSiti bap obHmh nqm at hgoim aSr la Smeo׃ 
micah 6:1	Smeo na at aSr ihoh amr qom rib at hhrim otSmenh hgbeot qolk׃ 
micah 6:2	Smeo hrim at rib ihoh ohatnim msdi arz ki rib lihoh em emo oem iSral itokH׃ 
micah 6:3	emi mh eSiti lk omh hlatik enh bi׃ 
micah 6:4	ki heltik marz mzrim ombit ebdim pditik oaSlH lpnik at mSh ahrn omrim׃ 
micah 6:5	emi ckr na mh iez blq mlk moab omh enh ato blem bn beor mn hSTim ed hglgl lmen det zdqot ihoh׃ 
micah 6:6	bmh aqdm ihoh akp lalhi mrom haqdmno beolot beglim bni Snh׃ 
micah 6:7	hirzh ihoh balpi ailim brbbot nHli Smn hatn bkori pSei pri bTni HTat npSi׃ 
micah 6:8	hgid lk adm mh Tob omh ihoh dorS mmk ki am eSot mSpT oahbt Hsd ohzne lkt em alhik׃ 
micah 6:9	qol ihoh leir iqra otoSih irah Smk Smeo mTh omi iedh׃ 
micah 6:10	eod haS bit rSe azrot rSe oaipt rcon ceomh׃ 
micah 6:11	hackh bmacni rSe obkis abni mrmh׃ 
micah 6:12	aSr eSirih mlao Hms oiSbih dbro Sqr olSonm rmih bpihm׃ 
micah 6:13	ogm ani hHliti hkotk hSmm el HTatk׃ 
micah 6:14	ath takl ola tSbe oiSHk bqrbk otsg ola tpliT oaSr tplT lHrb atn׃ 
micah 6:15	ath tcre ola tqzor ath tdrk cit ola tsok Smn otiroS ola tSth iin׃ 
micah 6:16	oiStmr Hqot emri okl meSh bit aHab otlko bmezotm lmen tti atk lSmh oiSbih lSrqh oHrpt emi tSao׃ 
micah 7:1	alli li ki hiiti kaspi qiz kellt bzir ain aSkol lakol bkorh aoth npSi׃ 
micah 7:2	abd Hsid mn harz oiSr badm ain klm ldmim iarbo aiS at aHiho izodo Hrm׃ 
micah 7:3	el hre kpim lhiTib hSr Sal ohSpT bSlom ohgdol dbr hot npSo hoa oiebtoh׃ 
micah 7:4	Tobm kHdq iSr mmsokh iom mzpik pqdtk bah eth thih mboktm׃ 
micah 7:5	al tamino bre al tbTHo balop mSkbt Hiqk Smr ptHi pik׃ 
micah 7:6	ki bn mnbl ab bt qmh bamh klh bHmth aibi aiS anSi bito׃ 
micah 7:7	oani bihoh azph aoHilh lalhi iSei iSmeni alhi׃ 
micah 7:8	al tSmHi aibti li ki nplti qmti ki aSb bHSk ihoh aor li׃ 
micah 7:9	cep ihoh aSa ki HTati lo ed aSr irib ribi oeSh mSpTi ioziani laor arah bzdqto׃ 
micah 7:10	otra aibti otksh boSh hamrh ali aio ihoh alhik eini trainh bh eth thih lmrms kTiT Hozot׃ 
micah 7:11	iom lbnot gdrik iom hhoa irHq Hq׃ 
micah 7:12	iom hoa oedik iboa lmni aSor oeri mzor olmni mzor oed nhr oim mim ohr hhr׃ 
micah 7:13	ohith harz lSmmh el iSbih mpri mellihm׃ 
micah 7:14	reh emk bSbTk zan nHltk Skni lbdd ier btok krml ireo bSn ogled kimi eolm׃ 
micah 7:15	kimi zatk marz mzrim arano nplaot׃ 
micah 7:16	irao goim oibSo mkl gbortm iSimo id el ph acnihm tHrSnh׃ 
micah 7:17	ilHko epr knHS kcHli arz irgco mmsgrtihm al ihoh alhino ipHdo oirao mmk׃ 
micah 7:18	mi al kmok nSa eon oebr el pSe lSarit nHlto la hHciq led apo ki Hpz Hsd hoa׃ 
micah 7:19	iSob irHmno ikbS eontino otSlik bmzlot im kl HTaotm׃ 
micah 7:20	ttn amt lieqb Hsd labrhm aSr nSbet labtino mimi qdm׃ 
nahum 1:1	mSa ninoh spr Hcon nHom halqSi׃ 
nahum 1:2	al qnoa onqm ihoh nqm ihoh obel Hmh nqm ihoh lzrio onoTr hoa laibio׃ 
nahum 1:3	ihoh ark apim ogdol kH onqh la inqh ihoh bsoph obSerh drko oenn abq rglio׃ 
nahum 1:4	goer bim oibSho okl hnhrot hHrib amll bSn okrml oprH lbnon amll׃ 
nahum 1:5	hrim reSo mmno ohgbeot htmggo otSa harz mpnio otbl okl iSbi bh׃ 
nahum 1:6	lpni cemo mi iemod omi iqom bHron apo Hmto ntkh kaS ohzrim ntzo mmno׃ 
nahum 1:7	Tob ihoh lmeoc biom zrh oide Hsi bo׃ 
nahum 1:8	obSTp ebr klh ieSh mqomh oaibio irdp HSk׃ 
nahum 1:9	mh tHSbon al ihoh klh hoa eSh la tqom pemim zrh׃ 
nahum 1:10	ki ed sirim sbkim oksbam sboaim aklo kqS ibS mla׃ 
nahum 1:11	mmk iza HSb el ihoh reh iez bliel׃ 
nahum 1:12	kh amr ihoh am Slmim okn rbim okn ngco oebr oentk la aenk eod׃ 
nahum 1:13	oeth aSbr mTho melik omosrtik antq׃ 
nahum 1:14	ozoh elik ihoh la icre mSmk eod mbit alhik akrit psl omskh aSim qbrk ki qlot׃ 
nahum 1:15	hnh el hhrim rgli mbSr mSmie Slom Hgi ihodh Hgik Slmi ndrik ki la iosip eod lebor bk bliel klh nkrt׃ 
nahum 2:1	elh mpiz el pnik nzor mzrh zph drk Hcq mtnim amz kH mad׃ 
nahum 2:2	ki Sb ihoh at gaon ieqb kgaon iSral ki bqqom bqqim ocmrihm SHto׃ 
nahum 2:3	mgn gbriho madm anSi Hil mtleim baS pldot hrkb biom hkino ohbrSim hrelo׃ 
nahum 2:4	bHozot ithollo hrkb iStqSqon brHbot mraihn klpidm kbrqim irozzo׃ 
nahum 2:5	ickr adirio ikSlo bhlkotm imhro Homth ohkn hskk׃ 
nahum 2:6	Seri hnhrot nptHo ohhikl nmog׃ 
nahum 2:7	ohzb glth helth oamhtih mnhgot kqol ionim mtppt el lbbhn׃ 
nahum 2:8	oninoh kbrkt mim mimi hia ohmh nsim emdo emdo oain mpnh׃ 
nahum 2:9	bco ksp bco chb oain qzh ltkonh kbd mkl kli Hmdh׃ 
nahum 2:10	boqh omboqh omblqh olb nms opq brkim oHlHlh bkl mtnim opni klm qbzo paror׃ 
nahum 2:11	aih meon ariot omreh hoa lkprim aSr hlk arih lbia Sm gor arih oain mHrid׃ 
nahum 2:12	arih Trp bdi grotio omHnq llbatio oimla Trp Hrio omentio Trph׃ 
nahum 2:13	hnni alik nam ihoh zbaot ohberti beSn rkbh okpirik takl Hrb ohkrti marz Trpk ola iSme eod qol mlakkh׃ 
nahum 3:1	hoi eir dmim klh kHS prq mlah la imiS Trp׃ 
nahum 3:2	qol SoT oqol reS aopn osos dhr omrkbh mrqdh׃ 
nahum 3:3	prS melh olhb Hrb obrq Hnit orb Hll okbd pgr oain qzh lgoih ikSlo bgoitm׃ 
nahum 3:4	mrb cnoni conh Tobt Hn belt kSpim hmkrt goim bcnonih omSpHot bkSpih׃ 
nahum 3:5	hnni alik nam ihoh zbaot ogliti Solik el pnik ohraiti goim merk ommlkot qlonk׃ 
nahum 3:6	ohSlkti elik Sqzim onbltik oSmtik krai׃ 
nahum 3:7	ohih kl raik idod mmk oamr Sddh ninoh mi inod lh main abqS mnHmim lk׃ 
nahum 3:8	htiTbi mna amon hiSbh biarim mim sbib lh aSr Hil im mim Homth׃ 
nahum 3:9	koS ezmh omzrim oain qzh poT olobim hio becrtk׃ 
nahum 3:10	gm hia lglh hlkh bSbi gm ellih irTSo braS kl Hozot oel nkbdih ido gorl okl gdolih rtqo bcqim׃ 
nahum 3:11	gm at tSkri thi nelmh gm at tbqSi meoc maoib׃ 
nahum 3:12	kl mbzrik tanim em bkorim am inoeo onplo el pi aokl׃ 
nahum 3:13	hnh emk nSim bqrbk laibik ptoH nptHo Seri arzk aklh aS briHik׃ 
nahum 3:14	mi mzor Sabi lk Hcqi mbzrik bai bTiT ormsi bHmr hHciqi mlbn׃ 
nahum 3:15	Sm taklk aS tkritk Hrb taklk kilq htkbd kilq htkbdi karbh׃ 
nahum 3:16	hrbit rklik mkokbi hSmim ilq pST oiep׃ 
nahum 3:17	mncrik karbh oTpsrik kgob gbi hHonim bgdrot biom qrh SmS crHh onodd ola node mqomo aim׃ 
nahum 3:18	nmo reik mlk aSor iSkno adirik npSo emk el hhrim oain mqbz׃ 
nahum 3:19	ain khh lSbrk nHlh mktk kl Smei Smek tqeo kp elik ki el mi la ebrh retk tmid׃ 
habakkuk 1:1	hmSa aSr Hch Hbqoq hnbia׃ 
habakkuk 1:2	ed anh ihoh Soeti ola tSme aceq alik Hms ola toSie׃ 
habakkuk 1:3	lmh trani aon oeml tbiT oSd oHms lngdi oihi rib omdon iSa׃ 
habakkuk 1:4	el kn tpog torh ola iza lnzH mSpT ki rSe mktir at hzdiq el kn iza mSpT meql׃ 
habakkuk 1:5	rao bgoim ohbiTo ohtmho tmho ki pel pel bimikm la tamino ki ispr׃ 
habakkuk 1:6	ki hnni mqim at hkSdim hgoi hmr ohnmhr hholk lmrHbi arz lrSt mSknot la lo׃ 
habakkuk 1:7	aim onora hoa mmno mSpTo oSato iza׃ 
habakkuk 1:8	oqlo mnmrim sosio oHdo mcabi erb opSo prSio oprSio mrHoq ibao iepo knSr HS lakol׃ 
habakkuk 1:9	klh lHms iboa mgmt pnihm qdimh oiasp kHol Sbi׃ 
habakkuk 1:10	ohoa bmlkim itqls orcnim mSHq lo hoa lkl mbzr iSHq oizbr epr oilkdh׃ 
habakkuk 1:11	ac Hlp roH oiebr oaSm co kHo lalho׃ 
habakkuk 1:12	hloa ath mqdm ihoh alhi qdSi la nmot ihoh lmSpT Smto ozor lhokiH isdto׃ 
habakkuk 1:13	Thor einim mraot re ohbiT al eml la tokl lmh tbiT bogdim tHriS bble rSe zdiq mmno׃ 
habakkuk 1:14	oteSh adm kdgi him krmS la mSl bo׃ 
habakkuk 1:15	klh bHkh helh igrho bHrmo oiaspho bmkmrto el kn iSmH oigil׃ 
habakkuk 1:16	el kn icbH lHrmo oiqTr lmkmrto ki bhmh Smn Hlqo omaklo brah׃ 
habakkuk 1:17	hel kn iriq Hrmo otmid lhrg goim la iHmol׃ 
habakkuk 2:1	el mSmrti aemdh oatizbh el mzor oazph lraot mh idbr bi omh aSib el tokHti׃ 
habakkuk 2:2	oienni ihoh oiamr ktob Hcon obar el hlHot lmen iroz qora bo׃ 
habakkuk 2:3	ki eod Hcon lmoed oipH lqz ola ikcb am itmhmh Hkh lo ki ba iba la iaHr׃ 
habakkuk 2:4	hnh eplh la iSrh npSo bo ozdiq bamonto iHih׃ 
habakkuk 2:5	oap ki hiin bogd gbr ihir ola inoh aSr hrHib kSaol npSo ohoa kmot ola iSbe oiasp alio kl hgoim oiqbz alio kl hemim׃ 
habakkuk 2:6	hloa alh klm elio mSl iSao omlizh Hidot lo oiamr hoi hmrbh la lo ed mti omkbid elio ebTiT׃ 
habakkuk 2:7	hloa pte iqomo nSkik oiqzo mceceik ohiit lmSsot lmo׃ 
habakkuk 2:8	ki ath Slot goim rbim iSlok kl itr emim mdmi adm oHms arz qrih okl iSbi bh׃ 
habakkuk 2:9	hoi bze bze re lbito lSom bmrom qno lhnzl mkp re׃ 
habakkuk 2:10	iezt bSt lbitk qzot emim rbim oHoTa npSk׃ 
habakkuk 2:11	ki abn mqir tceq okpis mez iennh׃ 
habakkuk 2:12	hoi bnh eir bdmim okonn qrih beolh׃ 
habakkuk 2:13	hloa hnh mat ihoh zbaot oiigeo emim bdi aS olamim bdi riq iepo׃ 
habakkuk 2:14	ki tmla harz ldet at kbod ihoh kmim ikso el im׃ 
habakkuk 2:15	hoi mSqh reho mspH Hmtk oap Skr lmen hbiT el meorihm׃ 
habakkuk 2:16	Sbet qlon mkbod Sth gm ath oherl tsob elik kos imin ihoh oqiqlon el kbodk׃ 
habakkuk 2:17	ki Hms lbnon iksk oSd bhmot iHitn mdmi adm oHms arz qrih okl iSbi bh׃ 
habakkuk 2:18	mh hoeil psl ki pslo izro mskh omorh Sqr ki bTH izr izro elio leSot alilim almim׃ 
habakkuk 2:19	hoi amr lez hqizh eori labn domm hoa iorh hnh hoa tpoS chb oksp okl roH ain bqrbo׃ 
habakkuk 2:20	oihoh bhikl qdSo hs mpnio kl harz׃ 
habakkuk 3:1	tplh lHbqoq hnbia el Sginot׃ 
habakkuk 3:2	ihoh Smeti Smek irati ihoh pelk bqrb Snim Hiiho bqrb Snim todie brgc rHm tckor׃ 
habakkuk 3:3	aloh mtimn iboa oqdoS mhr parn slh ksh Smim hodo othlto mlah harz׃ 
habakkuk 3:4	ongh kaor thih qrnim mido lo oSm Hbion ech׃ 
habakkuk 3:5	lpnio ilk dbr oiza rSp lrglio׃ 
habakkuk 3:6	emd oimdd arz rah oitr goim oitpzzo hrri ed SHo gbeot eolm hlikot eolm lo׃ 
habakkuk 3:7	tHt aon raiti ahli koSn irgcon irieot arz mdin׃ 
habakkuk 3:8	hbnhrim Hrh ihoh am bnhrim apk am bim ebrtk ki trkb el sosik mrkbtik iSoeh׃ 
habakkuk 3:9	erih teor qStk Sbeot mTot amr slh nhrot tbqe arz׃ 
habakkuk 3:10	raok iHilo hrim crm mim ebr ntn thom qolo rom idiho nSa׃ 
habakkuk 3:11	SmS irH emd cblh laor Hzik ihlko lngh brq Hnitk׃ 
habakkuk 3:12	bcem tzed arz bap tdoS goim׃ 
habakkuk 3:13	izat liSe emk liSe at mSiHk mHzt raS mbit rSe erot isod ed zoar slh׃ 
habakkuk 3:14	nqbt bmTio raS prco isero lhpizni eliztm kmo lakl eni bmstr׃ 
habakkuk 3:15	drkt bim sosik Hmr mim rbim׃ 
habakkuk 3:16	Smeti otrgc bTni lqol zllo Spti iboa rqb bezmi otHti argc aSr anoH liom zrh lelot lem igodno׃ 
habakkuk 3:17	ki tanh la tprH oain ibol bgpnim kHS meSh cit oSdmot la eSh akl gcr mmklh zan oain bqr brptim׃ 
habakkuk 3:18	oani bihoh aeloch agilh balhi iSei׃ 
habakkuk 3:19	ihoh adni Hili oiSm rgli kailot oel bmoti idrkni lmnzH bnginoti׃ 
zephaniah 1:1	dbr ihoh aSr hih al zpnih bn koSi bn gdlih bn amrih bn Hcqih bimi iaSiho bn amon mlk ihodh׃ 
zephaniah 1:2	asp asp kl mel pni hadmh nam ihoh׃ 
zephaniah 1:3	asp adm obhmh asp eop hSmim odgi him ohmkSlot at hrSeim ohkrti at hadm mel pni hadmh nam ihoh׃ 
zephaniah 1:4	onTiti idi el ihodh oel kl ioSbi iroSlm ohkrti mn hmqom hch at Sar hbel at Sm hkmrim em hkhnim׃ 
zephaniah 1:5	oat hmStHoim el hggot lzba hSmim oat hmStHoim hnSbeim lihoh ohnSbeim bmlkm׃ 
zephaniah 1:6	oat hnsogim maHri ihoh oaSr la bqSo at ihoh ola drSho׃ 
zephaniah 1:7	hs mpni adni ihoh ki qrob iom ihoh ki hkin ihoh cbH hqdiS qraio׃ 
zephaniah 1:8	ohih biom cbH ihoh opqdti el hSrim oel bni hmlk oel kl hlbSim mlboS nkri׃ 
zephaniah 1:9	opqdti el kl hdolg el hmptn biom hhoa hmmlaim bit adnihm Hms omrmh׃ 
zephaniah 1:10	ohih biom hhoa nam ihoh qol zeqh mSer hdgim oillh mn hmSnh oSbr gdol mhgbeot׃ 
zephaniah 1:11	hililo iSbi hmktS ki ndmh kl em knen nkrto kl nTili ksp׃ 
zephaniah 1:12	ohih bet hhia aHpS at iroSlm bnrot opqdti el hanSim hqpaim el Smrihm hamrim blbbm la iiTib ihoh ola ire׃ 
zephaniah 1:13	ohih Hilm lmSsh obtihm lSmmh obno btim ola iSbo onTeo krmim ola iSto at iinm׃ 
zephaniah 1:14	qrob iom ihoh hgdol qrob omhr mad qol iom ihoh mr zrH Sm gbor׃ 
zephaniah 1:15	iom ebrh hiom hhoa iom zrh omzoqh iom Sah omSoah iom HSk oaplh iom enn oerpl׃ 
zephaniah 1:16	iom Sopr otroeh el herim hbzrot oel hpnot hgbhot׃ 
zephaniah 1:17	ohzrti ladm ohlko keorim ki lihoh HTao oSpk dmm kepr olHmm kgllim׃ 
zephaniah 1:18	gm kspm gm chbm la iokl lhzilm biom ebrt ihoh obaS qnato takl kl harz ki klh ak nbhlh ieSh at kl iSbi harz׃ 
zephaniah 2:1	htqoSSo oqoSo hgoi la nksp׃ 
zephaniah 2:2	bTrm ldt Hq kmz ebr iom bTrm la iboa elikm Hron ap ihoh bTrm la iboa elikm iom ap ihoh׃ 
zephaniah 2:3	bqSo at ihoh kl enoi harz aSr mSpTo pelo bqSo zdq bqSo enoh aoli tstro biom ap ihoh׃ 
zephaniah 2:4	ki ech ecobh thih oaSqlon lSmmh aSdod bzhrim igrSoh oeqron teqr׃ 
zephaniah 2:5	hoi iSbi Hbl him goi krtim dbr ihoh elikm knen arz plStim ohabdtik main ioSb׃ 
zephaniah 2:6	ohith Hbl him not krt reim ogdrot zan׃ 
zephaniah 2:7	ohih Hbl lSarit bit ihodh elihm ireon bbti aSqlon berb irbzon ki ipqdm ihoh alhihm oSb Sbotm׃ 
zephaniah 2:8	Smeti Hrpt moab ogdopi bni emon aSr Hrpo at emi oigdilo el gbolm׃ 
zephaniah 2:9	lkn Hi ani nam ihoh zbaot alhi iSral ki moab ksdm thih obni emon kemrh mmSq Hrol omkrh mlH oSmmh ed eolm Sarit emi ibcom oitr goi inHlom׃ 
zephaniah 2:10	cat lhm tHt gaonm ki Hrpo oigdlo el em ihoh zbaot׃ 
zephaniah 2:11	nora ihoh elihm ki rch at kl alhi harz oiStHoo lo aiS mmqomo kl aii hgoim׃ 
zephaniah 2:12	gm atm koSim Hlli Hrbi hmh׃ 
zephaniah 2:13	oiT ido el zpon oiabd at aSor oiSm at ninoh lSmmh zih kmdbr׃ 
zephaniah 2:14	orbzo btokh edrim kl Hito goi gm qat gm qpd bkptrih ilino qol iSorr bHlon Hrb bsp ki arch erh׃

zephaniah 3:1	hoi mrah ongalh heir hionh׃ 
zephaniah 3:2	la Smeh bqol la lqHh mosr bihoh la bTHh al alhih la qrbh׃ 
zephaniah 3:3	Srih bqrbh ariot Sagim SpTih cabi erb la grmo lbqr׃ 
zephaniah 3:4	nbiaih pHcim anSi bgdot khnih Hllo qdS Hmso torh׃ 
zephaniah 3:5	ihoh zdiq bqrbh la ieSh eolh bbqr bbqr mSpTo itn laor la nedr ola iode eol bSt׃ 
zephaniah 3:6	hkrti goim nSmo pnotm hHrbti Hozotm mbli eobr nzdo erihm mbli aiS main ioSb׃ 
zephaniah 3:7	amrti ak tirai aoti tqHi mosr ola ikrt meonh kl aSr pqdti elih akn hSkimo hSHito kl elilotm׃ 
zephaniah 3:8	lkn Hko li nam ihoh liom qomi led ki mSpTi lasp goim lqbzi mmlkot lSpk elihm cemi kl Hron api ki baS qnati takl kl harz׃ 
zephaniah 3:9	ki ac ahpk al emim Sph brorh lqra klm bSm ihoh lebdo Skm aHd׃ 
zephaniah 3:10	mebr lnhri koS etri bt pozi ioblon mnHti׃ 
zephaniah 3:11	biom hhoa la tboSi mkl eliltik aSr pSet bi ki ac asir mqrbk elici gaotk ola tospi lgbhh eod bhr qdSi׃ 
zephaniah 3:12	ohSarti bqrbk em eni odl oHso bSm ihoh׃ 
zephaniah 3:13	Sarit iSral la ieSo eolh ola idbro kcb ola imza bpihm lSon trmit ki hmh ireo orbzo oain mHrid׃ 
zephaniah 3:14	rni bt zion hrieo iSral SmHi oelci bkl lb bt iroSlm׃ 
zephaniah 3:15	hsir ihoh mSpTik pnh aibk mlk iSral ihoh bqrbk la tirai re eod׃ 
zephaniah 3:16	biom hhoa iamr liroSlm al tirai zion al irpo idik׃ 
zephaniah 3:17	ihoh alhik bqrbk gbor ioSie iSiS elik bSmHh iHriS bahbto igil elik brnh׃ 
zephaniah 3:18	nogi mmoed aspti mmk hio mSat elih Hrph׃ 
zephaniah 3:19	hnni eSh at kl menik bet hhia ohoSeti at hzleh ohndHh aqbz oSmtim lthlh olSm bkl harz bStm׃ 
zephaniah 3:20	bet hhia abia atkm obet qbzi atkm ki atn atkm lSm olthlh bkl emi harz bSobi at Sbotikm leinikm amr ihoh׃ 
haggai 1:1	bSnt Stim ldrioS hmlk bHdS hSSi biom aHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh bid Hgi hnbia al crbbl bn Saltial pHt ihodh oal ihoSe bn ihozdq hkhn hgdol lamr׃ 
haggai 1:2	kh amr ihoh zbaot lamr hem hch amro la et ba et bit ihoh lhbnot׃ 
haggai 1:3	oihi dbr ihoh bid Hgi hnbia lamr׃ 
haggai 1:4	het lkm atm lSbt bbtikm sponim ohbit hch Hrb׃ 
haggai 1:5	oeth kh amr ihoh zbaot Simo lbbkm el drkikm׃ 
haggai 1:6	cretm hrbh ohba meT akol oain lSbeh Sto oain lSkrh lboS oain lHm lo ohmStkr mStkr al zror nqob׃ 
haggai 1:7	kh amr ihoh zbaot Simo lbbkm el drkikm׃ 
haggai 1:8	elo hhr ohbatm ez obno hbit oarzh bo oakbd amr ihoh׃ 
haggai 1:9	pnh al hrbh ohnh lmeT ohbatm hbit onpHti bo ien mh nam ihoh zbaot ien biti aSr hoa Hrb oatm rzim aiS lbito׃ 
haggai 1:10	el kn elikm klao Smim mTl oharz klah ibolh׃ 
haggai 1:11	oaqra Hrb el harz oel hhrim oel hdgn oel htiroS oel hizhr oel aSr tozia hadmh oel hadm oel hbhmh oel kl igie kpim׃ 
haggai 1:12	oiSme crbbl bn Sltial oihoSe bn ihozdq hkhn hgdol okl Sarit hem bqol ihoh alhihm oel dbri Hgi hnbia kaSr SlHo ihoh alhihm oiirao hem mpni ihoh׃ 
haggai 1:13	oiamr Hgi mlak ihoh bmlakot ihoh lem lamr ani atkm nam ihoh׃ 
haggai 1:14	oier ihoh at roH crbbl bn Sltial pHt ihodh oat roH ihoSe bn ihozdq hkhn hgdol oat roH kl Sarit hem oibao oieSo mlakh bbit ihoh zbaot alhihm׃ 
haggai 1:15	biom eSrim oarbeh lHdS bSSi bSnt Stim ldrioS hmlk׃ 
haggai 2:1	bSbiei beSrim oaHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh bid Hgi hnbia lamr׃ 
haggai 2:2	amr na al crbbl bn Sltial pHt ihodh oal ihoSe bn ihozdq hkhn hgdol oal Sarit hem lamr׃ 
haggai 2:3	mi bkm hnSar aSr rah at hbit hch bkbodo hraSon omh atm raim ato eth hloa kmho kain beinikm׃ 
haggai 2:4	oeth Hcq crbbl nam ihoh oHcq ihoSe bn ihozdq hkhn hgdol oHcq kl em harz nam ihoh oeSo ki ani atkm nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
haggai 2:5	at hdbr aSr krti atkm bzatkm mmzrim oroHi emdt btokkm al tirao׃ 
haggai 2:6	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot eod aHt meT hia oani mreiS at hSmim oat harz oat him oat hHrbh׃ 
haggai 2:7	ohreSti at kl hgoim obao Hmdt kl hgoim omlati at hbit hch kbod amr ihoh zbaot׃ 
haggai 2:8	li hksp oli hchb nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
haggai 2:9	gdol ihih kbod hbit hch haHron mn hraSon amr ihoh zbaot obmqom hch atn Slom nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
haggai 2:10	beSrim oarbeh ltSiei bSnt Stim ldrioS hih dbr ihoh al Hgi hnbia lamr׃ 
haggai 2:11	kh amr ihoh zbaot Sal na at hkhnim torh lamr׃ 
haggai 2:12	hn iSa aiS bSr qdS bknp bgdo onge bknpo al hlHm oal hncid oal hiin oal Smn oal kl makl hiqdS oieno hkhnim oiamro la׃ 
haggai 2:13	oiamr Hgi am ige Tma npS bkl alh hiTma oieno hkhnim oiamro iTma׃ 
haggai 2:14	oien Hgi oiamr kn hem hch okn hgoi hch lpni nam ihoh okn kl meSh idihm oaSr iqribo Sm Tma hoa׃ 
haggai 2:15	oeth Simo na lbbkm mn hiom hch omelh mTrm Som abn al abn bhikl ihoh׃ 
haggai 2:16	mhiotm ba al ermt eSrim ohith eSrh ba al hiqb lHSp HmSim porh ohith eSrim׃ 
haggai 2:17	hkiti atkm bSdpon obirqon obbrd at kl meSh idikm oain atkm ali nam ihoh׃ 
haggai 2:18	Simo na lbbkm mn hiom hch omelh miom eSrim oarbeh ltSiei lmn hiom aSr isd hikl ihoh Simo lbbkm׃ 
haggai 2:19	heod hcre bmgorh oed hgpn ohtanh ohrmon oez hcit la nSa mn hiom hch abrk׃ 
haggai 2:20	oihi dbr ihoh Snit al Hgi beSrim oarbeh lHdS lamr׃ 
haggai 2:21	amr al crbbl pHt ihodh lamr ani mreiS at hSmim oat harz׃ 
haggai 2:22	ohpkti ksa mmlkot ohSmdti Hcq mmlkot hgoim ohpkti mrkbh orkbih oirdo sosim orkbihm aiS bHrb aHio׃ 
haggai 2:23	biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot aqHk crbbl bn Saltial ebdi nam ihoh oSmtik kHotm ki bk bHrti nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
zechariah 1:1	bHdS hSmini bSnt Stim ldrioS hih dbr ihoh al ckrih bn brkih bn edo hnbia lamr׃ 
zechariah 1:2	qzp ihoh el abotikm qzp׃ 
zechariah 1:3	oamrt alhm kh amr ihoh zbaot Sobo ali nam ihoh zbaot oaSob alikm amr ihoh zbaot׃ 
zechariah 1:4	al thio kabtikm aSr qrao alihm hnbiaim hraSnim lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot Sobo na mdrkikm hreim omelilikm hreim ola Smeo ola hqSibo ali nam ihoh׃ 
zechariah 1:5	abotikm aih hm ohnbaim hleolm iHio׃ 
zechariah 1:6	ak dbri oHqi aSr zoiti at ebdi hnbiaim hloa hSigo abtikm oiSobo oiamro kaSr cmm ihoh zbaot leSot lno kdrkino okmellino kn eSh atno׃ 
zechariah 1:7	biom eSrim oarbeh leSti eSr HdS hoa HdS SbT bSnt Stim ldrioS hih dbr ihoh al ckrih bn brkiho bn edoa hnbia lamr׃ 
zechariah 1:8	raiti hlilh ohnh aiS rkb el sos adm ohoa emd bin hhdsim aSr bmzlh oaHrio sosim admim Srqim olbnim׃ 
zechariah 1:9	oamr mh alh adni oiamr ali hmlak hdbr bi ani arak mh hmh alh׃ 
zechariah 1:10	oien haiS hemd bin hhdsim oiamr alh aSr SlH ihoh lhthlk barz׃ 
zechariah 1:11	oieno at mlak ihoh hemd bin hhdsim oiamro hthlkno barz ohnh kl harz iSbt oSqTt׃ 
zechariah 1:12	oien mlak ihoh oiamr ihoh zbaot ed mti ath la trHm at iroSlm oat eri ihodh aSr cemth ch Sbeim Snh׃ 
zechariah 1:13	oien ihoh at hmlak hdbr bi dbrim Tobim dbrim nHmim׃ 
zechariah 1:14	oiamr ali hmlak hdbr bi qra lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot qnati liroSlm olzion qnah gdolh׃ 
zechariah 1:15	oqzp gdol ani qzp el hgoim hSannim aSr ani qzpti meT ohmh ecro lreh׃ 
zechariah 1:16	lkn kh amr ihoh Sbti liroSlm brHmim biti ibnh bh nam ihoh zbaot oqoh inTh el iroSlm׃ 
zechariah 1:17	eod qra lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot eod tpozinh eri mTob onHm ihoh eod at zion obHr eod biroSlm׃ 
zechariah 1:18	oaSa at eini oara ohnh arbe qrnot׃ 
zechariah 1:19	oamr al hmlak hdbr bi mh alh oiamr ali alh hqrnot aSr cro at ihodh at iSral oiroSlm׃ 
zechariah 1:20	oirani ihoh arbeh HrSim׃ 
zechariah 1:21	oamr mh alh baim leSot oiamr lamr alh hqrnot aSr cro at ihodh kpi aiS la nSa raSo oibao alh lhHrid atm lidot at qrnot hgoim hnSaim qrn al arz ihodh lcroth׃ 
zechariah 2:1	oaSa eini oara ohnh aiS obido Hbl mdh׃ 
zechariah 2:2	oamr anh ath hlk oiamr ali lmd at iroSlm lraot kmh rHbh okmh arkh׃ 
zechariah 2:3	ohnh hmlak hdbr bi iza omlak aHr iza lqrato׃ 
zechariah 2:4	oiamr alo rz dbr al hner hlc lamr prcot tSb iroSlm mrb adm obhmh btokh׃ 
zechariah 2:5	oani ahih lh nam ihoh Homt aS sbib olkbod ahih btokh׃ 
zechariah 2:6	hoi hoi onso marz zpon nam ihoh ki karbe roHot hSmim prSti atkm nam ihoh׃ 
zechariah 2:7	hoi zion hmlTi ioSbt bt bbl׃ 
zechariah 2:8	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot aHr kbod SlHni al hgoim hSllim atkm ki hnge bkm nge bbbt eino׃ 
zechariah 2:9	ki hnni mnip at idi elihm ohio Sll lebdihm oidetm ki ihoh zbaot SlHni׃ 
zechariah 2:10	rni oSmHi bt zion ki hnni ba oSknti btokk nam ihoh׃ 
zechariah 2:11	onloo goim rbim al ihoh biom hhoa ohio li lem oSknti btokk oidet ki ihoh zbaot SlHni alik׃ 
zechariah 2:12	onHl ihoh at ihodh Hlqo el admt hqdS obHr eod biroSlm׃ 
zechariah 2:13	hs kl bSr mpni ihoh ki neor mmeon qdSo׃ 
zechariah 3:1	oirani at ihoSe hkhn hgdol emd lpni mlak ihoh ohSTn emd el imino lSTno׃ 
zechariah 3:2	oiamr ihoh al hSTn iger ihoh bk hSTn oiger ihoh bk hbHr biroSlm hloa ch aod mzl maS׃ 
zechariah 3:3	oihoSe hih lbS bgdim zoaim oemd lpni hmlak׃ 
zechariah 3:4	oien oiamr al hemdim lpnio lamr hsiro hbgdim hzaim melio oiamr alio rah hebrti melik eonk ohlbS atk mHlzot׃ 
zechariah 3:5	oamr iSimo znip Thor el raSo oiSimo hznip hThor el raSo oilbSho bgdim omlak ihoh emd׃ 
zechariah 3:6	oied mlak ihoh bihoSe lamr׃ 
zechariah 3:7	kh amr ihoh zbaot am bdrki tlk oam at mSmrti tSmr ogm ath tdin at biti ogm tSmr at Hzri ontti lk mhlkim bin hemdim halh׃ 
zechariah 3:8	Sme na ihoSe hkhn hgdol ath oreik hiSbim lpnik ki anSi mopt hmh ki hnni mbia at ebdi zmH׃ 
zechariah 3:9	ki hnh habn aSr ntti lpni ihoSe el abn aHt Sbeh einim hnni mptH ptHh nam ihoh zbaot omSti at eon harz hhia biom aHd׃ 
zechariah 3:10	biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot tqrao aiS lreho al tHt gpn oal tHt tanh׃ 
zechariah 4:1	oiSb hmlak hdbr bi oieirni kaiS aSr ieor mSnto׃ 
zechariah 4:2	oiamr ali mh ath rah oiamr raiti ohnh mnort chb klh oglh el raSh oSbeh nrtih elih Sbeh oSbeh mozqot lnrot aSr el raSh׃ 
zechariah 4:3	oSnim citim elih aHd mimin hglh oaHd el Smalh׃ 
zechariah 4:4	oaen oamr al hmlak hdbr bi lamr mh alh adni׃ 
zechariah 4:5	oien hmlak hdbr bi oiamr ali hloa idet mh hmh alh oamr la adni׃ 
zechariah 4:6	oien oiamr ali lamr ch dbr ihoh al crbbl lamr la bHil ola bkH ki am broHi amr ihoh zbaot׃ 
zechariah 4:7	mi ath hr hgdol lpni crbbl lmiSr ohozia at habn hraSh tSaot Hn Hn lh׃ 
zechariah 4:8	oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr׃ 
zechariah 4:9	idi crbbl isdo hbit hch oidio tbzenh oidet ki ihoh zbaot SlHni alkm׃ 
zechariah 4:10	ki mi bc liom qTnot oSmHo orao at habn hbdil bid crbbl Sbeh alh eini ihoh hmh mSoTTim bkl harz׃ 
zechariah 4:11	oaen oamr alio mh Sni hcitim halh el imin hmnorh oel Smaolh׃

zechariah 4:13	oiamr ali lamr hloa idet mh alh oamr la adni׃ 
zechariah 4:14	oiamr alh Sni bni hizhr hemdim el adon kl harz׃ 
zechariah 5:1	oaSob oaSa eini oarah ohnh mglh eph׃ 
zechariah 5:2	oiamr ali mh ath rah oamr ani rah mglh eph arkh eSrim bamh orHbh eSr bamh׃ 
zechariah 5:3	oiamr ali cat halh hiozat el pni kl harz ki kl hgnb mch kmoh nqh okl hnSbe mch kmoh nqh׃ 
zechariah 5:4	hozatih nam ihoh zbaot obah al bit hgnb oal bit hnSbe bSmi lSqr olnh btok bito oklto oat ezio oat abnio׃ 
zechariah 5:5	oiza hmlak hdbr bi oiamr ali Sa na einik orah mh hiozat hcat׃ 
zechariah 5:6	oamr mh hia oiamr cat haiph hiozat oiamr cat einm bkl harz׃ 
zechariah 5:7	ohnh kkr eprt nSat ocat aSh aHt ioSbt btok haiph׃

zechariah 5:10	oamr al hmlak hdbr bi anh hmh molkot at haiph׃ 
zechariah 5:11	oiamr ali lbnot lh bit barz Sner ohokn ohniHh Sm el mknth׃

zechariah 6:3	obmrkbh hSlSit sosim lbnim obmrkbh hrbeit sosim brdim amzim׃ 
zechariah 6:4	oaen oamr al hmlak hdbr bi mh alh adni׃

zechariah 8:3	kh amr ihoh Sbti al zion oSknti btok iroSlm onqrah iroSlm eir hamt ohr ihoh zbaot hr hqdS׃ 
zechariah 8:4	kh amr ihoh zbaot ed iSbo cqnim ocqnot brHbot iroSlm oaiS mSento bido mrb imim׃ 
zechariah 8:5	orHbot heir imlao ildim oildot mSHqim brHbtih׃

zechariah 8:10	ki lpni himim hhm Skr hadm la nhih oSkr hbhmh ainnh olioza olba ain Slom mn hzr oaSlH at kl hadm aiS breho׃ 
zechariah 8:11	oeth la kimim hraSnim ani lSarit hem hch nam ihoh zbaot׃ 
zechariah 8:12	ki cre hSlom hgpn ttn prih oharz ttn at ibolh ohSmim itno Tlm ohnHlti at Sarit hem hch at kl alh׃ 
zechariah 8:13	ohih kaSr hiitm qllh bgoim bit ihodh obit iSral kn aoSie atkm ohiitm brkh al tirao tHcqnh idikm׃ 
zechariah 8:14	ki kh amr ihoh zbaot kaSr cmmti lhre lkm bhqzip abtikm ati amr ihoh zbaot ola nHmti׃ 
zechariah 8:15	kn Sbti cmmti bimim halh lhiTib at iroSlm oat bit ihodh al tirao׃

zechariah 9:4	hnh adni iorSnh ohkh bim Hilh ohia baS takl׃ 
zechariah 9:5	tra aSqlon otira oech otHil mad oeqron ki hbiS mbTh oabd mlk mech oaSqlon la tSb׃ 
zechariah 9:6	oiSb mmcr baSdod ohkrti gaon plStim׃ 
zechariah 9:7	ohsrti dmio mpio oSqzio mbin Snio onSar gm hoa lalhino ohih kalp bihodh oeqron kibosi׃

zechariah 10:1	Salo mihoh mTr bet mlqoS ihoh eSh Hcicim omTr gSm itn lhm laiS eSb bSdh׃ 
zechariah 10:2	ki htrpim dbro aon ohqosmim Hco Sqr oHlmot hSoa idbro hbl inHmon el kn nseo kmo zan ieno ki ain reh׃ 
zechariah 10:3	el hreim Hrh api oel hetodim apqod ki pqd ihoh zbaot at edro at bit ihodh oSm aotm ksos hodo bmlHmh׃ 
zechariah 10:4	mmno pnh mmno itd mmno qSt mlHmh mmno iza kl nogS iHdo׃

zechariah 10:7	ohio kgbor aprim oSmH lbm kmo iin obnihm irao oSmHo igl lbm bihoh׃

zechariah 11:1	ptH lbnon dltik otakl aS barcik׃ 
zechariah 11:2	hill broS ki npl arc aSr adrim Sddo hililo aloni bSn ki ird ier hbzor׃ 
zechariah 11:3	qol illt hreim ki Sddh adrtm qol Sagt kpirim ki Sdd gaon hirdn׃ 
zechariah 11:4	kh amr ihoh alhi reh at zan hhrgh׃ 
zechariah 11:5	aSr qnihn ihrgn ola iaSmo omkrihn iamr brok ihoh oaeSr oreihm la iHmol elihn׃ 
zechariah 11:6	ki la aHmol eod el iSbi harz nam ihoh ohnh anki mmzia at hadm aiS bid reho obid mlko oktto at harz ola azil midm׃ 
zechariah 11:7	oareh at zan hhrgh lkn enii hzan oaqH li Sni mqlot laHd qrati nem olaHd qrati Hblim oareh at hzan׃ 
zechariah 11:8	oakHd at SlSt hreim birH aHd otqzr npSi bhm ogm npSm bHlh bi׃ 
zechariah 11:9	oamr la areh atkm hmth tmot ohnkHdt tkHd ohnSarot taklnh aSh at bSr reoth׃ 
zechariah 11:10	oaqH at mqli at nem oagde ato lhpir at briti aSr krti at kl hemim׃ 
zechariah 11:11	otpr biom hhoa oideo kn enii hzan hSmrim ati ki dbr ihoh hoa׃ 
zechariah 11:12	oamr alihm am Tob beinikm hbo Skri oam la Hdlo oiSqlo at Skri SlSim ksp׃ 
zechariah 11:13	oiamr ihoh ali hSlikho al hiozr adr hiqr aSr iqrti melihm oaqHh SlSim hksp oaSlik ato bit ihoh al hiozr׃ 
zechariah 11:14	oagde at mqli hSni at hHblim lhpr at haHoh bin ihodh obin iSral׃ 
zechariah 11:15	oiamr ihoh ali eod qH lk kli reh aoli׃ 
zechariah 11:16	ki hnh anki mqim reh barz hnkHdot la ipqd hner la ibqS ohnSbrt la irpa hnzbh la iklkl obSr hbriah iakl oprsihn iprq׃ 
zechariah 11:17	hoi rei halil ecbi hzan Hrb el croeo oel ein imino creo iboS tibS oein imino khh tkhh׃ 
zechariah 12:1	mSa dbr ihoh el iSral nam ihoh nTh Smim oisd arz oizr roH adm bqrbo׃

zechariah 12:3	ohih biom hhoa aSim at iroSlm abn memsh lkl hemim kl emsih SroT iSrTo onaspo elih kl goii harz׃ 
zechariah 12:4	biom hhoa nam ihoh akh kl sos btmhon orkbo bSgeon oel bit ihodh apqH at eini okl sos hemim akh beoron׃ 
zechariah 12:5	oamro alpi ihodh blbm amzh li iSbi iroSlm bihoh zbaot alhihm׃ 
zechariah 12:6	biom hhoa aSim at alpi ihodh kkior aS bezim oklpid aS bemir oaklo el imin oel Smaol at kl hemim sbib oiSbh iroSlm eod tHtih biroSlm׃

zechariah 12:9	ohih biom hhoa abqS lhSmid at kl hgoim hbaim el iroSlm׃

zechariah 12:11	biom hhoa igdl hmspd biroSlm kmspd hdd rmon bbqet mgdon׃

psalms 9:4	ki eSit mSpTi odini iSbt lksa SopT zdq׃

psalms 9:6	haoib tmo Hrbot lnzH oerim ntSt abd ckrm hmh׃ 
psalms 9:7	oihoh leolm iSb konn lmSpT ksao׃ 
psalms 9:8	ohoa iSpT tbl bzdq idin lamim bmiSrim׃ 
psalms 9:9	oihi ihoh mSgb ldk mSgb letot bzrh׃ 
psalms 9:10	oibTHo bk iodei Smk ki la ecbt drSik ihoh׃ 
psalms 9:11	cmro lihoh iSb zion hgido bemim elilotio׃ 
psalms 9:12	ki drS dmim aotm ckr la SkH zeqt eniim׃ 
psalms 9:13	Hnnni ihoh rah enii mSnai mrommi mSeri mot׃ 
psalms 9:14	lmen asprh kl thltik bSeri bt zion agilh biSoetk׃ 
psalms 9:15	Tbeo goim bSHt eSo brSt co Tmno nlkdh rglm׃ 
psalms 9:16	node ihoh mSpT eSh bpel kpio noqS rSe hgion slh׃ 
psalms 9:17	iSobo rSeim lSaolh kl goim SkHi alhim׃ 
psalms 9:18	ki la lnzH iSkH abion tqot enoim tabd led׃ 
psalms 9:19	qomh ihoh al iec anoS iSpTo goim el pnik׃ 
psalms 9:20	Sith ihoh morh lhm ideo goim anoS hmh slh׃ 
psalms 10:1	lmh ihoh temd brHoq telim letot bzrh׃ 
psalms 10:2	bgaot rSe idlq eni itpSo bmcmot co HSbo׃ 
psalms 10:3	ki hll rSe el taot npSo obze brk naz ihoh׃ 
psalms 10:4	rSe kgbh apo bl idrS ain alhim kl mcmotio׃ 
psalms 10:5	iHilo drko bkl et mrom mSpTik mngdo kl zorrio ipiH bhm׃ 
psalms 10:6	amr blbo bl amoT ldr odr aSr la bre׃ 
psalms 10:7	alh piho mla omrmot otk tHt lSono eml oaon׃ 
psalms 10:8	iSb bmarb Hzrim bmstrim ihrg nqi einio lHlkh izpno׃ 
psalms 10:9	iarb bmstr karih bskh iarb lHTop eni iHTp eni bmSko brSto׃ 
psalms 10:10	odkh iSH onpl bezomio Hlkaim׃ 
psalms 10:11	amr blbo SkH al hstir pnio bl rah lnzH׃ 
psalms 10:12	qomh ihoh al nSa idk al tSkH eniim׃ 
psalms 10:13	el mh naz rSe alhim amr blbo la tdrS׃ 
psalms 10:14	rath ki ath eml okes tbiT ltt bidk elik iecb Hlkh itom ath hiit eocr׃

psalms 10:18	lSpT itom odk bl iosip eod lerz anoS mn harz׃ 
psalms 11:1	lmnzH ldod bihoh Hsiti aik tamro lnpSi nodo hrkm zpor׃

psalms 11:3	ki hStot ihrson zdiq mh pel׃

psalms 11:7	ki zdiq ihoh zdqot ahb iSr iHco pnimo׃

psalms 26:2	bHnni ihoh onsni zroph klioti olbi׃ 
psalms 26:3	ki Hsdk lngd eini ohthlkti bamtk׃ 
psalms 26:4	la iSbti em mti Soa oem nelmim la aboa׃ 
psalms 26:5	Snati qhl mreim oem rSeim la aSb׃ 
psalms 26:6	arHz bnqion kpi oasbbh at mcbHk ihoh׃ 
psalms 26:7	lSme bqol todh olspr kl nplaotik׃

psalms 27:1	ldod ihoh aori oiSei mmi aira ihoh meoc Hii mmi apHd׃ 
psalms 27:2	bqrb eli mreim lakl at bSri zri oaibi li hmh kSlo onplo׃ 
psalms 27:3	am tHnh eli mHnh la iira lbi am tqom eli mlHmh bcat ani boTH׃ 
psalms 27:4	aHt Salti mat ihoh aoth abqS Sbti bbit ihoh kl imi Hii lHcot bnem ihoh olbqr bhiklo׃ 
psalms 27:5	ki izpnni bskh biom reh istrni bstr ahlo bzor irommni׃ 
psalms 27:6	oeth irom raSi el aibi sbiboti oacbHh bahlo cbHi troeh aSirh oacmrh lihoh׃ 
psalms 27:7	Sme ihoh qoli aqra oHnni oenni׃ 
psalms 27:8	lk amr lbi bqSo pni at pnik ihoh abqS׃ 
psalms 27:9	al tstr pnik mmni al tT bap ebdk ecrti hiit al tTSni oal tecbni alhi iSei׃ 
psalms 27:10	ki abi oami ecboni oihoh iaspni׃ 
psalms 27:11	horni ihoh drkk onHni barH miSor lmen Sorri׃ 
psalms 27:12	al ttnni bnpS zri ki qmo bi edi Sqr oipH Hms׃ 
psalms 27:13	lola hamnti lraot bTob ihoh barz Hiim׃ 
psalms 27:14	qoh al ihoh Hcq oiamz lbk oqoh al ihoh׃ 
psalms 28:1	ldod alik ihoh aqra zori al tHrS mmni pn tHSh mmni onmSlti em iordi bor׃ 
psalms 28:2	Sme qol tHnoni bSoei alik bnSai idi al dbir qdSk׃ 
psalms 28:3	al tmSkni em rSeim oem peli aon dbri Slom em reihm oreh blbbm׃ 
psalms 28:4	tn lhm kpelm okre mellihm kmeSh idihm tn lhm hSb gmolm lhm׃ 
psalms 28:5	ki la ibino al pelt ihoh oal meSh idio ihrsm ola ibnm׃

psalms 41:13	brok ihoh alhi iSral mheolm oed heolm amn oamn׃ 
psalms 42:1	lmnzH mSkil lbni qrH kail terg el apiqi mim kn npSi terg alik alhim׃ 
psalms 42:2	zmah npSi lalhim lal Hi mti aboa oarah pni alhim׃ 
psalms 42:3	hith li dmeti lHm iomm olilh bamr ali kl hiom aih alhik׃ 
psalms 42:4	alh ackrh oaSpkh eli npSi ki aebr bsk addm ed bit alhim bqol rnh otodh hmon Hogg׃ 
psalms 42:5	mh tStoHHi npSi othmi eli hoHili lalhim ki eod aodno iSoeot pnio׃ 
psalms 42:6	alhi eli npSi tStoHH el kn ackrk marz irdn oHrmonim mhr mzer׃ 
psalms 42:7	thom al thom qora lqol znorik kl mSbrik oglik eli ebro׃ 
psalms 42:8	iomm izoh ihoh Hsdo oblilh Sirh emi tplh lal Hii׃ 
psalms 42:9	aomrh lal slei lmh SkHtni lmh qdr alk blHz aoib׃ 
psalms 42:10	brzH bezmoti Hrponi zorri bamrm ali kl hiom aih alhik׃ 
psalms 42:11	mh tStoHHi npSi omh thmi eli hoHili lalhim ki eod aodno iSoet pni oalhi׃

psalms 44:1	lmnzH lbni qrH mSkil alhim bacnino Smeno abotino spro lno pel pelt bimihm bimi qdm׃ 
psalms 44:2	ath idk goim horSt otTem tre lamim otSlHm׃

psalms 44:4	ath hoa mlki alhim zoh iSoeot ieqb׃ 
psalms 44:5	bk zrino nngH bSmk nbos qmino׃ 
psalms 44:6	ki la bqSti abTH oHrbi la toSieni׃

psalms 44:26	qomh ecrth lno opdno lmen Hsdk׃

psalms 45:6	ksak alhim eolm oed SbT miSr SbT mlkotk׃

psalms 60:1	lmnzH el SoSn edot mktm ldod llmd bhzoto at arm nhrim oat arm zobh oiSb ioab oik at adom bgia mlH Snim eSr alp alhim cnHtno prztno anpt tSobb lno׃

psalms 60:5	lmen iHlzon ididik hoSieh imink oenno׃ 
psalms 60:6	alhim dbr bqdSo aelch aHlqh Skm oemq skot amdd׃ 
psalms 60:7	li gled oli mnSh oaprim meoc raSi ihodh mHqqi׃ 
psalms 60:8	moab sir rHzi el adom aSlik neli eli plSt htreei׃ 
psalms 60:9	mi iblni eir mzor mi nHni ed adom׃ 
psalms 60:10	hla ath alhim cnHtno ola tza alhim bzbaotino׃ 
psalms 60:11	hbh lno ecrt mzr oSoa tSoet adm׃ 
psalms 60:12	balhim neSh Hil ohoa ibos zrino׃ 
psalms 61:1	lmnzH el ngint ldod Smeh alhim rnti hqSibh tplti׃ 
psalms 61:2	mqzh harz alik aqra beTp lbi bzor irom mmni tnHni׃ 
psalms 61:3	ki hiit mHsh li mgdl ec mpni aoib׃ 
psalms 61:4	agorh bahlk eolmim aHsh bstr knpik slh׃ 
psalms 61:5	ki ath alhim Smet lndri ntt irSt irai Smk׃ 
psalms 61:6	imim el imi mlk tosip Snotio kmo dr odr׃ 
psalms 61:7	iSb eolm lpni alhim Hsd oamt mn inzrho׃ 
psalms 61:8	kn acmrh Smk led lSlmi ndri iom iom׃ 
psalms 62:1	lmnzH el idoton mcmor ldod ak al alhim domih npSi mmno iSoeti׃ 
psalms 62:2	ak hoa zori oiSoeti mSgbi la amoT rbh׃

psalms 62:5	ak lalhim domi npSi ki mmno tqoti׃ 
psalms 62:6	ak hoa zori oiSoeti mSgbi la amoT׃ 
psalms 62:7	el alhim iSei okbodi zor eci mHsi balhim׃

psalms 63:6	am ckrtik el izoei baSmrot ahgh bk׃

psalms 64:3	aSr Snno kHrb lSonm drko Hzm dbr mr׃ 
psalms 64:4	lirot bmstrim tm ptam irho ola iirao׃

psalms 74:4	Sago zrrik bqrb moedk Smo aottm atot׃ 
psalms 74:5	iode kmbia lmelh bsbk ez qrdmot׃ 
psalms 74:6	oet ptoHih iHd bkSil okilpt ihlmon׃ 
psalms 74:7	SlHo baS mqdSk larz Hllo mSkn Smk׃ 
psalms 74:8	amro blbm ninm iHd Srpo kl moedi al barz׃ 
psalms 74:9	aottino la raino ain eod nbia ola atno ide ed mh׃ 
psalms 74:10	ed mti alhim iHrp zr inaz aoib Smk lnzH׃ 
psalms 74:11	lmh tSib idk oimink mqrb Hoqk klh׃ 
psalms 74:12	oalhim mlki mqdm pel iSoeot bqrb harz׃ 
psalms 74:13	ath porrt beck im Sbrt raSi tninim el hmim׃ 
psalms 74:14	ath rzzt raSi loitn ttnno makl lem lziim׃ 
psalms 74:15	ath bqet mein onHl ath hobSt nhrot aitn׃

psalms 75:1	lmnzH al tSHt mcmor lasp Sir hodino lk alhim hodino oqrob Smk spro nplaotik׃ 
psalms 75:2	ki aqH moed ani miSrim aSpT׃ 
psalms 75:3	nmgim arz okl iSbih anki tknti emodih slh׃ 
psalms 75:4	amrti lhollim al thlo olrSeim al trimo qrn׃ 
psalms 75:5	al trimo lmrom qrnkm tdbro bzoar etq׃ 
psalms 75:6	ki la mmoza ommerb ola mmdbr hrim׃ 
psalms 75:7	ki alhim SpT ch iSpil och irim׃ 
psalms 75:8	ki kos bid ihoh oiin Hmr mla msk oigr mch ak Smrih imzo iSto kl rSei arz׃ 
psalms 75:9	oani agid lelm acmrh lalhi ieqb׃ 
psalms 75:10	okl qrni rSeim agde trommnh qrnot zdiq׃ 
psalms 76:1	lmnzH bngint mcmor lasp Sir node bihodh alhim biSral gdol Smo׃ 
psalms 76:2	oihi bSlm sko omeonto bzion׃ 
psalms 76:3	Smh Sbr rSpi qSt mgn oHrb omlHmh slh׃ 
psalms 76:4	naor ath adir mhrri Trp׃ 
psalms 76:5	aStollo abiri lb nmo Sntm ola mzao kl anSi Hil idihm׃ 
psalms 76:6	mgertk alhi ieqb nrdm orkb osos׃ 
psalms 76:7	ath nora ath omi iemd lpnik mac apk׃ 
psalms 76:8	mSmim hSmet din arz irah oSqTh׃ 
psalms 76:9	bqom lmSpT alhim lhoSie kl enoi arz slh׃ 
psalms 76:10	ki Hmt adm todk Sarit Hmt tHgr׃ 
psalms 76:11	ndro oSlmo lihoh alhikm kl sbibio iobilo Si lmora׃ 
psalms 76:12	ibzr roH ngidim nora lmlki arz׃ 
psalms 77:1	lmnzH el iditon lasp mcmor qoli al alhim oazeqh qoli al alhim ohacin ali׃ 
psalms 77:2	biom zrti adni drSti idi lilh ngrh ola tpog manh hnHm npSi׃ 
psalms 77:3	ackrh alhim oahmih aSiHh otteTp roHi slh׃ 
psalms 77:4	aHct Smrot eini npemti ola adbr׃ 
psalms 77:5	HSbti imim mqdm Snot eolmim׃ 
psalms 77:6	ackrh nginti blilh em lbbi aSiHh oiHpS roHi׃ 
psalms 77:7	hleolmim icnH adni ola isip lrzot eod׃ 
psalms 77:8	haps lnzH Hsdo gmr amr ldr odr׃ 
psalms 77:9	hSkH Hnot al am qpz bap rHmio slh׃ 
psalms 77:10	oamr Hloti hia Snot imin elion׃ 
psalms 77:11	ackir melli ih ki ackrh mqdm plak׃

psalms 77:13	alhim bqdS drkk mi al gdol kalhim׃ 
psalms 77:14	ath hal eSh pla hodet bemim eck׃ 
psalms 77:15	galt bcroe emk bni ieqb oiosp slh׃

psalms 78:7	oiSimo balhim kslm ola iSkHo melli al omzotio inzro׃ 
psalms 78:8	ola ihio kabotm dor sorr omrh dor la hkin lbo ola namnh at al roHo׃

psalms 79:5	ed mh ihoh tanp lnzH tber kmo aS qnatk׃

psalms 79:7	ki akl at ieqb oat noho hSmo׃

psalms 89:3	krti brit lbHiri nSbeti ldod ebdi׃ 
psalms 89:4	ed eolm akin crek obniti ldr odor ksak slh׃ 
psalms 89:5	oiodo Smim plak ihoh ap amontk bqhl qdSim׃ 
psalms 89:6	ki mi bSHq ierk lihoh idmh lihoh bbni alim׃ 
psalms 89:7	al nerz bsod qdSim rbh onora el kl sbibio׃ 
psalms 89:8	ihoh alhi zbaot mi kmok Hsin ih oamontk sbibotik׃ 
psalms 89:9	ath moSl bgaot him bSoa glio ath tSbHm׃ 
psalms 89:10	ath dkat kHll rhb bcroe eck pcrt aoibik׃ 
psalms 89:11	lk Smim ap lk arz tbl omlah ath isdtm׃ 
psalms 89:12	zpon oimin ath bratm tbor oHrmon bSmk irnno׃ 
psalms 89:13	lk croe em gborh tec idk trom imink׃

psalms 89:15	aSri hem iodei troeh ihoh baor pnik ihlkon׃ 
psalms 89:16	bSmk igilon kl hiom obzdqtk iromo׃

psalms 89:18	ki lihoh mgnno olqdoS iSral mlkno׃

psalms 89:20	mzati dod ebdi bSmn qdSi mSHtio׃

job 1:2	oioldo lo Sbeh bnim oSloS bnot׃ 
job 1:3	oihi mqnho Sbet alpi zan oSlSt alpi gmlim oHmS maot zmd bqr oHmS maot atonot oebdh rbh mad oihi haiS hhoa gdol mkl bni qdm׃ 
job 1:4	ohlko bnio oeSo mSth bit aiS iomo oSlHo oqrao lSlSt aHitihm lakl olStot emhm׃ 
job 1:5	oihi ki hqipo imi hmSth oiSlH aiob oiqdSm ohSkim bbqr ohelh elot mspr klm ki amr aiob aoli HTao bni obrko alhim blbbm kkh ieSh aiob kl himim׃ 
job 1:6	oihi hiom oibao bni halhim lhtizb el ihoh oiboa gm hSTn btokm׃ 
job 1:7	oiamr ihoh al hSTn main tba oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr mSoT barz omhthlk bh׃ 
job 1:8	oiamr ihoh al hSTn hSmt lbk el ebdi aiob ki ain kmho barz aiS tm oiSr ira alhim osr mre׃ 
job 1:9	oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr hHnm ira aiob alhim׃ 
job 1:10	hla at Skt bedo obed bito obed kl aSr lo msbib meSh idio brkt omqnho prz barz׃ 
job 1:11	oaolm SlH na idk oge bkl aSr lo am la el pnik ibrkk׃ 
job 1:12	oiamr ihoh al hSTn hnh kl aSr lo bidk rq alio al tSlH idk oiza hSTn mem pni ihoh׃ 
job 1:13	oihi hiom obnio obntio aklim oStim iin bbit aHihm hbkor׃ 
job 1:14	omlak ba al aiob oiamr hbqr hio HrSot ohatnot reot el idihm׃ 
job 1:15	otpl Sba otqHm oat hnerim hko lpi Hrb oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk׃ 
job 1:16	eod ch mdbr och ba oiamr aS alhim nplh mn hSmim otber bzan obnerim otaklm oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk׃ 
job 1:17	eod ch mdbr och ba oiamr kSdim Smo SlSh raSim oipSTo el hgmlim oiqHom oat hnerim hko lpi Hrb oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk׃ 
job 1:18	ed ch mdbr och ba oiamr bnik obnotik aklim oStim iin bbit aHihm hbkor׃ 
job 1:19	ohnh roH gdolh bah mebr hmdbr oige barbe pnot hbit oipl el hnerim oimoto oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk׃ 
job 1:20	oiqm aiob oiqre at melo oigc at raSo oipl arzh oiStHo׃

job 1:22	bkl cat la HTa aiob ola ntn tplh lalhim׃ 
job 2:1	oihi hiom oibao bni halhim lhtizb el ihoh oiboa gm hSTn btkm lhtizb el ihoh׃ 
job 2:2	oiamr ihoh al hSTn ai mch tba oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr mST barz omhthlk bh׃ 
job 2:3	oiamr ihoh al hSTn hSmt lbk al ebdi aiob ki ain kmho barz aiS tm oiSr ira alhim osr mre oedno mHciq btmto otsitni bo lbleo Hnm׃ 
job 2:4	oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr eor bed eor okl aSr laiS itn bed npSo׃ 
job 2:5	aolm SlH na idk oge al ezmo oal bSro am la al pnik ibrkk׃ 
job 2:6	oiamr ihoh al hSTn hno bidk ak at npSo Smr׃ 
job 2:7	oiza hSTn mat pni ihoh oik at aiob bSHin re mkp rglo ed qdqdo׃

job 2:11	oiSmeo SlSt rei aiob at kl hreh hcat hbah elio oibao aiS mmqmo alipc htimni obldd hSoHi ozopr hnemti oioedo iHdo lboa lnod lo olnHmo׃ 
job 2:12	oiSao at einihm mrHoq ola hkirho oiSao qolm oibko oiqreo aiS melo oicrqo epr el raSihm hSmimh׃

job 3:1	aHri kn ptH aiob at piho oiqll at iomo׃ 
job 3:2	oien aiob oiamr׃ 
job 3:3	iabd iom aold bo ohlilh amr hrh gbr׃ 
job 3:4	hiom hhoa ihi HSk al idrSho aloh mmel oal tope elio nhrh׃ 
job 3:5	igalho HSk ozlmot tSkn elio ennh ibetho kmriri iom׃ 
job 3:6	hlilh hhoa iqHho apl al iHd bimi Snh bmspr irHim al iba׃ 
job 3:7	hnh hlilh hhoa ihi glmod al tba rnnh bo׃ 
job 3:8	iqbho arri iom hetidim err loitn׃ 
job 3:9	iHSko kokbi nSpo iqo laor oain oal irah bepepi SHr׃ 
job 3:10	ki la sgr dlti bTni oistr eml meini׃ 
job 3:11	lmh la mrHm amot mbTn izati oagoe׃ 
job 3:12	mdoe qdmoni brkim omh Sdim ki ainq׃ 
job 3:13	ki eth Skbti oaSqoT iSnti ac inoH li׃ 
job 3:14	em mlkim oiezi arz hbnim Hrbot lmo׃ 
job 3:15	ao em Srim chb lhm hmmlaim btihm ksp׃ 
job 3:16	ao knpl Tmon la ahih kellim la rao aor׃ 
job 3:17	Sm rSeim Hdlo rgc oSm inoHo igiei kH׃ 
job 3:18	iHd asirim Sanno la Smeo qol ngS׃ 
job 3:19	qTn ogdol Sm hoa oebd HpSi madnio׃ 
job 3:20	lmh itn leml aor oHiim lmri npS׃ 
job 3:21	hmHkim lmot oainno oiHprho mmTmonim׃ 
job 3:22	hSmHim ali gil iSiSo ki imzao qbr׃ 
job 3:23	lgbr aSr drko nstrh oisk aloh bedo׃ 
job 3:24	ki lpni lHmi anHti tba oitko kmim Sagti׃ 
job 3:25	ki pHd pHdti oiatini oaSr igrti iba li׃ 
job 3:26	la Sloti ola SqTti ola nHti oiba rgc׃

job 4:3	hnh isrt rbim oidim rpot tHcq׃ 
job 4:4	koSl iqimon mlik obrkim kreot tamz׃ 
job 4:5	ki eth tboa alik otla tge edik otbhl׃

job 5:1	qra na hiS eonk oal mi mqdSim tpnh׃ 
job 5:2	ki laoil ihrg keS opth tmit qnah׃ 
job 5:3	ani raiti aoil mSriS oaqob noho ptam׃ 
job 5:4	irHqo bnio miSe oidkao bSer oain mzil׃ 
job 5:5	aSr qziro reb iakl oal mznim iqHho oSap zmim Hilm׃ 
job 5:6	ki la iza mepr aon omadmh la izmH eml׃
