ruth 1:1	oihi bimi SpT hSpTim oihi reb barz oilk aiS mbit lHm ihodh lgor bSdi moab hoa oaSto oSni bnio׃ 
ruth 1:2	oSm haiS alimlk oSm aSto nemi oSm Sni bnio mHlon oklion aprtim mbit lHm ihodh oibao Sdi moab oihio Sm׃ 
ruth 1:3	oimt alimlk aiS nemi otSar hia oSni bnih׃ 
ruth 1:4	oiSao lhm nSim mabiot Sm haHt erph oSm hSnit rot oiSbo Sm keSr Snim׃ 
ruth 1:5	oimoto gm Snihm mHlon oklion otSar haSh mSni ildih omaiSh׃ 
ruth 1:6	otqm hia okltih otSb mSdi moab ki Smeh bSdh moab ki pqd ihoh at emo ltt lhm lHm׃ 
ruth 1:7	otza mn hmqom aSr hith Smh oSti kltih emh otlknh bdrk lSob al arz ihodh׃ 
ruth 1:8	otamr nemi lSti kltih lknh Sbnh aSh lbit amh ieSh ihoh emkm Hsd kaSr eSitm em hmtim oemdi׃ 
ruth 1:9	itn ihoh lkm omzan mnoHh aSh bit aiSh otSq lhn otSanh qoln otbkinh׃ 
ruth 1:10	otamrnh lh ki atk nSob lemk׃ 
ruth 1:11	otamr nemi Sbnh bnti lmh tlknh emi heod li bnim bmei ohio lkm lanSim׃ 
ruth 1:12	Sbnh bnti lkn ki cqnti mhiot laiS ki amrti iS li tqoh gm hiiti hlilh laiS ogm ildti bnim׃ 
ruth 1:13	hlhn tSbrnh ed aSr igdlo hlhn tegnh lblti hiot laiS al bnti ki mr li mad mkm ki izah bi id ihoh׃ 
ruth 1:14	otSnh qoln otbkinh eod otSq erph lHmoth orot dbqh bh׃ 
ruth 1:15	otamr hnh Sbh ibmtk al emh oal alhih Sobi aHri ibmtk׃ 
ruth 1:16	otamr rot al tpgei bi lecbk lSob maHrik ki al aSr tlki alk obaSr tlini alin emk emi oalhik alhi׃ 
ruth 1:17	baSr tmoti amot oSm aqbr kh ieSh ihoh li okh isip ki hmot iprid bini obink׃ 
ruth 1:18	otra ki mtamzt hia llkt ath otHdl ldbr alih׃ 
ruth 1:19	otlknh Stihm ed banh bit lHm oihi kbanh bit lHm othm kl heir elihn otamrnh hcat nemi׃ 
ruth 1:20	otamr alihn al tqranh li nemi qran li mra ki hmr Sdi li mad׃ 
ruth 1:21	ani mlah hlkti oriqm hSibni ihoh lmh tqranh li nemi oihoh enh bi oSdi hre li׃ 
ruth 1:22	otSb nemi orot hmoabih klth emh hSbh mSdi moab ohmh bao bit lHm btHlt qzir Serim׃ 
ruth 2:1	olnemi mide laiSh aiS gbor Hil mmSpHt alimlk oSmo bec׃ 
ruth 2:2	otamr rot hmoabih al nemi alkh na hSdh oalqTh bSblim aHr aSr amza Hn beinio otamr lh lki bti׃ 
ruth 2:3	otlk otboa otlqT bSdh aHri hqzrim oiqr mqrh Hlqt hSdh lbec aSr mmSpHt alimlk׃ 
ruth 2:4	ohnh bec ba mbit lHm oiamr lqozrim ihoh emkm oiamro lo ibrkk ihoh׃ 
ruth 2:5	oiamr bec lnero hnzb el hqozrim lmi hnerh hcat׃ 
ruth 2:6	oien hner hnzb el hqozrim oiamr nerh moabih hia hSbh em nemi mSdh moab׃ 
ruth 2:7	otamr alqTh na oaspti bemrim aHri hqozrim otboa otemod mac hbqr oed eth ch Sbth hbit meT׃ 
ruth 2:8	oiamr bec al rot hloa Smet bti al tlki llqT bSdh aHr ogm la tebori mch okh tdbqin em nerti׃ 
ruth 2:9	einik bSdh aSr iqzron ohlkt aHrihn hloa zoiti at hnerim lblti ngek ozmt ohlkt al hklim oStit maSr iSabon hnerim׃ 
ruth 2:10	otpl el pnih otStHo arzh otamr alio mdoe mzati Hn beinik lhkirni oanki nkrih׃ 
ruth 2:11	oien bec oiamr lh hgd hgd li kl aSr eSit at Hmotk aHri mot aiSk otecbi abik oamk oarz moldtk otlki al em aSr la idet tmol SlSom׃ 
ruth 2:12	iSlm ihoh pelk othi mSkrtk Slmh mem ihoh alhi iSral aSr bat lHsot tHt knpio׃ 
ruth 2:13	otamr amza Hn beinik adni ki nHmtni oki dbrt el lb SpHtk oanki la ahih kaHt SpHtik׃ 
ruth 2:14	oiamr lh bec let hakl gSi hlm oaklt mn hlHm oTblt ptk bHmz otSb mzd hqozrim oizbT lh qli otakl otSbe ottr׃ 
ruth 2:15	otqm llqT oizo bec at nerio lamr gm bin hemrim tlqT ola tklimoh׃ 
ruth 2:16	ogm Sl tSlo lh mn hzbtim oecbtm olqTh ola tgero bh׃ 
ruth 2:17	otlqT bSdh ed herb otHbT at aSr lqTh oihi kaiph Serim׃ 
ruth 2:18	otSa otboa heir otra Hmoth at aSr lqTh otoza ottn lh at aSr hotrh mSbeh׃ 
ruth 2:19	otamr lh Hmoth aiph lqTt hiom oanh eSit ihi mkirk brok otgd lHmoth at aSr eSth emo otamr Sm haiS aSr eSiti emo hiom bec׃ 
ruth 2:20	otamr nemi lklth brok hoa lihoh aSr la ecb Hsdo at hHiim oat hmtim otamr lh nemi qrob lno haiS mgalno hoa׃ 
ruth 2:21	otamr rot hmoabih gm ki amr ali em hnerim aSr li tdbqin ed am klo at kl hqzir aSr li׃ 
ruth 2:22	otamr nemi al rot klth Tob bti ki tzai em nerotio ola ipgeo bk bSdh aHr׃ 
ruth 2:23	otdbq bnerot bec llqT ed klot qzir hSerim oqzir hHTim otSb at Hmoth׃ 
ruth 3:1	otamr lh nemi Hmoth bti hla abqS lk mnoH aSr iiTb lk׃ 
ruth 3:2	oeth hla bec mdetno aSr hiit at nerotio hnh hoa crh at grn hSerim hlilh׃ 
ruth 3:3	orHzt oskt oSmt Smltk elik oirdti hgrn al todei laiS ed klto lakl olStot׃ 
ruth 3:4	oihi bSkbo oidet at hmqom aSr iSkb Sm obat oglit mrgltio oSkbti ohoa igid lk at aSr teSin׃ 
ruth 3:5	otamr alih kl aSr tamri aeSh׃ 
ruth 3:6	otrd hgrn oteS kkl aSr zoth Hmoth׃ 
ruth 3:7	oiakl bec oiSt oiiTb lbo oiba lSkb bqzh hermh otba blT otgl mrgltio otSkb׃ 
ruth 3:8	oihi bHzi hlilh oiHrd haiS oilpt ohnh aSh Skbt mrgltio׃ 
ruth 3:9	oiamr mi at otamr anki rot amtk oprSt knpk el amtk ki gal ath׃ 
ruth 3:10	oiamr brokh at lihoh bti hiTbt Hsdk haHron mn hraSon lblti lkt aHri hbHorim am dl oam eSir׃ 
ruth 3:11	oeth bti al tirai kl aSr tamri aeSh lk ki iode kl Ser emi ki aSt Hil at׃ 
ruth 3:12	oeth ki amnm ki am gal anki ogm iS gal qrob mmni׃ 
ruth 3:13	lini hlilh ohih bbqr am igalk Tob igal oam la iHpz lgalk ogaltik anki Hi ihoh Skbi ed hbqr׃ 
ruth 3:14	otSkb mrglto ed hbqr otqm bTrom ikir aiS at reho oiamr al iode ki bah haSh hgrn׃ 
ruth 3:15	oiamr hbi hmTpHt aSr elik oaHci bh otaHc bh oimd SS Serim oiSt elih oiba heir׃ 
ruth 3:16	otboa al Hmoth otamr mi at bti otgd lh at kl aSr eSh lh haiS׃ 
ruth 3:17	otamr SS hSerim halh ntn li ki amr al tboai riqm al Hmotk׃ 
ruth 3:18	otamr Sbi bti ed aSr tdein aik ipl dbr ki la iSqT haiS ki am klh hdbr hiom׃ 
ruth 4:1	obec elh hSer oiSb Sm ohnh hgal ebr aSr dbr bec oiamr sorh Sbh ph plni almni oisr oiSb׃ 
ruth 4:2	oiqH eSrh anSim mcqni heir oiamr Sbo ph oiSbo׃ 
ruth 4:3	oiamr lgal Hlqt hSdh aSr laHino lalimlk mkrh nemi hSbh mSdh moab׃ 
ruth 4:4	oani amrti aglh acnk lamr qnh ngd hiSbim ongd cqni emi am tgal gal oam la igal hgidh li oade ki ain coltk lgaol oanki aHrik oiamr anki agal׃ 
ruth 4:5	oiamr bec biom qnotk hSdh mid nemi omat rot hmoabih aSt hmt qniti lhqim Sm hmt el nHlto׃ 
ruth 4:6	oiamr hgal la aokl lgaol li pn aSHit at nHlti gal lk ath at galti ki la aokl lgal׃ 
ruth 4:7	ocat lpnim biSral el hgaolh oel htmorh lqim kl dbr Slp aiS nelo ontn lreho ocat hteodh biSral׃ 
ruth 4:8	oiamr hgal lbec qnh lk oiSlp nelo׃ 
ruth 4:9	oiamr bec lcqnim okl hem edim atm hiom ki qniti at kl aSr lalimlk oat kl aSr lklion omHlon mid nemi׃ 
ruth 4:10	ogm at rot hmabih aSt mHlon qniti li laSh lhqim Sm hmt el nHlto ola ikrt Sm hmt mem aHio omSer mqomo edim atm hiom׃ 
ruth 4:11	oiamro kl hem aSr bSer ohcqnim edim itn ihoh at haSh hbah al bitk krHl oklah aSr bno Stihm at bit iSral oeSh Hil baprth oqra Sm bbit lHm׃ 
ruth 4:12	oihi bitk kbit prz aSr ildh tmr lihodh mn hcre aSr itn ihoh lk mn hnerh hcat׃ 
ruth 4:13	oiqH bec at rot othi lo laSh oiba alih oitn ihoh lh hrion otld bn׃ 
ruth 4:14	otamrnh hnSim al nemi brok ihoh aSr la hSbit lk gal hiom oiqra Smo biSral׃ 
ruth 4:15	ohih lk lmSib npS olklkl at Sibtk ki kltk aSr ahbtk ildto aSr hia Tobh lk mSbeh bnim׃ 
ruth 4:16	otqH nemi at hild otStho bHiqh othi lo lamnt׃ 
ruth 4:17	otqranh lo hSknot Sm lamr ild bn lnemi otqranh Smo eobd hoa abi iSi abi dod׃

ecclesiastes 2:2	lSHoq amrti mholl olSmHh mh ch eSh׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:3	trti blbi lmSok biin at bSri olbi nhg bHkmh olaHc bsklot ed aSr arah ai ch Tob lbni hadm aSr ieSo tHt hSmim mspr imi Hiihm׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:4	hgdlti meSi bniti li btim nTeti li krmim׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:5	eSiti li gnot oprdsim onTeti bhm ez kl pri׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:6	eSiti li brkot mim lhSqot mhm ier zomH ezim׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:7	qniti ebdim oSpHot obni bit hih li gm mqnh bqr ozan hrbh hih li mkl Shio lpni biroSlm׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:8	knsti li gm ksp ochb osglt mlkim ohmdinot eSiti li Srim oSrot otenogt bni hadm Sdh oSdot׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:9	ogdlti ohospti mkl Shih lpni biroSlm ap Hkmti emdh li׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:10	okl aSr Salo eini la azlti mhm la mneti at lbi mkl SmHh ki lbi SmH mkl emli och hih Hlqi mkl emli׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:11	opniti ani bkl meSi SeSo idi obeml Semlti leSot ohnh hkl hbl oreot roH oain itron tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:12	opniti ani lraot Hkmh ohollot osklot ki mh hadm Siboa aHri hmlk at aSr kbr eSoho׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:13	oraiti ani SiS itron lHkmh mn hsklot kitron haor mn hHSk׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:14	hHkm einio braSo ohksil bHSk holk oideti gm ani Smqrh aHd iqrh at klm׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:15	oamrti ani blbi kmqrh hksil gm ani iqrni olmh Hkmti ani ac iotr odbrti blbi Sgm ch hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:16	ki ain ckron lHkm em hksil leolm bSkbr himim hbaim hkl nSkH oaik imot hHkm em hksil׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:17	oSnati at hHiim ki re eli hmeSh SneSh tHt hSmS ki hkl hbl oreot roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:18	oSnati ani at kl emli Sani eml tHt hSmS SaniHno ladm Sihih aHri׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:19	omi iode hHkm ihih ao skl oiSlT bkl emli Semlti oSHkmti tHt hSmS gm ch hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:20	osboti ani liaS at lbi el kl heml Semlti tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:21	ki iS adm Semlo bHkmh obdet obkSron oladm Sla eml bo itnno Hlqo gm ch hbl oreh rbh׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:22	ki mh hoh ladm bkl emlo obreion lbo Shoa eml tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:23	ki kl imio mkabim okes enino gm blilh la Skb lbo gm ch hbl hoa׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:24	ain Tob badm Siakl oSth ohrah at npSo Tob bemlo gm ch raiti ani ki mid halhim hia׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:25	ki mi iakl omi iHoS Hoz mmni׃ 
ecclesiastes 2:26	ki ladm STob lpnio ntn Hkmh odet oSmHh olHoTa ntn enin lasop olknos ltt lTob lpni halhim gm ch hbl oreot roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:1	lkl cmn oet lkl Hpz tHt hSmim׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:2	et lldt oet lmot et lTet oet leqor nToe׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:3	et lhrog oet lrpoa et lproz oet lbnot׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:4	et lbkot oet lSHoq et spod oet rqod׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:5	et lhSlik abnim oet knos abnim et lHboq oet lrHq mHbq׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:6	et lbqS oet labd et lSmor oet lhSlik׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:7	et lqroe oet ltpor et lHSot oet ldbr׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:8	et lahb oet lSna et mlHmh oet Slom׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:9	mh itron heoSh baSr hoa eml׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:10	raiti at henin aSr ntn alhim lbni hadm lenot bo׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:11	at hkl eSh iph beto gm at helm ntn blbm mbli aSr la imza hadm at hmeSh aSr eSh halhim mraS oed sop׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:12	ideti ki ain Tob bm ki am lSmoH oleSot Tob bHiio׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:13	ogm kl hadm Siakl oSth orah Tob bkl emlo mtt alhim hia׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:14	ideti ki kl aSr ieSh halhim hoa ihih leolm elio ain lhosip ommno ain lgre ohalhim eSh Sirao mlpnio׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:15	mh Shih kbr hoa oaSr lhiot kbr hih ohalhim ibqS at nrdp׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:16	oeod raiti tHt hSmS mqom hmSpT Smh hrSe omqom hzdq Smh hrSe׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:17	amrti ani blbi at hzdiq oat hrSe iSpT halhim ki et lkl Hpz oel kl hmeSh Sm׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:18	amrti ani blbi el dbrt bni hadm lbrm halhim olraot Shm bhmh hmh lhm׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:19	ki mqrh bni hadm omqrh hbhmh omqrh aHd lhm kmot ch kn mot ch oroH aHd lkl omotr hadm mn hbhmh ain ki hkl hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:20	hkl holk al mqom aHd hkl hih mn hepr ohkl Sb al hepr׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:21	mi iode roH bni hadm helh hia lmelh oroH hbhmh hirdt hia lmTh larz׃ 
ecclesiastes 3:22	oraiti ki ain Tob maSr iSmH hadm bmeSio ki hoa Hlqo ki mi ibiano lraot bmh Sihih aHrio׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:1	oSbti ani oarah at kl heSqim aSr neSim tHt hSmS ohnh dmet heSqim oain lhm mnHm omid eSqihm kH oain lhm mnHm׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:2	oSbH ani at hmtim Skbr mto mn hHiim aSr hmh Hiim ednh׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:3	oTob mSnihm at aSr edn la hih aSr la rah at hmeSh hre aSr neSh tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:4	oraiti ani at kl eml oat kl kSron hmeSh ki hia qnat aiS mreho gm ch hbl oreot roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:5	hksil Hbq at idio oakl at bSro׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:6	Tob mla kp nHt mmla Hpnim eml oreot roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:7	oSbti ani oarah hbl tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:8	iS aHd oain Sni gm bn oaH ain lo oain qz lkl emlo gm einio la tSbe eSr olmi ani eml omHsr at npSi mTobh gm ch hbl oenin re hoa׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:9	Tobim hSnim mn haHd aSr iS lhm Skr Tob bemlm׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:10	ki am iplo haHd iqim at Hbro oailo haHd Sipol oain Sni lhqimo׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:11	gm am iSkbo Snim oHm lhm olaHd aik iHm׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:12	oam itqpo haHd hSnim iemdo ngdo ohHoT hmSlS la bmhrh intq׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:13	Tob ild mskn oHkm mmlk cqn oksil aSr la ide lhchr eod׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:14	ki mbit hsorim iza lmlk ki gm bmlkoto nold rS׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:15	raiti at kl hHiim hmhlkim tHt hSmS em hild hSni aSr iemd tHtio׃ 
ecclesiastes 4:16	ain qz lkl hem lkl aSr hih lpnihm gm haHronim la iSmHo bo ki gm ch hbl oreion roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:1	Smr rglik kaSr tlk al bit halhim oqrob lSme mtt hksilim cbH ki ainm iodeim leSot re׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:2	al tbhl el pik olbk al imhr lhozia dbr lpni halhim ki halhim bSmim oath el harz el kn ihio dbrik meTim׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:3	ki ba hHlom brb enin oqol ksil brb dbrim׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:4	kaSr tdr ndr lalhim al taHr lSlmo ki ain Hpz bksilim at aSr tdr Slm׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:5	Tob aSr la tdr mStdor ola tSlm׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:6	al ttn at pik lHTia at bSrk oal tamr lpni hmlak ki Sggh hia lmh iqzp halhim el qolk oHbl at meSh idik׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:7	ki brb Hlmot ohblim odbrim hrbh ki at halhim ira׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:8	am eSq rS ogcl mSpT ozdq trah bmdinh al ttmh el hHpz ki gbh mel gbh Smr ogbhim elihm׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:9	oitron arz bkl hia mlk lSdh nebd׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:10	ahb ksp la iSbe ksp omi ahb bhmon la tboah gm ch hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:11	brbot hTobh rbo aoklih omh kSron lbelih ki am rait einio׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:12	mtoqh Snt hebd am meT oam hrbh iakl ohSbe leSir ainno mniH lo liSon׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:13	iS reh Holh raiti tHt hSmS eSr Smor lbelio lreto׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:14	oabd heSr hhoa benin re oholid bn oain bido maomh׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:15	kaSr iza mbTn amo erom iSob llkt kSba omaomh la iSa bemlo Silk bido׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:16	ogm ch reh Holh kl emt Sba kn ilk omh itron lo Sieml lroH׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:17	gm kl imio bHSk iakl okes hrbh oHlio oqzp׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:18	hnh aSr raiti ani Tob aSr iph lakol olStot olraot Tobh bkl emlo Sieml tHt hSmS mspr imi Hio aSr ntn lo halhim ki hoa Hlqo׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:19	gm kl hadm aSr ntn lo halhim eSr onksim ohSliTo lakl mmno olSat at Hlqo olSmH bemlo ch mtt alhim hia׃ 
ecclesiastes 5:20	ki la hrbh ickr at imi Hiio ki halhim menh bSmHt lbo׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:1	iS reh aSr raiti tHt hSmS orbh hia el hadm׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:2	aiS aSr itn lo halhim eSr onksim okbod oainno Hsr lnpSo mkl aSr itaoh ola iSliTno halhim lakl mmno ki aiS nkri iaklno ch hbl oHli re hoa׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:3	am iolid aiS mah oSnim rbot iHih orb Sihio imi Snio onpSo la tSbe mn hTobh ogm qborh la hith lo amrti Tob mmno hnpl׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:4	ki bhbl ba obHSk ilk obHSk Smo iksh׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:5	gm SmS la rah ola ide nHt lch mch׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:6	oalo Hih alp Snim pemim oTobh la rah hla al mqom aHd hkl holk׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:7	kl eml hadm lpiho ogm hnpS la tmla׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:8	ki mh iotr lHkm mn hksil mh leni iode lhlk ngd hHiim׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:9	Tob mrah einim mhlk npS gm ch hbl oreot roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:10	mh Shih kbr nqra Smo onode aSr hoa adm ola iokl ldin em Shtqip mmno׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:11	ki iS dbrim hrbh mrbim hbl mh itr ladm׃ 
ecclesiastes 6:12	ki mi iode mh Tob ladm bHiim mspr imi Hii hblo oieSm kzl aSr mi igid ladm mh ihih aHrio tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:1	Tob Sm mSmn Tob oiom hmot miom holdo׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:2	Tob llkt al bit abl mlkt al bit mSth baSr hoa sop kl hadm ohHi itn al lbo׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:3	Tob kes mSHq ki bre pnim iiTb lb׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:4	lb Hkmim bbit abl olb ksilim bbit SmHh׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:5	Tob lSme gert Hkm maiS Sme Sir ksilim׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:6	ki kqol hsirim tHt hsir kn SHq hksil ogm ch hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:7	ki heSq iholl Hkm oiabd at lb mtnh׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:8	Tob aHrit dbr mraSito Tob ark roH mgbh roH׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:9	al tbhl broHk lkeos ki kes bHiq ksilim inoH׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:10	al tamr mh hih Shimim hraSnim hio Tobim malh ki la mHkmh Salt el ch׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:11	Tobh Hkmh em nHlh oitr lrai hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:12	ki bzl hHkmh bzl hksp oitron det hHkmh tHih belih׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:13	rah at meSh halhim ki mi iokl ltqn at aSr eoto׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:14	biom Tobh hih bTob obiom reh rah gm at ch lemt ch eSh halhim el dbrt Sla imza hadm aHrio maomh׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:15	at hkl raiti bimi hbli iS zdiq abd bzdqo oiS rSe marik breto׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:16	al thi zdiq hrbh oal ttHkm iotr lmh tSomm׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:17	al trSe hrbh oal thi skl lmh tmot bla etk׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:18	Tob aSr taHc bch ogm mch al tnH at idk ki ira alhim iza at klm׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:19	hHkmh tec lHkm meSrh SliTim aSr hio beir׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:20	ki adm ain zdiq barz aSr ieSh Tob ola iHTa׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:21	gm lkl hdbrim aSr idbro al ttn lbk aSr la tSme at ebdk mqllk׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:22	ki gm pemim rbot ide lbk aSr gm at qllt aHrim׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:23	kl ch nsiti bHkmh amrti aHkmh ohia rHoqh mmni׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:24	rHoq mh Shih oemq emq mi imzano׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:25	sboti ani olbi ldet oltor obqS Hkmh oHSbon oldet rSe ksl ohsklot hollot׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:26	omoza ani mr mmot at haSh aSr hia mzodim oHrmim lbh asorim idih Tob lpni halhim imlT mmnh oHoTa ilkd bh׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:27	rah ch mzati amrh qhlt aHt laHt lmza HSbon׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:28	aSr eod bqSh npSi ola mzati adm aHd malp mzati oaSh bkl alh la mzati׃ 
ecclesiastes 7:29	lbd rah ch mzati aSr eSh halhim at hadm iSr ohmh bqSo HSbnot rbim׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:1	mi khHkm omi iode pSr dbr Hkmt adm tair pnio oec pnio iSna׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:2	ani pi mlk Smor oel dbrt Sboet alhim׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:3	al tbhl mpnio tlk al temd bdbr re ki kl aSr iHpz ieSh׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:4	baSr dbr mlk SlTon omi iamr lo mh teSh׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:5	Somr mzoh la ide dbr re oet omSpT ide lb Hkm׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:6	ki lkl Hpz iS et omSpT ki ret hadm rbh elio׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:7	ki ainno ide mh Sihih ki kaSr ihih mi igid lo׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:8	ain adm SliT broH lkloa at hroH oain SlTon biom hmot oain mSlHt bmlHmh ola imlT rSe at belio׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:9	at kl ch raiti onton at lbi lkl meSh aSr neSh tHt hSmS et aSr SlT hadm badm lre lo׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:10	obkn raiti rSeim qbrim obao ommqom qdoS ihlko oiStkHo beir aSr kn eSo gm ch hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:11	aSr ain neSh ptgm meSh hreh mhrh el kn mla lb bni hadm bhm leSot re׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:12	aSr HTa eSh re mat omarik lo ki gm iode ani aSr ihih Tob lirai halhim aSr iirao mlpnio׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:13	oTob la ihih lrSe ola iarik imim kzl aSr ainno ira mlpni alhim׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:14	iS hbl aSr neSh el harz aSr iS zdiqim aSr mgie alhm kmeSh hrSeim oiS rSeim Smgie alhm kmeSh hzdiqim amrti Sgm ch hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:15	oSbHti ani at hSmHh aSr ain Tob ladm tHt hSmS ki am lakol olStot olSmoH ohoa ilono bemlo imi Hiio aSr ntn lo halhim tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:16	kaSr ntti at lbi ldet Hkmh olraot at henin aSr neSh el harz ki gm biom oblilh Snh beinio ainno rah׃ 
ecclesiastes 8:17	oraiti at kl meSh halhim ki la iokl hadm lmzoa at hmeSh aSr neSh tHt hSmS bSl aSr ieml hadm lbqS ola imza ogm am iamr hHkm ldet la iokl lmza׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:1	ki at kl ch ntti al lbi olbor at kl ch aSr hzdiqim ohHkmim oebdihm bid halhim gm ahbh gm Snah ain iode hadm hkl lpnihm׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:2	hkl kaSr lkl mqrh aHd lzdiq olrSe lTob olThor olTma olcbH olaSr ainno cbH kTob kHTa hnSbe kaSr Sboeh ira׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:3	ch re bkl aSr neSh tHt hSmS ki mqrh aHd lkl ogm lb bni hadm mla re ohollot blbbm bHiihm oaHrio al hmtim׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:4	ki mi aSr ibHr al kl hHiim iS bTHon ki lklb Hi hoa Tob mn harih hmt׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:5	ki hHiim iodeim Simto ohmtim ainm iodeim maomh oain eod lhm Skr ki nSkH ckrm׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:6	gm ahbtm gm Snatm gm qnatm kbr abdh oHlq ain lhm eod leolm bkl aSr neSh tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:7	lk akl bSmHh lHmk oSth blb Tob iink ki kbr rzh halhim at meSik׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:8	bkl et ihio bgdik lbnim oSmn el raSk al iHsr׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:9	rah Hiim em aSh aSr ahbt kl imi Hii hblk aSr ntn lk tHt hSmS kl imi hblk ki hoa Hlqk bHiim obemlk aSr ath eml tHt hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:10	kl aSr tmza idk leSot bkHk eSh ki ain meSh oHSbon odet oHkmh bSaol aSr ath hlk Smh׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:11	Sbti orah tHt hSmS ki la lqlim hmroz ola lgborim hmlHmh ogm la lHkmim lHm ogm la lnbnim eSr ogm la lideim Hn ki et opge iqrh at klm׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:12	ki gm la ide hadm at eto kdgim SnaHcim bmzodh reh okzprim haHcot bpH khm ioqSim bni hadm let reh kStpol elihm ptam׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:13	gm ch raiti Hkmh tHt hSmS ogdolh hia ali׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:14	eir qTnh oanSim bh meT oba alih mlk gdol osbb ath obnh elih mzodim gdlim׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:15	omza bh aiS mskn Hkm omlT hoa at heir bHkmto oadm la ckr at haiS hmskn hhoa׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:16	oamrti ani Tobh Hkmh mgborh oHkmt hmskn bcoih odbrio ainm nSmeim׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:17	dbri Hkmim bnHt nSmeim mceqt moSl bksilim׃ 
ecclesiastes 9:18	Tobh Hkmh mkli qrb oHoTa aHd iabd Tobh hrbh׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:1	cbobi mot ibaiS ibie Smn roqH iqr mHkmh mkbod sklot meT׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:2	lb Hkm limino olb ksil lSmalo׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:3	ogm bdrk kShskl hlk lbo Hsr oamr lkl skl hoa׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:4	am roH hmoSl telh elik mqomk al tnH ki mrpa iniH HTaim gdolim׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:5	iS reh raiti tHt hSmS kSggh Siza mlpni hSliT׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:6	ntn hskl bmromim rbim oeSirim bSpl iSbo׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:7	raiti ebdim el sosim oSrim hlkim kebdim el harz׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:8	Hpr gomz bo ipol oprz gdr iSkno nHS׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:9	msie abnim iezb bhm boqe ezim iskn bm׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:10	am qhh hbrcl ohoa la pnim qlql oHilim igbr oitron hkSir Hkmh׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:11	am iSk hnHS bloa lHS oain itron lbel hlSon׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:12	dbri pi Hkm Hn oSptot ksil tbleno׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:13	tHlt dbri piho sklot oaHrit piho hollot reh׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:14	ohskl irbh dbrim la ide hadm mh Sihih oaSr ihih maHrio mi igid lo׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:15	eml hksilim tigeno aSr la ide llkt al eir׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:16	ai lk arz Smlkk ner oSrik bbqr iaklo׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:17	aSrik arz Smlkk bn Horim oSrik bet iaklo bgborh ola bSti׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:18	bezltim imk hmqrh obSplot idim idlp hbit׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:19	lSHoq eSim lHm oiin iSmH Hiim ohksp ienh at hkl׃ 
ecclesiastes 10:20	gm bmdek mlk al tqll obHdri mSkbk al tqll eSir ki eop hSmim iolik at hqol obel hknpim igid dbr׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:1	SlH lHmk el pni hmim ki brb himim tmzano׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:2	tn Hlq lSbeh ogm lSmonh ki la tde mh ihih reh el harz׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:3	am imlao hebim gSm el harz iriqo oam ipol ez bdrom oam bzpon mqom Sipol hez Sm ihoa׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:4	Smr roH la icre orah bebim la iqzor׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:5	kaSr aink iode mh drk hroH kezmim bbTn hmlah kkh la tde at meSh halhim aSr ieSh at hkl׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:6	bbqr cre at crek olerb al tnH idk ki aink iode ai ch ikSr hch ao ch oam Snihm kaHd Tobim׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:7	omtoq haor oTob leinim lraot at hSmS׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:8	ki am Snim hrbh iHih hadm bklm iSmH oickr at imi hHSk ki hrbh ihio kl Sba hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:9	SmH bHor bildotik oiTibk lbk bimi bHorotk ohlk bdrki lbk obmrai einik ode ki el kl alh ibiak halhim bmSpT׃ 
ecclesiastes 11:10	ohsr kes mlbk ohebr reh mbSrk ki hildot ohSHrot hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:1	ockr at boraik bimi bHortik ed aSr la ibao imi hreh ohgieo Snim aSr tamr ain li bhm Hpz׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:2	ed aSr la tHSk hSmS ohaor ohirH ohkokbim oSbo hebim aHr hgSm׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:3	biom Siceo Smri hbit ohteoto anSi hHil obTlo hTHnot ki meTo oHSko hraot barbot׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:4	osgro dltim bSoq bSpl qol hTHnh oiqom lqol hzpor oiSHo kl bnot hSir׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:5	gm mgbh irao oHtHtim bdrk oinaz hSqd oistbl hHgb otpr habionh ki hlk hadm al bit eolmo osbbo bSoq hspdim׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:6	ed aSr la irHq Hbl hksp otrz glt hchb otSbr kd el hmboe onrz hglgl al hbor׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:7	oiSb hepr el harz kShih ohroH tSob al halhim aSr ntnh׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:8	hbl hblim amr hqohlt hkl hbl׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:9	oitr Shih qhlt Hkm eod lmd det at hem oacn oHqr tqn mSlim hrbh׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:10	bqS qhlt lmza dbri Hpz oktob iSr dbri amt׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:11	dbri Hkmim kdrbnot okmSmrot nToeim beli aspot ntno mreh aHd׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:12	oitr mhmh bni hchr eSot sprim hrbh ain qz olhg hrbh iget bSr׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:13	sop dbr hkl nSme at halhim ira oat mzotio Smor ki ch kl hadm׃ 
ecclesiastes 12:14	ki at kl meSh halhim iba bmSpT el kl nelm am Tob oam re׃ 
esther 1:1	oihi bimi aHSoroS hoa aHSoroS hmlk mhdo oed koS Sbe oeSrim omah mdinh׃ 
esther 1:2	bimim hhm kSbt hmlk aHSoroS el ksa mlkoto aSr bSoSn hbirh׃ 
esther 1:3	bSnt SloS lmlko eSh mSth lkl Srio oebdio Hil prs omdi hprtmim oSri hmdinot lpnio׃ 
esther 1:4	bhrato at eSr kbod mlkoto oat iqr tpart gdolto imim rbim Smonim omat iom׃ 
esther 1:5	obmloat himim halh eSh hmlk lkl hem hnmzaim bSoSn hbirh lmgdol oed qTn mSth Sbet imim bHzr gnt bitn hmlk׃ 
esther 1:6	Hor krps otklt aHoc bHbli boz oargmn el glili ksp oemodi SS mTot chb oksp el rzpt bhT oSS odr osHrt׃ 
esther 1:7	ohSqot bkli chb oklim mklim Sonim oiin mlkot rb kid hmlk׃ 
esther 1:8	ohStih kdt ain ans ki kn isd hmlk el kl rb bito leSot krzon aiS oaiS׃ 
esther 1:9	gm oSti hmlkh eSth mSth nSim bit hmlkot aSr lmlk aHSoroS׃ 
esther 1:10	biom hSbiei kTob lb hmlk biin amr lmhomn bcta Hrbona bgta oabgta ctr okrks Sbet hsrisim hmSrtim at pni hmlk aHSoroS׃ 
esther 1:11	lhbia at oSti hmlkh lpni hmlk bktr mlkot lhraot hemim ohSrim at ipih ki Tobt mrah hia׃ 
esther 1:12	otman hmlkh oSti lboa bdbr hmlk aSr bid hsrisim oiqzp hmlk mad oHmto berh bo׃ 
esther 1:13	oiamr hmlk lHkmim idei hetim ki kn dbr hmlk lpni kl idei dt odin׃ 
esther 1:14	ohqrb alio krSna Str admta trSiS mrs mrsna mmokn Sbet Sri prs omdi rai pni hmlk hiSbim raSnh bmlkot׃ 
esther 1:15	kdt mh leSot bmlkh oSti el aSr la eSth at mamr hmlk aHSoroS bid hsrisim׃ 
esther 1:16	oiamr momkn lpni hmlk ohSrim la el hmlk lbdo eoth oSti hmlkh ki el kl hSrim oel kl hemim aSr bkl mdinot hmlk aHSoroS׃ 
esther 1:17	ki iza dbr hmlkh el kl hnSim lhbcot belihn beinihn bamrm hmlk aHSoroS amr lhbia at oSti hmlkh lpnio ola bah׃ 
esther 1:18	ohiom hch tamrnh Srot prs omdi aSr Smeo at dbr hmlkh lkl Sri hmlk okdi bcion oqzp׃ 
esther 1:19	am el hmlk Tob iza dbr mlkot mlpnio oiktb bdti prs omdi ola iebor aSr la tboa oSti lpni hmlk aHSoroS omlkoth itn hmlk lreoth hTobh mmnh׃ 
esther 1:20	onSme ptgm hmlk aSr ieSh bkl mlkoto ki rbh hia okl hnSim itno iqr lbelihn lmgdol oed qTn׃ 
esther 1:21	oiiTb hdbr beini hmlk ohSrim oieS hmlk kdbr mmokn׃ 
esther 1:22	oiSlH sprim al kl mdinot hmlk al mdinh omdinh kktbh oal em oem klSono lhiot kl aiS Srr bbito omdbr klSon emo׃ 
esther 2:1	aHr hdbrim halh kSk Hmt hmlk aHSoroS ckr at oSti oat aSr eSth oat aSr ngcr elih׃ 
esther 2:2	oiamro neri hmlk mSrtio ibqSo lmlk nerot btolot Tobot mrah׃ 
esther 2:3	oipqd hmlk pqidim bkl mdinot mlkoto oiqbzo at kl nerh btolh Tobt mrah al SoSn hbirh al bit hnSim al id hga sris hmlk Smr hnSim onton tmroqihn׃ 
esther 2:4	ohnerh aSr tiTb beini hmlk tmlk tHt oSti oiiTb hdbr beini hmlk oieS kn׃ 
esther 2:5	aiS ihodi hih bSoSn hbirh oSmo mrdki bn iair bn Smei bn qiS aiS imini׃ 
esther 2:6	aSr hglh miroSlim em hglh aSr hglth em iknih mlk ihodh aSr hglh nbokdnazr mlk bbl׃ 
esther 2:7	oihi amn at hdsh hia astr bt ddo ki ain lh ab oam ohnerh ipt tar oTobt mrah obmot abih oamh lqHh mrdki lo lbt׃ 
esther 2:8	oihi bhSme dbr hmlk odto obhqbz nerot rbot al SoSn hbirh al id hgi otlqH astr al bit hmlk al id hgi Smr hnSim׃ 
esther 2:9	otiTb hnerh beinio otSa Hsd lpnio oibhl at tmroqih oat mnoth ltt lh oat Sbe hnerot hraiot ltt lh mbit hmlk oiSnh oat nerotih lTob bit hnSim׃ 
esther 2:10	la hgidh astr at emh oat moldth ki mrdki zoh elih aSr la tgid׃ 
esther 2:11	obkl iom oiom mrdki mthlk lpni Hzr bit hnSim ldet at Slom astr omh ieSh bh׃ 
esther 2:12	obhgie tr nerh onerh lboa al hmlk aHSoroS mqz hiot lh kdt hnSim Snim eSr HdS ki kn imlao imi mroqihn SSh HdSim bSmn hmr oSSh HdSim bbSmim obtmroqi hnSim׃ 
esther 2:13	obch hnerh bah al hmlk at kl aSr tamr intn lh lboa emh mbit hnSim ed bit hmlk׃ 
esther 2:14	berb hia bah obbqr hia Sbh al bit hnSim Sni al id SeSgc sris hmlk Smr hpilgSim la tboa eod al hmlk ki am Hpz bh hmlk onqrah bSm׃ 
esther 2:15	obhgie tr astr bt abiHil dd mrdki aSr lqH lo lbt lboa al hmlk la bqSh dbr ki am at aSr iamr hgi sris hmlk Smr hnSim othi astr nSat Hn beini kl raih׃ 
esther 2:16	otlqH astr al hmlk aHSoroS al bit mlkoto bHdS heSiri hoa HdS Tbt bSnt Sbe lmlkoto׃ 
esther 2:17	oiahb hmlk at astr mkl hnSim otSa Hn oHsd lpnio mkl hbtolt oiSm ktr mlkot braSh oimlikh tHt oSti׃ 
esther 2:18	oieS hmlk mSth gdol lkl Srio oebdio at mSth astr ohnHh lmdinot eSh oitn mSat kid hmlk׃ 
esther 2:19	obhqbz btolot Snit omrdki iSb bSer hmlk׃ 
esther 2:20	ain astr mgdt moldth oat emh kaSr zoh elih mrdki oat mamr mrdki astr eSh kaSr hith bamnh ato׃ 
esther 2:21	bimim hhm omrdki iSb bSer hmlk qzp bgtn otrS Sni srisi hmlk mSmri hsp oibqSo lSlH id bmlk aHSorS׃ 
esther 2:22	oiode hdbr lmrdki oigd lastr hmlkh otamr astr lmlk bSm mrdki׃ 
esther 2:23	oibqS hdbr oimza oitlo Snihm el ez oiktb bspr dbri himim lpni hmlk׃ 
esther 3:1	aHr hdbrim halh gdl hmlk aHSoroS at hmn bn hmdta haggi oinSaho oiSm at ksao mel kl hSrim aSr ato׃ 
esther 3:2	okl ebdi hmlk aSr bSer hmlk kreim omStHoim lhmn ki kn zoh lo hmlk omrdki la ikre ola iStHoh׃ 
esther 3:3	oiamro ebdi hmlk aSr bSer hmlk lmrdki mdoe ath eobr at mzot hmlk׃ 
esther 3:4	oihi bamrm alio iom oiom ola Sme alihm oigido lhmn lraot hiemdo dbri mrdki ki hgid lhm aSr hoa ihodi׃ 
esther 3:5	oira hmn ki ain mrdki kre omStHoh lo oimla hmn Hmh׃ 
esther 3:6	oibc beinio lSlH id bmrdki lbdo ki hgido lo at em mrdki oibqS hmn lhSmid at kl hihodim aSr bkl mlkot aHSoroS em mrdki׃ 
esther 3:7	bHdS hraSon hoa HdS nisn bSnt Stim eSrh lmlk aHSoroS hpil por hoa hgorl lpni hmn miom liom omHdS lHdS Snim eSr hoa HdS adr׃ 
esther 3:8	oiamr hmn lmlk aHSoroS iSno em aHd mpcr omprd bin hemim bkl mdinot mlkotk odtihm Snot mkl em oat dti hmlk ainm eSim olmlk ain Soh lhniHm׃ 
esther 3:9	am el hmlk Tob iktb labdm oeSrt alpim kkr ksp aSqol el idi eSi hmlakh lhbia al gnci hmlk׃ 
esther 3:10	oisr hmlk at Tbeto mel ido oitnh lhmn bn hmdta haggi zrr hihodim׃ 
esther 3:11	oiamr hmlk lhmn hksp nton lk ohem leSot bo kTob beinik׃ 
esther 3:12	oiqrao spri hmlk bHdS hraSon bSloSh eSr iom bo oiktb kkl aSr zoh hmn al aHSdrpni hmlk oal hpHot aSr el mdinh omdinh oal Sri em oem mdinh omdinh kktbh oem oem klSono bSm hmlk aHSorS nktb onHtm bTbet hmlk׃ 
esther 3:13	onSloH sprim bid hrzim al kl mdinot hmlk lhSmid lhrg olabd at kl hihodim mner oed cqn Tp onSim biom aHd bSloSh eSr lHdS Snim eSr hoa HdS adr oSllm lboc׃ 
esther 3:14	ptSgn hktb lhntn dt bkl mdinh omdinh gloi lkl hemim lhiot etdim liom hch׃ 
esther 3:15	hrzim izao dHopim bdbr hmlk ohdt ntnh bSoSn hbirh ohmlk ohmn iSbo lStot oheir SoSn nbokh׃ 
esther 4:1	omrdki ide at kl aSr neSh oiqre mrdki at bgdio oilbS Sq oapr oiza btok heir oiceq ceqh gdlh omrh׃ 
esther 4:2	oiboa ed lpni Ser hmlk ki ain lboa al Ser hmlk blboS Sq׃ 
esther 4:3	obkl mdinh omdinh mqom aSr dbr hmlk odto mgie abl gdol lihodim ozom obki omspd Sq oapr ize lrbim׃ 
esther 4:4	otboainh nerot astr osrisih oigido lh ottHlHl hmlkh mad otSlH bgdim lhlbiS at mrdki olhsir Sqo melio ola qbl׃ 
esther 4:5	otqra astr lhtk msrisi hmlk aSr hemid lpnih otzoho el mrdki ldet mh ch oel mh ch׃ 
esther 4:6	oiza htk al mrdki al rHob heir aSr lpni Ser hmlk׃ 
esther 4:7	oigd lo mrdki at kl aSr qrho oat prSt hksp aSr amr hmn lSqol el gnci hmlk bihodiim labdm׃ 
esther 4:8	oat ptSgn ktb hdt aSr ntn bSoSn lhSmidm ntn lo lhraot at astr olhgid lh olzoot elih lboa al hmlk lhtHnn lo olbqS mlpnio el emh׃ 
esther 4:9	oiboa htk oigd lastr at dbri mrdki׃ 
esther 4:10	otamr astr lhtk otzoho al mrdki׃ 
esther 4:11	kl ebdi hmlk oem mdinot hmlk iodeim aSr kl aiS oaSh aSr iboa al hmlk al hHzr hpnimit aSr la iqra aHt dto lhmit lbd maSr ioSiT lo hmlk at SrbiT hchb oHih oani la nqrati lboa al hmlk ch SloSim iom׃ 
esther 4:12	oigido lmrdki at dbri astr׃ 
esther 4:13	oiamr mrdki lhSib al astr al tdmi bnpSk lhmlT bit hmlk mkl hihodim׃ 
esther 4:14	ki am hHrS tHriSi bet hcat roH ohzlh iemod lihodim mmqom aHr oat obit abik tabdo omi iode am let kcat hget lmlkot׃ 
esther 4:15	otamr astr lhSib al mrdki׃ 
esther 4:16	lk knos at kl hihodim hnmzaim bSoSn ozomo eli oal taklo oal tSto SlSt imim lilh oiom gm ani onerti azom kn obkn aboa al hmlk aSr la kdt okaSr abdti abdti׃ 
esther 4:17	oiebr mrdki oieS kkl aSr zoth elio astr׃ 
esther 5:1	oihi biom hSliSi otlbS astr mlkot otemd bHzr bit hmlk hpnimit nkH bit hmlk ohmlk ioSb el ksa mlkoto bbit hmlkot nkH ptH hbit׃ 
esther 5:2	oihi kraot hmlk at astr hmlkh emdt bHzr nSah Hn beinio oioST hmlk lastr at SrbiT hchb aSr bido otqrb astr otge braS hSrbiT׃ 
esther 5:3	oiamr lh hmlk mh lk astr hmlkh omh bqStk ed Hzi hmlkot ointn lk׃ 
esther 5:4	otamr astr am el hmlk Tob iboa hmlk ohmn hiom al hmSth aSr eSiti lo׃ 
esther 5:5	oiamr hmlk mhro at hmn leSot at dbr astr oiba hmlk ohmn al hmSth aSr eSth astr׃ 
esther 5:6	oiamr hmlk lastr bmSth hiin mh Saltk ointn lk omh bqStk ed Hzi hmlkot oteS׃ 
esther 5:7	oten astr otamr Salti obqSti׃ 
esther 5:8	am mzati Hn beini hmlk oam el hmlk Tob ltt at Salti oleSot at bqSti iboa hmlk ohmn al hmSth aSr aeSh lhm omHr aeSh kdbr hmlk׃ 
esther 5:9	oiza hmn biom hhoa SmH oTob lb okraot hmn at mrdki bSer hmlk ola qm ola ce mmno oimla hmn el mrdki Hmh׃ 
esther 5:10	oitapq hmn oiboa al bito oiSlH oiba at ahbio oat crS aSto׃ 
esther 5:11	oispr lhm hmn at kbod eSro orb bnio oat kl aSr gdlo hmlk oat aSr nSao el hSrim oebdi hmlk׃ 
esther 5:12	oiamr hmn ap la hbiah astr hmlkh em hmlk al hmSth aSr eSth ki am aoti ogm lmHr ani qroa lh em hmlk׃ 
esther 5:13	okl ch ainno Soh li bkl et aSr ani rah at mrdki hihodi ioSb bSer hmlk׃ 
esther 5:14	otamr lo crS aSto okl ahbio ieSo ez gbh HmSim amh obbqr amr lmlk oitlo at mrdki elio oba em hmlk al hmSth SmH oiiTb hdbr lpni hmn oieS hez׃ 
esther 6:1	blilh hhoa nddh Snt hmlk oiamr lhbia at spr hckrnot dbri himim oihio nqraim lpni hmlk׃ 
esther 6:2	oimza ktob aSr hgid mrdki el bgtna otrS Sni srisi hmlk mSmri hsp aSr bqSo lSlH id bmlk aHSoroS׃ 
esther 6:3	oiamr hmlk mh neSh iqr ogdolh lmrdki el ch oiamro neri hmlk mSrtio la neSh emo dbr׃ 
esther 6:4	oiamr hmlk mi bHzr ohmn ba lHzr bit hmlk hHizonh lamr lmlk ltlot at mrdki el hez aSr hkin lo׃ 
esther 6:5	oiamro neri hmlk alio hnh hmn emd bHzr oiamr hmlk iboa׃ 
esther 6:6	oiboa hmn oiamr lo hmlk mh leSot baiS aSr hmlk Hpz biqro oiamr hmn blbo lmi iHpz hmlk leSot iqr iotr mmni׃ 
esther 6:7	oiamr hmn al hmlk aiS aSr hmlk Hpz biqro׃ 
esther 6:8	ibiao lboS mlkot aSr lbS bo hmlk osos aSr rkb elio hmlk oaSr ntn ktr mlkot braSo׃ 
esther 6:9	onton hlboS ohsos el id aiS mSri hmlk hprtmim ohlbiSo at haiS aSr hmlk Hpz biqro ohrkibho el hsos brHob heir oqrao lpnio kkh ieSh laiS aSr hmlk Hpz biqro׃ 
esther 6:10	oiamr hmlk lhmn mhr qH at hlboS oat hsos kaSr dbrt oeSh kn lmrdki hihodi hioSb bSer hmlk al tpl dbr mkl aSr dbrt׃ 
esther 6:11	oiqH hmn at hlboS oat hsos oilbS at mrdki oirkibho brHob heir oiqra lpnio kkh ieSh laiS aSr hmlk Hpz biqro׃ 
esther 6:12	oiSb mrdki al Ser hmlk ohmn ndHp al bito abl oHpoi raS׃ 
esther 6:13	oispr hmn lcrS aSto olkl ahbio at kl aSr qrho oiamro lo Hkmio ocrS aSto am mcre hihodim mrdki aSr hHlot lnpl lpnio la tokl lo ki npol tpol lpnio׃ 
esther 6:14	eodm mdbrim emo osrisi hmlk hgieo oibhlo lhbia at hmn al hmSth aSr eSth astr׃ 
esther 7:1	oiba hmlk ohmn lStot em astr hmlkh׃ 
esther 7:2	oiamr hmlk lastr gm biom hSni bmSth hiin mh Saltk astr hmlkh otntn lk omh bqStk ed Hzi hmlkot oteS׃ 
esther 7:3	oten astr hmlkh otamr am mzati Hn beinik hmlk oam el hmlk Tob tntn li npSi bSalti oemi bbqSti׃ 
esther 7:4	ki nmkrno ani oemi lhSmid lhrog olabd oalo lebdim olSpHot nmkrno hHrSti ki ain hzr Soh bncq hmlk׃ 
esther 7:5	oiamr hmlk aHSoroS oiamr lastr hmlkh mi hoa ch oai ch hoa aSr mlao lbo leSot kn׃ 
esther 7:6	otamr astr aiS zr oaoib hmn hre hch ohmn nbet mlpni hmlk ohmlkh׃ 
esther 7:7	ohmlk qm bHmto mmSth hiin al gnt hbitn ohmn emd lbqS el npSo mastr hmlkh ki rah ki klth alio hreh mat hmlk׃ 
esther 7:8	ohmlk Sb mgnt hbitn al bit mSth hiin ohmn npl el hmTh aSr astr elih oiamr hmlk hgm lkboS at hmlkh emi bbit hdbr iza mpi hmlk opni hmn Hpo׃ 
esther 7:9	oiamr Hrbonh aHd mn hsrisim lpni hmlk gm hnh hez aSr eSh hmn lmrdki aSr dbr Tob el hmlk emd bbit hmn gbh HmSim amh oiamr hmlk tlho elio׃ 
esther 7:10	oitlo at hmn el hez aSr hkin lmrdki oHmt hmlk Skkh׃ 
esther 8:1	biom hhoa ntn hmlk aHSoroS lastr hmlkh at bit hmn zrr hihodiim omrdki ba lpni hmlk ki hgidh astr mh hoa lh׃ 
esther 8:2	oisr hmlk at Tbeto aSr hebir mhmn oitnh lmrdki otSm astr at mrdki el bit hmn׃ 
esther 8:3	otosp astr otdbr lpni hmlk otpl lpni rglio otbk ottHnn lo lhebir at ret hmn haggi oat mHSbto aSr HSb el hihodim׃ 
esther 8:4	oioST hmlk lastr at SrbT hchb otqm astr otemd lpni hmlk׃ 
esther 8:5	otamr am el hmlk Tob oam mzati Hn lpnio okSr hdbr lpni hmlk oTobh ani beinio iktb lhSib at hsprim mHSbt hmn bn hmdta haggi aSr ktb labd at hihodim aSr bkl mdinot hmlk׃ 
esther 8:6	ki aikkh aokl oraiti breh aSr imza at emi oaikkh aokl oraiti babdn moldti׃ 
esther 8:7	oiamr hmlk aHSorS lastr hmlkh olmrdki hihodi hnh bit hmn ntti lastr oato tlo el hez el aSr SlH ido bihodiim׃ 
esther 8:8	oatm ktbo el hihodim kTob beinikm bSm hmlk oHtmo bTbet hmlk ki ktb aSr nktb bSm hmlk onHtom bTbet hmlk ain lhSib׃ 
esther 8:9	oiqrao spri hmlk bet hhia bHdS hSliSi hoa HdS sion bSloSh oeSrim bo oiktb kkl aSr zoh mrdki al hihodim oal haHSdrpnim ohpHot oSri hmdinot aSr mhdo oed koS Sbe oeSrim omah mdinh mdinh omdinh kktbh oem oem klSno oal hihodim kktbm oklSonm׃ 
esther 8:10	oiktb bSm hmlk aHSorS oiHtm bTbet hmlk oiSlH sprim bid hrzim bsosim rkbi hrkS haHStrnim bni hrmkim׃ 
esther 8:11	aSr ntn hmlk lihodim aSr bkl eir oeir lhqhl olemd el npSm lhSmid olhrg olabd at kl Hil em omdinh hzrim atm Tp onSim oSllm lboc׃ 
esther 8:12	biom aHd bkl mdinot hmlk aHSoroS bSloSh eSr lHdS Snim eSr hoa HdS adr׃ 
esther 8:13	ptSgn hktb lhntn dt bkl mdinh omdinh gloi lkl hemim olhiot hihodiim etodim liom hch lhnqm maibihm׃ 
esther 8:14	hrzim rkbi hrkS haHStrnim izao mbhlim odHopim bdbr hmlk ohdt ntnh bSoSn hbirh׃ 
esther 8:15	omrdki iza mlpni hmlk blboS mlkot tklt oHor oeTrt chb gdolh otkrik boz oargmn oheir SoSn zhlh oSmHh׃ 
esther 8:16	lihodim hith aorh oSmHh oSSn oiqr׃ 
esther 8:17	obkl mdinh omdinh obkl eir oeir mqom aSr dbr hmlk odto mgie SmHh oSSon lihodim mSth oiom Tob orbim memi harz mtihdim ki npl pHd hihodim elihm׃ 
esther 9:1	obSnim eSr HdS hoa HdS adr bSloSh eSr iom bo aSr hgie dbr hmlk odto lheSot biom aSr Sbro aibi hihodim lSloT bhm onhpok hoa aSr iSlTo hihodim hmh bSnaihm׃ 
esther 9:2	nqhlo hihodim berihm bkl mdinot hmlk aHSoroS lSlH id bmbqSi retm oaiS la emd lpnihm ki npl pHdm el kl hemim׃ 
esther 9:3	okl Sri hmdinot ohaHSdrpnim ohpHot oeSi hmlakh aSr lmlk mnSaim at hihodim ki npl pHd mrdki elihm׃ 
esther 9:4	ki gdol mrdki bbit hmlk oSmeo holk bkl hmdinot ki haiS mrdki holk ogdol׃ 
esther 9:5	oiko hihodim bkl aibihm mkt Hrb ohrg oabdn oieSo bSnaihm krzonm׃ 
esther 9:6	obSoSn hbirh hrgo hihodim oabd HmS maot aiS׃ 
esther 9:7	oat prSndta oat dlpon oat aspta׃ 
esther 9:8	oat porta oat adlia oat aridta׃ 
esther 9:9	oat prmSta oat arisi oat ardi oat oicta׃ 
esther 9:10	eSrt bni hmn bn hmdta zrr hihodim hrgo obbch la SlHo at idm׃ 
esther 9:11	biom hhoa ba mspr hhrogim bSoSn hbirh lpni hmlk׃ 
esther 9:12	oiamr hmlk lastr hmlkh bSoSn hbirh hrgo hihodim oabd HmS maot aiS oat eSrt bni hmn bSar mdinot hmlk mh eSo omh Saltk ointn lk omh bqStk eod oteS׃ 
esther 9:13	otamr astr am el hmlk Tob intn gm mHr lihodim aSr bSoSn leSot kdt hiom oat eSrt bni hmn itlo el hez׃ 
esther 9:14	oiamr hmlk lheSot kn otntn dt bSoSn oat eSrt bni hmn tlo׃ 
esther 9:15	oiqhlo hihodiim aSr bSoSn gm biom arbeh eSr lHdS adr oihrgo bSoSn SlS maot aiS obbch la SlHo at idm׃ 
esther 9:16	oSar hihodim aSr bmdinot hmlk nqhlo oemd el npSm onoH maibihm ohrg bSnaihm HmSh oSbeim alp obbch la SlHo at idm׃ 
esther 9:17	biom SlSh eSr lHdS adr onoH barbeh eSr bo oeSh ato iom mSth oSmHh׃ 
esther 9:18	ohihodiim aSr bSoSn nqhlo bSlSh eSr bo obarbeh eSr bo onoH bHmSh eSr bo oeSh ato iom mSth oSmHh׃ 
esther 9:19	el kn hihodim hprocim hiSbim beri hprcot eSim at iom arbeh eSr lHdS adr SmHh omSth oiom Tob omSloH mnot aiS lreho׃ 
esther 9:20	oiktb mrdki at hdbrim halh oiSlH sprim al kl hihodim aSr bkl mdinot hmlk aHSoroS hqrobim ohrHoqim׃ 
esther 9:21	lqim elihm lhiot eSim at iom arbeh eSr lHdS adr oat iom HmSh eSr bo bkl Snh oSnh׃ 
esther 9:22	kimim aSr nHo bhm hihodim maoibihm ohHdS aSr nhpk lhm migon lSmHh omabl liom Tob leSot aotm imi mSth oSmHh omSloH mnot aiS lreho omtnot labionim׃ 
esther 9:23	oqbl hihodim at aSr hHlo leSot oat aSr ktb mrdki alihm׃ 
esther 9:24	ki hmn bn hmdta haggi zrr kl hihodim HSb el hihodim labdm ohpil por hoa hgorl lhmm olabdm׃ 
esther 9:25	obbah lpni hmlk amr em hspr iSob mHSbto hreh aSr HSb el hihodim el raSo otlo ato oat bnio el hez׃ 
esther 9:26	el kn qrao limim halh porim el Sm hpor el kn el kl dbri hagrt hcat omh rao el kkh omh hgie alihm׃ 
esther 9:27	qimo oqbl hihodim elihm oel crem oel kl hnloim elihm ola iebor lhiot eSim at Sni himim halh kktbm okcmnm bkl Snh oSnh׃ 
esther 9:28	ohimim halh nckrim oneSim bkl dor odor mSpHh omSpHh mdinh omdinh oeir oeir oimi hporim halh la iebro mtok hihodim ockrm la isop mcrem׃ 
esther 9:29	otktb astr hmlkh bt abiHil omrdki hihodi at kl tqp lqim at agrt hporim hcat hSnit׃ 
esther 9:30	oiSlH sprim al kl hihodim al Sbe oeSrim omah mdinh mlkot aHSoroS dbri Slom oamt׃ 
esther 9:31	lqim at imi hprim halh bcmnihm kaSr qim elihm mrdki hihodi oastr hmlkh okaSr qimo el npSm oel crem dbri hzmot oceqtm׃ 
esther 9:32	omamr astr qim dbri hprim halh onktb bspr׃ 
esther 10:1	oiSm hmlk aHSrS ms el harz oaii him׃ 
esther 10:2	okl meSh tqpo ogborto oprSt gdlt mrdki aSr gdlo hmlk hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki mdi oprs׃ 
esther 10:3	ki mrdki hihodi mSnh lmlk aHSoroS ogdol lihodim orzoi lrb aHio drS Tob lemo odbr Slom lkl creo׃ 
daniel 1:1	bSnt SloS lmlkot ihoiqim mlk ihodh ba nbokdnazr mlk bbl iroSlm oizr elih׃ 
daniel 1:2	oitn adni bido at ihoiqim mlk ihodh omqzt kli bit halhim oibiam arz Sner bit alhio oat hklim hbia bit aozr alhio׃ 
daniel 1:3	oiamr hmlk laSpnc rb srisio lhbia mbni iSral omcre hmlokh omn hprtmim׃ 
daniel 1:4	ildim aSr ain bhm kl maom oTobi mrah omSkilim bkl Hkmh oidei det ombini mde oaSr kH bhm lemd bhikl hmlk ollmdm spr olSon kSdim׃ 
daniel 1:5	oimn lhm hmlk dbr iom biomo mpt bg hmlk omiin mStio olgdlm Snim SloS omqztm iemdo lpni hmlk׃ 
daniel 1:6	oihi bhm mbni ihodh dnial Hnnih miSal oecrih׃ 
daniel 1:7	oiSm lhm Sr hsrisim Smot oiSm ldnial blTSazr olHnnih Sdrk olmiSal miSk olecrih ebd ngo׃ 
daniel 1:8	oiSm dnial el lbo aSr la itgal bptbg hmlk obiin mStio oibqS mSr hsrisim aSr la itgal׃ 
daniel 1:9	oitn halhim at dnial lHsd olrHmim lpni Sr hsrisim׃ 
daniel 1:10	oiamr Sr hsrisim ldnial ira ani at adni hmlk aSr mnh at maklkm oat mStikm aSr lmh irah at pnikm cepim mn hildim aSr kgilkm oHibtm at raSi lmlk׃ 
daniel 1:11	oiamr dnial al hmlzr aSr mnh Sr hsrisim el dnial Hnnih miSal oecrih׃ 
daniel 1:12	ns na at ebdik imim eSrh oitno lno mn hcreim onaklh omim onSth׃ 
daniel 1:13	oirao lpnik mraino omrah hildim haklim at ptbg hmlk okaSr trah eSh em ebdik׃ 
daniel 1:14	oiSme lhm ldbr hch oinsm imim eSrh׃ 
daniel 1:15	omqzt imim eSrh nrah mraihm Tob obriai bSr mn kl hildim haklim at ptbg hmlk׃ 
daniel 1:16	oihi hmlzr nSa at ptbgm oiin mStihm ontn lhm crenim׃ 
daniel 1:17	ohildim halh arbetm ntn lhm halhim mde ohSkl bkl spr oHkmh odnial hbin bkl Hcon oHlmot׃ 
daniel 1:18	olmqzt himim aSr amr hmlk lhbiam oibiam Sr hsrisim lpni nbkdnzr׃ 
daniel 1:19	oidbr atm hmlk ola nmza mklm kdnial Hnnih miSal oecrih oiemdo lpni hmlk׃ 
daniel 1:20	okl dbr Hkmt binh aSr bqS mhm hmlk oimzam eSr idot el kl hHrTmim haSpim aSr bkl mlkoto׃ 
daniel 1:21	oihi dnial ed Snt aHt lkorS hmlk׃ 
daniel 2:1	obSnt Stim lmlkot nbkdnzr Hlm nbkdnzr Hlmot ottpem roHo oSnto nhith elio׃ 
daniel 2:2	oiamr hmlk lqra lHrTmim olaSpim olmkSpim olkSdim lhgid lmlk Hlmtio oibao oiemdo lpni hmlk׃ 
daniel 2:3	oiamr lhm hmlk Hlom Hlmti otpem roHi ldet at hHlom׃ 
daniel 2:4	oidbro hkSdim lmlk armit mlka lelmin Hii amr Hlma lebdik opSra nHoa׃ 
daniel 2:5	enh mlka oamr lkSdia mlta mni acda hn la thodeonni Hlma opSrh hdmin ttebdon obtikon noli itSmon׃ 
daniel 2:6	ohn Hlma opSrh thHon mtnn onbcbh oiqr Sgia tqblon mn qdmi lhn Hlma opSrh hHoni׃ 
daniel 2:7	eno tninot oamrin mlka Hlma iamr lebdohi opSrh nhHoh׃ 
daniel 2:8	enh mlka oamr mn izib ide anh di edna anton cbnin kl qbl di Hciton di acda mni mlta׃ 
daniel 2:9	di hn Hlma la thodenni Hdh hia dtkon omlh kdbh oSHith hcmnton lmamr qdmi ed di edna iStna lhn Hlma amro li oande di pSrh thHonni׃ 
daniel 2:10	eno kSdia qdm mlka oamrin la aiti anS el ibSta di mlt mlka iokl lhHoih kl qbl di kl mlk rb oSliT mlh kdnh la Sal lkl HrTm oaSp okSdi׃ 
daniel 2:11	omlta di mlkh Sal iqirh oaHrn la aiti di iHonh qdm mlka lhn alhin di mdrhon em bSra la aitohi׃ 
daniel 2:12	kl qbl dnh mlka bns oqzp Sgia oamr lhobdh lkl Hkimi bbl׃ 
daniel 2:13	odta npqt oHkimia mtqTlin obeo dnial oHbrohi lhtqTlh׃ 
daniel 2:14	badin dnial htib eTa oTem lariok rb TbHia di mlka di npq lqTlh lHkimi bbl׃ 
daniel 2:15	enh oamr lariok SliTa di mlka el mh dta mhHzph mn qdm mlka adin mlta hode ariok ldnial׃ 
daniel 2:16	odnial el obeh mn mlka di cmn intn lh opSra lhHoih lmlka׃ 
daniel 2:17	adin dnial lbith acl olHnnih miSal oecrih Hbrohi mlta hode׃ 
daniel 2:18	orHmin lmbea mn qdm alh Smia el rch dnh di la ihbdon dnial oHbrohi em Sar Hkimi bbl׃ 
daniel 2:19	adin ldnial bHcoa di lilia rch gli adin dnial brk lalh Smia׃ 
daniel 2:20	enh dnial oamr lhoa Smh di alha mbrk mn elma oed elma di Hkmta ogborta di lh hia׃ 
daniel 2:21	ohoa mhSna ednia ocmnia mhedh mlkin omhqim mlkin ihb Hkmta lHkimin omndea lidei binh׃ 
daniel 2:22	hoa gla emiqta omstrta ide mh bHSoka onhira emh Sra׃ 
daniel 2:23	lk alh abhti mhoda omSbH anh di Hkmta ogborta ihbt li oken hodetni di beina mnk di mlt mlka hodetna׃ 
daniel 2:24	kl qbl dnh dnial el el ariok di mni mlka lhobdh lHkimi bbl acl okn amr lh lHkimi bbl al thobd helni qdm mlka opSra lmlka aHoa׃ 
daniel 2:25	adin ariok bhtbhlh hnel ldnial qdm mlka okn amr lh di hSkHt gbr mn bni glota di ihod di pSra lmlka ihode׃ 
daniel 2:26	enh mlka oamr ldnial di Smh blTSazr haitik khl lhodetni Hlma di Hcit opSrh׃ 
daniel 2:27	enh dnial qdm mlka oamr rch di mlka Sal la Hkimin aSpin HrTmin gcrin iklin lhHoih lmlka׃ 
daniel 2:28	brm aiti alh bSmia gla rcin ohode lmlka nbokdnzr mh di lhoa baHrit iomia Hlmk oHcoi raSk el mSkbk dnh hoa׃ 
daniel 2:29	anth mlka reionk el mSkbk slqo mh di lhoa aHri dnh ogla rcia hodek mh di lhoa׃ 
daniel 2:30	oanh la bHkmh di aiti bi mn kl Hiia rca dnh gli li lhn el dbrt di pSra lmlka ihodeon oreioni lbbk tnde׃ 
daniel 2:31	anth mlka Hch hoit oalo zlm Hd Sgia zlma dkn rb ocioh itir qam lqblk oroh dHil׃ 
daniel 2:32	hoa zlma raSh di dhb Tb Hdohi odreohi di ksp meohi oirkth di nHS׃ 
daniel 2:33	Sqohi di prcl rglohi mnhon di prcl omnhon di Hsp׃ 
daniel 2:34	Hch hoit ed di htgcrt abn di la bidin omHt lzlma el rglohi di prcla oHspa ohdqt hmon׃ 
daniel 2:35	badin dqo kHdh prcla Hspa nHSa kspa odhba ohoo keor mn adri qiT onSa hmon roHa okl atr la hStkH lhon oabna di mHt lzlma hot lTor rb omlt kl area׃ 
daniel 2:36	dnh Hlma opSrh namr qdm mlka׃ 
daniel 2:37	anth mlka mlk mlkia di alh Smia mlkota Hsna otqpa oiqra ihb lk׃ 
daniel 2:38	obkl di darin bni anSa Hiot bra oeop Smia ihb bidk ohSlTk bklhon anth hoa raSh di dhba׃ 
daniel 2:39	obtrk tqom mlko aHri area mnk omlko tlitia aHri di nHSa di tSlT bkl area׃ 
daniel 2:40	omlko rbieih thoa tqiph kprcla kl qbl di prcla mhdq oHSl kla okprcla di mree kl alin tdq otre׃ 
daniel 2:41	odi Hcith rglia oazbeta mnhon Hsp di pHr omnhon prcl mlko pligh thoh omn nzbta di prcla lhoa bh kl qbl di Hcith prcla merb bHsp Tina׃ 
daniel 2:42	oazbet rglia mnhon prcl omnhon Hsp mn qzt mlkota thoh tqiph omnh thoh tbirh׃ 
daniel 2:43	di Hcit prcla merb bHsp Tina mterbin lhon bcre anSa ola lhon dbqin dnh em dnh ha kdi prcla la mterb em Hspa׃ 
daniel 2:44	obiomihon di mlkia anon iqim alh Smia mlko di lelmin la ttHbl omlkoth lem aHrn la tStbq tdq otsip kl alin mlkota ohia tqom lelmia׃ 
daniel 2:45	kl qbl di Hcit di mTora atgcrt abn di la bidin ohdqt prcla nHSa Hspa kspa odhba alh rb hode lmlka mh di lhoa aHri dnh oizib Hlma omhimn pSrh׃ 
daniel 2:46	badin mlka nbokdnzr npl el anpohi oldnial sgd omnHh oniHHin amr lnskh lh׃ 
daniel 2:47	enh mlka ldnial oamr mn qST di alhkon hoa alh alhin omra mlkin oglh rcin di iklt lmgla rch dnh׃ 
daniel 2:48	adin mlka ldnial rbi omtnn rbrbn Sgian ihb lh ohSlTh el kl mdint bbl orb sgnin el kl Hkimi bbl׃ 
daniel 2:49	odnial bea mn mlka omni el ebidta di mdint bbl lSdrk miSk oebd ngo odnial btre mlka׃ 
daniel 3:1	nbokdnzr mlka ebd zlm di dhb romh amin Stin ptih amin St aqimh bbqet dora bmdint bbl׃ 
daniel 3:2	onbokdnzr mlka SlH lmknS laHSdrpnia sgnia opHota adrgcria gdbria dtbria tptia okl SlTni mdinta lmta lHnkt zlma di hqim nbokdnzr mlka׃ 
daniel 3:3	badin mtknSin aHSdrpnia sgnia opHota adrgcria gdbria dtbria tptia okl SlTni mdinta lHnkt zlma di hqim nbokdnzr mlka oqamin lqbl zlma di hqim nbokdnzr׃ 
daniel 3:4	okroca qra bHil lkon amrin emmia amia olSnia׃ 
daniel 3:5	bedna di tSmeon ql qrna mSroqita qitrs sbka psntrin sompnih okl cni cmra tplon otsgdon lzlm dhba di hqim nbokdnzr mlka׃ 
daniel 3:6	omn di la ipl oisgd bh Seta itrma lgoa aton nora iqdta׃ 
daniel 3:7	kl qbl dnh bh cmna kdi Smein kl emmia ql qrna mSroqita qitrs Sbka psnTrin okl cni cmra nplin kl emmia amia olSnia sgdin lzlm dhba di hqim nbokdnzr mlka׃ 
daniel 3:8	kl qbl dnh bh cmna qrbo gbrin kSdain oaklo qrzihon di ihodia׃ 
daniel 3:9	eno oamrin lnbokdnzr mlka mlka lelmin Hii׃ 
daniel 3:10	anth mlka Smt Tem di kl anS di iSme ql qrna mSrqita qitrs Sbka psntrin osipnih okl cni cmra ipl oisgd lzlm dhba׃ 
daniel 3:11	omn di la ipl oisgd itrma lgoa aton nora iqdta׃ 
daniel 3:12	aiti gbrin ihodain di mnit ithon el ebidt mdint bbl Sdrk miSk oebd ngo gbria alk la Smo elik mlka Tem lalhik la plHin olzlm dhba di hqimt la sgdin׃ 
daniel 3:13	badin nbokdnzr brgc oHmh amr lhitih lSdrk miSk oebd ngo badin gbria alk hitio qdm mlka׃ 
daniel 3:14	enh nbkdnzr oamr lhon hzda Sdrk miSk oebd ngo lalhi la aitikon plHin olzlm dhba di hqimt la sgdin׃ 
daniel 3:15	ken hn aitikon etidin di bedna di tSmeon ql qrna mSroqita qitrs Sbka psntrin osompnih okl cni cmra tplon otsgdon lzlma di ebdt ohn la tsgdon bh Seth ttrmon lgoa aton nora iqdta omn hoa alh di iSicbnkon mn idi׃ 
daniel 3:16	eno Sdrk miSk oebd ngo oamrin lmlka nbokdnzr la HSHin anHnh el dnh ptgm lhtbotk׃ 
daniel 3:17	hn aiti alhna di anHna plHin ikl lSicbotna mn aton nora iqdta omn idk mlka iSicb׃ 
daniel 3:18	ohn la idie lhoa lk mlka di lalhik la aitna plHin olzlm dhba di hqimt la nsgd׃ 
daniel 3:19	badin nbokdnzr htmli Hma ozlm anpohi aStno el Sdrk miSk oebd ngo enh oamr lmca latona Hd Sbeh el di Hch lmcih׃ 
daniel 3:20	olgbrin gbri Hil di bHilh amr lkpth lSdrk miSk oebd ngo lmrma laton nora iqdta׃ 
daniel 3:21	badin gbria alk kpto bsrblihon pTiSihon okrblthon olbSihon ormio lgoa aton nora iqdta׃ 
daniel 3:22	kl qbl dnh mn di mlt mlka mHzph oatona ach itira gbria alk di hsqo lSdrk miSk oebd ngo qTl hmon Sbiba di nora׃ 
daniel 3:23	ogbria alk tlthon Sdrk miSk oebd ngo nplo lgoa aton nora iqdta mkptin׃ 
daniel 3:24	adin nbokdnzr mlka toh oqm bhtbhlh enh oamr lhdbrohi hla gbrin tlta rmina lgoa nora mkptin enin oamrin lmlka iziba mlka׃ 
daniel 3:25	enh oamr ha anh Hch gbrin arbeh Srin mhlkin bgoa nora oHbl la aiti bhon oroh di rbieia dmh lbr alhin׃ 
daniel 3:26	badin qrb nbokdnzr ltre aton nora iqdta enh oamr Sdrk miSk oebd ngo ebdohi di alha elia pqo oato badin npqin Sdrk miSk oebd ngo mn goa nora׃ 
daniel 3:27	omtknSin aHSdrpnia sgnia opHota ohdbri mlka Hcin lgbria alk di la SlT nora bgSmhon oSer raShon la htHrk osrblihon la Sno oriH nor la edt bhon׃ 
daniel 3:28	enh nbokdnzr oamr brik alhhon di Sdrk miSk oebd ngo di SlH mlakh oSicb lebdohi di htrHzo elohi omlt mlka Snio oihbo gSmihon di la iplHon ola isgdon lkl alh lhn lalhhon׃ 
daniel 3:29	omni Sim Tem di kl em amh olSn di iamr Slh el alhhon di Sdrk miSk oebd ngoa hdmin itebd obith noli iStoh kl qbl di la aiti alh aHrn di ikl lhzlh kdnh׃ 
daniel 3:30	badin mlka hzlH lSdrk miSk oebd ngo bmdint bbl׃ 
daniel 4:1	nbokdnzr mlka lkl emmia amia olSnia di darin bkl area Slmkon iSga׃ 
daniel 4:2	atia otmhia di ebd emi alha elia Spr qdmi lhHoih׃ 
daniel 4:3	atohi kmh rbrbin otmhohi kmh tqipin mlkoth mlkot elm oSlTnh em dr odr׃ 
daniel 4:4	anh nbokdnzr Slh hoit bbiti orenn bhikli׃ 
daniel 4:5	Hlm Hcit oidHlnni ohrhrin el mSkbi oHcoi raSi ibhlnni׃ 
daniel 4:6	omni Sim Tem lhnelh qdmi lkl Hkimi bbl di pSr Hlma ihodenni׃ 
daniel 4:7	badin ellin HrTmia aSpia kSdia ogcria oHlma amr anh qdmihon opSrh la mhodein li׃ 
daniel 4:8	oed aHrin el qdmi dnial di Smh blTSazr kSm alhi odi roH alhin qdiSin bh oHlma qdmohi amrt׃ 
daniel 4:9	blTSazr rb HrTmia di anh idet di roH alhin qdiSin bk okl rc la ans lk Hcoi Hlmi di Hcit opSrh amr׃ 
daniel 4:10	oHcoi raSi el mSkbi Hch hoit oalo ailn bgoa area oromh Sgia׃ 
daniel 4:11	rbh ailna otqp oromh imTa lSmia oHcoth lsop kl area׃ 
daniel 4:12	epih Spir oanbh Sgia omcon lkla bh tHtohi tTll Hiot bra obenpohi idron zpri Smia omnh itcin kl bSra׃ 
daniel 4:13	Hch hoit bHcoi raSi el mSkbi oalo eir oqdiS mn Smia nHt׃ 
daniel 4:14	qra bHil okn amr gdo ailna oqzzo enpohi atro epih obdro anbh tnd Hiota mn tHtohi ozpria mn enpohi׃ 
daniel 4:15	brm eqr SrSohi barea Sbqo obasor di prcl onHS bdtaa di bra obTl Smia izTbe oem Hiota Hlqh beSb area׃ 
daniel 4:16	lbbh mn anoSa iSnon olbb Hioh itihb lh oSbeh ednin iHlpon elohi׃ 
daniel 4:17	bgcrt eirin ptgma omamr qdiSin Salta ed dbrt di indeon Hiia di SliT elia bmlkot anoSa olmn di izba itnnh oSpl anSim iqim elih׃ 
daniel 4:18	dnh Hlma Hcit anh mlka nbokdnzr oanth blTSazr pSra amr kl qbl di kl Hkimi mlkoti la iklin pSra lhodetni oanth khl di roH alhin qdiSin bk׃ 
daniel 4:19	adin dnial di Smh blTSazr aStomm kSeh Hdh oreinhi ibhlnh enh mlka oamr blTSazr Hlma opSra al ibhlk enh blTSazr oamr mrai Hlma lSnaik opSrh lerik׃ 
daniel 4:20	ailna di Hcit di rbh otqp oromh imTa lSmia oHcoth lkl area׃ 
daniel 4:21	oepih Spir oanbh Sgia omcon lkla bh tHtohi tdor Hiot bra obenpohi iSknn zpri Smia׃ 
daniel 4:22	anth hoa mlka di rbit otqpt orbotk rbt omTt lSmia oSlTnk lsop area׃ 
daniel 4:23	odi Hch mlka eir oqdiS nHt mn Smia oamr gdo ailna oHblohi brm eqr SrSohi barea Sbqo obasor di prcl onHS bdtaa di bra obTl Smia izTbe oem Hiot bra Hlqh ed di Sbeh ednin iHlpon elohi׃ 
daniel 4:24	dnh pSra mlka ogcrt elia hia di mTt el mrai mlka׃ 
daniel 4:25	olk Trdin mn anSa oem Hiot bra lhoh mdrk oeSba ktorin lk iTemon omTl Smia lk mzbein oSbeh ednin iHlpon elik ed di tnde di SliT elia bmlkot anSa olmn di izba itnnh׃ 
daniel 4:26	odi amro lmSbq eqr SrSohi di ailna mlkotk lk qimh mn di tnde di SlTn Smia׃ 
daniel 4:27	lhn mlka mlki iSpr elik oHTik bzdqh prq oeoitk bmHn enin hn thoa arkh lSlotk׃ 
daniel 4:28	kla mTa el nbokdnzr mlka׃ 
daniel 4:29	lqzt irHin tri eSr el hikl mlkota di bbl mhlk hoh׃ 
daniel 4:30	enh mlka oamr hla da hia bbl rbta di anh bnith lbit mlko btqp Hsni oliqr hdri׃ 
daniel 4:31	eod mlta bpm mlka ql mn Smia npl lk amrin nbokdnzr mlka mlkoth edt mnk׃ 
daniel 4:32	omn anSa lk Trdin oem Hiot bra mdrk eSba ktorin lk iTemon oSbeh ednin iHlpon elik ed di tnde di SliT elia bmlkot anSa olmn di izba itnnh׃ 
daniel 4:33	bh Seta mlta spt el nbokdnzr omn anSa Trid oeSba ktorin iakl omTl Smia gSmh izTbe ed di Serh knSrin rbh oTprohi kzprin׃ 
daniel 4:34	olqzt iomih anh nbokdnzr eini lSmia nTlt omndei eli itob olelia brkt olHi elma SbHt ohdrt di SlTnh SlTn elm omlkoth em dr odr׃ 
daniel 4:35	okl dari area klh HSibin okmzbih ebd bHil Smia odari area ola aiti di imHa bidh oiamr lh mh ebdt׃ 
daniel 4:36	bh cmna mndei itob eli oliqr mlkoti hdri ocoi itob eli oli hdbri orbrbni ibeon oel mlkoti htqnt orbo itirh hospt li׃ 
daniel 4:37	ken anh nbokdnzr mSbH omromm omhdr lmlk Smia di kl mebdohi qST oarHth din odi mhlkin bgoh ikl lhSplh׃ 
daniel 5:1	blSazr mlka ebd lHm rb lrbrbnohi alp olqbl alpa Hmra Sth׃ 
daniel 5:2	blSazr amr bTem Hmra lhitih lmani dhba okspa di hnpq nbokdnzr abohi mn hikla di biroSlm oiSton bhon mlka orbrbnohi Sglth olHnth׃ 
daniel 5:3	badin hitio mani dhba di hnpqo mn hikla di bit alha di biroSlm oaStio bhon mlka orbrbnohi Sglth olHnth׃ 
daniel 5:4	aStio Hmra oSbHo lalhi dhba okspa nHSa prcla aea oabna׃ 
daniel 5:5	bh Seth npqo azben di id anS oktbn lqbl nbrSta el gira di ktl hikla di mlka omlka Hch ps idh di ktbh׃ 
daniel 5:6	adin mlka ciohi Snohi oreinhi ibhlonh oqTri Hrzh mStrin oarkbth da lda nqSn׃ 
daniel 5:7	qra mlka bHil lhelh laSpia kSdia ogcria enh mlka oamr lHkimi bbl di kl anS di iqrh ktbh dnh opSrh iHonni argona ilbS ohmonka di dhba el zoarh otlti bmlkota iSlT׃ 
daniel 5:8	adin ellin kl Hkimi mlka ola khlin ktba lmqra opSra lhodeh lmlka׃ 
daniel 5:9	adin mlka blSazr Sgia mtbhl ociohi Snin elohi orbrbnohi mStbSin׃ 
daniel 5:10	mlkta lqbl mli mlka orbrbnohi lbit mStia ellt ent mlkta oamrt mlka lelmin Hii al ibhlok reionk ocioik al iStno׃ 
daniel 5:11	aiti gbr bmlkotk di roH alhin qdiSin bh obiomi abok nhiro oSkltno oHkmh kHkmt alhin hStkHt bh omlka nbkdnzr abok rb HrTmin aSpin kSdain gcrin hqimh abok mlka׃ 
daniel 5:12	kl qbl di roH itirh omnde oSkltno mpSr Hlmin oaHoit aHidn omSra qTrin hStkHt bh bdnial di mlka Sm Smh blTSazr ken dnial itqri opSrh ihHoh׃ 
daniel 5:13	badin dnial hel qdm mlka enh mlka oamr ldnial anth hoa dnial di mn bni glota di ihod di hiti mlka abi mn ihod׃ 
daniel 5:14	oSmet elik di roH alhin bk onhiro oSkltno oHkmh itirh hStkHt bk׃ 
daniel 5:15	oken helo qdmi Hkimia aSpia di ktbh dnh iqron opSrh lhodetni ola khlin pSr mlta lhHoih׃ 
daniel 5:16	oanh Smet elik di tokl pSrin lmpSr oqTrin lmSra ken hn tokl ktba lmqra opSrh lhodetni argona tlbS ohmonka di dhba el zoark otlta bmlkota tSlT׃ 
daniel 5:17	badin enh dnial oamr qdm mlka mtntk lk lhoin onbcbitk laHrn hb brm ktba aqra lmlka opSra ahodenh׃ 
daniel 5:18	anth mlka alha elia mlkota orbota oiqra ohdrh ihb lnbkdnzr abok׃ 
daniel 5:19	omn rbota di ihb lh kl emmia amia olSnia hoo caein odHlin mn qdmohi di hoh zba hoa qTl odi hoh zba hoh mHa odi hoh zba hoh mrim odi hoh zba hoh mSpil׃ 
daniel 5:20	okdi rm lbbh oroHh tqpt lhcdh hnHt mn krsa mlkoth oiqrh hedio mnh׃ 
daniel 5:21	omn bni anSa Trid olbbh em Hiota Soi oem erdia mdorh eSba ktorin iTemonh omTl Smia gSmh izTbe ed di ide di SliT alha elia bmlkot anSa olmn di izbh ihqim elih׃ 
daniel 5:22	oanth brh blSazr la hSplt lbbk kl qbl di kl dnh idet׃ 
daniel 5:23	oel mra Smia htrommt olmania di bith hitio qdmik oanth orbrbnik Sgltk olHntk Hmra Stin bhon olalhi kspa odhba nHSa prcla aea oabna di la Hcin ola Smein ola idein SbHt olalha di nSmtk bidh okl arHtk lh la hdrt׃ 
daniel 5:24	badin mn qdmohi SliH psa di ida oktba dnh rSim׃ 
daniel 5:25	odnh ktba di rSim mna mna tql oprsin׃ 
daniel 5:26	dnh pSr mlta mna mnh alha mlkotk ohSlmh׃ 
daniel 5:27	tql tqilth bmacnia ohStkHt Hsir׃ 
daniel 5:28	prs prist mlkotk oihibt lmdi oprs׃ 
daniel 5:29	badin amr blSazr ohlbiSo ldnial argona ohmonka di dhba el zoarh ohkrco elohi di lhoa SliT tlta bmlkota׃ 
daniel 5:30	bh blilia qTil blaSzr mlka kSdia׃ 
daniel 5:31	odrioS mdia qbl mlkota kbr Snin Stin otrtin׃ 
daniel 6:1	Spr qdm drioS ohqim el mlkota laHSdrpnia mah oeSrin di lhon bkl mlkota׃ 
daniel 6:2	oela mnhon srkin tlta di dnial Hd mnhon di lhon aHSdrpnia alin ihbin lhon Tema omlka la lhoa ncq׃ 
daniel 6:3	adin dnial dnh hoa mtnzH el srkia oaHSdrpnia kl qbl di roH itira bh omlka eSit lhqmoth el kl mlkota׃ 
daniel 6:4	adin srkia oaHSdrpnia hoo bein elh lhSkHh ldnial mzd mlkota okl elh oSHith la iklin lhSkHh kl qbl di mhimn hoa okl Slo oSHith la hStkHt elohi׃ 
daniel 6:5	adin gbria alk amrin di la nhSkH ldnial dnh kl ela lhn hSkHnh elohi bdt alhh׃ 
daniel 6:6	adin srkia oaHSdrpnia aln hrgSo el mlka okn amrin lh drioS mlka lelmin Hii׃ 
daniel 6:7	atieTo kl srki mlkota sgnia oaHSdrpnia hdbria opHota lqimh qim mlka oltqph asr di kl di ibeh beo mn kl alh oanS ed iomin tltin lhn mnk mlka itrma lgb ariota׃ 
daniel 6:8	ken mlka tqim asra otrSm ktba di la lhSnih kdt mdi oprs di la teda׃ 
daniel 6:9	kl qbl dnh mlka drioS rSm ktba oasra׃ 
daniel 6:10	odnial kdi ide di rSim ktba el lbith okoin ptiHn lh belith ngd iroSlm ocmnin tlth bioma hoa brk el brkohi omzla omoda qdm alhh kl qbl di hoa ebd mn qdmt dnh׃ 
daniel 6:11	adin gbria alk hrgSo ohSkHo ldnial bea omtHnn qdm alhh׃ 
daniel 6:12	badin qribo oamrin qdm mlka el asr mlka hla asr rSmt di kl anS di ibeh mn kl alh oanS ed iomin tltin lhn mnk mlka itrma lgob ariota enh mlka oamr iziba mlta kdt mdi oprs di la teda׃ 
daniel 6:13	badin eno oamrin qdm mlka di dnial di mn bni glota di ihod la Sm elik mlka Tem oel asra di rSmt ocmnin tlth bioma bea beoth׃ 
daniel 6:14	adin mlka kdi mlta Sme Sgia baS elohi oel dnial Sm bl lSicboth oed meli SmSa hoa mStdr lhzloth׃ 
daniel 6:15	badin gbria alk hrgSo el mlka oamrin lmlka de mlka di dt lmdi oprs di kl asr oqim di mlka ihqim la lhSnih׃ 
daniel 6:16	badin mlka amr ohitio ldnial ormo lgba di ariota enh mlka oamr ldnial alhk di anth plH lh btdira hoa iSicbnk׃ 
daniel 6:17	ohitit abn Hdh oSmt el pm gba oHtmh mlka becqth obecqt rbrbnohi di la tSna zbo bdnial׃ 
daniel 6:18	adin acl mlka lhiklh obt Tot odHon la hnel qdmohi oSnth ndt elohi׃ 
daniel 6:19	badin mlka bSprpra iqom bngha obhtbhlh lgba di ariota acl׃ 
daniel 6:20	okmqrbh lgba ldnial bql ezib ceq enh mlka oamr ldnial dnial ebd alha Hia alhk di anth plH lh btdira hikl lSicbotk mn ariota׃ 
daniel 6:21	adin dnial em mlka mll mlka lelmin Hii׃ 
daniel 6:22	alhi SlH mlakh osgr pm ariota ola Hbloni kl qbl di qdmohi cko hStkHt li oap qdmik mlka Hbolh la ebdt׃ 
daniel 6:23	badin mlka Sgia Tab elohi oldnial amr lhnsqh mn gba ohsq dnial mn gba okl Hbl la hStkH bh di himn balhh׃ 
daniel 6:24	oamr mlka ohitio gbria alk di aklo qrzohi di dnial olgb ariota rmo anon bnihon onSihon ola mTo lareit gba ed di SlTo bhon ariota okl grmihon hdqo׃ 
daniel 6:25	badin drioS mlka ktb lkl emmia amia olSnia di darin bkl area Slmkon iSga׃ 
daniel 6:26	mn qdmi Sim Tem di bkl SlTn mlkoti lhon caein odHlin mn qdm alhh di dnial di hoa alha Hia oqim lelmin omlkoth di la ttHbl oSlTnh ed sopa׃ 
daniel 6:27	mSicb omzl oebd atin otmhin bSmia obarea di Sicib ldnial mn id ariota׃ 
daniel 6:28	odnial dnh hzlH bmlkot drioS obmlkot korS prsia׃ 
daniel 7:1	bSnt Hdh lblaSzr mlk bbl dnial Hlm Hch oHcoi raSh el mSkbh badin Hlma ktb raS mlin amr׃ 
daniel 7:2	enh dnial oamr Hch hoit bHcoi em lilia oaro arbe roHi Smia mgiHn lima rba׃ 
daniel 7:3	oarbe Hion rbrbn slqn mn ima Snin da mn da׃ 
daniel 7:4	qdmita karih ogpin di nSr lh Hch hoit ed di mriTo gpih onTilt mn area oel rglin kanS hqimt olbb anS ihib lh׃ 
daniel 7:5	oaro Hioh aHri tninh dmih ldb olSTr Hd hqmt otlt elein bpmh bin Snih okn amrin lh qomi akli bSr Sgia׃ 
daniel 7:6	batr dnh Hch hoit oaro aHri knmr olh gpin arbe di eop el gbih oarbeh raSin lHiota oSlTn ihib lh׃ 
daniel 7:7	batr dnh Hch hoit bHcoi lilia oaro Hioh rbieih dHilh oaimtni otqipa itira oSnin di prcl lh rbrbn aklh omdqh oSara brglih rpsh ohia mSnih mn kl Hiota di qdmih oqrnin eSr lh׃ 
daniel 7:8	mStkl hoit bqrnia oalo qrn aHri ceirh slqt binihon otlt mn qrnia qdmita ateqro mn qdmih oalo einin keini anSa bqrna da opm mmll rbrbn׃ 
daniel 7:9	Hch hoit ed di krson rmio oetiq iomin itb lboSh ktlg Hor oSer raSh kemr nqa krsih Sbibin di nor glglohi nor dlq׃ 
daniel 7:10	nhr di nor ngd onpq mn qdmohi alp alpim iSmSonh orbo rbon qdmohi iqomon dina itb osprin ptiHo׃ 
daniel 7:11	Hch hoit badin mn ql mlia rbrbta di qrna mmllh Hch hoit ed di qTilt Hiota ohobd gSmh oihibt liqdt aSa׃ 
daniel 7:12	oSar Hiota hedio SlTnhon oarkh bHiin ihibt lhon ed cmn oedn׃ 
daniel 7:13	Hch hoit bHcoi lilia oaro em enni Smia kbr anS ath hoh oed etiq iomia mTh oqdmohi hqrbohi׃ 
daniel 7:14	olh ihib SlTn oiqr omlko okl emmia amia olSnia lh iplHon SlTnh SlTn elm di la iedh omlkoth di la ttHbl׃ 
daniel 7:15	atkrit roHi anh dnial bgoa ndnh oHcoi raSi ibhlnni׃ 
daniel 7:16	qrbt el Hd mn qamia oiziba abea mnh el kl dnh oamr li opSr mlia ihodenni׃ 
daniel 7:17	alin Hiota rbrbta di anin arbe arbeh mlkin iqomon mn area׃ 
daniel 7:18	oiqblon mlkota qdiSi elionin oiHsnon mlkota ed elma oed elm elmia׃ 
daniel 7:19	adin zbit lizba el Hiota rbieita di hot Snih mn klhon dHilh itirh Snih di prcl oTprih di nHS aklh mdqh oSara brglih rpsh׃ 
daniel 7:20	oel qrnia eSr di braSh oaHri di slqt onplo mn qdmih tlt oqrna dkn oeinin lh opm mmll rbrbn oHcoh rb mn Hbrth׃ 
daniel 7:21	Hch hoit oqrna dkn ebdh qrb em qdiSin oiklh lhon׃ 
daniel 7:22	ed di ath etiq iomia odina ihb lqdiSi elionin ocmna mTh omlkota hHsno qdiSin׃ 
daniel 7:23	kn amr Hiota rbieita mlko rbieia thoa barea di tSna mn kl mlkota otakl kl area otdoSnh otdqnh׃ 
daniel 7:24	oqrnia eSr mnh mlkoth eSrh mlkin iqmon oaHrn iqom aHrihon ohoa iSna mn qdmia otlth mlkin ihSpl׃ 
daniel 7:25	omlin lzd elia imll olqdiSi elionin ibla oisbr lhSnih cmnin odt oitihbon bidh ed edn oednin oplg edn׃ 
daniel 7:26	odina itb oSlTnh ihedon lhSmdh olhobdh ed sopa׃ 
daniel 7:27	omlkoth oSlTna orbota di mlkot tHot kl Smia ihibt lem qdiSi elionin mlkoth mlkot elm okl SlTnia lh iplHon oiStmeon׃ 
daniel 7:28	ed kh sopa di mlta anh dnial Sgia reioni ibhlnni ocioi iStnon eli omlta blbi nTrt׃

daniel 8:2	oarah bHcon oihi brati oani bSoSn hbirh aSr beilm hmdinh oarah bHcon oani hiiti el aobl aoli׃ 
daniel 8:3	oaSa eini oarah ohnh ail aHd emd lpni habl olo qrnim ohqrnim gbhot ohaHt gbhh mn hSnit ohgbhh elh baHrnh׃ 
daniel 8:4	raiti at hail mngH imh ozponh ongbh okl Hiot la iemdo lpnio oain mzil mido oeSh krzno ohgdil׃ 
daniel 8:5	oani hiiti mbin ohnh zpir hecim ba mn hmerb el pni kl harz oain noge barz ohzpir qrn Hcot bin einio׃ 
daniel 8:6	oiba ed hail bel hqrnim aSr raiti emd lpni habl oirz alio bHmt kHo׃ 
daniel 8:7	oraitio mgie azl hail oitmrmr alio oik at hail oiSbr at Sti qrnio ola hih kH bail lemd lpnio oiSlikho arzh oirmsho ola hih mzil lail mido׃ 
daniel 8:8	ozpir hecim hgdil ed mad okezmo nSbrh hqrn hgdolh otelnh Hcot arbe tHtih larbe roHot hSmim׃ 
daniel 8:9	omn haHt mhm iza qrn aHt mzeirh otgdl itr al hngb oal hmcrH oal hzbi׃ 
daniel 8:10	otgdl ed zba hSmim otpl arzh mn hzba omn hkokbim otrmsm׃ 
daniel 8:11	oed Sr hzba hgdil ommno hrim htmid ohSlk mkon mqdSo׃ 
daniel 8:12	ozba tntn el htmid bpSe otSlk amt arzh oeSth ohzliHh׃ 
daniel 8:13	oaSmeh aHd qdoS mdbr oiamr aHd qdoS lplmoni hmdbr ed mti hHcon htmid ohpSe Smm tt oqdS ozba mrms׃ 
daniel 8:14	oiamr ali ed erb bqr alpim oSlS maot onzdq qdS׃ 
daniel 8:15	oihi brati ani dnial at hHcon oabqSh binh ohnh emd lngdi kmrah gbr׃ 
daniel 8:16	oaSme qol adm bin aoli oiqra oiamr gbrial hbn lhlc at hmrah׃ 
daniel 8:17	oiba azl emdi obbao nbeti oaplh el pni oiamr ali hbn bn adm ki let qz hHcon׃ 
daniel 8:18	obdbro emi nrdmti el pni arzh oige bi oiemidni el emdi׃ 
daniel 8:19	oiamr hnni modiek at aSr ihih baHrit hcem ki lmoed qz׃ 
daniel 8:20	hail aSr rait bel hqrnim mlki mdi oprs׃ 
daniel 8:21	ohzpir hSeir mlk ion ohqrn hgdolh aSr bin einio hoa hmlk hraSon׃ 
daniel 8:22	ohnSbrt otemdnh arbe tHtih arbe mlkiot mgoi iemdnh ola bkHo׃ 
daniel 8:23	obaHrit mlkotm khtm hpSeim iemd mlk ec pnim ombin Hidot׃

daniel 9:2	bSnt aHt lmlko ani dnial binti bsprim mspr hSnim aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmih hnbia lmlaot lHrbot iroSlm Sbeim Snh׃ 
daniel 9:3	oatnh at pni al adni halhim lbqS tplh otHnonim bzom oSq oapr׃ 
daniel 9:4	oatpllh lihoh alhi oatodh oamrh ana adni hal hgdol ohnora Smr hbrit ohHsd lahbio olSmri mzotio׃ 
daniel 9:5	HTano oeoino ohrSeno omrdno osor mmzotk ommSpTik׃ 
daniel 9:6	ola Smeno al ebdik hnbiaim aSr dbro bSmk al mlkino Srino oabtino oal kl em harz׃ 
daniel 9:7	lk adni hzdqh olno bSt hpnim kiom hch laiS ihodh olioSbi iroSlm olkl iSral hqrbim ohrHqim bkl harzot aSr hdHtm Sm bmelm aSr melo bk׃ 
daniel 9:8	ihoh lno bSt hpnim lmlkino lSrino olabtino aSr HTano lk׃ 
daniel 9:9	ladni alhino hrHmim ohslHot ki mrdno bo׃ 
daniel 9:10	ola Smeno bqol ihoh alhino llkt btortio aSr ntn lpnino bid ebdio hnbiaim׃ 
daniel 9:11	okl iSral ebro at tortk osor lblti Smoe bqlk ottk elino halh ohSbeh aSr ktobh btort mSh ebd halhim ki HTano lo׃ 
daniel 9:12	oiqm at dbrio aSr dbr elino oel SpTino aSr SpTono lhbia elino reh gdlh aSr la neSth tHt kl hSmim kaSr neSth biroSlm׃ 
daniel 9:13	kaSr ktob btort mSh at kl hreh hcat bah elino ola Hlino at pni ihoh alhino lSob meonno olhSkil bamtk׃ 
daniel 9:14	oiSqd ihoh el hreh oibiah elino ki zdiq ihoh alhino el kl meSio aSr eSh ola Smeno bqlo׃ 
daniel 9:15	oeth adni alhino aSr hozat at emk marz mzrim bid Hcqh oteS lk Sm kiom hch HTano rSeno׃ 
daniel 9:16	adni kkl zdqtk iSb na apk oHmtk meirk iroSlm hr qdSk ki bHTaino obeonot abtino iroSlm oemk lHrph lkl sbibtino׃ 
daniel 9:17	oeth Sme alhino al tplt ebdk oal tHnonio ohar pnik el mqdSk hSmm lmen adni׃ 
daniel 9:18	hTh alhi acnk oSme pqHh einik orah Smmtino oheir aSr nqra Smk elih ki la el zdqtino anHno mpilim tHnonino lpnik ki el rHmik hrbim׃ 
daniel 9:19	adni Smeh adni slHh adni hqSibh oeSh al taHr lmenk alhi ki Smk nqra el eirk oel emk׃ 
daniel 9:20	oeod ani mdbr omtpll omtodh HTati oHTat emi iSral ompil tHnti lpni ihoh alhi el hr qdS alhi׃ 
daniel 9:21	oeod ani mdbr btplh ohaiS gbrial aSr raiti bHcon btHlh mep biep nge ali ket mnHt erb׃ 
daniel 9:22	oibn oidbr emi oiamr dnial eth izati lhSkilk binh׃ 
daniel 9:23	btHlt tHnonik iza dbr oani bati lhgid ki Hmodot ath obin bdbr ohbn bmrah׃ 
daniel 9:24	Sbeim Sbeim nHtk el emk oel eir qdSk lkla hpSe olHtm HTaot olkpr eon olhbia zdq elmim olHtm Hcon onbia olmSH qdS qdSim׃ 
daniel 9:25	otde otSkl mn mza dbr lhSib olbnot iroSlm ed mSiH ngid Sbeim Sbeh oSbeim SSim oSnim tSob onbnth rHob oHroz obzoq hetim׃ 
daniel 9:26	oaHri hSbeim SSim oSnim ikrt mSiH oain lo oheir ohqdS iSHit em ngid hba oqzo bSTp oed qz mlHmh nHrzt Smmot׃ 
daniel 9:27	ohgbir brit lrbim Sboe aHd oHzi hSboe iSbit cbH omnHh oel knp Sqozim mSmm oed klh onHrzh ttk el Smm׃ 
daniel 10:1	bSnt SloS lkorS mlk prs dbr nglh ldnial aSr nqra Smo blTSazr oamt hdbr ozba gdol obin at hdbr obinh lo bmrah׃ 
daniel 10:2	bimim hhm ani dnial hiiti mtabl SlSh Sbeim imim׃ 
daniel 10:3	lHm Hmdot la aklti obSr oiin la ba al pi osok la skti ed mlat SlSt Sbeim imim׃ 
daniel 10:4	obiom eSrim oarbeh lHdS hraSon oani hiiti el id hnhr hgdol hoa Hdql׃ 
daniel 10:5	oaSa at eini oara ohnh aiS aHd lboS bdim omtnio Hgrim bktm aopc׃ 
daniel 10:6	ogoito ktrSiS opnio kmrah brq oeinio klpidi aS ocretio omrgltio kein nHSt qll oqol dbrio kqol hmon׃ 
daniel 10:7	oraiti ani dnial lbdi at hmrah ohanSim aSr hio emi la rao at hmrah abl Hrdh gdlh nplh elihm oibrHo bhHba׃ 
daniel 10:8	oani nSarti lbdi oarah at hmrah hgdlh hcat ola nSar bi kH ohodi nhpk eli lmSHit ola ezrti kH׃ 
daniel 10:9	oaSme at qol dbrio okSmei at qol dbrio oani hiiti nrdm el pni opni arzh׃ 
daniel 10:10	ohnh id ngeh bi otnieni el brki okpot idi׃ 
daniel 10:11	oiamr ali dnial aiS Hmdot hbn bdbrim aSr anki dbr alik oemd el emdk ki eth SlHti alik obdbro emi at hdbr hch emdti mreid׃ 
daniel 10:12	oiamr ali al tira dnial ki mn hiom hraSon aSr ntt at lbk lhbin olhtenot lpni alhik nSmeo dbrik oani bati bdbrik׃ 
daniel 10:13	oSr mlkot prs emd lngdi eSrim oaHd iom ohnh mikal aHd hSrim hraSnim ba lecrni oani notrti Sm azl mlki prs׃ 
daniel 10:14	obati lhbink at aSr iqrh lemk baHrit himim ki eod Hcon limim׃ 
daniel 10:15	obdbro emi kdbrim halh ntti pni arzh onalmti׃ 
daniel 10:16	ohnh kdmot bni adm nge el Spti oaptH pi oadbrh oamrh al hemd lngdi adni bmrah nhpko ziri eli ola ezrti kH׃ 
daniel 10:17	ohik iokl ebd adni ch ldbr em adni ch oani meth la iemd bi kH onSmh la nSarh bi׃ 
daniel 10:18	oisp oige bi kmrah adm oiHcqni׃ 
daniel 10:19	oiamr al tira aiS Hmdot Slom lk Hcq oHcq okdbro emi htHcqti oamrh idbr adni ki Hcqtni׃ 
daniel 10:20	oiamr hidet lmh bati alik oeth aSob lhlHm em Sr prs oani ioza ohnh Sr ion ba׃ 
daniel 10:21	abl agid lk at hrSom bktb amt oain aHd mtHcq emi el alh ki am mikal Srkm׃ 
daniel 11:1	oani bSnt aHt ldrioS hmdi emdi lmHciq olmeoc lo׃ 
daniel 11:2	oeth amt agid lk hnh eod SlSh mlkim emdim lprs ohrbiei ieSir eSr gdol mkl okHcqto beSro ieir hkl at mlkot ion׃ 
daniel 11:3	oemd mlk gbor omSl mmSl rb oeSh krzono׃ 
daniel 11:4	okemdo tSbr mlkoto otHz larbe roHot hSmim ola laHrito ola kmSlo aSr mSl ki tntS mlkoto olaHrim mlbd alh׃ 
daniel 11:5	oiHcq mlk hngb omn Srio oiHcq elio omSl mmSl rb mmSlto׃ 
daniel 11:6	olqz Snim itHbro obt mlk hngb tboa al mlk hzpon leSot miSrim ola tezr koH hcroe ola iemd ocreo otntn hia ombiaih ohildh omHcqh betim׃ 
daniel 11:7	oemd mnzr SrSih kno oiba al hHil oiba bmeoc mlk hzpon oeSh bhm ohHciq׃ 
daniel 11:8	ogm alhihm em nskihm em kli Hmdtm ksp ochb bSbi iba mzrim ohoa Snim iemd mmlk hzpon׃ 
daniel 11:9	oba bmlkot mlk hngb oSb al admto׃ 
daniel 11:10	obno itgro oaspo hmon Hilim rbim oba boa oSTp oebr oiSb oitgro ed mech׃ 
daniel 11:11	oitmrmr mlk hngb oiza onlHm emo em mlk hzpon ohemid hmon rb ontn hhmon bido׃ 
daniel 11:12	onSa hhmon irom lbbo ohpil rbaot ola ieoc׃ 
daniel 11:13	oSb mlk hzpon ohemid hmon rb mn hraSon olqz hetim Snim iboa boa bHil gdol obrkoS rb׃ 
daniel 11:14	obetim hhm rbim iemdo el mlk hngb obni prizi emk inSao lhemid Hcon onkSlo׃ 
daniel 11:15	oiba mlk hzpon oiSpk sollh olkd eir mbzrot ocreot hngb la iemdo oem mbHrio oain kH lemd׃ 
daniel 11:16	oieS hba alio krzono oain eomd lpnio oiemd barz hzbi oklh bido׃ 
daniel 11:17	oiSm pnio lboa btqp kl mlkoto oiSrim emo oeSh obt hnSim itn lo lhSHith ola temd ola lo thih׃ 
daniel 11:18	oiSb pnio laiim olkd rbim ohSbit qzin Hrpto lo blti Hrpto iSib lo׃ 
daniel 11:19	oiSb pnio lmeoci arzo onkSl onpl ola imza׃ 
daniel 11:20	oemd el kno mebir nogS hdr mlkot obimim aHdim iSbr ola bapim ola bmlHmh׃ 
daniel 11:21	oemd el kno nbch ola ntno elio hod mlkot oba bSloh ohHciq mlkot bHlqlqot׃ 
daniel 11:22	ocreot hSTp iSTpo mlpnio oiSbro ogm ngid brit׃ 
daniel 11:23	omn htHbrot alio ieSh mrmh oelh oezm bmeT goi׃ 
daniel 11:24	bSloh obmSmni mdinh iboa oeSh aSr la eSo abtio oabot abtio bch oSll orkoS lhm ibcor oel mbzrim iHSb mHSbtio oed et׃ 
daniel 11:25	oier kHo olbbo el mlk hngb bHil gdol omlk hngb itgrh lmlHmh bHil gdol oezom ed mad ola iemd ki iHSbo elio mHSbot׃ 
daniel 11:26	oakli pt bgo iSbroho oHilo iSTop onplo Hllim rbim׃ 
daniel 11:27	oSnihm hmlkim lbbm lmre oel SlHn aHd kcb idbro ola tzlH ki eod qz lmoed׃ 
daniel 11:28	oiSb arzo brkoS gdol olbbo el brit qdS oeSh oSb larzo׃ 
daniel 11:29	lmoed iSob oba bngb ola thih kraSnh okaHrnh׃ 
daniel 11:30	obao bo ziim ktim onkah oSb ocem el brit qodS oeSh oSb oibn el ecbi brit qdS׃ 
daniel 11:31	ocreim mmno iemdo oHllo hmqdS hmeoc ohsiro htmid ontno hSqoz mSomm׃ 
daniel 11:32	omrSiei brit iHnip bHlqot oem idei alhio iHcqo oeSo׃ 
daniel 11:33	omSkili em ibino lrbim onkSlo bHrb oblhbh bSbi obbch imim׃ 
daniel 11:34	obhkSlm iecro ecr meT onloo elihm rbim bHlqlqot׃ 
daniel 11:35	omn hmSkilim ikSlo lzrop bhm olbrr ollbn ed et qz ki eod lmoed׃ 
daniel 11:36	oeSh krzono hmlk oitromm oitgdl el kl al oel al alim idbr nplaot ohzliH ed klh cem ki nHrzh neSth׃ 
daniel 11:37	oel alhi abtio la ibin oel Hmdt nSim oel kl aloh la ibin ki el kl itgdl׃ 
daniel 11:38	olalh mecim el kno ikbd olaloh aSr la ideho abtio ikbd bchb obksp obabn iqrh obHmdot׃ 
daniel 11:39	oeSh lmbzri mecim em aloh nkr aSr hkir irbh kbod ohmSilm brbim oadmh iHlq bmHir׃ 
daniel 11:40	obet qz itngH emo mlk hngb oiSter elio mlk hzpon brkb obprSim obaniot rbot oba barzot oSTp oebr׃ 
daniel 11:41	oba barz hzbi orbot ikSlo oalh imlTo mido adom omoab oraSit bni emon׃ 
daniel 11:42	oiSlH ido barzot oarz mzrim la thih lpliTh׃ 
daniel 11:43	omSl bmkmni hchb ohksp obkl Hmdot mzrim olbim okSim bmzedio׃ 
daniel 11:44	oSmeot ibhlho mmcrH omzpon oiza bHma gdlh lhSmid olhHrim rbim׃ 
daniel 11:45	oiTe ahli apdno bin imim lhr zbi qdS oba ed qzo oain eocr lo׃ 
daniel 12:1	obet hhia iemd mikal hSr hgdol hemd el bni emk ohith et zrh aSr la nhith mhiot goi ed het hhia obet hhia imlT emk kl hnmza ktob bspr׃ 
daniel 12:2	orbim miSni admt epr iqizo alh lHii eolm oalh lHrpot ldraon eolm׃ 
daniel 12:3	ohmSklim ichro kchr hrqie omzdiqi hrbim kkokbim leolm oed׃ 
daniel 12:4	oath dnial stm hdbrim oHtm hspr ed et qz iSTTo rbim otrbh hdet׃ 
daniel 12:5	oraiti ani dnial ohnh Snim aHrim emdim aHd hnh lSpt hiar oaHd hnh lSpt hiar׃ 
daniel 12:6	oiamr laiS lboS hbdim aSr mmel lmimi hiar ed mti qz hplaot׃ 
daniel 12:7	oaSme at haiS lboS hbdim aSr mmel lmimi hiar oirm imino oSmalo al hSmim oiSbe bHi heolm ki lmoed moedim oHzi okklot npz id em qdS tklinh kl alh׃ 
daniel 12:8	oani Smeti ola abin oamrh adni mh aHrit alh׃ 
daniel 12:9	oiamr lk dnial ki stmim oHtmim hdbrim ed et qz׃ 
daniel 12:10	itbrro oitlbno oizrpo rbim ohrSieo rSeim ola ibino kl rSeim ohmSklim ibino׃ 
daniel 12:11	omet hosr htmid oltt Sqoz Smm imim alp matim otSeim׃ 
daniel 12:12	aSri hmHkh oigie limim alp SlS maot SlSim oHmSh׃ 
daniel 12:13	oath lk lqz otnoH otemd lgrlk lqz himin׃ 
ezra 1:1	obSnt aHt lkorS mlk prs lklot dbr ihoh mpi irmih heir ihoh at roH krS mlk prs oiebr qol bkl mlkoto ogm bmktb lamr׃ 
ezra 1:2	kh amr krS mlk prs kl mmlkot harz ntn li ihoh alhi hSmim ohoa pqd eli lbnot lo bit biroSlm aSr bihodh׃ 
ezra 1:3	mi bkm mkl emo ihi alhio emo oiel liroSlm aSr bihodh oibn at bit ihoh alhi iSral hoa halhim aSr biroSlm׃ 
ezra 1:4	okl hnSar mkl hmqmot aSr hoa gr Sm inSaoho anSi mqmo bksp obchb obrkoS obbhmh em hndbh lbit halhim aSr biroSlm׃ 
ezra 1:5	oiqomo raSi habot lihodh obnimn ohkhnim ohloim lkl heir halhim at roHo lelot lbnot at bit ihoh aSr biroSlm׃ 
ezra 1:6	okl sbibtihm Hcqo bidihm bkli ksp bchb brkoS obbhmh obmgdnot lbd el kl htndb׃ 
ezra 1:7	ohmlk korS hozia at kli bit ihoh aSr hozia nbokdnzr miroSlm oitnm bbit alhio׃

ezra 2:1	oalh bni hmdinh helim mSbi hgolh aSr hglh nbokdnzor mlk bbl lbbl oiSobo liroSlm oihodh aiS leiro׃
