ezra 3:1	oige hHdS hSbiei obni iSral berim oiaspo hem kaiS aHd al iroSlm׃ 
ezra 3:2	oiqm iSoe bn iozdq oaHio hkhnim ocrbbl bn Saltial oaHio oibno at mcbH alhi iSral lhelot elio elot kktob btort mSh aiS halhim׃ 
ezra 3:3	oikino hmcbH el mkontio ki baimh elihm memi harzot oiel elio elot lihoh elot lbqr olerb׃ 
ezra 3:4	oieSo at Hg hskot kktob oelt iom biom bmspr kmSpT dbr iom biomo׃ 
ezra 3:5	oaHrikn elt tmid olHdSim olkl moedi ihoh hmqdSim olkl mtndb ndbh lihoh׃ 
ezra 3:6	miom aHd lHdS hSbiei hHlo lhelot elot lihoh ohikl ihoh la isd׃ 
ezra 3:7	oitno ksp lHzbim olHrSim omakl omSth oSmn lzdnim olzrim lhbia ezi arcim mn hlbnon al im ipoa krSion korS mlk prs elihm׃ 
ezra 3:8	obSnh hSnit lboam al bit halhim liroSlm bHdS hSni hHlo crbbl bn Saltial oiSoe bn iozdq oSar aHihm hkhnim ohloim okl hbaim mhSbi iroSlm oiemido at hloim mbn eSrim Snh omelh lnzH el mlakt bit ihoh׃ 
ezra 3:9	oiemd iSoe bnio oaHio qdmial obnio bni ihodh kaHd lnzH el eSh hmlakh bbit halhim bni Hndd bnihm oaHihm hloim׃ 
ezra 3:10	oisdo hbnim at hikl ihoh oiemido hkhnim mlbSim bHzzrot ohloim bni asp bmzltim lhll at ihoh el idi doid mlk iSral׃ 
ezra 3:11	oieno bhll obhodt lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo el iSral okl hem hrieo troeh gdolh bhll lihoh el hosd bit ihoh׃ 
ezra 3:12	orbim mhkhnim ohloim oraSi habot hcqnim aSr rao at hbit hraSon bisdo ch hbit beinihm bkim bqol gdol orbim btroeh bSmHh lhrim qol׃ 
ezra 3:13	oain hem mkirim qol troet hSmHh lqol bki hem ki hem mrieim troeh gdolh ohqol nSme ed lmrHoq׃ 
ezra 4:1	oiSmeo zri ihodh obnimn ki bni hgolh bonim hikl lihoh alhi iSral׃ 
ezra 4:2	oigSo al crbbl oal raSi habot oiamro lhm nbnh emkm ki kkm ndroS lalhikm ola anHno cbHim mimi asr Hdn mlk aSor hmelh atno ph׃ 
ezra 4:3	oiamr lhm crbbl oiSoe oSar raSi habot liSral la lkm olno lbnot bit lalhino ki anHno iHd nbnh lihoh alhi iSral kaSr zono hmlk korS mlk prs׃ 
ezra 4:4	oihi em harz mrpim idi em ihodh omblhim aotm lbnot׃ 
ezra 4:5	oskrim elihm ioezim lhpr eztm kl imi korS mlk prs oed mlkot drioS mlk prs׃ 
ezra 4:6	obmlkot aHSoroS btHlt mlkoto ktbo STnh el iSbi ihodh oiroSlm׃ 
ezra 4:7	obimi artHSSta ktb bSlm mtrdt Tbal oSar knoto el artHSSta mlk prs oktb hnSton ktob armit omtrgm armit׃ 
ezra 4:8	rHom bel Tem oSmSi spra ktbo agrh Hdh el iroSlm lartHSSta mlka knma׃ 
ezra 4:9	adin rHom bel Tem oSmSi spra oSar knothon dinia oaprstkia Trplia aprsia arkoi bblia SoSnkia dhoa elmia׃ 
ezra 4:10	oSar amia di hgli asnpr rba oiqira ohotb hmo bqrih di Smrin oSar ebr nhrh okent׃ 
ezra 4:11	dnh prSgn agrta di SlHo elohi el artHSSta mlka ebdik anS ebr nhrh okent׃ 
ezra 4:12	idie lhoa lmlka di ihodia di slqo mn lotk elina ato liroSlm qrita mrdta obaiSta bnin oSori aSkllo oaSia iHiTo׃ 
ezra 4:13	ken idie lhoa lmlka di hn qrita dk ttbna oSorih iStkllon mndh blo ohlk la intnon oaptm mlkim thncq׃ 
ezra 4:14	ken kl qbl di mlH hikla mlHna oerot mlka la arik lna lmHca el dnh SlHna ohodena lmlka׃ 
ezra 4:15	di ibqr bspr dkrnia di abhtk othSkH bspr dkrnia otnde di qrita dk qria mrda omhncqt mlkin omdnn oaStdor ebdin bgoh mn iomt elma el dnh qrita dk hHrbt׃ 
ezra 4:16	mhodein anHnh lmlka di hn qrita dk ttbna oSorih iStkllon lqbl dnh Hlq bebr nhra la aiti lk׃ 
ezra 4:17	ptgma SlH mlka el rHom bel Tem oSmSi spra oSar knothon di itbin bSmrin oSar ebr nhrh Slm oket׃ 
ezra 4:18	nStona di SlHton elina mprS qri qdmi׃ 
ezra 4:19	omni Sim Tem obqro ohSkHo di qrita dk mn iomt elma el mlkin mtnSah omrd oaStdor mtebd bh׃ 
ezra 4:20	omlkin tqipin hoo el iroSlm oSliTin bkl ebr nhrh omdh blo ohlk mtihb lhon׃ 
ezra 4:21	ken Simo Tem lbTla gbria alk oqrita dk la ttbna ed mni Tema itSm׃ 
ezra 4:22	ochirin hoo Slo lmebd el dnh lmh iSga Hbla lhncqt mlkin׃ 
ezra 4:23	adin mn di prSgn nStona di artHSSta mlka qri qdm rHom oSmSi spra oknothon aclo bbhilo liroSlm el ihodia obTlo hmo badre oHil׃ 
ezra 4:24	badin bTlt ebidt bit alha di biroSlm ohot bTla ed Snt trtin lmlkot drioS mlk prs׃ 
ezra 5:1	ohtnbi Hgi nbiah ockrih br edoa nbiaia el ihodia di bihod obiroSlm bSm alh iSral elihon׃ 
ezra 5:2	badin qmo crbbl br Saltial oiSoe br iozdq oSrio lmbna bit alha di biroSlm oemhon nbiaia di alha msedin lhon׃ 
ezra 5:3	bh cmna ata elihon ttni pHt ebr nhrh oStr bocni oknothon okn amrin lhm mn Sm lkm Tem bita dnh lbna oaSrna dnh lSkllh׃ 
ezra 5:4	adin knma amrna lhm mn anon Smht gbria di dnh bnina bnin׃ 
ezra 5:5	oein alhhm hot el Sbi ihodia ola bTlo hmo ed Tema ldrioS ihk oadin itibon nStona el dnh׃ 
ezra 5:6	prSgn agrta di SlH ttni pHt ebr nhrh oStr bocni oknoth aprskia di bebr nhrh el drioS mlka׃ 
ezra 5:7	ptgma SlHo elohi okdnh ktib bgoh ldrioS mlka Slma kla׃ 
ezra 5:8	idie lhoa lmlka di aclna lihod mdinta lbit alha rba ohoa mtbna abn gll oae mtSm bktlia oebidta dk asprna mtebda omzlH bidhm׃ 
ezra 5:9	adin Salna lSbia alk knma amrna lhm mn Sm lkm Tem bita dnh lmbnih oaSrna dnh lSkllh׃ 
ezra 5:10	oap Smhthm Salna lhm lhodeotk di nktb Sm gbria di braSihm׃ 
ezra 5:11	oknma ptgma htibona lmmr anHna hmo ebdohi di alh Smia oarea obnin bita di hoa bnh mqdmt dnh Snin Sgian omlk liSral rb bnhi oSkllh׃ 
ezra 5:12	lhn mn di hrgco abhtna lalh Smia ihb hmo bid nbokdnzr mlk bbl ksdia obith dnh strh oemh hgli lbbl׃ 
ezra 5:13	brm bSnt Hdh lkorS mlka di bbl korS mlka Sm Tem bit alha dnh lbna׃ 
ezra 5:14	oap mania di bit alha di dhbh okspa di nbokdnzr hnpq mn hikla di biroSlm ohibl hmo lhikla di bbl hnpq hmo korS mlka mn hikla di bbl oihibo lSSbzr Smh di pHh Smh׃ 
ezra 5:15	oamr lh alh mania Sa acl aHt hmo bhikla di biroSlm obit alha itbna el atrh׃ 
ezra 5:16	adin SSbzr dk ata ihb aSia di bit alha di biroSlm omn adin oed ken mtbna ola Slm׃ 
ezra 5:17	oken hn el mlka Tb itbqr bbit gncia di mlka tmh di bbbl hn aiti di mn korS mlka Sim Tem lmbna bit alha dk biroSlm oreot mlka el dnh iSlH elina׃ 
ezra 6:1	badin drioS mlka Sm Tem obqro bbit spria di gncia mhHtin tmh bbbl׃ 
ezra 6:2	ohStkH baHmta bbirta di bmdi mdinth mglh Hdh okn ktib bgoh dkronh׃ 
ezra 6:3	bSnt Hdh lkorS mlka korS mlka Sm Tem bit alha biroSlm bita itbna atr di dbHin dbHin oaSohi msoblin romh amin Stin ptih amin Stin׃ 
ezra 6:4	ndbkin di abn gll tlta ondbk di ae Hdt onpqta mn bit mlka ttihb׃ 
ezra 6:5	oap mani bit alha di dhbh okspa di nbokdnzr hnpq mn hikla di biroSlm ohibl lbbl ihtibon oihk lhikla di biroSlm latrh otHt bbit alha׃ 
ezra 6:6	ken ttni pHt ebr nhrh Str bocni oknothon aprskia di bebr nhrh rHiqin hoo mn tmh׃ 
ezra 6:7	Sbqo lebidt bit alha dk pHt ihodia olSbi ihodia bit alha dk ibnon el atrh׃ 
ezra 6:8	omni Sim Tem lma di tebdon em Sbi ihodia alk lmbna bit alha dk omnksi mlka di mdt ebr nhrh asprna npqta thoa mtihba lgbria alk di la lbTla׃ 
ezra 6:9	omh HSHn obni torin odkrin oamrin lelon lalh Smia HnTin mlH Hmr omSH kmamr khnia di biroSlm lhoa mtihb lhm iom biom di la Slo׃ 
ezra 6:10	di lhon mhqrbin niHoHin lalh Smia omzlin lHii mlka obnohi׃ 
ezra 6:11	omni Sim Tem di kl anS di ihSna ptgma dnh itnsH ae mn bith ocqip itmHa elhi obith nolo itebd el dnh׃ 
ezra 6:12	oalha di Skn Smh tmh imgr kl mlk oem di iSlH idh lhSnih lHblh bit alha dk di biroSlm anh drioS Smt Tem asprna itebd׃ 
ezra 6:13	adin ttni pHt ebr nhrh Str bocni oknothon lqbl di SlH drioS mlka knma asprna ebdo׃ 
ezra 6:14	oSbi ihodia bnin omzlHin bnboat Hgi nbiah ockrih br edoa obno oSkllo mn Tem alh iSral omTem korS odrioS oartHSSta mlk prs׃ 
ezra 6:15	oSizia bith dnh ed iom tlth lirH adr di hia Snt St lmlkot drioS mlka׃ 
ezra 6:16	oebdo bni iSral khnia oloia oSar bni glota Hnkt bit alha dnh bHdoh׃ 
ezra 6:17	ohqrbo lHnkt bit alha dnh torin mah dkrin matin amrin arbe mah ozpiri ecin lHTia el kl iSral tri eSr lmnin SbTi iSral׃ 
ezra 6:18	ohqimo khnia bplgthon oloia bmHlqthon el ebidt alha di biroSlm kktb spr mSh׃ 
ezra 6:19	oieSo bni hgolh at hpsH barbeh eSr lHdS hraSon׃ 
ezra 6:20	ki hThro hkhnim ohloim kaHd klm Thorim oiSHTo hpsH lkl bni hgolh olaHihm hkhnim olhm׃ 
ezra 6:21	oiaklo bni iSral hSbim mhgolh okl hnbdl mTmat goi harz alhm ldrS lihoh alhi iSral׃ 
ezra 6:22	oieSo Hg mzot Sbet imim bSmHh ki SmHm ihoh ohsb lb mlk aSor elihm lHcq idihm bmlakt bit halhim alhi iSral׃ 
ezra 7:1	oaHr hdbrim halh bmlkot artHSsta mlk prs ecra bn Srih bn ecrih bn Hlqih׃ 
ezra 7:2	bn Slom bn zdoq bn aHiTob׃ 
ezra 7:3	bn amrih bn ecrih bn mriot׃ 
ezra 7:4	bn crHih bn eci bn bqi׃ 
ezra 7:5	bn abiSoe bn pinHs bn alecr bn ahrn hkhn hraS׃ 
ezra 7:6	hoa ecra elh mbbl ohoa spr mhir btort mSh aSr ntn ihoh alhi iSral oitn lo hmlk kid ihoh alhio elio kl bqSto׃ 
ezra 7:7	oielo mbni iSral omn hkhnim ohloim ohmSrrim ohSerim ohntinim al iroSlm bSnt Sbe lartHSsta hmlk׃ 
ezra 7:8	oiba iroSlm bHdS hHmiSi hia Snt hSbieit lmlk׃ 
ezra 7:9	ki baHd lHdS hraSon hoa isd hmelh mbbl obaHd lHdS hHmiSi ba al iroSlm kid alhio hTobh elio׃ 
ezra 7:10	ki ecra hkin lbbo ldroS at tort ihoh oleSt ollmd biSral Hq omSpT׃ 
ezra 7:11	och prSgn hnSton aSr ntn hmlk artHSsta lecra hkhn hspr spr dbri mzot ihoh oHqio el iSral׃ 
ezra 7:12	artHSsta mlk mlkia lecra khna spr dta di alh Smia gmir okent׃ 
ezra 7:13	mni Sim Tem di kl mtndb bmlkoti mn emh iSral okhnohi oloia lmhk liroSlm emk ihk׃ 
ezra 7:14	kl qbl di mn qdm mlka oSbet ieThi SliH lbqra el ihod oliroSlm bdt alhk di bidk׃ 
ezra 7:15	olhiblh ksp odhb di mlka oieTohi htndbo lalh iSral di biroSlm mSknh׃ 
ezra 7:16	okl ksp odhb di thSkH bkl mdint bbl em htndbot ema okhnia mtndbin lbit alhhm di biroSlm׃ 
ezra 7:17	kl qbl dnh asprna tqna bkspa dnh torin dkrin amrin omnHthon onskihon otqrb hmo el mdbHh di bit alhkm di biroSlm׃ 
ezra 7:18	omh di elik oel aHik iiTb bSar kspa odhbh lmebd kreot alhkm tebdon׃ 
ezra 7:19	omania di mtihbin lk lplHn bit alhk hSlm qdm alh iroSlm׃ 
ezra 7:20	oSar HSHot bit alhk di ipl lk lmntn tntn mn bit gnci mlka׃ 
ezra 7:21	omni anh artHSsta mlka Sim Tem lkl gcbria di bebr nhrh di kl di iSalnkon ecra khnh spr dta di alh Smia asprna itebd׃ 
ezra 7:22	ed ksp kkrin mah oed HnTin krin mah oed Hmr btin mah oed btin mSH mah omlH di la ktb׃ 
ezra 7:23	kl di mn Tem alh Smia itebd adrcda lbit alh Smia di lmh lhoa qzp el mlkot mlka obnohi׃ 
ezra 7:24	olkm mhodein di kl khnia oloia cmria treia ntinia oplHi bit alha dnh mndh blo ohlk la SliT lmrma elihm׃ 
ezra 7:25	oant ecra kHkmt alhk di bidk mni SpTin odinin di lhon danin lkl emh di bebr nhrh lkl idei dti alhk odi la ide thodeon׃ 
ezra 7:26	okl di la lhoa ebd dta di alhk odta di mlka asprna dinh lhoa mtebd mnh hn lmot hn lSrSo hn lenS nksin olasorin׃ 
ezra 7:27	brok ihoh alhi abotino aSr ntn kcat blb hmlk lpar at bit ihoh aSr biroSlm׃ 
ezra 7:28	oeli hTh Hsd lpni hmlk oioezio olkl Sri hmlk hgbrim oani htHcqti kid ihoh alhi eli oaqbzh miSral raSim lelot emi׃ 
ezra 8:1	oalh raSi abtihm ohtiHSm helim emi bmlkot artHSsta hmlk mbbl׃ 
ezra 8:2	mbni pinHs grSm mbni aitmr dnial mbni doid HToS׃ 
ezra 8:3	mbni Sknih mbni preS ckrih oemo htiHS lckrim mah oHmSim׃ 
ezra 8:4	mbni pHt moab alihoeini bn crHih oemo matim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:5	mbni Sknih bn iHcial oemo SlS maot hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:6	ombni edin ebd bn iontn oemo HmSim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:7	ombni eilm iSeih bn etlih oemo Sbeim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:8	ombni SpTih cbdih bn mikal oemo Smnim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:9	mbni ioab ebdih bn iHial oemo matim oSmnh eSr hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:10	ombni Slomit bn iospih oemo mah oSSim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:11	ombni bbi ckrih bn bbi oemo eSrim oSmnh hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:12	ombni ecgd ioHnn bn hqTn oemo mah oeSrh hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:13	ombni adniqm aHrnim oalh Smotm aliplT ieial oSmeih oemhm SSim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:14	ombni bgoi eoti ocbod oemo Sbeim hckrim׃ 
ezra 8:15	oaqbzm al hnhr hba al ahoa onHnh Sm imim SlSh oabinh bem obkhnim ombni loi la mzati Sm׃ 
ezra 8:16	oaSlHh laliecr larial lSmeih olalntn olirib olalntn olntn olckrih olmSlm raSim olioirib olalntn mbinim׃ 
ezra 8:17	oaozah aotm el ado hraS bkspia hmqom oaSimh bpihm dbrim ldbr al ado aHio hntonim bkspia hmqom lhbia lno mSrtim lbit alhino׃ 
ezra 8:18	oibiao lno kid alhino hTobh elino aiS Skl mbni mHli bn loi bn iSral oSrbih obnio oaHio Smnh eSr׃ 
ezra 8:19	oat HSbih oato iSeih mbni mrri aHio obnihm eSrim׃ 
ezra 8:20	omn hntinim Sntn doid ohSrim lebdt hloim ntinim matim oeSrim klm nqbo bSmot׃ 
ezra 8:21	oaqra Sm zom el hnhr ahoa lhtenot lpni alhino lbqS mmno drk iSrh lno olTpno olkl rkoSno׃ 
ezra 8:22	ki bSti lSaol mn hmlk Hil oprSim lecrno maoib bdrk ki amrno lmlk lamr id alhino el kl mbqSio lTobh oeco oapo el kl ecbio׃ 
ezra 8:23	onzomh onbqSh malhino el cat oietr lno׃ 
ezra 8:24	oabdilh mSri hkhnim Snim eSr lSrbih HSbih oemhm maHihm eSrh׃ 
ezra 8:25	oaSqolh lhm at hksp oat hchb oat hklim tromt bit alhino hhrimo hmlk oiezio oSrio okl iSral hnmzaim׃ 
ezra 8:26	oaSqlh el idm ksp kkrim SS maot oHmSim okli ksp mah lkkrim chb mah kkr׃ 
ezra 8:27	okpri chb eSrim ladrknim alp okli nHSt mzhb Tobh Snim Hmodt kchb׃ 
ezra 8:28	oamrh alhm atm qdS lihoh ohklim qdS ohksp ohchb ndbh lihoh alhi abtikm׃ 
ezra 8:29	Sqdo oSmro ed tSqlo lpni Sri hkhnim ohloim oSri habot liSral biroSlm hlSkot bit ihoh׃ 
ezra 8:30	oqblo hkhnim ohloim mSql hksp ohchb ohklim lhbia liroSlm lbit alhino׃ 
ezra 8:31	onseh mnhr ahoa bSnim eSr lHdS hraSon llkt iroSlm oid alhino hith elino oizilno mkp aoib oaorb el hdrk׃ 
ezra 8:32	onboa iroSlm onSb Sm imim SlSh׃ 
ezra 8:33	obiom hrbiei nSql hksp ohchb ohklim bbit alhino el id mrmot bn aorih hkhn oemo alecr bn pinHs oemhm iocbd bn iSoe onoedih bn bnoi hloim׃ 
ezra 8:34	bmspr bmSql lkl oiktb kl hmSql bet hhia׃ 
ezra 8:35	hbaim mhSbi bni hgolh hqribo elot lalhi iSral prim Snim eSr el kl iSral ailim tSeim oSSh kbSim Sbeim oSbeh zpiri HTat Snim eSr hkl eolh lihoh׃ 
ezra 8:36	oitno at dti hmlk laHSdrpni hmlk opHoot ebr hnhr onSao at hem oat bit halhim׃ 
ezra 9:1	okklot alh ngSo ali hSrim lamr la nbdlo hem iSral ohkhnim ohloim memi harzot ktoebtihm lkneni hHti hprci hibosi hemni hmabi hmzri ohamri׃ 
ezra 9:2	ki nSao mbntihm lhm olbnihm ohterbo cre hqdS bemi harzot oid hSrim ohsgnim hith bmel hch raSonh׃ 
ezra 9:3	okSmei at hdbr hch qreti at bgdi omeili oamrTh mSer raSi ocqni oaSbh mSomm׃ 
ezra 9:4	oali iaspo kl Hrd bdbri alhi iSral el mel hgolh oani iSb mSomm ed lmnHt herb׃ 
ezra 9:5	obmnHt herb qmti mteniti obqrei bgdi omeili oakreh el brki oaprSh kpi al ihoh alhi׃ 
ezra 9:6	oamrh alhi bSti onklmti lhrim alhi pni alik ki eontino rbo lmelh raS oaSmtno gdlh ed lSmim׃ 
ezra 9:7	mimi abtino anHno baSmh gdlh ed hiom hch obeontino ntno anHno mlkino khnino bid mlki harzot bHrb bSbi obbch obbSt pnim khiom hch׃ 
ezra 9:8	oeth kmeT rge hith tHnh mat ihoh alhino lhSair lno pliTh oltt lno itd bmqom qdSo lhair einino alhino olttno mHih meT bebdtno׃ 
ezra 9:9	ki ebdim anHno obebdtno la ecbno alhino oiT elino Hsd lpni mlki prs ltt lno mHih lromm at bit alhino olhemid at Hrbtio oltt lno gdr bihodh obiroSlm׃ 
ezra 9:10	oeth mh namr alhino aHri cat ki ecbno mzotik׃ 
ezra 9:11	aSr zoit bid ebdik hnbiaim lamr harz aSr atm baim lrSth arz ndh hia bndt emi harzot btoebtihm aSr mlaoh mph al ph bTmatm׃ 
ezra 9:12	oeth bnotikm al ttno lbnihm obntihm al tSao lbnikm ola tdrSo Slmm oTobtm ed eolm lmen tHcqo oakltm at Tob harz ohorStm lbnikm ed eolm׃ 
ezra 9:13	oaHri kl hba elino bmeSino hreim obaSmtno hgdlh ki ath alhino HSkt lmTh meonno ontth lno pliTh kcat׃ 
ezra 9:14	hnSob lhpr mzotik olhtHtn bemi htebot halh hloa tanp bno ed klh lain Sarit opliTh׃ 
ezra 9:15	ihoh alhi iSral zdiq ath ki nSarno pliTh khiom hch hnno lpnik baSmtino ki ain lemod lpnik el cat׃ 
ezra 10:1	okhtpll ecra okhtodto bkh omtnpl lpni bit halhim nqbzo alio miSral qhl rb mad anSim onSim oildim ki bko hem hrbh bkh׃ 
ezra 10:2	oien Sknih bn iHial mbni eolm oiamr lecra anHno melno balhino onSb nSim nkriot memi harz oeth iS mqoh liSral el cat׃ 
ezra 10:3	oeth nkrt brit lalhino lhozia kl nSim ohnold mhm bezt adni ohHrdim bmzot alhino oktorh ieSh׃ 
ezra 10:4	qom ki elik hdbr oanHno emk Hcq oeSh׃ 
ezra 10:5	oiqm ecra oiSbe at Sri hkhnim hloim okl iSral leSot kdbr hch oiSbeo׃ 
ezra 10:6	oiqm ecra mlpni bit halhim oilk al lSkt ihoHnn bn aliSib oilk Sm lHm la akl omim la Sth ki mtabl el mel hgolh׃ 
ezra 10:7	oiebiro qol bihodh oiroSlm lkl bni hgolh lhqbz iroSlm׃ 
ezra 10:8	okl aSr la iboa lSlSt himim kezt hSrim ohcqnim iHrm kl rkoSo ohoa ibdl mqhl hgolh׃ 
ezra 10:9	oiqbzo kl anSi ihodh obnimn iroSlm lSlSt himim hoa HdS htSiei beSrim bHdS oiSbo kl hem brHob bit halhim mreidim el hdbr omhgSmim׃ 
ezra 10:10	oiqm ecra hkhn oiamr alhm atm meltm otSibo nSim nkriot lhosip el aSmt iSral׃ 
ezra 10:11	oeth tno todh lihoh alhi abtikm oeSo rzono ohbdlo memi harz omn hnSim hnkriot׃ 
ezra 10:12	oieno kl hqhl oiamro qol gdol kn kdbrik elino leSot׃ 
ezra 10:13	abl hem rb ohet gSmim oain kH lemod bHoz ohmlakh la liom aHd ola lSnim ki hrbino lpSe bdbr hch׃ 
ezra 10:14	iemdo na Srino lkl hqhl okl aSr berino hhSib nSim nkriot iba letim mcmnim oemhm cqni eir oeir oSpTih ed lhSib Hron ap alhino mmno ed ldbr hch׃ 
ezra 10:15	ak iontn bn eShal oiHcih bn tqoh emdo el cat omSlm oSbti hloi ecrm׃ 
ezra 10:16	oieSo kn bni hgolh oibdlo ecra hkhn anSim raSi habot lbit abtm oklm bSmot oiSbo biom aHd lHdS heSiri ldrioS hdbr׃ 
ezra 10:17	oiklo bkl anSim hhSibo nSim nkriot ed iom aHd lHdS hraSon׃ 
ezra 10:18	oimza mbni hkhnim aSr hSibo nSim nkriot mbni iSoe bn iozdq oaHio meSih oaliecr oirib ogdlih׃ 
ezra 10:19	oitno idm lhozia nSihm oaSmim ail zan el aSmtm׃ 
ezra 10:20	ombni amr Hnni ocbdih׃ 
ezra 10:21	ombni Hrm meSih oalih oSmeih oiHial oecih׃ 
ezra 10:22	ombni pSHor alioeini meSih iSmeal ntnal iocbd oaleSh׃ 
ezra 10:23	omn hloim iocbd oSmei oqlih hoa qliTa ptHih ihodh oaliecr׃ 
ezra 10:24	omn hmSrrim aliSib omn hSerim Slm oTlm oaori׃ 
ezra 10:25	omiSral mbni preS rmih oicih omlkih omimn oalecr omlkih obnih׃ 
ezra 10:26	ombni eilm mtnih ckrih oiHial oebdi oirmot oalih׃ 
ezra 10:27	ombni ctoa alioeni aliSib mtnih oirmot ocbd oecica׃ 
ezra 10:28	ombni bbi ihoHnn Hnnih cbi etli׃ 
ezra 10:29	ombni bni mSlm mlok oedih iSob oSal irmot׃ 
ezra 10:30	ombni pHt moab edna okll bnih meSih mtnih bzlal obnoi omnSh׃ 
ezra 10:31	obni Hrm aliecr iSih mlkih Smeih Smeon׃ 
ezra 10:32	bnimn mlok Smrih׃ 
ezra 10:33	mbni HSm mtni mtth cbd aliplT irmi mnSh Smei׃ 
ezra 10:34	mbni bni medi emrm oaoal׃ 
ezra 10:35	bnih bdih klohi׃ 
ezra 10:36	onih mrmot aliSib׃ 
ezra 10:37	mtnih mtni oieSo׃ 
ezra 10:38	obni obnoi Smei׃ 
ezra 10:39	oSlmih ontn oedih׃ 
ezra 10:40	mkndbi SSi Sri׃ 
ezra 10:41	ecral oSlmiho Smrih׃ 
ezra 10:42	Slom amrih iosp׃ 
ezra 10:43	mbni nbo ieial mttih cbd cbina ido oioal bnih׃ 
ezra 10:44	kl alh nSai nSim nkriot oiS mhm nSim oiSimo bnim׃ 
nehemiah 1:1	dbri nHmih bn Hklih oihi bHdS kslo Snt eSrim oani hiiti bSoSn hbirh׃ 
nehemiah 1:2	oiba Hnni aHd maHi hoa oanSim mihodh oaSalm el hihodim hpliTh aSr nSaro mn hSbi oel iroSlm׃ 
nehemiah 1:3	oiamro li hnSarim aSr nSaro mn hSbi Sm bmdinh breh gdlh obHrph oHomt iroSlm mprzt oSerih nzto baS׃ 
nehemiah 1:4	oihi kSmei at hdbrim halh iSbti oabkh oatablh imim oahi zm omtpll lpni alhi hSmim׃ 
nehemiah 1:5	oamr ana ihoh alhi hSmim hal hgdol ohnora Smr hbrit oHsd lahbio olSmri mzotio׃ 
nehemiah 1:6	thi na acnk qSbt oeinik ptoHot lSme al tplt ebdk aSr anki mtpll lpnik hiom iomm olilh el bni iSral ebdik omtodh el HTaot bni iSral aSr HTano lk oani obit abi HTano׃ 
nehemiah 1:7	Hbl Hblno lk ola Smrno at hmzot oat hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr zoit at mSh ebdk׃ 
nehemiah 1:8	ckr na at hdbr aSr zoit at mSh ebdk lamr atm tmelo ani apiz atkm bemim׃ 
nehemiah 1:9	oSbtm ali oSmrtm mzoti oeSitm atm am ihih ndHkm bqzh hSmim mSm aqbzm ohboatim al hmqom aSr bHrti lSkn at Smi Sm׃ 
nehemiah 1:10	ohm ebdik oemk aSr pdit bkHk hgdol obidk hHcqh׃ 
nehemiah 1:11	ana adni thi na acnk qSbt al tplt ebdk oal tplt ebdik hHpzim lirah at Smk ohzliHh na lebdk hiom otnho lrHmim lpni haiS hch oani hiiti mSqh lmlk׃ 
nehemiah 2:1	oihi bHdS nisn Snt eSrim lartHSsta hmlk iin lpnio oaSa at hiin oatnh lmlk ola hiiti re lpnio׃ 
nehemiah 2:2	oiamr li hmlk mdoe pnik reim oath aink Holh ain ch ki am re lb oaira hrbh mad׃ 
nehemiah 2:3	oamr lmlk hmlk leolm iHih mdoe la ireo pni aSr heir bit qbrot abti Hrbh oSerih aklo baS׃ 
nehemiah 2:4	oiamr li hmlk el mh ch ath mbqS oatpll al alhi hSmim׃ 
nehemiah 2:5	oamr lmlk am el hmlk Tob oam iiTb ebdk lpnik aSr tSlHni al ihodh al eir qbrot abti oabnnh׃ 
nehemiah 2:6	oiamr li hmlk ohSgl ioSbt azlo ed mti ihih mhlkk omti tSob oiiTb lpni hmlk oiSlHni oatnh lo cmn׃ 
nehemiah 2:7	oaomr lmlk am el hmlk Tob agrot itno li el pHoot ebr hnhr aSr iebironi ed aSr aboa al ihodh׃ 
nehemiah 2:8	oagrt al asp Smr hprds aSr lmlk aSr itn li ezim lqrot at Seri hbirh aSr lbit olHomt heir olbit aSr aboa alio oitn li hmlk kid alhi hTobh eli׃ 
nehemiah 2:9	oaboa al pHoot ebr hnhr oatnh lhm at agrot hmlk oiSlH emi hmlk Sri Hil oprSim׃ 
nehemiah 2:10	oiSme snblT hHrni oTobih hebd hemni oire lhm reh gdlh aSr ba adm lbqS Tobh lbni iSral׃ 
nehemiah 2:11	oaboa al iroSlm oahi Sm imim SlSh׃ 
nehemiah 2:12	oaqom lilh ani oanSim meT emi ola hgdti ladm mh alhi ntn al lbi leSot liroSlm obhmh ain emi ki am hbhmh aSr ani rkb bh׃ 
nehemiah 2:13	oazah bSer hgia lilh oal pni ein htnin oal Ser haSpt oahi Sbr bHomt iroSlm aSr hm prozim oSerih aklo baS׃ 
nehemiah 2:14	oaebr al Ser hein oal brkt hmlk oain mqom lbhmh lebr tHti׃ 
nehemiah 2:15	oahi elh bnHl lilh oahi Sbr bHomh oaSob oaboa bSer hgia oaSob׃ 
nehemiah 2:16	ohsgnim la ideo anh hlkti omh ani eSh olihodim olkhnim olHrim olsgnim olitr eSh hmlakh ed kn la hgdti׃ 
nehemiah 2:17	oaomr alhm atm raim hreh aSr anHno bh aSr iroSlm Hrbh oSerih nzto baS lko onbnh at Homt iroSlm ola nhih eod Hrph׃ 
nehemiah 2:18	oagid lhm at id alhi aSr hia Tobh eli oap dbri hmlk aSr amr li oiamro nqom obnino oiHcqo idihm lTobh׃ 
nehemiah 2:19	oiSme snblT hHrni oTbih hebd hemoni ogSm herbi oilego lno oibco elino oiamro mh hdbr hch aSr atm eSim hel hmlk atm mrdim׃ 
nehemiah 2:20	oaSib aotm dbr oaomr lhm alhi hSmim hoa izliH lno oanHno ebdio nqom obnino olkm ain Hlq ozdqh ockron biroSlm׃ 
nehemiah 3:1	oiqm aliSib hkhn hgdol oaHio hkhnim oibno at Ser hzan hmh qdSoho oiemido dlttio oed mgdl hmah qdSoho ed mgdl Hnnal׃ 
nehemiah 3:2	oel ido bno anSi irHo oel ido bnh ckor bn amri׃ 
nehemiah 3:3	oat Ser hdgim bno bni hsnah hmh qroho oiemido dlttio mneolio obriHio׃ 
nehemiah 3:4	oel idm hHciq mrmot bn aorih bn hqoz oel idm hHciq mSlm bn brkih bn mSicbal oel idm hHciq zdoq bn bena׃ 
nehemiah 3:5	oel idm hHciqo htqoeim oadirihm la hbiao zorm bebdt adnihm׃ 
nehemiah 3:6	oat Ser hiSnh hHciqo ioide bn psH omSlm bn bsodih hmh qroho oiemido dlttio omnelio obriHio׃ 
nehemiah 3:7	oel idm hHciq mlTih hgbeni oidon hmrnti anSi gbeon ohmzph lksa pHt ebr hnhr׃ 
nehemiah 3:8	el ido hHciq ecial bn Hrhih zorpim oel ido hHciq Hnnih bn hrqHim oiecbo iroSlm ed hHomh hrHbh׃ 
nehemiah 3:9	oel idm hHciq rpih bn Hor Sr Hzi plk iroSlm׃ 
nehemiah 3:10	oel idm hHciq idih bn Hromp ongd bito oel ido hHciq HToS bn HSbnih׃ 
nehemiah 3:11	mdh Snit hHciq mlkih bn Hrm oHSob bn pHt moab oat mgdl htnorim׃ 
nehemiah 3:12	oel ido hHciq Slom bn hloHS Sr Hzi plk iroSlm hoa obnotio׃ 
nehemiah 3:13	at Ser hgia hHciq Hnon oiSbi cnoH hmh bnoho oiemido dlttio mnelio obriHio oalp amh bHomh ed Ser hSpot׃ 
nehemiah 3:14	oat Ser haSpot hHciq mlkih bn rkb Sr plk bit hkrm hoa ibnno oiemid dlttio mnelio obriHio׃ 
nehemiah 3:15	oat Ser hein hHciq Slon bn kl Hch Sr plk hmzph hoa ibnno oiTllno oiemido dlttio mnelio obriHio oat Homt brkt hSlH lgn hmlk oed hmelot hiordot meir doid׃ 
nehemiah 3:16	aHrio hHciq nHmih bn ecboq Sr Hzi plk bit zor ed ngd qbri doid oed hbrkh heSoih oed bit hgbrim׃ 
nehemiah 3:17	aHrio hHciqo hloim rHom bn bni el ido hHciq HSbih Sr Hzi plk qeilh lplko׃ 
nehemiah 3:18	aHrio hHciqo aHihm boi bn Hndd Sr Hzi plk qeilh׃ 
nehemiah 3:19	oiHcq el ido ecr bn iSoe Sr hmzph mdh Snit mngd elt hnSq hmqze׃ 
nehemiah 3:20	aHrio hHrh hHciq brok bn cbi mdh Snit mn hmqzoe ed ptH bit aliSib hkhn hgdol׃ 
nehemiah 3:21	aHrio hHciq mrmot bn aorih bn hqoz mdh Snit mptH bit aliSib oed tklit bit aliSib׃ 
nehemiah 3:22	oaHrio hHciqo hkhnim anSi hkkr׃ 
nehemiah 3:23	aHrio hHciq bnimn oHSob ngd bitm aHrio hHciq ecrih bn meSih bn ennih azl bito׃ 
nehemiah 3:24	aHrio hHciq bnoi bn Hndd mdh Snit mbit ecrih ed hmqzoe oed hpnh׃ 
nehemiah 3:25	pll bn aoci mngd hmqzoe ohmgdl hioza mbit hmlk helion aSr lHzr hmTrh aHrio pdih bn preS׃ 
nehemiah 3:26	ohntinim hio iSbim bepl ed ngd Ser hmim lmcrH ohmgdl hioza׃ 
nehemiah 3:27	aHrio hHciqo htqeim mdh Snit mngd hmgdl hgdol hioza oed Homt hepl׃ 
nehemiah 3:28	mel Ser hsosim hHciqo hkhnim aiS lngd bito׃ 
nehemiah 3:29	aHrio hHciq zdoq bn amr ngd bito oaHrio hHciq Smeih bn Sknih Smr Ser hmcrH׃ 
nehemiah 3:30	aHri hHciq Hnnih bn Slmih oHnon bn zlp hSSi mdh Sni aHrio hHciq mSlm bn brkih ngd nSkto׃ 
nehemiah 3:31	aHri hHciq mlkih bn hzrpi ed bit hntinim ohrklim ngd Ser hmpqd oed elit hpnh׃ 
nehemiah 3:32	obin elit hpnh lSer hzan hHciqo hzrpim ohrklim׃ 
nehemiah 4:1	oihi kaSr Sme snblT ki anHno bonim at hHomh oiHr lo oikes hrbh oileg el hihodim׃ 
nehemiah 4:2	oiamr lpni aHio oHil Smron oiamr mh hihodim hamllim eSim hiecbo lhm hicbHo hiklo biom hiHio at habnim mermot hepr ohmh Sropot׃ 
nehemiah 4:3	oTobih hemni azlo oiamr gm aSr hm bonim am ielh Soel oprz Homt abnihm׃ 
nehemiah 4:4	Sme alhino ki hiino boch ohSb Hrptm al raSm otnm lbch barz Sbih׃ 
nehemiah 4:5	oal tks el eonm oHTatm mlpnik al tmHh ki hkeiso lngd hbonim׃ 
nehemiah 4:6	onbnh at hHomh otqSr kl hHomh ed Hzih oihi lb lem leSot׃ 
nehemiah 4:7	oihi kaSr Sme snblT oTobih oherbim ohemnim ohaSdodim ki elth arokh lHmot iroSlm ki hHlo hprzim lhstm oiHr lhm mad׃ 
nehemiah 4:8	oiqSro klm iHdo lboa lhlHm biroSlm oleSot lo toeh׃ 
nehemiah 4:9	ontpll al alhino onemid mSmr elihm iomm olilh mpnihm׃ 
nehemiah 4:10	oiamr ihodh kSl kH hsbl ohepr hrbh oanHno la nokl lbnot bHomh׃ 
nehemiah 4:11	oiamro zrino la ideo ola irao ed aSr nboa al tokm ohrgnom ohSbtno at hmlakh׃ 
nehemiah 4:12	oihi kaSr bao hihodim hiSbim azlm oiamro lno eSr pemim mkl hmqmot aSr tSobo elino׃ 
nehemiah 4:13	oaemid mtHtiot lmqom maHri lHomh bzHHiim oaemid at hem lmSpHot em Hrbtihm rmHihm oqSttihm׃ 
nehemiah 4:14	oara oaqom oamr al hHrim oal hsgnim oal itr hem al tirao mpnihm at adni hgdol ohnora ckro ohlHmo el aHikm bnikm obntikm nSikm obtikm׃ 
nehemiah 4:15	oihi kaSr Smeo aoibino ki node lno oipr halhim at eztm onSob klno al hHomh aiS al mlakto׃ 
nehemiah 4:16	oihi mn hiom hhoa Hzi neri eSim bmlakh oHzim mHciqim ohrmHim hmgnim ohqStot ohSrinim ohSrim aHri kl bit ihodh׃ 
nehemiah 4:17	hbonim bHomh ohnSaim bsbl emSim baHt ido eSh bmlakh oaHt mHcqt hSlH׃ 
nehemiah 4:18	ohbonim aiS Hrbo asorim el mtnio obonim ohtoqe bSopr azli׃ 
nehemiah 4:19	oamr al hHrim oal hsgnim oal itr hem hmlakh hrbh orHbh oanHno nprdim el hHomh rHoqim aiS maHio׃ 
nehemiah 4:20	bmqom aSr tSmeo at qol hSopr Smh tqbzo alino alhino ilHm lno׃ 
nehemiah 4:21	oanHno eSim bmlakh oHzim mHciqim brmHim melot hSHr ed zat hkokbim׃ 
nehemiah 4:22	gm bet hhia amrti lem aiS onero ilino btok iroSlm ohio lno hlilh mSmr ohiom mlakh׃ 
nehemiah 4:23	oain ani oaHi oneri oanSi hmSmr aSr aHri ain anHno pSTim bgdino aiS SlHo hmim׃ 
nehemiah 5:1	othi zeqt hem onSihm gdolh al aHihm hihodim׃ 
nehemiah 5:2	oiS aSr amrim bnino obntino anHno rbim onqHh dgn onaklh onHih׃ 
nehemiah 5:3	oiS aSr amrim Sdtino okrmino obtino anHno erbim onqHh dgn breb׃ 
nehemiah 5:4	oiS aSr amrim loino ksp lmdt hmlk Sdtino okrmino׃ 
nehemiah 5:5	oeth kbSr aHino bSrno kbnihm bnino ohnh anHno kbSim at bnino oat bntino lebdim oiS mbntino nkbSot oain lal idno oSdtino okrmino laHrim׃ 
nehemiah 5:6	oiHr li mad kaSr Smeti at ceqtm oat hdbrim halh׃ 
nehemiah 5:7	oimlk lbi eli oaribh at hHrim oat hsgnim oamrh lhm mSa aiS baHio atm nSaim oatn elihm qhlh gdolh׃ 
nehemiah 5:8	oamrh lhm anHno qnino at aHino hihodim hnmkrim lgoim kdi bno ogm atm tmkro at aHikm onmkro lno oiHriSo ola mzao dbr׃ 
nehemiah 5:9	oiamr la Tob hdbr aSr atm eSim hloa birat alhino tlko mHrpt hgoim aoibino׃ 
nehemiah 5:10	ogm ani aHi oneri nSim bhm ksp odgn necbh na at hmSa hch׃ 
nehemiah 5:11	hSibo na lhm khiom Sdtihm krmihm citihm obtihm omat hksp ohdgn htiroS ohizhr aSr atm nSim bhm׃ 
nehemiah 5:12	oiamro nSib omhm la nbqS kn neSh kaSr ath aomr oaqra at hkhnim oaSbiem leSot kdbr hch׃ 
nehemiah 5:13	gm Hzni nerti oamrh kkh iner halhim at kl haiS aSr la iqim at hdbr hch mbito omigieo okkh ihih neor orq oiamro kl hqhl amn oihllo at ihoh oieS hem kdbr hch׃ 
nehemiah 5:14	gm miom aSr zoh ati lhiot pHm barz ihodh mSnt eSrim oed Snt SlSim oStim lartHSsta hmlk Snim Stim eSrh ani oaHi lHm hpHh la aklti׃ 
nehemiah 5:15	ohpHot hraSnim aSr lpni hkbido el hem oiqHo mhm blHm oiin aHr ksp Sqlim arbeim gm nerihm SlTo el hem oani la eSiti kn mpni irat alhim׃ 
nehemiah 5:16	ogm bmlakt hHomh hcat hHcqti oSdh la qnino okl neri qbozim Sm el hmlakh׃ 
nehemiah 5:17	ohihodim ohsgnim mah oHmSim aiS ohbaim alino mn hgoim aSr sbibtino el SlHni׃ 
nehemiah 5:18	oaSr hih neSh liom aHd Sor aHd zan SS brrot ozprim neSo li obin eSrt imim bkl iin lhrbh oem ch lHm hpHh la bqSti ki kbdh hebdh el hem hch׃ 
nehemiah 5:19	ckrh li alhi lTobh kl aSr eSiti el hem hch׃ 
nehemiah 6:1	oihi kaSr nSme lsnblT oTobih olgSm herbi olitr aibino ki bniti at hHomh ola notr bh prz gm ed het hhia dltot la hemdti bSerim׃ 
nehemiah 6:2	oiSlH snblT ogSm ali lamr lkh onoedh iHdo bkpirim bbqet aono ohmh HSbim leSot li reh׃ 
nehemiah 6:3	oaSlHh elihm mlakim lamr mlakh gdolh ani eSh ola aokl lrdt lmh tSbt hmlakh kaSr arph oirdti alikm׃ 
nehemiah 6:4	oiSlHo ali kdbr hch arbe pemim oaSib aotm kdbr hch׃ 
nehemiah 6:5	oiSlH ali snblT kdbr hch pem HmiSit at nero oagrt ptoHh bido׃ 
nehemiah 6:6	ktob bh bgoim nSme ogSmo amr ath ohihodim HSbim lmrod el kn ath bonh hHomh oath hoh lhm lmlk kdbrim halh׃ 
nehemiah 6:7	ogm nbiaim hemdt lqra elik biroSlm lamr mlk bihodh oeth iSme lmlk kdbrim halh oeth lkh onoezh iHdo׃ 
nehemiah 6:8	oaSlHh alio lamr la nhih kdbrim halh aSr ath aomr ki mlbk ath bodam׃ 
nehemiah 6:9	ki klm miraim aotno lamr irpo idihm mn hmlakh ola teSh oeth Hcq at idi׃ 
nehemiah 6:10	oani bati bit Smeih bn dlih bn mhiTbal ohoa ezor oiamr noed al bit halhim al tok hhikl onsgrh dltot hhikl ki baim lhrgk olilh baim lhrgk׃ 
nehemiah 6:11	oamrh haiS kmoni ibrH omi kmoni aSr iboa al hhikl oHi la aboa׃ 
nehemiah 6:12	oakirh ohnh la alhim SlHo ki hnboah dbr eli oTobih osnblT Skro׃ 
nehemiah 6:13	lmen Skor hoa lmen aira oaeSh kn oHTati ohih lhm lSm re lmen iHrponi׃ 
nehemiah 6:14	ckrh alhi lTobih olsnblT kmeSio alh ogm lnoedih hnbiah olitr hnbiaim aSr hio miraim aoti׃ 
nehemiah 6:15	otSlm hHomh beSrim oHmSh lalol lHmSim oSnim iom׃ 
nehemiah 6:16	oihi kaSr Smeo kl aoibino oirao kl hgoim aSr sbibtino oiplo mad beinihm oideo ki mat alhino neSth hmlakh hcat׃ 
nehemiah 6:17	gm bimim hhm mrbim Hri ihodh agrtihm holkot el Tobih oaSr lTobih baot alihm׃ 
nehemiah 6:18	ki rbim bihodh beli Sboeh lo ki Htn hoa lSknih bn arH oihoHnn bno lqH at bt mSlm bn brkih׃ 
nehemiah 6:19	gm Tobtio hio amrim lpni odbri hio moziaim lo agrot SlH Tobih lirani׃ 
nehemiah 7:1	oihi kaSr nbnth hHomh oaemid hdltot oipqdo hSoerim ohmSrrim ohloim׃ 
nehemiah 7:2	oazoh at Hnni aHi oat Hnnih Sr hbirh el iroSlm ki hoa kaiS amt oira at halhim mrbim׃ 
nehemiah 7:3	oiamr lhm la iptHo Seri iroSlm ed Hm hSmS oed hm emdim igipo hdltot oaHco ohemid mSmrot iSbi iroSlm aiS bmSmro oaiS ngd bito׃ 
nehemiah 7:4	oheir rHbt idim ogdolh ohem meT btokh oain btim bnoim׃ 
nehemiah 7:5	oitn alhi al lbi oaqbzh at hHrim oat hsgnim oat hem lhtiHS oamza spr hiHS heolim braSonh oamza ktob bo׃ 
nehemiah 7:6	alh bni hmdinh helim mSbi hgolh aSr hglh nbokdnzr mlk bbl oiSobo liroSlm olihodh aiS leiro׃ 
nehemiah 7:7	hbaim em crbbl iSoe nHmih ecrih remih nHmni mrdki blSn msprt bgoi nHom benh mspr anSi em iSral׃ 
nehemiah 7:8	bni preS alpim mah oSbeim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:9	bni SpTih SlS maot Sbeim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:10	bni arH SS maot HmSim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:11	bni pHt moab lbni iSoe oioab alpim oSmnh maot Smnh eSr׃ 
nehemiah 7:12	bni eilm alp matim HmSim oarbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:13	bni ctoa Smnh maot arbeim oHmSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:14	bni cki Sbe maot oSSim׃ 
nehemiah 7:15	bni bnoi SS maot arbeim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:16	bni bbi SS maot eSrim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:17	bni ecgd alpim SlS maot eSrim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:18	bni adniqm SS maot SSim oSbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:19	bni bgoi alpim SSim oSbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:20	bni edin SS maot HmSim oHmSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:21	bni aTr lHcqih tSeim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:22	bni HSm SlS maot eSrim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:23	bni bzi SlS maot eSrim oarbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:24	bni Hrip mah Snim eSr׃ 
nehemiah 7:25	bni gbeon tSeim oHmSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:26	anSi bit lHm onTph mah Smnim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:27	anSi entot mah eSrim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:28	anSi bit ecmot arbeim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:29	anSi qrit ierim kpirh obarot Sbe maot arbeim oSlSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:30	anSi hrmh ogbe SS maot eSrim oaHd׃ 
nehemiah 7:31	anSi mkms mah oeSrim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:32	anSi bit al ohei mah eSrim oSlSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:33	anSi nbo aHr HmSim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:34	bni eilm aHr alp matim HmSim oarbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:35	bni Hrm SlS maot oeSrim׃ 
nehemiah 7:36	bni irHo SlS maot arbeim oHmSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:37	bni ld Hdid oaono Sbe maot oeSrim oaHd׃ 
nehemiah 7:38	bni snah SlSt alpim tSe maot oSlSim׃ 
nehemiah 7:39	hkhnim bni ideih lbit iSoe tSe maot Sbeim oSlSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:40	bni amr alp HmSim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:41	bni pSHor alp matim arbeim oSbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:42	bni Hrm alp Sbeh eSr׃ 
nehemiah 7:43	hloim bni iSoe lqdmial lbni lhodoh Sbeim oarbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:44	hmSrrim bni asp mah arbeim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:45	hSerim bni Slom bni aTr bni Tlmn bni eqob bni HTiTa bni Sbi mah SlSim oSmnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:46	hntinim bni zHa bni HSpa bni Tbeot׃ 
nehemiah 7:47	bni qirs bni siea bni pdon׃ 
nehemiah 7:48	bni lbnh bni Hgbh bni Slmi׃ 
nehemiah 7:49	bni Hnn bni gdl bni gHr׃ 
nehemiah 7:50	bni raih bni rzin bni nqoda׃ 
nehemiah 7:51	bni gcm bni eca bni psH׃ 
nehemiah 7:52	bni bsi bni meonim bni npoSsim׃ 
nehemiah 7:53	bni bqboq bni Hqopa bni HrHor׃ 
nehemiah 7:54	bni bzlit bni mHida bni HrSa׃ 
nehemiah 7:55	bni brqos bni sisra bni tmH׃ 
nehemiah 7:56	bni nziH bni HTipa׃ 
nehemiah 7:57	bni ebdi Slmh bni soTi bni soprt bni prida׃ 
nehemiah 7:58	bni iela bni drqon bni gdl׃ 
nehemiah 7:59	bni SpTih bni HTil bni pkrt hzbiim bni amon׃ 
nehemiah 7:60	kl hntinim obni ebdi Slmh SlS maot tSeim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:61	oalh heolim mtl mlH tl HrSa krob adon oamr ola iklo lhgid bit abotm ocrem am miSral hm׃ 
nehemiah 7:62	bni dlih bni Tobih bni nqoda SS maot oarbeim oSnim׃ 
nehemiah 7:63	omn hkhnim bni Hbih bni hqoz bni brcli aSr lqH mbnot brcli hgledi aSh oiqra el Smm׃ 
nehemiah 7:64	alh bqSo ktbm hmtiHSim ola nmza oigalo mn hkhnh׃ 
nehemiah 7:65	oiamr htrSta lhm aSr la iaklo mqdS hqdSim ed emd hkhn laorim otomim׃ 
nehemiah 7:66	kl hqhl kaHd arbe rboa alpim SlS maot oSSim׃ 
nehemiah 7:67	mlbd ebdihm oamhtihm alh Sbet alpim SlS maot SlSim oSbeh olhm mSrrim omSrrot matim oarbeim oHmSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:68	sosihm Sbe maot SlSim oSSh prdihm matim arbeim oHmSh׃ 
nehemiah 7:69	gmlim arbe maot SlSim oHmSh Hmrim SSt alpim Sbe maot oeSrim׃ 
nehemiah 7:70	omqzt raSi habot ntno lmlakh htrSta ntn laozr chb drkmnim alp mcrqot HmSim ktnot khnim SlSim oHmS maot׃ 
nehemiah 7:71	omraSi habot ntno laozr hmlakh chb drkmonim Sti rbot oksp mnim alpim omatim׃ 
nehemiah 7:72	oaSr ntno Sarit hem chb drkmonim Sti rboa oksp mnim alpim oktnt khnim SSim oSbeh׃ 
nehemiah 7:73	oiSbo hkhnim ohloim ohSoerim ohmSrrim omn hem ohntinim okl iSral berihm oige hHdS hSbiei obni iSral berihm׃ 
nehemiah 8:1	oiaspo kl hem kaiS aHd al hrHob aSr lpni Ser hmim oiamro lecra hspr lhbia at spr tort mSh aSr zoh ihoh at iSral׃ 
nehemiah 8:2	oibia ecra hkhn at htorh lpni hqhl maiS oed aSh okl mbin lSme biom aHd lHdS hSbiei׃ 
nehemiah 8:3	oiqra bo lpni hrHob aSr lpni Ser hmim mn haor ed mHzit hiom ngd hanSim ohnSim ohmbinim oacni kl hem al spr htorh׃ 
nehemiah 8:4	oiemd ecra hspr el mgdl ez aSr eSo ldbr oiemd azlo mttih oSme oenih oaorih oHlqih omeSih el imino omSmalo pdih omiSal omlkih oHSm oHSbdnh ckrih mSlm׃ 
nehemiah 8:5	oiptH ecra hspr leini kl hem ki mel kl hem hih okptHo emdo kl hem׃ 
nehemiah 8:6	oibrk ecra at ihoh halhim hgdol oieno kl hem amn amn bmel idihm oiqdo oiStHo lihoh apim arzh׃ 
nehemiah 8:7	oiSoe obni oSrbih imin eqob Sbti hodih meSih qliTa ecrih iocbd Hnn plaih ohloim mbinim at hem ltorh ohem el emdm׃ 
nehemiah 8:8	oiqrao bspr btort halhim mprS oSom Skl oibino bmqra׃ 
nehemiah 8:9	oiamr nHmih hoa htrSta oecra hkhn hspr ohloim hmbinim at hem lkl hem hiom qdS hoa lihoh alhikm al ttablo oal tbko ki bokim kl hem kSmem at dbri htorh׃ 
nehemiah 8:10	oiamr lhm lko aklo mSmnim oSto mmtqim oSlHo mnot lain nkon lo ki qdoS hiom ladnino oal tezbo ki Hdot ihoh hia meckm׃ 
nehemiah 8:11	ohloim mHSim lkl hem lamr hso ki hiom qdS oal tezbo׃ 
nehemiah 8:12	oilko kl hem lakl olStot olSlH mnot oleSot SmHh gdolh ki hbino bdbrim aSr hodieo lhm׃ 
nehemiah 8:13	obiom hSni naspo raSi habot lkl hem hkhnim ohloim al ecra hspr olhSkil al dbri htorh׃ 
nehemiah 8:14	oimzao ktob btorh aSr zoh ihoh bid mSh aSr iSbo bni iSral bskot bHg bHdS hSbiei׃ 
nehemiah 8:15	oaSr iSmieo oiebiro qol bkl erihm obiroSlm lamr zao hhr ohbiao eli cit oeli ez Smn oeli hds oeli tmrim oeli ez ebt leSt skt kktob׃ 
nehemiah 8:16	oizao hem oibiao oieSo lhm skot aiS el ggo obHzrtihm obHzrot bit halhim obrHob Ser hmim obrHob Ser aprim׃ 
nehemiah 8:17	oieSo kl hqhl hSbim mn hSbi skot oiSbo bskot ki la eSo mimi iSoe bn non kn bni iSral ed hiom hhoa othi SmHh gdolh mad׃

nehemiah 13:20	oilino hrklim omkri kl mmkr mHoz liroSlm pem oStim׃

nehemiah 13:27	olkm hnSme leSt at kl hreh hgdolh hcat lmel balhino lhSib nSim nkriot׃

nehemiah 13:31	olqrbn hezim betim mcmnot olbkorim ckrh li alhi lTobh׃

2_chronicles 3:2	oiHl lbnot bHdS hSni bSni bSnt arbe lmlkoto׃

2_chronicles 3:4	ohaolm aSr el pni hark el pni rHb hbit amot eSrim ohgbh mah oeSrim oizpho mpnimh chb Thor׃ 
2_chronicles 3:5	oat hbit hgdol Hph ez broSim oiHpho chb Tob oiel elio tmrim oSrSrot׃ 
2_chronicles 3:6	oizp at hbit abn iqrh ltpart ohchb chb proim׃ 
2_chronicles 3:7	oiHp at hbit hqrot hspim oqirotio odltotio chb optH krobim el hqirot׃ 
2_chronicles 3:8	oieS at bit qdS hqdSim arko el pni rHb hbit amot eSrim orHbo amot eSrim oiHpho chb Tob lkkrim SS maot׃ 
2_chronicles 3:9	omSql lmsmrot lSqlim HmSim chb oheliot Hph chb׃ 
2_chronicles 3:10	oieS bbit qdS hqdSim krobim Snim meSh zezeim oizpo atm chb׃ 
2_chronicles 3:11	oknpi hkrobim arkm amot eSrim knp haHd lamot HmS mget lqir hbit ohknp haHrt amot HmS mgie lknp hkrob haHr׃ 
2_chronicles 3:12	oknp hkrob haHd amot HmS mgie lqir hbit ohknp haHrt amot HmS dbqh lknp hkrob haHr׃ 
2_chronicles 3:13	knpi hkrobim halh prSim amot eSrim ohm emdim el rglihm opnihm lbit׃ 
2_chronicles 3:14	oieS at hprkt tklt oargmn okrmil oboz oiel elio krobim׃

2_chronicles 9:21	ki aniot lmlk hlkot trSiS em ebdi Horm aHt lSloS Snim tboanh aniot trSiS nSaot chb oksp Snhbim oqopim otokiim׃

2_chronicles 25:3	oihi kaSr Hcqh hmmlkh elio oihrg at ebdio hmkim at hmlk abio׃ 
2_chronicles 25:4	oat bnihm la hmit ki kktob btorh bspr mSh aSr zoh ihoh lamr la imoto abot el bnim obnim la imoto el abot ki aiS bHTao imoto׃ 
2_chronicles 25:5	oiqbz amziho at ihodh oiemidm lbit abot lSri halpim olSri hmaot lkl ihodh obnimn oipqdm lmbn eSrim Snh omelh oimzam SlS maot alp bHor ioza zba aHc rmH oznh׃ 
2_chronicles 25:6	oiSkr miSral mah alp gbor Hil bmah kkr ksp׃ 
2_chronicles 25:7	oaiS halhim ba alio lamr hmlk al iba emk zba iSral ki ain ihoh em iSral kl bni aprim׃ 
2_chronicles 25:8	ki am ba ath eSh Hcq lmlHmh ikSilk halhim lpni aoib ki iS kH balhim lecor olhkSil׃ 
2_chronicles 25:9	oiamr amziho laiS halhim omh leSot lmat hkkr aSr ntti lgdod iSral oiamr aiS halhim iS lihoh ltt lk hrbh mch׃ 
2_chronicles 25:10	oibdilm amziho lhgdod aSr ba alio maprim llkt lmqomm oiHr apm mad bihodh oiSobo lmqomm bHri ap׃ 
2_chronicles 25:11	oamziho htHcq oinhg at emo oilk gia hmlH oik at bni Seir eSrt alpim׃ 
2_chronicles 25:12	oeSrt alpim Hiim Sbo bni ihodh oibiaom lraS hsle oiSlikom mraS hsle oklm nbqeo׃ 
2_chronicles 25:13	obni hgdod aSr hSib amziho mlkt emo lmlHmh oipSTo beri ihodh mSmron oed bit Horon oiko mhm SlSt alpim oibco bch rbh׃ 
2_chronicles 25:14	oihi aHri boa amziho mhkot at adomim oiba at alhi bni Seir oiemidm lo lalhim olpnihm iStHoh olhm iqTr׃

2_chronicles 25:16	oihi bdbro alio oiamr lo hlioez lmlk ntnok Hdl lk lmh ikok oiHdl hnbia oiamr ideti ki iez alhim lhSHitk ki eSit cat ola Smet lezti׃

2_chronicles 25:18	oiSlH ioaS mlk iSral al amziho mlk ihodh lamr hHoH aSr blbnon SlH al harc aSr blbnon lamr tnh at btk lbni laSh otebr Hit hSdh aSr blbnon otrms at hHoH׃ 
2_chronicles 25:19	amrt hnh hkit at adom onSak lbk lhkbid eth Sbh bbitk lmh ttgrh breh onplt ath oihodh emk׃ 
2_chronicles 25:20	ola Sme amziho ki mhalhim hia lmen ttm bid ki drSo at alhi adom׃ 
2_chronicles 25:21	oiel ioaS mlk iSral oitrao pnim hoa oamziho mlk ihodh bbit SmS aSr lihodh׃ 
2_chronicles 25:22	oingp ihodh lpni iSral oinso aiS lahlio׃ 
2_chronicles 25:23	oat amziho mlk ihodh bn ioaS bn ihoaHc tpS ioaS mlk iSral bbit SmS oibiaho iroSlm oiprz bHomt iroSlm mSer aprim ed Ser hponh arbe maot amh׃

2_chronicles 36:12	oieS hre beini ihoh alhio la nkne mlpni irmiho hnbia mpi ihoh׃ 
2_chronicles 36:13	ogm bmlk nbokdnazr mrd aSr hSbieo balhim oiqS at erpo oiamz at lbbo mSob al ihoh alhi iSral׃ 
2_chronicles 36:14	gm kl Sri hkhnim ohem hrbo lmeol mel kkl tebot hgoim oiTmao at bit ihoh aSr hqdiS biroSlm׃ 
2_chronicles 36:15	oiSlH ihoh alhi abotihm elihm bid mlakio hSkm oSloH ki Hml el emo oel meono׃ 
2_chronicles 36:16	oihio mlebim bmlaki halhim obocim dbrio omteteim bnbaio ed elot Hmt ihoh bemo ed lain mrpa׃ 
2_chronicles 36:17	oiel elihm at mlk kSdiim oihrg bHorihm bHrb bbit mqdSm ola Hml el bHor obtolh cqn oiSS hkl ntn bido׃ 
2_chronicles 36:18	okl kli bit halhim hgdlim ohqTnim oazrot bit ihoh oazrot hmlk oSrio hkl hbia bbl׃ 
2_chronicles 36:19	oiSrpo at bit halhim ointzo at Homt iroSlm okl armnotih Srpo baS okl kli mHmdih lhSHit׃ 
2_chronicles 36:20	oigl hSarit mn hHrb al bbl oihio lo olbnio lebdim ed mlk mlkot prs׃ 
2_chronicles 36:21	lmlaot dbr ihoh bpi irmiho ed rzth harz at Sbtotih kl imi hSmh Sbth lmlaot Sbeim Snh׃ 
2_chronicles 36:22	obSnt aHt lkorS mlk prs lklot dbr ihoh bpi irmiho heir ihoh at roH korS mlk prs oiebr qol bkl mlkoto ogm bmktb lamr׃ 
2_chronicles 36:23	kh amr korS mlk prs kl mmlkot harz ntn li ihoh alhi hSmim ohoa pqd eli lbnot lo bit biroSlm aSr bihodh mi bkm mkl emo ihoh alhio emo oiel׃ 
romans 1:1	polos ebd ihoSe hmSiH mqra lhiot SliH onbdl lbSort alhim׃ 
romans 1:2	aSr hbTiHh mlpnim bid nbiaio bktbi hqdS׃ 
romans 1:3	el dbr bno hnold mcre dod lpi hbSr׃ 
romans 1:4	aSr hokn lbn halhim bgborh lpi roH hqdSh btHito mbin hmtim hoa ihoSe hmSiH adnino׃ 
romans 1:5	aSr bido qblno Hn oSliHot lhqim mSmet hamonh bkl hgoim lmen Smo׃ 
romans 1:6	aSr btokm hnkm gm atm qroai ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
romans 1:7	lkl aSr bromi ididi alhim oqroaim lhiot qdoSim Hsd oSlom lkm mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
romans 1:8	braSonh aodh lalhi bihoSe hmSiH el klkm aSr spr amontkm bkl heolm׃ 
romans 1:9	ki halhim aSr ani ebd ato broHi bbSort bno led li ki tmid ani mckir atkm׃ 
romans 1:10	bhetiri btploti bkl et lmen aSr rq hpem azliH brzon alhim lboa alikm׃ 
romans 1:11	ki nksp nkspti lraotkm olHlq lkm ai co mtt roH lmen ttHcqi׃ 
romans 1:12	ohoa lhtnHm emkm ch bch bamonh aSr lkm ogm li׃ 
romans 1:13	ola akHd mkm aHi ki pemim rbot Smti el lbi lboa alikm ak nmne mmni ed hnh lmen amza pri gm bkm kmo bitr hgoim׃ 
romans 1:14	mHib anki lionim ogm llecim lHkmim ogm lptaim׃ 
romans 1:15	lkn ndbni lbi lhSmie at hbSorh gm atkm aSr bromi׃ 
romans 1:16	ki ainni boS mbSort hmSiH baSr gbort alhim hia ltSoet kl hmamin lihodi braSonh okn gm lioni׃ 
romans 1:17	ki tglh bh zdqt alhim mamonh al amonh kktob ozdiq bamonto iHih׃ 
romans 1:18	ki nglh Hron alhim mn hSmim el kl rSet bni adm oeoltm aSr iezro at hamt beolh׃ 
romans 1:19	ien aSr det halhim gloih bqrbm ki halhim hodiem aoth׃ 
romans 1:20	ki mhoto hnelmh hia kHo hnzHi oalhoto met nbra heolm tode bmeSim otrah lblti hiot lhm lhtnzl׃ 
romans 1:21	ien bdetm at halhim la kbdho kalhim ogm la hodo lo ki am hlko aHri hhbl bmoezotihm oiHSk lbm hnber׃ 
romans 1:22	obamrm Hkmim anHno hio lksilim׃ 
romans 1:23	oimiro at kbod halhim aSr ainno npsd bdmot zlm adm hnpsd zlm kl eop oholk el arbe ormS hadmh׃ 
romans 1:24	el kn gm ntnm halhim lTmah btaot lbm lnbl goiotihm aiS at reho׃ 
romans 1:25	aSr hmiro amt halhim bkcb oikbdo oiebdo at hbrih tHt brah hmbrk leolmim amn׃ 
romans 1:26	bebor cat ntnm halhim ltaot boSh ki nSihm hHlipo at htSmiS kdrkn bSla kdrkn׃ 
romans 1:27	okn gm hckrim ecbo at tSmiS haSh kdrkh oiHmo ch bch btSoqtm oieSo toebh ckr em ckr oiqHo Skr mSobtm hraoi lhm bezm gopm׃ 
romans 1:28	okaSr maso lhSig halhim bdet ntnm halhim bidi deh nmash leSot at aSr la itkn׃ 
romans 1:29	oirb bqrbm kl Hms cnot orSe bze oaon oimlao qnah orzH omribh omrmh othpkot׃ 
romans 1:30	hlki rkil omlSinim Snai alhim ogaim ocdim ohollim oHSbi aon oainm Smeim bqol abotm׃ 
romans 1:31	nberim mdet obgdim akcrim nTri Snah ola rHmnim׃ 
romans 1:32	iodeim hmh at mSpT alhim ki eSi alh bni mot hm ola lbd SieSo at alh ki gm rzth npSm beSihm׃ 
romans 2:1	lkn ain lk htnzlot ath bn adm hdn thih mi Sthih ki bmh Stdin at Hbrk tHib at npSk baSr ath hdn teSh kmeSho׃ 
romans 2:2	oideno ki mSpT alhim kpi hamt el eSi alh׃ 
romans 2:3	oath bn adm hdn at aSr pelo kalh oeSit kmeSihm htHSb lhmlT mmSpT halhim׃ 
romans 2:4	ao htboc letrt Tobo olHmlto olark roHo ola ttbonn ki Tobt halhim tdrik atk ltSobh׃ 
romans 2:5	obqSi lbbk hmman lSob tzbr lk ebrh al iom ebrt halhim oet hglot zdqt mSpTo׃ 
romans 2:6	aSr iSlm laiS kmeSho׃ 
romans 2:7	lmtmidim beSot hTob ombqSim at hkbod ohhdr oat aSr ainno ebd itn at Hii heolmim׃ 
romans 2:8	oel bni hmri oaSr la iSmeo lamt ki am leolh Smeo Hron ap oHmh׃ 
romans 2:9	zrh omzoqh el kl npS adm eSh hre el hihodi braSonh okn gm el hioni׃ 
romans 2:10	okbod ohdr oSlom lkl eSh hTob lihodi braSonh okn gm lioni׃ 
romans 2:11	ki ain mSa pnim em halhim׃

romans 2:13	ki la Smei htorh zdiqim lpni halhim ki am eSi htorh hm izdqo׃ 
romans 2:14	ki hgoim aSr ain lhm torh beSotm kdbri htorh malihm gm bain torh hm torh lnpSm׃ 
romans 2:15	bhraotm meSh htorh ktob el lbm odetm meidh bhm omHSbotm bqrbm mHibot cat at cat ao gm mckot׃ 
romans 2:16	biom aSr iSpT halhim at kl telmot bni hadm bid ihoSe hmSiH kpi bSorti׃ 
romans 2:17	hn ath nqra bSm ihodi onSent el htorh ohthllt balhim׃ 
romans 2:18	oidet hraoi obhiotk mlmd btorh tbin bin Tob lre׃ 
romans 2:19	obTHt bnpSk lhiot molik heorim oaor lhlkim bHSk׃ 
romans 2:20	misr lHsri lb omorh hptaim oiS lk zort hmde ohamt btorh׃ 
romans 2:21	oath aSr torh aHrim at npSk la torh amrt la tgnb ohnk gnb׃ 
romans 2:22	amrt la tnap oath nap tSqz at halilim oath gcl at hqdS׃ 
romans 2:23	tthll btorh otnbl at halhim bebrk at htorh׃ 
romans 2:24	ki Sm halhim bgllkm mHll bgoim kaSr ktob׃ 
romans 2:25	hn hmilh moeilh am tSmr at htorh abl am ebr ath at htorh ac miltk hith lk lerlh׃ 
romans 2:26	lkn am iSmr herl at mSpTi htorh hla tHSb lo erlto lmilh׃ 
romans 2:27	oherl mldh hmqim at htorh hla hoa idin atk aSr iS lk hktb ohmilh oebrt at htorh׃

romans 2:29	ki am aSr bpnim hoa ihodi omilh hia aSr blb kpi hroH ola kpi hktb aSr la mbni adm thlto ki am mat halhim׃ 
romans 3:1	oeth mh hoa itron hihodi omh hia toelt hmilh׃ 
romans 3:2	hrbh mkl pnim braSon ki hpqdo bidm dbri alhim׃ 
romans 3:3	ki mh hoa am mqztm la hamino hibTl Hsron amontm at amont alhim׃ 
romans 3:4	Hlilh abl ihi hal hoa hnamn okl hadm kcb kktob lmen tzdq bdbrk tckh bSpTk׃ 
romans 3:5	oam eoltno tromm at zdqt halhim mh namr hki iS eol balhim hmSlH Hron apo lpi drk bni adm anki mdbr׃ 
romans 3:6	Hlilh Sam kn aik iSpT halhim at heolm׃ 
romans 3:7	ki am el idi kcbi trbh otprz amt alhim lthlto lmh ch ani aSpT eod kHoTa׃ 
romans 3:8	ola neSh kdbr mHrpino omqzt moziai dbh elino lamr hnh amrim neSh hre lmen iza hTob aSr dinm iba elihm bzdq׃ 
romans 3:9	oeth mh hoa hiS lno melh itrh la bmaomh kbr hokHno ki gm hihodim gm hionim klm hm tHt hHTa׃ 
romans 3:10	kktob ain zdiq ain gm aHd׃ 
romans 3:11	ain mSkil ain drS at alhim׃ 
romans 3:12	hkl sr iHdo nalHo ain eSh Tob ain gm aHd׃ 
romans 3:13	qbr ptoH gronm lSonm iHliqon Hmt ekSob tHt Sptimo׃ 
romans 3:14	aSr alh pihm mla omrrot׃ 
romans 3:15	rglihm imhro lSpk dm׃ 
romans 3:16	Sd oSbr bmslotm׃ 
romans 3:17	odrk Slom la ideo׃ 
romans 3:18	ain pHd alhim lngd einihm׃ 
romans 3:19	oanHno ideno ki kl mh Samrh htorh mdbrt al alh aSr tHt htorh lmen iskr kl ph ohih kl heolm mHib lpni alhim׃ 
romans 3:20	ien aSr mmeSi htorh la izdq lpnio kl bSr ki el idi htorh det hHTa׃ 
romans 3:21	oeth bbli torh zdqt alhim laor izah aSr heido elih htorh ohnbiaim׃ 
romans 3:22	ohia zdqt alhim bamont ihoSe hmSiH al kl oel kl aSr hamino bo ki ain hbdl׃ 
romans 3:23	ki klm HTao oHsri kbod alhim hmh׃ 
romans 3:24	onzdqo Hnm bHsdo el idi hpdot aSr hith bmSiH ihoSe׃

romans 3:26	lhraot at zdqto bet hcat lhioto zdiq omzdiq at bn amont ihoSe׃ 
romans 3:27	oeth aih hhthllot hla nSbth oel idi tort mh hel idi tort hmeSim la ki el idi tort hamonh׃ 
romans 3:28	lkn nHSb ki bamonh izdq hadm bbli meSi torh׃ 
romans 3:29	ao halhim rq alhi hihodim hla gm alhi hgoim akn gm alhi hgoim hoa׃ 
romans 3:30	ki aHd halhim hmzdiq at hmolim mtok hamonh oat herlim el idi hamonh׃ 
romans 3:31	oeth hmbTlim anHno at htorh el idi hamonh Hlilh ak mqimim anHno at htorh׃ 
romans 4:1	oeth mh namr el abrhm abino mh ch hSig lpi hbSr׃ 
romans 4:2	ki am nzdq abrhm mtok hmeSim lo hthlh ak la lpni halhim׃ 
romans 4:3	ki hktob mh hoa amr ohamn abrhm bihoh oiHSbh lo zdqh׃ 
romans 4:4	hnh hpel la iHSb lo Skro el pi hHsd ki am el pi hHob׃ 
romans 4:5	abl laSr ainno pel ki am mamin bmzdiq at hrSe amonto tHSb lo lzdqh׃ 
romans 4:6	kaSr gm dod maSr at hadm aSr halhim iHSb lo zdqh bla meSim bamro׃ 
romans 4:7	aSri nSoi pSe ksoi HTah׃ 
romans 4:8	aSri adm la iHSb ihoh lo eon׃ 
romans 4:9	oeth haSor hch hel hmilh hoa am gm el herlh hla amrno ki labrhm nHSbh amonto lzdqh׃ 
romans 4:10	oain nHSbh lo am bhioto mhol ao beodno erl hn la bhioto mhol ki am berlto׃ 
romans 4:11	oaot hmilh qbl lHotm zdqt hamonh aSr hith lo berlto lhiot lab lkl hmaminim ohm erlim lmen ap lhm tHSb hzdqh׃ 
romans 4:12	olhiot lab gm lmolim ak la laSr hm nmolim lbd ki am gm hlkim beqbot hamonh Shith lo labrhm beodno berlto׃ 
romans 4:13	ki la el idi torh bah hhbTHh labrhm olcreo lhioto irS heolm ki am el idi zdqt hamonh׃ 
romans 4:14	ki alo lbni htorh hirSh hamonh lriq thih ohhbTHh bTlh׃ 
romans 4:15	ki htorh mbiah qzp ki baSr ain torh gm ain Sm ebrh׃ 
romans 4:16	el kn mtok amonh lmen lpi Hsd lmen tHih hhbTHh qimt lkl creo la lbni htorh lbdm ki gm lbni amont abrhm aSr hoa ab lklno׃ 
romans 4:17	kktob ki ab hmon goim nttik ohoa hamin bhbiT al al hmHih at hmtim ohqora at aSr la hih kmo hoh׃ 
romans 4:18	baSr ain tqoh qoh oiamn lmen aSr ihih lab hmon goim kmo Snamr kh ihih crek׃ 
romans 4:19	ola rpth amonto ola htbonn al gopo Skbr npog bhioto kbn mat Snh oal blot rHm Srh׃ 
romans 4:20	ola Hlq lbo bhbTHt halhim kHsr hamonh ki am htHcq bamonto oitn kbod lalhim׃ 
romans 4:21	oide blbb Slm ki at aSr hbTiH gm ikl leSoto׃ 
romans 4:22	el kn gm nHSbh lo lzdqh׃ 
romans 4:23	ola lbd lmeno ktobh cat SnHSbh lo׃ 
romans 4:24	ki am gm lmenno aSr etidh lhHSb lno hmaminim bmi Sheir at ihoSe adnino mn hmtim׃ 
romans 4:25	aSr nmsr bebor pSeino oneor lbebor zdqno׃ 
romans 5:1	lkn aHri nzdqno bamonh Slom lno em halhim badnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
romans 5:2	aSr bido mzano bamonh mboa al hHsd hch aSr anHno emdim bo onthll btqot kbod halhim׃ 
romans 5:3	ola cat blbd ki ap nthll bzrot ien aSr ideno ki hzrh mbiah lidi sblnot׃ 
romans 5:4	ohsblnot lidi emidh bnsion ohemidh bnsion lidi tqoh׃ 
romans 5:5	ohtqoh hia la tbiS ki hozq blbbno ahbt al el idi roH hqdS hntn lno׃ 
romans 5:6	ki hmSiH beodno HlSim mt beto bed hreSim׃ 
romans 5:7	hn bed hzdiq iqSh laiS lmot akn lmot bed hTob aoli iSaho lbo׃ 
romans 5:8	abl bcat hodie halhim at ahbto alino ki hmSiH mt bedno bhiotno eod HTaim׃ 
romans 5:9	oeth aSr nzdqno bdmo mh mad noSe bo mn hqzp׃ 
romans 5:10	ki am nrzino lalhim bmot bno bhiotno aibim ap ki noSe eth bHiio aHri aSr nrzino׃ 
romans 5:11	ola cat blbd ki gm mthllim anHno balhim el id adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr bo eth qblno at hrzoi׃ 
romans 5:12	lkn kaSr el idi adm aHd ba hHTa leolm ohmot beqb hHTa okn ebr hmot el kl bni adm mpni aSr klm HTao׃ 
romans 5:13	ki ed cmn htorh hih hHTa beolm ak la iHSb HTa bain torh׃ 
romans 5:14	aolm hmot mlk madm ed mSh gm el alh aSr la HTao bdmion ebrt adm hraSon aSr hoa dmot hetid lboa׃ 
romans 5:15	ak la kdbr hpSe dbr hmtnh ki am bpSe haHd mto hrbim ap ki Hsd alhim omtnto edpo erop lrbim bHsd hadm haHd ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
romans 5:16	ola kmo el idi HTa aHd kn hmtnh ki hmSpT iza maHd lHib abl mtnt hHsd hia lckot mpSeim rbim׃ 
romans 5:17	ki am bpSe haHd mlk hmot el idi haHd ap ki mqbli edp hHsd omtnt hzdqh imlko bHiim el idi haHd ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
romans 5:18	lkn kaSr bpSe aHd naSmo kl bni adm kkh gm el idi ckot aHt icko kl bni adm lHiim׃ 
romans 5:19	ki kaSr bmri hadm haHd hio hrbim lHTaim kkh gm el idi mSmet haHd ihio hrbim lzdiqim׃ 
romans 5:20	abl htorh nknsh lmen irbh hpSe obaSr rbh hHTa edp mmno hHsd׃ 
romans 5:21	lmen kaSr mlk hHTa bmot kkh imlk gm hHsd el idi hzdqh lHii eolm bihoSe hmSiH adnino׃ 
romans 6:1	am kn mh namr hnemd bHTa lmen irbh hHsd׃ 
romans 6:2	Hlilh lno ki mtno lHTa oaik nosip lHiot bo׃ 
romans 6:3	ao hainkm ideim ki klno hnTblim lmSiH ihoSe lmoto nTblno׃ 
romans 6:4	lkn nqbrno ato bTbilh lmot lmen kaSr neor hmSiH mn hmtim bkbod hab kn nthlk gm anHno bHiim mHdSim׃ 
romans 6:5	ki am ndbqno bdmion moto akn gm nhih dboqim ltHito׃ 
romans 6:6	baSr ideim anHno ki nzlb ato hadm hiSn aSr bno lmen tbTl goit hHTa lblti hiotno eod ebdim lHTa׃ 
romans 6:7	ki aSr mt hoa nqh mn hHTa׃ 
romans 6:8	ohnh am mtno em hmSiH namin ki gm nHih emo׃ 
romans 6:9	baSr ideno ki hmSiH aHri aSr neor mn hmtim la imot eod ohmot la iSlT bo eod׃ 
romans 6:10	ki aSr mt mt lHTa pem aHt oaSr Hi Hi hoa lalhim׃ 
romans 6:11	okn gm atm HSbo atkm mtim lHTa oHiim lalhim bmSiH ihoSe adnino׃ 
romans 6:12	am kn apoa al tmlk hHTat bgopkm aSr imot lnTot aHrih btaotio׃ 
romans 6:13	 gm al tkino at abrikm lhiot kli eol lHTa ak tkino at npSkm lalhim kHiim mem hmtim oabrikm kli zdqh lalhim ki hHTa la iokl lmSl eod bkm ien ainkm tHt id htorh ki am tHt id hHsd׃ 
romans 6:14	׃ 
romans 6:15	oeth mh hnHTa ien ainno tHt id htorh ki am tHt id hHsd Hlilh׃ 
romans 6:16	hla idetm ki laSr ttno at npSkm lhiot ebdio lsor lmSmeto hn ebdim atm laSr tSmeo lo am lHTa ali mot am lmSmet ali zdqh׃ 
romans 6:17	abl todt lalhim ki hiitm ebdi hHTa oaHr Smetm bkl lbbkm al tkont hlqH aSr nmsrtm lo׃ 
romans 6:18	SHrrtm midi hHTa lkn hStebdtm lzdqh׃ 
romans 6:19	kdrk bni adm ani mdbr mpni rpion bSrkm ki kaSr lpnim hkinotm at abrikm lebodt hHTah ohrSe lhrSie kn eth hkino at abrikm lebodt hzdqh lhtqdS׃ 
romans 6:20	ki bet hiotkm ebdi hHTa HpSim hiitm mn hzdqh׃ 
romans 6:21	omh apoa hpri Shih lkm ac mn hmeSim aSr eth tbSo mhm ki aHritm hmot׃ 
romans 6:22	akn eth bhiotkm mSHrrim midi hHTa omSebdim lalhim iS lkm prikm lqdSh oaHrito Hii eolm׃ 
romans 6:23	ki Skr hHTa hoa hmot omtnt Hsd alhim hia Hii heolm bmSiH ihoSe adnino׃ 
romans 7:1	ao hla idetm aHi olidei htorh anki mdbr ki htorh tSlT el hadm kl imi Hiio׃ 
romans 7:2	ki aSh belt bel qSorh hia baiSh kpi htorh bHiio obmot hbel pTorh hia mtort belh׃ 
romans 7:3	ohnh am tHih laiS aHr bHii belh napt iqra lh abl aHri mot belh pTorh hia mn htorh oainnh napt bhioth laiS aHr׃ 
romans 7:4	lkn aHi homtm gm atm ltorh bgoit hmSiH lhiotkm laHr laSr neor mn hmtim lmen neSh pri lalhim׃ 
romans 7:5	ki bet hiotno bbSr tSoqot hHTa aSr hteorro el idi htorh hio pelot babrino leSot pri lmot׃ 
romans 7:6	abl eth npTrno mn htorh ki mtno laSr hiino asorim bo lmen nebd meth lpi htHdSot hroH ola lpi iSn hktb׃ 
romans 7:7	am kn mh namr hki htorh HTa hia Hlilh ala la ideti at hHTa blti el idi htorh ki la hiiti iode hHmod loli amrh htorh la tHmd׃ 
romans 7:8	oimza hHTa sbh lo bmzoh leorr bqrbi kl Hmod ki mbledi htorh hHTa mt hoa׃ 
romans 7:9	oani Hiiti mlpnim bla torh okaSr bah hmzoh oiHi hHTa׃ 
romans 7:10	oani mti ohmzoh aSr ntnh lHiim hia nmzah li lmot׃ 
romans 7:11	ki mza hHTa sbh bmzoh lhteot ati oihrgni el idh׃ 
romans 7:12	obkn htorh hia qdoSh ohmzoh qdoSh oiSrh oTobh׃ 
romans 7:13	hki hTobh hith li lmot Hlilh ala hHTa lmen irah ki HTa hoa hbia li el idi hTobh at hmot lmen aSr ihih hHTa lHTah itrh el idi hmzoh׃ 
romans 7:14	ki ideim anHno Shtorh hia roHnit oani Sl bSr onmkr tHt id hHTa׃ 
romans 7:15	ki at aSr ani pel la ideti ki ainni eSh at aSr ani rzh bo ki am aSr Snati ato ani eSh׃ 
romans 7:16	obeSoti at aSr la rziti bo hnni modh bcat ki htorh Tobh hia׃ 
romans 7:17	oeth la anki eod hpel ato ki am hHTa hiSb bi׃ 
romans 7:18	ki ideti aSr bi bbSri la iSb Tob hn hrzon iS emdi abl eSot hTob la mzati׃ 
romans 7:19	ki ainni eSh hTob aSr ani rzh bo ki am hre aSr ainni rzh bo aoto ani eSh׃ 
romans 7:20	oam at aSr la rziti bo ani eSh la eod anki hpel ki hHTa hiSb bqrbi׃ 
romans 7:21	obkn mza ani bi ch hHq anki rzh leSot hTob odbq bi hre׃ 
romans 7:22	ki lpi hadm hpnimi Hpzti btort alhim׃ 
romans 7:23	ak rah ani babri Hq aHr hlHm lHq Skli oiolikni Sbi ltort hHTa aSr babri׃ 
romans 7:24	aoi li hadm heni mi izilni mgop hmot hch׃ 
romans 7:25	aodh lalhim bihoSe hmSiH adnino׃   lkn bSkli hnni ebd ltort halhim obbSri ani ebd ltort hHTa׃  
romans 8:1	el kn ain aSmh balh aSr hm bmSiH ihoSe hmthlkim bla kbSr ki am lpi hroH׃ 
romans 8:2	ki tort roH hHiim bmSiH ihoSe SHrrh ati mtort hHTa ohmot׃ 
romans 8:3	ki mh Sla iklh htorh leSot hnHlSh el id hbSr eSh halhim bSlHo at bno btoar bSr hHTa obed hHTa oirSie at hHTa bbSr׃ 
romans 8:4	lmen tmla Hqt htorh bno hmthlkim bla kbSr ki am lpi hroH׃ 
romans 8:5	ki aSr hmh lbSr benini hbSr iHSbo oaSr lroH benini hroH iHSbo׃ 
romans 8:6	ki mHSbt hbSr hia hmot omHSbt hroH hia hHiim ohSlom׃ 
romans 8:7	ien mHSbt hbSr rq Snat alhim hia baSr la tStebd ltort halhim oap ainnh ikolh׃ 
romans 8:8	oaSr hmh bbSr la ioklo lhiot rzoim lalhim׃ 
romans 8:9	oatm ainkm bbSr ki am broH am amnm roH halhim Skn bqrbkm ki mi Sain bo roH hmSiH ainno Slo׃ 
romans 8:10	oam hmSiH bqrbkm ac hgop mt hoa bdbr hHTa ohroH Hiim hoa bdbr hzdqh׃ 
romans 8:11	oam iSkn bqrbkm roH hmeir at ihoSe mn hmtim hoa aSr heir at hmSiH mn hmtim gm at goiotikm hmtot iHih el idi roHo hSkn bqrbkm׃ 
romans 8:12	lkn aHi Hibim anHno la lbSr lHiot lpi hbSr׃ 
romans 8:13	ki am tHio lpi hbSr mot tmton oam el idi hroH tmotto at melli hbSr Hih tHio׃ 
romans 8:14	ki kl aSr roH alhim inhgm bni alhim hmh׃ 
romans 8:15	ki la qbltm roH ebdot lSob lira ki am qbltm roH mSpT bnim aSr bo qraim anHno aba abino׃ 
romans 8:16	ohroH hhoa meid broHno ki bni alhim anHno׃ 
romans 8:17	oam bnim anHno gm irSim nhih irSi alhim oHbri hmSiH birSh am amnm ntenh ato lmen gm ato nkbd׃ 
romans 8:18	ki aHSb aSr enoii hcmn hch ainm Sqolim kngd hkbod hetid lhglot elino׃ 
romans 8:19	ki hbriah terg oeinih tloiot lhtglot bni alhim׃ 
romans 8:20	ki nkbSh hbriah lhbl la mrzonh ki am lmen hkbS ath ali tqoh׃ 
romans 8:21	aSr hbriah gm hia tSHrr mebdot hklion al Hrot kbod bni halhim׃ 
romans 8:22	ki ideno aSr hbriah klh iHd tanH otHil ed hnh׃ 
romans 8:23	ola cat blbd ki gm anHno ap am iS lno bkori hroH nanH bnpSno onHkh lmSpT hbnim pdot goitno׃ 
romans 8:24	ki noSeno btqoh ak htqoh hnrah leinim ainnh tqoh ki aik iiHl aiS ldbr aSr hoa rah׃ 
romans 8:25	abl am nqoh laSr la rainho nHkh lo bsblnot׃ 
romans 8:26	okn gm hroH tmk atno bHlSotino ki la ideno mh lhtpll kraoi akn hroH hoa mpgie bedno banHot emqot mdbr׃ 
romans 8:27	ohHqr lbbot iode at aSr iHSb hroH ki krzon halhim ipgie bed hqdoSim׃ 
romans 8:28	ohnh ideno ki lahbi alhim hqroaim bezto hkl iecr lTob lhm׃ 
romans 8:29	ki at aSr idem mqdm atm gm ied mqdm lhiot domim ldmot bno lmen ihih hbkor btok aHim rbim׃ 
romans 8:30	oat aSr iedm mqdm atm gm qra oat aSr qram atm gm hzdiq oat aSr hzdiqm atm gm par׃ 
romans 8:31	oeth mh namr el cat am halhim lno mi irib atno׃ 
romans 8:32	aSr el bno iHido la Hs ki am ntno bed klno hla gm itn lno emo at hkl׃ 
romans 8:33	mi ienh bbHiri alhim hn alhim hoa hmzdiq׃ 
romans 8:34	omi hoa iaSimm hn hmSiH aSr mt obiotr aSr neor mem hmtim hoa limin halhim ohoa ipgie bedno׃ 
romans 8:35	mi ipridno mahbt hmSiH hzrh ao mzoqh ao mSTmh ao reb am erih ao sknh ao Hrb׃ 
romans 8:36	kktob ki elik hrgno kl hiom nHSbno kzan TbHh׃ 
romans 8:37	abl bkl alh gbrno mad el idi hahb atno׃ 
romans 8:38	obToH anki ki la hmot ola hHiim la mlakim ola Srrot ola gborot la hhoh ola hetid׃ 
romans 8:39	la hroH ola hemq ola kl brih aHrt ioklo lhpridno mahbt halhim aSr hia bmSiH ihoSe adnino׃

romans 9:20	amnm bn adm mi ath aSr trib at halhim hiamr izr lizro lmh kkh eSitni׃ 
romans 9:21	am ain rSot lizr el hHmr leSot mglm aHd kli aHd lkbod oaHd lqlon׃

romans 9:23	lhodie gm at eSr kbodo el kli hHninh aSr iedm lkbod׃

romans 9:25	kdbro bhoSe aqra lla emi emi olla rHmh rHmh׃

romans 10:4	ki hmSiH sop htorh lzdqh lkl hmamin bo׃

romans 11:3	ihoh at nbiaik hrgo oat mcbHtik hrso oaotr ani lbdi oibqSo at npSi׃

romans 11:5	okn gm bet hcat notrh Sarit el pi bHirt hHsd׃

romans 11:23	ogm hmh am la iemdo bmrim irkbo ki ikl halhim lSob lhrkibm׃

romans 14:11	ki ktob Hi ani nam ihoh ki li tkre kl brk okl lSon todh lalhim׃ 
romans 14:12	hnh na kl aHd mmno el npSo itn HSbon lalhim׃ 
romans 14:13	lkn al ndin eod aiS at reho ki am ch ihi dinkm Sla itn aiS lpni aHio mkSol ao moqS׃

romans 15:1	oelino hHcqim lSat HlSot hkSlim oal nbqS hnat ezmno׃ 
romans 15:2	ki kl aHd mmno ibqS hnat Hbro lTob lo lmen ibnh׃ 
romans 15:3	ki gm hmSiH la bqS hnat ezmo ala kktob Hrpot Horpik nplo eli׃ 
romans 15:4	ki kl aSr nktb mlpnim llmdno nktb lmen thih lno tqoh bsblnot obtnHomot hktobim׃ 
romans 15:5	oalhi hsblnot ohnHmh hoa itn lkm lhiot klkm lb aHd el pi hmSiH ihoSe׃ 
romans 15:6	aSr tkbdo bnpS aHt obph aHd at halhim abi adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
romans 15:7	el kn tqblo aiS at aHio kaSr gm hmSiH qbl atno lkbod halhim׃ 
romans 15:8	oani amr ki ihoSe hmSiH hih lmSrt bni hmilh lmen amt halhim lqim at hhbTHot aSr labot׃ 
romans 15:9	ohgoim hmh ikbdo at halhim lmen rHmio kktob el kn aodk bgoim olSmk acmrh׃ 
romans 15:10	oaomr hrnino goim emo׃ 
romans 15:11	oaomr hllo at ihoh kl goim SbHoho kl hamim׃ 
romans 15:12	oiSeiho amr ohih SrS iSi aSr emd lns emim alio goim iqoo׃ 
romans 15:13	oalhi htqoh hoa imla atkm kl SmHh oSlom bamonh lmen tedp tqotkm bgbort roH hqdS׃ 
romans 15:14	ohnh aHi mbTH ani bkm ki gm atm bezmkm mlai ahbt Hsd mmlaim kl det otoklo lhokiH aiS at reho׃ 
romans 15:15	ak hecti meT bktbi alikm hnh ohnh kmckir atkm el pi hHsd hnton li mat halhim׃ 
romans 15:16	lhioti mSrt ihoSe hmSiH lgoim olkhn bbSort halhim lmen ihih qrbn hgoim rzoi omqdS broH hqdS׃ 
romans 15:17	el kn iS li lhthll bmSiH ihoSe ngd halhim׃ 
romans 15:18	ki la aec pni ldbr dbr colti aSr eSh hmSiH bidi lmen hTot bamr obmeSh at lb hgoim lsor lmSmeto׃ 
romans 15:19	bgbort atot omoptim obgbort roH alhim ed ki mlati miroSlim osbibotih oed laloriqon at bSort hmSiH׃ 
romans 15:20	bhStdli lhgid at hbSorh la bmqmot aSr Sm kbr nqra Sm hmSiH lblti bnot el isod aHrim׃ 
romans 15:21	ki am kktob aSr la spr lhm rao oaSr la Smeo htbonno׃ 
romans 15:22	och hoa hdbr aSr nezrti bgllo pem oStim mboa alikm׃ 
romans 15:23	abl ket aSr ain eod mqom li bglilot halh onksp nkspti lba alikm ch Snim rbot׃ 
romans 15:24	aboa alikm blkti laspmia ki mqoh anki lraotkm bebri oatm tSlHoni Smh oaSbeh meT mkm braSonh׃ 
romans 15:25	amnm eth alkh iroSlimh lecor at hqdoSim׃ 
romans 15:26	ki mqdonia oakia hoailo ltt mSat ndbh labioni hqdoSim aSr biroSlim׃ 
romans 15:27	ki hoailo oap mHibim hm lhm ki am hih lgoim Hlq bdbri hroH aSr lhm hla elihm lecrm gm bdbri hgop׃ 
romans 15:28	lkn kSgmrti at cat oHtmti lhm hpri hch ac aebrh drk arzkm laspmia׃ 
romans 15:29	oiode anki ki bbai alikm aboa bmla brkt bSort hmSiH׃ 
romans 15:30	oani meorr atkm aHi badnino ihoSe hmSiH obahbt hroH lhtamz ati bhetir bedi al halhim׃ 
romans 15:31	lmen aSr anzl mhsorrim barz ihodh oierb el hqdoSim SmoSi lSm iroSlim׃ 
romans 15:32	oaSr aboa alikm bmSHh brzon alhim oanpS emkm׃ 
romans 15:33	oalhi hSlom em klkm amn׃ 
romans 16:1	ohnni mckir lkm lTob at pobi aHotno Shia mSmSt hqhlh aSr bqnkri׃ 
romans 16:2	aSr tqbloh badnino kraoi lqdoSim otecro lh bkl aSr tzTrk lkm ki hith gm hia ecrt lrbim ogm lezmi׃ 
romans 16:3	Salo lSlom prisqla oeqils Shm Hbri bebodt hmSiH ihoSe׃ 
romans 16:4	oaSr msro at zoarm bed npSi ola ani lbdi aodh lhm ki gm kl qhlot hgoim ogm lSlom hqhlh bbitm׃ 
romans 16:5	Salo lSlom apinTos Hbibi Shoa raSit akia lmSiH׃ 
romans 16:6	Salo lSlom mrim Semlh eml rb beborno׃ 
romans 16:7	Salo lSlom androniqos oionis Shm qrobi oasorim ati olhm Sm bSliHim olpni hio bmSiH׃ 
romans 16:8	Salo lSlom amplias Hbibi badnino׃ 
romans 16:9	Salo lSlom aorbnos Hbrno bebodt hmSiH olSlom asTkim Hbibi׃ 
romans 16:10	Salo lSlom aplis hbHon bmSiH Salo lSlom bni bito Sl arisToblos׃ 
romans 16:11	Salo lSlom horodion qrobi Salo lSlom bni bito Sl nrqisos aSr hm badnino׃ 
romans 16:12	Salo lSlom Tropinh oTropsh hemlot badnino Salo lSlom prsis hHbibh Semlh eml rb badnino׃ 
romans 16:13	Salo lSlom ropos hnbHr badnino olSlom amo Shia kam li׃ 
romans 16:14	Salo lSlom asonqriTos opligon ohrms opTrobs ihrmis ohaHim aSr atm׃ 
romans 16:15	Salo lSlom pilologos oiolia niros oaHoto oaolomps okl hqdoSim aSr atm׃ 
romans 16:16	Salo lSlom aiS at reho bnSiqh hqdoSh qhlot hmSiH Salot lSlomkm׃ 
romans 16:17	oani mchir atkm aHi lSom pnikm beSi mHlqot omkSolim lngd hlqH aSr lmdtm osoro mhm׃ 
romans 16:18	ki anSim aSr kalh ainm ebdim at adnino ihoSe hmSiH ki am at krSm obamri nem oSpt Hlqot iteo at lb hptaim׃ 
romans 16:19	ki mSmetkm nodet lkl lkn ani SmH elikm ak Hpzti hitkm Hkmim lhTib otmimim lblti hre׃ 
romans 16:20	oalhi hSlom hoa idka at hSTn bmhrh tHt rglikm Hsd adnino ihoSe hmSiH emkm׃ 
romans 16:21	Timotios Hbri oloqios oison osospTros qrobi Salim lSlomkm׃ 
romans 16:22	ani TrTios kotb hagrt hcat Sal lSlomkm badnino׃ 
romans 16:23	gios hmarH aoti oat kl hqhlh Sal lSlomkm arsTos skn heir oqorTos aHino Salim lSlomkm׃ 
romans 16:24	Hsd adnino ihoSe hmSiH em klkm amn׃ 
romans 16:25	olaSr ikl lHcq atkm kbSorti okqriat ihoSe hmSiH kpi gloi hsod aSr hih mksh mimot eolm׃ 
romans 16:26	oeth ntprsm onode el idi ktbi hnbiaim kmzot alhi eolm lkl hgoim lhbiam lmSmet hamonh׃ 
romans 16:27	lalhim hHkm lbdo lo hkbod bihoSe hmSiH leolmim amn׃ 
1_corinthians 1:1	polos hmqra lhiot SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim osostnis aHino׃ 
1_corinthians 1:2	al qhlt alhim aSr bqorntos al hmqdSim bmSiH ihoSe hqroaim lhiot qdSim em kl hqraim bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH bkl mqom Slhm oSlno׃ 
1_corinthians 1:3	Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_corinthians 1:4	aodh lalhi beborkm bkl et el Hsd halhim hntn lkm bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
1_corinthians 1:5	aSr eSrtm bo bkl bkl dbor obkl det׃ 
1_corinthians 1:6	baSr edot hmSiH htqimh bkm׃ 
1_corinthians 1:7	ed ki la Hsrtm kl mtn hHsd ohnkm mHkim lhtglot adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_corinthians 1:8	aSr gm iqim atkm er et qz lhiot nqiim biom adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_corinthians 1:9	namn hoa halhim aSr el pio nqratm lHbrt bno ihoSe hmSiH adnino׃ 
1_corinthians 1:10	ohnni mchir atkm aHi bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH lhiot klkm ph aHd ola thiin mHlqot bqrbkm ki am tkonno iHd blb aHd obezh aHt׃ 
1_corinthians 1:11	ki hgd li elikm bid bni bit kloah ki iS mribot binikm׃ 
1_corinthians 1:12	ocat ani amr ki aiS aiS mkm ch amr lpolos och lapolos och lkipa och lmSiH hnni׃ 
1_corinthians 1:13	hki Hlq hmSiH hki polos nzlb bedkm ao lSm polos nTbltm׃ 
1_corinthians 1:14	aodh lalhim Sla Tblti aiS mkm ki am at qrspos oat gios׃ 
1_corinthians 1:15	pn iamro ki lSmi Tblti׃ 
1_corinthians 1:16	ak Tblti gm at bni bit asTpnos omlbd alh ainni ide am Tblti eod aiS aHr׃ 
1_corinthians 1:17	ki la SlHni hmSiH lTbol ki am lbSr la bHkmt dbrim lmen aSr la ihih lriq zlb hmSiH׃ 
1_corinthians 1:18	ki dbr hzlb sklot hoa labdim abl lno hnoSeim gbort alhim hoa׃ 
1_corinthians 1:19	ki kn ktob aabd Hkmt Hkmim obint nbonim astir׃ 
1_corinthians 1:20	aih Hkm aih spr aih drS heolm hch hla skl halhim at Hkmt heolm hch׃ 
1_corinthians 1:21	ki aHri aSr bHkmt halhim la ide heolm at halhim bHkmh hih rzon lpnio lhoSie bsklot hqriah at hmaminim׃ 
1_corinthians 1:22	ki hihodim Salim lhm aot ohionim mbqSim Hkmh׃ 
1_corinthians 1:23	oanHno mSmieim at hmSiH hzlob mkSol lihodim osklot lionim׃ 
1_corinthians 1:24	abl lmqraim hn mihodim hn mionim at hmSiH aSr hoa gbort alhim oHkmt alhim׃ 
1_corinthians 1:25	ien ki sklot hal Hkmh hia madm oHlSt hal Hcqh hia madm׃ 
1_corinthians 1:26	ki rao na aHi at qriatkm Sla rbim hmh hHkmim lpi hbSr la rbim hSliTim ola rbim hHrim׃ 
1_corinthians 1:27	ki am bskl Sbeolm bHr hal lmen biS at hHkmim obHloS Sbeolm bHr hal lmen biS at hHcq׃ 
1_corinthians 1:28	obdlt heolm bHr hal obnmas obaSr kain lmen bTl at aSr iSno׃ 
1_corinthians 1:29	kdi Sla ithll lpnio kl bSr׃ 
1_corinthians 1:30	ommno atm bmSiH ihoSe aSr hih lno lHkmh mat halhim olzdqh olqdoS olpdion׃ 
1_corinthians 1:31	oihi kktob hmthll ithll bihoh׃ 
1_corinthians 2:1	ogm anki bbai alikm aHi la bati bgaot hdbor ohHkmh bhgidi lkm at edot halhim׃ 
1_corinthians 2:2	ki la HSbti ldet btokkm dbr blti am ihoSe hmSiH ohoa hnzlb׃ 
1_corinthians 2:3	oahi azlkm bHlSh obirah obHlHlh rbh׃ 
1_corinthians 2:4	odbri oqriati la lptot bamri Hkmt bni adm ki am btokHt hroH ohgborh׃

1_corinthians 2:6	akn Hkmh ndbr bin hSlmim la Hkmt heolm hch gm la Sl Sri heolm hch aSr iabdo׃ 
1_corinthians 2:7	ki am bsod ndbr Hkmt halhim hnstrh aSr halhim iedh lkbodno lpni imi heolm׃ 
1_corinthians 2:8	aSr la ideh aiS mSri heolm hch ki lo ideoh la zlbo at adon hkbod׃ 
1_corinthians 2:9	ala kktob aSr ein la rath oacn la Smeh ola elh el lb anoS at aSr hkin halhim lahbio׃ 
1_corinthians 2:10	olno glh halhim broHo ki hroH Hoqr at hkl gm at memqi halhim׃ 
1_corinthians 2:11	ki mi hoa bbni adm hide at aSr badm blti am roH hadm aSr bqrbo kn gm la ide aiS at aSr balhim blti am roH halhim׃ 
1_corinthians 2:12	oanHno la qblno at roH heolm ki am hroH mat halhim lmen nde at aSr ntn lno mat halhim bHsdo׃ 
1_corinthians 2:13	oat cat ndbr la bdbrim aSr tlmdm Hkmt bni adm ki am bdbrim aSr roH hqdS tlmdm onbar dbrim roHniim el pi hroH׃

1_corinthians 2:15	abl hadm hroHni idin at hkl oaoto la idin aiS׃ 
1_corinthians 2:16	ki mi tkn at roH ihoh omi iodieno oanHno hnh iS lno roH hmSiH׃

1_corinthians 7:2	ak mpni hcnot thi lkl aiS aSto oihi lkl aSh belh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:3	haiS iqim Hobt heonh laSto okmo kn haSh lbelh׃

1_corinthians 7:5	al tmneo at ezmkm ch mch colti bhskmt Snikm el cmn qboe lhiot pnoim ltenit oltplh otSobo ottaHdo pn insh atkm hSTn bebor prizot izrkm׃ 
1_corinthians 7:6	oani amr cat bdrk ezh ola bdrk mzoh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:7	ki mi itn ohih kl adm kmni ak iS lkl aiS mtnto mat halhim ch bkh och bkh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:8	oal hpnoim oal halmnot amr ani ki Tob lhm am iSbo kkh kmo gm ani׃ 
1_corinthians 7:9	ak am la ioklo lhncr itHbro bnSoain ki Tob lhtHbr bnSoain mhiot ber btaoh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:10	ohnh at hnSoaim anki mzoh ola anki ki am hadon aSr la tprS aSh mbelh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:11	oam prS tprS mmno tSb bla aiS ao ttrzh lbelh oaiS al iSlH at aSto׃ 
1_corinthians 7:12	ohnh al haHrim amr anki ola hadon ki thih laH aSh aSr ainnh mamnt orzonh lSbt emo la iecbnh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:13	oaSh ki ihih lh bel aSr ainno mamin orzono lSbt emh la tecbno׃ 
1_corinthians 7:14	ki haiS aSr ainno mamin mqdS hoa baSh ohaSh aSr ainnh mamnt mqdSt hia baiS Sam la kn ihio bnikm Tmaim amnm eth qdoSim hmh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:15	abl am iprS mi Sainno mamin iprS ohaH ao haHot ainm mSebdim balh ki lSlom qrano halhim׃ 
1_corinthians 7:16	ki mh tdei at haSh am toSiei at haiS omh tde ath haiS am toSie at haSh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:17	rq ithlk aiS aiS kpi mh SHlq lo halhim okpi mh Sqra ato hadon okn mtqn anki bkl hqhlot׃ 
1_corinthians 7:18	am nmol haiS hmqra al imSk at erlto oam erl hoa al imol׃ 
1_corinthians 7:19	ain hmilh nHSbh oain herlh nHSbh ki am Smirt mzot halhim׃ 
1_corinthians 7:20	aiS aiS bmSmrto aSr nqra bh Sm iemd׃

1_corinthians 7:22	ki hqroa badon bhioto ebd mSHrr hoa ladon okkh gm hqroa bhioto HpSi ebd hoa lmSiH׃ 
1_corinthians 7:23	bmHir nqnitm al thio ebdi bni adm׃ 
1_corinthians 7:24	aiS aiS bmSmrt aSr nqra bh aHi bcat iemd lpni halhim׃ 
1_corinthians 7:25	oel dbr hbtolot ain li mzoh mat hadon rq aodie at ezti aHri aSr Hnni hadon lhiot namn׃ 
1_corinthians 7:26	hnni HSb ki Tob ladm mpni hzrh hqrobh ki Tob lo lhiot kmo Shoa׃

1_corinthians 7:29	ocat ani amr aHi ki hSeh dHoqh lmen meth ihio hnSoaim kalo ain lhm nSim׃ 
1_corinthians 7:30	ohbkim kainm bkim ohSmHim kainm SmHim ohqonim kalo ain qnin bidm׃ 
1_corinthians 7:31	ohnhnim mn heolm hch kalo ain lhm hnah mmno ki ebor iebr tar heolm hch׃ 
1_corinthians 7:32	oani Hpzti Sthio bli dagh mi Sain lo aSh dag laSr ladon aik iiTb beini hadon׃ 
1_corinthians 7:33	omi SiS lo aSh dag hoa lenini heolm aik iiTb beini haSh׃ 
1_corinthians 7:34	iS hbdl bin aSt aiS lbtolh ki haSh aSr la hith laiS dagt laSr ladon olhiot qdoSh gm bgoph gm broHh obeolt bel dagt hia lenini heolm aik tiTb beini belh׃

1_corinthians 13:10	okboa htmim ac ebor tebr hqzt׃

1_corinthians 14:1	rdpo aHri hahbh ohtaoo mtnot hroH obiotr aSr ttnbao׃ 
1_corinthians 14:2	ki hmdbr blSon ainno mdbr ladm ki am lalhim ki ain aiS aSr iSmeho rq broH hoa mdbr sodot׃ 
1_corinthians 14:3	ohmtnba hoa mdbr lbni adm lbnotm olisrm olnHmm׃ 
1_corinthians 14:4	hmdbr blSon bonh at npSo ohmtnba bonh at hedh׃

1_corinthians 14:6	oeth aHi ki aboa alikm oadbr blSnot mh aoeil lkm am la adbr alikm bHcon ao bdet ao bnboah ao bhorah׃

2_corinthians 4:2	ki am masno bstri hbSt Sla lhthlk bermh ola lcip at dbr halhim ala bhraot hamt nckir atno lTob ngd det kl bni adm lpni halhim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:3	ogm ki nelmh bSortno nelmh hia mn habdim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:4	aSr alhi heolm hch eor bhm at deot hsorrim lblti crH lhm ngh bSort kbod hmSiH aSr hoa zlm halhim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:5	ki la atno mkricim anHno ki am at hmSiH ihoSe lamr hoa hadon oanHno ebdikm lmen ihoSe׃ 
2_corinthians 4:6	ki halhim aSr amr oipe aor mHSk hoa hopie blbno lhpiz aor det kbod halhim aSr bpni hmSiH׃ 
2_corinthians 4:7	abl iS lno haozr hch bkli HrS lmen aSr thih hgborh hitrh lalhim ola matno׃ 
2_corinthians 4:8	nHlzim anHno bkl ola ndkaim dagim ola noaSim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:9	nrdpim ola nToSim mSlkim ola abdim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:10	onSaim bkl et mitt hadon ihoSe bgoitno lmen iglo gm Hii ihoSe bgoitno׃ 
2_corinthians 4:11	ki anHno hHiim nmsrim tmid lmot bebor ihoSe lmen iglo gm Hii ihoSe bbSrno bSr htmoth׃ 
2_corinthians 4:12	lkn bno iamz hmot obkm hHiim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:13	obhiot lno hroH hhoa Sl hamonh kdbr hktob hamnti ki adbr gm anHno namin oel kn ndbr׃ 
2_corinthians 4:14	baSr ideno ki hmeir at hadon ihoSe ieir gm atno el id ihoSe oiemidno emkm׃ 
2_corinthians 4:15	ki kl cat lmenkm lmen aSr irbh hHsd el idi rbim otprz htodh lkbod halhim׃ 
2_corinthians 4:16	obebor cat la nHt oap am iklh bno hadm hHizon hnh hadm hpnimi itHdS iom iom׃ 
2_corinthians 4:17	ki lHzno aSr hoa ql oak lrge ibia lno kbod eolmim gdol orb ed lmad׃ 
2_corinthians 4:18	aSr la nbiT al hdbrim hnraim ki am al aSr ainm nraim ki hnraim lSeh hmh oaSr ainm nraim hm leolm׃

2_corinthians 5:2	ki gm eth nanHim onkspim anHno lhteTp bbitno aSr mn hSmim׃ 
2_corinthians 5:3	baSr aHri lbSnho la nmza ermim׃ 
2_corinthians 5:4	ki gm eth bahlno ch nanH mpni hkbd ola Hpzno lhtpST ki am lhteTp lmen ible hmot el idi hHiim׃ 
2_corinthians 5:5	ohmkin atno lcat hoa halhim aSr ap ntn lno at erbon hroH׃ 
2_corinthians 5:6	lkn bToHim anHno bkl et oideim ki kl eod SmoSbno bgop rHoqim anHno mn hadon׃ 
2_corinthians 5:7	ki bamonh nthlk ola braot einim׃ 
2_corinthians 5:8	amnm bToHim anHno onbHrh lno lhtrHq mn hgop olhiot qrobim al hadon׃ 
2_corinthians 5:9	el kn gm nStdl am qrobim am rHoqim lhiot lo lrzon׃ 
2_corinthians 5:10	ki klno etidim lhraot lpni ksa din hmSiH lmen iqbl aiS oaiS kpi pelo bHii gopo am Tob oam re׃ 
2_corinthians 5:11	oeth ien aSr ideno irat hadon ndbr el lb bni adm olalhim anHno gloim oaqoh ki gloim anHno gm bmdekm׃ 
2_corinthians 5:12	ki ain anHno mStbHin Snit alikm ak ntnim lkm sbh lhtpar bno lngd hmtparim bpnim ola blb׃ 
2_corinthians 5:13	ki am hStgeno lalhim hith cat oam hSklno lkm hith׃ 
2_corinthians 5:14	ki ahbt hmSiH dHqt atno bhiotno dnim aSr am mt aHd bed klm klm mto׃ 
2_corinthians 5:15	obed klm mt lmen la iHio hHiim eod lnpSm ki am laSr mt oiqm bedm׃ 
2_corinthians 5:16	lkn meth anHno la nde aiS lpi hbSr ogm am ideno at hmSiH lpi hbSr meth la ndeho eod׃ 
2_corinthians 5:17	obkn mi Shoa bmSiH briah HdSh hoa hiSnot ebro ohnh hkl nhih lHdS׃ 
2_corinthians 5:18	ohkl mat halhim hmrzh atno lezmo el idi ihoSe hmSiH oitn lno Srot hrzoi׃ 
2_corinthians 5:19	ien aSr alhim hih bmSiH mrzh at heolm lezmo ola HSb lhm at pSeihm oiSm bno at dbr hrzoi׃ 
2_corinthians 5:20	lkn mlizi hmSiH anHno okalo halhim mchir atkm el idno nbqS mkm bed hmSiH htrzo na al halhim׃ 
2_corinthians 5:21	ki at aSr la ide HTat ato eSh lHTat bedno lmen nhih bo anHno lzdqt alhim׃

2_corinthians 6:2	ki hoa aomr bet rzon enitik obiom ihoSeh ecrtik hnh eth et rzon hnh eth iom ihoSeh׃ 
2_corinthians 6:3	oain anHno ntnim mkSol bmaomh pn ihih Srotno lnazh׃ 
2_corinthians 6:4	ki am nrah bkl dbr kmSrti alhim bsblnot rbh blHz obzrot obmzoqot׃ 
2_corinthians 6:5	bmkot obmosrot obmhomot btlaot bSqidot obzomot׃ 
2_corinthians 6:6	bThrh obdet obark roH obHsd obroH hqdS obahbh la zboeh׃ 
2_corinthians 6:7	bdbr hamt obgbort alhim bkli nSq hzdqh mimin omSmal׃ 
2_corinthians 6:8	bkbod obqlon bSm re obSm Tob kmteim obkl cat namnim׃ 
2_corinthians 6:9	kainm idoeim ogm idoeim kmtim ohnno Hiim kmisrim ola momtim׃

2_corinthians 6:11	pino ptoH lkm anSi qorntos orHb lbno׃ 
2_corinthians 6:12	la zr mqomkm bno ak zr hmqom bmeikm׃

2_corinthians 6:17	el kn zao mtokm ohbro nam ihoh oTma al tgeo oani aqbz atkm׃

2_corinthians 7:6	abl halhim hmnHm at hSplim nHm atno bboa TiTos׃ 
2_corinthians 7:7	ola bbao lbd ki am gm bnHmh aSr nHm bkm bhgido lno at tSoqtkm oat ablkm oat qnatkm li obkn hospti lSmoH׃ 
2_corinthians 7:8	ki gm am hezbti atkm bagrt ainni mtHrT gm ki htHrTti lpni mch braoti ki hagrt hhia hezibh atkm oap am lSeh׃ 
2_corinthians 7:9	eth ani SmH la el aSr nezbtm ki am el aSr nezbtm ltSobh ki nezbtm krzon alhim lmen la tSao ncq bmaomh el idno׃ 
2_corinthians 7:10	ki hezbt Shia krzon alhim tpel tSobh lihoSeh aSr aiS la itHrT elih abl ezbt heolm pelt at hmot׃ 
2_corinthians 7:11	ki rao na at aSr nezbtm krzon alhim kmh hbia atkm ch lidi cricot gm lhtnzlot gm lrgc gm lirah gm ltSoqh gm lqnah gm lnqmh obkl hokHtm ki nqiim atm bdbr hhoa׃ 
2_corinthians 7:12	lkn gm am ktbti lkm la ktbti bebor helb ola bebor hnelb rq lmen tglh bkm cricotno bedkm lpni halhim׃

2_corinthians 8:14	lmen gm itrm ihih lmla mHsrkm kdi lhSot׃
