2_corinthians 12:1	amnm lhthll la ioeil li ki aboa lmraot hadon oHcinotio׃ 
2_corinthians 12:2	ideti aiS bmSiH ch arbe eSrh Snh am hih bgop la ideti ao mHoz lgop la ideti halhim iode ohaiS hhoa lqH ed lrqie hSliSi׃ 
2_corinthians 12:3	oideti at haiS hhoa am bgop ao mHoz lgop la ideti halhim iode׃ 
2_corinthians 12:4	aSr helh al hprds oiSme dbrim nstrim aSr nmne maiS lmllm׃ 
2_corinthians 12:5	el aiS kmoho athll ak el ezmi la athll colti bHlSoti׃ 
2_corinthians 12:6	ki lo Hpzti lhthll la ahih skl ki amt adbr abl atapq pn iHSbni aiS iotr mmh Sirah bi ao SiSme mmni׃ 
2_corinthians 12:7	olmen aSr la atromm brb gdl hHcinot ntn li slon bbSri mlak hSTn lhktni bagrop lmen la atromm׃ 
2_corinthians 12:8	el cat htHnnti SlS pemim al hadon lhsiro mmni׃ 
2_corinthians 12:9	oiamr ali di lk Hsdi ki bHlSh tSlm gborti el kn SmH lbi lhthll bHlSoti lmen tSrh eli gbort hmSiH׃ 
2_corinthians 12:10	lkn rzth npSi bHlSot obHrpot obzrot obrdipot obmzoqot bed hmSiH ki kaSr HlSti ac gbor ani׃ 
2_corinthians 12:11	skl hiiti bhthlli atm hkrHtm ati tHt aSr hih elikm lhckirni lSbH ki la npl anki bmaomh mn hSliHim hgdolim kl kk ap ki kain anki׃ 
2_corinthians 12:12	hn atot hSliH neSo bqrbkm bkl sblnot batot obmoptim obgborot׃ 
2_corinthians 12:13	ki bmh ngretm mn hqhlot haHrot am la hlaiti atkm slHo na li at heolh hcat׃ 
2_corinthians 12:14	hnni mokn lboa alikm pem SliSit ola alah atkm ki la abqS at aSr lkm ki am atkm ki hbnim ainm Hibim lazr aozrot labot ki am habot lbnim׃ 
2_corinthians 12:15	abl ani bkl Hpz lbbi apcr ogm apcr bed npSotikm ap am tHt ahbti lkm hitrh atm tmeiTo at ahbtkm ali׃ 
2_corinthians 12:16	ak am kn hoa oani la hkbdti elikm aoli kaiS erom bmrmh lkdti atkm׃ 
2_corinthians 12:17	hap honiti atkm bid aHd malh aSr SlHti alikm׃ 
2_corinthians 12:18	bqSti mn TiTos oSlHti ato at haH hki honh atkm TiTos hla broH aHd hthlkno hla bmegl aHd׃ 
2_corinthians 12:19	htHSbo eod ki mtnzlim anHno alikm la ki lpni halhim ndbr bmSiH okl cat Hbibi lmen tbno׃ 
2_corinthians 12:20	ki ira anki pn bbai la amza atkm kaSr Hpzti oatm gm atm la tmzao ati kaSr Hpztm pn ihih bkm mzh oqnah orgc omribot odbh reh orkilot ogaot ombokh׃ 
2_corinthians 12:21	pn aSob lboa oiSpilni alhi azlkm oatabl el rbim aSr HTao kbr ola Sbo mn hTmah omn hcnot omn hcmh aSr eSo׃ 
2_corinthians 13:1	cat hpem hSliSit aSr aboa alikm el pi Snim edim ao SlSh edim iqom kl dbr׃ 
2_corinthians 13:2	mqdm amrti bhioti azlkm bpem hSnit omqdm ani amr oktb eth brHqi mkm laSr HTao lpni mch olkl hnSarim ki bSobi lboa la aHos׃ 
2_corinthians 13:3	ien bqSkm lbHn at hmSiH hmdbr bi aSr ainno HlS lkm ki am gbor hoa btokkm׃ 
2_corinthians 13:4	ki am gm nzlb bHlSh akn Hi hoa bgbort alhim oam gm HlSim bo anHno akn nHih emo bgbort alhim lngdkm׃ 
2_corinthians 13:5	nso na atkm am bamonh atm bHno atkm ao hainkm ideim at npSkm ki ihoSe hmSiH bkm am la ki nmasim atm׃ 
2_corinthians 13:6	abl aqoh ki tdeo aSr anHno ainno nmasim׃ 
2_corinthians 13:7	oani mtHnn al halhim aSr la teSo kl re la lmen nrah anHno namnim ki am lmen teSo atm at hTob oanHno nhih knmasim׃ 
2_corinthians 13:8	ki ain anHno ikolim leSot maomh lngd hamt ki am bed hamt׃ 
2_corinthians 13:9	ki nSmH am HlSim anHno oatm gborim oel cat gm ntpll el aSr tkonno׃ 
2_corinthians 13:10	obebor cat ktbti at alh bhioti brHoq lmen aSr la azTrk bqrbi alikm ldbr atkm mSpTim lpi hrSot aSr ntnh li hadon lbnot ola lhros׃ 
2_corinthians 13:11	obkn aHi SmHo ohtkonno htnHmo oihi lkm lb aHd ahbo hSlom oalhi hahbh ohSlom ihi emkm׃ 
2_corinthians 13:12	 Salo lSlom aiS at reho bnSiqh hqdoSh hqdoSim klm Salim lSlomkm׃ 
2_corinthians 13:13	׃ 
2_corinthians 13:14	Hsd hadon ihoSe hmSiH oahbt halhim ohtHbrot roH hqdS em klkm amn׃ 
galatians 1:1	polos hSliH la mbni adm ola el idi bn adm ki am el idi ihoSe hmSiH oalhim hab aSr heiro mn hmtim׃ 
galatians 1:2	okl haHim aSr emdi al hqhlot aSr bglTia׃ 
galatians 1:3	Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino omat adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
galatians 1:4	aSr ntn at npSo bed HTatino lHlzno mn heolm hre hch krzon alhino abino׃ 
galatians 1:5	aSr lo hkbod leolmi eolmim amn׃ 
galatians 1:6	tmh ani ki srtm mhr maHri hqra atkm bHsd hmSiH al bSorh crh׃ 
galatians 1:7	ohia ainnh aHrt rq SiS anSim hekrim atkm oHpzim lhpk at bSort hmSiH׃ 
galatians 1:8	abl gm anHno ao mlak mn hSmim am iboa lbSr atkm bSorh mbledi cat aSr bSrno atkm Hrm ihih׃ 
galatians 1:9	kmo Samrno kbr kn amr eth eod hpem aiS ki ibSr atkm bSorh mbledi aSr qbltm Hrm ihih׃ 
galatians 1:10	oeth hmtrzh anki al bni adm am al halhim ao hmbqS anki lmza Hn beini bni adm ki bmzai Hn beini bni adm la ahih eod ebd hmSiH׃ 
galatians 1:11	abl modie ani atkm aHi ki hbSorh aSr bSrti la lpi drk adm hia׃ 
galatians 1:12	ki gm anki la qbltih madm ola lmdoni ath ki am bHcion ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
galatians 1:13	ki hla Smetm at drki aSr hthlkti mlpnim bin hihodim oat aSr rdpti el itr at edt alhim oabdtih׃ 
galatians 1:14	oahi holk oHcq bdt hihodit el rbim mbni gili bemi bqnati hgdolh lqblot aboti׃ 
galatians 1:15	ak kaSr hih rzon halhim aSr hbdil ati mrHm ami oiqrani bHsdo׃ 
galatians 1:16	lglot bi at bno SabSrno bgoim mid la noezti em bSr odm׃ 
galatians 1:17	gm la eliti iroSlim al aSr hio SliHim lpni ki am hlkti lerb omSm Sbti al dmSq׃ 
galatians 1:18	aHri kn mqz SlS Snim eliti iroSlim lraot at kipa oaSb emo HmSh eSr iom׃ 
galatians 1:19	oaHr mn hSliHim la raiti colti at ieqb aHi adnino׃ 
galatians 1:20	oaSr ani ktb alikm hnh ngd halhim ki la akcb׃ 
galatians 1:21	aHri kn bati al glilot soria oqiliqia׃ 
galatians 1:22	abl qhlot ihodh aSr bmSiH hnh la ideo at pni׃ 
galatians 1:23	rq cat blbd Smeo ki haiS hhoa aSr hih rdp atno mac eth hoa mbSr at hamonh aSr habidh mlpnim׃ 
galatians 1:24	oihllo bi at halhim׃ 
galatians 2:1	aHri kn mqz arbe eSrh Snh Sbti oeliti liroSlim em br nba oaqH ati gm at TiTos׃ 
galatians 2:2	oael Smh el pi mHch oaSim lpnihm at hbSorh aSr qrati bgoim obiHod Smtih lpni hHSobim Sbhm pn thih lriq mrozti aSr aroz ao rzti׃ 
galatians 2:3	abl gm TiTos aSr ati ap ki ioni hoa la hkrH lhmol׃ 
galatians 2:4	mpni aHi hSqr hnknsim bstr btokno aSr bao lrgl at Hrotno aSr lno bihoSe hmSiH lmen hebidno׃ 
galatians 2:5	aSr la srno lmSmetm ap la Seh aHt lmen aSr temd bqrbkm amth Sl hbSorh׃ 
galatians 2:6	omat hnHSbim lhiot mh ihio mi Sihio ainni HoSS lch ki halhim la iSa pni aiS li la hosipo hHSobim maomh׃ 
galatians 2:7	othi lhpk braotm ki hpqdh li hbSorh al herlim kmo Shpqd kipa al hmolim׃ 
galatians 2:8	ki hpel bkipa lSlHo al hmolim hoa pel gm bi lSlHni al hgoim׃ 
galatians 2:9	okaSr ideo ieqb okipa oioHnn hnHSbim lemodim at hHsd hntn li ntno li olbr nba at id iminm onaot ki nlk anHno lgoim ohmh lmolim׃ 
galatians 2:10	rq Snckr at habionim aSr gm Sqdti leSoth׃ 
galatians 2:11	okaSr ba kipa lanTiokia hokHti al pnio drko mpni Shih bo aSm׃ 
galatians 2:12	ki lpni ba anSim mat ieqb hih akl em hgoim iHdo okbam hih mtrHq oporS mhm mirato at bni hmilh׃ 
galatians 2:13	oikHSo emo gm Sar hihodim ed ki br nba gm hoa ndH aHri kHSm׃ 
galatians 2:14	akn braoto at aSr la iSro lkt kamth Sl hbSorh amrti al kipa bpni kl am ath hihodi ttnhg knkri ola kihodi lmh tkriH at hgoim lhtnhg kihodim׃ 
galatians 2:15	hn mcre hihodim anHno ola HTaim mn hgoim׃ 
galatians 2:16	omdetno ki la izdq adm mtok meSi htorh ki am bamont ihoSe hmSiH gm anHno hamno bmSiH ihoSe lmen nzdq mamont hmSiH ola mmeSi htorh ki mmeSi htorh la izdq kl bSr׃ 
galatians 2:17	oam bbqSno lhzdq bmSiH nmza gm anHno HTaim hnh hmSiH mSrt hHTa Hlilh׃ 
galatians 2:18	ki am aSob oabnh at mh Sstrti ani eSh at ezmi pSe׃ 
galatians 2:19	ki mti ani ltorh el idi htorh lmen aHih lalhim׃ 
galatians 2:20	em hmSiH nzlbti oain eod anki hHi ki am hmSiH hoa Hi bqrbi oaSr ani Hi eth bbSr aHih bamont bn alhim aSr ahbni oitn at npSo bedi׃ 
galatians 2:21	la amas at Hsd halhim ki alo thih el idi htorh zdqh hnh Hnm mt hmSiH׃ 
galatians 3:1	ahh glTim Hsri det mi hteh atkm bkSpio mSme at hamt aHri aSr zir btokkm ihoSe hmSiH hzlob lngd einikm׃ 
galatians 3:2	cat lbd Hpzti llmd mkm ham mmeSi htorh qbltm at hroH ao mSmoet hamonh׃ 
galatians 3:3	hatm sklim kl kk aSr hHlotm broH oeth tklo bbSr׃ 
galatians 3:4	hkcat sbltm lriq am amnm ak lriq׃ 
galatians 3:5	hnh hmpiq lkm at hroH opel bkm gborot hki mmeSi htorh hoa eSh alh ao mSmoet hamonh׃ 
galatians 3:6	kaSr hamin abrhm balhim otHSb lo lzdqh׃ 
galatians 3:7	deo apoa ki bni hamonh bni abrhm hmh׃ 
galatians 3:8	ohmqra brato mraS ki halhim izdiq at hgoim mtok hamonh qdm lbSr at abrhm lamr onbrko bk kl hgoim׃ 
galatians 3:9	el kn bni hamonh itbrko em abrhm hmamin׃

galatians 3:11	ogloi hoa ki el idi htorh la izdq hadm lpni halhim ki zdiq bamonto iHih׃

galatians 3:13	hmSiH pdno mqllt htorh bhioto lqllh bedno Snamr qllt alhim tloi׃ 
galatians 3:14	lmen aSr tba brkt abrhm bmSiH ihoSe el hgoim lmen aSr nSa at hbTHt hroH el idi hamonh׃

galatians 3:18	ki am tboa hnHlh mtok htorh la tboa eod mtok hhbTHh abl at abrhm Hnn halhim el idi hbTHh׃ 
galatians 3:19	am kn htorh mh hia mpni hpSeim nosph ed ki iboa hcre aSr lo hhbTHh otoSm htorh el idi hmlakim obid srsr׃ 
galatians 3:20	ohsrsr la Sl aHd hoa ak halhim hoa aHd׃ 
galatians 3:21	oeth hki htorh strt at hbTHot halhim Hlilh ki alo ntnh torh aSr bkHh lhHiot ac bamt hith hzdqh el idi htorh׃ 
galatians 3:22	abl hktob sgr at hkl bid hHTa lmen tntn hhbTHh al hmaminim bamont ihoSe hmSiH׃

galatians 3:24	obkn htorh hith amnt aotno al hmSiH lmen nzdq el idi hamonh׃ 
galatians 3:25	abl eth aHri aSr bah hamonh ain anHno eod tHt id hamn׃ 
galatians 3:26	ki klkm bni alhim atm el idi hamonh bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
galatians 3:27	ki klkm aSr nTbltm lmSiH lbStm at hmSiH׃ 
galatians 3:28	oain eod la ihodi ola ioni la ebd ola bn Horin la ckr ola nqbh ki atm klkm aHd bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
galatians 3:29	oam atm lmSiH hnkm cre abrhm onHlim kpi hhbTHh׃ 
galatians 4:1	oani amr hiorS kl et hioto qTn ain hbdl bino obin hebd ap am hoa adon hkl׃ 
galatians 4:2	ala hoa tHt id amnim opqidi hbit ed lcmn hmied lo mat abio׃ 
galatians 4:3	kkh gm anHno beod hiotno qTnim hiino mSebdim lisdot heolm׃ 
galatians 4:4	obmlat het SlH halhim at bno aSr nold maSh ontn tHt id htorh׃

galatians 4:13	atm idetm aSr bHlSt bSri bSrti lkm at hbSorh lraSonh׃ 
galatians 4:14	oatm la bcitm at nsioni aSr nsiti bbSri ola geltm ato ki am qbltm ati kmlak alhim kmSiH ihoSe׃

galatians 4:16	oeth hnhiiti lkm laib bdbri amt alikm׃

galatians 4:18	abl Tob lqna tmid lTobh ola lbd bhioto azlkm׃ 
galatians 4:19	bni aSr ani mHoll Snit ed ki iozr bkm hmSiH׃ 
galatians 4:20	amnh Hpzti lhiot eth azlkm lSnot at qol dbri ki nbok ani bkm׃ 
galatians 4:21	amro li atm hHpzim lhiot mSebdim ltorh hla Smetm at htorh׃ 
galatians 4:22	ki ktob Shio labrhm Sni bnim haHd mn hamh ohSni mn hHpSih׃ 
galatians 4:23	oaSr lamh hoa nold lpi hbSr oaSr lHpSih el pi hhbTHh׃ 
galatians 4:24	ohdbrim hm lrmc ki Sti hbritot hnh haHt mn hr sini hioldt lebdot ohia hgr׃ 
galatians 4:25	ki hgr sini hr berb hoa ohoa kngd iroSlim Sl eth ki hia bebdot em bnih׃ 
galatians 4:26	abl iroSlim Sl melh hia HpSih ohia am klno׃ 
galatians 4:27	ki ktob rni eqrh la ildh pzHi rnh ozhli la Hlh ki rbim bni Sommh mbni beolh׃ 
galatians 4:28	oanHno aHi hnno kizHq bni hhbTHh׃ 
galatians 4:29	okaSr hnold lpi hbSr ac hih rdp at hnold lpi hroH kn hoa gm eth׃ 
galatians 4:30	abl hktob mh hoa amr grS hamh oat bnh ki la iirS bn hamh em bn hHpSih׃ 
galatians 4:31	el kn aHi la bni hamh anHno ki am bni hHpSih׃ 
galatians 5:1	oeth emdo na bHrot aSr SHrr atno hmSiH oal tSobo lhlkd bel hebdot׃ 
galatians 5:2	hnh ani polos amr lkm ki am tmolo la ioeil lkm hmSiH׃ 
galatians 5:3	omeid ani eod hpem bkl aiS aSr imol ki mHib hoa lSmr at kl htorh׃ 
galatians 5:4	ngcrtm mn hmSiH atm hmzTdqim btorh npltm mn hHsd׃ 
galatians 5:5	ki anHno broH niHl mtok hamonh ltqot hzdqh׃ 
galatians 5:6	ki bmSiH ainnh nHSbt la hmilh ola herlh ki am hamonh hpelt bahbh׃ 
galatians 5:7	hiTbtm lroz mi HSk atkm mSme al hamt׃ 
galatians 5:8	hptoi hch ainno mat hqra atkm׃ 
galatians 5:9	meT Sar mHmz hoa at kl hesh׃ 
galatians 5:10	mbTH ani bkm badon Sla thih roH aHrt emkm ohekr atkm iSa at eono ihih mi Sihih׃ 
galatians 5:11	oani aHi am akric eod hmilh el mh ahih nrdp hla ac mbTl mkSol hzlb׃ 
galatians 5:12	mi itn oikrto hmdiHim atkm׃ 
galatians 5:13	ki atm aHi lHrot nqratm oblbd Sla thih hHrot tanh lbSr ala Stebdo aiS at reho bahbh׃ 
galatians 5:14	ki kl htorh klolh bmzoh aHt ohia oahbt lrek kmok׃ 
galatians 5:15	abl am tnSko otaklo aiS at aHio rao pn tklo aiS el idi reho׃ 
galatians 5:16	ohnni amr hthlko broH ola tmlao at taot hbSr׃ 
galatians 5:17	ki hbSr mtaoh hpk mn hroH ohroH hpk mn hbSr oSnihm mtqommim ch lch ed Sla toklo leSot at aSr tHpzo׃ 
galatians 5:18	oam tnhgo el idi hroH ac ainkm tHt htorh׃ 
galatians 5:19	ogloim hm peli hbSr aSr hm naop cnot Tmah ocmh׃ 
galatians 5:20	ebodt alilim okSop aibot omzot oqnah orgc mribot mHlqot oktot׃

galatians 5:22	opri hroH ahbh SmHh oSlom ark roH ondibot oHsd oamonh׃ 
galatians 5:23	oenoh opriSot ain torh lngd eSi alh׃ 
galatians 5:24	oaSr hm lmSiH zlbo at bSrm em kl tSoqtio otaotio׃ 
galatians 5:25	am nHih broH nthlkh gm broH׃

galatians 6:1	aHi gm ki itpS aiS mkm bebrh atm anSi hroH tqimho broH enoh ohSmr lnpSk pn tba lidi nsion gm ath׃ 
galatians 6:2	Sao aiS at mSa reho bcat tmlao at tort hmSiH׃ 
galatians 6:3	ki hHSb at ezmo lhiot mh oainno maomh at npSo hoa mrmh׃ 
galatians 6:4	abl ibHn kl aiS at meSho oac lo lbdo thih thlto ola lngd aHr׃ 
galatians 6:5	ki kl aiS at mSao iSa׃ 
galatians 6:6	hmlmd bdbr iHlq mkl Tobo lmlmdho׃ 
galatians 6:7	al tteo la itn alhim lhtl bo ki mh Scre hadm ato iqzr׃ 
galatians 6:8	hcre bbSro iqzr klion mSbro ohcre broH iqzr mn hroH Hii eolm׃ 
galatians 6:9	oanHno beSot hTob al nHt ki nqzr beto am la nrph׃ 
galatians 6:10	lkn kaSr het bidno neSh na at hTob em kl adm obiotr em bni amontno׃ 
galatians 6:11	rao na mh gdol hmktb aSr ktbti alikm bidi׃ 
galatians 6:12	hHpzim lhthdr bbSr mkriHim atkm lhmol rq lmen la irdpo el zlb hmSiH׃ 
galatians 6:13	ki gm hm hnmolim ainm Smrim at htorh ala rzonm Stmolo lmen ithllo bbSrkm׃ 
galatians 6:14	oanki Hlilh mhthll colti bzlb adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr bo heolm nzlb li oani nzlb leolm׃ 
galatians 6:15	ki bmSiH ihoSe gm hmilh gm herlh ainn nHSbot ki am briah HdSh׃ 
galatians 6:16	okl hmhlkim kpi hSorh hcat Slom orHmim elihm oel iSral aSr lalhim׃ 
galatians 6:17	meth aiS al ilani eod ki at Hborot hadon ihoSe ani nSa bgoiti׃ 
galatians 6:18	Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino ihi em roHkm aHi amn׃ 
ephesians 1:1	polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim al hqdSim hnmzaim bapsos omaminim bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
ephesians 1:2	Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 1:3	brok hoa halhim oabi adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr brkno bkl brkt roH bmromim bmSiH׃ 
ephesians 1:4	kaSr bHr atno bo lpni mosdot tbl lhiot qdSim otmimim lpnio bahbh׃ 
ephesians 1:5	iedno lo lbnim el idi ihoSe hmSiH kHpz rzono׃ 
ephesians 1:6	lthlt kbod Hsdo aSr ntn atno bidido׃ 
ephesians 1:7	aSr bo lno hpdiom bdmo osliHt hpSeim krb Hsdo׃ 
ephesians 1:8	aSr hSpieo elino bkl Hkmh ohSkl׃ 
ephesians 1:9	ohodieno at sod rzono kezto hieozh bo׃ 
ephesians 1:10	el dbr hnhgto bmlat hetim lqbz at hkl tHt hmSiH hn mh SbSmim hn mh Sbarz׃ 
ephesians 1:11	aSr gm lqHno bo nHltno anHno hmiedim lh mac bmHSbt pel hkl kezt Hpzo׃ 
ephesians 1:12	lhiotno lthlt kbodo anHno aSr iHlno al hmSiH mac׃ 
ephesians 1:13	oaSr gm atm nToeim bo aHri Smekm dbr hamt at bSort ihoSetkm oaSr bo kShamntm gm nHtmtm broH hhbTHh roH hqdS׃ 
ephesians 1:14	ki ch erbon irStno lpdot lo em sglh lthlt kbodo׃ 
ephesians 1:15	bebor cat gm anki aHri Smei amontkm badnino ihoSe ohahbh aSr ahbtm at kl hqdSim׃ 
ephesians 1:16	la aHdl mhodot beborkm bhckiri atkm btplti׃ 
ephesians 1:17	ki itn lkm alhi adnino ihoSe hmSiH abi hkbod at roH hHkmh ohHcon ldet ato׃ 
ephesians 1:18	oiar eini lbbkm lmen tdeo ai co hia toHlt qriato oai ch hoa eSr kbod nHlto bqdSim׃ 
ephesians 1:19	oai ch hoa itron gdlt gborto bno hmaminim kpi pelt ezt kHo׃ 
ephesians 1:20	aSr pel bmSiH bheir ato mn hmtim oioSibno limino bmromim׃ 
ephesians 1:21	mmel lkl Srrh oSlTn ogborh ommSlh okl hnqra bSm la lbd beolm hch ki am gm beolm hba׃ 
ephesians 1:22	oiSt kl tHt rglio oitn ato lraS el hkl al hedh׃ 
ephesians 1:23	aSr hia gopo mloa hmmla at hkl bkl׃ 
ephesians 2:1	gm atkm hmtim lpnim bpSeikm oHTatikm׃ 
ephesians 2:2	aSr hthlktm bhm lpi dor heolm hch krzon Sr mmSlt haoir ohoa hroH hpel ket bbni hmri׃ 
ephesians 2:3	ogm anHno klno btokm hlkno lpnim btaot hbSr leSot Hpzi bSrno omHSbotino onhi ak bni rgc bTbeno kaSr bni adm׃ 
ephesians 2:4	abl halhim hmla rHmim brb ahbto aSr ahb atno׃ 
ephesians 2:5	aHri hiotno mtim bpSeim hHino em hmSiH bHsd noSetm׃ 
ephesians 2:6	oieirno ato ap hoSibno bmromim bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
ephesians 2:7	lhraot bdrot hbaim at gdlt eSr Hsdo bTobto elino bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
ephesians 2:8	ki bHsd noSetm el idi hamonh ola midkm hith cat ki mtt alhim hia׃ 
ephesians 2:9	la mtok hmeSim Sla ithll aiS׃ 
ephesians 2:10	ki pel alhim anHno nbraim bmSiH ihoSe lmeSim Tobim aSr hkin halhim mqdm lmen nthlk bhm׃ 
ephesians 2:11	el kn ckro ki atm hgoim bbSr hnqraim erlim bpi hnqraim bni hmilh Shia meSh idim bbSr׃ 
ephesians 2:12	ki atm bet hhia hiitm bli mSiH mocrim ledt iSral onkrim lbritot hhbTHh bain tqoh obain lkm alhim beolm׃ 
ephesians 2:13	oeth bihoSe hmSiH atm hrHoqim mac hiitm qrobim bdm hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 2:14	ki hoa Slomno aSr eSh hSnim laHd ohrs mHizt hgdr׃ 
ephesians 2:15	bbTlo haibh bbSro at tort hmzot bgcrotihn lbra bnpSo at hSnim laiS aHd HdS oieS Slom׃ 
ephesians 2:16	oirzh at Snihm bgop aHd lalhim el idi zlibto bhmito bnpSo at haibh׃ 
ephesians 2:17	oiba oibSr Slom lkm hrHoqim ohqrobim׃ 
ephesians 2:18	ki el ido iS lSnino mboa broH aHd al abino׃ 
ephesians 2:19	lkn ainkm eod grim otoSbim ki atm bni eir aHt em hqdSim obni bit alhim׃ 
ephesians 2:20	bnoim el isod hSliHim ohnbiaim oihoSe hmSiH hoa abn hpnh׃ 
ephesians 2:21	aSr Hbr bo iHd hbnin klo edi igbh lhikl qdS lihoh׃ 
ephesians 2:22	obo nbnim gm atm lhiot mSkn alhim broH׃ 
ephesians 3:1	bebor cat ani polos asir hmSiH lmenkm hgoim׃ 
ephesians 3:2	ki amnm Smetm hnhgt Hsd halhim aSr ntn li alikm׃ 
ephesians 3:3	ki bHcon glh li hsod aSr lmelh ktbti lkm bmeT׃ 
ephesians 3:4	obqrakm toklo lhkir bcat at binti bsod hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 3:5	aSr bdort hraSnim la node lbni adm kaSr nglh eth lSliHio hqdSim olnbiaio broH׃ 
ephesians 3:6	lhiot hgoim gm hm bni irSto ogop aHd ato oHbri hbTHto bmSiH el idi hbSrh׃ 
ephesians 3:7	aSr hiiti lh lmSrt bmtnt Hsd alhim hntonh li kpi pelt gborto׃ 
ephesians 3:8	li zeir hzeirim Sbkl hqdSim ntn hHsd hch lbSr bgoim at eSr hmSiH aSr la iHqr׃ 
ephesians 3:9	olhair eini kl mh hia hnhgt hsod hnstr mdrt eolm balhim iozr hkl el idi ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 3:10	lmen aSr tode eth el idi hedh lSrim lSliTim aSr bmromim Hkmt alhim hmpliah dtkih׃ 
ephesians 3:11	el pi ezt eolmim aSr iez bmSiH ihoSe adnino׃ 
ephesians 3:12	aSr ptHon pino mmno oqrbtno bbTHh el id amonto׃ 
ephesians 3:13	bebor cat abqS Sla tHto bzroti lmenkm ien ki hia tpartkm׃ 
ephesians 3:14	el kn akreh el brki labi adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 3:15	aSr nqra el Smo kl bit abot SbSmim oSbarz׃ 
ephesians 3:16	ltt lkm lpi eSr kbodo lhtHcq bgborh el idi roHo ladm hpnimi׃ 
ephesians 3:17	SiSkn hmSiH blbbkm bamonh ohiitm mSrSim omisdim bahbh׃ 
ephesians 3:18	lmen toklo lhSig em kl hqdSim mh hoa hrHb ohark ohemq ohgbh׃ 
ephesians 3:19	oidetm at ahbt hmSiH hnelh el kl det onmlatm at kl mloa halhim׃ 
ephesians 3:20	olo aSr ikl lhrbot gmolio elino iotr mkl mSalotino omHSbotino lpi hkH hpel bqrbno׃ 
ephesians 3:21	lo hkbod bqrb hqhl bmSiH ihoSe ldr odr ed eolmi eolmim amn׃ 
ephesians 4:1	lkn achirkm ani hasor badon lhthlk kaSr iath lmSmrtkm aSr nqratm lh׃ 
ephesians 4:2	bkl nmikot oenoh obark roH lSat aiS at reho bahbh׃ 
ephesians 4:3	oSqdo lSmr at aHdot hroH bagdt hSlom׃

ephesians 4:5	adon aHd amonh aHt Tbilh aHt׃ 
ephesians 4:6	al oab aHd lkl Shoa el kl obkl obtok klkm׃ 
ephesians 4:7	abl lkl aHd oaHd mmno ntn hHsd kmdt mtnt hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 4:8	el kn hoa aomr elh lmrom Sbh Sbi oitn mtnot ladm׃ 
ephesians 4:9	oelh Samr mh hoa am la Sird ird mqdm ltHtiot arz׃ 
ephesians 4:10	hird hoa aSr gm elh lmelh mkl hSmim lmen imla at hkl׃ 
ephesians 4:11	ohoa ntn at alh SliHim oat alh nbiaim oat alh mbSrim oat alh reim omlmdim׃ 
ephesians 4:12	lhSlim at hqdSim lmeSh hebodh lbnin gop hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 4:13	ed ki ngie klno laHdot hamonh odet bn halhim kaiS aHd Slm lSeor qomt mloa hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 4:14	ola nhih eod ildim ngrSim ondpim bkl roH hlmod btrmit bni adm omqSotm aSr Sto lhteot׃ 
ephesians 4:15	ki am ndbr hamt bahbh ongdlh bkl dbr lo lmSiH Shoa hraS׃ 
ephesians 4:16	aSr mmno kl hgop bhioto mrkb omdbq bkl Hbor hSmoS kpi mdt hpelh hntonh lkl abr oabr irbh oigdl lhSlmt bnino bahbh׃

ephesians 4:20	oatm la kn lmdtm at hmSiH׃

ephesians 4:22	aSr tsoro mdrkikm hraSnim otpSTo at hadm hiSn hnSHt btaot htrmit׃ 
ephesians 4:23	ottHdSo broH Sklkm׃ 
ephesians 4:24	otlbSo at hadm hHdS hnbra kdmot alhim bzdqh oqdSt hamt׃ 
ephesians 4:25	el kn hsiro mkm at hSqr odbro amt aiS at reho ki abrim klno iHd aiS laiS׃

ephesians 4:27	gm la ttno mqom lSTn׃ 
ephesians 4:28	mi Sgnb al isp lgnb ki am iige obidio ieSh at hTob lmen ihih lo ltt laiS mHsor׃ 
ephesians 4:29	kl dbr nbol la iza mpikm ki am hTob ohmoeil lbnot lpi hzrk lmen itn Hn lSmeio׃ 
ephesians 4:30	ola tezbo at roH hqdS Sl alhim aSr nHtmtm bo al iom hgalh׃

ephesians 5:1	lkn lko bdrk halhim kbnim Hbibim׃ 
ephesians 5:2	ohthlko bahbh kaSr gm hmSiH ahb atno ohqrib at npSo bedno lqrbn ocbH lalhim lriH niHoH׃ 
ephesians 5:3	abl cnot okl Tmah oahbt bze bl ickr binikm kaSr naoh lqdSim׃ 
ephesians 5:4	gm la nbol ph odbri sklot oleg aSr la khgn ki am qol todh׃ 
ephesians 5:5	ki cat ide tdeo ki kl cnh oTma oahb bze Shoa ebd alilim ain lo Hlq onHlh bmlkot hmSiH ohalhim׃ 
ephesians 5:6	al iSia aiS atkm bdbri riq ki bgll alh Hron alhim ba el bni hmri׃ 
ephesians 5:7	el kn al ihi Hlqkm emhm׃ 
ephesians 5:8	ki mlpnim hiitm HSk oeth hnkm aor badnino hthlko na kbni aor׃ 
ephesians 5:9	ki pri hroH kl meSi Hsd ozdq oamt׃ 
ephesians 5:10	obHno mh hoa rzoi beini adnino׃ 
ephesians 5:11	oal tSttpo em meSi hHSk aSr la ieSo pri ki am hokH tokiHo aotm׃ 
ephesians 5:12	ki mh Shm eSim bstr Hrph hia ak lspr׃ 
ephesians 5:13	abl kl cat iglh kSiokH el idi haor ki kl hnglh aor hoa׃ 
ephesians 5:14	el kn hoa aomr eorh hiSn oqomh mn hmtim oiar lk hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 5:15	oeth rao ohchro lhthlk la kksilim ki am kHkmim׃ 
ephesians 5:16	moqirim het ki himim reim hmh׃ 
ephesians 5:17	el kn al thio Hsri det ki am mbinim ldet mh hoa rzon adnino׃ 
ephesians 5:18	oal tStkro miin hmbia lidi prizot ki am hmlao broH׃ 
ephesians 5:19	oSiHo aiS lreho bthlot otSbHot oSirot roHniot Siro ocmro ladni blbbkm׃ 
ephesians 5:20	ohodo bkl et el hkl lalhim abino bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
ephesians 5:21	hkneo aiS laHio birat alhim׃ 
ephesians 5:22	hnSim hknenh lbelikn kmo ladnino׃ 
ephesians 5:23	ki haiS hoa raS haSh kaSr hmSiH hoa raS hedh ohoa moSie Sl hgop׃ 
ephesians 5:24	abl kaSr tkne hedh lmSiH kkh gm hnSim lbelihn bkl dbr׃ 
ephesians 5:25	hanSim ahbo at nSikm kaSr gm hmSiH ahb at hedh oitn at npSo bedh׃ 
ephesians 5:26	lmen qdSh bdbro aHri aSr Thrh brHizt hmim׃ 
ephesians 5:27	lhqimh bkbod lo ledh aSr ain bh ktm oqmT okdomh ki am lmen thih qdoSh otmimh׃ 
ephesians 5:28	kn hanSim Hibim lahb at nSihm kgopm ki hahb at aSto ahb at ezmo׃ 
ephesians 5:29	ki meolm la Sna aiS at bSro ki am cn omklkl ato kaSr gm hadon at edto׃ 
ephesians 5:30	ki abri gopo anHno mSbro omezmio׃ 
ephesians 5:31	el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto ohio Snihm lbSr aHd׃ 
ephesians 5:32	gdol hsod hch oani mprS ato el hmSiH oel edto׃ 
ephesians 5:33	oaolm gm atm kl aiS mkm iahb at aSto knpSo ohaSh hia tchr otira at belh׃ 
ephesians 6:1	Smeo bnim al horikm badnino ki arH iSr hoa׃ 
ephesians 6:2	kbd at abik oat amk cat hia hmzoh hraSonh aSr lh hhbTHh׃ 
ephesians 6:3	lmen iiTb lk olmen iarikn imik el hadmh׃ 
ephesians 6:4	oatm habot al tkeiso at bnikm ak gdlom bmosr adnino obtokHto׃ 
ephesians 6:5	Smeo ebdim al adnikm lpi hbSr birah ortt obtm lbbkm kmo lmSiH׃ 
ephesians 6:6	la bebdt mrah hein kmbqSi Hn bni adm ki am kebdi hmSiH eSim rzon halhim bkl npSm׃ 
ephesians 6:7	oebdim bnpS Hpzh at hadon ola bni adm׃ 
ephesians 6:8	oidetm ki kl dbr Tob aSr eSh hadm iSlmno lo adnino am ebd hoa ao bn Horin׃

ephesians 6:11	lbSo kli nSq alhim lmen toklo emd ngd nkli hSTn׃ 
ephesians 6:12	ki la em bSr odm mlHmtno ki em Srim oSliTim em hmSlim bHSkt heolm hch em hroHot hreot aSr bmromim׃ 
ephesians 6:13	el kn aHco bkli nSq alhim lmen toklo lqom biom hre olmla zbakm olemod׃ 
ephesians 6:14	emdo na Hgori mtnim bamt omlbSim bSrion hzdq׃ 
ephesians 6:15	orglikm mnelot lhiotkm moknim lbSort hSlom׃ 
ephesians 6:16	oel kl alh tpSo at mgn hamonh aSr toklo lkbot bo at Hzi hrSe hberim׃ 
ephesians 6:17	oqHo at kobe hihoSeh oHrb hroH Shia dbr halhim׃ 
ephesians 6:18	ohtpllo tmid bkl et btplh otHnonim broH oSqdo ohtamzo el cat lhetir tmid bed kl hqdSim׃ 
ephesians 6:19	ogm bedi lmen intn li hdbr bptHi pi lhgid bbTHon at sod hbSorh aSr anki zir lh bmosrot׃ 
ephesians 6:20	lmen adbr bh bbTHh kaSr mTl eli ldbr׃ 
ephesians 6:21	olmen aSr tdeo gm atm at qrti oat meSi hnh at hkl iodie atkm Tokiqos haH hHbib ohmSrt hnamn badnino׃ 
ephesians 6:22	aSr lcat SlHtiho alikm lmen tdeo at qrtino olmen inHm at lbbkm׃ 
ephesians 6:23	hSlom laHim ohahbh em hamonh mat halhim hab omat hadon ihoSe hmSiH׃

philippians 1:1	polos oTimotios ebdi hmSiH ihoSe al kl hqdSim bmSiH ihoSe aSr hm bpilpi em hpqidim ohSmSim׃ 
philippians 1:2	Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
philippians 1:3	aodh lalhi mdi ckri atkm׃ 
philippians 1:4	otmid bkl tploti atHnn bSmHh bed klkm׃ 
philippians 1:5	el htHbrotkm al hbSorh lmn hiom hraSon oed hnh׃ 
philippians 1:6	obTH ani ki hmtHil bkm hmeSh hTob gm igmrno ed iom ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
philippians 1:7	kaSr raoi li lHSb kkh el klkm bebor Sati atkm blbbi bmosri obhzdiqi obHcqi at hbSorh baSr klkm Hbri bHsd׃ 
philippians 1:8	ki halhim li led aSr lklkm nkspti bahbt ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
philippians 1:9	oel cat mtpll anki ki trbh otgdl ahbtkm bhSkl obkl det׃ 
philippians 1:10	lmen tbHno at hmbHrot ohiitm ckim obli mkSol ed iom hmSiH׃ 
philippians 1:11	mlaim pri hzdqh el idi ihoSe hmSiH lkbod alhim othlto׃ 
philippians 1:12	ohnni modie atkm aHi ki aSr mzatni hith ak litron hbSorh׃ 
philippians 1:13	ed aSr nglo mosroti bmSiH bkl Ser hmlk olkl hnSarim׃ 
philippians 1:14	orb haHim badnino hosipo amz bmosroti ohtHcqo iotr blbbm ldbr at hdbr bli pHd׃ 
philippians 1:15	hn iS mgidim at hmSiH mqnah orib oiS mgidim bkonh Tobh׃ 
philippians 1:16	alh mmribh mgidim at hmSiH la blb Thor ki HSbim lhosip zrh el mosri׃

philippians 1:19	ki iode ani Sthih li cat lihoSeh btpltkm obecrt roH ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
philippians 1:20	oaoHil oaqoh Sla aboS bkl dbr ki am bkl bTHon kaSr mac kn gm eth itgdl hmSiH bgopi am bHii am bmoti׃ 
philippians 1:21	ki hmSiH hoa Hii ohmot roH li׃ 
philippians 1:22	aolm am lHiot bbSr eod iosip li pri emli ain li lhgid bmh abHr׃ 
philippians 1:23	ki mSok ani mn hSnim npSi aoth lhpTr olhiot em hmSiH ki ch hmbHr׃ 
philippians 1:24	abl lemd eod bbSr zrik itr beborkm׃ 
philippians 1:25	oani bTH oide ki aotr oaemd em klkm iHd lamz atkm olhgdil SmHt amontkm׃ 
philippians 1:26	lmen trbh el idi thltkm bmSiH ihoSe bSobi lboa alikm׃

philippians 2:3	ola teSo dbr bdrk mribh ao kbod Soa ki am bSplot roH tHSbo aiS at reho iotr mezmo׃

philippians 2:13	ki halhim hoa hpel bkm gm lHpz gm lpel kpi rzono׃ 
philippians 2:14	eSo kl dbr bla tlnot obla mcmot׃

philippians 2:20	ki colto ain ati aiS klbbi aSr blb Slm idag lkm׃

philippians 2:22	oaoto idetm ki bHon hoa aSr kbn hebd at abio kn hih ati bebodt hbSorh׃

philippians 2:26	ien hioto nksp lklkm onezb mad el aSr Smetm ki Hlh׃

philippians 3:1	obkn aHi SmHo badnino hn lktb olSnot kcat alikm eli ainno lTrH olkm hoa lHcoq׃ 
philippians 3:2	hchro mn hklbim hchro mn hpelim hreim hchro mn hHtok׃ 
philippians 3:3	ki anHno bni hmilh hebdim at halhim broH omtparim bmSiH ihoSe oainno bTHim bbSr׃ 
philippians 3:4	ap ki gm li iS lbTH bbSr oam iHSb aiS Siokl lbTH bbSr hnh ani iotr mmno׃ 
philippians 3:5	aSr ani nmol bn Smont imim mbni iSral mSbT bnimin ebri mn hebrim׃ 
philippians 3:6	lpi htorh proS bqnati rdp at hedh olpi zdqt htorh bli Smz׃ 
philippians 3:7	ak hitrnot halh kln HSbti li lHsrnot lmen hmSiH׃ 
philippians 3:8	ogm eodni HSb at kln lHsron lemt melt idiet ihoSe hmSiH adni aSr beboro Hsrti at npSi mkl alh oaHSbm lsHi lhroiH at hmSiH olhmza bo׃ 
philippians 3:9	ola thih li zdqti mtok htorh ki am bamont hmSiH hzdqh hbah mat halhim bamonh׃ 
philippians 3:10	ldet ato oat gbort tHito ohtHbrot enoiio olhdmot lmoto׃ 
philippians 3:11	lhgie am aokl al tHit hmtim׃ 
philippians 3:12	la kalo hSgti kbr ao kalo hSlmti abl ardp aoli aSig kaSr gm hSigni hmSiH ihoSe׃ 
philippians 3:13	aHi ainni HSb ki kbr hSgti ak aHt dbrti ki SkH ani at aSr maHri oaStTH al aSr lpni׃ 
philippians 3:14	oardp at mTrt Skr hnzHon aSr hoa bqriah Sl melh mat halhim bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
philippians 3:15	lkn mi Shoa Slm bno kn iHSb oam tHSbo mHSbh aHrt gm cat iglh lkm halhim׃ 
philippians 3:16	rq nthlkh baSr hgeno edih bmegl aHd iblb aHd׃ 
philippians 3:17	aHi hio Hbrim lhlkim aHri ohbiTo al hmthlkim kn kaSr anHno mopt lkm׃ 
philippians 3:18	ki rbim hmthlkim kn kaSr anHno mopt lkm׃ 
philippians 3:19	ki rbim hmthlkim aSr elihm amrti lkm pemim hrbh oeth gm bbki ani amr ki hm aibi zlb hmSiH׃ 
philippians 3:20	aSr aHritm habdon aSr krsm alhihm okbodm bbStm oqrbm hbli Hld׃ 
philippians 3:21	ki acrHotno bSmim hia omSm mHkim anHno lmoSieno adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃   aSr iHlip at gop Splotno lhioto domh lgop kbodo kpi kH iklto lkbS hkl tHtio׃  
philippians 4:1	oeth aHi hHbibim ohHmodim SmHti oeTrt raSi emdo na kn badnino Hbibi׃ 
philippians 4:2	at abhodih ani mchir oat sonTiki ani mchir lhiot lb aHd badnino׃ 
philippians 4:3	oath Hbri hnzmd li bamt ap mmk ani mbqS lhiot lhn lecr aSr igeo emdi el hbSorh em qlimis oem Sar tmki aSr Smotm iHd bspr hHiim׃ 
philippians 4:4	SmHo badnino bkl et oeod hpem amr ani SmHo׃ 
philippians 4:5	enot roHkm tode lkl aiS qrb hoa hadon׃ 
philippians 4:6	al tdago ki am btplh obtHnonim em todh todieo bkl dbr at mSalotikm lalhino׃ 
philippians 4:7	oSlom alhim hnSgb mkl Skl inzr at lbbkm oat mHSbotikm bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
philippians 4:8	obkn aHi kl aSr hoa amt onkbd oiSr oThor oneim oaSr Smeo Tob kl meSh zdq kl meSh SbH el alh tSimo lbbkm׃ 
philippians 4:9	aSr lmdtm oqbltm oSmetm oraitm bi at alh teSo oalhi hSlom ihih emkm׃ 
philippians 4:10	oani SmHti mad badnino ki eth hpem hHlptm kH lhSgiH eli ogm mSgiHim hiitm ed kh ak la elth bidkm׃ 
philippians 4:11	ola mmHsor adbr kn ki lmdti lhstpq bmh SiS li׃ 
philippians 4:12	ideti lenot ap ideti lhotir mHnk ani bkl enin oaopn hn lSbe hn lreb hn lhotir hn lHsr׃ 
philippians 4:13	kl cat aokl becrt hmSiH hnotn kH bqrbi׃ 
philippians 4:14	abl hiTbtm leSot bhtHbrkm ali bzrti׃ 
philippians 4:15	oidetm gm atm pilpiim ki braSit hbSorh kzati mmqdonia la htHbrh li aHt mn hqhlot beSq mSa omtn ki am atm blbd׃ 
philippians 4:16	ki gm btsloniqi SlHtm li at zrki pem oStim׃ 
philippians 4:17	la SabqS at hmtn ak abqS hpri aSr irbh bHSbnkm׃ 
philippians 4:18	oani qblti at hkl oiS li di ohotr oani nmlati riH niHH bqbli midi approdiTos at kl aSr SlHtm cbH erb orzoi lalhim׃ 
philippians 4:19	oalhi hoa imla at kl zrkkm keSr kbodo bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
philippians 4:20	olalhim abino hkbod leolmi eolmim amn׃ 
philippians 4:21	Salo lSlom kl qdoS bmSiH ihoSe haHim aSr emdi Salim lSlomkm׃ 
philippians 4:22	kl hqdSim Salim lSlomkm obiotr alh aSr mbit hqisr׃ 
philippians 4:23	Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino em klkm amn׃ 
colossians 1:1	polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim oTimotios aHino׃ 
colossians 1:2	al hqdSim ohaHim hnamnim bmSiH aSr hm bqolSa Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
colossians 1:3	nodh lalhim abi adnino ihoSe hmSiH bkl et aSr anHno mtpllim bedkm׃ 
colossians 1:4	aHri aSr Smeno amontkm bmSiH ihoSe oahbtkm al kl hqdSim׃ 
colossians 1:5	bebor htqoh hzponh lkm bSmim onodetm lkm mqdm bdbr amt hbSorh׃ 
colossians 1:6	aSr bah alikm ogm lkl heolm otprh otrbh kmo gm btokkm lmn hiom aSr Smetm ohkrtm bamt at Hsd alhim׃ 
colossians 1:7	kaSr lmdtm mn apprs Hbrno hHbib aSr hoa mSrt namn bedkm lmSiH׃ 
colossians 1:8	ohoa gm hodie atno at habtkm broH׃ 
colossians 1:9	bebor cat gm anHno lmn hiom aSr Smenoh la Hdlno lhtpll bedkm olbqS Stmlao det rzon halhim bkl Hkmh otbonh roHnit׃ 
colossians 1:10	lhthlk kTob beini hadon okkl rzono oleSot pri bkl meSh Tob olrbot bdet alhim׃ 
colossians 1:11	lhtHcq bkl kH kgbort kbodo lkl sblnot oark roH em SmHh׃ 
colossians 1:12	oltt todh labino heSh atno raoim lHlq nHlt hqdSim baor׃ 
colossians 1:13	aSr hoa Hlzno mmmSlt hHSk ohebirno lmlkot bn ahbto׃ 
colossians 1:14	aSr iS lno bo hpdion bdmo sliHt hHTaim׃ 
colossians 1:15	ohoa zlm halhim hnelm obkor kl nbra׃ 
colossians 1:16	ki bo nbra kl aSr bSmim oaSr barz kl hnrah okl aSr ainno nrah hn ksaot ommSlot hn Srrot orSiot hkl nbra el idi olmenho׃ 
colossians 1:17	ohoa lpni hkl ohkl qim bo׃ 
colossians 1:18	ohoa raS gop hedh aSr hoa raSit obkor mem hmtim lmen ihih hraSon bkl׃ 
colossians 1:19	ki kn hih hrzon lSkn bo at kl hmloa׃ 
colossians 1:20	olrzot al ezmo at hkl el ido beSoto Slom bdm zlbo el ido hn aSr barz hn aSr bSmim׃ 
colossians 1:21	ogm atm aSr hiitm mlpnim mocrim oaibim bnTot lbbkm aHri hmeSim hreim׃ 
colossians 1:22	eth rzh atkm bgop bSro el idi moto lhemidkm lpnio qdSim obli mom odpi׃ 
colossians 1:23	am temdo misdim onkonim bamonh ola tcoeo mtoHlt hbSorh aSr Smetm oaSr nSmeh lkl hnbra tHt hSmim oani polos hiiti lh lmSrt׃ 
colossians 1:24	eth hnni SmH benoii aSr ani sbl lmenkm oamla at hHsr bisori hmSiH bbSri bed gopo hia hedh׃ 
colossians 1:25	aSr hiiti lh lmSrt kpi pqdt alhim aSr ntnh li elikm lmlat at dbr halhim׃ 
colossians 1:26	at hsod aSr hih nstr meolmim omdor odor oeth nglh lqdoSio׃ 
colossians 1:27	aSr rzh halhim lhodiem ai ch hoa eSr kbod hsod hhoa bgoim ohoa hmSiH aSr bkm aSr hoa tqot hkbod׃

colossians 2:2	lmen inHmo lbotm onqSro iHd bahbh olkl eSr det nkonh lhSkil sod halhim abino osod hmSiH׃ 
colossians 2:3	aSr zponim bo kl azrot hHkmh ohdet׃ 
colossians 2:4	ocat amr ani lkm lmen aSr la iTeh atkm aiS bSpti Hlqot׃ 
colossians 2:5	ki gm am bbSri ani rHoq mkm hnh broHi ani azlkm oaSmH brati at tkontkm oamz amontkm bmSiH׃

colossians 2:9	ki bo bgopo Skn kl mla halhot obo atm nmlaim׃ 
colossians 2:10	aSr hoa raS kl Srrh oSlTn׃

colossians 2:13	gm atkm hmtim bpSeim oberlt bSrkm hHih ato bslH lkm at kl pSeikm׃

colossians 2:18	al ttno laiS leqb atkm el idi Splot roH oebodh mlakim hmhlk bdbrim aSr la rao einio omla roH gaoh el la dbr mSkl bSro׃ 
colossians 2:19	oainno aHc braS aSr mHbr mmno kl hgop omaHc bzirio odbqio igdl gdol alhim׃

colossians 2:22	ohm klm lklion btSmiSm lpi mzot anSim olmodihm׃

colossians 3:3	ki mtm oHiikm zponim em hmSiH balhim׃

colossians 3:5	el kn tmotto at abrikm barz at hcnot ohTmah ohcmh ohtaot hreot onTot aHri hbze aSr hia ebodt alilim׃

colossians 4:14	loqs hropa hHbib odims Salim lSlomkm׃

colossians 4:18	Salt hSlom midi ani polos ckro at mosri hHsd emkm amn׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:1	polos oslonos oTimotios al qhlt htsloniqim balhim hab obadon ihoSe hmSiH Hsd lkm oSlom mat alhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:2	nodh lalhim el klkm bkl et bhckir atkm btplotino׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:3	bckrno tmid lpni halhim abino at pel amontkm oigiet ahbtkm osblnot tqotkm ladnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:4	ki ideno aHi Hbibi halhim at aSr nbHrtm׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:5	baSr bSortno la hith lkm bdbor lbd ki gm bgborh obroH hqdS obdet namnh mad kaSr idetm gm atm at aSr hiino btokkm lmenkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:6	oatm hiitm hlkim beqbotino obeqbot adnino bqblkm at hdbr btok eni rb em Hdot roH hqdS׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:7	ed hiotkm mopt lkl hmaminim aSr bmqdonia obakia׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:8	ki matkm nSme qol dbr ihoh la lbd bmqdonia oakia ki am bkl mqom izah amontkm balhim ed Sain lno zrk ldbr dbr׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:9	ki pihm hmspr mh hih mboano alikm oaik pnitm mebodt alilim oSbtm lalhim lebd at al Hi oamti׃ 
1_thessalonians 1:10	olHkot lbno mn hSmim aSr heiro mn hmtim lihoSe mzilno mn hHron hba׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:1	ki atm aHi hnkm ideim at mboano alikm ki la hih lriq׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:2	ak aHri aSr enino olHrpot hiino bpilpi kaSr idetm htHcqno balhino lhgid gm lkm at hbSorh bnptolim rbim׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:3	ki tokHtno ainnh mtok Teot ogm la mtok Tmah ola brmih׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:4	ki am kaSr nHSbno namnim lalhim lhpqid bidno at hbSorh kn ndbr ola kHpzim lhiot rzoim lbni adm ki am lalhim hbHn lbotno׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:5	ki meolm la dbrno bSpt Hlqot kaSr idetm ogm la lmen bze bze halhim ed׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:6	gm la bqSno mn hadm kbod la mkm ola maHrim ap ki hih lno mqom lhtkbd kSliHi hmSiH׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:7	abl hlkno laT btokkm kamnt mpnqt at bnih׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:8	obHbbno kkh atkm Hpzno ltt lkm la lbd at bSort halhim ki gm at npStino ien ki hiitm Hbibim elino׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:9	hla tckro aHi at igietno oat tlatno aSr hiino emlim lilh oiomm lblti hiot lmSa laiS bbSrno bqrbkm at bSort halhim׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:10	edim atm oed halhim ki bqdS obzdq obtmim hiino emkm hmaminim׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:11	oatm idetm ki kab at bnio hchrno at kl aHd mkm odbrno el lbo׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:12	oned bkm llkt kraoi lpni halhim hqora atkm lmlkoto olkbodo׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:13	bebor cat gm nodh tmid lalhim ki atm bqblkm matno dbr Smoet halhim la qbltm aoto kdbr bni adm ki am kmo Shoa bamt kdbr halhim aSr hoa gm pel bkm hmaminim׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:14	ki atm aHi hlktm beqbi qhlot halhim aSr barz ihodh bmSiH ihoSe ki sbltm gm atm kalh el idi bni SbTkm kaSr sblo gm hmh el idi hihodim׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:15	aSr ap hmito at hadon ihoSe oat nbiaihm oaotno rdpo oainm Tobim beini alhim oaibim lkl adm׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:16	hmneim atno mdbr al hgoim ki ioSeo lmen aSr imlao at HTatihm bkl et oiSigm hHron ed lklh׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:17	oanHno aHi aHri aSr Sklno atkm lcmn meT bpnim ola blb hStdlno biotr lraot pnikm btSoqh rbh׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:18	oel kn Hpzno lboa alikm ani polos pem oStim ohSTn ezrno׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:19	ki mi tqotno omi SmHtno oeTrt tpartno hla gm atm lpni adnino ihoSe hmSiH bboao׃ 
1_thessalonians 2:20	amnm atm kbodno oSmHtno׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:1	oel kn la iklno eod lhtapq onoez lhotr lbdno batins׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:2	onSlH at Timotios aHino omSrt halhim oecrno bbSort hmSiH lHcq olhchir atkm el dbr amontkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:3	Sla imoT aiS bmzoqot halh ki idetm ap atm ki lcat iedno׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:4	hla kbd amrno alikm bhiotno azlkm ki etidim anHno lhlHz kaSr gm hih oatm idetm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:5	obebor kn la iklti eod lhtapq oaSlH ldet amontkm ki amrti pn nsh atkm hmnsh ohith lriq igietno׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:6	oeth kSob alino Timotios matkm oibSr atno at bSort amontkm oahbtkm oat aSr atm ckrim atno lTobh bkl et onkspim lraot atno kaSr gm anHno nkspim lkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:7	ac nHmno elikm aHi bkl zrtno olHzno el idi amontkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:8	ki eth nHih am temdo atm badnino׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:9	ki mh nSib lalhim lhodot lo beborkm el kl hSmHh aSr SmHno elikm lpni alhino׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:10	lilh oiomm mpilim anHno tHntno lraot at pnikm olhSlim at mHsri amontkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:11	ohoa halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH iiSr at drkno alikm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:12	oatkm irbh oiotir hadon lahbh aiS at reho olahbh kl adm kaSr gm anHno ahbim atkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 3:13	oikonn at lbbkm lhiot tmim bqdSh lpni alhino abino bboa ihoSe hmSiH adnino em kl qdSio׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:1	oeod nbqSh mkm aHi onchir atkm badnino ihoSe ki kaSr qbltm matno aik lkm lhthlk olmza Hn beini halhim kn tosipo okn trbo eod׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:2	ki idetm at hmzot aSr ntno lkm bSm hadon ihoSe׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:3	ki rzon halhim hia qdStkm aSr ttrHqo mn hcnot׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:4	oide kl aiS mkm lSmr at klio bqdSh oiqr׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:5	ola btaot cmh kdrk hgoim aSr ainm ideim halhim׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:6	ola iprz aiS oionh at aHio beSq ki noqm ihoh el kl cat kaSr kbr amrno oheidno lkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:7	ki la qra aotno halhim lTmah ki am lqdSh׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:8	el kn hboch cat la anSim hoa boch ki am at halhim aSr gm Sm bqrbno at roH qdSo׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:9	oel ahbt haHim ain zrk lktb alikm hla ap atm lmodi ihoh lahbh aiS at reho׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:10	ogm eSim atm kn lkl aHikm aSr bkl mqdonia ak nbqSh mkm aHi aSr tosipo otrbo eod׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:11	otStdlo lSbt bnHt oteSo aiS mlakto beml idikm kaSr zoino atkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:12	lmen ttnhgo khgn em aSr bHoz ola tzTrko ladm׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:13	oel dbr hiSnim aHi la nkHd mkm dbr lmen la tezbo kaHrim aSr ain lhm tqoh׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:14	ki am namin aSr mt ihoSe oiHi kn ibia halhim el idi ihoSe gm at hiSnim ato׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:15	ki at cat namr lkm bdbr ihoh ki anHno hHiim hnotrim ed ba hadon la nqdm at hiSnim׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:16	ki hoa hadon ird mn hSmim btroeh bqol Sr hmlakim obSopr alhim oac iqomo raSonh hmtim bmSiH׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:17	aHri kn anHno hHiim hnSarim nlqH atm iHdo bennim lqrat hadon lrqie obkn nhih tmid em hadon׃ 
1_thessalonians 4:18	lkn nHmo ch at ch bdbrim halh׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:1	oel dbr hetim ohcmnim ain zrk lktb alikm aHi׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:2	hla ap atm idetm hiTb ki iom ihoh kgnb blilh kn boa iboa׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:3	ki bet amrm Slom oSloh iba elihm hSbr ptam kHblim el hhrh ola ioklo lhmlT׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:4	abl atm aHi ainkm bHSk SiSig atkm hiom kgnb׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:5	atm klkm bni haor obni hiom la bni hlilh anHno ola bni hHSk׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:6	lkn al na nrdm kmo haHrim ki am nSqd onncr׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:7	ki hnrdmim hm blilh nrdmim ohmStkrim mStkrim blilh׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:8	oanHno bni hiom nncrh na onlbS at Srion hamonh ohahbh okkobe at tqot hihoSeh׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:9	ien aSr la iedno halhim lHron ki am lnHl at hihoSeh el idi adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:10	aSr mt bedno lmen am nSqd oam niSn Hih nHih emo iHd׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:11	el kn nHmo ch at ch obno aiS at aHio kaSr gm eSitm׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:12	ohnno mbqSim mkm aHi lhkir at hemlim bkm oaSr hm nzbim elikm badon omokiHim atkm׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:13	aSr tnhgo bm kbod ed lmelh bahbh lmen peltm oihi Slom binikm׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:14	ohnno mchirim atkm aHi hokiHo at hsorrim amzo at rki hlbb tmko at hHlSim ohariko roH al kl adm׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:15	orao pn iSlm aiS laiS reh tHt reh ki am rdpo bkl et at hTob hn laiS aiS mkm hn lkl adm׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:16	hio SmHim bkl et׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:17	htmido btplh׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:18	hodo el hkl ki ch rzon halhim alikm bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:19	at hroH la tkbo׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:20	at hnboaot la tmaso׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:21	bHno kl dbr obTob aHco׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:22	htrHqo mkl hdomh lre׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:23	ohoa alhi hSlom iqdS atkm qdSh Slmh okl roHkm onpSkm ogopkm iSmr tmim bboa adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:24	namn hqora atkm aSr gm ieSh׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:25	aHi htpllo bedno׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:26	Salo lSlom kl haHim bnSiqh hqdSh׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:27	hnni mSbiekm badon Stqra hagrt hcat bacni kl haHim hqdSim׃ 
1_thessalonians 5:28	Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino emkm amn׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:1	polos oslonos oTimotios al qhlt htsloniqim balhim abino obadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:2	Hsd lkm oSlom mat alhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:3	Hibim anHno lhodot bkl et lalhim elikm aHi kraoi ki amontkm gdlh mad orbh ahbt klkm aiS lreho׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:4	ed ki nthll bkm ap anHno bqhlot alhim el sblnotkm oel amontkm bkl hrdipot obkl hlHz aSr sbltm׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:5	laot zdqt mSpT alhim lmen tmzao raoim lmlkot halhim aSr beborh gm teno׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:6	baSr zdiq halhim lgml lHz llHzikm׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:7	olkm hnlHzim roHh atno iHd bhglot hadon ihoSe mn hSmim em mlaki eco׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:8	baS lhbh lhSib nqm laSr la ideo at halhim ola Smeo lbSort adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:9	aSr iSao mSpT abdn eolm mat pni hadon omhdr gaono׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:10	bbao biom hhoa lhkbd bqdSio olhtpla bkl hmaminim ki hamntm ledotno alikm׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:11	lkn gm ntpll bedkm bkl et aSr itn atkm alhino raoim al aSr atm mqraim oimla bec kl Hpzkm bTob okl meSh amontkm׃ 
2_thessalonians 1:12	lmen ikbd bkm Sm ihoSe adnino oatm tkbdo bo el pi Hsd alhino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:1	ohnno mbqSim mkm aHi el adot biat adnino ihoSe hmSiH oasiptno alio׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:2	aSr la tTrp detkm ptam oaSr la tbhlo la broH ola bdbor ola bagrt kmo SloHh matno kalo hgie iom hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:3	al iteh atkm aiS bSom aopn ki la iba bTrm ihih braSonh hmrd onglh aiS hHTah bn habdon׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:4	hmtqomm ohmtromm el kl hnqra al ao ebodh ed ki gm iSb bhikl halhim kalhim omrah at ezmo ki alhim hoa׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:5	hla tckro ki beod hioti atkm dbrti alh alikm׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:6	oeth idetm mh Simneho mlhglot beto׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:7	ki sod hrSe kbr hHl lpel rq Siosr mtok hmne ed kh׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:8	oac iglh hrSe aSr imitno hadon broH Sptio oiSbitno bhopet biato׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:9	at aSr iboa kHcqt hSTn brb kH obatot obmopti Sqr׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:10	obkl mrmt aon babdim tHt aSr la qblo at ahbt hamt lhoSe׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:11	obebor cat iSlH lhm halhim mdoHi Soa lhamin bSqr׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:12	lmen idono bl aSr la hamino bamt ki am rzo beolh׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:13	abl anHno Hibim lhodot lalhim bkl et beborkm aHi Hbibi hadon aSr halhim bHr bkm mraSit lihoSeh bqdoS hroH obamont hamt׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:14	lcat qra atkm bbSortno lnHlt kbod adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:15	lkn aHi emdo ohHciqo bqblot aSr lmdtm am bdbrno am bagrtno׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:16	ohoa adnino ihoSe hmSiH oalhino abino aSr ahb atno oitn lno bHsdo nHmt eolm otqoh Tobh׃ 
2_thessalonians 2:17	hoa inHm at lbbkm oikonn atkm bkl dbr omeSh Tob׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:1	oeod aHi htpllo bedno aSr iroz dbr ihoh oikbd kmo gm bqrbkm׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:2	oaSr nnzl mn hanSim hteim ohreim ki la lkl adm hamonh׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:3	abl namn hoa hadon aSr iHcq atkm oiSmrkm mn hre׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:4	oanHno bToHim elikm badnino ki teSo ogm tosipo leSot at aSr nzoh׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:5	ohadon hoa iiSr at lbbkm lahbt halhim olsblnot hmSiH׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:6	ohnno mzoim atkm aHim bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr tbdlo mkl aH meqS drkio oainno mthlk el pi hqblh aSr qbl matno׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:7	hla idetm ap atm aik elikm lhthlk kmno ki la nhgno drk meot btokkm׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:8	gm la aklno lHm aiS Hnm ki bigieh otlah lilh oiomm hiino emlim lblti hiot laiS mkm lmSa׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:9	la bebor Sain lno hrSot lcat ki am ltt atno lkm lmopt llkt beqbotino׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:10	ki gm bhiotno azlkm zoino atkm lamr mi Sla irzh lebd gm akol la iakl׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:11	ki Smeno SiS bkm anSim hmeqSim at drkihm oainm ebdim maomh omblim imihm bhblim׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:12	oanSim kalh nzoh aotm onbqS mhm badnino ihoSe hmSiH lebd bnHt lmen iaklo at lHmm׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:13	oatm aHi al tlao beSot hTob׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:14	oam la iSme aiS al dbrno bagrt hcat ato trSmo lkm oal tterbo emo lmen iboS׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:15	ak la kaib tHSbho ki am tokiHho kaH׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:16	ohoa adon hSlom hoa itn lkm at hSlom tmid obkl pnim׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:17	ihi hadon em klkm׃ 
2_thessalonians 3:18	Salt hSlom midi ani polos ohia haot bkl hagrot kn anki ktb׃   Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino em klkm amn׃  
1_timothy 1:1	polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH kmzot halhim moSieno ohadon ihoSe hmSiH tqotno׃ 
1_timothy 1:2	al Timotios bno hamti bamonh Hsd orHmim oSlom mat alhim abino ohmSiH ihoSe adnino׃ 
1_timothy 1:3	hnh blkti lmqdonia bqSti mmk lSbt bapsos lmen tchir mqzt anSim Sla ioro torh crh׃ 
1_timothy 1:4	ola iSimo lbm lhgdot ollmodi toldot ain qz hmbiaim iotr lSalot mlbnot bit alhim bamonh׃ 
1_timothy 1:5	ki tklit hmzoh hia hahbh blb Thor obroH Tobh obamonh la zboeh׃ 
1_timothy 1:6	iS aSr teo mmnh oipno aHri lmodi tho׃ 
1_timothy 1:7	bHSbm lhiot mori torh oainm mbinim mh hm amrim omh hm mHliTim׃ 
1_timothy 1:8	abl ideno ki htorh Tobh hia am itnhg bh hadm ktorh׃ 
1_timothy 1:9	bdeto cat ki Hq la hoSm bebor hzdiq ala bebor hsorrim ohmrdim hrSeim ohHTaim eSi cmh onblh mki ab omki am omrzHim׃ 
1_timothy 1:10	ocnim oSkbim at ckr ognbi npS okcbim onSbeim lSqr okl meSh hpk mn hlqH hbria׃ 
1_timothy 1:11	kpi bSort kbod hal hmbrk aSr pqdh eli׃ 
1_timothy 1:12	ohnni modh lihoSe hmSiH adnino hmacrni Hil ki HSbni namn oiSimni lmSrt lo׃ 
1_timothy 1:13	ati aSr mlpnim hiiti mgdp omrdp omHrp abl rHmti ki eSiti mbli det bain amonh׃ 
1_timothy 1:14	oigdl eli bmad mad Hsd adnino em hamonh ohahbh bmSiH ihoSe׃ 
1_timothy 1:15	namn hdbr oraoi lhtqbl el kl ki hmSiH ihoSe ba leolm lhoSie at hHTaim aSr anki hgdol bhm׃ 
1_timothy 1:16	obebor cat rHmti lmen aSr irah ihoSe hmSiH bi braSonh at kl ark roHo lhioti lmopt lkl aSr ibao lhamin bo lHii eolm׃ 
1_timothy 1:17	olmlk eolmim lalhim hqim led ohnelm mein ohHkm lbdo lo hkbod ohhdr leolmi eolmim amn׃ 
1_timothy 1:18	at hmzoh hcat ani mzok bni Timotios kpi hnboaot hqdmot elik StlHm lpihn hmlHmh hTobh׃

1_timothy 2:3	ki kn Tob orzoi beini alhim moSieno׃ 
1_timothy 2:4	aSr Hpzo SioSeo kl bni hadm oigieo lhkrt hamt׃ 
1_timothy 2:5	ki aHd hoa halhim oaHd hoa hemd bin alhim obin bni adm hoa bn adm hmSiH ihoSe׃ 
1_timothy 2:6	aSr ntn at npSo kpr bed kl ocat hedot hbah beth׃

1_timothy 2:10	ala kmo Shoa hgon lnSim aSr bHro lhn irat alhim bmeSim Tobim׃ 
1_timothy 2:11	haSh tlmd domm bkl hkneh׃

1_timothy 3:3	ki am dn lkp ckot ola bel qTTh ola ahb ksp׃ 
1_timothy 3:4	oihi mnhig at bito bTob omdrik at bnio lmSmeto bkl hiSr׃ 
1_timothy 3:5	ki am la ide aiS lhnhig at bito aikkh iokl ldag ledt alhim׃
