matthew 8:21	oaHr mn htlmidim amr alio adni hniHh li braSonh llkt olqbr at abi׃ 
matthew 8:22	oiamr alio ihoSe lk aHri ohnH lmtim lqbr at mtihm׃ 
matthew 8:23	oird al hanih oirdo ato tlmidio׃ 
matthew 8:24	ohnh ser gdol hih bim otksh hanih bglim ohoa iSn׃ 
matthew 8:25	oigSo alio tlmidio oieiro aoto lamr hoSieno adnino abdno׃ 
matthew 8:26	oiamr alihm qTni hamonh lmh ch iratm oiqm oiger broHot obim othi dmmh gdolh׃ 
matthew 8:27	oitmho hanSim oiamro mi apoa hoa amr gm hroHot ohim lo iSmeon׃ 
matthew 8:28	oihi kbao al ebr him al arz hgrgSim oipgSoho Sni anSim aHoci Sdim izaim mbti hqbrot ohmh rgonim mad ed aSr la ikl aiS lebr bdrk hhoa׃ 
matthew 8:29	ohnh hm zeqim lamr mh lno olk ihoSe bn halhim hbat hlm lenotno bla etno׃ 
matthew 8:30	oedr Hcirim rbim hih Sm bmreh hrHq mhm׃ 
matthew 8:31	oitHnno alio hSdim lamr am tgrSno SlHno bedr hHcirim׃ 
matthew 8:32	oiamr alihm lko lkm oizao oibao bedr hHcirim ohnh hSter kl edr hHcirim mn hmord el him oimoto bmim׃ 
matthew 8:33	oinoso hreim oibao heirh oigido at hkl oat aSr neSh laHoci hSdim׃ 
matthew 8:34	ohnh kl heir izah lqrat ihoSe okraotm ato oibqSo mmno lebr mgbolm׃ 
matthew 9:1	oird banih oiebr oiba al eiro׃ 
matthew 9:2	ohnh hm mbiaim alio aiS nkh abrim ohoa mSkb el hmTh oihi kraot ihoSe at amontm oiamr al nkh habrim Hcq bni nslHo lk HTatik׃ 
matthew 9:3	ohnh anSim mn hsoprim amro blbbm mgdp hoa׃ 
matthew 9:4	oira ihoSe at mHSbtm oiamr lmh tHSbo reh blbbkm׃ 
matthew 9:5	ki mh hnql hamr nslHo lk HTatik am amr qom hthlk׃ 
matthew 9:6	ak lmen tdeon ki bn hadm iS lo hSlTn barz lslH HTaim oiamr al nkh habrim qom Sa at mTtk olk lk al bitk׃ 
matthew 9:7	oiqm oilk lbito׃ 
matthew 9:8	ohmon hem kraotm cat hStommo oiSbHo at halhim aSr ntn SlTn kch lbni adm׃ 
matthew 9:9	oihi bebr ihoSe mSm oira aiS iSb bbit hmks oSmo mti oiamr alio lkh aHri oiqm oilk aHrik׃ 
matthew 9:10	oihi bhsbo bbito ohnh moksim oHTaim rbim bao oisbo em ihoSe otlmidio׃ 
matthew 9:11	oirao hproSim oiamro al tlmidio mdoe em hmoksim ohHTaim akl rbkm׃ 
matthew 9:12	oiSme cat ihoSe oiamr alihm hHcqim ainm zrikim lrpa ki am hHolim׃ 
matthew 9:13	oatm zao olmdo mh hoa Hsd Hpzti ola cbH ki la bati lqra at hzdiqim ki am at hHTaim ltSobh׃ 
matthew 9:14	oigSo alio tlmidi ioHnn oiamro mdoe anHno ohproSim zmim hrbh otlmidik ainm zmim׃ 
matthew 9:15	oiamr alihm ihoSe aik ioklo bni hHph lhtabl beod hHtn emhm hnh imim baim olqH matm hHtn oac izomo׃ 
matthew 9:16	ain mSim mTlit HdSh el Smlh blh ki tntq mlato mn hSmlh otre hqrieh׃ 
matthew 9:17	oain notnim iin HdS bnadot blim pn ibqeo hnadot ohiin iSpk ohnadot iabdo abl notnim at hiin hHdS bnadot HdSim oSnihm iHdo iSmro׃ 
matthew 9:18	oihi hoa mdbr alihm at alh ohnh aHd hSrim ba oiStHo lo oiamr eth ch mth bti ba na oSim at idk elih otHih׃ 
matthew 9:19	oiqm ihoSe oilk aHrio hoa otlmidio׃ 
matthew 9:20	ohnh aSh cbt dm Stim eSrh Snh ngSh maHrio otge bzizt bgdo׃ 
matthew 9:21	ki amrh blbh ak am age bbgdo aoSe׃ 
matthew 9:22	oipn ihoSe oira aoth oiamr Hcqi bti amontk hoSieh lk otoSe haSh mn hSeh hhia׃ 
matthew 9:23	oiba ihoSe al bit hSr oira at hmHllim bHlilim oat hem hhomh oiamr׃ 
matthew 9:24	soro mph ki la mth hildh ak iSnh hia oiSHqo lo׃ 
matthew 9:25	oihi aHri grS hem oiba hbith oiaHc bidh otqm hnerh׃ 
matthew 9:26	otza hSmoeh hcat bkl harz hhia׃ 
matthew 9:27	oiebr ihoSe mSm oilko aHrio Sni anSim eorim ohmh zeqem oamrim Hnno bn dod׃ 
matthew 9:28	okboao hbith ngSo alio heorim oiamr alihm ihoSe hmaminim atm ki iS lal idi leSot cat oiamro alio kn adnino׃ 
matthew 9:29	oige beinihm oiamr ieSh lkm kamontkm׃ 
matthew 9:30	otpqHnh einihm oiger bm ihoSe oiamr rao pn iode laiS׃ 
matthew 9:31	ohmh bzatm hSmieo at Smeo bkl harz hhia׃ 
matthew 9:32	hmh izao ohnh hbiao alio aiS alm aHoc Sd׃ 
matthew 9:33	okaSr grS hSd oidbr halm oitmh hmon hanSim oiamro meolm la nrath kcat biSral׃ 
matthew 9:34	ohproSim amro el idi Sr hSdim mgrS hoa at hSdim׃ 
matthew 9:35	oisb ihoSe bkl herim ohkprim oilmd bbti knsiotihm oibSr bSort hmlkot oirpa kl mHlh okl mdoh bem׃ 
matthew 9:36	obraoto at hhmnim nkmro rHmio elihm ki hm mtelpim ondHim kzan aSr ain lhm reh׃ 
matthew 9:37	ac idbr ltlmdidio oiamr rb hqzir ohpelim meTim׃ 
matthew 9:38	lkn htHnno al bel hqzir lSlH pelim lqziro׃ 
matthew 10:1	oiqra alio at Snim eSr tlmidio oitn lhm SlTn el roHot hTmah lgrSm olrpoa kl Hli okl mdoh׃ 
matthew 10:2	oalh Smot Snim eSr hSliHim hraSon Smeon hnqra pTros oandri aHio ieqb bn cbdi oioHnn aHio׃ 
matthew 10:3	pilpos obr tlmi toma omti hmoks ieqb bn Hlpi olbi hmknh tdi׃ 
matthew 10:4	Smeon hqni oihodh aiS qriot aSr gm msr ato׃ 
matthew 10:5	at Snim heSr halh SlH ihoSe oizo atm lamr al drk hgoim al tlko oal eir hSmronim al tbao׃ 
matthew 10:6	ki am lko al hzan habdot lbit iSral׃ 
matthew 10:7	oblktkm qrao lamr lmkot hSmim qrbh lboa׃ 
matthew 10:8	rpao at hHolim Thro at hmzreim hqimo at hmtim oat hSdim grSo Hnm lqHtm Hnm ttno׃ 
matthew 10:9	la tqHo chb ola ksp ola nHSt bHgorikm׃ 
matthew 10:10	ola trmil ldrk ola Sti ktnot ola nelim ola mTh ki Soh hpel di mHito׃ 
matthew 10:11	okl eir okpr aSr tbao Smh drSo mi hoa hraoi lch btokh oSm Sbo ed ki tzao׃ 
matthew 10:12	obboakm al hbit Salo lo lSlom׃ 
matthew 10:13	ohih am raoi hbit iboa elio Slomkm oam ainno raoi Slomkm alikm iSob׃ 
matthew 10:14	okl aSr la iqbl atkm ola iSme ldbrikm zao lkm mn hbit hhoa omn heir hhia onero at epr rglikm׃ 
matthew 10:15	amn amr ani lkm ki iql larz sdom oemrh biom hdin mn heir hhia׃ 
matthew 10:16	hnni SlH atkm kkbSim bin hcabim lkn hio eromim knHSim otmimim kionim׃ 
matthew 10:17	ohSmro lkm mbni hadm ki imsro atkm lsnhdriot oiko atkm bSoTim bbti knsiotihm׃ 
matthew 10:18	olpni mSlim omlkim tobao lmeni ledot lhm olgoim׃ 
matthew 10:19	oki imsro atkm al tdago aik omh tdbro ki intn lkm bSeh hhia at aSr tdbro׃ 
matthew 10:20	ki la atm hm hmdbrim ki roH abikm hoa hmdbr bpikm׃ 
matthew 10:21	ohih aH imsr at aHio lmot oab imsr at bno oqmo bnim babotm oimito aotm׃ 
matthew 10:22	ohiitm Snoaim lkl adm lmen Smi ohmHkh ed et qz hoa ioSe׃ 
matthew 10:23	oam irdpo atkm beir aHt noso leir aHrt ki amn amr ani lkm la tklo lebr eri iSral ed ki iboa bn hadm׃ 
matthew 10:24	ain tlmid elh el rbo oebd el adnio׃ 
matthew 10:25	dio ltlmid lhiot krbo olebd lhiot kadnio am lbel hbit qrao bel cbob ap lanSi bito׃ 
matthew 10:26	el kn la tiraom ki ain dbr mksh aSr la iglh oain nelm aSr la iode׃ 
matthew 10:27	at aSr ani amr lkm bHSk dbro baor oaSr ilHS lacnikm hSmieo el hggot׃ 
matthew 10:28	oal tirai mn hhrgim at hgop oat hnpS la ioklo lhrg ak tirao at aSr iokl labd gm at hnpS gm at hgop bgihnm׃ 
matthew 10:29	hla tmkrnh Sti zprim basr oaHt mhnh la tpol arzh mbledi abikm׃ 
matthew 10:30	oatm gm Serot raSkm nmnot kln׃ 
matthew 10:31	lkn al tirao hnkm iqrim mzprim rbot׃ 
matthew 10:32	hn kl aSr iodh bi lpni hadm aodh bo gm ani lpni abi SbSmim׃ 
matthew 10:33	oaSr ikHS bi lpni hadm akHS bo gm ani lpni abi SbSmim׃ 
matthew 10:34	al tHSbo ki bati lhTil Slom barz la bati lhTil Slom ki am Hrb׃ 
matthew 10:35	ki bati lhprid aiS mabio obt mamh oklh mHmoth׃ 
matthew 10:36	oaibi aiS anSi bito׃ 
matthew 10:37	hahb at abio oat amo iotr mmni ainno kdi li ohahb at bno obto iotr mmni ainno kdi li׃ 
matthew 10:38	oaSr la iqH at zlbo ohlk aHri ainno kdi li׃ 
matthew 10:39	hmza at npSo iabdnh ohmabd at npSo lmeni hoa imzanh׃ 
matthew 10:40	hmqbl atkm aoti hoa mqbl ohmqbl aoti hoa mqbl at aSr SlHni׃ 
matthew 10:41	hmqbl nbia lSm nbia Skr nbia iqH ohmqbl zdiq lSm zdiq Skr zdiq iqH׃ 
matthew 10:42	ohmSqh at aHd hqTnim halh rq kos mim qrim lSm tlmid amn amr ani lkm ki la iabd Skro׃ 
matthew 11:1	oihi kklot ihoSe lzot at Snim eSr tlmidio oilk mSm llmd olqra berihm׃ 
matthew 11:2	oioHnn Sme bbit hshr at meSi hmSiH oiSlH Snim mtlmidio׃ 
matthew 11:3	oiamr alio hath hoa hba am nHkh laHr׃ 
matthew 11:4	oien ihoSe oiamr lhm lko hgido lioHnn at aSr Smetm oraitm׃ 
matthew 11:5	eorim raim opsHim mthlkim mzreim mThrim oHrSim Somein omtim qmim oeniim mtbSri ihoSeh hm׃ 
matthew 11:6	oaSri aSr la ikSl bi׃ 
matthew 11:7	hmh hlko lhm oihoSe hHl ldbr al hmon hem el adot ioHnn oiamr mh ch izatm hmdbrh lraot hqnh aSr inoe broH׃ 
matthew 11:8	oam la mh ch izatm lraot haiS lboS bgdi ednim hnh hlbSim ednim bbti hmlkim hmh׃ 
matthew 11:9	oam la mh ch izatm lraot am aiS nbia hn ani amr lkm ki gm gdol hoa mnbia׃ 
matthew 11:10	ki ch hoa aSr ktob elio hnni SlH mlaki lpnik opnh rdkk lpnik׃ 
matthew 11:11	amn amr ani lkm la qm bilodi aSh aiS gdol mioHnn hmTbil ak hqTn bmlkot hSmim gdol hoa mmno׃ 
matthew 11:12	omimi ioHnn hmTbil ed hnh mlkot hSmim ntpSh bHcqh ohmtHcqim iHTpoh׃ 
matthew 11:13	ki kl hnbiaim ohtorh edi ioHnn nbao׃ 
matthew 11:14	oam trzo lqbl hnh hoa alih hetid lboa׃ 
matthew 11:15	mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
matthew 11:16	oal mi admh at hdor hch domh hoa lildim hiSbim bSoqim oqraim lHbrihm lamr׃ 
matthew 11:17	Hllno lkm bHlilim ola rqdtm qonno lkm qinh ola spdtm׃ 
matthew 11:18	ki ba ioHnn la akl ola Sth oiamro Sd bo׃ 
matthew 11:19	oiba bn hadm ohoa akl oSth oiamro hnh aiS coll osba oahb moksim oHTaim onzdqh hHkmh mat bnih׃ 
matthew 11:20	ac hHl lger berim aSr rb gborotio neSo btokn ola Sbo׃ 
matthew 11:21	aoi lk korcin aoi lk bit zidh ki hgborot aSr neSo bqrbkn lo bzor obzidon neSo hla kbr Sbo bSq oapr׃ 
matthew 11:22	abl ani amr lkm ki biom hdin iql lzor ozidon iotr mkm׃ 
matthew 11:23	oat kpr nHom hmrommh ed hSmim ed Saol tordi ki hgborot aSr neSo btokk lo bsdom neSo ki eth emdh el tlh ed hiom hch׃ 
matthew 11:24	abl ani amr lkm ki biom hdin iql ladmt sdom mmk׃ 
matthew 11:25	bet hhia enh ihoSe oamr aodk abi adon hSmim oharz ki hstrt at alh mn hHkmim ohnbonim oglitm leollim׃ 
matthew 11:26	hn abi ki kn hih rzon lpnik׃ 
matthew 11:27	hkl nmsr li mat abi oain mkir at hbn blti hab oain mkir at hab blti hbn oaSr iHpz hbn lgloto lo׃ 
matthew 11:28	lko ali kl hemlim ohTeonim oani aniH lkm׃ 
matthew 11:29	qblo elikm at eli olmdo mmni ki eno oSpl roH anki otmzao mrgoe lnpStikm׃ 
matthew 11:30	ki eli neim hoa oql mSai׃ 
matthew 12:1	bet hhia ebr ihoSe bin hqmh biom hSbt otlmidio rebo oiHlo lqTp mlilt oiaklo׃ 
matthew 12:2	oirao hproSim oiamro lo hnh tlmidik eSim at aSr asor leSot bSbt׃ 
matthew 12:3	oiamr alihm hla qratm at aSr eSh dod bhito reb hoa ohanSim aSr ato׃ 
matthew 12:4	ki ba al bit halhim oiakl at lHm hpnim aSr ainno mtr lo olanSio laklh rq lkhnim lbdm׃ 
matthew 12:5	ao hla qratm btorh ki bSbtot iHllo hkhnim at hSbt bmqdS oain lhm eon׃ 
matthew 12:6	abl ani amr lkm ki iS ph gdol mn hmqdS׃ 
matthew 12:7	olo idetm mh hoa Hsd Hpzti ola cbH la hrSetm at hnqim׃ 
matthew 12:8	ki bn hadm hoa gm adon hSbt׃ 
matthew 12:9	oiebr mSm al bit knstm׃ 
matthew 12:10	ohnh Sm aiS aSr ido ibSh oiSaloho lamr hmtr lrpa bSbt lmen imzao elio STnh׃ 
matthew 12:11	oiamr alihm mi haiS bkm aSr lo kbS aHd onpl bbor bSbt ola iHciq bo oielno׃ 
matthew 12:12	omh iqr adm mn hkbS lkn mtr lhiTib bSbt׃ 
matthew 12:13	oiamr al haiS pST at idk oipST ath otrpa otSb kido haHrt׃ 
matthew 12:14	oiza hproSim oitiezo elio labdo׃ 
matthew 12:15	oide ihoSe oisr mSm oilk aHrio hmon em rb oirpam klm׃ 
matthew 12:16	oizo atm bgerh Sla iglho׃ 
matthew 12:17	lmlat at aSr dbr iSeiho hnbia lamr׃ 
matthew 12:18	hn ebdi bHrti bo ididi rzth npSi ntti roHi elio omSpT lgoim iozia׃ 
matthew 12:19	la izeq ola iSa ola iSme bHoz qolo׃ 
matthew 12:20	qnh rzoz la iSbor opSth khh la ikbnh ed iozia lnzH mSpT׃ 
matthew 12:21	olSmo goim iiHlo׃ 
matthew 12:22	ac hoba alio aiS eor oalm aSr aHco Sd oirpaho oidbr halm ogm rah׃ 
matthew 12:23	oiStommo kl hmon hem oiamro hki ch hoa bn dod׃ 
matthew 12:24	ohproSim kSmem cat amro ch ainno mgrS at hSdim ki am el idi bel cbob Sr hSdim׃ 
matthew 12:25	oihoSe ide at mHSbotm oiamr alihm kl mmlkh hnHlqh el ezmh tHrb okl eir obit hnHlqim el ezmm la ikono׃ 
matthew 12:26	ohSTn am igrS at hSTn nHlq el ezmo oaikkh tkon mmlkto׃ 
matthew 12:27	oam ani mgrS at hSdim bbel cbob bnikm bmi hm mgrSim atm el kn hmh ihio SpTikm׃ 
matthew 12:28	ak am broH alhim ani mgrS at hSdim hnh hgieh alikm mlkot halhim׃ 
matthew 12:29	ao aik iokl aiS lboa lbit hgbor olgcl at klio am la iasr braSonh at hgbor oaHr iSsh at bito׃ 
matthew 12:30	kl aSr ainno ati hoa lngdi oaSr ainno mkns ati hoa mpcr׃ 
matthew 12:31	el kn ani amr lkm kl HTa ogdop islH ladm ak gdop hroH la islH ladm׃ 
matthew 12:32	okl aSr idbr dbr Hrph el bn hadm islH lo ohmHrp at roH hqdS la islH lo la beolm hch ola beolm hba׃ 
matthew 12:33	ao eSo at hez Tob oprio Tob ao eSo at hez mSHt oprio mSHt ki bprio nkr hez׃ 
matthew 12:34	ildi hzpeonim aikh toklo lmll Tob oatm reim ki mSpet hlb imll hph׃ 
matthew 12:35	haiS hTob maozr lbo hTob mozia at hTob ohaiS hre maozr hre mozia re׃ 
matthew 12:36	oani amr lkm kl mlh bTlh aSr idbro bni hadm itno elih HSbon biom hdin׃ 
matthew 12:37	ki mdbrik tzdq omdbrik tHib׃ 
matthew 12:38	oieno mn hsoprim ohproSim oiamro rbi Hpzno lraot aot midk׃ 
matthew 12:39	oien oiamr alihm dor re omnap mbqS lo aot oaot la intn lo blti am aot ionh hnbia׃ 
matthew 12:40	ki kaSr hih ionh bmei hdg SlSh imim oSlSh lilot kn ihih bn hadm blb hadmh SlSh imim oSlSh lilot׃ 
matthew 12:41	anSi ninoh iqomo bmSpT em hdor hch oirSieoho ki hm Sbo bqriat ionh ohnh ph gdol mionh׃ 
matthew 12:42	mlkt timn tqom bmSpT em hdor hch otrSieno ki bah mqzot harz lSme at Hkmh Slmh ohnh ph gdol mSlmh׃ 
matthew 12:43	ohroH hTmah aHri zath mn hadm tSTT bmqmot zih lbqS lh mnoHh ola tmzanh׃ 
matthew 12:44	ac tamr aSobh al biti aSr izati mSm obah omzah ato mpnh omTaTa omhdr׃ 
matthew 12:45	oaHr tlk olqHh alih Sbe roHot aHrot reot mmnh obao oSkno Sm ohith aHrit hadm hhoa reh mraSito kn ihih gm ldor hre hch׃ 
matthew 12:46	eodno mdbr al hmon hem ohnh amo oaHio emdo bHoz mbqSim ldbr ato׃ 
matthew 12:47	oigd alio hnh amk oaHik emdim bHoz ombqSim ldbr atk׃ 
matthew 12:48	oien oiamr al haiS hmgid lo mi hia ami omi hm aHi׃ 
matthew 12:49	oiT ido el tlmidio oiamr hnh ami oaHi׃ 
matthew 12:50	ki kl aSr ieSh rzon abi SbSmim hoa aHi oaHoti oami׃ 
matthew 13:1	oihi biom hhoa oiza ihoSe mn hbit oiSb el him׃ 
matthew 13:2	oiqhlo alio hmon em rb oird al hanih oiSb bh okl hem emdim el Spt him׃ 
matthew 13:3	oirb ldbr alihm bmSlim lamr hnh hcore iza lcre׃ 
matthew 13:4	obcreo npl mn hcre el id hdrk oiba heop oiaklho׃ 
matthew 13:5	oiS aSr npl el mqmot sle aSr ain lo Sm admh hrbh oimhr lzmH ki la hih lo emq admh׃ 
matthew 13:6	oihi kcrH hSmS oizrb oiibS ki la hih lo SrS׃ 
matthew 13:7	oiS aSr npl bin hqzim oielo hqzim oimekho׃ 
matthew 13:8	oiS aSr npl el hadmh hTobh oitn pri ch mah Serim och SSim och SlSim׃ 
matthew 13:9	mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
matthew 13:10	oigSo alio htlmidim oiamro lmh ch bmSlim tdbr alihm׃ 
matthew 13:11	oien oiamr ki lkm ntn ldet at sodot mlkot hSmim olhm la ntn׃ 
matthew 13:12	ki mi SiS lo ntn intn lo oiedip omi Sain lo gm at aSr iS lo iqH mmno׃ 
matthew 13:13	el kn bmSlim adbr alihm ki bratm la irao obSmem la iSmeo ap la ibino׃ 
matthew 13:14	otqim bhm nboat iSeiho hamrt Smeo Smoe oal tbino orao rao oal tdeo׃ 
matthew 13:15	ki hSmn lb hem hch oacnio hkbd oeinio hSe pn irah beinio obacnio iSme olbbo ibin oSb orpa lo׃ 
matthew 13:16	oatm aSri einikm ki trainh oacnikm ki tSmenh׃ 
matthew 13:17	ki amn amr ani lkm nbiaim ozdiqim rbim nkspo lrat at aSr atm raim ola raoho olSme at aSr atm Smeim ola Smeoho׃ 
matthew 13:18	lkn atm Smeo na at mSl hcore׃ 
matthew 13:19	kl aiS Sme at dbr hmlkot ola ibinho oba hre oHTp at hcroe blbbo hoa hncre el id hdrk׃ 
matthew 13:20	ohncre el hsle hoa hSme at hdbr oimhr oiqHno bSmHh׃ 
matthew 13:21	ak ain lo SrS tHtio orq lSeh iemd obhiot zrh ordiph el adot hdbr mid nkSl׃ 
matthew 13:22	ohncre bin hqzim hoa hSme at hdbr odagt heolm hch omrmt heSr imeko at hdbr opri la ihih lo׃ 
matthew 13:23	ohncre el hadmh hTobh hoa hSme at hdbr ombin ato ap ieSh pri ontn ch mah Serim och SSim och SlSim׃ 
matthew 13:24	oiSm lpnihm mSl aHr lamr mlkot hSmim domh laiS aSr cre cre Tob bSdho׃ 
matthew 13:25	oihi bnpl trdmh el hanSim oiba aibo oicre conin btok hHTim oilk lo׃ 
matthew 13:26	okaSr prH hdSa oieS pri oirao gm hconin׃ 
matthew 13:27	oigSo ebdi bel hbit oiamro alio adnino hla cre Tob cret bSdk omain lo hconin׃ 
matthew 13:28	oiamr lhm aiS aib eSh cat oiamro alio hebdim hiS at npSk ki nlk onlqT atm׃ 
matthew 13:29	oiamr la pn blqTkm at hconin tSrSo gm at hHTim׃ 
matthew 13:30	hniHo atm oigdlo Snihm iHd ed hqzir ohih bet hqzir amr lqozrim lqTo braSonh at hconin oagdo atm agdot lSrpm oat hHTim aspo laozri׃ 
matthew 13:31	oiSm lpnihm mSl aHr lamr mlkot hSmim domh lgrgr Sl Hrdl aSr lqHo aiS oicreho bSdho׃ 
matthew 13:32	ohoa qTn mkl hcroeim okaSr zmH gdol hoa mn hirqot ohih lez ed aSr ibao eop hSmim oqnno benpio׃ 
matthew 13:33	oiSa eod mSlo oiamr mlkot hSmim domh lSar aSr lqHto aSh otTmnho bSlS saim qmH ed ki iHmz klo׃ 
matthew 13:34	kl cat dbr ihoSe bmSlim al hmon hem obbli mSl la dbr alihm׃ 
matthew 13:35	lmlat at aSr dbr hnbia lamr aptHh bmSl pi abieh Hidot mni qdm׃ 
matthew 13:36	ac SlH ihoSe at hmon hem oiba hbith oigSo alio tlmidio oiamro bar na lno at mSl coni hSdh׃ 
matthew 13:37	oien oiamr alihm hcore at hcre hTob hoa bn hadm׃ 
matthew 13:38	ohSdh hoa heolm ohcre hTob bni hmlkot hm ohconin bni hre hmh׃ 
matthew 13:39	ohaib aSr crem hoa hSTn ohqzir hoa qz heolm ohqzrim hm hmlakim׃ 
matthew 13:40	ohnh kaSr ilqTo hconin onSrpo baS kn ihih bqz heolm hch׃ 
matthew 13:41	bn hadm iSlH at mlakio olqTo mmlkoto at kl hmkSlot oat kl peli haon׃ 
matthew 13:42	ohSliko atm al tnor haS Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim׃ 
matthew 13:43	ac ichiro hzdiqim kSmS bmlkot abihm mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
matthew 13:44	eod domh mlkot hSmim laozr Tmon bSdh aSr mzao aiS oiTmnho obSmHto ilk omkr at kl aSr lo oqnh at hSdh hhoa׃ 
matthew 13:45	eod domh mlkot hSmim lsHr hmbqS mrgliot Tbot׃ 
matthew 13:46	okaSr mza mrglit aHt iqrh mad hlk lo oimkr at kl aSr lo oiqn ath׃ 
matthew 13:47	eod domh mlkot hSmim lmkmrt aSr hordh lim ominim Sonim iaspo ltokh׃ 
matthew 13:48	okaSr nmlah helo ath al Spt him oiSbo oilqTo at hminim hTobim ltok hklim oat hmSHtim hSliko Hozh׃ 
matthew 13:49	kn ihih bqz heolm izao hmlakim ohbdilo at hrSeim mtok hzdiqim׃ 
matthew 13:50	ohSlikom al tnor haS Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim׃ 
matthew 13:51	oiamr alihm ihoSe hatm hbinotm at kl cat oiamro alio kn adnino׃ 
matthew 13:52	oiamr alihm el kn kl sopr hmlmd lmlkot hSmim domh laiS bel hbit hmozia maozro HdSot oiSnot׃ 
matthew 13:53	oihi kklot ihoSe at hmSlim halh oiebr mSm׃ 
matthew 13:54	oiba larzo oilmd atm bbit knstm ed ki hStommo oiamro main lch hHkmh hcat ohgborot׃ 
matthew 13:55	hla ch hoa bn hHrS hla amo Smh mrim oaHio ieqb oiosi oSmeon oihodh׃ 
matthew 13:56	oaHiotio hla kln atno hn omain aipoa lo kl alh׃ 
matthew 13:57	oihi lhm lmkSol oiamr ihoSe alihm ain hnbia nqlh ki am barzo obbito׃ 
matthew 13:58	ola eSh Sm gborot rbot mpni Hsr amontm׃ 
matthew 14:1	bet hhia Sme hordos Sr rbe hmdinh at Sme ihoSe׃ 
matthew 14:2	oiamr al nerio ch hoa ioHnn hmTbil ohoa qm mn hmtim el kn hgborot pelot bo׃ 
matthew 14:3	ki hordos tpS at ioHnn oiasrho oiSimho bbit hshr bgll horodih aSt pilpos aHio׃ 
matthew 14:4	ki ioHnn amr alio la nkon hith lk laSh׃ 
matthew 14:5	oibqS hmito ak ira at hhmon ki lnbia HSbo ato׃ 
matthew 14:6	oihi biom hldt hordos otrqd bt horodih btokm otiTb beini hordos׃ 
matthew 14:7	oiSbe lh oiamr mh tSal npSk oatn lk׃ 
matthew 14:8	oamh Smh at hdbrim bpih otSal lamr tnh li ph bqerh at raS ioHnn hmTbil׃ 
matthew 14:9	oiezb hmlk ak bebor hSboeh ohmsbim emo zoh ltt lh׃ 
matthew 14:10	oiSlH oiSa at raS ioHnn melio bbit hshr׃ 
matthew 14:11	oibiao at raSo bqerh oitno lnerh otbiaho al amh׃ 
matthew 14:12	oigSo tlmidio oiSao at goito oiqbroh oilko oigido lihoSe׃ 
matthew 14:13	oihi kSmeo at cat oisr mSm banih al mqom Hrbh lbdd oiSmeo hmon hem oilko aHrio brglihm mn herim׃ 
matthew 14:14	oiza ihoSe oira hmon em rb oihmo meio elihm oirpa at hHlSim aSr bhm׃ 
matthew 14:15	oihi lpnot erb oigSo alio tlmidio oiamro hmqom Hrb ogm nTh hiom SlHh at hmon hem oilko al hkprim lqnot lhm akl׃ 
matthew 14:16	oiamr alihm ainm zrikim llkt tno atm lhm lakl׃ 
matthew 14:17	oiamro alio ain lno ph ki am HmSt kkrot lHm oSni dgim׃ 
matthew 14:18	oiamr hbiaom ali hlm׃ 
matthew 14:19	oizo at hem lSbt el hdSa oiqH at HmSt kkrot hlHm oat Sni hdgim oiSa einio hSmimh oibrk oiprs oitn at hlHm ltlmidim ohtlmidim ntno lem׃ 
matthew 14:20	oiaklo klm oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim Snim eSr slim mlaim׃ 
matthew 14:21	ohaklim hio kHmSt alpi aiS mlbd hnSim ohTp׃ 
matthew 14:22	oiaz ihoSe btlmidio lrdt banih lebr lpnih al ebr him ed aSr iSlH at hem׃ 
matthew 14:23	oaHri SlHo at hem elh hhrh bdd lhtpll oihi erb ohoa lbdo Smh׃ 
matthew 14:24	ohanih hlkh btok him otTrp mn hglim ki hroH lngdh׃ 
matthew 14:25	oihi baSmrt hrbieit oiba alihm ihoSe mthlk el pni him׃ 
matthew 14:26	ohtlmidim bratm aoto mthlk el pni him nbhlo lamr mrah roH hoa oizeqo mpHd׃ 
matthew 14:27	oidbr ihoSe ptam alihm Hcqo ki ani hoa al tirao׃ 
matthew 14:28	oien pTros oiamr alio am ath hoa adni zoh na ki aba alik el hmim׃ 
matthew 14:29	oiamr boa oird pTros mn hanih oithlk el hmim lboa al ihoSe׃ 
matthew 14:30	oihi krato at hroH ki Hcqh hia oiira oiHl lTbe oizeq lamr adni hoSieni׃ 
matthew 14:31	oimhr ihoSe lSlH at ido oiHcq bo oiamr alio qTn hamonh lmh lHq lbk׃ 
matthew 14:32	hm elo al hanih ohroH Skkh׃ 
matthew 14:33	oanSi hanih ngSo oiStHoo lo lamr bamt bn alhim ath׃ 
matthew 14:34	oiebro at him oibao arzh gnisr׃ 
matthew 14:35	oikiro ato anSi hmqom hhoa oiSlHo al kl sbibotihm oibiao alio at kl hHolim׃ 
matthew 14:36	oibqSo mmno ki igeo rq bzizt bgdo okl hngeim noSeo׃ 
matthew 15:1	ac bao al ihoSe hsoprim ohproSim aSr miroSlim׃ 
matthew 15:2	oiamro mdoe tlmidik ebrim at qblt hcqnim ki ainm rHzim at idihm baklm lHm׃ 
matthew 15:3	oien oiamr alihm mdoe gm atm ebrim at mzot alhim bebor qbltkm׃ 
matthew 15:4	ki alhim zoh lamr kbd at abik oat amk omqll abio oamo mot iomt׃ 
matthew 15:5	oatm amrim hamr labio olamo qrbn kl mh Sath nhnh li ain elio lkbd at abio oat amo׃ 
matthew 15:6	otpro at dbr halhim bebor qbltkm׃ 
matthew 15:7	Hnpim hiTb nba elikm iSeiho lamr׃ 
matthew 15:8	hem hch ngS bpio obSptio kbdoni olbo rHq mmni׃ 
matthew 15:9	otho iratm ati mzot anSim mlmdim׃ 
matthew 15:10	oiqra al hem oiamr lhm Smeo ohbino׃ 
matthew 15:11	la hba al hph iTma at hadm ki am hioza mn hph hoa mTma at hadm׃ 
matthew 15:12	oigSo alio tlmidio oiamro hidet ki hproSim bSmem at hdbr hch nkSlo bo׃ 
matthew 15:13	oien oiamr kl mTe aSr la nTe abi SbSmim eqor ieqr׃ 
matthew 15:14	hniHo aotm mnhlim eorim hmh leorim oki iolik eor at heor onplo Snihm btok hbor׃ 
matthew 15:15	oien pTros oiamr alio bar lno at hmSl hch׃ 
matthew 15:16	oiamr ihoSe ednh gm atm bain binh׃ 
matthew 15:17	heod la tSkilo ki kl hba al hph iord al hkrS oiSpk mSm lmozaot׃ 
matthew 15:18	abl hioza mn hph ioza mn hlb ohoa mTma at hadm׃ 
matthew 15:19	ki mn hlb iozaot mHSbot re rziHot naopim cnonim gnbot ediot Sqr ogdopim׃ 
matthew 15:20	alh hm hmTmaim at hadm abl akol bli nTilt idim la iTma at hadm׃ 
matthew 15:21	oiza ihoSe mSm oisr al glilot zor ozidon׃ 
matthew 15:22	ohnh aSh knenit izah mn hgbolot hhm otzeq alio lamr Hnni adni bn dod ki bti menh mad el idi Sd׃ 
matthew 15:23	ohoa la enh ath dbr oigSo tlmidio oibqSo mmno lamr SlHh ki zeqt hia aHrino׃ 
matthew 15:24	oien oiamr la SlHti ki am al hzan habdot lbit iSral׃ 
matthew 15:25	ohia bah otStHo lo lamr adni ecrni׃ 
matthew 15:26	oien oiamr la Tob lqHt at lHm hbnim olhSliko lzeiri hklbim׃ 
matthew 15:27	otamr kn adni aps ki gm zeiri hklbim iaklo mprorim hnplim mel SlHn adnihm׃ 
matthew 15:28	oien ihoSe oiamr alih aSh gdlh amontk ihi lk krzonk otrpa bth mn hSeh hhia׃ 
matthew 15:29	oiebr ihoSe mSm oiba al im hglil oiel hhrh oiSb Sm׃ 
matthew 15:30	oibao alio hmon em rb oemhm psHim eorim HrSim qTeim orbim khmh oipilom lrgli ihoSe oirpam׃ 
matthew 15:31	oitmho hem braotm at halmim mdbrim ohqTeim briaim ohpsHim mthlkim oheorim raim oiSbHo at alhi iSral׃ 
matthew 15:32	oiqra ihoSe al tlmidio oiamr nkmro rHmi el hem ki ch SlSt imim emdo emdi oain lhm mh lakl oainni abh lSlHm rebim pn itelpo bdrk׃ 
matthew 15:33	oiamro alio htlmidim main lno di lHm bmdbr lhSbie at hhmon hgdol hch׃ 
matthew 15:34	oiamr ihoSe alihm kmh kkrot lHm lkm oiamro Sbe omeT dgim qTnim׃ 
matthew 15:35	oizo at hmon hem lSbt larz׃ 
matthew 15:36	oiqH at Sbe kkrot hlHm oat hdgim oibrk oiprs oitn al htlmidim ohtlmidim ntno lem׃ 
matthew 15:37	oiaklo klm oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim Sbeh dodim mlaim׃ 
matthew 15:38	ohaklim hio arbet alpi aiS mlbd hnSim ohTp׃ 
matthew 15:39	oiSlH at hem oird banih oiba al gbol mgdla׃ 
matthew 16:1	oigSo hproSim ohzdoqim lnsoto oiSalo mato lhraotm aot mn hSmim׃ 
matthew 16:2	oien oiamr lhm berb tamro iom zH ihih ki admo hSmim׃ 
matthew 16:3	obbqr tamro hiom ser ki admo ohtqdro hSmim Hnpim atm at pni hSmim idetm lbHn oatot hetim la toklo׃ 
matthew 16:4	dor re omnap bqS lo aot oaot la intn lo blti am aot ionh hnbia oiecbm oilk lo׃ 
matthew 16:5	okboa htlmidim al ebr him SkHo lqHt atm lHm׃ 
matthew 16:6	oiamr ihoSe alihm rao ohSmro lkm mSar hproSim ohzdoqim׃ 
matthew 16:7	oiHSbo blbbm lamr ki la lqHno atno lHm׃ 
matthew 16:8	oide ihoSe oiamr alihm qTni hamonh mh tHSbo blbbkm ki la lqHtm atkm lHm׃ 
matthew 16:9	heod la tSkilo ola tckro at HmSt kkrot hlHm lHmSt alpi aiS okmh slim nSatm׃ 
matthew 16:10	oat Sbe kkrot lHm larbet alpi aiS okmh dodim nSatm׃ 
matthew 16:11	aik la tbino ki la el hlHm amrti alikm hSmro lkm mSar hproSim ohzdoqim׃ 
matthew 16:12	ac hbino ki la amr lhSmr mSar hlHm ki am mlmod hproSim ohzdoqim׃ 
matthew 16:13	oihi kboa ihoSe al glilot qisrin Sl pilpos oiSal at tlmidio lamr mh amrim hanSim eli mi hoa bn hadm׃ 
matthew 16:14	oiamro iS amrim ioHnn hmTbil hoa oaHrim amrim aliho oiS amrim irmiho ao aHd mn hnbiaim׃ 
matthew 16:15	oiamr alihm oatm mh tamro mi ani׃ 
matthew 16:16	oien Smeon pTros oiamr ath hoa hmSiH bn alhim Hiim׃ 
matthew 16:17	oien oiamr alio aSrik Smeon br ionh ki bSr odm la glh lk at cat ki am abi SbSmim׃ 
matthew 16:18	oap ani amr alik ki ath pTros oel hsle hch abnh at qhlti oSeri Saol la igbro elih׃ 
matthew 16:19	oatn lk at mptHot mlkot hSmim okl aSr tasr el harz asor ihih bSmim okl aSr ttir el harz mtr ihih bSmim׃ 
matthew 16:20	ac zoh at htlmidim bgerh lblti hgid laiS ki hoa ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
matthew 16:21	mn het hhia hHl ihoSe lhorot at tlmidio Shoa zrik llkt iroSlim oienh hrbh bidi hcqnim ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oihrg obiom hSliSi qom iqom׃ 
matthew 16:22	oiqHho pTros oiHl lger bo lamr Hs lk adni al ihi lk kcat׃ 
matthew 16:23	oipn oiamr lpTros sor meli hSTn lmkSol ath li ki ain lbk ldbri alhim ki am ldbri bni adm׃ 
matthew 16:24	oiamr ihoSe al tlmidio aiS ki iHpz llkt aHri ikHS bnpSo onSa at zlbo ohlk aHri׃ 
matthew 16:25	ki kl aSr iHpz lhoSie at npSo tabd npSo mmno okl aSr tabd lo npSo lmeni hoa imzanh׃ 
matthew 16:26	ki mh ioeil hadm ki iqnh at kl heolm onpSo tSHt ao mh itn hadm pdion npSo׃ 
matthew 16:27	ki etid bn hadm lboa bkbod abio em mlakio oac iSlm lkl aiS kmeSho׃ 
matthew 16:28	amn amr ani lkm ki iS mn hemdim ph aSr la iTemo mot ed ki irao at bn hadm ba bmlkoto׃ 
matthew 17:1	omqz SSt imim lqH lo ihoSe at pTros oat ieqb oat ioHnn aHio oielm bdd el hr gboh׃ 
matthew 17:2	oiStnh leinihm oichiro pnio kSmS obgdio kaor hlbino׃ 
matthew 17:3	ohnh nrao alihm mSh oaliho mdbrim ato׃ 
matthew 17:4	oien pTros oiamr al ihoSe adni Tob hiotno ph am tHpz neSh na ph SlS skot lk aHt olmSh aHt olaliho aHt׃ 
matthew 17:5	eodno mdbr ohnh enn aor hzl elihm ohnh qol mtok henn amr ch bni ididi aSr rziti bo alio tSmeon׃ 
matthew 17:6	oihi kSme htlmidim oiplo el pnihm oiirao mad׃ 
matthew 17:7	oigS ihoSe oige bm oiamr qomo oal tirao׃ 
matthew 17:8	oiSao einihm ola rao aiS blti at ihoSe lbdo׃ 
matthew 17:9	obrdtm mn hhr zoh ihoSe atm lamr la tgido laiS at dbr hmrah ed am qm bn hadm mem hmtim׃ 
matthew 17:10	oiSalho tlmidio lamr lmh ch amrim hsoprim ki aliho boa iboa braSonh׃ 
matthew 17:11	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hnh aliho ba braSonh ohSib at hkl׃ 
matthew 17:12	abl amr ani lkm ki aliho kbr ba ola hkirho oieSo bo krzonm okn gm bn hadm ienh el idm׃ 
matthew 17:13	ac hbino htlmidim ki el ioHnn hmTbil dbr alihm׃ 
matthew 17:14	oihi kboam al hmon hem oigS alio aiS oikre el brkio lngdo׃ 
matthew 17:15	oiamr adni rHm na el bni ki mkh irH hoa oHlio re ki pemim rbot hoa npl baS opemim rbot al tok hmim׃ 
matthew 17:16	oabia ato al tlmidik ola iklo lrpa lo׃ 
matthew 17:17	oien ihoSe oiamr hoi dor blti mamin optltl ed mti ahih emkm ed mti asbl atkm hbiao aoto ali hnh׃ 
matthew 17:18	oiger bo ihoSe oiza hSd mmno oirpa hner mn hSeh hhia׃ 
matthew 17:19	oigSo htlmidim al ihoSe ohoa lbdo oiamro mdoe anHno la iklno lgrSo׃ 
matthew 17:20	oiamr ihoSe alihm mpni aSr ainkm maminim ki amn amr ani lkm am iS lkm amonh kgrgr hHrdl oamrtm al hhr hch hetq mch Smh onetq mmqomo oain dbr aSr ibzr mkm׃ 
matthew 17:21	abl hmin hch la iza ki am btplh obzom׃ 
matthew 17:22	oihi bhthlkm barz hglil oiamr alihm ihoSe etid bn hadm lhmsr bidi anSim׃ 
matthew 17:23	oihrgho obiom hSliSi qom iqom oitezbo mad׃ 
matthew 17:24	oihi kboam al kpr nHom oigSo al pTros gbi mHzit hSql oiamro hla itn rbkm at mHzit hSql׃ 
matthew 17:25	oiamr hn obboao hbith qdm ato ihoSe lSal mh detk Smeon mlki harz mmi iqHo mks oms mat bnihm ao mat hcrim׃ 
matthew 17:26	oiamr pTros alio mat hcrim oiamr lo ihoSe am kn apoa hbnim HpSim hmh׃ 
matthew 17:27	ak lmen la nhih lhm lmkSol lk al him ohSlkt al toko Hkh oat hdg hraSon aSr ielh Saho okaSr tptH at pio tmza bo astira aoto qH lk ontt lhm bedi obedk׃ 
matthew 18:1	bSeh hhia ngSo htlmidim al ihoSe oiamro mi apoa gdol mHbrio bmlkot hSmim׃ 
matthew 18:2	oiqra ihoSe alio ild qTn oiemidho btokm׃ 
matthew 18:3	oiamr amn amr ani lkm am la tSobo lhiot kildim la tboa al mlkot hSmim׃ 
matthew 18:4	lkn kl hmSpil at ezmo kild hch hoa hgdol bmlkot hSmim׃ 
matthew 18:5	okl aSr iqbl ild aHd kch bSmi aoti hoa mqbl׃ 
matthew 18:6	okl hmkSil at aHd mn hqTnim halh hmaminim bi noH lo Sitlh plH rkb el zoaro oTbe bmzolot im׃ 
matthew 18:7	aoi leolm mpni hmkSlim ki hmkSlim zrikim lboa abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido iboa hmkSol׃ 
matthew 18:8	oam tkSilk idk ao rglk qzz aoth ohSlk mmk Tob lk lboa lHiim psH ao qTe mhiot lk Sti idim ao Sti rglim otSlk al aS eolm׃ 
matthew 18:9	oam eink tkSlik nqr aoth ohSlk mmk Tob lk lboa lHiim bein aHt mhiot lk Sti einim otSlk al aS gihnm׃ 
matthew 18:10	rao pn tbco aHd wqTnim halh ki amr ani lkm ki mlakihm raim tmid at pni abi SbSmim׃ 
matthew 18:11	ki ba bn hadm lhoSie at habd׃ 
matthew 18:12	mh detkm ki ihio laiS mah kbSim oteh aHd mhm hla iecb at htSeim otSeh el hhrim ohlk lbqS at hteh׃ 
matthew 18:13	ohih kaSr imzaho amn amr ani lkm ki iSmH elio iotr mel htSeim otSeh aSr la teo׃ 
matthew 18:14	kn ainno rzon mlpni abikm SbSmim ki iabd aHd mn hqTnim halh׃ 
matthew 18:15	oki iHTa lk aHik lk ohokHt aoto bink obino lbdo oam iSme alik qnit lk aHik׃ 
matthew 18:16	oam la iSme qH emk eod aHd ao Snim lmen el pi Snim ao SlSh edim iqom kl dbr׃ 
matthew 18:17	oam la iSme alihm hgd al hqhl oam la iSme gm al hqhl ohih lk kgoi okmoks׃ 
matthew 18:18	amn amr ani lkm kl aSr tasro el harz asor ihih bSmim okl aSr ttiro el harz mtr ihih bSmim׃ 
matthew 18:19	oeod amr ani lkm Snim mkm ki ioezo iHdo barz el kl dbr aSr iSalo hih ihih lhm mat abi SbSmim׃ 
matthew 18:20	ki bkl mqom aSr Snim ao SlSh naspo bSmi Sm ani btokm׃ 
matthew 18:21	oigS alio pTros oiamr lo adni kmh pemim iHTa li aHi oslHti lo hed Sbe pemim׃ 
matthew 18:22	oiamr alio ihoSe la amr lk ed Sbe pemim ki am ed Sbeim oSbe׃ 
matthew 18:23	el kn domh mlkot hSmim lmlk bSr odm aSr Hpz leSot HSbon em ebdio׃ 
matthew 18:24	okaSr hHl lHSb hoba lpnio aiS aSr Hib lo eSrt alpim kkri ksp׃ 
matthew 18:25	ola hih lo lSlm oizo adnio lmkr aoto oat aSto oat bnio oat kl aSr lo okn iSlm׃ 
matthew 18:26	oipl hebd oiStHo lo lamr adni hark li apk oat kl aSlmh lk׃ 
matthew 18:27	oihmo rHmi adoni hebd hhoa oipTrho oiSmT lo at hHob׃ 
matthew 18:28	oiza hebd hhoa mlpnio oimza aHd mHbrio hebdim ohoa Hib lo mah dinrim oiHcq bo oiHnqho lamr Slm at aSr ath Hib li׃ 
matthew 18:29	oipl Hbro lpni rglio oibqS mmno lamr hark li apk oaSlmh lk hkl׃ 
matthew 18:30	ohoa man oilk oiSlikho bmSmr ed ki iSlm lo at Hobo׃ 
matthew 18:31	oHbrio hebdim rao at hneSh oiezbo mad oibao oigido ladnihm at kl aSr neSh׃ 
matthew 18:32	oiqra alio adnio oiamr lo ath hebd hre at kl hHob hhoa hSmTti lk ien aSr bqSt mmni׃ 
matthew 18:33	hla hih lk gm ath lrHm el hebd Hbrk kaSr rHmti ani elik׃ 
matthew 18:34	oiqzp adnio oisgr aoto lmisrim ed ki iSlm at kl Hobo׃ 
matthew 18:35	kkh ieSh lkm gm abi SbSmim am la tslHo aiS aiS laHio bkl lbbkm at HTatm׃ 
matthew 19:1	oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at hdbrim halh oise mn hglil oiba al gbol ihodh bebr hirdn׃ 
matthew 19:2	oilko aHrio hmon em rb oirpam Sm׃ 
matthew 19:3	oigSo alio hproSim lnsoto lamr hiokl aiS lSlH at aSto el kl dbr׃ 
matthew 19:4	oien oiamr alihm hla qratm ki eSh braSit ckr onqbh eSh atm׃ 
matthew 19:5	oamr el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto ohio Snihm lbSr aHd׃ 
matthew 19:6	am kn ainm eod Snim ki am bSr aHd lkn at aSr Hbr halhim al ipridno hadm׃ 
matthew 19:7	oiamro alio olmh ch zoh mSh ltt lh spr kritt olSlHh׃ 
matthew 19:8	oiamr alihm bebor qSi lbbkm hniH lkm mSh lSlH at nSikm ak mraS la hith kkh׃ 
matthew 19:9	oani amr lkm hmSlH at aSto blti el dbr cnot olqH lo aHrt nap hoa ohlqH at hgroSh nap hoa׃ 
matthew 19:10	oiamro alio htlmidim am kkh hoa enin aiS oaSto la Tob lqHt aSh׃ 
matthew 19:11	oiamr alihm la iokl kl adm qbl at hdbr hch ki am alh aSr ntn lhm lhbin׃ 
matthew 19:12	iS srisim aSr noldo kn mbTn amm oiS srisim hmsrsim el idi adm oiS srisim aSr srso at ezmm lmen mlkot hSmim mi Siokl lqbl iqbl׃ 
matthew 19:13	ac ibiao alio ildim lmen iSim elihm at idio oitpll elihm oigero bm htlmidim׃ 
matthew 19:14	ohoa ihoSe amr hniHo lildim oal tmneom mboa ali ki lalh mlkot hSmim׃ 
matthew 19:15	oiSm at idio elihm oiebr mSm׃ 
matthew 19:16	ohnh aiS ngS alio oiamr rbi hTob ai ch hTob aSr aeSno lqnot Hii eolmim׃ 
matthew 19:17	oiamr alio mh tqrani Tob ain Tob ki am aHd halhim oam Hpzk lboa al hHiim Smr at hmzot׃ 
matthew 19:18	oiamr alio mh hnh oiamr ihoSe alh hn la trzH la tnap la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr׃ 
matthew 19:19	kbd at abik oat amk oahbt lrek kmok׃ 
matthew 19:20	oiamr alio hbHor at kl alh Smrti mneori omh Hsrti eod׃ 
matthew 19:21	oiamr ihoSe alio am Hpzk lhiot Slm lk mkr at rkSk otn leniim ohih lk aozr bSmim oSob hlm olk aHri׃ 
matthew 19:22	oihi kSme hbHor at hdbr hch oilk mSm nezb ki hio lo nksim rbim׃ 
matthew 19:23	oiamr ihoSe al tlmidio amn amr ani lkm qSh leSir lboa al mlkot hSmim׃ 
matthew 19:24	oeod ani amr lkm ki nql lgml lebr drk nqb hmHT mba eSir al mlkot halhim׃ 
matthew 19:25	ohtlmidim kSmem cat hStommo mad oiamro mi apoa iokl lhoSe׃ 
matthew 19:26	oibT bn ihoSe oiamr lhm mbni adm ipla hdbr abl mhalhim la ipla kl dbr׃ 
matthew 19:27	oien pTros oiamr alio hn anHno ecbno at hkl onlk aHrik mh ihih lno׃ 
matthew 19:28	oiamr ihoSe alihm amn amr ani lkm atm hhlkim aHri bhtHdS hbriah kaSr iSb bn hadm el ksa kbodo tSbo gm atm el Snim eSr ksaot lSpT at Snim eSr SbTi iSral׃ 
matthew 19:29	okl aiS aSr ecb at btio oat aHio oat aHiotio oat abio oat amo oat aSto oat bnio oat Sdotio lmen Smi hoa iqH mah Serim oHii eolmim iirS׃ 
matthew 19:30	oaolm rbim mn hraSonim aSr ihio aHronim omn haHronim ihio raSonim׃ 
matthew 20:1	ki domh mlkot hSmim ladm bel bit aSr hSkim lzat bbqr lSkr pelim lkrmo׃ 
matthew 20:2	ohtnh em hpelim Skr dinr liom oiSlHm al krmo׃ 
matthew 20:3	oiza bSeh hSliSit oira aHrim emdim bTlim bSoq׃ 
matthew 20:4	oiamr lhm lko gm atm al krmi okiSr atn lkm oilko׃ 
matthew 20:5	oiza gm bSeh hSSit gm btSieit oieS kdbr hch׃ 
matthew 20:6	oiza bSet eSti eSrh oimza aHrim emdim oiamr alihm lmh atm emdim ph bTlim kl hiom׃ 
matthew 20:7	oiamro lo ki la Skr aotno aiS oiamr alihm lko gm atm al hkrm okiSr itn lkm׃ 
matthew 20:8	oihi berb oiamr bel hkrm al pqido qra at hpelim oSlm lhm at Skrm hHl baHronim oklh braSonim׃ 
matthew 20:9	oibao hnSkrim bSet aHt eSrh oiqHo aiS aiS dinr aHd׃ 
matthew 20:10	obba hraSonim dmo bnpSm ki iqHo iotr oiqHo gm hm aiS aiS dinr aHd׃ 
matthew 20:11	oihi bqHtm oilono el bel hbit lamr׃ 
matthew 20:12	alh haHronim la eSo ki am Seh aHt oath hSoitm alino aSr sblno at kbd hiom oat Hmo׃ 
matthew 20:13	oien oiamr al aHd mhm rei la eSqtik hla Skr dinr htnit emi׃ 
matthew 20:14	qH at Slk olk oani rzoni ltt gm lch haHron kmo lk׃ 
matthew 20:15	hla aokl leSot bSli krzoni ham tre eink el aSr Tob anki׃ 
matthew 20:16	kkh ihio haHronim raSonim ohraSonim ihio aHronim ki rbim hm hqroaim omeTim hnbHrim׃ 
matthew 20:17	oihi kelot ihoSe iroSlim oiqH alio at Snim heSr lbdm oiamr lhm bdrk׃ 
matthew 20:18	hnno elim iroSlimh obn hadm imsr lraSi hkhnim olsoprim ohrSieho lmot׃ 
matthew 20:19	omsro aoto lgoim lhtl bo olhkot aoto bSoTim olzlb aoto obiom hSliSi qom iqom׃ 
matthew 20:20	ac ngSh alio am bni cbdi em bnih otStHo lo lbqS mmno dbr׃ 
matthew 20:21	oiamr alih mh bqStk otamr alio amr na ki iSbo Sni bni alh aHd limink oaHd lSmalk bmlkotk׃ 
matthew 20:22	oien ihoSe oiamr la idetm at aSr Saltm hikl toklo Stot at hkos aSr ani etid lStoto ohTbl bTbilh aSr ani nbTl bh oiamro alio nokl׃ 
matthew 20:23	oiamr alihm hn at kosi tSto obTbilh aSr ani nTbl bh tTblo ak Sbt limimi olSmali ain bidi ltth blti laSr hokn lhm mat abi׃ 
matthew 20:24	oihi kaSr Smeo cat heSrh oikeso al Sni haHim׃ 
matthew 20:25	oihoSe qra lhm oiamr atm idetm ki Sri hgoim rdim bhm ohgdolim SlTim elihm׃ 
matthew 20:26	oatm al ihi kn binikm ki am hHpc lhiot gdol bkm ihi lkm lmSrt׃ 
matthew 20:27	ohHpz lhiot bkm lraS ihi lkm ebd׃ 
matthew 20:28	kaSr bn hadm la ba lmen iSrtoho ki am lSrt oltt at npSo kpr tHt rbim׃ 
matthew 20:29	oihi kzatm miriHo oilk aHrio hmon em rb׃ 
matthew 20:30	ohnh Sni eorim iSbim el id hdrk oiSmeo ki ihoSe ebr oizeqo lamr Hnno na adnino bn dod׃ 
matthew 20:31	oiger bm hem lhStiqm ohm hrbo lzeq oiamro adnino Hnno na bn dod׃ 
matthew 20:32	oiemd ihoSe oiqra lhm oiamr mh tHpzo oaeSh lkm׃ 
matthew 20:33	oiamro alio adnino eSh StpqHnh einino׃ 
matthew 20:34	orHmi ihoSe nkmro oige beinihm optam hHlo einihm lraot oilko aHrio׃ 
matthew 21:1	oihi kaSr qrbo liroSlim obao al bit pgi bhr hcitim oiSlH ihoSe Snim mn htlmidim׃ 
matthew 21:2	oiamr alihm lko al hkpr aSr mmolkm Sm tmzao aton asorh oeir emh htiro atm ohbiao ali׃ 
matthew 21:3	oki iamr aiS alikm dbr oamrtm hadon zrik lhm obrge iSlHm׃ 
matthew 21:4	okl cat hith lmlat hnamr bid hnbia lamr׃ 
matthew 21:5	amro lbt zion hnh mlkk iboa lk eni orkb el Hmor oel eir bn atnot׃ 
matthew 21:6	oilko htlmidim oieSo kaSr zoh atm ihoSe׃ 
matthew 21:7	oibiao at haton oat heir oiSimo elihm at bgdihm oirkibho elihm׃ 
matthew 21:8	orb hhmon prSo at bgdihm el hdrk oaHrim krto enpi ezim oiSTHom el hdrk׃ 
matthew 21:9	ohmon hem hhlkim lpnio oaHrio qrao lamr hoSe na lbn dod brok hba bSm ihoh hoSe na bmromim׃ 
matthew 21:10	oihi bbao iroSlim othm kl heir lamr mi hoa ch׃ 
matthew 21:11	oiamro hmni hem ch hoa hnbia ihoSe mnzrt aSr bglil׃ 
matthew 21:12	oiba ihoSe al mqdS halhim oigrS mSm at kl hmokrim ohqonim bmqdS oihpk at SlHnot hSlHnim oat moSbot mkri hionim׃ 
matthew 21:13	oiamr alihm hn ktob ki biti bit tplh iqra oatm Smtm ato lmert prizim׃ 
matthew 21:14	oigSo alio eorim opsHim bmqdS oirpam׃ 
matthew 21:15	oihi kraot hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim at hnplaot aSr eSh oat hildim hzeqim bmqdS oamrim hoSe na lbn dod oiHr lhm׃ 
matthew 21:16	oiamro alio hSme ath at aSr alh amrim oiamr ihoSe alihm kn hki qra la qratm mpi eollim oionqim isdt ec׃ 
matthew 21:17	oiecbm oiza mHoz leir al bit hini oiln Sm׃ 
matthew 21:18	obbqr Sb al heir ohoa reb׃ 
matthew 21:19	oira tanh aHt el hdrk oiqrb alih ola mza bh maomh mlbd helim oiamr alih meth la ihih mmk pri ed eolm otibS htanh ptam׃ 
matthew 21:20	oirao htlmidim oitmho lamr aik ibSh htanh ptam׃ 
matthew 21:21	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm am thih lkm amonh oainkm mstpqim la lbd kmeSh htanh hcat teSo ki gm bamrkm al hhr hch hnSa ohetq al tok him hio thih׃ 
matthew 21:22	okl aSr tSalo btplh oatm maminim tqHho׃ 
matthew 21:23	oiba al hmqdS oihi blmdo Sm oigSo alio raSi hkhnim ocqni hem oiamro bai co rSot ath eSh alh omi ntn lk hrSot hcat׃ 
matthew 21:24	oien ioSe oiamr alihm gm ani aSalh atkm dbr aHd aSr am tgido ato li gm ani agid lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh׃ 
matthew 21:25	Tbilt ioHnn main hith hmn hSmim am mbni adm oiHSbo blbbm lamr׃ 
matthew 21:26	am namr mn hSmim iamr alino mdoe apoa la hamontm lo oam namr mbni adm iraim anHno at hmon hem ki klm HSbim at ioHnn lnbia׃ 
matthew 21:27	oieno at ihoSe oiamro la ideno oiamr alihm gm ani la amr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh׃ 
matthew 21:28	abl mh detkm aiS hih olo Sni bnim oigS al hraSon oiamr bni lk hiom oebd bkrmi׃ 
matthew 21:29	oien oiamr ainni aba oaHri kn nHm oilk׃ 
matthew 21:30	oigS al hSni oidbr kcat gm alio oien oiamr hnni adni ola hlk׃ 
matthew 21:31	mi mSnihm eSh at rzon hab oiamro alio hraSon oiamr lhm ihoSe amn amr ani lkm hmoksim ohconot iqdmo atkm lboa al mlkot halhim׃ 
matthew 21:32	ki ioHnn ba alikm bdrk zdqh ola hamntm lo abl hmoksim ohconot hm hamino lo oatm raitm ola Sbtm aHri kn lhamin lo׃ 
matthew 21:33	mSl aHr Smeo aiS bel bit hih oiTe haiS krm oieS gdr sbib lo oiHzb iqb oibn mgdl btoko oitnho al krmim oilk bdrk mrHoq׃ 
matthew 21:34	oihi bhgie et hasip oiSlH ebdio al hkrmim lqHt at prio׃ 
matthew 21:35	oiHciqo hkrmim bebdio at ch hko oat ch hrgo oat ch sqlo׃ 
matthew 21:36	oiosp SlH ebdim aHrim rbim mn hraSonim oieSo kkh gm lhm׃ 
matthew 21:37	obaHronh SlH alihm at bno bamro mpni bni igoro׃ 
matthew 21:38	oihi kraot hkrmim at hbn oiamro aiS al aHio ch hoa hiorS lko onhrgho onaHch bnHlto׃ 
matthew 21:39	oiHciqo bo oidHpoho al mHoz lkrm oihrgo ato׃ 
matthew 21:40	ohnh kboa bel hkrm mh ieSh lkrmim hhm׃ 
matthew 21:41	oiamro alio ire lreim oiabdm oat hkrm itn lkrmim aHrim aSr iSibo lo at hpri beto׃ 
matthew 21:42	oiamr ihoSe alihm hki qra la qratm bktobim abn maso hbonim hith lraS pnh mat ihoh hith cat hia nplat beinino׃ 
matthew 21:43	el kn ani amr lkm ki tqH mkm mlkot halhim otntn lgoi aSr ieSh at prih׃ 
matthew 21:44	ohnpl el habn hhia iSbr oaSr tpl elio tSHqho׃ 
matthew 21:45	oihi kSme hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim at mSlio oibino ki elihm dbr׃ 
matthew 21:46	oibqSo ltpSo ak irao mpni hmon hem ki lnbia HSbho׃ 
matthew 22:1	oien ihoSe oisp dbr bmSlim alihm lamr׃ 
matthew 22:2	domh mlkot hSmim lmlk bSr odm aSr eSh Htnh lbno׃ 
matthew 22:3	oiSlH at ebdio lqra hqroaim al hHtnh ola abo lboa׃ 
matthew 22:4	oisp SlH ebdim aHrim lamr amro al hqroaim hnh erkti at seodti Sori omriai TboHim ohkl mokn bao al hHtnh׃ 
matthew 22:5	ohm la Sto lbm lcat oilko lhm ch al Sdho och al msHro׃ 
matthew 22:6	ohnSarim tpSo at ebdio oitello bm oihrgom׃ 
matthew 22:7	oiqzp hmlk oiSlH zbaotio oiabd at hmrzHim hhm oat eirm Srp baS׃ 
matthew 22:8	ac amr al ebdio hn hHtnh moknh ohqroaim la hio raoim lh׃ 
matthew 22:9	lkn lko na al raSi hdrkim okl aiS aSr tmzao qrao ato al hHtnh׃ 
matthew 22:10	oizao hebdim hhm al hdrkim oiaspo at kl aSr mzao gm reim gm Tobim oimla bit hHtnh msbim׃ 
matthew 22:11	oihi kboa hmlk lraot at hmsbim oira bhm aiS ola hih lboS bgdi Htnh׃ 
matthew 22:12	oiamr alio rei aikh bat hnh oain lk bgdi Htnh oialm׃ 
matthew 22:13	oiamr hmlk lmSrtim asro idio orglio onSatm ohSlktm aoto al hHSk hHizon Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim׃ 
matthew 22:14	ki rbim hm hqroaim omeTim hnbHrim׃ 
matthew 22:15	oilko hproSim oitiezo aik ikSilho bdbr׃ 
matthew 22:16	oiSlHo alio at tlmidihm em hhordosiim lamr rbi ideno ki aiS amt ath otorh bamt at drk alhim ola tgor mpni aiS ki aink mkir pni adm׃ 
matthew 22:17	lkn hgidh na lno at detk hnkon lno ltt ms al hqisr am la׃ 
matthew 22:18	oihoSe ide at rSetm oiamr hHnpim mh tnsoni׃ 
matthew 22:19	hraoni at mTbe hms oibiao lo dinr׃ 
matthew 22:20	oiamr alihm Sl mi hzorh hcat ohmktb aSr elio׃ 
matthew 22:21	oiamro alio Sl hqisr oiamr alihm lkn tno lqisr at aSr lqisr olalhim at aSr lalhim׃ 
matthew 22:22	okSmem at cat tmho oiecbho oilko lhm׃ 
matthew 22:23	biom hhoa ngSo alio zdoqim hamrim ki ain tHit hmtim oiSalo ato lamr׃ 
matthew 22:24	rbi hn mSh amr aiS ki imot obnim ain lo aHio iibm at aSto ohqim cre laHio׃ 
matthew 22:25	oatno hio Sbeh aHim ohraSon nSa aSh oimt ocre ain lo oiecb at aSto laHio׃ 
matthew 22:26	okmo kn gm hSni okn gm hSliSi ed hSbeh׃ 
matthew 22:27	oaHri klm mth gm haSh׃ 
matthew 22:28	oeth btHit hmtim lmi mn hSbeh thih laSh ki lklm hith׃ 
matthew 22:29	oien ihoSe oiamr lhm Teim atm baSr ainkm iodeim at hktobim ogm at gbort halhim׃ 
matthew 22:30	ki btHit hmtim la iSao nSim ola tnSanh ki am kmlaki alhim bSmim ihio׃ 
matthew 22:31	oel dbr tHit hmtim hla qratm at hnamr lkm mpi halhim lamr׃ 
matthew 22:32	anki alhi abrhm oalhi izHq oalhi ieqb ohoa ainno alhi hmtim ki am alhi hHiim׃ 
matthew 22:33	oiSme hmon hem oiStommmo el torto׃ 
matthew 22:34	ohproSim kSmem ki skr pi hzdoqim oioedo iHdo׃ 
matthew 22:35	oaHd mhm mbin btorh Sal ato lnsoto lamr׃ 
matthew 22:36	rbi ai co mzoh gdolh hia btorh׃ 
matthew 22:37	oiamr ihoSe alio oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl mdek׃ 
matthew 22:38	cat hia hmzoh hgdolh ohraSonh׃ 
matthew 22:39	ohSnit domh lh oahbt lrek kmok׃ 
matthew 22:40	bSti hmzot halh kl htorh tloih ogm hnbiaim׃ 
matthew 22:41	oihi bhqhl hproSim oiSalm ihoSe lamr׃ 
matthew 22:42	mh detkm el hmSiH bn mi hoa oiamro alio bn dod׃ 
matthew 22:43	oiamr alihm oaik qra lo dod broH adon bamro׃ 
matthew 22:44	nam ihoh ladni Sb limini ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik׃ 
matthew 22:45	oeth am dod qra lo adon aik hoa bno׃ 
matthew 22:46	ola ikl aiS lenot ato dbr ola erb eod aiS at lbo mn hiom hhoa lSal aoto׃ 
matthew 23:1	ac idbr ihoSe al hmon hem oal tlmidio lamr׃ 
matthew 23:2	el ksa mSh iSbo hsoprim ohproSim׃ 
matthew 23:3	lkn kl aSr iamro lkm tSmro leSot ak kmeSihm la teSo ki amrim hm oainm eSim׃ 
matthew 23:4	ki asrim mSat kbdim oemsim el Skm hanSim ola iabo lhniem ap bazbem׃ 
matthew 23:5	oeSim at kl meSihm lhraot bhm lbni adm ki mrHibim at tplihm omgdilim at ziziotihm׃ 
matthew 23:6	oahbim at hsbt hraS bseodot oat moSbi hraS bbti hknsiot׃ 
matthew 23:7	oat Salot Slomm bSoqim oat aSr iqrao lhm bni hadm rbi rbi׃ 
matthew 23:8	aolm atm al tqrao rbi ki aHd hoa rbkm hmSiH oatm aHim klkm׃ 
matthew 23:9	oal tqrao ab laiS mkm el hadmh ki aHd hoa abikm aSr bSmim׃ 
matthew 23:10	gm al tqrao mnhigim ki aHd hoa mnhigkm hmSiH׃ 
matthew 23:11	ohgdol bkm ihi lkm lmSrt׃ 
matthew 23:12	kl hmromm at ezmo iSpl ohmSpil at ezmo iromm׃ 
matthew 23:13	ak aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki sgrim atm lpni hadm at mlkot hSmim hn atm la tbao bh oat hbaim la tniHo lboa׃ 
matthew 23:14	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki bleim atm at bti halmnot omarikim btplh lmrah ein tHt cat mSpT el itr tqHo׃ 
matthew 23:15	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki sobbim atm bim obibSh lmen gir gr aHd oki itgir teSo aoto lbn gihnm kplim iotr mkm׃ 
matthew 23:16	aoi lkm mnhlim eorim hamrim hnSbe bhikl ain cat maomh ohnSbe bchb hhikl iaSm׃ 
matthew 23:17	atm hksilim oheorim ki mh hoa hgdol am hchb ao hhikl hmqdS at hchb׃ 
matthew 23:18	oamrtm hnSbe bmcbH ain maomh ohnSbe bqrbn aSr elio iaSm׃ 
matthew 23:19	atm hksilim oheorim ki mh hoa hgdol am hqrbn ao hmcbH hmqdS at hqrbn׃ 
matthew 23:20	lkn hnSbe bmcbH nSbe bo obkl aSr elio׃ 
matthew 23:21	ohnSbe bhikl nSbe bo obSokn btoko׃ 
matthew 23:22	ohnSbe bSmim nSbe bksa alhim obiSb elio׃ 
matthew 23:23	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki meSrim atm at hmnta oat hSbt oat hkmn otniHo at hHmorot btorh at hmSpT oat hHsd oat hamonh ohih lkm leSot at alh ola lhniH gm at alh׃ 
matthew 23:24	mnhlim eorim hmsnnim at hitoS obleim at hgml׃ 
matthew 23:25	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki mThrim atm pni hkos ohqerh mHoz otokn mla gcl oprizot׃ 
matthew 23:26	proS eor Thr braSonh at tok hkos lmen tThr gm mHoz׃ 
matthew 23:27	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki dmim atm lqbrim hmsidim hnraim naim mHoz otokm mla ezmot mtim okl Tmah׃ 
matthew 23:28	kkh gm atm mHoz nraim kzdiqim al bni adm otokkm mla Hnph oaon׃ 
matthew 23:29	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki bonim atm at qbri hnbiaim otipo at mzbot qbrot hzdiqim׃ 
matthew 23:30	oamrtm am hiino bimi abotino la hith idno emhm lSpk dm hnbiaim׃ 
matthew 23:31	obkn teido el npSkm ki bnim atm lrozHi hnbiaim׃ 
matthew 23:32	ap atm mlao sat abotikm׃ 
matthew 23:33	nHSim atm ildi hzpeonim aikh tmlTo mdin gihnm׃ 
matthew 23:34	lkn hnni SlH lkm nbiaim oHkmim osoprim omhm thrgo otzlbo omhm tko bSoTim bbti knsiotikm otrdpom meir leir׃ 
matthew 23:35	lmen iba elikm kl dm nqi hnSpk barz mdm hbl hzdiq ed dm ckrih bn brkih aSr rzHtm aoto bin hhikl olmcbH׃ 
matthew 23:36	amn amr ani lkm ba iba kl alh el hdor hch׃ 
matthew 23:37	iroSlim iroSlim hhrgt at hnbiaim ohsqlt at hSloHim alih kmh pemim rziti lqbz at bnik ktrnglt hmqbzt at aprHih tHt knpih ola abitm׃ 
matthew 23:38	hnh bitkm iecb lkm Smm׃ 
matthew 23:39	ki ani amr lkm rah la traoni meth ed aSr tamro brok hba bSm ihoh׃ 
matthew 24:1	oiza ihoSe mn hmqdS llkt ldrko oigSo tlmidio lhraoto at bnini hmqdS׃ 
matthew 24:2	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hraitm at kl alh amn amr ani lkm la tSar ph abn el abn aSr la ttprq׃ 
matthew 24:3	oiSb el hr hcitim oigSo alio htlmidim lbdm oiamro amr na lno mti thih cat omh hoa aot boak oaot qz heolm׃ 
matthew 24:4	oien ihoSe oiamr lhm rao pn iteh atkm aiS׃ 
matthew 24:5	ki rbim ibao bSmi lamr ani hoa hmSiH ohteo rbim׃ 
matthew 24:6	oatm etidim lSme mlHmot oSmeot mlHmh rao pn tbhlo ki hio thih kl cat ak edn ain hqz׃ 
matthew 24:7	ki iqom goi el goi ommlkh el mmlkh ohih reb odbr oreS hnh ohnh׃ 
matthew 24:8	okl alh rq raSit hHblim׃ 
matthew 24:9	ac imsro atkm leni ohmito atkm ohiitm Snoaim lkl hgoim lmen Smi׃ 
matthew 24:10	oac ikSlo rbim omsro aiS at reho oSnao aiS at aHio׃ 
matthew 24:11	onbiai Sqr rbim iqomo ohteo rbim׃ 
matthew 24:12	ompni aSr irbh hrSe tpog ahbt rbim׃ 
matthew 24:13	ohmHkh ed et qz hoa ioSe׃ 
matthew 24:14	otqra bSort hmlkot hcat btbl klh ledot lkl hgoim oaHr iboa hqz׃ 
matthew 24:15	lkn kaSr trao Sqoz mSmm hamor el idi dnial hnbia eomd bmqom qdS hqra ibin׃ 
matthew 24:16	ac nos inoso anSi ihodh al hhrim׃ 
matthew 24:17	oaSr el hgg al ird lSat dbr mbito׃ 
matthew 24:18	oaSr bSdh al iSb hbith lSat at mlboSo׃ 
matthew 24:19	oaoi lhrot olminiqot bimim hhm׃ 
matthew 24:20	ak htpllo aSr mnostkm la thih bHrp ola bSbt׃ 
matthew 24:21	ki ac thih zrh gdolh aSr kmoh la nhith mraSit heolm ed eth okmoh la thih eod׃ 
matthew 24:22	olola nqzro himim hhm la ioSe kl bSr ak lmen hbHirim iqzro himim hhm׃ 
matthew 24:23	oki iamr alikm aiS bet hhia hnh ph hmSiH ao hno Sm al tamino׃ 
matthew 24:24	ki iqomo mSiHi Sqr onbiai Sqr oitno atot gdlot omoptim lmen hteot ap at hbHirim am ioklo׃ 
matthew 24:25	hnh mraS hgdti lkm׃ 
matthew 24:26	lkn ki iamro alikm hno bmdbr al tzao hno bHdrim al tamino׃ 
matthew 24:27	ki kbrq hioza mmcrH omair ed merb kn ihih gm boao Sl bn hadm׃ 
matthew 24:28	ki baSr hHll Sm iqbzo hnSrim׃ 
matthew 24:29	omid aHri zrt himim hhm tHSk hSmS ohirH la igih aoro ohkokbim iplo mn hSmim okHot hSmim itmoTTo׃ 
matthew 24:30	ac aot bn hadm irah bSmim ospdo kl mSpHot harz orao at bn hadm ba em enni hSmim bgborh okbod rb׃ 
matthew 24:31	oiSlH at mlakio bqol Sopr gdol oiqbzo at bHirio marbe hroHot lmqzh hSmim oed qzh hSmim׃ 
matthew 24:32	lmdo na at mSl htanh kaSr irTb enph oprHo elih idetm ki qrob hqiz׃ 
matthew 24:33	kn gm atm braotkm at kl alh deo ki qrob hoa lptH׃ 
matthew 24:34	amn amr ani lkm ki la iebr hdor hch ed aSr ihio kl alh׃ 
matthew 24:35	hSmim oharz iebro odbri la iebron׃ 
matthew 24:36	ak hiom hhoa ohSeh hhia ain aiS iode ath gm la mlaki hSmim blti abi lbdo׃ 
matthew 24:37	okimi nH kn ihih gm boao Sl bn hadm׃ 
matthew 24:38	ki kaSr bimi hmbol hio aklim oStim nSaim nSim ontnim atn lanSim ed hiom aSr ba nH al htbh׃ 
matthew 24:39	ola ideo ed boa hmbol oiSHt at klm kn ihih gm boao Sl bn hadm׃ 
matthew 24:40	ac ihio Snim bSdh aHd iasp oaHd iecb׃ 
matthew 24:41	Stim ToHnot brHim aHt tasp oaHt tecb׃ 
matthew 24:42	lkn Sqdo ki ainkm iodeim bai co Seh iba adnikm׃ 
matthew 24:43	oat cat hbino aSr lo ide bel hbit bai co aSmorh iba hgnb ki eth Sqd ola hniH lHtr at bito׃ 
matthew 24:44	lkn hio nkonim gm atm ki bSeh aSr la tdmo iboa bn hadm׃ 
matthew 24:45	mi hoa apoa hebd hnamn ohnbon aSr hpqido adnio el bni bito ltt lhm at aklm beto׃ 
matthew 24:46	aSri hebd aSr adnio bboao imzaho eSh kn׃ 
matthew 24:47	amn amr ani lkm ki ipqidho el kl aSr lo׃ 
matthew 24:48	oam hebd hre iamr blbo bSS adni lboa׃ 
matthew 24:49	oiHl lhkot at Hbrio oakl oSth em hsobaim׃ 
matthew 24:50	boa iboa adni hebd hhoa biom la izph obSeh la ide׃ 
matthew 24:51	oiSsp ato oiSim at Hlqo em hHnpim Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim׃ 
matthew 25:1	ac tdmh mlkot hSmim leSr elmot aSr lqHo at nrotihn otzanh lqrat hHtn׃ 
matthew 25:2	HmS mhn hio Hkmot oHmS ksilot׃ 
matthew 25:3	hksilot lqHo at hnrot ola lqHo emhn Smn׃ 
matthew 25:4	ohHkmot lqHo Smn bklihn oat nrotihn׃ 
matthew 25:5	okaSr bSS hHtn lboa otnmnh kln otrdmnh׃ 
matthew 25:6	oihi bHzot hlilh othi zoHh hnh hHtn zainh lqrato׃ 
matthew 25:7	ac hteorro kl helmot hhn otiTbnh at nrotihn׃ 
matthew 25:8	otamrnh hksilot al hHkmot tnh lno mSmnkn ki ikbo nrotino׃ 
matthew 25:9	oteninh hHkmot lamr la kn pn iHsr lno olkn ki am lknh al hmokrim oqninh lkn׃ 
matthew 25:10	oihi bet lktn lqnot oiboa hHtn ohnknot llkt bao ato al hHtnh otsgr hdlt׃ 
matthew 25:11	oaHri kn bao gm Sar helmot otamrnh adnino adnino ptH lno׃ 
matthew 25:12	oien oiamr amn amr ani lkn la ideti atkn׃ 
matthew 25:13	lkn Sqdo ki ainkm iodeim at hiom oat hSeh aSr iba bh bn hadm׃ 
matthew 25:14	ki kmo aiS nse lmrHoq aSr qra al ebdio oimsr lhm at rkoSo׃ 
matthew 25:15	oitn lch HmS kkrim olch Stim olch aHt lkl aiS oaiS kpi erko oimhr oise mSm׃ 
matthew 25:16	oilk haiS hlqH HmS kkrim oisHr bhn oieS lo HmS kkrim aHrot׃ 
matthew 25:17	okn hlqH Stim gm hoa hroiH Stim aHrot׃ 
matthew 25:18	ak lqH haHt hlk oiHpr badmh oiTmn at ksp adnio׃ 
matthew 25:19	oaHri imim rbim ba adoni hebdim hhm oieS HSbon emhm׃ 
matthew 25:20	oigS hlqH HmS hkkrim oiba HmS kkrim aHrot lamr adni HmS kkrim msrt li hnh HmS kkrim aHrot hroHti bhn׃ 
matthew 25:21	oiamr alio adnio kn hebd hTob ohnamn ki bmeT namn hiit oel hrbh apqidk boa al SmHt adnik׃ 
matthew 25:22	oigS gm lqH hkkrim oiamr adni kkrim msrt li hnh kkrim hroHti bhn׃ 
matthew 25:23	oiamr alio adnio hiTbt hebd hTob ohnamn bmcer namn hiit oel hrbh apqidk boa al SmHt adnik׃ 
matthew 25:24	oigS gm hlqH at hkkr haHt oiamr adni idetik ki aiS qSh ath qzr baSr la cret okns maSr la pcrt׃ 
matthew 25:25	oaira oalk oaTmn at kkrk badmh oeth ha lk at aSr lk׃ 
matthew 25:26	oien adnio oiamr alio hebd hre ohezl ath idet ki qzr anki baSr la creti okns maSr la pcrti׃ 
matthew 25:27	lkn hih elik ltt at kspi lSlHnim oani bboai hiiti lqH at aSr li btrbit׃ 
matthew 25:28	el kn Sao mmno at hkkr otno al haiS aSr lo eSr hkkrim׃ 
matthew 25:29	ki kl aiS aSr iS lo intn lo oiedip ohaiS aSr ain lo gm at aSr lo iqH mmno׃ 
matthew 25:30	oat ebd hbliel hSliko al hHSk hHizon Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim׃ 
matthew 25:31	ohih ki iboa bn hadm bkbodo okl hmlakim hqdSim emo oiSb el ksa kbodo׃ 
matthew 25:32	onaspo lpnio kl hgoim ohprid binotm kaSr iprid hreh at hkbSim mn hetodim׃ 
matthew 25:33	ohzib at hkbSim limino oat hetodim lSmalo׃ 
matthew 25:34	ac iamr hmlk al hnzbim limino bao broki abi orSo at hmlkot hmoknh lkm lmn hosd heolm׃ 
matthew 25:35	ki reb hiiti otakilni zma hiiti otSqoni gr hiiti otasponi׃ 
matthew 25:36	erom otksoni Holh otbqroni bmSmr hiiti otbao ali׃ 
matthew 25:37	oeno hzdiqim oamro adnino mti rainok reb onklklk ao zma onSqh aotk׃ 
matthew 25:38	omti rainok gr onaspk ao erm onksk׃ 
matthew 25:39	omti rainok Holh ao bmSmr onba alik׃ 
matthew 25:40	ohmlk ienh oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm mh SeSitm laHd maHi hzeirim halh li eSitm׃ 
matthew 25:41	oac iamr gm al hnzbim lSmalo lko meli atm harorim al aS eolm hmoknh lSTn olmlakio׃ 
matthew 25:42	ki reb hiiti ola hakltm aoti zma hiiti ola hSqitm aoti׃ 
matthew 25:43	gr hiiti ola asptm aoti erom ola ksitm aoti Holh obmSmr ola bqrtm aoti׃ 
matthew 25:44	oeno gm hm oamro adnino mti rainok reb ao zma ao gr ao erom ao Holh ao bmSmr ola Srtnok׃ 
matthew 25:45	ac ienh atm lamr amn amr ani lkm mh Sla eSitm laHd mn hzeirim halh gm li la eSitm׃ 
matthew 25:46	oilko alh lmezbt eolm ohzdiqim lHii eolm׃ 
matthew 26:1	oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at kl hdbrim halh oiamr al tlmidio׃ 
matthew 26:2	atm idetm ki aHri iomim ihih hpsH obn hadm imsr lhzlb׃ 
matthew 26:3	oiqhlo hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ocqni hem al Hzr hkhn hgdol hnqra qipa׃ 
matthew 26:4	oioezo iHdo ltpS at ihoSe bermh olhmito׃ 
matthew 26:5	oiamro ak la bHg pn thih mhomh bem׃ 
matthew 26:6	oihi bhiot ihoSe bit hini bbit Smeon hmzre׃ 
matthew 26:7	otqrb alio aSh obidh pk Smn iqr mad otzq el raSo bhsbo el hSlHn׃ 
matthew 26:8	oirao htlmidim oitremo lamr el mh habod hch׃ 
matthew 26:9	ki hSmn hch hih raoi lhmkr bmHir rb oltto leniim׃ 
matthew 26:10	oide ihoSe oiamr alihm lmh togo at haSh hla meSh Tob eSth emdi׃ 
matthew 26:11	ki eniim tmid emkm oanki ainni atkm tmid׃ 
matthew 26:12	ki aSr Spkh at hSmn hch el gopi lHnT aoti eSth cat׃ 
matthew 26:13	amn amr ani lkm baSr tqra hbSorh hcat bkl heolm gm at aSr hia eSth ispr lckron lh׃ 
matthew 26:14	oilk aHd mSnim heSr hnqra ihodh aiS qriot al raSi hkhnim׃ 
matthew 26:15	oiamr mh ttno li oamsrno bidkm oiSqlo lo SlSim ksp׃ 
matthew 26:16	omn het hhia bqS tanh lmsr aoto׃ 
matthew 26:17	oihi braSon lHg hmzot oigSo htlmidim al ihoSe lamr bai ch mqom tHpz ki nkin lk lakl at hpsH׃ 
matthew 26:18	oiamr lko heirh al plni almni oamrtm alio kh amr hrb eti qrobh hia obbitk aeSh at hpsH em tlmidi׃ 
matthew 26:19	oieSo htlmidim kaSr zom ihoSe oikino at hpsH׃ 
matthew 26:20	oihi berb oisb em Snim heSr׃ 
matthew 26:21	obaklm oiamr amn amr ani lkm ki aHd mkm imsrni׃ 
matthew 26:22	oitezbo mad oiHlo aiS oaiS lamr lo hanki hoa adni׃ 
matthew 26:23	oien oiamr haiS aSr Tbl emi at ido bqerh hoa imsrni׃ 
matthew 26:24	hn bn hadm hlok ilk lo kktob elio abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido imsr bn hadm Tob laiS hhoa am la nold׃ 
matthew 26:25	oien ihodh hmsr aoto oiamr rbi hani hoa oiamr alio ath amrt׃ 
matthew 26:26	obaklm oiqH ihoSe at hlHm oibrk oibze oitn ltlmidim oiamr qHo oaklo ch hoa gopi׃ 
matthew 26:27	oiqH at hkos oibrk oitn lhm lamr Sto mmnh klkm׃ 
matthew 26:28	ki ch hoa dmi dm hbrit hHdSh hnSpk bed rbim lsliHt HTaim׃ 
matthew 26:29	oani amr lkm ki meth Sth la aSth mtnobt hgpn hcat ed hiom hhoa aSr aSth ath emkm HdSh bmlkot abi׃ 
matthew 26:30	oihi aHri gmrm at hhll oizao al hr hcitim׃ 
matthew 26:31	ac amr alihm ihoSe atm klkm tkSlo bi blilh hch ki ktob akh at hreh otpozin hzan׃ 
matthew 26:32	oaHri qomi alk lpnikm hglilh׃ 
matthew 26:33	oien pTros oiamr lo gm ki ikSlo bk klm ani leolm la akSl׃ 
matthew 26:34	oiamr alio ihoSe amn amr ani lk ki blilh hch bTrm iqra htrngol tkHS bi SlS pemim׃ 
matthew 26:35	oiamr alio pTros gm ki ihih eli lmot atk kHS la akHS bk okn amro gm kl htlmidim׃ 
matthew 26:36	aHri kn ba atm ihoSe al Hzr hnqra gt Smni oiamr al htlmidim Sbo lkm ph ed aSr alk Smh ohtpllti׃ 
matthew 26:37	oiqH ato at pTros oat Sni bni cbdi oiHl lhezb olmog׃ 
matthew 26:38	oiamr lhm npSi mrh li ed mot emdo ph oSqdo emi׃ 
matthew 26:39	oilk meT halh oipl el pnio oitpll lamr abi am iokl lhiot tebr na meli hkos hcat ak la krzoni ki am krzonk׃ 
matthew 26:40	oiba al htlmidim oimzam iSnim oiamr al pTros hnh la hih bikltkm lSqd emi Seh aHt׃ 
matthew 26:41	Sqdo ohtpllo pn tbao lidi nsion hn hroH hia Hpzh ohbSr hoa rph׃ 
matthew 26:42	oiosp llkt lo Snit oitpll lamr abi am la tokl hkos hcat lebr mmni mbli Stoti ath ihi krzonk׃ 
matthew 26:43	oiba oimzam gm bpem hcat iSnim ki einihm hio kbdot׃ 
matthew 26:44	oiniHm oiosp llkt oitpll SliSit bamro eod hpem kdbr hch׃ 
matthew 26:45	oiba al htlmidim oiamr alihm nomo meth onoHo hnh hSeh qrobh obn hadm nmsr lidi HTaim׃ 
matthew 26:46	qomo onlkh hnh hlk oqrb hmsr aoti׃ 
matthew 26:47	eodno mdbr ohnh ba ihodh aHd mSnim heSr oemo hmon rb brHbot obmqlot mat raSi hkhnim ocqni hem׃ 
matthew 26:48	ohmsr ato ntn lhm aot lamr haiS aSr aSqho ch hoa tpSoho׃ 
matthew 26:49	omid ngS al ihoSe oiamr Slom lk rbi oinSq lo׃ 
matthew 26:50	oiamr alio ihoSe rei el mh bat oigSo oiSlHo at idihm bihoSe oitpSo ato׃ 
matthew 26:51	ohnh aHd mn hanSim aSr em ihoSe SlH ido oiSlp Hrbo oik at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno׃ 
matthew 26:52	oiamr alio ihoSe hSb at Hrbk al terh ki kl aHci Hrb bHrb iabdo׃ 
matthew 26:53	ao hiHSb lbk ki la iklti lSal eth mat abi ohoa izoh li iotr mSnim eSr lgionot Sl mlakim׃ 
matthew 26:54	oaikkh apoa imlao hktobim ki kn hih thih׃ 
matthew 26:55	bSeh hhia amr ihoSe al hmon hem kel priz izatm bHrbot obmqlot ltpSni oiom iom hiiti iSb omlmd azlkm bmqdS ola hHcqtm bi׃ 
matthew 26:56	okl cat hith lmlat ktbi hnbiaim ac ecboho htlmidim klm oinoso׃ 
matthew 26:57	ohanSim aSr tpSo at ihoSe holikho al qipa hkhn hgdol aSr nqhlo Sm hsoprim ohcqnim׃ 
matthew 26:58	opTros hlk aHrio mrHoq ed lHzr hkhn hgdol oiba pnimh oiSb lo azl hmSrtim lraot at aHrit hdbr׃ 
matthew 26:59	ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim okl hsnhdrin bqSo edot Sqr bihoSe lhmito ola mzao׃ 
matthew 26:60	oap bemd Sm edi Sqr rbim la mzao obaHronh ngSo Sni edi Sqr׃ 
matthew 26:61	oiamro ch amr iS biklti lhrs at hikl halhim olSob lbnoto bSlSt imim׃ 
matthew 26:62	oiqm hkhn hgdol oiamr alio haink mSib dbr el aSr eno bk alh׃ 
matthew 26:63	oihoSe hHriS oien hkhn hgdol oiamr lo mSbiek ani balhim Hiim Stamr lno am ath hoa hmSiH bn halhim׃ 
matthew 26:64	oiamr alio ihoSe ath amrt abl ani amr lkm ki meth trao at bn hadm iSb limin hgborh oba em enni hSmim׃ 
matthew 26:65	oiqre hkhn hgdol at bgdio oiamr hoa gdp omh lno eod lbqS edim hnh eth Smetm at gdopo׃ 
matthew 26:66	mh detkm oieno oiamro aiS mot hoa׃ 
matthew 26:67	oirqo bpnio oikho bagrop oaHrim hkho el hlHi׃ 
matthew 26:68	oiamro hnba lno hmSiH mi hoa hmkh aotk׃ 
matthew 26:69	opTros iSb mHoz lbit bHzr otgS alio SpHh lamr gm ath hiit em ihoSe hglili׃ 
matthew 26:70	oikHS bpni klm lamr la ideti mh at amrt׃ 
matthew 26:71	oiza al ptH hSer otra aoto aHrt otamr lanSim aSr Sm gm ch hih em ihoSe hnzri׃ 
matthew 26:72	oiosp lkHS oiSbe lamr la ideti at haiS׃ 
matthew 26:73	okmeT aHri kn oigSo hemdim Sm oiamro al pTros amt ki gm ath mhm ki gm lSonk mglh aotk׃ 
matthew 26:74	oiHl lhHrim at npSo olhSbe lamr la ideti at haiS omid qra htrngol׃ 
matthew 26:75	oickr pTros at dbr ihoSe aSr amr alio lamr bTrm iqra htrngol tkHS bi SlS pemim oiza hHozh oimrr bbki׃ 
matthew 27:1	oihi lpnot hbqr oitiezo kl raSi hkhnim ocqni hem el ihoSe lhmito׃ 
matthew 27:2	oiasro ato oiolikho mSm oimsrho al ponTios pilTos hhgmon׃ 
matthew 27:3	oira ihodh hmsr aoto ki hrSieho oinHm oiSb at SlSim hksp al hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim lamr׃ 
matthew 27:4	HTati ki dm nqi hsgrti ohm amro mh lno olcat ath trah׃ 
matthew 27:5	oiSlk at hksp al hhikl oipn oilk oiHnq׃ 
matthew 27:6	oiqHo raSi hkhnim at hksp oiamro la nkon lno ltto al aron hqrbn ki mHir dmim hoa׃ 
matthew 27:7	oitiezo oiqno bo at Sdh hiozr lqbort hgrim׃ 
matthew 27:8	el kn Sm hSdh hhoa Sdh hdm ed hiom hch׃ 
matthew 27:9	ac ntmla mh Snamr bid irmih hnbia oiqHo SlSim hksp adr hiqr aSr iqr mel bni iSral׃ 
matthew 27:10	oitno atm al Sdh hiozr kaSr zoni ihoh׃ 
matthew 27:11	oihoSe hemd lpni hhgmon oiSalho hhgmon lamr hath hoa mlk hihodim oiamr ihoSe ath amrt׃ 
matthew 27:12	oidbro elio STnh hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim ohoa la enh dbr׃ 
matthew 27:13	oiamr alio pilTos haink Sme kmh hm meidim bk׃ 
matthew 27:14	ola enho ap dbr aHd oitmh hhgmon ed mad׃ 
matthew 27:15	omnhg hhgmon hih lpTr lem bkl Hg asir aHd at aSr iHpzo׃ 
matthew 27:16	obet hhia hih lhm asir idoe oSmo br aba׃ 
matthew 27:17	oihi kaSr nqhlo oiamr alihm pilTos at mi tHpzo ki apTr lkm at br aba ao at ihoSe hnqra bSm mSiH׃ 
matthew 27:18	ki ide aSr rq mqnah msro ato׃ 
matthew 27:19	oihi kSbto el ksa hdin otSlH alio aSto lamr al ihi lk dbr em hzdiq hch ki beboro eniti hrbh hiom bHlom׃ 
matthew 27:20	ohkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim pto at hmon hem lSal lhm at br aba olabd at ihoSe׃ 
matthew 27:21	oien hhgmon oiamr alihm at mi mSnihm tHpzo ki apTr lkm oiamro at br aba׃ 
matthew 27:22	oiamr alihm pilTos omh aeSh lihoSe hnqra bSm mSiH oieno klm izlb׃ 
matthew 27:23	oiamr hhgmon mh apoa hreh aSr eSh oiosipo eod zeq lamr izlb׃ 
matthew 27:24	oihi kraot pilTos ki la ioeil maomh orbth eod hmhodh oiqH mim oirHz at idio leini hem oiamr nqi anki mdm hzdiq hch atm trao׃ 
matthew 27:25	oieno kl hem oiamro dmo elino oel bnino׃ 
matthew 27:26	ac pTr lhm at br aba oat ihoSe hkh bSoTim oimsr aoto lhzlb׃ 
matthew 27:27	oiqHo anSi hzba aSr lhgmon at ihoSe oibiaho al bit hmSpT oiaspo elio at kl hgdod׃ 
matthew 27:28	oipSiTo aoto at bgdio oieTpho meil Sni׃ 
matthew 27:29	oiSrgo qzim oieSo eTrt oiSimo el raSo oqnh bimino oikreo lpnio oitlozzo bo lamr Slom lk mlk hihodim׃ 
matthew 27:30	oirqo bo oiqHo at hqnh oikho el raSo׃ 
matthew 27:31	oaHri htlozzm bo hpSiTo aoto at hmeil oilbiSho at bgdio oiolikho lzlb׃ 
matthew 27:32	oihi bzatm oimzao aiS qorini oSmo Smeon oianso ato lSat lo at zlbo׃ 
matthew 27:33	oibao al hmqom hnqra glglta hoa mqom glglt׃ 
matthew 27:34	oitno lo lStot Hmz mcog bmrorh oiTem ola abh lStot׃ 
matthew 27:35	oihi kaSr zlbo aoto oiHlqo lhm at bgdio ogorl hpilo lmlat at aSr namr bpi hnbia iHlqo bgdi lhm oel lboSi ipilo gorl׃ 
matthew 27:36	oiSbo Smh oiSmro aoto׃ 
matthew 27:37	oiSimo at dbr aSmto ktob mmel lraSo ch hoa ihoSe mlk hihodim׃ 
matthew 27:38	oizlbo ato Sni prizim aHd limino oaHd lSmalo׃ 
matthew 27:39	ohebrim gdpo aoto oinieo at raSm׃ 
matthew 27:40	oiamro ath hhrs at hhikl obnho bSlSt imim hoSe lnpSk oam bn halhim ath rdh mn hzlb׃ 
matthew 27:41	okn hleigo gm raSi hkhnim em hsoprim ohcqnim lamr׃ 
matthew 27:42	at aHrim hoSie olezmo la iokl lhoSie am mlk iSral hoa ird na eth mn hzlb onamin bo׃ 
matthew 27:43	bTH balhim eth iplTho am Hpz bo ki amr bn halhim ani׃ 
matthew 27:44	ogm hprizim hnzlbim ato Hrpho kdbrim halh׃ 
matthew 27:45	omSeh hSSit hih HSk el kl harz ed hSeh htSieit׃ 
matthew 27:46	oket hSeh htSieit oizeq ihoSe bqol gdol ali ali lmh Sbqtni otrgomo ali ali lmh ecbtni׃ 
matthew 27:47	oiamro mqzt hemdim Sm kSmem at cat lamr al aliho hoa qora׃ 
matthew 27:48	oimhr aHd mhm oirz oiqH spog oimla ato Hmz oiSimho el qnh oiSqho׃ 
matthew 27:49	oSar hanSim amro hniHo lo onrah am iboa aliho lhoSieo׃ 
matthew 27:50	oihoSe hosip lqra bqol gdol otza roHo׃ 
matthew 27:51	ohnh nqreh prkt hhikl mlmelh lmTh lSnim qreim oharz nreSh ohsleim nbqeo׃ 
matthew 27:52	ohqbrim nptHo orbim mgopot hqdoSim iSni admt epr neoro׃ 
matthew 27:53	oizao mn hqbrim aHri hqizo oibao al heir hqdoSh oirao lrbim׃ 
matthew 27:54	oSr hmah ohanSim aSr ato hSmrim at ihoSe kraotm at hreS oat aSr nhith nbhlo mad oiamro akn ch hih bn alhim׃ 
matthew 27:55	othiinh Sm nSim rbot hraot mrHoq aSr hlko aHri ihoSe mn hglil lSrto׃ 
matthew 27:56	obtokn mrim hmgdlit omrim am ieqb oiosi oam bni cbdi׃ 
matthew 27:57	oihi berb oiba aiS eSir mn hrmtim oSmo iosp ogm hoa hih mtlmidi ihoSe׃ 
matthew 27:58	oigS al pilTos lSal at goit ihoSe oizo pliTos ki tntn lo׃ 
matthew 27:59	oiqH iosp at hgoih oikrk aoth bsdin Thor׃ 
matthew 27:60	oiSimh bqbr hHdS aSr Hzb lo bsle oigl abn gdolh el ptH hqbr oilk lo׃ 
matthew 27:61	omrim hmgdlit omrim haHrt hio iSbot Sm mmol hqbr׃ 
matthew 27:62	oihi mmHrt erb hSbt oiqhlo hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim al pilTos׃ 
matthew 27:63	oiamro adnino ckrno ki amr hmteh hhoa beodno Hi mqzh SlSt imim qom aqom׃ 
matthew 27:64	lkn zoh na oiskr mboa hqbr ed hiom hSliSi pn ibao tlmidio blilh ognbho oamro al hem hnh qm mn hmtim ohith htrmit haHronh reh mn hraSonh׃ 
matthew 27:65	oiamr alihm pilTos hnh lkm anSi mSmr lko skroho kdetkm׃ 
matthew 27:66	oilko oiskro at mboa hqbr oiHtmo at habn oiemido elio at hmSmr׃ 
matthew 28:1	oaHri mozai hSbt kShair laHd bSbt bah mrim hmgdlit omrim haHrt lraot at hqbr׃ 
matthew 28:2	ohnh reS gdol hih ki mlak ihoh ird mn hSmim oigS oigl at habn mn hptH oiSb elih׃ 
matthew 28:3	oihi mraho kbrq olboSo lbn kSlg׃ 
matthew 28:4	ompHdo nbhlo hSmrim oihio kmtim׃ 
matthew 28:5	oien hmlak oiamr al hnSim atn al tiran hn ideti ki at ihoSe hnzlb atn mbqSot׃ 
matthew 28:6	ainno ph ki qm kaSr amr banh rainh at hmqom aSr Skb Sm hadon׃ 
matthew 28:7	omhrtn llkt oamrtn al tlmidio ki qm mn hmtim ohnh hoa holk lpnikm hglilh oSm traho hnh amrti lkn׃ 
matthew 28:8	otmhrnh lzat mn hqbr birah obSmHh gdolh otrznh lhgid ltlmidio׃ 
matthew 28:9	hnh hlkot lhgid ltlmidio ohnh ihoSe nqrh alihn oiamr Slom lkn otgSnh otaHcnh brglio otStHoin lo׃ 
matthew 28:10	oiamr alihn ihoSe al tiran lknh ohgdn laHi oilko hglilh oSm iraoni׃ 
matthew 28:11	oihi blktn ohnh anSim mn hmSmr bao heirh oigido lraSi hkhnim at kl hneSh׃ 
matthew 28:12	oiqhlo em hcqnim oitiezo oitno ksp lrb al anSi hzba lamr׃ 
matthew 28:13	amro ki bao tlmidio lilh oignbo aoto bhiotno iSnim׃ 
matthew 28:14	oam iSme hdbr lpni hhgmon anHno npisho ohiitm bli pHd׃ 
matthew 28:15	oiqHo at hksp oieSo kaSr lmdo otza hSmoeh hcat bin hihodim ed hiom hch׃ 
matthew 28:16	oeSti eSr htlmidim hlko hglilh al hhr aSr zom ihoSe׃ 
matthew 28:17	oihi kraotm ato oiStHoo lo omqztm nHlqo blbm׃ 
matthew 28:18	oigS ihoSe oidbr alihm lamr ntn li kl SlTn bSmim obarz׃ 
matthew 28:19	lko oeSo ltlmidim at kl hgoim oTbltm atm lSm hab ohbn oroH hqdS׃ 
matthew 28:20	olmdtm atm lSmr at kl aSr zoiti atkm ohnh anki atkm kl himim ed qz heolm amn׃ 
mark 1:1	raSit bSort ihoSe hmSiH bn halhim׃ 
mark 1:2	kktob bnbiaim hnni SlH mlaki lpnik opnh drkk lpnik׃ 
mark 1:3	qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro mslotio׃ 
mark 1:4	oihi ioHnn Tbl bmdbr oqora Tbilt htSobh lsliHt hHTaim׃ 
mark 1:5	otza alio kl arz ihodh obni iroSlim oiTblo klm el ido bnhr hirdn mtodim at HTatm׃ 
mark 1:6	oioHnn lboS Ser gmlim oacor eor bmtnio oakl Hgbim odbS hier׃ 
mark 1:7	oiqra lamr boa iba aHri hHcq mmni aSr ainni kdi lkre olhtir at Srok nelio׃ 
mark 1:8	anki Tblti atkm bmim ohoa iTbl atkm broH hqdS׃ 
mark 1:9	oihi bimim hhm oiba ihoSe mnzrt aSr bglil oiTbl el idi ioHnn birdn׃ 
mark 1:10	oihi ak elh elh mn hmim oira at hSmim nbqeim ohroH kionh irdt elio׃ 
mark 1:11	oihi qol mn hSmim ath bni ididi aSr rzth npSi bo׃ 
mark 1:12	oaHri kn hoziao hroH hmdbrh׃ 
mark 1:13	oihi Sm bmdbr arbeim iom ohSTn nsho oihi em hHiot ohmlakim Srtoho׃ 
mark 1:14	oaHri aSr hsgr ioHnn ba ihoSe hglilh oiqra at bSort mlkot halhim lamr׃ 
mark 1:15	mlah het ohgieh mlkot halhim Sobo ohamino bbSorh׃ 
mark 1:16	oihi bhthlko el id im hglil oira at Smeon oat andri aHi Smeon prSim mzodh bim ki digim hio׃ 
mark 1:17	oiamr alihm ihoSe lko aHri oaSimkm ldigi anSim׃ 
mark 1:18	oiecbo mhr at mkmrtihm oilko aHrio׃ 
mark 1:19	oihi kebro meT mSm oira at ieqb bn cbdi oat ioHnn aHio ogm hmh banih mtqnim at hmkmrot׃ 
mark 1:20	oiqra mhrh alihm oiecbo at cbdi abihm banih em hSkirim oilko aHrio׃ 
mark 1:21	oibao al kpr nHom oimhr lboa bSbt lbit hknst oilmd׃ 
mark 1:22	oiStommo el torto ki hih mlmdm kbel gborh ola ksprim׃ 
mark 1:23	oaiS hih bbit knstm aSr roH Tmah bo oizeq lamr׃ 
mark 1:24	ahh mh lno olk ihoSe hnzri bat lhabidno ideti mi ath qdoS halhim׃ 
mark 1:25	oiger bo ihoSe lamr halm oza mmno׃ 
mark 1:26	oisHbho roH hTmah oizeq bqol gdol oiza mmno׃ 
mark 1:27	oibhlo klm oiSalo aiS at reho lamr mh cat mh hia htorh hHdSh aSr ap lroHot hTmah bgborh hoa mzoh ohnh Smeot lo׃ 
mark 1:28	oiza Smeo mhr bkl mqmot arz hglil׃ 
mark 1:29	oihi aHri zatm mbit hknst oibao bith Smeon oandri hmh oieqb oioHnn emm׃ 
mark 1:30	oHmot Smeon Skbh aHoct hqdHt oimhro ldbr alio elih׃ 
mark 1:31	oigS oiaHc bidh oiqimh otrp mmnh hqdHt ptam otSrt aotm׃ 
mark 1:32	oihi berb kboa hSmS oibiao alio at kl hHolim oat aHoci hSdim׃ 
mark 1:33	okl heir naspo iHdo ptH hbit׃ 
mark 1:34	oirpa rbim aSr hio Holim Hliim Sonim oigrS Sdim hrbh ola ntn at hSdim ldbr ki ideho׃ 
mark 1:35	oiSkm mmHrt beod lilh oiza oilk al mqom Hrbh oitpll Sm׃ 
mark 1:36	oirdpo aHrio Smeon ohanSim aSr ato׃ 
mark 1:37	oimzaho oiamro alio hnh klm mbqSim aotk׃ 
mark 1:38	oiamr alihm nebrh mch al eri hprcot hqrbot oaqra gm Sm ki bebor cat izati׃ 
mark 1:39	oihi qra bbti knsiotihm bkl hglil oigrS at hSdim׃ 
mark 1:40	oiboa alio aiS mzre oitHnn alio oikre el brkio oiamr lo am trzh tokl lThrni׃ 
mark 1:41	oirHm elio oiSlH at ido oige bo oiamr rzh anki Thr׃ 
mark 1:42	eodno mdbr ohzret srh mmno oiThr׃ 
mark 1:43	oiger bo oimhr lhoziao hHozh׃ 
mark 1:44	oiamr alio rah al tspr dbr laiS ki am lk hrah al hkhn ohqrb el Thrtk at aSr zoh mSh ledot lhm׃ 
mark 1:45	ak hoa bzato hHl lqra hrbh olhSmie hdbr ed aSr la ikl lboa eod al eir bgloi ki am hih iSb mHoz leir bmqmot Hrbh oibao alio mkl ebrio׃ 
mark 2:1	oihi mqz imim bSobo al kpr nHom oiSmeo ki hoa bbit׃ 
mark 2:2	oiaspo rbim mhrh ed aps mqom lemd ap mHoz lptH oidbr alihm at hdbr׃ 
mark 2:3	oibao alio anSim nSaim aiS nkh abrim oiSaho barbeh׃ 
mark 2:4	ola iklo lgSt alio mpni hem oisiro at hgg bmqom aSr hih Sm oiHtro Htirh oiorido at hmSkb aSr Skb elih nkh habrim׃ 
mark 2:5	oihi kraot ihoSe at amontm oiamr al nkh habrim bni nslHo lk HTatik׃ 
mark 2:6	oihio mn hsoprim iSbim Sm oHSbim blbm lamr׃ 
mark 2:7	mh idbr ch gdopim kalh mi iokl lslH HTaim blti halhim lbdo׃ 
mark 2:8	oide ihoSe broHo ki kkh HSbo blbbm oiamr alihm mdoe tHSbo kalh blbbkm׃ 
mark 2:9	mh hnql hamr al nkh habrim nslHo lk HTatik am amor qom Sa at mSkbk ohthlk׃ 
mark 2:10	ak lmen tdeon ki lbn hadm iS hSlTn lslH HTaim barz oiamr al nkh habrim׃ 
mark 2:11	lk ani amr qom Sa at mSkbk olk al bitk׃ 
mark 2:12	oiqm ptam oiSa at mSkbo oiza leini klm ed ki hStmmo klm oiSbHo at halhim lamr meolm la raino kcat׃ 
mark 2:13	oiSb lzat al id him oibao alio kl hem oilmdm׃ 
mark 2:14	oihi bebro oira at loi bn Hlpi iSb bbit hmks oiamr alio lkh aHri oiqm oilk aHrio׃ 
mark 2:15	oihi kaSr hsb bbito oisbo moksim oHTaim rbim em ihoSe oem tlmidio ki rbim hio hhlkim aHrio׃ 
mark 2:16	ohsoprim ohproSim rao ato akl em hmoksim ohHTaim oiamro al tlmidio lmh ch em hHTaim ohmoksim akl rbkm׃ 
mark 2:17	oiSme ihoSe oiamr hHcqim ainm zrikim lrpa ki am hHlim la bati lqra hzdiqim ki am hHTaim ltSobh׃ 
mark 2:18	otlmidi ioHnn ohproSim hio zmim oibao oiamro alio mdoe tlmidi ioHnn otlmidi hproSim zmim otlmidik ainm zmim׃ 
mark 2:19	oiamr alihm ihoSe aik ioklo bni hHph lzom beod hHtn emhm kl imi hiot hHtn emhm la ioklo lzom׃ 
mark 2:20	hnh imim baim olqH matm hHtn oac izomo bimim hhm׃ 
mark 2:21	ain tpr mTlit bgd HdS el Smlh blh ki ac intq mloio hHdS mn hblh otre hqrieh׃ 
mark 2:22	oain ntn iin HdS bnadot blim ki ac ibqe hiin at hnadot ohiin iSpk ohnadot iabdo abl bnadot HdSim intn hiin hHdS׃ 
mark 2:23	oihi kebro bSbt bin hqmh oiHlo tlmidio lqTp mlilt blktm׃ 
mark 2:24	oiamro alio hproSim rah mh hmh eSim bSbt dbr aSr la ieSh׃ 
mark 2:25	oiamr alihm hki la qratm at aSr eSh dod bhito Hsr oreb hoa oaSr hio ato׃ 
mark 2:26	ki ba al bit alhim bimi abitr hkhn hgdol oiakl at lHm hpnim aSr la nkon laklh ki am lkhnim oitn gm lanSim aSr ato׃ 
mark 2:27	oiamr alihm hSbt neSh bebor hadm ola hadm bebor hSbt׃ 
mark 2:28	lkn bn hadm adon hoa gm lSbt׃ 
mark 3:1	oiSb oibao al bit hknst oSm aiS aSr ido ibSh׃ 
mark 3:2	oitbonno bo am irpaho bSbt lmen imzao elio STnh׃ 
mark 3:3	oiamr al haiS aSr ibSh ido qom emd btok׃ 
mark 3:4	oiamr alihm hnkon bSbt lhiTib ao lhre lhzil npS ao labdh oiHriSo׃ 
mark 3:5	oibT alihm sbib bHmh oitezb el TmTom lbbm oiamr al haiS pST at idk oipST ido otrpa otSb kaHrt׃ 
mark 3:6	ohproSim izao mhrh oitiezo elio em hhordosiim labdo׃ 
mark 3:7	oihoSe sr mSm em tlmidio al id him oilko aHrio hmon em rb mn hglil omihodh׃ 
mark 3:8	omiroSlim omadom omebr hirdn omsbibot zor ozidon hmon rb aSr Smeo at kl aSr eSh oibao alio׃ 
mark 3:9	oiamr al tlmidio ki ikino lo anih qTnh mpni hem lmen la ilHzoho׃ 
mark 3:10	ki rpa lrbim ed ki htnplo elio kl hmngeim lnge bo׃ 
mark 3:11	ohroHot hTmaot kraotn ato nplo lpnio otzeqnh lamr ath hoa bn alhim׃ 
mark 3:12	oiger bhn mad aSr la tglinh aoto׃ 
mark 3:13	oiel al hhr oiqra al aSr hoa Hpz bm oibao alio׃ 
mark 3:14	oiSm Snim eSr aiS lmen ihio ato olmen iSlHm lqra׃ 
mark 3:15	ohih lhm hSlTn lrpa at htHlaim olgrS at hSdim׃ 
mark 3:16	oiknh at Smeon bSm pTros׃ 
mark 3:17	oat ieqb bn cbdi oat ioHnn aHi ieqb oiknh atm bSm bni rgoS hoa bni rem׃ 
mark 3:18	oat andri oat pilpos oat br tlmi oat mti oat toma oat ieqb bn Hlpi oat tdi oat Smeon hqni׃ 
mark 3:19	oat ihodh aiS qriot aSr gm msro׃ 
mark 3:20	oibao hbith oiSb hmon hem lhtasp ed ki la iklo ap lakl lHm׃ 
mark 3:21	oiSmeo qrobio oizao lhHciq bo ki amro iza mdeto׃ 
mark 3:22	ohsoprim aSr irdo miroSlim amro ki bel cbob nkns bo oel idi Sr hSdim hoa mgrS at hSdim׃ 
mark 3:23	oiqra aotm alio oidbr lhm bmSlim lamr aik iokl hSTn lgrS hSTn׃ 
mark 3:24	oam nHlqh mmlkh el ezmh la tokl lemd hmmlkh hhia׃ 
mark 3:25	obit am nHlq el ezmo la iokl lemd hbit hhoa׃ 
mark 3:26	oam hSTn itqomm al ezmo onHlq la iokl lemd ki ba qzo׃ 
mark 3:27	ain aiS aSr ikl lboa lbit hgbor olgcl at klio am la iasr braSonh at hgbor oaHr iSsh at bito׃ 
mark 3:28	amn amr ani lkm ki kl hHTaim islHo lbni adm okl hgdopim aSr igdpo׃ 
mark 3:29	ak hmgdp at roH hqdS ain lo sliHh leolm ki iaSm beono lnzH׃ 
mark 3:30	ki hmh amro roH Tmah bo׃ 
mark 3:31	oibao amo oaHio oiemdo mHoz lbit oiSlHo alio lqra lo׃ 
mark 3:32	ohmon hem iSbo sbibio oiamro alio hnh amk oaHik bHoz mbqSim aotk׃ 
mark 3:33	oien oiamr alihm mi hm ami oaHi׃ 
mark 3:34	oibT sbib al hiSbim sbibio oiamr hnh ami oaHi׃ 
mark 3:35	ki kl aSr ieSh rzon halhim hoa aHi oaHoti oami׃ 
mark 4:1	oiSb al him oiHl llmd oiqhlo alio hmon em rb ed aSr ird lSbt banih bim okl hem eomd el Hop him bibSh׃ 
mark 4:2	oilmdm hrbh bmSlim oiamr alihm blmdo atm׃ 
mark 4:3	Smeo Smoe hnh hcre iza lcre׃ 
mark 4:4	oihi bcreo oipl mn hcre el id hdrk oiba eop hSmim oiaklho׃ 
mark 4:5	oiS aSr npl el mqom hsle aSr ain lo Sm admh hrbh oimhr lzmH ki la hih lo emq admh׃ 
mark 4:6	oihi kcrH hSmS oizrb oiibS ki ain lo SrS׃ 
mark 4:7	oiS aSr npl bin hqzim oielo hqzim oimekho ola ntn pri׃ 
mark 4:8	oiS aSr npl el hadmh hTobh oitn pri elh ogdl oieS ch SlSim Serim och SSim och mah׃ 
mark 4:9	oiamr alihm mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
mark 4:10	oihi bhioto lbdo oiSaloho hanSim aSr sbibio em Snim heSr el hmSl׃ 
mark 4:11	oiamr alihm lkm ntn ldet sod mlkot halhim oaSr bHoz lhm hkl bmSlim׃ 
mark 4:12	lmen irao rao ola ideo oSmeo Smoe ola ibino pn iSobo onslH lHTatm׃ 
mark 4:13	oiamr lhm hn la idetm at hmSl hch oaik tbino at hmSlim klm׃ 
mark 4:14	hcre hoa cre at hdbr׃ 
mark 4:15	oalh hm hncreim el id hdrk aSr icre bm hdbr okSmem aoto mid ba hSTn oiSa at hdbr hcroe blbbm׃ 
mark 4:16	okn hncreim el mqmot hsle hm hSmeim at hdbr omhr bSmHh iqHho׃ 
mark 4:17	ak ain lhm SrS bqrbm orq lSeh iemdo oaHr kn bhiot zrh ordiph el adot hdbr mhrh ikSlo׃ 
mark 4:18	ohaHrim hncreim bin hqzim hm hSmeim at hdbr׃ 
mark 4:19	odagot heolm hch omrmt heSr otaot Sar hdbrim baot ommekot at hdbr opri la ihih lo׃ 
mark 4:20	oalh hmcreim el hadmh hTobh hm hSmeim at hdbr omqblim ato oeSim pri lSlSim Serim olSSim olmah׃ 
mark 4:21	oiamr alihm hki ibiao hnr lmen ioSm tHt haiph otHt hmTh ola lmen ielho el hmnorh׃ 
mark 4:22	ki ain dbr stom aSr la iglh ola nelm dbr ki am lmen iba lgloi׃ 
mark 4:23	kl aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
mark 4:24	oiamr alihm rao mh atm Smeim bmdh aSr atm moddim bh imd lkm oeod iosp lkm hSmeim׃ 
mark 4:25	ki mi SiS lo nton intn lo omi Sain lo gm at aSr iS lo iqH mmno׃ 
mark 4:26	oiamr mlkot halhim hia kaSr iSlik aiS cre el hadmh׃ 
mark 4:27	oiSn oqm lilh oiom ohcre izmH ogdl ohoa la ide׃ 
mark 4:28	ki harz malih moziah prih at hdSa raSonh oaHrio at hSblt oaHri kn at hHTh hmlah bSblt׃ 
mark 4:29	okaSr gml hpri imhr lSlH at hmgl ki bSl hqzir׃ 
mark 4:30	oiamr al mh ndmh at mlkot halhim obai ch mSl nmSilnh׃ 
mark 4:31	kgrgr Sl Hrdl aSr icre badmh ohoa qTn mkl hcreim aSr el harz׃ 
mark 4:32	oaHri hcreo ielh oigdl el kl hirqot oeSh enpim gdolim ed aSr ioklo eop hSmim lqnn bzlo׃ 
mark 4:33	obmSlim rbim kalh dbr alihm at hdbr kpi aSr iklo lSme׃ 
mark 4:34	obbli mSl la dbr alihm ohih bhioto em tlmidio lbdm ibar lhm at hkl׃ 
mark 4:35	oiamr alihm biom hhoa lpnot erb nebrh hebr׃ 
mark 4:36	oiecbo at hmon hem oiqHo ato kaSr hoa banih ogm aniot aHrot hlko emo׃ 
mark 4:37	otqm roH serh gdolh oiSTpo hglim al tok hanih ed aSr kmeT nmlah׃ 
mark 4:38	ohoa iSn el hkst baHri hanih oieiro aoto oiamro alio rbi haink dag lno ki nabd׃ 
mark 4:39	oieor oiger broH oiamr al him hs odm otSk hroH othi dmmh gdolh׃ 
mark 4:40	oiamr alihm lmh kkh atm Hrdim aik ain lkm amonh׃ 
mark 4:41	oiirao irah gdolh oiamro aiS al reho mi apoa hoa aSr gm hroH ohim Smeim lo׃ 
mark 5:1	oibao al ebr him al arz hgdrim׃ 
mark 5:2	ohoa iza mn hanih ohnh aiS ba lqrato mbin hqbrim aSr roH Tmah bo׃ 
mark 5:3	omoSbo bqbrim ogm bebtim la ikl aiS lasro׃ 
mark 5:4	ki pemim hrbh asroho bkblim obebtim ointq at hebtim oiSbr at hkblim oain aiS ikl lkbSo׃ 
mark 5:5	otmid lilh oiomm hih bhrim obqbrim zeq opze at ezmo babnim׃ 
mark 5:6	oihi kraoto at ihoSe mrHoq oirz oiStHo lo׃ 
mark 5:7	oizeq bqol gdol oiamr mh li olk ihoSe bn al elion balhim ani mSbiek aSr la tenni׃ 
mark 5:8	ki hoa amr alio za roH Tma mn hadm hch׃ 
mark 5:9	oiSal ato mh Smk oien oiamr lgion Smi ki rbim anHno׃ 
mark 5:10	oitHnn alio mad lblti SlHm al mHoz larz׃ 
mark 5:11	oedr Hcirim rbim hih Sm bmreh hhrim׃ 
mark 5:12	oitHnno lo kl hSdim lamr SlHno al hHcirim onbah al tokm׃
