mark 5:13	oinH lhm oizao roHot hTmah oibao bHcirim oiSter hedr mn hmord al him kalpim bmspr oiTbeo bim׃ 
mark 5:14	oinoso rei hHcirim oigido cat beir obSdot oizao lraot mh nhith׃ 
mark 5:15	oibao al ihoSe oirao at aHoc hSdim aSr hlgion bo ohoa ioSb mlbS oTob Skl oiirao׃ 
mark 5:16	oispro lhm hraim at aSr neSh laHoc hSdim oat dbr hHcirim׃ 
mark 5:17	oiHlo lhtHnn lo lsor mgbolihm׃ 
mark 5:18	oihi brdto al hanih htHnn alio haiS aSr hih aHoc Sdim ltto lSbt emo׃ 
mark 5:19	ola hniH lo ki am amr alio Sob lbitk al bni mSpHtk ohgd lhm at hgdlot aSr eSh lk ihoh oiHnk׃ 
mark 5:20	oilk lo oiHl lqra beSr herim at hgdlot aSr eSh lo ihoSe oitmho klm׃ 
mark 5:21	oiSb ihoSe lebr banih al ebr him oiqhl alio hmon rb ohoa el Spt him׃ 
mark 5:22	ohnh ba aHd mraSi hknst oSmo iair oira ato oipl lrglio׃ 
mark 5:23	oitHnn alio mad lamr bti hqTnh Hlth ed lmot ana boa na oSim idik elih lmen trpa otHih׃ 
mark 5:24	oilk ato oilko aHrio hmon rb oidHqho׃ 
mark 5:25	oaSh hith cbt dm Stim eSrh Snh׃ 
mark 5:26	ohia sblh hrbh tHt idi rpaim rbim ohoziah at kl aSr lh ola lhoeil oihi Hlih Hcq mad׃ 
mark 5:27	oihi kSmeh at Sme ihoSe otboa bhmon hem maHrio otge bbgdo׃ 
mark 5:28	ki amrh rq am age bbgdio aoSe׃ 
mark 5:29	oiibS mqor dmih ptam otbn bbSrh ki nrpa ngeh׃ 
mark 5:30	obrge ide ihoSe bnpSo ki gborh izah mmno oipn btok hem oiamr mi nge bbgdi׃ 
mark 5:31	oiamr alio tlmidio ath rah at hhmon doHq atk oamrt mi nge bi׃ 
mark 5:32	oibT sbib lraot at aSr eSth cat׃ 
mark 5:33	otira haSh otHrd ki ideh at aSr neSh lh otba otpl lpnio otgd lo at hamt klh׃ 
mark 5:34	oiamr alih bti amontk hoSieh lk lki lSlom oHiit mngek׃ 
mark 5:35	eodno mdbr ohnh baim mbit raS hknst lamr btk mth lmh tTriH eod at hmorh׃ 
mark 5:36	okSme ihoSe at hdbr aSr dbro oiamr al raS hknst al tira rq haminh׃ 
mark 5:37	ola hniH laiS llkt ato blti am lpTros olieqb olioHnn aHi ieqb׃ 
mark 5:38	oiba bit raS hknst oira hmon hbkim ohmillim hrbh׃ 
mark 5:39	obbao amr alihm mh thmo otbko hnerh la mth ak iSnh hia׃ 
mark 5:40	oiSHqo lo ohoa grS at klm oiqH at abi hnerh oat amh oat aSr ato oiba hHdrh aSr Sm Skbt hnerh׃ 
mark 5:41	oiaHc bid hnerh oiamr alih Tlita qomi aSr proSo hildh ani amr lk qomi na׃ 
mark 5:42	omid qmh hildh otthlk ohia bt Stim eSrh Snh oiSmo Smh gdolh׃ 
mark 5:43	oichr aotm mad Sla iode hdbr laiS oiamr ltt lh lakol׃ 
mark 6:1	oiza mSm oiba al arzo oilko aHrio tlmidio׃ 
mark 6:2	obiom hSbt hHl llmd bbit hknst oiSmeo rbim oiStommo lamr main lch kalh omh hia hHkmh hntonh lo ed aSr neSo gborot kalh el idio׃ 
mark 6:3	hla ch hoa hHrS bn mrim oaHi ieqb oiosi oihodh oSmeon ohla aHiotio atno ph oihi lhm lmkSol׃ 
mark 6:4	oiamr alihm ihoSe ain hnbia nqlh ki am barzo obin qrobio obbito׃ 
mark 6:5	ola ikl leSot Sm pla rq el HlSim meTim Sm at idio oirpam׃ 
mark 6:6	oitmh el Hsron amontm oisb bkprim sbob olmd׃ 
mark 6:7	oiqra al Snim heSr oiHl lSlH aotm Snim Snim oitn lhm SlTn el roHot hTmah׃ 
mark 6:8	oizo aotm aSr la iSao maomh ldrk colti mql lbdo la trmil ola lHm ola nHSt bHgorh׃ 
mark 6:9	rq lhiot neoli sndl oSti ktnot la ilbSo׃ 
mark 6:10	oiamr alihm bmqom aSr tbao bit aiS Sbo bo ed ki tzao mSm׃ 
mark 6:11	okl aSr la iqblo atkm ola iSmeo alikm zao mSm onero at epr kpot rglikm ledot lhm amn ani amr lkm lsdm olemrh iql biom hdin mn heir hhia׃ 
mark 6:12	oizao oiqrao lSob btSobh׃ 
mark 6:13	oigrSo Sdim rbim oisoko bSmn HlSim rbim oirpaom׃ 
mark 6:14	oiSme elio hmlk hordos ki node Smo oiamr ioHnn hTobl qm mn hmtim oel kn pelot bo hgborot׃ 
mark 6:15	oaHrim amro ki hoa aliho oaHrim amro ki nbia hoa ao kaHd hnbiaim׃ 
mark 6:16	oiSme hordos oiamr ioHnn aSr anki nSati at raSo melio hoa qm mn hmtim׃ 
mark 6:17	ki hoa horods SlH ltpS at ioHnn oiasrho bbit hshr bgll horodih aSt pilpos aHio ki ath lqH lo laSh׃ 
mark 6:18	ien aSr amr ioHnn al hordos aSt aHik ainnh mtrt lk׃ 
mark 6:19	otSTm aoto horodih otbqS hmito ola iklh׃ 
mark 6:20	ki hordos ira at ioHnn bdeto ki hoa aiS zdiq oqdoS oign bedo ohrbh eSh bSmeo alio oiahb lSme ato׃ 
mark 6:21	oiba hiom hmkSr ki hordos biom hldt ato eSh mSth lgdolio olSri halpim olraSi hglil׃ 
mark 6:22	otba bt horodih otrqd otiTb beini hordos obeini hmsbim emo oiamr hmlk al hnerh Sali mmni at aSr tHpzi oatn lk׃ 
mark 6:23	oiSbe lh lamr kl aSr tSali mmni atn lk ed Hzi mlkoti׃ 
mark 6:24	otza otamr lamh mh aSal otamr at raS ioHnn hmTbil׃ 
mark 6:25	otmhr mad lboa al hmlk otSal lamr rzoni aSr ttn li eth bqerh at raS ioHnn hmTbil׃ 
mark 6:26	oitezb hmlk mad ak bebor hSboeh ohmsbim emo la rzh lhSib pnih׃ 
mark 6:27	omid SlH hmlk aHd hTbHim oizoho lhbia at raSo׃ 
mark 6:28	oilk oikrt at raSo bbit hshr oibiaho bqerh oitnho lnerh ohnerh ntnh ato al amh׃ 
mark 6:29	oiSmeo tlmidio oibao oiSao at goito oiSimoh bqbr׃ 
mark 6:30	oiqhlo hSliHim al ihoSe oigido lo at kl aSr eSo oat aSr lmdo׃ 
mark 6:31	oiamr alihm bao atm lbdd al mqom Hrbh onoHo meT ki rbim hio hbaim ohizaim ed lain et lhm lakol׃ 
mark 6:32	oilko mSm banih al mqom Hrbh lbdd׃ 
mark 6:33	ohhmon rah aotm izaim oikirho rbim oirozo Smh brglihm mkl herim oiebro aotm oiaspo alio׃ 
mark 6:34	oiza oira hmon em rb oihmo meio elihm ki hio kzan aSr ain lhm reh oiHl llmd aotm dbrim hrbh׃ 
mark 6:35	oihi kaSr rph hiom lerob oigSo alio tlmidio lamr hnh hmqom Hrb ohiom rd mad׃ 
mark 6:36	SlH aotm oilko al hHzrim ohkprim msbib lqnot lhm lHm ki ain lhm mh lakl׃ 
mark 6:37	oien oiamr alihm tno atm lhm laklh oiamro alio hnlk lqnot lHm bmatim dinr ontn lhm laklh׃ 
mark 6:38	oiamr alihm kmh kkrot lHm iS lkm lko orao oideo oiamro HmS oSni dgim׃ 
mark 6:39	oizo aotm lSbt klm Hbrh Hbrh lbdh el irq hdSa׃ 
mark 6:40	oiSbo lhm Sorot Sorot lmaot olHmSim׃ 
mark 6:41	oiqH at HmSt kkrot hlHm oat Sni hdgim oiSa einio hSmimh oibrk oiprs at hlHm oitn ltlmidio lSom lpnihm oat Sni hdgim Hlq lklm׃ 
mark 6:42	oiaklo klm oiSbeo׃ 
mark 6:43	oiSao mn hptotim mloa slim Snim eSr ogm mn hdgim׃ 
mark 6:44	ohaklim mn hlHm hio kHmSt alpi aiS׃ 
mark 6:45	oaHri kn haiz btlmidio lrdt banih olebor lpnio al ebr him al bit zidh ed SlHo at hem׃ 
mark 6:46	oihi aHr SlHo atm oiel hhrh lhtpll׃ 
mark 6:47	oihi erb ohanih bah btok him ohoa lbdo bibSh׃ 
mark 6:48	oira aotm mtemlim bSoTm ki hroH lngdm oihi ket haSmrt hrbieit oiba alihm mthlk el pni him oioal lebor lpnihm׃ 
mark 6:49	ohm bratm ato mthlk el pni him HSbo ki mrah roH hoa oizeqo׃ 
mark 6:50	ki klm raoho oibhlo ac dbr atm oiamr alihm Hcqo ki ani hoa al tirao׃ 
mark 6:51	oird alihm al hanih ohroH Skkh oiStommo eod iotr blbbm oitmho׃ 
mark 6:52	ki la hSkilo bdbr kkrot hlHm mpni TmTom lbbm׃ 
mark 6:53	oiebro at him oibao arzh gnisr oiqrbo al hibSh׃ 
mark 6:54	oihi kzatm mn hanih ac hkirho׃ 
mark 6:55	oirozo bkl sbibotihm oiHlo lSat at hHolim bmSkbot al kl mqom aSr Smeo ki Sm hoa׃ 
mark 6:56	obkl mqom aSr iba al hkprim ao herim oal hSdot Sm Smo at hHolim bHozot oitHnno lo ki igeo rq bzizt bgdo ohih kl aSr ngeo onoSeo׃ 
mark 7:1	oiqhlo alio hproSim omn hsoprim aSr bao miroSlim׃ 
mark 7:2	oihi kraotm mtlmidio aklim lHm bTmat idihm bla nTilh oiokiHo atm׃ 
mark 7:3	ki hproSim okl hihodim la iaklo blti at rHzo at idihm ed hprq baHcm bqblt hcqnim׃ 
mark 7:4	oat aSr mn hSoq ainm aklim bla Tbilh oeod dbrim aHrim rbim aSr qblo lSmr kmo Tbilt ksot okdim oiorot omTot׃ 
mark 7:5	oiSalo aoto hproSim ohsoprim mdoe tlmidik ainm nhgim el pi qblt hcqnim ki aklim lHm bla nTbilt idim׃ 
mark 7:6	oien oiamr alihm hiTb nba iSeiho elikm hHnpim kktob hem hch bSptio kbdoni olbo rHq mmni׃ 
mark 7:7	otho iratm ati mzot anSim mlmdim׃ 
mark 7:8	ki ecbtm at mzot alhim laHc bqblt bni adm Tbilot kdim oksot okalh rbot atm eSim׃ 
mark 7:9	oiamr alihm mh iph eSitm aSr bTltm at mzot halhim kdi StSmro at qbltkm׃ 
mark 7:10	ki mSh amr kbd at abik oat amk omqll abio oamo mot iomt׃ 
mark 7:11	oatm amrim aiS ki iamr labio olamo qrbn proSo mtnh lalhim kl mh Sath nhnh li׃ 
mark 7:12	ola tniHo lo leSot eod maomh labio olamo׃ 
mark 7:13	otpro at dbr halhim el idi qbltkm aSr qbltm ohrbh kalh atm eSim׃ 
mark 7:14	oiqra al kl hem oiamr alihm Smeo ali klkm ohbino׃ 
mark 7:15	ain dbr mHoz ladm aSr iokl lTma aoto bbao al qrbo ki am hdbrim hiozaim mmno hmh iTmao at hadm׃ 
mark 7:16	kl aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
mark 7:17	oihi kaSr Sb hbith mn hhmon oiSalho tlmidio el dbr hmSl׃ 
mark 7:18	oiamr alihm hap atm Hsri binh hla tSkilo ki kl hba at tok hadm mHozh lo la iTmano׃ 
mark 7:19	ki la iboa al lbo ki am al krSo oiza lmozaot lhbr kl akl׃ 
mark 7:20	oiamr hiza mn hadm hoa mTma at hadm׃ 
mark 7:21	 ki mtok lb hadm izaot hmHSbot hreot nap ocnh orzoH ognob oahbt bze orSeh ormih ocollot ozrot ein ogdop ocdon osklot׃ 
mark 7:22	׃ 
mark 7:23	kl hreot halh mqrb hadm hn iozaot omTmaot ato׃ 
mark 7:24	oiqm mSm oilk lo al gbolot zor ozidon obboao hbith la abh ki iode laiS ola ikl lhstr׃ 
mark 7:25	ki aSh aSr roH Tmah nknsh bbth hqTnh Smeh at Smeo otba otpl lrglio׃ 
mark 7:26	ohaSh ionit oarz moldth knen aSr lsoria otbqS mmno lgrS ar hSd mbth׃ 
mark 7:27	oiamr alih ihoSe hniHo lSbe braSonh hbnim ki la Tob lqHt lHm hbnim olhSliko lzeiri hklbim׃ 
mark 7:28	oten otamr alio kn adni abl gm zeiri hklbim iaklo tHt hSlHn mprori lHm hbnim׃ 
mark 7:29	oiamr alih bgll dbrk ch lki lk iza hSd mbtk׃ 
mark 7:30	otba al bith otmza at hildh mSkbt el HmTh ohSd iza mmnh׃ 
mark 7:31	oiSb oiza mgbol zor ozidon oiba al im hglil btok gbol eSr herim׃ 
mark 7:32	oibiao alio aiS aSr hih HrS oalm oitHnno lo lSom elio at ido׃ 
mark 7:33	oiqH ato lbdo mqrb hhmon oiSm at azbeotio bacnio oirq oige el lSno׃ 
mark 7:34	oibT hSmimh oianH oiamr alio aptH oproSo hptH׃ 
mark 7:35	obrge nptHo acnio oitr qSr lSono oidbr bSph brorh׃ 
mark 7:36	oichr aotm ki la ispro laiS okaSr ichirm kn irbo lhkric׃ 
mark 7:37	oiStommo ed mad oiamro at hkl eSh iph gm hHrSim hoa eSh lSmeim gm halmim lmdbrim׃ 
mark 8:1	oihi bimim hhm bhqbz em rb oain lhm mh iaklo oiqra al tlmidio oiamr alihm׃ 
mark 8:2	nkmro rHmi el hem ki ch SlSt imim emdo emdi oain lhm lHm lakl׃ 
mark 8:3	ohih bSlHi aotm rebim lbtihm itelpo bdrk ki iS mhm aSr bao mmrHq׃ 
mark 8:4	oieno ato tlmidio main iokl aiS lhSbie at alh ph bmdbr lHm׃ 
mark 8:5	oiSal aotm kmh kkrot lHm iS lkm oiamro Sbe׃ 
mark 8:6	oizo at hem lSbt larz oiqH at Sbe kkrot hlHm oibrk oiprs oitn aotm ltlmidio lSom lpnihm oiSimo lpni hem׃ 
mark 8:7	oihi lhm meT dgim qTnim oibrk oiamr lSom lpnihm gm at alh׃ 
mark 8:8	oiaklo oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim Sbet dodim׃ 
mark 8:9	ohaklim hio karbet alpi aiS oiSlHm׃ 
mark 8:10	ac ird banih em tlmidio oiba al glilot dlmonta׃ 
mark 8:11	oizao hproSim oiHlo lhtokH ato oiSalo memo aot mn hSmim ohm mnsim ato׃ 
mark 8:12	oianH broHo oiamr mh hdor hch mbqS lo aot amn amr ani lkm am intn aot ldor hch׃ 
mark 8:13	oiecb aotm oird banih oiSb oiebr al ebr him׃ 
mark 8:14	oiSkHo lqHt atm lHm ola hih lhm banih blti am kkr lHm aHt׃ 
mark 8:15	oichr aotm lamr rao hSmro lkm mSar hproSim omSar hordos׃ 
mark 8:16	oiHSbo oiamro aiS al reho el ki lHm ain atno׃ 
mark 8:17	oide ihoSe oiamr lhm mh tHSbo el ki lHm ain lkm heod la tSkilo ola tbino olbkm eodno mTmTm׃ 
mark 8:18	einim lkm ola trao oacnim lkm ola tSmeo ola tckro׃ 
mark 8:19	kaSr prsti at HmSt kkrot hlHm lHmSt alpi aiS kmh slim mlai ptotim nSatm oiamro alio Snim eSr׃ 
mark 8:20	obSbe larbet alpi aiS kmh dodim mlai ptotim nSatm oiamro alio Sbeh׃ 
mark 8:21	oiamr alihm aik la tbino׃ 
mark 8:22	oiba al bit zidh oibiao alio aiS eor oitHnno lo lget bo׃ 
mark 8:23	oiaHc bid heor oiolikho al mHoz lkpr oirq beinio oiSm at idio elio oiSalho lamr hrah ath dbr׃ 
mark 8:24	oibT oiamr arah at bni hadm ki mthlkim kailnot ani rah׃ 
mark 8:25	oiosp lSom at idio el einio otpqHnh einio oirpa oira hkl hiTb ed lmrHoq׃ 
mark 8:26	oiSlHho al bito lamr al tba btok hkpr oal tdbr laiS bkpr׃ 
mark 8:27	oiza ihoSe otlmidio llkt al kpri qisrin Sl pilpos oihi bdrk oiSal at tlmidio oiamr alihm mh amrim eli hanSim mi ani׃ 
mark 8:28	oieno oiamro ioHnn hmTbil oiS amrim aliho oaHrim amrim aHd mn hnbiaim׃ 
mark 8:29	oiSal atm lamr oatm mh tamro eli mi ani oien pTros oiamr alio ath hoa hmSiH׃ 
mark 8:30	oizo atm bgerh lblti dbr elio laiS׃ 
mark 8:31	oiHl llmdm ki zrik bn hadm lenot hrbh oimas el idi hcqnim ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oiomt omqzh SlSt imim qom iqom׃ 
mark 8:32	ohoa bgloi dbr at hdbr hch oiqHho pTros oiHl lger bo׃ 
mark 8:33	oipn aHrio oibT at tlmidio oiger bpTros lamr sor mel pni hSTn ki ain lbk ldbri halhim ki am ldbri hadm׃ 
mark 8:34	oiqra al hem oal tlmidio oiamr alihm hHpz llkt aHri ikHS bnpSo oiSa at zlbo oilk aHri׃ 
mark 8:35	ki kl aSr iHpz lhoSie at npSo tabd npSo mmno okl aSr tabd lo npSo lmeni olmen hbSorh hoa ioSienh׃ 
mark 8:36	ki mh iskn ladm ki iqnh at kl heolm onSHth npSo׃ 
mark 8:37	ao mh itn aiS pdion npSo׃ 
mark 8:38	ki kl aiS aSr hiiti ani odbri lo lHrph bdor hnap ohHoTa hch ap hoa ihih lHrph lbn hadm bboao bkbod abio em hmlakim hqdoSim׃ 
mark 9:1	oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm ki iS mn hemdim ph aSr la iTemo mot ed ki irao mlkot halhim bah bgborh׃ 
mark 9:2	oaHri SSt imim lqH ihoSe at pTros oat ieqb oat ioHnn oielm el hr gbh ato lbdm oiStnh leinihm׃ 
mark 9:3	obgdio nhio mchirim lbnim mad kSlg aSr la iokl kobs barz lhlbin kmohm׃ 
mark 9:4	oira alihm aliho omSh mdbrim em ihoSe׃ 
mark 9:5	oien pTros oiamr al ihoSe rbi Tob hiotno ph neSh na SlS skot lk aHt olmSh aHt olaliho aHt׃ 
mark 9:6	ki la ide mh idbr ki hio nbhlim׃ 
mark 9:7	oihi enn sokk elihm oiza mn henn qol amr ch bni ididi alio Smeo׃ 
mark 9:8	ohmh hbiTo kh okh ptam ola rao eod aiS blti at ihoSe lbdo atm׃ 
mark 9:9	oirdo mn hhr oichirm lblti hgid laiS at aSr rao ed ki iqom bn hadm mn hmtim׃ 
mark 9:10	oiSmro at hdbr blbbm oidrSo ldet mh hia htqomh mn hmtim׃ 
mark 9:11	oiSalho lamr mh ch amrim hsoprim ki aliho boa iboa braSonh׃ 
mark 9:12	oien oiamr lhm hnh aliho ba braSonh oiSib at hkl omh ktob el bn hadm hla ki ienh hrbh oimas׃ 
mark 9:13	abl amr ani lkm gm ba aliho ogm eSo lo krzonm kaSr ktob elio׃ 
mark 9:14	oihi kboao al htlmidim oira em rb sbibotm osoprim mtokHim atm׃ 
mark 9:15	okl hem kraotm ato kn tmho oirozi alio oiSalo lo lSlom׃ 
mark 9:16	oiSal at hsoprim mh atm mtokHim emhm׃ 
mark 9:17	oien aHd mn hem oiamr rbi hbati alik at bni aSr roH alm bqrbo׃ 
mark 9:18	ohih bkl mqom aSr iaHcho hoa mrzz ato oird riro oHrq at Snio oibS gopo oamr al tlmidik lgrSo ola iklo׃ 
mark 9:19	oien oiamr lhm hoi dor blti mamin ed mti ahih emkm ed mti asbl atkm hbiao ato lpni׃ 
mark 9:20	oibiaho lpnio oihi kaSr raho hroH oirozzno ptam oipl arzh oitgoll oiord riro׃ 
mark 9:21	oiSal at abio kmh imim hith lo cat oiamr mimi neorio׃ 
mark 9:22	opemim rbot hpil ato gm baS gm bmim lhabido ak am ikl tokl rHm elino oecrno׃ 
mark 9:23	oiamr alio ihoSe lamr am tokl lhamin kl iokl hmamin׃ 
mark 9:24	oitn abi hild at qlo bbki oiamr ani mamin ecr na lHsron amonti׃ 
mark 9:25	oira ihoSe at hem mtqbz alio oiger broH hTma lamr roH alm oHrS ani mzok za mmno oal tsp lboa bo eod׃ 
mark 9:26	oizeq oirzz ato mad oiza oihi kmt ed aSr amro rbim ki goe׃ 
mark 9:27	oiHcq ihoSe bido oinieho oiqm׃ 
mark 9:28	oihi kaSr ba hbith oiSalho tlmidio bhiotm lbdm ato mdoe anHno la iklno lgrSo׃ 
mark 9:29	oiamr alihm hmin hch iza la iza ki am btplh obzom׃ 
mark 9:30	oizao mSm oiebro bglil ola abh lhode laiS׃ 
mark 9:31	ki hih mlmd at tlmidio lamr alihm ki etid bn hadm lhmsr bidi bni adm oihrgho oaHri aSr nhrg iqom biom hSliSi׃ 
mark 9:32	ohm la hbino at hdbr oiirao lSal aoto׃ 
mark 9:33	oiba al kpr nHom obhioto bbit oiSal aotm mh htokHtm aiS em reho bdrk׃ 
mark 9:34	oiHriSo ki hteSqo bdrk mi hoa hgdol bhm׃ 
mark 9:35	oiSb oiqra al Snim heSr oiamr alihm aiS ki iHpz lhiot hraSon hoa ihih haHron lklm omSrt klm׃ 
mark 9:36	oiqH ild oiemidho btokm oiHbqho oiamr lhm׃ 
mark 9:37	kl aSr iqbl bSmi ild aHd kch hoa mqbl aoti okl aSr aoti iqbl ainno mqbl aoti ki am at aSr SlHni׃ 
mark 9:38	oien ioHnn oiamr alio rbi raino aiS mgrS Sdim bSmk oainno holk aHrino onklano ien aSr la hlk aHrino׃ 
mark 9:39	oiamr ihoSe al tklaho ki ain aiS eSh gborh bSmi oiokl bmhrh ldbr bi reh׃ 
mark 9:40	ki kl aSr ainno ngdno hoa bedno׃ 
mark 9:41	ki kl hmSqh atkm kos mim bSmi el aSr atm lmSiH amn amr ani lkm ki la iabd Skro׃ 
mark 9:42	okl hmkSil aHd hqTnim hmaminim bi Tob lo Sitlh plH rkb el zoaro ohSlk bim׃ 
mark 9:43	oam idk tkSilk qzz ath Tob lk lboa qTe lHiim mhiot lk Sti idim otlk al gihnm al haS aSr la tkbh׃ 
mark 9:44	aSr Sm toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh׃ 
mark 9:45	oam rglk tkSilk qzz ath Tob lk lboa psH lHiim mhiot lk Sti rglim otSlk lgihnm al haS aSr la tkbh׃ 
mark 9:46	aSr Sm toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh׃ 
mark 9:47	oam eink tkSilk eqr ath Tob lk lboa al mlkot halhim bein aHt mhiot lk Sti einim otSlk lgihnm׃ 
mark 9:48	aSr Sm toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh׃ 
mark 9:49	ki kl aiS baS imlH okl qrbn bmlH imlH׃ 
mark 9:50	Tob hmlH oam hmlH ihih tpl bmh ttqno aoto ihi lkm mlH bqrbkm oihi Slom binikm׃ 
mark 10:1	oiqm mSm oilk al gbol ihodh mebr hirdn oiqhlo eod alio hmon em oilmdm kpem bpem׃ 
mark 10:2	oigSo alio hproSim oiSalho am iokl aiS lSlH at aSto ohm mnsim ato׃ 
mark 10:3	oien oiamr alihm mh zoh atkm mSh׃ 
mark 10:4	oiamro mSh htir lktb spr kritt olSlH׃ 
mark 10:5	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm bebor qSi lbbkm ktb lkm at hmzoh hcat׃ 
mark 10:6	abl mraSit hbriah ckr onqbh eSh atm alhim׃ 
mark 10:7	el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto׃ 
mark 10:8	ohio Snihm lbSr aHd oam kn apoa ainm eod Snim ki am bSr aHd׃ 
mark 10:9	lkn at aSr Hbr alhim la ipridno adm׃ 
mark 10:10	oihi bbit oiSobo tlmidio lSal ato el cat׃ 
mark 10:11	oiamr alihm hmSlH at aSto olqH aHrt nap hoa elih׃ 
mark 10:12	oaSh ki tecb aiSh olqHh aiS aHr napt hia׃ 
mark 10:13	oibiao alio ildim lmen ige bhm oigero htlmidim bmbiaihm׃ 
mark 10:14	oira ihoSe oikes oiamr alihm hniHo lildim lboa ali oal tmneom ki lalh mlkot halhim׃ 
mark 10:15	amn amr ani lkm kl aSr la iqbl at mlkot halhim kild hoa la iba bh׃ 
mark 10:16	oiHbqm oibrkm bSomo at idio elihm׃ 
mark 10:17	oihi bzato ldrk ohnh aiS rz alio oikre lpnio oiSal aoto rbi hTob mh aeSh oairS Hii eolm׃ 
mark 10:18	oiamr lo ihoSe mdoe qrat li Tob ain Tob blti aHd halhim׃ 
mark 10:19	hn idet at hmzot la tnap la trzH la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr la teSq kbd at abik oat amk׃ 
mark 10:20	oien oiamr alio rbi at kl alh Smrti neori׃ 
mark 10:21	oibT bo ihoSe oiahbho oiamr alio aHt Hsrt lk mkr at kl aSr lk otn leniim oihi lk aozr bSmim oboa Sa at hzlb olk aHri׃ 
mark 10:22	oizr lo el hdbr hch oiezb oilk lo ki hon rb hih lo׃ 
mark 10:23	oibT ihoSe sbib oiamr al tlmidio kmh iqSh lbeli nksim lboa al mlkot halhim׃ 
mark 10:24	oibhlo htlmidim el dbrio oisp ihoSe oien oiamr lhm bni mh qSh lbTHim el Hilm lboa al mlkot halhim׃ 
mark 10:25	nql lgml lebr btok nqb hmHT mboa eSir al mlkot halhim׃ 
mark 10:26	oiosipo eod lhStomm oiamro aiS alm aHio mi apoa iokl lhoSe׃ 
mark 10:27	oibT bm ihoSe oiamr mbni adm tpla cat ak la malhim ki malhim la ipla kl dbr׃ 
mark 10:28	oien pTros oiamr alio hn anHno ecbno at hkl onlk aHrik׃ 
mark 10:29	oiamr ihoSe amn amr ani lkm ki ain aiS aSr ecb at bito ao at aHio ao at aHiotio ao at abio ao at amo ao at aSto ao at bnio ao at Sdotio lmeni olmen hbSorh׃ 
mark 10:30	aSr la iqH eth bcmn hch bkl hrdipot mah pemim khmh btim oaHim oaHiot oamot obnim oSdot obeolm hba Hii eolmim׃ 
mark 10:31	oaolm rbim mn hraSonim ihio aHronim ohaHronim raSonim׃ 
mark 10:32	oihi bdrk belotm iroSlim oihoSe holk lpnihm ohmh nbhlim oiraim blktm aHrio oiosp lqHt alio at Snim heSr oiHl lhgid lhm at aSr iqrho lamr׃ 
mark 10:33	hnh anHno elim iroSlimh obn hadm imsr lraSi hkhnim olsoprim oirSieho lmot oimsro ato lgoim׃ 
mark 10:34	oihtlo bo oikho bSoTim oirqo bpnio oimitho obiom hSliSi qom iqom׃ 
mark 10:35	oiqrbo alio ieqb oioHnn bni cbdi oiamro rbi aoth npSno ki teSh lno at aSr nSal mmk׃ 
mark 10:36	oiamr alihm mh aoitm ki aeSh lkm׃ 
mark 10:37	oiamro alio tnh lno lSbt aHd limink oaHd lSmalk bkbodk׃ 
mark 10:38	oiamr alihm ihoSe la idetm at aSr Saltm hikl toklo lStot at hkos aSr ani Sth olhTbl bTbilh aSr ani nTbl bh׃ 
mark 10:39	oiamro alio nokl oiamr alihm ihoSe at hkos aSr ani Sth tSto obTbilh aSr ani nTbl bh tTblo׃ 
mark 10:40	ak Sbt limini olSmali ain bidi ltth blti laSr hokn lhm׃ 
mark 10:41	oihi kSme cat heSrh oiHlo lkeos el ieqb oioHnn׃ 
mark 10:42	oiqra lhm ihoSe oiamr alihm atm idetm ki hnHSbim lSri hgoim hm rdim bhm ogdolihm SolTim elihm׃ 
mark 10:43	oatm la kn binikm ki am hHpz lhiot gdol binikm ihih lkm lmSrt׃ 
mark 10:44	ohHpz lhiot bkm raSon ihih ebd lkl׃ 
mark 10:45	ki bn hadm ap hoa la ba lmen iSrtoho ki am lSrt oltt at npSo kpr tHt rbim׃
