mark 10:48	oigero bo rbim lhStiqo ohoa hrbh lzeq bn dod Hnni׃ 
mark 10:49	oiemd ihoSe oiamr qrao lo oiqrao leor oiamro alio Hcq qom qra lk׃ 
mark 10:50	oiSlk at Smlto melio oiqm oiba al ihoSe׃ 
mark 10:51	oien ihoSe oiamr alio mh Hpzt oaeSh lk oiamr alio heor rboni ki arah׃ 
mark 10:52	oiamr ihoSe alio lk lk amontk hoSieh lk optam rah oilk aHri ihoSe bdrk׃ 
mark 11:1	oihi kaSr qrbo liroSlim al bit pgi obit hini bhr hcitim oiSlH Snim mtlmidio׃ 
mark 11:2	oiamr alihm lko al hkpr aSr mmolkm ohih kbakm Smh tmzao eir asor aSr la iSb elio adm aoto htiro ohbiao׃ 
mark 11:3	oki iamr alikm aiS lmh teSo cat oamrtm hadon zrik lo obrge iSlHno hnh׃ 
mark 11:4	oilko oimzao heir asor al hSer bHoz el am hdrk oitiroho׃ 
mark 11:5	oanSim mn hemdim Sm amro alihm mh cat teSo lhtir at heir׃ 
mark 11:6	oiamro alihm kaSr zom ihoSe oiniHo lhm׃ 
mark 11:7	oibiao at heir al ihoSe oiSliko elio at bgdihm oiSb elio׃ 
mark 11:8	orbim prSo at bgdihm el hdrk oaHrim krto enpim mn hezim oiSTHo el hdrk׃ 
mark 11:9	ohhlkim lpnio oaHrio zeqim lamr hoSe na brok hba bSm ihoh׃ 
mark 11:10	brokh mlkot dod abino hbah bSm ihoh hoSe na bmromim׃ 
mark 11:11	oiba ihoSe iroSlim oal bit hmqdS oira oitbonn el hkl ohiom rph lerob oiza al bit hini em Snim heSr׃ 
mark 11:12	oihi mmHrt bzatm mbit hini oireb׃ 
mark 11:13	oira tanh mrHoq ola elim oiba lraot himza bh pri oiqrb alih ola mza bh ki am elim lbd ki la hith et tanim׃ 
mark 11:14	oien oiamr alih meth aiS al iakl pri mmk ed eolm oiSmeo tlmidio׃ 
mark 11:15	oibao iroSlim oiba ihoSe al hmqdS oiHl lgrS mSm at hmokrim oat hqonim oihpk at SlHnot hSlHnim oat moSbot mkri hionim׃ 
mark 11:16	ola hniH laiS lSat kli drk hmqdS׃ 
mark 11:17	oilmd oiamr lhm hla ktob ki biti bit tplh iqra lkl hemim oatm eSitm ato mert priaim׃ 
mark 11:18	oiSmeo hsoprim oraSi hkhnim oitnklo ato lhSmido ki irao mpnio ien aSr kl hem mStommim el torto׃ 
mark 11:19	oihi berb oiza al mHoz leir׃ 
mark 11:20	oihi hm ebrim bbqr oirao at htanh ki ibSh em SrSih׃ 
mark 11:21	oickr pTros oiamr alio rbi hnh htanh aSr arrth ibSh׃ 
mark 11:22	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm thi na bkm amont alhim׃ 
mark 11:23	ki amn amr ani lkm kl aSr iamr al hhr hch hnSa ohetq al tok him oain spq blbbo ki am iamin ki ihih kaSr amr kn gm ihih lo׃ 
mark 11:24	el kn ani amr lkm kl aSr tSalo bhtpllkm hamino ki tqHo oihi lkm׃ 
mark 11:25	oki temdo lhtpll tslHo lkl aiS at aSr blbbkm elio lmen islH lkm abikm SbSmim ap hoa at pSeikm׃ 
mark 11:26	oatm am la tslHo ap abikm SbSmim la islH lkm at pSeikm׃ 
mark 11:27	oiSobo oibao iroSlim oihi hoa mthlk bmqdS oibao alio hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ohcqnim׃ 
mark 11:28	oiamro alio bai co rSot ath eSh alh omi ntn lk at hrSot hcat leSot at alh׃ 
mark 11:29	oiamr ihoSe alihm gm ani aSalh atkm dbr aHd oatm hSiboni oamr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh׃ 
mark 11:30	Tbilt ioHnn hmn hSmim hith am mbni adm hSiboni׃ 
mark 11:31	oiHSbo kh okh bqrbm lamr am namr mn hSmim iamr mdoe apoa la hamntm lo׃ 
mark 11:32	ao hnamr mbni adm oiirao at hem ki klm HSbo at ioHnn lnbia bamt׃ 
mark 11:33	oieno oiamro al ihoSe la ideno oien ihoSe oiamr alihm am kn gm ani la amr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh׃ 
mark 12:1	oiHl ldbr alihm bmSlim lamr aiS nTe krm oieS gdr sbibotio oiHzb iqb oibn mgdl oitnho al krmim oilk lmrHqim׃ 
mark 12:2	olmoed SlH al hkrmim ebd lqHt mat hkrmim mpri hkrm׃ 
mark 12:3	oiHciqo bo oikho oiSlHho riqm׃ 
mark 12:4	oisp lSlH alihm ebd aHr oato sqlo babnim omHqo raSo oiSlHho nklm׃ 
mark 12:5	oisp oiSlH aHr ogm ato hrgo okn eSo brbim aHrim mhm hko omhm hrgo׃ 
mark 12:6	oihi lo eod bn iHid aSr ahbo oiSlH gm ato alihm baHrnh lamr mpni bni igoro׃ 
mark 12:7	ohkrmim hhm amro aiS al reho hnh ch hoa hiorS lko onhrgho olno thih hirSh׃ 
mark 12:8	oiHciqo bo oihrgo aoto oiSlikho al mHoz lkrm׃ 
mark 12:9	oeth mh ieSh bel hkrm iboa oiabd at hkrmim hhm oitn at hkrm laHrim׃ 
mark 12:10	hla qratm at hktob hch abn maso hbonim hith lraS pnh׃ 
mark 12:11	mat ihoh hith cat hia nplat beinino׃ 
mark 12:12	oibqSo ltpSo oiirao mpni hem ien aSr hbino ki elihm dbr at hmSl hch oiecbho oilko lhm׃ 
mark 12:13	oiSlHo alio anSim mn hproSim omn hhordosim llkd ato bdbro׃ 
mark 12:14	oibao oiamro alio rbi ideno ki aiS amt ath ola tgor mpni aiS ki la tkir pnim ki am bamt morh ath at drk halhim hnkon ltt ms al hqisr am la ntn׃ 
mark 12:15	ohoa ide at Hnptm oiamr alihm mh tnsoni hbiao ali dinr oarah׃ 
mark 12:16	oibiao oiamr alihm Sl mi hzorh hcat ohmktb aSr elio oiamro alio Sl hqisr׃ 
mark 12:17	oiamr ihoSe alihm at aSr lqisr tno lqisr oat aSr lalhim tno lalhim oitmho elio׃ 
mark 12:18	oibao alio mn hzdoqim hamrim ki ain tHih lmtim oiSalho lamr׃ 
mark 12:19	rbi ktb lno mSh ki imot aHi aiS oecb aSh obnim ain lo iibm aHio at aSto oiqm cre laHio׃ 
mark 12:20	ohnh Sbeh aHim ohraSon lqH aSh obmoto la hSair aHrio cre׃ 
mark 12:21	oiqH ath hSni oimt ola hniH cre okn gm hSliSi׃ 
mark 12:22	oiqHoh kl hSbeh ola hSairo aHrihm cre oaHri mot klm mth gm haSh׃ 
mark 12:23	oeth btHit hmtim kSiqomo lmi mhm thih laSh ki lSbeh hith laSh׃ 
mark 12:24	oiamr ihoSe alihm hla bcat atm teim baSr ainkm iodeim gm at hktobim gm at gbort halhim׃ 
mark 12:25	ki bet qomm mn hmtim hanSim la iSao nSim ola tnSanh ak ihio kmlaki hSmim׃ 
mark 12:26	oel dbr hmtim ki qom iqomo hla qratm bspr mSh bsnh at aSr dbr alio halhim lamr anki alhi abrhm oalhi izHq oalhi ieqb׃ 
mark 12:27	halhim ainno alhi hmtim ki am alhi hHiim lkn hrbitm lteot׃ 
mark 12:28	oaHd mn hsoprim Sme atm mtokHim oiqrb alihm oira ki hiTb hSibm oiSalho mh hia hraSnh lkl hmzot׃ 
mark 12:29	oien ihoSe oidbr alio hraSnh lkl hmzot hia Sme iSral ihoh alhino ihoh aHd׃ 
mark 12:30	oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl mdek obkl madk cat hia hmzoh hraSnh׃ 
mark 12:31	ohSnit hdmh lh hia oahbt lrek kmok oain mzoh gdolh malh׃ 
mark 12:32	oiamr alio hsopr amnm rbi iph dbrt ki alhim aHd hoa oain eod mlbdo׃ 
mark 12:33	olahbh ato bkl lbb obkl mde obkl npS obkl mad olahbh at hre knpSo gdolh hia mkl elot ocbHim׃ 
mark 12:34	oira ihoSe ki enh bdet oiamr alio la rHoq ath mmlkot halhim oaiS la erb eod at lbo lSal aoto Salh׃ 
mark 12:35	oien ihoSe blmdo bmqdS oiamr aik iamro hsoprim ki hmSiH hoa bn dod׃ 
mark 12:36	ohoa dod amr broH hqdS nam ihoh ladni Sb limini ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik׃ 
mark 12:37	hnh dod bezmo qra lo adon oaik hoa bno oiahb rb hem lSme ato׃ 
mark 12:38	oiamr alihm blmd atm hSmro mn hsoprim hahbim lhthlk eTopi Tlit oat Salot Slomm bSoqim׃ 
mark 12:39	oat moSbi hraS bbti knsiot oat msbot hraS bseodot׃ 
mark 12:40	hbleim at bti halmnot omarikim btplh lmrah einim hmh mSpT el itr iqHo׃ 
mark 12:41	oihoSe iSb mmol aron haozr ohoa rah at hem mSlikim meot laron haozr oeSirim rbim ntno hrbh׃ 
mark 12:42	otba almnh enih otSlk Sti proTot aSr hn rbe asr׃ 
mark 12:43	oiqra al tlmidio oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm ki halmnh henih hcat ntnh iotr mkl hntnim al aron haozr׃ 
mark 12:44	ki klm ntno mn hedp Slhm ohia mmHsrh ntnh kl aSr lh at kl rkoSh׃ 
mark 13:1	oihi bzato mn hmqdS oiamr alio aHd mtlmidio rbi rah mh ipo habnim ohbninim halh׃ 
mark 13:2	oien ihoSe ato oiamr hrait at kl hbninim hgdolim halh la tSar abn el abn aSr la ttprq׃ 
mark 13:3	oiSb el hr hcitim mmol hmqdS oiSalho pTros oieqb oioHnn oandri ohm ato lbdm׃ 
mark 13:4	amr na lno mti thih cat omh hoa haot bba het aSr teSh bh kl cat׃ 
mark 13:5	oien atm ihoSe oiHl ldbr rao pn iteh atkm aiS׃ 
mark 13:6	ki rbim ibao bSmi lamr ani hoa oiteo rbim׃ 
mark 13:7	obSmekm mlHmot oSmeot mlHmh al tbhlo ki hio thih cat ak la cat hia hqz׃ 
mark 13:8	ki iqom goi el goi ommlkh el mmlkh ohih reS kh okh ohih reb omhomh׃ 
mark 13:9	alh raSit hHblim oatm hSmro bnpStikm ki imsro atkm lsnhdriot ohkitm bbti knsiot olpni mSlim omlkim tobao lmeni ledot lhm׃ 
mark 13:10	ohbSorh zrikh lhqra braSnh lkl hgoim׃ 
mark 13:11	okaSr ioliko omsro atkm al tdago oal tHSbo mh tdbro ki hdbr aSr intn lkm bSeh hhia aoto dbro ien la atm hm hmdbrim ki am roH hqdS׃ 
mark 13:12	oaH imsr at aHio lmot oab at bno oqmo bnim babotm ohmito aotm׃ 
mark 13:13	ohiitm Snoaim lkl adm lmen Smi ohmHkh ed et qz hoa ioSe׃ 
mark 13:14	oki trao at Sqoz mSmm hnamr bid dnial hnbia emd bmqom aSr la lo hqora ibin ac nos inoso anSi ihodh al hhrim׃ 
mark 13:15	oaSr el hgg al ird hbith oal iba pnimh lSat dbr mbito׃ 
mark 13:16	oaSr bSdh al iSb hbith lSat mlboSo׃ 
mark 13:17	oaoi lhrot olminiqot bimim hhmh׃ 
mark 13:18	ak htpllo aSr la thih mnostkm bHrp׃ 
mark 13:19	ki himim hhm ihio et zrh aSr la nhith kmoh mraSit hbriah aSr bra alhim ed eth okmoh la thih eod׃ 
mark 13:20	ololi qzr ihoh at himim hhm la ioSe kl bSr ak lmen hbHirim aSr bHr bm qzr at himim׃ 
mark 13:21	oac am iamr aiS alikm hnh ph hmSiH ao hnho Sm al tamino׃ 
mark 13:22	ki iqomo mSiHi Sqr onbiai Sqr ontno atot omoptim lhteot ap at hbHirim am ioklo׃ 
mark 13:23	oatm rao hnh mraS hgdti lkm at kl׃ 
mark 13:24	ohih bimim hhm aHri hzrh hhia tHSk hSmS ohirH la igih aoro׃ 
mark 13:25	ohkokbim iplo mn hSmim okHot hSmim itmoTTo׃ 
mark 13:26	oac irao at bn hadm ba bennim bgborh rbh obkbod׃ 
mark 13:27	oac iSlH at mlakio oiqbz at bHirio marbe hroHot mqzh harz ed qzh hSmim׃ 
mark 13:28	lmdo na at mSl htanh kSirTb enph oprH elh idetm ki qrob hqiz׃ 
mark 13:29	kn ap atm bratkm ki hio kl alh deo ki qrob hoa lptH׃ 
mark 13:30	amn amr ani lkm la iebr hdor hch ed aSr ihio kl alh׃ 
mark 13:31	hSmim oharz iebro odbri la iebron׃ 
mark 13:32	ak et boa hiom hhoa ohSeh hhia ain aiS iode aoth gm la mlaki hSmim gm la hbn mbledi hab׃ 
mark 13:33	rao Sqdo ohtpllo ki la idetm mti thih het׃ 
mark 13:34	ohih kaiS holk lmrHq aSr ecb at bito oitn SlTn lebdio olaiS aiS at mlakto ogm at hSoer zoh lSqd׃ 
mark 13:35	lkn Sqdo ki la idetm mti iboa bel hbit am let erb ao bHzot hlilh am bet qriat hgbr ao bbqr׃ 
mark 13:36	pn iboa ptam omza atkm iSnim׃ 
mark 13:37	oat aSr amrti lkm amr ani lkl Sqdo׃ 
mark 14:1	oihi iomim lpni Hg hpsH ohmzot oibqSo hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim aik itpSho bermh lhmito׃ 
mark 14:2	oiamro ak la bHg pn thih mhomh bem׃ 
mark 14:3	oihi bhioto bbit hini bit Smeon hmzre oisb al hSlHn otba aSh obidh pk Smn nrd ck oiqr mad otSbr at hpk otzq el raSo׃ 
mark 14:4	oiS aSr mtremim aiS al reho lamr el mh hih abod hSmn hch׃ 
mark 14:5	ki raoi hih ch lhmkr biotr mSlS maot dinr oltto leniim oigero bh׃ 
mark 14:6	oiamr ihoSe hniHo lh lmh tgion npSh meSh Tob eSth emdi׃ 
mark 14:7	ki heniim tmid emkm okStrzo toklo lhiTib lhm oanki la ahih atkm tmid׃ 
mark 14:8	at aSr hih lal idh eSth qdmh lmSoH at gopi lHnTo׃ 
mark 14:9	amn amr ani lkm ki baSr tqra hbSorh hcat al kl heolm gm at aSr eSth hia ispr lckron lh׃ 
mark 14:10	oihodh aiS qriot aHd mSnim heSr hlk al raSi hkhnim lmsr aoto alihm׃ 
mark 14:11	ohm kSmem SmHo oiamro ltt lo ksp oibqS tanh lmsro׃ 
mark 14:12	oihi braSon lHg hmzot et cbH hpsH oiamro alio tlmidio aiph tHpz lakl at hpsH onlkh onkin׃ 
mark 14:13	oiSlH Snim mtlmidio oiamr alihm lko heirh oipge atkm aiS nSa zpHt hmim lko aHrio׃ 
mark 14:14	obaSr iboa Smh amro lbel hbit kh amr hrb aih hmlon aSt aklh Sm at hpsH em tlmidi׃ 
mark 14:15	ohoa irah atkm elih gdolh mzeh omoknh oSm hkino lno׃ 
mark 14:16	oizao tlmidio oibao heirh oimzao kaSr dbr lhm oikino at hpsH׃ 
mark 14:17	oihi berb oiba em Snim heSr׃ 
mark 14:18	oisbo oiaklo oiamr ihoSe amn amr ani lkm aHd mkm hakl ati imsrni׃ 
mark 14:19	oiHlo lhtezb oiamro alio ch aHr ch hki ani hoa׃ 
mark 14:20	oien oiamr alihm aHd mSnim heSr hoa hTbl emi bqerh׃ 
mark 14:21	hn bn hadm hlk ilk kaSr ktob elio abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido imsr bn hadm Tob laiS hhoa Sla nold׃ 
mark 14:22	oihi baklm oiqH ihoSe lHm oibrk oibze oitn lhm oiamr qHo aklo ch hoa gopi׃ 
mark 14:23	oiqH at hkos oibrk oitn lhm oiSto mmnh klm׃ 
mark 14:24	oiamr lhm ch hoa dmi dm hbrit hHdSh hnSpk bed rbim׃ 
mark 14:25	amn amr ani lkm Sth la aSth eod mtnobt hgpn ed hiom hhoa aSr aSth aoth HdSh bmlkot halhim׃ 
mark 14:26	oaHri gmrm at hhll oizao al hr hcitim׃ 
mark 14:27	oiamr alihm ihoSe atm klkm tkSlo bi blilh hch ki ktob akh at hreh otpozin hzan׃ 
mark 14:28	oaHri qomi mn hmtim alk lpnikm hglilh׃ 
mark 14:29	oiamr alio pTros gm am klm ikSlo ani la akSl׃ 
mark 14:30	oiamr alio ihoSe amn amr ani lk ki hiom blilh hch bTrm iqra htrngol pemim ath tkHS bi SlS pemim׃ 
mark 14:31	ohoa htHcq oiosp ldbr oiamr gm ki ihih eli lmot atk kHS la akHS bk okn amro gm klm׃ 
mark 14:32	oibao al Hzr gt Smni Smo oiamr al tlmidio Sbo lkm ph ed aSr atpll׃ 
mark 14:33	oiqH ato at pTros oat ieqb oat ioHnn oiHl lhSmim olmog׃ 
mark 14:34	oiamr alihm npSi mrh li ed mot emdo ph oSqdo׃ 
mark 14:35	oiebr mSm meT ohlah oipl arzh oitpll aSr am iokl hiot tebr na melio hSeh hcat׃ 
mark 14:36	oiamr aba abi hkl tokl hebr na meli at hkos hcat ak la at aSr ani rozh ki am at aSr ath׃ 
mark 14:37	oiba oimzam iSnim oiamr al pTros Smeon htiSn hki la iklt lSqd Seh aHt׃ 
mark 14:38	Sqdo ohtpllo pn tbao lidi nsion hn hroH hia Hpzh ohbSr rph׃ 
mark 14:39	oisp lsor oitpll bamro eod hpem kdbrim hhmh׃ 
mark 14:40	oiSb oimzam Snit iSnim ki einihm hio kbdot ola ideo mh ienho׃ 
mark 14:41	oiba pem SliSit oiamr alihm meth nomo onoHo rb li ki bah hSeh hnh bn hadm nmsr bidi HTaim׃ 
mark 14:42	qomo onlkh hnh hmosr aoti qrb׃ 
mark 14:43	eodno mdbr oihodh ba ohoa aHd mSnim heSr oemo hmon rb bHrbot obmqlot mat hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ohcqnim׃ 
mark 14:44	ohmosr ato ntn lhm aot lamr haiS aSr aSqho ch hoa aoto tpSo oholikho al imlT׃ 
mark 14:45	hoa ba ohoa ngS alio oiamr rbi rbi oinSq lo׃ 
mark 14:46	oiSlHo bo at idihm oitpSho׃ 
mark 14:47	oaHd mn hemdim azlo Slp at Hrbo oik at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno׃ 
mark 14:48	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm kmo el priz izatm eli bHrbot obmqlot ltpSni׃ 
mark 14:49	oiom iom hiiti azlkm mlmd bmqdS ola hHcqtm bi abl lmen imlao hktobim׃ 
mark 14:50	oiecbo aoto klm oinoso׃ 
mark 14:51	oner aHd hlk aHrio meTp bsdin lksot at eroto oiaHcho hnerim׃ 
mark 14:52	ohoa ecb at hsdin bidm oins erm mpnihm׃ 
mark 14:53	oioliko at ihoSe al hkhn hgdol oiqhlo ato kl hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim ohsoprim׃ 
mark 14:54	opTros hlk aHrio mrHoq ed lHzr hkhn hgdol pnimh oiSb Sm em hmSrtim oitHmm ngd haor׃ 
mark 14:55	oraSi hkhnim okl hsnhdrin bqSo edot el ihoSe lhmito ola mzao׃ 
mark 14:56	ki rbim eno bo edot Sqr ak hediot la hio Sot׃ 
mark 14:57	oiqomo anSim oieno bo edot Sqr lamr׃ 
mark 14:58	Smeno ato amr ani ahrs at hhikl hch meSh idi adm olSlSt imim abnh hikl aHr aSr ainno meSh idi adm׃ 
mark 14:59	ogm bcat edotm la Soth׃ 
mark 14:60	oiqm hkhn hgdol oiemd btok oiSal at ihoSe lamr haink mSib dbr mh ch alh enim bk׃ 
mark 14:61	ohoa hHriS ola hSib dbr oiosp eod hkhn hgdol lSal ato oiamr alio hath hoa hmSiH bn hmbrk׃ 
mark 14:62	oiamr ihoSe ani hoa oatm trao at bn hadm ioSb limin hgborh oba em enni hSmim׃ 
mark 14:63	oiqre hkhn hgdol at bgdio oiamr mh lno eod lbqS edim׃ 
mark 14:64	Smetm at hgdop mh detkm oirSieho klm ki Hib mith hoa׃ 
mark 14:65	oiHlo mhm lrq bo oiHpo at pnio oikho bagrp oiamro alio hnba ohmSrtim hkaibho bhkotm aoto el hlHi׃ 
mark 14:66	oihi bhiot pTros btHtit hHzr otba aHt mSpHot hkhn hgdol׃ 
mark 14:67	otra at pTros ki mtHmm hoa otbT bo otamr gm ath hiit em hnzri ihoSe׃ 
mark 14:68	oikHS lamr la ade ola abin mh at amrt oiza hHozh al haolm ohtrngl qra׃ 
mark 14:69	otraho hSpHh otosp otamr al hemdim Sm ki ch hoa aHd mhm oikHS pem Snit׃ 
mark 14:70	okmeT aHri kn gm hemdim Sm amro al pTros amnm ath aHd mhm ki ap glili ath olSonk klSonm׃ 
mark 14:71	oiHl lhHrim at npSo olhSbe lamr la iedti at haiS hch aSr amrtm׃ 
mark 14:72	ohtrngl qra pem Snit oickr pTros at hdbr aSr amr lo ihoSe bTrm iqra htrngl pemim tkHS bi SlS pemim oiSm al lbo oibk׃ 
mark 15:1	oiSkimo raSi hkhnim em hcqnim ohsoprim okl hsnhdrin bbqr oitiezo oiasro at ihoSe oiolikho mSm oimsrho al pilTos׃ 
mark 15:2	oiSal aoto pilTos hath mlk hihodim oien oiamr alio ath amrt׃ 
mark 15:3	oraSi hkhnim hrbo lSTno׃ 
mark 15:4	oiosp pilTos oiSalho lamr haink mSib dbr rah kmh hm meidim bk׃ 
mark 15:5	oihoSe la hSib eod ap dbr aHd oitmh pilTos׃ 
mark 15:6	obkl Hg hih drko lpTr lhm asir aHd at aSr ibqSo׃ 
mark 15:7	oihi aiS hnqra bSm br aba asor em hmordim aSr rzHo rzH bet hmrd׃ 
mark 15:8	oiSa hhmon at qolo oiHlo lbqS SieSh lhm kpem bpem׃ 
mark 15:9	oien atm pilTos oiamr htHpzo ki apTr lkm at mlk hihodim׃ 
mark 15:10	ki ide aSr rq mqnah msroho raSi hkhnim׃ 
mark 15:11	oraSi hkhnim hsito at hhmon lblti pTr lhm ki am br aba׃ 
mark 15:12	oisp pilTos oien oiamr lhm omh apoa Hpztm oaeSh laSr atm qraim mlk hihodim׃ 
mark 15:13	oiosipo lzeq hzlb aoto׃ 
mark 15:14	oiamr alihm pilTos mh apoa eSh reh ohm hrbo eod lzeq hzlb aoto׃ 
mark 15:15	oioal pilTos leSot krzon hem oipTr lhm at br aba oat ihoSe hkh bSoTim oimsr aoto lhzlb׃ 
mark 15:16	oiolikho anSi hzlb al hHzr hpnimit hoa bit hmSpT oiceiqo at kl hgdod׃ 
mark 15:17	oilbiSho argmn oiSrgo eTrt qzim oieTrho׃ 
mark 15:18	oiHlo lbrko lamr Slom lk mlk hihodim׃ 
mark 15:19	oiko el raSo bqnh oirqo bo oikreo el brkihm oiStHoo lo׃ 
mark 15:20	oaHri htlozzm bo hpSiTo aoto at hargmn oilbiSho at bgdio oioziaho lzlb aoto׃ 
mark 15:21	oianso aiS ebr aHd hba mn hSdh oSmo Smeon hqorini abi alksndros oropos lSat at zlbo׃ 
mark 15:22	oibiaho al mqom glglta hoa mqom hglglt׃ 
mark 15:23	oitno lo iin mcog bmr ohoa la qbl׃ 
mark 15:24	oihi kaSr zlbo aoto oiHlqo bgdio lhm bhpilm elihm gorl mh iqH aiS aiS׃ 
mark 15:25	othi hSeh hSliSit oizlbho׃ 
mark 15:26	omktb dbr aSmto ktob lmelh mlk hihodim׃ 
mark 15:27	oizlbo ato Sni prizim aHd limino oaHd lSmalo׃ 
mark 15:28	oimla hktob hamr oat pSeim nmnh׃ 
mark 15:29	ohebrim gdpo aoto oinieo raSm lamr haH ath hhors at hhikl obonh aoto bSlSt imim׃ 
mark 15:30	hoSe at ezmk ordh mn hzlb׃ 
mark 15:31	okn lego lo gm raSi hkhnim em hsoprim bamrm aiS al reho at aHrim hoSie oat ezmo la iokl lhoSie׃ 
mark 15:32	hmSiH mlk iSral ird na mn hzlb lmen nrah onamin ogm hnzlbim ato Hrpoho׃ 
mark 15:33	obhiot hSeh hSSit hih HSk el kl harz ed hSeh htSieit׃ 
mark 15:34	obSeh htSieit oizeq ihoSe bqol gdol alhi alhi lmh Sbqtni aSr proSo ali ali lmh ecbtni׃ 
mark 15:35	omqzt hemdim azlo bSmem at cat amro hnh al aliho hoa qora׃ 
mark 15:36	oirz aHd mhm oimla spog Hmz oiSm el qnh oiSqho oiamr hniHo onrah am iba aliho lhorido׃ 
mark 15:37	oihoSe ntn qol gdol oipH at npSo׃ 
mark 15:38	oprkt hhikl nqreh lSnim qreim mlmelh lmTh׃ 
mark 15:39	oira Sr hmah hemd lngdo ki bceqo kn npH at npSo oiamr akn haiS hch hih bn halhim׃ 
mark 15:40	ogm nSim hio Sm raot mrHoq obtokn gm mrim hmgdlit omrim amo Sl ieqb hzeir oSl iosi oSlmit׃ 
mark 15:41	aSr gm hlko aHrio oSrtho bhioto bglil oaHrot rbot aSr elo ato iroSlim׃ 
mark 15:42	oet herb hgie ompni aSr erb Sbt hih hoa hiom Slpni hSbt׃ 
mark 15:43	oiba iosp hrmti ioez nkbd aSr hih mHkh gm hoa lmlkot halhim oitHcq oiba al pilTos oiSal at gopt ihoSe׃ 
mark 15:44	oitmh pilTos el aSr hoa kbr mt oiqra al Sr hmah oiSalho hgoe kbr׃ 
mark 15:45	oide mpi Sr hmah ki kn oitn at gopto mtnh liosp׃ 
mark 15:46	ohoa qnh sdin oiord ato oikrkho bsdin oiSimho bqbr Hzob bsle oigl abn el ptH hqbr׃ 
mark 15:47	omrim hmgdlit omrim am iosi hio raot at hmqom aSr hoSm Smh׃ 
mark 16:1	oihi kaSr ebr iom hSbt otqninh mrim hmggdlit omrim am ieqb oSlmit smim lboa olsok ato bhm׃ 
mark 16:2	obaHd bSbt bbqr hSkm bao al hqbr kcroH hSmS׃ 
mark 16:3	otamrnh aSh al aHoth mi igl lno at habn mel ptH hqbr׃ 
mark 16:4	obhbiTn rao ohnh ngllh habn ki hith gdlh mad׃ 
mark 16:5	otbanh al tok hqbr otrainh bHor aHd iSb mimin ohoa eTh Smlh lbnh otStommnh׃ 
mark 16:6	oiamr alihn al tStommnh at ihoSe hnzri atn mbqSot at hnzlb hoa qm ainno ph hnh ch hmqom aSr hSkibho bo׃ 
mark 16:7	ak lknh oamrtn al tlmidio oal pTros ki holk hoa lpnikm hglilh oSm traho kaSr amr lkm׃ 
mark 16:8	otmhrnh lzat otbrHnh mn hqbr ki aHctn redh otmhon ola hgido dbr laiS ki irao׃ 
mark 16:9	ohoa kaSr qm mn hmtim baHd bSbt nrah braSonh al mrim hmgdlit aSr grS mmnh Sbeh Sdim׃ 
mark 16:10	otlk otgd lanSim aSr hio emo ohm mtablim obkim׃ 
mark 16:11	okaSr Smeo ki Hi onrah alih la hamino lh׃ 
mark 16:12	oaHri kn nrah bdmot aHrt lSnim mhm bhitm mthlkim bzatm hSdh׃ 
mark 16:13	ohm hlko oigido laHrim ogm lhm la hamino׃ 
mark 16:14	obaHrnh nrah leSti heSr bhiotm msbim oiHrp Hsron amontm oqSi lbbm aSr la hamino lraim ato neor mn hmtim׃ 
mark 16:15	oiamr alihm lko al kl heolm oqrao at hbSorh lkl hbriah׃ 
mark 16:16	hmamin onTbl hoa ioSe oaSr la iamin iaSm׃ 
mark 16:17	oalh hatot aSr iloo al hmaminim igrSo Sdim bSmi oblSnot HdSot idbro׃ 
mark 16:18	nHSim iSao bidihm oam iSto sm hmot la iciqm el Holim iSimo at idihm oiiTb lhm׃ 
mark 16:19	oihi aHri aSr dbr atm hadon oinSa hSmimh oiSb limin halhim׃ 
mark 16:20	ohmh izao oiqrao bkl hmqmot ohadon ecrm oiHcq at hdbr batot hbaot aHri dbrm amn׃ 
luke 1:1	aHri aSr rbim hoailo lHbr spor hmeSim aSr namno bSlmot btokno׃ 
luke 1:2	kaSr msrom lno hraim atm beinihm mtHlh oaSr hio mSrti hdbr׃ 
luke 1:3	HSbti lTob gm ani hHpS kl hdbrim hiTb mraSitm lktbm alik bsdr taopilos hadir׃ 
luke 1:4	lmen tde qST hamrim aSr Hnkt bm׃ 
luke 1:5	khn hih bimi hordos mlk ihodh ckrih Smo mmSmrt abih olo aSh mbnot ahrn oSmh aliSbe׃ 
luke 1:6	oSnihm hio zdiqim lpni halhim ohlki tm bkl mzot ihoh obHqtio׃ 
luke 1:7	ola hih lhm ild ki aliSbe eqrh oSnihm bao bimim׃ 
luke 1:8	oihi hiom oikhn lpni alhim bsdr mSmrto׃ 
luke 1:9	okmSpT ebodt hkhnim iza gorlo lhqTir qTrt oiba al hikl ihoh׃ 
luke 1:10	okl qhl hem hio mtpllim bHoz bet hqTrt׃ 
luke 1:11	oira alio mlak ihoh emd limin mcbH hqTrt׃ 
luke 1:12	oibhl ckrih braoto ato oaimh nplh elio׃ 
luke 1:13	oiamr alio hmlak al tira ckriho ki nSmeh tpltk oaliSbe aStk tld lk bn oqrat Smo ioHnn׃ 
luke 1:14	ohih lk lSmHh ogil orbim iSmHo bholdo׃ 
luke 1:15	ki gdol ihih lpni ihoh oiin oSkr la iSth oroH hqdS imla beodno bbTn amo׃ 
luke 1:16	orbim mbni iSral iSib al ihoh alhihm׃ 
luke 1:17	ohoa ilk lpnio broH aliho obgborto lhSib at lb abot el bnim oat hsorrim ltbont hzdiqim lhemid lihoh em mtqn׃ 
luke 1:18	oiamr ckrih al hmlak bmh ade cat ki ani cqnti oaSti bah bimim׃ 
luke 1:19	oien hmlak oiamr alio ani gbrial heomd lpni halhim oSloH anki ldbr alik olbSrk at cat׃ 
luke 1:20	ohnh talm ola tokl ldbr ed hiom aSr thih cat tHt ki la hamnt bdbri aSr imlao lmoedm׃ 
luke 1:21	ohem hih mHkh lckrih oitmho ki aHr bhikl׃ 
luke 1:22	oihi bzato la ikl ldbr alihm oideo ki mrah rah bhikl oirmc lhm oeodno nalm׃ 
luke 1:23	oihi kaSr mlao imi ebdto oilk lo al bito׃ 
luke 1:24	oihi aHri himim halh othr aliSbe aSto ottHba HmSh HdSim otamr׃ 
luke 1:25	kkh eSh li ihoh bimi pqdo aoti lasp at Hrpti btok bni adm׃ 
luke 1:26	oihi bHdS hSSi oiSlH hmlak gbrial mat halhim glilh al eir aSr Smh nzrt׃ 
luke 1:27	al btolh marSh laiS aSr Smo iosp mbit dod oSm hbtolh mrim׃ 
luke 1:28	oiba hmlak alih hHdrh oiamr Slom lk aSt Hn ihoh emk brokh at bnSim׃ 
luke 1:29	ohia braoth nbhlh ldbro otamr blbh mh hia hbrkh hcat׃ 
luke 1:30	oiamr lh hmlak al tirai mrim ki mzat Hn lpni halhim׃ 
luke 1:31	ohnk hrh oildt bn oqrat at Smo ihoSe׃ 
luke 1:32	ohoa gdol ihih obn elion iqra oihoh alhim itn lo at ksa dod abio׃ 
luke 1:33	oel bit ieqb imlk leolm oed olmlkoto ain qz׃ 
luke 1:34	otamr mrim al hmlak aik thih cat oani ainni idet aiS׃ 
luke 1:35	oien hmlak oiamr alih roH hqdS tboa elik ogbort elion tzl elik el kn gm lqdoS hilod iqra bn alhim׃ 
luke 1:36	ohnh aliSbe qrobtk aSr qrao lh eqrh gm hia hrth bn bcqnth och lh hHdS hSSi׃ 
luke 1:37	ki la ipla malhim kl dbr׃ 
luke 1:38	otamr mrim hnni SpHt ihoh ihi li kdbrk oiza math hmlak׃ 
luke 1:39	otqm mrim bimim hhm otmhr llkt hhrh al eir ihodh׃ 
luke 1:40	otba bit ckrih otbrk at aliSbe׃ 
luke 1:41	oihi kSme aliSbe at brkt mrim oirqd hild bmeih otmla aliSbe roH hqdS׃ 
luke 1:42	otqra bqol gdol otamr brokh at bnSim obrok pri bTnk׃ 
luke 1:43	omain li cat aSr am adni bah ali׃ 
luke 1:44	ki qol brktk ba bacni ohnh rqd bSmHh hild bmei׃ 
luke 1:45	oaSri hmaminh ki hmla tmla aSr dbr lh mat ihoh׃ 
luke 1:46	otamr mrim rommh npSi at ihoh׃ 
luke 1:47	otgl roHi balhi iSei׃ 
luke 1:48	 aSr rah beni amto ki hnh meth kl hdrot iaSroni ki gdlot eSh li Sdi oqdoS Smo׃ 
luke 1:49	׃ 
luke 1:50	oHsdo ldor dorim el iraio׃ 
luke 1:51	gborot eSh bcreo pcr gaim bmcmot lbbm׃ 
luke 1:52	hrs ndibim mksaoto oirm Splim׃ 
luke 1:53	rebim mla Tob oeSirim SlH riqm׃ 
luke 1:54	tmk biSral ebdo lckr at rHmio׃ 
luke 1:55	kaSr dbr al abotino labrhm olcreo ed eolm׃ 
luke 1:56	otSb mrim emh kSlSh HdSim otSb lbith׃ 
luke 1:57	oimlao imi aliSbe lldt otld bn׃ 
luke 1:58	oiSmeo Sknih oqrobih ki hgdil ihoh at Hsdo emh oiSmHo ath׃ 
luke 1:59	oihi biom hSmini oibao lmol at hild oiqrao ato ckrih el Sm abio׃ 
luke 1:60	oten amo otamr la ki ioHnn iqra׃ 
luke 1:61	oiamro alih ain aiS bmSpHtk aSr nqra bSm hch׃ 
luke 1:62	oirmco al abio ldet mh hSm aSr iHpz lhqra lo׃ 
luke 1:63	oiSal loH oiktb elio lamr ioHnn Smo oitmho klm׃ 
luke 1:64	oiptH pio olSono ptam oidbr oibrk at halhim׃ 
luke 1:65	otpl aimh el kl Sknihm oispr kl hdbrim halh bkl hri ihodh׃ 
luke 1:66	oiSimo kl hSmeim al lbm lamr mh apoa ihih hild hch oid ihoh hith emo׃ 
luke 1:67	oimla ckrih abio roH hqdS oinba lamr׃ 
luke 1:68	brok ihoh alhi iSral ki pqd at emo oiSlH lo pdot׃ 
luke 1:69	oirm lno qrn ihoSeh bbit dod ebdo׃ 
luke 1:70	kaSr dbr bpi nbiaio hqdoSim aSr meolm׃ 
luke 1:71	ihoSeh maibino omid kl Snaino׃ 
luke 1:72	leSot Hsd em abotino olckr at brit qdSo׃ 
luke 1:73	at hSboeh aSr nSbe labrhm abino׃ 
luke 1:74	lhzilno mid aibino olttno lebdo bli pHd׃ 
luke 1:75	btmim obzdqh lpnio kl imi Hiino׃ 
luke 1:76	oath hild nbia elion tqra ki lpni ihoh tlk lpnot at drkio׃ 
luke 1:77	ltt det hihoSeh lemo bsliHt HTatihm׃ 
luke 1:78	brHmi Hsd alhino aSr bhm pqdno hngh mmrom׃ 
luke 1:79	lhair liSbi HSk ozlmot olhkin at rglino al drk hSlom׃ 
luke 1:80	oigdl hild oiHcq broH oihi bmdbrot ed iom hrato al iSral׃ 
luke 2:1	oihi bimim hhm otza dt mat hqisr aogosTos lspr at kl iSbi tbl׃ 
luke 2:2	och hmpqd hih hraSon bhiot qorinios SliT bsoria׃ 
luke 2:3	oilko klm lhtpqd aiS leiro׃ 
luke 2:4	oiel gm iosp mn hglil meir nzrt al ihodh leir dod hnqrah bit lHm ki hih mbit dod ommSpHto׃ 
luke 2:5	lhtpqd em mrim hmarSh lo ohia hrh׃ 
luke 2:6	oihi bhiotm Sm oimlao imih lldt׃ 
luke 2:7	otld at bnh hbkor otHtlho otSkibho babos ki la hih lhm mqom bmlon׃ 
luke 2:8	oreim hio barz hhia lnim bSdh oSmrim at mSmrot hlilh bedrm׃ 
luke 2:9	ohnh mlak ihoh nzb elihm okbod ihoh hopie elihm msbib oiirao irah gdolh׃ 
luke 2:10	oiamr alihm hmlak al tirao ki hnni mbSr atkm SmHh gdolh aSr thih lkl hem׃ 
luke 2:11	ki hiom ild lkm beir dod moSie aSr hoa hmSiH hadon׃ 
luke 2:12	och lkm haot tmzaon ild mHtl omnH babos׃ 
luke 2:13	oihi ptam azl hmlak hmon zba hSmim ohm mSbHim at halhim oamrim׃ 
luke 2:14	kbod bmromim lalhim obarz Slom bbni adm rzono׃ 
luke 2:15	oihi kaSr elo melihm hmlakim hSmimh oiamro hreim aiS al reho nebrh na ed bit lHm onrah hmeSh hch aSr hodieno ihoh׃ 
luke 2:16	oimhro lboa oimzao at mrim oat iosp oat hild Skb babos׃ 
luke 2:17	oirao oiSmieo at hdbr hnamr alihm el hger hch׃ 
luke 2:18	okl hSmeim tmho el hdbrim aSr dbro alihm hreim׃ 
luke 2:19	omrim Smrh at hdbrim halh otHSbm blbh׃ 
luke 2:20	oiSobo hreim mhllim omSbHim at halhim el kl aSr Smeo orao kpi aSr namr alihm׃ 
luke 2:21	oihi bmlat lner Smnh imim oimol oiqra Smo ihoSe kSm aSr qra lo hmlak bTrm hrh bbTn׃ 
luke 2:22	oimlao imi Thrh lpi tort mSh oielho liroSlim lhemido lpni ihoh׃ 
luke 2:23	kaSr ktob btort ihoh kl ckr pTr rHm iqra qdS lihoh׃ 
luke 2:24	oltt qrbn kamor btort ihoh Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh׃ 
luke 2:25	ohnh aiS hih biroSlim oSmo Smeon ohoa aiS zdiq oHsid mHkh lnHmt iSral oroH hqdS hih elio׃ 
luke 2:26	olo nglh broH hqdS ki la irah mot ed raoto at mSiH ihoh׃ 
luke 2:27	oiba broH al hmqdS oihi kaSr hbiao horio at hner ihoSe leSot elio kmSpT htorh׃ 
luke 2:28	oiqHho el creotio oibrk at halhim oiamr׃ 
luke 2:29	eth tpTr at ebdk kdbrk adni bSlom׃ 
luke 2:30	ki rao eini at ihoSetk׃ 
luke 2:31	aSr hkinot lpni kl hemim׃ 
luke 2:32	aor lglot eini hgoim otpart iSral emk׃ 
luke 2:33	oiosp oamo tmhim el hdbrim hnamrim elio׃ 
luke 2:34	oibrk aotm Smeon oiamr al mrim amo hnh ch mosd lnpilh oltqomh lrbim biSral olaot mribh׃ 
luke 2:35	ogm bnpSk tHtr Hrb lmen tglinh mHSbot lbb rbim׃ 
luke 2:36	othi Sm Hnh aSh nbiah bt pnoal mSbT aSr ohia bah bimim oHith em belh Sbe Snim aHri btolih׃ 
luke 2:37	ohia almnh karbe oSmnim Snh ola mSh mn hmqdS obzom obtHnonim ebdh at halhim lilh oiom׃ 
luke 2:38	otqm bSeh hhia otgS lhdot lihoh otdbr elio bacni kl hmHkim lgalh biroSlim׃ 
luke 2:39	oiklo at hkl kpi tort ihoh oiSobo hglilh al nzrt eirm׃ 
luke 2:40	oigdl hner oiHcq broH oimla Hkmh oHsd alhim emo׃ 
luke 2:41	oelo horio iroSlim Snh bSnh lHg hpsH׃ 
luke 2:42	oihi bhioto bn Stim eSrh Snh oielo iroSlim kmSpT hHg׃ 
luke 2:43	oimlao at himim oiSobo oiotr ihoSe hner biroSlim oiosp oamo la ideo׃ 
luke 2:44	oiHSbo ki em Hbl harHim hoa oilko kdrk iom oibqSho bin hqrobim ohmideim׃ 
luke 2:45	ola mzaho oiSbo iroSlim lbqSo׃ 
luke 2:46	oihi aHri SlSt imim oimzaho bmqdS iSb btok hmorim Sme alihm oSal atm׃ 
luke 2:47	okl hSmeim alio hStommo el Sklo oel tSobtio׃ 
luke 2:48	oihi kraotm ato oiHrdo otamr alio amo bni mdoe kkh eSit lno hnh abik oanki bezbt lb bqSnok׃ 
luke 2:49	oiamr alihm lmh ch bqStm ati hla idetm ki eli lhiot baSr labi׃ 
luke 2:50	ohm la hbino at hdbr aSr dbr alihm׃ 
luke 2:51	oird atm oiba al nzrt oikne lhm oamo Smrh blbh at kl hdbrim halh׃ 
luke 2:52	oihoSe hlk ogdl bHkmh omqomh obHn em alhim oem anSim׃ 
luke 3:1	bSnt HmS eSrh lmlkot hqisr Tibrios bhiot ponTios pilTos hgmon bihodh ohordos Sr rbe el hglil oaHio pilpos Sr rbe el mdinot iTor oTrkonh olosnis Sr rbe el abilin׃ 
luke 3:2	bimi hkhnim hgdolim Hnn oqipa hih dbr alhim al ioHnn bn ckrih bmdbr׃ 
luke 3:3	oiba al kl kkr hirdn oiqra Tbilt htSobh lsliHt hHTaim׃ 
luke 3:4	kktob bspr dbri iSeiho hnbia qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro mslotio׃ 
luke 3:5	kl gia inSa okl hr ogbeh iSplo ohih heqb lmiSor ohrksim lbqeh׃ 
luke 3:6	orao kl bSr at ihoSet alhim׃ 
luke 3:7	oiamr al hmon hem hizaim lhTbl el ido atm ildi hzpeonim mi horh atkm lhmlT mpni hqzp hba׃ 
luke 3:8	lkn eSo pri hraoi ltSobh oal tdmo bnpSkm lamr abrhm hoa abino ki ani amr lkm ki mn habnim halh ikl halhim lhqim bnim labrhm׃ 
luke 3:9	okbr hoSm hgrcn el SrS hezim ohnh kl ez aSr ainno eSh pri Tob igde ohSlk baS׃ 
luke 3:10	oiSalho hmon hem lamr mh apoa neSh׃ 
luke 3:11	oien oiamr alihm mi aSr lo ktnot Stim hoa iHlq laSr ain lo omi aSr lo mcon kkh ieSh gm hoa׃ 
luke 3:12	oibao gm moksim lhTbl oiamro alio rbi mh neSh׃ 
luke 3:13	oiamr alihm al tgbo iotr mHqkm׃ 
luke 3:14	oiSalho gm anSi hzba lamr oanHno mh neSh oiamr alihm aiS al tceceo oal tlSino aiS oihi di lkm bSkrkm׃ 
luke 3:15	oihi kaSr Hkh hem oklm HSbim blbm lamr aoli ioHnn hoa hmSiH׃ 
luke 3:16	oien ioHnn oiamr lklm hn ani Tobl atkm bmim abl boa iboa hHcq mmni aSr ainni kdi lhtir at Srok nelio hoa iTbl atkm broH hqdS obaS׃ 
luke 3:17	aSr hmcrh bido lhbr at grno oiasp at dgno al aozro oat hmz iSrpno baS aSr la tkbh׃ 
luke 3:18	okn eod dbrim aHrim hrbh bSr ogm hchir at hem׃ 
luke 3:19	ohordos Sr rbe hmdinh aSr hokH el ido el adot horodih aSt aHio pilpos oel adot kl hre aSr eSh hordos׃ 
luke 3:20	hosip el kl alh gm at cat oisgr at ioHnn bmSmr׃ 
luke 3:21	oihi bhTbl kl hem ogm ihoSe nTbl omtpll oiptHo hSmim׃ 
luke 3:22	oird elio roH hqdS bdmot gop kionh oihi qol mn hSmim oiamr ath bni ididi bk rzth npSi׃ 
luke 3:23	ohoa ihoSe bhHlo hih kbn SlSim Snh oiHSbho lbn iosp bn eli׃ 
luke 3:24	bn mtt bn loi bn mlki bn ini bn iosp׃ 
luke 3:25	bn mttih bn amoz bn nHom bn Hsli bn ngi׃ 
luke 3:26	bn mHt bn mttih bn Smei bn iosp bn iodh׃ 
luke 3:27	bn ioHnn bn riSa bn crbll bn Saltial bn gri׃ 
luke 3:28	bn mlki bn adi bn qosm bn almdm bn er׃ 
luke 3:29	bn iosi bn aliecr bn iorim bn mtt bn loi׃ 
luke 3:30	bn Smeon bn ihodh bn iosp bn ionm bn aliqim׃ 
luke 3:31	bn mlia bn mina bn mtth bn ntn bn dod׃ 
luke 3:32	bn iSi bn eobd bn bec bn Slmon bn nHSon׃ 
luke 3:33	bn emindb bn arm bn Hzron bn prz bn ihodh׃ 
luke 3:34	bn ieqb bn izHq bn abrhm bn trH bn nHor׃ 
luke 3:35	bn Srog bn reo bn plg bn ebr bn SlH׃ 
luke 3:36	bn qinn bn arpkSd bn Sm bn nH bn lmk׃ 
luke 3:37	bn mtoSlH bn Hnok bn ird bn mhllal bn qinn׃ 
luke 3:38	bn anoS bn St bn adm bn alhim׃ 
luke 4:1	oihoSe Sb mn hirdn mla roH hqdS oinhgho hroH hmdbrh׃ 
luke 4:2	oinsho hSTn arbeim iom ola akl maomh bimim hhm oaHri aSr tmo oireb׃ 
luke 4:3	oiamr alio hSTn am bn halhim ath amr al habn hcat othi llHm׃ 
luke 4:4	oien ato ihoSe hn ktob ki la el hlHm lbdo iHih hadm ki el kl moza pi ihoh׃ 
luke 4:5	oielho hSTn el hr gbh oiraho brge aHd at kl mmlkot tbl׃ 
luke 4:6	oiamr alio hSTn lk atn at kl hmmSlh hcat oat kbodn ki nmsrh bidi onttih laSr aHpz׃ 
luke 4:7	oeth am tStHoh lpni hkl ihih lk׃ 
luke 4:8	oien ihoSe oiamr alio sor mmni hSTn ki ktob lihoh alhik tStHoh oato tebd׃ 
luke 4:9	oibiaho iroSlim oiemidho el pnt bit hmqdS oiamr alio am bn halhim ath htnpl mch mTh׃ 
luke 4:10	ki ktob ki mlakio izoh lk lSmrk׃ 
luke 4:11	oki el kpim iSaonk pn tgp babn rglk׃ 
luke 4:12	oien ihoSe oiamr alio namr la tnsh at ihoh alhik׃ 
luke 4:13	okklot hSTn kl msh oirp mmno ed et׃ 
luke 4:14	oiSb ihoSe bgbort hroH al hglil oiza Smeo bkl hkkr׃ 
luke 4:15	ohoa hih mlmd bbti knsiotihm oihllho klm׃ 
luke 4:16	oiba al nzrt aSr gdl Sm oilk kmSpTo biom hSbt al bit hknst oiqm lqra btorh׃ 
luke 4:17	oitn lo spr iSeih hnbia oiptH at hspr oimza at hmqom aSr hih ktob bo׃ 
luke 4:18	roH adni eli ien mSH ati lbSr enoim׃ 
luke 4:19	SlHni lHbS lnSbri lb lqra lSboim dror oleorim pqH qoH lSlH rzozim HpSim lqra Snt rzon lihoh׃ 
luke 4:20	oihi kaSr gll at hspr oiSibho al hHcn oiSb oeini kl aSr bbit hknst nSaot alio׃ 
luke 4:21	oiHl oiamr alihm hiom ntmla hktob hch bacnikm׃ 
luke 4:22	oklm heidho otmho el dbri Hn aSr izao mpiho oiamro hla ch hoa bn iosp׃ 
luke 4:23	oiamr alihm hn tamro li at hmSl hch rpa rpa at ezmk okkl aSr Smeno SneSh bkpr nHom eSh kn gm ph beir moldtk׃ 
luke 4:24	oiamr amn amr ani lkm ki ain nbia rzoi barz moldto׃ 
luke 4:25	oamt ani amr lkm almnot rbot hio biSral bimi aliho bhezr hSmim SlS Snim oSSh HdSim oreb gdol hih bkl harz׃ 
luke 4:26	ola nSlH aliho al aHt mhnh colti zrpth aSr lzidon al aSh almnh׃ 
luke 4:27	omzreim rbim hio biSral bimi aliSe hnbia ola Thr aHd mhm colti nemn harmi׃ 
luke 4:28	oimlao kl aSr bbit hknst Hmh bSmem at alh׃ 
luke 4:29	oiqomo oidiHo aoto al mHoz leir oibiaho ed gb hhr aSr nbnth eirm elio lmen hSliko mTh׃ 
luke 4:30	ak hoa ebr btokm oilk ldrko׃ 
luke 4:31	oird al kpr nHom eir hglil oilmdm bSbtot׃ 
luke 4:32	oiStommo el torto ki ezom dbro׃ 
luke 4:33	oaiS hih bbit hknst obo roH Sd Tma oizeq bqol gdol lamr׃ 
luke 4:34	ath mh lno olk ihoSe hnzri bat lhabidno idetik mi ath qdoS halhim׃ 
luke 4:35	oiger bo ihoSe lamr halm oza mmno oipilho hSd btokm oiza mmno la hre lo׃ 
luke 4:36	otpl aimh el klm oidbro aiS al reho lamr mh hdbr hch ki bSlTn obgborh mzoh lroHot hTmah ohmh izaim׃ 
luke 4:37	oSmeo holk bkl mqmot hkkr׃ 
luke 4:38	oiqm mbit hknst oiba bith Smeon oHmot Smeon aHcth qdHt Hcqh oiSalho bedh׃ 
luke 4:39	oitizb elih oiger bqdHt otrp mmnh otqm mhrh otSrt atm׃ 
luke 4:40	okboa hSmS hbiao alio kl aSr lhm Hlim Hliim Sonim oirpa aotm bSomo at idio el kl aHd mhm׃ 
luke 4:41	ogm Sdim izao mrbim zeqim oamrim ath hoa hmSiH bn halhim oiger bm ola ntnm ldbr ki ideo aSr hoa hmSiH׃ 
luke 4:42	oiza oilk lo kaor hbqr al mqom Hrbh ohmon hem bqSho oibao edio oipzro bo lblti sor mhm׃ 
luke 4:43	oiamr lhm hn eli lbSr gm lerim haHrot at bSort mlkot halhim ki lcat SlHti׃ 
luke 4:44	oihi qora bbti hknsiot aSr bglil׃ 
luke 5:1	oihi kaSr ndHq hmon hem lSme at dbr halhim ohoa emd el id im gnisr׃ 
luke 5:2	oira Sti aniot emdot el id him ohdigim izao mhn oidiHo at hmkmrot׃ 
luke 5:3	oird al aHt mn haniot aSr hia lSmeon oibqS mmno lholiko meT mn hibSh al him oiSb oilmd at hem mtok hanih׃ 
luke 5:4	oikl ldbr oiamr al Smeon holikh al emq him ohorido at mkmrotikm lzod׃ 
luke 5:5	oien Smeon oiamr alio morh kl hlilh igeno ola lkdno maomh ak el pi dbrk aorid at hmkmrt׃ 
luke 5:6	oieSo kn oilkdo dgim hrbh mad otqre mkmrtm׃ 
luke 5:7	oinipo id al Hbrihm aSr bamih hSnit lboa alihm olecrm oibao oimlao at Sti haniot ed ki Sqeo׃ 
luke 5:8	oihi kraot Smeon pTros at cat oipl lbrki ihoSe oiamr adni za na memi ki aiS HoTa anki׃ 
luke 5:9	ki Smh hHciqh aoto oat kl aSr ato el zid hdgim aSr zdo׃ 
luke 5:10	okn gm at ieqb oat ioHnn bni cbdi aSr htHbro em Smeon oiamr ihoSe al Smeon al tira meth zod tzod anSim׃ 
luke 5:11	oioliko at haniot al hibSh oiecbo at hkl oilko aHrio׃ 
luke 5:12	oihi bhioto baHt herim ohnh aiS mla zret oira at ihoSe oipl el pnio oitHnn alio lamr adni am tHpz tokl lThrni׃ 
luke 5:13	oiSlH at ido oige bo oiamr Hpz anki Thr optam srh mmno hzret׃ 
luke 5:14	oied bo lblti spr laiS ki am lk ohrah al hkhn ohqrb qrbn el Thrtk kaSr zoh mSh ledot lhm׃ 
luke 5:15	oSmeo holk hlok ogdl oiqbzo em rb lSmoe olhrpa bido mtHloaihm׃ 
luke 5:16	ohoa sr al hmdbrot oitpll׃ 
luke 5:17	oihi baHd himim ohoa mlmd oiSbo Sm proSim omori htorh aSr bao mkl kpri hglil omihodh oiroSlim ogbort ihoh hith bo lrpoa׃ 
luke 5:18	ohnh anSim noSaim aiS bmTh ohoa nkh abrim oibqSo lhbiao hbith olSom lpnio׃ 
luke 5:19	ola mzao drk lhkniso mrb hem oielo hggh oioridho oat erSo bin hrepim ltok hbit lpni ihoSe׃ 
luke 5:20	oira at amontm oiamr alio bn adm nslHo lk HTatik׃ 
luke 5:21	oiHlo hsoprim ohproSim lHSb mHSbot lamr mi hoa ch hmdbr gdopim mi iokl lslH HTaim mbledi halhim lbdo׃ 
luke 5:22	oide ihoSe at mHSbotm oien oiamr alihm mh atm HSbim blbbkm׃ 
luke 5:23	mh hoa hnql hamr nslHo lk HTatik am amr qom ohthlk׃ 
luke 5:24	ak lmen tdeon ki bn hadm iS lo hSlTn barz lslH HTaim oiamr al nkh habrim amr ani alik qom oSa at erSk olk lk al bitk׃ 
luke 5:25	oimhr oiqm leinihm oiSa at mSkbo oilk lo al bito mhll at halhim oiSa at mSkbo oilk lo al bito mhll at halhim׃ 
luke 5:26	oSmh hHciqh at klm oibrko at halhim oimlao irah oiamro ki nplaot raino hiom׃ 
luke 5:27	oihi aHri kn oiza oira moks oSmo loi ioSb bbit hmks oiamr alio lkh aHri׃ 
luke 5:28	oiecb at hkl oiqm oilk aHrio׃ 
luke 5:29	oieS lo loi mSth gdol bbito oem rb Sl moksim oanSim aHrim hio msbim emhm׃ 
luke 5:30	 oilono hsoprim aSr bhm ohproSim el tlmidio oiamro lmh atm aklim alihm hbriaim ainm zrikim lrpa ki am hHlim׃ 
luke 5:31	׃ 
luke 5:32	la bati lqroa hzdiqim ki am hHTaim ltSobh׃ 
luke 5:33	oiamro alio hn tlmidi ioHnn zmim hrbh oamrim tHnot ogm tlmidi hproSim eSim kn otlmidik aklim oStim׃ 
luke 5:34	oiamr alihm htoklo ans bni hHph lzom ohHtn eod emhm׃ 
luke 5:35	oaolm imim baim olqH matm hHtn ac izomo bimim hhmh׃ 
luke 5:36	oidbr alihm gm am hmSl hch ain aiS melh mTlit Sl bgd HdS el bgd bloi ki ac gm hHdS iqre ogm la tSoh mTlit hHdS lbloi׃ 
luke 5:37	oain aiS ntn iin HdS bnadot blim ki ac hiin hHdS ibqe at hnadot ohoa iSpk ohnadot iabdo׃ 
luke 5:38	ak itn hiin hHdS bnadot HdSim oSnihm iHdo iSmro׃ 
luke 5:39	oaSr Sth iin iSn ainno Hpz eod biin HdS ki iamr hiSn hoa neim mmno׃ 
luke 6:1	oihi bSbt hSnit lspirt hemr ebr bin hqmh oiqTpo tlmidio mlilt oiprko atn bidihm oiaklo׃ 
luke 6:2	oiS mn hproSim aSr amro alihm lmh atm eSim at aSr ainno mtr leSot bSbt׃ 
luke 6:3	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hla qratm at aSr eSh dod bhioto reb hoa oaSr hio ato׃ 
luke 6:4	kaSr ba al bit halhim oiqH at lHm hpnim oiakl ogm ntn laSr ato at aSr la nkon laklo ki am lkhnim lbdm׃ 
luke 6:5	oiamr alihm bn hadm gm adon hSbt hoa׃ 
luke 6:6	oihi bSbt aHrt ba al bit hknst oilmd oSm aiS aSr ibSh ido himnit׃ 
luke 6:7	oiarbo lo hsoprim ohproSim lraot am irpa bSbt lmen imzao elio STnh׃ 
luke 6:8	ohoa ide at mHSbotm oiamr al haiS aSr ido ibSh qom oemod btok oiqm oiemd׃ 
luke 6:9	oiamr alihm ihoSe aSalh atkm dbr hnkon bSbt lhiTib am lhre lhzil npS am labd׃ 
luke 6:10	oibT sbib al klm oiamr laiS pST at idk oieS kn otrpa ido otSb kaHrt׃ 
luke 6:11	ohmh nmlao Hmh oiosdo iHd mh leSot lihoSe׃ 
luke 6:12	oihi bimim hhm oiza hhrh lhtpll oiemd kl hlilh btplh lalhim׃ 
luke 6:13	obhit hbqr asp alio at tlmidio oibHr mhm Snim eSr aSr gm qra lhm SliHim׃ 
luke 6:14	at Smeon aSr gm qrao pTros oat andri aHio at ieqb oat ioHnn at pilpos oat br tlmi׃ 
luke 6:15	at mti oat toma oat ieqb bn Hlpi oat Smeon hmknh hqna׃ 
luke 6:16	at ihodh bn ieqb oat ihodh aiS qriot aSr gm hih lmosr׃ 
luke 6:17	oird atm oiemd bmqom miSor ohmon tlmidio oqhl em rb mkl ihodh oiroSlim omHop im zr ozidon aSr bao lSme ato olhrpa mHliihm׃ 
luke 6:18	ogm hnlHzim broHot Tmaot oirpao׃ 
luke 6:19	okl hhmon mbqSim lget bo ki gborh izah mato orpah at klm׃ 
luke 6:20	ohoa nSa at einio al tlmidio oiamr aSrikm heniim ki lkm mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 6:21	aSrikm hrebim ket ki tSbeo aSrikm hbkim ket ki tSHqo׃ 
luke 6:22	aSrikm am iSnao atkm hanSim oam indo atkm oHrpo ohdiHo at Smkm kSm re bebor bn hadm׃ 
luke 6:23	SmHo biom hhoa orqdo ki hnh Skrkm rb bSmim ki kcat eSo abtihm lnbiaim׃ 
luke 6:24	ak aoi lkm heSirim ki kbr lqHtm at nHmtkm׃ 
luke 6:25	aoi lkm hSbeim ki trebo aoi lkm hSHqim ket ki ttablo otbko׃ 
luke 6:26	aoi lkm am kl hanSim mSbHim atkm ki kcat eSo abotihm lnbiai hSqr׃ 
luke 6:27	abl alikm hSmeim ani amr ahbo at aibikm hiTibo lSnaikm׃ 
luke 6:28	brko at mqllikm ohtpllo bed mklimikm׃ 
luke 6:29	hmkh atk el hlHi hTh lo gm at haHrt ohlqH at meilk al tmne mmno gm at ktntk׃ 
luke 6:30	okl hSal mmk tn lo ohlqH at aSr lk al tSal mato׃ 
luke 6:31	okaSr tHpzo ki ieSo lkm bni hadm kn teSo lhm gm atm׃ 
luke 6:32	oam tahbo at ahbikm mh hoa Hsdkm ki gm hHTaim ahbim at ahbihm׃ 
luke 6:33	oam tiTibo lmTibikm mh hoa Hsdkm gm hHTaim ieSo kn׃ 
luke 6:34	oam tloo at hanSim aSr tqoo lqbl mhm mh hoa Hsdkm gm hHTaim mloim at hHTaim lmen ioSb lhm bSoh׃ 
luke 6:35	abl ahbo at aibikm ohiTibo ohloo mbli toHlt oihi Skrkm rb ohiitm bni elion ki Tob hoa gm lSkHi Tobh olreim׃ 
luke 6:36	lkn hio rHmnim kaSr gm abikm rHom hoa׃ 
luke 6:37	oal tSpTo ola tSpTo al tHibo ola tHibo nqo otnqo׃ 
luke 6:38	tno otntn lkm mdh Tobh dHoqh ogdoSh omSpeh itno al Hiqkm ki bmdh aSr atm moddim bh imd lkm׃ 
luke 6:39	oiSa mSlo oiamr alihm hiokl eor lnhl at heor hla iplo Snihm al hpHt׃ 
luke 6:40	ain tlmid nelh el rbo odi lkl tlmid Slm lhiot krbo׃ 
luke 6:41	olmh ch ath rah at hqsm aSr bein aHik oat hqorh beink la tbiT׃ 
luke 6:42	oaik tamr al aHik aHi hniHh li oasirh at hqsm aSr beink oaink rah at hqorh aSr beink hHnp hsr braSonh at hqorh meink oaHr rah trah lhsir at hqsm aSr bein aHik׃ 
luke 6:43	ki ez Tob ainno eSh pri mSHt ogm ez mSHt ainno eSh pri Tob׃ 
luke 6:44	ki kl ez nkr bprio ki ain aspim tanim mn hqzim ap ain bzrim enb mn hsnh׃ 
luke 6:45	haiS hTob maozr lbbo hTob mpiq at hTob ohaiS hre maozr lbbo hre mpiq at hre ki mSpet hlb imll piho׃ 
luke 6:46	olmh ch atm qraim li adni adni oainkm eSim at aSr ani amr׃ 
luke 6:47	kl hba ali oSome at dbri oeSh atm aorh atkm lmi hoa domh׃ 
luke 6:48	domh hoa laiS bnh bit aSr hemiq lHpr oiisdo el hsle okboa hSTp prz hnhr bbit hhoa ola ikl lhnieo ki el hsle isodo׃ 
luke 6:49	oaSr Sme ola eSh domh laiS aSr bnh bit el hqrqe bli isod oiprz bo hnhr oipl ptam oigdl Sbr hbit hhoa׃ 
luke 7:1	oihi aHri kloto ldbr at kl dbrio bacni hem oiba al kpr nHom׃ 
luke 7:2	oebd laHd mSri hmaot Hlh lmot ohoa iqr lo mad׃ 
luke 7:3	oiSme at Sme ihoSe oiSlH alio mcqni hihodim oiSal mato lboa olhoSie at ebdo׃ 
luke 7:4	oibao al ihoSe oitHnno lo mad oiamro raoi hoa aSr teSh bqSto׃ 
luke 7:5	ki ahb emno hoa ohoa bnh lno at bit hknst׃ 
luke 7:6	oilk atm ihoSe oihi kaSr qrb al hbit oiSlH alio Sr hmah el idi reio lamr lo bi adni al na tTriH at ezmk ki ainni kdi Stboa bzl qorti׃ 
luke 7:7	obebor cat gm at ezmi la HSbti raoi lboa alik ak dbr na dbr oirpa neri׃ 
luke 7:8	ki gm anki aiS nton tHt hSlTon iS tHt idi anSi zba oamrti lch lk ohlk olch boa oba olebdi eSh cat oeSh׃ 
luke 7:9	oiSme ihoSe at dbrio oitmh elio oipn oiamr al hhmon hhlk aHrio amr ani lkm gm biSral la mzati amonh gdolh kcat׃ 
luke 7:10	oiSobo hSloHim al hbit oimzao at hebd hHlh ohoa nrpa׃ 
luke 7:11	oihi mmHrt oilk al eir oSmh neim orbim mtlmidio hlkim ato ohmon em rb׃ 
luke 7:12	hoa qrb al Ser heir ohnh moziaim mt bn iHid lamo ohia almnh oemh rbim mem heir׃ 
luke 7:13	okraot ath hadon nkmro rHmio elih oiamr lh al tbki׃ 
luke 7:14	oigS oige baron ohnSaim emdo oiamr elm amr ani alik qomh׃ 
luke 7:15	oiteodd hmt oiHl ldbr oitnho lamo׃ 
luke 7:16	otaHc klm redh oiSbHo at halhim oiamro ki nbia gdol qm bqrbno oki pqd halhim at emo׃ 
luke 7:17	oiza hdbr hch bkl ihodh obkl hkkr׃ 
luke 7:18	otlmidi ioHnn hgido lo at kl alh׃ 
luke 7:19	oiqra alio ioHnn Snim mtlmidio oiSlHm al ihoSe lamr lo hath hoa hba am nHkh laHr׃ 
luke 7:20	oibao alio hanSim oiamro ioHnn hmTbil SlHno alik lamr hath hoa hba am nHkh laHr׃ 
luke 7:21	bet hhia rpa rbim mHliim omngeim omroHot reot oleorim rbim ntn raot einim׃ 
luke 7:22	oien ihoSe oiamr lhm lko ohgido lioHnn at aSr raitm oaSr Smetm ki eorim raim opsHim mthlkim omzreim mThrim oHrSim Someim omtim qmim oeniim mtbSrim׃ 
luke 7:23	oaSri aSr la ikSl bi׃ 
luke 7:24	oihi kaSr hlko lhm SloHi ioHnn oiHl ldbr al hmon hem el adot ioHnn oiamr mh ch izatm hmdbrh lraot hqnh aSr inoe broH׃ 
luke 7:25	oam la mh ch izatm lraot haiS lboS bgdi ednim hnh hmlbSim bgdi tpart ohmengim bHzrot hmlkim hmh׃ 
luke 7:26	oeth mh ch izatm lraot am lraot aiS nbia hn ani amr lkm ki ap gdol hoa mnbia׃ 
luke 7:27	ch hoa aSr ktob elio hnni SlH mlaki lpnik opnh drkk lpnik׃ 
luke 7:28	ki amr ani lkm ain aiS bilodi aSh gdol mioHnn hmTbil ak hqTn bmlkot halhim gdol hoa mmno׃ 
luke 7:29	okl hem ohmksim kSmem hzdiqo at halhim oiTblo bTbilt ioHnn׃ 
luke 7:30	ak hproSim obeli htorh nazo at ezt halhim el npSm ola nTblo el ido׃ 
luke 7:31	oiamr hadon eth al mi admh at anSi hdor hch oal mi hm dmim׃ 
luke 7:32	dmim hm lildim hiSbim bSoq oqraim ch al ch oamrim Hllno lkm bHlilim ola rqdtm qonno lkm qinh ola bkitm׃ 
luke 7:33	ki ba ioHnn hmTbil lHm la akl oiin la Sth oamrtm Sd bo׃ 
luke 7:34	oba bn hadm ohoa akl oSth oamrtm hnh coll osba ore lmoksim olHTaim׃ 
luke 7:35	otzdq hHkmh el idi kl bnih׃ 
luke 7:36	oibqS mmno aHd mn hproSim lakl ato lHm oiba al bit hproS oisb׃ 
luke 7:37	ohnh aSh aHt beir ohia HTat Smeh ki hoa msb bit hproS otba pk Smn hmor׃ 
luke 7:38	otemd lrglio maHrio otbk otHl lhrTib at rglio bdmeot otngb atn bSerot raSh otSq at rglio otmSH atn bSmn׃ 
luke 7:39	oira hproS hqra ato oiamr blbo alo hih ch nbia ki eth ide ide mi hia cat oai co hia hnget bo ki aSh HTat hia׃ 
luke 7:40	oien ihoSe oiamr alio Smeon dbr li alik oiamr rbi dbr׃ 
luke 7:41	Sni Hibim hio lnSh aHd haHd Hib lo dinrim HmS maot ohSni dinrim HmSim׃ 
luke 7:42	oihi baSr la hSigh idm lSlm oiSmT at Snihm oeth amr na mi mSnihm irbh lahbh ato׃ 
luke 7:43	oien Smeon oiamr aHSb ki haiS hhoa aSr hrbh lhSmiT lo oiamr alio kn SpTt׃ 
luke 7:44	oipn al haSh oiamr al Smeon hrait at haSh hcat hnh bati al bitk omim el rgli la ntt ohia hrTibh at rgli bdmeot otngb bSerotih׃ 
luke 7:45	nSiqh la nSqtni ohia mac bati la Hdlh mnSq at rgli׃ 
luke 7:46	bSmn la mSHt at raSi ohia bSmn hmor mSHh at rgli׃ 
luke 7:47	lkn ani amr alik nslHo lh HTatih hrbot ki hrbh ahbh oaSr nslH lo meT hoa ahb meT׃ 
luke 7:48	oiamr alih nslHo lk HTatik׃ 
luke 7:49	oiHlo hmsbim emo lamr blbm mi hoa ch aSr gm islH HTaim׃ 
luke 7:50	oiamr al haSh amontk hoSieh lk lki lSlom׃ 
luke 8:1	oihi aHri kn oiebr meir al eir omkpr al kpr qora ombSr at mlkot halhim oSnim heSr ato׃ 
luke 8:2	onSim aSr nrpao mroHot reot omHliim mrim hnqrah mgdlit aSr grSo mmnh Sbeh Sdim׃ 
luke 8:3	oioHnh aSt koca sokn hordos oSoSnh oaHrot rbot aSr Srtho mnksihn׃ 
luke 8:4	oihi bhtasp hmon em rb aSr izao alio meir oeir oidbr bmSl׃ 
luke 8:5	hcore iza lcre at creo obcreo npl mn hcre el id hdrk oirms oeop hSmim aklo׃ 
luke 8:6	oiS aSr npl el hsle oizmH oiibS ki la hith lo lHh׃ 
luke 8:7	oiS aSr npl btok hqzim oizmHo hqzim emo oimekho׃ 
luke 8:8	oiS aSr npl el hadmh hTobh oizmH oieS pri mah Serim kcat dbr oiceq mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
luke 8:9	oiSalho tlmidio lamr mh hmSl hch׃ 
luke 8:10	oiamr lkm ntn ldet at sodot mlkot halhim olaHrim bmSlim lmen bratm la irao obSmem la ibino׃ 
luke 8:11	och hoa hmSl hcre dbr alhim hoa׃ 
luke 8:12	oaSr el id hdrk hm hSmeim oaHr kn ba hSTn onSa at hdbr mlbm pn iamino onoSeo׃ 
luke 8:13	oaSr el hsle hm hmqblim bSmHh at hdbr bSmem oSrS ain lhm rq lSeh maminim obet hnsion isgo aHor׃ 
luke 8:14	oaSr npl bin hqzim hm hSmeim oholikm lhm oimko bdagot obeSr obtaot hHiim opri la iSoo lmo׃ 
luke 8:15	oaSr badmh hTobh hm hSmrim blb Tob oThor at hdbr aSr Smeo oeSim pri btoHlt׃ 
luke 8:16	oain aiS mdliq nr aSr iksh aoto bkli ao iSimho tHt hmTh ki am el hmnorh ielho lmen irao kl bai hbit at haor׃ 
luke 8:17	ki ain dbr nelm aSr la iglh oain gnoc aSr la iode oba laor׃ 
luke 8:18	lkn rao aik tSmeon ki kl aSr iS lo nton intn lo okl aSr ain lo gm at aSr hoa HSb lhiot lo iqH mmno׃ 
luke 8:19	oibao alio amo oaHio ola iklo lgSt alio mpni hem׃ 
luke 8:20	oigd lo lamr amk oaHik emdim bHoz ohm Hpzim lraotk׃ 
luke 8:21	oien oiamr alihm ami oaHi hm hSmeim oeSim at dbr halhim׃ 
luke 8:22	oihi hiom oird al anih hoa otlmidio oiamr alihm nebrh al ebr him oiSoTo himh׃ 
luke 8:23	oihi blktm banih oiSkb oiiSn oroH serh irdh el him oiSTpo elihm hmim oihio bsknh׃ 
luke 8:24	oigSo oieiro aoto lamr morh morh abdno oieor oiger broH obmSbri im oiStqo othi dmmh׃ 
luke 8:25	oiamr alihm aih amontkm oiirao oitmho oiamro aiS al reho mi apoa hoa hmzoh gm at hroHot oat hmim oiSmeo lo׃ 
luke 8:26	oiebro oibao al arz hgdriim aSr mmol hglil׃ 
luke 8:27	oiza al hibSh oipgSho aiS mn heir aSr Sdim bo mimim rbim obgd la lbS obbit la iSb ki am bqbrim׃ 
luke 8:28	oira at ihoSe oipl lpnio oiqra bqol gdol mh li olk ihoSe bn al elion mbqS ani mmk aSr la tenni׃ 
luke 8:29	ki zoh at hroH hTma lzat mn haiS ki imim rbim HTp ato onasr bciqim onSmr bkblim ohih bntqo at hmosrot ondHp bid hSd al hmdbrot׃ 
luke 8:30	oiSal ato ihoSe lamr mh Smk oiamr lgion Smi ki Sdim rbim nknso bo׃ 
luke 8:31	oitHnn lo lblti zot atm lrdt al hthom׃ 
luke 8:32	oihi Sm edr Hcirim rbim el hmreh bhr oitHnno lo ki iniH lhm lboa al tokm oinH lhm׃ 
luke 8:33	oizao hSdim mn hadm hhoa oibao bHcirim oiSter hedr mn hmord al him oiTbe׃ 
luke 8:34	oinoso hreim kraotm at aSr neSh oigido hdbr beir obkprim׃ 
luke 8:35	oizao lrat at aSr neSh oibao al ihoSe oimzao Sm at hadm aSr izao mmno hSdim iSb lrgli ihoSe mlbS oTob Skl oiirao׃ 
luke 8:36	oispro lhm hraim aik nrpa aHoc hSdim׃ 
luke 8:37	oibqSo mmno kl hmon Hbl hgdriim llkt matm ki aimh gdolh nplh elihm oird al hanih oiSb׃ 
luke 8:38	oibqS mmno haiS aSr izao mmno hSdim lSbt ato oiSlH ato ihoSe bamro׃ 
luke 8:39	Sob lbitk ospr hgdlot aSr eSh lk halhim oilk lo oiSme bkl heir at hgdlot aSr eSh lo ihoSe׃ 
luke 8:40	oihi bSob ihoSe oiqbl ato hem ki klm hio mHkim lo׃ 
luke 8:41	ohnh ba aiS oSmo iair ohoa raS bit hknst oipl lrgli ihoSe oitHnn lo lboa ato al bito׃ 
luke 8:42	ki bt iHidh kStim eSrh Snh hith lo ohia noTh lmot oihi blkto Smh oidHqho hmon hem׃ 
luke 8:43	oaSh cbt dm Stim eSrh Snh aSr hoziah kl qninh lrpaim oain aiS ikl lrpath׃ 
luke 8:44	hia qrbh maHrio otge bzizt bgdo ocob dmh emd ptam׃ 
luke 8:45	oiamr ihoSe mi ch nge bi oklm kHSo oiamr pTros ohemdim azlo morh hmon hem dHqim olHzim atk oath tamr mi nge bi׃ 
luke 8:46	oiamr ihoSe nge bi adm ki ideti aSr izah mmni gborh׃ 
luke 8:47	otra haSh ki la nstrh mmno otHrd lqrato otpl lpnio otgd bacni kl hem el mh ngeh bo oaik nrpah ptam׃ 
luke 8:48	oiamr alih Hcqi bti amontk hoSieh lk lki lSlom׃ 
luke 8:49	eodno mdbr oaiS ba mbit raS hknst oiamr mth btk al tTriH at hmorh׃ 
luke 8:50	oiSme ihoSe oien oiamr lo al tira ak hamn ohia toSe׃ 
luke 8:51	oiba hbith ola hniH laiS lboa ato blti am lpTros olieqb olioHnn olabi hildh olamh׃ 
luke 8:52	oklm bkim ospdim lh oiamr al tbko ki la mth ak iSnh hia׃ 
luke 8:53	oiSHqo elio baSr ideo ki mth׃ 
luke 8:54	ohoa aHc bidh oiqra lamr hildh qomi׃ 
luke 8:55	otSb roHh otqm ptam oizo ltt lh lakol׃ 
luke 8:56	oiStommo abih oamh ohoa zoh atm lblti hgid laiS at aSr neSh׃ 
luke 9:1	oiqra al Snim heSr oitn lhm gborh oSlTn el kl hSdim olrpa Hliim׃ 
luke 9:2	oiSlHm lqra at mlkot halhim olrpa at hHlim׃ 
luke 9:3	oiamr lhm al tqHo maomh ldrk la mTot ola trmil ola lHm ola ksp oal ihih laiS mkm Sti ktnot׃ 
luke 9:4	ohbit aSr tbao bo Sm Sbo lkm omSm zao׃ 
luke 9:5	okl aSr la iqblo atkm zao mn heir hhia onero at hepr mel rglikm ledot bhm׃ 
luke 9:6	oizao oiebro bkprim mbSrim at hbSorh omrpaim bkl mqom׃ 
luke 9:7	oiSme hordos Sr hrbe at kl aSr neSh el ido otpem roHo ki iS aSr amro ioHnn qm mn hmtim׃ 
luke 9:8	oiS Samro aliho nrah oaHrim amro nbia qm mn hqdmonim׃ 
luke 9:9	oiamr hordos hn anki nSati at raS ioHnn melio omi apoa hoa aSr ani Sme elio kcat oibqS lraoto׃ 
luke 9:10	oiSobo hSliHim oispro lo at kl aSr eSo oiqHm alio oisr lbdd al mqom Hrb aSr leir hnqrah bit zidh׃ 
luke 9:11	ohmon hem kaSr ideo at cat hlko aHrio oiqblm oidbr alihm el mlkot halhim oirpa at hzrikim lrpoah׃ 
luke 9:12	ohiom rph lerb oSnim heSr qrbo oiamro alio SlH na at hem oilko al hkprim ohHzrim aSr sbibotino llon Sm olmza mcon ki ph anHno bmqom Hrbh׃ 
luke 9:13	oiamr alihm tno atm lhm lakl oiamro ain lno ki am HmSt kkrot lHm odgim Snim blti am nlk onqnh akl lkl hem hch׃ 
luke 9:14	ki hio kHmSt alpi aiS oiamr al tlmidio hoSibo atm Sorot Sorot HmSim bSorh׃ 
luke 9:15	oieSo kn oioSibo at klm׃ 
luke 9:16	oiqH at HmSt kkrot hlHm oat Sni hdgim oiSa einio hSmimh oibrk elihm oiprs oitn ltlmidio lSom lpni hem׃ 
luke 9:17	oiaklo klm oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim lhm Snim eSr slim׃ 
luke 9:18	oihi hoa mtpll lbdd oiaspo alio tlmidio oiSal atm lamr mh amrim eli hmon hem mi ani׃ 
luke 9:19	oieno oiamro ioHnn hmTbil oaHrim amrim aliho oaHrim amrim nbia qm mn hqdmonim׃ 
luke 9:20	oiamr alihm oatm mh atm amrim mi ani oien pTros oiamr mSiH halhim ath׃ 
luke 9:21	oizo atm bgerh lblti hgid laiS at hdbr hch׃ 
luke 9:22	oiamr mn hzrk hoa aSr bn hadm ienh hrbh oimas mn hcqnim ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oihrg obiom hSliSi qom iqom׃ 
luke 9:23	oal klm amr aiS ki iHpz llkt aHri ikHS bnpSo oiom iom iSa at zlbo ohlk aHri׃ 
luke 9:24	ki kl aSr iHpz lhoSie at npSo tabd npSo mmno okl aSr iabd at npSo lmeni hoa ioSienh׃ 
luke 9:25	ki mh ioeil hadm ki iqnh at kl heolm oabd ohSHit at npSo׃ 
luke 9:26	ki kl aSr hiiti ani odbri lo lHrph hoa ihih lHrph lbn hadm kaSr iba bkbodo obkbod hab ohmlakim hqdoSim׃ 
luke 9:27	obamt ani amr lkm iS mn hemdim ph aSr la iTemo mot ed ki irao at mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 9:28	oihi kSmnh imim aHri hdbrim halh oiqH alio at pTros oat ioHnn oat ieqb oiel al hhr lhtpll Sm׃ 
luke 9:29	oihi bhtpllo nStnh mrah pnio olboSo hlbin ohbriq׃ 
luke 9:30	ohnh Sni anSim mdbrim ato ohmh mSh oaliho׃ 
luke 9:31	aSr nrao bkbod ohgido at aHrito aSr imlanh biroSlim׃ 
luke 9:32	oihio pTros oaSr ato nrdmim obhqizm rao at kbodo oat Sni hanSim hemdim elio׃ 
luke 9:33	oihi bhprdm mmno oiamr pTros al ihoSe morh Tob hiotno ph neSh na SlS skot lk aHt olmSh aHt olaliho aHt ola ide mh dbr׃ 
luke 9:34	hoa mdbr kcat ohnh enn skk elihm okboam benn nbeto׃ 
luke 9:35	oiza qol mn henn amr ch bni ididi alio tSmeon׃ 
luke 9:36	obhiot hqol nSar ihoSe lbdo ohmh hHSo ola hgido dbr laiS bimim hhm mkl aSr rao׃ 
luke 9:37	oihi mmHrt brdtm mn hhr oiza em rb lqrato׃ 
luke 9:38	ohnh aiS aHd mn hem zeq lamr ana rbi pnh na al bni ki iHid hoa li׃ 
luke 9:39	ohnh roH aHc bo optam hoa mzeq ohroH mrozz ato bhorid riro omqSh lsor mmno obsoro idka ato׃ 
luke 9:40	oabqS mtlmidik lgrSo ola iklo׃ 
luke 9:41	oien ihoSe oiamr hoi dor Hsr amonh optltl ed mti ahih emkm oasbl atkm hba hnh at bnk׃ 
luke 9:42	oihi ak hqrib lboa oirezho hSd oirozzho oihoSe ger broH hTma oirpa at hner oiSibho labio׃ 
luke 9:43	oiStommo klm el gdlt halhim oihi btmhm klm el kl aSr eSh oiamr ihoSe al tlmidio׃ 
luke 9:44	Simo atm bacnikm at hdbrim halh ki etid bn hadm lhmsr bidi bni hadm׃ 
luke 9:45	ohmh la hbino at hmamr hch onelm hoa mdetm oiirao lSal ato el hmamr hch׃ 
luke 9:46	oiel el lbbm lHSob mi hoa hgdol bhm׃ 
luke 9:47	oira ihoSe at mHSbt lbm oiqH ild oiemidho azlo׃ 
luke 9:48	oiamr alihm kl aSr iqbl at hild hch lSmi aoti hoa mqbl okl aSr iqbl aoti hoa mqbl at aSr SlHni ki hqTn bklkm hoa ihih hgdol׃ 
luke 9:49	oien ioHnn oiamr morh raino aiS mgrS Sdim bSmk onkla aoto ien ainno holk emno׃ 
luke 9:50	oiamr ihoSe alio al tklao ki kl aSr ainno ngdno bedno hoa׃ 
luke 9:51	oihi kmlat imi heloto ohoa Sm at pnio llkt iroSlim׃ 
luke 9:52	oiSlH mlakim lpnio oilko oibao al aHd mkpri hSmronim lhkin lo׃ 
luke 9:53	ola qblho el aSr hio pnio hlkim iroSlim׃ 
luke 9:54	oiamro ieqb oioHnn tlmidio kraotm cat lamr adnino htrzh onamr ki trd aS mn hSmim otaklm kaSr eSh gm aliho׃ 
luke 9:55	oipn oiger bm oiamr hla idetm bni roH mi atm׃ 
luke 9:56	ki bn hadm la ba labd npSot adm ki am lhoSiem oilko lhm al kpr aHr׃ 
luke 9:57	oihi blktm bdrk oiamr alio aiS adni alkh aHrik al kl aSr tlk׃ 
luke 9:58	oiamr alio ihoSe lSoelim iS Hori epr oleop hSmim qnim obn hadm ain lo mqom lhniH Sm at raSo׃ 
luke 9:59	oal aiS aHr amr lk aHri ohoa amr adni tn li oalkh braSonh lqbr at abi׃ 
luke 9:60	oiamr alio ihoSe hnH lmtim lqbr at mtihm oath lk hode at mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 9:61	oiamr eod aiS aHr alkh aHrik adni ak hniHh li braSonh lhpTr mbni biti׃ 
luke 9:62	oiamr ihoSe kl hSm at ido el hmHrSh ombiT aHrio la ikSr lmlkot halhim׃ 
luke 10:1	oaHri kn hbdil hadon eod Sbeim aHrim oiSlHm lpnio Snim Snim al kl eir omqom aSr bqS lboa Smh׃ 
luke 10:2	oiamr lhm hn hqzir rb ohpelim meTim lkn htHnno al adon hqzir oiSlH pelim lqziro׃ 
luke 10:3	lko na hnni SlH atkm kkbSim bin hcabim׃ 
luke 10:4	al tSao kis ola trmil ola nelim oal tSalo lSlom aiS bdrk׃ 
luke 10:5	olkl bit aSr tbao Sm amro braSonh Slom lbit hch׃ 
luke 10:6	ohih ki ihih Sm bn Slom onH elio Slomkm oam la alikm iSob׃ 
luke 10:7	obbit hhoa tSbo otaklo otSto mSlhm ki Soh hpoel bSkro al tseo mbit lbit׃ 
luke 10:8	okl eir aSr tbao bh oqblo atkm aklo Sm at aSr iSimo lpnikm׃ 
luke 10:9	orpao at hHolim aSr bqrbh oamro lhm qrbh alikm mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 10:10	okl eir aSr tbao bh ola iqblo atkm zao lkm al rHobotih oamro׃ 
luke 10:11	ap at epr eirkm hndbq brglino nnerho lkm ak ide tdeo ki qrbh alikm mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 10:12	ani amr alkim ki lsdom iql biom hhoa mn heir hhia׃ 
luke 10:13	aoi lk korcin aoi lk bit zidh ki hgborot aSr neSo bqrbkn alo neSo bzor obzidon hla kbr iSbo bSq oapr oSbo׃ 
luke 10:14	akn lzor ozidon iql bdin mkm׃ 
luke 10:15	oat kpr nHom aSr ed hSmim htrommt al Saol tordi׃ 
luke 10:16	hSome alikm ali hoa Some ohboch atkm aoti hoa boch ohboch aoti hoa boch at aSr SlHni׃ 
luke 10:17	oiSobo hSbeim bSmHh oiamro adnino gm hSdim nkneim lno bSmk׃ 
luke 10:18	oiamr alihm raiti at hSTn npl kbrq mn hSmim׃ 
luke 10:19	hnh hSlTti atkm ldrk el nHSim oeqrbim oel kl gbort haib okl dbr la iciq lkm׃ 
luke 10:20	ak bcat al tSmHo ki nkneim lkm hroHot ki am SmHo el aSr nktbo Smotikm bSmim׃ 
luke 10:21	bSeh hhia elz ihoSe broH oiamr aodk hab adon hSmim oharz ki hstrt at alh mn hHkmim ohnbonim oglitm lellim hn abi ki kn hih rzon mlpnik׃ 
luke 10:22	hkl nmsr li mat abi oain iode mi hoa hbn blti hab omi hoa hab blti hbn oaSr iHpz hbn lgloto lo׃ 
luke 10:23	oipn al tlmidio lbdm oiamr aSri heinim hraot at aSr atm raim׃ 
luke 10:24	ki ani amr lkm nbiaim omlkim rbim Hpzo lraot at aSr atm raim ola rao olSme at aSr atm Smeim ola Smeo׃ 
luke 10:25	ohnh aHd mbeli htorh qm lnsoto oiamr morh mh aeSh oairS Hii eolm׃ 
luke 10:26	oiamr alio mh ktob btorh oaik ath qora׃ 
luke 10:27	oien oiamr oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl madk obkl mdek oat rek kmok׃ 
luke 10:28	oiamr alio kn hSibot eSh cat oHih׃ 
luke 10:29	ohoa Hpz lhzTdq oiamr al ihoSe omi hoa rei׃ 
luke 10:30	oien ihoSe oiamr aiS aHd ird miroSlim liriHo onpl bidi Sddim ohm hpSiTho ogm pzeho oiecbo aoto bin Hiim lmot oilko lhm׃ 
luke 10:31	oiqr hmqrh ki ird khn aHd bdrk hhoa oira ato oiebr melio׃ 
luke 10:32	okn gm aiS loi pge bmqom oigS oira ato oiebr melio׃ 
luke 10:33	oaiS Smroni hlk bdrk oiba elio oira ato oihmo rHmio׃ 
luke 10:34	oigS alio oiHbS at pzeio oisokm bSmn oiin oielho el bhmto oiolikho al hmlon oiklklho׃ 
luke 10:35	olmHrt bnseo hozia Sni dinrim oitnm lbel hmlon oiamr klkl aoto oat aSr tosip eod lhozia elio ani bSobi aSlmno lk׃ 
luke 10:36	oeth mi malh hSlSh hih beinik hre lnpl bidi hSddim׃ 
luke 10:37	oiamr heSh emo at hHsd oiamr alio ihoSe lk oeSh kn gm ath׃ 
luke 10:38	oihi bnsem oiba al kpr aHd oaSh aHt oSmh mrta asph aoto al bith׃ 
luke 10:39	olh hith aHot oSmh mrim aSr iSbh lrgli ihoSe lSme al dbro׃ 
luke 10:40	omrta igeh brb Sroth otgS otamr hla tSim el lbk adni aSr aHoti ecbtni lSrt lbdi amr na alih otecr li׃ 
luke 10:41	oien ihoSe oiamr lh mrta mrta at dagt ombhlt el hrbh׃ 
luke 10:42	abl aHt hia mn hzrk omrim bHrh lh hHlq hTob aSr la iqH mmnh׃ 
luke 11:1	oihi hoa mtpll bmqom aHd oiamr alio aHd mtlmidio aHri kloto adni lmdno lhtpll kaSr lmd gm ioHnn at tlmidio׃ 
luke 11:2	oiamr alihm ki ttpllo amro abino SbSmim itqdS Smk tboa mlkotk ieSh rzonk kmo bSmim kn barz׃ 
luke 11:3	at lHm Hqno tn lno iom iom׃ 
luke 11:4	oslH lno at Hobtno ki slHim gm anHno lkl hHib lno oal tbiano lidi nsion ki am hzilno mn hre׃ 
luke 11:5	oiamr alihm mi bkm aSr ihih lo ahb ohlk oba alio bHzot hlilh oamr alio ididi hloni SlSt kkrot lHm׃ 
luke 11:6	ki ahbi ba ali mn hdrk oain li dbr lSom lpnio׃ 
luke 11:7	ohoa mlpnim ienh oiamr al togieni ki kbr nsgrh hdlt oildi Sokbim emdi bmTh la aokl lqom oltt lk׃ 
luke 11:8	ani amr lkm gm ki la iqom ltt lo el hioto ahbo iqom bebor ecot pnio oitn lo kkl zrko׃ 
luke 11:9	ogm ani amr lkm Salo ointn lkm drSo otmzao dpqo oiptH lkm׃ 
luke 11:10	ki kl hSal iqbl ohdrS imza oldpq iptH׃ 
luke 11:11	omi bkm hab aSr iSal mmno bno lHm ontn lo abn oam dg hitn lo nHS tHt hdg׃ 
luke 11:12	ao ki iSalno bizh hitn lo eqrb׃ 
luke 11:13	hn atm hreim ideim ltt mtnot Tbot lbnikm ap ki hab mn hSmim itn at roH hqdS lSalim mato׃ 
luke 11:14	oihi hiom oigrS Sd ohoa alm oihi aHri zat hSd oidbr halm oitmho hem׃ 
luke 11:15	oiS aSr amro bbel cbob Sr hSdim hoa mgrS at hSdim׃ 
luke 11:16	oiS aSr nsoho oiSalo mmno aot mn hSmim׃ 
luke 11:17	ohoa ide at mHSbotm oiamr alihm kl mmlkh hnHlqh el ezmh tHrb obit ipl el bit׃ 
luke 11:18	ogm hSTn am nHlq el ezmo aikkh tkon mmlkto ki amrtm Sbbel cbob mgrS ani at hSdim׃ 
luke 11:19	oam ani mgrS at hSdim bbel cbob bnikm bmi hm mgrSim atm el kn hmh ihio SpTikm׃ 
luke 11:20	oam bazbe alhim mgrS ani at hSdim hnh hgieh alikm mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 11:21	bhiot hgbor Smr at Hzro ohoa mcin ohih rkoSo Slom׃ 
luke 11:22	oam iboa elio Hcq mmno otqpo iSa mmno at nSqo aSr bTH bo oat mlqHo iHlq׃ 
luke 11:23	kl aSr ainno ati hoa lngdi oaSr ainno masp ati hoa mpcr׃ 
luke 11:24	hroH hTmah aHri zath mn hadm tSoTT bmqmot zih lbqS lh mnoHh ola tmza ac tamr aSobh na al biti aSr izati mSm׃ 
luke 11:25	obboah tmza ato mTaTa omhdr׃ 
luke 11:26	oaHr tlk olqHh Sbe roHot aHrot reot mmnh obao oSkno Sm ohith aHrit hadm hhoa reh mraSito׃ 
luke 11:27	oihi kdbro at hdbrim halh oaSh aHt mn hem nSah at qolh otamr alio aSri hbTn aSr nSatk ohSdim aSr inqt׃ 
luke 11:28	ohoa amr oap ki aSri hSmeim ohSmrim at dbr halhim׃ 
luke 11:29	oiqbzo em rb oiHl ldbr hdor hch dor re hoa aot hoa mbqS oaot la intn lo blti am aot ionh hnbia׃ 
luke 11:30	ki kaSr hih ionh lanSi ninoh laot kn ihih gm bn hadm ldor hch׃ 
luke 11:31	mlkt timn tqom bmSpT em anSi hdor hch ohrSieh aotm ki bah mqzot harz lSme at Hkmt Slmh ohnh iS ph gdol mSlmh׃ 
luke 11:32	anSi ninoh iqomo bmSpT em hdor hch ohrSieho ki hm Sbo bqriat ionh ohnh iS ph gdol mionh׃ 
luke 11:33	ain mdliq nr aSr iSimho bstr ao tHt haiph ki am el hmnorh lmen irao bai hbit at aoro׃ 
luke 11:34	nr hgop hoa hein lkn bhiot eink tmimh gm kl gopk iaor obhioth reh oHSk gm gopk׃ 
luke 11:35	el kn hSmr lk pn iHSk haor aSr bqrbk׃ 
luke 11:36	ohnh am gopk klo aor oain bo kl dbr HSk ac iaor klo ohih khair lk hnr bbrq ngho׃ 
luke 11:37	oihi bdbro oibqS mmno proS aHd lakl ato lHm oiba hbith oisb׃ 
luke 11:38	oitmh hproS brato aSr la nTl idio braSonh lpni hseodh׃ 
luke 11:39	oiamr alio hadon ket atm hproSim mThrim at hkom ohqerh mHoz ohpnimi aSr bkm hoa mla gcl orSe׃ 
luke 11:40	hksilim hla eSh hHizon gm eSh at hpnimi׃ 
luke 11:41	abl tno lzdqh at aSr bm ohnh hkl Thor lkm׃ 
luke 11:42	ak aoi lkm hproSim ki teSro at hmnta oat hpigm oat kl hirq otebro at hmSpT oat ahbt alhim ohih lkm leSot at alh ola lhniH gm at alh׃ 
luke 11:43	aoi lkm hproSim ki tahbo at moSb hraS bbti hknsiot oat Salot Slomkm bSoqim׃ 
luke 11:44	aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki atm kqbrim hnstrim obni hadm mthlkim elihm ola ideo׃ 
luke 11:45	oien aHd mbeli htorh oiamr alio rbi bdbrik alh tHrp gm atno׃ 
luke 11:46	oiamr aoi gm lkm beli htorh ki emsim atm el bni hadm mSaot kbdim msbl oatm bezmkm ainkm ngeim bmSaot gm baHt mazbeotikm׃ 
luke 11:47	aoi lkm ki bonim atm at qbrot hnbiaim oabotikm hrgo aotm׃ 
luke 11:48	okn atm meidim orozim bmeSi abotikm ki hmh hrgo aotm oatm bonim at qbrihm׃ 
luke 11:49	bebor cat gm amrh Hkmt halhim aSlH alihm nbiaim oSliHim omhm ihrgo oirdpo׃ 
luke 11:50	lmen idrS mn hdor hch dm kl hnbiaim aSr nSpk lmn hosd harz׃ 
luke 11:51	mdm hbl ed dm ckriho aSr nhrg bin hmcbH olbit hn amr ani lkm droS idrS mn hdor hch׃ 
luke 11:52	aoi lkm beli htorh ki hsirtm at mptH hdet atm la batm oat hbaim mnetm׃ 
luke 11:53	oihi kdbro lhm at alh oiHlo hsoprim ohproSim lSTm aoto mad olhqSot lo bdbrim rbim׃ 
luke 11:54	oiarbo lo oibqSo lzodd dbr mpiho lmen imzao elio STnh׃ 
luke 12:1	oihi ed kh oed kh bhtasp rbbot em ed ki lHzo aiS at reho oiHl ldbr al tlmidio braSonh hSmro lnpStikm mSaor hproSim Shoa hHnph׃ 
luke 12:2	oain dbr mksh aSr la iglh oain nelm aSr la iode׃ 
luke 12:3	lkn kl aSr dbrtm bHSk baor iSme oat aSr lHStm lacn bHdrim qra iqra el hggot׃ 
luke 12:4	oani amr lkm ididi al tirao mn hmmitim at hgop oaHri cat ain lal idm leSot eod dbr׃ 
luke 12:5	abl aorh atkm at aSr tirao irao at aSr iS lo SlTn aHri hmito lhSlik al gihnm hn ani amr lkm aoto tiraon׃ 
luke 12:6	hla HmS zprim tmkrnh bSni asrim oain aHt mhn nSkHt lpni halhim׃ 
luke 12:7	oatm gm Serot raSkm nmnot kln lkn al tirao iqrtm mzprim rbot׃ 
luke 12:8	oani amr lkm kl aSr iodh bi lpni hadm gm bn hadm iodh bo lpni mlaki alhim׃ 
luke 12:9	oaSr ikHS bi lpni hadm hoa ikHS lpni mlaki alhim׃ 
luke 12:10	okl aSr idbr dbr Hrph el bn hadm islH lo ohmgdp at roH hqdS la islH lo׃ 
luke 12:11	okaSr ibiao atkm al bti hknsiot olpni hrSiot ohSlTonim al tdago aik ao bmh tzTdqo omh tdbro׃ 
luke 12:12	ki roH hqdS hoa iorh atkm bSeh hhia at hnkon ldbr׃ 
luke 12:13	oiamr alio aHd mn hem rbi amr na al aHi oiHlq ati at hirSh׃ 
luke 12:14	oiamr alio bn adm mi Smni elikm lSpT olmHlq׃ 
luke 12:15	oiamr alihm rao ohSmro lkm mbze bze ki Hii hadm ainm tloim bhrbot nksio׃ 
luke 12:16	oiSa mSlo oiamr alihm lamr Sdh aiS eSir aHd eSh tboah hrbh׃ 
luke 12:17	oiHSb blbo lamr mh aeSh ki ain li mqom lknos bo at tboati׃ 
luke 12:18	oiamr at cat aeSh hrs at asmi obnh gdolim mhm oaknsh Smh at kl iboli oTobi׃ 
luke 12:19	oamr lnpSi npSi iS lk etodot hrbh lSnim rbot hnpSi akli Sti oSiSi׃ 
luke 12:20	ohalhim amr lo ath hksil bezm hlilh hch idrSo mmk at npSk oaSr hkinot lk lmi ihih׃ 
luke 12:21	ch Hlq hazr lo azrot ola ieSir balhim׃ 
luke 12:22	oiamr al tlmidio lkn ani amr lkm al tdago lnpSkm mh taklo olgopkm mh tlbSo׃ 
luke 12:23	hnpS iqrh hia mn hmcon ohgop iqr mn hmlboS׃ 
luke 12:24	htbonno al herbim aSr ainm creim oainm qzrim ogm ain lhm mgorh oaozr ohalhim mklkl aotm omh melim atm mn heop׃ 
luke 12:25	omi ch mkm aSr bdagto iokl lhosip amh aHt el qomto׃ 
luke 12:26	oeth hn meT mcer ain bikltkm oliotr mh tdago׃ 
luke 12:27	htbonno al hSoSnim hzmHot oainn Tot oainn argot oani amr lkm ki gm Slmh bkl hdro la hih lboS kaHt mhnh׃ 
luke 12:28	oam kkh ilbiS alhim at Hzir hSdh aSr hiom iSno omHr iSlk ltok htnor ap ki atkm qTni hamonh׃ 
luke 12:29	gm atm al tdrSo mh taklo omh tSto oal thlko bgdlot׃ 
luke 12:30	ki at kl alh mbqSim goii harz oabikm hoa iode ki zrikim atm lalh׃ 
luke 12:31	ak bqSo at mlkot halhim onosp lkm kl alh׃ 
luke 12:32	al tira hedr hqTn ki rzh abikm ltt lkm at hmlkot׃ 
luke 12:33	mkro at rkoSkm otno zdqh eSo lkm kisim aSr la iblo oaozr bSmim aSr la igre leolm aSr gnb la iqrb alio oss la iaklho׃ 
luke 12:34	ki bmqom aSr aozrkm bo Sm ihih gm lbbkm׃ 
luke 12:35	mtnikm ihio Hgorim ohnrot dlqim׃ 
luke 12:36	oatm hio dmim lanSim hmHkim ladnihm mti iSob mn hHtnh okaSr iboa odpq iptHo lo krge׃ 
luke 12:37	aSri hebdim hhm aSr bboa hadon imzam Sqdim amn amr ani lkm ki itacr oioSibm oilk lSrt aotm׃ 
luke 12:38	oam iboa baSmrh hSnit ao baSmrh hSliSit okn imza aSri hebdim hhm׃ 
luke 12:39	ocat deo aSr am ide ide bel hbit bai co Seh iboa hgnb ki eth Sqd Sqod ola itn lHtr at bito׃ 
luke 12:40	lkn gm atm hio nkonim ki bSeh aSr la plltm iboa bn hadm׃ 
luke 12:41	oiamr pTros adnino hlno ath amr at hmSl hch am gm lkl adm׃ 
luke 12:42	oiamr hadon mi hoa apoa hskn hnamn ohnbon aSr ipqidho hadon el ebdto ltt at arHtm beto׃ 
luke 12:43	aSri hebd hhoa aSr bba adnio imzaho eSh kn׃ 
luke 12:44	amt amr ani lkm ki el kl aSr iS lo ipqidho׃ 
luke 12:45	ohebd hhoa am iamr blbo bSS adni lboa ohHl lhkot at hebdim oat hSpHot olakl olStot olSkr׃ 
luke 12:46	boa iboa adni hebd hhoa biom la izph obSeh la ide oiSsp aoto oiSim at Hlqo em hsorrim׃ 
luke 12:47	 ohebd hhoa aSr ide at rzon adnio ola hkin ola eSh krzono ikh mkot rbot, oaSr la ide oeSh dbrim aSr elihm bn hkot hoa la ikh ki am meT ki kl aiS aSr ntn lo hrbh droS idrS mmno hrbh oaSr hpqido bido hrbh iSalo mato iotr׃ 
luke 12:48	׃ 
luke 12:49	lhpil aS el harz bati omh Hpz ani ki kbr berh׃ 
luke 12:50	oeli Tbilh lhTbl omh izr li ed ki tSlm׃ 
luke 12:51	hHSbim atm ki bati ltt Slom barz ani amr lkm la ki am mHlqt׃ 
luke 12:52	ki meth HmSh bbit aHd iHlqo SlSh el Snim oSnim el SlSh׃ 
luke 12:53	hab iHlq el hbn ohbn el hab ham el hbt ohbt el ham hHmot el hklh ohklh el hHmot׃

luke 12:55	oam nSbh roH hngb tamro hnh Hm ba ogm iboa׃ 
luke 12:56	hHnpim at pni harz ohSmim idetm lbHn oat het hcat aik la tbHno׃ 
luke 12:57	lmh ap mnpSkm la tSpTo at hiSr׃

luke 12:59	oani amr lk la tza mSm ed am Slmt gm at hproTh haHronh׃ 
luke 13:1	oibao anSim bet hhia oigido lo el dbr hglilim aSr pilTos erb dmm em cbHihm׃ 
luke 13:2	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hHSbim atm ki hglilim halh hio HTaim mkl anSi hglil el aSr bah kcat elihm׃ 
luke 13:3	la ki amr ani lkm am la tSobo tabdo klkm gm atm׃ 
luke 13:4	ao Smnh heSr hhm aSr npl elihm hmgdl bSlH oimitm hHSbim atm ki hio aSmim mkl hanSim hiSbim biroSlim׃ 
luke 13:5	la ki amr ani lkm am la tSobo tabdo klkm gm atm׃ 
luke 13:6	oiSa mSlo oiamr aiS aHd hith lo tanh nToeh bkrmo oiba lbqS bh pri ola mza׃ 
luke 13:7	oiamr al hkrm hnh ch SlS Snim anki ba lbqS pri btanh hcat oainni moza gde aoth lmh ch tSHit at hadmh׃ 
luke 13:8	oien oiamr alio adni hniHh ath eod hSnh hcat ed ki aedr oSmti dmn sbibotih׃ 
luke 13:9	aoli teSh pri oam la bSnh hbah tgdenh׃ 
luke 13:10	oihi hoa mlmd bSbt baHd mbti hknsiot׃
