luke 13:12	oihi braot ath ihoSe oiqra alih oiamr lh aSh hHlzi mHlik׃ 
luke 13:13	oiSm at idio elih okrge qmh otteodd otSbH at halhim׃ 
luke 13:14	oikes raS hknst el aSr rpa ihoSe bSbt oien oiamr al hem SSt imim hm aSr teSh bhm mlakh lkn balh bao ohrpao ola biom hSbt׃ 
luke 13:15	oien hadon oiamr alio hHnp aiS aiS mkm hla itir bSbt at Soro ao at Hmro mn habos oiolikho lhSqto׃ 
luke 13:16	ocat aSr hia bt abrhm oaSr hSTn asrh ch Smnh eSrh Snh hla ttr mmosrotih biom hSbt׃ 
luke 13:17	oihi kamro at hdbrim halh nklmo kl mtqommio oiSmH kl hem el kl hnplaot hneSot el ido׃ 
luke 13:18	oiamr lmh domh mlkot halhim oal mh amSilnh׃ 
luke 13:19	domh hia lgrgr Sl Hrdl aSr lqHo aiS oiSimho bgno oizmH oihi lez gdol oeop hSmim iqnn benpio׃ 
luke 13:20	oiamr eod al mh admh at mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 13:21	domh hia lSar aSr lqHto aSh otTmnho bSlS saim qmH ed ki iHmz klo׃ 
luke 13:22	oiebr berim obkprim ebor olmd oiSm at drko lboa iroSlim׃ 
luke 13:23	oiSalho aiS lamr adnino hmeT hm hnoSeim׃ 
luke 13:24	oiamr alihm htamzo lboa bptH hzr ki amr ani lkm rbim ibqSo lboa ola ioklo׃ 
luke 13:25	ohih miom aSr iqom bel hbit osgr at hdlt otHlo lemd bHoz oldpq el hdlt lamr adnino adnino ptH lno oenh oamr alikm ainni iode atkm main atm׃ 
luke 13:26	ac tHlo lamr aklno oStino lpnik obrHbotino lmdt׃ 
luke 13:27	oiamr ani amr lkm ainni iode atkm main atm soro mmni kl peli haon׃ 
luke 13:28	oSm thih hillh oHrq hSnim kaSr trao at abrhm oizHq oieqb oat kl hnbiaim bmlkot halhim oatm mgrSim hHozh׃ 
luke 13:29	oibao mmcrH ommerb omzpon omdrom oisbo bmlkot halhim׃ 
luke 13:30	ohnh iS aHronim aSr ihio raSonim oraSonim aSr ihio aHronim׃ 
luke 13:31	biom hhoa ngSo mn hproSim oiamro alio za olk mch ki hordos mbqS lhrgk׃ 
luke 13:32	oiamr alihm lko oamro al hSoel hch hnni mgrS Sdim opel rpoaot hiom omHr obSliSi aba ed qzi׃ 
luke 13:33	abl hlok alk hiom omHr ommHrto ki la itkn aSr iabd nbia mHoz liroSlim׃ 
luke 13:34	iroSlim iroSlim hhrgt at hnbiaim ohsqlt at hnSlHim alih kmh pemim Hpzti lqbz at bnik kaSr tqbz htrnglt at aproHih tHt knpih oatm la abitm׃ 
luke 13:35	hnh bitkm iecb lkm Smm oani amr lkm ki rah la traoni ed boa het aSr tamro brok hba bSm ihoh׃ 
luke 14:1	oihi bbao bSbt al bit aHd mraSi hproSim lakl lHm ohmh arbim lo׃ 
luke 14:2	ohnh aiS aHd lpnio aSr gopo zbh mmim׃ 
luke 14:3	oien ihoSe oiamr al beli htorh oal hproSim lamr hmtr lrpa bSbt am la oiHriSo׃ 
luke 14:4	oiaHc bo oirpaho oiSlHho׃ 
luke 14:5	oien oiamr alihm mi mkm aSr Hmro ao Soro ipol al hbar ola imhr lheloto biom hSbt׃ 
luke 14:6	ola iklo lhSib el cat dbr׃ 
luke 14:7	oiSa mSlo al hqroaim braoto aik bHro lhm lhsb braS oiamr alihm׃ 
luke 14:8	ki iqra atk aiS al hHtnh al tsb braS pn iqra Smh aiS nkbd mmk׃ 
luke 14:9	oba hqra aotk oaoto oamr alik pnh mqom lch oac tqom bklmh lqHt at hmqom haHron׃ 
luke 14:10	abl ki tqra lk ohsb bmqom haHron lmen iba hqra atk oamr alik ahobi elh lmelh mch ohih lk kbod lpni hmsbim emk׃ 
luke 14:11	ki kl hmromm at ezmo iSpl ohmSpil at ezmo iromm׃ 
luke 14:12	ogm al haiS aSr qra aoto amr ki teSh seodt zhrim ao seodt erb al tqra lahbik olaHik olqrobik olSknik heSirim pn iqrao lk gm hmh ohih lk lSlom׃ 
luke 14:13	abl ki teSh mSth qra leniim olnSbrim olpsHim oleorim׃ 
luke 14:14	oaSrik baSr ain lhm lSlm lk ki iSlm lk btHit hzdiqim׃ 
luke 14:15	oiSme cat aHd mn hmsbim oiamr alio aSri hakl lHm bmlkot halhim׃ 
luke 14:16	ohoa amr alio aiS aHd eSh seodh gdolh oiqra lrbim׃ 
luke 14:17	oiSlH at ebdo let hseodh lamr al hqroaim bao ki kbr mokn hkl׃ 
luke 14:18	oiHlo klm ph aHd lhtnzl oiamr alio hraSon Sdh qniti oeli lzat lrato abqS mmk nqni׃ 
luke 14:19	oaHr amr HmSt zmdi bqr qniti oani hlk lbHn aotm abqS mmk nqni׃ 
luke 14:20	oaHr amr aSh lqHti obebor cat la aokl lboa׃ 
luke 14:21	oiba hebd oigd at hdbrim halh ladnio oiqzp bel hbit oiamr lebdo mhr za al rHbot heir oal hozotih ohba hnh at heniim oat hnSbrim oat heorim oat hpsHim׃ 
luke 14:22	oiamr hebd adni kaSr zoit kn neSh oiS eod mqom׃ 
luke 14:23	oiamr hadon al hebd za al hdrkim oal hgdrot opzr bhm lboa lmen imla biti׃ 
luke 14:24	ki ani amr lkm ain aHd mn hanSim hqroaim hhm aSr iTem seodti׃ 
luke 14:25	ohmon em rb hlkim ato oipn oiamr alihm׃ 
luke 14:26	aiS ki iboa ali ola iSna at abio oat amo oat aSto oat bnio oat aHio oat aHitio oap gm at npSo la iokl lhiot tlmidi׃ 
luke 14:27	oaSr la iSa at zlbo oba aHri la iokl lhiot tlmidi׃ 
luke 14:28	ki mi mkm hHpz lbnot mgdl hla iSb braSonh oiHSb at hhozaot am hSg tSig ido lhSlimo׃ 
luke 14:29	pn iSim at hisod ola iokl lkloto ohih kl hraim iqomo lhleig lo lamr׃ 
luke 14:30	ki ch haiS hHl lbnot ola ikl lklot׃ 
luke 14:31	ac mi hoa hmlk hqm lhtgrot mlHmh bmlk aHr ola iSb braSonh oitiez am iokl beSrt alpim lerk lqrat hba elio beSrim alp׃ 
luke 14:32	oam la oSlH alio mlakim beodno rHoq lbqS Slom׃ 
luke 14:33	kkh kl aiS mkm aSr la npTr mkl rkoSo la iokl lhiot tlmidi׃ 
luke 14:34	Tob hmlH oam hmlH hih tpl bmh itqn׃ 
luke 14:35	la izlH gm ladmh gm ldmn hHozh iSlikho mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme׃ 
luke 15:1	oihi bqrb alio kl hmoksim ohHTaim lSme aoto׃ 
luke 15:2	oilono hproSim ohsoprim lamr hnh ch mqbl at hHTaim oakl atm׃ 
luke 15:3	oidbr alihm at hmSl hch lamr׃ 
luke 15:4	mi ch haiS mkm aSr lo mah kbSim oabd lo aHd mhm ola iToS at htSeim otSeh bmdbr ohlk aHri habd ed ki imzaho׃ 
luke 15:5	ohih kmzao ato iSimno el ktpio bSmHh׃ 
luke 15:6	oba al bito oqra lahbio olSknio iHd lamr SmHo ati ki mzati at Sii habd׃ 
luke 15:7	ani amr lkm ki kn thih SmHh bSmim el HoTa aHd hSb iotr mel tSeim otSeh zdiqim aSr la izTrko ltSobh׃ 
luke 15:8	ao mi haSh aSr lh eSrh drkmonim oabd lh drkmon aHd ola tdliq nr otTaTa at hbit otHpS hiTb ed ki tmzaho׃ 
luke 15:9	ohih kmzah aoto tqra lreotih olSknotih lamr SmHnh ati ki mzati at hdrkmon aSr abd li׃ 
luke 15:10	kn ani amr lkm thih SmHh lnpi mlaki alhim el HoTa aHd aSr Sb mHTao׃ 
luke 15:11	oiamr aiS aHd hio lo Sni bnim׃ 
luke 15:12	oiamr hzeir al abio abi tnh li at Hlq hrkoS aSr ipl li oiHlq lhm at hnHlh׃ 
luke 15:13	oihi mqz imim oiasp hbn hzeir at hkl oilk al arz rHoqh oSm pcr at rkSo oilk bdrk sobaim ocollim׃ 
luke 15:14	oaHri kloto at hkl hih reb Hcq barz hhia oiHl lhiot Hsr lHm׃ 
luke 15:15	oilk oidbq baHd mbni hmdinh barz hhia oiSlH aoto al Sdotio lreot Hcirim׃ 
luke 15:16	oitao lmla at bTno bHrobim aSr iaklo hHcirim oain ntn lo׃ 
luke 15:17	oiSb al lbo oiamr mh rbo Skiri abi oiS lhm lHm lSbe oani abd breb׃ 
luke 15:18	aqomh na oalkh al abi oamr alio abi HTati lSmim olpnik׃ 
luke 15:19	onqlti mhqra eod bnk Simni kaSr Skirik׃ 
luke 15:20	oiqm oiba al abio eodno mrHoq oabio raho oihmo meio oirz oipl el zoario oiSqho׃ 
luke 15:21	oiamr alio hbn abi HTati lSmim olpnik oani nqlti mhqra eod bnk׃ 
luke 15:22	oiamr hab al ebdio hoziao at hSmlh hTobh mkln ohlbiSho otno Tbet el ido onelim brglio׃ 
luke 15:23	ohbiao at egl hmrbq oTbHo ato onaklh onSmH׃ 
luke 15:24	ki ch bni hih mt oiHi oaobd hih oimza oiHlo lSmH׃ 
luke 15:25	obno hgdol hih bSdh oihi kaSr ba oiqrb al hbit oiSme qol cmrh omHlot׃ 
luke 15:26	oiqra al aHd hnerim oiSal mh cat׃ 
luke 15:27	oiamr alio ki ba aHik oiTbH abik at egl hmrbq el aSr hoSb lo Slm׃ 
luke 15:28	oiHr lo ola abh lboa hbith oiza abio oidbr el lbo׃ 
luke 15:29	oien oiamr al abio hnh ch Snim rbot ani ebd atk omimi la ebrti at mzotk omimi la ntt li gdi lmen aSiS em rei׃ 
luke 15:30	oiba bnk ch aSr ble at nHltk em hcnot otcbH lo at egl hmrbq׃ 
luke 15:31	oiamr alio bni ath tmid emdi okl aSr li lk hoa׃ 
luke 15:32	abl nkon lSoS olSmH ki aHik ch hih mt oiHi oabd hih oimza׃ 
luke 16:1	oiamr gm al tlmidio aiS eSir hih olo pqid el bito oilSinho alio bamrm ki mpcr hoa at qninik׃ 
luke 16:2	oiqra ato oiamr alio mh cat Smeti elik tn HSbon pqdtk ki la tokl lhiot eod pqid׃ 
luke 16:3	oiamr hpqid blbo mh aeSh ki iqH adni mmni at hpqdh ledr la aokl olSal el hptHim ani boS׃ 
luke 16:4	ideti mh aeSh lmen iasponi al btihm bet aosr mpqdti׃ 
luke 16:5	oiqra al kl aiS aSr nSh bhm adnio oiSal at hraSon kmh ath Hib ladni׃ 
luke 16:6	oiamr mat bti Smn oiamr alio qH at STrk omhr Sb oktbt HmSim׃ 
luke 16:7	oal aHr amr kmh ath Hib oiamr mat kr HTim oiamr qH at STrk oktb Smnim׃ 
luke 16:8	oiSbH hadon at pqid heolh el aSr herim leSot ki bni heolm hch eromim hm bdorm mbni haor׃ 
luke 16:9	ogm ani amr lkm eSo lkm ahbim bmmon heolh lmen bet klto iaspo atkm al mSknot eolm׃ 
luke 16:10	hnamn bmeT mcer namn gm bhrbh ohmeol bmeT mcer meol gm bhrbh׃ 
luke 16:11	lkn am bmmon heolh la hiitm namnim at hamti mi ipqid bidkm׃ 
luke 16:12	oam bdbr aSr laHrim la hiitm namnim at aSr lkm mi itn lkm׃ 
luke 16:13	ain ebd aSr iokl lebd Sni adnim ki iSna at haHd oiahb at haHr ao idbq baHd oat haHr ibch la toklo ebd at halhim oat hmmon׃ 
luke 16:14	oiSmeo kl cat gm hproSim aSr hm ahbi ksp oilego lo׃ 
luke 16:15	oiamr alihm atm hm hmzTdqim lpni hadm oalhim iode at lbbkm ki hgbh badm toebh hoa lpni halhim׃ 
luke 16:16	htorh ohnbiaim ed ioHnn omn ac ohlah bSort mlkot halhim okl aiS bHcqh iboa bh׃ 
luke 16:17	abl nql ki iebro hSmim oharz maSr ipl qoz aHd mn htorh׃ 
luke 16:18	kl aiS hmSlH at aSto olqH aHrt nap hoa okl hlqH at hgroSh maiSh nap hoa׃ 
luke 16:19	aiS eSir hih ohoa lboS argmn oSS oitegg oiSmH iom iom׃ 
luke 16:20	oaiS abion oSmo lecr mSkb ptH Ser bito ohoa mla abebeot׃ 
luke 16:21	oitao lSbe mn hprorim hnplim mel SlHn heSir ogm hklbim bao oilqo abebeotio׃ 
luke 16:22	oihi kaSr mt habion oiobl el idi hmlakim al Hiq abrhm oimt gm heSir oiqbr׃ 
luke 16:23	obhioto bmkabot bSaol oiSa at einio oira at abrhm mrHoq oat lecr bHiqo׃ 
luke 16:24	oizeq oiamr abi abrhm Hnni oSlH na at lecr oiTbl at qzh azbeo bmim lmen qrr at lSoni ki eniti bmoqd hch׃ 
luke 16:25	oiamr abrhm bni ckr ki lqHt Tobk bHiik ogm lecr lqH at hreot oeth hoa inHm oath tzTer׃ 
luke 16:26	omlbd kl cat SoHh gdolh mpsqt binino obinikm lblti ioklo ebor hHpzim llkt mph alikm olblti iebro mSm alino׃ 
luke 16:27	oiamr am kn abi Sal ani matk ki tSlH ato al bit abi׃ 
luke 16:28	ki iS li HmSh aHim lmen ieid bhm pn ibao gm hm al mqom hmezbh hch׃ 
luke 16:29	oiamr abrhm iS lhm mSh ohnbiaim alihm iSmeon׃ 
luke 16:30	oiamr la kn abi abrhm ak am ilk alihm aHd mn hmtim ac iSobo׃ 
luke 16:31	oiamr alio am la iSmeo al mSh oal hnbiaim gm ki iqom aHd mn hmtim la iamino׃ 
luke 17:1	oiamr al tlmidio ai apSr Sla ibao hmkSlim abl aoi laiS aSr el ido ibao׃ 
luke 17:2	noH lo Sitlh plH rkb el zoaro oiSlk al him maSr ikSil at aHd mhqTnim walh׃ 
luke 17:3	hSmro lnpSotikm am iHTa lk aHik hokH lo oam inHm slH lo׃ 
luke 17:4	oam iHTa lk Sbe pemim biom oSb alik Sbe pemim biom oamr nHmti oslHt lo׃ 
luke 17:5	oiamro hSliHim al hadon hosp lno amonh׃ 
luke 17:6	oiamr hadon lo hith lkm amonh kgrgr hHrdl ac tamro al htot hch heqr ohnTe btok him oiSme lkm׃ 
luke 17:7	mi hoa ch mkm olo ebd HrS ao reh aSr bbao mn hSdh iamr alio mhr gSh hnh ohsb׃ 
luke 17:8	hla iamr alio hkn li aroHt herb oHgr mtnik oSrtni ed am kliti lakl olStot oaHr takl otSth gm ath׃ 
luke 17:9	hgm itn todh lebd el eSto at aSr zoho amrti la itn׃ 
luke 17:10	kkh gm atm aHri eSotkm at kl aSr zoitm amro ebdim ain moeil bm anHno ki rq at hmTl elino leSot eSino׃ 
luke 17:11	oihi bnseo iroSlim ohoa ebr btok Smron ohglil׃ 
luke 17:12	oiba al kpr aHd oipgeho eSrh anSim mzreim ohm emdim mrHoq׃ 
luke 17:13	oiSao at qolm lamr ihoSe morh Hnno׃ 
luke 17:14	oira aotm oiamr alihm lko ohrao al hkhnim oihi blktm oiThro׃ 
luke 17:15	oaHd mhm brato ki nrpa oiSb oiSbH at halhim bqol gdol׃ 
luke 17:16	oipl el pnio lrglio oiodh lo ohoa hih Smroni׃ 
luke 17:17	oien ihoSe oiamr hla heSrh Thro ohtSeh aih hm׃ 
luke 17:18	ham la nmza aSr Sb ltt kbod lalhim colti hnkri hch׃ 
luke 17:19	oiamr alio qom olk amontk hoSieh lk׃ 
luke 17:20	oiSalho hproSim mti tboa mlkot halhim oien atm lamr mlkot halhim la tboa bmrah einim׃ 
luke 17:21	ola iamro hnh ph ao hnh Sm ki mlkot halhim hnh bqrbkm hia׃ 
luke 17:22	oiamr al htlmidim imim baim ohtaoitm lraot iom aHd mimi bn hadm ola trao׃ 
luke 17:23	oam iamro alikm hnh Sm hnh ph al tlko oal trozo aHrihm׃ 
luke 17:24	ki kbrq aSr ibrq mqzh hSmim oiair ed qzh hSmim kn ihih bn hadm biomo׃ 
luke 17:25	ak braSonh zrik hoa lsbl hrbh olhmas mn hdor hch׃ 
luke 17:26	okaSr hih nH kn ihih bimi bn hadm׃ 
luke 17:27	aklo oSto nSao nSim ohSiao nSim lanSim ed hiom aSr ba nH al htbh oiba hmbol oiSHt at klm׃ 
luke 17:28	okaSr hih bimi loT akl oSth qnh omkr nTe obnh׃ 
luke 17:29	oihi biom aSr iza loT msdom oimTr aS ogprit mn hSmim oiSHt at klm׃ 
luke 17:30	kkh ihih biom aSr iglh bn hadm׃ 
luke 17:31	biom hhoa aiS aSr ihih el hgg oklio bbit al ird lSat atm oaiS aSr bSdh al iSb hbith׃ 
luke 17:32	ckro at aSt loT׃ 
luke 17:33	hmbqS lmlT at npSo iabdnh oaSr iabd ath ihih׃ 
luke 17:34	ani amr lkm blilh hhoa Snim ihio bmTh aHt haHd iasp ohaHr iecb׃ 
luke 17:35	Stim thiinh THnot iHd haHt tasp ohaHrt tecb׃ 
luke 17:36	Snim ihio bSdh onasp haHd ohaHr iecb׃ 
luke 17:37	oieno oiamro alio aih cat adnino oiamr alihm baSr hpgr Sm iqbzo hnSrim׃ 
luke 18:1	ogm mSl dbr alihm lhtpll tmid ola lhtrpot׃ 
luke 18:2	oiamr SopT hih beir aHt aSr la ira at halhim ola nSa pnim ladm׃ 
luke 18:3	oalmnh hith beir hhia otba alio lamr dinh at dini mmribi׃ 
luke 18:4	oiman miom al iom oaHri kn amr bnpSo gm ki at halhim ainni ira oladm la aSa pnim׃ 
luke 18:5	aeSh at din halmnh hcat el hogieh ati pn tboa tmid otdkani bmlim׃ 
luke 18:6	oiamr hadon Smeo at aSr amr din heolh׃ 
luke 18:7	ohalhim hla hoa ieSh din bHirio hqraim alio iomm olilh gm ki itmhmh lhoSiem׃ 
luke 18:8	ani amr lkm ki ieSh at dinm bmhrh ak bn hadm bbao himza amonh barz׃ 
luke 18:9	oiosp oiSa mSlo al anSim bTHim bnpSm ki zdiqim hmh oaHrim nbcim beinihm oiamr׃ 
luke 18:10	Sni anSim elo al hmqdS lhtpll haHd proS ohaHd moks׃ 
luke 18:11	oitizb hproS lbdo oitpll lamr alhim aodk ki ainni kaSr hadm hgclim oheSqim ohnapim ao gm kmks hch׃ 
luke 18:12	ani zm pemim bSboe ani meSr at kl qnini׃ 
luke 18:13	ohmoks hih emd mrHoq ola abh ap lSat at einio lSmim ki am topp el lbo lamr alhim slH li hHoTa׃ 
luke 18:14	ani amr lkm ki ird ch lbito nzdq mch ki kl hmrim at npSo iSpl oaSr iSpilh iromm׃ 
luke 18:15	oibiao alio gm at hildim lmen ige bhm oirao htlmidim oigero bm׃ 
luke 18:16	oiqra atm ihoSe alio oiamr hniHo lildim lboa ali oal tmneom ki lalh mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 18:17	amn amr ani lkm kl aSr la iqbl at mlkot halhim kild hoa la iba bh׃ 
luke 18:18	oiSalho qzin aHd lamr rbi hTob mh li leSot oairS Hii eolmim׃ 
luke 18:19	oiamr alio ihoSe mdoe qrat li Tob ain Tob blti aHd halhim׃ 
luke 18:20	at hmzot ath iode la tnap la trzH la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr kbd at abik oat amk׃ 
luke 18:21	oiamr at kl alh Smrti mneori׃ 
luke 18:22	oiSme ihoSe oiamr eod aHt Hsrt mkr at kl aSr lk oHlq leniim oihi lk aozr bSmim oboa olk aHri׃ 
luke 18:23	oihi kSmeo at cat oiezb mad ki eSr gdol hih lo׃ 
luke 18:24	oira ihoSe ki nezb oiamr kmh iqSh lbeli nksim lboa al mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 18:25	ki nql lgml ebr btok nqb hmHT mboa eSir al mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 18:26	oiamro hSmeim omi iokl lhoSe׃ 
luke 18:27	oiamr mh Sipla mbni adm la ipla malhim׃ 
luke 18:28	oiamr pTros hn anHno ecbno at hkl onlk aHrik׃ 
luke 18:29	oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm ain aiS aSr ecb at bito ao at abotio ao at aHio ao at aSto ao at bnio lmen mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 18:30	ola iqH tHtihm kplim hrbh beolm hch obeolm hba Hii eolmim׃ 
luke 18:31	oiqH alio at Snim heSr oiamr lhm hnno elim iroSlimh oimla kl hktob bidi hnbiaim el bn hadm׃ 
luke 18:32	ki imsr lgoim oihtlo bo oitello bo oirqo bpnio׃ 
luke 18:33	oaHri hkotm ato bSoTim imitoho obiom hSliSi qom iqom׃ 
luke 18:34	ohm la hbino maomh oihi hdbr hch nelm mhm ola ideo at hnamr׃ 
luke 18:35	oihi bqrbo al iriHo ohnh aiS eor iSb el hdrk ohoa mSal׃ 
luke 18:36	oiSme at qol hem hebr oidrS ldet mh cat׃ 
luke 18:37	oigido lo ki ihoSe hnzri eobr׃ 
luke 18:38	oizeq lamr ihoSe bn dod Hnni׃ 
luke 18:39	ohhlkim braSnh gero bo lhHSto ohoa hrbh eod lzeq ihoSe bn dod Hnni׃ 
luke 18:40	oiemd ihoSe oizo lhbiao alio oihi kaSr qrb oiSalho lamr׃ 
luke 18:41	mh Hpzk ki aeSh lk oiamr adni ki arah׃ 
luke 18:42	oiamr alio rah amontk hoSieh lk׃ 
luke 18:43	optam rah oilk aHrio hlk oSbH at halhim okl hem braotm cat ntno todh lalhim׃ 
luke 19:1	oiboa oiebr biriHo׃ 
luke 19:2	ohnh aiS oSmo cki mraSi hmoksim ohoa eSir׃ 
luke 19:3	oibqS lraot at ihoSe mi hoa ola ikl mpni hem ki Spl qomh hih׃ 
luke 19:4	oiqdm oirz oiel el Sqmh lraoto ki Sm hdrk aSr iebr bh׃ 
luke 19:5	oihi bbao al hmqom hhoa oibT ihoSe oiraho oiamr alio cki rd mhr ki zrik ani lSbt hiom bbitk׃ 
luke 19:6	oimhr oird oiaspho bSmHh׃ 
luke 19:7	oilono kl hraim lamr ba llon bbit aiS HoTa׃ 
luke 19:8	oiemd cki oiamr al hadon hnh adni at mHzit nksi ani ntn leniim oam eSqti aiS aSib lo arbetim׃ 
luke 19:9	oiamr alio ihoSe hiom hith tSoeh lbit hch baSr bn abrhm gm hoa׃ 
luke 19:10	ki ba bn hadm lbqS olhoSie at habd׃ 
luke 19:11	oihi hm Smeim at cat oisp Sat mSl el aSr qrb liroSlim ohmh HSbim ki mhrh tglh mlkot halhim׃ 
luke 19:12	el kn amr aiS aHd mn hadirim hlk al arz rHoqh lqHt lo mmlkh olSob׃ 
luke 19:13	oiqra al eSrh mebdio oitn lhm eSrh mnim oiamr lhm sHro bhm ed bai׃ 
luke 19:14	obni eiro Snaim aoto oiSlHo mlakim aHrio lamr la nHpz bch ki imlk elino׃ 
luke 19:15	oihi aHri qHto at hmmlkh oiSb oiamr lqra at hebdim hhm aSr ntn lhm at hksp lmen ide mh hroiH kl aHd bmsHro׃ 
luke 19:16	oiba hraSon oiamr adni mnh Slk hbia eSrt mnim׃ 
luke 19:17	oiamr alio kn hebd hTob tHt aSr hiit namn bmeT mcer hih SliT el eSr erim׃ 
luke 19:18	oiba hSni oiamr adni mnh Slk eSh HmSt mnim׃ 
luke 19:19	oiamr gm lch ap ath hih el HmS erim׃ 
luke 19:20	oiba haHr oiamr ha lk mnh Slk aSr hih azli zror bsodr׃ 
luke 19:21	mpni irati atk ki ath aiS qSh lqH at aSr la hnHt oqzr at aSr la cret׃ 
luke 19:22	oiamr alio mpik aSpTk hebd hre ath idet ki ani aiS qSh lqH at aSr la hnHti oqozr at aSr la creti׃ 
luke 19:23	olmh la ntt at kspi lSlHni oani bboai hiiti tobe aoto bmrbit׃ 
luke 19:24	oiamr al hemdim Sm Sao mmno at hmnh otnoho al aSr lo eSrt hmnim׃ 
luke 19:25	oiamro alio adnino iS lo eSrt mnim׃ 
luke 19:26	hn ani amr lkm ki kl aiS SiS lo intn lo oaSr ain lo iqH mmno gm at aSr lo׃ 
luke 19:27	abl at aibi hhm aSr la Hpzo mlki elihm hbiao atm hnh ohrgo atm lpni׃ 
luke 19:28	oikl ldbr hdbrim halh oiebr lpnihm oiel iroSlim׃ 
luke 19:29	oihi bqrbo al bit pgi obit hini bhr hnqra hr hcitim oiSlH Snim mtlmidio lamr׃

luke 23:40	oien haHr oiger bo lamr haink ira at halhim bhiotk bezm henS hch׃ 
luke 23:41	ohn anHno bo kmSpT ki lqHno kpi meSino abl ch la eSh maomh re׃ 
luke 23:42	oiamr al ihoSe ckrni na adni bbak bmlkotk׃ 
luke 23:43	oiamr ihoSe alio amn amr ani lk ki hiom thih emdi bgn edn׃ 
luke 23:44	oihi kSeh hSSit ohnh HSk el kl harz ed hSeh htSieit׃ 
luke 23:45	oiHSk hSmS otqre prkt hhikl lSnim qreim׃ 
luke 23:46	oiqra ihoSe bqol gdol oiamr abi bidk apqid roHi obamro cat npH npSo׃ 
luke 23:47	oira Sr hmah at aSr nhith oitn kbod lalhim lamr akn haiS hch zdiq hih׃ 
luke 23:48	okl hmon hem aSr htaspo iHd lmrah hch bhbiTm al kl aSr neSh toppo el lbbihm oiSobo׃ 
luke 23:49	okl mideio emdo mrHoq ogm hnSim aSr hlko ato mn hglil oeinihn raot at alh׃ 
luke 23:50	ohnh aiS oSmo iosp ohoa mn hiezim aiS Tob ozdiq mn hrmtim eir hihodim׃ 
luke 23:51	aSr la hskim leztm olpelm omHkh gm hoa lmlkot halhim׃ 
luke 23:52	oigS al pilTos oiSal mmno at goit ihoSe׃ 
luke 23:53	oiord ath oikrkh bsdinim oiSimh bqbr Hzob bsle aSr edn la hoSm bo adm׃ 
luke 23:54	oiom erb Sbt hih ohSbt hgieh׃ 
luke 23:55	otlknh aHrio mn hnSim aSr bao ato mn hglil otHcinh at hqbr oat aSr hoSm bo goito׃ 
luke 23:56	oaHri Sobn hkino smim omrqHot obSbt Sbto kpi hmzoh׃ 
luke 24:1	obaHd bSbt lpni elot hSHr bao al hqbr otbiainh at hsmim aSr hkino oemhn eod aHrot׃ 
luke 24:2	oimzao at habn glolh mn hqbr׃ 
luke 24:3	otbanh pnimh ola mzao at goit hadon ihoSe׃ 
luke 24:4	oihi hnh nbkot el hdbr hch ohnh Sni anSim emdo elihn olboSihm mchirim׃ 
luke 24:5	oipl pHd elihn otqdnh apim arzh oiamro alihn mh tbqSnh at hHi azl hmtim׃ 
luke 24:6	ainno ph ki qm ckrnh at aSr dbr alikn beod hioto bglil lamr׃ 
luke 24:7	ki zrik bn hadm lhmsr lidi anSim HTaim olhzlb obiom hSliSi qom iqom׃ 
luke 24:8	otckrnh at dbrio׃ 
luke 24:9	otSbnh mn hqbr otgdnh at kl hdbrim halh leSti heSr olkl haHrim׃ 
luke 24:10	omrim hmgdlit oioHnh omrim am ieqb ohaHrot aSr emhn hnh hio hmdbrot al hSliHim at hdbrim halh׃ 
luke 24:11	oihio dbrihn kdbri riq beinihm ola hamino lhn׃ 
luke 24:12	opTros qm oirz al hqbr oiSqp ola rah ki am htkrikim mnHim Sm oiSb lmqomo mStomm el hnhih׃ 
luke 24:13	ohnh Snim mhm hio hlkim bezm hiom hch al kpr hrHq miroSlim kSSim ris oSmo emaos׃ 
luke 24:14	ohm ndbro aiS al reho el kl hqrot halh׃ 
luke 24:15	oihi bdbrm obhtokHm iHd oigS ihoSe ap hoa oilk atm׃ 
luke 24:16	oeinihm naHco ola ikirho׃ 
luke 24:17	oiamr alihm mh hmh hdbrim halh aSr atm nSaim ontnim bhm iHdo bdrk opnikm cepim׃ 
luke 24:18	oien haHd aSr Smo qliops oiamr alio hath lbdk gr biroSlim oaink ide at hqrt bh bimim halh׃ 
luke 24:19	oiamr alihm omh hmh oigido alio meSh ihoSe hnzri aSr hih aiS nbia gbor bpel obamr lpni halhim olpni kl hem׃ 
luke 24:20	oat aSr khnino hgdolim ocqnino hsgirho lmSpT mot oizlbho׃ 
luke 24:21	oanHno Hkino ki hoa hetid lgal at iSral oeth bkl cat hiom iom SliSi mac neSo alh׃ 
luke 24:22	ohnh gm nSim mqrbno hHridno aSr qdmo bbqr lba lqbr׃ 
luke 24:23	ola mzao at goito otbanh otamrnh ki rao gm mrah mlakim hamrim ki hoa Hi׃ 
luke 24:24	oilko anSim mSlno al hqbr oimzao kaSr amro hnSim oaoto la rao׃ 
luke 24:25	oiamr alihm hoi Hsri det okbdi lb mhamin bkl aSr dbro hnbiaim׃ 
luke 24:26	hla el hmSiH hih lsbl at kl cat olboa al kbodo׃ 
luke 24:27	oiHl mmSh omkl hnbiaim oibar lhm at kl hktobim hnamrim elio׃ 
luke 24:28	oiqrbo al hkpr aSr hm hlkim Smh oiSm pnio khlk lo ldrko׃ 
luke 24:29	oipzro bo lamr Sbh atno ki et erb hgie onTh hiom oiba hbith lSbt atm׃ 
luke 24:30	oihi kaSr hsb emhm oiqH at hlHm oibrk oibze oitn lhm׃ 
luke 24:31	otpqHnh einihm oikirho ohoa Hmq ebr meinihm׃ 
luke 24:32	oiamro aiS al reho hla hih ber lbbno bqrbno bdbro alino bdrk oiptH lno at hktobim׃

luke 24:34	hamrim akn qm hadon mn hmtim onrah al Smeon׃ 
luke 24:35	oispro gm hm at aSr neSh lhm bdrk oaik hkirho bbziet hlHm׃ 
luke 24:36	eodm mdbrim kdbrim halh ohoa ihoSe emd btokm oiamr alihm Slom lkm׃ 
luke 24:37	ohmh Hto onbeto oiHSbo ki roH rao׃ 
luke 24:38	oiamr alihm mh ch atm nbhlim oel mh ch mHSbot elot blbbkm׃

luke 24:40	oaHri amro at cat hrah atm at idio oat rglio׃ 
luke 24:41	ohm eod la hamino mSmHh otmho oiamr alihm hiS lkm ph dbr akl׃ 
luke 24:42	oitno lpnio Hlq dg zloi omeT zop dbS׃ 
luke 24:43	oiqH oiakl leinihm׃ 
luke 24:44	oiamr alihm alh hm hdbrim aSr dbrti alikm beod hioti emkm ki hmla imla kl hktob eli btort mSh obnbiaim obthlim׃ 
luke 24:45	ac ptH at lbbm lhbin at hktobim׃ 
luke 24:46	oiamr alihm kn ktob okn ngcr aSr ienh hmSiH oiqom mn hmtim biom hSliSi׃

acts 1:1	hn hmamr hraSon taopilos eSitiho el kl aSr hHl ihoSe leSot ollmd׃ 
acts 1:2	ed hiom aSr lqH lmrom aHri zoto broH hqdS at hSliHim aSr bHr bhm׃ 
acts 1:3	oaSr gm htizb lhm Hi aHri enoto batot rbot bhraoto alihm arbeim iom oidbr el mlkot halhim׃ 
acts 1:4	obaklo lHm emhm zoh atm lblti sor miroSlim ki am lhoHil lhbTHt hab aSr Smetm mmni׃ 
acts 1:5	ki ioHnn hTbil bmim oatm tTblo broH hqdS bqrob aHri himim halh׃ 
acts 1:6	oihi kaSr naspo iHdo oiSalho lamr adnino hmSib ath bet hcat at hmlokh liSral׃ 
acts 1:7	oiamr alihm la lkm ldet hetim ohcmnim aSr ied hab bSlTno׃ 
acts 1:8	abl tqblo gborh bboa elikm roH hqdS ohiitm edi biroSlim obkl ihodh obSmron oed qzh harz׃ 
acts 1:9	oihi kdbro cat helh ohm raim oiSaho enn mngd einihm׃ 
acts 1:10	oibiTo aHrio hSmimh bebro ohnh Sni anSim lboSi bdim nzbim elihm׃ 
acts 1:11	oiamro atm anSi hglil mh temdo ph oeinikm hSmimh ihoSe ch aSr lqH matkm hSmimh kn boa iboa kaSr raitm ato elh hSmimh׃

acts 1:13	oibao heirh oielo al helih aSr hio iSbim bh pTros oieqb oioHnn oandri pilpos otoma br tlmi omti ieqb bn Hlpi oSmeon hqna oihodh bn ieqb׃ 
acts 1:14	kl alh hio Sqdim iHdo blb aHd lhtpll olhtHnn oemhm hnSim omrim am ihoSe ogm aHio׃ 
acts 1:15	obimim halh qm pTros btok htlmidim omspr Smot hnqhlim iHd kmah oeSrim oiamr׃ 
acts 1:16	anSim aHim mn hzrk hih ki imla hktob hhoa aSr dbr mqdm roH hqdS bpi dod el ihodh aSr hih molik at tpSi ihoSe׃ 
acts 1:17	ki hih nmnh atno ockh bgorl hSrot hch׃ 
acts 1:18	ohnh hoa qnh lo Sdh bmHir hrSeh oipl el pnio arzh oibqe btok oiSpko kl meio׃ 
acts 1:19	ogm nodeh cat lkl iSbi iroSlim oiqra bSptm lSdh hhoa Hql dma hoa Sdh hdm׃ 
acts 1:20	ki ktob bspr thlim thi Tirto nSmh oal ihi bh iSb opqdto iqH aHr׃ 
acts 1:21	oel kn mn hzrk ki mn hanSim halh aSr hthlko atno kl imi hiot adnino ihoSe ioza oba lpnino׃ 
acts 1:22	hHl mTbilt ioHnn ed iom hlqHo matno ki aHd mhm ihih led emno el qomo mn hmtim׃ 
acts 1:23	oiemido Snim at iosp hnqra br Sba ohoa mknh iosTos oat mtih׃ 
acts 1:24	oitpllo oiamro ath adni hiode kl hlbbot hrah na mn hSnim halh at haHd aSr bHrt bo׃ 
acts 1:25	lqHt at gorl hSrot hch ohSliHot aSr sr mmnh ihodh lhlk al mqomo׃ 
acts 1:26	oipilo gorlot oipl hgorl el mtih oispH al eSti eSr hSliHim׃ 
acts 2:1	obiom mlat Sbet hSbeot oitaspo klm lb aHd׃ 
acts 2:2	oihi ptam qol reS mn hSmim kqol roH serh oimla at kl hbit aSr iSbo bo׃ 
acts 2:3	otrainh alihm lSnot nHlqot omraihn kaS otnoHinh aHt aHt el kl aHd mhm׃

acts 2:5	obiroSlim Skno ihodim anSi Hsd mkl goi ogoi aSr tHt hSmim׃

acts 2:7	oiStommo oitmho oiamro aiS al reho hnh kl alh hmdbrim hla glilim hmh׃

acts 2:13	oaHrim lego oiamro ki mlai esis hmh׃

acts 2:15	ki alh la Skorim hmh kaSr HSbtm ki Seh SliSit biom eth׃ 
acts 2:16	abl ch hoa hamor el idi ioal hnbia׃

acts 2:18	ogm el ebdi oel SpHoti bimim hhmh aSpk at roHi onbao׃

acts 2:20	hSmS ihpk lHSk ohirH ldm lpni boa iom ihoh hgdol ohnora׃ 
acts 2:21	ohih kl aSr iqra bSm ihoh imlT׃

acts 2:23	ato hnmsr el pi ezt halhim hnHrzh oidieto mqom lqHtm obidi rSeim hoqetm ohrgtm ato׃ 
acts 2:24	ohalhim hqimo mn hmtim bhtir at Hbli hmot baSr nmne mn hmot lezr ato׃

acts 2:26	lkn SmH lbi oigl kbodi ap bSri iSkn lbTH׃ 
acts 2:27	ki la tecb npSi lSaol la ttn Hsidk lraot SHt׃ 
acts 2:28	todieni arHot Hiim Sbe SmHot at pnik׃ 
acts 2:29	anSim aHim hniHo li oadbrh bacni klkm el dod abino aSr gm mt gm nqbr oqborto atno hia ed hiom hch׃ 
acts 2:30	ohoa bhioto nbia omdeto at hSboeh aSr nSbe lo halhim lhqim at hmSiH kpi hbSr mpri Hlzio lhoSibo el ksao׃ 
acts 2:31	lkn bHcoto mraS dbr el tqomt hmSiH ki la necbh npSo lSaol ogm bSro la rah SHt׃

acts 2:35	ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik׃

acts 2:39	ki lkm hhbTHh olbnikm olkl hrHoqim lkl aSr qra ihoh alhino׃ 
acts 2:40	oied eod bhm bamrim aHrim hrbh oichr atm lamr hmlTo na mdor thpkot hch׃ 
acts 2:41	oiqblo at dbro bSmHh oiTblo obiom hhoa nospo kSlSt alpi npS׃

acts 2:44	okl hmaminim htaHdo iHd oihi lhm hkl bStpot׃

acts 2:47	oiaklo mconm bgilh obtm lbb oiSbHo at halhim oimzao Hn beini kl hem ohadon hosip iom iom el hedh at hnoSeim׃ 
acts 3:1	opTros oioHnn elim iHdo al hmqdS let htplh bSeh htSieit׃ 
acts 3:2	oaiS aHd psH mbTn amo moba Smh aSr ioSibho iom iom Ser hmqdS hnqra Ser hmhdr lSal mtnot mat bai hmqdS׃ 
acts 3:3	oihi kraoto at pTros oat ioHnn baim al hmqdS oibqS lqHt matm zdqh׃ 
acts 3:4	oistkl bo pTros ogm ioHnn oiamr alio hbiTh alino׃ 
acts 3:5	oiSm pnio alihm bqoto lqHt matm dbr׃ 
acts 3:6	oiamr pTros ksp ochb ain li abl at aSr bidi atnno lk bSm ihoSe hmSiH hnzri qom hthlk׃ 
acts 3:7	oiaHc bid imino oiqm aoto oitHcqo ptam rglio oqrslio׃ 
acts 3:8	oiqpz oithlk oiba atm al hmqdS mthlk omrqd omSbH at halhim׃ 
acts 3:9	oiraho kl hem mthlk omSbH at halhim׃ 
acts 3:10	oikiro aoto ki hoa aSr hih iSb lSal zdqh bSer hmqdS hmhdr oimlao Smh oSmmon el hneSh lo׃

acts 3:12	oira pTros oien oiamr al hem anSi iSral mh atm tmhim el cat omh tstklo bno kalo anHno bkHno obHsidotno Smno at ch mthlk׃ 
acts 3:13	alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb alhi abotino hoa par at ebdo ihoSe aSr atm msrtm aoto okHStm bo bpni pilTos kShih dn lpTro׃ 
acts 3:14	abl atm kHStm bqdoS obzdiq obqStm ki iHn lkm aiS rzH׃

acts 3:17	oeth aHi ide ani ki bbli det eSitm gm atm gm raSikm׃ 
acts 3:18	ohalhim kkh mla at aSr hgid mqdm bpi kl nbiaio ki ienh hmSiH׃ 
acts 3:19	lkn hnHmo oSobo oimHo HTaikm׃

acts 4:1	oihi bdbrm al hem oiqomo elihm hkhnim ongid bit hmqdS ohzdoqim׃

acts 4:3	oiSlHo bhm at idihm oiSimom bmSmr ed lmHr ki kbr ba herb׃ 
acts 4:4	orbim mhSmeim at hdbr hamino oihi mspr hanSim kHmSt alpim׃ 
acts 4:5	oihi mmHrt oiqhlo Srihm raSihm ocqnihm osoprihm iroSlim׃ 
acts 4:6	oHnn hkhn hgdol oqipa oioHnn oalksndros okl aSr mmSpHt hkhn hgdol׃ 
acts 4:7	oiemido atm btok oiSalom bai ch kH obai ch Sm eSitm cat׃ 
acts 4:8	oimla pTros roH hqdS oiamr alihm atm raSi hem ocqni iSral׃ 
acts 4:9	am anHno nHqrim hiom el hTobh aSr eSino laiS Holh oSaltm bmh ch noSe׃ 
acts 4:10	iode lklkm olkl em iSral ki bSm ihoSe hmSiH hnzri aSr zlbtm aoto oaSr halhim hqimo mn hmtim ki bSmo emd ch lpnikm bria׃ 
acts 4:11	ohoa habn aSr mastm atm hbonim othi lraS pnh׃ 
acts 4:12	oain hihoSeh baHr oain tHt hSmim Sm aHr hntn lbni adm aSr bo noSe׃ 
acts 4:13	oihi kaSr rao at bTHon lb Sl pTros oioHnn ohbino ki hdioTim ola beli Hkmh hmh oitmho elihm oikirom ki hthlko em ihoSe׃ 
acts 4:14	obraotm at haiS hnrpa emd azlm la mzao ldbr ngdm dbr׃ 
acts 4:15	oizoo atm lzat Hozh mn hsnhdrin oitiezo iHdo׃ 
acts 4:16	oiamro mh neSh lanSim halh hnh aot gloi neSh el idihm ogm mprsm lkl iSbi iroSlim ola nokl lkHS bo׃ 
acts 4:17	ak lmen la irbh hdbr bem oiprz nchirh atm bgerh lblti dbr eod lkl adm bSm hch׃ 
acts 4:18	oiqrao atm oizoom aSr la idbro dbr ola ilmdo bSm ihoSe׃ 
acts 4:19	oieno pTros oioHnn oiamro alihm hnkon hoa lpni halhim Sme lkm itr mSme lalhim SpTo atm׃ 
acts 4:20	ki la nokl anHno lHdl mdbr at aSr raino oSmeno׃ 
acts 4:21	oiosipo lger bm oipTro atm baSr la mzao dbr lenoS atm mpni hem ki klm mhllim at halhim el hneSh׃ 
acts 4:22	ki bn arbeim Snh omelh hih haiS hhoa aSr neSh emo aot hrpoah hcat׃ 
acts 4:23	oaHri hpTrm bao al aHihm oispro lhm at aSr amro alihm hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim׃ 
acts 4:24	oihi kaSr Smeo at cat oiSao at qolm blb aHd lalhim oiamro adni ath hal heSh at hSmim oat harz oat him oat kl aSr bm׃ 
acts 4:25	aSr amrt bpi ebdk dod lmh rgSo goim olamim ihgo riq׃ 
acts 4:26	itizbo mlki arz orocnim nosdo iHd el ihoh oel mSiHo׃ 
acts 4:27	ki amnm nosdo hordos opnTios pilTos em hgoim olami iSral el ihoSe ebdk hqdoS aSr mSHt׃ 
acts 4:28	leSot at aSr idk oeztk mqdm gcrh lhiot׃ 
acts 4:29	oeth adni rah at gertm otn lebdik ldbr at dbrk bkl bTHon lbm׃ 
acts 4:30	bnTtk at idk lmrpa oltt atot omoptim bSm ihoSe ebdk hqdoS׃ 
acts 4:31	oihi kaSr htpllo oine hmqom aSr hio nqhlim Sm oimlao klm roH hqdS oidbro at dbr halhim bbTHon lbb׃ 
acts 4:32	oqhl hmaminim hih lhm lb aHd onpS aHt oain aiS mhm aomr el aSr bido li hoa ki hkl hih lhm bStpot׃ 
acts 4:33	obgborh gdolh ieido hSliHim el tqomt hadon ihoSe oHsd gdol nmSk lklm׃ 
acts 4:34	ki la hih bhm Hsr dbr ki kl beli Sdot obtim mkro atm oibiao at ksp mHirm׃ 
acts 4:35	oiSimho lrgli hSliHim oitn lkl aiS oaiS di mHsro׃ 
acts 4:36	oiosp aSr knoho hSliHim bSm br nba proSo bn hnHmh aiS loi aSr nold barz ktim׃ 
acts 4:37	gm lo hih Sdh oimkrho oiba at hksp oiSimho lrgli hSliHim׃ 
acts 5:1	oaiS aHd oSmo Hnnih em aSto Spirh mkr at aHcto׃ 
acts 5:2	oiqH mn hmHir oistirho oaSto idet gm hia oHlq aHd hbia oiSm lrgli hSliHim׃ 
acts 5:3	oiamr pTros Hnnih lmh ch mla hSTn at lbbk lSqr broH hqdS olhstir mmHir hSdh׃ 
acts 5:4	hla Slk hih Trm hmkro ogm aHri nmkr hih bidk olmh Smt el lbbk hdbr hch la Sqrt bbni adm ki am balhim׃ 
acts 5:5	okSme Hnnih at hdbrim halh npl arzh oigoe othi irah gdolh el kl hSmeim׃ 
acts 5:6	oiqomo hzeirim oiaspo ato oiSaho hHozh oiqbrho׃ 
acts 5:7	oihi kmSlS Seot otba aSto ohia la ideh at hneSh׃ 
acts 5:8	oien pTros oiamr alih amri li hbmHir hch mkrtm at hSdh otamr kn bmHir hch׃ 
acts 5:9	oiamr pTros alih lmh ch noedtm lnsot at roH ihoh hnh bptH rgli hmqbrim at aiSk onSao atk hHozh׃ 
acts 5:10	otpl ptam lrglio otgoe ohbHorim bao ohnh mth oiSaoh hHozh oiqbroh azl aiSh׃ 
acts 5:11	othi irah gdolh el kl hqhl oel kl hSmeim at alh׃ 
acts 5:12	oieSo atot omoptim rbim bqrb hem el idi hSliHim oklm naspo lb aHd baolm Sl Slmh׃ 
acts 5:13	omn haHrim ain aiS aSr mlao lbo lHlot elihm ak hoqir atm hem׃ 
acts 5:14	abl nspHo eod itr maminim al hadon anSim onSim hrbh mad׃ 
acts 5:15	ed ki nSao at hHolim al hrHbot oiSimom el mTot omSkbot lmen aSr ilk pTros onpl ak zlo el aHd mhm׃ 
acts 5:16	ogm hmon em herim aSr msbib nqbzo iroSlim mbiaim at hHolim oat hnlHzim mroHot Tmaot oirpao klm׃ 
acts 5:17	oiqm hkhn hgdol okl aSr ato ohm anSi kt hzdoqim oimlao qnah׃ 
acts 5:18	oiSlHo id bSliHim oitnom bmSmr heir׃ 
acts 5:19	oihi blilh oiptH mlak ihoh at dlti bit hkla oioziam lamr׃ 
acts 5:20	lko ohtizbo bmqdS odbro al hem at kl dbri hHiim halh׃ 
acts 5:21	ohm kSmem at cat bao al hmqdS bhit hbqr oilmdo Sm oiba hkhn hgdol oaSr ato oiqrao al hsnhdrin oal kl cqni bni iSral oiSlHo al bit hasorim lhbia atm׃ 
acts 5:22	oilko hmSrtim ola mzaom bbit hkla oiSobo oigido lamr׃ 
acts 5:23	at bit hasorim mzano sgor omsgr ohSmrim emdim el hdltot okaSr ptHno la nmza bo adm׃ 
acts 5:24	oihi kSme hkhn ongid hmqdS oraSi hkhnim at hdbrim halh oibhlo elihm oiamro aik ipl hdbr hch׃ 
acts 5:25	oaiS aHd ba oigd lhm lamr hnh hanSim aSr Smtm bmSmr emdim hm bmqdS omlmdim at hem׃ 
acts 5:26	oilk Smh hngid em mSrtio oiqHm ak la bHcqh ki irao mpni hem pn isqlo׃ 
acts 5:27	oibiao atm oiemidom lpni hsnhdrin oiSalm hkhn hgdol lamr׃ 
acts 5:28	hla zoh zoino elikm lblti lmd bSm hch ohnh mlatm at iroSlim tortkm otHpzo lhbia elino at dmi haiS hch׃ 
acts 5:29	oien pTros ohSliHim oiamro hla elino lhqSib bqol alhim mhqSib bqol bni adm׃ 
acts 5:30	alhi abotino hqim at ihoSe aSr SlHtm idkm bo ottlo aoto el hez׃ 
acts 5:31	at ch nSa halhim bimino lSr olmoSie ltt tSobh liSral osliHt hHTaim׃ 
acts 5:32	oanHno edio el alh ogm roH hqdS aSr ntn aoto halhim lSmeim bqolo׃ 
acts 5:33	oihi kSmem oitrgco oitiezo lhrog atm׃ 
acts 5:34	oiqm btok hsnhdrin aHd mn hproSim gmlial Smo ohoa morh htorh mkbd beini kl hem oizo lhozia at hSliHim hHozh lcmn meT׃ 
acts 5:35	oiamr alihm anSi iSral hSmro lkm mpni hanSim halh bmh Satm eSim lhm׃ 
acts 5:36	ki lpni himim halh qm tods oitn at npSo kaHd hgdolim oidbqo bo karbe maot aiS oihrg okl aSr Smeo alio htprdo oihio lain׃ 
acts 5:37	oaHr kn qm ihodh hglili bimi hspr oist aHrio em rb ogm hoa nhrg okl aSr Smeo alio npzo׃

acts 5:39	oam mat halhim hia la toklo lhpr ath pn tmzao nlHmim at halhim׃

acts 5:41	oizao SmHim mlpni hsnhdrin el ki cko lSat el Smo klmh׃ 
acts 5:42	okl hiom la Hdlo llmd bmqdS obbtim olbSr at bSort ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
acts 6:1	bimim hhm kaSr rbo htlmidim hith tlont hionim el hebriim el aSr helimo einihm malmnotihm lblti tt lhn iom iom at aroHtn׃

acts 6:3	lkn aHi bro lkm Sbeh anSim mqrbkm aSr Sm Tob lhm omlaim roH hqdS oHkmh onpqidm el henin hch׃ 
acts 6:4	oanHno nSqd el htplh oel SmoS hdbr׃ 
acts 6:5	oiiTb hdbr lpni kl hhmon oibHro at asTpnos aiS mla amonh oroH hqdS oat pilpos oat prokoros oat niqnor oat Timon oat prmns oat niqls gr anTiokia׃ 
acts 6:6	at alh hemido lpni hSliHim oitpllo oismko at idihm elihm׃ 
acts 6:7	oihi dbr halhim holk ogdl oirb mspr htlmidim biroSlim ed mad ogm hmon rb mn hkhnim nkneo al hamonh׃ 
acts 6:8	oasTpnos mla amonh ogborh oieS atot omoptim gdolim bqrb hem׃

acts 6:15	oistklo bo kl hiSbim bsnhdrin oirao at pnio kpni mlak alhim׃ 
acts 7:1	oiamr hkhn hgdol hamt hoa aSr dbro׃ 
acts 7:2	oien oiamr anSim aHim oabot Smeo alhi hkbod nrah al abrhm abino bhioto barm nhrim lpni Sbto bHrn׃ 
acts 7:3	oiamr alio lk lk marzk ommoldtk oba al harz aSr arak׃ 
acts 7:4	oiza marz kSdim oiSb bHrn oaHri mot abio hebir ato mSm al harz hcat aSr atm iSbim bh eth׃ 
acts 7:5	ola ntn lo nHlh bh ap la mdrk kp rgl oibTH ltth laHch lo olcreo aHrio oeod la hih lo bn׃ 
acts 7:6	oiamr lo alhim ki gr ihih creo barz la lhm oebdom oeno atm arbe maot Snh׃ 
acts 7:7	ogm at hgoi aSr iebdo dn anki amr alhim oaHri kn izao oiebdoni bmqom hch׃

acts 7:9	oiqnao habot biosp oimkro aoto mzrimh oalhim hih emo׃ 
acts 7:10	oizilho mkl zrotio oitn lo Hn oHkmh lpni preh mlk mzrim oiSimho SliT el mzrim oel kl bito׃ 
acts 7:11	oihi reb el kl arz mzrim oknen ozrh gdolh oabotino la mzao akl׃ 
acts 7:12	oiSme ieqb ki iS Sbr bmzrim oiSlH Smh at abotino bpem hraSonh׃ 
acts 7:13	obpem hSnit htode iosp al aHio omoldt iosp nglth lpreh׃ 
acts 7:14	oiSlH iosp oiqra lieqb abio olkl mSpHto bSbeim oHmS npS׃ 
acts 7:15	oird ieqb mzrimh oimt hoa oabotino׃ 
acts 7:16	oiobao Skmh oioSmo bqbr aSr qnh abrhm bkspo mid bni Hmor abi Skm׃ 
acts 7:17	oihi kaSr qrbh et hhbTHh aSr nSbe alhim labrhm oigdl hem oirb bmzrim׃ 
acts 7:18	ed ki qm mlk aHr aSr la ide at iosp׃ 
acts 7:19	och htHkm lmSpHtno oire labotino oizo atm lhSlik at ellihm al pni hSdh lblti hHiotm׃ 
acts 7:20	bet hhia nold mSh oihi Tob lalhim oihi amon bbit abio SlSh irHim׃ 
acts 7:21	okaSr hSlk asph ato bt preh otgdlho lh lbn׃ 
acts 7:22	oilmd mSh bkl Hkmt mzrim oihi gbor bdbrim obmeSim׃ 
acts 7:23	obmlat lo arbeim Snh elh el lbo lpqd at aHio bni iSral׃ 
acts 7:24	oira aiS aHd meSq Hnm oioSe lo oiqm nqmt hmkh bhkoto at hmzri׃ 
acts 7:25	oiHSb blbbo ki ibino aHio aSr el ido itn halhim lhm tSoeh ohm la hbino׃ 
acts 7:26	oihi biom hSni oiba btokm ohm nzim oibqS leSot Slom binihm lamr anSim aHim atm olmh teSqo aiS at aHio׃ 
acts 7:27	oheSq at reho hdpo lamr mi Smk laiS Sr oSpT elino׃ 
acts 7:28	hlhrgni ath amr kaSr hrgt atml at hmzri׃ 
acts 7:29	oibrH mSh el hdbr hch oihi gr barz mdin oiold Sm Sni bnim׃ 
acts 7:30	obmlat arbeim Snh nrah alio mlak ihoh bmdbr hr sini blbt aS mtok hsnh׃ 
acts 7:31	oira mSh oitmh el hmrah obsoro lraot oihi qol ihoh alio׃ 
acts 7:32	anki alhi abotik alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb oiHrd mSh oiira mhbiT׃ 
acts 7:33	oiamr alio ihoh Sl nelik mel rglik ki hmqom aSr ath eomd elio admt qdS hoa׃ 
acts 7:34	rah raiti at eni emi aSr bmzrim oat naqtm Smeti oard lhzilm oeth lkh oaSlHk mzrimh׃ 
acts 7:35	hoa mSh aSr kHSo bo lamr mi Smk lSr oSpT ato SlH halhim lSr ogal bid hmlak hnrah alio bsnh׃ 
acts 7:36	ohoa hoziam oieS atot omptim barz mzrim obim sop obmdbr arbeim Snh׃ 
acts 7:37	hoa mSh aSr amr al bni iSral nbia mqrb aHikm kmni iqim lkm ihoh alhikm alio tSmeon׃ 
acts 7:38	hoa aSr hih bqhl bmdbr em hmlak hdbr alio bhr sini oem abotino oaSr qbl dbrim Hiim ltt lno׃ 
acts 7:39	hoa aSr abotino la abo lSme lo ki am maso ato olbbm pnh mzrimh׃ 
acts 7:40	oiamro al ahrn eSh lno alhim aSr ilko lpnino ki ch mSh aSr helno marz mzrim la ideno mh hih lo׃ 
acts 7:41	oieSo egl bimim hhm oicbHo cbHim lalil oiSmHo bmeSh idihm׃ 
acts 7:42	oipn mhm halhim oitnm lebd at zba hSmim kaSr ktob bspr hnbiaim hcbHim omnHh hgStm li bmdbr arbeim Snh bit iSral׃ 
acts 7:43	onSatm at skt mlkm oat kokb alhikm rmpn hzlmim aSr eSitm lhStHot lhm ohgliti atkm mhlah lbbl׃ 
acts 7:44	mSkn hedot hih labotino bmdbr kaSr zoh hmdbr al mSh leSot ato ktbnit aSr rah׃ 
acts 7:45	oabotino lqHho ogm hbiaho atm hm oihoSe brStm at arzot hgoim aSr grS atm alhim mpni abotino ed imi dod׃ 
acts 7:46	ohoa mza Hn beini alhim oiSal lmza mSknot lalhi ieqb׃ 
acts 7:47	oSlmh bnh lo bit׃ 
acts 7:48	abl helion la iSkn bhiklot meSi idim kaSr amr hnbia׃ 
acts 7:49	hSmim ksai oharz hdm rgli ai ch bit aSr tbno li amr ihoh oai ch mqom mnoHti׃ 
acts 7:50	hla at kl alh idi eSth׃ 
acts 7:51	qSi erp oerli lb oacnim mmrim hiitm tmid broH hqdS kabotikm gm atm׃ 
acts 7:52	mi mhnbiaim aSr la rdpoho abotikm ap hmito at hmbSrim mqdm biat hzdiq aSr eth hiitm atm mosrio omrzHio׃ 
acts 7:53	atm aSr qbltm at htorh el idi mlakot hmlakim ola Smrtm aoth׃ 
acts 7:54	oihi kSmem at alh htrgco blbbm oiHrqo elio Snihm׃ 
acts 7:55	ohoa mla roH hqdS oibT hSmimh oira at kbod alhim oat ihoSe nzb limin halhim׃

acts 7:59	oisqlo at asTpnos ohoa mSoe oamr adni ihoSe qbl at roHi׃ 
acts 7:60	oikre el brkio oizeq bqol gdol ihoh al tSmr lhm at hHTa hch oihi aHri dbro kdbr hch oiiSn׃ 
acts 8:1	oSaol gm hoa hih rzh bhrgto othi biom hhoa rdiph gdolh el hqhlh aSr biroSlim oipzo klm beri ihodh oSmron lbd mn hSliHim׃ 
acts 8:2	oiSao anSim Hsidim at asTpnos oiqbrho oispdo elio mspd gdol׃ 
acts 8:3	oSaol hHrib at hqhlh oiSoTT bbtim oisHb mSm anSim onSim oisgirm lkla׃ 
acts 8:4	ohnpozim ebro barz oibSro at hdbr׃ 
acts 8:5	opilpos ird al eir Smron oikrc lhm at hmSiH׃ 
acts 8:6	oiqSb hmon hem blb aHd al amri pilpos bSmem obraotm at hatot aSr eSh׃ 
acts 8:7	ki rbim hio aHoci roHot hTmah ohroHot izao mhm zeqot bqol gdol orbim nki abrim opsHim oirpao׃ 
acts 8:8	othi SmHh gdolh beir hhia׃ 
acts 8:9	oaiS aHd oSmo Smeon hih mlpnim beir mkSp omSmim at em Smron bamro el npSo ki gdol hoa׃ 
acts 8:10	oiqSibo alio mqTnm oed gdolm lamr ch hoa gbort halhim hgdolh׃ 
acts 8:11	oiqSibo alio el hioto mSmim aotm bkSpio imim rbim׃ 
acts 8:12	oihi kaSr hamino lpilpos bbSro at mlkot halhim oat Sm ihoSe hmSiH oiTblo anSim onSim׃ 
acts 8:13	oiamn Smeon gm hoa oiTbl oidbq bpilpos oira at hatot ohmptim hgdlim aSr neSo oiStomm׃ 
acts 8:14	oiSmeo hSliHim aSr biroSlim ki qblh Smron at dbr halhim oiSlHo alihm at pTros oat ioHnn׃ 
acts 8:15	oirdo Smh oitpllo bedm aSr iqblo at roH hqdS׃ 
acts 8:16	ki hroH la zlHh ed eth el aHd mhm ohm rq nTblim bSm hadon ihoSe׃ 
acts 8:17	oismko at idihm elihm oiqblo at roH hqdS׃ 
acts 8:18	oihi braot Smeon ki bsmikot idi hSliHim ntn roH hqdS oiba lpnihm ksp׃ 
acts 8:19	oiamr tno na gm li at hiklt hcat aSr iqbl at roH hqdS kl aSr aSim elio at idi׃ 
acts 8:20	oiamr alio pTros kspk ihi atk labdon ien HSbt lqnot bmHir at mtt halhim׃ 
acts 8:21	ain lk Hlq ogorl bdbr hch ki lbbk ainno iSr lpni halhim׃ 
acts 8:22	oeth Sob mretk cat ohtHnn al halhim aoli tslH lk mcmt lbbk׃ 
acts 8:23	ki rah anki ki bat lidi mrort roS oHrzbot rSe׃ 
acts 8:24	oien Smeon oiamr hetiro atm bedi al ihoh lblti boa eli dbr mkl aSr amritm׃ 
acts 8:25	ohmh aHri aSr heidh odbro at dbr ihoh Sbo iroSlim oibSro at hbSorh bkprim rbim aSr lSmronim׃ 
acts 8:26	oidbr mlak ihoh al pilpos lamr qom lk hngbh el hdrk hirdt miroSlim ecth ohia Hrbh׃ 
acts 8:27	oiqm oilk ohnh aiS koSi ohoa sris oSliT lqndq mlkt koS ommnh el kl gncih aSr elh al iroSlim lhStHot׃ 
acts 8:28	oihi bSobo ohoa iSb el mrkbto oqra bspr iSeih hnbia׃ 
acts 8:29	oiamr hroH al pilpos gSh ohloh el hmrkbh hcat׃ 
acts 8:30	oirz pilpos alih oiSme ato qra bspr iSeih hnbia oiamr hgm tbin at aSr ath qora׃ 
acts 8:31	oiamr oaikkh aokl am ain aiS aSr iorni oibqS mat pilpos lelot olSbt azlo׃ 
acts 8:32	oenin hktob aSr qra ch hoa kSh lTbH iobl okrHl lpni goccih nalmh ola iptH pio׃ 
acts 8:33	bezr mSpTo lqH oat doro mi iSoHH ki ngcro marz Hiio׃ 
acts 8:34	oien hsris oiamr al pilpos aSalh mmk el mi hnbia mdbr at cat el npSo ao el aiS aHr׃ 
acts 8:35	oiptH pilpos at pio oiHl mn hktob hch oibSr aoto at ihoSe׃ 
acts 8:36	oihi bebrm bdrk oibao al mqom mim oiamr hsris hnh mim mh imneni mhTbl׃ 
acts 8:37	oiamr pilpos am mamin ath bkl lbbk mtr lk oien oiamr ani mamin ki ihoSe hmSiH bn halhim hoa׃ 
acts 8:38	oizo lhemid at hmrkbh oirdo Snihm al tok hmim pilpos ohsris oiTbl aoto׃ 
acts 8:39	oihi ki elo mn hmim oiSa roH ihoh at pilpos ola isp hsris lraoto ki hlk ldrko SmH׃ 
acts 8:40	opilpos nmza baSdod oiebr oibSr bkl herim ed bao lqsrin׃ 
acts 9:1	oSaol eodno ipH cem orzH el tlmidi hadon oiba al hkhn hgdol׃ 
acts 9:2	oiSal mato mktbim ldmSq al bti hknsiot lmen aSr iasr at aSr imza bdrk hhia anSim ao nSim oibiam iroSlim׃ 
acts 9:3	oihi hoa hlk oqrb ldmSq ohnh ptam ngh elio msbib aor mn hSmim׃ 
acts 9:4	oipl arzh oiSme qol mdbr alio Saol Saol lmh trdpni׃ 
acts 9:5	oiamr mi ath adni oiamr hadon anki ihoSe aSr ath rodp qSh lk lbeT bdrbnot׃ 
acts 9:6	ohoa Hrd onbet oiamr adni mh tHpz oaeSh oien hadon qom lk heirh oiamr lk at aSr elik leSot׃ 
acts 9:7	ohanSim aSr hlko ato emdo nalmim ki Smeo at hqol oaiS la hbiTo׃ 
acts 9:8	oiqm Saol mn harz obptHo at einio la rah aiS oiHciqo bido oiolikho ldmSq׃ 
acts 9:9	oiHSko einio mraot SlSt imim ola akl ola Sth׃ 
acts 9:10	otlmid aHd hih bdmSq Hnnih Smo oiamr alio hadon bmHch Hnnih oiamr hnni adni׃ 
acts 9:11	oiamr alio hadon qom lk al hrHob hnqra hiSr oSal bbit ihodh laiS Trsi oSmo Saol ki hnh hoa mtpll׃ 
acts 9:12	oira bmHch ohnh aiS oSmo Hnnih ba hHdrh oSm elio at ido lmen iSob oirah׃ 
acts 9:13	oien Hnnih oiamr adni Smeti rbim msprim el haiS hch kmh reot eSh lqdoSik biroSlim׃ 
acts 9:14	ogm ph rSion iS lo mat raSi hkhnim lasr at kl hqraim bSmk׃ 
acts 9:15	oiamr alio hadon lk ki kli Hpz hoa li lSat at Smi lpni goim omlkim olpni bni iSral׃ 
acts 9:16	ki ani araho kmh iS lo lsbl lmen Smi׃ 
acts 9:17	oilk Hnnih oiba hbith oiSm at idio elio oiamr Saol aHi hadon ihoSe hnrah alik bdrk aSr bat bh SlHni lmen tSob otrah otmla roH hqdS׃ 
acts 9:18	okrge nplo mel einio kmo qSqSim oiSb ptam lraot oiqm oiTbl׃ 
acts 9:19	oiakl lHm oiHcq oiSb Saol imim aHdim em htlmidim aSr bdmSq׃ 
acts 9:20	oimhr oiqra bbti hknsiot at hmSiH lamr ki hoa hoa bn halhim׃ 
acts 9:21	oiStommo kl hSmeim oiamro hla ch hoa aSr habid biroSlim at qrai hSm hch olmen cat ba hnh lhbiam asorim lpni raSi hkhnim׃ 
acts 9:22	oSaol hih holk oHcq oihm at hihodim iSbi dmSq bhokiHo ki ch hoa hmSiH׃ 
acts 9:23	oihi ki arko lo Sm himim oioezo hihodim iHdo lhmito׃ 
acts 9:24	oiode lSaol arbm ohmh Smro at hSerim iomm olilh lmen imitho׃ 
acts 9:25	oiqHo ato htlmidim lilh oioridho bsl bed hHomh׃ 
acts 9:26	oihi kboa Saol iroSlimh oibqS lhlot al htlmidim oiirao klm mpnio ola hamino ki tlmid hoa׃ 
acts 9:27	oiqH ato br nba oibiaho al hSliHim oispr lhm at aSr rah bdrk at hadon oki hoa dbr alio oaik bdmSq hSmie bbTHon at Sm ihoSe׃ 
acts 9:28	oihi atm ioza oba biroSlim׃ 
acts 9:29	oiqra bbTHon bSm hadon ihoSe oidbr oitokH gm em hihodim hionim ohm cmmo lhmito׃ 
acts 9:30	oiSmeo haHim oiorido ato lqsrin oiSlHho al Trsos׃ 
acts 9:31	oihi Slom lqhlot bkl mqmot ihodh ohglil oSmron otbninh otthlknh birat hadon otrbinh bnHmt roH hqdS׃ 
acts 9:32	oihi bsbb pTros bkl hmqmot oird gm al hqdoSim aSr iSbo bld׃ 
acts 9:33	oimza Sm aiS Smo anis ohoa Skb el mSkbo ch Smnh Snim ohoa nkh abrim׃ 
acts 9:34	oiamr alio pTros anis rpak ihoSe hmSiH qom hze lk ath oiqm ptam׃ 
acts 9:35	oirao aoto kl iSbi ld ohSron oipno al hadon׃ 
acts 9:36	otlmidh bipo oSmh Tbita trgomo zbih ohia mlah meSim Tobim ozdqot aSr eSth׃ 
acts 9:37	oihi bimim hhm otHlh otmt oirHzo ath oiSimoh belih׃ 
acts 9:38	old qrobh hia lipo oiSmeo htlmidim ki pTros Sm oiSlHo alio Sni anSim oipzro bo lblti hezl lebr alihm׃ 
acts 9:39	oiqm pTros oilk atm obbao helho al helih otnSnh alio kl halmnot bokiot omraot lo at hktnt oat hbgdim aSr eSth zbih beodh emhn׃ 
acts 9:40	oioza pTros at klm hHozh oikre el brkio oitpll oipn al goith oiamr Tbita qomi otptH at einih otra at pTros otteodd׃ 
acts 9:41	oiSlH ido oiqm ath oiqra at hqdoSim oat halmnot oiemd ath Hih lpnihm׃ 
acts 9:42	oiode hdbr bkl ipo oiamino rbim badon׃ 
acts 9:43	oioal lSbt bipo imim rbim em borsi aHd oSmo Smeon׃ 
acts 10:1	oaiS hih bqsrin oSmo qrnilios Sr mah mn hgdod hnqra haiTlqi׃ 
acts 10:2	ohoa Hsid oira alhim em kl bni bito oeSh zdqot hrbh lem omtpll tmid lalhim׃ 
acts 10:3	omHch nrah alio kSeh htSieit liom oira mlak alhim ba alio pnimh oamr qrnilios׃ 
acts 10:4	oibT alio oiira oiamr mh ch adni oiamr alio tplotik ozdqotik elo lckron lpni halhim׃ 
acts 10:5	oeth SlH lk anSim al ipo ohba alik at Smeon hmknh pTros׃ 
acts 10:6	hoa mtgorr em borsi aHd Smeon Smo aSr bito el id him hoa iamr lk at aSr elik leSot׃ 
acts 10:7	oilk lo hmlak hdbr al qrnilios oiqra al Snim mebdi bito oal aiS mlHmh aHd ira alhim mn hemdim tmid lpnio lSrto׃ 
acts 10:8	oispr lhm at kl hdbrim oiSlHm al ipo׃ 
acts 10:9	oihi mmHrt ohmh hlkim bdrk oqrbim leir oiel pTros el hgg lhtpll kSeh hSSit׃ 
acts 10:10	ohoa reb oitao lTem lHm obhkinm lo nplh trdmh elio׃ 
acts 10:11	oira at hSmim nptHim ohnh kli ird alio kdmot mTpHt bd gdolh oiord barbe knpotio el harz׃ 
acts 10:12	obtoko mkl bhmt harz oHih ormS oeop hSmim׃ 
acts 10:13	oihi qol alio lamr qom pTros cbH oakl׃ 
acts 10:14	oiamr pTros Hlilh li adni ki meolm la aklti kl pgol oTma׃ 
acts 10:15	oihi eod qol alio pem Snit lamr at aSr Thr halhim ath al tTmano׃ 
acts 10:16	okn hih SlS pemim ohkli Sb ohelh hSmimh׃ 
acts 10:17	oihi bhtpem roH pTros el hmrah aSr rah ohnh hanSim hSloHim mat qrnilios Salo lbit Smeon oiemdo el hptH׃ 
acts 10:18	oiqrao oidrSo hiS mtgorr Sm Smeon hmknh pTros׃ 
acts 10:19	opTros eodno HSb em lbbo el hmrah ohroH amr alio hnh SlSh anSim mbqSim aotk׃ 
acts 10:20	lkn qom rd olkh na atm oal ttmhmh ki anki SlHtim׃ 
acts 10:21	oird pTros al hanSim hnSlHim alio mat qrnilios oiamr anki haiS aSr atm mbqSim lmh ch batm hnh׃ 
acts 10:22	oiamro qrnilios Sr mah aiS zdiq oira alhim olo Sm Tob bkl em hihodim zoh el pi mlak qdoS lqra lk al bito olSme dbrim mpik׃ 
acts 10:23	oiqra atm alio oiaspm hbith oihi mmHrt oiza pTros atm omqzt haHim aSr bipo hlko emo׃ 
acts 10:24	olmHrto bao al qsrin oqrnilios mHkh lhm oemo bni mSpHto oqrobio omideio hnqhlim alio׃ 
acts 10:25	oihi kboa pTros oiza qrnilios lqrato oipl lrglio oiStHo׃ 
acts 10:26	oiqm aoto pTros oiamr qom ki gm ani anoS anki׃ 
acts 10:27	oidbr ato oiba hbith oimza rbim naspim Smh׃ 
acts 10:28	oiamr alihm atm idetm ki asor hoa laiS ihodi lhlot olqrb al nkri oati horh alhim lblti amr Hl ao Tma el kl adm׃ 
acts 10:29	obebor cat kaSr nqrati la nmneti mhlk oeth aSalkm mdoe qratm li׃ 
acts 10:30	oiamr qrnilios ch arbeh imim hiiti zm ed hSeh hcat obSeh htSieit htpllti btok biti ohnh aiS nzb lpni blboS chr׃ 
acts 10:31	oiamr qrnilios nSmeh tpltk ozdqotik hio lckron lpni halhim׃ 
acts 10:32	oeth SlH al ipo oqra alik at Smeon hmknh pTros mtgorr hoa bbit Smeon hborsi el him aSr bboao idbr lk׃ 
acts 10:33	oamhr oaSlH alik oath hiTbt leSot aSr bat ali ohnno klno ph lpni halhim lSme at kl aSr zoit mat ihoh׃ 
acts 10:34	oiptH pTros at pio oiamr eth ideti bamt ki halhim ainno nSa pnim׃ 
acts 10:35	ki am bkl em oem hira aoto oeSh zdq rzoi hoa lpnio׃ 
acts 10:36	oiSlH at dbro lbni iSral oibSr at hSlom el idi ihoSe hmSiH ohoa adon hkl׃ 
acts 10:37	atm idetm at hdbr hneSh bkl ihodh hHl mn hglil aHri hTbilh aSr qra aoth ioHnn׃ 
acts 10:38	at aSr mSH halhim at ihoSe hnzri broH hqdS obgborh oiebr barz eSh Hsd orpa at kl hnkbSim tHt id hSTn ki halhim hih emo׃ 
acts 10:39	oanHno edim el kl aSr eSh barz hihodim obiroSlim oaSr hrgho bhoqiem ato el hez׃ 
acts 10:40	aoto hqim halhim biom hSliSi oitnho lhraot bgloi׃ 
acts 10:41	la lkl hem ki am lno hedim aSr halhim bHr bhm mraS aSr aklno oStino ato aHri qomo mn hmtim׃ 
acts 10:42	oizo atno lhSmie lem olheid ki ato Sm halhim lSopT hHiim ohmtim׃ 
acts 10:43	oelio kl hnbiaim meidim ki iqblo sliHt hHTaim bSmo kl hmaminim bo׃ 
acts 10:44	eod pTros mdbr hdbrim halh oroH hqdS zlHh el kl hSmeim at hdbr׃ 
acts 10:45	ohmaminim bni hmilh aSr bao at pTros hStommo ki mtnt roH hqdS nSpkh gm el hgoim׃ 
acts 10:46	ki Smeo atm mmllim blSnot omgdlim at halhim׃ 
acts 10:47	oien pTros oiamr hiokl aiS lmne at hmim mTbl at alh aSr qblo at roH hqdS gm hm kmno׃ 
acts 10:48	oizo lTbl atm bSm hadon oibqSo mmno lSbt atm imim aHdim׃ 
acts 11:1	oiSmeo hSliHim ohaHim aSr bihodh ki qblo gm hgoim at dbr halhim׃ 
acts 11:2	oihi kaSr elh pTros iroSlim oiribo emo bni hmilh lamr׃ 
acts 11:3	al anSim aSr lhm erlh bat otakl atm lHm׃ 
acts 11:4	oiHl pTros oispr lhm at kl aSr qrho lamr׃ 
acts 11:5	mtpll hiiti beir ipo oardm oara mrah ohnh kli kdmot mTpHt bd gdolh iord mn hSmim otord barbe knpotih otba edi׃ 
acts 11:6	ohstklti bh oabin oara at bhmt harz oat hHih ormS hadmh oeop hSmim׃ 
acts 11:7	oaSme gm qol hamr ali qom pTros cbH oakl׃ 
acts 11:8	oamr Hlilh li adni ki kl pgol oTma la ba bpi meolm׃ 
acts 11:9	oienni hqol Snit mn hSmim oiamr at aSr Thr halhim ath al tTmano׃ 
acts 11:10	okn hih SlS pemim ohkl Sb ohelh hSmimh׃ 
acts 11:11	ohnh krge SlSh anSim emdim el ptH hbit aSr anki Sm ohmh SloHim ali mqsrin׃ 
acts 11:12	oiamr ali hroH llkt atm olblti htmhmh oilko ati gm SSt haHim halh onboa al bit haiS׃ 
acts 11:13	oigd lno at aSr rah hmlak nzb bbito oamr alio SlH al ipo anSim oqra alik at Smeon hmknh pTros׃ 
acts 11:14	ohoa idbr alik dbrim aSr toSe bhm ath okl bitk׃ 
acts 11:15	okaSr hHloti ldbr zlHh elihm roH hqdS kaSr zlHh elino btHlh׃ 
acts 11:16	oackr at dbr hadon aSr amr ioHnn hTbil bmim oatm tTblo broH hqdS׃ 
acts 11:17	oeth am mtnh aHt ntn halhim lhm olno hmaminim badon ihoSe hmSiH mi anki ki aezr lalhim׃ 
acts 11:18	oihi kSmem cat oiHriSo oihllo at halhim oiamro akn gm lgoim ntn halhim htSobh lHiim׃ 
acts 11:19	ohnpozim mpni hzrh aSr hith el aodt asTpnos hlko obao ed pinoqia oqpros oanTiokia ola dbro at hdbr ki am al hihodim lbdm׃ 
acts 11:20	oihi btokm anSi qpros oqorini aSr bao al anTiokia oidbro gm al hionim oibSro atm at hadon ihoSe׃ 
acts 11:21	othi emhm id ihoh omspr rb hamino oiSobo al hadon׃ 
acts 11:22	oiSme hdbr bacni hqhlh aSr biroSlim oiSlHo at br nba al anTiokia׃ 
acts 11:23	oiba Smh oiSmH krato at Hsd halhim oichr at klm ldbqh badon blb nkon׃ 
acts 11:24	ki aiS Tob hih omla roH hqdS oamonh oiaspo ladon em rb׃ 
acts 11:25	oilk br nba mSm al Trsos lbqS at Saol oimza ato oibiaho al anTiokia׃ 
acts 11:26	oihio iSbim iHd bqhlh Snh tmimh omlmdim em rb ac hoHl banTiokia lqra at htlmidim bSm mSiHiim׃ 
acts 11:27	oihi bimim hhm oibao nbiaim miroSlim al anTiokia׃ 
acts 11:28	oiqm aHd mhm oSmo agbos oigd el pi hroH ki reb gdol iboa el kl iSbi tbl oihi kn bimi qlodios׃ 
acts 11:29	oioezo htlmidim lSlH aiS aiS maSr tSig ido lecrt haHim hiSbim bihodh׃ 
acts 11:30	okn gm eSo oiSlHo al hcqnim el idi br nba oSaol׃ 
acts 12:1	bet hhia SlH hmlk hordos at ido lhre lanSim mn hqhl׃ 
acts 12:2	oimt at ieqb aHi ioHnn bHrb׃ 
acts 12:3	oira ki Tob hdbr beini hihodim oiosp ltpS gm at pTros ohimim imi Hg hmzot׃ 
acts 12:4	oiaHc ato oitnho bmSmr oimsrho larbe mHlqot Sl arbeh anSi zba lSmro ki amr lheloto aHri hpsH lpni hem׃ 
acts 12:5	pTros hih ezor bmSmr ohqhlh hetirh bedo bHcqh al halhim׃ 
acts 12:6	oihi blilh hhoa aSr amr hordos lhbiao mHr ldin oiiSn pTros bin Sni anSi zba ohoa asor bSnim cqim oSmri hptH Smrim at hmSmr׃ 
acts 12:7	ohnh mlak ihoh nzb elio oaor ngh bHdr oispq el irk pTros oieirho lamr qom mhrh oiplo mosrotio mel idio׃ 
acts 12:8	oiamr alio hmlak Hgr mtnik ohnel at rglik oieS kn oiamr alio eTh meilk olk aHri׃ 
acts 12:9	oiza oilk aHrio ola ide am amt hoa hneSh lo el idi hmlak ki kmrah hih beinio׃ 
acts 12:10	oiebro drk hmSmrt hraSonh ohSnih oibao ed Ser hbrcl aSr izao bo heirh oiptH hSer lpnihm malio oizao hHozh oilko mhlk rHob aHd ohmlak sr melio ptam׃ 
acts 12:11	oihi bSobo al deto oiamr pTros eth ch ideti bamt ki halhim SlH at mlako oiplTni mid hordos omkl mcmt em hihodim׃ 
acts 12:12	hoa HSb kcat ohoa ba ed bit mrim am ioHnn hmknh mrqos aSr nqhlo Sm rbim ohm mtpllim iHd׃ 
acts 12:13	oidpq el dlt hSer otgS nerh lhqSib oSmh rodi׃ 
acts 12:14	otkr at qol pTros omSmHth la ptHh lo am dlt hSer otrz hbith otgd lhm ki pTros emd el hSer׃ 
acts 12:15	oiamro alih mSget at ohia mtamzt ki kn hoa oiamro mlako hoa׃ 
acts 12:16	opTros hrbh ldpq oiptHo oiraho oiStommo׃ 
acts 12:17	ohoa rmc lhm bido lHSot oispr lhm at aSr hoziao hadon mn hmSmr oiamr hgido at cat lieqb olaHim oiza oilk lo lmqom aHr׃ 
acts 12:18	hbqr aor ombokh la qTnh hith bin anSi hzba el pTros mh hih lo׃ 
acts 12:19	oihi kaSr bqS aoto hordos ola mzao Hqr at hSmrim oizo lhoziam lmot oird mihodh al qsrin oiSb Sm׃ 
acts 12:20	oaibh hith bin hordos obin bni zor ozidon oibao alio blb aHd oipto at blsTos aSr el Hdr hmlk oibqSo Slom ien lqHo mHit arzotm marz hmlk׃ 
acts 12:21	oihi biom hmoed oilbS hordos lboS mlkot oiSb el ksa hmSpT oiTp alihm amrto׃ 
acts 12:22	oirieo lo hem lamr qol alhim hoa ola qol adm׃ 
acts 12:23	oikho mlak ihoh ptam eqb aSr la ntn hkbod lalhim oiaklho toleim oigoe׃ 
acts 12:24	odbr alhim holk orb׃ 
acts 12:25	oiSobo br nba oSaol miroSlim aHri klotm at hSmoS oiqHo atm at ioHnn hmknh mrqos׃ 
acts 13:1	oanSim nbiaim omlmdim hio banTiokia bqhlh aSr bh br nba oSmeon hnqra nigr oloqios hqorini omnHm aSr gdl em hordos Sr hrbe oSaol׃ 
acts 13:2	oihi bSrtm at ihoh obzomm oiamr roH hqdS hbdilo li at br nba oat Saol lmlakh aSr qratim lh׃ 
acts 13:3	oizomo oitpllo oismko at idihm elihm oiSlHom׃ 
acts 13:4	ohmh hmSlHim el idi roH hqdS irdo al sloqia omSm bao banih al qpros׃ 
acts 13:5	oibao al eir slmis oigido at dbr halhim bbti hknsiot aSr lihodim oihi lhm gm ioHnn lmSrt׃ 
acts 13:6	oiebro bkl hai ed ppos oimzao aiS mgoS aHd nbia Sqr aiS ihodi oSmo br ihoSe׃ 
acts 13:7	aSr hih em srgios polos Sr hmdinh aiS nbon ohoa qra alio at br nba oat Saol oitao lSme at dbr halhim׃ 
acts 13:8	oiemd lngdm alima hmgoS ki ch trgom Smo oibqS lhTot at hSr mn hamonh׃ 
acts 13:9	oSaol hnqra gm polos mla roH hqdS oistkl bo׃ 
acts 13:10	oiamr ath hmla kl mrmh okl eolh bn bliel oSona kl zdq hla tHdl lslp at drki ihoh hiSrim׃ 
acts 13:11	oeth hnh id ihoh bk ohiit eor ola trah at hSmS ed et moed otpl elio ptam aplh oHSkh oipn hnh ohnh oibqS aiS lholiko bido׃ 
acts 13:12	ohSr kaSr rah at hmeSh hamin oiStomm el tort hadon׃ 
acts 13:13	oizao polos ohanSim aSr ato mppos oirdo banih oibao al prgi aSr bpmpolia oiecb atm ioHnn oiSb iroSlim׃ 
acts 13:14	ohmh nseo mprgi oibao al anTiokia aSr bpisdia oibao al bit hknst biom hSbt oiSbo׃ 
acts 13:15	oihi aHr qriat htorh ohnbiaim oiSlHo alihm raSi hknst lamr anSim aHim am iS lkm dbr mosr lem dbro׃ 
acts 13:16	oiqm polos oinp ido oiamr anSi iSral oirai alhim Smeo׃ 
acts 13:17	alhi hem hch alhi iSral bHr babotino oiromm at hem bhiotm grim barz mzrim obcroe rmh hoziam mSm׃ 
acts 13:18	oiSa atm oiklklm bmdbr karbeim Snh׃ 
acts 13:19	oiSmd Sbeh goim barz knen oiHlq at arzm lhm lnHlh׃ 
acts 13:20	oaHri kn ntn lhm SpTim karbe maot oHmSim Snh ed imi Smoal hnbia׃ 
acts 13:21	oiSalo mlk oitn lhm alhim at Saol bn qiS aiS mSbT bnimn arbeim Snh׃ 
acts 13:22	okhsiro aoto oiqm at dod lmlk elihm aSr gm heid elio lamr mzati dod at bn iSi aiS klbbi ohoa ieSh at kl Hpzi׃ 
acts 13:23	och hoa aSr mcreo hqim halhim kpi hhbTHh goal liSral at ihoSe׃ 
acts 13:24	aSr lpni boao qdm ioHnn lqra at Tbilt htSobh al kl em iSral׃ 
acts 13:25	oihi kklot ioHnn at mrozto oiamr lmi tHSboni la ani hoa ki hnh hoa ba aHri oani nqlti mhtir at neli rglio׃ 
acts 13:26	anSim aHim bni mSpHt abrhm oirai alhim aSr bqrbkm lkm SloH dbr hihoSeh hcat׃ 
acts 13:27	ki iSbi iroSlim oraSihm ien aSr la hkirho mlao bmSpTm aSr SpTho at dbri hnbiaim hnqraim bkl Sbt׃ 
acts 13:28	oap ki la mzao bo mSpT mot Salo mat pilTos lhmito׃ 
acts 13:29	okaSr hSlimo at kl hdbrim hktobim elio horido aoto mn hez oiniHho bqbr׃ 
acts 13:30	abl halhim hqimo mn hmtim׃ 
acts 13:31	oira imim rbim al helim ato mn hglil iroSlimh ohmh eth edio al hem׃ 
acts 13:32	oanHno mbSrim atkm at bSort hhbTHh aSr hith labotino ki ath mla halhim lbnino bhqimo at ihoSe׃ 
acts 13:33	kktob bmcmor hSni bni ath hiom ildtik׃ 
acts 13:34	oel aSr hqim ato mn hmtim lblti Sob eod lSHt kh amr atn lkm Hsdi dod hnamnim׃ 
acts 13:35	el kn hoa amr gm bmqom aHr la ttn Hsidk lraot SHt׃ 
acts 13:36	ki dod goe aHri Srto bdoro lezt halhim oiasp al abotio oira at hSHt׃ 
acts 13:37	oaSr halhim hqim aoto hoa la rah hSHt׃ 
acts 13:38	lkn anSim aHim iode lkm ki el idi ch hgd lkm sliHt hHTaim׃ 
acts 13:39	obkl aSr la ikltm lhzTdq btort mSh kl hmamin izdq el ido׃ 
acts 13:40	lkn hSmro lkm pn iboa elikm hnamr bnbiaim׃ 
acts 13:41	rao bgdim ohtmho oSmo ki pel pel ani bimikm pel aSr la tamino ki ispr lkm׃ 
acts 13:42	obzat hihodim mbit hknst bqSo mhm hgoim ldbr alihm at hdbrim halh bSbt hbah׃ 
acts 13:43	orbim mn hihodim omgri hzdq hlko aHri polos obr nba bhprd hqhl ohmh dbro el lbm oichirom lemd bHsd halhim׃ 
acts 13:44	obSbt hSnit nqhlh kmeT kl heir lSme at dbr ihoh׃ 
acts 13:45	oihi kraot hihodim at hmon hem oimlao qnah oikHiSo at dbri polos hkHS ogdp׃ 
acts 13:46	ac hgido polos obr nba el pnihm lamr bdin hih lhSmie atkm braSonh at dbr halhim oeth aHri aSr mastm aoto oainkm ckim beinikm lHii heolm lkn hnno pnim al hgoim׃ 
acts 13:47	ki kn zoh elino hadon nttik laor goim lhiot ihoSeti ed qzh harz׃ 
acts 13:48	oiSmHo hgoim kSmem oihllo at dbr ihoh oiamino kl aSr hio moknim lHii eolm׃ 
acts 13:49	oiprz dbr ihoh bkl hmqom׃ 
acts 13:50	ak hihodim hsito at hnSim hHsidot ohHSobot oat azili heir oieorro rdiph el polos obr nba oigrSom mgbolm׃ 
acts 13:51	ohmh nero elihm at hepr mel rglihm oilko laiqnion׃ 
acts 13:52	ohtlmidim mlao SmHh oroH hqdS׃ 
acts 14:1	oihi baiqnion oibao iHdo al bit knst hihodim oidbro Sm ed ki hamin hmon rb mn hihodim omn hionim׃ 
acts 14:2	ak hihodim aSr la hamino eorro ohkeiso at npSot hgoim el haHim׃ 
acts 14:3	oiSbo Sm imim rbim oilmdo bbTHonm bihoh hemid el dbr Hsdo beSoto el idm atot omoptim׃ 
acts 14:4	oiHlq hmon heir lHzi alh nTo aHri hihodim oalh aHri hSliHim׃ 
acts 14:5	oihi rgSt hgoim ohihodim em raSihm lhtell bhm olsqlm׃ 
acts 14:6	oiode lhm oibrHo leri loqonia al losTra odrbi osbibotn׃ 
acts 14:7	oibSro Sm hbSorh׃ 
acts 14:8	oaiS nkh rglim hih blosTra ohoa iSb psH mbTn amo ola hlk mimio׃ 
acts 14:9	oiSme at polos mdbr ohoa hstkl bo oira ki amonh bo lhoSe׃ 
acts 14:10	oiamr bqol gdol emd hkn el rglik oidlg oithlk׃ 
acts 14:11	ohmon hem kraotm at aSr eSh polos nSao at qolm oiamro blSon loqonit irdo alino halhim bdmot anSim׃ 
acts 14:12	oiqrao lbr nba bl olpolos qrao hrmis baSr hoa raS hmdbrim׃ 
acts 14:13	okhn bit bl aSr mHoz leirm hbia hSerh Sorim oeTrot oiHpz lcbH hoa ohmon hem׃ 
acts 14:14	oihi kSme cat hSliHim polos obr nba oiqreo at bgdihm oirozo al tok hem׃ 
acts 14:15	oizeqo lamr anSim lmh teSo kcat gm anHno bni adm HlSim kmokm onbSrh atkm lmen Sob tSobo mn hblikm alh al alhim Hiim aSr eSh at hSmim oat harz oat him oat kl aSr bm׃ 
acts 14:16	oaSr bdrot qdm hniH lkl hgoim llkt bdrkihm׃ 
acts 14:17	ogm la Hdl lheid el ezmo oiiTb lno btto mTr mn hSmim oetot Sbe oimla lbotino mcon oSSon׃ 
acts 14:18	oap bdbrim halh kmeT la ezro kH lkloa at hem mcbH lhm׃ 
acts 14:19	oibao Smh ihodim mn anTiokia omn aiqnion oisito at hem oirgmo at polos babnim oisHbho Hozh leir bHSbm ki mt׃ 
acts 14:20	oisbo ato htlmidim oiqm oiba heirh ommHrt iza al drbi hoa obr nba׃ 
acts 14:21	oibSro at hbSorh beir hhia oaHri hemidm tlmidim hrbh Sbo al losTra oaiqnion oanTiokia׃ 
acts 14:22	oiHcqo at npSot htlmidim oichiro atm lemd bamonh oki rq bzrot rbot boa nboa al mlkot halhim׃ 
acts 14:23	oibHro lhm cqnim bkl qhlh oqhlh oitpllo oizomo oipqidom bid hadon aSr hamino bo׃ 
acts 14:24	oiebro bpisdia oibao al pmpolia׃ 
acts 14:25	oiSmieo at dbr ihoh bprgi oirdo al aTlia׃ 
acts 14:26	omSm bao banih al anTiokia aSr nmsro Sm lHsd alhim el hmlakh aSr mlao ath׃ 
acts 14:27	obbam Smh hqhilo at hedh oigido at kl aSr eSh atm halhim oat aSr ptH lgoim ptH hamonh׃ 
acts 14:28	oiSbo Sm em htlmidim imim la meTim׃ 
acts 15:1	oanSim irdo mihodh oilmdo at haHim lamr am la tmolo kdt mSh la toSeon׃ 
acts 15:2	oihi el cat rib omHlqt la qlh lpolos olbr nba emhm oigcro ki polos obr nba oaHrim mhm ielo iroSlim al hSliHim ohcqnim el adot hSalh hcat׃ 
acts 15:3	otloh atm hqhlh oiebro at pinoqia oat Smron msprim at tSobt hgoim oiSmHo at kl haHim SmHh gdolh׃ 
acts 15:4	oihi kbam iroSlim oiqblo atm hqhlh ohSliHim ohcqnim oigido lhm at aSr hgdil halhim leSot emhm׃ 
acts 15:5	oiqomo anSim maminim mkt hproSim oiamro ki Hobh hia lmol atm olzotm lSmr at tort mSh׃ 
acts 15:6	oiqhlo hSliHim ohcqnim lein bdbr hch׃ 
acts 15:7	oihi brbot hmHlqt qm pTros oiamr alihm anSim aHim atm idetm ki mimim raSim bi bHr halhim mklno aSr iSmeo hgoim mpi at dbr hbSorh oiamino׃ 
acts 15:8	ohalhim ide hlbbot heid elihm btto gm lhm at roH hqdS kaSr ntn lno׃ 
acts 15:9	ola hbdil binino obinihm ki Thr at lbbm el idi hamonh׃ 
acts 15:10	oeth mh tnso at halhim lSom el el zoari htlmidim aSr gm abotino gm anHno la iklno lSat׃ 
acts 15:11	abl bHsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino namin lhoSe kmohm kmono׃ 
acts 15:12	oiHriSo kl hqhl oiSmeo al br nba oal polos msprim at hatot ohmoptim aSr hrbh halhim leSot el idihm bqrb hgoim׃ 
acts 15:13	oiklo ldbr oien ieqb oiamr anSim aHim Smeo ali׃ 
acts 15:14	Smeon spr aik halhim rah lo braSonh lqHt mbin hgoim em lSmo׃ 
acts 15:15	olcat mskimim dbri hnbiaim kktob׃ 
acts 15:16	aHri cat aSob oaqim at skt doid hnplt ohrsotih aqim obnitih׃ 
acts 15:17	lmen idrSo Sarit adm at ihoh okl hgoim aSr nqra Smi elihm nam ihoh eSh kl alh׃ 
acts 15:18	nodeim lalhim meolm kl meSio׃ 
acts 15:19	oel kn ani dn Sla lhHmir el hSbim mn hgoim lalhim׃ 
acts 15:20	rq lktb alihm aSr irHqo mTmat halilim omn hcnot ombSr hnHnq omn hdm׃ 
acts 15:21	ki mSh mdrt eolm iS lo mgidio bkl eir oeir oiqra bbti hknsiot mdi Sbt bSbto׃ 
acts 15:22	oiiTb beini hSliHim ohcqnim em kl hqhl lbHr mhm anSim olSlH atm al anTiokia em polos obr nba at ihodh hmknh br Sba oat sila anSi Sm bin haHim׃ 
acts 15:23	oiktbo oiSlHo el idm lamr anHno hSliHim ohcqnim ohaHim Salim lSlom haHim aSr mn hgoim banTiokia obsoria obqiliqia׃ 
acts 15:24	ien obien Smeno ki izao matno mblblim atkm omqlqlim npStikm bdbrim bamrm lkm lhmol olSmr at htorh aSr la zoino aotm׃ 
acts 15:25	lkn Tob beini klno iHdo lbHr anSim lSlHm alikm em Hbibino br nba opolos׃ 
acts 15:26	anSim aSr msro npSm el Sm adnino ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
acts 15:27	el kn SlHno at ihodh oat sila aSr gm hmh igido cat bpihm׃ 
acts 15:28	ki Tob lpni roH hqdS olpnino lblti Som elikm mSa aHr lbd malh hdbrim hzrikim׃ 
acts 15:29	aSr trHqo mcbHi alilim omn hdm ombSr hnHnq omn hcnot am malh tSmro at npStikm tiTibo leSot oSlom lkm׃ 
acts 15:30	oiSlHo hanSim oibao al anTiokia oiqhilo at hem oitno lhm at hagrt׃ 
acts 15:31	oiqrao ath oiSmHo el hnHmh׃ 
acts 15:32	oihodh osila aSr gm hm nbiaim nHmo haHim bdbrim rbim oiHcqom׃ 
acts 15:33	oihio Sm imim aHdim oiSlHom haHim bSlom al hSliHim׃ 
acts 15:34	oiiTb beini sila lSbt Sm׃ 
acts 15:35	opolos obr nba iSbo banTiokia oilmdo oibSro at dbr ihoh hmh ogm rbim aHrim emm׃ 
acts 15:36	oihi mqz imim oiamr polos al br nba lkh onSobh onpqdh at aHino bkl eir oeir aSr qrano Sm at dbr ihoh onrah mh hmh׃ 
acts 15:37	obr nba iez lqHt atm at ioHnn hmknh mrqos׃ 
acts 15:38	ak polos la abh lqHt atm at haiS aSr sr melihm bpmpolia ola hlk atm bmlaktm׃ 
acts 15:39	oihi rgc ed aSr nprdo aiS maHio oiqH br nba at mrqos oise banih al qpros׃ 
acts 15:40	opolos bHr lo at sila oimsrho haHim al Hsd ihoh oiza׃ 
acts 15:41	oiebr bsoria obqiliqia oiHcq at hqhlot׃ 
acts 16:1	oiba al drbi oal losTra ohnh Sm tlmid aHd oSmo Timotios ohoa bn aSh ihodit mamnt oabio ioni׃ 
acts 16:2	oihi lo Sm Tob bin haHim aSr blosTra obaiqnion׃ 
acts 16:3	bo bHr polos aSr iza ato oiqH oiml ato bebor hihodim aSr bmqmot hhm ki klm ideo at abio ki ioni hoa׃ 
acts 16:4	oihi bebrm berim oimsro lhm lSmr at hpqodim aSr gcro hSliHim ohcqnim aSr biroSlim׃ 
acts 16:5	ottHcqnh hqhlot bamonh oirb msprn iom iom׃ 
acts 16:6	oiebro bprogia obarz glTia ki mnem roH hqdS mhSmie at hdbr basia׃ 
acts 16:7	okbam al mosia hoailo llkt al bitonia ola hniH lhm hroH׃ 
acts 16:8	oiHlpo mmosia oirdo al Troas׃ 
acts 16:9	oHcon nrah al polos blilh ohnh aiS moqdon nzb ohoa mbqS mmno lamr ebr al mqdonia oecrno׃ 
acts 16:10	okrato at hmHch mid bqSno llkt al mqdonia bhbinno ki halhim qrano Smh lbSr atm hbSorh׃ 
acts 16:11	onza mn Troas onrd banih onba drk iSrh al smotrqia ommHrt al npolis׃ 
acts 16:12	omSm al pilpi raSit eri hplk Sl mqdonia ohia bt Horin onSb beir hcat imim aHdim׃ 
acts 16:13	obiom hSbt izano al mHoz leir al id hnhr aSr Sm mqom tplh kmnhgm onSb ondbr al hnSim hnqhlot Smh׃ 
acts 16:14	oaSh irat alihm oSmh lodia mkrt argmn meir tiaTira Smeh oiptH ihoh at lbh lhqSib al dbri polos׃ 
acts 16:15	otTbl hia obni bith otbqS mmno lamr am HSbtm ati namnh ladon bao na al biti oSbo bo otpzr bno׃ 
acts 16:16	oihi blktno lmqom htplh otpge bno SpHh belt aob aSr eSth hon rb ladnih bqsmih׃ 
acts 16:17	otlk aHri polos oaHrino hlok oqroa lamr hanSim halh ebdi al elion hmh hmodieim atno arH hihoSeh׃ 
acts 16:18	okn eSth imim rbim oire beini polos hdbr hch oipn oiamr al hroH anki mzok bSm ihoSe hmSiH lzat mmnh oiza bSeh hhia׃ 
acts 16:19	oirao adnih ki aclh toHlt bzem oitpSo at polos oat sila oisHbom al hrHob lpni cqni heir׃ 
acts 16:20	oibiaom al hSrim oiamro hanSim halh ekrim at eirno ohm ihodim׃ 
acts 16:21	omodieim Hqot aSr la nkon lno lqblm oleStm ki romiim anHno׃ 
acts 16:22	oiqm gm hem elihm ohSrim qreo at bgdihm melihm oizoo lhkotm bSoTim׃ 
acts 16:23	oihi aHri hkot atm mkh rbh oiSlikom bmSmr oizoo at Somr hasorim lSmrm hiTb׃ 
acts 16:24	ohoa kaSr zoh kn hSlikm bHdr hmSmr hpnimi oiSm at rglihm bsd׃ 
acts 16:25	oihi kHzot hlilh oitpllo polos osila oicmro lalhim ohasorim mqSibim alihm׃ 
acts 16:26	optam hih reS gdol ed aSr ceo mosdot bit hkla okrge nptHo kl hdltot omosrot klm ntqo׃ 
acts 16:27	oSomr hasorim neor mSnto oihi krato at dltot hmSmr nptHot oiSlp Hrbo oibqS labd at ezmo bHSbo ki brHo hasorim׃ 
acts 16:28	oiqra polos bqol gdol lamr al teS lk maomh re ki ph anHno klno׃

acts 16:30	oioziam hHozh oiamr adni mh eli leSot lmen aoSe׃ 
acts 16:31	oiamro hamn badon ihoSe hmSiH otoSe ath obitk׃ 
acts 16:32	oigido lo at dbr ihoh olkl aSr bbito׃ 
acts 16:33	oiqHm blilh bSeh hhia oirHz at Hbortihm oimhr lhTbl hoa okl aSr lo׃ 
acts 16:34	oielm al bito oiSm SlHn lpnihm oigl em kl bito el hioto mamin balhim׃ 
acts 16:35	obHit hbqr SlHo hSrim at hSoTrim lamr SlH at hanSim hhm׃ 
acts 16:36	oigd Smr hasorim lpolos at hdbrim halh lamr SlHo hSrim lpTr atkm oeth zao olko bSlom׃ 
acts 16:37	oiamr polos alihm hkh hkono ngd kl hem bla din omSpT oanHno anSim romiim oiSliko atno bmSmr oeth nstr igrSono al na ki am ibao hmh oioziaono׃ 
acts 16:38	oigido hSTrim lSrim at hdbrim halh oihi kSmem ki romiim hm oiirao׃

acts 16:40	oizao mn hmSmr oibao al bit lodia oirao at haHim oichirom oilko ldrkm׃ 
acts 17:1	oihi aHri ebrm bamppolis obaploina oibao al tsloniqi aSr Sm bit knst hihodim׃ 
acts 17:2	opolos nkns alihm kmSpTo oSlS Sbtot dbr emhm bdbri hktobim׃ 
acts 17:3	ptoH ohokH lhm ki zrik hih aSr ienh hmSiH oiqom mn hmtim oki ch hoa hmSiH ihoSe aSr ani mgid lkm׃ 
acts 17:4	oiamino mqztm oispHo el polos osila ogm irai alhim mn hionim lrb ogm nSim HSobot mspr la meT׃ 
acts 17:5	oiqnao hsorrim Sbihodim oiqHo lhm anSi bliel mbTlni hSoq oiqbzo hmon oihmo at heir oisbo el bit ison oibqSo lhbiam Hozh al hem׃ 
acts 17:6	okaSr la mzao aotm sHbo at ison oanSim mn haHim lpni raSi heir oizeqo lamr hnh hmdiHim at kl iSbi tbl bao gm hlom׃ 
acts 17:7	oison asp atm al bito ohm klm eSim ngd dti hqisr bamrm ki iS mlk aHr ohoa ihoSe׃ 
acts 17:8	oiHrido at hem oat raSi heir aSr Smeo at cat׃ 
acts 17:9	oiqHo erbon midi ison omidi haHrim oaHri kn pTrom׃ 
acts 17:10	ohaHim mhro lSlH at polos oat sila lilh lbroah ohm bbam Smh hlko lbit knst hihodim׃ 
acts 17:11	oalh hio ndibim manSi tsloniqi oiqblo at hdbr bkl lb oidrSo bktobim iom iom ldet am kn hoa hdbr׃ 
acts 17:12	oiamino hrbh mhm ogm mn hnSim hHSobot hioniot omn hanSim la meT׃ 
acts 17:13	oihi kaSr Smeo hihodim aSr mtsloniqi ki mgid polos at dbr alhim gm bbroah oibao oierro at hem gm Smh׃ 
acts 17:14	oimhro haHim oiSlHo at polos llkt ed him osila oTimotios nSaro Sm׃ 
acts 17:15	ohmloim at polos holikho ed atins oiqblo mzoto al sila oTimotios ki boa ibao alio bmhrh oilko׃ 
acts 17:16	oihi batins opolos mhkh lhm ottHmz roHo bqrbo brato at heir mlah alilim׃ 
acts 17:17	el kn bbit hknst dbr em hihodim oem irai alhim obSoq iom iom em hnqrim alio׃ 
acts 17:18	ogm mqzt hpilosopim mtlmidi apiqoros omHbrt hasToa htgro bo oiS aSr amro mh iamr hmpTpT hlc oaHrim amrim kpi hnrah hoa mgid alhi nkr ien ki bSr atm at ihoSe oat htHih׃ 
acts 17:19	oiaHcoho oibiaho al gbet hmSpT hnqrah bSm ariopgos oiamro hnokl ldet mh hia co htorh hHdSh aSr ath mSmie׃ 
acts 17:20	ki dbrim crim ath mbia bacnino ohnno Hpzim ldet mh eninm׃ 
acts 17:21	ki hatiniim klm ogm hnkrim hgrim Sm la HSo ldbr aHr ki am lspr ao lSme HdSot׃ 
acts 17:22	oiemd polos btok oed hSpTim oiamr anSi atins hnni rah bkl ki irai alim atm mad׃ 
acts 17:23	ki ani ebr omtbonn al ebdot alhikm oamza mcbH aHd ktob elio lal hnelm oeth at aSr ebdtm oainkm ideim ato ani mgid lkm׃ 
acts 17:24	hal aSr eSh at heolm okl aSr bo la iSkn bhiklot meSh idim ki hoa adon hSmim oharz׃ 
acts 17:25	gm la iSrtoho idi bni adm kalo izTrk ldbr ki hoa hntn lkl Hiim onSmh okl dbr׃ 
acts 17:26	oioSb kl emmi bni adm el kl pni hadmh mdm aHd oizb moedim qboeim ogbolt moSbm׃ 
acts 17:27	lmen ibqSo at halhim aoli imSSho oimzaho ap ki ainno rHoq mkl aHd mmno׃ 
acts 17:28	ki bo anHno Hiim omtnoeeim oqimim kaSr gm mqzt mSorrikm amro ap ilidio anHno׃ 
acts 17:29	ohnh bhiotno ilidi halhim la nkon lno lHSb ki halhot tdmh lchb ao lksp ao labn meSh HrS omHSbt bni adm׃ 
acts 17:30	lkn eth aHri ebr alhim el imot hsklot mzoh hoa at kl bni hadm bkl apsi arz ki Sob iSobo׃ 
acts 17:31	ien aSr St iom lSpT tbl bzdq el idi aiS aSr hpqido oitn edot namnh lklm bhqimo ato mn hmtim׃ 
acts 17:32	okaSr Smeo tHit mtim alh hleigo lo oalh amro el cat nSmek bet aHrt׃ 
acts 17:33	obkn iza polos mtokm׃ 
acts 17:34	omqztm dbqo bo oiamino obhm dionosios mn hSpTim Sl ariopgos oaSh aHt Smh dmris oeod aHrim emhm׃ 
acts 18:1	aHr kn sr polos matins oiba al qorntos׃ 
acts 18:2	oimza ihodi nold bponTos omSo eqils aSr ba mqrob mn aiTlia hoa oaSto prisqlh mpni aSr zoh qlodios at kl hihodim lsor meir romi׃ 
acts 18:3	oiba alihm oihi bhitm bni amnot aHt oiSb atm oieS mlakto oamnotm eSot irieot ahlim׃ 
acts 18:4	oidbr bbit hknst bkl Sbt oSbt oiokH at hihodim oat hionim׃ 
acts 18:5	okboa sila oTimotios mmqdonia hih polos ngS broH lheid al hihodim ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH׃ 
acts 18:6	oihi khmrotm okgdpm oiner at bgdio oiamr alihm dmkm braSikm oanki nqi meth alkh li al hgoim׃ 
acts 18:7	oilk mSm oiba al bit aiS oSmo iosTos aiS ira alhim obito smok lbit hknst׃ 
acts 18:8	oqrispos raS hknst hamin badon hoa okl bito ogm qorntim rbim bSmem hamino oiTblo׃ 
acts 18:9	odbr hadon hih al polos bmHch blilh lamr al tira ki am dbr oal tHSh׃ 
acts 18:10	ki emk anki oaiS al ige bk lhre lk ki goi gdol li beir hcat׃ 
acts 18:11	oiSb Sm Snh oSSh HdSim oilmd bhm at dbr halhim׃ 
acts 18:12	oihi bhiot glion Sr mdint akia oiqomo hihodim klm oHdo el polos oibiaho al ksa hmSpT׃ 
acts 18:13	oiamro haiS hch mpth at bni hadm lebd at alhim bla ktorh׃ 
acts 18:14	oihi ak bqS polos lptH at pio oglion amr al hihodim lamr am hih dbr pSe ao meSh nblh ki eth nSati oSmeti atkm hihodim kmSpT׃ 
acts 18:15	abl am hia Salh el mlin oSmot ohdt Slkm rao atm oani ain rzoni lhiot SpT el dbrim kalh׃ 
acts 18:16	oigrS atm mlpni ksa hmSpT׃ 
acts 18:17	oiaHco kl hionim at sostnim raS hknst oikoho lpni ksa hmSpT oglion la St lbo gm lcat׃ 
acts 18:18	opolos iSb Sm eod imim rbim oipTr mn haHim oird banih llkt al soria oato prisqlh oeqils oiglH at raSo bqnkri ki ndr elio׃ 
acts 18:19	oibao al apsos oiecb atm Sm ohoa hlk lbit hknst oidbr em hihodim׃ 
acts 18:20	oibqSo mmno lharik imi Sbto atm ola abh׃ 
acts 18:21	ki am npTr mhm bamro mHib ani lHg at hHg hba biroSlim oaHri kn aSobh alikm am irzh ihoh oilk lo banih mn apsos׃ 
acts 18:22	oiba al qsrin oiel oiSal lSlom hqhlh oird al anTiokia׃ 
acts 18:23	oiSb Sm imim aHdim oilk lmseio oiebr barz glTia oprogia oiHcq at kl htlmidim׃ 
acts 18:24	oaiS ihodi ba al apsos oeir moldto alksndria oSmo apolos aiS dbrim otqip bktobim׃ 
acts 18:25	hoa hih mlmd drk hadon ohoa mdbr kHm roHo omlmd hiTb el adot ihoSe ola ide ki am Tbilt ioHnn lbdh׃ 
acts 18:26	ohoa hHl lqra bbit hknst bbTHon lbb oiSmeo ato eqils oprisqlh oiqHho alihm oiosipo lhgid lo at drk halhim bar hiTb׃ 
acts 18:27	oiHpz llkt lakia oiktbo haHim al htlmidim oierro atm lqblo oiba Smh oiecr hrbh at hmaminim el idi hHsd׃ 
acts 18:28	ki bHcqh htokH em hihodim lpni kl hem oiram mn hmqraot ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH׃ 
acts 19:1	oihi bhiot apolos bqorntos oiebr polos bmdinot heliont oird al apsos oimza Sm tlmidim׃ 
acts 19:2	oiamr alihm hqbltm at roH hqdS aHri aSr hamntm oiamro alio ap la Smeno ki iSno roH hqdS׃ 
acts 19:3	oiamr alihm el mh apoa hTbltm oiamro el Tbilt ioHnn׃ 
acts 19:4	oiamr polos ioHnn hTbil bTbilt htSobh oamr al hem ki hamn iamino baSr iboa aHrio ohoa hmSiH ihoSe׃ 
acts 19:5	oihi kSmem cat oibao lhTbl bSm ihoSe hadon׃ 
acts 19:6	oismk polos at idio elihm oiba elihm roH hqdS oimllo blSnot oitnbao׃ 
acts 19:7	oihio klm kSnim eSr aiS׃ 
acts 19:8	oiba al bit hknst oiqra Sm bbTHon lbb oidbr emm kSlSh HdSim oiT at lbm al dbri mlkot halhim׃ 
acts 19:9	ak mqztm hqSo at lbbm ola hamino oidbro srh el hdrk hch lpni hqhl oisr mhm oibdl mtokm at htlmidim oidbr atm iom iom bbit hmdrS Sl Tornos׃ 
acts 19:10	okn hith kSntim imim ed ki Smeo kl iSbi asia gm ihodim gm ionim at dbr ihoSe hadon׃ 
acts 19:11	ogborot gdlot eSh halhim el idi polos׃ 
acts 19:12	ed ki gm hniHo sodrim oHgrt mel eor bSro el hHolim oisoro mhm tHlaihm ogm hroHot hreot izao׃ 
acts 19:13	oanSim mn hihodim hsbbim omlHSim hoailo lhckir at Sm ihoSe hadon el aHoci hroHot hreot lamr mSbie ani atkm bihoSe aSr polos qra aoto׃ 
acts 19:14	oheSim kkh hio Sbet bni sqoh aHd mgdoli khni hihodim׃ 
acts 19:15	oien hroH oiamr at ihoSe ani mkir oat polos ani ide omi atm׃ 
acts 19:16	oiqpz elihm bel hroH hreh oigbr elihm oikbSm ed ki nso mn hbit hhoa eirmim opzoeim׃ 
acts 19:17	oiode hdbr lkl hihodim ohionim iSbi apsos oipl pHd el klm oigdl Sm hadon ihoSe׃ 
acts 19:18	orbim mn hmaminim bao oitodo oiodieo at aSr eSo׃ 
acts 19:19	orbim aSr eSqo bmeSi kSpim hbiao at sprihm oiSrpom leini kl oiHSbo at erkm oimzaho HmSt rbbot dinrim׃ 
acts 19:20	odbr ihoh gbr mad oilk hlk oHcq׃ 
acts 19:21	oihi kklot hdbrim halh iez polos broHo lebr btok mqdonia oakia ollkt iroSlim oiamr aHri hioti Smh rah arah gm at romi׃ 
acts 19:22	oiSlH Snim mn hmSrtim ato at Timotios oat arsTos al mqdonia ohoa htmhmh eod imim basia׃ 
acts 19:23	othi bet hhia mhomh la qTnh el adot drk ihoh׃ 
acts 19:24	ki zorp ksp aHd dmTrios Smo eSh hiklot ksp Sl arTmis hmzia lHrSim mSkrt la meT׃ 
acts 19:25	oiqhl atm oat Sar hesqim bmlakh hhia oiamr anSim atm ideim ki mn hmlakh hcat eSino kbod׃ 
acts 19:26	oatm raim oSmeim aSr la bapsos lbdh ki gm kmeT basia klh ch polos pth ohdiH hmon em rb lamr la alhim alh hneSim bidim׃ 
acts 19:27	oeth eod meT ola lbd Hlqno ch ihih lboc ki am gm hikl arTmis hmlkt hgdolh iHSb lain otklh tparth aSr kl asia okl iSbi tbl mkbdim aoth׃ 
acts 19:28	oihi kSmem at dbrio oimlao Hmh oizeqo lamr gdolh arTmis Sl hapsiim׃ 
acts 19:29	otmla kl heir mbokh oisero klm iHdo al htaTron oiHTpo atm at gios oat arsTrkos anSim mqdonim oHbri polos bmseio׃ 
acts 19:30	oial polos lboa al tok hem ola hniHo lo htlmidim׃ 
acts 19:31	ogm mqzt raSi asia aSr hio ahbio SlHo alio oichiro ato aSr la imlaho lbo lboa al htaTron׃ 
acts 19:32	oizeqo Sm alh bkh oalh bkh ki mbokh gdolh hith bqhl orbm la ideo el mh ch naspo׃ 
acts 19:33	oimSko mtok hhmon at alksndr ohihodim dHo ato ed zato oinp alksndr at ido oibqS lhzTdq lpni hem׃ 
acts 19:34	ohmh khkirm ki hoa ihodi nSao klm qol oizeqo kSti Seot lamr gdolh arTmis Sl hapsiim׃ 
acts 19:35	oihs sopr heir at hem oiamr anSi apsos mi hoa haiS aSr la ide ki heir apsos sknt hia lhikl Sl arTmis hmlkt hgdolh olzlmh hiord mn hSmim׃ 
acts 19:36	oien aSr ain lkHS bdbrim halh raoi lkm lhiot SqTim ola leSot dbr nmhr׃

acts 19:41	oihi kaSr klh ldbr kdbrim halh oiSlH at hqhl׃
