acts 24:1	oird Hnnih hkhn hgdol aHri HmSt imim oato hcqnim oTrTlos aiS dbrim oiodieo at hhgmon at dbr ribm em polos׃ 
acts 24:2	oihi kaSr qrao lo oiHl TrTlos lSTno oiamr׃ 
acts 24:3	at aSr iSbno el idk bSlom rb oaSr neSo tqnot rbot lem hch bhSgHtk nqbl el kl pnim obkl mqom bkl todh piliks hadir׃ 
acts 24:4	ak lblti hlaotk hrbh atHnn alik aSr tSmeno bqzr dbrino kHmltk׃ 
acts 24:5	ki mzano at haiS hch kqTb omgrh mdinim bin kl hihodim el pni tbl ohoa raS kt hnzrim׃ 
acts 24:6	ohoa gm nsh lHll at hmqdS ontpS aoto onHpz lSpTo el pi tortno׃ 
acts 24:7	oiba elino losias Sr halp brb kH oiHTpho midino׃ 
acts 24:8	oizo at STnio ki boa ibao lpnik oath ki tHqr ato tokl ldet mpiho at kl hdbrim halh aSr anHno Tenim elio׃ 
acts 24:9	oimlao hihodim at dbrio lamr ki kn hoa׃ 
acts 24:10	oirmc hhgmon al polos ldbr oien oiamr ien aSr ideti ki ch kmh Snim SopT ath lem hch hnni mzTdq blb bToH el enini׃ 
acts 24:11	ath tokl ldet aSr la ebro iotr mSnim eSr iom met eloti iroSlim lhStHot׃ 
acts 24:12	ola bmqdS mzaoni mtokH em aiS ao meorr mhomh bem ola bbti hknsiot ola beir׃ 
acts 24:13	gm ain bikltm lhokiH eli at aSr eth hm STnim aoti׃ 
acts 24:14	abl at cat modh ani lpnik ki bdrk hhia aSr iqraoh bSm kt bh ani ebd at alhi abotino bhamini bkl hktob btorh obnbiaim׃ 
acts 24:15	otqoti lalhim aSr gm hm iHko lh cat hia ki etidh lhiot tHit hmtim lzdiqim olrSeim׃ 
acts 24:16	obcat gm emlti lhiot tmim lb lalhim oladm tmid׃ 
acts 24:17	omqz Snim rbot bati lhbia ndbot lemi olhqrib qrbn׃ 
acts 24:18	oahi mThr bmqdS la bhmon em ola bmhomh okn mzaoni anSim ihodim masia׃ 
acts 24:19	aSr elihm hih lemd hnh lpnik olenot bi am hih lhm dbr ngdi׃ 
acts 24:20	ao alh idbro na hmh mh mzao bi eol bemdi lpni hsnhdrin׃ 
acts 24:21	blti am hdbr haHd hhoa aSr qrati bemdi btokm ki el tHit hmtim ani ndon hiom lpnikm׃ 
acts 24:22	oihi kSme piliks at hdrim halh oiaHr at dinm let aHrt ki enini hdrk hcat nodeo lo hiTb oiamr brdt ali losias Sr halp aSpT el dbrkm׃ 
acts 24:23	oizo at Sr hmah lSom ato bmSmr oltt lo roHh olblti mne aiS mmideio mSrt ato omboa alio׃ 
acts 24:24	oaHri imim aHdim ba piliks em aSto droslh ohia ihodit oiSlH lqra lpolos oiSme ato el dbr hamonh bmSiH׃ 
acts 24:25	oihi kdbro el hzdq ohpriSot oel hdin hetid lboa oiHrd piliks oien eth ch lk olkSapnh aSob lqra lk׃ 
acts 24:26	ohoa mqoh ki polos itn lo SHd lmen itirho obebor ch qra lo pemim hrbh oidbr emo׃ 
acts 24:27	oihi mqz Sntim imim oiqm prqios psTos tHt piliks opiliks Hpz lhtrzot al hihodim oiecb at polos HboS bbit hasorim׃ 
acts 25:1	oiba psTos al hmdinh oiel aHri SlSt imim mqsrin liroSlim׃ 
acts 25:2	ohkhn hgdol oraSi hihodim hodieho at ribm em polos׃ 
acts 25:3	oipzro bo oiSalo mmno leSot Hsd emhm lhbiao iroSlim ohmh mtnklim ato lhmito bdrk׃ 
acts 25:4	oien aotm psTos ki ezor polos bqsrin oki gm hoa iSob Smh bqrob׃ 
acts 25:5	oiamr lkn irdo ati hezomim Sbkm oam iS maom baiS hch ieno bo׃ 
acts 25:6	oiSb btokm iotr mimim eSrh oird al qsrin ommHrt iSb el ksa hmSpT oizo lhbia at polos׃ 
acts 25:7	hoa ba ohihodim aSr irdo miroSlim sbbho oiaSimo at polos baSmot rbot oqSot aSr la iklo lhokiH׃ 
acts 25:8	ohoa hzTdq lamr la HTati bmaomh la ldt hihodim ola lmqdS ola lqisr׃ 
acts 25:9	opsTos Hpz lhtrzot al hihodim oien at polos oiamr htHpz lelot iroSlim lhSpT el alh lpni Smh׃ 
acts 25:10	oiamr polos lpni ksa mSpT hqisr ani emd oSm nkon li lhSpT la hreti lihodim kaSr idet hiTb gm ath׃ 
acts 25:11	am hreti oiS bi dbr mSpT mot bl aHSk npSi mmot oam ain bi maomh mkl aSr hm enim bi aiS la iokl lhsgirni al idm at hqisr ani qora ldini׃ 
acts 25:12	oioez psTos em ioezio oien ato lamr at hqisr qrat al hqisr tlk׃ 
acts 25:13	oihi aHri imim oirdo hmlk agrps obrniqh al qsrin lSal lSlom psTos׃ 
acts 25:14	oihi ki arko lhm himim Sm oispr psTos lmlk at rib polos lamr iS ph aiS aSr piliks hniHo asor׃ 
acts 25:15	obhioti biroSlim dbro ali raSi hkhnim ocqni hihodim el adotio oibqSo mmni lHrz mSpTo׃ 
acts 25:16	oaen aotm ki ain mnhg hromiim lmgn aiS labd bTrm iemd hnSTn lnkH STnio ontn lo mqom lhzTdq mn hSTnh׃ 
acts 25:17	olkn kaSr bao hnh iHd HSti ola htmhmhti ki mmHrt hiom iSbti el ksa hmSpT oazoh lhbia at haiS׃ 
acts 25:18	oiemdo elio STnio ola hbiao elio dbr re maSr hiiti HSd ato׃ 
acts 25:19	rq hio lhm dbri ribt lngdo el ebodt alhihm oel mt aHd ihoSe Smo aSr amr elio polos ki hoa Hi׃ 
acts 25:20	otkbd beini hSalh hcat oamr hHpz ath llkt iroSlim olhSpT Sm el alh׃ 
acts 25:21	abl polos Sal lhniHo bmSmr ed zat mSpTo mlpni agosTos oazoh lSmro ed aSr aSlH ato al hqisr׃ 
acts 25:22	oiamr agrps al psTos gm ani Hpz lSme at haiS oiamr mHr tSmeno׃ 
acts 25:23	oihi mmHrt kboa agrps obrniqh bhod gdol oibao al alm hmSmet hmh oSri halp ongidi heir oizo psTos oibiao at polos׃ 
acts 25:24	oiamr psTos agrps hmlk okl haiSim aSr atm ph atno hnkm raim at haiS aSr beboro pgeo bi kl hmon hihodim gm biroSlim ogm ph oizeqo ki aino bdin SiHih eod׃ 
acts 25:25	oani kaSr hkrti ki la eSh dbr lHibo mith ohoa gm hoa qra at agosTos ldino iezti lSlH ato Smh׃ 
acts 25:26	ak ain li lktb elio dbr nkon ladnino obebor cat hbiatio lpnikm obiotr lpnik hmlk agrps lmen iHqr oideti mh aktb׃ 
acts 25:27	ki la itkn beini lSloH asir mbli hodie gm at elilt hdbrim aSr Smo lo׃ 
acts 26:1	oiamr agrps al polos ntn lk ldbr bed npSk ac izTdq polos oioST at ido oiamr׃ 
acts 26:2	maSr ani at npSi hmlk agrps ki lpnik azTdq hiom el kl aSr STnim ati hihodim׃ 
acts 26:3	ki ath ide hiTb kl hmnhgim ohSalot aSr bin hihodim oel kn aSalh matk lSme ati kark roHk׃ 
acts 26:4	hnh at drki mneori aSr hthlkti bh mac btok emi obiroSlim ideim aoth kl hihodim׃ 
acts 26:5	ki mimim raSonim ideoni am irzo lheid ki kproS htnhgti el pi hkt hmqpdt biotr bebodtno׃ 
acts 26:6	oeth ani emd lhSpT el tqot hhbTHh aSr hbTiHh halhim at abotino׃ 
acts 26:7	oaSr Snim eSr SbTino miHlim lhgie lh bebdm at ihoh tmid iomm olilh el dbr htqoh hcat agrps hmlk STnim aoti hihodim׃ 
acts 26:8	mdoe ipla beinikm ki halhim iHih mtim׃ 
acts 26:9	hn lpnim ani HSbti zdqh lzrr at Sm ihoSe hnzri ed mad׃ 
acts 26:10	kaSr eSiti biroSlim ogm qdoSim rbim ani hsgrti lbti klaim brSion aSr qblti mat hkhnim hgdolim okSnhrgo hskmti׃ 
acts 26:11	obkl bti hknsiot isrti atm pemim rbot oanstim lgdp oathollh bm ed mad oardpm ed lerim aSr Hozh larz׃ 
acts 26:12	oihi blkti el cat ldmSq brSion hkhnim hgdolim obmzotm׃ 
acts 26:13	ohnh adni hmlk bzhrim bdrk raiti aor zH mchr hSmS aSr mSmim ngh eli msbib oel hhlkim ati׃ 
acts 26:14	onpl klno arzh oaSme qol mdbr ali blSon ebrit lamr Saol Saol lmh trdpni qSh lk lbeT bdrbnot׃ 
acts 26:15	oamr mi ath adni oiamr anki ihoSe aSr ath rdp׃ 
acts 26:16	abl qom oemd el rglik ki lbebor cat nraiti alik lbHr bk lmSrt oled el aSr rait oel aSr arak׃ 
acts 26:17	bhzili aotk mn hem omn hgoim aSr aSlHk eth alihm׃ 
acts 26:18	lpqH at einihm lmen iSobo mHSk laor omid hSTn al halhim oimzao bamontm bi at sliHt hHTaim oat hnHlh btok hmqdSim׃ 
acts 26:19	el kn hmlk agrps la hmriti at hmrah aSr raiti mn hSmim׃ 
acts 26:20	ki am qrati raSonh liSbi dmSq oiroSlim obkl arz ihodh ogm lgoim ki inHmo oiSobo al halhim oieSo meSim raoim ltSobh׃ 
acts 26:21	obgll hdbr hch tpSo ati hihodim bmqdS oibqSo lhmitni׃ 
acts 26:22	ohalhim hih becri oed hiom hch emd ani omeid lpni qTn ogdol oainni mdbr dbr colti aSr dbro hnbiaim omSh ki etidot hnh lhiot׃ 
acts 26:23	ki hmSiH menh hoa oki raSon hoa lqmim mn hmtim lhpiz aor bem obgoim׃ 
acts 26:24	oihi hoa mzTdq kcat oien psTos bqol gdol lamr hnk mStge polos rb hlmod hbiak lidi Sgeon׃ 
acts 26:25	oiamr polos ainni mSge psTos hadir ki am dbri amt oTem abie׃ 
acts 26:26	ki hmlk iode at alh oel cat gm bbTHon ani mdbr alio ien aSr la aamin ki nelm mmno dbr mn hdbrim halh ki la bqrn coit neSth cat׃ 
acts 26:27	hmlk agrps hmamin ath bnbiaim ideti ki mamin ath׃ 
acts 26:28	oiamr agrps al polos eod meT optitni lhiot nzri׃ 
acts 26:29	oiamr polos abqSh malhim aSr am bmeT oam bhrbh la ath lbdk ki gm kl hSmeim aoti ihio kmoni colti hmosrot halh׃ 
acts 26:30	oihi bdbro hdbr hch oiqm hmlk ohhgmon obrniqh ohiSbim atm׃ 
acts 26:31	oisoro hHdrh oidbro aiS al reho lamr haiS hch la eSh dbr aSr ihih elio Hib mith ao mosrot׃ 
acts 26:32	oiamr agrps al psTos haiS hch iokl lhpTr lola qra at hqisr ldino׃ 
acts 27:1	okaSr ngmr hdin ki nebr banih al aiTlia msro at polos omqzt asirim aHrim al Sr hmah lgdod agosTos oSmo iolios׃ 
acts 27:2	onrd al anih adrmTit nknim lboa el pni Hop asia onebr himh oihi atno arsTrkos moqdon mn tsloniqi׃ 
acts 27:3	ommHrt hgeno al zidon oiolios eSh em polos Hsd oinH lo llkt al mideio lhecr bidm׃ 
acts 27:4	onlk mSm onebr bsbibot qpros ki hroHot hio lngdno׃ 
acts 27:5	onebr at him aSr lpni qiliqia opmpolia onba al mora aSr bloqia׃ 
acts 27:6	oimza Sm Sr hmah anih alksndrit bah laiTlia oiebirno ltokh׃ 
acts 27:7	ohanih hlkh bkbdot imim rbim oaHri aSr igeno obano al mol qnidos la hniHno hroH lHtr al hibSh onebr mzd lqriTi el pni hr slmoni׃ 
acts 27:8	oaHri aSr ebrno btlaot bano lmqom aHd nqra qlilmni aSr qrobh lo eir oSmh lsia׃ 
acts 27:9	oihi mqz imim rbim kaSr bah et hsknh lirdi him ki gm hzom kbr ebr oichr atm polos׃ 
acts 27:10	oiamr alihm anSim rah ani ki hliktno thih ak mri oncq gdol la lbd lmemsh olanih ki am gm lnpSotino׃ 
acts 27:11	oSr hmah la Sme al dbri polos ki am al rb hHbl oal bel hanih׃ 
acts 27:12	obaSr hHop ainno Tob lemd bo bimi hstio iezo hrbim lebr mSm lamr aoli nokl hgie lpiniks oiSbno Sm bimi hsto ohoa Hop bqriTi ponh drk hdrom merbh odrk hzpon merbh׃ 
acts 27:13	oroH nSbt laT mdrom oiHSbo ki tzlH eztm bidm oielo heogin oiebro lemt Spt qriTi׃ 
acts 27:14	oihi kmeT aHri kn otpge bh roH nHSl hnqrah aoriqlidon׃ 
acts 27:15	otTrp hanih ola iklh lemd ngd hroH onrp idino mmnh onndp׃ 
acts 27:16	otrz hanih al ebr ai qTn hnqra qlodh okmeT la iklno laHc hebrh׃ 
acts 27:17	oaHri mSkm aoth alihm oiqHo lecr at kl aSr hSigh idm oiHSbo at dpni hanih omiratm pn iplo al bin rksi hHol horido at kli hmprS okh ndpo׃ 
acts 27:18	oihi hser holk oser elino ommHrt hTilo at hmemsh al him׃ 
acts 27:19	obiom hSliSi hTlno bidino at kli hanih al him׃ 
acts 27:20	oihi imim rbim gm hSmS gm hkokbim la nrao ohserh Hcqh elino ed mad otkrt mmno kl tqot ihoSeh׃ 
acts 27:21	opolos emd btokm aHri harikm bzom oiamr anSim lo Smetm ali ola izatm mqriTi ki ac la qrno hncq hch bmrikm׃ 
acts 27:22	oeth ani amr alikm Hcqo oamzo ki la tabd npS mkm blti hspinh lbdh׃ 
acts 27:23	ki blilh hch nzb eli mlak halhim aSr lo anki oaSr ani ebd ato׃ 
acts 27:24	oiamr al tira polos elik eod lemd lpni hqisr oeth hnh ntn lk halhim at kl hhlkim atk banih׃ 
acts 27:25	el kn anSim Hcqo oamzo ki mamin ani lalhim ki kn ihih kaSr namr ali׃ 
acts 27:26	ak hSlk nSlk al aHd haiim׃ 
acts 27:27	oihi kboa lil arbeh eSr lTlTolno bim adrih kHzot hlilh oiHSbo hmlHim ki qrbh lhm ibSt׃ 
acts 27:28	oiorido at hank oimzao emq him eSrim qomh oiebro meT oiosipo lhorid at hank oimzao qomot HmS eSrh׃ 
acts 27:29	oiirao pn ipgeo bSni hsleim oiSliko mel aHori hanih arbeh eoginim al him oikspo laor hiom׃ 
acts 27:30	ohmlHim bqSo lbrH mn hanih oiorido at hebrh al him bamrm ki iS at npSm lSlH eoginim gm mraS hanih׃ 
acts 27:31	oiamr polos al Sr hmah oal anSi hzba lamr am alh la iSbo atno banih la toklo atm lhoSe׃ 
acts 27:32	oiqzzo anSi hzba at Hbli hebrh oitnoh lnpol׃ 
acts 27:33	ohbqr Trm iaor opolos mbqS mklm lTem lHm lamr hiom iom arbeh eSr aSr Hkitm zmim ola Temtm maomh׃ 
acts 27:34	el kn qra ani atkm lTem lHm ki hoa lmHitkm ki aiS aiS mkm la ipl mSert raSo arzh׃ 
acts 27:35	hoa dbr at hdbrim halh ohoa lqH at hlHs oiodh lalhim lpni klm oibze oiHl lakl׃ 
acts 27:36	oiamz lb klm oiTemo akl gm hmh׃ 
acts 27:37	oanHno kl npS aSr banih matim oSbeim oSS׃ 
acts 27:38	oiaklo lSbeh oiqlo mel hanih oiTilo at hzdh al him׃ 
acts 27:39	hbqr aor ola hkiro at harz abl rao kmprz oHop lo oioezo lnhg alio at hanih am ioklo׃ 
acts 27:40	oigdeo at heoginim oiecbom lim oitiro gm at mitri hmnhig oiprSo mprS htrn al pni hroH oibqSo lba al hHop׃ 
acts 27:41	oipgeo bmqom aSr him mSni ebrio otdbq bo hanih otemd raSh la inoe oaHorih nSbro mSaon hglim׃ 
acts 27:42	othi ezt anSi hzba lhmit at hasirim pn iSHh aiS mhm oimlT׃ 
acts 27:43	oSr hmah Hpz lhzil at polos oina at eztm oiamr mi ide lSHot ird oiebr libSh braSnh ohnSarim alh el qrSim oalh el Sbri hanih׃ 
acts 27:44	oihi kn oimlTo klm al hibSh׃ 
acts 28:1	okaSr nmlTno node lno ki Sm hai mliTi׃ 
acts 28:2	ohnkrim la hmeiTo Hsdm emno ki bero aS oiaspo at klno alihm mpni hgSm hiord ompni hqr׃ 
acts 28:3	opolos asp lo ermt qzim oiSm el hmoqd omn hHm iza apeh oiaHc bido׃ 
acts 28:4	oirao hnkrim at hHih tloih el ido oiamro aiS al reho akn rzH haiS hch aSr hnqmh la hniHh lo lHiot ap ki nmlT mn him׃ 
acts 28:5	ohoa ner at hHih mel ido al tok haS ola hreh lo maomh׃ 
acts 28:6	ohm hoHilo aSr izbh gopo ao aSr ipl mt ptam oiHilo ed boS ohnh la qrho kl ason oihpk lbm oiamro ki alhim hoa׃ 
acts 28:7	obsbibo hmqom hhoa hio Sdot aSr lraS anSi hai oSmo poblios hoa hbia atno lbito oiklkl atno bTobo SlSt imim׃ 
acts 28:8	oabi poblios moTl lmSkb bqdHt obmHlh hmeim oiba alio polos oitpll oiSm elio at idio oirpaho׃ 
acts 28:9	oaHri hmeSh hch bao gm hHlim haHrim aSr bai oirpao׃ 
acts 28:10	oikbdno kbod gdol oblktno mSm spqo lno di zrkno׃ 
acts 28:11	oaHri SlSt HdSim ebrno mSm banih alksndrit aSr iSbh bai bimi hsto oaot dglh htaomim׃ 
acts 28:12	onba al srqosa onSb Sm SlSt imim׃ 
acts 28:13	mSm sbno onba al rgion obnSb roH dromit biom hmHrt bano biom hSni al poTioli׃ 
acts 28:14	oSm mzano aHim oibqSo mmno lSbt atm Sbet imim obkn hlkno al romi׃ 
acts 28:15	oiSmeo haHim at boano oizao mSm lqratno ed lSoq apios oed lSlSt hHniot oira atm polos oiodh lalhim oitHcq׃ 
acts 28:16	oaHr bano al romi hebir Sr hmah at hasirim al Sr hzba olpolos hniHo lSbt lbdo em aiS hzba hSmr aoto׃ 
acts 28:17	oihi aHri SlSt imim oiqra polos alio at raSi hihodim oiqhlo alio oiamr alihm anSim aHim ap ki la melti mel bemno obHqot abotino asroni biroSlim oimsroni lidi hromiim׃ 
acts 28:18	ohm aHri Hqrm ati amro lpTrni ki la nmza bi mSpT mot׃ 
acts 28:19	ohihodim qmo bi oaans lqra at hqisr ldini ak ain npSi lSTon at emi bdbr׃ 
acts 28:20	obebor cat qrati lkm lraotkm oldbr emkm ki bgll tqot iSral asor ani bkbl hch׃ 
acts 28:21	oiamro alio la qblno el adotik agrot marz ihodh ola ba hnh aHd mn haHim aSr hgid ao dbr elik dbr re׃ 
acts 28:22	amnm Hpzim anHno lSme at aSr blbbk ki node lno aSr bkl mqom iribo al hkt hcat׃ 
acts 28:23	oiSimo lo iom moed oibao alio rbim al mlono oied bhm oibar at mlkot alhim oiokH lhm enini ihoSe mtort mSh omn hnbiaim mbqr ed erb׃ 
acts 28:24	oiS aSr Smeo al dbrio oiS aSr la hamino׃ 
acts 28:25	oiHlqo bdetm oisoro llkt ldrkm bdbr polos hdbr haHd hch hiTb dbr roH hqdS labotino bpi iSeiho hnbia lamr׃ 
acts 28:26	lk oamrt lem hch Smeo Smoe oal tbino orao rao oal tdeo׃ 
acts 28:27	ki Smn lb hem hch oacnio kbdo oat einio hSe pn irah beinio obacnio iSme olbbo ibin oSb orpatio׃ 
acts 28:28	lkn deo ki lgoim nSlHh tSoet alhim ohmh iSmeo׃ 
acts 28:29	oihi bdbro cat hlko mato hihodim oitokHo hrbh aiS em reho׃ 
acts 28:30	opolos iSb Sntim imim bbito aSr Skr lo oiqbl at kl hbaim alio׃ 
acts 28:31	oiqra at mlkot halhim oilmd at drki ihoSe hmSiH adnino bkl bTHon lbo oain mne׃ 
john 1:1	braSit hih hdbr ohdbr hih at halhim oalhim hih hdbr׃ 
john 1:2	hoa hih braSit azl halhim׃ 
john 1:3	hkl nhih el ido ombledio la nhih kl aSr nhih׃ 
john 1:4	bo hio Hiim ohHiim hio aor bni hadm׃ 
john 1:5	ohaor bHSk crH ohHSk la hSigo׃ 
john 1:6	oihi aiS SloH mat halhim oSmo ioHnn׃ 
john 1:7	hoa ba ledot lheid el haor lmen iamino klm el ido׃ 
john 1:8	hoa la hih haor ki am lheid el haor׃ 
john 1:9	haor hamti hmair lkl adm hih ba al heolm׃ 
john 1:10	beolm hih oel ido nhih heolm oheolm la hkiro׃ 
john 1:11	hoa ba al aSr lo oaSr hmh lo la qblho׃ 
john 1:12	ohmqblim ato ntn ec lmo lhiot bnim lalhim hmaminim bSmo׃ 
john 1:13	aSr la mdm ola mHpz hbSr ap la mHpz gbr ki am malhim noldo׃ 
john 1:14	ohdbr nhih bSr oiSkn btokno onHch tparto ktpart bn iHid labio rb Hsd oamt׃ 
john 1:15	oioHnn meid elio oiqra lamr hnh ch hoa aSr amrti elio hba aHri hih lpni ki qdm li hih׃ 
john 1:16	ommloao lqHno klno Hsd el Hsd׃ 
john 1:17	ki htorh ntnh bid mSh ohHsd ohamt bao el idi ihoSe hmSiH׃ 
john 1:18	at halhim la rah aiS meolm hbn hiHid aSr bHiq hab hoa hodie׃ 
john 1:19	ocat hia edot ioHnn bSlH hihodim miroSlim khnim oloim lSal ato mi ath׃ 
john 1:20	oiodh ola kHS oiodh lamr ani ainni hmSiH׃ 
john 1:21	oiSalo ato mi apoa ath hath aliho oiamr ainni hath hnbia oien la׃ 
john 1:22	oiamro alio mi ch ath lmen nSib lSlHino dbr mh tamr elik׃ 
john 1:23	oiamr ani qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh kaSr dbr iSeiho hnbia׃ 
john 1:24	ohmSlHim hio mn hproSim׃ 
john 1:25	oiSalho oiamro alio mdoe apoa mTbil ath am aink hmSiH ao alih ao hnbia׃ 
john 1:26	oien atm ioHnn oiamr anki mTbil bmim obtokkm eomd aSr la idetm ato׃ 
john 1:27	hoa hba aHri aSr hih lpni oani nqlti mhtir Srok nelio׃ 
john 1:28	cat hith bbit ebrh mebr lirdn mqom aSr ioHnn mTbil Sm׃ 
john 1:29	oihi mmHrt oira ioHnn at ihoSe ba alio oiamr hnh Sh halhim hnSa HTat heolm׃ 
john 1:30	ch hoa aSr amrti elio aHri iba aiS aSr hih lpni ki qdm li hih׃ 
john 1:31	oani la idetio ki am bebor iglh biSral bati ani lTbl bmim׃ 
john 1:32	oied ioHnn oiamr Hciti hroH kdmot ionh irdt mSmim otnH elio׃ 
john 1:33	oani la idetio aolm hSlH ati lTbl bmim hoa amr ali at aSr trah hroH irdt onHh elio hnh ch hoa aSr iTbl broH hqdS׃ 
john 1:34	oani raiti oaeidh ki ch hoa bn halhim׃ 
john 1:35	oihi mmHrt oisp ioHnn oiemd oSnim mtlmidio emo׃ 
john 1:36	oibT al ihoSe ohoa mthlk oiamr hnh Sh halhim׃ 
john 1:37	oSni tlmidio Smeo at dbro oilko aHri ihoSe׃ 
john 1:38	oipn ihoSe aHrio oira atm hlkim aHrio oiamr alihm mh tbqSo oiamro alio rbi proSo mori aiph tlin׃ 
john 1:39	oiamr alihm bao orao oibao oirao at mqom mlono oiSbo emo biom hhoa ohet kSeh heSirit׃ 
john 1:40	oaHd mn hSnim aSr Smeo mat ioHnn ohlko aHrio hoa andri aHi Smeon pTros׃ 
john 1:41	hoa pgS braSonh at Smeon aHio oiamr alio at hmSiH mzano aSr trgomo krisTos׃ 
john 1:42	oiolikho al ihoSe oihi khbiT alio ihoSe oiamr Smeon bn ionh lk iqra kipa aSr trgomo pTros׃ 
john 1:43	oihi mmHrt oioal ihoSe lzat hglilh oimza at pilpos oiamr alio lk aHri׃ 
john 1:44	opilpos hih mbit zidh eir andri opTros׃ 
john 1:45	oipge pilpos at ntnal oiamr alio mzano ato aSr ktb mSh bspr htorh ohnbiaim at ihoSe bn iosp mnzrt׃ 
john 1:46	oiamr alio ntnal hmnzrt tza lno Tobh oiamr alio ba orah׃ 
john 1:47	oira ihoSe at ntnal ba lqrato oiamr elio hnh bamt bn iSral aSr ain bo rmih׃ 
john 1:48	oiamr alio ntnal main idetni oien ihoSe oiamr lo bTrm qra lk pilpos bhiotk tHt htanh anki raitik׃ 
john 1:49	oien ntnal oiamr alio rbi ath bn alhim ath hoa mlk iSral׃ 
john 1:50	oien ihoSe oiamr alio el amri lk ki tHt htanh raitik hamnt hnh gdlot malh trah׃ 
john 1:51	oiamr alio amn amn ani amr lkm meth trao hSmim nptHim omlaki alhim elim oirdim el bn alhim׃ 
john 2:1	obiom hSliSi hith Htnh bqnh aSr bglil oam ihoSe hith Sm׃ 
john 2:2	oihoSe otlmidio hio gm hm qroaim al hHtnh׃ 
john 2:3	oiHsr hiin otamr am ihoSe alio iin ain lhm׃ 
john 2:4	oiamr alih ihoSe mh li olk aSh eti edin la bah׃ 
john 2:5	otamr amo al hmSrtim kkl aSr iamr lkm teSo׃ 
john 2:6	ohnh SSh kdi abn erokim Sm kmSpT hihodim lThrtm Stim ao SlS btim ikil kl aHd׃ 
john 2:7	oiamr alihm ihoSe mlao lkm hkdim mim oimlaom ed lmelh׃ 
john 2:8	oiamr Sabo na ohbiao al rb hmsbh oibiao׃ 
john 2:9	oiTem rb hmsbh at hmim aSr nhpko liin ola ide main hoa oaolm hmSrtim aSr Sabo at hmim ideo oiqra rb hmsbh al hHtn׃ 
john 2:10	oiamr alio kl aiS itn braSonh at hiin hTob okaSr iSkro itn lhm at hgroe oath zpnt hiin hTob ed eth׃ 
john 2:11	cat tHlt hatot aSr eSh ihoSe bqnh aSr barz hglil oglh at kbodo oiamino bo tlmidio׃ 
john 2:12	oihi aHri kn oird al kpr nHom hoa oamo oaHio otlmidio ola arko imi Sbtm Sm׃ 
john 2:13	oiqrbo imi Hg hpsH aSr lihodim oiel ihoSe iroSlim׃ 
john 2:14	oimza bmqdS mkri bqr ozan obni ionh oat mHlipi ksp iSbim Sm׃ 
john 2:15	oiqH Hblim oiebtm lSoT oigrS klm mn hmqdS oat hzan oat hbqr oipcr at meot hSlHnim oihpk SlHntihm׃ 
john 2:16	oal mkri hionim amr hoziao alh mch oal teSo at bit abi lbit msHr׃ 
john 2:17	oickro tlmidio at hktob ki qnat bitk akltni׃ 
john 2:18	oieno hihodim oiamro alio ai co aot trano ki kcat ath eSh׃ 
john 2:19	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hrso at hhikl hch obSlSh imim aqimno׃ 
john 2:20	oiamro hihodim hnh ch arbeim oSS Snh nbnh hhikl hch oath bSlSh imim tqimno׃ 
john 2:21	ohoa dbr el hikl goito׃ 
john 2:22	oaHri qomo mn hmtim ckro tlmidio ki cat amr lhm oiamino bktob obdbr aSr dbr ihoSe׃ 
john 2:23	oihi bhito biroSlim bHg hpsH hamino rbim bSmo ki rao hatot aSr eSh׃ 
john 2:24	ohoa ihoSe la hpqid at ezmo bidm el aSr ide at klm׃ 
john 2:25	ola hzTrk ledot aiS el hadm ki hoa ide mh bqrb hadm׃ 
john 3:1	oihi aiS aHd btok hproSim oSmo nqdimon Sr lihodim׃ 
john 3:2	oiba al ihoSe lilh oiamr alio rbi ideno ki ath morh mat alhim bat ki la iokl aiS leSot hatot aSr ath eSh blti am halhim emo׃ 
john 3:3	oien ihoSe oiamr alio amn amn ani amr lk am la iold aiS mlmelh la iokl lraot mlkot halhim׃ 
john 3:4	oiamr alio nqdimon aik iold adm ohoa cqn hki Sob iSob al bTn amo oiold׃ 
john 3:5	oien ihoSe amn amn ani amr lk am la iold aiS mn hmim ohroH la iokl lboa al mlkot halhim׃ 
john 3:6	hnold mn hbSr bSr hoa ohnold mn hroH roH hoa׃ 
john 3:7	al ttmh el amri lk ki elikm lhold mlmelh׃ 
john 3:8	hroH baSr iHpz Sm hoa nSb oath tSme at qolo ak la tde main ba oanh hoa holk kn kl hnold mn hroH׃ 
john 3:9	oien nqdimon oiamr alio aikh thih kcat׃ 
john 3:10	oien ihoSe oiamr alio rbn Sl iSral ath ocat la idet׃ 
john 3:11	amn amn ani amr lk ki at aSr ideno ndbr oat aSr raino neid oatm la tqblo edotno׃ 
john 3:12	am amrti alikm dbri harz oainkm maminim aik tamino bamri alikm dbri hSmim׃ 
john 3:13	oaiS la elh hSmimh blti am aSr ird mn hSmim bn hadm aSr hoa bSmim׃ 
john 3:14	okaSr hgbih mSh at hnHS bmdbr kn zrik bn hadm lhnSa׃ 
john 3:15	lmen la iabd kl hmamin bo ki am iHih Hii eolmim׃ 
john 3:16	ki kkh ahb halhim at heolm ed aSr ntn at bno at iHido lmen la iabd kl hmamin bo ki am iHih Hii eolmim׃ 
john 3:17	ki halhim la SlH at bno al heolm ldin at heolm ki am lmen ioSe bo heolm׃ 
john 3:18	hmamin bo la idon oaSr la iamin bo kbr ndon ki la hamin bSm bn halhim hiHid׃ 
john 3:19	och hoa hdin ki haor ba al heolm obni hadm ahbo hHSk mn haor ki reim meSihm׃ 
john 3:20	ki kl pel eolh iSna at haor ola iba laor pn iokHo meSio׃ 
john 3:21	abl eSh hamt iba laor lmen iglo meSio ki neSo balhim׃ 
john 3:22	oihi aHri hdbrim halh oiba ihoSe otlmidio al arz ihodh oigr Sm emhm oiTbl׃ 
john 3:23	ogm ioHnn hih Tbl beinon qrob lSlm ki Smh mim lrb oibao oiTblo׃ 
john 3:24	ki eod la ntn ioHnn al bit hshr׃ 
john 3:25	oihi rib bin tlmidi ioHnn obin hihodim el dbr hThrh׃ 
john 3:26	oibao al ioHnn oiamro alio rbi haiS aSr hih emk bebr hirdn oaSr heidt lo hno Tbl oklm baim alio׃ 
john 3:27	oien ioHnn la iokl aiS lqHt dbr blti am ntn lo mn hSmim׃ 
john 3:28	oatm edi ki amrti anki ainni hmSiH rq SloH ani lpnio׃ 
john 3:29	aSr lo hklh hoa hHtn ore hHtn hemd oSme ato SmoH iSmH lqol hHtn hnh SmHti cat eth Slmh׃ 
john 3:30	hoa igdl hlok ogdl oani aHsr hlok oHsor׃ 
john 3:31	hba mmel nelh el kl oaSr marz marz hoa omarz idbr hba mSmim nelh el kl׃ 
john 3:32	oat aSr rah oSme at cat ieid oain mqbl edoto׃ 
john 3:33	oaSr qbl edoto Htom Htm ki halhim amt׃ 
john 3:34	ki at aSr SlHo alhim dbri alhim idbr ki la bmdh ntn alhim at hroH׃ 
john 3:35	hab ahb at bno oat kl ntn bido׃ 
john 3:36	kl hmamin bbn iS lo Hii eolmim oaSr la iamin bbn la irah Hiim ki am Hron alhim iSkn elio׃ 
john 4:1	oihi kaSr node ladon ki Smeo hproSim aSr ihoSe hemid ohTbil tlmidim hrbh mioHnn׃ 
john 4:2	oaolm ihoSe hoa la hTbil ki am tlmidio׃ 
john 4:3	oiecb at arz ihodh oilk Snit hglilh׃ 
john 4:4	oihi lo lebr barz Smron׃ 
john 4:5	oiba leir meri Smron oSmh sokr hia mmol Hlqt hSdh aSr ntnh ieqb lbno liosp׃ 
john 4:6	oSm bar ieqb oihoSe hih eip mn hdrk oiSb lo el hbar ohet kSeh hSSit׃ 
john 4:7	otba aSh mSmron lSab mim oiamr alih ihoSe tni na li lStot׃ 
john 4:8	ki tlmidio hlko heirh lqnot akl׃ 
john 4:9	otamr alio haSh hSmronit hn ihodi ath oaikkh tSal mmni lStot oanki aSh Smronit ki la iterbo hihodim em hSmronim׃ 
john 4:10	oien ihoSe oiamr alih lo idet at mtt alhim omi hoa hamr alik tni na li lStot ki eth Salt mmno ontn lk mim Hiim׃ 
john 4:11	otamr alio haSh adni hn ain lk kli lSab bo ohbar emqh omain lk apoa mim Hiim׃ 
john 4:12	hath gdol mieqb abino aSr ntn lno at hbar hcat oiSt mmnh hoa obnio obeiro׃ 
john 4:13	oien ihoSe oiamr alih kl hSth mn hmim halh iSob oizma׃ 
john 4:14	oaSr iSth mn hmim aSr anki ntn lo la izma leolm ki hmim aSr atn lo ihio bqrbo lmqor mim nbeim lHii heolmim׃ 
john 4:15	otamr alio haSh adni tnh li hmim hhm lmen la azma eod ola aosip lboa hnh lSab׃ 
john 4:16	oiamr alih ihoSe lki oqrai laiSk oSobi hlom׃ 
john 4:17	oten haSh otamr ain li aiS oiamr alih ihoSe kn dbrt ain li aiS׃ 
john 4:18	ki belim HmSh hio lk oaSr lk eth ainno belk lkn amt hdbr aSr dbrt׃ 
john 4:19	otamr alio haSh adni rah anki ki nbia ath׃ 
john 4:20	abotino hStHoo bhr hch oatm amrim ki iroSlim hia hmqom hnbHr lhStHot Smh׃ 
john 4:21	oiamr alih ihoSe aSh hamini li ki tboa Seh aSr la bhr hch ap la biroSlim tStHoo lab׃ 
john 4:22	atm mStHoim al aSr la idetm oanHno mStHoim al aSr ideno ki hihoSeh mn hihodim hia׃ 
john 4:23	aolm tboa Seh oeth hia aSr ebdi al hamtim iStHoo lab broH obamt ki bmStHoim kalh Hpz hab׃ 
john 4:24	halhim roH hoa ohmStHoim lo zrikim lhStHot broH obamt׃ 
john 4:25	otamr alio haSh ideti ki iba hmSiH hnqra krisTos hoa bbao igid lno at kl׃ 
john 4:26	oiamr alih ihoSe ani hoa hmdbr alik׃ 
john 4:27	oihi hoa mdbr kkh otlmidio bao oitmho el dbro em aSh ak la amr lo aiS mh ch tSal ao mh tdbr emh׃ 
john 4:28	otecb haSh at kdh otlk heirh otamr al hanSim׃ 
john 4:29	bao orao aiS aSr hgid li kl aSr eSiti hki ch hoa hmSiH׃ 
john 4:30	oizao mn heir oibao alio׃ 
john 4:31	Trm ibao otlmidio bqSo mmno lamr akl na adni׃ 
john 4:32	oiamr alihm iS li akl lakl aSr atm la idetm׃ 
john 4:33	oiamro htlmidim aiS al reho hki hbia lo aiS lakl׃ 
john 4:34	oiamr alihm ihoSe makli hoa leSot rzon SlHi olhSlim meSho׃ 
john 4:35	hla atm tamro ki eod arbeh HdSim ohqzir ba hnh ani amr lkm Sao einikm orao bSdot ki kbr hlbino lqzir׃ 
john 4:36	ohqozr iqH Skro oiasp tboah lHii eolmim lmen iSmHo iHdo gm hcre gm hqozr׃ 
john 4:37	ki bcat amt hmSl ki ch cre oaHr iqzr׃ 
john 4:38	anki SlHti atkm lqzr at aSr la emltm bo oaHrim emlo oatm nknstm bemlm׃ 
john 4:39	oiamino bo Smrnim rbim mn heir hhia el dbr haSh aSr heidh lamr hoa hgid li at kl aSr eSiti׃ 
john 4:40	oihi kaSr bao alio hSmrnim oiSalo mmno lSbt atm oiSb Sm iomim׃ 
john 4:41	oeod rbim mhmh hamino bo bebor dbro׃ 
john 4:42	oiamro al haSh meth la bebor mamrk namin ki bacnino Smeno onde ki amnm ch hoa hmSiH moSie heolm׃ 
john 4:43	oihi mqz Sni himim oiza mSm llkt hglilh׃ 
john 4:44	ki hoa ihoSe heid ki nbia barz moldto ainno nkbd׃ 
john 4:45	oihi hoa ba arz hglil oiaspho anSi hglil ki rao at kl aSr eSh biroSlim bimi hHg ki gm hm elo lHg at hHg׃ 
john 4:46	oiba ihoSe eod hpem al qnh aSr bglil mqom Somo hmim liin oaiS hih mebdi hmlk obno Hlh bkpr nHom׃ 
john 4:47	oihi kSmeo ki ba ihoSe mihodh larz hglil oilk alio oiSal mato lrdt olrpa at bno ki qrb lmot׃ 
john 4:48	oiamr alio ihoSe am la trao atot omoptim la tamino׃ 
john 4:49	oiamr alio haiS aSr mebdi hmlk adni rdh na bTrm imot bni׃ 
john 4:50	oiamr alio ihoSe lk lk bnk Hi ohaiS hamin ldbr aSr dbr alio ihoSe oilk׃ 
john 4:51	oihi brdto oipgeo bo ebdio oibSro ato ki Hi bno׃ 
john 4:52	oidrS matm at hSeh aSr bh roH lo oiamro alio tmol bSeh hSbieit ecbto hqdHt׃ 
john 4:53	oide abiho ki hith hSeh aSr dbr lo ihoSe bnk Hi oiamn hoa okl bito׃ 
john 4:54	ch hoa haot hSni aSr eSh ihoSe bbao mihodh larz hglil׃ 
john 5:1	aHr hdbrim halh hih Hg lihodim oiel ihoSe iroSlim׃ 
john 5:2	obiroSlim brkh qrobh lSer hzan oSmh blSon ebrit bit Hsda olh HmSh almim׃ 
john 5:3	Smh Skbo Holim oeorim opsHim oibSi kH lrb ohmh miHlim ltnoet hmim׃ 
john 5:4	ki mlak ird bmoedo al hbrkh oireS at mimih ohih hird raSon al tokh aHri htgeSo hmim hoa nrpa mkl mHlh aSr dbqh bo׃ 
john 5:5	oaiS hih Sm aSr Hlh Hlio ch SlSim oSmnh Snh׃ 
john 5:6	oira ato ihoSe Skb oide ki arko lo imi Hlio oiamr alio htHpz lhrpa׃ 
john 5:7	oien hHolh adni ain aiS ati aSr iSlikni bhreS hmim al hbrkh obTrm aba oird aHr lpni׃ 
john 5:8	oiamr alio ihoSe qom Sa at mSkbk ohthlk׃ 
john 5:9	okrge Sb haiS laitno oiSa at mSkbo oithlk ohiom hhoa iom Sbt hih׃ 
john 5:10	oiamro hihodim al haiS hnrpa Sbt hiom asor lk lSat at mSkbk׃ 
john 5:11	oien atm lamr haiS aSr hHlimni hoa amr ali Sa at mSkbk ohthlk׃ 
john 5:12	oiSalho mi ch haiS aSr amr lk Sa at mSkbk ohthlk׃ 
john 5:13	ohnrpa la ide mi hoa ki sr ihoSe oilk bhiot hmon rb bmqom hhoa׃ 
john 5:14	oihi aHri kn oimzaho ihoSe bbit hmqdS oiamr alio hnh nrpa lk al tosip lHTa pn tanh alik reh gdolh mcat׃ 
john 5:15	oilk haiS oigd lihodim ki ihoSe hoa aSr rpao׃ 
john 5:16	oel kn rdpo hihodim at ihoSe oibqSo hmito el ki eSh kcat bSbt׃ 
john 5:17	oien atm ihoSe abi pel ed eth ogm anki pel׃ 
john 5:18	ac iosipo hihodim lbqS at npSo ki mlbd aSr Hll at hSbt eod amr ki halhim hoa abio oidmh lalhim׃ 
john 5:19	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm amn amn ani amr lkm la iokl hbn leSot dbr mnpSo blti at aSr irah at abio eSh ki at aSr eSh hoa gm hbn ieSh kmho׃ 
john 5:20	ki hab ahb at hbn omrah ato kl aSr ieSh oeod meSim gdolim malh iraho lmen ttmho׃ 
john 5:21	ki kaSr hab ieir oiHih at hmtim kn gm hbn iHih at aSr iHpz׃ 
john 5:22	ki hab la idin aiS ki am kl hmSpT ntn lbn lmen ikbdo klm at hbn kaSr ikbdo at hab׃ 
john 5:23	mi aSr la ikbd at hbn gm at hab aSr SlHo ainno mkbd׃ 
john 5:24	amn amn ani amr lkm hSme dbri omamin lSlHi iS lo Hii eolmim ola iba bmSpT ki ebr mmot lHiim׃ 
john 5:25	amn amn ani amr lkm ki tboa Seh oeth hia aSr iSmeo hmtim at qol bn halhim ohSmeim Hih iHio׃ 
john 5:26	ki kaSr lab iS Hiim bezmo kn ntn gm lbn lhiot lo Hiim bezmo׃ 
john 5:27	oap SlTn ntn lo leSot mSpT ki bn adm hoa׃ 
john 5:28	al ttmho el cat ki hnh Seh bah aSr kl Skni qbr at qolo iSmeon׃ 
john 5:29	oizao eSi hTob ltqomt hHiim oeSi hre ltqomt hmSpT׃ 
john 5:30	la aokl leSot dbr mnpSi kaSr aSme kn aSpT omSpTi mSpT zdq ki la abqS rzoni ki am rzon hab aSr SlHni׃ 
john 5:31	am anki meid eli edoti ainnh namnh׃ 
john 5:32	iS aHr hmeid eli oideti ki edoto aSr hoa meid eli namnh hia׃ 
john 5:33	atm SlHtm al ioHnn ohoa heid el hamt׃ 
john 5:34	oani ainni lqH edot madm ak amrti cat lmen toSeon׃ 
john 5:35	hoa hih hnr hdlq ohmair oatm rzitm lSoS kSeh laoro׃ 
john 5:36	oani iS li edot gdolh medot ioHnn ki hmeSim aSr ntn li abi lhSlimm hmeSim halh aSr ani eSh meidim eli ki hab SlHni׃ 
john 5:37	ohab aSr SlHni hoa meid eli oatm at qolo la Smetm meolm otmonto la raitm׃ 
john 5:38	odbro ainno Skn bqrbkm ki ainkm maminim lSloHo׃ 
john 5:39	drSo bktobim aSr tHSbo SiS lkm Hii eolmim bhm ohmh hmeidim eli׃ 
john 5:40	oatm ainkm abim lboa ali lhiot lkm Hiim׃ 
john 5:41	la aqH kbod mbni adm׃ 
john 5:42	akn ideti atkm ki ain ahbt alhim bqrbkm׃ 
john 5:43	ani hnh bati bSm abi ola qbltm ato oam iba aHr bSm ezmo ato tqblo׃ 
john 5:44	aik toklo lhamin atm hlqHim kbod aiS mreho oat hkbod aSr mat halhim hiHid la tbqSo׃ 
john 5:45	al tHSbo ki anki aTen elikm lpni abi mSh hoa hTen elikm aSr lo tiHlo׃ 
john 5:46	ki lo hamntm lmSh gm li tamino ki hoa ktb eli׃ 
john 5:47	oam lktbio ainkm maminim aikh ldbri tamino׃ 
john 6:1	oihi aHri kn oiza ihoSe al ebr im hglil aSr lTibrih׃ 
john 6:2	oilko aHrio hmon em rb ki rao aottio aSr eSh em hHolim׃ 
john 6:3	oiel ihoSe el hhr oiSb Sm hoa otlmidio׃ 
john 6:4	oimi hpsH Hg hihodim qrbo lboa׃ 
john 6:5	oiSa ihoSe at einio oira em rb ba alio oiamr al pilpos main nqnh lhm lHm lakl׃ 
john 6:6	oak lmen nsot ato dbr cat ki hoa ide at aSr ieSh׃ 
john 6:7	oien ato pilpos lHm matim dinr la imza lhm lqHt lo aiS aiS meT׃ 
john 6:8	oiamr alio aHd mtlmidio andri aHi Smeon pTros׃ 
john 6:9	iS ph ner aSr lo HmS kkrot lHm Serim oSni dgim ak alh mh hmh lem rb kch׃ 
john 6:10	oiamr ihoSe zoo at hem lSbt arzh oirq dSa lrb hih bmqom hhoa oiSbo larz kHmSt alpi aiS bmspr׃ 
john 6:11	oiqH ihoSe at kkrot hlHm oibrk oitn ltlmidio ohtlmidim al hmsbim okkh gm mn hdgim kaot npSm׃ 
john 6:12	oihi kaSr Sbeo oiamr al tlmidio aspo at ptoti lHm hnotrim lmen la iabd maomh׃ 
john 6:13	oiaspo oimlao Snim eSr slim bptoti HmS kkrot lHm hSerim hnotrim laklihm׃ 
john 6:14	oihi kraot hanSim at haot hch aSr eSh ihoSe oiamro hnh ch hoa bamt hnbia hba leolm׃ 
john 6:15	oide ihoSe ki ibao oitpSho lhmlik aoto oimlT eod hpem al hhr hoa lbdo׃ 
john 6:16	oihi berb oirdo tlmidio al him oibao banih oiebro al ebr him al kpr nHom׃ 
john 6:17	oiks atm hHSk oihoSe la ba alihm׃ 
john 6:18	oiser him ki roH gdolh noSbt׃ 
john 6:19	ohm Htro bmSoTihm kdrk eSrim oHmS ao SlSim ris oirao at ihoSe mthlk el him hlok oqrb al hanih oiirao׃ 
john 6:20	oiamr alihm ani hoa al tirao׃ 
john 6:21	oioailo lqHt ato al hanih orge hgieh hanih larz aSr hm hlkim Smh׃ 
john 6:22	oihi mmHrt oira hmon hem hemd mebr lim ki la hith anih bch blti aHt aSr irdo bh tlmidio oki ihoSe la ba em tlmidio al hanih ak tlmidio lbdm nseo mch׃ 
john 6:23	oaniot aHrot bao mTibrim qrob lmqom aSr aklo Sm at hlHm bbrkt hadon׃ 
john 6:24	oihi kraot hmon hem ki ihoSe ainno Sm ap la tlmidio oirdo gm hm baniot oibao al kpr nHom lbqS at ihoSe׃ 
john 6:25	okaSr mzao ato mebr him oiamro alio rbi mti bat hlm׃ 
john 6:26	oien atm ihoSe oiamr amn amn ani amr lkm la el raotkm at hatot tbqSoni ki am el aSr akltm mn hlHm otSbeo׃ 
john 6:27	al temlo bmakl aSr iabd ki am bmakl hqim lHii eolmim aSr bn hadm itnno lkm ki bo Htm Hotmo abio halhim׃ 
john 6:28	oiamro alio mh neSh lpel pelot alhim׃ 
john 6:29	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm cat pelt alhim ki tamino bch aSr hoa SlHo׃ 
john 6:30	oiamro alio mh apoa haot aSr teSh lmennrah onamin bk mh tpel׃ 
john 6:31	abotino aklo at hmn bmdbr kaSr ktob lHm mn hSmim ntn lmo lakl׃ 
john 6:32	oiamr alihm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm la mSh ntn lkm at hlHm mn hSmim ki am abi ntn lkm at hlHm mn hSmim hamti׃ 
john 6:33	ki lHm alhim hoa hiord mn hSmim ontn Hiim leolm׃ 
john 6:34	oiamro alio adni tnh lno tmid at hlHm hch׃ 
john 6:35	oiamr lhm ihoSe anki hoa lHm hHiim kl hba ali la ireb oaSr iamin bi la izma eod׃ 
john 6:36	oani hnh amrti lkm ki gm Hcitm ati ola tamino׃ 
john 6:37	kl aSr itnno li abi iboa ali ohba ali la ahdpno hHozh׃ 
john 6:38	ki irdti mn hSmim la leSot rzoni ki am rzon SlHi׃ 
john 6:39	och rzon hab aSr SlHni ki kl aSr ntn li la iabd li ki am aqimno biom haHron׃ 
john 6:40	och rzon SlHi aSr kl hrah at hbn omamin bo ihio lo Hii eolmim oani aqimno biom haHron׃ 
john 6:41	oilno elio hihodim el amro anki hoa hlHm hird mn hSmim׃ 
john 6:42	oiamro hla ch hoa ihoSe bn iosp aSr anHno ideim at abio oat amo oaik iamr mn hSmim bati׃ 
john 6:43	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm al tlino aiS al reho׃ 
john 6:44	la iokl aiS lboa ali blti am imSkho abi aSr SlHni oani aqimno biom haHron׃ 
john 6:45	hla ktob bnbiaim okl bnik lmodi ihoh lkn kl aSr Sme mn hab olmd iba ali׃ 
john 6:46	la kalo rah aiS at hab blti hba mat halhim hoa rah at halhim׃ 
john 6:47	amn amn ani amr lkm hmamin bi lo Hii eolmim׃ 
john 6:48	anki hoa lHm hHiim׃ 
john 6:49	abotikm aklo at hmn bmdbr oimto׃ 
john 6:50	ch hoa hlHm hird mn hSmim lmen iakl aiS mmno ola imot׃ 
john 6:51	anki hlHm hHi hird mn hSmim aiS ki iakl mn hlHm hch iHih leolm ohlHm aSr atnno hoa bSri aSr ani ntn bed Hii heolm׃ 
john 6:52	oitokHo hihodim aiS em reho lamr aikh iokl ch ltt lno at bSro lakl׃ 
john 6:53	oiamr alihm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm am la taklo at bSr bn hadm oStitm at dmo ain lkm Hiim bqrbkm׃ 
john 6:54	hakl at bSri ohSth at dmi iS lo Hii eolmim oani aqimno biom haHron׃ 
john 6:55	ki bSri bamt hoa makl odmi bamt hoa mSqh׃ 
john 6:56	hakl at bSri oSth at dmi hoa ilin bi oani bo׃ 
john 6:57	kaSr SlHni hab hHi oanki Hi bgll abi kn hakl ati gm hoa iHih bglli׃ 
john 6:58	ch hoa hlHm hird mn hSmim la kaSr aklo abotikm at hmn oimto hakl at hlHm hch iHih leolm׃ 
john 6:59	kcat dbr bbit hknst blmdo bkpr nHom׃ 
john 6:60	orbim mtlmidio kSmem amro qSh hdbr hch mi iokl lSme ato׃ 
john 6:61	oibn ihoSe blbo ki tlmidio mlinim el cat oiamr alihm hcat lkm lmkSol׃ 
john 6:62	mh apoa am trao at bn hadm elh al aSr hih Sm lpnim׃ 
john 6:63	hroH hoa hntn Hiim ohbSr ain bo moeil hdbrim aSr ani dbrti alikm roH hmh oHiim hmh׃ 
john 6:64	ak iS mkm aSr la iamino ki ihoSe ide mraS mi hm aSr ainm maminim omi hmosr ato׃ 
john 6:65	oiamr el kn amrti lkm ki la iokl aiS lboa ali blti am ntn lo mat abi׃ 
john 6:66	mn het hcat rbim mtlmidio nsgo aHor ola ispo lhthlk ato׃ 
john 6:67	oiamr ihoSe al Snim heSr hiS at npSkm gm atm lsor mmni׃ 
john 6:68	oien ato Smeon pTros adni al mi nlk dbri Hii eolmim emk׃ 
john 6:69	oanHno hamno onde ki ath hmSiH bn al Hi׃ 
john 6:70	oien atm ihoSe hla bHrti ani bkm Snim heSr oaHd mkm STn hoa׃ 
john 6:71	cat amr el ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot ki etid hih lmsro ohoa aHd mSnim heSr׃ 
john 7:1	aHri hdbrim halh hlk ihoSe barz hglil hlok oebor ki la abh lhthlk bihodh el aSr bqSo hihodim lhrgo׃ 
john 7:2	oiqrb Hg hihodim hoa Hg hskot׃ 
john 7:3	oiamro alio aHio qom olk mch arzh ihodh lmen irao gm tlmidik at hmeSim aSr ath eSh׃ 
john 7:4	ki la ieSh aiS dbr bstr ohoa Hpz lhtprsm lkn am ath eSh kalh hglh al heolm׃ 
john 7:5	ki aHio gm hm la hamino bo׃ 
john 7:6	oiamr alihm ihoSe eti la bah ed eth oetkm tmid nkonh׃ 
john 7:7	la iokl heolm lSnoa atkm oati iSna baSr ani meid elio ki reim mellio׃ 
john 7:8	elo atm lHg at hHg ani la aelh al hHg hch ki eti la mlah ed eth׃ 
john 7:9	kcat dbr oiSb bglil׃ 
john 7:10	oihi kaSr elo aHio lrgl oiel gm hoa la bgloi ki am kmsttr׃ 
john 7:11	ohihodim bqSho bHg oiamro aih hoa׃ 
john 7:12	othi tlonh rbh el adotio btok hem alh amro Tob hoa oalh amro la ki mteh hoa at hem׃ 
john 7:13	ak ain aiS mdbr elio bgloi mpni irat hihodim׃ 
john 7:14	oihi bHzi imi hHg elh ihoSe al hmqdS oilmd׃ 
john 7:15	oitmho hihodim oiamro aik ide ch spr ohoa la lmd׃ 
john 7:16	oien atm ihoSe oiamr lqHi la Sli hoa ki am laSr SlHni׃ 
john 7:17	haiS hHpz leSot rzono ide lqHi am mat alhim hoa oam mnpSi adbr׃ 
john 7:18	hmdbr mnpSi kbod ezmo ibqS abl hmbqS kbod SlHo namn hoa oain eolth bo׃ 
john 7:19	hla mSh ntn lkm at htorh oain aiS mkm eSh htorh mdoe tbqSo lhrgni׃ 
john 7:20	oien hem oiamr Sd bqrbk mi mbqS lhrgk׃ 
john 7:21	oien ihoSe oiamr lhm pelh aHt pelti oklkm elih ttmho׃ 
john 7:22	mSh ntn lkm hmilh ak la mmSh hia ki am mn habot obiom hSbt tmolo kl ckr׃ 
john 7:23	oeth am imol ckr bSbt lmen aSr la topr tort mSh mh tqzpo eli ki rpati aiS klo bSbt׃ 
john 7:24	al tSpTo lmrah ein ki am mSpT zdq SpTo׃ 
john 7:25	oiamro anSim miSbi iroSlim hla ch hoa aSr bqSo lhmito׃ 
john 7:26	ohnh hoa dbr bgloi ola igero bo hap amnm ideo raSino ki bamt ch hoa hmSiH׃ 
john 7:27	ak at ch ideno main hoa okaSr iboa hmSiH la ide aiS ai mch hoa׃ 
john 7:28	ac qra ihoSe bmqdS oilmd lamr hn idetm ati ap idetm main ani omnpSi la bati akn iS amti aSr SlHni oato la idetm׃ 
john 7:29	oani idetio ki mato ani ohoa SlHni׃ 
john 7:30	oibqSo ltpSo oaiS la SlH bo id ki la ba eto׃ 
john 7:31	orbim mn hem hamino bo oiamro am iba hmSiH hgm ieSh atot rbot maSr eSh ch׃ 
john 7:32	ohproSim Smeo at hem mtlHSim elio kcat oiSlHo hproSim oraSi hkhnim mSrtim ltpSo׃ 
john 7:33	oiamr alihm ihoSe ak lmzer eodni emkm ohlkti al aSr SlHni׃ 
john 7:34	tSHrnni ola tmzanni obaSr ani Sm atm la toklo lboa׃ 
john 7:35	oiamro hihodim aiS reho anh ilk ch oanHno la nmzaho hki ilk al hnpozim bin hionim oilmd anSi ion׃ 
john 7:36	mh ch hdbr aSr amr tSHrnni ola tmzanni obaSr ani Sm atm la toklo lboa׃ 
john 7:37	oihi biom hHg haHron hgdol emd ihoSe oiqra lamr aiS ki izma iba na ali oiSth׃ 
john 7:38	hmamin bi kdbr hktob mbTno inhro nhri mim Hiim׃ 
john 7:39	ocat amr el hroH aSr iqHho hmaminim bo ki la ntn roH hqdS ednh ien aSr ihoSe eod la ntpar׃ 
john 7:40	orbim mhmon hem kSmem at hdbr hch amro akn ch hoa hnbia׃ 
john 7:41	oiS aSr amro ch hoa hmSiH oaHrim amro hmn hglil iba hmSiH׃ 
john 7:42	hla hktob amr ki mcre dod omkpr bit lHm mqom dod iza hmSiH׃ 
john 7:43	othi mHlqt btok hem el adotio׃ 
john 7:44	omqztm rzo ltpSo oaiS la SlH bo id׃ 
john 7:45	oiSobo hmSrtim al hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim ohmh amro alihm mdoe la hbatm ato׃ 
john 7:46	oieno hebdim meolm la dbr aiS kaiS hch׃ 
john 7:47	oiamro alihm hproSim hki ndhtm gm atm׃ 
john 7:48	hgm hamin bo aiS mn hSrim ao mn hproSim׃ 
john 7:49	rq hhmon hch aSr ainm ideim at htorh arorim hmh׃ 
john 7:50	oiamr alihm nqdimon aSr ba alio blilh ohoa hih aHd mhm׃ 
john 7:51	htSpT tortno aiS bTrm tHqrho ldet at aSr eSh׃ 
john 7:52	oieno oiamro alio hgm ath mn hglil drS na orah ki la qm nbia mn hglil׃ 
john 7:53	oilko aiS aiS lbito׃ 
john 8:1	oihoSe hlk al hr hcitim׃ 
john 8:2	oihi bbqr oiba eod al hmqdS okl hem bao alio oiSb oilmdm׃ 
john 8:3	oibiao hsoprim ohproSim aSh lpnio aSr ntpSh bSToth oiemidoh btok׃ 
john 8:4	oiamro alio rbi haSh hcat ntpSh kSnTmat bnaopih׃ 
john 8:5	omSh zono btorh lsql nSim kalh oath mh tamr׃ 
john 8:6	oak lnsot ato dbro cat lmza elio STnh oikp ihoSe lmTh oito bazbeo el hqrqe׃ 
john 8:7	oihi kaSr hosipo lSal ato oiSa at einio oiamr alihm mi bkm ck bli pSe hoa raSonh idh bh abn׃ 
john 8:8	oikp Snit lmTh oito el hqrqe׃ 
john 8:9	oihi kSmem oik lbm atm oizao aHd aHd hHozh hHl mn hcqnim oed haHronim oiotr ihoSe lbdo ohaSh nzbt btok׃ 
john 8:10	oiSa ihoSe at einio oira ki ain aiS blti haSh lbdh oiamr alih aSh aiph STnik hki hrSiek aiS׃ 
john 8:11	otamr la adni oiamr lkn gm ani la arSiek lki ldrkk oal tHTai eod׃ 
john 8:12	oisp ihoSe oidbr alihm lamr ani aor heolm kl hhlk aHri la ithlk bHSkh ki aor hHiim ihih lo׃ 
john 8:13	oiamro hproSim el nSpk meid ath edotk ainnh namnh׃ 
john 8:14	oien ihoSe oiamr alihm ap am aeid el npSi edoti namnh ien ki ideti main bati oanh ani hlk oatm la idetm main bati oanh alk׃ 
john 8:15	atm lpi hbSr tSpTo oani la aSpT aiS׃ 
john 8:16	oam anki aSpT mSpTi amt ki la lbdi hnni ki am ani ohab aSr SlHni׃ 
john 8:17	ogm btortkm ktob ki edot Sni anSim namnh hia׃ 
john 8:18	ani hoa hmeid eli ogm hab aSr SlHni ieidni׃ 
john 8:19	oiamro alio aio abik oien ihoSe gm ati gm at abi la idetm alo ati idetm ki eth gm at abi idetm׃ 
john 8:20	kdbrim halh dbr bbit haozr blmdo bmqdS ola tpSo aiS ki la ba eto׃ 
john 8:21	oiosp ihoSe oiamr alihm ani hlk mch otbqSoni obHTatkm tmoto al aSr ani hlk Smh atm la toklo lboa׃ 
john 8:22	oiamro hihodim hhmt imit at npSo ki amr al aSr ani holk Smh atm la toklo lboa׃ 
john 8:23	oiamr alihm atm hnkm mn htHtonim oani mn helionim atm mn heolm hch oani ainni mn heolm hch׃ 
john 8:24	lkn amrti alikm ki tmoto bHTaikm ki am la tamino ki ani hoa bHTaikm tmoto׃ 
john 8:25	oiamro alio mi ch ath oiamr alihm ihoSe mh Sgm mraS dbrti alikm׃ 
john 8:26	rbot emi ldbr olSpT elikm akn SlHi namn hoa oaSr Smeti mmno ato ani mdbr al heolm׃ 
john 8:27	ohm la htbonno ki el hab amr alihm׃ 
john 8:28	ac amr lhm ihoSe bet tnSao at bn hadm oidetm ki ani hoa oki ainni eSh dbr mnpSi ki am kaSr lmdni abi alh adbr׃ 
john 8:29	oaSr SlH ati hoa emdi hab la ecbni lbdd ki at hTob beinio ani eSh tmid׃ 
john 8:30	oihi bdbro cat oiamino bo rbim׃ 
john 8:31	oiamr ihoSe al hihodim hmaminim bo am temdo bdbri bamt tlmidi atm׃ 
john 8:32	oidetm at hamt ohamt tSimkm lbni Horin׃ 
john 8:33	oieno ato cre abrhm nHno omeolm la hiino laiS lebdim aikh tamr bni Horin thio׃ 
john 8:34	oien atm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm kl eSh HTa ebd hHTa hoa׃ 
john 8:35	ohebd la iSkn bbit leolm hbn iSkn leolm׃ 
john 8:36	lkn am hbn ieSh atkm bni Horin HpSim bamt thio׃ 
john 8:37	ideti ki cre abrhm atm abl atm mbqSim lhmitni ki dbri la ikn btokkm׃ 
john 8:38	ani mdbr at aSr raiti azl abi oatm eSim at aSr raitm azl abikm׃ 
john 8:39	oieno oiamro alio abino hoa abrhm oiamr alihm ihoSe alo hiitm bni abrhm kmeSi abrhm eSitm׃ 
john 8:40	oeth atm mbqSim lhmitni aiS dbr alikm hamt aSr Smeti mem halhim abrhm la eSh kcat׃ 
john 8:41	at meSi abikm atm eSim oiamro alio la ildi cnonim anHno iS lno ab aHd hoa halhim׃ 
john 8:42	oiamr alihm ihoSe alo alhim hoa abikm ki eth ahbtm ati ki anki izati obati mat halhim hn la mmni bati ak hoa SlHni׃ 
john 8:43	mdoe la tbino lSoni ien la toklon lSme at dbri׃ 
john 8:44	atm mn abikm hSTn oleSot at taot abikm Hpztm hoa rozH npS hih mraS obamt la emd ki amt ain bo mdi dbri kcb mSlo idbr ki kcb hoa oabi hkcb׃ 
john 8:45	oani ien dbri hamt la tamino li׃ 
john 8:46	mi bkm el eon iokiHni oam amt dbrti mdoe la tamino li׃ 
john 8:47	aSr mat halhim hoa iSme at dbri halhim el kn atm la Smetm ki ainkm mat halhim׃ 
john 8:48	ac ieno hihodim oiamro alio hla hTbno aSr dbrno ki Smroni ath oSd bk׃ 
john 8:49	oien ihoSe Sd ain bi rq at abi ani mkbd oatm tbconi׃ 
john 8:50	akn la abqS at kbodi iS aHd aSr ibqS oiSpT׃ 
john 8:51	amn amn ani amr lkm am iSmr aiS at dbri la irah mot lnzH׃ 
john 8:52	oiamro alio hihodim eth ideno ki Sd bk hn abrhm ohnbiaim mto oath amrt am iSmr aiS at dbri la iTem mot lnzH׃ 
john 8:53	hath gdol mabrhm abino aSr mt gm hnbiaim mto mh teSh at ezmk׃ 
john 8:54	oien ihoSe am ani mkbd at npSi kbodi main abi hoa hmkbd ati aSr tamro elio ki hoa alhikm׃ 
john 8:55	ola idetm ato oani idetio oam amr la ideti ato ahih kcb kmokm abl idetio oat dbro Smrti׃ 
john 8:56	abrhm abikm SS lraot at iomi oira oiSmH׃ 
john 8:57	oiamro alio hihodim hnh aink bn HmSim Snh oat abrhm rait׃ 
john 8:58	oiamr alihm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm bTrm hiot abrhm ani hoa׃ 
john 8:59	ac irimo abnim lrgm ato oihoSe htelm oiza mn hmqdS oiebr btokm ebor oHlop׃ 
john 9:1	oihi bebro oira aiS ohoa eor miom holdo׃ 
john 9:2	oiSalo ato tlmidio lamr rbi mi hoa aSr HTa hch am ildio ki nold eor׃ 
john 9:3	oien ihoSe la ch HTa ola ioldio ak lmen iglo bo melli al׃ 
john 9:4	eli leSot meSi SlHi beod iom iboa hlilh aSr bo la iokl aiS lpel׃ 
john 9:5	bhioti beolm aor heolm ani׃ 
john 9:6	oihi kdbro cat oirq el harz oieS TiT mn hroq oimrH at hTiT el eini heor׃ 
john 9:7	oiamr alio lk orHz bbrkt hSlH proSo SloH oilk oirHz oiba oeinio raot׃ 
john 9:8	oiamro Sknio oaSr rao ato lpnim ki eor hoa hla ch hoa hiSb omSal׃ 
john 9:9	alh amro ki hoa ch oalh amro ak domh lo ohoa amr ani hoa׃ 
john 9:10	oiamro alio bmh apo npqHo einik׃ 
john 9:11	oien oiamr aiS aSr nqra Smo ihoSe eSh TiT oimrH el eini oiamr ali lk orHz bbrkt hSlH oalk oarHz otarnh eini׃ 
john 9:12	oiamro alio aio oiamr la ideti׃ 
john 9:13	oibiao at haiS aSr hih eor lpnim al hproSim׃ 
john 9:14	ohiom aSr eSh bo ihoSe at hTiT oipqH at einio Sbt hih׃ 
john 9:15	oiosipo lSal ato gm hproSim aik npqHo einio oiamr alihm TiT Sm el eini oarHz ohnni rah׃ 
john 9:16	oiamro mqzt hproSim ch haiS la malhim hoa ki la iSmr at hSbt oaHrim amro aikh iokl aiS HTa leSot atot kalh oihi rib binihm׃ 
john 9:17	oiosipo oiamro al heor mh tamr ath elio aSr pqH einik oiamr nbia hoa׃ 
john 9:18	ola hamino hihodim elio ki eor hih oaro einio ed aSr qrao al ioldi hnrpa׃ 
john 9:19	oiSalo atm lamr hch hoa bnkm aSr amrtm ki nold eor oaikh hoa rah eth׃ 
john 9:20	oieno atm ioldio oiamro ideno ki ch hoa bnno oki nold eor׃ 
john 9:21	abl aik hoa rah eth ao mi pqH at einio anHno la ideno hla bn det hoa Salo at piho ohoa igid mh hih lo׃ 
john 9:22	kcat dbro ioldio miratm at hihodim ki hihodim kbr noezo lndot at kl aSr iodh ki hoa hmSiH׃ 
john 9:23	el kn amro ioldio bn det hoa Salo at piho׃ 
john 9:24	oiqrao Snit laiS aSr hih eor oiamro alio tn kbod lalhim anHno ideno ki haiS hch HTa hoa׃ 
john 9:25	oien oiamr am haiS HTa hoa ainni ide aHt ideti ki eor hiiti oeth hnni rah׃ 
john 9:26	oiamro alio eod mh eSh lk aikh pqH einik׃ 
john 9:27	oien atm kbr amrti lkm hla Smetm omh lkm lSme Snit htabo gm atm lhiot tlmidio׃ 
john 9:28	oiHrpo ato oiamro ath tlmido oanHno tlmidio Sl mSh׃ 
john 9:29	anHno iodeim ki al mSh dbr halhim oat ch la ideno main hoa׃ 
john 9:30	oien haiS oiamr alihm cat hia hpla opla ki la idetm main hoa ohoa pqH at eini׃ 
john 9:31	ohnh ideno ki at hHTaim la iSme al ki am at ira halhim oeSh rzono ato iSme׃ 
john 9:32	meolm la nSme ki pqH aiS eini eor mrHm׃ 
john 9:33	lola hih ch mat alhim la hih ikl leSot maomh׃ 
john 9:34	oieno oiamro alio hn bHTaim noldt klk oath tlmdno oihdpho hHozh׃ 
john 9:35	oiSme ihoSe ki hdpho hHozh oipgSho oiamr alio htamin bbn hadm׃ 
john 9:36	oien oiamr mi hoa ch adni lmen aamin bo׃ 
john 9:37	oiamr alio ihoSe hn rait ato ohmdbr alik hnh ch hoa׃ 
john 9:38	oiamr ani mamin adni oiStHo lo׃ 
john 9:39	oiamr ihoSe ani ldin bati leolm hch lmen irao heorim ohraim iko beoron׃ 
john 9:40	oaSr hio emo mn hproSim Smeo dbrio oiamro alio hgm anHno eorim׃ 
john 9:41	oiamr alihm am eorim hiitm la hih bkm HTa oeth ki amrtm pqHim anHno HTatkm temd׃ 
john 10:1	amn amn ani amr lkm aiS aSr la iboa drk hSer al mkla hzan ki am ielh bdrk aHr gnb opriz hoa׃ 
john 10:2	oaSr iboa drk hSer hoa reh hzan׃ 
john 10:3	lo iptH Smr hsp ohzan at qlo tSmenh ohoa lzano bSm iqra oioziam׃ 
john 10:4	oaHri hoziao at zano hoa iebr lpnihn ohzan hlkot aHrio ki ideo at qolo׃ 
john 10:5	oaHri cr la tlknh ki am inoso mpnio ki at qol hcrim la ideo׃ 
john 10:6	hmSl hch dbr ihoSe bacnihm ohmh la ideo mh cat aSr amr alihm׃ 
john 10:7	oiosp ihoSe oidbr alihm amn amn ani amr lkm ani hoa dlt hzan׃ 
john 10:8	kl aSr bao lpni gnbim hmh oprizim ohzan la Smeo lqolm׃ 
john 10:9	anki hdlt aiS ki iboa bi ioSe obzato obboao imza mreh׃ 
john 10:10	hgnb la iboa ki am lgnob olhrog olabd oani bati lbebor hbia lhm Hiim omla spqm׃ 
john 10:11	anki hoa hreh hTob hreh hTob itn at npSo bed zano׃ 
john 10:12	ohSkir aSr la reh hoa ohzan la lo hnh braoto ki ba hcab iecb at hzan ons ohcab iHTp oipiz at hzan׃ 
john 10:13	hSkir inos ki Skir hoa ola idag lzan׃ 
john 10:14	ani hreh hTob oideti at aSr li onodeti laSr li׃ 
john 10:15	kaSr hab ideni oani ideti at hab oat npSi atn bed hzan׃ 
john 10:16	ozan aHrot iS li aSr ainn mn hmklh hcat oeli lnhl gm atn otSmenh qoli ohih edr aHd oreh aHd׃ 
john 10:17	el kn ahb ati abi ki at npSi atn lmen aSob oaqHh׃ 
john 10:18	oaiS la iqHnh mati ki am ani mezmi atnnh iS bidi ltt ath obidi lSob lqHth at hmzoh hcat lqHti mem abi׃ 
john 10:19	othi mHlqt gm bpem hcat bin hihodim el hdbrim halh׃ 
john 10:20	oiamro rbim mhm Sd bo omSge hoa lmh tSmeo alio׃ 
john 10:21	oaHrim amro la kalh idbr aiS aHoc Sd hiokl Sd lpqH eini eorim׃ 
john 10:22	oihi Hg Hnkt hbit biroSlim ostio hih׃ 
john 10:23	oithlk ihoSe bmqdS baolm Sl Slmh׃ 
john 10:24	oisbo ato hihodim oiamro alio ed anh ttlh at npSno at hmSiH ath hgidh lno bror׃ 
john 10:25	oien atm ihoSe hn amrti alikm ola hamntm bi hmeSim aSr ani eSh bSm abi hm ieido eli׃ 
john 10:26	abl atm la tamino ien la mzani atm kaSr amrti lkm׃ 
john 10:27	zani tSmenh at qoli oani idetin oaHri tlknh׃ 
john 10:28	oani atn lhn Hii eolmim ola tabdnh lnzH oaiS la iHTp athn midi׃ 
john 10:29	hab aSr ntnn li gdol hoa el kl oaiS la iHTp athn mid hab׃ 
john 10:30	ani oabi aHd anHno׃ 
john 10:31	ac irimo hihodim kpem bpem abnim lsqlo׃ 
john 10:32	oien atm ihoSe meSim Tobim rbim hraiti atkm mat abi el ai ch mn hmeSim hhm tsqlni׃ 
john 10:33	oieno hihodim ato lamr el meSh Tob la nsql atk ki am el gdpk at alhim oel ki adm ath oteS at ezmk lalhim׃ 
john 10:34	oien atm ihoSe hla ktob btortkm ani amrti alhim atm׃ 
john 10:35	hn qra Sm alhim lalh aSr hih dbr halhim alihm ohktob la iopr׃ 
john 10:36	oaik tamro el aSr qdSo hab oSlHo leolm mgdp ath ien amrti bn alhim ani׃ 
john 10:37	am la aeSh at meSi abi al tamino li׃ 
john 10:38	oam eSiti ola tamino li hamino na lmeSi lmen tdeo otamino ki bi hab oani bo׃ 
john 10:39	ac iSobo oibqSo ltpSo oimlT midm׃ 
john 10:40	oilk oiSb al ebr hirdn al hmqom aSr hTbil Sm ioHnn btHlh oiSb Sm׃ 
john 10:41	oibao alio rbim oiamro hnh ioHnn la eSh aot abl kl aSr dbr ioHnn el haiS hch amt hih׃ 
john 10:42	oiamino bo rbim bmqom hhoa׃ 
john 11:1	oihi aiS Holh lecr Smo mbit hini kpr mrim omrta aHoth׃ 
john 11:2	hia mrim aSr mSHh at hadon bSmn hmr otngb at rglio bSerotih oeth lecr aHih Hlh׃ 
john 11:3	otSlHnh aHiotio alio lamr adni hnh ch aSr ahbt Hlh hoa׃ 
john 11:4	oiSme ihoSe oiamr cat hmHlh ainnh lmot ki am lkbod halhim lmen ikbd bh bn halhim׃ 
john 11:5	oihoSe ahb at mrta oat aHoth oat lecr׃ 
john 11:6	oihi kSmeo ki Hlh oitmhmh oiSb iomim bmqom aSr hoa Sm׃ 
john 11:7	maHri kn amr ltlmidio lko onSobh larz ihodh׃ 
john 11:8	oiamro alio tlmidio rbi eth ch bqSo hihodim lsqlk oath tSob Smh׃ 
john 11:9	oien ihoSe hla Stim eSrh Seot liom aiS ki ilk biom la ikSl ki irah aor heolm hch׃ 
john 11:10	abl hhlk blilh ikSl ki haor ain bo׃ 
john 11:11	kcat dbr oaHri kn amr alihm lecr ididno iSn hoa oanki hlk lmen aeirno׃ 
john 11:12	oiamro tlmidio adni am iSn hoa ioSe׃ 
john 11:13	oihoSe dbr el moto ohmh HSbo ki el mnoHt hSnh dbr׃ 
john 11:14	ac glh ihoSe at acnm oiamr alihm lecr mt׃ 
john 11:15	oSmH ani bgllkm ki la hiiti Sm lmen tamino oeth nseh onlkh alio׃ 
john 11:16	oiamr toma hnqra didomos al htlmidim Hbrio nlkh gm anHno lmen nmot emo׃ 
john 11:17	oiba ihoSe oimzaho ch arbeh imim Skb bqbr׃ 
john 11:18	obit hini hih qrob liroSlim kdrk HmS eSrh ris׃ 
john 11:19	orbim mn hihodim bao bit mrta omrim lnHm athn el aHihn׃ 
john 11:20	oihi kSme mrta ki ihoSe ba otza lqrto omrim ioSbt bbit׃ 
john 11:21	otamr mrta al ihoSe adni alo hiit ph ki ac la mt aHi׃ 
john 11:22	ogm eth ideti ki kl aSr tSal mat alhim itn lk alhim׃ 
john 11:23	oiamr alih ihoSe qom iqom aHik׃ 
john 11:24	otamr alio mrta ideti ki iqom btqomh biom haHron׃ 
john 11:25	oiamr alih ihoSe anki htqomh ohHiim hmamin bi iHih gm ki imot׃ 
john 11:26	okl hHi aSr iamin bi la imot leolm htamini cat׃ 
john 11:27	otamr alio kn adni hamnti ki ath hmSiH bn halhim hba leolm׃ 
john 11:28	oihi aHr dbrh cat otlk otqra lmrim aHoth bstr lamr hnh hmorh ph oqra lk׃ 
john 11:29	hia Smeh otmhr lqom otba alio׃ 
john 11:30	oihoSe Trm iba al hkpr ki eodno emd bmqom aSr pgSto Sm mrta׃ 
john 11:31	ohihodim aSr bao al bith lnHmh kraotm at mrim ki qmh ptam otza hlko aHrih bamrm ki hlkh lh al hqbr lbkot Smh׃ 
john 11:32	otba mrim al hmqom aSr ihoSe emd Sm otra ato otpl lrglio otamr lo adni alo hiit ph ki ac la mt aHi׃ 
john 11:33	oihi kraot ihoSe ath bkih ogm hihodim aSr bao ath bkim otcem roHo oihi mreid׃ 
john 11:34	oiamr aiph Smtm ato oiamro alio adni ba orah׃ 
john 11:35	oibk ihoSe׃ 
john 11:36	oiamro hihodim hnh mh gdlh ahbto ato׃ 
john 11:37	omqztm amro hpqH eini heor hla ikl leSot Sgm ch la imot׃ 
john 11:38	oiosp eod ihoSe lhcem broHo oiba al hqbr ohoa merh oabn el mboah׃ 
john 11:39	oiamr ihoSe Sao at habn melih otamr alio mrta aHot hmt adni hnh kbr baS ki arbeh imim lo׃ 
john 11:40	oiamr alih ihoSe hla amrti lk ki am tamini tHci at kbod halhim׃ 
john 11:41	oiSao at habn aSr hmt hoSm Sm oihoSe nSa at einio lmrom oiamr aodk abi ki enitni׃ 
john 11:42	oani ideti ki bkl et tenni aolm bebor hem hch aSr sbiboti dbrti lmen iamino bi ki ath SlHtni׃ 
john 11:43	oihi kkloto ldbr oiqra bqol gdol lecr qom za׃ 
john 11:44	oiza hmt oidio orglio krokt btkrikin opio loTim bsodr oiamr alihm ihoSe htiro ato oilk ldrko׃ 
john 11:45	orbim mn hihodim aSr bao al mrim braotm at aSr eSh ihoSe hamino bo׃ 
john 11:46	omqztm hlko al hproSim oigido lhm at aSr eSh ihoSe׃ 
john 11:47	ac iqhilo hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim at hsnhdrin oiamro mh neSh ki haiS hlch eSh atot hrbh׃ 
john 11:48	am nniH lo leSot klm iamino bo obao hromiim olqHo gm at admtno ogm at emno׃ 
john 11:49	oaHd mhm qipa Smo ohoa khn gdol bSnh hhia amr alihm hn la tdeo maomh׃ 
john 11:50	ap la ttbonno ki Tob lno mot aiS aHd bed hgoi mabd hem klo׃ 
john 11:51	ocat la dbr mlbo ki am bhioto khn gdol bSnh hhia nba ki ihoSe imot bed hem׃ 
john 11:52	ola bed hem lbd ki am lqbz gm at bni alhim hmpcrim ohio laHdim׃ 
john 11:53	oioezo iHdo lhmito mhiom hhoa ohlah׃ 
john 11:54	el kn la hthlk ihoSe eod btok hihodim bgloi ki am sr mSm larz hqrobh al hmdbr al eir eprim oigr Sm em tlmidio׃ 
john 11:55	oiqrbo imi hpsH lihodim oem rb elo mn harz iroSlimh lpni hpsH lmen iThro׃ 
john 11:56	oibqSo at ihoSe obemdm bbit hmqdS ndbro lamr mh tHSbo hki la iboa al hHg׃ 
john 11:57	ohkhnim hgdolim ohproSim gcro gcrh aSr am ide aiS at mqomo iodieno lmen itpSho׃ 
john 12:1	oSSt imim lpni Hg hpsH ba ihoSe lbit hini mqom lecr aSr heir ato mem hmtim׃ 
john 12:2	oieSo lo Sm mSth berb omrta mSrtt olecr hih aHd mn hmsbim ato׃ 
john 12:3	otqH mrim mrqHt nrd ck oiqr mad lTra aHt mSqlh otmSH bh at rgli ihoSe otngb at rglio bSerotih ohbit imla riH hmrqHt׃ 
john 12:4	oiamr aHd mtlmidio hoa ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot hetid lmsro׃ 
john 12:5	mdoe la nmkrh hmrqHt bSlS maot dinr ontn leniim׃ 
john 12:6	ohoa la dbr at cat mHmlto el heniim ki am gnb hih okis hksp ato oiSa kl aSr iSimo bo׃ 
john 12:7	oiamr ihoSe hniHh lh liom qborti zpnh cat׃ 
john 12:8	ki heniim tmid hmh emkm oani ainni tmid emkm׃ 
john 12:9	oiSmeo em rb bihodh ki Sm hoa oibao la bebor ihoSe lbdo ki am lraot gm at lecr aSr heiro mem hmtim׃ 
john 12:10	oraSi hkhnim htiezo lhrg gm at lecr׃ 
john 12:11	ki bgllo bao Smh rbim mn hihodim oiamino bihoSe׃ 
john 12:12	oihi mmHrt kSmoe hmon rb aSr bao lHg hHg ki iba ihoSe iroSlim׃ 
john 12:13	oiqHo bidm kpot tmrim oizao lqrato oirieo lamr hoSe na brok hba bSm ihoh mlk iSral׃ 
john 12:14	oimza ihoSe eir aHd oirkb elio kaSr ktob׃ 
john 12:15	al tirai bt zion hnh mlkk iboa lk rkb el eir bn atnot׃ 
john 12:16	okl cat la hbino tlmidio braSonh ak aHri aSr ntpar ihoSe ckro ki kn ktob elio oki cat eSo lo׃ 
john 12:17	oieido hem aSr hio azlo bqrao al lecr lzat mn hqbr oier ato mem hmtim׃ 
john 12:18	el cat gm hmon hem iza lqrato el Smem ki eSh haot hch׃ 
john 12:19	ohproSim dbro aiS at aHio lamr hraitm ki hoeil la toeilo maomh hnh kl heolm nmSk aHrio׃ 
john 12:20	obtok helim lhStHot bHg hio anSim ionim׃ 
john 12:21	oiqrbo al pilpos aiS bit zidh aSr barz hglil oiSalo mmno lamr adni lraot at ihoSe Hpzno׃ 
john 12:22	oiba pilpos oigd cat al andri oandri opilpos hgido al ihoSe׃ 
john 12:23	oien aotm ihoSe oiamr bah hSeh Sipar bn hadm׃ 
john 12:24	amn amn ani amr lkm am la ipl grgr hHTa al tok hadmh omt iSar lbdo okaSr mt ieSh pri hrbh׃ 
john 12:25	hahb at npSo iabdnh ohSna at npSo beolm hch inzrh lHii nzH׃ 
john 12:26	hHpz lSrtni ilk aHri obaSr ahih Sm ihih gm mSrti oaiS aSr iSrtni ato ikbd abi׃ 
john 12:27	eth nbhlh npSi omh amr hoSieni abi mn hSeh hcat ak el kn bati al hSeh hcat׃ 
john 12:28	abi par at Smk otza bt qol mn hSmim gm parti ogm aosip lpar׃ 
john 12:29	ohem hemdim Smh kSmem amro rem nSme oaHrim amro mlak dbr ato׃ 
john 12:30	oien ihoSe oiamr la lmeni hih hqol hch ki am lmenkm׃ 
john 12:31	eth mSpT ba el heolm hch eth iSlk Sr heolm hch Hozh׃ 
john 12:32	oani bhnSai mel harz amSk klm ali׃ 
john 12:33	ocat dbr lrmoc ai ch mot hoa etid lmot׃ 
john 12:34	oieno ato hem oiamro hnh Smeno btorh ki hmSiH ikon leolm oaik amrt ki bn hadm zrik lhnSa omi bn hadm hlch׃ 
john 12:35	oiamr alihm ihoSe ak lmzer ihih haor emkm hthlko beod lkm haor pn iSopkm HSk ohhlk bHSk la ide anh hoa hlk׃ 
john 12:36	beod lkm haor hamino baor lmen thio bni haor at hdbrim halh dbr ihoSe oilk lo oistr mpnihm׃ 
john 12:37	rbim hatot aSr eSh leinihm obkl cat la hamino bo׃ 
john 12:38	lmlat dbr iSeiho hnbia aSr amr ihoh mi hamin lSmetno ocroe ihoh el mi nglth׃ 
john 12:39	el kn la iklo lhamin ki eod amr iSeiho׃ 
john 12:40	hSe einihm ohSmin lbbm pn irao beinihm olbbm ibin oSbo orpati lhm׃ 
john 12:41	kcat dbr iSeiho braoto at tparto oinba elio׃ 
john 12:42	aolm rbim ap mn hSrim hamino bo ak bgll hproSim la hodo lmen aSr la indo׃ 
john 12:43	ki ahbo kbod anSim iotr mkbod halhim׃ 
john 12:44	oiqra ihoSe oiamr hmamin bi la bi hoa mamin ki am bSlH ati׃ 
john 12:45	ohrah ati at aSr SlHni hoa rah׃ 
john 12:46	ani bati laor al heolm lmen kl aSr iamin bi la iSb bHSk׃ 
john 12:47	ohSme at dbri ola iSmrm ani la aSpT ato ki la bati lSpT at heolm ki am lhoSie at heolm׃ 
john 12:48	oaiS aSr ibcni ola iqH amri iS aHd aSr idin ato hdbr aSr dbrti hoa idin ato biom haHron׃ 
john 12:49	ki ani la mlbi dbrti ki am abi hSlH ati hoa zoni at aSr amr oat aSr adbr׃ 
john 12:50	oani ideti ki mzoto Hii eolm lkn kl aSr adbr kaSr amr ali abi kn ani mdbr׃ 
john 13:1	olpni Hg hpsH kSide ihoSe ki bah Seto lebr mn heolm hch al abio kaSr ahb at bHirio aSr beolm kn ahbm ed hqz׃ 
john 13:2	oihi aHri hHl hseodh ohSTn ntn blb ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot lmsro׃ 
john 13:3	oide ihoSe ki ntn abio at hkl bido oki malhim ba oal alhim iSob׃ 
john 13:4	oiqm mel hSlHn oipST at bgdio oiqH mTpHt oiHgrh׃ 
john 13:5	oaHr izq mim bkior oiHl lrHz at rgli tlmidio olngb bmTpHt aSr hoa Hgor bh׃ 
john 13:6	oiqrb al Smeon pTros ohoa amr alio adni hath trHz at rgli׃ 
john 13:7	oien ihoSe oiamr alio at aSr ani eSh aink ide ket oaHri kn tde׃ 
john 13:8	oiamr alio pTros leolm la trHz at rgli oien ihoSe am la arHz atk ain lk Hlq emi׃ 
john 13:9	oiamr alio Smeon pTros adni la lbd at rgli ki am gm at idi oat raSi׃ 
john 13:10	oiamr alio ihoSe hmrHz ain lo lrHz eod ki am at hrglim ki klo Thor hoa oatm Thorim ak la klkm׃ 
john 13:11	ki ide mi imsrho el kn amr la klkm Thorim׃ 
john 13:12	oihi aHri aSr rHz at rglim oilbS at bgdio oiSb lhsb oiamr alihm hidetm mh hdbr aSr eSiti lkm׃ 
john 13:13	atm qraim li rb oadon ohiTbtm aSr dbrtm ki ani hoa׃ 
john 13:14	lkn am ani hmorh ohadon rHzti at rglikm gm atm Hibim lrHz aiS at rgli aHio׃ 
john 13:15	ki mopt ntti lkm lmen teSo gm atm kaSr eSiti lkm׃ 
john 13:16	amn amn ani amr lkm ki hebd ainno gdol madnio ohSloH ainno gdol mSlHo׃ 
john 13:17	am idetm cat aSrikm am kn teSo׃ 
john 13:18	la el klkm dbrti iode ani at aSr bHrti bhm ak lmen imla hktob aokl lHmi hgdil eli eqb׃ 
john 13:19	meth ani amr lkm bTrm hioth lmen bboah tamino ki ani hoa׃ 
john 13:20	amn amn ani amr lkm ki kl hmqbl at aSr aSlHho ati hoa mqbl ohmqbl ati hoa mqbl at SlHi׃ 
john 13:21	oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr hdbrim halh oibhl broHo oied oiamr amn amn ani amr lkm ki aHd mkm imsrni׃ 
john 13:22	oitrao tlmidio oitmho aiS al reho ldet el mi dbr׃ 
john 13:23	oaHd mtlmidio msb el Hiq ihoSe aSr ihoSe ahbo׃ 
john 13:24	oirmc lo Smeon pTros ldrS mi hoa ch aSr dbr elio׃ 
john 13:25	oipl el lb ihoSe oiamr alio adni mi hoa׃ 
john 13:26	oien ihoSe hnh ch hoa aSr aTbl pti ltto lo oiTbl at pto oitn al ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot׃ 
john 13:27	oaHri bleo ba hSTn al qrbo oiamr alio ihoSe at aSr teSh eSh mhrh׃ 
john 13:28	omn hmsbim la ide aiS el mh dbr alio kcat׃ 
john 13:29	ki iS aSr HSbo ki amr alio ihoSe qnh lno zrki hHg ao ltt labionim ien aSr kis hksp tHt id ihodh׃ 
john 13:30	ohoa bqHto at pt hlHm mhr lzat hHozh oihi lilh׃ 
john 13:31	hoa iza oihoSe amr eth ntpar bn hadm ohalhim ntpar bo׃ 
john 13:32	am halhim ntpar bo gm halhim hoa iparho bezmo obmhrh iparho׃ 
john 13:33	bni eod meT mcer ahih emkm atm tbqSoni okaSr amrti al hihodim ki al aSr ani holk la toklo lboa Smh kn alikm amr ani eth׃ 
john 13:34	mzoh HdSh ani ntn lkm ki tahbo aiS at aHio kaSr ahbti atkm kn gm atm aiS at aHio tahbon׃ 
john 13:35	bcat ideo klm ki tlmidi atm bhiot ahbh binikm׃ 
john 13:36	oiamr alio pTros adni anh tlk oien ato ihoSe al aSr ani holk Smh la tokl eth llkt aHri ak aHri kn tlk aHri׃ 
john 13:37	oiamr alio pTros mdoe la aokl eth llkt aHrik hn npSi bed npSk atn׃ 
john 13:38	oien ato ihoSe hki ttn npSk bed npSi amn amn ani amr lk bTrm iqra htrngl tkHS bi SlS pemim׃ 
john 14:1	al ibhl lbbkm hamino balhim obi hamino׃ 
john 14:2	bbit abi meonot rbot oam la kn hoa ki eth hgdti lkm hnni hlk lhkin mqom lkm׃ 
john 14:3	ohih ki hlkti ohkinoti lkm mqom Sob aSob olqHti atkm ali lmen baSr ahih Sm thio gm atm׃ 
john 14:4	oal aSr ani holk Smh idetm oat hdrk idetm׃ 
john 14:5	oiamr alio toma adni la ideno anh ath hlk oaikkh nde at hdrk׃ 
john 14:6	oiamr alio ihoSe anki hnni hdrk ohamt ohHiim la iba aiS al hab ki am el idi׃ 
john 14:7	lo idetm ati gm at abi idetm ometh idetm ato oraitm ato׃ 
john 14:8	oiamr alio pilpos adni hrano na at hab odi lno׃ 
john 14:9	oiamr alio ihoSe ch kmh imim anki atkm oath pilpos hTrm tdeni hrah ati rah at hab olmh ch tamr hrano at hab׃ 
john 14:10	haink mamin ki anki babi oabi bi hoa hdbrim aSr adbr alikm la mnpSi anki dbr ki abi hSkn bqrbi hoa eSh at hmeSim׃ 
john 14:11	hamino li ki anki babi oabi bi hoa oam la ak bgll hmeSim hamino li׃ 
john 14:12	amn amn ani amr lkm hmamin bi ieSh gm hoa at hmeSim aSr anki eSh ogdlot malh ieSh ki ani holk al abi׃ 
john 14:13	okl aSr tSalo bSmi aeSno lmen ikbd hab bbno׃ 
john 14:14	ki tSalo dbr bSmi ani aeSno׃ 
john 14:15	am ahbtm ati at mzoti tSmro׃ 
john 14:16	oani aSalh mabi ohoa itn lkm prqliT aHr aSr iSkn atkm lnzH׃ 
john 14:17	at roH hamt aSr la ikl heolm lhSigo baSr la iraho ola ideho oatm idetm ato ki atkm Skn hoa ap ihih btokkm׃ 
john 14:18	la aecbkm itomim aboah alikm׃ 
john 14:19	eod meT oheolm la iosip lraot ati oatm traoni ki Hi ani ogm atm Hih tHio׃ 
john 14:20	ohih biom hhoa idoe tdeo ki ani babi oatm bi oani bkm׃ 
john 14:21	mi aSr mzoti ato oinzrn ch hoa aSr iahbni oahbi ahob hoa labi oani ahbho oalio atode׃ 
john 14:22	oiamr alio ihodh la ihodh aiS qriot adni mh hoa ch ki tHpz lhtode alino ola leolm׃ 
john 14:23	oien ihoSe oiamr alio aiS ki iahbni iSmr at dbri oabi iahb ato onboah alio onSim azlo meontno׃ 
john 14:24	oaSr la iahbni hoa la iSmr at dbri ohdbr aSr Smetm la Sli hoa ki am Sl abi aSr SlHni׃ 
john 14:25	at alh dbrti alikm beod hioti emkm׃ 
john 14:26	ohprqliT toH hqdS aSr iSlHno abi bSmi hoa ilmdkm at kl oickirkm at kl aSr hgdti lkm׃ 
john 14:27	Slom aniH lkm at Slomi atn lkm la kaSr itn heolm anki ntn lkm al ibhl lbbkm oal iHt׃ 
john 14:28	hla Smetm ki amrti alikm alk li oaSobh alikm am ahb tahboni ki eth tSmHo bamri lkm ki hlk ani al hab ki abi gdol mmni׃ 
john 14:29	oeth hnh hgdti cat lkm bTrm hioth lmen bboah tamino׃ 
john 14:30	la arbh eod amrim emkm ki iboa Sr heolm hch obi ain lo maomh׃ 
john 14:31	ak lmen ide heolm ki at abi ani ahb okaSr zoni abi kn ani eSh qomo onlkh mch׃ 
john 15:1	anki hgpn hamtit oabi hoa hkrm׃ 
john 15:2	kl Srig bi aSr ainno eSh pri isirno oaSr ieSh pri iThrno lhrbot at prio׃ 
john 15:3	atm ket mThrim bebor dbri aSr dbrti alikm׃ 
john 15:4	emdo bi oani bkm kaSr hSrig bl ieSh pri malio am la iemd bgpn kn gm atm am la temdo bi׃ 
john 15:5	anki hoa hgpn oatm hSrigim hemd bi oani bo hoa ieSh pri lrb ki bledi la toklon eSot maomh׃ 
john 15:6	aiS aSr la iemd bi hSlk kSrig hHozh oiibS oilqTom oiSlikom al tok haS ohih lber׃ 
john 15:7	ohih am temdo bi odbri ihio bkm kkl Hpzkm tSalo oieSh lkm׃ 
john 15:8	bcat nkbd abi beSotkm pri lrb ohiitm li ltlmidim׃ 
john 15:9	kaSr ahbni abi ahbti atkm gm ani oatm emdo bahbti׃ 
john 15:10	am tSmro at mzoti temdo bahbti kaSr Smrti gm ani at mzot abi oemdti bahbto׃ 
john 15:11	at alh dbrti alikm bebor thih SmHti bkm otmla SmHtkm׃ 
john 15:12	hnh cat mzoti ki tahbon aiS at aHio kaSr ahbtikm׃ 
john 15:13	ain laiS ahbh itrh mtto at npSo bed ididio׃ 
john 15:14	oatm ididi atm am teSo at aSr ani mzoh atkm׃ 
john 15:15	la aqra lkm eod ebdim ki hebd ainno ide at aSr ieSh adnio ki am amrti ididi atm ki kl aSr Smeti mat abi hodeti atkm׃ 
john 15:16	la atm bHrtm bi ki am anki bHrti bkm ohpqdti atkm llkt oleSot pri oprikm iqom ohih kl aSr tSalo mabi bSmi itn lkm׃ 
john 15:17	at alh ani mzoh atkm lmen tahbon aiS at aHio׃ 
john 15:18	am heolm Sna atkm deo ki ati Sna raSonh׃ 
john 15:19	alo mn heolm hiitm ki ac ahb heolm at aSr lo oien ki ainkm mn heolm ki am bHrti atkm mtok heolm lkn heolm iSna atkm׃ 
john 15:20	ckro at dbri aSr dbrti alikm hebd ainno gdol madnio am rdpo ati gm atkm irdpo am Smro at dbri gm at dbrkm iSmro׃ 
john 15:21	abl kl cat ieSo lkm bebor Smi ki la ideo at SlHi׃ 
john 15:22	lola bati odbrti alihm la hih bhm HTa oeth la ioklon lhtnzl el HTatm׃ 
john 15:23	hSna ati iSna gm at abi׃ 
john 15:24	lola eSiti btokm at hmeSim aSr aiS colti la eSh la hih bhm HTa oeth rao oiSnao gm ati gm at abi׃ 
john 15:25	ak lmlat dbr hktob btortm Snat Hnm Snaoni׃ 
john 15:26	obboa hprqliT aSr aSlHno lkm mat abi roH hamt hioza mat abi hoa ieid eli׃ 
john 15:27	ogm atm teido ki mraS hiitm emdi׃ 
john 16:1	at alh dbrti alikm lmen la tkSlo׃ 
john 16:2	hnh indo atkm oap bah hSeh aSr kl hrg atkm idmh lhqrib ebodh lalhim׃ 
john 16:3	okcat ieSo lkm ien gm at abi ogm ati la ideo׃ 
john 16:4	abl hgdti lkm at alh lmen aSr bba hSeh tckrom ki anki amrti alikm okalh la amrti alikm mraS ki hiiti emkm׃ 
john 16:5	oeth hlk anki al SlHi ola iSalni aiS mkm anh tlk׃ 
john 16:6	ak el dbri at alh alikm mla lbbkm ezbt׃ 
john 16:7	aolm hamt agid lkm ki lkti ak Tob lkm ki am la alk la iba alikm hprqliT oam alk aSlHho alikm׃ 
john 16:8	ohih bbao iokiH at heolm el dbr hHTa ohzdq ohmSpT׃ 
john 16:9	el hHTa ki la hamino bi׃ 
john 16:10	oel hzdq ki alk al abi ola tosipo lraot ati׃ 
john 16:11	oel hmSpT ki ndon Sr heolm hch׃ 
john 16:12	eod rbot li lhgid lkm ak la toklon Sat eth׃ 
john 16:13	oroH hamt bbao hoa idrik atkm al kl hamt ki la idbr mezmo ki am aSr iSme idbr ohatiot igid lkm׃ 
john 16:14	hoa iparni ki mSli iqH oigid lkm׃ 
john 16:15	kl aSr labi li hoa el kn amrti ki mSli iqH oigid lkm׃ 
john 16:16	hn meT ola traoni oeod meT otHconi ki ani hlk al abi׃ 
john 16:17	omqzt tlmidio ndbro aiS al aHio lamr mh ch amr alino hn meT ola traoni oeod meT otHconi oamro ani hlk al abi׃ 
john 16:18	oiamro mh ch aSr amr meT la ideno mh dbr׃ 
john 16:19	oide ihoSe ki em lbbm lSal ato oiamr alihm hel cat atm drSim binikm ki amrti hn meT ola traoni oeod meT otHconi׃ 
john 16:20	amn amn ani amr lkm ki atm tbko otililo oheolm iSmH hn atm tezbo akn ezbkm ihpk lSSon׃ 
john 16:21	haSh bldth ezb lh ki bah eth oaHri ildh at hild la tckr eod at ezbonh mSmHth ki adm nold leolm׃ 
john 16:22	ogm atm ket ttezbo ak aSob arah atkm oSS lbkm oain lqH SmHtkm mkm׃ 
john 16:23	obiom hhoa la tSaloni dbr amn amn ani amr lkm ki kl aSr tSalo mat abi bSmi itnno lkm׃ 
john 16:24	ed eth la Saltm dbr bSmi Salo otqHo lmen tmla SmHtkm׃ 
john 16:25	at alh dbrti alikm bmSlim akn Seh bah ola adbr eod alikm bmSlim ki am bror amll lkm el abi׃ 
john 16:26	biom hhoa tSalo bSmi oainni amr lkm ki ani aetir labi bedkm׃ 
john 16:27	ki abi gm hoa ahb atkm eqb aSr ahbtoni ohamntm ki mat alhim izati׃ 
john 16:28	mat hab izati oaba leolm aSobh aecb at heolm oalk al abi׃ 
john 16:29	oiamro alio tlmidio hnh ket bror tmll ola tmSl mSl׃ 
john 16:30	eth ideno ki kl idet ola tzTrk ki iSalk aiS bcat namin ki mat alhim izat׃ 
john 16:31	oien atm ihoSe eth tamino׃ 
john 16:32	hnh Seh bah oeth ch hgieh onpzotm aiS aiS lbito oati tecbo lbdi oainni lbdi ki abi emdi׃ 
john 16:33	at alh dbrti alikm lmen bi ihih lkm Slom beolm ihih lkm eni ak iamz lbbkm ani nzHti at heolm׃ 
john 17:1	at alh dbr ihoSe oiSa einio hSmimh oiamr abi hnh bah hSeh par at bnk lmen gm bnk ipark׃ 
john 17:2	kaSr ntt lo hSlTn el kl bSr lmen itn Hii eolmim lkl aSr ntt lo׃ 
john 17:3	oalh hm Hii heolmim ldet atk aSr ath lbdk al amt oat ihoSe hmSiH aSr SlHt׃ 
john 17:4	ani partik barz kliti pelk aSr zoitni leSot׃ 
john 17:5	oeth parni ath abi emk bkbod aSr hih li emk Trm hiot heolm׃ 
john 17:6	at Smk hodeti lbni hadm aSr nttm li mtok heolm lk hio oli ntt atm oat dbrk nzro׃ 
john 17:7	oeth ideo ki kl aSr ntt li memk hoa׃ 
john 17:8	ki hdbrim aSr ntt li ntti lhm ohm qblom oikiro bamt ki memk izati oiamino ki ath SlHtni׃ 
john 17:9	ani bedm aetir lk la bed heolm aetir ki am bed alh aSr ntt li ki lk hmh׃ 
john 17:10	okl aSr li lk hoa oSlk Sli ontparti bhm׃ 
john 17:11	oani ainni eod beolm ohm beolm hmh oani ba alik abi hqdoS nzr bSmk at aSr nttm li lmen ihio aHd kmno׃ 
john 17:12	bhioti emhm beolm ani nzrti atm bSmk at aSr nttm li Smrti ola abd mhm aiS colti bn habdon lmlat dbr hktob׃ 
john 17:13	oeth hnni ba alik oalh ani mdbr beolm lmen tmla lhm SmHti bqrbm׃ 
john 17:14	ani ntti lhm at dbrk oheolm Sna atm ien ki la mn heolm hmh kaSr gm anki la mn heolm ani׃ 
john 17:15	ola aetir lk aSr tqHm mn heolm rq Stzrm mn hre׃ 
john 17:16	mn heolm ainmo kaSr gm anki ainni mn heolm׃ 
john 17:17	qdS atm bamtk dbrk amt hoa׃ 
john 17:18	kaSr ath SlHt ati al heolm kn gm ani SlHti atm al heolm׃ 
john 17:19	ohtqdSti bedm lmen ihio gm hm mqdSim bamt׃ 
john 17:20	aolm la lbd bed alh anki metir lk ki am gm bed hmaminim bi el pi dbrm׃ 
john 17:21	lmen ihio klm aHd kaSr ath abi bi ath oani bk ohio gm hmh bno kaSr lmen iamin heolm ki ath SlHtni׃ 
john 17:22	oani ntti lhm at hkbod aSr ntt li lmen ihio aHd kaSr anHno aHd nHno׃ 
john 17:23	ani bhm oath bi lmen ihio mSlmim laHd olmen ide heolm ki ath SlHtni oahbt atm kaSr ahbtni׃ 
john 17:24	abi Hpzti ki gm hm aSr nttm li ihio emi baSr ahih ani lmen iHco at kbodi aSr ntt li ki ahbtni lpni mosdot eolm׃ 
john 17:25	abi hzdiq hn heolm la idek oani idetik oalh hkiro ki ath SlHtni׃ 
john 17:26	oani hodetim at Smk oaosip lhodiem lmen thih bm hahbh aSr ahbtni oani ahih bhm׃ 
john 18:1	oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at hdbrim halh oiza hHozh em tlmidio mebr lnHl qdron oSm gn oiba bo hoa otlmidio׃ 
john 18:2	ogm ihodh mosro ide at hmqom ki pemim rbot noed Smh ihoSe em tlmidio׃ 
john 18:3	oiqH ihodh at hgdod omSrtim mat hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim oiba Smh bnrot oblpidim obkli nSq׃ 
john 18:4	oihoSe ide at kl aSr iba elio oiza oiamr alihm at mi tbqSo׃ 
john 18:5	oieno oiamro at ihoSe hnzri oiamr alihm ihoSe ani hoa ogm ihodh mosro emd azlm׃ 
john 18:6	oihi bdbr ihoSe alihm ani hoa oisgo aHor oiplo arzh׃ 
john 18:7	oisp oiSal atm at mi tbqSo oiamro at ihoSe hnzri׃ 
john 18:8	oien ihoSe hla amrti lkm ani hoa lkn am ati tbqSo hniHo lalh oilko׃ 
john 18:9	lmlat hdbr aSr amr malh aSr ntt li la abd li ap aHd׃ 
john 18:10	olSmeon pTros Hrb oiSlph oik at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno himnit oSm hebd mlkos׃ 
john 18:11	oiamr ihoSe al pTros hSb Hrbk al ndnh hki la aSth at hkos aSr ntn li abi׃ 
john 18:12	ac tpSo hgdod oSr halp omSrti hihodim at ihoSe oiasrho׃ 
john 18:13	oiolikho braSonh al Hnn ohoa Htn qipa aSr SmS bkhnh gdolh bSnh hhia׃ 
john 18:14	hoa qipa aSr iez at hihodim ki Tob aSr aiS aHd iabd bed kl hem׃ 
john 18:15	oSmeon pTros otlmid aHr hlko aHri ihoSe ohtlmid hhoa hih node lkhn hgdol oiba em ihoSe lHzr hkhn hgdol׃ 
john 18:16	opTros emd mHoz lptH oiza htlmid haHr hmide lkhn hgdol oidbr al hSert oiba at pTros pnimh׃ 
john 18:17	otamr hamh hSert al pTros hla gm ath mtlmidi haiS hch oiamr ainni׃ 
john 18:18	ohebdim ohmSrtim bero aS gHlim ki et qr hith oiemdo Sm oitHmmo ogm pTros emd emm omtHmm׃ 
john 18:19	oiSal hkhn hgdol at ihoSe el tlmidio oel lqHo׃ 
john 18:20	oien ato ihoSe anki bgloi dbrti al heolm otmid lmdti bbit hknst obbit hmqdS aSr kl hihodim nqhlim Smh ola dbrti dbr bstr׃ 
john 18:21	omh tSal ati Sal na at hSmeim mh Sdbrti alihm hnm iodeim at aSr amrti׃ 
john 18:22	oihi kdbro hdbrim halh oik aHd hmSrtim hemd Smh at ihoSe el hlHi oiamr hkcat tenh at hkhn hgdol׃ 
john 18:23	oien aoto ihoSe am reh dbrti tnh ed ki reh hia oam Tob mdoe tsTrni׃ 
john 18:24	oiSlHho Hnn asor bcqim al qipa hkhn hgdol׃ 
john 18:25	oSmeon pTros emd omtHmm oiamro alio hla gm ath mtlmidio oikHS oiamr ainni׃ 
john 18:26	oiamr aiS mebdi hkhn hgdol ohoa mode laSr qzz pTros at acno hla raitik emo btok hgn׃ 
john 18:27	oisp pTros lkHS optam qra htrngol׃ 
john 18:28	oioliko at ihoSe mbit qipa al bit hmSpT oihi bbqr hSkm ohmh la nknso al bit hmSpT lmen aSr la iTmao ki am iaklo at hpsH׃ 
john 18:29	oiza pilTos alihm oiamr el mh taSimo at haiS hch׃ 
john 18:30	oieno oiamro alio lola hih ch eSh re ki eth la hsgrnho alik׃ 
john 18:31	oiamr alihm pilTos qHho atm emkm oeSo mSpTo ktortkm oiamro alio hihodim ain lno rSion lhmit aiS׃ 
john 18:32	lmlat dbr ihoSe aSr dbr lrmc ai ch mot etid hoa lmot׃ 
john 18:33	oiSb pilTos al bit hmSpT oiqra al ihoSe oiamr alio hath hoa mlk hihodim׃ 
john 18:34	oien ato ihoSe hmlbk tdbr cat ao aHrim hgido lk eli׃ 
john 18:35	oien pilTos hap anki ihodi hla emk oraSi hkhnim hsgirok ali mh eSit׃ 
john 18:36	oien ihoSe mlkoti ainnh mn heolm hch am hith mlkoti mn heolm hch ki ac nlHmo li mSrti lblti hmsr bid hihodim oeth mlkoti ainnh mph׃ 
john 18:37	oiamr alio pilTos am kn apoa mlk ath oien ihoSe ath amrt ki mlk anki lch noldti olch bati beolm lheid lamt kl aSr hoa mn hamt iSme bqoli׃ 
john 18:38	oiamr alio pilTos mh hia hamt oaHri dbro cat iza Snit al hihodim oiamr alihm ani la mzati bo kl eon׃ 
john 18:39	hn mnhg hoa bkm ki aSlH lkm aiS aHd HpSi bpsH hiS at npSkm ki aSlH lkm at mlk hihodim׃
