john 19:1	ac lqH pilTos at ihoSe oiisrho bSoTim׃ 
john 19:2	oiSrgo anSi hzba eTrt qzim oiSimo ato el raSo oieTho lboS argmn׃ 
john 19:3	oiamro Slom lk mlk hihodim oikho el hlHi׃ 
john 19:4	oiza pilTos eod hHozh oiamr alihm hnni mozia ato alikm lmen tdeo ki la mzati bo kl eon׃ 
john 19:5	oihoSe iza hHoz oelio eTrt hqzim olboS hargmn oiamr alihm pilTos hnh hadm׃ 
john 19:6	oihi kaSr raho hkhnim hgdolim ohmSrtim oizeqo lamr hzlb hzlb oiamr alihm pilTos qHho atm ohzlibho ki anki la mzati bo aSmh׃ 
john 19:7	oieno hihodim torh iS lno oel pi tortno Hib mot hoa ki eSh ezmo lbn alhim׃ 
john 19:8	oihi kSme pilTos at hdbr hch oiasp lra eod׃ 
john 19:9	oiSb oiba al bit hmSpT oiamr al ihoSe main ath ola hSibo ihoSe dbr׃ 
john 19:10	oiamr alio pilTos ali la tdbr hla idet ki iS lal idi lzlbk oiS lal idi lSlHk׃ 
john 19:11	oien ihoSe la hith lk rSot eli lola ntn lk mlmelh lkn eon hmsgir ati alik gdol meonk׃ 
john 19:12	ac ibqS pilTos lSlHo ohihodim zeqo oiamro am tSlH at ch aink ahb lqisr ki kl hmtnSa lhiot mlk mrd hoa bqisr׃ 
john 19:13	oihi kSme pilTos at hdbr hch hozia at ihoSe hHozh oiSb el ksa hmSpT bmqom hnqra bSm rzph oblSonm gbta׃ 
john 19:14	oac hith hknt hpsH ohSeh kSeh hSSit oiamr al hihodim hnh mlkkm ohm zeqo Tol Tol zlb ato׃ 
john 19:15	oiamr alihm pilTos hzlb azlb at mlkkm oieno raSi hkhnim ain lno mlk ki am hqisr׃ 
john 19:16	ac msro alihm lhzlibo oiqHo at ihoSe oiolikho׃ 
john 19:17	oiSa at zlbo oiza al hmqom hnqra mqom hglglt oblSonm glglta׃ 
john 19:18	oizlbo ato Smh oSni anSim aHrim emo mch aHd omch aHd oihoSe btok׃ 
john 19:19	opilTos ktb el loH oiSm el hzlb och mktbo ihoSe hnzri mlk hihodim׃ 
john 19:20	oihodim rbim qrao at hmktb hch ki hmqom aSr nzlb Sm ihoSe hih qrob al heir ohmktb hih blSon ebr ion oromi׃ 
john 19:21	oiamro raSi khni hihodim al pilTos al na tktb mlk hihodim ki am aSr amr ani mlk hihodim׃ 
john 19:22	oien pilTos oiamr at aSr ktbti ktbti׃ 
john 19:23	oihi kaSr zlbo anSi hzba at ihoSe oiqHo at bgdio oiHlqom larbeh Hlqim laiS aiS Hlq aHd ogm at ktnto ohktnt la hith tporh ki am meSh arg mlmelh oed qzh׃ 
john 19:24	oiamro aiS al aHio al na nqreh lqreim ak npil elih gorl lmi thih lmlat dbr hktob iHlqo bgdi lhm oel lboSi ipilo gorl oieSo kn anSi hzba׃ 
john 19:25	oel id zlb ihoSe emdo amo oaHot amo mrim aSt qlops omrim hmgdlit׃ 
john 19:26	oira ihoSe at amo oat tlmido aSr ahb emdim azlo oiamr al amo aSh hnh ch bnk׃ 
john 19:27	oaHr amr al tlmido hnh cat amk omn hSeh hhia asp ath htlmid al bito׃ 
john 19:28	oihi maHri kn kaSr ide ihoSe ki eth ch klh hkl lmen imla hktob klo amr zmati׃ 
john 19:29	oSm kli mla Hmz oiTblo spog bHmz oiSimho el acob oiqribho al pio׃ 
john 19:30	oiqH ihoSe at hHmz oiamr klh oiT at raSo oipqd at roHo׃ 
john 19:31	olmen la tSarnh hgoiot el hzlb biom hSbt ki erb Sbt hih ogdol iom hSbt hhoa Salo hihodim mn pilTos lSbr at Soqihm olhorid atm׃ 
john 19:32	oibao anSi hzba oiSbro at Soqi hraSon ohSni hnzlbim emo׃ 
john 19:33	oibao al ihoSe obratm ki kbr mt la Sbro at Soqio׃ 
john 19:34	ak aHd manSi hzba dqr bHnit at zdo okrge iza dm omim׃ 
john 19:35	ohrah cat heid oedoto namnh ohoa iode ki hamt igid lmen gm atm tamino׃ 
john 19:36	ki kl cat hith lmlat hktob oezm la tSbro bo׃ 
john 19:37	oeod ktob aHr amr ohbiT alio at aSr dqro׃ 
john 19:38	oihi aHri kn ba iosp hrmti ohoa tlmid ihoSe ak bstr mpni hihodim oiSal mat pilTos aSr itnho lSat at gopt ihoSe oinH lo pilTos oiba oiSa at gopt ihoSe׃ 
john 19:39	oiba gm nqdimon aSr ba lpnim blilh al ihoSe oiba erob mr oahlot kmah liTrin׃ 
john 19:40	oiqHo at gopt ihoSe oiHtloh btkrikin em hbSmim kaSr nhgim hihodim lqbr at mtihm׃ 
john 19:41	obmqom aSr nzlb Sm hih gn obgn qbr HdS aSr la hoSm bo aiS ed eth׃ 
john 19:42	Sm Smo at ihoSe ki erb Sbt hih lihodim ohqbr qrob׃ 
john 20:1	oihi baHd bSbt lpnot hbqr beod HSk otba mrim hmgdlit al hqbr otra at habn mosrh mel hqbr׃ 
john 20:2	otrz otba al Smeon pTros oal htlmid haHr aSr HSq bo ihoSe otamr alihm hnh nSao at hadon mqbro ola ideno aiph hniHho׃ 
john 20:3	oiza pTros ohtlmid haHr oilko al hqbr׃ 
john 20:4	oirozo Snihm iHdo oimhr htlmid haHr lroz oiebr at pTros oiba raSonh al hqbr׃ 
john 20:5	oiSqp al toko oira at htkrikin mnHim ak la ba pnimh׃ 
john 20:6	oiba Smeon pTros aHrio ohoa nkns al hqbr oira at htkrikin mnHim׃ 
john 20:7	ohsodr aSr hith el raSo ainnh mnHt azl htkrikin ki am mqplt lbdh bmqomh׃ 
john 20:8	oiba Smh gm htlmid haHr aSr ba raSonh al hqbr oira oiamn׃ 
john 20:9	ki la hbino ed eth at hktob aSr qom iqom mem hmtim׃ 
john 20:10	oiSobo htlmidim oilko al bitm׃ 
john 20:11	omrim emdh bokih mHoz lqbr oihi bbkoth otSqp al tok hqbr׃ 
john 20:12	otra Sni mlakim lboSi lbnim iSbim bmqom aSr Smo Sm at gopt ihoSe aHd mraSotio oaHd mrglotio׃ 
john 20:13	oiamro alih aSh lmh tbki otamr alihm ki nSao mch at adni ola ideti aiph hniHho׃ 
john 20:14	oihi bdbrh cat otpn aHrih otra at ihoSe emd ola ideh ki hoa ihoSe׃ 
john 20:15	oiamr alih ihoSe aSh lmh tbki at mi tbqSi ohia HSbh ki hoa Smr hgn otamr alio adni am ath nSat ato mch hgidh na li aiph hnHto olqHtio mSm׃ 
john 20:16	oiamr alih ihoSe mrim otpn otamr alio rboni hoa morh׃ 
john 20:17	oiamr alih ihoSe al tgei bi ki eod la eliti al abi ak lki na al aHi oamri alihm ani elh al abi oabikm oal alhi oalhikm׃ 
john 20:18	otba mrim hmgdlit otspr al htlmidim ki rath at hadon okcat dbr alih׃ 
john 20:19	oihi let erb biom hhoa ohoa aHd bSbt kaSr nsgro dltot hbit aSr nqbzo Sm htlmidim mirat hihodim oiba ihoSe oiemd binihm oiamr alihm Slom lkm׃ 
john 20:20	obdbro cat hrah atm at idio oat zdo oiSmHo htlmidim braotm at hadon׃ 
john 20:21	oisp ihoSe ldbr alihm Slom lkm kaSr SlH ati hab kn anki SlH atkm׃ 
john 20:22	oihi bdbro cat oipH bhm oiamr alihm qHo lkm at roH hqdS׃ 
john 20:23	ohih kl aSr tslHo at HTatm onslH lhm oaSr taSimo iaSmo׃ 
john 20:24	otoma aHd mSnim heSr hnqra didomos la hih btokm kboa ihoSe׃ 
john 20:25	oigido lo htlmidim hnSarim rah raino at hadon oiamr alihm am la arah bidio at rSm hmsmrot oaSim at azbeti bmqom hmsmrot oaSim at idi bzdo la aamin׃ 
john 20:26	oihi mqzh Smont imim otlmidio Snit pnimh otoma emhm oiba ihoSe ohdltot msgrot oiemd binihm oiamr Slom lkm׃ 
john 20:27	oaHr amr al toma SlH azbek hnh orah at idi oSlH at idk hnh oSim bzdi oal thi Hsr amonh ki am mamin׃ 
john 20:28	oien toma oiamr alio adni oalhi׃ 
john 20:29	oiamr alio ihoSe ien rait ati hamnt aSri hmaminim oainm raim׃ 
john 20:30	ohnh gm atot aHrim rbim eSh ihoSe leini tlmidio aSr la nktbo bspr hch׃ 
john 20:31	ak alh nktbo lmen tamino ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH bn alhim olmen ihio lkm hmaminim Hii eolm bSmo׃ 
john 21:1	oihi aHri kn oisp ihoSe hglot al tlmidio el im Tibrih okh nglh alihm׃ 
john 21:2	Smeon pTros otoma hnqra didomos ontnal mqnh aSr barz hglil obni cbdi oeod Snim aHrim mtlmidio iSbo iHdo׃ 
john 21:3	oiamr alihm Smeon pTros hnni hlk ldig oiamro alio gm anHno nlk emk oizao oimhro lrdt al hanih oblilh hhoa la aHco maomh׃ 
john 21:4	hbqr aor oihoSe emd el Spt him ola ideo htlmidim ki ihoSe hoa׃ 
john 21:5	oiamr alihm ihoSe bni hiS lkm akl maomh oieno ato ain׃ 
john 21:6	oiamr lhm hSliko hmkmrt mimin lanih otmzao oiSliko ola iklo eod lmSk ath mrb hdgim׃ 
john 21:7	oiamr htlmid hhoa aSr ihoSe ahbo al pTros ch hoa hadon oihi kSme Smeon pTros ki hoa hadon oiHgr at meilo ki eirom hih oitnpl al him׃ 
john 21:8	ohtlmidim hnSarim bao bspinh ki la hrHiqo mn hibSh ki am kmatim amh oimSko at hmkmrt em hdgim׃ 
john 21:9	oihi kzatm al hibSh oirao Sm gHli aS erokim odgim elihm olHm lakl׃ 
john 21:10	oiamr alihm ihoSe hbiao hlm mn hdgim aSr aHctm eth׃ 
john 21:11	oiel Smeon pTros oimSk at hmkmrt al hibSh ohia mlah dgim gdolim mah oHmSim oSlSh ola nqreh hmkmrt ap ki rbim hio׃ 
john 21:12	oiamr alihm ihoSe bao bro lHm oain gm aHd btlmidim aSr mlao lbo lSal ato mi ath ki ideo aSr hoa hadon׃ 
john 21:13	oiba ihoSe oiqH at hlHm oitn lhm ogm at hdgim׃ 
john 21:14	ocat hia hpem hSliSit aSr nglh ihoSe al tlmidio aHri qomo mem hmtim׃ 
john 21:15	oihi aHri aklm amr ihoSe al Smeon pTros Smeon bn ionh htahb ati iotr malh oiamr alio kn adni ath idet ki ahbtik oiamr alio reh at Tlai׃ 
john 21:16	oiamr alio eod hpem Smeon bn ionh htahb ati oiamr alio kn adni ath idet ki ahbtik oiamr alio nhg at zani׃ 
john 21:17	oiamr alio pem SliSit Smeon bn ionh htahb ati oitezb pTros el ki amr alio bSliSit htahb ati oiamr alio adni at kl ath iode oidet ki ahbtik oiamr alio ihoSe reh at zani׃ 
john 21:18	amn amn ani amr lk bhiotk zeir limim ath Hgrt at ezmk otlk al aSr Hpzt ohih kaSr tcqn oprSt kpik oaHr iHgrk onSak al aSr la tHpz׃ 
john 21:19	okl cat dbr lrmc el hmith aSr ikbd bh at halhim oihi kkloto ldbr oiamr alio lk aHri׃ 
john 21:20	oipn pTros oira at htlmid aSr ihoSe ahbo hlk aHrihm hoa hnpl el lbo bet hseodh ogm Sal adni mi hoa ch aSr imsrk׃ 
john 21:21	oihi braot ato pTros oiamr al ihoSe adni och mh hoa׃ 
john 21:22	oiamr alio ihoSe am Hpzi ki iSar ed bai mh lk olcat ath lk aHri׃ 
john 21:23	el kn iza hdbr hch bin haHim ki htlmid hhoa la imot oihoSe la amr lo ki la imot ak amr am Hpzi ki iSar ed bai mh ch lk׃ 
john 21:24	ch hoa htlmid hmeid el alh oaSr ktb kl cat oideno ki edoto namnh׃ 
john 21:25	oiS eod meSim rbim aHrim aSr eSh ihoSe oam iktbo klm laHd aHd aHSbh ki gm heolm klo la ikil at hsprim aSr iktbo amn׃

revelation 1:2	aSr heid dbr halhim oedot ihoSe hmSiH oat kl aSr rah׃ 
revelation 1:3	aSri hqora oaSri hSmeim at dbri hnboah oSmrim at aSr ktob bh ki qrobh het׃

revelation 2:3	oath nSat hrbh oiS lk sblnot olmen Smi la iept׃ 
revelation 2:4	ak iS li elik ki ecbt at ahbtk hraSonh׃

revelation 2:6	abl cat hia lk ki tSna at meSi hniqlsiim aSr Snatim gm ani׃
